tadbrūhi nijavṛttantaṃ janmanaḥ prabhṛti prabho / māṃ pavitraya bhūyo 'pi na gopyaṃ yadi mādṛśe // 1.2.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vararucistasya praṇatasyānurodhataḥ / sarvamājanmavṛttāntaṃ vistarādidamabravīt // 1.2.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kauśāmbyāṃ somadattākhyo nāmnāgniśikha ityapi / dvijo 'bhūttasya bhāryā ca vasudattābhidhābhavat // 1.2.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
munikanyā ca sā śāpāttasyāṃ jātāvavātarat / tasyāṃ tasmāddvijavarādeṣa jāto 'smi śāpataḥ // 1.2.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tato mamātibālasya pitā pañcatvamāgataḥ / atiṣṭhadvardhayantī tu mātā māṃ kṛcchrakarmabhiḥ // 1.2.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athābhyagacchatāṃ viprau dvāvasmadgṛhamekadā / ekarātrinivāsārthaṃ dūrādhvaparidhūsarau // 1.2.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tiṣṭhatos tatra ca tayor udabhūn murajadhvaniḥ / tena māmabravīnmātā bhartuḥ smṛtvā sagadgadam // 1.2.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
nṛtyatyeṣa piturmittraṃ tava nando naṭaḥ suta / ahamapyavadaṃ mātardraṣṭumetadvrajāmyaham // 1.2.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tavāpi darśayiṣyāmi sapāṭhaṃ sarvameva tat / etanmadvacanaṃ śrutvā viprau tau vismayaṃ gatau // 1.2.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avocattau ca manmātā he putrau nātra saṃśayaḥ / sakṛcchrutamayaṃ bālaḥ sarvaṃ vai dhārayeddhṛdi // 1.2.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jijñāsārthamathābhyāṃ me prātiśākhyamapaṭhyata / tathaiva tanmayā sarvaṃ paṭhitaṃ paśyatostayoḥ // 1.2.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatastābhyāṃ samaṃ gatvā dṛṣṭvā nāṭyaṃ tathaiva tat / gṛhametyāgrato mātuḥ samagraṃ darśitaṃ mayā // 1.2.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekaśrutadharatvena māṃ niścitya kathāmimām / vyāḍināmā tayoreko manmātuḥ praṇato 'bravīt // 1.2.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

sakṛcchrutadharaṃ vipraṃ prāpyaitāstvaṃ prakāśayeḥ / ityādiṣṭaḥ sa tenaiva saharṣo 'yamihāgataḥ // 1.2.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āgatyaiva ca vṛttāntaṃ sarvaṃ mahyaṃ nyavedayat / tadā prabhṛtyavirataṃ japandhyāyaṃśca tiṣṭhati // 1.2.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)

athāvāṃ pṛthivīṃ bhrāntau na ca śrutadharaṃ kvacit / labdhavantau tataḥ śrāntau prāptāvadya gṛhaṃ tava // 1.2.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

kadācid yāti kāle 'tha kṛte svādhyāyakarmaṇi / iti varṣa upādyāyaḥ pṛṣṭo 'smābhiḥ kṛtāhnikaḥ // 1.3.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
idam evaṃvidhaṃ kasmān nagaraṃ kṣetratāṃ gatam / sarasvatyāś ca lakṣmyāś ca tadupādhyāya kathyatām // 1.3.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

dākṣiṇātyo dvijaḥ kaścit tapasyan bhāryayā saha / tatrāsīt tasya cātraiva jāyante sma trayaḥ sutāḥ // 1.3.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

alakṣitaṃ praviṣṭaṃ tamupakośedamabravīt / asnātaṃ na spṛśāmi tvāṃ tatsnāhi praviśāntaram // 1.4.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅgīkurvansa tanmūḍhaśceṭikābhiḥ praveśitaḥ / abhyantaragṛhaṃ guptamandhakāramayaṃ tataḥ // 1.4.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gṛhītvā tatra tasyāntarvastrāṇyābharaṇāni ca / celakhaṇḍaṃ tamekaṃ ca dattvāntarvāsasaḥ kṛte // 1.4.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ā śiraḥ pādamaṅgeṣu tābhistattailakajjalam / abhyaṅgabhaṅgyā pāpasya nyastaṃ ghanamapaśyataḥ // 1.4.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
atiṣṭhanmardayantyastatpratyaṅgaṃ yāvadasya tāḥ / tāvaddvitīye prahare sa purodhā upāgamat // 1.4.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
mittraṃ vararuceḥ prāptaḥ kimapyeṣa purohitaḥ / tadiha praviśetyuktvā ceṭyastāstaṃ tathāvidham // 1.4.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kumārasacivaṃ nagnaṃ mañjūṣāyāṃ sasaṃbhramam / nicikṣipurathābadhnannargalena bahiśca tām // 1.4.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi snānamiṣānnītastamasyantaḥ purohitaḥ / tathaiva hṛtavastrādistailakajjalamardanaiḥ // 1.4.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
celakhaṇḍadharastāvacceṭikābhirvimohitaḥ / yāvattṛtīye prahare daṇḍādhipatirāgamat // 1.4.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tadāgamanajāccaiva ceṭībhiḥ sahasā bhayāt / ādyavatso 'pi nikṣipto mañjūṣāyāṃ purohitaḥ // 1.4.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya dattvārgalaṃ tābhiḥ snānavyājāt praveśya saḥ / daṇḍādhipo 'pi tatraiva tāvatkajjalamardanaiḥ // 1.4.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyavadvipralabdho 'bhūccelakhaṇḍaikakarpaṭaḥ / yāvatsa paścime yāme vaṇiktatrāgato 'bhavat // 1.4.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taddarśanabhayaṃ dattvā kṣipto daṇḍādhipo 'pyatha / mañjūṣāyāṃ sa ceṭībhirdattaṃ ca bahirargalam // 1.4.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
te ca trayo 'ndhatāmisravasabhyāsodyatā iva / mañjūṣāyāṃ bhiyānyonyaṃ sparśaṃ labdhvāpi nālapan // 1.4.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dattvātha dīpaṃ gehe 'tra vaṇijaṃ taṃ praveśya sā / upakośāvadaddehi tanme bhartrārpitaṃ dhanam // 1.4.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tacchrutvā śūnyamālokya gṛhaṃ so 'pyavadacchaṭhaḥ / uktaṃ mayā dadāmyeva yadbhartrā sthāpitaṃ dhanam // 1.4.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upakośāpi mañjūṣāṃ śrāvayantī tato 'bravīt / etaddhiraṇyaguptasya vacaḥ śṛṇuta devatāḥ // 1.4.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā caiva nirvāpya dīpaṃ so 'py anyavadvaṇik / liptaḥ snānāpadeśena ceṭībhiḥ kajjalaiś ciram // 1.4.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha gaccha gatā rātrir ity uktaḥ sa niśākṣaye / anicchan galahastena tābhir nirvāsitas tataḥ // 1.4.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha cīraikavasano maṣīliptaḥ pade pade / bhakṣyamāṇaḥ śvabhiḥ prāpa lajjamāno nijaṃ gṛham // 1.4.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra dāsajanasyāpi tāṃ prakṣālayato maṣīm / nāśakatsaṃmukhe sthātuṃ kaṣṭo hyavinayakramaḥ // 1.4.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upakośāpy atha prātaś ceṭikānugatā gatā / gurūṇām anivedyaiva rājño nandasya mandiram // 1.4.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vaṇigghiraṇyagupto me bhartrā nyāsīkṛtaṃ dhanam / jihīrṣatīti vijñaptas tatra rājā tayā svayam // 1.4.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

upakośā tato 'vādītsanti me deva sākṣiṇaḥ / mañjūṣāyāṃ gataḥ kṣiptvā bhartā me gṛhadevatāḥ // 1.4.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svavācā puratastāsāmanenāṅgīkṛtaṃ dhanam / tāmānāyyeha mañjūṣāṃ pṛcchyantāṃ devatāstvayā // 1.4.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tacchrutvā vismayādrājā tadānayanamādiśat / tataḥ kṣaṇāt sā mañjūṣā prāpitā bahubhirjanaiḥ // 1.4.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
athopakośā vakti sma satyaṃ vadata devatāḥ / yaduktaṃ vaṇijānena tato yāta nijaṃ gṛham // 1.4.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
no ceddadāmyahaṃ yuṣmānsadasyudghāṭayāmi vā / tacchrutvā bhītabhītāste mañjūṣāsthā babhāṣire // 1.4.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
satyaṃ samakṣam asmākam anenāṅgīkṛtaṃ dhanam / tato niruttaraḥ sarvaṃ sa vaṇik tat prapadyata // 1.4.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upakośāmathābhyarthya rājñā tvatikutūhalāt / sadasyudghāṭitā tatra mañjūṣā sphoṭitārgalā // 1.4.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
niṣkṛṣṭāste 'pi puruṣāstamaḥ piṇḍā iva trayaḥ / kṛcchrācca pratyabhijñātā mantribhirbhūbhṛtā tathā // 1.4.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
prahasatsvatha sarveṣu kimetaditi kautukāt / rājñā pṛṣṭā satī sarvamupakośā śaśaṃsa tat // 1.4.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
acintyaṃ śīlaguptānāṃ caritaṃ kulayoṣitām / iti cābhinanandustāmupakośāṃ sabhāsadaḥ // 1.4.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas te hṛtasarvasvāḥ paradāriṣiṇo 'khilāḥ / rājñā nirvāsitā deśādaśīlaṃ kasya bhūtaye // 1.4.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhaginī me tvamityuktvā dattvā prītyā dhanaṃ bahu / upakośāpi bhūpena preṣitā gṛhamāgamat // 1.4.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
varṣopavarṣau tadbuddhvā sādhvīṃ tāmabhyanandatām / sarvaśca vismayasmeraḥ pure tatrābhavajjanaḥ // 1.4.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
atrāntare tuṣārādrau kṛtvā tīvrataraṃ tapaḥ / ārādhito mayā devo varadaḥ pārvatīpatiḥ // 1.4.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadeva tena śāstraṃ me pāṇinīyaṃ prakāśitam / tadicchānugrahādeva mayā pūrṇīkṛtaṃ ca tat // 1.4.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'haṃ gṛham āgaccham ajñātādhvapariśramaḥ / niśākarakalāmauliprasādāmṛtanirbharaḥ // 1.4.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha mātur gurūṇāṃ ca kṛtapādābhivandanaḥ / tatropakośāvṛttāntaṃ tam aśrauṣaṃ mahādbhutam // 1.4.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)

varṣo 'tha manmukhādaicchacchrotuṃ vyākaraṇaṃ navam / tataḥ prakāśitaṃ svāmikumāreṇaiva tasya tat // 1.4.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vyāḍīndradattābhyāṃ vijñapto dakṣiṇāṃ prati / gururvarṣo 'bravīt svarṇakoṭir me dīyatām iti // 1.4.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅgīkṛtya gurorvākyaṃ tau ca māmityavocatām / ehi rājñaḥ sakhe nandādyācituṃ gurudakṣiṇām // 1.4.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

vācā tenopakośā ca prāgdharmabhaginī kṛtā / ataḥ śyālaḥ sa te kiṃcittvadguṇaiḥ samavāpyate // 1.4.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti niścitya nandasya bhūpateḥ kaṭakaṃ vayam / ayodhyāsthamagacchāma trayaḥ sabrahmacāriṇaḥ // 1.4.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāptamātreṣu cāsmāsu sa rājā pañcatāṃ gataḥ / rāṣṭre kolāhalaṃ jātaṃ viṣādena sahaiva naḥ // 1.4.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

utsavākṣiptacitto 'yaṃ sarvaḥ parijanaḥ sthitaḥ / kṣaṇaṃ pratīkṣatāmeṣa vipro yāvaddadāmyaham // 1.4.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athaitya yoganandasya vyāḍinā kranditaṃ puraḥ / abrahmaṇyamanutkrāntajīvo yogasthito dvijaḥ // 1.4.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anāthaśava ityadya balāddagdhastavodaye / tacchrutvā yoganandasya kāpyavasthābhavacchucā // 1.4.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dehadāhātsthire tasmiñjāte nirgatya me dadau / suvarṇakoṭiṃ sa tataḥ śakaṭālo mahāmatiḥ // 1.4.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
yoganando 'tha vijane saśoko vyāḍimabravīt / śūdrībhūto 'smi vipro 'pi kiṃ śriyā sthirayāpi me // 1.4.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tacchrutvāśvāsya taṃ vyāḍiḥ kālocitamabhāṣata / jñāto 'si śakaṭālena tadenaṃ cintayādhunā // 1.4.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mahāmantrī hyayaṃ svecchamacirāttvāṃ vināśayet / pūrvanandasutaṃ kuryāc candraguptaṃ hi bhūmipam // 1.4.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

ityuktaiva gate vyāḍau dātuṃ tāṃ gurudakṣiṇām / tadaivānīya dattā me yoganandena mantritā // 1.4.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tasmānnāśaya yuktyainamiti mantre mayodite / yoganando 'ndhakūpāntaḥ śakaṭālaṃ tamakṣipat // 1.4.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tasmātsaṃbhakṣayatvekaḥ pratyahaṃ sajalānamūn / yaḥ śakto yoganandasya kartuṃ vairapratikriyām // 1.4.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvameva śakto bhuṅkṣvaitaditi putrāstamabruvan / prāṇebhyo 'pi hi dhīrāṇāṃ priyā śatrupratikriyā // 1.4.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa śakaṭālastaiḥ pratyahaṃ saktuvāribhiḥ / eka evākarod vṛttiṃ kaṣṭaṃ krūrā jigīṣavaḥ // 1.4.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abuddhvā cittam aprāpya visrambhaṃ prabhaviṣṇuṣu / na svecchaṃ vyavahartavyam ātmano bhūtim icchatā // 1.4.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

abhyetyaiva ca so 'vādīcciraṃ rājyaṃ sakhe 'stu te / āmantrito si gacchāmi tapastaptumahaṃ kvacit // 1.4.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

vyāḍis tato 'vadad rājañ śarīre kṣaṇanaśvare / evaṃprāyeṣv asāreṣu dhīmān ko nāma majjati // 1.4.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nahi mohayati prājñaṃ lakṣmīrmarumarīcikā / ityuktvaiva sa tatkālaṃ tapase niścito yayau // 1.4.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agamad atha yoganandaḥ pāṭaliputraṃ svarājanagaraṃ saḥ / bhogāya kāṇabhūte matsahitaḥ sakalasainyayutaḥ // 1.4.135	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
tatropakośāparicaryamāṇaḥ samudvahanmantridhurāṃ ca tasya / ahaṃ jananyā gurubhiś ca sākam āsādya lakṣmīmavasaṃ cirāya // 1.4.136	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
bahu tatra dine dine dyusindhuḥ kanakaṃ mahyamadāttapaḥ prasannā / vadati sma śarīriṇī ca sākṣān mama kāryāṇi sarasvatī sadaiva // 1.4.137	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
evamuktvā vararuciḥ punaretadavarṇayat / kālena yoganando 'tha kāmādivaśamāyayau // 1.5.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
gajendra iva mattaśca nāpaikṣata sa kiṃcana / akāṇḍapātopanatā kaṃ na lakṣmīr vimohayet // 1.5.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
acintayaṃ tataścāhaṃ rājā tāvadviśṛṅkhalaḥ / tatkāryacintayākrāntaḥ svadharmo me 'vasīdati // 1.5.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmādvaraṃ sahāyaṃ taṃ śakaṭālaṃ samuddhare / kriyetā cedviruddhaṃ ca kiṃ da kuryānmayi sthite // 1.5.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
niścityaitanmayābhyarthya rājānaṃ so 'ndhakūpataḥ / uddhṛtaḥ śakaṭālo 'tha mṛdavo hi dvijātayaḥ // 1.5.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
durjayo yoganando 'yaṃ sthite vararucāvataḥ / āśraye vaitasīṃ vṛttiṃ kālaṃ tāvatpratīkṣitum // 1.5.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti saṃcintya sa prājñaḥ śakaṭālo madicchayā / akarodrājakāryāṇi punaḥ saṃprāpya mantritām // 1.5.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kadācidyoganando 'tha nirgato nagarādvahiḥ / śliṣyatpañcāṅguliṃ hastaṃ gaṅgāmadhye vyalokayat // 1.5.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kimetaditi papraccha māmāhūya sa tatkṣaṇam / ahaṃ ca dve nijāṅgulyau diśi tasyāmadarśayam // 1.5.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena tasmiṃstirobhūte haste rājātivismayāt / bhūyo 'pi tadapṛcchanmāṃ tataścāhaṃ tamabravam // 1.5.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pañcabhirmilitaiḥ kiṃ yajjagatīha na sādhyate / ityuktavānasau hastaḥ śvāṅgulīḥ pañca darśayan // 1.5.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'sya rājan naṅgulyāv ete dve darśite mayā / aikacitye dvayoreva kimasādhyaṃ bhavediti // 1.5.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityukte gūḍhavijñāne samatuṣyattato nṛpaḥ / śakaṭālo vyaṣīdacca madbuddhiṃ vīkṣya durjayām // 1.5.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā yoganandaśca dṛṣṭavānmahiṣīṃ nijām / vātāyanāgrāt paśyantīṃ brāhmaṇātithimunmukham // 1.5.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tanmātrādeva kupito rājā viprasa tasya saḥ / ādiśadbadhamīrṣyā hi vivekaparipanthinī // 1.5.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
hantuṃ vadhyabhuvaṃ tasmin nīyamāne dvije tadā / ahasadgatajīvo 'pi matsyo vipaṇimadhyagaḥ // 1.5.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadaiva rājā tadbuddhvā vadhaṃ tasya nyavārayat / viprasya māmapṛcchacca matsyahāsasya kāraṇam // 1.5.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
nirūpya kathayāmyetadityuktvā nirgataṃ ca mām / cintitopasthitaikānte sarasvatyevamabravīt // 1.5.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asya tālataroḥ pṛṣṭhe tiṣṭha rātrābalakṣitaḥ / atra śroṣyasi matsyasya hāsahetum asaṃśayam // 1.5.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tacchrutvā niśi tatrāhaṃ gatvā tālopari sthitaḥ / apaśyaṃ rākṣasīṃ ghorāṃ bālaiḥ putraiḥ sahāgatam // 1.5.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā bhakṣyaṃ yācamānāṃstānavādītpratipālyatām / prātarvo vipramāṃsāni dāsyāmyadya hato na saḥ // 1.5.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kasmātsa na hato 'dyeti pṛṣṭā tairabravītpunaḥ / taṃ hi dṛṣṭva mṛto 'pīha matsyo hasitavāniti // 1.5.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hasitaṃ kimu teneti pṛṣṭā bhūyaḥ sutaiśca sā / avocadrākṣasī rājñaḥ sarvā rājño 'pi viplutāḥ // 1.5.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sarvatrāntaḥpure hyatra strīrūpāḥ puruṣāḥ sthitāḥ / hanyate 'naparādhas tu vipra ity ahasat timiḥ // 1.5.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhūtānāṃ pārthivātyarthanirvivekatvahāsinām / sarvāntaścāriṇāṃ hyetā bhavantyeva ca vikriyāḥ // 1.5.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etattasyā vacaḥ śrutvā tato 'pakrāntavāhanam / prāptaśca matsyahāsasya hetuṃ rājñe nyavedayam // 1.5.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāpya cāntaḥpurebhyas tān strīrūpān puruṣāṃs tataḥ / bahv amanyata māṃ rājā vadhādvipraṃ ca muktavān // 1.5.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityādi ceṣṭitaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasya rājño viśṛṅkhalam / khinne mayi kadācicca tatrāgāccitrakṛnnavaḥ // 1.5.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alikhat sa mahādevīṃ yoganandaṃ ca taṃ paṭe / sajīvam iva taccitraṃ vākceṣṭārahitaṃ tv abhūt // 1.5.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ ca citrakaraṃ rājā tuṣṭo vittairapūrayat / taṃ ca vāsagṛhe citrapaṭaṃ bhittāvakārayat // 1.5.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā ca praviṣṭasya vāsake tatra sā mama / saṃpūrṇalakṣaṇā devī pratibhāti sma citragā // 1.5.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
lakṣaṇāntarasaṃbandhādabhyūhya pratibhāvaśāt / athākārṣamahaṃ tasyāstilakaṃ mekhalāpade // 1.5.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃpūrṇalakṣaṇāṃ tena kṛtvaināṃ gatavānaham / praviṣṭo yoganando 'tha tilakaṃ taṃ vyalokayat // 1.5.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kenāyaṃ racito 'treti so 'pṛcchacca mahattarān / te ca nyavedayaṃstasmai kartāraṃ tilakasya mām // 1.5.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
devyā guptapradeśasthamimaṃ nānyo mayā vinā / vetti tajjñātavānevamasau vararuciḥ katham // 1.5.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
channaḥ kṛto 'munā nūnaṃ mamāntaḥpuraviplavaḥ / dṛṣṭavānata evāyaṃ strīrūpāṃstatra tānnarān // 1.5.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti saṃcintayāmāsa yoganandaḥ krudhā jvalan / jāyante bata mūḍhānāṃ saṃvāda api tādṛśāḥ // 1.5.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ svairaṃ samāhūya śakaṭālaṃ samādiśat / tvayā vararucirvadhyo devīvidhvaṃsanāditi // 1.5.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yathā jñāpayasītyuktvā śakaṭālo 'gamadbahiḥ / acintayacca śaktiḥ syāddhantuṃ vararuciṃ na me // 1.5.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
divyabuddhiprabhāvo 'sābuddhartā ca mamāpadaḥ / viprasya tadvaraṃ guptaṃ saṃprati svīkaromi tam // 1.5.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti niścitya so 'bhyetya rājñaḥ kopamakāraṇam / vadhāntaṃ kathayitvā me śakaṭālo 'bravīttataḥ // 1.5.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyaṃ kaṃcitpravādāya hanmyahaṃ tvaṃ ca madgṛhe / pracchannas tiṣṭha mām asmād rakṣituṃ kopanān nṛpāt // 1.5.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti tadvacanāc channas tadgṛhe 'vasthito 'bhavam / sa cānyaṃ hatavān kaṃcin madvadhākhyātaye niśi // 1.5.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ prayuktanītiṃ taṃ prītyāvocamahaṃ tadā / eko mantrī bhavānyena hantuṃ māṃ na kṛtā matiḥ // 1.5.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nahi hantumahaṃ śakyo rākṣaso mittramasti me / dhyātamātrāgato viśvaṃ grasate sa madicchayā // 1.5.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājā tvihendradattākhyaḥ sakhā vadhyo na me dvijaḥ / tacchrutvā so 'bravīnmantrī rakṣo me darśyatāmiti // 1.5.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato dhyātāgataṃ tasmi tadrakṣo 'hamadarśayam / taddarśanācca vitrasto vismitaśca vabhūva saḥ // 1.5.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rakṣasyantarhite tasmiñ śakaṭālaḥ sa māṃ punaḥ / kathaṃ te rākṣaso mittraṃ saṃjāta iti pṛṣṭavān // 1.5.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'hamavadaṃ pūrvaṃ rakṣārthaṃ nagare bhraman / rātrau rātrau kṣayaṃ prāpadekaiko nagarādhipaḥ // 1.5.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tacchrutvā yoganando māmakaronnagarādhipam / bhramaṃścāpaśyamatrāhaṃ bhramantaṃ rākṣasaṃ niśi // 1.5.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca māmavadadbrūhi vidyate nagare 'tra kā / surūpā strīti tacchrutvā vihasyāhaṃ tamabravam // 1.5.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yā yasyābhimatā mūrkha surūpā tasya sā bhavet / tacchrutvaiva tvayaikena jito 'smītyavadatsa mām // 1.5.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praśnamokṣādvadhottirṇaṃ māṃ punaścābravīdasau / tuṣṭo 'smīti suhṛnme tvaṃ saṃnidhāsye ca te smṛtaḥ // 1.5.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityuktvāntarhite tasminyathāgatamagāmaham / evam āpatsahāyo me rākṣaso mittratāṃ gataḥ // 1.5.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityuktavānahaṃ bhūyaḥ śakaṭālena cārthitaḥ / gaṅgāmadarśayaṃ tasmai mūrtāṃ dhyānādupasthitām // 1.5.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
stutibhistoṣitā sā ca mayā devī tirodadhe / babhūva śakaṭālaśca sahāyaḥ praṇato mayi // 1.5.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā ca sa mantrī māṃ guptasthaṃ khinnamabravīt / sarvajñenāpi khedāya kimātmā dīyate tvayā // 1.5.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ na jānāsi yadrājñāmavicāraratā dhiyaḥ / acirācca bhavecchuddhistathā cātra kathaṃ śṛṇu // 1.5.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ādityavarmanāmātra babhūva nṛpatiḥ purā / śivavarmābhidhāno 'sya mantrī cābhūnmahāmatiḥ // 1.5.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājñastasyaikadā caikā rājñī garbhamadhārayat / tadbuddhvā sa nṛpo 'pṛcchadityantaḥ purarakṣiṇaḥ // 1.5.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
varṣadvayaṃ praviṣṭasya vartate 'ntaḥpure 'tra me / tadeṣā garbhasaṃbhūtiḥ kutaḥ saṃprati kathyatām // 1.5.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athocuste praveśo 'tra puṃso 'nyasyāsti na prabho / śivavarmā tu te mantrī praviśatyanivāritaḥ // 1.5.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tacchrutvācintayadrājā nūnaṃ drohī sa eva me / prakāśaṃ ca hate tasminnapavādo bhavenmama // 1.5.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityālocya sa taṃ yuktyā śivavarmāṇamīśvaraḥ / sāmantasyāntikaṃ sakhyuḥ prāhiṇodbhogavarmaṇaḥ // 1.5.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadvadhaṃ tasya lekhena saṃdiśya tadanantaram / nigūḍhaṃ sa nṛpastatra lekhahāraṃ vyasarjayat // 1.5.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yāte mantriṇi saptāhe gate bhītyā palāyitā / sā rājñī rakṣibhirlabdhā puṃsā strīrupiṇā saha // 1.5.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ādityavarmā tadbuddhvā sānutāpo 'bhavattadā / kiṃ mayā tādṛśo mantrī ghātito 'kāraṇāditi // 1.5.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
atrāntare sa ca prāpa nikaṭaṃ bhogavarmaṇaḥ / śivavarmā sa copāgāllekhamādāya pūruṣaḥ // 1.5.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vācayitvā ca taṃ lekhamekānte śivavarmaṇe / śaśaṃsa vadhanirdeśaṃ bhogavarmā vidhervaśāt // 1.5.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śivavarmāpy avocat taṃ sāmantaṃ mantrisattamaḥ / tvaṃ vyāpādaya māṃ no cen nihanmyātmānam ātmanā // 1.5.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tacchrutvā vismayāviṣṭo bhogavarmā jagāda tam / kimetadbrūhi me vipra śāpito 'si na vakṣi cet // 1.5.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha vakti sma taṃ mantrī hanyeyaṃ yatra bhūpate / tatra dvādaśa varṣāṇi deśe devo na varṣati // 1.5.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tacchrutvā mantribhiḥ sārdhaṃ bhogavarmā vyacintayat / duṣṭaḥ sa rājā deśasya nāśamasmākamicchati // 1.5.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kiṃ hi tatra na santyeva vadhakā guptagāminaḥ / tasmānmantrī na vadhyo 'sau rakṣyaḥ svātmavadhādapi // 1.5.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti saṃmantrya dattvā ca rakṣakān bhogavarmaṇā / śivavarmā tato deśāt preṣito 'bhūt tataḥ kṣaṇāt // 1.5.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ pratyāyayau jīvansa mantrī prajñayā svayā / śuddhiścāsyānyato jātā nahi dharmo 'nyathā bhavet // 1.5.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
itthaṃ tavāpi śuddhiḥ syāttiṣṭha tāvadgṛhe mama / kātyāyana nṛpo 'pyeṣa sānutāpo bhaviṣyati // 1.5.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityuktaḥ śakaṭālena cchanno 'haṃ tasya veśmani / pratīkṣamāṇo 'vasaraṃ tānyahānyatyavāhayam // 1.5.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tasyātha yoganandasya kāṇabhūteḥ kadācana / putro hiraṇyaguptākhyo mṛgayāyai gato 'bhavat // 1.5.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśvavegātprayātasya kathaṃciddūramantaram / ekākino vane tasya vāsaraḥ paryahīyata // 1.5.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataśca tāṃ niśāṃ netuṃ vṛkṣamārohati sma saḥ / kṣaṇāttatraiva cārohadṛkṣaḥ siṃhena bhīṣitaḥ // 1.5.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa dṛṣṭvā rājaputraṃ taṃ bhītaṃ mānuṣabhāṣayā / mā bhaiṣīrmama mittraṃ tvamityuktvā nirbhayaṃ vyadhāt // 1.5.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
visrambhādṛkṣavākyena rājaputro 'tha suptavān / ṛkṣastu jāgradevāsīdadhaḥ siṃho 'tha so 'bravīt // 1.5.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ṛkṣaṃ mānuṣametaṃ me kṣipa yāvadvrajāmyaham / ṛkṣastato 'bravītpāpa na mitraṃ ghātayāmyaham // 1.5.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kramādṛkṣe prasupte ca rājaputre ca jāgrati / punaḥ siṃho 'bravīdetamṛkṣaṃ me kṣipa mānuṣa // 1.5.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tacchrutvātmabhayāttena siṃhasyārādhanāya saḥ / kṣipto 'pi nāpataccitramṛkṣo daivaprabodhitaḥ // 1.5.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mittradrohin bhavonmatta iti śāpam adāc ca saḥ / tasya rājasutasyaitadvṛttāntāvagamāvadhim // 1.5.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāpyaiva svagṛhaṃ prātarunmatto 'bhūnnṛpātmajaḥ / yoganandaśca taddṛṣṭvā viṣādaṃ sahasāgamat // 1.5.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abravīcca sa kāle 'smiñ jīved vararucir yadi / idaṃ jñāyeta tatsarvaṃ dhiṅ me tadvadhapāṭavam // 1.5.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tacchrutvā vacanaṃ rājñaḥ śakaṭālo vyacintayat / hanta kātyāyanasyāyaṃ labdhaḥ kālaḥ prakāśane // 1.5.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na so 'tra mānī tiṣṭheca rājā mayi ca viśvaset / ityālocya sa rājānamabravīdyācitābhayaḥ // 1.5.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājannalaṃ viṣādena jīvanvararuciḥ sthitaḥ / yoganandastato 'vādīddrutamānīyatāmiti // 1.5.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athāhaṃ śakaṭālena yoganandāntikaṃ haṭhāt / ānītas taṃ tathābhūtaṃ rājaputraṃ vyalokayam // 1.5.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mittradrohaḥ kṛto 'nena devetyuktvā tathaiva saḥ / sarasvatīprasādena vṛttāntaḥ kathito mayā // 1.5.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatastacchāpamuktena stuto 'haṃ rājasūnunā / tvayā kathamidaṃ jñātamityapṛcchatsa bhūpatiḥ // 1.5.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athāham avadaṃ rājaṃl lakṣaṇair anumānataḥ / pratibhātaśca paśyanti sarvaṃ prajñāvatāṃ dhiyaḥ // 1.5.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tataḥ stokena mūlyena krītvā tāṃścaṇakāṃstataḥ / tathaiva kāṣṭhikebhyo 'hamanyedyuḥ kāṣṭhamāharam // 1.6.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ pratidinaṃ kṛtvā prāpya mūlyaṃ kramānyayā / kāṣṭhikebhyo 'khilaṃ dāru krītaṃ tebhyo dinatrayam // 1.6.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akasmādatha saṃjāte kāṣṭhacchede 'tivṛṣṭibhiḥ / mayā taddāru vikrītaṃ paṇānāṃ bahubhiḥ śataiḥ // 1.6.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tenaiva vipaṇiṃ kṛtvā dhanena nijakauśalāt / kurvanvaṇijyāṃ kramaśaḥ saṃpanno 'smi mahādhanaḥ // 1.6.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
sauvarṇo mūṣakaḥ kṛtvā mayā tasmai samarpitaḥ / viśākhilāya so 'pi svāṃ kanyāṃ mahyamadāttataḥ // 1.6.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ata eva ca loke 'smin prasiddho mūṣakākhyayā / evaṃ lakṣmīr iyaṃ prāptā nirdhanena satā mayā // 1.6.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tacchrutvā tatra te 'bhūvanvaṇijo 'nye savismayāḥ / dhīrna citrīyate kasmādabhittau citrakarmaṇā // 1.6.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kvacitpratigrahaprāptahemamāṣāṣṭako dvijaḥ / chandogaḥ kaścidityukto viṭaprāyeṇa kenacit // 1.6.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
brāhmaṇyādbhojanaṃ tāvadasti te tattvayāmunā / lokayātrā suvarṇena vaidagdhyāyeha śikṣyatām // 1.6.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ko māṃ śiṣayatītyukte tena mugdhena so 'bravīt / yaiṣā caturikā nāma veśyā tasyā gṛhaṃ vraja // 1.6.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra kiṃ karavāṇīti dvijenokto viṭo 'bravīt / svarṇaṃ dattvā prayuñjīthā rañjayansāma kiṃcana // 1.6.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutvety agacchac chandogo drutaṃ caturikāgṛham / upāviśat praviśyātra kṛtapratyudgatistayā // 1.6.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
māmadya lokayātrāṃ tvaṃ śikṣayaitena sāṃpratam / iti jalpansa tattasyai svarṇamarpitavāndvijaḥ // 1.6.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prahasatyatha tatrasthe jane kiṃcidvicintya saḥ / gokarṇasadṛśau kṛtvā karāvābaddhasāraṇau // 1.6.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tārasvaraṃ tathā sāma gāyati sma jaḍāśayaḥ / yathā tatra milanti sma viṭā hāsyadidṛkṣavaḥ // 1.6.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
te cāvocañ śṛgālo 'yaṃ praviṣṭo 'tra kuto 'nyathā / tac chīghram ardhacandro 'sya gale 'smin dīyatām iti // 1.6.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ardhacandraṃ śaraṃ matvā śiraśchedabhayāddrutam / śikṣitā lokayātreti garjansa niragāttataḥ // 1.6.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatsakāśaṃ tato 'gacchadyenāsu preṣito 'bhavat / vṛttāntaṃ cāvadattasmai so 'pi cainamabhāṣata // 1.6.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāma sāntvaṃ mayoktaṃ te vedasyāvasaro 'tra kaḥ / kiṃ vā dhārādhirūḍhaṃ hi jāḍyaṃ vedajaḍe jane // 1.6.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ vihasya gatvā ca tenoktā sā vilāsinī / dvipadasya paśorasya tatsuvarṇatṛṇaṃ tyaja // 1.6.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hasantyā ca tayā tyaktaṃ suvarṇaṃ prāpya sa dvijaḥ / punarjātamivātmānaṃ manvāno gṛhamāgataḥ // 1.6.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃprāyāṇy ahaṃ paśyan kautukāni pade pade / prāptavān rājabhavanaṃ mahendrasadanopamam // 1.6.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tataś cāntaḥ praviṣṭo 'haṃ śiṣyair agre niveditaḥ / āsthānasthitamadrākṣaṃ rājānaṃ sātavāhanam // 1.6.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śarvavarmaprabhṛtibhirmantribhiḥ parivāritam / ratnasiṃhāsanāsīnamamarairiva vāsavam // 1.6.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vihitasvastikāraṃ māmupaviṣṭamathāsane / rājñā kṛtādaraṃ caiva śarvavarmādayo 'stuvan // 1.6.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayaṃ deva bhuvi khyātaḥ sarvavidyāviśāradaḥ / guṇāḍhya iti nāmāsya yathārthamata eva hi // 1.6.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityādi tatstutiṃ dṛṣṭvā mantribhiḥ sātavāhanaḥ / prītaḥ sapadi satkṛtya mantritve māṃ nyayojayat // 1.6.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athāhaṃ rājakāryāṇi cintayannavasaṃ sukham / śiṣyānadhyāpayaṃstatra kṛtadāraparigrahaḥ // 1.6.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kadācitkautukādbhrāmyansvairaṃ godāvarītaṭe / devīkṛtiriti khyātamudyānaṃ dṛṣṭavānaham // 1.6.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taccātiramyamālokya kṣitisthamiva nandanam / udyānapālaḥ pṛṣṭo 'bhūnmayā tatra tadāgamam // 1.6.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sa ca māmabravītsvāminvṛddhebhyaḥ śrūyate yathā / pūrvaṃ maunī nirāhāro dvijaḥ kaścitamāyayau // 1.6.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa divyamidamudyānaṃ sadevabhavanaṃ vyadhāt / tato 'tra brāhmaṇāḥ sarve milanti sma sakautukāḥ // 1.6.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nirbandhāttaiḥ sa pṛṣṭaḥ svaṃ vṛttāntam avadad dvijaḥ / astīha bharukacchākhyo viṣayo narmadātaṭe // 1.6.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasminn ahaṃ samutpanno viprastasya ca me purā / na bhikṣāmapyadātkaściddaridrasyālasasya ca // 1.6.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha khedādgṛhaṃ tyaktvā virakto jīvitaṃ prati / bhrāntvā tīrthānyahaṃ draṣṭumagacchaṃ vindhyavāsinīm // 1.6.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvā tataśca tāṃ devīmiti saṃcintitaṃ mayā / lokaḥ paśūpahāreṇa prīṇāti varadāmimām // 1.6.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ tvātmānameveha hanmi mūrkhamimaṃ paśum / niścityeti śiraśchettuṃ mayā śastramagṛhyata // 1.6.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkṣaṇaṃ sā prasannā māṃ devī svayamabhāṣata / putra siddho 'si mātmānaṃ vadhīstiṣṭha mamāntike // 1.6.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti devīvaraṃ labdhvā saṃprāptā divyatā mayā / tataḥ prabhṛti naṣṭā me bubhukṣā ca tṛṣā saha // 1.6.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kadācidatha devī māṃ tatrasthaṃ svayamādiśat / gatvā putra pratiṣṭhāne racayodyānamuttamam // 1.6.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityuktvā saiva me bījaṃ divyaṃ prādāttato mayā / ihāgatya kṛtaṃ kāntamudyānaṃ tatprabhāvataḥ // 1.6.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pālyametacca yuṣmākamityuktvā sa tirodadhe / iti nirmitam udyānam idaṃ devyā purā prabho // 1.6.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
udānapālād ityevaṃ taddeśe devyanugraham / ākarṇya vismayāviṣṭo gṛhāya gatavānaham // 1.6.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
evamukte guṇāḍhena kāṇabhūtirabhāṣata / sātavāhana ityasya kasmannāmābhavatprabho // 1.6.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'bravīdguṇāḍhyo 'pi śṛṇvetatkathayāmi te / dīpakarṇiriti khyāto rājābhūtprājyavikramaḥ // 1.6.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya śaktimatī nāma bhāryā prāṇādhikābhavat / ratāntasuptām udyāne sarpastāṃ jātu daṣṭavān // 1.6.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
gatāyāmatha pañcatvaṃ tasyāṃ tadgatamānasaḥ / aputro 'pi sa jagrāha brahmacaryavrataṃ nṛpaḥ // 1.6.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ kadācid rājyārhaputrāsadbhāvaduḥkhitam / ityādideśa taṃ svapne bhagavāninduśekharaḥ // 1.6.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṭavyāṃ drakṣasi bhrāmyansiṃhārūḍhaṃ kumārakam / taṃ gṛhītvā gṛhaṃ gaccheḥ sa te putro bhaviṣyati // 1.6.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha prabuddhas taṃ svapnaṃ svaranrājā jaharṣa saḥ / kadācicca yayau dūrāmaṭavīṃ mṛgayārasāt // 1.6.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
dadarśa tatra madhyāhne siṃhārūḍhaṃ sa bhūpatiḥ / bālakaṃ padmasarasastīre tapanatejasam // 1.6.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
atha rājā smaransvapnamavatāritabālakam / jalābhilāṣiṇaṃ siṃhaṃ jaghānaikaśareṇa tam // 1.6.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa siṃhas tadvapus tyaktvā sadyo 'bhūtpuruṣākṛtiḥ / kaṣṭaṃ kim etad brūhīti rājñā pṛṣṭo jagāda ca // 1.6.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
dhanadasya sakhā yakṣaḥ sāto nāmāsmi bhūpate / so 'haṃ snāntīmapaśyaṃ prāggaṅgāyāmṛṣikanyakām // 1.6.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpi māṃ vīkṣya saṃjātamanmathābhūdahaṃ tathā / gāndharveṇa vivāhena tato bhāryā kṛtā mayā // 1.6.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tacca tadbāndhavā buddhvā tāṃ ca māṃ cāśapan krudhā / siṃhau bhaviṣyataḥ pāpau svecchācārau yuvām iti // 1.6.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
putrajanmāvadhiṃ tasyāḥ śāpāntaṃ munayo vyadhuḥ / mama tu tvaccharāghātaparyantaṃ tadanantaram // 1.6.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athāvāṃ siṃhamithunaṃ saṃjātau sāpi kālataḥ / garbhiṇyabhūttato jāte dārake 'sminvyapadyata // 1.6.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayaṃ ca vardhito 'nyāsāṃ siṃhīnāṃ payasā mayā / adya cāhaṃ vimukto 'smi śāpādbāṇāhatastvayā // 1.6.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadgṛhāṇa mahāsattvaṃ mayā dattamamuṃ sutam / ayaṃ hyarthaḥ samādiṣṭastaireva munibhiḥ purā // 1.6.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityuktvāntarhite tasminsātanāmani guhyake / sa rājā taṃ samādāya bālaṃ pratyāyayau gṛham // 1.6.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sātena yasmād ūḍho 'bhūt tasmāt taṃ sātavāhanam / nāmnā cakāra kālena rājye cainaṃ nyaveśayet // 1.6.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tasmin gate 'raṇyaṃ dīpakarṇau kṣitīśvare / saṃvṛttaḥ sārvabhaumo 'sau bhūpatiḥ sātavāhanaḥ // 1.6.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evamuktvā kathāṃ madhye kāṇabhūtyanuyogataḥ / guṇāḍhyaḥ prakṛtaṃ dhīmānanusmṛtyābravītpunaḥ // 1.6.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ kadācidadhyāsta vasantasamayotsave / devīkṛtaṃ tadudyānaṃ sa rājā sātavāhanaḥ // 1.6.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
viharansuciraṃ tatra mahendra iva nandane / vāpījale 'vatīrṇo 'bhūtkrīḍituṃ kāminīsakhaḥ // 1.6.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asiñcattatra dayitāḥ sahelaṃ karavāribhiḥ / asicyata sa tābhiśca vaśābhiriva vāraṇaḥ // 1.6.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
mukhairdhautāñjanātāmranetrairjahnujalāplutaiḥ / aṅgaiḥ saktāmbaravyaktavibhāgaiśca tamaṅganāḥ // 1.6.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidalatpatratilakāḥ sa cakre vanamadhyagāḥ / cyutābharaṇapuṣpāstā latā vāyuriva priyāḥ // 1.6.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
athaikā tasya mahiṣī rājñaḥ stanabharālasā / śirīṣasukumārāṅgī krīḍantī klamamabhyagāt // 1.6.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā jalairabhiṣiñcantaṃ rājānamasahā satī / abravīnmodakairdeva paritāḍaya māmiti // 1.6.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā modakān rājā drutam ānāyayad bahūn / tato vihasya sā rājñī punar evam abhāṣata // 1.6.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājannavasaraḥ ko 'tra modakānāṃ jalāntare / udakaiḥ siñca mā tvaṃ māmityuktaṃ hi mayā tava // 1.6.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃdhimātraṃ na jānāsi māśabdodakaśabdayoḥ / na ca prakaraṇaṃ vetsi mūrkhastvaṃ kathamīdṛśaḥ // 1.6.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityuktaḥ sa tayā rājā śabdaśāstravidā nṛpaḥ / parivāre hasatyantarlajjākrānto jhagityabhūt // 1.6.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
parityaktajalakrīḍo vītadarpaśca tatkṣaṇam / jātāvamāno nirlakṣaḥ prāviśannijamandiram // 1.6.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tataścintāparo muhyannāharādiparāṅmukhaḥ / citrastha iva pṛṣṭo 'pi naiva kiṃcidabhāṣata // 1.6.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pāṇḍityaṃ śaraṇaṃ vā me mṛtyurveti vicintayan / śayanīyaparityaktagāraḥ saṃtāpavānabhūt // 1.6.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akasmādatha rājñastāṃ dṛṣṭvāvasthāṃ tathāvidhām / kimetaditi saṃbhrāntaḥ sarvaḥ parijano 'bhavat // 1.6.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'haṃ śarvavarmā ca jñātavantau krameṇa tām / atrāntare sa ca prāyaḥ paryahīyata vāsaraḥ // 1.6.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asmin kāle na ca svastho rājety ālocya tatkṣaṇam / āvābhyāṃ rājahaṃsākhya āhūto rājaceṭakaḥ // 1.6.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śarīravārtāṃ bhūpasya sa ca pṛṣṭo 'bravīd idam / nedṛśo durmanāḥ pūrvaṃ dṛṣṭo devaḥ kadācana // 1.6.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
viṣṇuśaktiduhitrā ca mithyāpaṇḍitayā tayā / vilakṣīkṛta ityāhurdevyo 'nyāḥ kopanirbharam // 1.6.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etattasya mukhācchrutvā rājaceṭasya durmanāḥ / śarvavarmadvitīyo 'haṃ saṃśayādityacintayam // 1.6.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vyādhiryadi bhavedrājñaḥ praviśeyuścikitsakāḥ / ādhirvā yadi tatrāsya kāraṇaṃ nopalabhyate // 1.6.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nāstyeva hi vipakṣo 'sya rājye nihatakaṇṭake / anuraktāḥ prajāścaitā na hāniḥ paridṛśyate // 1.6.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkasmād eṣa khedaḥ syād īdṛśaḥ sahasa prabhoḥ / evaṃ vicintite dhīmāñ śarvavarmedam abravīt // 1.6.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ jānāmi rājño 'sya manyurmaurkhyānutāpataḥ / mūrkho 'ham iti pāṇḍityaṃ sadaivāyaṃ hi vāñchati // 1.6.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upalabdho mayā caiṣa pūrvam eva tadāśayaḥ / rājñyāvamānitaś cādya tannimittam iti śrutam // 1.6.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evamanyonyamālocya tāṃ rātrimativāhya ca / prātar āvāma gacchāva vāsaveśma mahīpateḥ // 1.6.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra sarvasya ruddhe 'pi praveśe kathamapyaham / prāviśaṃ mama paścācca śarvavarmā laghukramam // 1.6.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upaviśyātha nikaṭe vijñaptaḥ sa mayā nṛpaḥ / akāraṇaṃ kathaṃ deva vartase vimanā iti // 1.6.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tacchrutvāpi tathaivāsītsa tūṣṇīṃ sātavāhanaḥ / śarvavarmā tataścedamadbhutaṃ vākyamabravīt // 1.6.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutaṃ mama syāt kāpīti prāguktaṃ deva me tvayā / tenāhaṃ kṛtavānadyā svapnamāṇavakaṃ niśi // 1.6.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
svapne tato mayā dṛṣṭaṃ nabhasaścyutamambujam / tacca divyena kenāpi kumāreṇa vikāsitam // 1.6.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataśca nirgatā tasmāddivyā strī dhavalāmbarā / tava deva mukhaṃ sā ca praviṣṭā samanantaram // 1.6.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iyaddṛṣṭvā prabuddho 'smi manye sā ca sarasvatī / devasya vadane sākṣāt saṃpraviṣṭā na saṃśayaḥ // 1.6.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ niveditasvapne śarvavarmaṇi tatkṣaṇam / māmastamaunaḥ sākūtamavadatsātavāhanaḥ // 1.6.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
śikṣamāṇaḥ prayatnenā kālena kiyatā pumān / adhigacchati pāṇḍityametanme kathyatāṃ tvayā // 1.6.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mama tena vinā hyeṣā lakṣmīrna pratibhāsate / vibhavaiḥ kiṃ nu mūrkhasya kāṣṭhasyābharaṇairiva // 1.6.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'hamavadaṃ rājanvarṣairdvādaśabhiḥ sadā / jñāyate sarvavidyānāṃ mukhaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ naraiḥ // 1.6.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ tu śikṣayāmi tvāṃ varṣaṣaṭkena tadvibho / śrutvaitatsahasā serṣyaṃ śarvavarmā kilāvadat // 1.6.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sukhocito janaḥ kleśaṃ kathaṃ kuryadiyacciram / tadahaṃ māsaṣaṭkena deva tvāṃ śikṣayāmi tat // 1.6.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutvaivaitad asaṃbhāvyaṃ tam avocam ahaṃ ruṣā / ṣaḍbhir māsais tvayā devaḥ śikṣitaś cet tato mayā // 1.6.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃskṛtaṃ prākṛtaṃ tadvaddeśabhāṣā ca sarvadā / bhāṣātrayamidaṃ tyaktaṃ yanmanuṣyeṣu saṃbhavet // 1.6.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śarvavarmā tato 'vādīnna cedevaṃ karomyaham / dvādaśābdānvahāmyeṣa śirasā tava pāduke // 1.6.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityuktvā nirgate tasminnahamapyagamaṃ gṛham / rājāpyubhayataḥ siddhiṃ matvāśvasto babhūva saḥ // 1.6.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vihastaḥ śarvavarmā ca pratijñāṃ tāṃ sadustarām / paśyansānuśayaḥ sarvaṃ svabhāryāyai śaśaṃsa tat // 1.6.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpi taṃ duḥkhitāvocatsaṃkaṭe 'smiṃstava prabho / vinā svāmikumāreṇa gatiranyā na dṛśyate // 1.6.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatheti niścayaṃ kṛtvā paścime prahare niśi / śarvavarmā nirāhārastatraiva prasthito 'bhavat // 1.6.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tacca cāramukhādbuddhvā mayā prātarniveditam / rājñe so 'pi tadākarṇya kiṃ bhavedityacintayat // 1.6.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatastaṃ siṃhaguptākhyo rājaputro hito 'bravīt / tvayi khinne tadā deva nirvedo me mahānabhūt // 1.6.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ śreyonimittaṃ te caṇḍikāgre nijaṃ śiraḥ / chettuṃ prārabdhavānasmi gatvāsmānnagarādvahiḥ // 1.6.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

ityuktvā nṛpamāmantrya satvaraṃ śarvavarmaṇaḥ / paścāccāradvayaṃ so 'tha siṃhagupto vyasarjayat // 1.6.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi vātaikabhakṣaḥ san kṛtamaunaḥ suniścayaḥ / prāpa svāmikumārasya śarvavarmāntikaṃ kramāt // 1.6.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śarīranirapekṣeṇa tapasā tatra toṣitaḥ / prasādamakarottasya kārtikeyo yathepsitam // 1.6.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āgatyāgre tato rājñe cārābhyāṃ sa niveditaḥ / siṃhaguptavisṛṣṭābhyāmudayaḥ śarvavarmaṇaḥ // 1.6.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tacchrutvā mama rājñaśca viṣādapramadau dvayoḥ / abhūtāṃ mekhamālokya haṃsacātakayoriva // 1.6.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āgatya śarvavarmātha kumāravarasiddhimān / cintitopasthitā rājñe sarvā vidyāḥ pradattavān // 1.6.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prādurāsaṃśca tāstasya sātavāhanabhūpateḥ / tatkṣaṇaṃ kiṃ na kuryāddhi prasādaḥ pārameśvaraḥ // 1.6.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha tam akhilavidyālābham ākarṇya rājñaḥ pramuditavati rāṣṭre tatra ko 'pyutsavo 'bhūt / api pavanavidhūtāstatkṣaṇollāsyamānāḥ prativasati patākā baddhanṛttā ivāsan // 1.6.165	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
rājārharatnanicayairatha śarvavarmā tenārcito gururiti praṇatena rājñā / svāmīkṛtaśca viṣaye marukacchanāmni kūlopakaṇṭhaviniveśini narmadāyāḥ // 1.6.166	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
yo 'gre cāramukhena ṣaṇmukhavaraprāptiṃ samākarṇayat saṃtuṣyātmasamaṃ śriyā narapatistaṃ siṃhaguptaṃ vyadhāt / rājñīṃ tām api viṣṇuśaktitanayāṃ vidyāgame kāraṇaṃ devīnāmupari prasahya kṛtavān prītyābhiṣicya svayam // 1.6.167	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
tato gṛhītamauno 'haṃ rājāntikamupāgamam / tara ca ślokamapaṭhaddvijaḥ kaścitsvayaṃ kṛtam // 1.7.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
taṃ cācaṣṭa svayaṃ rājā samyaksaṃskṛtayā girā / tatrālokya ca tatrastho janaḥ pramudito 'bhavat // 1.7.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa śarvavarmāṇaṃ rājā savinayo 'bravīt / svayaṃ kathaya devena kahaṃ te 'nugrahaḥ kṛtaḥ // 1.7.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tacchrutvānugrahaṃ rājñaḥ śarvavarmābhyabhāṣata / ito rājannirāhāro maunastho 'haṃ tadā gataḥ // 1.7.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'dhvani manāk cheṣe jāte tīvratapaḥkṛśaḥ / klāntaḥ patitavān asmi niḥsaṃjño dharaṇītale // 1.7.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttiṣṭha putra sarvaṃ te saṃpatsyata iti sphuṭam / śaktihastaḥ pumānetya jāne māmabravīttadā // 1.7.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

atha devasya nikaṭaṃ prāpya bhaktibharākulaḥ / snātvā garbhagṛhaṃ tasya praviṣṭo 'bhūvamunmanāḥ // 1.7.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

athāsu bhagavān sākṣāt ṣaḍbhir ānanapaṅkajaiḥ / siddho varṇasamāmnāya iti sūtramudairayat // 1.7.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

athābravītsa devo māṃ nāvadiṣyaḥ svayaṃ yadi / abhaviṣyadidaṃ śāstraṃ pāṇinīyopamardakam // 1.7.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

ityuktvā śabdaśāstraṃ tatprakāśyābhinavaṃ laghu / sākṣādeva sa māṃ devaḥ punarevamabhāṣata // 1.7.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tatheti cāhaṃ tatrasthaḥ prāptāyāṃ niśi valgatām / tamapṛcchaṃ prasaṅgena bhūtānāṃ harṣakāraṇam // 1.7.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

tena saṃtyajya taṃ deśamanaṅgakṛtaviplavaḥ / sa devadattaḥ prayayau pratiṣṭhānamatadritaḥ // 1.7.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tatra vṛddhamupādhyāyaṃ vṛddhayā bhāryayānvitam / mantrasvāmyākhyamabhyarthya vidyāḥ samyagadhītavān // 1.7.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtavidyaṃ ca taṃ tatra dadarśa nṛpateḥ sutā / suśarmākhyasya subhagaṃ śrīrnāma śrīr ivācyutam // 1.7.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
so 'pi tāṃ dṛṣṭavān kanyāṃ sthitāṃ vātayanopari / viharantīṃ vimānena candrasyevādhidevatām // 1.7.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
baddhāviva tayānyonyaṃ māraśṛṅkhalayā dṛśā / nāpasartuṃ samarthau tau babhūvaturubhāvapi // 1.7.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sātha tasyaikayāṅgulyā mūrtayeva smarājñayā / ito nikaṭamehīti saṃjñāṃ cakre nṛpātmajā // 1.7.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ samīpaṃ tasyāśca yayāvantaḥpurācca saḥ / sā ca cikṣepa dantena puṣpamādāya taṃ prati // 1.7.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃjñāmetāmajānāno gūḍhāṃ rājasutākṛtām / sa kartavyavimūḍhaḥ sann upādhyāyagṛhaṃ yayau // 1.7.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
luloṭha tatra dharaṇau na kiṃcidvaktumīśvaraḥ / tāpena dahyamāno 'ntarmūkaḥ prabhuṣito yathā // 1.7.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vitarkya kāmajaiścihnairupādhyāyena dhīmatā / yuktyā pṛṣṭaḥ kathaṃcicca yathāvṛttaṃ śaśaṃsa saḥ // 1.7.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadbuddhvā tamupādhyāyo vidagdho vākyamabravīt / dantena puṣpaṃ muñcantyā tayā saṃjñā kṛtā tava // 1.7.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
yadetatpuṣpadantākhyaṃ puṣpāḍhyaṃ suramandiram / tatrāgatya pratīkṣethāḥ sāṃprataṃ gamyatāmiti // 1.7.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

dṛṣṭo 'tra dvārapaṭṭasya paścātso 'tha priyastayā / gṛhītānena cotthāya sā kaṇṭhe sahasā tataḥ // 1.7.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tasyāṃ ca dhṛtagarbhāyāṃ taṃ dvijaṃ sa gaṇottamaḥ / smṛtamātrāgato rātrau tato 'naiṣīdalakṣitam // 1.7.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

taṃ vañcayitumindro 'tha kṛtvā śyenavapuḥ svayam / māyākapotavapuṣaṃ dharmam anvapatad drutam // 1.7.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)

tataḥ śarīraṃ sakalaṃ tulāṃ rājādhyaropayat / sādhu sādhu śamaṃ tvetaddivyā vāgudabhūttataḥ // 1.7.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

atha martyavapurvimucya puṇyāṃ sahasā tadgaṇatāmahaṃ prapannaḥ / iti dhūrjaṭinā kṛtaṃ prasādād abhidhānaṃ mama mālyavānitīdam // 1.7.112	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
so 'haṃ gataḥ punarihādya manuṣyabhāvaṃ śāpena śailaduhiturbata kāṇabhūte / tanme kathāṃ harakṛtāṃ kathayādhunā tvaṃ yenāvayorbhavati śāpadaśopaśāntiḥ // 1.7.113	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]

maitāṃ vidyādharā hārṣuriti tāmātmaśoṇitaiḥ / aṭavyāṃ maṣyabhāvācca lilekha sa mahākaviḥ // 1.8.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

guṇāḍhyena nibaddhāṃ ca tāṃ dṛṣṭvaiva mahākathām / jagāma muktaśāpaḥ san kāṇabhūtir nijāṃ gatim // 1.8.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
piśācā ye 'pi tatrāsannanye tatsahacāriṇaḥ / te 'pi prāpurdivaṃ sarve divyamākarṇya tāṃ kathām // 1.8.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pratiṣṭhāṃ prāpaṇīyaiṣā pṛthivyāṃ me bṛhatkathā / ayamartho 'pi me devyā śāpāntoktāvudīritaḥ // 1.8.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkathaṃ prāpayāmyenāṃ kasmai tāvatsamarpaye / iti cācintayattatra sa guṇāḍhyo mahākaviḥ // 1.8.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athaiko guṇadevākhyo nandidevābhidhaḥ paraḥ / tamūcaturupādhyāyaṃ śiṣyāvanugatāvubhau // 1.8.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

evamastviti tau śiṣyāvantikaṃ tasya bhūpateḥ / prāhiṇotpustakaṃ dattvā guṇāḍhyo guṇaśālinau // 1.8.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

gacchiṣyābhyāṃ ca gatvā tatsātavāhanabhūpateḥ / guṇāḍhyakṛtireṣeti darśitaṃ kāvyapustakam // 1.8.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
piśācabhāṣāṃ tāṃ śrutvā tau ca dṛṣṭvā tadākṛtī / vidyāmadena sāsūyaṃ sa rājaivam abhāṣata // 1.8.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

lakṣamekamidaṃ tvasti kathaikā saiva gṛhyatām / macchiṣyau tava cātraitau vyākhyātārau bhaviṣyataḥ // 1.8.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityuktvā nṛpamāmantrya tyaktvā yogena tāṃ tanum / guṇāḍhyaḥ śāpanirmuktaḥ prāpa divyaṃ nijaṃ padam // 1.8.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha tāṃ guṇāḍhyadattāmādāya kathāṃ bṛhatkathāṃ nāmnā / nṛpatiragānnijanagaraṃ naravāhanadattacaritamayīm // 1.8.35	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)

idaṃ gurugirīndrajāpraṇayamandarāndolanāt purā kila kathāmṛtaṃ haramukhāmbudherudgatam / prasahya rasayanti ye vigatavighnalabdhardhayaḥ puraṃ dadhati vaibudhīṃ bhuvi bhavaprasādena te // 2.0.1	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]

tadbuddhvā śabarāddṛṣṭvā dayitāvalayaṃ ca tam / vicāra dolām ārohat sahasrānīkabhūpatiḥ // 2.1.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kṣīṇaḥ śāpaḥ sa te rājannudayādrau ca sā sthitā / jamadagnyāśrame jāyā saputrā te mṛgāvatī // 2.1.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti divyā tadā vāṇī nandayāmāsa taṃ nṛpam / viprayoganidāghārtaṃ vāridhāreva barhiṇam // 2.1.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athotkaṇṭhādīrghe kathamapi dine 'sminnavasite tamevāgre kṛtvā śabaramaparedyuḥ sa nṛpatiḥ / sahasrānīkastāṃ sarabhasamavāptuṃ priyatamāṃ pratasthe tatsainyaiḥ samamudayaśailāśramapadam // 2.1.90	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
gatvātha dūramadhvānaṃ rājā vasatimagrahīt / dine tasmin sa kasmiṃścid araṇyasarasastaṭe // 2.2.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śayanīyagataḥ śrāntastatra sevārasāgatam / sāyaṃ saṃgatakaṃ nāma jagāda kathakaṃ nṛpaḥ // 2.2.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kathāmākhyāhi me kāṃciddhṛdayasya vinodinīm / mṛgāvatīmukhāmbhojadarśanotsavakāṅkṣiṇaḥ // 2.2.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha saṃgatako 'vādīddeva kiṃ tapyase vṛthā / āsanna eva devyāste kṣīṇaśāpaḥ samāgamaḥ // 2.2.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃyogā viprayogāśca bhavanti bahavo nṛṇām / tatha cātra kathāmekāṃ kathayāmi śṛṇu prabho // 2.2.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mālave yajñasomākhyo dvijaḥ kaścidabhūtpurā / tasya ca dvau sutau sādhorjāyete sma janapriyau // 2.2.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekastayorabhūnnāmnā kālanemiriti śrutaḥ / dvitīyaścāpi vigatabhaya ityākhyayābhavat // 2.2.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
pitari svargate tau ca bhrātarau tīrṇaśaiśavau / vidyāprāptyai prayayatuḥ puraṃ pāṭaliputrakam // 2.2.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)

taddṛṣṭvā mahadāścaryaṃ śrānto natvā vṛṣadhvajam / udyāne sundare tatra tāṃ nināya vibhāvarīm // 2.2.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

kṛtātithyavidhiścāsau svagṛhaṃ bāhuśālinā / nīto 'bhūtkathitāśeṣanijavṛttāntakautukaḥ // 2.2.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatropacaryamāṇaḥ san pitṛbhyāṃ bāhuśālinaḥ / sa uvāsa samaṃ mittraiḥ śrīdattaḥ svagṛhe yathā // 2.2.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kadācitso 'tha saṃprāpte madhumāsamahotsave / yātrāmupavane draṣṭuṃ jagāma sakhibhiḥ saha // 2.2.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra kanyāṃ dadarśaikāṃ rājñaḥ śrībimbakeḥ sutām / āgatāmākṛtimatīṃ sākṣādiva madhuśriyam // 2.2.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
sā mṛgāṅkavatī nāma hṛdayaṃ tasya tatkṣaṇam / viveśa dattamārgeva dṛṣṭyāsya savikāsayā // 2.2.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyā api muhuḥ snigdhā prathamapremaśaṃsinī / nyastā taṃ prati dūtīva dṛṣṭiścakre gatāgatam // 2.2.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praviṣṭāṃ vṛkṣagahanaṃ tāmapaśyannatha kṣaṇāt / śrīdattaḥ śūnyahṛdayo diśo 'pi na dadarśa saḥ // 2.2.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
jñātaṃ mayā te hṛdayaṃ sakhe māpahnavaṃ kṛthāḥ / tadehi tatra gacchāvo yatra rājasutā gatā // 2.2.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityuktaśceṅgitajñena suhṛdā bāhuśālinā / tatheti sa yayau tasyāḥ saṃnikarṣaṃ suhṛtsakhaḥ // 2.2.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hā kaṣṭamahinā daṣṭā rājaputrīti tatkṣaṇam / ākranda udabhūttatra śrīdattahṛdayajvaraḥ // 2.2.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
viṣaghnamaṅgulīyaṃ ca vidyā ca suhṛdo 'sya me / astīti gatvā jagade kañcukī bāhuśālinā // 2.2.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
sa ca tatkṣaṇamabhyetya kañcukī caraṇānataḥ / nikaṭaṃ rājaduhituḥ śrīdattamanayaddrutam // 2.2.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
so 'pi tasyāstadaṅgulyāṃ nicikṣepāṅgulīyakam / tato jajāpa vidyāṃ ca tena pratyujjijīva sā // 2.2.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha sarvajane hṛṣṭe śrīdattastutitatpare / tatraiva jñātavṛttānto rājā bimbakirāyayau // 2.2.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tenāsau sakhibhiḥ sārdhamagṛhītāṅgulīyakaḥ / pratyājagāma śrīdatto bhavanaṃ bāhuśālinaḥ // 2.2.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatra tasmai suvarṇādi yatprītaḥ prāhiṇonnṛpaḥ / tadbāhuśālinaḥ pitre samagraṃ sa samarpayat // 2.2.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha tāṃ cintayan kāntāṃ sa tathā paryatapyata / yathā kiṃkāryatāmūḍhā vayasyas tasya jajñire // 2.2.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato bhāvanikā nāma rājaputryāḥ priyā sakhī / aṅgulīyārpaṇavyājāttasyāntikamupāyayau // 2.2.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uvāca cainaṃ matsakhyās tasyāḥ subhaga sāṃpratam / tvaṃ vā prāṇaprado bhartā mṛtyurvāpyeṣa niścayaḥ // 2.2.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityukte bhāvanikayā śrīdattaḥ sa ca sāpi ca / bāhuśālī ca te 'nye ca mantraṃ saṃbhūya cakrire // 2.2.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
harāmo nibhṛtaṃ yuktyā rājaputrīmimāṃ vayam / nivāsahetor guptaṃ ca gacchāmo mathurāmitaḥ // 2.2.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
iti saṃmantrite samyakkāyasiddhyai ca saṃvidi / anyonyaṃ sthāpitāyāṃ sā yayau bhāvanikā tataḥ // 2.2.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyedyurbāhuśālī ca vayasyatritayānvitaḥ / vaṇijyāvyapadeśena jagāma mathurāṃ prati // 2.2.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa gacchansthāpayāmāsa vāhanāni pade pade / rājaputryabhisārāya gūḍhāni caturāṇi ca // 2.2.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrīdatto 'pi tataḥ kācmidduhitrā sahitāṃ striyam / sāyaṃ rājasutāvāse pāyayitvā madhu nyadhāt // 2.2.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'tra dīpoddeśena dattvāgniṃ vāsaveśmani / pracchannaṃ bhāvanikayā ninye rājasutā bahiḥ // 2.2.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatkṣaṇaṃ tāṃ ca saṃprāpya śrīdattaḥ sa bahiḥ sthitaḥ / prākprasthitasya nikaṭaṃ prāhiṇodbāhuśālinaḥ // 2.2.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
dadau mitradvayaṃ cāsyāḥ paścādbhāvanikāṃ tathā / tanmandire ca dagdhā sā kṣībā strī sutayā saha // 2.2.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
lokastu tāṃ sakhīyuktāṃ mene dagdhāṃ nṛpātmajām / prātaśca pūrvavattatra śrīdatto dadṛśe janaiḥ // 2.2.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato rātrau dvitīyasyāṃ sa gṛhītamṛgāṅkakaḥ / śrīdattaḥ prayayau pūrvaprasthitāṃ tāṃ priyāṃ prati // 2.2.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tayā ca rātryātikramya dūramadhvānam utsukaḥ / vindhyāṭavīmatha prāpa sa prātaḥ prahare gate // 2.2.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrādāvanimittāni paścāt pathi dadarśa tān / sarvān prahārābhihatān sahabhāvanikān sakhīn // 2.2.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
te ca dṛṣṭvā nijagadustaṃ saṃbhrāntamupāgatam / muṣitāḥ smo nipatyādya bahvaśvārohasenayā // 2.2.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekena cāśvāroheṇa rājaputrī bhayākulā / asmāsvetadavastheṣu nītāśvamadhiropya sā // 2.2.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
dūraṃ na yāvan nītā ca tāvadgacchānayā diśā / asmākamantike mā sthāḥ sarvathābhyadhikā ca sā // 2.2.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti taiḥ preṣito mittrairmuhuḥ paśyanvivṛtya saḥ / javena rājatanayāṃ śrīdatto 'nusasāra tām // 2.2.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
gatvā sudūraṃ lebhe ca tāmaśvārohavāhinīm / yuvānamekaṃ tanmadhye kṣatriyaṃ sa dadarśa ca // 2.2.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tenopari ruraṃgasya gṛhītāṃ taṃ nṛpātmajām / apaśyacca yayau cāsya kṣatrayūno 'ntikaṃ kramāt // 2.2.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāntvena rājaputrīṃ tāmamuñcantaṃ ca pādataḥ / aśvādākṣipya dṛṣadi śrīdattastamacūrṇayat // 2.2.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
taṃ hatvā ca tam evāśvam āruhya nijaghāna tān / anyān api bahūn kruddhān aśvārohān pradhāvitān // 2.2.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hataśeṣāstataste ca taddṛṣṭvā tasya tādṛśam / vīrasyāmānuṣaṃ vīryaṃ palāyya sabhayaṃ yayuḥ // 2.2.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa cāpi turagārūḍho rājaputryā tayā saha / mṛgāṅkavatyā śrīdattaḥ prayayau tān sakhīn prati // 2.2.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
stokaṃ gatvā ca tasyāśvaḥ saṃgrāme vraṇito bhṛśam / sabhāryasyāvatīrṇasya papāta prāpa pañcatām // 2.2.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkālaṃ cāsya tatraiva sā mṛgāṅkavatī priyā / trāsāyāsapariśrāntā tṛṣārtā samapadyata // 2.2.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sthāpayitvā ca tāṃ tatra gatvā dūramitastataḥ / jalamanviṣyataścāsya savitāstamupāyayau // 2.2.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa labdhe 'pi jale mārganāśavaśādbhraman / cakravākavadutkūjaṃstāṃ nināya niśāṃ vane // 2.2.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātaḥ prāpa ca tatsthānaṃ patitāśvopalakṣitam / na ca tatra kacitkāntāṃ rājaputrīṃ dadarśa tām // 2.2.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa mohād vinyasya bhuvi khaḍgaṃ mṛgāṅkakam / vṛkṣāgramārurohaināmavekṣitumitastataḥ // 2.2.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkṣaṇaṃ tena mārgeṇa ko 'pyagācchavarādhipaḥ / sa cāgatyaiva jagrāha vṛkṣamūlānmṛgāṅkakam // 2.2.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ dṛṣṭvāpi sa vṛkṣāgrādavatīryaiva pṛṣṭavān / priyāpravṛttimatyārtaḥ śrīdattaḥ śavarādhipam // 2.2.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
itastvaṃ gaccha matpallīṃ jāne sā tatra te gatā / ahaṃ tatraiva caiṣyāmi dāsyāsyasimimaṃ ca te // 2.2.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityuktvā preṣitastena śabareṇa sa cotsukaḥ / śrīdattastāṃ yayau pallīṃ tadīyaiḥ puruṣaiḥ saha // 2.2.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śramaṃ tāvadvimuñceti tatroktaḥ puruṣaiśca taiḥ / prāpya pallīpatergehaṃ śrānto nidrāṃ kṣaṇādyayau // 2.2.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prabuddhaśca dadarśa svau pādau nigaḍasaṃyutau / alabdhatadgatī kāntāprāptyupāyodyamāviva // 2.2.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha kṣaṇaṃ dattasukhāṃ kṣaṇāntaravimāthinīm / daivasyeva gatiṃ tatra tasthau śocansa tāṃ priyām // 2.2.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā tamuvācaitya ceṭī mocanikābhidhā / āgato 'si mahābhāga kutreha bata mṛtyave // 2.2.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kāryasiddhyai sa hi kāpi prayātaḥ śabarādhipaḥ / āgatya caṇḍikāyāstvāmupahārīkariṣyati // 2.2.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
etadarthaṃ hi tena tvamito vindhyāṭavītaṭāt / prāpya yuktyā visṛjyeha nītaḥ saṃprati bandhanam // 2.2.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhagavatyupahāratve yata evāsi kalpitaḥ / ata eva sadā vastrairbhojanaiścopacaryase // 2.2.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekastu muktyupāyaste vidyate yadi manyase / astyasya sundarī nāma śabarādhipateḥ sutā // 2.2.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atyarthaṃ sā ca dṛṣṭvā tvāṃ jāyate madanāturā / tāṃ bhajasva vayasyāṃ me tataḥ kṣemamavāpsyasi // 2.2.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tayetyukto vimuktyarthī sa śrīdattastatheti tām / gāndharvavidhinā guptaṃ bhāryāṃ vyadhita sundarīm // 2.2.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rātrau rātrau ca sā tasya bandhanāni nyavārayat / acirācca sagarbhā sā sundarī samapadyata // 2.2.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatsarvamatha tanmātā buddhvā mocanikāmukhāt / jāmātṛsnehato gatvā svairaṃ śrīdattamabravīt // 2.2.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
putra śrīcaṇḍanāmāsau kopanaḥ sundarīpitā / na tvāṃ kṣameta tadgaccha vismartavyā na sundarī // 2.2.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityuktvā mocitaḥ śvaśrvā khaḍgaṃ śrīcaṇḍahastagam / sundaryai nijamāvedya śrīdattaḥ prayayau tataḥ // 2.2.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
viveśa cādyāṃ tāmeva cintākrānto nijāṭavīm / mṛgāṅkavatyāḥ padavīṃ tasya jijñāsituṃ punaḥ // 2.2.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
nimittaṃ ca śubhaṃ dṛṣṭvā tamevoddeśamāyayau / yatrāsyāśvo mṛtaḥ so 'tha yatra sā hāritā vadhūḥ // 2.2.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra caikaṃ dadarśārāllubdhakaṃ saṃmukhāgatam / dṛṣṭvā ca pṛṣṭavāṃstasyāḥ pravṛttiṃ hariṇīdṛśaḥ // 2.2.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ śrīdattastvamityukto lubdhakena ca tatra saḥ / sa eva mandabhāgyo 'hamityuvāca viniḥśvasan // 2.2.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa lubdhako 'vādīttarhi vacmi sakhe śṛṇu / dṛṣṭā sā te mayā bhāryā krandantī tvāmitastataḥ // 2.2.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pṛṣṭvā tataśca vṛttāntamāśvāsya ca kṛpākulaḥ / nijāṃ pallīmito 'raṇyāddīnāṃ tāṃ nītavānaham // 2.2.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra cālokya taruṇān pulindān sabhayena sā / mathurānikaṭaṃ grāmaṃ nītā nāgasthalaṃ mayā // 2.2.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra ca sthāpitā gehe sthavirasya dvijanmanaḥ / viśvadattābhidhānasya nyāsīkṛtya sagauravam // 2.2.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataś cāham ihāyāto buddhvā tvannāma tanmukhāt / tām anveṣṭuṃ tato gaccha śīghraṃ nāgasthalaṃ prati // 2.2.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityukto lubdhakenāśu sa śrīdattastato yayau / taṃ ca nāgasthalaṃ prāpadaparedyurdinātyaye // 2.2.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhavanaṃ viśvadattasya praviśyātha vilokya tam / yayāce dehi me bhāryāṃ lubdhakasthāpitāmiti // 2.2.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tacchrutvā viśvadattastaṃ śrīdattaṃ nijagāda saḥ / mathurāyāṃ suhṛnme 'sti brāhmaṇo guṇināṃ priyaḥ // 2.2.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upādhyāyaśca mantrī ca śūrasenasya bhūpateḥ / tasya haste tvadīyā sā gṛhiṇī sthāpitā mayā // 2.2.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhayaṃ hi vijano grāmo na tadrakṣākṣamo bhavet / tatprātastatra gaccha tvamadya viśramyatāmiha // 2.2.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityukto viśvadattena sa nītvātraiva tāṃ niśām / prātaḥ pratasthe prāpacca mathurāmapare dine // 2.2.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
dīrghādhvamalinastasminnagare bahireva saḥ / snānaṃ cakre pariśrānto nirmale dīrghikājale // 2.2.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tata evāmbumadhyācca vastraṃ cauraniveśitam / prāptavānañcalagranthibaddhahāramaśaṅkitam // 2.2.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha tadvastramādāya sa taṃ hāramalakṣayan / priyāṃ didṛkṣuḥ śrīdatto viveśa mathurāṃ purīm // 2.2.168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatra tatpratyabhijñāya vastraṃ hāramavāpya ca / sa caura ityavaṣṭabhya ninye nagararakṣibhiḥ // 2.2.169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
darśitaśca tathābhūto nagarādhipateśca taiḥ / tenāpyāvedito rājñe rājāpyasyādiśadvadham // 2.2.170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vadhyabhuvaṃ hantuṃ nīyamānaṃ dadarśa tam / sā mṛgāṅkavatī dūrātpaścātprahataḍiṇḍimam // 2.2.171	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'yaṃ me nīyate bhartā vadhāyeti sasaṃbhramam / sā gatvā mantrimukhyaṃ tamabravīdyadgṛhe sthitā // 2.2.172	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nivārya vadhakānso 'tha mantrī vijñapya bhūpatim / śrīdattaṃ mocayitvā taṃ vadhādānāyayadgṛham // 2.2.173	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kathaṃ so 'yaṃ pitṛvyo me gatvā deśāntaraṃ purā / ihaiva daivādvigatabhayaḥ prāpto 'dya mantritām // 2.2.174	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
iti taṃ mantriṇaṃ so 'tha śrīdattas tadgṛhāgataḥ / pratyabhijñātavān pṛṣṭvā papātāsya ca pādayoḥ // 2.2.175	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi taṃ pratyabhijñāya bhrātuḥ putraṃ savismayaḥ / kaṇṭhe jagrāha sarvaṃ ca vṛttāntaṃ paripṛṣṭavān // 2.2.176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatastasmai sa nikhilaṃ śrīdattaḥ svapiturvadhāt / ārabhya nijavṛttāntaṃ pitṛvyāya nyavedayat // 2.2.177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi muktvāśru vijane bhrātuḥ putraṃ tamabhyadhāt / adhṛtiṃ mā kṛthāḥ putra mama siddhā hi yakṣiṇī // 2.2.178	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

tatas taṃ kalyāṇaṃ tanayam anuraktaprakṛtikaṃ niveśya sve rājye jagadudayahetor udayanam / sahasrānīko 'sau sacivasahitaḥ sapriyatamo mahāprasthānāya kṣitipatir agacchad dhimagirim // 2.2.217	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
tataḥ sa vatsarājyaṃ ca prāpya pitrā samarpitam / kauśāmbyavasthitaḥ samyakchaśāsodayanaḥ prajāḥ // 2.3.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

sadā siṣeve mṛgayāṃ vīṇāṃ ghoṣavatīṃ ca tām / dattāṃ vāsukinā pūrvaṃ naktaṃdinamavādayat // 2.3.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
