kastvaṃ subhaga kasmācca praviṣṭo 'sīha sāṃpratam / ityuktaḥ sa tayā rājā yathātattvamavarṇayat // 2.3.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tacchrutvā netrayugalātsarāgādaśrusaṃtatim / hṛdayāddhīratāṃ cāpi samaṃ kanyā mumoca sā // 2.3.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kā tvaṃ rodiṣi kasmācca pṛṣṭā teneti bhūbhṛtā / sā taṃ pratyabravīdevaṃ manmahājñānuvartinī // 2.3.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yo varāhaḥ praviṣṭo 'tra sa daityo 'ṅgārakābhidhaḥ / ahaṃ caitasya tanayā nāmnāṅgāravatī nṛpa // 2.3.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
vajrasāramayaś cāsau rājaputrīr imāḥ śatam / ācchidya rājñāṃ gehebhyaḥ parivāraṃ vyadhān mama // 2.3.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kiṃ caiṣa rākṣasībhūtaḥ śāpadoṣānmahāsuraḥ / tṛṣṇāśramārtaś cādya tvāṃ prāpyāpi tyaktavānayam // 2.3.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
idānīṃ cāstavārāharūpo viśrāmyati svayam / suptotthitaśca niyataṃ tvayi pāpaṃ samācaret // 2.3.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
iti me tava kalyāṇamapaśyantyā galantyamī / saṃtāpakvathitāḥ prāṇā iva bāṣpāmbubindavaḥ // 2.3.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityaṅgāravatīvākyaṃ śrutvā rājā jagāda tām / yadi mayyasti te snehastadidaṃ madvacaḥ kuru // 2.3.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prabuddhasyāsya gatvā tvaṃ rudihi svapituḥ puraḥ / tataśca niyataṃ sa tvāṃ pṛcchedudvegakāraṇam // 2.3.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvāṃ cennipātayetkaścittato me kā gatirbhavet / etadduḥkhaṃ mametyevaṃ sa ca vācyastvayā tataḥ // 2.3.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ kṛte 'sti kalyāṇaṃ tavāpi ca mamāpi ca / ityuktā tena sā rājñā tathetyaṅgīcakāra tam // 2.3.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ ca cchannamavasthāpya rājānaṃ pāpaśaṅkinī / agādasurakanyā sa prasuptasyāntikaṃ pituḥ // 2.3.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi daiyaḥ prabubudhe prārebhe sā ca roditum / kiṃ putri rodiṣītyevaṃ sa ca tāmabravīttataḥ // 2.3.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
hanyāttvāṃ ko'pi cettāta tadā me kā gatirbhavet / ityārtyā tamavāditsā sa vihasya tato 'bravīt // 2.3.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ko māṃ vyāpādayetputri sarvo vajramayo hyaham / vāmahaste 'sti me chidraṃ tacca cāpena rakṣyate // 2.3.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
itthamāśvāsayāmāsa sa daityastāṃ nijāṃ sutām / etacca nikhilaṃ tena rājñā channena śuśruve // 2.3.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ kṣaṇādivotthāya kṛtvā snānaṃ sa dānavaḥ / kṛtamaunaḥ pravavṛtte devaṃ pūjayituṃ haram // 2.3.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
tatkālaṃ prakaṭībhūya sa rājākṛṣṭakārmukaḥ / upetya prasabhaṃ daityaṃ raṇāyāhvayate sma tam // 2.3.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pyutkṣipya karaṃ vāmaṃ maunasthastasya bhūpateḥ / pratīkṣasva kṣaṇaṃ tāvaditi saṃjñāṃ tadākarot // 2.3.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājāpi laghuhastatvātkare tatraiva tatkṣaṇam / tasminmarmaṇi taṃ daityaṃ pṛṣatkena jaghāna saḥ // 2.3.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca marmāhato ghoraṃ rāvaṃ kṛtvā mahāsuraḥ / aṅgārako 'patadbhūmau niryajjīvo jagāda ca // 2.3.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tṛṣito 'haṃ hato yena sa māmadbhirna tarpayet / pratyabdaṃ yadi tattasya naśyeyuḥ pañca mantriṇaḥ // 2.3.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityuktvā pañcatāṃ prāpa sa daityaḥ so 'pi tatsutām / tāmaṅgāravatīṃ rājā gṛhītvojjayinīṃ yayau // 2.3.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pariṇītavatastasya tatra tāṃ daityakanyakām / jātau dvau tanayau caṇḍamahāsenasya bhūpateḥ // 2.3.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
eko gopālako nāma dvitīyaḥ pālakastathā / tayorindrotsavaṃ cāsau jātayorakaronnṛpaḥ // 2.3.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatastaṃ nṛpatiṃ svapne tuṣṭo vakti sma vāsavaḥ / prāpsyasyananyasadṛśīṃ matprasādātsutāmiti // 2.3.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tataḥ kālena jātāsya rājñaḥ kanyā tu tanvyatha / apūrvā nirmitā dhātrā candrasyevāparā tanuḥ // 2.3.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kāmadevāvatāro 'syāḥ putro vidyādharādhipaḥ / bhaviṣyatīti tatkālamudabhūdbhāratī divaḥ // 2.3.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dattā me vāsavenaiṣā tuṣṭeneti sa bhūpatiḥ / nāmnā vāsavadattāṃ tāṃ tanayāmakarottadā // 2.3.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā ca tasya pitur gehe pradeyā saṃprati sthitā / prāṅmanthād arṇavasyeva kamalā kukṣikoṭare // 2.3.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃvidhaprabhāvaścaṇḍamahāsenabhūpatiḥ sa kila / deva na śakyo jetuṃ yathā tathā durgadeśasthaḥ // 2.3.81	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
kiṃ ca sa rājanvāñchati dātuṃ tubhyaṃ sadaiva tanayāṃ tām / prārthayate tu sa rājā nijapakṣamahodayaṃ mānī // 2.3.82	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
sā cāvaśyaṃ manye vāsavadattā tvayaiva pariṇeyā / sa sapadi vāsavadattāhṛtahṛdayo vatsarājo 'bhūt // 2.3.83	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
atrāntare sa vatseśapratidūtastadabravīt / gatvā prativacaścaṇḍamahāsenāya bhūbhṛte // 2.4.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi caṇḍamahāsenastacchrutvaiva vyacintayat / sa tāvadiha nāyāti mānī vatseśvaro bhṛśam // 2.4.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kanyā hi tatra na preṣyā bhavedevaṃ hi lāghavam / tasmādbaddhvaiva taṃ yuktyā nṛpamānāyayāmyaham // 2.4.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti saṃcintya saṃmantrya sa rājā mantribhiḥ saha / akārayatsvasadṛśaṃ mahāntaṃ yantrahastinam // 2.4.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
taṃ cāntarvīrapuruṣaiḥ kṛtvā channairadhiṣṭhitam / vindhyāṭavyāṃ sa nidadhe rājā yantramayaṃ gajam // 2.4.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatra taṃ cārapuruṣāḥ paśyanti sma vidūrataḥ / gajabandharasāsaktavatsarājopajīvinaḥ // 2.4.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
te ca tvaritamāgatya vatsarājaṃ vyajijñapan / deva dṛṣṭo gajo 'smābhireko vindhyavane bhraman // 2.4.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asminniyati bhūloke naiva yo 'nyatra dṛśyate / varṣmaṇā vyāptagagano vindhyādririva jaṅgamaḥ // 2.4.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tataścāravacaḥ śrutvā vatsarājo jaharṣa saḥ / tebhyaḥ suvarṇalakṣaṃ ca pradadau pāritoṣikam // 2.4.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ cedgajendraṃ prāpsyāmi pratimallaṃ naḍāgireḥ / tataścaṇḍamahāseno vaśyo bhavati me dhruvam // 2.4.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vāsavadattāṃ tāṃ sa svayaṃ me prayacchati / iti saṃcintayanso 'tha rājā tāmanayanniśām // 2.4.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātaśca mantrivacanaṃ nyakṛtvā gajatṛṣṇayā / puraskṛtyaiva tāṃścārānyayau vindhyāṭavīṃ prati // 2.4.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
prasthānalagnasya phalaṃ kanyālābhaṃ sabandhanam / yadūcurgaṇakāstasya tatsa naiva vyacārayat // 2.4.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāpya vindhyāṭavīṃ tasya gajasya kṣobhaśaṅkayā / vatsarājaḥ sa sainyāni dūrādeva nyavārayat // 2.4.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
cāramātrasahāyastu vīṇāṃ ghoṣavatīṃ dadhat / nijavyasanavistīrṇāṃ tāṃ viveśa mahāṭavīm // 2.4.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vindhyasya dakṣiṇe pārśve dūrācāraiḥ pradarśitam / gajaṃ satyagajābhāsaṃ taṃ dadarśa sa bhūpatiḥ // 2.4.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekākī vādayanvīṇāṃ cintayan bandhanāni saḥ / madhuradhvani gāyaṃś ca śanair upajagāma tam // 2.4.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gāndharvadattacittatvātsaṃdhyādhvāntavaśācca saḥ / na taṃ vanagajaṃ rājā māyāgajamalakṣayat // 2.4.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi hastī tamutkarṇatālo gītarasādiva / upetyopetya vicalandūramākṛṣṭavānnṛpam // 2.4.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tato 'kasmācca nirgatya tasmādyantramayādgajāt / vatseśvaraṃ taṃ saṃnaddhāḥ puruṣāḥ paryavārayan // 2.4.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tāndṛṣṭvā nṛpatiḥ kopādākṛṣṭacchuriko 'tha saḥ / agrasthānyodhayannanyairetya paścādagṛhyata // 2.4.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃketamilitaiścānyairyodhāstaiḥ sainikaiḥ saha / ninyurvatseśvaraṃ caṇḍamahāsenāntikaṃ ca tam // 2.4.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi caṇḍamahāseno nirgayāgre kṛtādaraḥ / vatseśena samaṃ tena viveśojjayinīṃ purīm // 2.4.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tatra tadṛśe paurairavamānakalaṅkitaḥ / śaśīva locanānando vatsarājo navāgataḥ // 2.4.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'sya guṇarāgeṇa vadhamāśaṅkya tatra te / paurāḥ saṃbhūya sakalāścakrurmaraṇaniścayam // 2.4.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
na me vatseśvaro vadhyaḥ saṃdheya iti tān bruvan / so 'tha caṇḍamahāsenaḥ paurān kṣobhād avārayat // 2.4.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vāsavadattāṃ tāṃ sutāṃ tatraiva bhūpatiḥ / vatsarājāya gāndharvaśikṣāhetoḥ samarpayat // 2.4.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uvāca cainaṃ gāndharvaṃ tvametāṃ śikṣaya prabho / tataḥ prāpsyasi kalyāṇaṃ mā viṣādaṃ kṛthā iti // 2.4.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya dṛṣṭvā tu tāṃ kanyāṃ vatsarājasya mānasam / tathā snehāktamabhavanna yahā manyumaikṣata // 2.4.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tasyāś ca cakṣurmanasī saha taṃ prati jagmatuḥ / hriyā cakṣur nivavṛtte manas tu na kathaṃcana // 2.4.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
atha vāsavadattāṃ tāṃ gāpayaṃstadgatekṣaṇaḥ / tatra gāndharvaśālāyāṃ vatsarāja uvāsa saḥ // 2.4.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅke ghoṣavatī tasya kaṇṭhe gītaśrutistathā / puro vāsavadattā ca tasthau cetovinodinī // 2.4.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā ca vāsavadattāsya paricaryāparābhavat / takṣmīriva tadekāgrā baddhasyāpyanapāyinī // 2.4.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atrāntare ca kauśāmbyāṃ vatsarājānuge jane / āvṛtte taṃ prabhuṃ buddhvā baddhaṃ rāṣṭraṃ pracukṣubhe // 2.4.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ujjayinyāmavaskandaṃ dātumaicchansamantataḥ / vatseśvarānurāgeṇa kruddhāḥ prakṛtayastadā // 2.4.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
naiva caṇḍamahāseno balasādhyo mahān hi saḥ / na caivaṃ vatsarājasya śarīre kuśalaṃ bhavet // 2.4.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmānna yukto 'vaskando buddhisādhyamidaṃ punaḥ / iti prakṛtayaḥ kṣobhānnavāryanta rumaṇvatā // 2.4.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'nuraktamālokya rāṣṭramavyabhicāri tat / rumaṇvadādīn āha sma dhīro yaugandharāyaṇaḥ // 2.4.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ihaiva sarvair yuṣmābhiḥ sthātavyaṃ satatodyataiḥ / rakṣaṇīyamidaṃ rāṣṭraṃ kāle kāryaśca vikramaḥ // 2.4.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vasantakadvitīyaśca gatvāhaṃ prajñayā svayā / vatseśaṃ mocayitvā tamānayāmi na saṃśayaḥ // 2.4.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jalāhatau viśeṣeṇa vaidyutāgneriva dyutiḥ / āpadi sphurati prajñā yasya dhīraḥ sa eva hi // 2.4.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prākārabhañjanānyogāṃstathā nigaḍabhañjanān / adarśanaprayogāṃśca jāne 'hamupayoginaḥ // 2.4.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityuktvā prakṛtīḥ kṛtvā hastanyastā rumaṇvataḥ / yaugandharāyaṇaḥ prāyāt kauśāmbyāḥ savasantakaḥ // 2.4.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praviveśa ca tenaiva saha vindhyamahāṭavīm / svaprajñāmiva sattāḍhyāṃ svanītimiva durgamām // 2.4.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra vatseśamittrasya vindhyaprāgbhāravāsinaḥ / gṛhaṃ pulindakākhyasya pulindādhipateragāt // 2.4.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ sajjaṃ sthāpayitvā ca pahā tenāgamiṣyataḥ / vatsarājasya rakṣārthaṃ bhūrisainyasamanvitam // 2.4.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā vasantakasakhastato yaugandharāyaṇaḥ / ujjayinyāṃ mahākālaśmaśānaṃ prāpa sa kramāt // 2.4.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
viveśa tacca vetālaiḥ kravyagandhibhirāvṛtam / itastatastamaḥ śyāmaiścitādhūmairivāparaiḥ // 2.4.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrainaṃ darśanaprīto mittrabhāvāya tatkṣaṇam / yogeśvarākhyo vṛtavānabhyetya brahmarākṣasaḥ // 2.4.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tenopadiṣṭayā yuktyā tato yaugandharāyaṇaḥ / na cakārātmanaḥ sadyo rūpasya parivartanam // 2.4.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
babhūva tena vikṛtaḥ kubjo vṛddhaśca tatkṣaṇāt / unmattaveṣaḥ khalvāṭo hāsyasaṃjananaḥ param // 2.4.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tayaiva yuktyā sa tadā sirānaddhapṛthūdaram / cakre vasantakasyāpi rūpaṃ danturadurmukham // 2.4.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato rājakuladvāramādau preṣya vasantakam / viveśojjayinīṃ tāṃ sa tādṛgyaugandharāyaṇaḥ // 2.4.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nṛtyan gāyaṃś ca tatrāsau baṭubhiḥ parivāritaḥ / dṛṣṭaḥ sakautukaṃ sarvairyayau rājagṛhaṃ prati // 2.4.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra rājāvarodhānāṃ tenāsau kṛtakautukaḥ / agādvāsavadattāyāḥ śanaiḥ śravaṇagocaram // 2.4.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā tamānāyayāmāsa ceṭikāṃ preṣya satvaram / gāndharvaśālāṃ narmaikasādaraṃ hi navaṃ vayaḥ // 2.4.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sa ca tatra gato vṛddhaṃ vatsarājaṃ dadarśa tam / unmattaveṣo vigaladvāṣpo yaugandharāyaṇaḥ // 2.4.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
cakāra tasmai saṃjñāṃ ca vatsarājāya so 'pi tam / pratyabhijñātavānrājā veṣapracchannamāgatam // 2.4.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vāsavadattāṃ ca tacceṭīḥ prati cātmanaḥ / adarśanaṃ yuktibalād vyadhād yaugandharāyaṇaḥ // 2.4.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
rājā tveko dadarśainaṃ tāśca sarvāḥ savismayam / vadanti sma gato 'kasmādunmattaḥ kvāpyasāviti // 2.4.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tacchrutvā taṃ ca dṛṣṭāgre matvā yogabalena tat / yuktyā vāsavadattāṃ tāṃ vatsarājo 'bravīdidam // 2.4.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā sarasvatīpūjāmādāyāgaccha dārike / tacchrutvā sā tathetyuktvā savayasyā viniryayau // 2.4.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yathocitamupetyātha dadau vatseśvarāya saḥ / yaugandharāyaṇas tasmai yogān nigaḍabhañjanān // 2.4.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyānvāsavadattāyā vīṇātantrīniyojitān / vaśīkaraṇayogāṃśca rājñe 'smai sa samārpayat // 2.4.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vyajijñapacca taṃ rājannihāyāto vasantakaḥ / dvāri sthito 'nyarūpeṇa taṃ kuruṣvāntike dvijam // 2.4.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yadā vāsavadatteyaṃ tvayi visrambhameṣyati / tadā vakṣyāmi yadahaṃ tatkuryāstiṣṭha sāṃpratam // 2.4.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ityuktvā niryayau śīghraṃ tato yaugandharāyaṇaḥ / agādvāsavadattā ca pūjāmādāya tatkṣaṇāt // 2.4.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'tha tāmavadadrājā bahirdvāri dvijaḥ sthitaḥ / sarasvatyarcane so 'smindakṣiṇārthe praveśyatām // 2.4.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatheti dvāradeśātsa tatra vāsavadattayā / virūpāmākṛtiṃ bibhradānāyyata vasantakaḥ // 2.4.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa cānītastamālokya vatseśamarudacchucā / tataścāpratibhedāya sa rājā nijagāda tam // 2.4.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
he brahmanrogavairūpyaṃ sarvametadahaṃ tava / nivārayāmi mā rodīstiṣṭhehaiva mamāntike // 2.4.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mahān prasādo deveti sa covāca vasantakaḥ / so 'tha taṃ vikṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā rājā smitamukho 'bhavat // 2.4.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
taccālokyāśayaṃ buddhvā tasya so 'pi vasantakaḥ / hasati smādhikodbhūtavirūpānanavaikṛtaḥ // 2.4.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ hasantaṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā krīḍanīyakasaṃnibham / tatra vāsavadattāpi jahāsa ca tutoṣa ca // 2.4.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sā narmaṇā bālā taṃ papraccha vasantakam / kiṃ vijñānaṃ vijānāsi bho brahman kathyatām iti // 2.4.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kathāḥ kathayituṃ devi jānāmīti sa cāvadat / kathāṃ kathaya tarhokāmiti sāpi tato 'bravīt // 2.4.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatastāṃ rājatanayāṃ rañjayansa vasantakaḥ / hāsyavaicitrasarasām imām akathayat kathām // 2.4.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
astīha mathurā nāma purī kaṃsārijanmabhūḥ / tasyāṃ rūpaṇiketyāsītkhyātā vāravilāsinī // 2.4.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyā makaradaṃṣṭrākhyā mātābhūdvṛddhakuṭṭanī / tadguṇākṛṣyamāṇānāṃ yūnāṃ dṛśi viṣacchaṭā // 2.4.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pūjākāle surakulaṃ svaniyogāya jātu sā / gatā rūpaṇikā dūrādekaṃ puruṣamaikṣata // 2.4.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa dṛṣṭaḥ subhagastasyā viveśa hṛdayaṃ tathā / yathā mātrā kṛtāste 'smādupadeśā viniryayuḥ // 2.4.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ceṭikāmatha sāvādīdgaccha madvacanādamum / puruṣaṃ brūhi madgehe tvayādyāgamyatāmiti // 2.4.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatheti ceṭikā sā ca gatvā tasmai tad abravīt / tataḥ sa kiṃcid vimṛśan puruṣas tām abhāṣata // 2.4.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
lohajaṅghābhidhāno 'smi brāhmaṇo nāsti me dhanam / tadāḍhyajanalabhye hi ko 'haṃ rūpaṇikāgṛhe // 2.4.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na dhanaṃ vāñchyate tvattaḥ svāminyetyudite tayā / sa lohajaṅghas tadvākyaṃ tatheti pratyapadyata // 2.4.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tataśceṭīmukhādbuddhvā tacca sā gṛhamutsukā / gatvā rūpaṇikā tatsthau tanmārganyastalocanā // 2.4.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣaṇācca lohajaṅgho 'tha tasyāmandiramāyayau / kuto 'yamiti kuṭṭanyā dṛṣṭo makaradaṃṣṭrayā // 2.4.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpi rūpaṇikā dṛṣṭvā svayamutthāya sādarā / vāsaveśmāntaraṃ hṛṣṭā kaṇṭhe lagnā nināya tam // 2.4.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra sā lohajaṅghasya tasya saubhāgyasaṃpadā / vaśīkṛtā satī nānyatphalaṃ janmanyamanyata // 2.4.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatastayā nivṛttānyapuruṣāsaṅgayā saha / yathāsukhaṃ sa tatraiva tasthau tanmandire yuvā // 2.4.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taddṛṣṭvā śikṣitāśeṣaveṣayoṣijjagāda tām / mātā makaradaṃṣṭrā sā khinnā rūpaṇikāṃ rahaḥ // 2.4.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kimayaṃ nirdhanaḥ putri sevyate puruṣastvayā / śavaṃ spṛśanti sujanā gaṇikā na tu nirdhanam // 2.4.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
kānurāgaḥ kva veśyātvamiti te vismṛtaṃ katham / saṃdhyeva rāgiṇī veśyā na ciraṃ putri dīpyate // 2.4.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
naṭīva kṛtrimaṃ prema gaṇikārthāya darśayet / tadenaṃ nirdhanaṃ muñca mā kṛthā nāśamātmanaḥ // 2.4.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti mātṛvacaḥ śrutvā ruṣā rūpaṇikābravīt / maivaṃ vādīrmama hyeṣa prāṇebhyo 'pyadhikaḥ priyaḥ // 2.4.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dhanamasti ca me bhūri kimanyena karomyaham / tadamba naiva vaktavyā bhūyo 'pyevamahaṃ tvayā // 2.4.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tacchrutvā lohajaṅghasya nirvāsanavidhau krudhā / tasthau makaradaṃṣṭrā sā tasyopāyaṃ vicinvatī // 2.4.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha mārgāgataṃ kaṃcitkṣīṇakoṣaṃ dadarśa sā / rājaputraṃ parivṛtaṃ puruṣaiḥ śastrapāṇibhiḥ // 2.4.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
upagamya drutaṃ taṃ ca nītvaikānte jagāda sā / nirdhanena mamaikena kāmukenāvṛtaṃ gṛham // 2.4.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tattvamāgaccha tatrādya tathā ca kuru yena saḥ / gṛhānmama nivarteta madīyāṃ ca sutāṃ bhaja // 2.4.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatheti rājaputro 'tha praviveśa sa tadgṛham / tasmin kṣaṇe rūpaṇikā tasthau devakule ca sā // 2.4.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
lohajaṅghaśca tatkālaṃ bahiḥ kvāpi sthito 'bhavat / kṣaṇāntare ca niḥśaṅkastatraiva samupāyayau // 2.4.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkṣaṇaṃ rājaputrasya tasya bhṛtyaiḥ pradhāvya saḥ / dṛḍhaṃ pādaprahārādyaiḥ sarveṣvaṅgeṣv atāḍyata // 2.4.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tair eva cāmedhyapūrṇe kṣiptaḥ sa khātake / lohajaṅghaḥ kathamapi prapalāyitavāṃstataḥ // 2.4.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
athāgatā rūpaṇikā tadbuddhvā śokavihvalā / sābhūdvīkṣyātha sa yayau rājaputro yathāgatam // 2.4.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
lohajaṅgho 'pi kuṭṭanyā prasahya sa khalīkṛtaḥ / gantuṃ pravavṛte tīrthaṃ prāṇāṃstyaktuṃ viyogavān // 2.4.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gacchannaṭavyāṃ saṃtaptaḥ kuṭṭanīmanyunā hṛdi / tvaci ca grīṣmatāpena cchāyāmabhilalāṣa saḥ // 2.4.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tarumaprāpnuvanso 'tha lebhe hastikalevaram / jaghanena praviśyāntarnirmāṃsaṃ jambukaiḥ kṛtam // 2.4.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
carmāvaśeṣe tatrāntaḥ pariśrānaḥ praviśya saḥ / lohajaṅgho yayau nidrāṃ praviśadvātaśītale // 2.4.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
athākasmātsamutthāya kṣaṇenaiva samantataḥ / meghaḥ pravavṛte tatra dhārāsāreṇa varṣitum // 2.4.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena nirvivaraṃ prāpa saṃkocaṃ hasticarma tat / kṣaṇācca tena mārgeṇa jalaugho bhṛśamāyayau // 2.4.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tenāpahṛtya gaṅgāyāmakṣepi gajacarma tat / tajjalaughena nītvā ca samudrāntarnyadhīyata // 2.4.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra dṛṣṭvā ca taccarma nipatyāmiṣaśaṅkayā / hṛtvābdheḥ pāramanayatpakṣī garuḍavaṃśajaḥ // 2.4.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatra cañcvā vidāryaitad gajacarma vilokya ca / antaḥsthaṃ mānuṣaṃ pakṣī palāyya sa tato yayau // 2.4.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataśca carmaṇastasmātpakṣisaṃrambhabodhitaḥ / taccañcuracitadvārāllohajaṅgho viniryayau // 2.4.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvā samudrapārasthamātmānaṃ ca savismayaḥ / anidrasvapnamiva tat sa samagram amanyata // 2.4.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
atha dvau rākṣasau tatra ghorau bhīto dadarśa saḥ / tau cāpi rākṣasau dūrāccakitau tamapaśyatām // 2.4.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rāmātparābhavaṃ smṛtvā taṃ tathaiva ca mānuṣam / dṛṣṭvā tīrṇāmbudhiṃ bhūyastau bhayaṃ hṛdi cakratuḥ // 2.4.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃmantrya ca tayormadhyādeko gatvā tadaiva tam / vibhīṣaṇāya prabhave yathādṛṣṭaṃ nyavedayat // 2.4.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
dṛṣṭarāmaprabhāvaḥ sanso 'pi rājā vibhīṣaṇaḥ / mānuṣāgamanādbhīto rākṣasaṃ tamabhāṣata // 2.4.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gaccha madvacanādbhadra prītyā taṃ brūhi mānuṣam / āgamyatāṃ gṛhe 'smākaṃ prasādaḥ kriyatāmiti // 2.4.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathetyāgatya tattasmai svaprabhuprārthanāvacaḥ / cakito lohajaṅghāya śaśaṃsa sa ca rākṣasaḥ // 2.4.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pyaṅgīkṛtya tadvipro lohajaṅghaḥ praśāntadhīḥ / tenaiva sadvitīyena saha laṅkāṃ tato 'gamat // 2.4.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāṃ ca dṛṣṭasauvarṇatattatprāsādavismitaḥ / praviśya rājabhavanaṃ sa dadarśa vibhīṣaṇam // 2.4.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
so 'pi papraccha rājā taṃ kṛtātithyaḥ kṛtāśiṣam / brahman katham imāṃ bhūmim anuprāpto bhavān iti // 2.4.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa dhūrto 'vādīttaṃ lohajaṅgho vibhīṣaṇam / vipro 'haṃ lohajaṅghākhyo mathurāyāṃ kṛtasthitiḥ // 2.4.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'haṃ dāridryasaṃtaptastatra nārāyaṇāmataḥ / nirāhāraḥ sthito 'kārṣaṃ gatvā devakulaṃ tapaḥ // 2.4.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vibhīṣaṇāntikaṃ gaccha madbhakaḥ sa hi te dhanam / dāsyatīty ādiśat svapne tato māṃ bhagavān hariḥ // 2.4.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kvāhaṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ keti mayokte sa punaḥ prabhuḥ / samādiśadvrajādyaiva taṃ drakṣyasi vibhīṣaṇam // 2.4.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityuktaḥ prabhuṇā sadyaḥ prabuddho 'hamihāmbudheḥ / pāre 'vasthitamātmānamapaśyaṃ vedmi nāparam // 2.4.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityukto lohajaṅghena laṅkāmālokya durgamām / satyaṃ divyaprabhāvo 'yamiti mene vibhīṣaṇaḥ // 2.4.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tiṣṭha dāsyāmi te vittam ity uktvā brāhmaṇaṃ ca tam / matvā ca rakṣasāṃ haste tamapreṣyaṃ nṛghātinām // 2.4.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrasthātsvarṇamūlākhyādgireḥ saṃprekṣya rākṣasān / ānāyayat pakṣipotaṃ garuḍānvayasaṃbhavam // 2.4.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
taṃ cāsmai lohajaṅghāyā mathurāyāṃ gamiṣyate / tatkālameva pradadau vaśīkārāya vāhanam // 2.4.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
lohajaṅgho 'pi laṅkāyāṃ vāhayannadhiruhya tam / kaṃcitkālaṃ viśaśrāma sa vibhīṣaṇasatkṛtaḥ // 2.4.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā taṃ ca papraccha rākṣasendraṃ sakautukaḥ / laṅkāyāṃ kāṣṭhamayyeṣā kathaṃ sarvaiva bhūriti // 2.4.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tacchrutvā sa ca tadvṛttaṃ tamuvāca vibhīṣaṇaḥ / yadi te kautukaṃ brahmaṃstadidaṃ śṛṇu vacmi te // 2.4.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
purā pratijñopanatāṃ nāgānāṃ dāsabhāvataḥ / niṣkraṣṭukāmo jananīṃ garuḍaḥ kaśyapātmajaḥ // 2.4.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tanmūlyabhūtāṃ devebhyaḥ sudhāmāhartumudyataḥ / balasya hetor bhakṣyārthī svapitur nikaṭaṃ yayau // 2.4.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sa cainaṃ yācito 'vādīnmahāntau gajakacchapau / abdhau staḥ putra tau bhuṅkṣva gaccha śāpacutāviti // 2.4.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa garuḍo gatvā bhakṣyāvādāya tāvubhau / mahataḥ kalpavṛkṣasya śākhāyāṃ samupāviśat // 2.4.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāṃ ca śākhāṃ bharāt sadyo bhagnāṃ cañcvā babhāra saḥ / adhaḥ sthitataponiṣṭhavālakhilyānurodhataḥ // 2.4.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
lokopamardabhītena tenātha piturājñayā / ānīya vijane tyaktā sā śākheha garutmatā // 2.4.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāḥ pṛṣṭhe kṛtā laṅkā tena kāṭhamayīha bhūḥ / etadvibhiṣaṇācchrutvā lohajaṅghastutoṣa saḥ // 2.4.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tasmai mahārghāṇi ratnāni subahūni ca / vibhīṣaṇo dadāti sma mathurāṃ gantumicchate // 2.4.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhaktyā ca devasya harer mathurāvartinaḥ kṛte / haste 'syābjagadāśaṅkhacakrān hemamayān dadau // 2.4.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadgṛhītvākhilaṃ tasmin vibhīṣaṇasamarpite / āruhya vihage lakṣaṃ yojanānāṃ prayātari // 2.4.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
utpatya vyomamārgeṇa laṅkāyāstīrṇavāridhiḥ / sa lohajaṅgho mathurāmakleśenājagāma tām // 2.4.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tasyāṃ śūnye vihāre ca bāhye vyomno 'vatīrya saḥ / sthāpayāmāsa ratnaughaṃ taṃ babandha ca pakṣiṇam // 2.4.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āpaṇe ratnam ekaṃ ca gatvā vikrītavāṃs tataḥ / atha vastrāṅgarāgādi krītavān bhojanaṃ tathā // 2.4.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadvihāre ca tatraiva bhuktvā dattvā ca pakṣiṇe / vastrāṅgarāgapuṣpādyairātmānaṃ tairabhūṣayat // 2.4.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pradoṣe cāyayau tasyāstatraivāruhya pakṣiṇi / gṛhaṃ rūpaṇikāyāstāḥ śaṅkhacakragadā vahan // 2.4.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatropari tataḥ sthitvā sthānavitkhe caraṃś ca saḥ / śabdaṃ cakāra gambhīraṃ rahaḥsthāṃ śrāvayan priyām // 2.4.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ ca śrutvaiva niryātā sāpaśyadratnarājitam / enaṃ nārāyaṇākalpaṃ vyomni rūpaṇikā niśi // 2.4.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ haririhāyātastvadarthamiti tena sā / uktā praṇamya vakti sma dayāṃ devaḥ karotviti // 2.4.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athāvatīryā saṃyamya lohajaṅgho vihaṃgamam / viveśa vāsabhavanaṃ sa tayā kānayā saha // 2.4.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatra saṃprāptasaṃbhogaḥ sa niṣkramya kṣaṇāntare / tathaiva vihagārūḍho jagāma nabhasā tataḥ // 2.4.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
devatā viṣubhāryāhaṃ martyaiḥ saha na mantraye / iti rūpaṇikā prātas tasthau maunaṃ vidhāya sā // 2.4.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kasmādevaṃvidhaṃ putri vartase kathyatāṃ tvayā / ityapṛcchata sā mātrā tato makaradaṃṣṭrayā // 2.4.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nirbandhapṛṣṭā tasyai ca sā mātre maunakāraṇam / śaśaṃsa rātrivṛttāntaṃ dāpayitvāntare paṭam // 2.4.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā tacchrutvā sasaṃdehā svayaṃ taṃ kuṭṭanī niśi / dadarśa vihagārūḍhaṃ lohajaṅghaṃ tataḥ kṣaṇam // 2.4.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prabhāte ca paṭāntaḥsthāmetya rūpaṇikāṃ rahaḥ / prahvā makaradaṃṣṭrā sā kuṭṭanīti vyajijñapat // 2.4.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
devasyānugrahātputri tvaṃ devītvamihāgatā / ahaṃ ca te 'tra jananī tanme dehi sutāphalam // 2.4.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
vṛddhānenaiva dehena yathā svargaṃ vrajāmyaham / tathā devasya vijñaptiṃ kuruṣvānugṛhāṇa mām // 2.4.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatheti sā rūpaṇikā tamevārthaṃ vyajijñapat / vyājaviṣṇuṃ punarnaktaṃ lohajaṅgahmupāgatam // 2.4.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa devaveṣas tāṃ lohajaṅgho 'bravītpriyām / pāpā te jananī svargaṃ vyaktaṃ netuṃ na yujyate // 2.4.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekādaśyāṃ punaḥ prātardvāramudghaṭyate divi / tatra ca praviśantyagre bahavaḥ śāṃbhavā gaṇāḥ // 2.4.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tanmadhye kṛtatadveṣā tvanmātāsau praveśyate / tadasyāḥ pañcacūḍaṃ tvaṃ kṣurakḷptaṃ śiraḥ kuru // 2.4.168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṇṭhaṃ karaṅkamālāḍhyaṃ pārśvaṃ caikaṃ sakajjalam / anyatsindūraliptaṃ ca kurvasyā vītavāsasaḥ // 2.4.169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ hyenāṃ gaṇākārāṃ sukhaṃ svargaṃ nayāmyaham / ityuktvā sa kṣaṇaṃ sthitvā lohajaṅghastato 'gamat // 2.4.170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātaśca sā rūpaṇikā yathoktaṃ tamakārayat / veṣaṃ māturathaipāpi tasthau svargaikasaṃmukhī // 2.4.171	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
āyayau ca punastatra lohajaṅgho niśāmukhe / sā ca rūpaṇikā tasmai mātaraṃ tāṃ samarpayat // 2.4.172	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa vihagārūḍhastāmādāyaiva kuṭṭanīm / agnāṃ vikṛtaveṣāṃ ca javādudapatannabhaḥ // 2.4.173	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gaganasthaśca tatraiva prāṃśuṃ devakulāgrataḥ / sa dadarśa śilāstambhaṃ cakreṇopari lāñchitam // 2.4.174	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya pṛṣṭhe sa cakraikasālambe tāṃ nyaveśayat / khalikārapratīkārapatākāmiva kuṭṭanīm // 2.4.175	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iha tiṣṭha kṣaṇaṃ yāvatsāṃnidhyānugrahaṃ bhuvi / gatvā karomīty uktvā ca tasyā dṛṣṭipathād yayau // 2.4.176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatas tatraiva devāgre dṛṣṭvā jāgaraṇāgatān / rātrau yātrotsave lokān gaganād evam abravīt // 2.4.177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
he lokā iha yuṣmākamuparyadya patiṣyati / sarvasaṃhāriṇī māri tadeta śaraṇaṃ harim // 2.4.178	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutvaitāṃ gaganādvāṇīṃ bhītāḥ sarve 'pi tatra te / māthurā devamāśritya tasthuḥ svastyayanādṛtāḥ // 2.4.179	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi vyomno 'vatīryaiva lohajaṅgho 'valokayan / tasthāv adṛṣṭas tanmadhye devaveṣaṃ nivārya tam // 2.4.180	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
adyāpi nāgato devo na ca svargamahaṃ gatā / iti ca stambhapṛṣṭhasthā kuṭṭanyevamacintayat // 2.4.181	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akṣamaivopari sthātuṃ śrāvayantī janānadhaḥ / hā hāhaṃ patitāsmīti sā cakranda ca vibhyatī // 2.4.182	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tacchrutvā patitā seyaṃ mārītyāśaṅkya cākulāḥ / devi mā mā patetyūcaste devāgragatā janāḥ // 2.4.183	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sabālavṛddhāste māthurāstāṃ vibhāvarīm / mārīpātabhayodbhrāntā kathamapyatyavāhayan // 2.4.184	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātaśca dṛṣṭvā stambhasthāṃ kuṭṭanīṃ tāṃ tathāvidhām / pratyabhijñātavānsarvaḥ pauralokaḥ sarājakaḥ // 2.4.185	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
atikrāntabhaye tatra jātahāse 'khile jane / āyayau śutavṛttāntā tatra rūpaṇikātha sā // 2.4.186	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā ca dṛṣṭvā savailaṣyā stambhāgrājjananīṃ nijām / tāmavātārayatsadyastatrasthaiśca janaiḥ saha // 2.4.187	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sā kuṭṭanī tatra sarvaistaiḥ sakutūhalaiḥ / apṛcchyata yathāvṛttaṃ sāpi tebhyaḥ śaśaṃsa tat // 2.4.188	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ siddhādicaritaṃ tanmatvādbhutakārakam / sarājavipravaṇijo janās te vākyam abruvan // 2.4.189	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
yeneyaṃ vipralabdhā hi vañcitānekakāmukā / prakaṭaḥ so 'stu tasyeha paṭṭabandho vidhīyate // 2.4.190	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tacchrutvā lohajaṅghaḥ sa tatrātmānamadarśayat / pṛṣṭaścāmūlataḥ sarvaṃ vṛttāntaṃ tamavarṇayat // 2.4.191	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dadau ca tatra devāya śaṅkhacakrādyupāyanam / vibhīṣaṇena prahitaṃ janavismayakārakam // 2.4.192	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
atha tasya sapadi paṭṭaṃ baddhvā saṃtuṣya māthurāḥ sarve / svādhīnāṃ rūpaṇikāṃ rājādeśena tāṃ cakruḥ // 2.4.193	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
tataś ca tatra priyayā samaṃ tadā samṛddhakoṣo bahuratnasaṃcayaiḥ / sa lohajaṅghaḥ pratikṛtya kuṭṭanī nikāramanyuṃ nyavasadyathāsukham // 2.4.194	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
ity anyarūpasya vasantakasya mukhāt samākarṇya kathām avāpi / baddhasya vatsādhipateḥ samīpe toṣaḥ paro vāsavadattayāntaḥ // 2.4.195	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
atha vāsavadattā sā śanairvatseśvaraṃ prati / gāḍhaṃ babandha sadbhāvaṃ pitṛpakṣaparāṅmukhī // 2.5.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vatseśanikaṭaṃ punar yaugandharāyaṇaḥ / viveśādarśanaṃ kṛtvā sarvān anyāñ janān prati // 2.5.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vasantakasamakṣaṃ ca vijane taṃ vyajijñapat / rājan baddho bhavāṃś caṇḍamahāsenena māyayā // 2.5.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sutāṃ ca dattvā saṃmānya tvāmayaṃ moktumicchati / tadasyaināṃ svayaṃ hṛtvā gacchāmastanayāṃ vayam // 2.5.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ hyasya pratīkāro dṛptasya vihito bhavet / apauruṣakṛtaṃ loke naiva syāllāghavaṃ ca vaḥ // 2.5.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asti caitena dattāsyās tanayāyāḥ kareṇukā / rājñā vāsavadattāyā nāmnā bhadravatī nṛpa // 2.5.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā cānugantuṃ vegena śaktyā nānyena dantinā / muktvā naḍāgiriṃ so 'pi tāṃ dṛṣṭaiva na yudhyate // 2.5.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyaścāṣāḍhako nāma hastyāroho 'tra vidyate / sa ca dattvā dhanaṃ bhūri svīkṛtya sthāpito mayā // 2.5.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadāruhya kareṇuṃ tāṃ saha vāsavadattayā / sāyudhenāpayātavyaṃ naktaṃ guptamitastvayā // 2.5.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ihatyaśca mahāmātro dviradeṅgitavittadā / madyena kṣībatāṃ neyo naitaccetayate yathā // 2.5.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pulindakasya sakhyuste pārśvamagre ca yāmyaham / mārgarakṣārthamityuktvā yayau yaugandharāyaṇaḥ // 2.5.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vatsarājo 'pi tatsarvaṃ kartavyaṃ hṛdaye vyadhāt / atha vāsavadattā sā tasyāntikamupāyayau // 2.5.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatastāstāḥ savisrambhāḥ kathāḥ kurvaṃstayā saha / yaugandharāyaṇoktaṃ ca tasyai rājā śaśaṃsa saḥ // 2.5.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā ca tatpratipadyaiva niścitya gamanaṃ prati / ānāyyāṣāḍhakaṃ sajjaṃ hastyārohaṃ cakāra tam // 2.5.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
devapūjāpadeśena dattvā madyaṃ madānvitam / sarvadhoraṇasaṃyuktaṃ mahāmāraṃ ca sākarot // 2.5.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ pradoṣe vilasanmeghaśabdasamākule / āṣāḍhakaḥ kareṇuṃ tāṃ sajjīkṛtyānināya saḥ // 2.5.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sajjyamānā ca sā śabdaṃ cakāra kariṇī kila / taṃ ca hastirutābhijño mahāmātro 'tha so 'śṛṇot // 2.5.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
triṣaṣṭiyojanānyadya yāsyāmītyāha hastinī / ityuvāca sa coddāmamadaviskhalitākṣaram // 2.5.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vicārārhaṃ punastasya mattasyābhūnna mānasam / tacca hastipakāḥ kṣībāstadvākyaṃ naiva śuśruvuḥ // 2.5.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataśca vatsarājo 'tra vīṇāmādāya tāṃ nijām / yaugandharāyaṇātprāptairyogaiḥ sraṃsitabandhanaḥ // 2.5.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upanītapraharaṇaḥ svairaṃ vāsavadattayā / kareṇukāyām ārohat sa tasyāṃ savasantakaḥ // 2.5.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tato vāsavadattāpi saha kāñcanamālayā / sakhyā rahasyadhāriṇyā tasyāmevāruroha sā // 2.5.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athojjayinyā niragātsa hastipakapañcamaḥ / vatseśo niśi mattebhabhinnaprākāravartmanā // 2.5.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatsthānarakṣiṇau vīrau svairaṃ sa hatavānnṛpaḥ / vīrabāhuṃ tathā tālabhaṭaṃ rājasutāvubhau // 2.5.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ pratasthe vegena sa rājā dayitāsakhaḥ / hṛṣṭaḥ kareṇukārūḍho dadhatyāṣāḍhake 'ṅkuśam // 2.5.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ujjayinyāṃ ca tau dṛṣṭvā hatau prākārarakṣiṇau / rājñe nyavedayanrātrau kṣubhitāḥ purarakṣiṇaḥ // 2.5.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pyanviṣya kramāccaṇḍamahāsenaḥ palāyitam / hṛtavāsavadattaṃ taṃ vatsarājamabudhyata // 2.5.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatputraḥ pālakākhyo 'tha jātakolāhale pure / anvadhāvatsa vatseśamadhiruhya naḍāgirim // 2.5.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vatseśo 'pi tamāyāntaṃ pahi bāṇairayodhayat / naḍāgiriḥ kareṇuṃ tāṃ dṛṣṭvā na prajahāra ca // 2.5.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa pālako bhrātrā paścādetya nyavartyata / gopālakena vākyajñaḥ pitṛkāryānurodhinā // 2.5.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vatsarājo 'pi visrabdhaṃ gantuṃ pravavṛte tataḥ / gacchataścātra śanakaiḥ śarvarī paryahīyata // 2.5.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tato vindhyāṭavīṃ prāpya madhyāhne tasya bhūpateḥ / triṣaṣṭiyojanāyātā tṛṣitābhūtkareṇukā // 2.5.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avatīrṇe sabhārye ca rājñi tasmiñjalāni sā / pītvā taddoṣataḥ prāpa pañcatāṃ hastinī kṣaṇāt // 2.5.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
viṣaṇṇo 'tha sa vatseśaḥ saha vāsavadattayā / gaganādudgatāmetāṃ śṛṇoti sma sarasvatīm // 2.5.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ māyāvatī nāma rājanvidyādharāṅganā / iyantaṃ kālamabhavaṃ śāpadoṣeṇa hastinī // 2.5.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
upakāraṃ ca vatseśa tavādya ṛtavatyaham / kariṣyāmi ca bhūyo 'pi tvatputrasya bhaviṣyataḥ // 2.5.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
eṣā vāsavadattā ca patnī te naiva mānuṣī / devīyaṃ kāraṇavaśādavatīrṇā kṣitāviti // 2.5.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tataḥ sa hṛṣṭo vyasṛjadvindhyasānuṃ vasantakam / pulindakāya suhṛde vaktuṃ svāgamanaṃ nṛpaḥ // 2.5.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
svayaṃ ca pādacārī sansa śanairdayitānvitaḥ / tatraiva gacchann utthāya dasyubhiḥ paryavāryata // 2.5.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
dhanurdvitīyo dasyūnāṃ teṣāṃ pañcottaraṃ śatam / puro vāsavadattāyā vatsarājaḥ sa cāvadhīt // 2.5.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkṣaṇaṃ so 'sya rājño 'tra mittraṃ cāgātpulindakaḥ / yaugandharāyaṇasakho vasantakapuraḥsaraḥ // 2.5.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
sa tāndasyūnnivāryānyānvatseśaṃ praṇipatya tam / nayati sma nijāṃ pallīṃ bhillarājaḥ savallabham // 2.5.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tāṃ rātrimāraṇyadarbhapāṭitapādayā / sa vatseśo viśaśrāsa saha vāsavadattayā // 2.5.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātaḥ senāpatiś cāsya rumaṇvān prāpadantikam / yaugandharāyaṇena prāgdūtaṃ saṃpreṣya bodhitaḥ // 2.5.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agācca kaṭakaṃ sarvaṃ tathā vyāptadigantaram / yathā vindhyāṭavī prāpa sā saṃbādharasajñatām // 2.5.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praviśya kaṭake tasmiṃstasyāmevāṭavībhuvi / tasthāvujjayinīvārtāṃ jñātuṃ vatseśvaro 'tha saḥ // 2.5.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrasthaṃ ca tamabhyāgādujjayinyā vaṇiktadā / yaugandharāyaṇasuhṛtsa cāgatyābravīdidam // 2.5.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
deva caṇḍamahāsenaḥ prīto jāmātari tvayi / preṣitaśca pratīhārasteneha bhavadantikam // 2.5.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa cāgacchansthitaḥ paścādahamagrata eva tu / pracchannaḥ satvaraṃ devaṃ vijñāpayitumāgataḥ // 2.5.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etacchrutvā sa vatseśo jaharṣa ca śaśaṃsa ca / sarvaṃ vāsavadattāyāḥ sāpi harṣamagātparam // 2.5.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtabandhuparityāgā vivāhavidhisatvarā / atha vāsavadattā sā salajjā cotsukā tathā // 2.5.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ svātmavinodāya nikaṭasthaṃ vasantakam / sā jagāda kathā kācittvayā me varṇyatāmiti // 2.5.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca mugdhadṛśastasyā bhartṛbhaktivivardhinīm / vasantakastadā dhīmānimāmakathayatkathām // 2.5.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
astīha nagarī loke tāmraliptīti viśrutā / tasyāṃ ca dhanadattākhyo vaṇigāsīnmadhādhanaḥ // 2.5.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa cāputro bahūnviprānsaṃghaṭya praṇato 'bravīt / tathā kuruta putro me yathā syādacirāditi // 2.5.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tam ūcur viprāste naitat kiṃcana duṣkaram / sarvaṃ hi sādhayantīha dvijāḥ śrautena karmaṇā // 2.5.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathā ca pūrvamabhavadrāja kaścidaputrakaḥ / pañcottaraṃ śataṃ cābhūttasyāntaḥpurayoṣitām // 2.5.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
putrīyeṣṭyā ca tasyaiko janturnāma suto 'jani / tatpatnīnāmaśeṣāṇāṃ nūtanendūdayo dṛśi // 2.5.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jānubhyāṃ paryaṭantaṃ ca bālaṃ jātu pipīlikā / urūdeśe dadaṃśainaṃ muktacūtkārakātaram // 2.5.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvatā tumulākrandamantaḥ puramajāyata / rājāpi putra putreti cikranda prākṛto yathā // 2.5.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣaṇāttasminsamāśvaste bāle 'pāstapipīlike / duḥkhaikakāraṇaṃ rājā sa ninindaikaputratām // 2.5.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asti kaścidupāyo me yena syurbahavaḥ sutāḥ / iti tatparitāpena papraccha brāhmaṇāṃśca saḥ // 2.5.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
te taṃ pratyabruvanrājannupāyo 'tra tavāstyayam / havaitaṃ tvatsutaṃ vahnau tanmāsaṃ hūyate 'khilam // 2.5.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadgandhāghrāṇato rājñyaḥ sarvāḥ prāpsyanti te sutān / etac chrutvā sa rājā tat tathā sarvam akārayat // 2.5.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svapatnīsamasaṃkhyāṃś ca sa putrān prāptavān nṛpaḥ / atas tavāpi homena sādhayāmo vayaṃ sutam // 2.5.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityuktvā dhanadattaṃ te brāhmaṇāḥ kḷptadakṣiṇam / homaṃ cakrustatastasya vaṇijo jātavānsutaḥ // 2.5.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
guhasenābhidhānaśca sa balo vavṛdhe kramāt / pitātha dhanadatto 'sya bhāryāmanviṣyati sma saḥ // 2.5.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa tatpitā tena tanayena samaṃ yayau / dvīpāntaraṃ snuṣāhetorvaṇijyāvyapadeśataḥ // 2.5.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra devasmitāṃ nāma dharmaguptādvaṇigvarāt / svaputraguhasenasya kṛte kanyāmayācata // 2.5.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dharmaguptastu saṃbandhaṃ na tamaṅgīcakāra saḥ / ālocya tāmraliptīṃ tāṃ durāṃ duhitṛvatsalaḥ // 2.5.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā tu devasmitā dṛṣṭvā guhasenaṃ tadaiva tam / tadguṇākṛṣṭacittatvādbandhutyāgaikaniścayā // 2.5.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sakhīmukhena kṛtvā ca saṃketaṃ saha tena sā / priyeṇa pitṛyuktena rātrau dvīpāttato yayau // 2.5.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāmraliptīmatha prāpya tayoḥ kṛtavivāhayoḥ / jāyāpatyormithaḥ premapāśabaddhamabhūnmanaḥ // 2.5.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athāstaṃ pitari prāpte prerito 'bhūtsa bandhubhiḥ / kaṭāhadvīpagamane guhaseno yadṛcchayā // 2.5.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
taccāsya gamanaṃ bhāryā tadā nāṅgīcakāra sā / serṣyā devasmitā kāmamanyastrīsaṅgaśaṅkinī // 2.5.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ patnyāmanicchantyāṃ prerayatsu ca bandhuṣu / kartavyaniścalo mūḍho guhaseno babhūva saḥ // 2.5.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aha gatvā nirāhāraścakre devakule vratam / upāyamiha devo me nirdiśatviti cintayan // 2.5.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpi devasmitā tadvattena sārdhaṃ vyadhādvratam / tato 'nayoḥ śivaḥ svapne daṃpatyordarśanaṃ dadau // 2.5.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dve ca raktāmbuje dattvā sa devastāvabhāṣata / haste gṛhṇītamekaikaṃ padmametadubhāvapi // 2.5.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dūrasthatve ca yadyekaḥ śīlatyāgaṃ kariṣyati / tadanyasya kare padmaṃ mlānimeṣyati nānyathā // 2.5.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etacchrutvā prabudhyaiva daṃpatī tāvapaśyatām / anyonyasyeva hṛdayaṃ hastasthaṃ raktamambujam // 2.5.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tataḥ sa cakre prasthānaṃ guhaseno dhṛtāmbujaḥ / sā tu devasmitātatra tasthau padmārpitekṣaṇā // 2.5.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
guhaseno 'pi taṃ prāpa kaṭāhadvīpamāśu saḥ / kartuṃ pravavṛte cātra ratnānāṃ krayavikrayau // 2.5.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
haste ca tasya taddṛṣṭvā sadaivāmlānamambujam / atra kecidvaṇikputrāścatvāro vismayaṃ yayuḥ // 2.5.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
te yuktyā taṃ gṛhaṃ nītvā pāyayitvā bhṛśaṃ madhu / papracchuḥ padmavṛttāntaṃ so 'pi kṣībaḥ śaśaṃsa tam // 2.5.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatastaṃ ciranirvāhyaratnādikrayavikrayam / vicintya guhasenaṃ te catvāro 'pi vaṇiksutāḥ // 2.5.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃmantrya kautukātpāpāstadbhāryāśīlaviplavam / cikīrṣavo yayuḥ śīghraṃ tāmraliptīmalakṣitāḥ // 2.5.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatropāyaṃ vicinvantaḥ sugatāyatanasthitām / pravrājikāmupājagmurnāmnā yogakaraṇḍikām // 2.5.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prītipūrvaṃ ca tām ūcur bhagavaty asmadīpsitam / sādhyate cet tvayā tat te dāsyāmo 'rthān bahūn iti // 2.5.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpyuvāca dhruvaṃ yūnāṃ kāpi strī vāñchiteha vaḥ / tadbhūta sādhayāmyeva dhanalipsā ca nāsti me // 2.5.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asti siddhikarī nāma śiṣyā me buddhiśālinī / atprasādena saṃprāptamasaṃkhyaṃ hi dhanaṃ mayā // 2.5.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kathaṃ śiṣyāprasādena bhūri prāptaṃ dhanaṃ tvayā / iti taiḥ sā vaṇikputraiḥ pṛṣṭā pravrājikābravīt // 2.5.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kautukaṃ yadi tatputrāḥ śrūyatāṃ varṇayāmi vaḥ / iha ko'pi vaṇikpūrvamāyayāvuttarāpathāt // 2.5.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyehasthasya macchiṣyā sā gatvā śiśriye gṛhe / yuktyā karmakarībhāvaṃ kṛtarūpavivartanā // 2.5.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
viśvāsya vaṇijaṃ taṃ ca tadgṛhātsvarṇasaṃcayam / sarvaṃ muṣitvā pracchannaṃ pratyūṣe sātha niryayau // 2.5.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
nagarīnirgatāṃ dṛṣṭvā śaṅkāśīghragatiṃ ca tām / mṛdaṅgahasto moṣāya ḍombaḥ ko 'pyanvagāddrutam // 2.5.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
nyagrodhasya talaṃ prāpya sā dṛṣṭvā tamupāgatam / ḍombaṃ siddhikarī dhūrtā sadainyevedamabravīt // 2.5.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhartrā sahādya kalahaṃ kṛtvāhaṃ nigatā gṛhāt / martuṃ tadbhadra pāśo 'tra tvayā me badhyatāmiti // 2.5.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
pāśena mriyatāmeṣā kimenāṃ hanmyahaṃ striyam / matveti tatra vṛkṣe 'sau ḍombaḥ pāśamasajjayat // 2.5.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ siddhikarī ḍombaṃ sā mugdheva jagāda tam / kriyate kathamudbandhastvayā medarśyatāmiti // 2.5.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa ḍombas taṃ dattvā mṛdaṅgaṃ pādayoradhaḥ / itthaṃ kriyata ityuktvā svakaṇṭhe pāśamarpayat // 2.5.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpi siddhikarī sadyastaṃ mṛdaṅgamacūrṇayat / pādāghātena ḍombo 'tha so 'pi pāśe vyapadyata // 2.5.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkālamāgato 'nveṣṭuṃ vṛkṣamūle dadarśa saḥ / muṣitāśeṣakoṣāṃ tāṃ dūrātsiddhikarīṃ vaṇik // 2.5.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpi dṛṣṭvā tamāyāntaṃ vṛkṣe tasminnalakṣitam / āruhya tasthau śākhāyāṃ pattraughacchannavigrahā // 2.5.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sa cāgatya vaṇigyāvatsabhṛtyaḥ pāśabandhanam / ḍombameva tamadrākṣīnna tu siddhikarīṃ kvacit // 2.5.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mā nāma vṛkṣamārūḍhā sā bhavediti tatkṣaṇam / eko 'sya vaṇijo bhṛtyastarumārohati sma tam // 2.5.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sadā tvayyeva me prītirihārūḍhastvameva ca / tatsundara tavaivedaṃ dhanamehi bhajasva mām // 2.5.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityuktvāliṅgya cumbantī sāsya siddhikarī mukham / vaṇigbhṛtyasya daśanairjihvāṃ mūḍhadhiyo 'cchinat // 2.5.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
sa papāta vyathākrānto mukhena rudhiraṃ vaman / vṛkṣāttasmāllalalleti kimapyaprasphuṭaṃ bruvan // 2.5.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taddṛṣṭvā sa vaṇigbhīto bhūtagrastamavetya tam / svagṛhaṃ bhṛtyasahitaḥ palāyyaiva tato yayau // 2.5.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
athāvatīrya vṛkṣāgrāttadvadbhītā ca tāpasī / āgādgṛhaṃ samādāya tatsā siddhikarī dhanam // 2.5.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃvidhā hi macchiṣyā bahuprajñānaśālinī / evaṃ ca tatprasādena putrāḥ prāptaṃ mayā dhanam // 2.5.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityuktvā tānvaṇikputrānatha pravrājikā nijām / tatkālamāgatāṃ śiṣyāmetebhyastāmadarśayat // 2.5.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jagāda caitāṃs tatputrāḥ sadbhāvaṃ vadatādhunā / kāṃ striyaṃ vāñchatha kṣipraṃ tāmahaṃ sādhayāmi vaḥ // 2.5.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tacchrutvā te ca tāmūcuryaiṣā devasmitābhidhā / guhasenavaṇigbhāryā tayā naḥ saṃgamaṃ kuru // 2.5.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutveti pratijajñe tatkāryaṃ pravrājikātha sā / vaṇiksutānāṃ caiteṣāṃ svagṛhaṃ sthitaye dadau // 2.5.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
rañjayitvātha tatratyaṃ janaṃ bhakṣyādidānataḥ / guhasenagṛhaṃ tatsā viveśa saha śiṣyayā // 2.5.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato devasmitāvāsagṛhadvāramupāgatām / tāṃ śunī śṛṅkhalābaddhā rurodhāpūrvarodhinī // 2.5.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato devasmitā dṛṣṭvā sā tāṃ prāveśayatsvayam / kim āgatā syād eṣeti vicintya preṣya ceṭikām // 2.5.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
praviṣṭā cāśiṣaṃ dattvā kṛtvā vyājakṛtādarām / sā tāṃ devasmitāṃ sādhvīṃ pāpā pravrājikābravīt // 2.5.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sadaiva tvaddidṛkṣā me bhavatyadya punarmayā / svapne dṛṣṭāsi tenāhamutkā tvāṃ draṣṭumāgatā // 2.5.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhartrā vinākṛtāṃ tvāṃ ca dṛṣṭvā me dūyate manaḥ / priyopabhogavandhye hi viphale rūpayauvane // 2.5.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityādibhirvacobhistāṃ sādhvīmāśvāsya sā ciram / āmantrya cāyayau tāvadgṛhaṃ pravrājikā nijam // 2.5.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dvitīye 'hni gṛhītvā ca maricakṣodanirbharam / māṃsakhaṇḍaṃ punaḥ sā tadyayau devasmitāgṛham // 2.5.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dvāraśunyai dadau tasyai māṃsakhaṇḍaṃ ca tatra tam / sāpi taṃ bhakṣayāmāsa sadyaḥ samaricaṃ śunī // 2.5.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato maricadoṣeṇa tasyā dṛgbhyāmavāritam / aśru pravavṛte tasyāḥ prasnauti sma ca nāsikā // 2.5.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpi pravrājikā tasmin kṣaṇe devasmitāntikam / praviśya tatkṛtātithyā prārebhe rodituṃ śaṭhā // 2.5.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pṛṣṭā ca devasmitayā sā kṛcchrādevamabravīt / putri saṃprati paśyaitāṃ bahiḥ prarudatīṃ śunīm // 2.5.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
eṣā hyadya parijñāya māṃ janmāntarasaṃgatām / pravṛttā rodituṃ tena kṛpayāśru mamodgatam // 2.5.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tacchrutvā bahirālokya śunīṃ tāṃ rudatīmiva / kimetaccitramiti sā dadhyau devasmitā kṣaṇam // 2.5.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
pravrājikātha sāvādītputri pūrvatra janmani / ahameṣā ca bhārye dve viprasyābhūva kasyacit // 2.5.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa cāvayoḥ patirdūraṃ deśāntaramitastataḥ / vāraṃ vāraṃ prayāti sma rājādeśena dūtyayā // 2.5.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatpravāse ca kurvantyā svecchaṃ puruṣasaṃgamam / mayā bhūtendriyagrāmo nopabhogairavañcyata // 2.5.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhūtendriyānabhidroho dharmo hi paramo mataḥ / ato jātismarā putri jātāhamiha janmani // 2.5.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
eṣā tu śīlamevaikaṃ rarakṣājñānatastadā / tena śvayonau patitā kiṃ tu jātiṃ smaratyasau // 2.5.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
ko 'yaṃ dharmo dhruvaṃ dhūrtaracaneyaṃ kṛtānayā / iti saṃcintya suprajñā sā tāṃ devasmitābravīt // 2.5.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iyacciraṃ mayā dharmo na jñāto bhagavatyayam / tattvaṃ kenāpi kāntena puṃsā me saṃgamaṃ kuru // 2.5.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

madvidhvaṃsāya ke 'pyete dvīpāttasmādihāgatāḥ / vaṇikputrāḥ śaṭhāstaiśca prayukteyaṃ kutāpasī // 2.5.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

svaśiṣyāveṣasaṃchannaṃ taṃ ca devasmitāgṛhe / tatra sāyaṃ praveśyaiva nirgatyāprakaṭaṃ yayau // 2.5.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'tra taṃ vaṇikputraṃ tatsadhattūrakaṃ madhu / ceṭī devasmitāveṣā sā sādaramapāyayat // 2.5.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena so 'vinayeneva madhunā hṛtacetanaḥ / hṛtvā vastrādi ceṭībhistatra cakre digambaraḥ // 2.5.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śunaḥ pādena dattvāṅkaṃ lalāṭe tābhireva ca / nītvā so 'śucisaṃpūrṇe kṣipto 'bhūtkhātake niśi // 2.5.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

sā ca kiṃcidvivṛddhasya rūkṣaṃ tasyāśanaṃ dadau / so 'pi tenābhavadbālo dhūsarāṅgaḥ pṛthūdaraḥ // 2.6.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

idaṃ gurugirīndrajāpraṇayamandarāndolanāt purā kila kathāmṛtaṃ haramukhāmbudherudgatam / prasahya rasayanti ye vigatavighnalabdhardvayo dhuraṃ dadhati vaibudhīṃ bhuvi bhavaprasādena te // 3.0.1	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]

asti mākandikā nāma nagarī jāhnavītaṭe / tasyāṃ maunavrataḥ kaścidāsītpravrājakaḥ purā // 3.1.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca bhikṣāśano 'nekaparivrāṭparivāritaḥ / āsta devakulasyāntarmaṭhikāyāṃ kṛtasthitiḥ // 3.1.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praviṣṭo jātu bhikṣārthamekasya vaṇijo gṛhe / sa dadarśa śubhāṃ kanyāṃ bhikṣāmādāya nirgatām // 3.1.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvā cādbhutarūpāṃ tāṃ sa kāmavaśagaḥ śaṭhaḥ / hā hā kaṣṭamiti smāha vaṇijastasya śṛṇvataḥ // 3.1.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gṛhītabhikṣaśca tato jagāma nilayaṃ nijam / tatastaṃ sa vaṇiggatvā rahaḥ papraccha vismayāt // 3.1.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kimadyaivamakasmāttvaṃ maunaṃ tyaktvoktavāniti / tacchrutvā vaṇijaṃ taṃ ca parivrāḍevamabravīt // 3.1.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
durlakṣaṇeyaṃ kanyā te vivāho 'syā yadā bhavet / tadā sasutadārasya kṣayaḥ syāt tava niścitam // 3.1.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad etāṃ vīkṣya duḥkhaṃ me jātaṃ bhakto hi me bhavān / tenaivam uktavān asmi tyaktvā maunaṃ bhavatkṛte // 3.1.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad eṣā kanyakā naktaṃ mañjūṣāyāṃ niveśitā / upari nyastadīpāyāṃ gaṅgāyāṃ kṣipyatāṃ tvayā // 3.1.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatheti pratipadyaitadgatvā so 'tha vaṇigbhayāt / naktaṃ cakre tathā sarvaṃ nirvimarśā hi bhīravaḥ // 3.1.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pravrājako 'pi tatkālamuvācānucarānnijān / gaṅgāṃ gacchata tatrāntarvahatīṃ yāṃ ca paśyatha // 3.1.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pṛṣṭhaṃsthadīpāṃ mañjūṣāṃ guptamānayateha tām / udghāṭanīyā na ca sā śrute 'pyantardhvanāviti // 3.1.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tatheti cāgatā yāvadgaṅgāṃ na prāpnuvanti te / rājaputraḥ kimapyekastāvattasyāmavātarat // 3.1.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'tra tāṃ vaṇijā kṣiptāṃ mañjūṣāṃ vīkṣya dīpataḥ / bhṛtyairānāyya sahasā kautukādudaghāṭayat // 3.1.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
dadarśa cāntaḥ kanyāṃ tāṃ hṛdayonmādakāriṇīm / upameye ca gāndharvavidhinā tāṃ ca tatkṣaṇam // 3.1.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
mañjūṣāṃ tāṃ ca gaṅgāyāṃ tathaivordhvasthadīpikām / kṛtvā tatyāja niḥkṣipya ghoraṃ vānaramantare // 3.1.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gate 'tha tasmin saṃprāptakanyāratne nṛpātmaje / āyayustasya cinvantaḥ śiṣyāḥ pravrājakasya te // 3.1.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
dadṛśustāṃ ca mañjūṣāṃ gṛhītvā tasya cāntikam / ninyuḥ pravrājakasyaināṃ so 'tha hṛṣṭo jagāda tān // 3.1.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
eko 'haṃ sādhaye mantramādāyaitāmihopari / adhastūṣṇīṃ ca yuṣmābhiḥ śayitavyamimāṃ niśām // 3.1.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā tāṃ sa mañjūṣām āropya maṭhikopari / sa parivrāḍ vivṛtavān vaṇikkanyābhilāṣukaḥ // 3.1.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tataśca tasyā nirgatya vānaro bhīṣaṇākṛtiḥ / tamabhyadhāvatsvakṛto mūrtimāniva durnayaḥ // 3.1.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
sa tasya daśanairnāsāṃ nakhaiḥ karṇau ca tatkṣaṇam / ciccheda pāpasya kapirnigrahajña iva krudhā // 3.1.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tathābhūto 'tha sa tataḥ parivrāḍavatīrṇavān / yatnastambhitasāhāśca śiṣyāstaṃ dadṛśustadā // 3.1.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātarbuddhvā ca tatsarvaṃ jahāsa sakalo janaḥ / nananda sa vaṇiksā ca tatsutā prāptasampratiḥ // 3.1.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ yathā sa hāsyatvaṃ gataḥ pravrājakastathā / vyājaprayogasyāsiddhau vayaṃ gacchema jātucit // 3.1.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
bahudoṣo hi viraho rājño vāsavadattayā / evaṃ rumaṇvatoktaḥ sannāha yaugandharāyaṇaḥ // 3.1.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
nānyathodyogasiddhiḥ syādanudyoge ca niścitam / rājani vyasaninyetannaśyedapi yathāsthitam // 3.1.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
labdhāpi mantritākhyātirasmākaṃ cānyathā bhavet / svāmisaṃbhāvanāyāśca bhavema vyabhicāriṇaḥ // 3.1.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svāyattasiddhe rājño hi prajñopakaraṇaṃ matā / sacivaḥ ko bhavetteṣāṃ kṛte vāpyathavākṛte // 3.1.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sacivāyattasiddhestu tatprajñaivārthasādhanam / ta eva cennirutsāhāḥ śriyo datto jalāñjaliḥ // 3.1.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha devīpituścaṇḍamahāsenādviśaṅkase / sa saputraśca devī ca vacaḥ kuruta eva me // 3.1.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavantaṃ dhīrāṇāṃ dhuryaṃ yaugandharāyaṇam / pramādaśaṅkihṛdayo rumaṇvān punar abravīt // 3.1.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
abhīṣṭastrīviyogārtyā saviveko 'pi bādhyate / kiṃ punarvatsarājo 'yamatra caitāṃ kathāṃ śṛṇu // 3.1.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
purābhūddevasenākhyo rājā matimatāṃ varaḥ / śrāvastīti purī tasya rājadhānī babhūva ca // 3.1.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāṃ ca puryām abhavad vaṇig eko mahādhanaḥ / tasyodapadyatānanyasadṛśī duhitā kila // 3.1.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
unmādinīti nāmnā ca kanyakā sāpi paprathe / unmādyati gatastasyā rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvākhilo janaḥ // 3.1.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tanayeyamanāvedya rājñe deyā kvacinna me / sa hi kupyediti pitā tasyāḥ so 'cintayadvaṇik // 3.1.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tataśca gatvā rājānaṃ devasenaṃ vyajijñapat / devāsti kanyāratnaṃ me gṛhyatāmupayogi cet // 3.1.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tacchrutvā vyasṛjadrāja so 'tha pratyayitāndvijān / gatvā sulakṣaṇā sā vā na vetyālocyatāmiti // 3.1.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatheti te dvijā gatvā tāṃ dṛṣṭvaiva vaṇiksutām / unmādinīṃ yayuḥ kṣobhaṃ sadyaḥ saṃjātamanmathāḥ // 3.1.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājāsyāṃ pariṇītāyāmetadekamanāstyajet / rājakāryāṇi naśyecca sarvaṃ tasmātkimetayā // 3.1.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti ca prakṛtiṃ prāptā dvijāḥ saṃmantrya te gatāḥ / kulakṣaṇā sā kanyeti mithyā rājānam abruvan // 3.1.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tato rājñā parityaktāṃ sa tāmunmādinīṃ vaṇik / tatsenāpataye prādād antarjātavimānanām // 3.1.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhartṛveśmani harmyasthā sātha jātu tamāgatam / rājānaṃ tena mārgeṇa buddhvātmānam adarśayat // 3.1.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvaiva ca sa tāṃ rājā jagatsaṃmohanauṣadhim / prayuktāmiva kāmena jātonmāda ivābhavat // 3.1.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā svabhavanaṃ jñātvā tāṃ ca pūrvāvadhīritām / unmanā jvarasaṃtāpapīḍāṃ gāḍhamavāpa saḥ // 3.1.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā dāsī na parastrīti gṛhyatāṃ yadi vāpyaham / tyajāmi tāṃ devakule svīkarotu tataḥ prabhuḥ // 3.1.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
iti tena ca tadbhartrā svasenāpatinā tataḥ / abhyarthyamāno yatnena jagādaivaṃ sa bhūpatiḥ // 3.1.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
nāhaṃ parastrīm ādāsye tvaṃ vā tyakṣyasi tāṃ yadi / tato naṅkṣyati te dharmo daṇḍyo me ca bhaviṣyasi // 3.1.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tacchrutvā mantriṇo 'nye ca tūṣṇīmāsansa ca kramāt / smarajvareṇa tenaiva nṛpaḥ pañcatvamāyayau // 3.1.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ sa rājā naṣṭo 'bhūd dhīro 'pyunmādinīṃ vinā / vinā vāsavadattāṃ tu vatsarājaḥ kathaṃ bhavet // 3.1.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
etadrumaṇvataḥ śrutvā punaryaugandharāyaṇaḥ / uvāca sahyate kleśo rājabhiḥ kāryadarśibhiḥ // 3.1.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rāvaṇocchittaye devaiḥ kṛtvā yuktiṃ viyojitaḥ / sītādevyā na kiṃ rāmo viṣehe virahavyathām // 3.1.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etacchrutvā ca bhūyo 'pi rumaṇvānabhyabhāṣata / te hi rāmādayo devāsteṣāṃ sarvaṃsahaṃ manaḥ // 3.1.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asahaṃ tu manuṣyāṇāṃ tathā ca śrūyatāṃ kathā / astīha bahuratnāḍhyā mathureti mahāpurī // 3.1.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyām abhūd vaṇikputraḥ ko'pi nāmnā yaïllakaḥ / tasya cābhūtpriyā bhāryā tadekābaddhamānasā // 3.1.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tayā saha vasanto 'tha kadācitkāryagauravāt / dvīpāntaraṃ vaṇikputro gantuṃ vyavasito 'bhavat // 3.1.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadbhāryāpi ca tenaiva saha gantumiyeṣa sā / strīṇāṃ bhāvānuraktaṃ hi virahāsahanaṃ manaḥ // 3.1.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa ca vaṇikputraḥ pratasthe kṛtamaṅgalaḥ / na ca tāṃ saha jagrāha bhāryāṃ kḷptaprasādhanām // 3.1.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sātha taṃ prasthitaṃ paścātpaśyantī sāśrulocanā / atiṣṭhatprāṅgaṇadvārakavāṭāntavilambinī // 3.1.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gate dṛṣṭipathāt tasmin sā viyogāsahā tataḥ / niryātuṃ nāśakanmugdhā prāṇās tasyā viniryayuḥ // 3.1.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadbuddhvā ca vaṇikputraḥ pratyāvṛtyā catatkṣaṇam / dadarśa vihvalāṃ kāntāmetāmutkrāntajīvitām // 3.1.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sundarāpāṇḍuracchāyāṃ vilolālakalāñchanām / bhuvi cāndramasīṃ lakṣmīṃ divaḥ suptacyutāmiva // 3.1.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅke kṛtvā ca tāṃ sadyaḥ krandatastasya niryayuḥ / śokāgnijvalitād dehād drutaṃ bhītā ivāsavaḥ // 3.1.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evamanyonyavirahāddaṃpatī tau vineśatuḥ / ato 'sya rājño devyāśca rakṣyānyonyaviyogitā // 3.1.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ity uktvā virate tasmin baddhāśaṅke rumaṇvati / jagāda dhairyajaladhir dhīmān yaugandharāyaṇaḥ // 3.1.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
mayaitanniścitaṃ sarvaṃ kāryāṇi ca mahībhṛtām / bhavantyevaṃvidhānyeva tathā cātra kathāṃ śṛṇu // 3.1.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ujjayinyāmabhūtpūrvaṃ puṇyasenābhidho nṛpaḥ / sa jātu balinānyena rājñā gatvābhyayujyata // 3.1.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha tanmantriṇo dhīrāstamariṃ vīkṣya durjayam / mithyā rājā mṛta iti pravādaṃ sarvato vyadhuḥ // 3.1.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
pracchannaṃ sthāpayāmāsuḥ puṇyasenaṃ nṛpaṃ ca te / anyaṃ kaṃcidadhākṣuśca rājārhavidhinā śavam // 3.1.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arājakānām adhunā bhava rājā tvam eva naḥ / iti dūtamukhenātha tamariṃ jagaduśca te // 3.1.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathetyuktavatastasya ripostuṣṭasya te tataḥ / militvā sainyasahitāḥ kaṭakaṃ bibhiduḥ kramāt // 3.1.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
bhinne ca sainye rājānaṃ puṇyasenaṃ prakāśya tam / te saṃprāpabalāḥ śatruṃ taṃ nijaghnuḥ svamantriṇaḥ // 3.1.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
īddṛṃśi rājakāryāṇi bhavanti tadidaṃ vayam / devīdāhapravādena kāryaṃ dhairyeṇa kurmahe // 3.1.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityetanniścitamateḥ śrutvā yaugandharāyaṇāt / rumaṇvānabravīdevaṃ tarhi yadyeṣa niścayaḥ // 3.1.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadgopālakamānīya devyā bhrātaramādṛtam / saṃmantrya ca samaṃ tena samyaksarvaṃ vidhīyatām // 3.1.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evamastviti vakti sma tato yaugandharāyaṇaḥ / tatpratyayādrumaṇvāṃśca cakre kartavyaniścayam // 3.1.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyedyurmantrimukhyau tau dūtaṃ vyasṛjatāṃ nijam / gopālakaṃ tamānetumutkaṇṭhāvyapadeśataḥ // 3.1.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kāryahetorgataḥ pūrvaṃ taddūtavacanācca saḥ / āgād gopālakastatra svayaṃ mūrta ivotsavaḥ // 3.1.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āgataṃ tadahaścainaṃ svairaṃ yaugandharāyaṇaḥ / nināya sarumaṇvatkaṃ gṛhaṃ gopālakaṃ niśi // 3.1.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra cāsmai tadutsāhaṃ śaśaṃsa svacikīrṣitam / yatpūrvaṃ mantritaṃ tena sarvaṃ saha rumaṇvatā // 3.1.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca rājahitaiṣī sanduḥkhāvahamapi svasuḥ / gopālako 'numene tatkartavyaṃ hi satāṃ vacaḥ // 3.1.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sarvam etat suvihitaṃ devīṃ dagdhām avetya tu / prāṇāṃs tyajan kathaṃ rakṣyo vatseśa iti cintyatām // 3.1.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sadupāyādisāmagrīsaṃbhave kila satyapi / mukhyamaṅgaṃ hi mantrasya vinipātapratikriyā // 3.1.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti bhūyo 'pi tatkālamukte tatra rumaṇvatā / uvācālocitāśeṣakāryo yaugandharāyaṇaḥ // 3.1.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nāstyatra cintā yadrājaputrī gopālakasya sā / kanīyasī svasā devī prāṇebhyo 'pyadhikā priyā // 3.1.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
etasya cālpamālokya śokaṃ vatseśvarastadā / jīvet kadācid devīti matvā dhairyam avāpsyati // 3.1.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
api cottamasattvo 'yaṃ śīghraṃ ca pariṇīyate / padmāvatī tato devī darśyate cācirāditi // 3.1.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evametadviniścitya tato yaugandharāyaṇaḥ / gopālako rumaṇvāṃśca tato mantramiti vyadhuḥ // 3.1.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yuktyā lāvāṇakaṃ yāmaḥ saha devyā nṛpeṇa ca / paryanto magadhāsannavartī hi viṣayo 'sti saḥ // 3.1.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
subhagākheṭabhūmitvād rājñaś cāsaṃnidhānakṛt / tatrāntaḥ puramādīpya kriyate yadi cintitam // 3.1.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
devī ca sthāpyate nītvā yuktyā padmāvatīgṛhe / channasthitāyā yenāsyāḥ saiva syācchīlasākṣiṇī // 3.1.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
evaṃ rātrau mithaḥ kṛtvā mantraṃ sarve 'pare 'hani / yaugandharāyaṇādyāste prāviśanrājamandiram // 3.1.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatraivamatha vijñapto vatsarājo rumaṇvatā / deva lāvāṇake 'smākaṃ gatānāṃ vartate śivam // 3.1.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa cātiramyo viṣayastatra cākheṭabhūmayaḥ / śobhanāḥ santi te rājannaḍaghāsāśca sugrahāḥ // 3.1.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
bādhate taṃ ca naikaṭyāt sarvaṃ sa magadheśvaraḥ / tat tatra rakṣāhetoś ca vinodāya ca gamyatām // 3.1.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
etacchrutvā ca vatseśaḥ samaṃ vāsavadattayā / krīḍaikalālasaścakre gantuṃ lāvāṇake matim // 3.1.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
niścite gamane 'nyedyurlagne ca parikalpite / akasmānnāradamuniḥ kāntidyotitadiṅmukhaḥ // 3.1.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
avatīrya nabhomadhyātpradattanayanotsavaḥ / śaśīva svakulaprītyā taṃ vatseśvaramabhyagāt // 3.1.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gṛhītātithyasatkāraḥ pārijātamayīṃ srajam / prītaḥ sa ca munistasmai dadau prahvāya bhūbhṛte // 3.1.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidyādharādhipaṃ putraṃ kāmadevāṃśamāpsyasi / iti vāsavadattāṃ ca so 'bhyanandatkṛtādaraḥ // 3.1.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataścovāca vatseśaṃ sthite yaugandharāyaṇe / rājanvāsavadattāṃ te dṛṣṭvā hanta smṛtaṃ mayā // 3.1.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yudhiṣṭhirādayo 'bhūvan purā te prapitāmahāḥ / pañcānāṃ draupadī teṣām ekā patnī babhūva ca // 3.1.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā ca vāsavadatteva rūpeṇāpratimābhavat / tatastaddoṣamāśaṅkya tānevamahamabhyadhām // 3.1.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
strīvairaṃ rakṣaṇīyaṃ vastaddhi bījamihāpadām / tathāhi śṛṇutaitāṃ ca kathāṃ vaḥ kathayāmyaham // 3.1.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sundopasundanāmānau bhrātarau dvau babhūvatuḥ / asurau vikramākrāntalokatritayadurjayau // 3.1.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tayorvināśakāmaśca dattvājñāṃ viśvakarmaṇā / brahmā nirmāpayāmāsa divyanārīṃ tilottamām // 3.1.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rūpamālokituṃ yasyāścaturdikkaṃ caturmukhaḥ / babhūva kila śarvo 'pi kurvāṇāyaḥ pradakṣiṇam // 3.1.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā padmayoner ādeśāt pārśvaṃ sundopasundayoḥ / pralobhanāya prayayau kailāsodyānavartinoḥ // 3.1.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tau cāsurau jagṛhatustāṃ dṛṣṭvaivāntikāgatām / ubhāvapyubhayorbāhvoḥ sundarīṃ kāmamohitau // 3.1.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
parasparavirodhena harantau tāṃ ca tatkṣaṇam / pravṛttasaṃprahāratvāddvāvapi kṣayamīyatuḥ // 3.1.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ strīnāma viṣayo nidānaṃ kasya nāpadām / yuṣmākaṃ draupadī caikā bahūnāmiha vallabhā // 3.1.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tattannimittaḥ saṃgharṣaḥ saṃrakṣyo bhavatāṃ kila / madvākyādayametasyāḥ samayaścāstu vaḥ sadā // 3.1.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
jyeṣṭhāntikagatā mātā mantavyeyaṃ kanīyasā / jyeṣṭhena ca snuṣā jñeyā kaniṣṭhāntikavartinī // 3.1.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityetanmadvaco rājaṃstava te prapitāmahāḥ / tatheti pratyapadyanta kalyāṇakṛtabuddhayaḥ // 3.1.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
te ca me suhṛdo 'bhūvaṃstatprītyā cāhamāgataḥ / tvāṃ draṣṭumiha vatseśa tadidaṃ śṛṇu vacmi te // 3.1.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yathaitanme kṛtaṃ vākyaṃ kuryāstvaṃ mantriṇāṃ tathā / acireṇa ca kālena mahatīmṛddhimāpsyasi // 3.1.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṃcitkālaṃ ca duḥkhaṃ te bhaviṣyati na ca tvayā / tatrātimohaḥ kartavyaḥ sukhāntaṃ bhavitā hi tat // 3.1.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
samyagevamabhidhāya tatkṣaṇaṃ vatsarājamudayasya bhāvinaḥ / bhaṅgisūcanavidhau viśārado nārado muniradarśanaṃ yayau // 3.1.148	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
sarve ca tasya vacasā munipuṃgavasya yaugandharāyaṇamukhāḥ sacivāstataste / saṃbhāvya siddhyudayamātmacikīrṣitasya saṃpādanāya sutarāṃ jagṛhuḥ prayatnam // 3.1.149	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
tataḥ pūrvoktayā yuktyā vatsarājaṃ savallabham / yaugandharāyaṇādyās te ninyur lāvāṇakaṃ prati // 3.2.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa rājā prāpa taṃ deśaṃ sainyaghoṣeṇa mūrcchatā / abhivāñchitasaṃsiddhiṃ vadantamiva mantriṇām // 3.2.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra prāptaṃ vidhitvā ca vatseśaṃ saparicchadam / avaskandabhayāśaṅkī cakampe magadheśvaraḥ // 3.2.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yaugandharāyaṇopāntaṃ sadbuddhirvisasarja ca / sa dūtaṃ so 'pi sanmantrī kāryajño 'bhinananda tam // 3.2.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vatseśvaro 'pi nivasaṃstasmindeśe davīyasīm / ākheṭakārthamaṭavīmaṭati sma dine dine // 3.2.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)

yaugandharāyaṇo dhīmānsarumaṇvadvasantakaḥ / devyā vāsavadattāyā vijane nikaṭaṃ yayau // 3.2.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tāṃ rājakārye 'tra sāhāyye tataduktibhiḥ / prahvām abhyarthayām āsa bhrātrā pūrvaṃ prabodhitām // 3.2.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sānumene ca virahakleśadāyi tadāmanaḥ / kiṃ nāma na sahante hi bhartṛbhaktāḥ kulāṅganāḥ // 3.2.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatastāṃ brāhmaṇīrūpāṃ devīṃ yaugandharāyaṇaḥ / sa cakāra kṛtī dattvā yogaṃ rūpavivartanam // 3.2.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vasantakaṃ ca kṛtavān kāṇaṃ baṭukarūpiṇam / ātmanā ca tathaivābhūt sthavirabrāhmaṇākṛtiḥ // 3.2.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathārūpāṃ gṛhītvātha tāṃ devīṃ sa mahāmatiḥ / vasantakasakhaḥ svairaṃ pratasthe magadhān prati // 3.2.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathā vāsavadattā sā svagṛhānnirgatā satī / agāccittena bhartāraṃ panthānaṃ vapuṣā punaḥ // 3.2.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tanmandiramathādīpya dahanena rumaṇvatā / hā hā vasantakayutā devī dagdhetyaghoṣyata // 3.2.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tathā ca dahanākrandau samaṃ tatrodatiṣṭhatām / śanaiḥ śaśāma dahano na punaḥ kranditadhvaniḥ // 3.2.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
yaugandharāyaṇaḥ so 'tha saha vāsavadattayā / vasantakena ca prāpa magadhādhipateḥ puram // 3.2.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrodyānagatāṃ dṛṣṭvā samaṃ tābhyāmupāyayau / padmāvatīṃ rājasutāṃ vāryamāṇo 'pi rakṣibhiḥ // 3.2.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)

devatā munayaścāpi vañcanārthaṃ satāṃ gṛhe / tiṣṭhantyeva tathā caitāmantra putri kathāṃ śṛṇu // 3.2.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
babhūva kuntibhojākhyo rājā tasyāpi veśmani / āgatya tasthau durvāsā vañcanaikaraso muniḥ // 3.2.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)

pratidūtaḥ sa gatvā ca yathāsaṃdiṣṭamabhyaghāt / tato magadharājāya sa cāpyabhinananda tam // 3.2.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa duhitṛsnehanijecchāvibhavocitam / vivāhotsavasaṃbhāraṃ cakāra magadheśvaraḥ // 3.2.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā cābhīṣṭavaraśrutyā mudaṃ padmāvatī yayau / prāpa vāsavadattā ca tadvārtākarṇanācchucam // 3.2.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā vārtā karṇamāgatya tasyā vaivarṇyadāyinī / pracchannavāsavairūpyasāhāyakamivākarot // 3.2.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
itthaṃ mitrīkṛtaḥ śatrurna ca bhartānyathā tvayi / vasantakoktirityasyāḥ sakhīva vidadhe dhṛtim // 3.2.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athāsannavivāhāyāḥ padmāvatyā manasvinī / amlānamālātilakau divyau bhūyaścakāra sā // 3.2.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tato vatseśvarastatra saṃprāpte saptame 'hani / sasainyo mantribhiḥ sākaṃ pariṇetuṃ kilāyayau // 3.2.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
manasāpi tadudyogaṃ virahī sa kathaṃ spṛśet / devīṃ labheya tāmevamityāśā na bhavedyadi // 3.2.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pratyudyayau ca taṃ sadyaḥ sānando magadheśvaraḥ / prajānetrotsavaṃ candramudayasthamivāmbudhiḥ // 3.2.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
viveśātha sa vatseśo magadhādhipateḥ puram / samantātpauralokasya mānasaṃ ca mahotsavaḥ // 3.2.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
virahakṣāmavapuṣaṃ manaḥsaṃmohadāyinam / dadṛśustatra nāryastaṃ ratihīnamiva smaram // 3.2.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

tatra padmāvatīmantardadarśa kṛtakautukām / sa rājā pūrṇavaktrendujitapūrṇendumaṇḍalām // 3.2.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

athādideśa sarvajño hariḥ kṣīrāmbudhisthitaḥ / nāradākhyaṃ munivaraṃ darśanārthamupāgatam // 3.3.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
