kadācit tasya rājñaś ca jajñe jīrṇajvarāmayaḥ / vaidyā nivārayāmāsustayā devyāsya saṃgamam // 3.3.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
devīsaṃparkahīnasya hṛdaye tasya bhūbhṛtaḥ / auṣadhopakramāsādhyo vyādhiḥ samudapadyata // 3.3.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhayācchokābhighātādvā rājño rogaḥ kadācana / sphuṭed ayam iti smāhur bhiṣajo mantriṇaṃ rahaḥ // 3.3.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yaḥ purā pṛṣṭhapatite na tatrāsa mahorage / nāntaḥpurapraviṣṭe 'pi parānīke ca cukṣubhe // 3.3.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāsya rājño jāyeta bhayaṃ sattvavataḥ katham / nāstyatropāyabuddhirnaḥ kiṃ kurmastena mantriṇaḥ // 3.3.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti saṃcintya saṃmantrya te devyā saha mantriṇaḥ / tāṃ pracchādya tamūcuśca mṛtā devīti bhūpatim // 3.3.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena śokātibhāreṇa mathyamānasya tasya saḥ / pusphoṭa hṛdayavyādhirvihvalasya mahībhṛtaḥ // 3.3.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttirṇarogavipade tasmai rājñe 'tha mantribhiḥ / arpitā sā mahādevī sukhasaṃpadivāparā // 3.3.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
bahu mene ca so 'pyenāṃ rājā prāṇapradāyinīm / na punarmatimānasyai cukrodhācchāditātmane // 3.3.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hitaiṣitā hi yā patyuḥ sā devītvasya kāraṇam / priyakāritvamātreṇa devīśabdo na labhyate // 3.3.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā mantritā ca yadrājyakāryabhāraikacintanam / cittānuvartanaṃ yattadupajīvakalakṣaṇam // 3.3.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ato magadharājena saṃdhātuṃ paripanthinā / pṛthvīvijayahetos te yatno 'smābhiriyaṃ kṛtaḥ // 3.3.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena deva bhavadbhaktisoḍhāsahyaviyogayā / devyā naivāparāddhaṃ te pūrṇā tūpakṛtiḥ kṛtā // 3.3.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etacchrutyā vacastasya yathārthaṃ mukhyamantriṇaḥ / mene 'parāddhamātmānaṃ vatsarājastutoṣa ca // 3.3.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uvāca caitaj jāne 'haṃ devyā yuṣmatprayuktayā / ākāravatyā nītyeva mama dattaiva medinī // 3.3.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kiṃ tvatipraṇayādetanmayoktamasamañjasam / anurāgāndhamanasāṃ vicārasahatā kutaḥ // 3.3.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ityādibhiḥ samālāpairvatsarājaḥ sa taddinam / lajjoparāgaṃ devyāśca samamevāpanītavān // 3.3.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
anyedyurmagadheśena preṣito jñānavastunā / dūto vatseśamabhyetya tadvākyena vyajijñapat // 3.3.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mantribhiste vayaṃ tāvadvañcitā tattathādhunā / kuryāḥ śokamayo yena jīvaloko bhavenna naḥ // 3.3.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etacchrutvātha saṃmānya vatseśaḥ prajighāya tam / dūtaṃ padmāvatīpārśvaṃ pratisaṃdeśalabdhaye // 3.3.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpi vāsavadattaikanamrā tatsaṃnidhau dadau / dūtasya darśanaṃ tasya vinayo hi satīvratam // 3.3.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vyājena putri nītā tvamanyāsaktaśca te patiḥ / iti śokānmayā labdhaṃ kanyājanakatāphalam // 3.3.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityuktapitṛsaṃdeśaṃ dūtaṃ padmāvatī tadā / jagāda bhadra vijñāpyastāto 'mbā ca girā mama // 3.3.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ śokenāryaputro hi paramaṃ sadayo mayi / devī vāsavadattā ca sasnehā bhaginīva me // 3.3.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tattātenāryaputrasya bhāvyaṃ naiva vikāriṇā / nijasatyamivātyājyaṃ madīyaṃ jīvitaṃ yadi // 3.3.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityukte pratisaṃdeśe padmāvatyā yathocite / dūtaṃ vāsavadattā taṃ satkṛtya prāhiṇottataḥ // 3.3.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dūte pratigate tasminsmarantī pitṛveśmanaḥ / kiṃcitpadmāvatī tatsthāvutkaṇṭhāvimanā iva // 3.3.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatastasya vinodārthamukto vāsavadattayā / vasantako 'ntikaprāptaḥ kathāmitthamavarṇayat // 3.3.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asti pāṭaliputrākhyaṃ puraṃ pṛthvīvibhūṣaṇam / tasmiṃśca dharmaguptākhyo babhūvaiko mahāvaṇik // 3.3.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya candraprabhety āsīd bhāryā sā ca kadācana / sagarbhābhūt prasūtātha kanyāṃ sarvāṅgasundarīm // 3.3.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā kanyā jātamātraiva kāntidyotitavāsakā / cakre savyaktamālāpamutthāyopaviveśa ca // 3.3.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vismitavitrastaṃ strījanaṃ jātaveśmani / dṛṣṭvā sa dharmagupto 'tra sabhayaḥ svayamāyayau // 3.3.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
papraccha kanyakāṃ tāṃ ca praṇatastatkṣaṇaṃ rahaḥ / bhagavatyavatīrṇāsi kā tvaṃ mama gṛheṣviti // 3.3.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpyavādīttvayā naiva deyā kasmaicidapyaham / gṛhasthitā śubhāhaṃ te pṛṣṭenānyena tāta kim // 3.3.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityuktaḥ sa tayā bhīto dharmaguptaḥ svamandire / guptaṃ tāṃ sthāpayāmāsa mṛteti khyāpitāṃ bahiḥ // 3.3.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ somaprabhā nāmnā sā kanyā vavṛdhe kramāt / mānuṣeṇa śarīreṇa rūpakāntyā tu divyayā // 3.3.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā tu pramodena madhūtsavavilokinīm / harmyasthāṃ guhacandrākhyo vaṇikputro dadarśa tām // 3.3.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa manobhavabhallyeva sadyo hṛdayalagnayā / tayā mumūrccheva tadā kṛcchācca gṛhamāyayau // 3.3.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
smarārtividhurastatra pitrorasvāsthyakāraṇam / nirbandhapṛṣṭo vakti sma svavayasyamukhena saḥ // 3.3.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tato 'sya guhasenākhyaḥ pitā snehena yācitum / āṃ kanyāṃ dharmaguptasya vaṇijo bhavanaṃ yayau // 3.3.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra taṃ kṛtayācñaṃ sa guhasenaṃ snuṣārthinam / kanyā kuto me mūḍheti dharmagupto nirākarot // 3.3.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
nihnutāṃ tena kanyāṃ tāṃ matvā gatvā gṛhe sutam / dṛṣṭvā smarajvarākrāntaṃ guhaseno vyacintayat // 3.3.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājānaṃ prerayāmyatra sa hi me pūrvasevitaḥ / dāpayatyapi putrāya sa kanyāṃ tāṃ mumūrṣave // 3.3.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti niścitya gatvā ca dattvāsmai ratnamuttamam / nṛpaṃ vijñāpayāmāsa sa vaṇiksvābhikāṅkṣitam // 3.3.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nṛpo 'pi prītimānasya sāhāyye nagarādhipam / dadau tena samaṃ cāsau dharmaguptagṛhaṃ yayau // 3.3.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rurodha ca gṛhaṃ tasya dharmaguptasya tadbalaiḥ / asubhiḥ kaṇṭhadeśaṃ ca sarvanāśaviśaṅkinaḥ // 3.3.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ somaprabhā sā taṃ dharmaguptamabhāṣata / dehi māṃ tāta mā bhūtte mannimittamupadravaḥ // 3.3.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āropaṇīyā śayyāyāṃ nāhaṃ bhartrā kadācana / īdṛktu vācā niyamo grāhyaḥ saṃbandhināṃ tvayā // 3.3.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
ityuktaḥ sa tayā putryā dātuṃ tāṃ patyapadyata / dharmaguptastadābhāṣya śayyāropaṇavarjanam // 3.3.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
guhaseno 'numene ca sāntarhāsastathaiva tat / vivāho mama putrasya tāvadatviti cintayan // 3.3.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athādāya kṛtodvāhāṃ tāṃ sa somaprabhāṃ vadhūm / guhasenasutaḥ prāyādguhacandro nijaṃ gṛham // 3.3.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāyaṃ cainaṃ pitāvādītputra śayyāmimāṃ vadhūm / āropaya svabhāryā hi kasyāśayyā bhaviṣyati // 3.3.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tacchrutvā śvaśuraṃ taṃ sā vadhūḥ somaprabhā krudhā / vilokya bhrāmayāmāsa yamājñāmiva tarjanīm // 3.3.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāṃ dṛṣṭaivāṅguliṃ tasyāḥ snuṣāyāstasya tatkṣaṇam / vaṇijaḥ prayayuḥ prāṇā anyeṣāmāyayau bhayam // 3.3.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
guhacandro 'pi saṃprāpte tasmin pitari pañcatām / mārī mama gṛhe bhāryā praviṣṭeti vyacintayat // 3.3.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataścānupabhuñjāno bhāryāṃ tāṃ gṛhavartinīm / siṣeve guhacandro 'sāvasidhāramiva vratam // 3.3.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadduḥkhadahyamāno 'ntarvirakto bhogasaṃpadi / brāhmaṇān bhojayām āsa pratyahaṃ sa kṛtavrataḥ // 3.3.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadbhāryāpi ca sā tebhyo dvijebhyo maunadhāriṇī / bhuktavadbhyo dadau nityaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ divyarūpadhṛt // 3.3.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā brāhmaṇo vṛddhastāmeko bhojanāgataḥ / dadarśa jagadāścaryajananīṃ rūpasaṃpadā // 3.3.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sakautuko dvijo 'prākṣīdguhacandraṃ rahastadā / kā tebhavati bāleyaṃ tvayā me kathyatāmiti // 3.3.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nirbandhapṛṣṭaḥ so 'pyasmai guhacandro dvijanmane / śaśaṃsa tadgataṃ sarvaṃ vṛttāntaṃ khinnamānasaḥ // 3.3.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadbuddhvā sa tatastasmai sānukampo dvijottamaḥ / agnerārādhanaṃ mantraṃ dadāvīpsitasiddhaye // 3.3.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena mantreṇa tasyātha japaṃ rahasi kurvataḥ / udabhūdguhacandrasya puruṣo bahnimadhyataḥ // 3.3.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa cāgnirdvijarūpī taṃ jagāda caraṇānatam / adyāhaṃ tvadgṛhe bhokṣye rātrau sthāsyāmi tatra ca // 3.3.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
darśayitvā ca tattvaṃ te sādhayiṣyāmi vāñchitam / ityuktvā guhacandraṃ sa brāhmaṇastadgṛhaṃ yayau // 3.3.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrānyavipravadbhuktvā guhacandrāntike ca saḥ / siṣeve śayanaṃ rātrau yāmamātramatandritaḥ // 3.3.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvacca saṃsuptajanātsā tasmāttasya mandirāt / niryayau guhacandrasya bhāryā somaprabhā niśi // 3.3.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkālaṃ brāhmaṇaḥ so 'tra guhacandramabodhayat / ehi svabhāryāvṛttāntaṃ paśyety enam uvāca ca // 3.3.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
yogena bhṛṅgarūpaṃ ca kṛtvā tasyātmanastathā / nirgatyādarśayattasya bhāryāṃ tāṃ gṛhanirgatām // 3.3.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā jagāma sudūraṃ ca sundarī nagarādbahiḥ / guhacandreṇa sākaṃ ca dvijo 'pyanujagāma tām // 3.3.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatastatra mahābhogaṃ sacchāyaskandhasundaram / guhacandro dadarśāsāvekaṃ nyaprodhapādapam // 3.3.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyādhastācca śuśrāva vīṇāveṇuravānvitam / ullasadgītamadhuraṃ divyaṃ saṃgītakadhvanim // 3.3.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
skandhadeśe ca tasyaikāṃ svabhāryāsadṛśākṛtim / apaśyatkanyakāṃ divyāmupaviṣṭāṃ mahāsane // 3.3.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nijakāntijitajyotsnāṃ śuklacāmaravījitām / indorlāvaṇyasarvasvakoṣasyevādhidevatām // 3.3.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atraivāruhya vṛkṣe ca tasyā ardhāsane tadā / upaviṣṭāṃ svabhāryāṃ tāṃ guhacandro dadarśa saḥ // 3.3.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkālaṃ tulyakāntī te saṃgate divyakanyake / paśyatastasya bhāti sma sā tricandreva yāminī // 3.3.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa kautukāviṣṭaḥ kṣaṇam evam acintayat / kiṃ svapno 'yam uta bhrāntir dhig etad athavā dvayam // 3.3.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yā sanmārgataroreṣā vidvatsaṃgatimañjarī / asau puṣpodgatistasyā mamocitaphalonmukhī // 3.3.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti cintayati svairaṃ tasmiṃste divyakanyake / bhuktvā nijocitaṃ bhojyaṃ divyaṃ papaturāsavam // 3.3.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adyāgato mahātejā dvijaḥ ko'pi gṛheṣu naḥ / tasmādbhagini ceto me śaṅkitaṃ tadvrajāmyaham // 3.3.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityuktvā tāmathāmantrya dvitīyāṃ divyakanyakām / guhacandrasya gṛhiṇī taroravaruroha sā // 3.3.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
taddṛṣṭvā bhṛṅgarūpau tau guhacandro dvijaśca saḥ / pratyāgatyāgrato gehe pūrvavattasthaturniśi // 3.3.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sā divyakanyāpi guhacandrasya gehinī / āgatyālakṣitātraiva praviveśa svamandiram // 3.3.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa brāhmaṇaḥ svairaṃ guhacandramabhāṣata / dṛṣṭaṃ tvayā yadeṣā te bhāryā divyā na mānuṣī // 3.3.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dvitīyā sāpi caitasyā dṛṣṭādya bhaginī tvayā / divyā strī tu manuṣyeṇa kathamicchati saṃgamam // 3.3.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadetatsiddhaye mantraṃ dvārollekhyaṃ dadāmi te / tasyopabṛṃhaṇīṃ bāhyāṃ yuktiṃ copadiśāmyaham // 3.3.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
viśuddho 'pi jvalayagnirvātyāyoge tu kā kathā / evaṃ mantro 'rthado 'pyekaḥ kiṃ punaryuktisaṃyutaḥ // 3.3.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
ityuktvā guhacandrāya dattvā mantraṃ dvijottamaḥ / upadiśya ca tāṃ yuktiṃ prabhāte sa tirodave // 3.3.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
guhacandro 'pi bhāryāyā gṛhadvāre 'bhilikhya tam / mantraṃ punaścakāraivaṃ sāyaṃ yuktiṃ prarocanīm // 3.3.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā sa tasyāḥ paśyantyā kayāpi varayoṣitā / saha cakre samālāpaṃ racitodāramaṇḍanaḥ // 3.3.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
taddṛṣṭaiva tamāhūya mantronmudritayā girā / eṣā kāstīti papraccha sā serṣyā divyakanyakā // 3.3.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asau varāṅganā baddhabhāvā mayy aham adya ca / etadgṛhaṃ vrajāmīti praty avocat sa tāṃ mṛṣā // 3.3.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sācīkṛtadṛśā mukhena valitabhruṇā / dṛṣṭvā nivārya vāmena kareṇa tamuvāca sā // 3.3.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
huṃ jñātametadartho 'yaṃ veṣastatra ca mā sma gāḥ / kiṃ tayā māmuṣehi tvamahaṃ hi tava gehinī // 3.3.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityuktaḥ pulakotkampasaṃkṣobhākulayā tayā / āviṣṭayeva tanmantradūtadurgrahayāpi saḥ // 3.3.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praviśya vāsake sadyastayaiva samamanvabhūt / martyo 'pi divyasaṃbhogamasaṃspṛṣṭaṃ manorahaiḥ // 3.3.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

utsavena ca nīte 'smindine yaugandharāyaṇaḥ / cittaṃ jijñāsuranyedyurvatseśvaramabhāṣata // 3.4.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

vijitya pṛthvīm ārūḍhā yatra me prapitāmahāḥ / tatrājitvā diśaḥ sarvāḥ kā mamārohataḥ prathā // 3.4.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
jitvaivemāṃ samudrāntāṃ pṛhvīṃ pṛthuvibhūṣaṇām / alaṃkaromi pūrveṣāṃ ratnasiṃhāsanaṃ mahat // 3.4.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityūcivānnarapatirnāruroha sa saṃprati / saṃbhavatyabhijātānāmabhimāno hyakṛtrimaḥ // 3.4.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ prītastamāha sma nṛpaṃ yaugandharāyaṇaḥ / sādhu deva kuru prācyāṃ tarhi pūrvaṃ jayodyamam // 3.4.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tacchrutvaiva prasaṅgāttaṃ rājā papraccha manriṇam / sthitāsvapyuttarādyāsu prākpācīṃ yānti kiṃ nṛpāḥ // 3.4.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etacchrutvā jagādainaṃ punaryaugandharāyaṇaḥ / sphītāpi rājan kauberī mlecchasaṃsargagarhitā // 3.4.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
arkādyastamaye hetuḥ paścimāpi na pūjyate / āsannarākṣasā duṣṭā dakṣiṇāpyanakāśritā // 3.4.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prācyāmudeti sūryastu prācīmindro 'dhitiṣṭhati / jāhnavīṃ yāti ca prācīṃ tena prācī praśasyate // 3.4.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
deśeṣvapi ca vindhyādrihimavanmadhyavartiṣu / jāhnavījalapūto yaḥ sa praśasyatamo mataḥ // 3.4.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmātprācīṃ prayāntyādau rājāno maṅgalaiṣiṇaḥ / nivasanti ca deśe 'pi surasindhusamāśrite // 3.4.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pūrvajairapi hi prācīprakrameṇa jitā diśaḥ / gaṅgopakaṇṭhe vāsaśca vihito hastināpure // 3.4.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
śatānīkastu kauśāmbīṃ ramyabhāvena śiśriye / sāmrājye pauruṣādhīne paśyandeśamakāraṇam // 3.4.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityuktvā virate tatra tasminyaugandharāyaṇe / rājā puruṣakāraikabahumānādabhāṣata // 3.4.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
satyaṃ na deśaniyamaḥ sāmrājyasyeha kāraṇam / saṃpatsu hi susattvānāmekahetuḥ svapauruṣam // 3.4.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
eko 'pyāśrayahīno 'pi lakṣmīṃ prāpnoti sattvavān / śrutā kiṃ nātra yuṣmābhiḥ puṃsaḥ sattvavataḥ kathā // 3.4.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evamuktvā sa vatseśaḥ sacivābhyarthitaḥ śubhām / vicitrāṃ saṃnidhau devyorimāmakathayatkathām // 3.4.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asti bhūtalavikhyātā yeyamujjayinī purī / tasyāmādityasenākhyaḥ pūrvamāsīnmahīpatiḥ // 3.4.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ādityasyeva yasyeha na caskhāla kila kvacit / pratāpanilayasyaikacakravartitayā rathaḥ // 3.4.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhāsayatyucchrite vyoma yaccatre tuhinatviṣi / nyavartantātapatrāṇi rājñāmapagatoṣmaṇām // 3.4.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
samastabhūtalābhogasaṃbhavānāṃ babhūva saḥ / bhājanaṃ sarvaratnānāmamburāśirivāmbhasām // 3.4.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa kadācana kasyāpi hetoryātrāgato nṛpaḥ / sasainyo jāhnavīkūlamāsādyāvasthito 'bhavat // 3.4.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra taṃ guṇavarmākhyaḥ ko 'pyāḍhyastatpradeśajaḥ / abhyagānnṛpamādāya kanyāratnamupāyanam // 3.4.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ratnaṃ tribhuvane 'pyeṣā kanyotpannā gṛhe mama / nānyatra dātuṃ śakyā ca devo hi prabhur īdṛśaḥ // 3.4.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ity āvedya pratīhāramukhenātha praviśya saḥ / guṇavarmā nijāṃ tasmai rājñe kanyāmadarśayat // 3.4.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tāṃ tejasvatīṃ nāma dīptidyotitadiṅmukhām / anaṅgamaṅgalāvāsaratnadīpaśikhāmiva // 3.4.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
paśyansnehamayo rājā śliṣṭastatkāntitejasā / kāmāgnineva saṃtaptaḥ svinno vigalati sma saḥ // 3.4.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svīkṛtyaitāṃ ca tatkālaṃ mahādevīpadocitām / cakāra guṇavarmāṇaṃ parituṣyātmanaḥ samam // 3.4.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatastāṃ pariṇīyaiva priyāṃ tejasvatīṃ nṛpaḥ / kṛtārthamānī sa tayā sākamujjayinīṃ yayau // 3.4.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tatra tanmukhasaktaikadṛṣtī rājā hy abhūt tathā / dadarśa rājakāryāṇi na yathā sumahānty api // 3.4.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tejasvatīkalālāpakīliteva kila śrutiḥ / nāvasannaprajākrandaistasyākraṣṭumaśakyata // 3.4.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
cirapraviṣṭo niragānnaiva so 'ntaḥpurānnṛpaḥ / niragādarivargasya hṛdayāttu rujājvaraḥ // 3.4.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kālena tasya jajñe ca rājñaḥ sarvābhinanditā / kanyā tejasvatīdevyāṃ buddhau ca vijigīṣutā // 3.4.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
paramādbhutarūpā sā tṛṇīkṛtya jagattrayam / harṣaṃ tasyākarotkanyā pratāpaṃ ca jigīṣutā // 3.4.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athābhiyoktumutsiktaṃ sāmantaṃ kaṃcidekadā / ādityasenaḥ prayayāvujjayinyāḥ sa bhūpatiḥ // 3.4.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tāṃ ca tejasvatīṃ rājñīṃ samārūḍhakareṇukām / sahaprayāyinīṃ cakre sainyasyevādhidevatām // 3.4.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ārurodhā varāśvaṃ ca darpodyaddharmanirjharam / jaṅgamādrinibhaṃ tuṅgaṃ sa śrīvṛkṣaṃ samekhalam // 3.4.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āsṛkkotthitapādābhyāmabhyasyantamivāmbare / gatiṃ garutmato dṛṣṭāṃ vegasabrahmacāriṇaḥ // 3.4.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
javasya mama paryāptā kiṃ nu syāditi medinīm / kalayantamivonnamya kaṃdharāṃ dhīrayā dṛśā // 3.4.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃcidgatvā ca saṃprāpya samāṃ bhūmiṃ sa bhūpatiḥ / aśvamuttejayāmāsa tejasvatyāḥ pradarśayan // 3.4.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'śvastatpārṣṇighātena yantreṇeveritaḥ śaraḥ / jagāma kvāpyatijavādalakṣyo lokalocanaiḥ // 3.4.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
taddṛṣṭvā vihvale sainye hayārohāḥ sahasradhā / anvadhāvanna ca prāpustamaśvāpahṛtaṃ nṛpam // 3.4.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataścāniṣṭamāśaṅkya sasainyā mantriṇo bhayāt / ādāya devīṃ krandantīṃ nivṛttyojjayinīṃ yayuḥ // 3.4.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatra te pihitadvārakṛtaprākāraguptayaḥ / rājñaḥ pravṛttiṃ cinvantastasthurāśvāsitaprajāḥ // 3.4.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
atrāntare sa rājāpi nīto 'bhūttena vājinā / saraudrasiṃhasaṃcārāṃ durgāṃ vindhyātavīṃ kṣaṇāt // 3.4.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra daivātsthite tasminnaśve sa sahasā nṛpaḥ / āsīnmahāṭavīdattadiṅmoho vihvalākulaḥ // 3.4.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatimanyāmapaśyaṃśca so 'vatīrya praṇamya ca / taṃ jāgādāśvajātijño rājā varaturaṃgamam // 3.4.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
devastvaṃ na prabhudrohaṃ tvādṛśaḥ kartumarhati / tanme tvameva śaraṇaṃ śivena naya māṃ pathā // 3.4.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tacchrutvā sānutāpaḥ sanso 'śvo jātismarastadā / tat tathety agrahīd buddhau daivataṃ hi hayottamaḥ // 3.4.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato rājñi samārūḍhe sa pratasthe turaṃgamaḥ / svacchaśītāmbusarasā mārgeṇādhvaklamacchidā // 3.4.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
sāyaṃ ca prāpayāmāsa sa yojanaśatāntaram / ujjayinyāḥ samīpaṃ taṃ rājānaṃ vājisattamaḥ // 3.4.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadvegavijitānvīkṣya saptāpi nijavājinaḥ / astādrikaṃdarālīne lajjayevāṃśumālini // 3.4.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tamasi prasṛte dvārāṇyujjayinyā vilokya saḥ / pihitāni śmaśānaṃ ca bahistatkālabhīṣaṇam // 3.4.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nināyainaṃ nivāsāya bhūpatiṃ buddhimān hayaḥ / bāhyaikāntasthitaṃ tatra guptaṃ vipramaṭhaṃ niśi // 3.4.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
niśātivāhayogyaṃ ca taṃ sa dṛṣṭvā maṭhaṃ nṛpaḥ / ādityasenaḥ prārebhe praveṣṭuṃ śrāntavāhanaḥ // 3.4.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
rurudhustasya viprāśca praveśaṃ tannivāsinaḥ / śmaśānapālaś cauro vā ko 'pyasāviti vādinaḥ // 3.4.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
niryayuste ca saṃsaktakalahā lolaniṣṭhurāḥ / bhayakārkaśyakopānāṃ gṛhaṃ hi cchāndasā dvijāḥ // 3.4.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
raṭatsu teṣu tatraiko nirjagāma tato maṭhāt / vidūṣakākhyo guṇavāndhuryaḥ sattvavatāṃ dvijaḥ // 3.4.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
yo yuvā bāhuśālī ca tapasārādhya pāvakam / prāpa khaḍgottamaṃ tasmāddhyātamātropagāminam // 3.4.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa dṛṣṭvā taṃ niśi prāptaṃ dhīro bhavyākṛtiṃ nṛpam / pracchannaḥ ko'pi devo 'yamiti dadhyau vidūṣakaḥ // 3.4.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidhūya viprāṃś cānyāṃs tān sa sarvānucitāśayaḥ / nṛpaṃ praveśayāmāsa maṭhāntaḥ praśrayānataḥ // 3.4.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
viśrāntasya ca dāsībhir dhūtādhvarajasaḥ kṣaṇāt / āhāraṃ kalpayāmāsa rājñastasya nijocitam // 3.4.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ cāpanītaparyāṇaṃ tadīyaṃ turagottamam / yavasādipradānena cakāra vigataśramam // 3.4.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rakṣāmyahaṃ śarīraṃ te tatsukhaṃ svapihi prabho / ityuvāca ca taṃ śrāntamāstīrṇaśayanaṃ nṛpam // 3.4.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
supte ca tasmin dvārastho jāgarāmāsa sa dvijaḥ / cintitopasthitāgneyakhaḍgahasto 'khilāṃ niśām // 3.4.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātaś ca tasya nṛpateḥ prabuddhasyaiva sa svayam / anukta eva turagaṃ sajjīcakre vidūṣakaḥ // 3.4.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
rājāpi sa tam āmantrya samāruhya ca vājinam / viveśojjayinīṃ dūrāddṛṣṭo harṣākulairjanaiḥ // 3.4.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praviṣṭamabhijagmustaṃ sarvāḥ prakṛtayaḥ kṣaṇāt / tadāgamanajānandalasatkalakalāravāḥ // 3.4.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āyayau rājabhavanaṃ sa rājā sacivānvitaḥ / yayau tejasvatīdevyā hṛdayācca mahājvaraḥ // 3.4.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vātāhatotsavākṣiptapatākāṃśukapaṅktibhiḥ / utsāritā ivābhūvannagaryāstatkṣaṇaṃ śucaḥ // 3.4.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akarodā dināntaṃ ca devī tāvanmahotsavam / yāvannagaraloko 'bhūtsārkaḥ sindūrapiṅgalaḥ // 3.4.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyedyuḥ sa tamādityaseno rājā vidūṣakam / maṭhādānāyayāmāsa tasmātsarvairdvijaiḥ saha // 3.4.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prakhyāpya rātrivṛttāntaṃ dadau tasmai ca tatkṣaṇam / vidūṣakāya grāmāṇāṃ sahasramupakāriṇe // 3.4.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
paurohitye ca cakre taṃ pradattacchattravāhanam / vipraṃ kṛtajño nṛpatiḥ kautukālokitaṃ janaiḥ // 3.4.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
evaṃ tadaiva sāmantatulyaḥ so 'bhūdvidūṣakaḥ / moghā hi nāma jāyeta mahatsūpakṛtiḥ kutaḥ // 3.4.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yāṃśca prāpa nṛpādgrāmāṃstānsarvānsa mahāśayaḥ / tanmaṭhāśrayibhirvipraiḥ samaṃ sādhāraṇānvyadhāt // 3.4.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasthau ca sevamānastaṃ rājānaṃ sa tadāśritaḥ / bhuñjānaśca sahānyaistairbrāhmaṇairgrāmasaṃcayam // 3.4.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kāle gacchati cānye te sarve prādhānyamicchavaḥ / naiva taṃ gaṇayām āsur dvijā dhanamadoddhatāḥ // 3.4.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vibhinnaiḥ saptasaṃkhyākairekasthānāśrayairmithaḥ / saṃgharṣāttair abādhyanta grāmā duṣṭair grahair iva // 3.4.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ucchṛṅkhaleṣu teṣvāsīdudāsīno vidūṣakaḥ / alpabhāveṣu dhīrāṇāmavajñaiva hi śobhate // 3.4.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā kalahāsaktāndṛṣṭvā tānabhyupāyayau / kaściccakradharo nāma vipraḥ prakṛtiniṣṭhuraḥ // 3.4.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
parārtanyāyavādeṣu kāṇo 'pyamlānadarśanaḥ / kubjo 'pi vāci suspaṣṭo viprastānityabhāṣata // 3.4.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāptā bhikṣācarairbhūtvā bhavadbhiḥ śrīriyaṃ śaṭhāḥ / tannāśayatha kiṃ grāmānanyonyamasahiṣṇavaḥ // 3.4.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidūṣakasya doṣo 'yaṃ yena yūyamupekṣitāḥ / tadasaṃdigdhamacirātpunarbhikṣāṃ bhramiṣyatha // 3.4.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
varaṃ hi daivāyattaikavṛddhisthānam anāyakam / na tu viplutasarvārthaṃ vibhinnabahunāyakam // 3.4.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadekaṃ nāyakaṃ dhīraṃ kurudhvaṃ vacasā mama / sthirayā yadi kṛtyaṃ vo dhuryarakṣitayā śriyā // 3.4.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā nāyakatvaṃ te sarve 'py aicchan yadātmanaḥ / tadā vicintya mūḍhāṃs tān punaś cakradharo 'bravīt // 3.4.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃgharṣaśālināṃ tarhi samayaṃ vo dadāmyaham / itaḥ śmaśāne śūlāyāṃ trayaścaurā niṣūditāḥ // 3.4.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
nāsāsteṣāṃ niśi cchittvā yaḥ susattva ihānayet / sa yuṣmākaṃ pradhānaḥ syādvīro hi svāmyamarhati // 3.4.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti cakradhareṇoktānviprāṃstānantikasthitaḥ / kurudhvam etat ko doṣa ity uvāca vidūṣakaḥ // 3.4.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tataste 'syāvadanviprā naitatkartuṃ kṣamā vayam / yo vā śaktaḥ sa kurutāṃ samaye ca vayaṃ sthitāḥ // 3.4.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tato vidūṣako 'vādīdahametatkaromi bhoḥ / ānayāmi niśi cchittvā nāsāsteṣāṃ śmaśānataḥ // 3.4.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatastadduṣkaraṃ matvā te 'pi mūḍhāstamabruvan / evaṃ kṛte tvamasmākaṃ svāmī niyama eṣa naḥ // 3.4.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity evākhyāpya samayaṃ prāptāyāṃ rajanau ca tān / āmantrya viprān prayayau śmaśānaṃ sa vidūṣakaḥ // 3.4.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
praviveśa ca tadvīro nijaṃ karmeva bhīṣaṇam / cintitopasthitāgneyakṛpāṇaikaparigrahaḥ // 3.4.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ḍākinīnādasaṃvṛddhagṛdhravāyasavāśite / ulkāmukhamukholkāgnivisphāritacitānale // 3.4.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dadarśa tatra madhye ca sa tāñ śūlādhiropitān / puruṣān nāsikāchedabhiyevordhvīkṛtānanān // 3.4.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yāvac ca nikaṭaṃ teṣāṃ prāpa tāvat trayo 'pi te / vetālādhiṣṭhitās tasmin praharanti sma muṣṭibhiḥ // 3.4.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
niṣkampa eva khaḍgena so 'pi pratijaghāna tān / na śikṣitaḥ prayatno hi dhīrāṇāṃ hṛdaye bhiyā // 3.4.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tenāpagatavetālavikārāṇāṃ sa nāsikāḥ / teṣāṃ cakarta vaddhvā ca kṛtī jagrāha vāsasi // 3.4.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āgacchaṃśca dadarśaikaṃ śavasyopari saṃsthitam / pravrājakaṃ śmaśāne 'tra japantaṃ sa vidūṣakaḥ // 3.4.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tacceṣṭālokanakrīḍākautukādupagamya tam / pracchannaḥ pṛṣṭhatastasya tasthau pravrājakasya saḥ // 3.4.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣaṇāt pravrājakasyādhaḥ phūtkāraṃ muktavāñ śavaḥ / niragāc ca mukhāt tasya jvālā nābheś ca sarṣapāḥ // 3.4.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gṛhītvā sarṣapāṃstāṃśca sa parivrājakastataḥ / utthāya tāḍayāmāsa śavaṃ pāṇitalena tam // 3.4.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
udatiṣṭhatsa cottālavetālādhiṣṭhitaḥ śavaḥ / āruroha ca tasyaiva skandhe pravrājako 'tha saḥ // 3.4.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadārūḍhaśca sahasā gantuṃ pravavṛte tataḥ / vidūṣako 'pi taṃ tūṣṇīmanvagacchadalakṣitaḥ // 3.4.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
nātidūramatikramya sa dadarśa vidūṣakaḥ / śūnyaṃ kātyāyanīmūrtisanāthaṃ devatāgṛham // 3.4.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāvatīrya vetālaskandhātpravrājakastataḥ / viveśa garbhabhavanaṃ vetālo 'pyapatadbhuvi // 3.4.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
vidūṣakaśca tatrāsīdyuktyā paśyannalakṣitaḥ / pravrājako 'pi saṃpūjya tatra devīṃ vyajijñapat // 3.4.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tuṣṭāsi yadi taddevi dehi me varamīpsitam / anyathātmopahāreṇa prīṇāmi bhavatīmaham // 3.4.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityuktavantaṃ taṃ tīvramantrasādhanagarvitam / pravrājakaṃ jagādaivaṃ vāṇī garbhagṛhodgatā // 3.4.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ādityasenanṛpateḥ sutāmānīya kanyakām / upahārīkuruṣveha tataḥ prāpsyasi vāñchitam // 3.4.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
etacchrutvā sa nirgatya kareṇāhatya taṃ punaḥ / pravrāḍutthāpayāmāsa vetālaṃ muktaphūtkṛtim // 3.4.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya ca skandhamāruhya niryadvaktrānalārciṣaḥ / ānetuṃ rājaputrīṃ tāmutpatya nabhasā yayau // 3.4.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidūṣako 'pi tatsarvaṃ dṛṣṭvā tatra vyacintayat / kathaṃ rājasutānena hanyate mayi jīvati // 3.4.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ihaiva tāvat tiṣṭhāmi yāvad āyāty asau śaṭhaḥ / ityāllocya sa tatraiva tasthau channo vidūṣakaḥ // 3.4.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
pravrājakaśca gatvaiva vātāyanapathena saḥ / praviśyāntaḥpuraṃ prāpa suptāṃ niśi nṛpātmajām // 3.4.168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āyayau ca gṛhītvā tāṃ gaganena tamomayaḥ / kāntiprakāśitadiśaṃ rāhuḥ śaśikalāmiva // 3.4.169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
hā tāta hāmbeti ca tāṃ krandantīṃ kanyakāṃ vahan / tatraiva devībhavane so 'ntarikṣādavātarat // 3.4.170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
praviveśa ca tatkālaṃ vetālaṃ pravimucya saḥ / kanyāratnaṃ tadādāya devīgarbhagṛhāntaram // 3.4.171	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra yāvannihantuṃ tāṃ rājaputrīmiyeṣa saḥ / tāvadākṛṣṭakhaḍgo 'tra praviveśa vidūṣakaḥ // 3.4.172	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āḥ pāpa mālatīpuṣpamaśmanā hantumīhase / yadasyāmākṛtau śastraṃ vyāpārayitumicchasi // 3.4.173	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityuktvākṛṣya keśeṣu śirastasya vivellataḥ / pravrājakasya ciccheda khaḍgena sa vidūṣakaḥ // 3.4.174	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āśvāsayāmāsa ca tāṃ rājaputrīṃ bhayākulām / praviśantīmivāṅgāni kiṃcitpratyabhijānatīm // 3.4.175	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kathamantaḥpuraṃ rājño rājaputrīmimāmitaḥ / nayeyamiti tatkālamasau dhīro vyacintayat // 3.4.176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bho vidūṣaka śṛṇvetadyo 'yaṃ pravrāṭ tvayā hataḥ / mahānetasya vetālaḥ siddho 'bhūtsarṣapāstathā // 3.4.177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'sya pṛthvīrājye ca vāñchā rājātmajāsu ca / udapadyata tenāyam evaṃ mūḍho 'dya vañcitaḥ // 3.4.178	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadgṛhāṇaitadīyāṃstvaṃ sarṣapānvīra yena te / imāmekāṃ niśāmadya bhaviṣyatyambare gatiḥ // 3.4.179	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityākāśagatā vāṇī jātaharṣaṃ jagāda tam / anugṛhṇanti hi prāyo devatā api tādṛśam // 3.4.180	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vastrāñcalāt tasya sa parivrājakasya tān / jarāha sarṣapān haste tām aṅke ca nṛpātmajām // 3.4.181	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yāvacca devībhavanātsa tasmānniryayau bahiḥ / uccacāra punastāvadanyā nabhasi bhāratī // 3.4.182	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ihaiva devībhavane māsasyānte punastvayā / āgantavyaṃ mahāvīra vismartavyamidaṃ na te // 3.4.183	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tacchrutvā sa tathetyuktvā sadyo devīprasādataḥ / utpapāta nabho bibhradrājaputrīṃ vidūṣakaḥ // 3.4.184	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā ca gaganenāśu sa tāmantaḥpurāntaram / prāveśayadrājasutāṃ samāśvastāmuvāca ca // 3.4.185	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
na me bhaviṣyati prātargatirvyomni tataśca mām / sarve drakṣyanti niryāntaṃ tatsaṃpratyeva yāmyaham // 3.4.186	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti tenoditā bālā bibhyatī sā jagāda tam / gate tvayi mama prāṇāstrāsākrāntāḥ prayāntyamī // 3.4.187	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tanmahābhāga mā gāstvaṃ dehi me jīvitaṃ punaḥ / pratipannārthanirvāhaḥ sahajaṃ hi satāṃ vratam // 3.4.188	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā cintayām āsa sa susattvo vidūṣakaḥ / yad astu me na gacchāmi muñcet prāṇān bhayādiyam // 3.4.189	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataśca nṛpaterbhaktiḥ kā mayā vihitā bhavet / ityālocya sa tatraiva tasthāvantaḥpure niśi // 3.4.190	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vyāyāmajāgaraśrānto yayau nidrāṃ śanaiśca saḥ / rājaputrī tvanidraiva bhītā tāmanayanniśām // 3.4.191	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
viśrāmyatu kṣaṇaṃ tāvaditi premārdramānasā / suptaṃ prabodhayāmāsa sā prabhāte 'pi naiva tam // 3.4.192	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ praviṣṭā dadṛśustamantaḥpuracārikāḥ / sasaṃbhramāśca gatvaiva rājānaṃ taṃ vyajijñapan // 3.4.193	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājāpy avekṣituṃ tattvaṃ pratīhāraṃ vyasarjayat / pratīhāraśca gatvāntastatrāpaśyadvidūṣakam // 3.4.194	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śuśrāva ca yathāvṛttaṃ sa tadrājasutāmukhāt / tathaiva gatvā rājñe ca sa samagraṃ nyavedayat // 3.4.195	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
vidūṣakasya sattvajñastacchrutvā sa mahīpatiḥ / kimetatsyāditi kṣipraṃ samudbhrānta ivābhavat // 3.4.196	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ānāyayacca duhiturmandirāttaṃ vidūṣakam / dattānuyātraṃ manasā tasyāḥ snehānupātinā // 3.4.197	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
papraccha ca yathāvṛttaṃ sa rājā tamupāgatam / ā mūlataśca so 'pyasmai vipro vṛttāntamabravīt // 3.4.198	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adarśayac ca vastrānte nibaddhāś cauranāsikāḥ / pravrāṭsaṃbandhinas tāṃś ca sarṣapān bhūmibhedinaḥ // 3.4.199	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ saṃbhāvya satyaṃ tat tāṃś cānāyya maṭhadvijān / sarvāṃś cakradharopetān pṛṣṭvā tanmūlakāraṇam // 3.4.200	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svayaṃ śmaśāne gatvā ca dṛṣṭvā tāṃśchinnanāsikān / puruṣāṃstaṃ ca nirlūnakaṇṭhaṃ pravrājakādhamam // 3.4.201	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
utpannapratyayo rājā sa tutoṣa mahāśayaḥ / vidūṣakāya kṛtine sutāprāṇapradāyine // 3.4.202	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
dadau tasmai ca tāmeva tadaiva tanayāṃ nijām / kimadeyamudārāṇāmupakāriṣu tuṣyatām // 3.4.203	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrīruvāsāmbujaprītyā nūnaṃ rājasutākare / gṛhītapāṇir yenāsyā lebhe lakṣmīṃ vidūṣakaḥ // 3.4.204	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tato rājopacāreṇa sa tayā kāntayā saha / ādityasenanṛpatestasthau ślāghyayaśā gṛhe // 3.4.205	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
atha yāteṣu divaseṣvekadā daivacoditā / tamuvāca niśāyāṃ sā rājaputrī vidūṣakam // 3.4.206	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
nātha smarasi yattatra tava devīgṛhe niśi / māsānte tvamihāgaccherityuktaṃ divyayā girā // 3.4.207	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra cādya gato māso bhavatastacca vismṛtam / ity uktaḥ priyayā smṛtvā sa jaharṣa vidūṣakaḥ // 3.4.208	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sādhu smṛtaṃ tvayā tanvi vismṛtaṃ tanmayā punaḥ / ityuktvāliṅganaṃ cāsyi sa dadau pāritoṣakam // 3.4.209	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
suptāyāṃ ca tatastasyāṃ nirgatyāntaḥpurānniśi / ādāya khaḍgaṃ svasthaḥ saṃstaddevībhavanaṃ yayau // 3.4.210	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
prāpto vidūṣako 'haṃ bhor iti tatra vadan bahiḥ / praviśety aśṛṇod vācam antaḥ kenāpy udīritām // 3.4.211	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praviśya cāntare so 'tra divyamāvāsamaikṣata / tadantardivyarūpāṃ ca kanyāṃ divyaparicchadām // 3.4.212	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svaprabhābhinnatimirāṃ rajanijvalitāmiva / harakopāgninirdagdhasmarasaṃjīvanauṣadhim // 3.4.213	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kimetaditi sāścaryaḥ sa tayā hṛṣṭayā svayam / sasnehabahumānena svāgatenābhyanandyata // 3.4.214	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upaviṣṭaṃ ca saṃjātavisrambhaṃ premadarśanāt / tatsvarūpaparijñānasotsukaṃ sā tamabravīt // 3.4.215	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ vidyādharī kanyā bhadrānāma mahānvayā / iha kāmacaratvācca tvāmapaśyamahaṃ tadā // 3.4.216	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvadguṇākṛṣṭacittā ca tatkālamahameva tām / adṛśyavāṇīmasṛjaṃ punarāgamanāya te // 3.4.217	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
adya vidyāprayogāś ca saṃmohya preritā mayā / sā te rājasutaivāsmin kārye smṛtim ajījanat // 3.4.218	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvadarthaṃ ca sthitāsmīha tattubhyamidamarpitam / śarīraṃ sundara mayā kuru pāṇigrahaṃ mama // 3.4.219	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ityukto bhadrayā bhavyo vidyādharyā vidūṣakaḥ / tatheti pariṇinye tāṃ gāndharvavidinā tadā // 3.4.220	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atiṣṭhadatha tatraiva divyaṃ bhogamavāpya saḥ / svapauruṣaphalarddhyeva priyayā saṃgatastayā // 3.4.221	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atrāntare prabuddhā sā rājaputrī niśākṣaye / bhartāraṃ tamapaśyantī viṣādaṃ sahasāgamat // 3.4.222	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
utthāya cāntikaṃ mātuḥ praskhaladbhiḥ padairyayau / vihvalā saṃgaladvāṣpataraṅgitavilocanā // 3.4.223	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa patirme gataḥ kvāpi rātrāviti ca mātaram / ātmāparādhasabhayā sānutāpā ca sābhyadhāt // 3.4.224	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatastanmātari snehātsaṃbhrāntāyāṃ krameṇa tat / buddhvā rājāpi tatraitya paramākulatāmagāt // 3.4.225	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jāne śmaśānabāhyaṃ taṃ gato 'sau devatāgṛham / ityukte rājasutayā rājā tatra svayaṃ yayau // 3.4.226	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatra vidyādharīvidyāprabhāveṇa tirohitam / vicintyāpi na lebhe taṃ sa kṣitīśo vidūṣakam // 3.4.227	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato rājñi parāvṛtte nirāśāṃ tāṃ nṛpātmajām / dehatyāgonmukhīmetya jñānī ko 'pyabravīdidam // 3.4.228	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nāriṣṭaśaṅkā kartavyā sa hi te vartate patiḥ / yukto divyena bhogena tvāmupaiṣyati cācirāt // 3.4.229	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tacchrutvā rājaputrī sā dhārayāmāsa jīvitam / hṛdi praviṣṭayā ruddhaṃ tatpratyāgamavāñchayā // 3.4.230	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidūṣakasyāpi tatastiṣṭhatastatra tāṃ priyām / bhadrāṃ yageśvarī nāma sakhī kācidupāyayau // 3.4.231	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
upetya sā rahasyenāmidaṃ bhadrāmathābravīt / sakhi mānuṣasaṃsargātkruddhā vidyādharāstvayi // 3.4.232	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pāpaṃ ca te cikīrṣanti tadito gamyatāṃ tvayā / asti pūrvāmbudheḥ pāre puraṃ kārkoṭakābhidham // 3.4.233	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadatikramya ca nadī śītodā nāma pāvanī / tīrtvā tāmudayākhyaśca siddhakṣetraṃ mahāgiriḥ // 3.4.234	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidyādharairanākramyastatra tvaṃ gaccha sāṃpratam / priyasya mānuṣasyāsya kṛte cintāṃ ca mā kṛthāḥ // 3.4.235	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etaddhi sarvametasya kathayitvā gamiṣyasi / yenaiṣa paścāt tatraiva sattvavānāgamiṣyati // 3.4.236	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ityuktā sā tayā sakhyā bhadrā bhayavaśīkṛtā / vidūṣakānuraktāpi pratipede tatheti tat // 3.4.237	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uktvā ca tasya tadyuktyā dattvā ca svāṅgulīyakam / vidūṣakasya rātryantasamaye sā tirodadhe // 3.4.238	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidūṣakasya pūrvasmiñ śūnye devagṛhe sthitam / kṣaṇād apaśyad ātmānaṃ na bhadrāṃ na ca mandiram // 3.4.239	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
smaranvidyāprapañcaṃ taṃ paśyaṃścaivāṅgulīyakam / viṣādavismayāveśavaśaḥ so 'bhūdvidūṣakaḥ // 3.4.240	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
acintayacca tasyāḥ sa vacaḥ svapnamiva smaran / gatā tāvannivedyaiva sā mamodayaparvatam // 3.4.241	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tanmayāpyāśu tatraiva gantavyaṃ tadavāptaye / na caivaṃ lokadṛṣṭaṃ māṃ labdhvā rājā parityajet // 3.4.242	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmādyuktiṃ karomīha kāryaṃ siddhyati me yathā / iti saṃcintya matimānrūpamanyatsa śiśriye // 3.4.243	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
jīrṇavāsā rajolipto bhūtvā devīgṛhāttataḥ / niragādatha hā bhadre hā bhadre iti sa bruvan // 3.4.244	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkṣaṇaṃ ca vilokyainaṃ janāstaddeśavartinaḥ / so 'yaṃ vidūṣakaḥ prāpta iti kolāhalaṃ vyadhuḥ // 3.4.245	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
buddhvā ca rājñā nirgatya svayaṃ dṛṣṭvā tathāvidhaḥ / unmattaceṣṭo 'vaṣṭabhya sa nīto 'bhūtsvamandiram // 3.4.246	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatra snehākulairyadyadukto 'bhūdbhṛtyabāndhavaiḥ / tatra tatra sa hā bhadre iti pratyuttaraṃ dadau // 3.4.247	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

ānīya ca praveśyo 'tra rātrau matputrikāgṛhe / paśyāmo 'tra vipadyante kiyanto 'tra kiyacciram // 3.4.266	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tasya vāro 'dya saṃprāptastatra gantuṃ vipattaye / tadabhāve mayā kāryaṃ prātaragnipraveśanam // 3.4.270	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

evamuktavatīṃ dhīrastāmavocadvidūṣakaḥ / yadyevamamba tarhi tvaṃ mā sma viklavatāṃ kṛthāḥ // 3.4.272	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ tatrādya gacchāmi jīvatvekasutastava / kimetaṃ ghātayāmīti kṛpā te mayi mā ca bhūt // 3.4.273	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

ityukto 'pi sa tair viprair anaṅgīkṛtatadvacāḥ / vidūṣako rājagṛhaṃ yayau tatkiṃkaraiḥ saha // 3.4.326	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tatrāryavarmaṇā rājñā svayaṃ dṛṣṭvābhinanditaḥ / viveśa tatsutāvāsaṃ naktamarka ivānalam // 3.4.327	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dadarśa rājakanyāṃ ca tāmākṛtyānurāgiṇīm / nairāśyaduḥkhavidhuraṃ paśyantīṃ sāsrayā dṛśā // 3.4.328	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
āsīcca jāgradevātra sa rātrāvavalokayan / kare kṛpāṇamāgneyaṃ cintitopanataṃ dadhat // 3.4.329	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akasmācca mahāghoraṃ dadarśa dvāri rākṣasam / chinnadakṣiṇabāhutvātprasāritabhujāntaram // 3.4.330	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvā vyacintayac cāsau hanta so 'yaṃ niśācaraḥ / yasya bāhur mayā chinno nagare pauṇḍravardhane // 3.4.331	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadadya na punarbāhau prahariṣyāmyasau hi me / palāyya pūrvavadgacchettasmātsādhu nihanmyamum // 3.4.332	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityālocya pradhāvyaiva keśeṣvākṛṣya tasya saḥ / rākṣasasya śiraśchettuṃ samārebhe vidūṣakaḥ // 3.4.333	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkṣaṇaṃ bhītabhītaśca tamuvāca sa rākṣasaḥ / mā māṃ vadhīḥ susattvastvaṃ tatkuruṣva kṛpāmiti // 3.4.334	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃnāma tvaṃ ca keyaṃ ca tava ceṣṭeti tena saḥ / muktvā pṛṣṭaśca vīreṇa punarāha sa rākṣasaḥ // 3.4.335	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yamadaṃṣṭrābhidhānasya mamābhūtāṃ sute ime / iyam ekā tathānyā ca pauṇḍravardhanavartinī // 3.4.336	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avīrapuruṣāsaṅgādrakṣaṇīye nṛpātmaje / śaṃkarājñāprasādo hi mamābhūdayamīdṛśaḥ // 3.4.337	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrādau bāhur ekena chinno me pauṇḍravardhane / tvayā cādya jito 'smīha tat samāptam idaṃ mama // 3.4.338	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sa vihasyainaṃ pratyuvāca vidūṣakaḥ / mayaiva sa bhujas tatra lūnaste pauṇḍravardhane // 3.4.339	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rākṣaso 'pyavadattarhi devāṃśastvaṃ na mānuṣaḥ / manye tvadarthamevābhūccharvājñānugrahaḥ sa me // 3.4.340	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadidānīṃ suhṛnme tvaṃ yadā māṃ ca smariṣyasi / tadāhaṃ saṃnidhāsye te siddhaye saṃkaṭeṣvapi // 3.4.341	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ sa rākṣaso maitryā varayitvā vidūṣakam / tenābhinanditavacā yamadaṃṣṭrastirodadhe // 3.4.342	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
vidūṣako 'pi sānandamabhinanditavikramaḥ / rājaputryā tayā tatra hṛṣṭastāmanayanniśām // 3.4.343	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātaśca jñātavṛttāntastuṣṭastasmai dadau nṛpaḥ / vibhavaiḥ saha śauryaikapatākāmiva tāṃ sutām // 3.4.344	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tayā saha tatrāsīdrātrīḥ kāścidvidūṣakaḥ / padātpadamamuñcantyā lakṣmyeva guṇabaddhayā // 3.4.345	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā ca niśi svairaṃ tataḥ prāyātpriyotsukaḥ / labdhadivyarasāsvādaḥ ko hi rajyedrasāntare // 3.4.346	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nagarācca vinirgatya sa taṃ sasmāra rākṣasam / smṛtamātrāgataṃ taṃ ca jagāda racitānatim // 3.4.347	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
siddhakṣetre prayātavyamudayādrau mayā sakhe / bhadrāvidyādharīhetoratastvaṃ tatra māṃ naya // 3.4.348	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathetuktavatastasya skandhamāruhya rakṣasaḥ / yayau ca sa tayā rātryā durgamāṃ ṣaṣṭiyojanīm // 3.4.349	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātaśca tīrtvā śītodāmalaṅghyāṃ mānuṣairnadīm / udayādreratha prāpatsaṃnikarṣamayatnataḥ // 3.4.350	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayaṃ sa parvataḥ śrīmānudayākhyaḥ purastava / atropari ca nāstyeva siddhadhāmni gatirmama // 3.4.351	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā rākṣase tasmin prāptānujñe tirohite / dīrghikāṃ sa dadarśaikāṃ ramyāṃ tatra vidūṣakaḥ // 3.4.352	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vadantyāḥ svāgatamiva bhramadbhramaraguñjitaiḥ / tasyās tīre nyaṣīdac ca phullapadmānanaśriyaḥ // 3.4.353	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
strīṇāmivātra cāpaśyatpadapaṅktiṃ suvistarām / ayaṃ priyāgame mārgastaveti bruvatīmiva // 3.4.354	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alaṅghyo 'yaṃ girirmartyaistadihaiva varaṃ kṣaṇam / sthito bhavāmi paśyāmi kasyeyaṃ padapaddhatiḥ // 3.4.355	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti cintayatastasya tatra toyārthamāyayuḥ / gṛhītakāñcanaghaṭā bhavyāḥ subahavaḥ striyaḥ // 3.4.356	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
vāripūritakumbhāśca tāḥ sa papraccha yoṣitaḥ / kasyedaṃ nīyate toyamiti praṇayapeśalam // 3.4.357	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āste cidyādharī bhadra bhadrānāmātra parvate / idaṃ snānodakaṃ tasyā iti tāśca tamabruvan // 3.4.358	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
citraṃ dhātaiva dhīrāṇāmārabdhoddāmakarmaṇām / parituṣyeva sāmagrīṃ ghaṭayatyupayoginīm // 3.4.359	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yadekā sahasaiva strī tāsāṃ madhyāduvāca tam / mahābhāga mama skandhe kumbha utkṣipyatāmiti // 3.4.360	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatheti ca ghaṭe tasyāḥ skandhotkṣipte sa buddhimān / nidadhe bhadrayā pūrvaṃ dattaṃ ratnāṅgulīyakam // 3.4.361	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upāviśacca tatraiva sa punardīrghikātaṭe / tāśca tajjalamādāya yayurbhadrāgṛhaṃ striyaḥ // 3.4.362	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tābhiśca bhadrāyā yāvatsnānāmbu dīyate / tāvattasyāstadutsaṅge nipapātāṅgulīyakam // 3.4.363	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taddṛṣṭvā pratyabhijñāya bhadrā papraccha tāḥ sakhīḥ / dṛṣṭaḥ kiṃ ko'pi yuṣmābhirihāpūrvaḥ pumāniti // 3.4.364	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭa eko yuvāsmābhirmānuṣo vāpikātaṭe / tenotkṣipto ghaṭaścāyamiti pratyabruvaṃśca tāḥ // 3.4.365	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato bhadrābravīcchīghraṃ prakḷptasnānamaṇḍanam / ihānayata gatvā taṃ sa hi bhartā mamāgataḥ // 3.4.366	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityukte bhadrayā gatvā yathavastu nivedya ca / snātaśca tadvayasyābhistatrāninye vidūṣakaḥ // 3.4.367	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāptaśca sa dadarśātra bhadrāṃ mārgonmukhīṃ cirāt / nijasattvataroḥ sākṣātpakvāmiva phalaśriyam // 3.4.368	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpi dṛṣṭvā tamutthāya harṣabāṣpāmbusīkaraiḥ / dattārgheva babandhāsya kaṇṭhe bhujalatāsrajam // 3.4.369	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
parasparāliṅgitayostayoḥ svedacchalādiva / atipīḍanataḥ snehaḥ sasyande cirasaṃbhṛtaḥ // 3.4.370	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
athopaviṣṭāv anyonyam avitṛptau vilokane / ubhau śataguṇībhūtām ivotkaṇṭhām udūhatuḥ // 3.4.371	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
āgato 'si kathaṃ bhūmimimāmiti ca bhadrayā / paripṛṣṭaḥ sa tatkālamuvācedaṃ vidūṣakaḥ // 3.4.372	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tacchrutvā tasya dṛṣṭvā tāmanapekṣitajīvitām / prītiṃ kāṣṭhāgatasnehā sā bhadrā tamabhāṣata // 3.4.374	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āryaputra na me kāryaṃ sakhibhirna ca siddhibhiḥ / tvaṃ me prāṇā guṇakrītā dāsī cāhaṃ tava prabho // 3.4.375	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidūṣakastato 'vādīttarhyāgaccha mayā saha / muktvā divyamimaṃ bhogaṃ vastumujjayinīṃ priye // 3.4.376	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatheti pratipede sā bhadrā sapadi tadvacaḥ / tatsaṃkalpaparibhraṣṭā vidyāśca tṛṇavajjahau // 3.4.377	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatastayā samaṃ tatra sa viśaśrāma tāṃ niśām / kḷptopacāras tatsakhyā yogeśvaryā vidūṣakaḥ // 3.4.378	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
prātaśca bhadrayā sākamavatīryodayādritaḥ / sasmāra yamadaṃṣṭraṃ taṃ rākṣasaṃ sa punaḥ kṛtī // 3.4.379	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
smṛtamātrāgatasyoktvā gantavyādhvakramaṃ nijam / tasyāruroha sa skandhe bhadrāmāropya tāṃ puraḥ // 3.4.380	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpi sehe tadatyugrarākṣasāṃsādhirohaṇam / anurāgaparāyattāḥ kurvate kiṃ na yoṣitaḥ // 3.4.381	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rakṣodhirūḍhaśca tataḥ sa pratasthe priyāsakhaḥ / vidūṣakaḥ punaḥ prāpa tacca kārkoṭakaṃ puram // 3.4.382	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
rakṣodarśanasatrāsaṃ tatra cālokito janaiḥ / dṛṣṭvāryavarmanṛpatiṃ svāṃ bhāryāṃ mārgati sma saḥ // 3.4.383	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
dattāṃ tena gṛhītvā ca tatsutāṃ tāṃ bhujarjitām / tathaiva rākṣasārūḍhaḥ sa pratasthe purāttataḥ // 3.4.384	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvāmbudhestaṭe prāpa pāpaṃ taṃ vaṇijaṃ ca saḥ / yenāsya vāridhau pūrvaṃ chinnāḥ kṣiptasya rajjavaḥ // 3.4.385	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jahāra tasya ca sutāṃ vaṇijaḥ sa dhanaiḥ saha / prāgambudhau pravahaṇapramocanapaṇārjitām // 3.4.386	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
dhanāpahāramevāsya vadhaṃ mene ca pāpmanaḥ / kadaryāṇāṃ pure prāṇāḥ prāyeṇa hyarthasaṃcayāḥ // 3.4.387	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato rakṣorathārūḍhastāmānīya vaṇiksutām / sa bhadrārājaputrībhyāṃ sahaivodapatannabhaḥ // 3.4.388	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
darśayannijakāntānāṃ dyumārgeṇa tatāra ca / vilasatsattvasaṃrambhaṃ svapauruṣamivāmbudhim // 3.4.389	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāpa tac ca sa bhūyo 'pi nagaraṃ pauṇḍravardhanam / dṛṣṭaḥ savismayaṃ sarvair vāhanīkṛtarākṣasaḥ // 3.4.390	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tāṃ devasenasya sutāṃ rājñaścirotsukām / bhāryāṃ saṃbhāvayāmāsa rākṣasāvajayārjitām // 3.4.391	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rudhyamāno 'pi tatpitrā sa svadeśasamutsukaḥ / gṛhītvā tāmapi tataḥ prāyādujjayinīṃ prati // 3.4.392	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
acireṇa ca tāṃ prāpa purīṃ rākṣasayogataḥ / bahirgatāmivātmīyadeśadarśananirvṛtim // 3.4.393	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athopari sthitastasya mahākāyasya rakṣasaḥ / aṃsasthatadvadhūcakrakāntiprakaṭitātmanaḥ // 3.4.394	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tato vismitavitraste jane buddhvātra bhūpatiḥ / ādityaseno niragācchvaśuro 'sya tadā puraḥ // 3.4.396	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
vidūṣakastu dṛṣṭvā tamavatīryāśu rākṣasāt / praṇamya nṛpamabhyāgānnṛpo 'pyabhinananda tam // 3.4.397	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avatāryaiva tatskandhāttāḥ svabhāryāstato 'khilāḥ / mumoca kāmacārāya rākṣasaṃ sa vidūṣakaḥ // 3.4.398	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gate ca rākṣase tasmin sa tena saha bhūbhujā / śvaśureṇa sabhāryaḥ san prāviśad rājamandiram // 3.4.399	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tāṃ prathamāṃ bhāryāṃ tanayāṃ tasya bhūpateḥ / ānandayadupāgatya cirotkaṇṭhāvaśīkṛtām // 3.4.400	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kathametāstvayā bhāryāḥ prāptāḥ kaścaiṣa rākṣasaḥ / iti pṛṣṭaḥ sa rājñātra sarvamasmai śaśaṃsa tat // 3.4.401	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ prabhāvatuṣṭena tena tasya mahībhṛtā / jāmāturnijarājyārdhaṃ pradattaṃ kāryavedinā // 3.4.402	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkṣaṇācca sa rājābhūdvipro bhūtvā vidūṣakaḥ / samucchritasitacchattro vidhūtobhayacāmaraḥ // 3.4.403	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadā ca maṅgalātodyavādyanirhrādanirbharā / praharṣamuktanādeva rarājojjayinī purī // 3.4.404	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityāptarājyavibhavaḥ kramaśaḥ sa kṛtsnāṃ jitvā mahīmakhilarājakapūjitāṅghriḥ / tābhiḥ samaṃ vigatamatsaranirvṛtābhir bhadrāsakhaściramaraṃsta nijapriyābhiḥ // 3.4.405	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
ityanukūle daive bhajati nijaṃ sattvam eva dhīrāṇām / lakṣmīrabhasākarṣaṇasiddhamahāmodamantratvam // 3.4.406	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
itthaṃ śrutvā vatsarājasya vaktrāc citrām etām adbhutārthāṃ kathāṃ te / pāśvāsīnā mantriṇaś cāsya sarve devyau cāpi prītimagryāmavāpuḥ // 3.4.407	śālinī [11: mttgg]
tato vatseśvaraṃ prāha tatra yaugandharāyaṇaḥ / rājan daivānukūlyaṃ ca vidyate pauruṣaṃ ca te // 3.5.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nītimārge ca vayam apy atra kiṃcitkṛtaśramāḥ / tad yathācintitaṃ śīghraṃ kuruṣva vijayaṃ diśām // 3.5.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukte mantrimukhyena rājā vatseśvaro 'bravīt / astv etad bahuvighnās tu sadā kalyāṇasiddhayaḥ // 3.5.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atas tadarthaṃ tapasā śaṃbhum ārādhayāmy aham / vinā hi tatprasādena kuto vāñchitasiddhayaḥ // 3.5.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā ca tapas tasya mantriṇo 'py anumenire / setubandhodyatasyābdhau rāmasyeva kapīśvarāḥ // 3.5.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas taṃ saha devībhyāṃ sacivaiś ca tapaḥsthitam / trirātropoṣitaṃ bhūpaṃ śivaḥ svapnaṃ samādiśat // 3.5.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tuṣṭo 'smi te tad uttiṣṭha nirvighnaṃ jayam āpsyasi / sarvavidyādharādhīśaṃ putraṃ caivācirād iti // 3.5.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa bubudhe rājā tatprasādahṛtaklamaḥ / arkāṃśuracitāpyāyaḥ pratipaccandramā iva // 3.5.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ānandayac ca sacivān prātaḥ svapnena tena saḥ / vratopavāsaklānte ca devyau dve puṣpakomale // 3.5.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatsvapnavarṇanenaiva śrotrapeyena tṛptayoḥ / tayoś ca vibhavāyaiva jātaḥ svādvauṣadhakramaḥ // 3.5.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
lebhe sa rājā tapasā prabhāvaṃ pūrvajaiḥ samam / puṇyāṃ pativratānāṃ ca tatpatnyau kīrtim āpatuḥ // 3.5.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
utsavavyagrapaure ca vihite vratapāraṇe / yaugandharāyaṇo 'nyedyur iti rājānam abravīt // 3.5.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dhanyas tvaṃ yasya caivetthaṃ prasanno bhagavān haraḥ / tad idānīṃ ripūñ jitvā bhaja lakṣmīṃ bhujārjitām // 3.5.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā hi svadharmasaṃbhūtā bhūbhṛtām anvaye sthirā / nijadharmārjitānāṃ hi vināśo nāsti saṃpadām // 3.5.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathā ca cirabhūmiṣṭho nidhiḥ pūrvajasaṃbhṛtaḥ / praṇaṣṭo bhavatā prāptaḥ kiṃ cātraitāṃ kathāṃ śṛṇu // 3.5.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
babhūva devadāsākhyaḥ pure pāṭaliputrake / purā ko'pi vaṇikputro mahādhanakulodgataḥ // 3.5.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhavat tasya bhāryā ca nagarāt pauṇḍravardhanāt / pariṇītā samṛddhasya kasyāpi vaṇijaḥ sutā // 3.5.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gate pitari pañcatvaṃ krameṇa vyasanānvitaḥ / sa devadāso dyūtena sarvaṃ dhanam ahārayat // 3.5.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tataś ca tasya sā bhāryā duḥkhadāridryaduḥkhitā / etya nītā nijaṃ gehaṃ svapitrā pauṇḍravardhanam // 3.5.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śanaiḥ so 'pi vipatkhinnaḥ sthātum icchan svakarmaṇi / mūlyārthī devadāsas taṃ śvaśuraṃ yācituṃ yayau // 3.5.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāptaś ca saṃdhyāsamaye tat puraṃ pauṇḍravardhanam / rajorūkṣaṃ vivastraṃ ca vīkṣyātmānam acintayat // 3.5.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
īdṛśaḥ praviśāmīha kathaṃ śvaśuraveśmani / varaṃ hi mānino mṛtyur na dainyaṃ svajanāgrataḥ // 3.5.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ālocyāpaṇe gatvā sa kvāpi vipaṇer bahiḥ / naktaṃ saṃkucitas tasthau tatkālaṃ kamalopamaḥ // 3.5.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣaṇāc ca tasyāṃ vipaṇau praviśantaṃ vyalokayat / yuvānaṃ vaṇijaṃ kaṃcid udghāṭitakavāṭakam // 3.5.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣaṇāntare ca tatraiva niḥśabdapadam āgatām / drutam antaḥ praviṣṭāṃ ca striyam ekāṃ dadarśa saḥ // 3.5.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jvalatpradīpe yāvac ca dadau dṛṣṭiṃ tadantare / pratyabhijñātavāṃs tāvat tāṃ nijām eva gehinīm // 3.5.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ so 'rgalitadvārāṃ bhāryāṃ tām anyagāminīm / dṛṣṭvā duḥkhāśanihato devadāso vyacintayat // 3.5.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
dhanahīnena deho 'pi hāryate strīṣu kā kathā / nisarganiyataṃ vāsāṃ vidyutām iva cāpalam // 3.5.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad iyaṃ sā vipat puṃsāṃ vyasanārṇavapātinām / gatiḥ seyaṃ svatantrāyāḥ striyāḥ pitṛgṛhasthiteḥ // 3.5.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti saṃcintayaṃs tasyā bhāryāyāḥ sa bahiḥ sthitaḥ / ratāntavisrambhajuṣaḥ kathālāpam ivāśṛṇot // 3.5.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
upetya ca dadau dvāri sa karṇaṃ sāpi tatkṣaṇam / ity abravīd upapatiṃ pāpā taṃ vaṇijaṃ rahaḥ // 3.5.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
śṛṇv idaṃ kathayāmy adya rahasyaṃ te 'nurāgiṇī / madbhartur vīravarmākhyaḥ purābhūt prapitāmahaḥ // 3.5.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svagṛhasyāṅgaṇe tena catvāraḥ svarṇapūritāḥ / kumbhāś caturṣu koṇeṣu nigūḍhāḥ sthāpitā bhuvi // 3.5.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad ekasyāḥ svabhāryāyāḥ sa cakre viditaṃ tadā / tadbhāryā cāntakāle sā snuṣāyai tad avocata // 3.5.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpi snuṣāyai macchvaśrve macchvaśrūr abravīc ca me / ity ayaṃ matpatikule śvaśrūkramamukhāgamaḥ // 3.5.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
svabhartus tac ca na mayā daridrasyāpi varṇitam / sa hi dyūtarato dveṣyas tvaṃ tu me paramaḥ priyaḥ // 3.5.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tat tatra gatvā madbhartuḥ sakāśāt tadgṛhaṃ dhanaiḥ / krītvā tat prāpya ca svarṇam ihaitya bhaja māṃ sukham // 3.5.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktaḥ kuṭilayā sa tayopapatir vaṇik / tutoṣa tasyai manvāno nidhiṃ labdham ayatnataḥ // 3.5.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
devadāso 'pi kuvadhūvākśalyais tair bahir gataḥ / kīlitām iva tatkālaṃ dhanāśāṃ hṛdaye dadhau // 3.5.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
jagāma ca tataḥ sadyaḥ puraṃ pāṭaliputrakam / prāpya ca svagṛhaṃ labdhvā nidhānaṃ svīcakāra tat // 3.5.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athājagāma sa vaṇik tadbhāryācchannakāmukaḥ / tam eva deśaṃ vāṇijyavyājena nidhilolupaḥ // 3.5.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
devadāsasakāśāc ca krīṇāti sma sa tadgṛham / devadāso 'pi mūlyena bhūyasā tasya tad dadau // 3.5.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato gṛhasthitiṃ kṛtvā yuktyā śvaśuraveśmanaḥ / sa devadāsaḥ śīghraṃ tām ānināya svagehinīm // 3.5.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
evaṃ kṛte ca tadbhāryākāmukaḥ sa vaṇik śaṭhaḥ / alabdhanidhir abhyetya devadāsam uvāca tam // 3.5.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etad bhavadgṛhaṃ jīrṇaṃ mahyaṃ na khalu rocate / tad dehi me nijaṃ mūlyaṃ svagṛhaṃ svīkuruṣva ca // 3.5.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti jalpaṃś ca sa vaṇig devadāsaś ca vibruvan / ubhau vivādasaktau tau rājāgram upajagmatuḥ // 3.5.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra svabhāryāvṛttāntaṃ vakṣaḥsthaviṣaduḥsaham / devadāso narendrāgre kṛtsnam udgirati sma tam // 3.5.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataś cānāyya tadbhāryāṃ tattvaṃ cānviṣya bhūpatiḥ / adaṇḍayat taṃ sarvasvaṃ vaṇijaṃ pāradārikam // 3.5.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
devadāso 'pi kuvadhūṃ kṛtva tāṃ chinnanāsikām / anyāṃ ca pariṇīyātra tasthau labdhanidhiḥ sukham // 3.5.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
itthaṃ dharmārjitā lakṣmīr āsaṃtaty anapāyinī / itarā tu jalapātatuṣārakaṇanaśvarī // 3.5.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
ato yateta dharmeṇa dhanam arjayituṃ pumān / rājā tu sutarāṃ yena mūlaṃ rājyataror dhanam // 3.5.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmād yathāvat saṃmānya siddhaye mantrimaṇḍalam / kuru digvijayaṃ deva labdhuṃ dharmottarāṃ śriyam // 3.5.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
śvaśuradvayabandhūnāṃ prasaktānuprasaktitaḥ / vikurvate na bahavo rājānas te milanti ca // 3.5.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
yas tv eṣa brahmadattākhyo vārāṇasyāṃ mahīpatiḥ / nityaṃ vairī sa te tasmād vijayasva tam agrataḥ // 3.5.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmiñ jite jaya prācīprakrameṇākhilā diśaḥ / uccaiḥ kuruṣva vai pāṇḍor yaśaś ca kumudojjvalam // 3.5.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukto mantrimukhyena tatheti vijayodyataḥ / vatsarājaḥ prakṛtiṣu prayāṇārambham ādiśat // 3.5.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
dadau vaidehadeśe ca rājyaṃ gopālakāya saḥ / satkārahetor nṛpatiḥ śvaśuryāyānugacchate // 3.5.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
kiṃ ca padmāvatībhrātre prāyacchat siṃhavarmaṇe / saṃmānya cediviṣayaṃ sainyaiḥ samam upeyuṣe // 3.5.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ānāyayac ca sa vibhur bhillarājaṃ pulindakam / mittraṃ balair vyāptadiśaṃ prāvṛṭkālam ivāmbudaiḥ // 3.5.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
abhūc ca yātrāsaṃrambho rāṣṭre tasya mahāprabhoḥ / ākulatvaṃ tu śatrūṇāṃ hṛdi citram ajāyata // 3.5.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
yaugandharāyaṇaś cāgre cārān vārāṇasīṃ prati / prāhiṇod brahmadattasya rājño jñātuṃ viceṣṭitam // 3.5.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ śubhe 'hani prīto nimittair jayaśaṃsibhiḥ / brahmadattaṃ prati prācyāṃ pūrvaṃ vatseśvaro yayau // 3.5.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ārūḍhaḥ procchritacchattraṃ prottuṅgaṃ jayakuñjaram / giriṃ praphullaikataruṃ mṛgendra iva durmadaḥ // 3.5.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
prāptayā siddhidūtyeva śaradā dattasaṃmadaḥ / darśayantyātisugamaṃ mārgaṃ svalpāmbunimnagam // 3.5.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
pūrayan bahunādābhir vāhinībhir bhuvas talam / kurvann akāṇḍanirmeghavarṣāsamayasaṃbhramam // 3.5.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadā ca sainyanirghoṣapratiśabdākulīkṛtāḥ / parasparam ivācakhyus tadāgamabhayaṃ diśaḥ // 3.5.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
celuś ca hemasaṃnāhasaṃbhṛtārkaprabhā hayāḥ / tasya nīrājanaprītapāvakānugatā iva // 3.5.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
virejur vāraṇāś cāsya sitaśravaṇacāmarāḥ / vigaladgaṇḍasindūraśoṇadānajalāḥ pathi // 3.5.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śaratpāṇḍupayodāṅkāḥ sadhāturasanirjharāḥ / yātrānupreṣitā bhītair ātmajā iva bhūdharaiḥ // 3.5.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
naivaiṣa rājā sahate pareṣāṃ prasṛtaṃ mahaḥ / itīva taccamūreṇur arkatejas tirodadhe // 3.5.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
padāt padaṃ ca dve devyau mārge tam anujagmatuḥ / nṛpaṃ nayaguṇākṛṣṭe iva kīrtijayaśriyau // 3.5.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
namatātha palāyadhvam ity ūce vidviṣām iva / pavanākṣiptavikṣiptais tasya senādhvajāṃśukaiḥ // 3.5.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ yayau sa digbhāgān paśyan phullasitāmbujān / mahīmardabhayodbhrāntaśeṣotkṣiptaphaṇān iva // 3.5.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atrāntare ca te cārā dhṛtakāpālikavratāḥ / yaugandharāyaṇādiṣṭāḥ prāpur vārāṇasīṃ purīm // 3.5.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
teṣāṃ ca kuhakābhijño jñānitvam upadarśayan / śiśriye gurutām ekaḥ śeṣās tacchiṣyatāṃ yayuḥ // 3.5.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ācāryo 'yaṃ trikālajña iti vyājaguruṃ ca tam / śiṣyās te khyāpayām āsur bhikṣāśinam itas tataḥ // 3.5.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yad uvācāgnidāhādi sa jñānī bhāvi pṛcchatām / tacchiṣyās tat tathā guptaṃ cakrus tena sa paprathe // 3.5.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rañjitaṃ kṣudrasiddhyā ca tatratyaṃ nṛpavallabham / svīcakre sa kam apy ekaṃ rājaputram upāsakam // 3.5.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tanmukhenaiva rājñaś ca brahmadattasya pṛcchataḥ / so 'bhūt tatra rahasyajñaḥ prāpte vatseśavigrahe // 3.5.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athāsya brahmadattasya mantrī yogakaraṇḍakaḥ / cakāra vatsarājasya vyājān āgacchataḥ pathi // 3.5.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adūṣayat pratipathaṃ viṣādidravyayuktibhiḥ / vṛkṣān kusumavalliś ca toyāni ca tṛṇāni ca // 3.5.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidadhe viṣakanyāś ca sainye paṇyavilāsinīḥ / prāhiṇot puruṣāṃś caiva niśāsu cchadmaghātinaḥ // 3.5.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac ca vijñāya sa jñānaliṅgī cāro nyavedayat / yaugandharāyaṇāyāśu svasahāyamukhais tadā // 3.5.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yaugandharāyaṇo 'py etad buddhvā pratipadaṃ pathi / dūṣitaṃ tṛṇatoyādi pratiyogair aśodhayat // 3.5.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apūrvastrīsamāyogaṃ kaṭake niṣiṣedha ca / avadhīd vadhakāṃs tāṃś ca labdhvā saha rumaṇvatā // 3.5.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad buddhvā dhvastamāyaḥ san sainyapūritadiṅmukham / vatseśvaraṃ brahmadatto mene durjayam eva tam // 3.5.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
saṃmantrya dattvā dūtaṃ ca śiroviracitāñjaliḥ / tataḥ sa nikaṭībhūtaṃ vatseśaṃ svayam abhyagāt // 3.5.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vatsarājo 'pi taṃ prāptaṃ pradattopāyanaṃ nṛpam / prītyā saṃmānayām āsa śūrā hi praṇatipriyāḥ // 3.5.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
itthaṃ tasmiñ jite prācīṃ śamayan namayan mṛdūn / unmūlayaṃś ca kaṭhinān nṛpān vāyur iva drumān // 3.5.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
prāpa ca prabalaḥ prācyaṃ caladvīcivighūrṇitam / vaṅgāvajayavitrāsavepamānam ivāmbudhim // 3.5.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya velātaṭānte ca jayastambhaṃ cakāra saḥ / pātālābhayayācñārthaṃ nāgarājam ivodgatam // 3.5.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avanamya kare datte kaliṅgair agragais tataḥ / āruroha mahendrādriṃ yaśas tasya yaśasvinaḥ // 3.5.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mahendrābhibhavād bhītair vindhyakūṭair ivāgataiḥ / gajair jitvāṭavīṃ rājñāṃ sa yayau dakṣiṇāṃ diśam // 3.5.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra cakre sa niḥsārapāṇḍurān apagarjitān / parvatāśrayiṇaḥ śatrūñ śaratkāla ivāmbudān // 3.5.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ullaṅghyamānā kāverī tena saṃmardakāriṇā / colakeśvarakīrtiś ca kāluṣyaṃ yayatuḥ samam // 3.5.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
na paraṃ muralānāṃ sa sehe mūrdhasu nonnatim / karair āhanyamāneṣu yāvat kāntākuceṣv api // 3.5.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yat tasya saptadhā bhinnaṃ papur godāvarīpayaḥ / mātaṅgās tanmadavyājāt saptadhaivāmucann iva // 3.5.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athottirya sa vatseśo revām ujjayinīm agāt / praviveśa ca tāṃ caṇḍamahāsenapuraskṛtaḥ // 3.5.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa mālyaślathadhammillaśobhād vaiguṇyaśālinām / mālavastrīkaṭākṣāṇāṃ yayau cātraiva lakṣyatām // 3.5.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasthau ca nirvṛtas tatra tathā śvaśurasatkṛtaḥ / visasmāra yathābhīṣṭān api bhogān svadeśajān // 3.5.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āsīd vāsavadattā ca pituḥ pārśvavivartinī / smarantī bālabhāvasya saukhye 'pi vimanā iva // 3.5.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājā caṇḍamahāsenas tayā tanayayā yathā / tathaiva padmāvatyāpi nandati sma sam āgataḥ // 3.5.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
viśramya ca niśāḥ kāścit prīto vatseśvaras tataḥ / anvitaḥ śvāśuraiḥ sainyaiḥ prayayau paścimāṃ diśam // 3.5.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya khaḍgalatā nūnaṃ pratāpānaladhūmikā / yaccakre lāṭanārīṇām udaśrukaluṣā dṛśaḥ // 3.5.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asau mathitum ambhodhiṃ mā mām unmūlayiṣyati / itīva tadgajādhūtavano 'vepata mandaraḥ // 3.5.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
satyaṃ sa ko'pi tejasvī bhāsvadādivilakṣaṇaḥ / pratīcyām udayaṃ prāpa prakṛṣṭam api yajjayī // 3.5.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ kuberatilakām alakāsaṅgaśaṃsinīm / kailāsahāsasubhagām āśām abhisasāra saḥ // 3.5.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
sindhurājaṃ vaśīkṛtya harisainyair anudrutaḥ / kṣapayām āsa ca mlecchān rāghavo rākṣasān iva // 3.5.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
turuṣkaturagavrātāḥ kṣubdhasyābdher ivormayaḥ / tadgajendraghaṭā velāvaneṣu dalaśo yayuḥ // 3.5.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gṛhītārikaraḥ śrīmān pāpasya puruṣottamaḥ / rāhor iva sa ciccheda pārasīkapateḥ śiraḥ // 3.5.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hūṇahānikṛtas tasya mukharīkṛtadiṅmukhā / kīrtir dvitīyā gaṅgeva vicacāra himācale // 3.5.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
nadantīṣv asya senāsu bhayastimitavidviṣaḥ / pratīpaḥ śuśruve nādaḥ śailarandhreṣu kevalam // 3.5.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apacchattreṇa śirasā kāmarūpeśvaro 'pi tam / naman vicchāyatāṃ bheje yat tadā na tad adbhutam // 3.5.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
taddattair anvito nāgaiḥ samrāḍ vivavṛte 'tha saḥ / adribhir jaṅgamaiḥ śailaiḥ karīkṛtyārpitair iva // 3.5.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ vijitya vatseśo vasudhāṃ saparicchadaḥ / padmāvatīpituḥ prāpa puraṃ magadhabhūbhṛtaḥ // 3.5.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
magadheśaś ca devībhyāṃ sahite 'sminn upasthite / sotsavo 'bhūn niśājyotsnāvati candra iva smaraḥ // 3.5.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avijñātasthitām ādau punaś ca vyaktim āgatām / mene vāsavadattāṃ ca so 'dhikapraśrayāspadam // 3.5.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato magadhabhūbhṛtā sanagareṇa tenārcitaḥ samagrajanamānasair anugato 'nurāgāgataiḥ / nigīrṇavasudhātalo balabhareṇa lāvāṇakaṃ jagāma viṣayaṃ nijaṃ sa kila vatsarājo jayī // 3.5.118	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
tataḥ sa senāviśrāntyai tatra lāvāṇake sthitaḥ / rahasy uvāca vatseśo rājā yaugandharāyaṇam // 3.6.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvadbuddhyā nirjitāḥ sarve pṛthivyāṃ bhūbhṛto mayā / upāyasvīkṛtās te ca naiva vyabhicaranti me // 3.6.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vārāṇasīpatis tv eṣa brahmadatto durāśayaḥ / jāne vyabhicaraty eko viśvāsaḥ kuṭileṣu kaḥ // 3.6.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti vatseśvareṇokta āha yaugandharāyaṇaḥ / na rājan brahmadattas te bhūyo vyabhicariṣyati // 3.6.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ākrāntopanatas tv eṣa bhṛśaṃ saṃmānitas tvayā / śubhācārasya kaḥ kuryād aśubhaṃ hi sacetanaḥ // 3.6.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kurvīta vā yas tasyaiva tadātmany aśubhaṃ bhavet / tathā ca śrūyatām atra kathāṃ te varṇayāmy aham // 3.6.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
babhūva padmaviṣaye purā ko'pi dvijottamaḥ / khyātimān agnidattākhyo bhūbhṛddattāgrahārabhuk // 3.6.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyaikaḥ somadattākhyaḥ putro jyāyān ajāyata / dvitīyaś cābhavad vaiśvānaradattākhyayā sutaḥ // 3.6.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ādyas tayor abhūn mūrkhaḥ svākṛtir durvinītakaḥ / aparaś cābhavad vidvān vinīto 'dhyayanapriyaḥ // 3.6.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tac chrutvā kupitaḥ so 'tha somadattaḥ pradhāvya tam / vipraṃ pādaprahāreṇa jaghānojjhitagauravaḥ // 3.6.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra vipraḥ sa kṛtvānyān sākṣiṇas tatkṣaṇaṃ dvijān / gatvā pādāhatikruddho rājānaṃ taṃ vyajijñapat // 3.6.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tato bhūyo balaṃ preṣyāvaṣṭabdhasyāsya bhūpatiḥ / krodhāndhaḥ somadattasya śūlāropaṇam ādiśat // 3.6.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tato maraṇanistīrṇaḥ somadatto gṛhaiḥ saha / gantuṃ rājāvamānena deśāntaram iyeṣa saḥ // 3.6.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tatra lebhe śubhāṃ bhūmiṃ saṃbhāvya phalasaṃpadam / tanmadhye ca mahābhogam aśvatthatarum aikṣata // 3.6.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ kalyāṇaghanacchāyāc channasūryāṃśuśītalam / prāvṛṭkālam ivālokya kṛṣyarthī toṣam āpa saḥ // 3.6.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

kāle tatra ca pakveṣu tasya sasyeṣv aśaṅkitam / sā bhūmiḥ pararāṣṭreṇa daivād etya vyaluṇṭhyata // 3.6.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

sasāmantaś ca vastrāṇi dattvā cābharaṇāni saḥ / grāmān rājā dadau tasmai na toṣo mahatāṃ mṛṣā // 3.6.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

kramād rājagṛhe cāsmin rāṣṭreṣv antaḥpureṣu ca / rājapriya iti prītiṃ bahumānām avāpa saḥ // 3.6.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
