yadā nābhūd ratānto 'sya gateṣv abdaśateṣv api / tadā tadupamardena cakampe bhuvanatrayam // 3.6.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato jagannāśabhayād ratavighnāya śūlinaḥ / vahniṃ smaranti sma surāḥ pitāmahanideśataḥ // 3.6.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
so 'py agniḥ smṛtamātraḥ sann adhṛṣyaṃ madanāntakam / matvā palāyya devebhyaḥ praviveśa jalāntaram // 3.6.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tattejodahyamānāś ca tatra bhekā divaukasām / vicinvatāṃ śaśaṃsus tam agnim antarjalasthitam // 3.6.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tān anabhivyaktavācaḥ śāpena tatkṣaṇam / bhekān kṛtvā tirobhūya bhūyo 'gnir mandaraṃ yayau // 3.6.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra taṃ koṭarāntasthaṃ devāḥ śambūkarūpiṇam / prāpur gajaśukākhyātaṃ sa caiṣāṃ darśanaṃ dadau // 3.6.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtvā jihvāviparyāsaṃ śāpena śukadantinām / pratipede ca devānāṃ sa kāryaṃ taiḥ kṛtastutiḥ // 3.6.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā ca svoṣmaṇā so 'gnir nivārya suratāc chivam / śāpabhītyā praṇamyāsmai devakāryaṃ nyavedayat // 3.6.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śarvo 'py ārūḍhavego 'gnau tasmin vīryaṃ svam ādadhe / tad dhi dhārayituṃ śakto na vahnir nāmbikāpi vā // 3.6.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na mayā tanayas tvattaḥ saṃprāpta iti vādinīm / khedakopākulāṃ devīm ity uvāca tato haraḥ // 3.6.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vighno 'tra tava jāto 'yaṃ vinā vighneśapūjanam / tad arcayainaṃ yenāśu vahnau no janitā sutaḥ // 3.6.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ity uktā śaṃbhunā devī cakre vighneśvarārcanam / analo 'pi sagarbho 'bhūt tena vīryeṇa dhūrjaṭeḥ // 3.6.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tat tejaḥ śāṃbhavaṃ bibhrat sa tadā divaseṣv api / antaḥpraviṣṭatigmāṃśur iva saptārcir ābabhau // 3.6.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
udvavāma ca gaṅgāyāṃ tat tejaḥ so 'tha durdharam / gaṅgainam atyajan merau vahnikuṇḍe harājñayā // 3.6.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra saṃrakṣyamāṇaḥ san sa garbhaḥ śāṃbhavair gaṇaiḥ / niḥsṛtyābdasahasreṇa kumāro 'bhūt ṣaḍānanaḥ // 3.6.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato gaurīniyuktānāṃ kṛttikānāṃ payodharān / ṣaṇṇāṃ ṣaḍbhir mukhaiḥ pītvā svalpaiḥ sa vavṛdhe dinaiḥ // 3.6.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atrāntare devarājas tārakāsuranirjitaḥ / śiśriye meruśṛṅgāṇi durgāṇy ujjhitasaṃgaraḥ // 3.6.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
devāś ca sākam ṛṣibhiḥ ṣaṇmukhaṃ śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ / ṣaṇmukho 'pi surān rakṣann āsīt taiḥ parivāritaḥ // 3.6.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad buddhvā hāritaṃ matvā rājyam indro 'tha cakṣubhe / yodhayām āsa gatvā ca kumāraṃ sa samatsaraḥ // 3.6.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadvajrābhihatasyāṅgāt ṣaṇmukhasyodbabhūvatuḥ / putrau śākhaviśākhākhyāv ubhāv atulatejasau // 3.6.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saputraṃ ca tam ākrāntaśatakratuparākramam / upetya tanayaṃ śarvaḥ svayaṃ yuddhād avārayat // 3.6.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jāto 'si tārakaṃ hantuṃ rājyaṃ cendrasya rakṣitum / tat kuruṣva nijaṃ kāryam iti cainaṃ śaśāsa saḥ // 3.6.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ praṇamya prītena tatkṣaṇaṃ vṛtravairiṇā / saināpatyābhiṣeko 'sya kumārasyopacakrame // 3.6.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
svayam utkṣiptakalaśastabdhabāhur abhūd yadā / tataḥ śakraḥ śucam agād athainam avadac chivaḥ // 3.6.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
na pūjito gajamukhaḥ senānyaṃ vāñchatā tvayā / tenaiṣa vighno jātas te tat kuruṣva tadarcanam // 3.6.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tac chrutvā tat tathā kṛtvā muktabāhuḥ śacīpatiḥ / abhiṣekotsavaṃ samyak senānye niravartayat // 3.6.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato jaghāna na cirāt senānīs tarakāsuram / nananduḥ siddhakāryāś ca devā gaurī ca putriṇī // 3.6.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad evaṃ devi devānām api santi na siddhayaḥ / herambe 'narcite tasmāt pūjayainaṃ varārthinī // 3.6.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktāhaṃ vayasyābhir udyānaikāntavartinam / āryaputra purā gatvā vighnarājam apūjayam // 3.6.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pūjāvasāne cāpaśyam akasmād gaganāṅgaṇe / utpatya viharantīs tāḥ svasakhīr nijasiddhitaḥ // 3.6.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad dṛṣṭvā kautukād vyomnaḥ samāhūyāvatārya ca / mayā siddhisvarūpaṃ tāḥ pṛṣṭāḥ sadyo 'bruvann idam // 3.6.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
imā nṛmāṃsāśanajā ḍākinīmantrasiddhayaḥ / kālarātrir iti khyātā brāhmaṇī gurur atra naḥ // 3.6.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ sakhībhir uktāhaṃ khecarīsiddhilolubhā / nṛmāṃsāśanabhītā ca kṣaṇam āsaṃ sasaṃśayā // 3.6.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha tatsiddhilubdhatvād avocaṃ tāḥ sakhīr aham / upadeśo mamāpy eṣa yuṣmābhir dāpyatām iti // 3.6.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato madabhyarthanayā gatvā tatkṣaṇam eva tāḥ / āninyuḥ kālarātriṃ tāṃ tatraiva vikaṭākṛtim // 3.6.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
miladbhruvaṃ kātarākṣīṃ nyañcaccipiṭanāsikām / sthūlagaṇḍīṃ karālauṣṭhīṃ danturāṃ dīrghakaṃdharām // 3.6.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
lambastanīm udariṇīṃ vidīrṇotphullapādukām / dhātrā vairūpyanirmāṇavaidagdhīṃ darśitām iva // 3.6.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā māṃ pādānatāṃ snātāṃ kṛtavighneśvarārcanām / vivastrāṃ maṇḍale bhīmāṃ bhairavārcām akārayat // 3.6.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhiṣicya ca sā mahyaṃ tāṃs tān mantrān nijān dadau / bhakṣaṇāya nṛmāṃsaṃ ca devārcanabalīkṛtam // 3.6.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āttamantragaṇā bhuktamahāmāṃsā ca tatkṣaṇam / nirambaraivotpatitā sasakhīkāham ambaram // 3.6.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
kṛtakrīḍāvatīryātha gaganād gurvanujñayā / gatābhūvam ahaṃ deva kanyakāntaḥpuraṃ nijam // 3.6.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ bālye 'pi jātāhaṃ ḍākinīcakravartinī / bhakṣitās tatra cāsmābhiḥ sametya bahavo narāḥ // 3.6.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asmin kathāntare caitāṃ mahārāja kathāṃ śṛṇu / viṣṇusvāmīty abhūt tasyāḥ kālarātryāḥ patir dvijaḥ // 3.6.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca tasminn upādhyāyo deśe nānādigāgatān / śiṣyān adhyāpayām āsa vedavidyāviśāradaḥ // 3.6.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śiṣyamadhye ca tasyaiko nāmnā sundarako yuvā / babhūva śiṣyaḥ śīlena virājitavapurguṇaḥ // 3.6.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tam upādhyāyapatnī sā kālarātrīḥ kadācana / vavre rahasi kāmārtā patyau kvāpi bahir gate // 3.6.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nūnaṃ virūpair adhikaṃ hāsanaiḥ krīḍati smaraḥ / yat sānavekṣya svaṃ rūpaṃ cakre sundarakaspṛhām // 3.6.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sa tu sarvātmanā naicchad arthyamāno 'pi viplavam / striyo yathā viceṣṭantāṃ niṣkampaṃ tu satāṃ manaḥ // 3.6.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sāpasṛte tasmin kālarātriḥ krudhā tadā / svam aṅgaṃ pāṭayām āsa svayaṃ dantanakhakṣataiḥ // 3.6.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vikīrṇavastrakeśāntā rudatī tāvad āsta ca / gṛhaṃ yāvad upādhyāyo viṣṇusvāmī viveśa saḥ // 3.6.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praviṣṭaṃ tam avādīc ca paśya sundarakeṇa me / avasthā vihitā svāmin balātkārābhilāṣiṇā // 3.6.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sa upādhyāyaḥ krudhā jajvāla tatkṣaṇam / pratyayaḥ strīṣu muṣṇāti vimarśaṃ viduṣām api // 3.6.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāyaṃ ca taṃ sundarakaṃ gṛhaprāptaṃ pradhāvya saḥ / saśiṣyo muṣṭibhiḥ pādair laguḍaiś cāpy atāḍayat // 3.6.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ ca prahāraniśceṣṭaṃ śiṣyān ādiśya taṃ bahiḥ / tyājayām āsa rathyāyāṃ nirapekṣatayā niśi // 3.6.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ śanaiḥ sundarakaḥ sa niśānilavījitaḥ / tathābhibhūtam ātmānaṃ paśyann evam acintayat // 3.6.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho strīpreraṇā nāma rajasā laṅghitātmanām / puṃsāṃ vātyeva sarasām āśayakṣobhakāriṇī // 3.6.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
yenāvicārya vṛddho 'pi vidvān api ca tat tathā / atikrodhād upādhyāyo viruddham akaron mayi // 3.6.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athavā daivasaṃsiddhāv ā sṛṣṭer viduṣām api / kāmakrodhau hi viprāṇāṃ mokṣadvārārgalāv ubhau // 3.6.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathā hi kiṃ na munayaḥ svadārabhraṃśaśaṅkinaḥ / devadāruvane pūrvam api śarvāya cakrudhuḥ // 3.6.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
na cainaṃ vividur devaṃ kṛtakṣapaṇakākṛtim / umāyai darśayiṣyantam ṛṣīṇām apy aśāntatām // 3.6.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dattaśāpāś ca te sadyas trijagatkṣobhakāraṇam / buddhvā taṃ devam īśānaṃ tam eva śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ // 3.6.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad evaṃ kāmakopādiripuṣaḍvargavañcitāḥ / munayo 'pi vimuhyanti śrotriyeṣu kathaiva kā // 3.6.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti sundarakas tatra dhyāyan dasyubhayān niśi / āruhya śūnyagovāṭaharmye tasthau samīpage // 3.6.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatraikadeśe yāvac ca kṣaṇaṃ tiṣṭhaty alakṣitaḥ / tāvat tatraiva harmye sā kālarātrir upāyayau // 3.6.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ākṛṣṭavīracchurikā muktaphūtkārabhīṣaṇā / nayanānanavāntolkā ḍākinīcakrasaṃgatā // 3.6.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāṃ dṛṣṭvā tādṛśīṃ tatra kālarātrim upāgatām / sasmāra mantrān rakṣoghnān bhītaḥ sundarako 'tha saḥ // 3.6.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tanmantramohitā cātha taṃ dadarśa na sā tadā / bhayasaṃpiṇḍitair aṅgair ekānte nibhṛtasthitam // 3.6.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athotpatanamantraṃ sā paṭhitvā sasakhījanā / kālarātriḥ sagovāṭaharmyaivodapatan nabhaḥ // 3.6.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ ca mantraṃ sa jagrāha śrutvā sundarakas tadā / saharmyā sāpi nabhasā kṣipram ujjayinīṃ yayau // 3.6.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatrāvatārya harmyaṃ sā mantrataḥ śākavāṭake / gatvā smaśāne cikrīḍa ḍākinīcakramadhyagā // 3.6.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatkṣaṇaṃ ca kṣudhākrāntaḥ śākavāṭe 'vatīrya saḥ / tatra sundarakaś cakre vṛttim utkhātamūlakaiḥ // 3.6.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtakṣutpratighāte 'smin prāgvad govāṭam āśrite / pratyāyayau kālarātrī rātrimadhye niketanāt // 3.6.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
tato 'dhirūḍhagovāṭā pūrvavan mantrasiddhitaḥ / ākāśena saśiṣyā sā niśi svagṛham āyayau // 3.6.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sthāpayitvā yathāsthānaṃ tac ca govāṭavāhanam / visṛjyānucarīs tāś ca śayyāveśma viveśa sā // 3.6.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi sundarako nītvā tāṃ niśāṃ vighnavismitaḥ / prabhāte tyaktagovāṭo nikaṭaṃ suhṛdāṃ yayau // 3.6.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrākhyātasvavṛttānto videśagamanonmukhaḥ / taiḥ samāśvāsito mittrais tanmadhye sthitim agrahīt // 3.6.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upādhyāyagṛhaṃ tyaktvā bhuñjānaḥ sattrasadmani / uvāsa tatra viharan svacchandaḥ sakhibhiḥ saha // 3.6.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ekadā nirgatā kretuṃ gṛhopakaraṇāni sā / dadarśa taṃ sundarakaṃ kālarātriḥ kilāpaṇe // 3.6.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
upetya ca jagādainaṃ punar eva smarāturā / bhaja sundarakādyāpi māṃ tvadāyattajīvitām // 3.6.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktas tayā so 'tha sādhuḥ sundarako 'bravīt / maivaṃ vadīr na dharmo 'yaṃ mātā me gurupatny asi // 3.6.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'bravīt kālarātrir dharmaṃ ced vetsi dehi tat / prāṇān me prāṇadānād dhi dharmaḥ ko 'bhyadhiko bhavet // 3.6.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha sundarako 'vādīn mātar maivaṃ kṛthā hṛdi / gurutalpābhigamanaṃ kutra dharmo bhaviṣyati // 3.6.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
evaṃ nirākṛtā tena tarjayantī ca taṃ ruṣā / pāṭayitvā svahastena svottarīyam agād gṛham // 3.6.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
paśya sundarakeṇedaṃ dhāvitvā pāṭitaṃ mama / ity uvāca patiṃ tatra darśayitvottarīyakam // 3.6.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca tasyāḥ patiḥ krodhād gatvā vadhyam udīrya ca / sattre sundarakasyāśu vārayām āsa bhojanam // 3.6.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sundarakaḥ khedāt taṃ deśaṃ tyaktum udyataḥ / jānann utpatane vyomni mantraṃ govāṭaśikṣitam // 3.6.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'varohe 'py aparaṃ śikṣitaṃ śrutavismṛtam / tad eva śūnyagovāṭaharmyaṃ niśi punar yayau // 3.6.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tasmin sthite prāgvat kālarātrir upetya sā / tathaivotpatya harmyasthā vyomnaivojjayinīṃ yayau // 3.6.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāvatārya mantreṇa govāṭaṃ śākavāṭake / jagāma rātricaryāyai punaḥ sā pitṛkānanam // 3.6.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ ca sundarako mantraṃ bhūyaḥ śrutvāpi nāgrahīt / vinā hi gurvādeśena saṃpūrṇāḥ siddhayaḥ kutaḥ // 3.6.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tato 'tra bhuktvā katicin mūlakāny aparāṇi ca / netuṃ prakṣipya govāṭe tatra tasthau sa pūrvavat // 3.6.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
athaityārūḍhagovāṭā sā gatvā nabhasā niśi / viveśa kālarātriḥ svaṃ sadma sthāpitavāhanā // 3.6.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi sundarakaḥ prātar govāṭān nirgatas tataḥ / yayau bhojanamūlyārthī vipaṇīm āttamūlakaḥ // 3.6.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

idaṃ gurugirīndrajāpraṇayamandarāndolanāt purā kila kathāmṛtaṃ haramukhāmbudher udgatam / prasahya sarayanti ye vigatavighnalabdharddhayo dhuraṃ dadhati vaibudhīṃ bhuvi bhavaprasādena te // 4.0.1	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]

śṛṇu saṃkṣiptam etat te vatseśvara vadāmy aham / babhūva pāṇḍur iti te rājā pūrvapitāmahaḥ // 4.1.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
taveva tasya dve eva bhavye bhārye babhūvatuḥ / ekā kuntī dvitīyā ca mādrī nāma mahaujasaḥ // 4.1.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa pāṇḍuḥ pṛthivīm etāṃ jitvā jaladhimekhalām / sukhī kadācit prayayau mṛgayāvyasanī vanam // 4.1.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tatra kindamanāmānaṃ sa muniṃ muktasāyakaḥ / jaghāna mṛgarūpeṇa sabhāryaṃ suratasthitam // 4.1.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa munir mṛgarūpaṃ tat tyaktvā kaṇṭhavivartibhiḥ / prāṇaiḥ śaśāpa taṃ pāṇḍuṃ viṣaṇṇaṃ muktakārmukam // 4.1.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svairastho nirvimarśena hato 'haṃ yat tvayā tataḥ / bhāryāsaṃbhogakāle te madvan mṛtyur bhaviṣyati // 4.1.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity āptaśāpas tadbhītyā tyaktabhogaspṛho 'tha saḥ / patnībhyām anvitaḥ pāṇḍus tasthau śānte tapovane // 4.1.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrastho 'pi sa śāpena preritas tena caikadā / akasmāc cakame mādrīṃ priyāṃ prāpa ca pañcatām // 4.1.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad evaṃ mṛgayā nāma pramādo nṛpa bhūbhṛtām / kṣapitā hy anayānye 'pi nṛpās te te mṛgā iva // 4.1.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ghoranādāmiṣaikāgrā rūkṣā dhūmrordhvamūrdhajā / kuntadantā kathaṃ kuryād rākṣasīva hi sā śivam // 4.1.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmād viphalam āyāsaṃ jahīhi mṛgayārasam / vanyavāhanahantṝṇāṃ samānaḥ prāṇasaṃśayaḥ // 4.1.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvaṃ ca tvatpūrvajaprītyā priyaḥ kalyāṇapātra me / putraś ca tava kāmāṃśo yathā bhāvī tathā śṛṇu // 4.1.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
purānaṅgāṅgasaṃbhūtyai ratyā stutibhir arcitaḥ / tuṣṭo rahasi saṃkṣepam idaṃ tasyāḥ śivo 'bhyadhāt // 4.1.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avatīrya nijāṃśena bhūmāv ārādhya māṃ svayam / gaurī putrārthinī kāmaṃ janayiṣyaty asāv iti // 4.1.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ataś caṇḍamahāsenasutā devī narendra sā / jātā vāsavadatteyaṃ saṃpannā mahiṣī ca te // 4.1.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad eṣā śaṃbhum ārādhya kāmāṃśaṃ soṣyate sutam / sarvavidyādharāṇāṃ yaś cakravartī bhaviṣyati // 4.1.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktenādṛtavacā rājñā pṛthvīṃ tadarpitām / pratyarpya tasmai sa yayau nāradarṣir adarśanam // 4.1.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tasmin gate vatsarājaḥ sa tad vāsavadattayā / jātaputrecchayā sākaṃ ninye taccintayā dinam // 4.1.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyedyus taṃ sa vatseśam upetyāsthānavartinam / nityoditākhyaḥ pravaraḥ pratīhāro vyajijñapat // 4.1.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
śiśukadvayasaṃyuktā brāhmaṇī kāpi durgatā / dvāri sthitā mahārāja devadarśanakāṅkṣiṇī // 4.1.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvaivābhyanujñāte tatpraveśe mahībhṛtā / brāhmaṇī sā viveśātra kṛśapāṇḍuradhūsarā // 4.1.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
māneneva viśīrṇena vāsasā vidhurīkṛtā / duḥkhadainyanibhāv aṅke vibhratī bālakāv ubhau // 4.1.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtocitapraṇāmā ca sā rājānaṃ vyajijñapat / brāhmaṇī kulajā cāham īdṛśīṃ durgatiṃ gatā // 4.1.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
daivād yugapad etau ca jātau dvau tanayau mama / tad deva nāsti me stanyam etayor bhojanaṃ vinā // 4.1.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
teneha kṛpaṇā nātha śaraṇāgatavatsalam / prāptāsmi devaṃ śaraṇaṃ pramāṇam adhunā prabhuḥ // 4.1.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tac chrutvā sadayo rājā sa pratīhāram ādiśat / iyaṃ vāsavadattāyai devyai nītvārpyatām iti // 4.1.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataś ca karmaṇā svena śubhenevāgrayāyinā / nītābhūn nikaṭaṃ devyāḥ pratīhāreṇa tena sā // 4.1.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājñā visṛṣṭāṃ buddhvā tāṃ pratīhārād upāgatām / devī vāsavadattā sā brāhmaṇīṃ śraddadhetarām // 4.1.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
yugmāpatyāṃ ca paśyantī dīnām etāṃ vyacintayat / aho vāmaikavṛttitvaṃ kimapy etat prajāpateḥ // 4.1.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho vastuni mātsaryam aho bhaktir avastuni / nādyāpy eko 'pi me jāto jātau tv asyāṃ yamāv imau // 4.1.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ saṃcintayantī ca sā devī snānakāṅkṣiṇī / brāhmaṇyāś ceṭikās tasyāḥ snapanādau samādiśat // 4.1.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
snapitā dattavastrā ca tābhiḥ svādu ca bhojitā / brāhmaṇī sāmbusikteva taptā bhūḥ samudaśvasat // 4.1.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
samāśvastā ca sā yuktyā kathālāpaiḥ parīkṣitum / kṣaṇāntare nijagade devyā vāsavadattayā // 4.1.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
bho brāhmaṇi kathā kācit tvayā naḥ kathyatām iti / tac chrutvā sā tathety uktvā kathāṃ vaktuṃ pracakrame // 4.1.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
purābhūj jayadattākhyaḥ sāmānyaḥ ko'pi bhūpatiḥ / devadattābhidhānaś ca putras tasyodapadyata // 4.1.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yauvanasthasya tasyātha vivāhaṃ tanayasya saḥ / vidhātum icchan nṛpatir matimān ity acintayat // 4.1.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
veśyeva balavadbhogyā rājaśrīr aticañcalā / vaṇijāṃ tu kulastrīva sthirā lakṣmīr ananyagā // 4.1.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmād vivāhaṃ putrasya karomi vaṇijāṃ gṛhāt / rājye 'sya bahudāyāde yena nāpad bhaviṣyati // 4.1.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti niścitya putrasya kṛte vavre sa bhūpatiḥ / vaṇijo vasudattasya kanyāṃ pāṭaliputrakāt // 4.1.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vasudatto 'pi sa dadau ślāghyasaṃbandhavāñchayā / dūradeśāntare 'py asmai rājaputrāya tāṃ sutām // 4.1.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
pūrayām āsa ca tathā ratnair jāmātaraṃ sa tam / agalad bahumāno 'sya yathā svapitṛvaibhave // 4.1.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
avāptāḍhyavaṇikputrīsahitenātha tena saḥ / tanayena samaṃ tasthau jayadattanṛpaḥ sukham // 4.1.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā tatra cāgatya sotkaḥ saṃbandhisadmani / sa vaṇig vasudattas tāṃ nināya svagṛhaṃ sutām // 4.1.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'kasmāt sa nṛpatir jayadatto divaṃ yayau / udbhūya gotrajais tasya tac ca rājyam adhiṣṭhitam // 4.1.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadbhītyā tasya tanayo jananyā nijayā niśi / devadattas tu nīto 'bhūd anyadeśam alakṣitaḥ // 4.1.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāha rājaputraṃ taṃ māta duḥkhitamānasā / devo 'sti cakravartī naḥ prabhuḥ pūrvadigīśvaraḥ // 4.1.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatpārśvaṃ vraja rājyaṃ te sādhayiṣyati vatsa saḥ / ity uktaḥ sa tadā mātrā rājaputro jagāda tām // 4.1.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra māṃ niṣparikaraṃ gataṃ ko bahu maṃsyate / tac chrutvā punar apy evaṃ sā mātā tam abhāṣata // 4.1.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
śvaśurasya gṛhaṃ gatvā tvaṃ hi prāpya tato dhanam / kṛtvā parikaraṃ gaccha nikaṭaṃ cakravartinaḥ // 4.1.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti sa prerito mātrā salajjo 'pi nṛpātmajaḥ / kramāt pratasthe sāyaṃ ca prāpa tacchvāśuraṃ gṛham // 4.1.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
pitṛhīno vinaṣṭaśrīr bāṣpapātābhiśaṅkayā / akāle nāśakac cātra praveṣṭuṃ lajjayā niśi // 4.1.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nikaṭe sattrabāhye 'tha sthitaḥ śvaśuramandirāt / naktaṃ rajjvāvarohantīm akasmāt striyam aikṣata // 4.1.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣaṇāc ca bhāryāṃ svām eva tāṃ ratnadyutibhāsvarām / ulkām ivābhrapatitāṃ parijñāyābhyatapyata // 4.1.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
sā tu taṃ dhūsarakṣāmaṃ dṛṣṭvāpy aparijānatī / ko 'sīty apṛcchat tac chrutvā pāntho 'ham iti so 'bravīt // 4.1.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tataḥ sā sattraśālāntaḥ praviveśa vaṇiksutā / anvagād rājaputro 'pi sa tāṃ guptam avekṣitum // 4.1.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā cātra puruṣaṃ kaṃcid upāgāt puruṣo 'pi tām / tvaṃ cireṇāgatāsīti pādaghātair atāḍayat // 4.1.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sā dviguṇībhūtarāgā pāpā prasādya tam / puruṣaṃ tena sahitā tatra tasthau yadṛcchayā // 4.1.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tad dṛṣṭvā tu sa suprajño rājaputro vyacintayat / kopasyāyaṃ na kālo me sādhyam anyad dhi vartate // 4.1.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kathaṃ ca prasaratv etac chastraṃ kṛpaṇayor dvayoḥ / śatruyogyaṃ striyām asyām asmin vā nṛpaśau mama // 4.1.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kim etayā kuvadhvā vā kṛtyam etad dhi durvidheḥ / maddhairyālokanakrīḍānaipuṇye duḥkhavarṣiṇaḥ // 4.1.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atulyakulasaṃbandhaḥ saiṣā kiṃ vāparādhyati / muktvā balibhujaṃ kākī kokile ramate katham // 4.1.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ālocya sa tāṃ bhāryām upaikṣata sakāmukām / satāṃ gurujigīṣe hi cetasi strītṛṇaṃ kiyat // 4.1.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkālaṃ ca ratāvegavaśāt tasyāḥ kilāpatat / vaṇiksutāyāḥ śravaṇāt san muktāḍhyaṃ vibhūṣaṇam // 4.1.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tac ca sā na dadarśaiva suratānte ca satvarā / yayau yathāgataṃ geham āpṛcchyopapatiṃ tataḥ // 4.1.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasminn api gate kvāpi drutaṃ pracchannakāmuke / sa rājaputro dṛṣṭvā tadratnābharaṇam agrahīt // 4.1.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sphuradratnaśikhājālaṃ dhātrā mohatamo 'paham / hastadīpam iva prattaṃ praṇaṣṭaśrīgaveṣaṇe // 4.1.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mahārghaṃ ca tad ālokya rājaputraḥ sa tatkṣaṇam / nirgatya siddhakāryaḥ san kānyakubjaṃ tato yayau // 4.1.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra bandhāya dattvā tat svarṇalakṣeṇa bhūṣaṇam / krītvā hastyaśvam agamat sa pārśvaṃ cakravartinaḥ // 4.1.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
taddattaiś ca balaiḥ sākam etya hatvā ripūn raṇe / prāpa tat paitṛkaṃ rājyaṃ kṛtī mātrābhinanditaḥ // 4.1.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac ca bandhād vinirmocya bhūṣaṇaṃ śvaśurāntikam / prāhiṇot prakaṭīkartuṃ rahasyaṃ tad aśaṅkitam // 4.1.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi tacchvaśuro dṛṣṭvā svasutākarṇabhūṣaṇam / tat tathopāgataṃ tasyai saṃbhrāntaḥ samadarśayat // 4.1.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpi pūrvaparibhraṣṭaṃ cāritram iva vīkṣya tat / buddhvā ca bhartrā prahitaṃ vyākulaiva samasmarat // 4.1.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
idaṃ me patitaṃ tasyāṃ rātrau sattragṛhāntare / yasyāṃ tatra sthito dṛṣṭaḥ sa ko'pi pathiko mayā // 4.1.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tan nūnaṃ so 'tra bhartā me śīlajijñāsayāyayau / mayā tu sa na vijñātas tenedaṃ prāpi bhūṣaṇam // 4.1.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity evaṃ cintayantyāś ca durnayavyaktiviklavam / vaṇiksutāyā hṛdayaṃ tasyāḥ kātaram asphuṭat // 4.1.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tatas tasyā rahasyajñāṃ pṛṣṭvā ceṭīṃ svayuktitaḥ / tatpitā sa vaṇig buddhvā tattvaṃ tatyāja tacchucam // 4.1.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājaputro 'tha saṃprāptarājyo labdhvā guṇārjitām / sa cakravartitanayāṃ bhāryāṃ bheje 'parāṃ śriyam // 4.1.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tad itthaṃ sāhase strīṇāṃ hṛdayaṃ vajrakarkaśam / tad eva sādhvasāvegasaṃpāte puṣpapelavam // 4.1.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tās tu kāścana sadvaṃśajātā muktā ivāṅganāḥ / yāḥ suvṛttācchahṛdayā yānti bhūṣaṇatāṃ bhuvi // 4.1.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
hariṇīva ca rājaśrīr evaṃ viplavinī sadā / dhairyapāśena banddhuṃ ca tām eke jānate budhāḥ // 4.1.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmād āpady api tyājyaṃ na sattvaṃ saṃpadeṣibhiḥ / ayam evātra vṛttānto mamātra ca nidarśanam // 4.1.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yan mayā vidhure 'py asmiṃś cāritraṃ devi rakṣitam / yuṣmaddarśanakalyāṇaprāptyā tat phalitaṃ hi me // 4.1.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti tasyā mukhāc chrutvā brāhmaṇyās tatkṣaṇaṃ kathām / devī vāsavadattā sā sādarā samacintayat // 4.1.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
brāhmaṇī kulavaty eṣā dhruvam asyā hy udāratām / bhaṅgiḥ svaśīlopakṣepe vacaḥprauḍhiś ca śaṃsati // 4.1.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
rājasaṃsatpraveśe 'syāḥ prāvīṇyam ata eva ca / iti saṃcintya devī tāṃ brāhmaṇīṃ punar abravīt: // 4.1.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhāryā tvaṃ kasya ko vā te vṛttāntaḥ kathyatāṃ tvayā / tac chrutvā brāhmaṇī bhūyaḥ sātha vaktuṃ pracakrame // 4.1.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mālave devi ko 'py āsīd agnidatta iti dvijaḥ / nilayaḥ śrīsarasvatyoḥ svayam āttadhano 'rthibhiḥ // 4.1.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya ca svānurūpau dvāv utpannau tanayau kramāt / jyeṣṭhaḥ śaṃkaradattākhyo nāmnā śāntikaro 'paraḥ // 4.1.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tayoḥ śāntikaro 'kasmād vidyārthī svapitur gṛhāt / sa bāla eva nirgatya gataḥ kvāpi yaśasvini // 4.1.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dvitīyaś ca sa tadbhrātā jyeṣṭho māṃ pariṇītavān / tanayāṃ yajñadattasya yajñārthabhṛtasaṃpadaḥ // 4.1.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kālena tasya madbhartuḥ so 'gnidattābhidhaḥ pitā / vṛddho lokāntaraṃ yāto bhāryayānugataḥ svayā // 4.1.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tīrthoddeśāc ca madbhartā dhṛtagarbhāṃ vimucya mām / gatvā sarasvatīpūre śokenāndho jahau tanum // 4.1.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vṛttānte kathite cāsminn etya tatsahayāyibhiḥ / svajanebhyo mayā labdhaṃ nānugantuṃ sagarbhayā // 4.1.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tatkṣaṇaṃ tisṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ brāhmaṇībhir ahaṃ tataḥ / śīlabhraṃśabhayād āttasvalpavastrā palāyitā // 4.1.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

śrutvā cānāthaśaraṇaṃ lokād vatseśvaraṃ tataḥ / sabrāhmaṇīkā śīlaikapātheyāham ihāgatā // 4.1.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
āgatyaiva prasūtāsmi yugapat tanayāv ubhau / sthitāsu cāsu tisṛṣu brāhmaṇīṣu sakhīṣv api // 4.1.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
śoko videśo dāridryaṃ dviguṇaḥ prasavo 'py ayam / aho apāvṛtaṃ dvāram āpadāṃ mama vedhasā // 4.1.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad etayor gatir nāsti bālayor vardhanāya me / ity ālocya parityajya lajjāṃ yoṣidvibhūṣaṇam // 4.1.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mayā praviśya vatseśo rājā sadasi yācitaḥ / kaḥ śaktaḥ soḍhum āpannabālāpatyārtidarśanam // 4.1.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadādeśena ca prāptaṃ mayā tvaccaraṇāntikam / vipadaś ca nivṛttā me dvārāt pratihatā iva // 4.1.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity eṣa mama vṛttānto nāmnā piṅgalikāpy aham / ābālyāgnikriyādhūmair yan me piṅgalite dṛśau // 4.1.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

evam uktasvavṛttāntāṃ kulīnety avadhārya tām / prītyenāṃ brāhmaṇīṃ devī sā vitarkyaivam abravīt // 4.1.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iha śāntikaro nāma sthito 'smākaṃ purohitaḥ / vaideśikaḥ sa jāne 'haṃ devaras te bhaviṣyati // 4.1.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā brāhmaṇīm utkāṃ nītvā rātriṃ tadaiva tām / devī śāntikaraṃ prātar ānāyyāpṛcchad anvayam // 4.1.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

ity uktā vatsarājena tatkālaṃ cāgatena sā / devī labdhāśayenāśu cakāra vrataniścayam // 4.1.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

uttiṣṭhataṃ sa yuvayoḥ kāmāṃśo janitā sutaḥ / nātho vidyādharāṇāṃ yo bhavitā matprasādataḥ // 4.1.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti vacanam udīrya candramaulau sapadi tirohitatāṃ gate prabudhya / adhigatavaram āśu daṃpatī tau pramadam akṛtrimam āpatuḥ kṛtārthau // 4.1.145	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
utthāya coṣasi tataḥ prakṛtīr vidhāya tatsvapnakīrtanasudhārasatarpitās tāḥ / devī ca sā narapatiś ca sabandhubhṛtyau baddhotsavau vidadhatur vratapāraṇāni // 4.1.146	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
katipayadivasāpagame tasyāḥ svapne jaṭādharaḥ puruṣaḥ / ko 'py atha devyā vāsavadattāyāḥ phalam upetya dadau // 4.1.147	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
tataḥ sa viniveditasphuṭatathāvidhasvapnayā saha pramuditas tayā samabhinandito mantribhiḥ / vicintya śaśimaulinā phalanibhena dattaṃ sutaṃ manoratham adūragaṃ gaṇayati sma vatseśvaraḥ // 4.1.148	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
atha vāsavadattāyā vatseśahṛdayotsavaḥ / saṃbabhūvācirād garbhaḥ kāmāṃśāvatarojjvalaḥ // 4.2.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā babhau lolanetreṇa mukhenāpāṇḍukāntinā / śaśāṅkeneva garbhasthakāmapremopagāminā // 4.2.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

ity uktavantaṃ tatkālaṃ mittrāvasur uvāca tam / janmāntarakathāṃ tāvac chaṃsaitāṃ kautukaṃ hi me // 4.2.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
etan mittrāvasoḥ śrutvā tasmai jīmūtavāhanaḥ / sukṛtī kathayām āsa pūrvajanmakathām imām // 4.2.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asti pūrvam ahaṃ vyomacārī vidyādharo 'bhavam / himavacchṛṅgamārgeṇa gato 'bhūvaṃ kadācana // 4.2.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataś cādhaḥ sthitas tatra krīḍan gauryā samaṃ haraḥ / śaśāpollaṅghanakruddho martyayonau pateti mām // 4.2.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāpya vidyādharīṃ bhāryāṃ niyojya svapade sutam / punar vaidyādharīṃ yoniṃ smṛtajātiḥ prapatsyase // 4.2.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ niśamya śāpāntam uktvā śarve tirohite / acireṇaiva jāto 'haṃ bhūtale vaṇijāṃ kule // 4.2.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nagaryāṃ valabhīnāmnyāṃ mahādhanavaṇiksutaḥ / vasudattābhidhānaḥ san vṛddhiṃ ca gatavān aham // 4.2.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kālena yauvanasthaś ca pitrā kṛtaparicchadaḥ / dvīpāntaraṃ gato 'bhūvaṃ vaṇijyāyai tadājñayā // 4.2.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āgacchantaṃ tato 'ṭavyāṃ taskarā vinipatya mām / hṛtasvam anayan baddhvā svapallīṃ caṇḍikāgṛham // 4.2.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
viloladīrghayā ghoraṃ raktāṃśukapatākayā / jighatsataḥ paśuprāṇān kṛtāntasyeva jihvayā // 4.2.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāham upahārārtham upanīto nijasya taiḥ / prabhoḥ pulindakākhyasya devīṃ pūjayato 'ntikam // 4.2.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa dṛṣṭvaivārdrahṛdayaḥ śabaro 'py abhavan mayi / vakti janmāntaraprītiṃ manaḥ snihyad akāraṇam // 4.2.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato māṃ mocayitvaiva vadhāt sa śabarādhipaḥ / aicchad ātmopahāreṇa kartuṃ pūjāsamāpanam // 4.2.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
maivaṃ kṛthāḥ prasannāsmi tava yācasva māṃ varam / ity ukto divyayā vācā prahṛṣṭaś ca jagāda saḥ // 4.2.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvaṃ prasannā varaḥ ko 'nyas tathāpy etāvad arthaye / janmāntare 'pi me sakhyam anena vaṇijāstv iti // 4.2.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam astv iti śāntāyāṃ vāci māṃ śabaro 'tha saḥ / pradattasaviśeṣārthaṃ prajighāya nijaṃ gṛham // 4.2.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mṛtyor mukhāt pravāsāc ca tataḥ pratyāgate mayi / akaroj jñātavṛttāntaḥ pitā mama mahotsavam // 4.2.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kālena tatra cāpaśyam ahaṃ sārthāvaluṇṭhanāt / vaṣṭabhyānāyitaṃ rājñā tam eva śabarādhipam // 4.2.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkṣaṇaṃ pitur āvedya vijñapya ca mahīpatim / mocitaḥ svarṇalakṣeṇa sa mayā vadhanigrahāt // 4.2.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāṇadānopakārasya kṛtvaivaṃ pratyupakriyām / ānīya ca gṛhaṃ prītyā pūrṇaṃ saṃmānitaś ciram // 4.2.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
satkṛtya preṣitaś cātha hṛdayaṃ premapeśalam / nidhāya mayi pallīṃ svāṃ prāyāt sa śabarādhipaḥ // 4.2.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra pratyupakārārthaṃ cintayan prābhṛtaṃ mama / svalpaṃ sa mene svādhīnaṃ muktākastūrikādy api // 4.2.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tataḥ sātiśayaṃ prāptuṃ muktāsāraṃ sa matkṛte / dhanurdvitīyaḥ prayayau gajān hantuṃ himācalam // 4.2.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
bhramaṃś ca tatra tīrasthadevāgāraṃ mahat saraḥ / prāpa tulyaiḥ kṛtaprītis tadabjair mittrarāgibhiḥ // 4.2.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāśaṅkyāmbupānārtham āgamaṃ vanyahastinām / channaḥ sa tasthāv ekānte sacāpas tajjighāṃsayā // 4.2.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tāvat tatra sarastīragataṃ pūjayituṃ haram / āgatām adbhutākārāṃ kumārīṃ siṃhavāhanām // 4.2.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa dadarśa tuṣārādrirājaputrīm ivāparām / paricaryāparāṃ śaṃbhoḥ kanyakābhāvavartinīm // 4.2.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvā ca vismayākrāntaḥ śabaraḥ sa vyacintayat / keyaṃ syād yadi martyastrī tat kathaṃ siṃhavāhanā // 4.2.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha divyā kathaṃ dṛśyā mādṛśais tad iyaṃ dhruvam / cakṣuṣoḥ pūrvapuṇyānāṃ mūrtā pariṇatir mama // 4.2.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anayā yadi mittraṃ taṃ yojayeyam ahaṃ tataḥ / kāpy anyaiva mayā tasya kṛtā syāt pratyupakriyā // 4.2.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad etām upasarpāmi tāvaj jijñāsituṃ varam / ity ālocya sa mittraṃ me śabaras tām upāyayau // 4.2.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca sāvatīryaiva siṃhāc chāyāniṣādinaḥ / kanyāgatya saraḥ padmāny avacetuṃ pracakrame // 4.2.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ ca dṛṣṭvāntikaprāptaṃ śabaraṃ sā kṛtānatim / apūrvam atithiprītyā svāgatenānvarañjayat // 4.2.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kas tvaṃ kiṃ cāgato 'sy etāṃ bhūmim atyantadurgamām / iti pṛṣṭavatīṃ tāṃ ca śabaraḥ pratyuvāca saḥ // 4.2.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ bhavānīpādaikaśaraṇaḥ śabarādhipaḥ / āgato 'smi ca mātaṅgamuktāhetor idaṃ vanam // 4.2.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvāṃ ca dṛṣṭvādhunātmīyo devi prāṇapradaḥ suhṛt / sārthavāhasutaḥ śrīmān vasudatto mayā smṛtaḥ // 4.2.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa hi tvam iva rūpeṇa yauvanena ca sundari / advitīyo 'sya viśvasya nayanāmṛtanirjharaḥ // 4.2.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā dhanyā kanyakā loke yasyās teneha gṛhyate / maittrīdānadayādhairyanidhinā kaṅkaṇī karaḥ // 4.2.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tat tvadākṛtir eṣā cet tādṛśena na yujyate / vyarthaṃ vahati tat kāmaḥ kodaṇḍam iti me vyathā // 4.2.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti vyādhendravacanaiḥ sadyo 'pahṛtamānasā / sābhūt kumārī kaṃdarpamohamantrākṣarair iva // 4.2.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
uvāca taṃ ca śabaraṃ preryamāṇā manobhuvā / kva sa te suhṛd ānīya tāvan me darśyatām iti // 4.2.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā ca tathety uktā tām āmantrya tadaiva saḥ / kṛtārthamānī muditaḥ pratasthe śabaras tataḥ // 4.2.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
prāpya svapallīm ādāya muktāmṛgamadādikam / bhūri bhāraśatair hāryam asmadgṛham athāyayau // 4.2.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sarvaiḥ puraskṛtas tatra praviśya prābhṛtaṃ ca tat / matpitre sa bahusvarṇalakṣamūlyaṃ nyavedayat // 4.2.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
utsavena ca yāte 'smin dine rātrau sa me rahaḥ / kanyādarśanavṛttāntaṃ tam āmūlād avarṇayat // 4.2.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ehi tatraiva gacchāva ity uktvā ca samutsukam / mām ādāya niśi svairaṃ sa prāyāc chabarādhipaḥ // 4.2.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātaś ca māṃ gataṃ kvāpi buddhvā saśabarādhipam / tatprītipratyayāt tasthau dhṛtim ālambya matpitā // 4.2.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ ca prāpito 'bhūvaṃ kramāt tena tarasvinā / śabareṇa tuṣārādriṃ kṛtādhvaparikarmaṇā // 4.2.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac ca prāpya saraḥ sāyaṃ snātvā svāduphalāśanau / ahaṃ ca sa ca tām ekāṃ vane tatroṣitau niśām // 4.2.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
latābhiḥ kīrṇakusumaṃ bhṛṅgīsaṃgītasundaram / śubhagandhavahaṃ hāri jvalitauṣadhidīpikam // 4.2.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
rates tad vāsaveśmeva viśrāntyai girikānanam / āvayor abhavan naktaṃ pibatos tatsarojalam // 4.2.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'nyedyuḥ pratipadaṃ tattadutkalikābhṛtā / pratyudgateva manasā mama tanmārgadhāvinā // 4.2.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
cakṣuṣā dakṣiṇenāpi sūcitāgamanāmunā / didṛkṣayeva sphuratā sā kanyātrāgatābhavat // 4.2.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
saṭālasiṃhapṛṣṭhasthā subhrūr dṛṣṭā mayā ca sā / śaradambhodharotsaṅgasaṅginīvendavī kalā // 4.2.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vilasadvismayautsukyasādhvasaṃ paśyataś ca tām / mamāvartata tatkālaṃ na jāne hṛdayaṃ katham // 4.2.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athāvatīrya siṃhāt sā puṣpāṇy uccitya kanyakā / snātvā sarasi tattīragataṃ haram apūjayat // 4.2.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pūjāvasāne copetya sa sakhā śabaro mama / praṇamyātmānam āvedya tām avocat kṛtādarām // 4.2.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ānītaḥ sa mayā devi suhṛd yogyo varas tava / manyase yadi tat tubhyaṃ darśayāmy adhunaiva tam // 4.2.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā darśayety ukte tayā sa śabaras tataḥ / āgatya nikaṭaṃ nītvā māṃ tasyāḥ samadarśayat // 4.2.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpi māṃ tiryag ālokya cakṣuṣā praṇayasrutā / madanāveśavaśagā śabareśaṃ tam abhyadhāt // 4.2.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
sakhā te mānuṣo nāyaṃ kāmaṃ ko 'py ayam āgataḥ / madvañcanāya devo 'dya martyasyaiṣākṛtiḥ kutaḥ // 4.2.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad ākarṇyoktavān asmi tāṃ pratyāyayituṃ svayam / satyaṃ sundari martyo 'haṃ kiṃ vyājenārjave jane // 4.2.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ hi sārthavāhasya valabhīvāsinaḥ sutaḥ / mahādhanābhidhānasya maheśvaravarārjitaḥ // 4.2.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tapasyan sa hi putrārtham uddiśya śaśiśekharam / samādiśyata tenaivaṃ svapne devena tuṣyatā // 4.2.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttiṣṭhotpatsyate ko'pi mahātmā tanayas tava / rahasyaṃ paramaṃ caitad alam uktvātra vistaram // 4.2.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvā prabuddhasya tasya kālena cātmajaḥ / aham eṣa samutpanno vasudatta iti śrutaḥ // 4.2.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayaṃ ca śabarādhīśaḥ svayaṃvarasuhṛn mayā / deśāntaragatena prākprāptaḥ kṛcchraikabāndhavaḥ // 4.2.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
eṣa me tattvasaṃkṣepa ity uktvā virate mayi / ābhāṣatātha kanyā sa lajjayāvanatānanā // 4.2.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asty etan māṃ ca jāne 'dya svapne 'rcitavatīṃ haraḥ / prātaḥ prāpsyasi bhartāram iti tuṣṭaḥ kilādiśat // 4.2.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmāt tvam eva me bhartā bhrātāyaṃ ca bhavatsuhṛt / iti vāksudhayā sā mām ānandya viratābhavat // 4.2.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃmantryātha tayā sākaṃ vivāhāya yathāvidhi / akārṣaṃ niścayaṃ gantuṃ samittro 'haṃ nijaṃ gṛham // 4.2.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sā siṃham āhūya vāhanaṃ taṃ svasaṃjñayā / atrārohāryaputreti mām abhāṣata sundarī // 4.2.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athāhaṃ tena suhṛdānuyātaḥ śabareṇa tam / siṃham āruhya dayitām utsaṅge tāṃ gṛhītavān // 4.2.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tataḥ prasthitavān asmi kṛtakṛtyo nijaṃ gṛham / kāntayā saha siṃhastho mitre tasmin puraḥsare // 4.2.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadīyaśaranirbhinnahariṇāmiṣavṛttayaḥ / krameṇa te vayaṃ sarve saṃprāptā valabhīṃ purīm // 4.2.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra mām āgataṃ dṛṣṭvā siṃhārūḍhaṃ savallabham / sāścaryas tad drutaṃ gatvā mama pitre 'bravīj janaḥ // 4.2.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi pratyudgato harṣād avatīrṇaṃ mṛgendrataḥ / pādāvanamraṃ dṛṣṭvā mām abhyanandat savismayaḥ // 4.2.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ananyasadṛśīṃ tāṃ ca kṛtapādābhivandanām / paśyan mamocitāṃ bhāryāṃ na māti sma mudā kvacit // 4.2.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praveśya mandiraṃ cāsmān vṛttāntaṃ paripṛcchya ca / praśaṃsañ śabarādhīśasauhārdaṃ cotsavaṃ vyadhāt // 4.2.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato mauhūrtikādeśād anyedyur varakanyakā / sā mayā pariṇītābhūn militākhilabandhunā // 4.2.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad ālokya ca so 'kasmān madvadhūvāhanas tadā / siṃhaḥ sarveṣu paśyatsu saṃpannaḥ puruṣākṛtiḥ // 4.2.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kim etad iti vibhrānte jane tatra sthite 'khile / sa divyavastrābharaṇo naman mām evam abravīt // 4.2.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
ahaṃ citrāṅgado nāma vidyādhara iyaṃ ca me / sutā manovatī nāma kanyā prāṇādhikapriyā // 4.2.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etām aṅke sadā kṛtvā vipinena bhramann aham / prāptavān ekadā gaṅgāṃ bhūritīratapovanām // 4.2.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tapasvilaṅghanatrāsāt tasyā madhyena gacchataḥ / apatan mama daivāc ca puṣpamālā tadambhasi // 4.2.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'kasmāt samutthāya nārado 'ntarjalasthitaḥ / pṛṣṭhe tayā patitayā kruddho mām aśapan muniḥ // 4.2.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
auddhatyenāmunā pāpa gaccha siṃho bhaviṣyasi / himācale gataś caitāṃ sutāṃ pṛṣṭhena vakṣyasi // 4.2.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yadā ca mānuṣeṇaiṣā sutā te pariṇeṣyate / tadā taddarśanād eva śāpād asmād vimokṣase // 4.2.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ahaṃ muninā śaptaḥ siṃhībhūya himācale / atiṣṭhaṃ tanayām etāṃ harapūjāparāṃ vahan // 4.2.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anantaraṃ yathā yatnāc chabarādhipater idam / saṃpannaṃ sarvakalyāṇaṃ tathā viditam eva te // 4.2.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tat sādhayāmi bhadraṃ vas tīrṇaḥ śāpo mayaiṣa saḥ / ity uktvā so 'bhyudapatat sadyo vidyādharo nabhaḥ // 4.2.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatas tadvismayākrānto nandatsvajanabāndhavaḥ / ślāghyasaṃbandhahṛṣṭo me pitākārṣīn mahotsavam // 4.2.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ko hi nirvyājamittrāṇāṃ caritaṃ cintayiṣyati / suhṛtsu naiva tṛpyanti prāṇair apy upakṛtya ye // 4.2.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti cātra na ko nāma sacamatkāram abhyadhāt / dhyāyan dhyāyann udāraṃ tac chabarādhipaceṣṭitam // 4.2.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājāpi tat tathā buddhvā tatratyas tasya sanmateḥ / atuṣyad asmatsnehena śabarādhipateḥ param // 4.2.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tuṣṭaś ca tasmai matpitrā dāpitaḥ sahasaiva ca / aśeṣam aṭavīrājyaṃ ratnopāyanadāyinā // 4.2.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tayā manovatyā patnyā mittreṇa tena ca / kṛtārthaḥ śabarendreṇa tatrātiṣṭham ahaṃ sukhī // 4.2.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca ślathīkṛtātmīyadeśavāsarasas tataḥ / bhūyasāsmadgṛheṣv eva nyavasac chabarādhipaḥ // 4.2.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
parasparopakāreṣu sarvakālam atṛptayoḥ / sa dvayor agamat kālo mama tasya ca mittrayoḥ // 4.2.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
acirāc ca manovatyāṃ tasyām ajani me sutaḥ / bahiṣkṛtaḥ kulasyeva kṛtsnasya hṛdayotsavaḥ // 4.2.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hiraṇyadattanāmā ca sa śanair vṛddhim āyayau / kṛtavidyo yathāvac ca pariṇīto 'bhavat tataḥ // 4.2.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad dṛṣṭvā jīvitaphalaṃ pūrṇaṃ matvā ca matpitā / vṛddho bhāgīrathīṃ prāyāt sadāro deham ujjhitum // 4.2.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'haṃ pitṛśokārtaḥ kathaṃcid bāndhavair dhṛtim / grāhito gṛhabhāraṃ svam udvoḍhuṃ pratipannavān // 4.2.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadā manovatīmugdhamukhadarśanam ekataḥ / anyataḥ śabarendreṇa saṃgamo māṃ vyanodayat // 4.2.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ satputrasānandāḥ sukalatramanoramāḥ / suhṛtsamāgamasukhā gatās te divasā mama // 4.2.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
kālenātha pravṛddhaṃ mām agrahīc cibuke jarā / kiṃ gṛhe 'dyāpi putreti prītyeva bruvatī hitam // 4.2.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tenāhaṃ sahasotpannavairāgyas tanayaṃ nijam / kuṭumbabhārodvahane vanaṃ vāñchann ayojayam // 4.2.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
sadāraś ca gato 'bhūvaṃ giriṃ kālañjaraṃ tataḥ / matsnehatyaktarājyena samaṃ śabarabhūbhṛtā // 4.2.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra prāptena cātmīyā jātir vaidyādharī mayā / śāpaś ca prāptaparyantaḥ sa śārvaḥ sahasā smṛtaḥ // 4.2.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac ca patnyai manovatyai tadaivākhyātavān aham / sakhye ca śabarendrāya mumukṣur mānuṣīṃ tanum // 4.2.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhāryāmittre ime eva bhūyāstāṃ smarato mama / anyajanmany apīty uktvā hṛdi kṛtvā ca śaṃkaram // 4.2.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mayā giritaṭāt tasmān nipatya prasabhaṃ tataḥ / tābhyāṃ svapatnīmittrābhyāṃ saha muktaṃ śarīrakam // 4.2.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
so 'haṃ tataḥ samutpanno nāmnā jīmūtavāhanaḥ / vidyādharakule 'muṣminn eṣa jātismaro 'dhunā // 4.2.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa cāpi śabarendras tvaṃ jāto mittrāvasuḥ punaḥ / tryakṣaprasādāt siddhānāṃ rājño viśvāvasoḥ sutaḥ // 4.2.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sāpi vidyādharī mittra mama bhāryā manovatī / tava svasā samutpannā nāmnā valayavaty asau // 4.2.168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ me pūrvapatny eṣā bhaginī te bhavān api / pūrvamittram ato yuktā pariṇetum asau mama // 4.2.169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ tu pūrvam ito gatvā mama pitror nivedaya / tayoḥ pramāṇīkṛtayoḥ śiddhyaty etat tavepsitam // 4.2.170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
itthaṃ niśamya jīmūtavāhanāt prītamānasaḥ / gatvā mittrāvasuḥ sarvaṃ tatpitṛbhyāṃ śaśaṃsa tat // 4.2.171	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhinanditavākyaś ca tābhyāṃ hṛṣṭas tadaiva saḥ / upagamya tam evārthaṃ svapitṛbhyāṃ nyavedayat // 4.2.172	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tayor īpsitasaṃpattituṣṭayoḥ satvaraṃ ca saḥ / yuvarājo vivāhāya saṃbhāram akarot svasuḥ // 4.2.173	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato jagrāha vidhivat tasyā jīmūtavāhanaḥ / pāṇiṃ malayavatyāḥ sa siddharājapuraskṛtaḥ // 4.2.174	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
babhūva cotsavas tatra cañcaddyucaracāraṇaḥ / saṃmilatsiddhasaṃghāto valgadvidyādharoddhuraḥ // 4.2.175	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtodvāhas tatas tasthau tasmiñ jīmūtavāhanaḥ / malayādrau mahārheṇa vibhavena vadhūsakhaḥ // 4.2.176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā ca śvaśuryeṇa sa mittrāvasunā saha / velāvanāni jaladher avalokayituṃ yayau // 4.2.177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatrāpaśyac ca puruṣaṃ yuvānaṃ vignam āgatam / nivartayantaṃ jananīṃ hā putreti virāviṇīm // 4.2.178	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
apareṇa parityaktaṃ bhaṭenevānuyāyinā / puruṣeṇa pṛthūttuṅgaṃ prāpayyaikaṃ śilātalam // 4.2.179	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kas tvaṃ kim īhase kiṃ ca mātā tvāṃ śocatīti tam / sa papraccha tataḥ so 'pi tasmai vṛttāntam abravīt // 4.2.180	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
purā kaśyapabhārye dve kadrūś ca vinatā tathā / mithaḥ kathāprasaṅgena vivādaṃ kila cakratuḥ // 4.2.181	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ādyā śyāmān raver aśvān avādīd aparā sitān / anyonyadāsabhāvaṃ ca paṇam atra babandhatuḥ // 4.2.182	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato jayārthinī kadrūḥ svairaṃ nāgair nijātmajaiḥ / viṣaphūtkāramalinān arkasyāśvān akārayat // 4.2.183	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tādṛśāṃś copadarśyaitān vinatāṃ chadmanā jitām / dāsīcakāra kaṣṭā hi strīṇām anyāsahiṣṇutā // 4.2.184	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad buddhvāgatya vinatātanayo garuḍas tadā / sāntvena mātur dāsatvamuktiṃ kadrūm ayācata // 4.2.185	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tataḥ kadrūsutā nāgā vicintyaivaṃ tam abruvat / bho vainateya kṣīrābdhiḥ prārabdho mathituṃ suraiḥ // 4.2.186	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tataḥ sudhāṃ samāhṛtya prativastu prayaccha naḥ / mātaraṃ svīkuruṣvātha bhavān hi balināṃ varaḥ // 4.2.187	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etan nāgavacaḥ śrutvā gatvā ca kṣīravāridhim / sudhārthaṃ darśayām āsa garuḍo guru pauruṣam // 4.2.188	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ parākramaprīto devas tatra svayaṃ hariḥ / tuṣṭo 'smi te varaṃ kaṃcid vṛṇīṣvety ādideśa tam // 4.2.189	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nāgā bhavantu me bhakṣyā iti so 'pi hares tataḥ / vainateyo varaṃ vavre mātur dāsyena kopitaḥ // 4.2.190	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatheti hariṇādiṣṭo nijavīryārjitāmṛtaḥ / sa caivam atha śakreṇa gadito jñātavastunā // 4.2.191	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathā pakṣīndra kāryaṃ te yathā mūḍhair na bhujyate / nāgaiḥ sudhā yathā caināṃ tebhyaḥ pratyāharāmy aham // 4.2.192	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvā tathety uktvā sa vaiṣṇavavaroddhuraḥ / sudhākalaśam ādāya tārkṣyo nāgān upāyayau // 4.2.193	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
varaprabhāvabhītāṃś ca mugdhān ārāj jagāda tān / idam ānītam amṛtaṃ muktvāmbāṃ mama gṛhyatām // 4.2.194	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
bhayaṃ cet sthāpayāmy etad ahaṃ vo darbhasaṃstare / unmocyāmbāṃ ca gacchāmi svīkurudhvam itaḥ sudhām // 4.2.195	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathety ukte ca tair nāgaiḥ sa pavitre kuśāstare / sudhākalaśam ādhatta te cāsya jananīṃ jahuḥ // 4.2.196	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dāsyamuktāṃ ca kṛtvaivaṃ mātaraṃ garuḍe gate / yāvad ādadate nāgā niḥśaṅkās tat kilāmṛtam // 4.2.197	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvan nipatya sahasā tān vimohya svaśaktitaḥ / taṃ sudhākalaśaṃ śakro jahāra kuśasaṃstarāt // 4.2.198	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
viṣaṇṇās te 'tha nāgās taṃ lilihur darbhasaṃstaram / kadācid amṛtaścyotalepo 'py asmin bhaved iti // 4.2.199	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena pāṭitajihvās te vṛthā prāpur dvijihvatām / hāsyād ṛte kim anyat syād atilaulyavatāṃ phalam // 4.2.200	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athālabdhāmṛtarasān nāgān vairī harer varāt / tārkṣyaḥ pravavṛte bhoktuṃ tān nipatya punaḥ punaḥ // 4.2.201	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadāpāte ca pātālaṃ trāsanirjīvarājilam / prabhṛṣṭagarbhiṇīgarbham abhūt kṣapitapannagam // 4.2.202	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ dṛṣṭvā cānvahaṃ tatra vāsukir bhujageśvaraḥ / kṛtsnam ekapade naṣṭaṃ nāgalokam amanyata // 4.2.203	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato durvāravīryasya sadyas tasya vicintya saḥ / samayaṃ prārthanāpūrvaṃ cakāraivaṃ garutmataḥ // 4.2.204	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekam ekaṃ pratidinaṃ nāgaṃ te preṣayāmy aham / āhārahetoḥ pakṣīndra payodhipulinācale // 4.2.205	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ātāle tu praveṣṭavyaṃ na tvayā mardakāriṇā / nāgalokakṣayāt svārthas tavaiva hi vinaśyati // 4.2.206	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti vāsukinā proktas tatheti garuḍo 'nvaham / tatpreṣitam ihaikaikaṃ nāgaṃ bhoktuṃ pracakrame // 4.2.207	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena krameṇa cāsaṃkhyāḥ phaṇino 'tra kṣayaṃ gatāḥ / ahaṃ ca śaṅkhacūḍākhyo nāgo vāro mamādya ca // 4.2.208	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ato 'haṃ garuḍāhārahetor vadhyaśilām imām / mātuś ca śocyatāṃ prāpto nāgarājanideśataḥ // 4.2.209	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā śaṅkhacūḍasya duḥkhitaḥ / sāntaḥkhedaḥ sa jīmūtavāhanas tam abhāṣata // 4.2.210	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho kim api niḥsattvaṃ rājatvaṃ bata vāsukeḥ / yat svahastena nīyante ripor āmiṣatāṃ prajāḥ // 4.2.211	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ na prathamam ātmaiva tena datto garutmate / klībenābhyarthitā keyaṃ svakulakṣayasākṣitā // 4.2.212	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
utpadya kaśyapāt pāpaṃ tārkṣyo 'pi kurute kiyat / dehamātrakṛte mohaḥ kīdṛśo mahatām api // 4.2.213	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad ahaṃ tāvad adyaikaṃ rakṣāmi tvāṃ garutmataḥ / svaśarīrapradānena mā viṣādaṃ kṛthāḥ sakhe // 4.2.214	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā śaṅkhacūḍo 'pi dhairyād etad uvāca tam / śāntam etan mahāsattva mā smaivaṃ bhāṣathāḥ punaḥ // 4.2.215	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na kācasya kṛte jātu yuktā muktāmaṇeḥ kṣatiḥ / na cāpy ahaṃ gamiṣyāmi kathāṃ kulakalaṅkitām // 4.2.216	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā taṃ niṣidhy aiva sādhur jīmūtavāhanam / matvā garuḍavelāṃ ca sa kṣaṇāntaragāminīm // 4.2.217	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śaṅkhacūḍo yayau tatra vāridhes tīravartinam / antakāle namaskartuṃ gokarṇākhyam umāpatim // 4.2.218	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gate tasmin sa kāruṇyanidhir jīmūtavāhanaḥ / tattrāṇāyātmadānena bubudhe labdham antaram // 4.2.219	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tadvismṛtam iva kṣipraṃ kṛtvā svayuktitaḥ / kāryāpadeśād vyasṛjan nijaṃ mittrāvasuṃ gṛham // 4.2.220	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tatkṣaṇaṃ ca samāsannatārkṣyapakṣānilāhatā / tatsattvadarśanāścaryād iva sā bhūr aghūrṇata // 4.2.221	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tenāhiripum āyāntaṃ matvā jīmūtavāhanaḥ / parānukampī tāṃ vadhyaśilām adhyāruroha saḥ // 4.2.222	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kṣaṇāc cātra nipatyaiva mahāsattvaṃ jahāra tam / āhatya cañcvā garuḍaḥ svacchāyāc chāditāmbaraḥ // 4.2.223	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
parisravadasṛgdhāraṃ cyutotkhātaśikhāmaṇim / nītvā bhakṣayituṃ cainam ārebhe śikhare gireḥ // 4.2.224	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkālaṃ puṣpavṛṣṭiś ca nipapāta nabhastalāt / taddarśanāc ca kiṃ nv etad iti tārkṣyo visismiye // 4.2.225	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvat sa śaṅkhacūḍo 'tra natvā gokarṇam āgataḥ / dadarśa rudhirāsārasiktaṃ vadhyaśilātalam // 4.2.226	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hā dhiṅ madarthaṃ tenātmā datto nūnaṃ mahātmanā / tat kutra nītas tārkṣyeṇa kṣaṇe 'smin sa bhaviṣyati // 4.2.227	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
anviṣyāmi drutaṃ tāvat kadācit tam avāpnuyām / iti sādhuḥ sa tadraktadhārām anusaran yayau // 4.2.228	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atrāntare ca hṛṣṭaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā jīmūtavāhanam / garuḍo bhakṣaṇaṃ muktvā savismayam acintayat // 4.2.229	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaścit kim anya evāyaṃ bhakṣyamāṇo 'pi yo mayā / vipadyate na tu paraṃ dhīraḥ pratyuta hṛṣyati // 4.2.230	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ity antar vimṛśantaṃ ca tārkṣyaṃ tādṛgvidho 'pi saḥ / nijagāda nijābhīṣṭasiddhyai jīmūtavāhanaḥ // 4.2.231	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pakṣirāja mamāsty eva śarīre māṃsaśoṇitam / tad akasmād atṛpto 'pi kiṃ nivṛtto 'si bhakṣaṇāt // 4.2.232	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvāścaryavaśagas taṃ sa papraccha pakṣirāṭ / nāgaḥ sādho na tāvat tvaṃ brūhi tat ko bhavān iti // 4.2.233	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
nāga evāsmi bhuṅkṣva tvaṃ yathārabdhaṃ samāpaya / ārabdhā hy asamāptaiva kiṃ dhīrais tyajyate kriyā // 4.2.234	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti yāvac ca jīmūtavāhanaḥ prativakti tam / tāvat sa śaṅkhacūḍo 'tra prāpto dūrād abhāṣata // 4.2.235	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mā mā garutman naivaiṣa nāgo nāgo hy ahaṃ tava / tad enaṃ muñca ko 'yaṃ te jāto 'kāṇḍe bata bhramaḥ // 4.2.236	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvātīva vibhrānto babhūva sa khageśvaraḥ / vāñchitāsiddhikhedaṃ ca bheje jīmūtavāhanaḥ // 4.2.237	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'nyonyasamālāpakrandadvidyādharādhipam / buddhvā taṃ bhakṣitaṃ mohād garutmān abhyatapyata // 4.2.238	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

ślāghyas tv eṣa mahātmaikaḥ parārthaprāṇadāyinā / mameti mohaikavaśaṃ yena viśvam adhaḥkṛtam // 4.2.240	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)

evaṃ sakalajagattrayahṛdayacamatkārakāricaritānām / svayam anudhāvanti sadā kalyāṇaparamparāḥ padavīm // 4.2.257	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ity ākarṇya kathāṃ kila devī yaugandharāyaṇasya mukhāt / mumude vāsavadattā garbhabharodāradohadinī // 4.2.258	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
tadanu tadanuṣaṅgaprāptayā prītibhājām anavaratanideśapratyayād devatānām / nijapatinikaṭasthā bhāvividyādharendrasvatanayakathayā taṃ vāsaraṃ sā nināya // 4.2.259	mālinī [15: nnmyy]

raktāyatādharadalaṃ calorṇācārukesaram / mukhaṃ dadhānaṃ sāmrājyalakṣmīlīlāmbujopamam // 4.3.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
prāg evānyanṛpaśrībhir bhityeva nijalāñchanaiḥ / ujjhitair aṅkitaṃ mṛdvoḥ padayoś chattracāmaraiḥ // 4.3.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato harṣabharāpūrapīḍanotphullayā dṛśā / sāsrayā sravatīvāsmin sutasnehaṃ mahīpatau // 4.3.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nandatsv api ca yaugandharāyaṇādiṣu mantriṣu / gaganād uccacāraivaṃ kāle tasmin sarasvatī // 4.3.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kāmadevāvatāro 'yaṃ rājañ jātas tavātmajaḥ / naravāhanadattaṃ ca jānīhy enam ihākhyayā // 4.3.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anena bhavitavyaṃ ca divyaṃ kalpam atandriṇā / sarvavidyādharendrāṇām acirāc cakravartinā // 4.3.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā virataṃ vācā tatkṣaṇaṃ nabhasaḥ kramāt / puṣpavarṣair nipatitaṃ prasṛtaṃ dundubhisvanaiḥ // 4.3.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tataḥ surakṛtārambhajanitābhyadhikādaram / sa rājā sutarāṃ hṛṣṭaś cakāra param utsavam // 4.3.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
babhramus tūryaninadā nabhasto mandirodgatāḥ / vidyādharebhyaḥ sarvebhyo rājajanmeva śaṃsitum // 4.3.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
saudhāgreṣv aniloddhūtāḥ śoṇarāgāḥ svakāntibhiḥ / patākā api sindūram anyonyam akirann iva // 4.3.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhuvi sāṅgasmarotpattitoṣād iva surāṅganāḥ / samāgatāḥ pratipadaṃ nanṛtur vārayoṣitaḥ // 4.3.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
adṛśyata ca sarvā sā samānavibhavā purī / rājño baddhotsavāt prāptair navavastravibhūṣaṇaiḥ // 4.3.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadā hy arthān nṛpe tasmin varṣaty arthyanujīviṣu / koṣād ṛte na tatratyo dadhau kaścana riktatām // 4.3.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
maṅgalyapūrvāḥ svācāradakṣiṇā nartitāparāḥ / satprābhṛtottarās tais taiḥ surakṣibhir adhiṣṭhitāḥ // 4.3.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
prasṛtātodyanirhrādāḥ sākṣād diśa ivākhilāḥ / samantād āyayuś cātra sāmantāntaḥpurāṅganāḥ // 4.3.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ceṣṭā nṛttamayī tatra pūrṇapātramayaṃ vacaḥ / vyavahāro mahātyāgamayas tūryamayo dhvaniḥ // 4.3.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
cīnapiṣṭamayo lokaś cāraṇaikamayī ca bhūḥ / ānandamayyāṃ sarvasyām api tasyām abhūt puri // 4.3.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
evaṃ mahotsavas tatra bhūrivāsaravardhitaḥ / nivartate sma sa samaṃ pūrṇaiḥ pauramanorathaiḥ // 4.3.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
so 'pi vrajatsu divaseṣv atha rājaputro vṛddhiṃ śiśuḥ pratipad indur ivājagāma / pitrā yathāvidhiniveditadivyavāṇīnirdiṣṭapūrvanaravāhanadattanāmnā // 4.3.87	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
yāni sphuranmasṛṇamugdhanakhaprabhāṇi dvitrāṇi yāni ca khacaddaśanāṅkurāṇi / tāni skhalanti dadato vadataś ca tasya dṛṣṭvā niśamya ca padāni pitā tutoṣa // 4.3.88	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
atha tasmai mantrivarāḥ svasutān ānīya rājaputrāya / śiśave śiśūn mahīpatihṛdayānandān samarpayām āsuḥ // 4.3.89	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
yaugandharāyaṇaḥ prāṅ marubhūtiṃ hariśikhaṃ rumaṇvāṃś ca / gomukham ityakanāmā tapantakākhyaṃ vasantakaś ca sutam // 4.3.90	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
śāntikaro 'pi purodhā bhrātṛsutaṃ śāntisomam aparaṃ ca / vaiśvānaram arpitavān piṅgalikāputrakau yamajau // 4.3.91	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
tasmin kṣaṇe ca nabhaso nipapāta divyā nāndīninādasubhagā surapuṣpavṛṣṭiḥ / rājā nananda ca tadā mahiṣīsametaḥ satkṛtya tatra sacivātmajamaṇḍalaṃ tat // 4.3.92	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
bālye 'pi tair abhimatair atha mantriputraiḥ ṣaḍbhis tadekanirataiś ca sa rājaputraḥ / yuktaḥ sadaiva naravāhanadatta āsīd yukto guṇair iva mahodayahetubhūtaiḥ // 4.3.93	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
taṃ ca krīḍākalitalalitāvyaktanarmābhilāṣaṃ yāntaṃ prītipravaṇamanasām aṅkato 'ṅkaṃ nṛpāṇām / putraṃ smerānanasarasijaṃ sādaraṃ paśyatas te baddhvānandāḥ kim api divasā vatsarājasya jagmuḥ // 4.3.94	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
samāptaś cāyaṃ naravāhanadattajananalambakaś caturthaḥ /	ajñātasamavṛtta [3: B] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
caturdārikā nāma pañcamo lambakaḥ /	ajñātasamavṛtta [3: y] (? 3 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
idaṃ gurugirīndrajāpraṇayamandarāndolanāt purā kila kathāmṛtaṃ haramukhāmbudher udgatam / prasahya sarayanti ye vigatavighnalabdharddhayo dhuraṃ dadhati vaibudhīṃ bhuvi bhavaprasādena te // 5.0.1	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
madaghūrṇitavakrotthaiḥ sindūraiś churayan mahīm / herambaḥ pātu vo vighnān svatejobhir dahann iva // 5.1.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ sa devīsahitas tasthau vatseśvaras tadā / naravāhanadattaṃ tam ekaputraṃ vivardhayan // 5.1.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadrakṣākātaraṃ taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā rājānam ekadā / yaugandharāyaṇo mantrī vijanasthitam abravīt // 5.1.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājan na rājaputrasya kṛte cintādhunā tvayā / naravāhanadattasya vidhātavyā kadācana // 5.1.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asau bhagavatā bhāvī bhargeṇa hi bhavadgṛhe / sarvavidyādharādhīśacakravartī vinirmitaḥ // 5.1.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidyāprabhāvād etac ca buddhvā vidyādharādhipāḥ / gatāḥ pāpecchavaḥ kṣobhaṃ hṛdayair asahiṣṇavaḥ // 5.1.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad viditvā ca devena rakṣārthaṃ śaśimaulinā / etasya stambhako nāma gaṇeśaḥ sthāpito nijaḥ // 5.1.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca tiṣṭhaty alakṣyaḥ san rakṣann etaṃ sutaṃ tava / etac ca kṣipram abhyetya nārado me nyavedayat // 5.1.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti tasmin vadaty eva mantriṇi vyomamadhyataḥ / kirīṭī kuṇḍalī divyaḥ khaḍgī cāvātarat pumān // 5.1.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praṇataṃ kalpitātithyaṃ kṣaṇād vatseśvaro 'tha tam / kas tvaṃ kim iha te kāryam ity apṛcchat sakautukam // 5.1.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'py avādīd ahaṃ martyo bhūtvā vidyādharādhipaḥ / saṃpannaḥ śaktivegākhyaḥ prabhūtāś ca mamārayaḥ // 5.1.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'haṃ prabhāvād vijñāya bhāvy asmaccakravartinam / bhavatas tanayaṃ draṣṭum āgato 'smy avanīpate // 5.1.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavantaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭabhaviṣyaccakravartinam / prītaṃ vatseśvaro hṛṣṭaḥ punaḥ papraccha vismayāt // 5.1.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidyādharatvaṃ prāpyeta kathaṃ kīdṛgvidhaṃ ca tat / tvayā ca tat kathaṃ prāptam etat kathaya naḥ sakhe // 5.1.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā vacanaṃ rājñaḥ sa tadā vinayānataḥ / vidyādharaḥ śaktivegas tam evaṃ pratyavocata // 5.1.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
