iti saṃcintya gatvā tān sa rājapuruṣāṃs tadā / śaktidevo mayā dṛṣṭā sā purīty avadan mṛṣā // 5.1.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
diṣṭyā tarhi pratīhārapārśvam ehīti tatkṣaṇam / uktavadbhiś ca taiḥ sākaṃ sa pratīhāram abhyagāt // 5.1.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmai tathaiva cāśaṃsat tatpurīdarśanaṃ mṛṣā / tenāpi satkṛtya tato rājāntikam anīyata // 5.1.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
rājāgre 'py avikalpaḥ saṃs tathaiva ca tad abravīt / dyūtatāntasya kiṃ nāma kitavasya hi duṣkaram // 5.1.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājāpi niścayaṃ jñātuṃ brāhmaṇaṃ taṃ visṛṣṭavān / tasyāḥ kanakarekhāyā duhitur nikaṭaṃ tadā // 5.1.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tayā ca sa pratīhāramukhāj jñātvāntikāgataḥ / kaccit tvayā sā kanakapurī dṛṣṭety apṛcchyata // 5.1.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
bāḍhaṃ mayā sā nagarī dṛṣṭā vidyārthinā satā / bhramatā bhuvam ity evaṃ so 'pi tāṃ pratyabhāṣata // 5.1.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kena mārgeṇa tatra tvaṃ gatavān kīdṛśī ca sā / iti bhūyas tayā pṛṣṭaḥ sa vipro 'py evam abravīt // 5.1.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ito harapuraṃ nāma nagaraṃ gatavān aham / tato 'pi prāptavān asmi purīṃ vārāṇasīṃ kramāt // 5.1.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vārāṇasyāś ca divasair nagaraṃ pauṇḍravardhanam / tasmāt kanakapuryākhyāṃ nagarīṃ tāṃ gato 'bhavam // 5.1.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭā mayā ca sā bhogabhūmiḥ sukṛtakarmaṇām / animeṣekṣaṇāsvādyaśobhā śakrapurī yathā // 5.1.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrādhigatavidyaś ca kālenāham ihāgamam / iti tenāsmi gatavān pathā sāpi purīdṛśī // 5.1.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
evaṃ viracitoktau ca dhūrte tasmin dvijanmani / śaktideve sahāsaṃ sā vyājahāra nṛpātmajā // 5.1.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho satyaṃ mahābrahman dṛṣṭā sā nagarī tvayā / brūhi brūhi punas tāvat kenāsi gatavān pathā // 5.1.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sa yadā dhārṣṭyaṃ śaktidevo 'karot punaḥ / tadā taṃ rājaputrī sā ceṭībhir niravāsayat // 5.1.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nirvāsite yayau cāsmin pituḥ pārśvaṃ tadaiva sā / kiṃ satyam āha vipro 'sāv iti pitrāpy apṛcchyata // 5.1.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataś ca sā rājasutā janakaṃ nijagāda tam / tāta rājāpi bhūtvā tvam avicāryaiva ceṣṭase // 5.1.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ na jānāsi dhūrtā yad vañcayante janān ṛjūn / sa hi mithyaiva vipro māṃ pratārayitum īhate // 5.1.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na punar nagarī tena dṛṣṭā sālīkavādinā / dhūrtair anekākārāś ca kriyante bhuvi vañcanāḥ // 5.1.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
śivamādhavavṛttāntaṃ tathā hi śṛṇu vacmi te / ity uktvā rājakanyā sā vyājahāra kathām imām // 5.1.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asti ratnapuraṃ nāma yathārthaṃ nagarottamam / śivamādhavasaṃjñau ca dhūrtau tatra babhūvatuḥ // 5.1.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
parivārīkṛtānekadhūrtau tau cakratuś ciram / māyāprayoganiḥśeṣamuṣitāḍhyajanaṃ puram // 5.1.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā dvau ca tāv evaṃ mantraṃ vidadhatur mithaḥ / idaṃ nagaram āvābhyāṃ kṛtsnaṃ tāvad viluṇṭhitam // 5.1.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ataḥ saṃprati gacchāmo vastum ujjayinīṃ purīm / tatra tu śrūyate rājñaḥ purodhāḥ sumahādhanaḥ // 5.1.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śaṃkarasvāmināmā ca tasmād yuktyā hṛtair dhanaiḥ / mālavastrīvilāsānāṃ yāsyāmo 'tra rasajñatām // 5.1.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āskandī dakṣinārdhasya sa tatra bhrukuṭīmukhaḥ / saptakumbhīnidhāno hi kīnāśo gīyate dvijaiḥ // 5.1.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kanyāratnaṃ ca tasyāsti viprasyaikam iti śrutam / tad apy etatprasaṅgena dhruvaṃ tasmād avāpsyate // 5.1.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti niścitya kṛtvā ca mithaḥ kartavyasaṃvidam / śivamādhavadhūrtau tu purāt prayayatus tataḥ // 5.1.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śanaiś cojjayinīṃ prāpya mādhavaḥ saparicchadaḥ / rājaputrasya veṣeṇa tasthau grāme kvacid bahiḥ // 5.1.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śivas tv avikalaṃ kṛtvā varṇiveṣaṃ viveśa tām / nagarīm eka evāgre bahumāyāvicakṣaṇaḥ // 5.1.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrādhyuvāsa siprāyā maṭhikāṃ tīrasīmani / dṛśyasthāpitamṛddarbhabhikṣābhāṇḍamṛgājinām // 5.1.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca prabhātakāleṣu ghanayāṅgaṃ mṛdālipat / avīcikardamālepasūtrapātam ivācaran // 5.1.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sarittoye ca sa ciraṃ nimajjyāsīd avāṅmukhaḥ / kukarmajām ivābhyasyan bhaviṣyantīm adhogatim // 5.1.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
snānotthito 'rkābhimukhas tasthāv ūrdhvaṃ ciraṃ ca saḥ / śūlādhiropaṇaucityam ātmano darśayann iva // 5.1.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato devāgrato gatvā kuśakūrcakaro japan / āsta padmāsanāsīnaḥ sadambhacaturānanaḥ // 5.1.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antarā hṛdayānīva sādhūnāṃ kaitavena saḥ / svacchāny āhṛtya puṣpāṇi purāriṃ paryapūjayat // 5.1.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtapūjaś ca bhūyo 'pi mithyā japaparo 'bhavat / dattāvadhānaḥ kusṛtiṣv iva dhyānaṃ tatāna saḥ // 5.1.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
aparāhṇe ca bhikṣārthī kṛṣṇasārājināmbaraḥ / puri tadvañcanāmāyākaṭākṣa iva so 'bhramat // 5.1.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ādāya dvijagehebhyo maunī bhikṣātrayaṃ tataḥ / sadaṇḍājinakaś cakre triḥ satyam iva khaṇḍaśaḥ // 5.1.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhāgaṃ dadau ca kākebhyo bhāgam abhyāgatāya ca / bhāgena dambhabījena kukṣibhastrām apūrayat // 5.1.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
punaḥ sa sarvapāpāni nijāni gaṇayann iva / japann āvartayām āsa ciraṃ mithyākṣamālikām // 5.1.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rajanyām advitīyaś ca sa tasthau maṭhikāntare / api sūkṣmāṇi lokasya marmasthānāni cintayan // 5.1.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ pratidinaṃ kurvan kaṣṭaṃ vyājamayaṃ tapaḥ / sa tatrāvarjayām āsa nagarīvāsināṃ manaḥ // 5.1.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho tapasvī śānto 'yam iti khyātiś ca sarvataḥ / udapadyata tatrāsya bhaktinamre 'khile jane // 5.1.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca sa dvitīyo 'sya sakhā cāramukhena tam / vijñāya mādhavo 'py etannagarīṃ praviveśa tām // 5.1.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gṛhītvā vasatiṃ cātra dūre devakulāntare / sa rājaputracchadmā san snātuṃ siprātaṭaṃ yayau // 5.1.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
snātvā sānucaro dṛṣṭvā devāgre japatatparam / taṃ śivaṃ paramaprahvo nipapātāsya pādayoḥ // 5.1.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jagāda ca janasyāgre nāstīdṛk tāpaso 'paraḥ / asakṛd dhi mayā dṛṣṭas tīrthāny eṣa bhramann iti // 5.1.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śivas tu taṃ vilokyāpi dambhastambhitakaṃdharaḥ / tathaivāsīt tataḥ so 'pi mādhavo vasatiṃ yayau // 5.1.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rātrau militvā caikatra bhuktvā pītvā ca tāv ubhau / mantrayām āsatuḥ śeṣaṃ kartavyaṃ yad ataḥ param // 5.1.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
yāme ca paścime svairam āgāt svamaṭhikāṃ śivaḥ / mādhavo 'pi prabhāte svaṃ dhūrtam ekaṃ samādiśat // 5.1.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etad gṛhītvā gaccha tvaṃ vastrayugmam upāyanam / śaṃkarasvāminaḥ pārśvam iha rājapurodhasaḥ // 5.1.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājaputraḥ parābhūto mādhavo nāma gotrajaiḥ / pitryaṃ bahu gṛhītvārtham āgato dakṣiṇāpathāt // 5.1.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
samaiḥ katipayair anyai rājaputrair anudrutaḥ / sa ceha yuṣmadīyasya rājñaḥ sevāṃ kariṣyati // 5.1.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena tvaddarśanāyāhaṃ preṣito yaśasāṃ nidhe / iti tvayā savinayaṃ sa ca vācyaḥ purohitaḥ // 5.1.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
evaṃ sa mādhavenoktvā dhūrtaḥ saṃpreṣitas tadā / jagāmopāyanakaro gṛhaṃ tasya purodhasaḥ // 5.1.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
upetyāvasare dattvā prābhūtaṃ vijane ca tat / tasmai mādhavasaṃdeśaṃ śaṃsati sma yathocitam // 5.1.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'py upāyanalobhāt tac chraddadhe kalpitāyatiḥ / upapradānaṃ lipsūnām ekaṃ hy ākarṣaṇauṣadham // 5.1.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tataḥ pratyāgate tasmin dhūrte 'nyedyuḥ sa mādhavaḥ / labdhāvakāśas tam agāt svayaṃ draṣṭuṃ purohitam // 5.1.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
dhṛtakārpaṭikākārai rājaputrāpadeśibhiḥ / vṛtaḥ pārśvacarair āttakāṣṭhakhaṇḍakalāñchanaiḥ // 5.1.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
purogāveditaś cainam abhyagāt sa purohitam / tenāpy abhyudgamānandasvāgatair abhyanandyata // 5.1.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tena saha sthitvā kathālāpaiḥ kṣaṇaṃ ca saḥ / āyayau tadanujñāto mādhavo vasatiṃ nijām // 5.1.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dvitīye 'hni punaḥ preṣya prābhṛtaṃ vastrayor yugam / bhūyo 'pi tam upāgacchat purohitam uvāca ca // 5.1.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
parivārānurodhena kila sevārthino vayam / tena tvam āśrito 'smābhir arthamātrāsti naḥ punaḥ // 5.1.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā prāptim āśaṅkya tasmāt so 'tha purohitaḥ / pratiśuśrāva tat tasmai mādhavāya samīhitam // 5.1.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣaṇāc ca gatvā rājānam etadarthaṃ vyajijñapat / tadgauraveṇa rājāpi tat tathā pratyapadyata // 5.1.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
apare 'hni ca nītvā taṃ mādhavaṃ saparicchadam / nṛpāyādarśayat tasmai sa purodhāḥ sagauravam // 5.1.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nṛpo 'pi mādhavaṃ dṛṣṭvā rājaputropamākṛtim / ādareṇānujagrāha vṛttiṃ cāsya pradiṣṭavān // 5.1.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'tra sevamānas taṃ nṛpaṃ tasthau sa mādhavaḥ / rātrau rātrau ca mantrāya śivena samagacchata // 5.1.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ihaiva vasa madgehe iti tena purodhasā / so 'rthitaś cābhaval lobhād upacāropajīvinā // 5.1.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sahacaraiḥ sākaṃ tasyaivāśiśriyad gṛham / vināśahetur vāsāya madguḥ skandhaṃ taror iva // 5.1.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kṛtvā kṛtrimamāṇikyamayair ābharaṇair bhṛtam / bhāṇḍaṃ ca sthāpayām āsa tadīye koṣaveśmani // 5.1.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antarā ca tad udghāṭya tais tair vyājārdhadarśitaiḥ / jahārābharaṇais tasya śaṣpair iva paśor manaḥ // 5.1.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
viśvaste ca tatas tasmin purodhasi cakāra saḥ / māndyam alpatarāhārakṛśīkṛtatanur mṛṣā // 5.1.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yāte katipayāhne ca taṃ śayyopāntavartinam / purohitaṃ sa vakti sma dhūrtarājo 'lpayā girā // 5.1.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mama tāvac charīre 'smin vartate viṣamā daśā / tad vipravara kaṃcit tvaṃ brāhmaṇottamam ānaya // 5.1.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yasmai dāsyāmi sarvasvam ihāmutra ca śarmaṇe / asthire jīvite hy āsthā kā dhaneṣu manasvinaḥ // 5.1.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktaḥ sa purodhāś ca tena dānopajīvakaḥ / evaṃ karomīty āha sma so 'patac cāsya pādayoḥ // 5.1.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tataḥ sa brāhmaṇaṃ yaṃ yam ānināya purohitaḥ / viśeṣecchānibhāt taṃ taṃ śraddadhe na sa mādhavaḥ // 5.1.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad dṛṣṭvā tasya pārśvastho dhūrta eko 'bravīd idam / na tāvad asmai sāmānyo vipraḥ prāyeṇa rocate // 5.1.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tad ya eṣa śivo nāma śiprātīre mahātapāḥ / sthitaḥ saṃprati bhāty asya na vety etan nirūpyatām // 5.1.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā mādhavo 'vādīt kṛtārtis taṃ purohitam / hanta prasīdānaya taṃ vipro nānyo hi tādṛśaḥ // 5.1.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
ity uktas tena ca yayau sa śivasyāntikaṃ tataḥ / purodhās tam apaśyac ca racitadhyānaniścalam // 5.1.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
upāviśac ca tasyāgre tataḥ kṛtvā pradakṣiṇam / tatkṣaṇaṃ so 'pi dhūrto 'bhūc chanair utmīlitekṣaṇaḥ // 5.1.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ praṇamya taṃ prahvaḥ sa uvāca purohitaḥ / na cet kupyasi tat kiṃcit prabho vijñāpayāmy aham // 5.1.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tan niśamya ca tenoṣṭhapuṭonnamanasaṃjñayā / anujñātaḥ śivenaivaṃ tam avādīt purohitaḥ // 5.1.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iha sthito dākṣiṇātyo rājaputro mahādhanaḥ / mādhavākhyaḥ sa cāsvasthaḥ sarvasvaṃ dātum udyataḥ // 5.1.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
manyase yadi tat tubhyaṃ sa sarvaṃ tat prayacchati / nānānarghamahāratnamayālaṃkaraṇojjvalam // 5.1.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sa śanair muktamaunaḥ kila śivo 'bravīt / brahman bhikṣāśanasyārthaiḥ ko 'rtho me brahmacāriṇaḥ // 5.1.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ purohito 'py evaṃ sa taṃ punar abhāṣata / maivaṃ vādīr mahābrahman kiṃ na vetsy āśramakramam // 5.1.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtadāro gṛhe kurvan devapitratithikriyāḥ / dhanais trivargaṃ prāpnoti gṛhī hy āśramiṇāṃ varaḥ // 5.1.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tataḥ so 'pi śivo 'vādīt kuto me dārasaṃgrahaḥ / na hy ahaṃ pariṇeṣyāmi kulād yādṛśatādṛśāt // 5.1.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sukhabhogyaṃ ca matvā tasya tathā dhanam / sa prāptāvasaro lubdhaḥ purodhās tam abhāṣata // 5.1.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asti tarhi sutā kanyā vinayasvāminīti me / atirūpavatī sā ca tāṃ ca tubhyaṃ dadāmy aham // 5.1.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yac ca pratigrahadhanaṃ tasmāt prāpnoṣi mādhavāt / tad ahaṃ tava rakṣāmi tad bhajasva gṛhāśramam // 5.1.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ākarṇya sa saṃpannayatheṣṭārthaḥ śivo 'bravīt / brahman grahas tavāyaṃ cet tat karomi vacas tava // 5.1.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hemaratnasvarūpe tu mugdha evāsmi tāpasaḥ / tvadvācaiva pravarte 'haṃ yathā vetsi tathā kuru // 5.1.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chivavacaḥ śrutvā parituṣṭas tatheti tam / mūḍho nināya gehaṃ svaṃ tathaiva sa purohitaḥ // 5.1.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃniveśya ca tatrainaṃ śivākhyam aśivaṃ tataḥ / yathākṛtaṃ śaśaṃsaitan mādhavāyābhinandate // 5.1.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadaiva ca dadau tasmai sutāṃ kleśavivardhitām / nijāṃ śivāya saṃpattim iva mūḍhatvahāritām // 5.1.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtodvāhaṃ tṛtīye 'hni pratigrahakṛte ca tam / nināya vyājamandasya mādhavasya tato 'ntikam // 5.1.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atarkyatapasaṃ vande tvām ity avitathaṃ vadan / mādhavo 'py apatat tasya śivasyotthāya pādayoḥ // 5.1.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dadau ca tasmai vidhivat koṣāgārāt tadāhṛtam / bhūrikṛtrimamāṇikyamayābharaṇabhāṇḍakam // 5.1.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
śivo 'pi pratigṛhyaitat tasya haste purodhasaḥ / nāhaṃ vedmi tvam evaitad vetsīty uktvā samarpayat // 5.1.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅgīkṛtam idaṃ pūrvaṃ mayā cintā tavātra kā / ity uktvā tac ca jagrāha tatkṣaṇaṃ sa purohitaḥ // 5.1.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtāśiṣi tato yāte svavadhūvāsakaṃ śive / nītvā sa sthāpayām āsa tan nije koṣaveśmani // 5.1.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mādhavo 'pi tad anyedyur māndyavyājaṃ śanais tyajan / rogopaśāntiṃ vakti sma mahādānaprabhāvataḥ // 5.1.168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tvayā dharmasahāyena samuttirṇo 'ham āpadaḥ / iti cāntikam āyāntaṃ praśaśaṃsa purohitam // 5.1.169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etatprabhāvād etan me śarīram iti kīrtayan / prakāśam eva cakre ca śivena saha mitratām // 5.1.170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
śivo 'pi yāteṣu dineṣv avādīt taṃ purohitam / evam eva bhavadgehe bhokṣyate ca kiyan mayā // 5.1.171	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tat kiṃ tvam eva mūlyena gṛhṇāsy ābharaṇaṃ na tat / mahārgham iti cen mūlyaṃ yathāsaṃbhavi dehi me // 5.1.172	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā tad anarghaṃ ca matvā tanniṣkrayaṃ dadau / tatheti tasmai sarvasvaṃ śivāya sa purohitaḥ // 5.1.173	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tadarthaṃ ca svahastena jīvaṃ lekhyam akārayat / svayaṃ cāpy akarod buddhvā tad dhanaṃ svadhanādhikam // 5.1.174	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyonyalikhitaṃ haste gṛhītvā sa purohitaḥ / pṛthag āsīt pṛthak so 'pi śivo bheje gṛhasthitim // 5.1.175	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataś ca sa śivaḥ so 'pi mādhavaḥ saṃgatāv ubhau / purohitārthān bhuñjānau yathecchaṃ tatra tasthatuḥ // 5.1.176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
gate kāle ca mūlyārthī sa purodhāḥ kilāpaṇe / tato 'laṃkāraṇād ekaṃ vikretuṃ kaṭakaṃ yayau // 5.1.177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatraitad ratnatattvajñāḥ parīkṣya vaṇijo 'bruvan / aho kasyāsti vijñānaṃ yenaitat kṛtrimaṃ kṛtam // 5.1.178	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kācasphaṭikakhaṇḍā hi nānārāgoparañjitāḥ / rītibaddhā ime naite maṇayo na ca kāñcanam // 5.1.179	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā vihvalo gatvā sa purodhās tadaiva tat / ānīyābharaṇaṃ gehāt kṛtsnaṃ teṣām adarśayat // 5.1.180	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
te dṛṣṭvā tadvad evāsya sarvaṃ kṛtrimam eva tat / ūcire ca sa tac chrutvā vajrāhata ivābhavat // 5.1.181	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataś ca gatvā tatkālaṃ sa mūḍhaḥ śivam abhyadhāt / gṛhṇīṣva svān alaṃkārāṃs tan me dehi nijaṃ dhanam // 5.1.182	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kuto mamādyāpi dhanaṃ tad dhy aśeṣaṃ gṛhe mayā / kālena bhuktam iti taṃ śivo 'pi pratyabhāṣata // 5.1.183	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tato vivadamānau tau pārśvāvasthitamādhavam / purodhaś ca śivaś cobhau rājānam upajagmatuḥ // 5.1.184	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kācasphaṭikayoḥ khaṇḍai rītibaddhaiḥ surañjitaiḥ / racitaṃ deva dattvaiva vyājālaṃkaraṇaṃ mahat // 5.1.185	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śivena mama sarvasvam ajānānasya bhakṣitam / iti vijñāpayām āsa nṛpatiṃ sa purohitaḥ // 5.1.186	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ śivo 'bravīd rājann ā bālyāt tāpaso 'bhavam / anenaiva tad abhyarthya grāhito 'haṃ pratigraham // 5.1.187	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadaiva bhāṣitaṃ cāsya mugdhenāpi satā mayā / ratnādiṣv anabhijñasya pramāṇaṃ me bhavān iti // 5.1.188	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ sthitas tavātreti pratyapadyata caiṣa tat / pratigṛhya ca tat sarvaṃ haste 'syaiva mayārpitam // 5.1.189	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'nena gṛhītaṃ tat svecchaṃ mūlyena me prabho / vidyate cāvayor atra svahastalikhitaṃ mithaḥ // 5.1.190	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
idānīṃ caiva sāhāyyaṃ paraṃ jānāty ataḥ prabhuḥ / evaṃ śive samāptoktāv uvāca sa ca mādhavaḥ // 5.1.191	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
maivam ādiśa mānyas tvam aparādho mamātra kaḥ / na gṛhītaṃ mayā kiṃcid bhavato vā śivasya vā // 5.1.192	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
paitṛkaṃ dhanam anyatra ciraṃ nyāsīkṛtaṃ sthitam / tadā tad eva cānītaṃ mayā dattaṃ dvijanmane // 5.1.193	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
satyaṃ yadi na tat svarṇaṃ na ca ratnāni tāni tat / rītisphaṭikakācānāṃ pradānād astu me phalam // 5.1.194	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

ity abhinnamukhacchāyam uktavaty atra mādhave / jahāsa mantrisahito rājā tasmai tutoṣa ca // 5.1.196	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
naivam anyāyataḥ kiṃcin mādhavasya śivasya vā / iti tatra sabhāsadbhiḥ sāntarhāsam udīrite // 5.1.197	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
purohitaḥ so 'tha yayau hāritārtho vilajjitaḥ / kāsāṃ hi nāpadāṃ hetur atilobhāndhabuddhitā // 5.1.198	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tau ca dhūrtau tatas tatra tasthatuḥ śivamādhavau / parituṣṭanṛpāvāptaprasādasukhitau ciram // 5.1.199	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ sūtraśatais tais tair jihvājālāni tanvate / jālopajīvino dhūrtā dhārāyāṃ dhīvarā iva // 5.1.200	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tat tāta mithyā kanakapurīṃ dṛṣṭām iva bruvan / eṣo 'pi vañcayitvā tvāṃ vipro matprāptim icchati // 5.1.201	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ataḥ saṃprati mā bhūt te madvivāhakṛte tvarā / sthitāsmi tāvat kanyaiva paśyāmo bhavitātra kim // 5.1.202	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ity uktaḥ sutayā rājā tayā kanakarekhayā / paropakārī sa tadā tām evaṃ pratyabhāṣata // 5.1.203	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
yauvane kanyakābhāvaś ciraṃ putri na yujyate / mithyā vadanti doṣaṃ hi durjanā guṇamatsarāḥ // 5.1.204	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttamasya viśeṣeṇa kalaṅkotpādako janaḥ / harasvāmikathām atra śṛṇv etāṃ kathayāmi te // 5.1.205	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gaṅgopakaṇṭhe kusumapuraṃ nāmāsti yat puram / harasvāmīti ko 'py āsīt tīrthārthī tatra tāpasaḥ // 5.1.206	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa bhaikṣavṛttir vipro 'tra gaṅgātīrakṛtoṭajaḥ / tapaḥprakarṣāl lokasya gauravāspadatāṃ yayau // 5.1.207	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kadācic cātra taṃ dṛṣṭvā dūrād bhikṣāvinirgatam / janamadhye jagādaikas tadguṇāsahanaḥ khalaḥ // 5.1.208	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
api jānītha jāto 'yaṃ kīdṛk kapaṭatāpasaḥ / anenaivārbhakāḥ sarve nagare 'mutra bhakṣitāḥ // 5.1.209	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā ca dvitīyo 'tra tatrāvocata tādṛśaḥ / satyaṃ śrutaṃ mayāpy etad ucyamānaṃ janair iti // 5.1.210	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam etad iti smāha tṛtīyo 'pi samarthayan / badhnāty āryaparīvādaṃ khalasaṃvādaśṛṅkhalā // 5.1.211	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

paurāś ca sarve gehebhyo balād bālān na tatyajuḥ / harasvāmī śiśūn nītvā bhakṣayaty akhilān iti // 5.1.213	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataś ca brāhmaṇās tatra saṃtatikṣayabhīravaḥ / saṃbhūya mantrayām āsuḥ purāt tasya pravāsanam // 5.1.214	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
graseta kupitaḥ so 'smān iti sākṣād bhayān na te / yadā tasyāśakan vaktuṃ dūtān visasṛjus tadā // 5.1.215	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
te ca gatvā tadā dūtā dūrād eva tam abruvan / nagarād gamyatām asmād ity āhus tvāṃ dvijātayaḥ // 5.1.216	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ nimittam iti proktā vismitenātha tena te / punar ūcus tvam aśnāsi bāladarśam iheti tam // 5.1.217	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sa harasvāmī svayaṃ pratyāyanecchayā / viprāṇāṃ nikaṭaṃ teṣāṃ bhītinaśyajjano yayau // 5.1.218	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
viprāś cāruruhus trāsāt taṃ dṛṣṭvaiva maṭhopari / pravādamohitaḥ prāyo na vicārakṣamo janaḥ // 5.1.219	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha dvijān harasvāmī tān ekaikam adhaḥ sthitaḥ / nāmagrāhaṃ samāhūya sa jagādopari sthitān // 5.1.220	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ko 'yaṃ moho 'dya vo viprā nāvekṣadhvaṃ parasparam / kiyanto bālakāḥ kasya mayā kutra ca bhakṣitāḥ // 5.1.221	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā yāvad anyonyaṃ viprāḥ parimṛśanti te / tāvat sarve 'pi sarveṣāṃ jīvanto bālakāḥ sthitāḥ // 5.1.222	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kramān niyuktāś cānye 'pi paurās tatra tathaiva tat / pratyapadyanta sarve 'pi savipravaṇijo 'bruvan // 5.1.223	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho vimūḍhair asmābhiḥ sādhur mithyaiva dūṣitaḥ / jīvanti bālāḥ sarveṣāṃ tat kasyānena bhakṣitāḥ // 5.1.224	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ity uktavatsu sarveṣu harasvāmī tadaiva saḥ / saṃpannaśuddhir nagarād gantuṃ pravavṛte tataḥ // 5.1.225	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
durjanotpāditāvadyaviraktīkṛtacetasi / avivekini durdeśe ratiḥ kā hi manasvinaḥ // 5.1.226	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vaṇigbhir vipraiś ca prārthitaś caraṇānataiḥ / kathaṃcit sa harasvāmī tatra vastum amanyata // 5.1.227	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
itthaṃ saccaritāvalokanalasadvidveṣavācālitā mithyādūṣaṇam evam eva dadati prāyaḥ satāṃ durjanāḥ / kiṃcit kiṃ punar āpnuvanti yadi te tatrāvakāśaṃ manāg draṣṭuṃ tajjvalite 'nale nipatitaḥ prājyājyadhārotkaraḥ // 5.1.228	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
tasmād viśalyayitum icchasi māṃ yadi tvaṃ vatse tad unmiṣati nūtanayauvane 'smin / na sveccham arhasi ciraṃ khalu kanyakātvam āsevituṃ sulabhadurjanaduṣpravādam // 5.1.229	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
ity uktā narapatinā pitrā prāyeṇa kanakarekhā sā / nijagāda rājatanayā tam avasthitaniścayā bhūyaḥ // 5.1.230	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
dṛṣṭā kanakapurī sā vipreṇa kṣatriyeṇa vā yena / tarhi tam āsu gaveṣaya tasmai māṃ dehi bhāṣitaṃ hi mayā // 5.1.231	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
tac chrutvā dṛḍhaniścayāṃ vigaṇayañ jātismarāṃ tāṃ sutāṃ nāsyāś cānyam abhīṣṭabhartṛghaṭane paśyann upāyakramam / deśe tatra tataḥ prabhṛty anudinaṃ praṣṭuṃ navāgantukān bhūyo bhūmipatiḥ sa nityapaṭahaprodghoṣaṇām ādiśat // 5.1.232	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
yo vipraḥ kṣatriyo vā nanu kanakapurīṃ dṛṣṭavān so 'bhidhattām tasmai rājā kila svāṃ vitarati tanayāṃ yauvarājyena sākam / sarvatrāghoṣyataivaṃ punar api paṭahānantaraṃ cātra śaśvan na tv ekaḥ ko'pi tāvat kṛtakanakapurīdarśano labhyate sma // 5.1.233	sragdharā [21: mrBnyyy]
atrāntare dvijayuvā śaktidevaḥ sa durmanāḥ / acintayad abhipretarājakanyāvamānitaḥ // 5.2.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
mayeha mithyākanakapurīdarśanavādinā / vimānanā paraṃ prāptā na tv asau rājakanyakā // 5.2.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad etatprāptaye tāvad bhramaṇīyā mahī mayā / yāvat sā nagarī dṛṣṭā prāṇair vāpi gataṃ mama // 5.2.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāṃ hi dṛṣṭvā purīm etya tatpaṇopārjitaṃ na cet / labheya rājatanayām enāṃ kiṃ jīvitena tat // 5.2.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
evaṃ kṛtapratijñaḥ san vardhamānapurāt tataḥ / dakṣiṇāṃ diśam ālambya sa pratasthe tadā dvijaḥ // 5.2.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
krameṇa gacchaṃś ca prāpa so 'tha vindhyamahāṭavīm / viveśa ca nijāṃ vāñchām iva tāṃ gahanāyatām // 5.2.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāṃ ca mārutādhūtamṛdupādapapallavaiḥ / vījayantyām ivātmānaṃ taptam arkakarotkaraiḥ // 5.2.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhūricauraparābhūtiduḥkhād iva divāniśam / krośantyāṃ tīvrasiṃhādihanyamānamṛgāravaiḥ // 5.2.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svacchandīcchaladuddāmamahāmarumarīcibhiḥ / jigīṣantyām ivātyugrāṇy api tejāṃsi bhāsvataḥ // 5.2.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jalasaṃhatihīnāyām apy aho sulabhāpadi / satatollaṅghyamānāyām api dūrībhavadbhuvi // 5.2.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
divasair dūram adhvānam atikramya dadarśa saḥ / ekānte śītalasvacchasalilaṃ sumahat saraḥ // 5.2.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
puṇḍarīkocchritacchattraṃ prollasaddhaṃsacāmaram / kurvāṇam iva sarveṣāṃ sarasām adhirājatām // 5.2.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmin snānādi kṛtvā ca tatpārśve punar uttare / apaśyad āśramapadaṃ saphalasnigdhapādapam // 5.2.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatrāśvatthataror mūle niṣaṇṇaṃ tāpasair vṛtam / sa sūryatapasaṃ nāma sthaviraṃ munim aikṣata // 5.2.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svavayobdaśatagranthisaṃkhyayevākṣamālayā / jarādhavalakarṇāgrasaṃśrayiṇyā virājitam // 5.2.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praṇāmapūrvakaṃ taṃ ca munim abhyājagāma saḥ / tenāpy atithisatkārair muninā so 'bhyanandyata // 5.2.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apṛcchyata ca tenaiva saṃvibhajya phalādibhiḥ / kutaḥ prāpto 'si gantāsi kva ca bhadrocyatām iti // 5.2.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vardhamānapurāt tāvad bhagavann aham āgataḥ / gantuṃ pravṛttaḥ kanakapurīm asmi pratijñayā // 5.2.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
na jāne kva bhavet sā tu bhagavān vaktu vetti cet / iti taṃ śaktidevo 'pi sa prahvo munim abhyadhāt // 5.2.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vatsa varṣaśatāny aṣṭau mamāśramapade tv iha / atikrāntāni na ca sā śrutāpi nagarī mayā // 5.2.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
iti tenāpi muninā gaditaḥ sa viṣādavān / punar evābravīt tarhi mṛto 'smi kṣmāṃ bhramann iha // 5.2.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ krameṇa jñātārthaḥ sa munis tam abhāṣata / yadi te niścayas tarhi yad ahaṃ vacmi tat kuru // 5.2.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
asti kāmpilyaviṣayo yojanānāṃ śateṣv itaḥ / triṣu tatrottarākhyaś ca giris tatrāpi cāśramaḥ // 5.2.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāryo 'sti mama bhrātā jyeṣṭho dīrghatapā iti / tatpārśvaṃ vraja jānīyāt sa vṛddho jātu tāṃ purīm // 5.2.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvā tathety uktvā jātāsthas tatra tāṃ niśām / nītvā pratasthe sa prātaḥ śaktidevo drutaṃ tataḥ // 5.2.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kleśātikrāntakāntāraśataś cāsādya taṃ cirāt / kāmpilyaviṣayaṃ tasminn ārurohottare girau // 5.2.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra taṃ dīrghatapasaṃ munim āśramavartinam / dṛṣṭvā praṇamya ca prītaḥ kṛtātithyam upāyayau // 5.2.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vyajijñapac ca kanakapurīṃ rājasutoditām / prasthito 'haṃ na jānāmi bhagavan kvāsti sā purī // 5.2.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā ca me 'vaśyagantavyā tatas tadupalabdhaye / ṛṣiṇā sūryatapasā preṣito 'smi tavāntikam // 5.2.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ity uktavantaṃ taṃ śaktidevaṃ so 'py abravīn muniḥ / iyatā vayasā putra purī sādya śrutā mayā // 5.2.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
deśāntarāgataiḥ kaiḥ kair jātaḥ paricayo ca me / na ca tāṃ śrutavān asmi dūre taddarśanaṃ punaḥ // 5.2.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jānāmy ahaṃ ca niyataṃ davīyasi tayā kvacit / bhāvyaṃ dvīpāntare vatsa tatropāyaṃ ca vacmi te // 5.2.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
asti vārinidher madhye dvīpam utsthalasaṃjñakam / tatra satyavratākhyo 'sti niṣādādhipatir dhanī // 5.2.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya dvīpāntareṣv asti sarveṣv api gatāgatam / tena sā nagarī jātu bhaved dṛṣṭā śrutāpi vā // 5.2.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmāt prayāhi jaladher upakaṇṭhapratiṣṭhitam / nagaraṃ prathamaṃ tāvad viṭaṅkapurasaṃjñakam // 5.2.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ kenāpi vaṇijā samaṃ pravahaṇena tat / niṣādasyāspadaṃ gaccha dvīpaṃ tasyeṣṭasiddhaye // 5.2.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktas tena muninā śaktidevaḥ sa tatkṣaṇam / tathety uktvā tam āmantrya prayāti sma tadāśramāt // 5.2.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kālena prāpya collaṅghya deśān krośān vahaṃś ca saḥ / vāridhes tīratilakaṃ tad viṭaṅkapuraṃ param // 5.2.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tasmin samudradattākhyam utsthaladvīpayāyinam / anviṣya vaṇijaṃ tena saha sakhyaṃ cakāra saḥ // 5.2.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadīyaṃ yānapātraṃ ca samaṃ tenādhiruhya saḥ / tatprītipūrṇapātheyaḥ pratasthe 'mbudhivartmanā // 5.2.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'lpadeśe gantavye samuttasthāv aśaṅkitam / kālo vidyullatājihvo garjan parjanyarākṣasaḥ // 5.2.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
laghūn unnamayan bhāvān gurūn apy avapātayan / vavau vidher ivārambhaḥ pracaṇḍaś ca prabhañjanaḥ // 5.2.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vātāhatāś ca jaladher udatiṣṭhan mahormayaḥ / āśrayābhibhavakrodhād iva śailāḥ sapakṣakāḥ // 5.2.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
yayau ca tat pravahaṇaṃ kṣaṇam ūrdhvam adhaḥ kṣaṇam / ucchrāyapātaparyāyaṃ darśayad dhaninām iva // 5.2.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣaṇāntare ca vaṇijām ākrandais tīvrapūritam / bharād iva tad utpatya vahanaṃ samabhajyata // 5.2.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhagne ca tasmiṃs tatsvāmī sa vaṇik patito 'mbudhau / tīrṇaś ca phalakārūḍhaḥ prāpyānyad vahanaṃ cirāt // 5.2.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
śaktidevaṃ patantaṃ tu taṃ vyāttamukhakandaraḥ / aparikṣatasarvāṅgaṃ mahāmatsyo nigīrṇavān // 5.2.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca matsyo 'bdhimadhyena tatkālaṃ svecchayā caran / utsthaladvīpanikaṭaṃ jagāma vidhiyogataḥ // 5.2.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatra tasyaiva kaivartapateḥ satyavratasya saḥ / śapharagrāhibhir bhṛtyaiḥ prāpya daivād agṛhyata // 5.2.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
te ca taṃ sumahākāyaṃ ninyur ākṛṣya kautukāt / tadaiva dhīvarās tasya nijasya svāmino 'ntikam // 5.2.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi taṃ tādṛśaṃ dṛṣṭvā tair eva sakutūhalaḥ / pāṭhīnaṃ pāṭayām āsa bhṛtyaiḥ satyavrato nijaiḥ // 5.2.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pāṭitasyodarāj jīvañ śaktidevo 'tha tasya saḥ / anubhūtāparāścaryagarbhavāso viniryayau // 5.2.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
niryātaṃ ca kṛtasvastikāraṃ taṃ ca savismayaḥ / yuvānaṃ vīkṣya papraccha dāśaḥ satyavratas tataḥ // 5.2.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kas tvaṃ kathaṃ kutaś caiṣā śapharodaraśāyitā / brahmaṃs tvayāptā ko 'yaṃ te vṛttānto 'tyantam adbhutaḥ // 5.2.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tac chrutvā śaktidevas taṃ dāśendraṃ pratyabhāṣata / brāhmaṇaḥ śaktidevākhyo vardhamānapurād aham // 5.2.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avaśyagamyā kanakapurī ca nagarī mayā / ajānānaś ca tāṃ dūrād bhrānto 'smi suciraṃ bhuvam // 5.2.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato dīrghatapovākyāt saṃbhāvya dvīpagāṃ ca tām / tajjñaptaye dāśapater utsthaladvīpavāsinaḥ // 5.2.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
pārśvaṃ satyavratasyāhaṃ gacchan vahanabhaṅgataḥ / magno 'mbudhau nigīrṇo 'haṃ matsyena prāpito 'dhunā // 5.2.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavantaṃ taṃ śaktidevaṃ satyavrato 'bravīt / satyavrato 'ham evaitad dvīpaṃ tac cedam eva te // 5.2.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ tu dṛṣṭā bahudvīpadṛśvanāpi na sā mayā / nagarī tvadabhipretā dvīpānteṣu śrutā punaḥ // 5.2.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā śaktidevaṃ ca viṣaṇṇaṃ vīkṣya tatkṣaṇam / punar abhyāgataprītyā taṃ sa satyavrato 'bhyadhāt // 5.2.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
brahman mā gā viṣādaṃ tvam ihaivādya niśāṃ vasa / prātaḥ kaṃcid upāyaṃ te vidhāsyāmīṣṭasiddhaye // 5.2.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity āśvāsya sa tenaiva dāśena prahitas tataḥ / sulabhātithisatkāraṃ dvijo vipramaṭhaṃ yayau // 5.2.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tadvāsinaikena kṛtāhāro dvijanmanā / viṣṇudattābhidhānena saha cakre kathākramam // 5.2.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatprasaṅgāc ca tenaiva pṛṣṭas tasmai samāsataḥ / nijaṃ deśaṃ kulaṃ kṛtsnaṃ vṛttāntaṃ ca śaśaṃsa saḥ // 5.2.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad buddhvā parirabhyainaṃ viṣṇudattaḥ sa tatkṣaṇam / babhāṣe harṣabāṣpāmbughargharākṣarajarjaram // 5.2.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
diṣṭyā mātulaputras tvam ekadeśabhavaś ca me / ahaṃ ca bālya eva prāk tasmād deśād ihāgataḥ // 5.2.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad ihaivāsva nacirāt sādhayiṣyati cātra te / iṣṭaṃ dvīpāntarāgacchadvaṇikkarṇaparamparā // 5.2.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvānvayam āvedya viṣṇudatto yathocitaiḥ / taṃ śaktidevaṃ tatkālam upacārair upācarat // 5.2.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
śaktidevo 'pi saṃprāpa vismṛtādhvaklamo mudam / videśe bandhulābho hi marāv amṛtanirjharaḥ // 5.2.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amaṃsta ca nijābhīṣṭasiddhim abhyarṇavartinīm / antarāpāti hi śreyaḥ kāryasaṃpattisūcakam // 5.2.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato rātrāv anidrasya śayanīye niṣeduṣaḥ / abhivāñchitasaṃprāptigatacittasya tasya saḥ // 5.2.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śaktidevasya pārśvastho viṣṇudattaḥ samarthanam / vinodapūrvakaṃ kurvan kathāṃ kathitavān imām // 5.2.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
purābhūt sumahāvipro govindasvāmisaṃjñakaḥ / mahāgrahāre kālindyā upakaṇṭhaniveśini // 5.2.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
jāyete sma ca tasya dvau sadṛśau guṇaśālinaḥ / aśokadatto vijayadattaś ceti sutau kramāt // 5.2.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
kālena tatra vasatāṃ teṣām ajani dāruṇam / durbhikṣaṃ tena govindasvāmī bhāryām uvāca saḥ // 5.2.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayaṃ durbhikṣadoṣeṇa deśas tāvad vināśitaḥ / tan na śaknomy ahaṃ draṣṭuṃ suhṛdbāndhavadurgatim // 5.2.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dīyate ca kiyat kasya tasmād annaṃ yad asti naḥ / tad dattvā mittrabandhubhyo vrajāmo viṣayād itaḥ // 5.2.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vārāṇasīṃ ca vāsāya sakuṭumbāḥ śrayāmahe / ity uktayā so 'numato bhāryayānnam adān nijam // 5.2.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
sadārasutabhṛtyaś ca sa deśāt prayayau tataḥ / utsahante na hi draṣṭum uttamāḥ svajanāpadam // 5.2.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gacchaṃś ca mārge jaṭilaṃ bhasmapāṇḍuṃ kapālinam / sārdhacandram ivīśānaṃ mahāvratinam aikṣata // 5.2.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
upetya jñāninaṃ taṃ ca natvā snehena putrayoḥ / śubhāśubhaṃ sa papraccha so 'tha yogī jagāda tam // 5.2.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
putrau te bhāvikalyāṇau kiṃ tv etena kanīyasā / brahman vijayadattena viyogas te bhaviṣyati // 5.2.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'syāśokadattasya dvitīyasya prabhāvataḥ / etena saha yuṣmākaṃ bhūyo bhāvī samāgamaḥ // 5.2.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktas tena govindasvāmī sa jñāninā tadā / sukhaduḥkhādbhutākrāntas tam āmantrya tato yayau // 5.2.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāpya vārāṇasīṃ tāṃ ca tadbāhye caṇḍikāgṛhe / dinaṃ tatrāticakrāma devīpūjādikarmaṇā // 5.2.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāyaṃ ca tatraiva bahiḥ sakuṭumbas taros tale / samāvasat kārpaṭikaiḥ so 'nyadeśāgataiḥ saha // 5.2.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
rātrau ca tatra supteṣu sarveṣv adhigatādhvasu / śrānteṣv āstīrṇaparṇādipānthaśayyāniṣādiṣu // 5.2.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadīyasya vibuddhasya tasyākasmāt kanīyasaḥ / sūnor vijayadattasya mahāñ śītajvaro 'jani // 5.2.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tena sahasā bhāvibandhuviśleṣahetunā / bhayeneva jvareṇābhūd ūrdhvaromā savepathuḥ // 5.2.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śītārtaś ca prabodhyaiva pitaraṃ svam uvāca tam / bādhate tāta tīvro mām iha śītajvaro 'dhunā // 5.2.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tan me samidham ānīya śītaghnaṃ jvalayānalam / nānyathā mama śāntiḥ syān nayeyaṃ na ca yāminīm // 5.2.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā taṃ sa govindasvāmī tadvedanākulaḥ / tāvat kuto 'dhunā vahnir vatseti ca samabhyadhāt // 5.2.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nanv ayaṃ nikaṭe tāta dṛśyate 'gnir jvalann itaḥ / bhūyiṣṭhe 'traiva tad gatvā kiṃ nāṅgaṃ tāpayāmy aham // 5.2.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmāt sakampaṃ haste māṃ gṛhītvā prāpaya drutam / ity uktas tena putreṇa punar vipro 'pi so 'bravīt // 5.2.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
śmaśānam etad eṣā ca citā jvalati tat katham / gamyate 'tra piśācādibhīṣaṇe tvaṃ hi bālakaḥ // 5.2.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvā pitur vākyaṃ vatsalasya vihasya saḥ / vīro vijayadattas taṃ sāvaṣṭambham abhāṣata // 5.2.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ piśācādibhis tāta varākaiḥ kriyate mama / kim alpasattvaḥ ko 'py asmi tad aśaṅkaṃ nayātra mām // 5.2.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ity āgrahād vadantaṃ taṃ sa pitā tatra nītavān / so 'py aṅgaṃ tāpayan bālaś citām upasasarpa tām // 5.2.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jvalantīm analajvālādhūmavyākulamūrdhajām / nṛmāṃsagrāhiṇīṃ sākṣād iva rakṣo 'dhidevatām // 5.2.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣaṇāt tatra samāśvasya so 'rbhakaḥ pitaraṃ ca tam / citāntar dṛśyate vṛttaṃ kim etad iti pṛṣṭavān // 5.2.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kapālaṃ mānuṣasyaitac citāyāṃ putra dahyate / iti taṃ pratyavādīc ca so 'pi pārśvasthitaḥ pitā // 5.2.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ svasāhaseneva dīptāgreṇa nihatya tam / kapālaṃ sphoṭayām āsa kāṣṭhenaikena so 'rbhakaḥ // 5.2.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tenoccaiḥ prasṛtā tasmān mukhe tasyāpatad vasā / śmaśānavahninā naktaṃcarīsiddhir ivārpitā // 5.2.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadāsvādena bālaś ca saṃpanno 'bhūt sa rākṣasaḥ / ūrdhvakeśaḥ śikhotkhātakhaḍgo daṃṣṭrāviśaṅkaṭaḥ // 5.2.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ākṛṣya ca kapālaṃ tad vasāṃ pītvā lileha saḥ / asthilagnānalajvālālolayā nijajihvayā // 5.2.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tyaktakapālaḥ san pitaraṃ nijam eva tam / govindasvāminaṃ hantum udyatāsir iyeṣa saḥ // 5.2.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kapālasphoṭa bho deva na hantavyaḥ pitā tava / iti ehīti tatkālaṃ śmaśānād udabhūd vacaḥ // 5.2.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā nāma labdhvā ca kapālasphoṭa ity adaḥ / sa baṭuḥ pitaraṃ muktvā rakṣobhūtas tirodadhe // 5.2.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatpitā so 'pi govindasvāmī hā putra hā guṇin / hā hā vijayadatteti muktākrandas tato yayau // 5.2.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etya caṇḍīgṛhaṃ tac ca prātaḥ patnyai sutāya ca / jyāyase 'sokadattāya yathāvṛttaṃ śaśaṃsa saḥ // 5.2.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tābhyāṃ sahānabhravidyudāpātadāruṇam / yathā śokānalāveśam ājagāma sa tāpasaḥ // 5.2.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathā vārāṇasīsaṃstho devīsaṃdarśanāgataḥ / tatropetya jano 'py anyo yayau tatsamaduḥkhatām // 5.2.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca devīpūjārtham āgatyaiko mahāvaṇik / apaśyad atra govindasvāminaṃ taṃ tathāvidham // 5.2.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
samudradattanāmāsāv upetyāśvāsya taṃ dvijam / tadaiva svagṛhaṃ sādhur nināya saparicchadam // 5.2.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
snānādinopacāreṇa tatra cainam upācarat / nisargo hy eṣa mahatāṃ yadāpannānukampanam // 5.2.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
so 'pi jagrāha govindasvāmī patnyā samaṃ dhṛtim / mahāvrativacaḥ śrutvā jātāsthaḥ sutasaṃgame // 5.2.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ prabhṛti caitasyāṃ vārāṇasyām uvāsa saḥ / abhyarthito mahāḍhyasya tasy aiva vaṇijo gṛhe // 5.2.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatraivādhītavidyo 'sya sa sutaḥ prāptayauvanaḥ / dvitīyo 'śokadattākhyo bāhuyuddham aśikṣata // 5.2.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
krameṇa ca yayau tatra prakarṣaṃ sa tathā yathā / ajīyata na kenāpi pratimallena bhūtale // 5.2.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā devayātrāyāṃ tatra mallasamāgame / āgād eko mahāmallaḥ khyātimān dakṣiṇāpathāt // 5.2.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tenātra nikhilā mallā rājño vārāṇasīpateḥ / pratāpamukuṭākhyasya purato 'nye parājitāḥ // 5.2.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa rājā mallasya yuddhe tasya samādiśat / ānāyyāśokadattaṃ taṃ śrutaṃ tasmād vaṇigvarāt // 5.2.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi mallo bhujaṃ hatvā hastenārabhatāhavam / mallaṃ cāśokadattas tu bhujaṃ hatvā nyapātayat // 5.2.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tatra mahāmallanipātotthitaśabdayā / yuddhabhūmyāpi saṃtuṣya sādhuvāda ivodite // 5.2.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa rājāśokadattaṃ taṃ tuṣṭo ratnair apūrayat / cakāra cātmanaḥ pārśvavartinaṃ dṛṣṭavikramam // 5.2.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi rājñaḥ priyo bhūtvā dinaiḥ prāpa parāṃ śriyam / śevadhiḥ śūravidyasya viśeṣajño viśāṃpatiḥ // 5.2.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'tha jātu yayau rājā caturdaśyāṃ bahiḥ pure / supratiṣṭhāpitaṃ dūre devam arcayituṃ śivam // 5.2.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtārcanas tato naktaṃ śmaśānasyāntikena saḥ / āgacchann aśṛṇod etāṃ tanmadhyād udgatāṃ giram // 5.2.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ daṇḍādhipeneha mithyā badhyānukīrtanāt / dveṣeṇa viddhaḥ śūlāyāṃ tṛtīyaṃ divasaṃ prabho // 5.2.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
adyāpi na ca niryānti prāṇā me 'pāpakarmaṇaḥ / tad deva tṛṣito 'tyartham ahaṃ dāpaya me jalam // 5.2.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā kṛpayā rājā sa pārśvastham uvāca tam / aśokadattam asyāmbhaḥ prahiṇotu bhavān iti // 5.2.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ko 'tra rātrau vrajed deva tad gacchāmy aham ātmanā / ity uktvāśokadattaḥ sa gṛhītvāmbhas tato yayau // 5.2.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yāte ca svapurīṃ rājñi sa vīro gahanāntaram / mahattareṇa tamasā sarvato 'ntaradhiṣṭhitam // 5.2.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
śivāvakīrṇapiśitaprattasaṃdhyāmahābali / kvacitkvaciccitājyotirdīpradīpaprakāśitam // 5.2.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
lasaduttālavetālatālavādyaṃ viveśa tat / śmaśānaṃ kṛṣṇarajanīnivāsabhavanopamam // 5.2.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
kenāmbho yācitaṃ bhūpād ity uccais tatra sa bruvan / mayā yācitam ity evam aśṛṇod vācam ekataḥ // 5.2.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā tadanusāreṇa nikaṭasthaṃ citānalam / dadarśa tatra śūlāgre viddhaṃ kaṃcit sa pūruṣam // 5.2.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhaś ca tasya rudatīṃ sadalaṃkārabhūṣitām / adṛṣṭapūrvāṃ sarvāṅgasundarīṃ striyam aikṣata // 5.2.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kṛṣṇapakṣaparikṣīṇe gate 'staṃ rajanīpatau / citārohāya tadraśmiramyāṃ rātrim ivāgatām // 5.2.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kā tvam amba kathaṃ ceha rudaty evam avasthitā / iti pṛṣṭā ca sā tena yoṣid evaṃ tam abravīt // 5.2.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asyāhaṃ śūlaviddhasya bhāryā vigatalakṣaṇā / niścitāśā sthitāsmīha citārohe sahāmunā // 5.2.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṃcit kālaṃ pratīkṣe ca prāṇānām asya niṣkramam / tṛtīye 'hni gate 'py adya yānty etasya hi nāsavaḥ // 5.2.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yācate ca muhus toyam ānītaṃ ca mayeha tat / kiṃ tv ahaṃ nonnate śūle prāpnomy asya mukhaṃ sakhe // 5.2.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti tasyā vacaḥ śrutvā sa pravīro 'py uvāca tām / idaṃ tv asya nṛpeṇāpi haste me preṣitaṃ jalam // 5.2.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tan me pṛṣṭhe padaṃ dattvā dehy etasyaitadānane / na parasparśamātraṃ hi strīṇām āpadi dūṣaṇam // 5.2.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvā tathety āttajalā dattvā padadvayam / śūlamūlāvanamrasya pṛṣṭhaṃ tasyāruroha sā // 5.2.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣaṇād bhuvi svapṛṣṭhe ca raktabinduṣv aśaṅkitam / patatsu mukham unnamya sa vīro yāvad īkṣate // 5.2.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvat striyam apaśyat tāṃ chittvā churikayā muhuḥ / khādantīṃ tasya māṃsāni puṃsaḥ śūlāgravartinaḥ // 5.2.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tāṃ vikṛtiṃ matvā krodhād ākṛṣya sa kṣitau / āsphoṭayiṣyañ jagrāha pāde raṇitanūpure // 5.2.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sāpi taṃ tarasā pādam ākṣipyaiva svamāyayā / kṣipraṃ gaganam utpatya jagāma kvāpy adarśanam // 5.2.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya cāśokadattasya tatpādān maṇinūpuram / tasmād ākarṣaṇasrastam avatasthe karāntare // 5.2.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tāṃ peśalām ādāv adhaḥkartrīṃ ca madhyataḥ / ante vikāraghorāṃ ca durjanair iva saṃgatim // 5.2.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
naṣṭāṃ vicintayan paśyan haste divyaṃ ca nūpuram / savismayaḥ sābhitāpaḥ saharṣaś ca babhūva saḥ // 5.2.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
tataḥ śmaśānatas tasmāt sa jagāmāttanūpuraḥ / nijagehaṃ prabhāte ca snāto rājakulaṃ yayau // 5.2.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ tasya śūlaviddhasya dattaṃ vārīti pṛcchate / rājñe sa ca tathety uktvā taṃ nūpuram upānayat // 5.2.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etat kuta iti svairaṃ pṛṣṭas tena sa bhūbhṛtā / tasmai svarātrivṛttāntaṃ śaśaṃsādbhutabhīṣaṇam // 5.2.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataś cānanyasāmānyaṃ sattvaṃ tasyāvadhārya saḥ / tuṣṭo 'py anyaguṇotkarṣāt tutoṣa sutarāṃ nṛpaḥ // 5.2.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gṛhītvā nūpuraṃ taṃ ca gatvā devyai dadau svayam / hṛṣṭas tatprāptivṛttāntaṃ tasyai ca samavarṇayat // 5.2.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā tad buddhvā ca dṛṣṭvā ca taṃ divyaṃ maṇinūpuram / aśokadattaślāghaikatatparā mumude rahaḥ // 5.2.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tato jagāda tāṃ rājā devi jātyeva vidyayā / satyeneva ca rūpeṇa mahatām apy ayaṃ mahān // 5.2.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśokadatto bhavyāyā bhartā ca duhitur yadi / bhaven madanalekhāyās tad bhadram iti me matiḥ // 5.2.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
varasyāmī guṇāḥ prekṣyā na lakṣmīḥ kṣaṇabhaṅginī / tad etasmai pravīrāya dadāmy etāṃ sutām aham // 5.2.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti bhartur vacaḥ śrutvā devī sā sādarāvadat / yuktam etad asau hy asyā yuvā bhartānurūpakaḥ // 5.2.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā ca tena madhūdyānadṛṣṭena hṛtamānasā / śūnyāśayā dineṣv eṣu na śṛṇoti na paśyati // 5.2.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatsakhītaś ca tad buddhvā sacintāhaṃ niśākṣaye / suptā jāne striyā svapne kayāpy uktāsmi divyayā // 5.2.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vatse madanalekheyaṃ deyānyasmai na kanyakā / eṣa hy aśokadattasya bhāryā janmāntarārjitā // 5.2.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac ca śrutvā prabuddhyaiva gatvā pratyūṣa eva ca / svayaṃ tatpratyayād vatsāṃ samāśvāsitavaty aham // 5.2.168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
idānīṃ cāryaputreṇa svayam eva mamoditam / tasmāt sametu tenāsau vṛkṣeṇevārtavī latā // 5.2.169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktaḥ priyayā prītaḥ sa rājā racitotsavaḥ / āhūyāśokadattāya tasmai tāṃ tanayāṃ dadau // 5.2.170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tayoś ca so 'bhūd rājendraputrīviprendraputrayoḥ / saṃgamo 'nyonyaśobhāyai lakṣmīvinayayor iva // 5.2.171	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ kadācid rājānaṃ taṃ devī vadati sma sā / aśokadattānītaṃ tad uddiśya maṇinūpuram // 5.2.172	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
āryaputrāyam ekākī nūpuro na virājate / anurūpas tad etasya dvitīyaḥ parikalpyatām // 5.2.173	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā hemakārādīn ādideśa sa bhūpatiḥ / nūpurasyāsya sadṛśo dvitīyaḥ kriyatām iti // 5.2.174	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
te tan nirūpya jagadur nedṛśo deva śakyate / aparaḥ kartum etad dhi divyaṃ śilpaṃ na mānuṣam // 5.2.175	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ratnānīdṛṃśi bhūyāṃsi na bhavanty eva bhūtale / tasmād eṣa yataḥ prāptas tatraivānyo gaveṣyatām // 5.2.176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvā sadevīke viṣaṇṇe rājñi tatkṣaṇam / aśokadattas tatrasthas tad dṛṣṭvā sahasābravīt // 5.2.177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
aham evānayāmy asya dvitīyaṃ nūpurasya te / evaṃ kṛtapratijñaś ca rājñā sāhasaśaṅkinā // 5.2.178	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
snehān nivāryamāṇo 'pi niścayān na cacāla saḥ / gṛhītvā nūpuraṃ tac ca śmaśānaṃ sa punar yayau // 5.2.179	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
niśi kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ yatraiva tam avāptavān / praviśya tatra ca prājyacitādhūmamalīmasaiḥ // 5.2.180	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pāśopaveṣṭitagalaskandhollambitamānuṣaiḥ / pādapair iva rakṣobhir ākīrṇe pitṛkānane // 5.2.181	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
apaśyan pūrvadṛṣṭāṃ tāṃ striyaṃ tannūpurāptaye / upāyam ekaṃ bubudhe sa mahāmāṃsavikrayam // 5.2.182	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tarupāśād gṛhītvātha śavaṃ babhrāma tatra saḥ / vikrīṇāno mahāmāṃsaṃ gṛhyatām iti ghoṣayan // 5.2.183	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mahāsattva gṛhītvaitad ehi tāvan mayā saha / iti kṣaṇāc ca jagade sa dūrād ekayā striyā // 5.2.184	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tac chrutvā sa tathaivaitām upetyānusaran striyam / ārāt tarutale divyarūpāṃ yoṣitam aikṣata // 5.2.185	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
strībhir vṛtām āsanasthāṃ ratnābharaṇabhāsurām / asaṃbhāvyasthitiṃ tatra marāv ambhojinīm iva // 5.2.186	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
striyā tayopanītaś ca tām upetya tathāsthitām / nṛmāṃsam asmi vikrīṇe gṛhyatām ity uvāca saḥ // 5.2.187	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bho mahāsattva mūlyena kenaitad dīyate tvayā / iti sāpi tadāha sma divyarūpā kilāṅganā // 5.2.188	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa vīro hastasthaṃ tam ekaṃ maṇinūpuram / saṃdarśya skandhapṛṣṭhasthapretakāyo jagāda tām // 5.2.189	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
yo dadāty asya sadṛśaṃ dvitīyaṃ nūpurasya me / māṃsaṃ tasya dadāmy etad asty asau yadi gṛhyatām // 5.2.190	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sāpy avādīt tam asty anyo nūpuro mama / asau madīya evaiko nūpuro hi hṛtas tvayā // 5.2.191	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saivāhaṃ yā tvayā dṛṣṭā śūlaviddhasya pārśvataḥ / kṛtānyarūpā bhavatā parijñātāsmi nādhunā // 5.2.192	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tat kiṃ māṃsena yad ahaṃ vacmi te tat karoṣi cet / tad dvitīyaṃ dadāmy asya tulyaṃ tubhyaṃ svanūpuram // 5.2.193	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktaḥ sa tadā vīraḥ pratipadya tad abravīt / yat tvaṃ vadasi tat sarvaṃ karomy eva kṣaṇād iti // 5.2.194	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tasmai jagādaivam ā mūlāt sā manīṣitam / asti bhadra trighaṇṭākhyaṃ himavacchikhare puram // 5.2.195	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāsīl lambajihvākhyaḥ pravīro rākṣasādhipaḥ / tasya vidyucchikhā nāma bhāryāhaṃ kāmarūpiṇī // 5.2.196	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa caikasyāṃ sutāyāṃ me jātāyāṃ daivataḥ patiḥ / prabhoḥ kapālasphoṭasya purato nihato raṇe // 5.2.197	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tato nijapuraṃ tan me prabhuṇā tena tuṣyatā / pradattaṃ tena ca sukhaṃ sthitāsmi sasutādhunā // 5.2.198	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
sā ca madduhitedānīm ārūḍhā navayauvanam / tatpravīravaraprāpticintā ca mama mānasam // 5.2.199	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atas tadā samaṃ rājñā yāntaṃ tvām amunā pathā / dṛṣṭvā naktaṃ caturdaśyām ihasthāham acintayam // 5.2.200	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayaṃ bhavyo yuvā vīro yogyo me duhituḥ patiḥ / tad etatprāptaye kaṃcid upāyaṃ kiṃ na kalpaye // 5.2.201	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti saṃkalpya yācitvā śūlaviddhavacomiṣāt / jalaṃ madhye śmaśānaṃ tvam ānīto 'bhūr mayā mṛṣā // 5.2.202	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
māyādarśitarūpādiprapañcālīkavādinī / vipralabdhavatī cāsmi tatra tvāṃ kṣaṇamātrakam // 5.2.203	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ākarṣaṇāya bhūyas te yuktyā caikaṃ svanūpuram / saṃtyajya śṛṅkhalāpāśam iva yātā tato 'py aham // 5.2.204	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adya cetthaṃ mayā prāpto bhavāṃs tad gṛham etya naḥ / bhajasva me sutāṃ kiṃ ca gṛhāṇāparanūpuram // 5.2.205	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktaḥ sa niśācaryā tathety uktvā tayā saha / vīro gaganamārgeṇa tatsiddhyā tatpuraṃ yayau // 5.2.206	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sauvarṇaṃ tad apaśyac ca śṛṅge himavataḥ puram / nabho 'dhvakhedaviśrāntam arkabimbam ivācalam // 5.2.207	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rakṣo 'dhipasutāṃ tatra nāmnā vidyutprabhāṃ sa tām / svasāhasamahāsiddhim iva mūrtām avāptavān // 5.2.208	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tayā ca saha tatraiva kaṃcit kālam uvāsa saḥ / aśokadattaḥ priyayā śvaśrūvibhavanirvṛtaḥ // 5.2.209	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tato jagāda tāṃ śvaśrūṃ mahyaṃ tad dehi nūpuram / yataḥ saṃprati gantavyā purī vārāṇasī mayā // 5.2.210	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra hy etat pratijñātaṃ svayaṃ narapateḥ puraḥ / ekatvannūpuraspardhidvitīyānayanaṃ mayā // 5.2.211	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktā tena sā śvaśrūr dvitīyaṃ taṃ svanūpuram / tasmai dattvā punaś caikaṃ suvarṇakamalaṃ dadau // 5.2.212	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāptābjanūpuras tasmāt sa purān niryayau tataḥ / aśokadatto vacasā niyamyāgamanaṃ punaḥ // 5.2.213	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tayā śvaśrvaiva cākāśapathena punar eva tam / śmaśānaṃ prāpitaḥ so 'bhūn nijasiddhiprabhāvataḥ // 5.2.214	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tarumūle ca tatraiva sthitvā sā taṃ tato 'bravīt / sadā kṛṣṇacaturdaśyām iha rātrāv upaimy aham // 5.2.215	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāṃ niśi ca bhūyo 'pi tvam eṣyasi yadā yadā / tadā tadā vaṭataror mūlāt prāpsyasi mām itaḥ // 5.2.216	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
etac chrutvā tathety uktvā tām āmantrya niśācarīm / aśokadattaḥ sa tato yayau tāvat pitur gṛham // 5.2.217	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
kanīyaḥsutaviśleṣaduḥkhadvaiguṇyadāyinā / tādṛśā tatpravāsena pitarau tatra duḥkhitau // 5.2.218	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atarkitāgato yāvad ānandayati tatkṣaṇāt / tāvat sa buddhvā śvaśuras tatraivāsyāyayau nṛpaḥ // 5.2.219	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
sa taṃ sāhasikasparśabhītair iva sakaṇṭakaiḥ / aṅgaiḥ praṇatam āliṅgya mumude bhūpatiś ciram // 5.2.220	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tena samaṃ rājñā viveśa nṛpamandiram / aśokadattaḥ sa tadā pramodo mūrtimān iva // 5.2.221	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
dadau rājñe sa saṃyuktaṃ tad divyaṃ nūpuradvayam / kurvāṇam iva tadvīryastutiṃ jhaṇajhaṇāravaiḥ // 5.2.222	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arpayām āsa tac cāsmai kāntaṃ kanakapaṅkajam / rakṣaḥkoṣaśriyo hastāl līlāmbujam ivāhṛtam // 5.2.223	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pṛṣṭo 'tha kautukāt tena rājñā devīyutena saḥ / avarṇayad yathāvṛttaṃ svaṃ karṇānandadāyi tat // 5.2.224	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vicitracaritollekhacamatkāritacetanam / prāpyate kiṃ yaśaḥ śubhram anaṅgīkṛtya sāhasam // 5.2.225	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ vadaṃs tatas tena jāmātrā kṛtakṛtyatām / mene sa rājā devī ca prāptanūpurayugmakā // 5.2.226	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
utsavātodyanirhrādi tadā rājagṛhaṃ ca tat / aśokadattasya guṇānudgāyad iva nirbabhau // 5.2.227	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
anyedyuś ca sa rājā tat svakṛte surasadmani / hemābjaṃ sthāpayām āsa sadraupyakalaśopari // 5.2.228	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ubhau kalaśapadmau ca śuśubhāte sitāruṇau / yaśaḥpratāpāv iva tau bhūpālāśokadattayoḥ // 5.2.229	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tādṛśau ca vilokyaitau sa harṣotphullalocanaḥ / rājā māheśvaro bhaktirasāveśād abhāṣata // 5.2.230	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho vibhāti padmena tuṅgo 'yaṃ kalaśo 'munā / bhūtiśubhraḥ kapardīva jaṭājūṭena babhruṇā // 5.2.231	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhaviṣyad dvitīyaṃ ced īdṛśaṃ kanakāmbujam / asthāpayiṣyatāmuṣmin dvitīye kalaśe 'pi tat // 5.2.232	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti rājavacaḥ śrutvāśokadattas tato 'bravīt / āneṣyāmy aham ambhojaṃ dvitīyam api deva te // 5.2.233	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā na mamānyena paṅkajena prayojanam / alaṃ te sāhaseneti rājāpi pratyuvāca tam // 5.2.234	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
divaseṣv atha yāteṣu hemābjaharaṇaiṣiṇi / aśokadatte sā bhūyo 'py agāt kṛṣṇacaturdaśī // 5.2.235	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tasyāṃ cāsya suvarṇābjavāñchāṃ buddhvā bhayād iva / dyusaraḥsvarṇakamale yāte 'staśikharaṃ ravau // 5.2.236	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
saṃdhyāruṇābhrapiśitagrāsagarvād iva kṣaṇāt / tamorakṣaḥsu dhāvatsu dhūmadhūmreṣu sarvataḥ // 5.2.237	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sphuraddīpāvalīdantamālābhāsvarabhīṣaṇe / jṛmbhamāṇe mahāraudre niśānaktaṃcarīmukhe // 5.2.238	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prasuptarājaputrīkāt svairaṃ nirgatya mandirāt / aśokadattaḥ sa yayau śmaśānaṃ punar eva tat // 5.2.239	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tatra tasmin vaṭataror mūle tāṃ punar āgatām / dadarśa rākṣasīṃ śvaśrūṃ vihitasvāgatādarām // 5.2.240	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tayā ca saha bhūyas tad agamat tanniketanam / sa yuvā himavacchṛṅgaṃ mārgonmukhavadhūjanam // 5.2.241	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tac chrutvā sāpy avādīt taṃ kuto 'nyat paṅkajaṃ mama / etat kapālasphoṭasya vidyate 'smatprabhoḥ saraḥ // 5.2.243	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
atredṛśāni jāyante hemābjāni samantataḥ / tasmāt tad ekaṃ madbhartre prītyā padmaṃ sa dattavān // 5.2.244	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
evaṃ tayokte so 'vādīt tarhi tan māṃ sarovaram / naya yāvat svayaṃ tasmād ādāsye kanakāmbujam // 5.2.245	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
na śakyam etad rakṣobhir dāruṇais tad dhi rakṣyate / evaṃ niṣiddho 'pi tayā nirbandhaṃ na sa taṃ jahau // 5.2.246	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tataḥ kathaṃcin nītaś ca tayā śvaśrvā dadarśa tat / dūrāt sarovaraṃ divyaṃ tuṅgādrikaṭakāśritam // 5.2.247	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
channaṃ nirantaroddaṇḍadīptahemasaroruhaiḥ / satatonmukhatāpītasaṃkrāntārkaprabhair iva // 5.2.248	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvaiva tatra yāvac ca padmāny avacinoti saḥ / tāvat tadrakṣiṇo ghorā rurudhus taṃ niśācarāḥ // 5.2.249	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tataḥ śastraṃ samutsṛjya harṣabāṣpāplutekṣaṇaḥ / dhāvitvā pādayoḥ sadyaḥ patitvā ca jagāda tam // 5.2.253	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ vijayadattākhyaḥ sodaryaḥ sa tavānujaḥ / āvāṃ dvijavarasyobhau govindasvāminaḥ sutau // 5.2.254	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iyac ciraṃ ca jāto 'haṃ daivād īdṛṅ niśācaraḥ / citākapāladalanāt kapālasphoṭanāmakaḥ // 5.2.255	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tvaddarśanād idānīṃ ca brāhmaṇyaṃ tat smṛtaṃ mayā / gataṃ ca rākṣasatvaṃ me mohācchāditacetanam // 5.2.256	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ vijayadattasya vadataḥ parirabhya saḥ / yāvat kṣālayatīvāṅgaṃ rākṣasībhāvadūṣitam // 5.2.257	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśokadatto bāṣpāmbupūrais tāvad avātarat / prajñaptikauśiko nāma vidyādharagurur divaḥ // 5.2.258	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tau dvāv apy upetyaiva bhrātarau gurur abravīt / yūyaṃ vidyādharāḥ sarve śāpād etāṃ daśāṃ gatāḥ // 5.2.259	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhunā ca sa śāpo vaḥ sarveṣāṃ śāntim āgataḥ / tad gṛhṇīta nijā vidyā bandhusādhāraṇīr imāḥ // 5.2.260	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vrajataṃ ca nijaṃ dhāma svīkṛtasvajanau yuvām / ity uktvā dattavidyo 'sau tayor dyām udyayau guruḥ // 5.2.261	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tau ca vidyādharībhūtau prabuddhau jagmatus tataḥ / vyomnā tad dhimavacchṛṅgaṃ gṛhītakanakāmbujau // 5.2.262	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra cāśokadattas tāṃ rakṣaḥpatisutāṃ priyām / upāgāt sāpy abhūt kṣīṇaśāpā vidyādharī tadā // 5.2.263	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tayā ca sākaṃ sudṛśā bhrātarau tāv ubhāv api / vārāṇasīṃ prayayatuḥ kṣaṇād gaganagāminau // 5.2.264	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatra copetya pitarau viprayogāgnitāpitau / niravāpayatāṃ sadyo darśanāmṛtavarṣiṇau // 5.2.265	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
adehabhede 'py ākrāntacitrajanmāntarau ca tau / na pitror eva lokasyāpy utsavāya babhūvatuḥ // 5.2.266	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
cirād vijayadattaś ca gāḍham āśliṣyataḥ pituḥ / bhujamadhyam ivātyarthaṃ manoratham apūrayat // 5.2.267	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tatsatkṛtaś ca tadrājadhānīṃ sotkasthitapriyām / aśokadattaḥ svajanaiḥ sārdhaṃ baddhotsavām agāt // 5.2.269	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)

tato vijayadattaṃ taṃ sarveṣv atra sthiteṣu saḥ / pitā papraccha govindasvāmī sāścaryakautukaḥ // 5.2.271	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadā śmaśāne yāminyāṃ rākṣasatvaṃ gatasya te / abhavat kīdṛśo vatsa vṛttānto varṇyatām iti // 5.2.272	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vijayadattas taṃ babhāṣe tāta cāpalāt / prasphoṭitacitādīptakapālo 'haṃ vidher vaśāt // 5.2.273	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mukhapraviṣṭayā sadyas tadvasāchaṭayā tadā / rakṣobhūtas tvayā tāvad dṛṣṭo māyāvimohitaḥ // 5.2.274	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kapālasphoṭa ity evaṃ nāma kṛtvā hi rākṣasaiḥ / tato 'nyair aham āhūtas tanmadhye milito 'bhavam // 5.2.275	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taiś ca nīto nijasyāsmi pārśvaṃ rakṣaḥpateḥ kramāt / so 'pi dṛṣṭvaiva māṃ prītaḥ senāpatye nyayojayat // 5.2.276	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ kadācid gandharvān abhiyoktuṃ madena saḥ / gato rakṣaḥpatis tatra saṅgrāme nihato 'ribhiḥ // 5.2.277	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadaiva pratipannaṃ ca tadbhṛtyair mama śāsanam / tato 'haṃ rakṣasāṃ rājyam akārṣaṃ tatpure sthitaḥ // 5.2.278	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

anantaraṃ yathāsmābhiḥ śāpamokṣavaśān nijāḥ / vidyāḥ prāptās tathāryo vaḥ kṛtsnam āvedayiṣyati // 5.2.280	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ vijayadattena tena tatra nivedite / aśokadattaḥ sa tadā tad ā mūlād avarṇayat // 5.2.281	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
purā vidyādharau santau gaganād gālavāśrame / āvāṃ snāntīr apaśyāva gaṅgāyāṃ munikanyakāḥ // 5.2.282	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tulyābhilāṣās tāś cātra vāñchantau sahasā rahaḥ / buddhvā tadbandhubhiḥ krodhāc chaptau svo divyadṛṣṭibhiḥ // 5.2.283	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
pāpācārau prajāyethāṃ martyayonau yuvām ubhau / tatrāpi viprayogaś ca vicitro vāṃ bhaviṣyati // 5.2.284	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mānuṣāgocare deśe viprakṛṣṭe 'py upāgatam / ekaṃ dṛṣṭvā dvitīyo vāṃ yadā prajñānam āpsyati // 5.2.285	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadā vidyādharaguror vidyāṃ prāpya bhaviṣyathaḥ / punar vidyādharau yuktau śāpamuktau svabandhubhiḥ // 5.2.286	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ tair munibhiḥ śaptau jātāv āvām ubhāv iha / viyogo 'tra yathā bhūtas tat sarvaṃ viditaṃ ca vaḥ // 5.2.287	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
idānīṃ padmahetoś ca śvaśrūsiddhiprabhāvataḥ / rakṣaḥpateḥ puraṃ gatvā prāpto 'yaṃ cānujo mayā // 5.2.288	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatraiva ca guroḥ prāpya vidyāḥ prajñaptikauśikāt / sadyo vidyādharībhūya vayaṃ kṣipram ihāgatāḥ // 5.2.289	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā pitarau ca tau priyatamāṃ tāṃ cātmajāṃ bhūpateḥ sadyaḥ śāpatamovimokṣamudito vidyāviśeṣair nijaiḥ / tais taiḥ saṃvyabhajad vicitracaritaḥ so 'śokadattas tadā yenaite sapadi prabuddhamanaso 'jāyanta vidyādharāḥ // 5.2.290	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
tatas tam āmantrya nṛpaṃ sa sākaṃ mātāpitṛbhyāṃ dayitādvayena / utpatya dhanyo nijacakravartidhāma dyumārgeṇa javī jagāma // 5.2.291	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
tatrālokya tam ājñāṃ prāpya ca tasmād aśokavega iti / nāma sa bibhrat so 'pi ca tadbhrātā vijayavega iti // 5.2.292	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
vidyādharavarataruṇau svajanānugatāv ubhau nijanivāsam / govindakūṭasaṃjñakam acalavaraṃ bhrātarau yayatuḥ // 5.2.293	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
so 'py āścaryavaśaḥ pratāpamukuṭo vārāṇasībhūpatiḥ svasmin devakule dvitīyakalaśanyastaikahemāmbujaḥ / taddattair aparaiḥ suvarṇakamalair abhyarcitatryambakas tatsaṃbandhamahattayā pramudito mene kṛtārthaṃ kulam // 5.2.294	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
evaṃ divyāḥ kāraṇenāvatīrṇā jāyante 'smiñ jantavo jīvaloke / sattvotsāhau svocitau te dadhānā duṣprāpām apy arthasiddhiṃ labhante // 5.2.295	śālinī [11: mttgg]
tat sattvasāgara bhavān api ko'pi jāne devāṃśa eva bhavitā ca yatheṣṭasiddhiḥ / prāyaḥ kriyāsu mahatām api duṣkarāsu sotsāhatā kathayati prakṛter viśeṣam // 5.2.296	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
sāpi tvadīpsitā nanu divyā rājātmajā kanakarekhā / bālānyathā hi vāñchati kanakapurīdarśinaṃ kathaṃ hi patim // 5.2.297	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
iti rahasi niśamya viṣṇudattāt sarasakathāprakaraṃ sa śaktidevaḥ / hṛdi kanakapurīvilokanaiṣī dhṛtim avalambya nināya ca triyāmām // 5.2.298	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
tatas tatrotsthaladvīpe prabhāte taṃ maṭhasthitam / śaktidevaṃ sa dāśendraḥ satyavrata upāyayau // 5.3.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca prākpratipannaḥ sann upetyainam abhāṣata / brahmaṃs tvadiṣṭasiddhyartham upāyaś cintito mayā // 5.3.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asti dvīpavaraṃ madhye ratnakūṭākhyam ambudheḥ / kṛtapratiṣṭhas tatrāste bhagavān harir abdhinā // 5.3.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
āṣāḍhaśukladvādaśyāṃ tatra yātrotsave sadā / āyānti sarvadvīpebhyaḥ pūjāyai yatnato janāḥ // 5.3.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatra jñāyeta kanakapurī sā jātucit purī / tad ehi tatra gacchāvaḥ pratyāsannā hi sā tithiḥ // 5.3.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti satyavratenoktaḥ śaktidevas tatheti saḥ / jagrāha hṛṣṭaḥ pātheyaṃ viṣṇudattopakalpitam // 5.3.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tato vahanam āruhya sa satyavrataḍhaukitam / tenaiva sākaṃ tvaritaḥ prāyād vāridhivartmanā // 5.3.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
gacchaṃś ca tatra sa dvīpanibhanakre 'dbhutālaye / satyavrataṃ taṃ papraccha karṇadhāratayā sthitam // 5.3.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ito dūraṃ mahābhogaṃ kim etad dṛśyate 'mbudhau / yadṛcchāprodgatodagrasapakṣagirivibhramam // 5.3.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ satyavrato 'vādīd asau devo vaṭadrumaḥ / asyāhuḥ sumahāvartam adhastād vaḍavāmukham // 5.3.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etaṃ ca parihṛtyaiva pradeśam iha gamyate / atrāvarte gatānāṃ hi na bhavaty āgamaḥ punaḥ // 5.3.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti satyavrate tasmin vadaty evāmbuvegataḥ / tasyām eva pravavṛte gantuṃ tadvahanaṃ diśi // 5.3.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tad dṛṣṭvā śaktidevaṃ sa punaḥ satyavrato 'bravīt / brahman vināśakālo 'yaṃ dhruvam asmākam āgataḥ // 5.3.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yad akasmāt pravahaṇaṃ paśyātraiva prayāty adaḥ / śakyate naiva roddhuṃ ca katham apy adhunā mayā // 5.3.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad āvarte gabhīre 'tra vayaṃ mṛtyor ivānane / kṣiptā evāmbunākṛṣya karmaṇeva balīyasā // 5.3.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac ca naiva me duḥkhaṃ śarīraṃ kasya hi sthiram / duḥkhaṃ tu yan na siddhas te kṛcchreṇāpi manorathaḥ // 5.3.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad yāvad vārayāmy etad ahaṃ pravahaṇaṃ manāk / tāvad asyāvalambethāḥ śākhāṃ vaṭataror drutam // 5.3.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kadācij jīvitopāyo bhaved bhavyākṛtes tava / vidher vilāsān abdheś ca taraṅgān ko hi tarkayet // 5.3.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
iti satyavratasyāsya dhīrasattvasya jalpataḥ / babhūva nikaṭe tasya taroḥ pravahaṇaṃ tataḥ // 5.3.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkṣaṇaṃ sa kṛtotphālaḥ śaktidevo visādhvasaḥ / pṛthulām agrahīc chākhāṃ tasyābdhivaṭaśākhinaḥ // 5.3.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
satyavratas tu vahatā dehena vahanena ca / parārthakalpitenātra viveśa vaḍavāmukham // 5.3.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

na tāvat sā ca kanakapurī dṛṣṭā mayā purī / apade naśyatā tāvad dāśendro 'py eṣa nāśitaḥ // 5.3.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
yadi vā satatanyastapadā sarvasya mūrdhani / kāmaṃ bhagavatī kena bhajyate bhavitavyatā // 5.3.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity avasthocitaṃ tasya tataś cintayatas tadā / viprayūnas taruskandhe dinaṃ tat paryahīyata // 5.3.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

dattāskando vahan pṛṣṭhe śaktidevam alakṣitam / kṣaṇād agacchat kanakapurīṃ tāṃ carituṃ punaḥ // 5.3.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tatrodyānāntare tasminn ūpaviṣṭe vihaṃgame / sa śaktidevo nibhṛtaṃ tasya pṛṣṭhād avātarat // 5.3.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
