praviśya cāntaḥ sadratnaparyaṅke nyastatūlike / paṭāvaguṇṭhitatanuṃ śayānaṃ kaṃcid aikṣata // 5.3.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
vīkṣate yāvad utkṣipya paṭaṃ tāvan mṛtāṃ tathā / paropakārinṛpates tanayāṃ varakanyakām // 5.3.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
dṛṣṭvā cācintayat so 'tha kim idaṃ mahad adbhutam / kim aprabodhasupteyaṃ kiṃ vā bhrāntir abādhakā // 5.3.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yasyāḥ kṛte pravāso 'yaṃ mama saiveha tiṣṭhati / asāv apagataprāṇā tatra deśe ca jīvati // 5.3.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amlānakāntir asyāś ca tad vidhātrā mama dhruvam / kenāpi kāraṇenedam indrajālaṃ vitanyate // 5.3.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti saṃcintya nirgatya tāv anyau maṇḍapau kramāt / praviśyāntaḥ sa dadṛśe tadvad anye ca kanyake // 5.3.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tato 'pi nirgatas tasya sāścaryo mandirasya saḥ / upaviṣṭaḥ sthito 'paśyad vāpīm atyuttamām adhaḥ // 5.3.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tattīre ratnaparyāṇaṃ dadarśaikaṃ ca vājinam / tenāvatīryaiva tatas tatpārśvaṃ kautukād yayau // 5.3.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
iyeṣa ca tam āroḍhuṃ śūnyaṃ dṛṣṭvā sa tena ca / aśvenāhatya pādena tasyāṃ vāpyāṃ nicikṣape // 5.3.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tannimagnaḥ sa ca kṣipraṃ vardhamānapurān nijāt / udyānadīrghikāmadhyād unmamajja sasaṃbhramaḥ // 5.3.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dadarśa janmabhūmau ca sadyo vāpījale sthitam / ātmānaṃ kumudais tulyaṃ dīnaṃ candraprabhāṃ vinā // 5.3.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vardhamānapuraṃ kvedaṃ kva sā vaidyādharī purī / aho kim etad āścaryamāyāḍambarajṛmbhitam // 5.3.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṣṭaṃ kim api kenāpi mandabhāgyo 'smi vañcitaḥ / yadi vā ko 'tra jānāti kīdṛśī bhavitavyatā // 5.3.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ādi cintayan so 'tha vāpīmadhyāt samutthitaḥ / savismayaḥ śaktidevo yayau pitṛgṛhaṃ nijam // 5.3.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
tatrāpadiṣṭapaṭahabhramaṇaḥ kṛtakaitavaḥ / pitrābhinanditas tasthau sotsavaiḥ svajanaiḥ saha // 5.3.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
dvitīye 'hni bahir gehān nirgataś cāśṛṇot punaḥ / ghoṣyamāṇaṃ sapaṭahaṃ pure tasminn idaṃ vacaḥ // 5.3.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
viprakṣatriyamadhyāt kanakapurī yena tattvato dṛṣṭā / vaktu sa tasmai tanayāṃ sayauvarājyāṃ dadāti nṛpaḥ // 5.3.94	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
tac chrutvaiva sa gatvā tān paṭahodghoṣakān kṛtī / mayā dṛṣṭā purī seti śaktidevo 'bravīt punaḥ // 5.3.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tais tūrṇaṃ nṛpater agraṃ sa nīto 'bhūn nṛpo 'pi tam / prāgvan mene parijñāya punar vitathavādinam // 5.3.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mithyā ced vacmi na mayā dṛṣṭa sā nagarī yadi / tad idānīṃ śarīrasya nigraheṇa paṇo mama // 5.3.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
adya sā rājaputrī māṃ pṛcchatv ity udite tataḥ / gatvā cānucarai rājā tatraivānāyayat sutām // 5.3.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā dṛṣṭā dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ taṃ vipraṃ rājānam abhyadhāt / tāta mithyaiva bhūyo 'pi kiṃcid vakṣyaty asāv iti // 5.3.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śaktidevas tato 'vādīd ahaṃ satyaṃ mṛṣaiva vā / vacmi rājasute tvaṃ tu vadaivaṃ mama kautukam // 5.3.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mayā kanakapuryāṃ tvaṃ paryaṅke gatajīvitā / dṛṣṭā ceha ca paśyāmi jīvantīṃ bhavatīṃ katham // 5.3.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktā śaktidevena sābhijñānaṃ nṛpātmajā / sadyaḥ kanakarekhā sā jagādaivaṃ pituḥ puraḥ // 5.3.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāta dṛṣṭāmunā satyaṃ nagarī sā mahātmanā / acirāc caiṣa bhartā me tatrasthāyā bhaviṣyati // 5.3.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra madbhaginīś cānyās tisro 'yaṃ pariṇeṣyati / vidyādharādhirājyaṃ ca tasyāṃ puri kariṣyati // 5.3.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mayā tv adya praveṣṭavyā svā tanuś ca purī ca sā / muneḥ śāpād ahaṃ hy atra jātābhūvaṃ bhavadgṛhe // 5.3.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yadā kanakapuryāṃ te deham ālokya mānuṣaḥ / martyabhāvabhṛtas tattvapratibhedaṃ kariṣyati // 5.3.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadā te śāpamuktiś ca sa ca syān mānuṣaḥ patiḥ / iti me ca sa śāpāntaṃ punar evādiśan muniḥ // 5.3.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jātismarā ca mānuṣye 'py ahaṃ jñānavatī tathā / tad vrajāmy adhunā siddhyai nijaṃ vaidyādharaṃ padam // 5.3.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā rājaputrī sā tanuṃ tyaktvā tirodadhe / tumulaś codabhūt tasminn ākrando rājamandire // 5.3.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śaktidevo 'py ubhayato bhraṣṭas tais tair duruttaraiḥ / kleśaiḥ prāpyāpi na prāpte dhyāyaṃs te dve api priye // 5.3.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
nindan khinno 'pi cātmānam asaṃpūrṇamanorathaḥ / nirgatya rājabhavanāt kṣaṇād evam acintayat // 5.3.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
abhīṣṭaṃ bhāvi me tāvad uktaṃ kanakarekhayā / tat kimarthaṃ viṣīdāmi sattvādhīnā hi siddhayaḥ // 5.3.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pathā tenaiva kanakapurīṃ gacchāmi tāṃ punaḥ / bhūyo 'py avaśyaṃ daivaṃ me tatropāyaṃ kariṣyati // 5.3.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ity ālocyaiva sa prāyāc chaktidevaḥ purāt tataḥ / asiddhārthā nivartante na hi dhīrāḥ kṛtodyamāḥ // 5.3.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gacchaṃś cirāc ca saṃprāpa jaladheḥ pulinasthitam / tad viṭaṅkapuraṃ nāma nagaraṃ punar eva saḥ // 5.3.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāpaśyac ca vaṇijaṃ taṃ saṃmukham upāgatam / yena sākaṃ gatasyābdhiṃ potam ādāv abhajyata // 5.3.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'yaṃ samudradattaḥ syāt kathaṃ ca patito 'mbudhau / uttīrṇo 'yaṃ na vā citram aham eva nidarśanam // 5.3.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ālocya sa yāvat tam abhyeti vaṇijaṃ dvijaḥ / tāvat sa taṃ parijñāya hṛṣṭaḥ kaṇṭhe 'grahīd vaṇik // 5.3.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anaiṣīc ca nijaṃ gehaṃ kṛtātithyaś ca pṛṣṭavān / potabhaṅge tvam ambhodheḥ katham uttirṇavān iti // 5.3.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śaktidevo 'pi vṛttāntaṃ tathā taṃ kṛtsnam abravīt / yathā matsyanigīrṇaḥ prāg utsthaladvīpam āpa saḥ // 5.3.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anantaraṃ ca tam api pratyapṛcchad vaṇigvaram / kathaṃ tadā tvam apy abdhim uttirṇo varṇyatām iti // 5.3.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
athābravīt so 'pi vaṇik tadāhaṃ patito 'mbudhau / dinatrayaṃ bhramann āsam ekaṃ phalahakaṃ śritaḥ // 5.3.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tena pathākasmād ekaṃ vahanam āgatam / tatrasthaiś cāham ākrandan dṛṣṭvā cātrādhiropitaḥ // 5.3.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ārūḍhaś cātra pitaraṃ svam apaśyam ahaṃ tadā / gatvā dvīpāntaraṃ pūrvaṃ cirāt tatkālam āgatam // 5.3.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa māṃ dṛṣṭvā parijñāya kṛtakaṇṭhagrahaḥ pitā / rudann apṛcchad vṛttāntam ahaṃ caivaṃ tam abruvam // 5.3.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
cirakālaprayāte 'pi tāta tvayy anupāgate / svadharma iti vāṇijye svayam asmi pravṛttavān // 5.3.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato dvīpāntaraṃ gacchann ahaṃ vahanabhaṅgataḥ / adyāmbudhau nimagnaḥ san prāpya yuṣmābhir uddhṛtaḥ // 5.3.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ mayoktas tāto māṃ sopālambham abhāṣata / ārohasi kim arthaṃ tvam īdṛśān prāṇasaṃśayān // 5.3.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
dhanam asti hi me putra sthitaś cāhaṃ tadarjane / paśyānītaṃ mayedaṃ te vahanaṃ hemapūritam // 5.3.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvāśvāsya tenaiva vahanena nijaṃ gṛham / viṭaṅkapuram ānītas tenaivedam ahaṃ tataḥ // 5.3.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity etad vaṇijas tasmāc chaktidevo niśamya saḥ / viśramya sa triyāmāṃ tām anyedyus tam abhāṣata // 5.3.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gantavyam utsthaladvīpaṃ sārthavāha punar mayā / tat kathaṃ tatra gacchāmi sāṃprataṃ kathyatām iti // 5.3.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gantuṃ pravṛttās tatrādya madīyā vyavahāriṇaḥ / tadyānapātram āruhya prayātu saha tair bhavān // 5.3.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktas tena vaṇijā sa tais tadvyavahāribhiḥ / sākaṃ tad utsthaladvīpaṃ śaktidevo yayau tataḥ // 5.3.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
yaḥ sa bandhur mahātmā me viṣṇudatto 'tra tiṣṭhati / prāgvat tasyaiva nikaṭaṃ vastum icchāmi tan maṭham // 5.3.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
iti saṃprāpya ca dvīpaṃ tatkālaṃ ca vicintya saḥ / vipaṇīmadhyamārgeṇa gantuṃ prāvartata dvijaḥ // 5.3.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca tatra daivāt taṃ dṛṣṭvā dāśapateḥ sutāḥ / satyavratasya tasyārāt parijñāyaivam abruvan // 5.3.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tātena sākaṃ kanakapurīṃ cinvann itas tadā / brahmann agās tvam ekaś ca katham adyāgato bhavān // 5.3.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
śaktidevas tato 'vādīd amburāśau sa vaḥ pitā / patito 'mbubhir ākṛṣṭavahano vaḍavāmukhe // 5.3.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā dāśaputrās te kruddhā bhṛtyān babhāṣire / badhnītainaṃ durātmānaṃ hato 'nena sa naḥ pitā // 5.3.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyathā katham ekasmin sati pravahaṇe dvayoḥ / vaḍavāgnau pated eko dvitīyaś cottaret tataḥ // 5.3.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad eṣa caṇḍikādevyāḥ purastāt pitṛghātakaḥ / asmābhir upahantavyaḥ śvaḥ prabhāte paśūkṛtaḥ // 5.3.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā dāśaputrās te bhṛtyān baddhvaiva taṃ tadā / śaktidevaṃ tato ninyur bhayakṛccaṇḍikāgṛham // 5.3.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śaśvatkavalitānekajīvaṃ pravitatodaram / khacadghaṇṭāvalīdantamālaṃ mṛtyor ivānanam // 5.3.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra baddhaḥ sthito rātrau saṃśayānaḥ svajīvite / sa śaktidevo devīṃ tāṃ caṇḍīm evaṃ vyajijñapat // 5.3.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
bālārkabimbanibhyā bhagavati mūrtyā tvayā paritrātam / nirbharapītapravisṛtarurudānavakaṇṭharudhirayeva jagat // 5.3.146	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
tan māṃ satatapraṇataṃ niṣkāraṇavidhuravargahastagatam / rakṣasva sudūrāgatam iṣṭajanaprāptitṛṣṇayā varade // 5.3.147	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
iti devīṃ sa vijñapya prāpya nidrāṃ kathaṃcana / apaśyad yoṣitaṃ svapne tadgarbhagṛhanirgatām // 5.3.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā divyākṛtir abhyetya sadayeva jagāda tam / bhoḥ śaktideva mā bhaiṣīr na te 'niṣṭaṃ bhaviṣyati // 5.3.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asty eṣāṃ dāśaputrāṇāṃ nāmnā bindumatī svasā / sā prātar vīkṣya kanyā tvāṃ bhartṛtve 'bhyarthayiṣyati // 5.3.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac ca tvaṃ pratipadyethāḥ saiva tvāṃ mocayiṣyati / na ca sā dhīvarī sā hi divyā strī śāpataś cyutā // 5.3.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvā prabuddhasya tasya netrāmṛtacchaṭā / prabhāte dāśakanyā sā taddevīgṛham āyayau // 5.3.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
babhāṣe cainam abhyetya nivedyātmānam utsukā / ito 'haṃ mocayāmi tvāṃ tat kuruṣvepsitaṃ mama // 5.3.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhrātṝṇāṃ saṃmatā hy ete pratyākhyātā varā mayā / tvayi dṛṣṭe tu me prītiḥ saṃjātā tad bhajasva mām // 5.3.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktaḥ sa tayā bindumatyā dāśendrakanyayā / śaktidevaḥ smarasvapnaṃ hṛṣṭas tat pratyapadyata // 5.3.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tayaiva mocitas tāṃ ca sumukhīṃ pariṇītavān / svapnalabdhāmbikādeśair bhrātṛbhir vihitepsitām // 5.3.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasthau ca sukhasiddhyeva tatra puṇyaikalabdhayā / rūpāntaropāgatayā sa tayā saha divyayā // 5.3.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
ekadā harmyapṛṣṭhastho dhṛtagomāṃsabhārakam / mārgāgataṃ sa caṇḍālaṃ dṛṣṭvā tām abravīt priyām // 5.3.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vandyās trijagato 'py etā yāḥ kṛśodari dhenavaḥ / tāsāṃ piśitam aśnāti paśyāyaṃ pāpakṛt katham // 5.3.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sāpy avādīt taṃ patiṃ bindumatī tadā / acintyam āryaputraitat pāpam atra kim ucyate // 5.3.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ gavāṃ prabhāveṇa svalpād apy aparādhataḥ / jātā dāśakule 'muṣmin kā tv etasyātra niṣkṛtiḥ // 5.3.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktavatīm eva śaktidevo jagāda tām / citraṃ brūhi priye kā tvaṃ dāśajanma kathaṃ ca te // 5.3.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atinirbandhataś caivaṃ pṛcchantaṃ tam uvāca sā / vadāmi gopyam apy etadvacanaṃ me karoṣi cet // 5.3.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bāḍhaṃ priye karomīti tenokte śapathottaram / sā tadainaṃ jagādaivam ādau tāvat samīhitam // 5.3.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asmin dvīpe dvitīyāpi bhāryā te bhavitādhunā / sā cāryaputra nacirād dhṛtagarbhā bhaviṣyati // 5.3.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
aṣṭame garbhamāse ca pāṭayitvodaraṃ tvayā / tasyāḥ sa garbhaḥ kraṣṭavyo naiva kāryā ghṛṇātra ca // 5.3.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
evam uktavatī tasmin kim etad iti vismite / lasadghṛṇe ca bhūyaḥ sā dāśendratanayābravīt // 5.3.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity etat tava kartavyaṃ hetoḥ kasyāpi madvacaḥ / athedaṃ śṛṇu yā cāhaṃ dāśajanma yathā ca me // 5.3.168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ janmāntare 'bhūvaṃ kāpi vidyādharī purā / martyaloke ca śāpena paribhraṣṭāsmi sāṃpratam // 5.3.169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidyādharatve ca yadā chittvā dantair ayojayam / vīṇāsu tantrīs teneha jātāhaṃ dāśaveśmani // 5.3.170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tad evaṃ vadane spṛṣṭe śuṣkeṇa snāyunā gavām / īdṛśy adhogatiḥ kā tu vārtā tanmāṃsabhakṣaṇe // 5.3.171	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity evaṃ kathayantyāṃ ca tatra tasyāṃ sasaṃbhramam / eko 'bhyupetya tadbhrātā śaktidevam abhāṣata // 5.3.172	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttiṣṭha sumahān eṣa kuto 'py utthāya sūkaraḥ / hatānekajano darpād ito 'bhimukham āgataḥ // 5.3.173	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā so 'vatīryaiva śaktidevaḥ svaharmyataḥ / āruhya śaktihasto 'śvam adhāvat sūkaraṃ prati // 5.3.174	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prajahāra ca dṛṣṭvaiva tasmin vīre 'bhidhāvati / palāyya vraṇitaḥ so 'pi varāhaḥ prāviśad bilam // 5.3.175	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śaktidevo 'pi tatraiva tadanveṣī praviśya ca / kṣaṇād apaśyat sāvāsam udyānagahanaṃ mahat // 5.3.176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatrasthaś ca dadarśaikāṃ kanyām atyadbhutākṛtim / sasaṃbhramam upāyātāṃ prītyeva vanadevatām // 5.3.177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tām apṛcchac ca kalyāṇi kā tvaṃ kiṃ saṃbhramaś ca te / tac chrutvā sāpi sumukhī tam evaṃ pratyabhāṣata // 5.3.178	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
asti dakṣiṇadiṅnātho nṛpatiś caṇḍavikramaḥ / tasyāhaṃ bindurekhākhyā sutā subhaga kanyakā // 5.3.179	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ihākasmāc ca pāpo māṃ daityo jvalitalocanaḥ / apahṛtya cchalenādya pitur ānītavān gṛhāt // 5.3.180	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa cāmiṣārthī vārāhaṃ rūpaṃ kṛtvā bahir gataḥ / viddho 'dyaiva kṣudhārtaḥ sañ śaktyā vīreṇa kenacit // 5.3.181	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
viddhamātraḥ praviśyeha pañcatām āgataś ca saḥ / tadadūṣitakaumārā palāyyāhaṃ ca nirgatā // 5.3.182	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā śaktidevas tām ūce kas tarhi saṃbhramaḥ / mayaiva sa varāho hi hataḥ śaktyā nṛpātmaje // 5.3.183	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sāpy avadat tarhi brūhi me ko bhavān iti / vipro 'haṃ śaktidevākhya iti pratyabravīc ca saḥ // 5.3.184	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tarhi tvam eva me bhartety uditaḥ sa tayā tataḥ / tathety ādāya tāṃ vīro biladvāreṇa niryayau // 5.3.185	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gṛhaṃ gatvā ca bhāryāyai bindumatyai nivedya tat / tacchraddhitaḥ kumārīṃ tāṃ bindurekhām udūḍhavān // 5.3.186	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tasya dvibhāryasya śaktidevasya tiṣṭhataḥ / tatraikā bindurekhā sā bhāryā garbham adhārayat // 5.3.187	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṣṭame garbhamāse ca tasyāḥ svairam upetya tam / ādyā bindumatī bhāryā śaktidevam uvāca sā // 5.3.188	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vīra tat smara yan mahyaṃ pratiśrutam abhūt tvayā / so 'yaṃ dvitīyabhāryāyā garbhamāso 'ṣṭamas tava // 5.3.189	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad gatvā garbham etasyā vipāṭyodaram āhara / anatikramaṇīyaṃ hi nijaṃ satyavacas tava // 5.3.190	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktas tayā śaktidevaḥ snehakṛpākulaḥ / pratijñāparatantraś ca kṣaṇam āsīd anuttaraḥ // 5.3.191	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jātodvegaś ca nirgatya bindurekhāntikaṃ yayau / sāpi khinnam upāyāntaṃ taṃ vilokyaivam abravīt // 5.3.192	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āryaputra viṣaṇṇo 'si kim adya nanu vedmy aham / bindumatyā niyuktas tvaṃ garbhasyotpāṭane mama // 5.3.193	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac ca te 'vaśyakartavyaṃ kāryaṃ kiṃcid dhi vidyate / nṛśaṃsatā ca nāsty atra kācit tan mā ghṛṇāṃ kṛthāḥ // 5.3.194	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathā hi śṛṇu nāthātra devadattakathām imām / purābhūd dharidattākhyaḥ kambukākhye pure dvijaḥ // 5.3.195	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya ca śrīmataḥ putraḥ kṛtavidyo 'pi śaiśave / devadattābhidhāno 'bhūd dyūtaikavyasanī yuvā // 5.3.196	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dyūtahāritavastrādir gantuṃ nālaṃ pitur gṛham / ekadā ca viveśaikaṃ sa śūnyaṃ devatāgṛham // 5.3.197	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra cāpaśyad ekākī sādhitānekakārmaṇam / japantaṃ jālapādākhyaṃ mahāvratinam ekakam // 5.3.198	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
cakāra ca śanais tasya praṇāmam upagamya saḥ / tenāpy apāstamaunena svāgatenābhyanandyata // 5.3.199	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sthitaḥ kṣaṇāc ca tenaiva pṛṣṭo vaidhuryakāraṇam / śaśaṃsāsmai svavipadaṃ vyasanakṣīṇavittajām // 5.3.200	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatas taṃ sa jagādaivaṃ devadattaṃ mahāvratī / nāsti vyasanināṃ vatsa bhuvi paryāptaye dhanam // 5.3.201	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
icchā ca vipadaṃ hātuṃ yadi te kuru madvacaḥ / vidyādharatvaṃ prāptuṃ yatkṛtaḥ parikaro mayā // 5.3.202	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tat sādhaya tvam apy etan mayā saha sulakṣaṇa / macchāsanaṃ tu pālyaṃ te naśyantu vipadas tava // 5.3.203	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukto vratinā tena pratiśrutya tatheti tat / sa devadattas tatpārśve tadaiva sthitim agrahīt // 5.3.204	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
anyedyuś ca śmaśānānte gatvā vaṭataror adhaḥ / vidhāya rajanau pūjāṃ paramānnaṃ nivedya ca // 5.3.205	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
balīn dikṣu ca vikṣipya saṃpāditatadarcanaḥ / taṃ pārśvavartinaṃ vipram uvāca sa mahāvratī // 5.3.206	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam eva tvayā kāryam iha pratyaham arcanam / vidyutprabhe gṛhāṇemāṃ pūjām ity abhidhāyinā // 5.3.207	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ataḥ paraṃ ca jāne 'haṃ siddhiś caivaṃ dhruvāvayoḥ / ity uktvā sa yayau tena samaṃ svanilayaṃ vratī // 5.3.208	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi nityaṃ taros tasya mūle gatvā tathaiva tat / devadatto 'rcanaṃ cakre tathaiva vidhinā tataḥ // 5.3.209	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā ca saparyānte dvidhābhūtāt taros tataḥ / akasmāt paśyatas tasya divyā nārī viniryayau // 5.3.210	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ehy asmatsvāminī bhadra vakti tvām iti vādinī / sā taṃ praveśayām āsa tasyaivābhyantaraṃ taroḥ // 5.3.211	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa praviśya dadarśātra divyaṃ maṇimayaṃ gṛham / paryaṅkavartinīm ekāṃ tatra cāntar varastriyam // 5.3.212	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rūpiṇī siddhir asmākam iyaṃ syād iti sa kṣaṇāt / yāvad dhyāyati tāvat sā kṛtātithyā varāṅganā // 5.3.213	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
raṇitābharaṇair aṅgair vihitasvāgatair iva / utthāya nijaparyaṅke tam upāveśayat svayam // 5.3.214	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jagāda ca mahābhāga sutā yakṣapater aham / kanyā hi ratnavarṣasya khyātā vidyutprabhākhyayā // 5.3.215	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ārādhayac ca mām eṣa jālapādo mahāvratī / tasyārthasiddhidaivāsmi tvaṃ prāṇeṣv api me prabhuḥ // 5.3.216	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmād dṛṣṭānurāgiṇyāḥ kuru pāṇigrahaṃ mama / ity uktaḥ sa tayā cakre devadattas tatheti tat // 5.3.217	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sthitvā ca kaṃcit kālaṃ sa garbhabhāre tayā dhṛte / jagāma punar āgantuṃ taṃ mahāvratinaṃ prati // 5.3.218	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
śaśaṃsa ca yathāvṛttaṃ taṃ tasmai sabhayaṃ tataḥ / so 'py evam ātmasiddhyarthī jagādainaṃ mahāvratī // 5.3.219	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhadra sādhu kṛtaṃ kiṃ tu gatvāsyā yakṣayoṣitaḥ / vipāṭyodaram ākṛṣya śīghraṃ garbhaṃ tam ānaya // 5.3.220	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā smārayitvā ca vratinā pūrvasaṃgaram / preṣitas tena bhūyas tāṃ devadatto 'py agāt priyām // 5.3.221	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tiṣṭhati yāvac ca tadvibhāvanadurmanāḥ / tāvad vidyutprabhā sā taṃ yakṣī svayam abhāṣata // 5.3.222	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āryaputra viṣaṇṇo 'si kimarthaṃ viditaṃ mayā / ādiṣṭaṃ jālapādena tava madgarbhapāṭanam // 5.3.223	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad garbham etam ākarṣa pāṭayitvā mamodaram / na cet svayaṃ karomy etat kāryaṃ hy asty atra kiṃcana // 5.3.224	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ tayoktaḥ sa yadā kartuṃ tan nāśakad dvijaḥ / tad ākṛṣṭavatī garbhaṃ sā svayaṃ pāṭitodarā // 5.3.225	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ ca kṛṣṭaṃ puras tyaktvā devadattaṃ tam abhyadhāt / bhoktur vidyādharatvasya kāraṇaṃ gṛhyatām ayam // 5.3.226	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ ca śāpād yakṣītve jātā vidyādharī satī / ayam īdṛk ca śāpānto mama jātismarā hy aham // 5.3.227	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
idānīṃ yāmi dhāma svaṃ saṃgamaś cāvayoḥ punaḥ / tatraivety abhidhāyaiṣā kvāpi vidyutprabhā yayau // 5.3.228	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
devadatto 'pi taṃ garbhaṃ gṛhītvā khinnamānasaḥ / jagāma jālapādasya tasya sa vratino 'ntikam // 5.3.229	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upānayac ca taṃ garbhaṃ tasmai siddhipradāyinam / bhajanty ātmaṃbharitvaṃ hi durlabhe 'pi na sādhavaḥ // 5.3.230	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi tat pācayitvaiva garbhamāṃsaṃ mahāvratī / vyasṛjad devadattaṃ taṃ bhairavārcākṛte 'ṭavīm // 5.3.231	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato dattabalir yāvad etya paśyati sa dvijaḥ / tāvan māṃsam aśeṣaṃ tad vratinā tena bhakṣitam // 5.3.232	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kathaṃ sarvaṃ tvayā bhuktam iti cātrāsya jalpataḥ / jihmo vidyādharo bhūtvā jālapādaḥ kham udyayau // 5.3.233	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vyomaśyāmalanistriṃśe hārakeyūrarājite / tasminn utpatite so 'tha devadatto vyacintayat // 5.3.234	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṣṭaṃ kīdṛg anenāhaṃ vañcitaḥ pāpabuddhinā / yadi vātyantam ṛjutā na kasya paribhūtaye // 5.3.235	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tad etasyāpakārasya katham adya pratikriyām / kuryāṃ vidyādharībhūtam apy enaṃ prāpnuyāṃ katham // 5.3.236	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tan nāsty upāyo vetālasādhanād aparo 'tra me / iti niścitya sa yayau rātrau pitṛvanaṃ tataḥ // 5.3.237	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatrāhūya taror mūle vetālaṃ nṛkalevare / pūjayitvākarot tasya nṛmāṃsabalitarpaṇam // 5.3.238	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atṛpyantaṃ ca vetālaṃ tam anyānayanāsaham / tarpayiṣyan svamāṃsāni cchettum ārabhate sma saḥ // 5.3.239	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkṣaṇaṃ taṃ sa vetālo mahāsattvam abhāṣata / sattvenānena tuṣṭo 'smi tava mā sāhasaṃ kṛthāḥ // 5.3.240	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad bhadra kim abhipretaṃ tava yat sādhayāmi te / ity uktavantaṃ vetālaṃ sa vīraḥ pratyuvāca tam // 5.3.241	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
viśvastavañcako yatra jālapādo vratī sthitaḥ / vidyādharanivāsaṃ taṃ naya tannigrahāya mām // 5.3.242	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathety uktavatā tena vetālena sa tatkṣaṇāt / skandhe 'dhiropya nabhasā ninye vaidyādharaṃ padam // 5.3.243	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatrāpaśyac ca taṃ jālapādaṃ prāsādavartinam / sa vidyādhararājatvadṛptaṃ ratnāsanasthitam // 5.3.244	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pratārayantaṃ tām eva labdhavidyādharīpadām / vidyutprabhām anicchantīṃ bhāryātve tattaduktibhiḥ // 5.3.245	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvaiva ca savetālo 'py abhyadhāvat sa taṃ yuvā / hṛṣyadvidyutprabhānetracakorāmṛtacandramāḥ // 5.3.246	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jālapādo 'pi so 'kasmāt taṃ dṛṣṭvaivāgataṃ tathā / vitrāsād bhraṣṭanistriṃśo nipapātāsanād bhuvi // 5.3.247	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
devadatto 'pi tat khaḍgaṃ sa labdhvāpy avadhīn na tam / ripuṣv api hi bhīteṣu sānukampā mahāśayāḥ // 5.3.248	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jighāṃsantaṃ ca vetālaṃ taṃ jagāda sa vārayan / pākhaṇḍinā kim etena kṛpaṇena hatena naḥ // 5.3.249	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sthāpyatāṃ bhuvi nītvāyaṃ tasmāt svanilaye tvayā / āstāṃ tatraiva bhūyo 'pi pāpaḥ kāpālikā varam // 5.3.250	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity evaṃ vadatas tasya devadattasya tatkṣaṇam / divo 'vatīrya śarvāṇī devī pratyakṣatāṃ yayau // 5.3.251	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā jagāda ca taṃ prahvaṃ putra tuṣṭāsmi te 'dhunā / ananyasadṛśeneha sattvotkarṣeṇa saṃprati // 5.3.252	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad vidyādhararājatvaṃ mayā dattam ihaiva te / ity uktvārpitavidyā sā devī sadyas tiro 'bhavat // 5.3.253	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jālapādaś ca nītvaiva vetālena sa bhūtale / vibhraṣṭasiddhir nidadhe nādharmaś ciram ṛddhaye // 5.3.254	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
devadatto 'pi sahitaḥ sa vidyutprabhayā tayā / vidyādharādhirājyaṃ tat prāpya tatra vyajṛmbhata // 5.3.255	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ākhyāya kathāṃ patye śaktidevāya satvarā / sā bindurekhā bhūyas taṃ babhāṣe mṛdubhāṣiṇī // 5.3.256	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
itīdṛṃśi bhavanty eva kāryāṇi tad idaṃ mama / bindumatyuditaṃ garbhaṃ muktaśokaṃ vipāṭaya // 5.3.257	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity evaṃ bindurekhāyāṃ vadantyāṃ pāpaśaṅkite / śaktideve ca gaganād udabhūt tatra bhāratī // 5.3.258	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
bhoḥ śaktideva niḥśaṅkaṃ garbho 'syāḥ kṛṣyatāṃ tvayā / kaṇṭhe muṣṭyā gṛhīto hi khaḍgo 'sau te bhaviṣyati // 5.3.259	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti divyāṃ giraṃ śrutva pāṭitodaram āśu saḥ / garbhaṃ tasyāḥ samākṛṣya pāṇinā kaṇṭhato 'grahīt // 5.3.260	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gṛhītamātro jajñe ca sa khaḍgas tasya hastagaḥ / ākṛṣṭaḥ sattvataḥ siddheḥ keśapāśa ivāyataḥ // 5.3.261	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vidyādharaḥ kṣiprāt sa vipraḥ samajāyata / bindurekhā ca tatkālam adarśanam iyāya sā // 5.3.262	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

atrāntare kilaitasmin kathāsaṃdhau śatakratoḥ / kuto 'pi hetos tridive vartate sma mahotsavaḥ // 6.1.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tatrāpsaraḥsu sarvāsu nartituṃ militāsv api / ekā surabhidattākhyā nādṛśyata varāpsarāḥ // 6.1.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praṇidhānāt tataḥ śakras tāṃ dadarśa rahaḥsthitām / vidyādhareṇa kenāpi sahitāṃ nandanāntare // 6.1.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad dṛṣṭvā jātakopo 'ntaḥ sa vṛtrārir acintayat / aho etau durācārau madanāndhāv ubhāv api // 6.1.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekā yad ācaraty eva vismṛtyāsmān svatantravat / karoty avinayaṃ cānyo devabhūmau praviśya yat // 6.1.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athavāsya varākasya doṣo vidyādharasya kaḥ / ākṛṣṭo hi vaśīkṛtya rūpeṇāyam ihānayā // 6.1.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kāntayāntaḥ kilāpūrṇatuṅgastanataṭāntayā / lāvaṇyāmbutaraṅgiṇyā hṛtaḥ syād ātmanaḥ prabhuḥ // 6.1.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
cakṣubhe kiṃ na śarvo 'pi purā dṛṣṭvā tilottamām / dhātrā gṛhītvā racitām uttamebhyas tilaṃ tilam // 6.1.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tapaś ca menakāṃ dṛṣṭvā viśvāmitro na kiṃ jahau / śarmiṣṭhārūpalobhāc ca yayātir nāptavāñ jarām // 6.1.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ato vidyādharayuvā naivāyam aparādhyati / trijagatkṣobhaśaktena rūpeṇāpsarasā hṛtaḥ // 6.1.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
iyaṃ tu svarvadhūḥ pāpā hīnāsaktāparādhinī / praveśitaḥ surān hitvā yayāyam iha nandane // 6.1.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ālocya vimucyainaṃ vidyādharakumārakam / ahalyākāmukaḥ so 'syai śāpam apsarase dadau // 6.1.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pāpe prayāhi mānuṣyaṃ prāpya cāyonijāṃ sutām / divyaṃ kṛtvā ca kartavyam eṣyasi dyām imām iti // 6.1.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atrāntare ca sā tasya rājñas takṣaśilāpuri / rājñī kaliṅgadattasya tārādattā yayāv ṛtum // 6.1.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāḥ surabhidattā sā śakraśāpacyutāpsarāḥ / saṃbabhūvodare devyā dehasaundaryadāyinī // 6.1.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadā ca nabhaso bhraṣṭāṃ jvālāṃ devī dadarśa sā / tārādattā kila svapne praviśantīṃ nijodare // 6.1.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātaś cāvarṇayat svapnaṃ bhartre taṃ sā savismayā / rājñe kaliṅgadattāya so 'pi prīto jagāda tām // 6.1.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
devi divyāḥ patanty eva śāpān mānuṣyayoniṣu / taj jāne devajātīyaḥ ko'pi garbhe tavārpitaḥ // 6.1.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vicitrasadasatkarmanibaddhāḥ saṃcaranti hi / jantavas trijagaty asmiñ śubhāśubhaphalāptaye // 6.1.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktā bhūbhṛtā rājñī sā prasaṅgād uvāca tam / satyaṃ karmaiva balavad bhogadāyi śubhāśubham // 6.1.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tathā cedam upodghātaṃ śrutaṃ vacmy atra te śṛṇu / abhavad dharmadattākhyaḥ kośalādhipatir nṛpaḥ // 6.1.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nāgaśrīr iti tasyāsīd rājñī yā patidevatā / bhūmāv arundhatī khyātā rundhanty api satīdhuram // 6.1.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kāle gacchati tasyāṃ ca devyāṃ tasya ca bhūpateḥ / aham eṣā samutpannā duhitāhitasūdana // 6.1.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato mayy atibālāyāṃ deva sā jananī mama / akasmāt pūrvajātiṃ svāṃ smṛtvā svapatim abravīt // 6.1.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājann akāṇḍa evādya pūrvajanma smṛtaṃ mayā / aprītyai tad anākhyātam ākhyātaṃ mṛtaye ca me // 6.1.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśaṅkitaṃ smṛtā jātiḥ syād ākhyātaiva mṛtyave / iti hy āhur ato deva mayy atīva viṣāditā // 6.1.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktaḥ sa tayā patnyā rājā tāṃ pratyabhāṣata / priye mayāpi prāg janma tvayeva sahasā smṛtam // 6.1.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tan mamācakṣva tāvat tvaṃ kathayiṣyāmy ahaṃ ca te / yad astu ko 'nyathā kartuṃ śakto hi bhavitavyatām // 6.1.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti sā preritā tena bhartrā rājñī jagāda tam / nirbandho yadi te rājañ śṛṇu tarhi vadāmy aham // 6.1.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ihaiva deśe viprasya mādhavākhyasya kasyacit / gṛhe 'ham abhavaṃ dāsī suvṛttā pūrvajanmani // 6.1.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
devadāsābhidhānaś ca patir atra mamābhavat / kasyāpy ekasya vaṇijaḥ sādhuḥ karmakaro gṛhe // 6.1.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tāv āvām avasāvātra kṛtvā gehaṃ nijocitam / svasvasvāmigṛhānītapakvānnakṛtavartanau // 6.1.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vāridhānī ca kumbhaś ca mārjanī mañcakas tathā / ahaṃ ca matpatiś ceti yugmatritayam eva nau // 6.1.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akaliprasare gehe saṃtoṣaḥ sukhinor abhūt / devapitratithiprattaśeṣaṃ pramitam aśnatoḥ // 6.1.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekaikato 'dhikaṃ kiṃcid yad ācchādanam apy abhūt / sudurgatāya kasmaicit tad āvābhyām adīyata // 6.1.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athātrodabhavat tīvro durbhikṣas tena cāvayoḥ / bhṛtyannam anvahaṃ prāpyam alpam alpam upānamat // 6.1.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ kṣutkṣāmavapuṣoḥ śanair nāv avasīdatoḥ / kadācid āgād āhārakāle klānto 'tithir dvijaḥ // 6.1.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tasmai niḥśeṣam āvābhyāṃ dvābhyām api nijāśanam / prāṇasaṃśayakāle 'pi dattaṃ yāvac ca yac ca tat // 6.1.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhuktvā tasmin gate prāṇā bhartāraṃ me tam atyajan / arthiny asyādaro nāsmāsv iti manyuvaśād iva // 6.1.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataś cāhaṃ samādhāya patye samucitāṃ citām / ārūḍhā cāvarūḍhaś ca vipadbhāro mamātmanaḥ // 6.1.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha rājagṛhe jātā jātāhaṃ mahiṣī tava / acintyaṃ hi phalaṃ sūte sadyaḥ sukṛtapādapaḥ // 6.1.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktaḥ sa tayā rājñā dharmadatto nṛpo 'bravīt / ehi priye sa evāhaṃ pūrvajanmapatis tava // 6.1.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vaṇikkarmakaro 'bhūvaṃ devadāso 'ham eva saḥ / etad eva mayāpy adya prāktanaṃ janma hi smṛtam // 6.1.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā svāny abhijñānāny udīrya sa tayā saha / devyā viṣaṇṇo hṛṣṭaś ca rājā sadyo divaṃ gataḥ // 6.1.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
evaṃ tayoś ca matpitror lokāntaram upeyuṣoḥ / mātuḥ svasā vardhayituṃ mām anaiṣīn nijaṃ gṛham // 6.1.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
kanyāyāṃ mayi cābhyāgād ekas tatrātithir muniḥ / mātṛsvasā ca māṃ tasya śuśrūṣāyai samādiśat // 6.1.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca kunty eva durvāsā yatnenārādhito mayā / tadvarāc ca mayā prāpto dhārmikas tvaṃ patiḥ prabho // 6.1.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ bhavanti bhadrāṇi dharmād eva yad ādarāt / pitṛbhyāṃ saha saṃprāpya rājyaṃ jātir api smṛtā // 6.1.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etat sa tārādattāyā devyāḥ śrutvā vaco nṛpaḥ / kaliṅgadatto dharmaikasādaro nijagāda tām // 6.1.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
satyaṃ samyakkṛto 'lpo 'pi dharmo bhūriphalo bhavet / tathā ca prāktanīṃ devi saptadvijakathāṃ śṛṇu // 6.1.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kuṇḍinākhye pure pūrvam upādhyāyasya kasyacit / brāhmaṇasyābhavañ śiṣyāḥ sapta brāhmaṇaputrakāḥ // 6.1.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tāñ śiṣyān upādhyāyo dhenuṃ durbhikṣadoṣataḥ / gomataḥ śvaśurād ekāṃ yācituṃ prāhiṇot tataḥ // 6.1.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
te ca gatvānyadeśasthaṃ durbhikṣakṣāmakukṣayaḥ / taṃ tadgirā tacchvaśuraṃ tacchiṣyā gāṃ yayācire // 6.1.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
so 'pi vṛttikarīm ekāṃ dhenuṃ tebhyaḥ samarpayat / kṛpaṇaḥ kṣudhitebhyo 'pi na tu tebhyo 'śanaṃ dadau // 6.1.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas te tāṃ gṛhītvā gām āyānto 'rdhapathe kṣudhā / udgāḍhapīḍitāḥ klāntā nipetur dharaṇītale // 6.1.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upādhyāyagṛhaṃ dūraṃ dūre cāpadgatā vayam / durlabhaṃ sarvataś cānnaṃ tat prāṇair gatam eva naḥ // 6.1.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ ca dhenur apy eṣā nistoyavanamānuṣe / araṇye 'smin vipannaiva gurvartho 'lpo 'pi kas tataḥ // 6.1.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad asyāḥ piśitaiḥ prāṇān saṃdhāryāśu gurūn api / saṃbhāvayām astaccheṣair āpatkālo hi vartate // 6.1.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
iti saṃmantrya saptāpi jaghnuḥ sabrahmacāriṇaḥ / śāstroktavidhinā dhenuṃ tāṃ paśūkṛtya tatra te // 6.1.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iṣṭvā devān pitṝn bhuktvā tanmāṃsaṃ vidhivac ca tat / jagmur ādāya taccheṣam upādhyāyasya cāntikam // 6.1.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmai praṇamya sarvaṃ te śasaṃsus tad yathā kṛtam / sa tebhyaḥ sāparādhebhyo 'py atuṣyat satyabhāṣaṇāt // 6.1.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dinaiḥ saptāpi durbhikṣadoṣāt te ca vipedire / jātismarāś ca bhūyo 'pi tena satyena jajñire // 6.1.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
itthaṃ phalati śuddhena siktaṃ saṃkalpavāriṇā / puṇyabījam api svalpaṃ puṃsāṃ kṛṣikṛtām iva // 6.1.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad eva dūṣitaṃ devi duṣṭasaṃkalpapāthasā / phalaty aniṣṭam atredaṃ vacmy anyad api tac chṛṇu // 6.1.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gaṅgāyāṃ tulyakālau dvau tapasy anaśane janau / eko vipro dvitīyaś ca caṇḍālas tasthatuḥ purā // 6.1.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tayor vipraḥ kṣudhākrānto niṣādān vīkṣya tatragān / matsyān ādāya bhuñjānān evaṃ mūḍho vyacintayat // 6.1.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho dāsyāḥ sutā ete dhanyā jagati dhīvarāḥ / ye yathākāmam aśnanti pratyahaṃ śapharāmiṣam // 6.1.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dvitīyas tu sa cāṇḍālo dṛṣṭvā tān eva dhīvarān / acintayad dhigas tv etān kravyādān prāṇighātinaḥ // 6.1.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tat kim evaṃ sthitasyeha dṛṣṭair eṣāṃ mukhair mama / iti saṃmīlya netre sa tatrāsīt svātmani sthitaḥ // 6.1.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kramāc cānaśanenobhau vipannau tau dvijāntyajau / dvijas tatra śvabhir bhuktaḥ śīrṇo gaṅgājale 'ntyajaḥ // 6.1.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'kṛtātmā kaivartakula evātra sa dvijaḥ / abhyajāyata tīrthasya guṇāj jātismaras tv abhūt // 6.1.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
caṇḍālo 'pi sa tatraiva gaṅgātīre mahībhujaḥ / gṛhe jātismaro jajñe dhīro 'nupahatātmakaḥ // 6.1.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jātayoś ca tayor evaṃ prāgjanmasmarator dvayoḥ / eko 'nutepe dāsaḥ san rājā san mumude 'paraḥ // 6.1.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
iti dharmataror mūlam aśuddhaṃ yasya mānasam / śuddhaṃ yasya ca tadrūpaṃ phalaṃ tasya na saṃśayaḥ // 6.1.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity etad uktvā devīṃ tāṃ tārādattāṃ sa bhūpatiḥ / kaliṅgadattaḥ punar apy uvācaināṃ prasaṅgataḥ // 6.1.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
kiṃ ca sattvādhikaṃ karma devī yan nāma yādṛśam / phalāya tad yataḥ sattvam anudhāvanti saṃpadaḥ // 6.1.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathā ca kathayāmy atra śṛṇu citrām imāṃ kathām / astīha bhuvanakhyātāvantīṣūjjayinī purī // 6.1.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājate sitaharmyair yā mahākālanivāsabhūḥ / tatsevārasasaṃprāptakailāsaśikharair iva // 6.1.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saccakravartipānīyaḥ praviśad vāhinīśataḥ / yadābhogo 'bdhigambhīraḥ sapakṣakṣmābhṛdāśritaḥ // 6.1.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāṃ vikramasiṃhākhyo babhūvānvarthayākhyayā / rājā vairimṛgā yasya naiva san saṃmukhāḥ kvacit // 6.1.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca niṣpratipakṣatvād alabdhasamarotsavaḥ / astreṣu bāhuvīrye ca sāvajño 'ntar atapyata // 6.1.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha so 'maraguptena tadabhirpāyavedinā / kathāntare prasaṅgena mantriṇā jagade nṛpaḥ // 6.1.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
deva dordaṇḍadarpeṇa śastravidyāmadena ca / āśaṃsatām api ripūn rājñāṃ doṣo na durlabhaḥ // 6.1.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tathā ca pūrvaṃ bāṇena yuddhayogyam ariṃ haraḥ / darpād bhujasahasrasya tāvad ārādhya yācitaḥ // 6.1.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
yāvat prāpta tathābhūtatadvaraḥ sa murāriṇā / devena vairiṇā saṃkhye lūnabāhuvanaḥ kṛtaḥ // 6.1.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmāt tvayāpi kartavyo nāsaṃtoṣo yudhaṃ vinā / kāṅkṣaṇīyo na cāniṣṭo vipakṣo 'pi kadācana // 6.1.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śastraśikṣā svavīryaṃ ca darśanīyaṃ taveha cet / yogyabhūmāv aṭavyāṃ tanmṛgayāyāṃ ca darśaya // 6.1.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājñāṃ cākheṭakam api vyāyāmādikṛte matam / yuddhādhvani na śasyante rājāno hy akṛtaśramāḥ // 6.1.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
āraṇyāś ca mṛgā duṣṭāḥ śūnyām icchanti medinīm / tena te nṛpater vadhyā ity apy ākheṭam iṣyate // 6.1.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na cāti te niṣevyante tatsevāvyasanena hi / gatā nṛpatayaḥ pūrvam api pāṇḍvādayaḥ kṣayam // 6.1.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukto 'maraguptena mantriṇā sa sumedhasā / rājā vikramasiṃho 'tra tatheti tad amanyata // 6.1.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyedyuś cāśvapādātasārameyamayīṃ bhuvam / vicitravāgurocchrāyamayīś ca sakalā diśaḥ // 6.1.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saharṣamṛgayugrāmaninādamayam ambaram / kurvan sa mṛgayāhetor nagaryā niryayau nṛpaḥ // 6.1.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nirgacchan gajapṛṣṭhastho bāhye śūnye surālaye / puruṣau dvāv apaśyac ca vijane sahitasthitau // 6.1.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svairaṃ mantrayamāṇau ca mithaḥ kim api tāv ubhau / dūrāt sa tarkayan rājā jagāma mṛgayāvanam // 6.1.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra protkhātakhaḍgeṣu vṛddhavyāghreṣu ca vyadhāt / toṣaṃ sa siṃhanādeṣu bhūbhāgeṣu nageṣu ca // 6.1.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāṃ sa vikramabījābhair mahīṃ tastāra mauktikaiḥ / siṃhānāṃ hastihantṝṇāṃ nihatānāṃ nakhacyutaiḥ // 6.1.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tiryañcas tiryag evāsya petur vakraplutā mṛgaḥ / laghu nirbhidya tān pūrvaṃ harṣaṃ prāpad avakragaḥ // 6.1.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtākheṭaś ca suciraṃ rājāsau śrāntasevakaḥ / āgāc chithilitajyena cāpenojjayinīṃ punaḥ // 6.1.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāṃ devakule tasmiṃs tāvat kālaṃ tathaiva tau / sthitau dadarśa puruṣau nirgacchanyau sa dṛṣṭavān // 6.1.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
kāv etau mantrayete ca kiṃ svid evam iyac ciram / nūnaṃ cārāv imau dīrgharahasyālāpasevinau // 6.1.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ālocya pratīhāraṃ visṛjyānāyayat sa tau / puruṣau dvāv avaṣṭabhya rājā baddhau cakāra ca // 6.1.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dvitīye 'hani cāsthānaṃ tāv ānāyya sa pṛṣṭavān / kau yuvāṃ suciraṃ kaś ca mantrastāvān sa vāmiti // 6.1.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tayoḥ svayaṃ rājñā tatra paryanuyuktayoḥ / yācitābhayayor eko yuvā vaktuṃ pracakrame // 6.1.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrūyatāṃ varṇayāmy etad yathāvad adhunā prabho / abhūt karabhako nāma vipro 'syām eva vaḥ puri // 6.1.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya pravīraputrecchakṛtāgnyārādhanodbhavaḥ / aham eṣa mahārāja vedavidyāvidaḥ sutaḥ // 6.1.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmiṃś ca bhāryānugate pitari svargate śiśuḥ / adhītavidyo 'py ānāthyāt svamārgaṃ tyaktavān aham // 6.1.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
pravṛttaś cābhavaṃ dyūtaṃ śastravidyāś ca sevitum / kasya nocchṛṅkhalaṃ bālyaṃ guruśāsanavarjitam // 6.1.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena krameṇa cottīrṇe śaiśave jātadormadaḥ / aṭavīm ekadā bāṇān ahaṃ kṣeptuṃ gato 'bhavam // 6.1.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvat tena pathā caikā nagaryā nirgatā vadhūḥ / āgāt karṇīrathārūḍhā janyair bahubhir anvitā // 6.1.168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tadbhayena ca sarve 'pi tyaktvā tām anuyāyinaḥ / tadbhartrāpi saha klībāḥ palāyyetas tato gatāḥ // 6.1.170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tatrāgre sthāpayitvā tāṃ śākhāṃ tiryak sulāghavāt / palāyito 'haṃ hastī ca sa tāṃ śākhām acūrṇayat // 6.1.176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tato 'haṃ yoṣitas tasyāḥ samīpam agamaṃ drutam / śarīrakuśalaṃ caitām apṛccham iha bhīṣitām // 6.1.177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpi māṃ vīkṣya duḥkhārtā saharṣā cāvadattadā / kiṃ me kuśalametasmai dattā kāpuruṣāya yā // 6.1.178	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
īdṛśe saṃkaṭe yo māṃ tyaktvā kvāpi gataḥ prabho / etat tu kuśalaṃ yat tvam akṣataḥ punar īkṣitaḥ // 6.1.179	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tan me sa katamo bhartā tvam idānīṃ patir mama / yenātmanirapekṣeṇa hṛtā mṛtyumukhād aham // 6.1.180	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

labdhe 'ntare hi milita yāsyāmo yatrakutracit / evaṃ tayoktas tad ahaṃ tatheti pratipannavān // 6.1.182	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)

kṣaṇād etya ca sā bhartrā bālā saṃbhāvitā satī / tena sākaṃ sabhṛtyena gantuṃ prāvartata kramāt // 6.1.184	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ ca gupta taddattapātheyaḥ paravartmanā / paścād alakṣitas tasya dūram adhvānam abhyagām // 6.1.185	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā ca hastibhayabhraṣṭabhaṅgāṅgajanitāṃ rujam / pathi mithyā vadantī taṃ patiṃ sparśe 'py avarjayat // 6.1.186	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kasya raktonmukhī gāḍharūḍhāntarviṣaduḥsahā / tiṣṭhed anapakṛtya strī bhujagīva vikāritā // 6.1.187	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kramāc ca lohanagaraṃ prāptāḥ smas te puraṃ vayam / vaṇijyājīvino yatra bhartus tasya gṛhaṃ striyāḥ // 6.1.188	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sthitāḥ smas tad ahaś cātra sarve bāhye surālaye / tatra saṃmilitaś caiṣa dvitīyo brāhmaṇaḥ sakhā // 6.1.189	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nave 'pi darśane 'nyonyam āśvāsaḥ samabhūc ca nau / cittaṃ jānāti jantūnāṃ prema janmāntarārjitam // 6.1.190	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato rahasyam ātmīyaṃ sarvam asmai mayoditam / tad buddhvaiva tadā svairaṃ mām evam ayam abravīt // 6.1.191	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tuṣṇīṃ bhavāsty upāyo 'tra yatkṛte tvam ihāgataḥ / etasyā bhartṛbhaginī vidyate 'tra vaṇikstriyāḥ // 6.1.192	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
gṛhītārthā mayā sākam itaḥ sā gantum udyatā / tat kariṣye tadīyena sāhāyyena tavepsitam // 6.1.193	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā mām ayaṃ vipro gatvā tasyās tadā rahaḥ / vaṇigvadhū nanāndus tad yathāvastu nyavedayat // 6.1.194	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyedyuḥ kṛtasaṃvic ca sā nanāndā sametya tām / prāveśayad bhrātṛjāyāṃ tatra devagṛhāntare // 6.1.195	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
tatrāntaḥ sthitayor nau ca madhyād etaṃ tadaiva sā / mittraṃ me bhrātṛjāyāyās tasyā veṣam akārayat // 6.1.196	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtatadveṣam enaṃ ca gṛhītvā nagarāntaram / bhrātrā sahāviśad gehaṃ kṛtvā naḥ kāryasaṃvidam // 6.1.197	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tadavasthānahetoś ca vittārthaṃ ca rahaś ciram / āvāṃ mantrayamāṇau hy o dṛṣṭau devena dūrataḥ // 6.1.203	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

ity uktvā sa dadau rājā yatheṣṭaṃ jīvanaṃ tayoḥ / tau ca bhāryānvitau tasya nikaṭe tasthatuḥ sukham // 6.1.207	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

ity aihikena ca purāvihitena cāpi svenaiva karmavibhavena śubhāśubhena / śaśvad bhavet tadanurūpavicitrabhogaḥ sarvo hi nāma sasurāsura eṣa sargaḥ // 6.1.209	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
tat svapnavṛttanibhato nabhasaś cyutā yā jvālā tvayāntar udaraṃ viśatīha dṛṣṭā / sā kāpi devi surajātir asaṃśayaṃ te garbhaṃ kuto 'pi khalu karmavaśāt prapannā // 6.1.210	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
iti nijabhartur vadanāc chrutvā nṛpateḥ kaliṅgadattasya / devī tārādattā prāpa sagarbhā paraṃ pramadam // 6.1.211	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
tataḥ kaliṅgadattasya rājño garbhabharālasā / rājñī takṣaśilāyāṃ sā tārādattā śanair abhūt // 6.2.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
udeṣyac candralekhāṃ ca prācīm anucakāra sā / āsannaprasavā pāṇḍumukhī taralatārakā // 6.2.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jajñe ca tasyā nacirād ananyasadṛśī sutā / vedhasaḥ sarvasaundaryasargavarṇakasaṃnibhā // 6.2.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
īdṛk putro na kiṃ jāta itīva snehaśālinaḥ / rakṣāpradīpās tatkrāntijitā vicchāyatāṃ yayuḥ // 6.2.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
pitā kaliṅgadattaś ca jātāṃ tāṃ tādṛśīm api / dṛṣṭvā tadrūpaputrāśāvaiphalyavimanā abhūt // 6.2.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
divyāṃ tām api saṃbhāvya sa putrecchur adūyata / śokakandaḥ ka kanyā hi kānandaḥ kāyavān sutaḥ // 6.2.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataś cetovinodāya khinno nirgatya mandirāt / yayau nānājinākāraṃ vihāraṃ sa mahīpatiḥ // 6.2.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatraikadeśe śuśrāva dharmapāṭhakabhikṣuṇā / janamadhyopaviṣṭena kathyamānam idaṃ vacaḥ // 6.2.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

bālā eva ca tās tyaktvā vairāgyeṇa pitur gṛham / śmaśānaṃ śiśriyuḥ pṛṣṭā jagaduś ca paricchadam // 6.2.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asāraṃ viśvam evaitat tatrāpīdaṃ śarīrakam / tatrāpy abhīṣṭasaṃyogasukhādi svapnavibhramaḥ // 6.2.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

sā tallocanalāvaṇyahṛtacittā tam abravīt / katham āttam idaṃ kaṣṭam īdṛśena tvayā vratam // 6.2.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

īdṛg eva dvitīyaṃ ca vada ramyaṃ kim etayoḥ / ity uktā tena tad dṛṣṭvā vyaṣīdat sā vaṇigvadhūḥ // 6.2.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tac chrutvā bhikṣur avadan mā bhūd amba tava vyathā / mama tvayā hy upakṛtaṃ yataḥ śṛṇu nidarśanam // 6.2.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
