dṛṣṭvā tatraikadeśe ca taṃ samādhisthitaṃ munim / atiṣṭhan parivāryainaṃ kim etad iti kautukāt // 6.2.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
cirasthitāsu tāsv atra prabuddhaḥ so 'tha bhūpatiḥ / apaśyan dayitāḥ pārśve tata babhrāma sarvataḥ // 6.2.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dadarśa cātra rājñīs tāḥ parivārya muniṃ sthitāḥ / kupitaś cerṣyayā tasmin khaḍgena prāharan munau // 6.2.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aiśvaryam īrṣyā nairghṛṇyaṃ kṣībatvaṃ nirvivekitā / ekaikaṃ kiṃ na yat kuryāt pañcāṅgitve tu kā kathā // 6.2.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato gate nṛpe tasmin kṛttāṅgam api taṃ munim / akruddhaṃ prakaṭībhūya kāpy uvācātra devatā // 6.2.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mahātman yena pāpena krodhenaitat kṛtaṃ tvayi / svaśaktyā tam ahaṃ hanmi manyate yadi tad bhavān // 6.2.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sa jagādarṣidevi mā smaivam ādiśaḥ / sa hi dharmasahāyo me na viprīyakaraḥ punaḥ // 6.2.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatprasādāt kṣamādharmaṃ bhagavatyāptavāhanam / kasya kṣameya kiṃ devi naivaṃ cet sa samācaret // 6.2.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaḥ kopo naśvarasyāsya dehasyārthe manasvinaḥ / priyāpriyeṣu sāmyena kṣamā hi brahmaṇaḥ padam // 6.2.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktā muninā sātha tapasā tasya toṣitā / aṅgāni devatā kṛtvā nirvraṇāni tirodadhe // 6.2.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad yathā so 'pi tasyarṣer upakārī mato nṛpaḥ / netrotkhananahetos tvaṃ tapovṛddhyā tathāmba me // 6.2.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā sa vaśī bhikṣur vinamrāṃ tāṃ vaṇigvadhūm / kānte 'pi vapuṣi svasminn anāsthaḥ siddhaye yayau // 6.2.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmād bāle 'pi ramye 'pi kaḥ kāye gatvare grahaḥ / sattvopakāras tv etasmād ekaḥ prājñasya śasyate // 6.2.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tad imā vayam etasmin nisargasukhasadmani / śmaśāne prāṇinām arthe vinyasyama śarīrakam // 6.2.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā parivāraṃ vāḥ sapta rājakumārikāḥ / tathaiva cakruḥ prāpuś ca saṃsiddhiṃ paramāṃ tataḥ // 6.2.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
evaṃ nije śarīre 'pi mamatvaṃ nāsti dhīmatām / kiṃ punaḥ sutadārādiparigrahatṛṇotkare // 6.2.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ādi sa nṛpaḥ śrutvā vihāre dharmapāṭhakāt / kaliṅgadatto nītvā ca dinaṃ prāyāt svamandiram // 6.2.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatrānubādhyamānaś ca kanyājanmaśucā punaḥ / sa rājā gṛhavṛddhena kenāpy ūce dvijanmanā // 6.2.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājan kiṃ kanyakāratnajanmanā paritapyase / putre 'bhyo 'py uttamāḥ kanyāḥ śivāś ceha paratra ca // 6.2.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājyalubdheṣu kā teṣu putreṣv āsthā mahībhujām / ye bhakṣayanti janakaṃ bata markaṭakā iva // 6.2.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
nṛpās tu kuntibhojād yaḥ kuntyāditanayāguṇaiḥ / tīrṇā duḥsahadurvāsaḥprabhṛtibhyaḥ parābhavam // 6.2.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
phalaṃ yac ca sutādānāt kutaḥ putrāt paratra tat / sulocanākathām atra kiṃ ca vacmi niśamyatām // 6.2.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āsīd rājā suṣeṇākhyaś citrakūṭācale yuvā / kāmo 'nya iva yo dhātrā nirmitas tryambakerṣyayā // 6.2.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa cakre divyam ārāmaṃ mūle tasya mahāgireḥ / suraṇāṃ nandanodyānavāsavairasyadāyinam // 6.2.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tanmadhye ca cakāraikāṃ vāpīm utphallapaṅkajām / lakṣmīlīlāravindānāṃ navākaramahīm iva // 6.2.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyās tasthau ca sadratnasopānāyās taṭe sadā / patnīnaṃ svānurūpāṇām abhāvād avadhūsakhaḥ // 6.2.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā tena mārgeṇa nabhasā surasundarī / rambhā jambhāribhavanād ājagāma yadṛcchayā // 6.2.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
sā taṃ dadarśa rājānaṃ tatrodyāne vihāriṇam / sākṣān madhum ivotphullapuṣpakānanamadhyagam // 6.2.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vāpikāpadmapatitāṃ divo 'nu patitaḥ śriyam / candraḥ kim eṣa naitad vā śrīr asya hy anapāyinī // 6.2.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
nūnaṃ puṣpeṣur udyānaṃ puṣpecchuḥ so 'yam āgataḥ / kiṃ tu sā ratir etasya kva gatā sahacāriṇī // 6.2.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity autsukyakṛtollekhā sāvatīrya nabhontarāt / rambhā mānuṣarūpeṇa rājānaṃ tam upāgamat // 6.2.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upetāṃ tāṃ ca sahasa dṛṣṭvā rājā savismayaḥ / acintayad aho keyam asaṃbhavyavapur bhavet // 6.2.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
na tāvan mānuṣī yena pādau nāsya rajaḥspṛśau / na cakṣuḥ sanimeṣaṃ vā tasmād divyaiva kāpy asau // 6.2.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praṣṭavyā tu mayā neyaṃ palāyeta hi jātucit / ratibhedāsahāḥ prāyo divyāḥ kāraṇasaṃgatāḥ // 6.2.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti dhyāyan sa nṛpatiḥ kṛtasaṃbhāṣaṇas tayā / tatkrameṇaiva tatkālaṃ tatkaṇṭhāśleṣam āptavān // 6.2.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
cikrīḍa ca ciraṃ so 'tra sākam apsarasā tayā / divaṃ sāpi na sasmāra ramyaṃ prema na janmabhūḥ // 6.2.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatsakhīyakṣiṇīvṛṣṭair apūri svarṇarāśibhiḥ / sāsya bhūmir narendrasya dyaur meruśikharair iva // 6.2.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kālena cāsya rājñaḥ sā suṣeṇasya varāpsarāḥ / asūtānanyasadṛśīṃ dhṛtagarbhā satī sutām // 6.2.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
prasūtamātraiva ca sā jagādainaṃ mahīpatim / rājan śāpo 'yam īdṛṅ me kṣīṇo jātaḥ sa cādhunā // 6.2.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ hi rambhā nākastrī tvayi dṛṣṭe 'nurāgiṇī / jāte ca garbhe muktvā taṃ gacchāmas tatkṣaṇaṃ vayam // 6.2.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
samayo hīdṛśo 'smākaṃ tadrakṣeḥ kanyakām imām / etadvivāhān nāke nau bhūyo bhāvī samāgamaḥ // 6.2.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
evam uktvāpsarā rambhā vivaśā sā tirodadhe / tadduḥkhāc ca sa rājābhūt tadā prāṇavyayodyataḥ // 6.2.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nirāsthenāpi kiṃ tyaktaṃ viśvāmitreṇa jīvitam / menakāyāṃ prayātāyāṃ prasūyaiva śakuntalām // 6.2.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ādi sacivair ukto jñātārthaḥ sa nṛpo dhṛtim / śanair ādatta kanyāṃ ca punaḥ saṃgamakāraṇam // 6.2.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāṃ ca bālāṃ tadekāgraḥ pitā sarvāṅgasundarīm / so 'tilocanasaundaryān nāmnā cakre sulocanām // 6.2.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kālena yauvanaprāptām udyānasthaṃ dadarśa tām / yuvā yadṛcchayā bhrāmyan vatsākhyaḥ kāśyapo muniḥ // 6.2.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa taporāśirūpo 'pi dṛṣṭvaivaitāṃ nṛpātmajām / anurāgarasajño 'bhūd iti cātra vyacintayat // 6.2.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho rūpaṃ kim apy asyāḥ kanyāyāḥ paramādbhutam / nemāṃ prāpnoti ced bhāryāṃ kim anyat tapasaḥ phalam // 6.2.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti dhyāyan muniyuvā sa sulocanayā tayā / adarśi prajvalattejā vidhūma iva pāvakaḥ // 6.2.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ vīkṣya sāpi sapremā sākṣasūtrakamaṇḍalum / śāntaś ca kamanīyaś ca ko 'yaṃ syād ity acintayat // 6.2.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
varaṇāyeva copetya nayanotpalamālikām / kṣipantī tasya vapuṣi praṇāmam akaron muneḥ // 6.2.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
patiṃ samāpnuhīty āśīs tasyās tenābhyadhīyata / surāsuradurullaṅghyamanmathājñāvaśātmanā // 6.2.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'sāmānyatadrūpalobhaluṇṭhitalajjayā / tayāpy ūce sa vinamadvaktrayā munipuṃgavaḥ // 6.2.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
eṣā yadīcchā bhavato nirmālāpo na ced ayam / tad deva dātā nṛpatiḥ pitā me yacyatām iti // 6.2.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
athānvayaṃ parijanān munis tasyā niśamya saḥ / gatvā nṛpaṃ tatpitaraṃ suṣeṇaṃ tām ayācata // 6.2.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
so 'pi taṃ vīkṣya tapasā vapuṣā cātibhūmigam / uvāca racitātithyo rājā munikumārakam // 6.2.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
jātāpsarasi rambhāyāṃ kanyaiṣā bhagavan mama / asyā vivāhān nāke me tayā bhāvī samāgamaḥ // 6.2.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
evaṃ tayā vrajantyā dyāṃ rambhayaiva mamoditam / etat kathaṃ mahābhāga bhaved iti nirūpyatām // 6.2.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā muniputro 'sau kṣaṇam evam acintayat / kiṃ purā menakodbhūtā sarpadaṣṭā pramadvarā // 6.2.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dattvāyuṣo 'rdhaṃ muninā na bhāryā ruruṇā kṛtā / triśaṅkuḥ kiṃ na nīto dyāṃ viśvāmitreṇa lubdhakaḥ // 6.2.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad idaṃ svatapobhāgavyayāt kiṃ na karomy aham / ity alocya na bhāro 'yam ity uktvā so 'bravīn muniḥ // 6.2.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
he devatās tapoṃśena madīyenaiṣa bhūpatiḥ / saśarīro divaṃ yātu rambhāsaṃbhogasiddhaye // 6.2.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukte tena muninā śṛṇvantyāṃ rājasaṃsadi / evam astv iti suvyaktā divyā vāg udabhūt tataḥ // 6.2.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sulocanāṃ tasmai munaye kāśyapāya tām / vatsāya dattvā tanayāṃ sa rājā divam udyayau // 6.2.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tatra divyatvam āsādya tayā śakraniyuktayā / sa reme rambhayā sākaṃ bhūyo divyānubhāvayā // 6.2.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
itthaṃ kṛtārthatāṃ deva suṣeṇaḥ prāpa kanyayā / kanyā yuṣmādṛśāṃ geheṣv īdṛśyo 'vataranti hi // 6.2.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad eṣā kāpi divyā te jāta śāpacyutā gṛhe / kanyā nūnam ato mā gāḥ śucaṃ taj janmanā vibho // 6.2.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti śrutvā kathāṃ rājā gṛhavṛddhād dvijanmanaḥ / kaliṅgadatto nṛpatir jahau cintāṃ tutoṣa ca // 6.2.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tāṃ ca cakre nijasutāṃ nayanānandadāyinīm / nāmnā kaliṅgaseneti bālām indukalopamām // 6.2.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpi tasya pitur gehe rājaputrī tataḥ kramāt / kaliṅgasenā vavṛdhe vayasyāmadhyavartinī // 6.2.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
vijahāra ca harmyeṣu sā gṛheṣu vaneṣu ca / krīḍārasamayasyeva laharī śaiśavāmbudheḥ // 6.2.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kadācid atha harmyasthāṃ kelisaktāṃ dadarśa tām / māyāsurasutā yāntī vyomnā somaprabhābhidhā // 6.2.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā tām ālokya rūpeṇa munimānasamohinīm / somaprabhā nabhaḥsthaiva jātaprītir acintayat // 6.2.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
keyaṃ kim aindavī mūrtiḥ kāntis tasyā divā kutaḥ / ratir vā yadi kāmaḥ kva kanyakā tad avaimy aham // 6.2.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atra rājagṛhe kāpi divyā śāpacyutā bhavet / jāne janmāntare cābhūn nūnaṃ sakhyaṃ mamaitayā // 6.2.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etad dhi me vadaty asyām atisnehākulaṃ manaḥ / tadyuktaṃ kartum etāṃ me svayaṃ varasakhīṃ punaḥ // 6.2.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti saṃcintya bālāyās tasyāḥ saṃtrāsaśaṅkayā / somaprabhā sā aganādalakṣitam avātarat // 6.2.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
manuṣyakanyakābhāvam āśrityāśvāsakāraṇam / sāsyāḥ kaliṅgasenāyāḥ śanair upasasarpa ca // 6.2.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
diṣṭyā rājasutā kāpi svayam atyadbhutākṛtiḥ / asau samāgatā pārśvam uciteyaṃ sakhī mama // 6.2.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti taddarśanād eva vicintyotthāya cādarāt / kaliṅgasenāpy āliṅgat sā tāṃ somaprabhāṃ tadā // 6.2.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
upaveśya ca papraccha kṣaṇād anvayanāmanī / vakṣyāmi sarvaṃ tiṣṭheti tāṃ ca somaprabhābravīt // 6.2.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tataḥ kathākrameṇaiva vācā sakhyam abadhyata / tābhyām ubhābhyam anyonyahastagrahapuraḥsaram // 6.2.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha somaprabhāvādīt sakhi tvaṃ rājakanyakā / rājaputraiḥ samaṃ sakhyaṃ kṛcchrād apy ativāhyate // 6.2.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alpenāpy aparādhena te hi kupyanty amātrayā / rājaputravaṇikputrakathāṃ śṛṇv atra vacmi te // 6.2.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nagaryāṃ puṣkarāvatyāṃ gūḍhasenābhidho nṛpaḥ / āsīt tasya ca jāto 'bhūd eka eva kilātmajaḥ // 6.2.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa rājaputro dṛptaḥ sann ekaputratayā śubham / aśubhaṃ vāpi yac cakre pitā tasyāsahiṣṭa tat // 6.2.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhrāmyatopavane jātu dṛṣṭas tenaikaputrakaḥ / vaṇijo brahmadattasya svatulyavibhavākṛtiḥ // 6.2.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvā ca sadyaḥ so 'nena svayaṃvarasuhṛtkṛtaḥ / tadaiva caikarūpau tau jātau rājavaṇiksutau // 6.2.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sthātuṃ na śekatuḥ kṣipraṃ tāv anyonyam adarśanam / āśu badhnāti hi prema prāgjanmāntarasaṃstavaḥ // 6.2.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nopabhuṅkte sma taṃ bhogaṃ rājaputraḥ kadācana / vaṇikputrasya yas tasya nādāv evopakalpitaḥ // 6.2.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā suhṛdas tasya niścityodvāham āditaḥ / ahicchatraṃ vivāhāya sa pratasthe nṛpātmajaḥ // 6.2.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mittreṇa tena sākaṃ ca gajārūḍhaḥ sasainikaḥ / gacchann ikṣumatītīraṃ prāpya sāyaṃ samāvasat // 6.2.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra candrodaye pānam āsevya śayanaṃ śritaḥ / arthito nijayā dhātryā kathāṃ vaktuṃ pracakrame // 6.2.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upakrāntakatho jahre śrānto mattaś ca nidrayā / dhātrī ca tadvat so 'py āsīt snehāj jāgradvaṇiksutaḥ // 6.2.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tataḥ supteṣu cānyeṣu strīṇām iva mithaḥ kathā / gagane śuśruve tena vaṇikputreṇa jāgratā // 6.2.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anākhyāya kathāṃ suptaḥ pāpo 'yaṃ tac chapāmy aham / paridrakṣyaty asau hāraṃ prātastaṃ ced grahīṣyati // 6.2.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṇṭhalagnena tenaiṣa tatkṣaṇaṃ mṛtyum āpsyati / ity uktvā virarāmaikā dvitīyā ca tato 'bravīt // 6.2.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ato yady ayam uttīrṇas tad drakṣyaty āmrapādapam / viyokṣyate phalāny asya tataḥ prāṇair vimokṣyate // 6.2.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā vyaramat sāpi tṛtīyābhidhadhe tataḥ / yady etad api tīrṇo 'yaṃ tadvivāhakṛte gṛham // 6.2.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praviṣṭaś cet tad evāsya hantuṃ pṛṣṭhe patiṣyati / uktveti nyavṛtat sāpi caturthī vyāharat tataḥ // 6.2.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ato 'pi yadi nistīrṇas tan naktaṃ vāsaveśmani / praviṣṭaḥ śatakṛtvo 'yaṃ kṣutaṃ sadyaḥ kariṣyati // 6.2.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śatakṛtvo 'pi yady asya jīveti na vadiṣyati / kaścid atra tataś caiṣa mṛtyor vaśam upaiṣyati // 6.2.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yena cedaṃ śrutaṃ so 'sya rakṣārthaṃ yadi vakṣyati / tasyāpi bhavitā mṛtyur ity uktvā sā nyavartata // 6.2.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vaṇiksutaś ca tat sarvaṃ śrutvā nirghātadāruṇam / sa tasya rājaputrasya snehodvigno vyacintayat // 6.2.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upakrantām anākhyātāṃ dhik kathāṃ yady alakṣitāḥ / devataḥ śrotum āyātāḥ śapantyas tu kutūhalāt // 6.2.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad etasmin mṛte rājasute ko 'rtho mamāsubhiḥ / ato 'yaṃ rakṣaṇīyo mety uktyā prāṇasamaḥ suhṛt // 6.2.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vṛttānto 'pi na vācyo 'sya mā bhūd doṣo mamāpy ataḥ / ity ālocya niśāṃ ninye sa kṛcchreṇa vaṇiksutaḥ // 6.2.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājaputro 'pi sa prātaḥ prasthitas tatsakhaḥ pathi / dadarśa purato hāraṃ tam ādātum iyeṣa ca // 6.2.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'bravīd vaṇikputro hāraṃ mā sma grahīḥ sakhe / māyeyam anyathā naite paśyeyuḥ sainikāḥ katham // 6.2.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā taṃ parityajya gacchann agre dadarśa saḥ / āmravṛkṣaṃ phalāny asya bhoktuṃ caicchan nṛpātmajaḥ // 6.2.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vaṇikputreṇa ca prāgvat tato 'pi sa nivāritaḥ / sāntaḥkhedaḥ śanair gacchan prāpa śvaśuraveśma tat // 6.2.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrodvāhakṛte veśma viśan dvārān nivartitaḥ / tenaiva sakhyā yāvac ca tāvat tatpatitaṃ gṛham // 6.2.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tataḥ kathaṃcid uttīrṇaḥ kiṃcit sapratyayo niśi / nivāsakaṃ viveśānyaṃ rājaputro vadhūsakhaḥ // 6.2.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tasmin vaṇikputre praviśyālakṣitasthite / śatakṛtvaḥ kṣutaṃ cakre śayanīyāśrito 'tha saḥ // 6.2.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śatakṛtvo 'pi tasyātra nīcair jīvety udīrya saḥ / kṛtakāryo vaṇikputro hṛṣṭaḥ svairaṃ bahir yayau // 6.2.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
niryāntaṃ tam apaśyac ca rājaputro vadhūsakhaḥ / īrṣyāvismṛtatatsnehaḥ kruddho dvāḥsthān uvāca ca // 6.2.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pāpātmāyaṃ rahaḥsthasya praviṣṭo 'ntaḥpuraṃ mama / tad baddhvā sthāpyatāṃ yāvat prabhāte 'sau nigṛhyate // 6.2.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad buddhvā rakṣibhir baddho niśāṃ ninye vaṇiksutaḥ / prātar vadhyabhuvaṃ taiś ca nīyamāno 'bravītsa tān // 6.2.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ādau nayata māṃ tāvad rājaputrāntikaṃ yataḥ / vakṣyāmi kāraṇaṃ kiṃcit tataḥ kuruta me vadham // 6.2.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktais tena tair gatvā vijñaptaḥ sa nṛpātmajaḥ / sacivair bodhitaś cānyais tasyānayanam ādiśat // 6.2.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ānītaḥ so 'bravīt tasmai vṛttāntaṃ rājasūnave / pratyayād gṛhapātotthān mene satyaṃ ca so 'pi tat // 6.2.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tuṣṭaḥ samaṃ sakhya vadhamuktena tena saḥ / āyayau rājatanayaḥ kṛtadāro nijāṃ purīm // 6.2.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatra so 'pi suhṛt tasya kṛtadāro vaṇiksutaḥ / stūyamānaguṇaḥ sarvair janair āsīd yathāsukham // 6.2.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam ucchṛṅkhalā bhūtvā svaniyantṛpramāthinaḥ / rājaputrā na manyante hitaṃ mattā gajā iva // 6.2.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vetālais taiś ca kā maittrī ye vihasya haranty asūn / tad rājaputri sakhyaṃ me ma sma vyabhicaraḥ sadā // 6.2.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti śrutvā kathām etāṃ harmye somaprabhāmukhāt / kaliṅgasenā sasnehaṃ tāṃ sakhīṃ pratyabhāṣata // 6.2.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ete piśācā na tv ete rājaputrā matāḥ sakhi / piśācadurgrahakathām aham ākhyāmi te śṛṇu // 6.2.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
yajñasthalākhye ko 'py āsīd agrahāre purā dvijaḥ / sa jātu durgataḥ kāṣṭhāny āhartum aṭavīṃ yayau // 6.2.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra kāṣṭhaṃ kuṭhāreṇa pāṭyamānaṃ vidher vaśāt / āpatya tasya jaṅghāyāṃ bhittvāntaḥ praviveśa tat // 6.2.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa prasravadrakto dṛṣṭvā kenāpi mūrcchitaḥ / utkṣipyānīyata gṛhaṃ puṃsāṃ pratyabhijānatā // 6.2.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatra vihvalayā patnyā tasya prakṣālya śoṇitam / āśvāsya tasya jaṅghāyāṃ nibaddho vraṇapaṭṭakaḥ // 6.2.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataś cikitsyamānaḥ san vraṇas tasya dine dine / na paraṃ na rurohaiva yāvan nāḍītvam āyayau // 6.2.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato nāḍīvraṇāt khinno daridro maraṇodyataḥ / abhyetya sakhyā vipreṇa kenāpi jagade rahaḥ // 6.2.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sakhā me yajñadattākhyaś ciraṃ bhūtvātidurgataḥ / piśācasādhanaṃ kṛtvā dhanaṃ prāpya sukhī sthitaḥ // 6.2.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac ca tatsādhanaṃ tena mamāpy uktaṃ tvam apy ataḥ / piśācaṃ sādhaya sakhe sa te ropayitā vraṇam // 6.2.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ity uktvākhyātamantro 'sāv uvācāsya kriyām imām / utthāya paścime yāme muktakeśo digambaraḥ // 6.2.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anācāntaś ca muṣṭī dvau taṇḍulānāṃ yathākṣamam / dvābhyām ādāya hastābhyāṃ japan gaccheś catuṣpatham // 6.2.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra taṇḍulamuṣṭī dvau sthāpayitvā tataḥ sakhe / maunenaiva tvam āgaccher mā vīkṣiṣṭhāś ca pṛṣṭhataḥ // 6.2.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ kuru sadā yāvat piśāco vyaktatāṃ gataḥ / ahaṃ hi hanmi te vyādhim iti tvāṃ vakṣyati svayam // 6.2.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'bhinandes taṃ so 'tha tava rogaṃ hariṣyati / ity uktas tena mittreṇa sa dvijas tat tathākarot // 6.2.168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ siddhaḥ piśācaḥ sa tasyārtasya mahauṣadhīḥ / himācalendrād ānīya ropayām āsa taṃ vraṇam // 6.2.169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
jagāda ca prahṛṣṭaṃ taṃ so 'tha lagnagraho dvijam / dehi vraṇaṃ dvitīyaṃ me yāvat taṃ ropayāmy aham // 6.2.170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na cet sṛjāmy anarthaṃ te śarīraṃ saṃharāmi vā / tac chrutvā sa dvijo bhītaḥ sadyo muktyai tam abhyadhāt // 6.2.171	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vraṇaṃ dvitīyaṃ dāsyāmi saptabhis te dinair iti / tatas tenojjhitaḥ so 'bhūn nirāśo jīvite dvijaḥ // 6.2.172	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā viratā madhyād aślīlākhyānalajjayā / kaliṅgasenā bhūyaḥ sāvādīt somaprabhām idam // 6.2.173	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tato vraṇāntarālābhād ārtaṃ vipram uvāca tam / dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭvā ca duhitā vidagdhā mṛtabhartṛkā // 6.2.174	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
vañcaye 'haṃ piśācaṃ taṃ gaccha tvaṃ brūhi taṃ punaḥ / nāḍīvraṇo madduhitur bhavatā ropyatām iti // 6.2.175	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tac chrutvā mudito gatvā tathaivoktvā ca sa dvijaḥ / anaiṣīd duhitus tasyāḥ piśācaṃ taṃ tato 'ntikam // 6.2.176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā ca tasya piśācasya varāṅgaṃ svam adarśayat / ropayemaṃ vraṇaṃ bhadra mameti bruvatī rahaḥ // 6.2.177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca mūḍhaḥ piśāco 'syā varāṅge satataṃ dadau / piṇḍīlepādi na tv āsīt sa taṃ ropayituṃ kṣamaḥ // 6.2.178	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dinaiś ca khinnas tasyāḥ sa kṛtvā jaṅghe nijāṃsayoḥ / kiṃsvin na rohatīty evaṃ tadvarāṅgaṃ vyalokayat // 6.2.179	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
yāvad dvitīyaṃ tasyādhaḥ sa payuvraṇam aikṣata / taṃ dṛṣṭvaiva ca saṃbhrāntaḥ sa piśāco vyacintayat // 6.2.180	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
eko na ropito yāvad utpanno 'yaṃ vraṇo 'paraḥ / satyaḥ pravādo yacchidreṣv anarthā yānti bhūritām // 6.2.181	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
prabhavanti yato lokāḥ pralayaṃ yānti yena ca / saṃsāravartma vivṛtaṃ kaḥ pidhātuṃ tad īśvaraḥ // 6.2.182	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ity ālocya viruddhārthasiddhyā bandhanaśaṅkayā / sa piśācas tato mūrkhaḥ palāyyādarśanaṃ yayau // 6.2.183	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ ca vañcayitvā taṃ piśācaṃ mocitas tayā / duhitrā sa dvijas tasthau rogottīrṇo yathāsukham // 6.2.184	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
itthaṃ piśācās tat tulyā bālā rājasutāś ca ye / te siddhā apy anarthāya sakhi rakṣyās tu buddhibhiḥ // 6.2.185	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājaputryaḥ kulīnās tu naitādṛśyaḥ śrutāḥ kvacit / ato 'nyathā na bhāvyaṃ te sakhi matsaṃgataṃ prati // 6.2.186	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ kaliṅgasenāyā mukhāc chrutvā yathākramam / sahāsacitramadhuraṃ toṣaṃ somaprabhā yayau // 6.2.187	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ito me ṣaṣṭiyojanyāṃ gṛhaṃ yāti ca vāsaraḥ / ciraṃ sthitāsmi tat tanvi yāmīty etām uvāca ca // 6.2.188	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'stagiriśekharaṃ vrajati vāsareśe śanaiḥ sakhīṃ punar upāgamat praṇayinīṃ samāpṛcchya tām / kṣaṇaṃ janitavismayā gaganamārgam utpatya sā jagāma vasatiṃ nijāṃ prasabham eva somaprabhā // 6.2.189	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
vilokya ca tad adbhutaṃ bahuvitarkam atyadbhutaṃ praviśya samacintayat kila kaliṅgasenā ca sā / na vedmi kim asāv aho mama sakhī hi siddhāṅganā bhavet kim athavāpsarāḥ kim athavāpi vidyādharī // 6.2.190	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
divyā tāvad iyaṃ bhavaty avitathaṃ vyomāgrasaṃcāriṇī divyā yānti ca mānuṣībhir asamasnehāhṛtāḥ saṃgatim / bheje kiṃ nṛpateḥ pṛthos tanayayā sakhyaṃ na sārundhatī tatprītyā pṛthur ānināya surabhiṃ svargān na kiṃ bhūtale // 6.2.191	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
tatkṣīrāśanato na kiṃ punar asau bhraṣṭo 'pi yāto divaṃ saṃbhūtāś ca tataḥ prabhṛty avikalā gāvo na kiṃ bhūtale / tad dhanyāsmi śubhodayād upanatā divyā sakhīyaṃ mama prātaś cānvayanāmanī sunipuṇaṃ prakṣyāmi tām āgatām // 6.2.192	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
ity ādi rājatanayā hṛdi cintayantī tāṃ yāminīm anayad atra kaliṅgasenā / somaprabhā ca nijaveśmani bhūya eva taddarśanotsukamanā rajanīṃ nināya // 6.2.193	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
tataḥ somaprabhā prātas tadvinodopapādinīm / nyastadārumayānekam āyasadyantraputrikām // 6.3.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karaṇḍināṃ samādāya sā nabhastalacāriṇī / tasyāḥ kaliṅgasenāyā nikaṭaṃ punar āyayau // 6.3.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaliṅgasenāpy ālokya tām ānandāśrunirbharā / utthāya kaṇṭhe jagrāha pārśvāsīnām uvāca ca // 6.3.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tvadīyamukhapūrṇendudarśanena vinā sakhi / tamomayī triyāmādya śatayām eva me gatā // 6.3.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tajjanmāntarasaṃbandhaḥ kīdṛśaḥ syāt tvayā mama / yasyāyaṃ pariṇāmo 'dya tvaṃ devī vetsi ced vada // 6.3.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā rājaputrīṃ tām evaṃ somaprabhābravīt / īdṛṅ me nāsti vijñānaṃ na hi jātiṃ smarāmy aham // 6.3.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na cātra munayo 'bhijñāḥ ke cit tu yadi jānate / taiḥ kṛtaṃ tādṛśaṃ pūrvaṃ paratattvavidaś ca te // 6.3.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktavatīṃ bhūyaḥ premaviśrambhapeśalam / kaliṅgasenā papraccha vijane tāṃ sakautukā // 6.3.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
brūhi me sakhi kasyeha devajāteḥ pitus tvayā / janmanālaṃkṛto vaṃśo muktayeva suvṛttayā // 6.3.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jagatkarṇāmṛtaṃ kiṃ ca tava nāma sulakṣaṇe / karaṇḍikā kimartheyam asyām asti ca vastu kim // 6.3.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ kaliṅgasenāyāḥ śrutvā sapraṇayaṃ vacaḥ / somaprabhā sā sarvaṃ tat kramād vaktuṃ pracakrame // 6.3.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
asti trijagati khyāto mayo nāma mahāsuraḥ / āsuraṃ bhāvam utsṛjya śauriṃ sa śaraṇaṃ śritaḥ // 6.3.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena dattābhayaś cakre sa ca vajrabhṛtaḥ sabhām / daityāś ca devapakṣo 'yam iti taṃ prati cukrudhuḥ // 6.3.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadbhayāt tena vindhyādrau māyāvivaramandiram / agamyam asurendrāṇāṃ bahvāścaryamayaṃ kṛtam // 6.3.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāvāṃ dve duhitarau mayasya brahmacāriṇī / jyeṣṭhā svayaṃprabhā nāma kumārī tadgṛhasthitā // 6.3.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ somaprabhā nāma kaniṣṭhā sā tv ahaṃ sakhi / nalakūbarasaṃjñāya dattā dhanadasūnave // 6.3.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pitrā ca śikṣitāsmīha māyāyantrāṇy anekadhā / tvatprītyā ceyam ānītā pūrṇā tava karaṇḍikā // 6.3.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvādarśayat tasyāḥ prodghāṭya bahukautukāḥ / somaprabhā kāṣṭhamayīḥ svamāyāyantraputrikāḥ // 6.3.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
kīlikāhatimātreṇa kācid gatvā vihāyasā / tadājñayā puṣpamālām ādāya drutam āyayau // 6.3.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
kācit tathaiva pānīyam ānināya yadṛcchayā / kācinn anarta kācic ca kathālāpam athākarot // 6.3.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ādibhir mahāścaryaiḥ kaṃcit kālaṃ vinodya tām / surakṣitāṃ sthāpayitvā tāṃ ca yantrakaraṇḍikām // 6.3.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
kaliṅgasenām āmantrya sotkāṃ somaprabhā tataḥ / yayau bhartṛparāyattā nabhasā nijamandiram // 6.3.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaliṅgasenāpy āścaryadarśanadhvastayā kṣudhā / prahṛṣṭā tad ahas tasthau sarvāhāraparāṅmukhī // 6.3.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad dṛṣṭvā ca tatas tasyā jananī rogaśaṅkinī / ānandākhyena bhiṣajā nirūpyāvikaloditā // 6.3.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
kuto 'pi hetor harṣeṇa naṣṭāsyāḥ kṣun na rogataḥ / utphullanetraṃ vakty etad asyā hasad ivānanam // 6.3.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ity uktā bhiṣajā harṣahetuṃ tajjananī ca sā / papraccha tāṃ yathāvṛttaṃ sāpi tasyai tad abravīt // 6.3.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ ślāghyasakhī saṅgahṛṣṭāṃ matvābhinandya ca / āhāraṃ kārayām āsa jananī tāṃ yathocitam // 6.3.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athānyedyur upāgatya viditārthā krameṇa sā / kaliṅgasenāṃ tām eva rahaḥ somaprabhābhyadhāt // 6.3.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
mayā tvatsakhyam āvedya tvatpārśvāgamane 'nvaham / anujñā jñānino bhartur gṛhītā viditārthataḥ // 6.3.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmāt tvam apy anujñātā pitṛbhyāṃ bhava sāṃpratam / yena svairaṃ mayā sākaṃ niḥśaṅkā vihariṣyasi // 6.3.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktavatīṃ haste tāṃ gṛhītvaiva tatkṣaṇam / kaliṅgasenā svapitur mātuś ca nikaṭaṃ yayau // 6.3.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tatra nāmānvayākhyānapūrvaṃ caitām adarśayat / pitre kaliṅgadattāya rājñe somaprabhāṃ sakhīm // 6.3.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mātre ca tārādattāyai tathaivaitām adarśayat / tau ca dṛṣṭvā yathākhyānam enām abhinanandatuḥ // 6.3.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ūcatuś cākṛtiprītau daṃpatī tāv ubhau tataḥ / satkṛtya duhitṛsnehāt tāṃ mahāsurasundarīm // 6.3.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vatse kaliṅgaseneyaṃ haste tava samarpitā / tad idānīṃ yathakāmam ubhe viharatāṃ yuvām // 6.3.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
etat tayor vaco dve cāpy abhinandya nirīyatuḥ / samaṃ kaliṅgasenā ca sā ca somaprabhā tataḥ // 6.3.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jagmatuś ca vihārāya vihāraṃ rājanirmitam / āninyatuś ca tāṃ tatra māyāyantrakaraṇḍikām // 6.3.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato yantramayaṃ yakṣaṃ gṛhītvā prāhiṇot tadā / somaprabhā svaprayogād buddhārcānayanāya sā // 6.3.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
sa yakṣo nabhasā gatvā dūram adhvānam āyayau / ādāya muktāsadratnahemāmburuhasaṃcayam // 6.3.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tenābhipūjya sugatān bhasayām āsa tatra sā / somaprabhā sanilayān sarvāścaryapradāyinā // 6.3.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tad buddhvāgatya dṛṣṭvā ca vismito mahiṣīsakhaḥ / rājā kaliṅgadattas tām apṛcchad yantraceṣṭitam // 6.3.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ somaprabhāvādīd rājann etāny anekadhā / māyāyantrādiśilpāni pitrā sṛṣṭāni me purā // 6.3.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yathā cedaṃ jagadyantraṃ pañcabhūtātmakaṃ tathā / yantrāṇy etāni sarvāṇi śṛṇu tāni pṛthak pṛthak // 6.3.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pṛthvīpradhānaṃ yantraṃ yad dvārādi pidadhāti tat / pihitaṃ tena śaknoti na codghāṭayituṃ paraḥ // 6.3.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ākāras toyayantrotthaḥ sajīva iva dṛśyate / tejomayaṃ tu yad yantraṃ taj jvalāḥ parimuñcati // 6.3.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vātayantraṃ ca kurute ceṣṭā gatyāgamādikāḥ / vyaktīkaroti cālāpaṃ yantram ākāśasaṃbhavam // 6.3.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
mayā caitāny avāptāni tātāt kiṃ tvam ṛtasya yat / rakṣakaṃ cakrayantraṃ tat tāto jānāti nāparaḥ // 6.3.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti tasyā vadantyās tadvacaḥ śraddadhatām iva / madhyāhne pūryamāṇānāṃ śaṅkhānām udabhūd dhvaniḥ // 6.3.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ svocitam āhāraṃ dātuṃ vijñāpya taṃ nṛpam / prāpy anujñāṃ vimāne tāṃ sānugāṃ yantranirmite // 6.3.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaliṅgasenām ādāya pratasthe gaganena sā / somaprabhā pitṛgṛhaṃ jyeṣṭhāyāḥ svasur antikam // 6.3.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
kṣaṇāc ca prāpya vindhyādrivarti tatpitṛmandiram / tasyāḥ svayaṃprabhāyāś ca pārśvaṃ tām anayat svasuḥ // 6.3.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāpaśyaj jaṭājūṭamālinīṃ tāṃ svayaṃprabhām / kaliṅgasenā lambākṣamālāṃ sā brahmacāriṇīm // 6.3.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
susitāmbarasaṃvītāṃ hasantīm iva pārvatīm / kāmabhogamahābhogagṛhītogratapaḥkriyām // 6.3.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpi somaprabhākhyātāṃ praṇatāṃ tāṃ nṛpātmajām / svayaṃprabhā kṛtātithyā saṃvibheje phalāśanaiḥ // 6.3.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sakhi bhuktaiḥ phalair etair jarā te na bhaviṣyati / vināśinyasya rūpasya padmasyeva himāhatiḥ // 6.3.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etadartham iha snehād ānītā bhavatī mayā / iti somaprabhā caitāṃ rājaputrīm abhāṣata // 6.3.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ kaliṅgasenātra tāny abhuṅkta phalāni sā / sadyo 'mṛtarasāsārasiktāṅgīva babhūva ca // 6.3.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dadarśa ca purodyānaṃ bhramantī tatra kautukāt / sasuvarṇābjavāpīkaṃ sudhāsvāduphaladrumam // 6.3.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
haimacitrakhagākīrṇaṃ san maṇistambhavibhramam / bhittibuddhikaraṃ śūnye bhittau śūnyapratītidam // 6.3.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jale sthaladhiyaṃ kurvat sthale ca jalabuddhikṛt / lokāntaram ivāpūrvaṃ mayamāyāvinirmitam // 6.3.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praviṣṭapūrvaṃ plavagaiḥ purā sītāgaveṣibhiḥ / svayaṃprabhāprasādena cirāt saṃprāptanirgamaiḥ // 6.3.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tadadbhutapuraprakāmālokavismitām / ajarābhājanībhūtāṃ tām āpṛcchya svayaṃprabhām // 6.3.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaliṅgasenām āropya yantre bhūyo vihāyasā / somaprabhā takṣaśilām ānināya svamandiram // 6.3.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tatra sā tad yathāvastu pitroḥ sarvam avarṇayat / kaliṅgasenā tau cāpi paraṃ saṃtoṣam īyatuḥ // 6.3.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
itthaṃ tayor dvayoḥ sakhyor gacchatsu divaseṣv atha / ūce kaliṅgasenāṃ tām evaṃ somaprabhaikadā // 6.3.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yāvan na pariṇīta tvaṃ tāvat sakhyaṃ mama tvayā / tvadbhartṛbhavane paścān mama syād āgamaḥ kutaḥ // 6.3.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na dṛśyo hi sakhībhartā nāṅgīkāryaḥ kathaṃcana / avervṛkīva snuṣāyāḥ śvaśrūr māṃsāni khādati // 6.3.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
tathā ca śṛṇu vacmy etāṃ kīrtisenākathāṃ tava // 6.3.68	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)
pure pāṭaliputrākhye dhuryo dhanavatāṃ vaṇik / nāmnā yathārthena purā dhanapālita ity abhūt // 6.3.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
kīrtisenābhidhānā ca tasyājāyata kanyakā / rūpeṇānanyasadṛśī prāṇebhyo 'py adhikapriyā // 6.3.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
sā ca tena samānāya magadheṣu maharddhaye / devasenābhidhānāya dattābhūd vaṇije sutā // 6.3.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya cātisuvṛttasya devasenasya durjanī / vipannajanakasyāsīj jananī svāminī gṛhe // 6.3.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā snuṣāṃ kīrtisenāṃ tāṃ paśyantī patisaṃmatām / krudhā jvalantī putrasya parokṣam akadarthayat // 6.3.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kīrtisenā ca sā patyur vaktuṃ naiva śaśāka tat / kaṣṭā hi kuṭilaśvaśrūparatantravadhūsthitiḥ // 6.3.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā sa patis tasyā devaseno vaṇijyayā / gantuṃ pravavṛte bandhuprerito valabhīṃ purīm // 6.3.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sā kīrtisenā taṃ patim evam abhāṣata / iyac ciraṃ mayā naitad āryaputra tavoditam // 6.3.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kadarthayati mām eṣā tavāmbā tvayy api sthite / tvayi tu proṣite kiṃ me kuryād iti na vedmy aham // 6.3.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sa samudbhrāntas tatsnehāt sabhayaḥ śanaiḥ / devasenas tadā gatvā mātaraṃ praṇato 'bravīt // 6.3.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kīrtisenādhunā haste tavāmba prasthitasya me / nāsyā niḥsnehatā kāryā kulīnatanayā hy asau // 6.3.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā kīrtisenāṃ tām āhūyodvartitekṣaṇā / taṃ devasenaṃ mātā sā tatkālaṃ samabhāṣata // 6.3.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kṛtaṃ mayā kiṃ pṛcchaitām evaṃ tvāṃ prerayatyasu / gṛhabhedakarī putra mama tu dvau yuvāṃ samau // 6.3.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutvaitac chāntacitto 'bhūt tatkṛte sa vaṇigvaraḥ / vyājasapraṇayair vākyair jananyā yo na vañcyate // 6.3.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kīrtisenā tu sā tūṣṇīm āsīd udvegasasmitā / devasenas tu so 'nyedyuḥ pratasthe valabhīṃ vaṇik // 6.3.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tadvirahakleśajuṣas tasyāḥ krameṇa sā / tanmātā kīrtisenāyā dāsīḥ pārśvān nyavārayat // 6.3.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtvā ca gṛhacāriṇyā svaceṭyā saha saṃvidam / ānāyyābhyantaraṃ guptaṃ tāṃ vivastraṃ cakāra sā // 6.3.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pāpe harasi me putram ity uktvā sakacagraham / pādair dantair nakhaiś caitāṃ ceṭyā samam apāṭayat // 6.3.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
cikṣepa caināṃ bhūgehe sapidhāne dṛḍhārgale / tatratye 'bhyuddhṛtāśeṣapūrvajātārthasaṃcaye // 6.3.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
nyadhāc ca tasyās tatrāntaḥ pratyahaṃ sā dinātyaye / pāpā tādṛgavasthāyā bhaktasyārdhaśarāvakam // 6.3.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
acintayac ca dūrasthe patyāv evaṃ mṛtā svayam / imāṃ vyutthāpya yāteti vakṣyāmi divasair iti // 6.3.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
itthaṃ bhūmigṛhe kṣiptā śvaśrvā pāpakṛtā tayā / sukhārhā rudatī tatra kīrtisenā vyacintayat // 6.3.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āḍhyaḥ patiḥ kule janma saubhāgyaṃ sādhuvṛttatā / tad apy aho mama śvaśrūprasādād īdṛśī vipat // 6.3.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etadarthaṃ ca nindanti kanyānāṃ janma bāndhavāḥ / śvaśrūn anandṛsaṃtrāsam asaubhāgyādidūṣitam // 6.3.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti śocanty akasmāt sā kīrtisenā khanitrakam / lebhe 'smād bhūgṛhād dhātrā manaḥ śalyam ivoddhṛtam // 6.3.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayomayena tenātra suruṅgāṃ nicakhāna sā / tāvad yāvat tayottasthe daivāt svād vāsaveśmanaḥ // 6.3.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dadarśa ca pradīpena prāktanenātha tadgṛham / akṣīṇena kṛtālokā dharmeṇaiva nijena sā // 6.3.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ādāyātaś ca vastrāṇi svaṃ varṇaṃ ca niśākṣaye / nirgatyaiva tato guptaṃ jagāma nagarād bahiḥ // 6.3.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃvidhāyā gantuṃ me na yuktaṃ pitṛveśmani / kiṃ vakṣye tatra lokaś ca pratyeṣyati kathaṃ mama // 6.3.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ataḥ svayuktyā gantavyaṃ patyur evāntikaṃ mayā / ihāmutra ca sādhvīnāṃ patir ekā gatir yataḥ // 6.3.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ālocya cakārātra taḍāgāmbukṛtāplavā / rājaputrasya veṣaṃ sā kīrtisenā subṛṃhitam // 6.3.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato gatvāpaṇe dattvā kiṃcin mūlyena kāñcanam / kasyāpi vaṇijo gehe dine tasminn uvāsa sā // 6.3.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyedyus tatra cakre ca valabhīṃ gantum icchatā / samudrasenanāmnā sā vaṇijā saha saṃstavam // 6.3.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena sākaṃ sabhṛtyena prāptuṃ prākprasthitaṃ patim / sadrājaputraveṣā sā pratasthe valabhīṃ prati // 6.3.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jagāda taṃ ca vaṇijaṃ gotrajair asmi bādhitaḥ / tat tvayā saha gacchāmi valabhīṃ svajanāntikam // 6.3.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sa vaṇikputro mārge paryacarac ca tām / rājaputro dhruvaṃ bhavyaḥ ko 'py asāv iti gauravāt // 6.3.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yayau ca sa vaṇiksārthaḥ puraskṛtyāṭavīpatham / bahuśulkabhayatyaktamārgāntarajanāśritam // 6.3.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dinaiḥ prāpyāṭavīdvāraṃ sāyaṃ sārthe kṛtasthitau / cakre kṛtāntadūtīva śabdaṃ bhayakaraṃ śivā // 6.3.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadabhijñe vaṇigloke cauradyāpātaśaṅkini / haste gṛhītaśastreṣu sarvato ripur akṣiṣu // 6.3.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dhvānte dhāvati dasyūnām agrayāyibalopame / kīrtisenā tad ālokya puṃveṣā sā vyacintayat // 6.3.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho duṣkṛtināṃ karma saṃtānenaiva vardhate / paśya śvaśrūkṛtā vyāpad ihāpi phalitā mama // 6.3.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prathamaṃ mṛtyunevāhaṃ śvaśrūkopena bhakṣitā / praviṣṭā bhūgṛhaṃ paścād garbhavāsam ivāparam // 6.3.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
daivāt tato 'pi niṣkrāntā jāteva punar apy aham / ihādyāgatya saṃprāptā bhūyo jīvitasaṃśayam // 6.3.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
caurair yadi hatāsmīha tacchvaśrūr mama vairiṇī / anyāsaktā gatā kvāpīty abhidhāsyati te patim // 6.3.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
strīti jñātāsmi kenāpi hṛtavastrāntarā yadi / tato mṛtyur mama śreyān na punaḥ śīlaviplavaḥ // 6.3.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena cātmaiva me rakṣyo nāpekṣyo 'yaṃ suhṛdvaṇik / satīdharmo hi sustrīṇāṃ cintyo na suhṛdādayaḥ // 6.3.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti niścitya sā prāpa cinvatī tarumadhyagam / gartaṃ gṛhākṛtiṃ dattaṃ kṛpayevāntaraṃ bhuvā // 6.3.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra praviśya cācchādya tṛṇaparṇādibhis tanum / tasthau saṃdhāryamāṇā sā patisaṃgamavāñchayā // 6.3.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato niśīthe sahasā nipatyaivodyatāyudhā / caurasenā sumahatī sārthaṃ vaiṣṭayati sma tam // 6.3.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ninadad dasyukālābhraṃ śastrajvālāciraprabham / tataḥ sarudhirāsāraṃ tatrābhūd yuddhadurdinam // 6.3.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hatvā samudrasenaṃ ca sānugaṃ taṃ vaṇikpatim / balino 'tha yayuś caurā gṛhītadhanasaṃcayāḥ // 6.3.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadā ca kīrtisenā sā śrutakolāhalā balāt / yan na muktāsubhis tatra kāraṇaṃ kevalo vidhiḥ // 6.3.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato niśāyāṃ yātāyām udite tigmatejasi / nirjagāma ca sā tasmād gartād viṭapamadhyataḥ // 6.3.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kāmaṃ bhartrekabhaktānām aviskhalitatejasām / devatā eva sādhvīnāṃ trāṇam āpadi kurvate // 6.3.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yat tatra nirjane 'raṇye siṃho dṛṣṭvāpi tāṃ jahau / na paraṃ yāvad abhyetya kutaścit ko'pi tāpasaḥ // 6.3.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pṛṣṭodantāṃ samāśvāsya jalapānaṃ kamaṇḍaloḥ / dattvopadiśya panthānaṃ tasyāḥ kvāpi tirodhadhe // 6.3.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tṛptāmṛteneva kṣutpipāsāvinākṛtā / tāpasoktena mārgeṇa pratasthe sā pativrata // 6.3.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athāstaśikharārūḍhaṃ prasāritakaraṃ ravim / rātrim ekāṃ kṣamasveti vadantam iva vīkṣya sā // 6.3.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mahato 'raṇyavṛkṣasya gṛhābhaṃ mūlakoṭaram / viveśa pidadhe cāsya dvāram anyena dāruṇā // 6.3.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pradoṣe ca dadarśātra dvāracchindrāntareṇa sā / rākṣasīm āgatāṃ ghorāṃ bālakair anvitāṃ sutaiḥ // 6.3.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tīrṇāny avipad adyāham anayā bhakṣiteti sā / trastā yāvat tarau tāvad ārūḍhā tatra rākṣasī // 6.3.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anvārūḍhāś ca tatputrās tatra tāṃ kila rākṣasīm / abruvann amba naḥ kiṃcid bhakṣyaṃ dehīti tatkṣaṇam // 6.3.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sā rākṣasī bālāṃs tān uvācādya putrakāḥ / mahāśmaśānaṃ gatvāpi bhakṣyaṃ nāsāditaṃ mayā // 6.3.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
yācito ḍākinīsaṃgho 'py atra bhāgam adān na me / tatkhedād atha vijñapya yācito bhairavo mayā // 6.3.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca nāmānvayau pṛṣṭvā devo mām evam ādiśat / bhayaṃkari kulīnāsi kharadūṣaṇavaṃśajā // 6.3.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad ito nātidūrasthaṃ masudattapuraṃ vraja / tatrāste vasudattākhyo rājā dharmaparo mahān // 6.3.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yaḥ kṛtsnām aṭavīm etāṃ paryantastho 'bhirakṣati / svayaṃ gṛhṇāti śulkaṃ ca nigṛhṇāti ca taskarān // 6.3.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāṭavyāṃ ca mṛgayāśramasuptasya bhūpateḥ / ajñātaiva praviṣṭāntaḥ karṇe śatapadī laghu // 6.3.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā ca kālena bahuśaḥ prasutāsya śirontare / tena rogeṇa rājāsau snāyuśeṣo 'dya vartate // 6.3.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vaidyāś cāsya na taṃ vyādhiṃ vidanty anyo 'pi ko'pi cet / na jñāsyati tataś caiṣa dinair alpair vipatsyate // 6.3.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya māṃsāni bhuñjīthā vipannasya svamāyayā / bhakṣitais tarhi ṣaṇmāsān paritṛptā bhaviṣyasi // 6.3.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
itthaṃ me bhairaveṇāpi saṃvibhāgaḥ sasaṃśayaḥ / kālavāṃś cādya vihitas tatputrāḥ kiṃ karomy aham // 6.3.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
evaṃ tayoktā rākṣasyā putrās te tām athābruvan / jñātāpanīte roge 'smin kiṃ sa rājāmba jīvati // 6.3.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kathaṃ ca tādṛśo rogo vada tasyāpanīyate / evam uktavatas tān sā tanayān rākṣasī jagau // 6.3.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jñātāpanīte roge 'smiñ jīvaty eva sa bhūpatiḥ / śrūyatāṃ ca yathā so 'sya mahārogo 'panīyate // 6.3.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
śiraḥ pūrvaṃ ghṛtābhyaktaṃ tasya nyastoṣṇasarpiṣā / kṛtvā madhyāhnakaṭhine sthāpitasyātape ciram // 6.3.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
niveśya karṇakuhare suṣirāṃ vaṃśanāḍikām / śītāmbughaṭapṛṣṭhasthaśarāvacchidrasaṅginīm // 6.3.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena svedātapaklāntā nirgatyāsya śirontarāt / karṇarandhreṇa tenaiva vaṃśanāḍīṃ praviśya tām // 6.3.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ghaṭe śītābhilāṣiṇyaḥ śatapadyaḥ patanti tāḥ / evaṃ sa nṛpatis tasmān mahārogād vimucyate // 6.3.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā rākṣasīṃ putrān vṛkṣasthān virarāma sā / kīrtisenā ca tat sarvam aśṛṇot koṭarasthitā // 6.3.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutvā ca cintayām āsa nistariṣyāmi ced itaḥ / tad gatvaivaitayā yuktyā jīvayiṣyāmi taṃ nṛpam // 6.3.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etām aivāṭavīṃ so 'lpaśulkaḥ prāntasthito 'vati / tatsaukaryāc ca vaṇijaḥ sarve yānty amunā pathā // 6.3.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
etat samudraseno 'pi svargāmī so 'bravīd vaṇik / tad etenaiva mārgeṇa sa me bhartāgamiṣyati // 6.3.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ato gatvāṭavīprānte vasudattapure nṛpam / rogād uttārya tatrasthā pratīkṣe bhartur āgamam // 6.3.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
eyaṃ vicintayantī sā kṛcchrāt tām anayan niśām / prātar naṣṭeṣu rakṣaḥsu niragāt koṭarāt tataḥ // 6.3.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kramāt tato 'ṭavīmadhye yāntī puruṣaveṣabhṛt / prāpte 'parāhṇe gopālam ekaṃ sādhuṃ dadarśa sā // 6.3.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatsaukumāryadūrādhvadarśanārdrīkṛtaṃ ca tam / papracchopetya sā ko 'yaṃ pradeśaḥ kathyatām iti // 6.3.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi gopālako 'vādīd vasudattasya bhūpateḥ / vasudattapuraṃ nāma puram etatpuraḥ sthitam // 6.3.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājāpi sa mahātmātra mumūrṣur vyādhitaḥ sthitaḥ / tac chrutvā kīrtisenā taṃ gopālakam abhāṣata // 6.3.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yadi māṃ nayate kaścid rājñas tasyāntikaṃ tataḥ / ahaṃ taṃ tasya jānāmi nivārayitum āmayam // 6.3.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvaivāvadad gopaḥ pure 'traiva vrajāmy aham / tad āyāhi mayā sākaṃ yāvad yatnaṃ karomi te // 6.3.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathety uktavatīṃ tāṃ ca kīrtisenāṃ tadaiva saḥ / vasudattapuraṃ gopaḥ puṃveṣāṃ nayati sma tām // 6.3.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac ca tatra tathā vastu nivedyātārya tatkṣaṇāt / pratīhārāya kalyāṇalakṣaṇāṃ tāṃ samarpayat // 6.3.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pratīhāro 'pi rājānaṃ vijñapyaiva tadājñayā / praveśayām āsa sa tāṃ tasyāntikam aninditām // 6.3.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
rājā ca so 'tra rogārtas tāṃ dṛṣṭvaivādbhutākṛtim / āśvasto vasudatto 'bhūd vetty ātmaiva hitāhitam // 6.3.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uvāca caitāṃ puṃveṣāṃ yadīmām apaneṣyasi / rujam etat pradāsyāmi rājyārdhaṃ te sulakṣaṇa // 6.3.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
jāne jahāra pṛṣṭhān me svapne strī kṛṣṇakambalam / tan niścitam imaṃ rogaṃ hariṣyati bhavān mama // 6.3.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā kīrtisenā taṃ jagādādya dinaṃ gatam / deva śvaste 'paneṣyāmi rogaṃ mā smādhṛtiṃ kathāḥ // 6.3.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā mūrdhni rājño 'sya gavyaṃ ghṛtam adāpayat / tena tasyāyayau nidrā yayau sā cātivedanā // 6.3.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhiṣagrūpeṇa devo 'yaṃ puṇyair naḥ ko 'py upāgataḥ / iti tatra ca tāṃ sarve kīrtisenāṃ tato 'stuvan // 6.3.168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mahādevī ca tais tais tām upacārair upācarat / naktaṃ veśma pṛthak cāsyāḥ sadāsīkam akalpayat // 6.3.169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athāparedyur madhyāhne mantriṣv antaḥpureṣu ca / paśyatsu tasya bhūpasya kīrtisenā cakarṣa sā // 6.3.170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
śirasaḥ karṇamārgeṇa sārdhaṃ śatapadīśatam / rākṣasyuditayā pūrvaṃ yuktyātyadbhutayā tayā // 6.3.171	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sthāpayitvā ca ghaṭake sā tāḥ śatapadīs tataḥ / ghṛtakṣīrādisekena taṃ nṛpaṃ samatarpayat // 6.3.172	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kramāt tasmin samāśvaste rogamukte mahīpatau / ghaṭe tān prāṇino dṛṣṭvā ko na tatra visismiye // 6.3.173	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājā ca sa vilokyaitān kukīṭān mūrdhanirgatān / tatrāsa dadhyau mumude mene janma nijaṃ punaḥ // 6.3.174	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
kṛtotsavaś ca sa snātaḥ kīrtisenām apūjayat / tām anādṛtarājyārdhāṃ grāmahastyaśvakāñcanaiḥ // 6.3.175	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
devī ca mantriṇaś caitāṃ hemnā vastrair apūrayan / prabhuprāṇaprado 'smākaṃ pūjyo bhiṣag asāv iti // 6.3.176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā ca tasyaiva rājñas tān haste 'rthān saṃprati nyadhāt / kaṃcit kālaṃ vratastho 'ham ity uktvā bhartrapekṣiṇī // 6.3.177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tavāc chuśrāva lokāt taṃ valabhītaḥ samāgatam / sārthavāhaṃ pathā tena devasenaṃ nijaṃ patim // 6.3.179	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
puri tatrātha taṃ sārthaṃ prāptaṃ buddhvaiva sābhyagāt / bhartāraṃ tam apaśyac ca mayūrīva navāmbudam // 6.3.180	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
citteneva cirautsukyasaṃtāpapravilāyinā / dattārghānandabāṣpeṇa pādayos tasya cāpatat // 6.3.181	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi pratyabhyajānāc ca veṣacchannāṃ nirūpya tām / bhartā bhāsvatkarālakṣmyāṃ divā mūrtim ivaindavīm // 6.3.182	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya tadvadanenduṃ ca candrakāntasya paśyataḥ / devasenasya hṛdayaṃ citraṃ na galati sma yat // 6.3.183	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
athāsyāṃ kīrtisenāyām evaṃ prakaṭitātmani / kim etad iti sāścaryaṃ sthite tasmiṃś ca tatpatau // 6.3.184	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vismite ca vaṇiggrāme tad buddhvaiva savismayaḥ / sa rājā vasudatto 'tra svayam eva kilāyayau // 6.3.185	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena pṛṣṭā ca sā kīrtisenā patyuḥ puro 'khilam / śvaśrūduścaritotpannaṃ svavṛttāntam avarṇayat // 6.3.186	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
devasenaś ca tac chrutvā tadbhartā sa svamātari / parāṅmukho 'bhavat kopakṣamāvismayaharṣavān // 6.3.187	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhartṛbhaktir athārūḍhāḥ śīlasaṃnāharakṣitāḥ / dharmasārathayaḥ sādhvyo jayanti matihetayaḥ // 6.3.188	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti tatra sthito 'vādīd ākarṇyaiva tad adbhutam / caritaṃ kīrtisenāyāḥ sānandaḥ sakalo janaḥ // 6.3.189	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājāpy uvāca patyartham āśritakleśayānayā / sītādevy api rāmasya parikleśavahā jitā // 6.3.190	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad eṣā dharmabhaginī mama prāṇapradāyinī / ity uktavantaṃ taṃ bhūpaṃ kīrtisenātha sābravīt // 6.3.191	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
deva tvatprītidāyo yas tava haste mama sthitaḥ / grāmahastyaśvaratnādiḥ sa me bhartre samarpyatām // 6.3.192	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktas tayā rājā dattvā grāmādi tasya tat / tadbhartur devasenasya prītaḥ paṭṭaṃ babandha saḥ // 6.3.193	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha narapatidattais tair vaṇijyārjitaiś ca prasabhabharitakoṣo devaseno dhanoghaiḥ / parihṛtajananīkaḥ saṃstuvan kīrtisenāṃ kṛtavasatir amuṣminn eva tasthau pure saḥ // 6.3.194	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
sukham apagatapāpaśvaśrukaṃ kīrtisenāpy asamacaritalabdhakhyātir āsādya tatra / nyavasad akhilabhogaiśvaryabhāgāntikasthā sukṛtaphalasamṛddhir dehabaddhveva bhartuḥ // 6.3.195	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
evaṃ viṣahya vidhurasya vidher niyogam āpatsu rakṣitacaritradhanā hi sādhvyaḥ / guptāḥ svasattvavibhavena mahattamena kalyāṇam ādadhati patyur athātmanaś ca // 6.3.196	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
itthaṃ ca pārthivakumāri bhavanti doṣāḥ śvaśrūn anāndṛvihitā bahavo vadhūnām / tadbhartṛveśma tava tādṛśam arthaye 'haṃ śvaśrūr na yatra na ca yatra śaṭhā nanāndā // 6.3.197	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
itīdam ānandikathādbhutaṃ sā mukhān niśamyāsurarājaputryāḥ / somaprabhāyā manujendraputrī kaliṅgasenā parituṣyati sma // 6.3.198	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
tato vicitrārthakathāvasānaṃ dṛṣṭveva gantuṃ m ihire pravṛtte / sotkāṃ samāliṅgya kaliṅgasenāṃ somaprabhā svaṃ bhavanaṃ jagāma // 6.3.199	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
tataḥ svasadma yātāyāḥ paścān mārgam avekṣitum / somaprabhāyāḥ snehena mārgaharmyāgram āsthitām // 6.4.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kaliṅgasenām ārāt tāṃ dadarśa gaganāgataḥ / daivān madanavegākhyo yuvā vidyādharādhipaḥ // 6.4.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tāṃ dṛṣṭvaiva rūpeṇa jagattritayamohinīm / kṣobhaṃ jagāma kāmaindrajālikasyeva picchikām // 6.4.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alaṃ vidyādharastrībhiḥ kā kathāpsarasām api / yatredṛg etad etasyā mānuṣyā rūpam adbhutam // 6.4.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad eṣā yadi me na syād bhāryā kiṃ jīvitena tat / kathaṃ ca mānuṣīsaṅgaṃ kuryāṃ vidyādharo 'pi san // 6.4.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ālocya sa dadhyau ca vidyāṃ prajñaptisaṃjñikām / sā cāvirbhūya sākārā tam evam avadattadā // 6.4.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tattvato mānuṣī neyam eṣā śāpacyutāpsarāḥ / jātā kaliṅgadattasya gṛhe subhaga bhūpateḥ // 6.4.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukte vidyayā so 'tha hṛṣṭo gatvā svadhāmani / vidyādharo 'nyavimukhaḥ kāmārtaḥ samacintayat // 6.4.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
haṭhād yadi harāmy etāṃ tad etan me na yujyate / strīṇāṃ haṭhopabhoge hi mama śāpo 'sti mṛtyudaḥ // 6.4.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad etatprāptaye śaṃbhur ārādhyas tapasā mayā / tapo 'dhīnāni hi śreyāṃsy upāyo 'nyo na vidyate // 6.4.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti niścitya cānyedyur gatvā ṛṣabhaparvatam / ekapādasthitas tepe nirāhāras tapāṃsi saḥ // 6.4.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha tuṣṭo 'cirāt tīvrais tapobhir dattadarśanaḥ / evaṃ madanavegaṃ tam ādideśāmbikāpatiḥ // 6.4.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
eṣā kaliṅgasenākhyā khyātā rūpeṇa bhūtale / kanyā nāsyāś ca bhartāpi sadṛśo rūpasaṃpadā // 6.4.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekas tu vatsarājo 'sti sa caitām abhivāñchati / kiṃ tu vāsavadattāyā bhītyā nārthayate sphuṭam // 6.4.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
eṣāpi rūpalubdhā taṃ śrutvā somaprabhāmukhāt / svayaṃvarāya vatseśaṃ rājaputry abhivāñchati // 6.4.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra yāvad vivāho 'syā na bhavet tāvad antarā / kṛtvā kālāsahasyeva rūpaṃ vatseśvarasya tat // 6.4.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā gāndharvavidhinā bhāryāṃ kuryād bhavān imām / evaṃ kaliṅgasenāsau tava setsyati sundarī // 6.4.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ādiṣṭaḥ sa śarveṇa praṇipatyātha taṃ yayau / gṛhaṃ madanavegaḥ svaṃ kālakūṭagires taṭam // 6.4.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atrāntare pratiniśaṃ gacchantyā nijamandiram / pratiprabhātam āyāntyā yantreṇa vyomagāminā // 6.4.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tayā takṣaśilāpuryāṃ sā somaprabhayā saha / kaliṅgasenā krīḍantī tāṃ jagādaikadā rahaḥ // 6.4.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sakhi vācyaṃ na kasyāpi tvayā yat te bravīmy aham / vivāho mama saṃprāpta iti jāne yataḥ śṛṇu // 6.4.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iha māṃ yācituṃ dūtāḥ preṣitā bahubhir nṛpaiḥ / te ca tātena saṃvṛtya tathaiva preṣitā itaḥ // 6.4.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yas tu prasenajinnāma śrāvastyām asti bhūpatiḥ / tadīyaḥ kevalaṃ dūtaḥ sādaraṃ tena satkṛtaḥ // 6.4.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mantritaṃ cāmbayāpy etat tan manye madvaro nṛpaḥ / sa tātasya tathāmbāyāḥ kulīna iti saṃmataḥ // 6.4.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa hi tatra kule jāto yatrāmbāmbālikādikāḥ / pitāmahyaḥ kurūṇāṃ ca pāṇḍavānāṃ ca jajñire // 6.4.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tat prasenajite tasmai sakhi dattāsmi sāṃpratam / tātena rājñe śrāvastyāṃ nagaryām iti niścayaḥ // 6.4.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
etat kaliṅgasenātaḥ śrutvā somaprabhā śucā / sṛjantīvāparaṃ hāraṃ sadyo dhārāśruṇārudat // 6.4.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jagāda caitāṃ pṛcchantīṃ vayasyām aśrukāraṇam / dṛṣṭaniḥśeṣabhūloka sā mayāsuraputrikā // 6.4.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vayo rūpaṃ kulaṃ śīlaṃ vittaṃ ceti varasya yat / mṛgyate sakhi tatrādyaṃ vayo vaṃśādikaṃ tataḥ // 6.4.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prasenajic ca pravayāḥ sa dṛṣṭo nṛpatir mayā / jātīpuṣpasya jātyeva jīrṇasyāsya kulena kim // 6.4.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
himaśubhreṇa tena tvaṃ heman teneva padminī / parimlānāmbujamukhī yuktā śocyā bhaviṣyasi // 6.4.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ato jāto viṣādo me praharṣas tu bhaven mama / yadi syād vatsarājas te kalyāṇy udayanaḥ patiḥ // 6.4.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya nāsti hi rūpeṇa lāvaṇyena kulena ca / śauryeṇa ca vibhūtyā ca tulyo 'nyo nṛpatir bhuvi // 6.4.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena ced yujyase bhartrā sadṛśena kṛśodari / dhātuḥ phalati lāvaṇyanirmāṇaṃ tad idaṃ tvayi // 6.4.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti somaprabhākḷptair vakyair yantrair iveritam / yayau kaliṅgasenāyā mano vatseśvaraṃ prati // 6.4.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataś ca sā tāṃ papraccha rājakanyā mayātmajām / kathaṃ sa vatsarājākhyaḥ sakhi kiṃvaṃśasaṃbhavaḥ // 6.4.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kathaṃ codayano nāmnā tvayā me kathyatām iti / sātha somaprabhāvādīc chṛṇu tat sakhi vacmi te // 6.4.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vatsa ity asti vikhyāto deśo bhūmer vibhūṣaṇam / purī tatrāsti kauśāmbī dvitīyevāmarāvatī // 6.4.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāṃ sa kurute rājyaṃ yato vatseśvaras tataḥ / vaṃśaṃ ca tasya kalyāṇi kīrtyamānaṃ mayā śṛṇu // 6.4.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pāṇḍavasyārjunasyābhūd abhimanyuḥ kilātmajaḥ / cakravyūhabhidā yena nītā kurucamūḥ kṣayam // 6.4.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmāt parīkṣid abhavad rājā bharatavaṃśabhṛt / sarpasattrapraṇetābhūt tato 'pi janamejayaḥ // 6.4.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

tasmād rājā jagacchlāghyaḥ sahasrānīka ity abhūt / yaḥ śakrapreṣitaratho divi cakre gatāgatam // 6.4.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tasya devyāṃ mṛgāvatyām asāv udayano 'jani / bhūṣaṇaṃ śaśino vaṃśe jagannetrotsavo nṛpaḥ // 6.4.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nāmno nimittam apy asya śṛṇu sā hi mṛgāvatī / antarvatnī sati rājño janany asya sujanmanaḥ // 6.4.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
utpannarudhirasnānadohadā pāpabhīruṇā / bhartrā racitalākṣādirasavāpīkṛtāplavā // 6.4.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pakṣiṇā tārkṣyavaṃśyena nipatyāmiṣaśaṅkayā / nītvā vidhivaśāt tyaktā jīvantyevodayācale // 6.4.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra cāśvāsitā bhūyo bhartṛsaṃgamavādinā / jamadagnyarṣiṇā dṛṣṭā sthitāsau tatra cāśrame // 6.4.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avajñājaniterṣyāyāḥ kaṃcit kālaṃ hi tādṛśaḥ / śāpas tilottamāto 'bhūt tadbhartus tadviyogadaḥ // 6.4.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

ity uccāryāmbarād vāṇīm aśarīrāṃ tadā kṛtam / nāgodayana ity asya devair udayajanmataḥ // 6.4.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi śāpāntabaddhāśaḥ kālaṃ mātalibodhitaḥ / kṛcchrāt sahasrānīkas tāṃ vinānaiṣīn mṛgāvatīm // 6.4.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)

evaṃ sa pitryaṃ rājyaṃ tat prāpya jitvā tato 'khilām / yaugandharāyaṇasakhaḥ praśāsty udayano mahīm // 6.4.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)

atas tasyāḥ sa vatseśo bibhyat tvāṃ neha yācate / sā ca dṛṣṭā mayā na tvāṃ spardhate rūpasaṃpadā // 6.4.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tasyāś cābhimataḥ kaścit prāyo nābhūd varo nṛpaḥ / ekadā ca dadarśaikaṃ puruṣaṃ sā svaharmyagā // 6.4.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena svākṛtinā daivāt saṃgatiṃ vāñchati sma sā / svābhiprāyaṃ ca saṃdiśya tasmai svāṃ vyasṛjat sakhīm // 6.4.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
