tatroktarājyahārādiduḥkhasya sa kṛtādaraḥ / aṅgīcakre sahāyatvaṃ rājā tasyārimardane // 6.4.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
matiṃ cakre ca tāṃ tasmai dātuṃ prāgditsitāṃ sutām / mantribhyaś ca tadaivaitam abhiprāyaṃ śaśaṃsa saḥ // 6.4.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahai tasmai ca rājñe taṃ sutāvṛttāntam abhyadhāt / devī svābodhitā pūrvaṃ tayaivāptasakhīmukhaiḥ // 6.4.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asiddhān iṣṭasiddheṣṭakākatālīyavismitam / tatas taṃ tatra rājānam eko mantrī tadābravīt // 6.4.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidhir eva hi jāgarti bhavyānām arthasiddhiṣu / asaṃcetayamānānāṃ sadbhṛtyaḥ svāminām iva // 6.4.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathā ca kathayāmy etāṃ rājann atra kathāṃ śṛṇu / babhūva hariśarmākhyaḥ ko'pi grāme kvacid dvijaḥ // 6.4.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa daridraś ca mūrkhaś ca vṛttyabhāvena duḥsthitaḥ / pūrvaduṣkṛtabhogāya jāto 'tibahubālakaḥ // 6.4.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sakuṭumbo bhraman bhikṣāṃ prāpyaikaṃ nagaraṃ kramāt / śiśriye sthūladattākhyaṃ gṛhasthaṃ sa mahādhanam // 6.4.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gavādirakṣakān putrān bhāryāṃ karmakarīṃ nijām / tasya kṛtvā gṛhābhyarṇe praiṣyaṃ kurvann uvāsa saḥ // 6.4.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā sthūladattasya sutāpariṇayotsavaḥ / tasyābhūd āgatān ekajanyayātrājanākulaḥ // 6.4.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadā ca hariśarmātra tadgṛhe sakuṭumbakaḥ / ākaṇṭhaghṛtamāṃsādibhojanāsthāṃ babandha saḥ // 6.4.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadvelāṃ vīkṣamāṇo 'tha smṛtaḥ kenāpi nātra saḥ / tato 'nāhāranirviṇṇo bhāryām ity abravīn niśi // 6.4.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dāridryād iha maurkhyāc ca mamedṛśam agauravam / tad atra kṛtrimaṃ yuktyā vijñānaṃ prayunajmy aham // 6.4.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yenāsya sthūladattasya bhaveyaṃ gauravāspadam / tvaṃ prāpte 'vasare cāsmai jñāninaṃ māṃ nivedaya // 6.4.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā tāṃ vicintyātra dhiyā supte jane hayaḥ / sthūladattagṛhāt tena jahre jāmātṛvāhanaḥ // 6.4.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dūre pracchannam etena sthāpitaṃ prātar atra tam / itas tato vicinvanto 'py aśvaṃ janyā na lebhire // 6.4.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athāmaṅgalavitrastaṃ hayacauragaveṣiṇam / hariśarmavadhūr etya sthūladattam uvāca sā // 6.4.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhartā madīyo vijñānī jyotirvidyādikovidaḥ / aśvaṃ vo lambhayaty enaṃ kimarthaṃ sa na pṛcchyate // 6.4.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sthūladattas taṃ hariśarmāṇam āhvayat / hyo vismṛto hṛteśve tu smṛto 'smy adyeti vādinam // 6.4.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vismṛtaṃ naḥ kṣamasveti prārthitaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ca saḥ / papraccha kenāpahṛto hayo naḥ kathyatām iti // 6.4.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
hariśarmā tato mithyā rekhāḥ kurvann uvāca saḥ / ito dakṣiṇasīmānte cauraiḥ saṃsthāpito hayaḥ // 6.4.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pracchannastho dinānte ca dūraṃ yāvan na nīyate / tāvad ānīyatāṃ gatvā tvaritaṃ sa turaṃgamaḥ // 6.4.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā dhāvitaiḥ prāpya kṣaṇāt sa bahubhir naraiḥ / āninye 'śvaḥ praśaṃsadbhir vijñānaṃ hariśarmaṇaḥ // 6.4.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato jñānīti sarveṇa pūjyamāno janena saḥ / uvāsa hariśarmātra sthūladattārcitaḥ sukham // 6.4.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha gacchatsu divaseṣv atra rājagṛhāntarāt / hemaratnādi caureṇa bhūri kenāpy anīyata // 6.4.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
nājñāyata yadā cauras tadā jñāniprasiddhitaḥ / ānāyayām āsa nṛpo hariśarmāṇam āśu tam // 6.4.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
sa cānītaḥ kṣipan kālaṃ vakṣye prātar iti bruvan / vāsake sthāpito jñānavigno rājñāsurakṣitaḥ // 6.4.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra rājakule cāsīn nāmnā jihveti ceṭikā / yayā bhrātrā samaṃ tac ca nītam abhyantarād dhanam // 6.4.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā gatvā niśi tatrāsya vāsake hariśarmaṇaḥ / jijñāsayā dadau dvāri karṇaṃ tajjñānaśaṅkitā // 6.4.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hariśarmā ca tatkālam ekako 'bhyantare sthitaḥ / nijāṃ jihvāṃ ninindaivaṃ mṛṣāvijñānavādinīm // 6.4.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhogalampaṭayā jihve kim idaṃ vihitaṃ tvayā / durācāre sahasva tvam idānīm iha nigraham // 6.4.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā jñāninānena jñātāsmīti bhayena sā / jihvākhyā ceṭikā yuktyā praviveśa tadantikam // 6.4.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
patitvā pādayos tasya jñānivyañjanam abravīt / brahmann iyaṃ sā jihvāhaṃ tvayā jñātārthahāriṇī // 6.4.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
nītvā tac ca mayāsyaiva mandirasyeha pṛṣṭhataḥ / udyāne dāḍimasyādho nikhātaṃ bhūtale dhanam // 6.4.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad rakṣa māṃ gṛhāṇemaṃ kiṃcin me hema hastagam / etac chrutvā sagarvaṃ sa hariśarmā jagāda tām // 6.4.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gaccha jānāmy ahaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhavat tathā / tvāṃ tu nodghāṭayiṣyāmi kṛpaṇāṃ śaraṇāgatām // 6.4.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yac ca hastagataṃ te 'sti tad dāsyasi punar mama / ity uktā tena sā ceṭī tathety āśu tato yayau // 6.4.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hariśarmā ca sa tato vismayād ity acintayat / asādhyaṃ sādhayaty arthaṃ helayābhimukho vidhiḥ // 6.4.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
yad ihopasthite 'narthe siddho 'rtho 'śaṅkitaṃ mama / svajihvāṃ nindato jihvā caurī me patitā puraḥ // 6.4.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śaṅkayaiva prakāśan te bata pracchannapātakāḥ / ity ādy ākalayan so 'tra hṛṣṭo rātriṃ nināya tām // 6.4.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāyaś cālīkavijñānayuktyā nītvā sa taṃ nṛpam / tatrodyāne nikhātasthaṃ prāpayām āsa tad dhanam // 6.4.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
cauraṃ cāpy apanītāṃśaṃ śaśaṃsa prapalāyitam / tatas tuṣṭo nṛpas tasmai grāmān dātuṃ pracakrame // 6.4.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kahaṃ syān mānuṣāgamyaṃ jñānaṃ śāstraṃ vinedṛśam / tan nūnaṃ caurasaṃketakṛteyaṃ dhūrtajīvikā // 6.4.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmād eṣo 'nyayā yuktyā vāram ekaṃ parīkṣyatām / deva jñānīti karṇe taṃ mantrī rājānam abhyadhāt // 6.4.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'ntaḥ kṣiptamaṇḍūkaṃ sapidhānaṃ navaṃ ghaṭam / svairam ānāyya rājā taṃ hariśarmāṇam abravīt // 6.4.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
brahman yad asmin ghaṭake sthitaṃ jānāsi tad yadi / tad adya te kariṣyāmi pūjāṃ sumahatīm aham // 6.4.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā nāśakālaṃ taṃ matvā smṛtvā tato nijam / pitrā krīḍākṛtaṃ bālye maṇḍūka iti nāma saḥ // 6.4.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidhātṛpreritaḥ kurvaṃs tenātra paridevanam / brāhmaṇo hariśarmātra sahasaivaivam abravīt // 6.4.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sādhor eva tu maṇḍūka tavākāṇḍe ghaṭo 'dhunā / avaśasya vināśāya saṃjāto 'yaṃ haṭhād iha // 6.4.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvāho mahājñānī bheko 'pi vidito 'munā / iti jalpan nanāndātra prastutārthānvayāj janaḥ // 6.4.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tatprātibhajñānaṃ manvāno hariśarmaṇe / tuṣṭo rājā dadau grāmān sahemacchatravāhanān // 6.4.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣaṇāc ca hariśarmā sa jajñe sāmantasaṃnibhaḥ / itthaṃ daivena sādhyante sadarthāḥ śubhakarmaṇām // 6.4.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tat somadattaṃ sadṛśaṃ daivenaivābhisāritā / nivāryāsadṛśaṃ rājaṃs tava tejasvatī sutā // 6.4.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti mantrimukhāc chrutvā tasmai rājasutāya tām / rājā vikramaseno 'tha dadau lakṣmīm ivātmajām // 6.4.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ śvaśurasainyena gatvā jitvā ripūṃś ca saḥ / somadattaḥ svarājyasthas tasthau bhāryāsakhaḥ sukham // 6.4.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ vidher bhavati sarvam idaṃ viśeṣāt tvām īdṛśīṃ ghaṭayituṃ ka iha kṣameta / vatseśvareṇa sadṛśena vinaiva daivaṃ kuryām ahaṃ sakhi kim atra kaliṅgasene // 6.4.142	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
itthaṃ kathāṃ rahasi rājasutā niśamya somaprabhāvadanato 'tra kaliṅgasenā / tatprārthinī śithilabandhubhayatrapā sā vatseśasaṃgamasamutkamanā babhūva // 6.4.143	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
athāstam upayāsyati tribhuvanaikadīpe ravau prabhātasamayāgamāvadhi kathaṃcid āmantrya tām / sakhīm abimatodyamasthitamatiṃ khamārgeṇa sā mayāsurasutā yayau nijagṛhāya somaprabhā // 6.4.144	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
tato 'nyedyurupetāṃ tāṃ prātaḥ somaprabhāṃ sakhīm / kaliṅgasenā viśrambhātkatāṃ kurvatyuvāca sā // 6.5.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
māṃ prasenajite rājñe tāto dāsyati niścitam / etac chrutaṃ mayāmbāto dṛṣṭo vṛddhaḥ sa ca tvayā // 6.5.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vatseśastu yathā rūpe tvay aiva kathitastathā / śrutimārgapraviṣṭena hṛtaṃ tena yathā manaḥ // 6.5.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatprasenajitaṃ pūrvaṃ pradarśya naya tatra mām / āste vatseśvaro yatra kiṃ tātena kimambayā // 6.5.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktavatīṃ tāṃ ca sotkāṃ somaprabhābravīt / gantavyaṃ yadi tadyāmo yantreṇa vyomagāminā // 6.5.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ tu sarvaṃ gṛhāṇa tvaṃ nijaṃ parikaraṃ yataḥ / dṛṣṭvā vatseśvaraṃ bhūyo nāgantum iha śakṣyasi // 6.5.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na ca tvaṃ drakṣyasi punaḥ pitarau na smariṣyasi / dūrasthāṃ prāptadayitā vismariṣyasi mām api // 6.5.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
nahyevam ahameṣyāmi bhartṛveśmani te sakhi / tac chrutvā rājakanyā sā rudatī tām abhāṣata // 6.5.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tarhi vatseśvaraṃ taṃ tvam ihaivānaya me sakhi / notsahe tatra hi sthātuṃ kṣaṇam ekaṃ tvayā vinā // 6.5.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nāninye cāniruddhaḥ kimupāyāccitralekhayā / jānatyapi tathā caitāṃ mattastvaṃ tatkathāṃ śṛṇu // 6.5.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bāṇāsurasya tanayā babhūvoṣeti viśrutā / tasyāścārādhitā gaurī patiprāptyai varaṃ dadau // 6.5.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
svapne prāpsyasi yatsaṅgaṃ sa te bhartā bhaved iti / tato devakumārābhaṃ kaṃcitsvapne dadarśa sā // 6.5.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gāndharvavidhinā tena pariṇītā tathaiva ca / prāptatatsatyasaṃbhogā prābudhyata niśākṣaye // 6.5.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adṛṣṭvā taṃ patiṃ dṛṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃbhogalakṣaṇam / smṛtvā gaurīvaraṃ sābhūtsātaṅkabhayavismayā // 6.5.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāmyantī ca tataḥ sā taṃ svapne dṛṣṭaṃ priyaṃ vinā / pṛcchantyai citralekhāyai sakhyai sarvaṃ śaśaṃsa tat // 6.5.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpi nāmādyabhijñānaṃ na kiṃcittasya jānatī / yogeśvarī citralekhā tāmuṣām evam abravīt // 6.5.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
sakhi devīvarasyāyaṃ prabhāvo 'tra kimucyate / kiṃ tv abhijñānaśūnyas te so 'nveṣṭavyaḥ priyaḥ katham // 6.5.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
parijānāsi cettaṃ te sasurāsuramānuṣam / jagallikhāmi tanmadhye taṃ me darśaya yena saḥ // 6.5.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ānīyate mayety uktā sā tathety udite tayā / citralekhā kramādviśvamalikhadvarnavartibhiḥ // 6.5.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatroṣā so 'yamityasyā hṛṣṭāṅgulyā sakampayā / dvārāvatyāṃ yadukulādaniruddhamadarśayat // 6.5.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
citralekhā tato 'vādītsakhi dhanyāsi yattvayā / bhartāniruddhaḥ prāpto 'yaṃ pautro bhagavato hareḥ // 6.5.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
yojanānāṃ sahasreṣu ṣaṣṭau vasati sa tvitaḥ / acchrutvā sādhikautsukyavaśāttām abravīduṣā // 6.5.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nādya cetsakhi tasyāṅkaṃ śraye śrīkhaṇḍaśītalam / tadatyuddāmakāmāgninirdagdhāṃ viddhi māṃ mṛtām // 6.5.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutvaitaccitralekhā sā tāmāśvāsya priyāṃ sakhīm / tadaivotpatya nabhasā yayau dvāravatīṃ purīm // 6.5.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
dadarśa ca pṛthūttuṃgairmandirairabdhimadhyagām / kurvatī taṃ punaḥ kṣiptamanthādriśikharabhramam // 6.5.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāṃ suptaṃ niśi prāpya sāniruddhaṃ vibodhya ca / uṣānurāgaṃ taṃ tasmai śaśaṃsa svapnadarśanāt // 6.5.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ādāya cāttatadrūpasvapnavṛttāntam eva tam / sotkaṃ siddhiprabhāveṇa kṣaṇenaivāyayau tataḥ // 6.5.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etya cāvekṣamāṇāyās tasyāḥ sakhyāḥ svavartmanā / prāveśayaduṣāyāstaṃ guptamantaḥpuraṃ priyam // 6.5.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā dṛṣṭvaivāniruddhaṃ tamuṣā sākṣādupāgatam / amṛtāṃśumivāmbhodhivelā nāṅgeṣv avartata // 6.5.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tena samaṃ tasthau sakhīdattena tatra sā / jīviteneva mūrtena vallabhena yathāsukham // 6.5.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tajjñānātpitaraṃ cāsyāḥ kruddhaṃ bāṇaṃ jigāya saḥ / aniruddhaḥ svavīryeṇa pitāmahabalena ca // 6.5.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato dvāravatīṃ gatvā tāvabhinnatanū ubhau / uṣāniruddhau jajñāte girijāśaṃkarāviva // 6.5.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ity uṣāyāḥ priyo 'hnaiva melitaścitralekhayā / tvaṃ saprabhāvāpyadhikā tato 'pi sakhi me matā // 6.5.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tanmamānaya vatseśam iha mā sma ciraṃ kṛthāḥ / evaṃ kaliṅgasenātaḥ śrutvā somaprabhābravīt // 6.5.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
citralekhā surastrī sā samutkṣipyānayatparam / mādṛśī kiṃ vidadhyāttu parasparśādyakurvatī // 6.5.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tattvāṃ nayāmi tatraiva yatra vatseśvaraḥ sakhi / prākprasenajitaṃ taṃ te darśayitvā tvadarthinam // 6.5.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti somaprabhoktā sā tathety uktvā tayā saha / kaliṅgasenā tatkḷptaṃ māyāyantravimānakam // 6.5.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tadaivaruhya nabhasā sakoṣā saparicchadā / kṛtaprāsthānikā prāyātpitroraviditā tataḥ // 6.5.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
na hi paśyati tuṅgaṃ vā śvabhraṃ vā strījano 'grataḥ / smareṇa nītaḥ paramāṃ dhārāṃ vājīva sādinā // 6.5.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
śrāvastīṃ prāpya pūrvaṃ ca taṃ prasenajitaṃ nṛpam / mṛgayānirgataṃ dūrājjarāpāṇḍuṃ dadarśa sā // 6.5.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vṛddhādvrajāsmād iti tāṃ dūrādiva niṣedhatā / uddhūyamānena muhuścāmareṇopalakṣitam // 6.5.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
so 'yaṃ prasenajidrājā pitrāsmai tvaṃ praditsitā / paśyeti somaprabhayā darśitaṃ sopahāsayā // 6.5.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
jarayāyaṃ vṛto rājā kā vṛṇīte 'parā tvamum / taditaḥ sakhi śīghraṃ māṃ naya vatseśvaraṃ prati // 6.5.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti somaprabhāṃ coktvā tatkṣaṇaṃ sā tayā saha / kaliṅgasenā vyomnaiva kauśāmbīṃ nagarīṃ yayau // 6.5.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatrodyānagataṃ sā taṃ vatseśaṃ sakhyudīritam / dadarśa dūrāt sotkaṇṭhā cakorīvāmṛtatviṣam // 6.5.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sā tadutphullayā dṛṣṭyā hṛnnyastena ca pāṇinā / praviṣṭo 'yaṃ pathānena māmatretyabravīd iva // 6.5.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sakhi saṃgamayādy aiva vatsarājena mām iha / enaṃ vilokya hi sthātuṃ na śaktā kṣaṇam apy aham // 6.5.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti coktavatīṃ tāṃ sā sakhī somaprabhābravīt / adyāśubhaṃ mayā kiṃcinnimittamupalakṣitam // 6.5.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadidaṃ divasaṃ tūṣṇīmudyāne 'sminnalakṣitā / adhitiṣṭhasva mā kārṣīḥ sakhi dūraṃ gatāgatam // 6.5.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātarāgatya yuktiṃ vā ghaṭayiṣyāmi saṃgame / adhunā gantumicchāmi bhartuścittagṛhe gṛham // 6.5.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā tām avasthāpya yayau somaprabhā tataḥ / vatsarājo 'pi codyānātsvamandiramathāviśat // 6.5.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ kaliṅgasenā sā tatrasthā svamahattaram / yathātattvaṃ svasaṃdeśaṃ dattvā vatseśvaraṃ prati // 6.5.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāhiṇotprāṅniṣiddhāpi svasakhyā śakunajñayā / svatantro 'bhinavārūḍho yuvatīnāṃ manobhavaḥ // 6.5.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca gatvā pratīhāramukhenāvedya tatkṣaṇam / mahattaraḥ praviśy aivaṃ vatsarājaṃ vyajijñapat // 6.5.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājan kaliṅgadattasya rājñas takṣaśilāpateḥ / sutā kaliṅgasenākhyā śrutvā tvāṃ rūpavattaram // 6.5.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svayaṃvarārtham iha te saṃprāptā tyaktabāndhavā / māyāyantravimānena sānugā vyomagāminā // 6.5.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ānītā guhyacāriṇyā sakhyā somaprabhākhyayā / mayāsurasyātmajayā nalakūbarabhāryayā // 6.5.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tayā vijñāpanāyāhaṃ preṣitaḥ svīkuruṣva tām / yuvayorastu yogo 'yaṃ kaumudīcandrayor iva // 6.5.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ mahattarāc chrutvā taṃ tathety abhinandya ca / prahṛṣṭo hemavastrādyair vatsarājo 'bhyapūjayat // 6.5.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āhūya cābravīnmantrimukhyaṃ yaugandharāyaṇam / rājñaḥ kaliṅgadattasya khyātarūpā kṣitau sutā // 6.5.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svayaṃ kaliṅgasenākhyā varaṇāya mam āgatā / tadbrūhi śīghramatyājyāṃ kadā pariṇayāmi tām // 6.5.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukto vatsarājena mantrī yaugandharāyaṇaḥ / asyāyatihitāpekṣī kṣaṇam evam acintayat // 6.5.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaliṅgasenā sā tāvatkhyātarūpā jagattraye / nāstyanyā tādṛśī tasyai spṛhayanti surā api // 6.5.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāṃ labdhvā vatsarājo 'yaṃ sarvamanyatparityajet / devī vāsavadattā ca tataḥ prāṇair viyujyate // 6.5.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
naravāhanadatto 'pi naśyedrājasutas tataḥ / padmāvatyapi tatsnehāddevī jīvati duṣkaram // 6.5.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataś caṇḍamahāsenapradyotau pitarau dvayoḥ / devyorvimuñcataḥ prāṇān vikṛtiṃ vāpi gacchataḥ // 6.5.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ ca sarvanāśaḥ syānna ca yuktaṃ niṣedhanam / rājño 'sya vyasanaṃ yasmādvāritasyādhikībhavet // 6.5.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmādanupraveśasya siddhyai kālaṃ harāmy aham / ity ālocya sa vatseśaṃ prāha yaugandharāyaṇaḥ // 6.5.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
deva dhanyo 'si yaṣyaiṣā svayaṃ te gṛham āgatā / kaliṅgasenā bhṛtyatvaṃ prāptaścaitatpitā nṛpaḥ // 6.5.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tat tvayā gaṇakān pṛṣṭvā sulagne 'syā yathāvidhi / kāryaḥ pāṇigraho rājño bṛhato duhitā hy asau // 6.5.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adyāsyā dīyatāṃ tāvadyogyaṃ vāsagṛhaṃ pṛthak / dāsīdāsā visṛjyantāṃ vastrāṇyābharaṇāni ca // 6.5.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukto mantrimukhyena vatsarājastatheti tat / prahṛṣṭahṛdayaḥ sarvaṃ saviśeṣaṃ cakāra saḥ // 6.5.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaliṅgasenā ca tataḥ praviṣṭā vāsaveśma tat / svamanorathamāsannaṃ matvā prāpa parāṃ mudam // 6.5.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
yaugandharāyaṇaḥ so 'pi kṣaṇādrājakulātataḥ / nirgatya svagṛhaṃ gatvā dhīmānevam acintayat // 6.5.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāyo 'śubhasya kāryasya kālahāraḥ pratikriyā / tathā ca vṛtraśatrau prāgbrahmahatyāpalāyite // 6.5.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
devarājyamavāptena nahuṣeṇabhivāñchitā / rakṣitā devaguruṇā śacī śaraṇamāśritā // 6.5.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
adya prātar upaiti tvāmity uktvā kālahārataḥ / yāvatsa naṣṭo nahuṣo huṃkārādbrahmaśāpataḥ // 6.5.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
prāptaś ca pūrvavacchakraḥ sa punardevarājatām / evaṃ kaliṅgasenārte kālaḥ kṣepyo mayā prabhoḥ // 6.5.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti saṃcintya sarveṣāṃ gaṇakānāṃ sa saṃvidam / dūralagnapradānāya mantrī guptaṃ vyadhāttadā // 6.5.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha vijñāya vṛttāntaṃ devyā vāsavadattayā / āhūya sa mahāmantrī svamandiramanīyata // 6.5.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra praviṣṭaṃ praṇataṃ rudatī sā jagāda tam / ārya pūrvaṃ tvayoktaṃ me yathā devi mayi sthite // 6.5.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
padmāvatyā ṛte nānyā sapatnī te bhaviṣyati / kaliṅgasenāpy adyaiṣā paśyeha pariṇeṣyate // 6.5.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sā ca rūpavatī tasyāmāryaputraś ca rajyati / ato vitathavādī tvaṃ jāto 'haṃ ca mṛtādhunā // 6.5.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā tām avocatsa mantrī yaugandharāyaṇaḥ / dhīrā bhava kathaṃ hy etaddevi syānmama jīvataḥ // 6.5.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvayā tu nātra kartavyā rājño 'sya pratikūlatā / pratyutālambya dhīratvaṃ darśanīyānukūlatā // 6.5.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nāturaḥ pratikūloktair vaśe vaidyasya vartate / vartate tvanukūloktaiḥ sāmnaivācarataḥ kriyām // 6.5.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pratīpaṃ kṛṣyamāṇo hi nottareduttarennaraḥ / vāhyamāno 'nukūlaṃ tu nodyogādvyasanāttathā // 6.5.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ataḥ samīpamāyāntaṃ rājānaṃ tvamavikriyā / upacārairupacareḥ saṃvṛtyākāramātmanaḥ // 6.5.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
kaliṅgasenāsvīkāraṃ śraddadhyās tasya sāṃpratam / vṛddhiṃ bruvāṇā rājyasya sahāye tatpitaryapi // 6.5.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
evaṃ kṛte ca mahātmyaguṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā paraṃ tava / pravṛddhasnehadākṣiṇyo rājāsau bhavati tvayi // 6.5.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
matvā kaliṅgasenāṃ ca svādhīnāṃ notsuko bhavet / vāryamāṇasya vāñchā hi viṣayeṣv abhivardhate // 6.5.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
devī padmāvatī caitacchikṣaṇīyā tvayānaghe / evaṃ sa rājā kārye 'smin kālakṣepaṃ saheta naḥ // 6.5.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ataḥ paraṃ ca jāne 'haṃ paśyeryuktibalaṃ mama / saṃkaṭe hi parīkṣyante prājñāḥ śūrāś ca saṃgare // 6.5.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taddevi mā viṣaṇṇā bhūriti devīṃ prabodhya tām / tayādṛtoktiḥ sa yayau tato yaugandharāyaṇaḥ // 6.5.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
vatseśvaraś ca tadahar na divā na rātrau devyordvayor api sa vāsagṛhaṃ jagāma / tādṛk svayaṃvararasopanamatkaliṅgasenāsamānanavasaṃgamasotkacetāḥ // 6.5.95	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
rātriṃ ca durlabharasotsukatātigāḍha cintāmahotsavamayīm iva tāṃ tatas te / ninyuḥ svasadmasu pṛthakpṛthageva devī vatseśatatsacivamukhyakaliṅgasenā // 6.5.96	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
tataḥ pratīkṣamāṇaṃ taṃ vatsarājamupetya saḥ / yaugandharāyaṇo dhūrtaḥ prātarmantrī vyajijñapat // 6.6.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
lagnaḥ kaliṅgasenāyā devasya ca śubhāvahaḥ / vivāhamaṅgalāyeha kiṃ nādy aiva vilokyate // 6.6.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā so 'bravīdrājā mamāpyevaṃ hṛdi sthitam / tāṃ vinā hi muhūrtaṃ me sthātuṃ na sahate manaḥ // 6.6.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvaiva sa tatkālaṃ pratīhāraṃ puraḥsthitam / ādiśyānāyayām āsa gaṇakānsaralāśayaḥ // 6.6.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena pṛṣṭā mahāmantripūrvasthāpitasaṃvidaḥ / ūcurlagno 'nukūlo sti rājño māseṣu ṣaṭsvitaḥ // 6.6.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvaiva mṛṣā kopaṃ kṛtvā yaugandharāyaṇaḥ / ajñā ime dhig ity uktvā rājānaṃ nipuṇo 'bravīt // 6.6.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yo 'sau jñānīti devena pūjito gaṇakaḥ purā / sa nāgato 'dya taṃ pṛṣṭvā yathāyuktaṃ vidhīyatām // 6.6.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etanmantrivacaḥ śrutvā vatseśo gaṇakaṃ tadā / tam apy ānāyayām āsa dolārūḍhena cetasā // 6.6.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'py asya kālahārāya sthitasaṃvit tathaiva tam / lagnaṃ pṛṣṭo 'bravīddhyātvā ṣaṇmāsānte vyavasthitam // 6.6.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato rājānamudvigna iva yaugandharāyaṇaḥ / jagāda deva kartavyaṃ kimatrādiśyatāmiti // 6.6.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājāpyutkaḥ sulagnaiṣī sa vimṛśya tato 'bhyadhāt / kaliṅgasenā praṣṭavyā sā kimāhetavekṣyatām // 6.6.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tac chrutvā sā tathety uktvā gṛhītvā gaṇakadvayam / pārśvaṃ kaliṅgasenāyā yayau yaugandharāyaṇaḥ // 6.6.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tayā kṛtādaro dṛṣṭvā tadrūpaṃ sa vyacintayat / prāpyemāṃ vyasanādrājā sarvaṃ rājyaṃ tyajed iti // 6.6.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uvāca cainām udvāhalagnaṃ te gaṇakaiḥ saha / niścetum āgato 'smy etair janmarkṣaṃ tan nivedyatām // 6.6.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā janmanakṣatraṃ tasyāḥ parijanoditam / gaṇakāste mṛṣā kṛtvā vicāraṃ mantrisaṃvidā // 6.6.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
lagnaṃ tam eva tatrāpi māsaṣaṭkāntavartinam / nārvāgataḥ puro 'stīti vadantaḥ punarabhyadhuḥ // 6.6.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutvā dūrataraṃ taṃ ca lagnamāvignacetasi / tataḥ kaliṅgasenāyāṃ tanmahattarako 'bhyadhāt // 6.6.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prekṣyo lagno 'nukūlaḥ prāgyena syādetayoḥ śubham / yāvatkālaṃ hi daṃpatyoḥ kiṃ cireṇācireṇa vā // 6.6.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etanmahattaravacaḥ śrutvā sarve 'pi tatkṣaṇam / saduktam evam evaitad iti tatra babhāṣire // 6.6.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
yaugandharāyaṇo 'py āha hā kulagne kṛte ca naḥ / kaliṅgadattaḥ saṃbandhī rājā khedaṃ vrajed iti // 6.6.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tataḥ kaliṅgasenāpi sarvāṃstānavaśā satī / yathā bhavanto jānantīty uktvā tūṣṇīṃ babhūva sā // 6.6.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tadeva ca vacas tasyā gṛhītvāmantrya tāṃ tataḥ / yaugandharāyaṇo rājñaḥ pārśvaṃ sagaṇako yayau // 6.6.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tasmai tadāvedya vatseśāya tathaiva saḥ / yuktyā ca tamavasthāpya sa jagāma nijaṃ gṛham // 6.6.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
siddhakālātipātaś ca kāryaśeṣāya tatra saḥ / yogeśvarākhyaṃ suhṛdaṃ sasmāra brahmarākṣasam // 6.6.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
sa pūrvapratipannastaṃ svairaṃ dhyānādupasthitaḥ / rākṣaso mantriṇaṃ natvā kiṃ smṛto 'smīty avocata // 6.6.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa mantrī tasmai taṃ kṛtsnaṃ vyasanadaṃ prabhoḥ / kaliṅgasenāvṛttāntam uktvā bhūyo jagāda tam // 6.6.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kālo mayā hṛto mittra tanmadhye tvaṃ svayuktitaḥ / vṛttaṃ kaliṅgasenāyāḥ pracchanno 'syā nirūpayeḥ // 6.6.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidyādharādayastāṃ hi channaṃ vāñchanti niścitam / yato 'nyā tādṛśī nāsti rūpeṇāsmiñjagattraye // 6.6.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ataḥ kenāpi siddhena saṅgaṃ vidyādhareṇa vā / gacchetsā yadi tac ca tvaṃ paśyestadbhadrakaṃ bhavet // 6.6.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyarūpāgataś cātra lakṣyaste divyakāmukaḥ / svāpakāle yato divyāḥ suptāḥ sve rūpa āsate // 6.6.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ tvaddṛṣṭitas tasyā doṣo 'smābhir vilokyate / tasyāṃ rājā virajyec ca tatkāryaṃ nirvahec ca naḥ // 6.6.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukto mantriṇā tena so 'bravīdbrahmarākṣasaḥ / yuktyāham eva kiṃ naitāṃ dhvaṃsayāmi nihanmi vā // 6.6.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvaiva mahāmantrī taṃ sa yaugandharāyaṇaḥ / uvāca naitatkartavyam adharmo hi mahān bhavet // 6.6.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
yaś ca dharmamabādhitvā svena saṃsarate pathā / tasyopayāti sāhāyyaṃ sa evābhīṣṭasiddhiṣu // 6.6.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tattasyāḥ svotthito doṣaḥ prekṣaṇīyastvayā sakhe / yenāsmābhirbhavanmaitryā rājakāryaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavet // 6.6.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti mantrivarādiṣṭaḥ sa gatvā brahmarākṣasaḥ / gṛhaṃ kaliṅgasenāyā yogacchannaḥ praviṣṭavān // 6.6.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atrāntare sakhī tasyāḥ sā mayāsuraputrikā / āgāt kaliṅgasenāyāḥ pārśvaṃ somaprabhā punaḥ // 6.6.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā pṛṣṭvā rātrivārtāṃ tāṃ yuktabandhuṃ mayātmajā / rājaputrīm uvācaivaṃ tasmiñ śṛṇvati rākṣase // 6.6.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adya pūrvāhṇa evāhaṃ vicitya tvām ihāgatā / channā tvatiṣṭhaṃ tvatpārśve dṛṣṭvā yaugandharāyaṇam // 6.6.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
śrutaś ca yuṣmadālāpaḥ sarvaṃ cāvagataṃ mayā / tatkiṃ tvayā hy a evaitadārabdhaṃ manniṣiddhayā // 6.6.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avyapohyānimittaṃ hi kāryaṃ cāvagataṃ mayā / tadaniṣṭāya kalpteta tathā cemāṃ kathāṃ śṛṇu // 6.6.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antarvedyām abhūt pūrvaṃ vasudatta iti dvijaḥ / visṇudattābhidhānaś ca putras tasyodapadyata // 6.6.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa viṣṇudatto vayasā pūrṇaṣoḍaśavatsaraḥ / gantuṃ pravavṛte vidyāprāptaye valabhīṃ purīm // 6.6.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
milanti sma ca tasyānye sapta viprasutāḥ samāḥ / saptāpi te punarmūkhāḥ sa vidvānsatkulodgataḥ // 6.6.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtvānyonyaparityāgaśapathaṃ taiḥ samaṃ tataḥ / viṣṇudattaḥ pratasthe sa pitroravidito niśi // 6.6.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prasthitaś cāgrato 'kasmād animittam upasthitam / dṛṣṭvā so 'tra vayasyāṃstānsahaprasthāyino 'bhyadhāt // 6.6.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
animittamidaṃ hanta yuktamadya nivartitum / punar eva prayasyāmaḥ siddhaye śakunānvitāḥ // 6.6.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvaiva sakhāyastaṃ mūrkhāḥ saptāpi te 'bruvan / mṛṣā mājīgaṇaḥ śaṅkāṃ nahyato bibhimo vayam // 6.6.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvaṃ cedbibheṣi tanmā gā vayaṃ yāmo 'dhunaiva tu / prātarviditaghṛttāntā nāsmāṃstyakṣyanti bāndhavāḥ // 6.6.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavadbhirajñaistaiḥ sākaṃ śapathayantritaḥ / viṣṇudatto yayāveva sa smṛtvāghaharaṃ harim // 6.6.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rātryante ca vilokyānyadanimittaṃ punarvadan / mūrkhaistaiḥ sakhibhiḥ sarvaiḥ sa evaṃ nirabhartsyata // 6.6.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etadevānimittaṃ naḥ kimanyenādhvamīluka / yattvamasmābhirānītaḥ kākaśaṅkī pade pade // 6.6.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityādi bhartsanāṃ kṛtvā gacchadbhis taiḥ samaṃ ca saḥ / vivaśaḥ prayayau viṣṇudattas tūṣṇīṃ babhūva ca // 6.6.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nopadeśo vidhātavyo mūrkhasya svābhicāriṇaḥ / saṃskāro 'vaskarasyeva tiraskarakaro hi saḥ // 6.6.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
eko bahūnāṃ mūrkhāṇāṃ madhye nipatato budhaḥ / padmaḥ pāthastaraṅgāṇām iva viplavate dhruvam // 6.6.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmādeṣāṃ na vaktavyaṃ mayā bhūyo hitāhitam / tūṣṇīm eva prayātavyaṃ vidhiḥ śreyo vidhāsyati // 6.6.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ādyākalayanmūrkhaiḥ prakramaṃstaiḥ samaṃ pathi / viṣṇudatto dinasyānte śabaragrāmamāpa saḥ // 6.6.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra bhrāntvā niśi prāpa taruṇyādhiṣṭhitaṃ striyā / gṛham ekaṃ yayāce ca nivāsaṃ so 'tha tāṃ striyam // 6.6.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tayā datte 'pavarake sahānyaistair viveśa saḥ / sakhibhiste ca saptāpi tatra nidrāṃ kṣaṇaṃ yayuḥ // 6.6.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa eko jāgradevāsīdamanuṣyagṛhāśrayāt / svapantyajñā hi niśceṣṭāḥ kuto nidrā vivekinām // 6.6.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca tatra puruṣaḥ ko 'py eko nibhṛtaṃ yuvā / abhyantaragṛhaṃ tasyāḥ praviveśāntikaṃ striyāḥ // 6.6.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena sākaṃ ca sā reme ciraṃ guptābhibhāṣiṇī / ratiśrāntau ca tau devānnidrāṃ dvāvapi jagmatuḥ // 6.6.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac ca dīpaprakāśena sarvaṃ dvārāntareṇa saḥ / viṣṇudatto viloky aivaṃ sanirvedamacintayat // 6.6.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṣṭaṃ kathaṃ praviṣṭāḥ smo duścāriṇyāḥ striyā gṛham / dhruvaṃ jñāto 'yam etasyā na kaumāraḥ patiḥ punaḥ // 6.6.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nānyathā hi bhavatyeṣā saśaṅkanibhṛtā gatiḥ / mayā capalacitteyamādāveva ca lakṣitā // 6.6.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyālābhāt praviṣṭāḥ smaḥ kiṃ tv atrānyonyasākṣiṇaḥ / ity evaṃ cintayañ śabdaṃ janānāṃ so 'śṛṇod bahiḥ // 6.6.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dadarśa praviśantaṃ ca svasvasthānasthitānugam / yuvānamabhipaśyantaṃ sakhaḍgaṃ śabarādhipam // 6.6.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ke yūyamiti pṛcchantaṃ matvā gṛhapatiṃ sa tam / bhītaḥ pānthāḥ sma ityāha viṣṇudattaḥ pulindapam // 6.6.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa cāntaḥ śabaro gatvā dṛṣṭvā bhāryāṃ tathāsthitām / ciccheda tasya suptasya tajjārasyāsinā śiraḥ // 6.6.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhāryā tu nigṛhītā na tena sā nāpi bodhitā / bhuvi nyastāsinānyatra paryaṅke suptam eva tu // 6.6.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad dṛṣṭvā sapradīpe 'tra viṣṇudatto vyacintayat / yuktaṃ strīti na yadbhāryā hatā dāraharo hataḥ // 6.6.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ tu kṛtvedṛśaṃ karma yadanenātra supyate / visrabdhaṃ tadaho citraṃ vīryamudriktacetasām // 6.6.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity atra cintayatyeva viṣṇudatte prabudhya sā / kustrī dadarśa jāraṃ svaṃ hataṃ suptaṃ ca taṃ patim // 6.6.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
utthāya ca gṛhītvā tatskandhe jārakabandhakam / hastenaikena cādāya tacchiraḥ sā viniryayau // 6.6.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā bahiś ca nikṣipya bhasmakūṭāntare drutam / kabandhaṃ saśiraskaṃ tamāyayau nibhṛtaṃ tataḥ // 6.6.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
viṣṇudattaś ca nirgatya sarvaṃ dūrādvilokya tat / madhye sakhīnāṃ suptānāṃ praviśyāsīttathaiva saḥ // 6.6.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sā cāgatya praviśyāntaḥ patyuḥ suptasya durjanī / tenaiva tatkṛpāṇena tasya mūrdhānamacchinat // 6.6.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nirgatya śrāvayantī ca bhṛtyāñ śabdaṃ cakāra sā / hā hatāsmi hato bhartā mamaibhiḥ pathikair iti // 6.6.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ parijanāḥ śrutvā pradhāvyālokya taṃ prabhum / hataṃ tānviṣṇudattādīnabhyadhāvannudāyudhāḥ // 6.6.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etaiścāhanyamāneṣu teṣu trastotthiteṣv atha / anyeṣu tatsahāyeṣu viṣṇudatto 'bravīddrutam // 6.6.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alaṃ vo brahmahatyābhirnaivāsmābhiridaṃ kṛtam / etay aiva kṛtaṃ hy etatkustriyānyaprasaktayā // 6.6.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mayā cāpāvṛtadvāramārgeṇā mūlamīkṣitam / nirgatya ca bahirdṛṣṭaṃ kṣamadhvaṃ yadi vacmi tat // 6.6.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā tānsa śabarānviṣṇudatto nivārya ca / tebhyo niḥśeṣamā mūlādvṛttāntaṃ tamavarṇayat // 6.6.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
nītvā cādarśayatteṣāṃ kabandhaṃ taṃ śironvitam / sadyo hataṃ tayā kṣiptaṃ striyā tasminn avaskare // 6.6.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ svena vivarṇena mukhenāṅgīkṛte tayā / kulaṭāṃ tāṃ tiraskṛtya sarve tatraivamabruvan // 6.6.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
smarākṛṣṭā tanotyeva yā sāhasamaśaṅkitā / sā parasvīkṛtā kustrī kṛpāṇīva na hanti kam // 6.6.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā viṣṇudattādīnsarvāṃste mumucustata / viṣṇudattaṃ ca saptānye sahāyāste 'tha tuṣṭuvuḥ // 6.6.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rakṣāratnapradīpastvaṃ jāto naḥ svapatāṃ niśi / tvatprasādena tīrṇāḥ smo mṛtyumadyānimittajam // 6.6.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
stutvaivaṃ viṣṇudattaṃ taṃ śamayitvā ca durvacaḥ / praṇatāste yayuḥ prātaḥ svakāryāy aiva tadyutāḥ // 6.6.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
itthaṃ kaliṅgasenāyāḥ kathayitvā kathāṃ mithaḥ / somaprabhā sā kauśāmbyāṃ sakhīṃ punaruvāca tām // 6.6.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
evaṃ kāryapravṛttānāmanimittamupasthitam / vilambadyapratihataṃ sakhyaniṣṭaṃ prayacchati // 6.6.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tataś cātrānutapyante prājñavākyāvamāninaḥ / pravartamānā rabhasātparyante mandabuddhayaḥ // 6.6.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
ato 'śubhe nimitte hy o vatseśaṃ prati yattvayā / ātmagrahāya prahito dūto yuktaṃ na tatkṛtam // 6.6.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tadavighnaṃ vivāhaṃ ca vidadhātu vidhis tava / kulagnenāgatā gehādvivāhastena dūrataḥ // 6.6.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
devā api ca lubhyanti tvayi rakṣyamidaṃ tataḥ / cintyaś ca nītinipuṇo mantrī yaugandharāyaṇaḥ // 6.6.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
rājavyasanaśaṅkī sanso 'tra vighnaṃ samācaret / vihite 'pi vivāhe vā doṣamutpādayettava // 6.6.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dhārmikaḥ sanna kuryādvā doṣaṃ tad api te sakhi / sapatnī sarvathā cintyā kathāṃ vacmyatra te śṛṇu // 6.6.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
astīhekṣumatī nāma purī tasyāś ca pārśvataḥ / nadī tadabhidhānaiva viśvāmitrakṛte ubhe // 6.6.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatsamīpe mahaccāsti vanaṃ tatra kṛtāśramaḥ / ūrdhvapādastapaścakre munirmaṅkaṇakābhidhaḥ // 6.6.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tapasyatā ca tenātra gaganenāgatāpsaraḥ / adarśi menakā nāma vātena calitāmbarā // 6.6.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato labdhāvakāśena kāmena kṣobhitātmanaḥ / nūtane kadalīgarbhe vīryaṃ tasyāpatanmuneḥ // 6.6.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jajñe tataś ca kanyā sā sadyaḥ sarvāṅgasundarī / amoghaṃ hi maharṣīnāṃ vīryaṃ phalati tatkṣaṇam // 6.6.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃbhūtā kadalīgarbhe yasmāttasmāccakāra tām / nāmnā sa kadalīgarbhāṃ pitā maṅkaṇako muniḥ // 6.6.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāśrame sā vavṛdhe gautamasya kṛpī yathā / droṇabhāryā purā rambhādarśanacyutavīryajā // 6.6.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā ca viveśaitamāśramaṃ mṛgayārasāt / dṛḍhavarmā hṛto 'svena madhyadeśabhavo nṛpaḥ // 6.6.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tāṃ dadarśa kadalīgarbhāṃ prāvṛtavalkalām / munikanyocitenātra veṣeṇātyantaśobhitām // 6.6.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā ca dṛṣṭvāsya nṛpateḥ svīcakre hṛdayaṃ tathā / yathāvakāśo 'pi hṛtas tatrāntaḥpurayoṣitām // 6.6.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
apīmāṃ prāpnuyāṃ bhāryāṃ kasyāpīha sutāmṛṣeḥ / duṣyanta iva kaṇvasya muneḥ kanyāṃ śakuntalām // 6.6.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti saṃcintayanneva saṃgṛhītasamitkuśam / so 'trāpaśyattamāyāntaṃ muniṃ maṅkaṇakaṃ nṛpaḥ // 6.6.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vavande cainamabhyetya pādayorbhuktavāhanaḥ / pṛṣṭaścātmānametasmai munaye sa nyavedayat // 6.6.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa kadalīgarbhāṃ munir ādiśati sma tām / vatse rājño 'titherasya tvayārghyaṃ kalpyatāmiti // 6.6.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatheti kalpitātithyastayā rājā sa namrayā / īdṛkkutaste kanyeyamiti papraccha taṃ munim // 6.6.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
muniś ca sa tatas tasyāstāmutpattiṃ ca nāma ca / anvarthaṃ kadalīgarbhetyasmai rājñe nyavedayat // 6.6.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tāṃ sa muneḥ kanyāṃ menakābhāvanodbhavām / matvāpsarasamatyutko rājā tasmādayācata // 6.6.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'py etāṃ kadalīgarbhāṃ dadau tasmai sutāmṛṣiḥ / divyānubhāvaṃ pūrveṣāmavicāryaṃ hi ceṣṭitam // 6.6.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tac ca buddhvā prabhāveṇa tatrābhyetya surāṅganāḥ / menakāprītitas tasyāś cakrur udvāhamaṇḍanam // 6.6.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dattvā ca sarṣapān haste jagadus tāṃ tadaiva tāḥ / yāntī mārge vapasvaitāṃs tvam abhijñānasiddhaye // 6.6.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yadi bhartra kṛtāvajñā kadācittvam ihaiṣyasi / tajjātairebhirāyāntī panthānaṃ putri vetsyati // 6.6.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktāṃ tābhirāropya kṛtodvāhāṃ svavājini / sa rājā kadalīgarbhāṃ dṛḍhavarmā yayau tataḥ // 6.6.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāptānvāgatasainyo 'tha vapantyā sarṣapān pathi / vadhvā tayā saha prāpa rājadhānīṃ nijāṃ ca saḥ // 6.6.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrānyapatnīvimukhaḥ kadalīgarbhayā tayā / samaṃ sa tasthāvākhyātatadvṛttāntaḥ svamantriṣu // 6.6.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatas tasya mahādevī tadīyaṃ mantriṇaṃ rahaḥ / smārayitvopakārānsvāñjagādātyantaduḥkhitā // 6.6.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājñā nūtanabhāryaikasaktenādāhamujjhitā / tattathā kuru yenaiṣā sapatnī me nivartate // 6.6.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā so 'bravīnmantrī devi kartuṃ na yujyate / mādṛśānāṃ praboḥ patnyā vināśo 'tha viyojanam // 6.6.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
eṣa pravrājakastrīṇāṃ viṣayaḥ kuhakādiṣu / prayogeṣv abhiyuktānāṃ saṃgatānāṃ tathāvidhaiḥ // 6.6.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tā hi kaitavatāpasyaḥ praviśyaivānivāritāḥ / gṛheṣu māyākuśalāḥ karma kiṃ kiṃ na kurvate // 6.6.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
ity uktā tena sā devī vinatevāha taṃ hriyā / alaṃ tarhi mamānena garhitena satāmiti // 6.6.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadvaco hṛdi kṛtvā tu taṃ visṛjya ca mantriṇam / kāṃcitpravrājikāṃ ceṭīmukhenānayati sma sā // 6.6.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāḥ śaśaṃsa cāmūlāttatsarvaṃ svamanīṣitam / aṅgīcakāra dātuṃ ca siddhe kārye dhanaṃ mahat // 6.6.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpyarthalobhād ārtāṃ tām ity uvāca kutāpasī / devī kiṃ nāma vastv etad ahaṃ te 'sadhayāmy adaḥ // 6.6.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
nānāvidhān hi jānāmi prayogān subahūn aham / evam āśvāsya tāṃ devīṃ sātha pravrājikā yayau // 6.6.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
maṭhikāṃ prāpya ca nijāṃ bhītevetthamacintayat / aho atīva bhogāśā kaṃ nāma na viḍambayet // 6.6.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
yan mayā sahasā devyāḥ pratijñā purataḥ kṛtā / vijñānaṃ cātra tādṛṅ me samyak kiṃcin na vidyate // 6.6.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyatr eva ca na vyājaṃ kartuṃ rājagṛhe kṣamam / jñātvā jātu hi kurvīrannigrahaṃ prabhaviṣṇavaḥ // 6.6.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekas tatrābhyupāyaḥ syād yat suhṛn me 'sti nāpitaḥ / idṛgvijñānakuśalaḥ sa cetkuryādihodyamam // 6.6.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ity ālocy aiva sā tasya nāpitasyāntikaṃ yayau / tasmai manīṣitaṃ sarvaṃ tacchaśaṃsārthasiddhidam // 6.6.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa nāpito vṛddho dhūrtaścaivamacintayat / upasthitamidaṃ diṣṭyā lābhasthānaṃ mamādhunā // 6.6.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tanna bādhyā navā rājavadhū rakṣyā tu sā yataḥ / divyadṛṣṭiḥ pitā tasya sarvaṃ prakhyāpayedidam // 6.6.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
viśliṣyaitāṃ tu nṛpaterdevīṃ saṃprati bhuñjmahe / kurahasyasahāye hi bhṛte bhṛtyāyate prabhuḥ // 6.6.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃśleṣya kāle rājñe ca vācyametattathā mayā / yathā syādupajīvyo me rājā sā cārṣikanyakā // 6.6.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ ca nātipāpaṃ syādbhaveddirghā ca jīvikā / ity ālocya sa tāṃ prāha nāpitaḥ kūṭatāpasīm // 6.6.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amba sarvaṃ karomyetatkiṃ tu yogabalena cet / eṣā rājño navā bhāryā hanyate tanna yujyate // 6.6.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
buddhvā kadācid rājā hi sarvān asmān vināśayet / strīhatyāpātakaṃ ca syāttatpitā ca muniḥ śapet // 6.6.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmādbuddhibalenaiṣā rājño viśleṣyate param / yena devī sukhaṃ tiṣṭhed arthaprāptir bhavec ca naḥ // 6.6.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac ca me kiyat kiṃ hi na buddhyā sādhayāmy aham / prajñānaṃ māmakīnaṃ ca śrūyatāṃ varṇayāmi te // 6.6.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhūd asya pitā rājño duḥśīlo dṛḍhavarmaṇaḥ / ahaṃ ca dāsas tasyeha rājñaḥ svocitakarmakṛt // 6.6.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sa kadācid iha bhrāmyan bhāryām aikṣata māmakīm / tasyāṃ tasya surūpāyāṃ taruṇyāṃ ca mano yayau // 6.6.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nāpitastrīti cābodhi pṛṣṭvā parijanaṃ sa tām / kiṃ nāpitaḥ karotīti praviśy aiva sa me gṛham // 6.6.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upabhujy aiva tāṃ svecchaṃ madbhāryāṃ kunṛpo yayau / ahaṃ ca tadahardaivādgṛhādāsaṃ bahiḥ kvacit // 6.6.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyedyuś ca praviṣṭena dṛṣṭā sānyādṛśī mayā / pṛṣṭā bhāryā yathāvṛttaṃ sābhimāneva me 'bhyadhāt // 6.6.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkrameṇaiva tāṃ bhāryām aśaktasya niṣedhane / nityam evopabhuñjānaḥ sa mamottabdhavān nṛpaḥ // 6.6.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kuto gamyamagamyaṃ vā kuśīlonmādinaḥ prabhoḥ / vātodbhūtasya dāvāgneḥ kiṃ tṛṇaṃ kiṃ ca kānanam // 6.6.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato yāvad gatir me 'sti na kācit tannivāraṇe / tāvatsvalpāśanakṣāmo māndyavyājamaśiśriyam // 6.6.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tādṛśaś ca gato 'bhūvaṃ rājñas tasyāham antikam / svavyāpāropasevārthaṃ niḥśvasankṛśapāṇḍuraḥ // 6.6.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra mandamivālokya sābhiprāyaḥ sa māṃ nṛpaḥ / papraccha re kimīdṛktvaṃ saṃjātaḥ kathyatāmiti // 6.6.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nirbandhapṛṣṭas taṃ cāhaṃ vijane yācitābhayaḥ / pratyavocaṃ nṛpaṃ deva bhāryāsti mama ḍākinī // 6.6.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā ca suptasya me 'ntrāṇi gudenākṛṣya cūṣati / tathaiva cāntaḥ kṣipati tenāhaṃ kṣāmatāṃ gataḥ // 6.6.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
poṣaṇāya ca me nityaṃ bṛṃhaṇaṃ bhojanaṃ kutaḥ / ity uktaḥ sa mayā rājā jātāśaṅko vyacintayat // 6.6.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ satyaṃ ḍākinī sā syāttenāhaṃ kiṃ hṛtastathā / kiṃsvidāharapuṣṭasya cūṣedantraṃ mamāpi sā // 6.6.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadadya tām ahaṃ yuktyā jijñāsiṣye svayaṃ niśi / iti saṃcintya rājā me so 'trāhāramadāpayat // 6.6.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato gatvā gṛhaṃ tasyā bhāryāyāḥ saṃnidhāvaham / aśrūṇyamuñca pṛṣṭaś ca tayā tām evam abravam // 6.6.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
priye na vācyaṃ kasyāpi tvayā śṛṇu vadāmi te / asya rājño gude jātā dantā vajrāśrisaṃnibhāḥ // 6.6.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac ca bhagno 'dya jātyo 'pi kṣuro me karma kurvataḥ / evaṃ cātra mamedānīṃ kṣurastruṭyetpade pade // 6.6.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tannavaṃ navamāneṣye kuto nityam ahaṃ kṣuram / ato rodimi naṣṭā hi jīvikeyaṃ gṛhe mama // 6.6.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktā sā mayā bhāryā matimādhādupaiṣyataḥ / rātrau rājño 'sya suptasya gudadantādbhutekṣaṇe // 6.6.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ā saṃsārādadṛṣṭaṃ tadasatyaṃ na tvabodhi sā / vidadhā api vañcyante viṭavarṇanayā striyaḥ // 6.6.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athaitya tāṃ ni śi svairaṃ madbhāryāmupabhujya saḥ / rājā śramādivālīkaṃ suptavānmadvacaḥ smaran // 6.6.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
madbhāryāpyatha taṃ suptaṃ matvā tasya śanaiḥ śanaiḥ / hastaṃ prasārayām āsa gude dantopalabdhaye // 6.6.168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gudaprāpte ca tatpāṇāvutthāya sahasaiva saḥ / ḍākinī ḍākinīty uktvā trasto rājā tato yayau // 6.6.169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ prabhṛti sā tena bhītyā tyaktā nṛpeṇa me / bhāryā gṛhītasaṃtoṣā madekāyattatāṃ gatā // 6.6.170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekaṃ pūrvaṃ nṛpādbuddhyā gṛhiṇī mocitā mayā / iti tāṃ tāpasīmuktvā nāpitaḥ so 'bravītpunaḥ // 6.6.171	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadetatprajñayā kāramārye yuṣmanmanīṣitam / yathā ca kriyate mātastadidaṃ vacmi te śṛṇu // 6.6.172	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ko 'py antaḥpuravṛddho 'tra svīkāryo yo bravītyamum / jāyā te kadalīgarbhā ḍākinīti nṛpaṃ rahaḥ // 6.6.173	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āraṇyakāyā nahyasyāḥ kaścitparijanaḥ svakaḥ / sarvaḥ paro bhedasaho lobhātkurvīta kiṃ na yat // 6.6.174	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tato 'smin rājñi sāśaṅke śravaṇān niśi yatnataḥ / hastapādādi kadalīgarbhādhāmni nidhīyate // 6.6.175	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatprabhāte viloky aiva rājā satyamavetya tat / vṛddhoktaṃ kadalīgarbhāṃ bhītastāṃ tyakṣyati svayam // 6.6.176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ sapatnīvirahāddevī sukhamavāpnuyāt / tvāṃ ca sā bahu manyeta lābhaḥ kaścidbhavec ca naḥ // 6.6.177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktā tāpasī tena nāpitena tatheti sā / gatvā rājño mahādevyai yathāvastu nyavedayat // 6.6.178	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
devī ca tattathā cakre sā tadyuktyā nṛpo 'pi tām / pratyakṣaṃ vīkṣya kadalīgarbhāṃ duṣṭeti tāṃ jahau // 6.6.179	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tuṣṭayā ca tato devyā tayā guptamadāyi yat / pravrājikā tadbubhuje sā yatheṣṭaṃ sanāpita // 6.6.180	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tyaktā ca kadalīgarbhā sā tena dṛḍhavarmaṇā / rājñābhiśāpasaṃtaptā niryayau rājamandirāt // 6.6.181	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yenājagāma tenaiva prayayau piturāśramam / pūrvoptajātasiddhārthasābhijñānena sā pathā // 6.6.182	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tām āgatāṃ dṛṣṭvā so 'kasmāttatpitā muniḥ / tasyā duścaritāśaṅkī tasthau maṅkaṇakaḥ kṣaṇam // 6.6.183	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praṇidānāc ca taṃ kṛtsnaṃ tadvṛttāntamavetya saḥ / āśvāsya ca svayaṃ snehāttāmādāya yayau tataḥ // 6.6.184	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etya tasmai yadācakyau svayaṃ prahvāya bhūbhṛte / devyā sapatnīdoṣeṇa kṛtaṃ kapaṭanāṭakam // 6.6.185	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatkālaṃ svayamabhyetya rājñe tasmai sa nāpitaḥ / yathāvṛttaṃ tadācaṣṭa punar evamuvāca ca // 6.6.186	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
itthaṃ viśleṣya kadalīgarbhā rājñī mayā prabho / abhicāravaśādyuktyā devīṃ saṃtoṣya rakṣitā // 6.6.187	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā niścayaṃ dṛṣṭvā munīndravacanasya saḥ / jagrāha kadalīgarbhāṃ saṃjātapratyayo nṛpaḥ // 6.6.188	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anuvrajya muniṃ taṃ ca saṃvibheje sa nāpitam / bhakto mamāyamityarthairdhūrtairbhojyā bateśvarāḥ // 6.6.189	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tayā samaṃ tasthau kadalīgarbhay aiva saḥ / rājā svadevīvimukho dṛḍhavarma sunirvṛtaḥ // 6.6.190	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
evaṃvidhānvidadhate subahūnsapatnyo doṣānmṛṣāpyanavamāṅgi kaliṅgasene / tvaṃ kanyakā ca cirabhāvivivāhalagnā vāñchantyacintyagatayaś ca surā api tvām // 6.6.191	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
tatsarvataḥ sāṃpratam ātmanā tvam ātmānam ekaṃ jagadekaratnam / vatseśvaraikārpitam atra rakṣer vairaṃ tavāyaṃ hi nijaḥ prakarṣaḥ // 6.6.192	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
ahaṃ hi neṣyāmi sakhi tvadantikaṃ sthitādhunā tvaṃ patimandire yataḥ / sakhīpateḥ sadma na yānti satstriyaḥ sugātri bhartādya nivāritāsmi ca // 6.6.193	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
na ca guptam ihāgamaḥ kṣamo me tvadatisnehavaśāt sa divyadṛṣṭiḥ / tadavaiti hi matpatiḥ kathaṃcit tamanujñāpya kilāgatāhamadya // 6.6.194	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
iha nāstyadhunā hi māmakīnaṃ sakhi kāryaṃ tava yāmi tadgṛhāya / yadi māmanumaṃsyate ca bhartā tadihaiṣyāmi punarvilaṅghya lajjām // 6.6.195	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
itthaṃ sabāṣpamabhidhāya kaliṅgasenāṃ tām aśrudhautavadanāṃ manujendraputrīm / āśvāsya cāhni vigalatyasurendraputrī somaprabhā svabhavanaṃ nabhasā jagāma // 6.6.196	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
tataḥ somaprabhāṃ yātāṃ smarantī tāṃ priyāṃ sakhīm / kaliṅgasenā saṃtyaktanijadeśasvabāndhavā // 6.7.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sā vilambita vatseśapāṇigrahamahotsavā / naredrakanyā kauśāmbyāṃ mṛgīvāsīdvanacyutā // 6.7.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kaliṅgasenāvivāhavilambanavicakṣaṇān / gaṇakān prati sāsūya iva vatseśvaro 'pi ca // 6.7.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
autsukyavimanāstasmin dine ceto vinodayan / devyā vāsavadattāyā nivāsabavanaṃ yayau // 6.7.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra sā taṃ patiṃ devī nirvikārā viśeṣataḥ / upācarat svopacāraiḥ prāṅmantrivaraśikṣitā // 6.7.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
kaliṅgasenāvṛttānte khyāte 'py avikṛtā katham / devīyamiti sa dhyātvā rājā jijñāsurāha tām // 6.7.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaccidevi tvayā jñātaṃ svayaṃvarakṛte mama / kaliṅgasenā nāmaiṣā rājaputrī yad āgatā // 6.7.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tac chrutvaivāvibhinnena mukharāgeṇa sābravīt / jñātaṃ mayātiharṣo me lakṣmīḥ sā hy āgateha naḥ // 6.7.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vaśage hi mahārāje tatprāptyā tatpitary api / kaliṅgadatte pṛthvī te sutarāṃ vartate vaśe // 6.7.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ahaṃ ca tvadvibhūtyaiva sukhitā tvatsukhena ca / āryaputra tavaitac ca viditaṃ prāgapi sthitam // 6.7.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tanna dhanyāsmi kiṃ yasyā mama bhartā tvamīdṛśaḥ / yaṃ rājakanyā vāñchanti vāñchyamānā nṛpāntaraiḥ // 6.7.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
evaṃ vatseśvaraḥ prokto devyā vāsavadattayā / yaugandharāyaṇaprattaśikṣayāntastutoṣa saḥ // 6.7.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tay aiva ca sahāsevya pānaṃ tadvāsake niśi / tasyāṃ suṣvāpa madhye ca prabuddhaḥ samacintayat // 6.7.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃsvinmahānubhāvetthaṃ devī māmanuvartate / kaliṅgasenām api yatsapatnīmanumanyate // 6.7.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
kathaṃ vā śaknuyādetāṃ soḍhuṃ saiṣā tapasvinī / padmāvatīvivāhe 'pi yā daivānna jahāvasṛn // 6.7.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadasyāścedaniṣṭaṃ syātsarvanāśastato bhavet / etadālambanāḥ putraśvaśuryaśvaśurāś ca me // 6.7.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
padmāvatī ca rājyaṃ ca kimabhyadhikamucyate / ataḥ kaliṅgasenaiṣā pariṇeyā kathaṃ mayā // 6.7.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evamālocya vatseśo niśānte nirgatas tataḥ / aparāhṇe yayau devyāḥ padmāvatyāḥ sa mandiram // 6.7.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpyenam āgataṃ dattaśikṣā vāsavadattayā / tathaivopācarattadvatpṛṣṭāvocattathaiva ca // 6.7.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'nyedyustayordevyorekaṃ cittaṃ vacaś ca tat / yaugandharāyaṇāyāsau śaśaṃsa vimṛśannṛpaḥ // 6.7.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi taṃ vīkṣya rājānaṃ vicārapatitaṃ śanaiḥ / kālavedī jagādaivaṃ mantrī yaugandharāyaṇaḥ // 6.7.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jāne 'haṃ naitadetāvadabhiprāyo 'tra dāruṇaḥ / devībhyāṃ jīvitatyāgadārḍhyāduktaṃ hi tattathā // 6.7.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyāsakte gate ca dyāṃ striyo maraṇaniścitāḥ / bhavantyadainyagambhīrāḥ sādhvyaḥ sarvatra niḥspṛhāḥ // 6.7.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asahyaṃ hi puraṃdhrīṇāṃ premṇo gāḍhasya khaṇḍanam / tathā ca rājaṃs tatraitāṃ śrutasainakathāṃ śṛṇu // 6.7.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
abhūd dakṣiṇabhūmau prāggokarṇākhye pure nṛpaḥ / śrutasena iti khyātaḥ kulabhūṣāśrutānvitaḥ // 6.7.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya caikābhavac cintā rājñaḥ saṃpūrṇasaṃpadaḥ / ātmānurūpāṃ bhāryāṃ yat sa na tāvad avāptavān // 6.7.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ekadā ca nṛpaḥ kurvaścintāṃ tāṃ tatkathāntare / agniśarmābhidhānena jagade so 'grajanmanā // 6.7.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āścarye dve mayā dṛṣṭe te rājanvarṇaye śṛṇu / tīrthayātrāgataḥ pañcatīrthīṃ tām ahamāptavān // 6.7.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yasyāmapsarasaḥ pañca grāhatvamṛṣiśāpataḥ / prāptāḥ satīrudaharattirthayātrāgato 'rjunaḥ // 6.7.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatra tīrthavare snātvā pañcarātropavāsinām / nārāyaṇānucaratādāyini snāyināṃ nṛṇām // 6.7.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
yāvadvrajāmi tāvac ca lāṅgalollikhitāvanim / gāyantaṃ kaṃcidadrākṣaṃ kārṣikaṃ kṣetramadhyagam // 6.7.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa pṛṣṭaḥ kārṣiko mārgaṃ mārgāyātena kenacit / pravrājakena sadvākyaṃ nāśṛṇodgītatatparaḥ // 6.7.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa tasmai cukrodha parivrāḍ vidhuraṃ bruvan / so 'pi gītaṃ vimucyātha kārṣikas tam abhāṣata // 6.7.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho pravrājako 'si tvaṃ dharmasyāśaṃ na vetsyasi / mūrkheṇāpi mayā jñātaṃ sāraṃ dharmasya yatpunaḥ // 6.7.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā kiṃ tvayā jñātam iti tena ca kautukāt / pravrājakena pṛṣṭaḥ san kārṣikaḥ sa jagāda tam // 6.7.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ihopaviśa pracchāye śṛṇu yāvad vadāmi te / asmin pradeśe vidyante brāhmaṇā bhrātaras trayaḥ // 6.7.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
brahmadattaḥ somadatto viśvadattaś ca puṇyakṛt / teṣāṃ jyeṣṭhau dāravantau kaniṣṭhastvaparigrahaḥ // 6.7.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
sa tayor jyeṣṭhayor ājñāṃ kurvan karmakaro yathā / mayā sahāsīd akrudhyann ahaṃ teṣāṃ hi kārṣikaḥ // 6.7.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tau ca jyeṣṭhāvabudhyetāṃ mṛduṃ taṃ buddhivarjitam / sādhumatyaktasanmārgamṛjumāyāsavarjitam // 6.7.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā bhrātṛjāyābhyāṃ sakāmābhyāṃ raho 'rthitaḥ / kaniṣṭho viśvadatto 'tha mātṛvatte nirākarot // 6.7.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas te nijayorbhartrorubhe gatvā mṛṣocatuḥ / vāñchatyāvāṃ rahasyeṣa kanīyānyuvayoriti // 6.7.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena taṃ prati tau jyeṣṭhau sāntaḥkopau babhūvatuḥ / sadasadvā na vidatuḥ kustrīvacanamohitau // 6.7.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
athaitau bhrātarau jātu viśvadattaṃ tamūcatuḥ / gaccha tvaṃ kṣetramadhyasthaṃ valmīkaṃ taṃ samīkuru // 6.7.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathety āgatya valmīkaṃ kuddālenākhanatsa tam / mā m aivaṃ kṛṣṇasarpo 'tra vasatītyudito mayā // 6.7.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvāpi sa valmīkam akhanad yad bhavatv iti / pāpaiṣiṇor apy ādeśaṃ jyeṣṭhabhrātror alaṅghayan // 6.7.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
khanyamānāt tataḥ prāpa kalaśaṃ hemapūritam / na kṛṣṇasarpaṃ dharmo hi sāṃnidhyaṃ kurute satām // 6.7.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
taṃ ca nītvā sa kalaśaṃ bhrātṛbhyāṃ sarvamarpayat / nivāryamāṇo 'pi mayā jyeṣṭhābhyāṃ dṛḍhabhaktitaḥ // 6.7.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tau punastata evāṃśaṃ dattvā prerya ca ghātakān / tasyācchedayatāṃ pāṇipādaṃ dhanajihīrṣayā // 6.7.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathāpi na sa cukrodha nirmanyurbhrātarau prati / tena satyena tasyātra hastapādamajāyata // 6.7.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadāprabhṛti tad dṛṣṭvā tyaktaḥ krodho 'khilo mayā / tvayā tu tāpasenāpi krodho 'dyāpi na mucyate // 6.7.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akrodhena jitaḥ svargaḥ paśyaitadadhunaiva bhoḥ / ity uktvaiva tanuṃ tyaktvā kārṣikaḥ sa divaṃ gataḥ // 6.7.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity āścaryaṃ mayā dṛṣṭaṃ dvitīyaṃ śṛṇu bhūpate / ity uktvā śrutasenaṃ sa nṛpaṃ vipro 'bravītpunaḥ // 6.7.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'pi tīrthayātrārthaṃ paryaṭannambudhestaṭe / ahaṃ vasantasenasya rājño rāṣṭramavāptavān // 6.7.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra bhoktuṃ praviṣṭaṃ māṃ rājasattre 'bruvan dvijāḥ / brahman pathāmunā mā gāḥ sthitā hy atra nṛpātmajā // 6.7.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidyuddyotābhidhānā tāṃ paśyedapi muniryadi / sa kāmaśaranirbhinnaḥ prāpyonmādaṃ na jīvati // 6.7.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'haṃ pratyavocaṃ tānnaitaccitraṃ sadā hy aham / paśyāmyaparakandarpaṃ śrutasenamahīpatim // 6.7.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yātrādau nirgate yasmin rakṣibhir dṛṣṭigocarāt / utsāryante satīvṛttabhaṅgabhītyā kulāṅganāḥ // 6.7.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavantaṃ vijñāya bhāvatkaṃ bhojanāya mām / nṛpāntikaṃ nītavantau sattrādhipapurohitau // 6.7.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
tatra sā rājatanayā vidyudyotā mayekṣitā / kāmasyeva jaganmohamantravidyā śarīriṇī // 6.7.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
cirāttaddarśanakṣobhaṃ niyamyāhamacintayam / asmatprabhoś ced bhāryeyaṃ bhaved rājyaṃ sa vismaret // 6.7.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tathāpi kathanīyo 'yamudantaḥ svāmine mayā / unmādinīdevasenavṛttānto hy anyathā bhavet // 6.7.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
devasenasya nṛpateḥ purā rāṣṭre vaṇiksutā / unmādinītyabhūtkanyā jagadunmādakāriṇī // 6.7.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
āveditāpi sā pitrā na tenāttā mahībhṛtā / vipraiḥ kulakṣaṇety uktā tasya vyasanarakṣibhiḥ // 6.7.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pariṇītā tadīyena mantrimukhyena sā tataḥ / vātāyanāgrād ātmānaṃ rājñe 'smai jātv adarśayat // 6.7.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tayā bhujaṃgyā rājendro durāddṛṣṭiviṣāhataḥ / muhurmumūrccha na ratiṃ lebhe nāhāramāharat // 6.7.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
prārthito 'pi a tadbhartṛpramukhaiḥ so 'tha mantribhiḥ / dhārmikastāṃ na jagrāha tatsaktaś ca jahāvasūn // 6.7.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadīdṛśe pramāde 'tra vṛtte drohaḥ kṛto bhavet / ity ālocya mayoktaṃ te citrametya tato 'dya tat // 6.7.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutvaitatsa dvijāttasmānmadanājñānibhaṃ vacaḥ / vidyuddyotāhṛtamanāḥ śrutasenanṛpo 'bhavat // 6.7.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatkṣaṇaṃ ca visṛjy aiva tatra vipraṃ tam eva saḥ / tathākarodyathānīya śīghraṃ tāṃ pariṇītavān // 6.7.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sā nṛpates tasya vidyuddyotā nṛpātmajā / śarīrāvyatiriktāsīdbhāskarasya prabhā yathā // 6.7.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha svayaṃvarāyāgāt taṃ nṛpaṃ rūpagarvitā / kanyakā mātṛdattākhyā mahādhanavaṇiksutā // 6.7.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adharmabhītyā jagrāha sa rājā tāṃ vaṇiksutām / vidyuddyotātha tad buddhvā hṛtsphoṭena vyapadyata // 6.7.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājāpy āgata tāṃ kāntāṃ paśyann eva tathā gatām / aṅke kṛtvā sa vilapan sadyaḥ prāṇair vyayujyata // 6.7.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tato vaṇiksutā vahniṃ mātṛdattā viveśa sā / itthaṃ praṇaṣṭaṃ sarvaṃ tad api rāṣṭraṃ sarājakam // 6.7.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ato rājan prakṛṣṭasya bhaṅgaḥ premṇaḥ suduḥsahaḥ / viśeṣeṇa manasvinyā devyā vāsavadattayā // 6.7.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmātkaliṅgaseṇaiṣā pariṇītā yadi tvayā / devī vāsavadattā tatprāṇāñjahyānna saṃśayaḥ // 6.7.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
devī padmāvatī tadvattayorekaṃ hi jīvitam / naravāhanadattaś ca putraste syātkathaṃ tataḥ // 6.7.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tañca devasya hṛdayaṃ soḍhuṃ jāne na śaknuyāt / evam ekapade sarvamidaṃ naśyenmahīpate // 6.7.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
devyoryaccoktigāmbhīryaṃ tadeva kathayatyalam / hṛdayaṃ jīvitatyāgagāḍhaniścitaniḥspṛham // 6.7.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatsvārtho rakṣaṇīyaste tiryañco 'pi hi jānate / svarakṣāṃ kiṃ punardeva buddhimanto bhavādṛśāḥ // 6.7.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti mantrivarāc chrutvā svairaṃ yaugandharāyaṇāt / samyagvivekapadavīṃ prāpya vatseśvaro 'bravīt // 6.7.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
evametanna saṃdeho naśyetsarvamidaṃ mama / tasmātkaliṅgasenāyāḥ ko 'rthaḥ pariṇayena me // 6.7.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ukto lagnaś ca dūre yat tad yuktaṃ gaṇakaiḥ kṛtam / svayaṃvarāgatātyāgād adharmo vā kiyān bhavet // 6.7.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukto vatsarājena hṛṣṭo yaugandharāyaṇaḥ / cintayām āsa kāryaṃ naḥ siddhaprāyaṃ yathepsitam // 6.7.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upāyarasasaṃsiktā deśakālopabṛṃhitā / seyaṃ nītimahāvallīṃ kiṃ nāma na phaletphalam // 6.7.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti saṃcintya sa dhyāyandeśakālau praṇamya tam / rājānaṃ prayayau mantrī gṛhaṃ yaugandharāyaṇaḥ // 6.7.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājāpi racitātithyagūḍhakārāmupetya saḥ / devīṃ vāsavadattāṃ tāṃ sāntvayannevam abravīt // 6.7.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kimarthaṃ vacmi jānāsi tvam eva hariṇākṣi yat / vāri vāriruhasyeva tvatprema mama jīvitam // 6.7.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nāmāpi hi kimanyasyā grahītumahamutsahe / kaliṅgasenā tu haṭhādupāyātā gṛhaṃ mama // 6.7.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
prasiddhaṃ cātra yadrambhā tapaḥsthena nirākṛtā / pārthena ṣaṇḍhatāśāpaṃ dadau tasyai haṭhāgatā // 6.7.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa śāpastiṣṭhatā tena varṣaṃ vairāṭaveśmani / strīveṣeṇa mahāścaryarūpeṇāpyativāhitaḥ // 6.7.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ataḥ kaliṅgasenaiṣā niṣiddhā na tadā mayā / vinā tvadicchayāhaṃ tu na kiṃcidvaktumutsahe // 6.7.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity āśvāsyopalabhyātha hṛdayeneva rāgiṇā / mukhārpitena madyena satyaṃ krūraṃ tadāśayam // 6.7.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tay aiva saha rātriṃ tāṃ rājñā vāsavadattayā / mantrimukhyamatiprauḍhituṣṭo vatseśvaro 'vasat // 6.7.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atrāntare ca yaṃ pūrvaṃ divārātrau prayuktavān / kaliṅgasenāvṛttāntajñaptyai yaugandharāyaṇaḥ // 6.7.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sa brahmarākṣaso 'bhyetya suhṛdyogeśvarābhidhaḥ / tasyām eva niśi svairaṃ taṃ mantrivaramabhyadhāt // 6.7.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaliṅgasenāsadane sthito 'smy antarbahiḥ sadā / divyānāṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ vā paśyāmi na tathāgamam // 6.7.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
adyāvyakto mayā śabdaḥ śruto 'kasmānnabhastale / pracchannenātra harmyāgrasaṃnikarṣe niśāmukhe // 6.7.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prabhāvaṃ tasya vijñātuṃ prayuktāpi tato mama / vidyā na prābhavattena vimṛśyāhamacintayam // 6.7.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayaṃ divyaprabhāvasya śabdaḥ kasyāpi niścitam / kaliṅgasenālāvaṇyalubdhasya bhramato 'mbare // 6.7.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
yena na kramate vidyā tadvīkṣe kiṃcidantaram / na duṣprāpaṃ paracchidraṃ jāgradbhirnipuṇairyataḥ // 6.7.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
divyānāṃ vāñchitaiṣeti proktaṃ mantrivareṇa ca / somaprabhā sakhī cāsyā vadantyetan mayā śrutā // 6.7.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti niścitya tat tubhyam ihāhaṃ vaktum āgataḥ / idaṃ prasaṅgāt pṛcchāmi tan me tāvat tvayocyatām // 6.7.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tiryañco 'pi hi rakṣanti svātmānam iti yat tvayā / ukto rajā tad aśrauṣaṃ yogād aham alakṣitaḥ // 6.7.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nidarśanaṃ ced atrāsti tan me kathaya sanmate / iti yogeśvareṇoktaḥ smāha yaugandharāyaṇaḥ // 6.7.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
asti mittraṃ tathā cātra kathāmākhyāmi te śṛṇu / vidiśānagarībāhye nyagrodho 'bhūtpurā mahān // 6.7.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
catvāraḥ prāṇinas tatra vasanti sma mahātarau / nakulolūkamārjāramūṣakāḥ pṛthagālayāḥ // 6.7.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhinne bhinne bile mūla āstāṃ nakulamūṣakau / mārjāro madhyabhāgasthe tarormahati koṭare // 6.7.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ulūkastu śirobhāge 'nanyalabhye latālaye / mūṣako 'tra tribhirvadhyo mārjāreṇa trayo 'pare // 6.7.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
annāya mārjārabhayānmūṣako nakulastathā / svabhāvenāpyulūkaś ca paribhremurniśi trayaḥ // 6.7.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
mārjāraś ca divārātrau nirbhayaḥ prabhramaty asau / tatrāsanne yavakṣetre sadā muṣakalipsayā // 6.7.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ye 'nye 'pi yuktyā jagmustatsvakāle 'nnābhivāñchayā / ekadā lubdhakas tatra caṇḍālaḥ kaścidāyayau // 6.7.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa mārjārapadaśreṇiṃ dṛṣṭvā tatkṣetragāminīm / tadvadhāyābhitaḥ kṣetraṃ pāśāndattvā tato yayau // 6.7.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra rātrau ca mārjāraḥ sa mūṣakajighāṃsayā / etya praviṣṭas tatpāśaiḥ kṣetre tasminn abadhyata // 6.7.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
mūṣako 'pi tato 'nnārthī sa tatra nibhṛtāgataḥ / baddhaṃ taṃ vīkṣya mārjāraṃ jaharṣa ca nanarta ca // 6.7.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yāvadviśati tatkṣetraṃ dūrādekena vartmanā / tatra tau tāvadāyātābulūkanakulāvapi // 6.7.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭamārjārabandhau ca mūṣakaṃ labdhumaicchatām / mūṣako 'pi ca tad dṛṣṭvā dūrādvigno vyacintayat // 6.7.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nakulolūkabhayadaṃ mārjāraṃ saṃśraye yadi / baddho 'py ekaprahāreṇa śatru rmām eṣa mārayet // 6.7.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
mārjārāddūragaṃ hanyādulūko nakulaś ca mām / tacchatrusaṃkaṭagataḥ kva gacchāmi karomi kim // 6.7.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
hanta mārjāram eveha śrayāmy āpadgato hy ayam / ātmatrāṇāya māṃ rakṣetpāśacchedopayoginam // 6.7.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ālocya śanairgatvā mārjāraṃ mūṣako 'bravīt / baddhe tvayyatiduḥkhaṃ me tatte pāśaṃ chinadbhyaham // 6.7.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ṛjūnāṃ jāyate snehaḥ sahavāsādripuṣvapi / kiṃ tu me nāsti viśvāsastava cittamajānataḥ // 6.7.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvovāca mārjāro bhadra viśvasyatāṃ tvayā / adya prabhṛti me mittraṃ bhavān prāṇapradāyakaḥ // 6.7.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti śrutvaiva mārjārāttasyotsaṅgaṃ sa śiśriye / tad dṛṣṭvā nakulolūkau nirāśau yayatus tataḥ // 6.7.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato jagāda mārjāro mūṣakaṃ pāśapīḍitaḥ / gataprāyā niśā mittra tatpāśāṃśchindhi me drutam // 6.7.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mūṣako 'pi śanaiśchindallubdhakāgamanonmukhaḥ / mṛṣā kaṭakaṭāyadbhir daśanair akaroc ciram // 6.7.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣaṇādrātrau prabhātāyāṃ lubdhake nikaṭāgate / mārjāre 'rthayamāne drākpāśāṃściccheda mūṣakaḥ // 6.7.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
chinnapāśe 'tha mārjāre lubdhakatrāsavidrute / mūṣako mṛtyumuktaḥ san palāyya prāviśad bilam // 6.7.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nāśvasatpunarāhūto mārjāreṇa jagāda ca / kālayuktyā hy arirmittraṃ jāyate na ca sarvadā // 6.7.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ bahubhyaḥ śatrubhyaḥ prajñayātmābhirakṣitaḥ / mūṣakena tiraścāpi kiṃ punarmānuṣeṣu yat // 6.7.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
etaduktastadā rājā mayā yattattvayā śrutam / buddhyā kāryaṃ nijaṃ rakṣeddevi saṃrakṣaṇād iti // 6.7.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
buddhirnāma ca sarvatra mukhyaṃ mittraṃ na pauruṣam / yogeśvara tathā caitām atrāpi tvaṃ kathāṃ śṛṇu // 6.7.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrāvastītyasti nagarī tasyāṃ pūrvaṃ prasenajit / rājābhūttatra cābhyāgāt ko 'py apūrvo dvijaḥ puri // 6.7.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
so śūdrānnabhugekena vaṇijā guṇavāniti / brāhmaṇasya gṛhe tatra kasyacitsthāpito dvijaḥ // 6.7.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatraiva tena śuṣkānnadakṣiṇādibhiranvaham / āpūryata tato 'nyaiśca śanairbuddhvā vaṇigvaraiḥ // 6.7.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tenāsau hemadīnārasahasraṃ kṛpaṇaḥ kramāt / saṃcitya gatvāraṇye tan nihatya kṣiptavān bhuvi // 6.7.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ekākī pratyahaṃ gatvā tac ca sthānamavaikṣata / ekadā hemaśūnyaṃ tatkhātaṃ vyāttaṃ ca dṛṣṭavān // 6.7.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śūnyaṃ tatkhātakaṃ tasya paśyato hatacetasaḥ / na paraṃ hṛdi saṃkrāntā citraṃ dikṣv api śūnyatā // 6.7.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athopāgāc ca vilapaṃstaṃ vipraṃ yadgṛhe sthitaḥ / pṛṣṭastaṃ ca svavṛttāntaṃ tasmai sarvaṃ nyavedayat // 6.7.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā tīrthamabhuñjānaḥ prāṇāṃstyaktumiyeṣa ca / buddhvā ca so 'nnadātāsya vaṇiganyaiḥ sahāyayau // 6.7.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa taṃ jagāda kiṃ brahmanvittahetormumūrṣasi / akālameghavadvittamakasmād eti yāti ca // 6.7.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ādyukto 'pi tenāsau na jahau maraṇagraham / prāṇebhyo 'py arthamātrā hi kṛpaṇasya garīyasī // 6.7.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataś ca mṛtaye tīrthaṃ gacchato 'sya dvijanmanaḥ / svayaṃ prasenajidrājā tad buddhvāntikamāyayau // 6.7.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
papraccha cainaṃ kiṃ kiṃcid asti tatropalakṣaṇam / yatra bhūmau nikhātāste dīnārā brāhmaṇa tvayā // 6.7.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutva sa dvijo 'vādīdasti kṣudro 'tra pādapaḥ / aṭavyāṃ deva tanmūle nikhātaṃ tanmayā dhanam // 6.7.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ākarṇyābravīdrājā dāsyāmyanviṣya tattava / dhanaṃ svakoṣādathavā mā tyākṣīrjīvitaṃ dvija // 6.7.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
ity uktvā maraṇodyogānnivārya vinidhāya ca / dvijaṃ taṃ vaṇijo haste sa rājābhyantaraṃ gataḥ // 6.7.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrādiśya pratīhāraṃ śirortivyapadeśataḥ / vaidyānānāyayatsarvāndattvā paṭahaghoṣaṇām // 6.7.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āturāste kiyanto 'tra kasyādāḥ kiṃ tvamauṣadham / ity upānīya papraccha tānekaikaṃ viviktagaḥ // 6.7.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
te 'pi tasmai tadaikaikaḥ sarvamūcurmahīpateḥ / eko 'tha vaidyas tanmadhyāt kramapṛṣṭo 'bravīd idam // 6.7.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
vaṇijo mātṛdattasya deva nāgabalā mayā / asvasthasyopadiṣṭādya dvitīyaṃ dinamoṣadhiḥ // 6.7.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sa tamāhūya rājā vaṇijamabhyadhāt / nanu nāgabalā kena tavānītocyatāmiti // 6.7.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
deva karmakareṇeti tenokte vaṇijā tadā / kṣipramānāyya taṃ rājā sa karmakaram abravīt // 6.7.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvayā nāgabalāhetoḥ khanatā śākhinastalam / dīnārajātaṃ yallabdhaṃ brahmasvaṃ tatsamarpaya // 6.7.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ity ukto bhūbhṛtā bhītaḥ pratipady aiva tatkṣaṇam / sa tānānīya dīnārāṃs tatra karmakaro jahau // 6.7.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājāpy upoṣitāyāsmai dvijāyāhūya tān dadau / dīnārān hāritaprāptān prāṇān iva bahiś carān // 6.7.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ sa labdhavān buddhyā nītaṃ mūlatalāttaroḥ / dvijārthaṃ bhūpatir jānann oṣadhiṃ tāṃ tadudbhavām // 6.7.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadevaṃ sarvadā buddheḥ prādhānyaṃ jitapauruṣam / īdṛśeṣu ca kāryeṣu kiṃ vidadhyātparākramaḥ // 6.7.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadyogeśvara kurvīthāstvam api prajñayā tathā / yathā kaliṅgasenāyā doṣo jñāyata kaścana // 6.7.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asti caitadyathā tasyāṃ lubhyantīha surāsurāḥ / tathā ca divi kasyāpi niśi śabdaḥ śrutastvayā // 6.7.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
labdhe 'tha doṣe tasyāś ca bhavedakuśalaṃ na naḥ / nopayaccheta tāṃ rājā na cādharmaḥ kṛto bhavet // 6.7.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity udāradhiyaḥ śrutvā sarvaṃ yaugandharāyaṇāt / yogeśvarastaṃ saṃtuṣya jagāda brahmarākṣasaḥ // 6.7.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kastvayā sadṛśo nītāvanyo devādbṛhaspateḥ / ayaṃ tvamṛtaseko 'sya tvanmantro rājyaśākhinaḥ // 6.7.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'haṃ kaliṅgasenāyā jijñāsiṣye gatiṃ sadā / buddhyā śaktyāpi cety uktvā tato yogeśvaro yayau // 6.7.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkālaṃ sā ca harmyādau paryaṭantaṃ svaharmyagā / kaliṅgasenā vatseśaṃ dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭvā sma tāmyati // 6.7.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tanmanāḥ smarasaṃtaptā mṛṇālāṅgadahāriṇī / sā śrīkhaṇḍāṅgarāgā ca na lebhe nirvṛtiṃ kvacit // 6.7.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atrāntare sa tāṃ pūrvaṃ dṛṣṭvā vidyādharādhipaḥ / tasthau madanavegākhyo gāḍhānaṅgaśarārditaḥ // 6.7.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatprāptaye tapaḥ kṛtvā vare labdhe 'pi śaṃkarāt / sānyāsaktānyadeśasthā sukhaprāpyāsya nābhavat // 6.7.168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yatastenāntaraṃ labdhumasau vidyādhareśvaraḥ / rajanīṣu divi bhrāmyannāsīttanmandiropari // 6.7.169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃsmṛtya tu tamādeśaṃ tapastuṣṭasya dhūrjaṭeḥ / ekasyāṃ niśi vatseśarūpaṃ cakre svavidyayā // 6.7.170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadrūpaś ca viveśāsya mandiraṃ dvāḥsthavanditaḥ / kālakṣepākṣamo guptaṃ mantriṇāṃ sa ivāgataḥ // 6.7.171	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaliṅgasenāpy uttasthau taṃ dṛṣṭvotkampaviklavā / na so 'yamiti sā rāvair vāryamāṇeva bhūṣaṇaiḥ // 6.7.172	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vatseśarūpeṇa kramādviśvāsya tena sā / bhāryā madanavegena gāndharvavidhinā kṛtā // 6.7.173	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkālaṃ ca praviṣṭastad dṛṣṭvā yogādalakṣitaḥ / yogeśvaro viṣaṇṇo 'bhūd vatseśālokanabhramāt // 6.7.174	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yaugandharāyaṇāyaitadgatvoktvā tannideśataḥ / yuktyā vāsavadattāyā vatseśaṃ vīkṣya pārśvagam // 6.7.175	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hṛṣṭo mantrivaroktyaiva rūpaṃ suptasya veditum / kaliṅgasenāpracchannakāminaḥ so 'gamatpunaḥ // 6.7.176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
gatvā kaliṅgasenāyāḥ suptāyāḥ śayanīyake / suptaṃ madanavegaṃ taṃ svarūpe sthitamaikṣata // 6.7.177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
chatradhvajāṅkanirdhūlipādābjaṃ divyamānuṣam / svāpāntarhitatadvidyāvītarūpavivartanam // 6.7.178	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra gatvā yathādṛṣṭaṃ niveśa paritoṣavān / yogeśvaro jagādāsau hṛṣṭo yaugandharāyaṇam // 6.7.179	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na vetti mādṛśaḥ kiṃcidvetsi tvaṃ nīticakṣuṣā / tava mantreṇa duḥsādhyaṃ siddhaṃ kāryamidaṃ prabhoḥ // 6.7.180	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ vā vyoma vinārkeṇa kiṃ toyena vinā saraḥ / kiṃ mantreṇa vinā rājyaṃ kiṃ satyena vinā vacaḥ // 6.7.181	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavantam āmantrya prīto yogeśvaraṃ tataḥ / prātar vatseśvaraṃ draṣṭumāgādyaugandharāyaṇaḥ // 6.7.182	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tamupetya yathāvac ca kathāprastāvato 'bravīt / nṛpaṃ kaliṅgasenārthe pṛṣṭakāryaviniścayam // 6.7.183	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svacchandāsau na te rājan pāṇisparśam ihārhati / eṣā hi svecchayā draṣṭuṃ prasenajitam āgatā // 6.7.184	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
viraktā vīkṣya taṃ vṛddhaṃ tvāṃ prāptā rūpalobhataḥ / tadanyapuruṣāsaṅgam api svecchaṃ karoty asau // 6.7.185	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā kulakanyeyaṃ katham evaṃ samācaret / śaktiḥ kasya praveṣṭuṃ vā madīyāntaḥpurāntare // 6.7.186	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti rājñodite 'vādīddhīmānyaugandharāyaṇaḥ / ady aiva darśayāmyetatpratyakṣaṃ niśi deva te // 6.7.187	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
divyās tām abhivāñchanti siddhādyā mānuṣo 'tra kaḥ / divyānāṃ ca gatī roddhuṃ rājan keneha śakyate // 6.7.188	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadehi sākṣāt paśyeti vādinā tena mantriṇā / saha gantuṃ matiṃ cakre tatra rātrau sa bhūpatiḥ // 6.7.189	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
padmāvatyā ṛte rājñyā na vivāhyapareti yat / proktaṃ devi pratijñātaṃ mayā nirvyūḍham adya tat // 6.7.190	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity athābhyetya tāṃ devīm uktvā yaugandharāyaṇaḥ / kaliṅgasenāvṛttāntaṃ taṃ tasyai sarvam uktavān // 6.7.191	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tvadīyaśikṣānuṣṭhānaphalam etan mameti sā / devī vāsavadattāpi praṇatābhinananda tam // 6.7.192	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato niśīthe saṃsupte jane vatseśvaro yayau / gṛhaṃ kaliṅgasenāyāḥ sa ca yaugandharāyaṇaḥ // 6.7.193	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

atha sa madanavegastāṃ samāśvāsya kāntāṃ vihitadhṛtivitīrṇasvarṇarāśiḥ sa tasyai / ucita iti tayāntarbaddhasadbhartṛbhaktiḥ punarupagamanāya dyāṃ tadaivotpapāta // 6.7.216	mālinī [15: nnmyy]

bhāryā kāmāvatārasya putrasya tava bhūpate / tathā cātra kathāmetāṃ yakṣasaṃbandhinīṃ śṛṇu // 6.8.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
