mathurāyāṃ bahiḥsaṃsthaṃ nidhānaṃ sa ca rakṣitum / yakṣaṃ niyuktavānekaṃ śilāstambhamivācalam // 6.8.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra taṃ nagarīvāsī kaścitpāśupato dvijaḥ / nidhānānveṣaṇāyāgāt khanyavādī kadācana // 6.8.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa mānuṣavasādīpahasto yāvatparīkṣate / sthānaṃ tattāvadasyātra karāddīpaḥ papāta saḥ // 6.8.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
lakṣaṇena ca tenātra sthitaṃ nidhimavetya saḥ / udghāṭayitumārebhe sahānyaiḥ sakhibhirdvijaiḥ // 6.8.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha yo 'sau niyukto 'bhūd yakṣo rakṣāvidhau sa tat / dṛṣṭvā gatvā yathāvastu virūpākṣaṃ vyajijñapat // 6.8.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gaccha vyāpādaya kṣipraṃ kṣudrāṃs tān khanyavādinaḥ / ity ādideśa taṃ yakṣaṃ virūpākṣaḥ sa kopanaḥ // 6.8.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa yakṣo gatvaiva svayuktyā nijaghāna tān / nidhānavādino viprānasaṃprāptamanorathān // 6.8.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad buddhvā dhanadaḥ kruddho virūpākṣam uvāca tam / brahmahatyā kathaṃ pāpa kāritā sahasā tvayā // 6.8.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
durgato vārtikajano lobhāt kiṃ nāma nācaret / nivāryate sa vitrāsya vighnaistaistair na hanyate // 6.8.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvātha śaśāpainaṃ virūpākṣaṃ dhanādhipaḥ / martyayonau prajāyasva duṣkṛtācaraṇād iti // 6.8.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāptaśāpo 'tha kasyāpi bhūtale brāhmaṇasya saḥ / virūpākṣaḥ suto jāto brāhmaṇasyāgrahāriṇaḥ // 6.8.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'sya yakṣiṇī patnī dhanādhyakṣaṃ vyajijñapat / deva yatra sa bhartā me kṣiptas tatraiva māṃ kṣipa // 6.8.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prasīda na hi śaknomi viyuktā tena jīvitum / evaṃ tayā sa vijñaptaḥ sādhvyā vaiśravaṇo 'bhyadhāt // 6.8.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya viprasya sadane jāto bhartā sa te 'naghe / tasyaiva dāsyā gehe tvaṃ nipatiṣyasyayonijā // 6.8.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatra tena samaṃ bhartrā saṃgamaste bhaviṣyati / tvatprasādātsa śāpaṃ ca tīrtvā matpārśvameṣyati // 6.8.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti vaiśravaṇādeśāt sādhvī sā patitā tataḥ / dāsyās tasyā gṛhadvāri kanyā bhūtvaiva mānuṣī // 6.8.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akasmāc ca tayā dāsyā kanyā dṛṣṭādbhutākṛtiḥ / gṛhītvā darśitā cāsya svāmino 'tra dvijanmanaḥ // 6.8.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
divyeyaṃ kanyakā kāpi niḥsaṃdehamayonijā / ity ātmā mama vaktīhānaya tāṃ tvamaśaṅkitam // 6.8.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iyaṃ hi mama putrasya manye bhāryātvamarhati / iti so 'pi dvijo dāsīṃ tāmuvāca nananda ca // 6.8.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kramādatra vivṛddhā sā kanyā viprātmajaś ca saḥ / anyonyadarśanābaddhagāḍhasnehau babhūvatuḥ // 6.8.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ kṛtavivāhau tau tena vipreṇa daṃpatī / ajātismaraṇe 'py āstāmuttīrṇavirahāviva // 6.8.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha kālena dehānte tayā so 'nugataḥ patiḥ / tattapaḥkṣatapāpaḥ sanyakṣaḥ svaṃ prāptavān padam // 6.8.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
itīhāvatarantyeva nirāgastvādayonijāḥ / bhūtale kāraṇavaśāddivyā daivatanirmitāḥ // 6.8.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
kulaṃ kiṃ nṛpate te 'syās tasmād bhārya sutasya te / kaliṅgasenāputrīyaṃ yathoktaṃ d aivanirmitā // 6.8.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
yaugandharāyaṇenaivam ukte vatseśvaraś ca tat / devī vāsavadattā ca tatheti hṛdi cakratuḥ // 6.8.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tasmin gṛhaṃ yāte mantrimukhye sa bhūpatiḥ / pānādikrīḍayā ninye sabhāryastaddinaṃ sukhī // 6.8.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato dineṣu gacchatsu mohabhraṣṭasvakasmṛtiḥ / kaliṅgasenātanayā sā samaṃ rūpasaṃpadā // 6.8.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
krameṇa vavṛdhe nāmnā kṛtā madanamañcukā / sutā madanavegasyetyato mātrā janena ca // 6.8.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nūnaṃ sā śiśriye rūpaṃ sarvānyavarayoṣitām / anyathā tāḥ puras tasyā virūpā jajñire katham // 6.8.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutvā rūpavatīṃ tāṃ ca kautukātsvayam ekadā / devi vāsavadattā tāmānināyātmano 'ntikam // 6.8.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra dhātryā mukhāsaktāṃ vatsarājo dadarśa tām / yaugandharāyaṇādyāś ca varterdīpaśikhām iva // 6.8.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvā cādṛṣṭapūrvaṃ tat tasyā netrāmṛtaṃ vapuḥ / ratir evāvatīrṇeyam iti mene na tatra kaḥ // 6.8.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataś cānāyayāṃcakre devyā vāsavadattayā / naravāhanadatto 'tra jagannetrotsavaḥ sutaḥ // 6.8.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'tra phullamukhāmbhoje dīprāṃ madanamañcukām / tām apaśyannavāṃ saurīm iva padmākaraḥ prabhām // 6.8.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpi taṃ locanānandaṃ paśyantī vikacānanā / na tṛptimāyayau bālā cakorīvāmṛtatviṣam // 6.8.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥprabhṛti tau bālāvapi sthātuṃ na śekatuḥ / dṛṣṭipāśairivābaddhau pṛthagbhūtāvapi kṣaṇam // 6.8.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dinairniścitya saṃbandhaṃ devanirmitam eva tu / vivāhavidhaye buddhiṃ vyadhād vatseśvarastayoḥ // 6.8.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaliṅgasenā tad buddhvā nananda ca babandha ca / naravāhanadatte 'smiñ jāmātṛprītito dhṛtim // 6.8.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃmantrya mantribhiḥ sārdhaṃ tataś cākārayatpṛthak / vatsarājaḥ svaputrasya tasya svam iva mandiram // 6.8.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ saṃbhṛtya saṃbhārān putraṃ rājā sa kālavit / yauvarājye 'bhyaṣiñcat taṃ dṛṣṭaślāghyaguṇagraham // 6.8.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pūrvaṃ tasyāpatanmūrdhni pitrorānandabāṣpajam / tataḥ śrautamahāmantrapūtaṃ sattīrthajaṃ payaḥ // 6.8.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhiṣekāmbubhis tasya dhaute vadanapaṅkaje / citraṃ nirmalatāṃ prāpurmukhāni kukuhām api // 6.8.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
maṅgalyāmālyapuṣpeṣu tasya kṣipteṣu mātṛbhiḥ / mumoca divyamālyaughavarṣaṃ dyaur api tatkṣanam // 6.8.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
devadundubhinirhrādaspardhayeva jajṛmbhire / ānandatūryanirghoṣapratiśabdā nabhastale // 6.8.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praṇanāmābhiṣiktaṃ taṃ yuvarājaṃ na tatra kaḥ / svaprabhāvād ṛte tenaivonnanāma tadā hi saḥ // 6.8.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vatseśvaras tasya sūnorbālasakhīnsataḥ / svamantriputrān āhūya sacivatve samādiśat // 6.8.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
yaugandharāyaṇasutaṃ mantritve marubhūtikam / senāpatye hariśikhaṃ rumaṇvattanayaṃ tataḥ // 6.8.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)

paurohitye ca pūrvoktāvubhau piṅgalikāsutau / vaiśvānaraṃ śāntisomaṃ bhrātuḥ putrau purodhasaḥ // 6.8.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
ity ājñapteṣu putrasya sācivye teṣu bhūbhṛtā / gamanādudabhūd vāṇī puṣpavṛṣṭipuraḥsara // 6.8.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sarvārthasādhakā ete bhaviṣyantyasya mantriṇaḥ / śarīrād avibhinno 'sya gomukhastu bhaviṣyati // 6.8.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukto divyayā vācā hṛṣṭo vatseśvaraś ca saḥ / sarvān saṃmānayām āsa vastrair ābharaṇaiś ca tān // 6.8.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anujīviṣu tasmiṃś ca vasu varṣati rājani / daridraśabdasyaikasya nāsīt tatrārthasaṃgatiḥ // 6.8.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
pavanollāsitākṣiptapatākāpaṭapaṅktibhiḥ / āhūtair iva sāpūri nartakīcāraṇaiḥ purī // 6.8.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āgādvaidyādharī sākṣāllakṣmīs tasyaiva bhāvinī / kaliṅgasenājāmātur utsave 'tra bhaviṣyataḥ // 6.8.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tato vāsavadattā ca sā ca padmāvatī tathā / harṣeṇa nanṛtustisro militā iva śaktayaḥ // 6.8.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mārutāndolitalatāḥ pranṛtyanniva sarvataḥ / udānataravo 'py atra cetaneṣu kathaiva kā // 6.8.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ kṛtābhiṣekaḥ sannāruhya jayakuñjaram / naravāhanadattaḥ sa yuvarājo viniryayau // 6.8.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avākīryata cotkṣiptairnetrairnīlasitāruṇaiḥ / paurastrībhiḥ sa nīlābjalājapadmāñjaliprabhaiḥ // 6.8.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvā ca tatpurīpūjyadevatā bandimāgadhaiḥ / stūyamānaḥ sasacivaḥ sa viveśa svamandiram // 6.8.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatra divyāni bhojyāni tathā pānānyupāharat / kaliṅgasenā tasyādau svavibhūtyadhikāni sā // 6.8.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
dadau tasmai suvastrāṇi divyānyābharaṇāni ca / samantrisakhibhṛtyāya jāmātṛsnehakātarā // 6.8.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ mahotsavenāsāvamṛtāsvādasundaraḥ / eṣāṃ vatseśvarādīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ vāsaro yayau // 6.8.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato niśāyāṃ prāptāyāṃ sutodvāhavimarśinī / kaliṅgasenā sasmāra tāṃ sā somaprabhāṃ sakhim // 6.8.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
etayā smṛtamātrāṃ tāṃ mayāsurasutāṃ tadā / bhavyāṃ bhartā mahājñānī jagāda nalakūbaraḥ // 6.8.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaliṅgasenā tvāmadya sotsukā smarati priye / tadgaccha divyamudyānaṃ kuru caitatsutākṛte // 6.8.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā bhāvi bhūtaṃ ca kathayitvā catadgatam / tadaiva preṣayām āsa patnīṃ somaprabhāṃ patiḥ // 6.8.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā cāgatya cirotkaṇṭhākṛtakaṇṭhagrahāṃ sakhīm / kaliṅgasenāṃ kuśalaṃ pṛṣṭvā somaprabhābravīt // 6.8.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
vidyādhareṇa tāvattvaṃ pariṇītā maharddhinā / avatīrṇā ratiste ca sutā śārvādanugrahāt // 6.8.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kāmāvatārasyaiṣā ca vatseśāl labdhajanmanaḥ / naravāhanadattasya pūrvabhāryā vinirmitā // 6.8.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidyādharādhirājyaṃ sa divyaṃ kalpaṃ kariṣyati / tasyaiṣānyāvarodhānāṃ mūrdhni mānyā bhaviṣyati // 6.8.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvaṃ cāvatīrṇā bhūloke śakraśāpacyutāpsaraḥ / niṣpannakāryaśeṣā ca śāpamuktimavāpsyasi // 6.8.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
etan me sarvamākhyātaṃ bhartrā jñānavatā sakhi / tasyāccintā na te kāryā bhāvi sarvaṃ śubhaṃ tava // 6.8.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ ceha karomyeṣā divyaṃ tvattanayākṛte / udyānaṃ nāsti pātāle na bhūmau yanna vā divi // 6.8.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā divyamudyānaṃ sā nirāya svamāyayā / kaliṅgasenām āmantrya sotkāṃ somaprabhā yayau // 6.8.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tato niśi prabhātāyāmakasmānnandanaṃ divaḥ / bhūmāviva cyutaṃ loko dadarśodyānamatra tat // 6.8.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
buddhvāta rājā vatseśaḥ sabhāryaḥ sacivaiḥ saha / naravāhanadattaś ca sānugo 'tra samāyayau // 6.8.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
dadṛśuste tamudyānaṃ sadā puṣpaphaladrumam / nānāmaṇimayastambhabhittibhūbhāgavāpikam // 6.8.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

dṛṣṭvā tadadbhutaṃ rājā kimetad iti pṛṣṭavān / kaliṅgasenām ātithyavyagrāṃ vatseśvarastadā // 6.8.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sā pratyuvāca sarveṣu śṛnvatsu nṛpatiṃ ca tam / viśvakarmāvatāro 'sti mayo nāma mahāsuraḥ // 6.8.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yudhiṣṭhirasya yaś cakre puraṃ ramyaṃ ca vajriṇaḥ / tasya somaprabhā nāma tanayāsti sakhī mama // 6.8.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tayā rātrāvihāgatya matsamīpaṃ svamāyayā / prītyā kṛtamidaṃ divyamudyānaṃ matsutākṛte // 6.8.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā yac ca saskhyāsyā bhūtaṃ bhāvyuditaṃ tayā / tattayaivoktamity uktvā tadā sarvaṃ śaśaṃsa sā // 6.8.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ kaliṅgasenoktiṃ sasaṃvādāmavekṣya tām / nirastasaṃśayāḥ sarve toṣaṃ tatrātulaṃ yayuḥ // 6.8.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaliṅgasenāthithyena nināya divasaṃ ca tam / udyāne 'traiva vatseśo bhāryāputrādibhiḥ saha // 6.8.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyedyurnirgato draṣṭuṃ devaṃ devakule ca saḥ / dadarśa nṛpatirbahnīḥ suvastrābharaṇāḥ striyaḥ // 6.8.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kā yūyamiti pṛṣṭāś ca tena tāstaṃ babhāṣire / vayaṃ vidyāḥ kalāścaitāstvatputrārtham ihāgatāḥ // 6.8.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā viśāma khastāntarity uktvā tāstiro 'bhavan / savismayaḥ sa rājāpi vatseśo 'bhyantaraṃ yayau // 6.8.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra vāsavadattāyai devyai mantrigaṇāya ca / tacchaśaṃsābhyanandaṃste devatānugrahaṃ ca tam // 6.8.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato rājanideśena viṇā vāsavadattayā / naravāhanadatte 'tra praviṣṭe jagṛhe kṣaṇāt // 6.8.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vādayantīṃ tatas tāṃ ca mātaraṃ vinayena saḥ / rājaputro 'bravīdvīṇā cyutā sthānādasāviti // 6.8.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

evaṃ sarvāsu vidyāsu kalāsu ca parīkṣitaḥ / pitrā yāvadvṛtastābhiḥ svayaṃ sarvaṃ viveda saḥ // 6.8.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tataḥ sa sūnor nijavaibhavocitaṃ vivāhasaṃbhāravidhiṃ vyadhān nṛpaḥ / tathā yathāsya svapurī na kevalaṃ pṛthivyapi kṣobhamagāt tadudyamāt // 6.8.249	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
prāpte vivāhadivase 'tha kaliṅgasenā pitrā nisṛṣṭanijadivyavibhūṣaṇāyāḥ / tasyāḥ prasādhanavidhiṃ duhituścakāra somaprabhā patinideśavaśāgatā ca // 6.8.250	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]

yadi yugapad ihendumūrtibhānū kanakagiriṃ bhramato 'bhitaḥ kadācit / bhavati tadupamā tayostadānīṃ jagati vadhūvarayoḥ pradakṣiṇe 'gneḥ // 6.8.256	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4

tvam apy akṣīṇakoṣaśrīrmatprasādādbhaviṣyasi / evaṃ dattavaraṃ vahniṃ brāhmaṇaḥ sa vyajijñapat // 7.1.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āvirbhūto 'si sahasā rājñaḥ svecchāvihāriṇaḥ / na me saniyamasyāpi kimetadbhagavanniti // 7.1.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'gnirvaradaḥ prāha nādāsyaṃ darśanaṃ yadi / ahoṣyadeva svaśirastīvrasatto nṛpo mayi // 7.1.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tīvrasattvasya nacirādbhavantyeva hi siddhayaḥ / mandasattvasya tu cirādbrahmanyuṣmādṛśasya tāḥ // 7.1.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ity uktvāntarhite vahnau nṛpam āmantrya sa dvijaḥ / nāgaśarmā tato gatvā krameṇābhūn mahādhanaḥ // 7.1.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nṛpo 'pi dṛṣṭasattvaḥ sa stūyamāno 'nuyāyibhiḥ / yayau vikramatuṅgaḥ svaṃ puraṃ pāṭaliputrakam // 7.1.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra sthitamakasmāttaṃ praviśya prabhum ekadā / rahaḥ śatruṃjayo nāma pratīhāro vyajijñapat // 7.1.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vijane deva vijñaptiṃ cikīrṣurbrāhmaṇo baṭuḥ / dattaśarmeti nāma svaṃ bruvāṇo dvāri tiṣṭhati // 7.1.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praveśayeti bhūpena tenādiṣṭe praveśitaḥ / svastipūrvaṃ sa rājānaṃ praṇamyopāviśadbaṭuḥ // 7.1.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vyajijñapac ca devāhaṃ cūrṇayuktyā kayācana / sadyaḥ sāhayituṃ jāne tāmrātkanakamuttamam // 7.1.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
guruṇā hy upadiṣṭā sā yuktirmama mayā ca tat / dṛṣṭaṃ sākṣāttayā yukyā saṃsiddhaṃ tasya kāñcanam // 7.1.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukte baṭunā tena tāmramānāyayannṛpaḥ / vilīne ca kṛte tasmin sa baṭuścūrṇamakṣipat // 7.1.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣipyamāṇaṃ ca taccūrṇamadṛśyaḥ ko 'py apāharat / yakṣastaṃ ca dadarśaikaḥ sa rājā tuṣṭapāvakaḥ // 7.1.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aprāptacūrṇaṃ tāmraṃ ca na suvarṇībabhūva tat / evaṃ triḥ kurvatas tasya baṭormoghaḥ śramo 'bhavat // 7.1.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

tasya tannāharaccūrṇaṃ yakṣaḥ smitvā yayau tu saḥ / tena taccūrṇasaṃyogāt tāmraṃ kanakatām agāt // 7.1.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vismitāya tatas tasmai baṭave paripṛcchate / sa rājā yakṣavṛttāntaṃ yathādṛṣṭaṃ śaśaṃsa tam // 7.1.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śikṣitvā cūrṇayuktiṃ ca baṭostasmāttadaiva tām / nṛpaścakre kṛtārthaṃ taṃ kṛtadāraparigraham // 7.1.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bheje ca pūrṇakoṣaśrīr hemnā tadyuktijanmanā / sāvarodho 'samān bhogān adaridrīkṛtadvijaḥ // 7.1.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tvattaś ca dhīrasattvo 'nyaḥ ko 'sti dātā ca deva tat / dāsyatyārādhitaḥ śaṃbhuḥ putraṃ te mā śucaṃ kṛthāḥ // 7.1.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity udāramalaṃkāraprabhādevīmukhādvacaḥ / śrutvā hemaprabho rājā śraddadhe ca tutoṣa ca // 7.1.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mene ca tanayaprāptiṃ gaurīśārādhanāddhruvam / sūcitāṃ hṛdayenaiva nijenotsāhaśālinā // 7.1.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'nyedyuḥ sadevīkaḥ snāto 'bhyarcitaśaṃkaraḥ / navakāñcanakoṭīś ca viprebhyaḥ pratipādya saḥ // 7.1.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

namaste satatotphullahṛtkuśeśayaśāyine / viśuddhamānasāvāsakalahaṃsāya śaṃbhave // 7.1.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

evaṃ kṛtastutiṃ taṃ ca rājānaṃ girijāpatiḥ / trirātropoṣitaṃ svapne sākṣādbhūyedam abravīt // 7.1.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttiṣṭha rājan bhāvī te vīro vaṃśadharaḥ sutaḥ / gaurīprasādā tkanyāpi bhaviṣyatyuttamā tava // 7.1.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
naravāhanadattasya yuṣmākaṃ cakravartinaḥ / bhaviṣyato bhavitrī yā mahiṣī mahasāṃ nidheḥ // 7.1.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvāntarhite śarve so 'tha vidyādhareśvaraḥ / hemaprabhaḥ prabubudhe prahṛṣṭo rajanīkṣaye // 7.1.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ānandayad alaṃkāraprabhāṃ svapnaṃ nivedya saḥ / gauryā svapne tathaivoktāṃ bhāryāṃ saṃvādaśaṃsinīm // 7.1.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
utthāya ca tataḥ snātaḥ sa rājārcitadhūrjaṭiḥ / cakāra dattadānaḥ sannutsavaṃ kṛtapāraṇaḥ // 7.1.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
divaseṣv atha yāteṣu devī katipayeṣu sā / alaṃkāraprabhā tasya rājño garbhamadhārayat // 7.1.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

yena jātena sahajaistejobhiravabhāsitam / sindūrāruṇatāṃ nītam api tajjātavāsakam // 7.1.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

tataḥ sa vavṛdhe bālaḥ pārvaṇendur iva kramāt / kalābhiḥ pūryamāṇaḥ sanvṛddhihetoḥ kulāmbudheḥ // 7.1.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athācirātpunas tasya rājño hemaprabhasya sā / alaṃkāraprabhā rājñī sagarbhā samapadyata // 7.1.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

ekadā so 'ntikāsīnāṃ pradeyāṃ vīkṣya tāṃ sutām / rājābravīdalaṃkāraprabhāṃ devīṃ samīpagām // 7.1.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

prātaḥ śubhaṃ dinaṃ putri tatsa vatseśvarātmajaḥ / draṣṭavyaḥ svavaro gatvā kauśāmbīṃ nagarīṃ tvayā // 7.1.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataśva svapure 'muṣminnānīya tvatpitā svayam / tava tasya ca kalyāṇi vivāhaṃ saṃvidhāsyati // 7.1.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti svapne 'tha taṃ gaurī sānukampā samādiśat / prabudhya sā ca taṃ svapnaṃ prātarmātre nyavedayat // 7.1.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sā tadanujñātā buddhvā vidyāprabhāvataḥ / udyānasthaṃ varaṃ draṣṭuṃ prāvartata nijātpurāt // 7.1.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāmāryaputra māmetāṃ vettha ratnaprabhāmiti / prāptāmutkāṃ kṣaṇenādya vittha yūyamataḥ param // 7.1.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

evaṃ vatseśamabhyarthya tenānumatavāñchitaḥ / saputraḥ kalpayitvā tadvimānaṃ nijavidyayā // 7.1.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāropya trapānamramukhaṃ ratnaprabhāyutam / naravāhanadattaṃ taṃ sahitaṃ gomukhādibiḥ // 7.1.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

reme ca divyānyudyānavāpīdevakulāni saḥ / paśyaṃstayā samāruhya tadvidyābalato nabhaḥ // 7.1.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ ca tatra katiciddivasānuṣitvā vidyādharādhipapure sa vadhūsahāyaḥ / vatseśvarasya tanayaḥ svapurīṃ prayātuṃ yaugandharāyaṇamatena matiṃ cakāra // 7.1.159	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
śvaśrvā tato racitamaṅgalasaṃvidhānaḥ saṃpūjitaḥ sasacivaḥ śvaśureṇa bhūyaḥ / tenaiva putrasahitena saha pratasthe kāntāsakhastadadhiruhya punarvimānam // 7.1.160	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
prāpyāśu tāṃ pramadanirbhara vatsarāja baddhotsavāṃ sa jananīnayanāmṛtaughaḥ / ratnaprabhāṃ dadhad atha svapurīṃ viveśa hemaprabheṇa sasutena sahānugaiśca // 7.1.161	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
vatseśvaro 'pi saha vāsavadattayā taṃ pādānataṃ samabhinandya sutaṃ vadhūṃ ca / hemaprabhaṃ satanayaṃ vibhavānurūpaṃ saṃbandhinaṃ navamapūjayadūrjitaśrīḥ // 7.1.162	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
atha vidyādhararāje tasminn āpṛcchya vatsarājādīn / utpatya nabhaḥ sasute gatavati hemaprabhe svapuram // 7.1.163	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
naravāhanadatto 'sau ratnaprabhayā samadanamañcukayā / saha sukhitas tadanaiṣīd divasaṃ sakhibhir nijair yuktaḥ // 7.1.164	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
evaṃ vidyādharīṃ bhāryāṃ bhavyāṃ ratnaprabhāṃ navām / tasya prāptavato 'nyedyustadveśmani tayā saha // 7.2.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
naravāhanadattasya sthitasya prātarāyayuḥ / darśanārthamupadvāraṃ sacivā gomukhādayaḥ // 7.2.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dvāḥsthayā kṣaṇaruddheṣu teṣv atrāvediteṣv atha / praviṣṭeṣv ādṛteṣv etāṃ dvāḥsthāṃ ratnaprabhābhyadhāt // 7.2.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dvārameṣāṃ na roddhavyam iha praviśatāṃ punaḥ / āryaputravayasyānāṃ svaṃ śarīramamī hi naḥ // 7.2.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rakṣā cāntaḥpureṣvīdṛṅnaivametan mataṃ mama / iti dvāḥsthāmuditvā sā svapatiṃ tamathābravīt // 7.2.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āryaputra prasaṅgena vadāmi tava tac chṛṇu / nītimātramahaṃ manye strīṇāṃ rakṣāniyantraṇam // 7.2.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
īrṣyākṛto 'thavā mohaḥ kāryaṃ tena na kiṃcana / mahattareṇa rakṣyante śīlenaiva kulastriyaḥ // 7.2.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dhātāpi na prabhuḥ prāyaścapalānāṃ tu rakṣaṇe / mattā nadī ca nārī ca niyantuṃ kena pāryate // 7.2.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathā ca śrūyatām atra kathāṃ vaḥ kathayāmy aham / astīha ratnakūṭākhyaṃ dvīpaṃ madhye 'mbudhermahat // 7.2.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra rājā mahotsāhaḥ purā paramavaiṣṇavaḥ / yathārthenābhidhānena ratnādhipatirityabhūt // 7.2.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa rājā vijayaṃ pṛthvyāḥ sarvarājātmajāstathā / bhāryāḥ prāptuṃ tapastepe viṣṇorārādhanaṃ mahat // 7.2.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃtuṣṭas tapasā sākṣādbhagavānādideśa tam / uttiṣṭha rājaṃs tuṣṭo 'smi tadidaṃ vacmi te śṛṇu // 7.2.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kaliṅgaviṣaye ko'pi gandharvo muniśāpataḥ / samutpanno gajaḥ śvetaḥ śvetaraśmiriti śrutaḥ // 7.2.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pūrvajanmatapaḥ siddhiyogānmadbhaktitastathā / jñānī gaganagāmī ca gajo jātismaraś ca saḥ // 7.2.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dattādeśo mayā svapne sa ca hastī mahāṃstava / etya svayaṃ dyumārgeṇa vāhanatvaṃ prapatsyate // 7.2.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tamāruhya gajaṃ śvetaṃ surebham iva vajrabhṛt / vyomamārgeṇa yaṃ yaṃ tvaṃ rājānamabhiyāsyasi // 7.2.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa sa divyānubhāvāya bhītastubhyaṃ pradāsyati / svapne may aiva dattājñaḥ kanyādānanibhātkaram // 7.2.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ vijeṣyase kṛtsnāṃ pṛthvīmantaḥpurāṇi ca / rājaputrīsahasrāṇi tvamaśītimavāpyasi // 7.2.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvāntarhite viṣṇau sa rājā kṛtapāraṇaḥ / anyedyurāgataṃ vyomnā taṃ dadarśa gajaṃ śubham // 7.2.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āruhyopanataṃ taṃ ca yathādiṣṭaḥ sa viṣṇunā / tathā vijitya pṛthivīmājahre rājakanyakāḥ // 7.2.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
sahasrāśītisaṃkhyābhistatas tābhiḥ samaṃ ca saḥ / uvāsa rātnakūṭe 'tra yathecchaṃ viharannṛpaḥ // 7.2.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śāntyarthaṃ śītaraśmeś ca tasya divyasya dantinaḥ / pratyahaṃ bhojayām āsa viprāṇāṃ śatapañcakam // 7.2.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kadācic ca tamāruhya paribhramya sa bhūpatiḥ / dvīpāntarāṇi svaṃ dvīpaṃ ratnādhipatirāyayau // 7.2.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatrāvataratas tasya gaganāt tu gajottamam / cañcvā tārkṣyodbhavaḥ pakṣī mūrdhnī daivād atāḍayat // 7.2.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca pakṣī pradudrāva rājñā tīkṣṇāṅkuśāhataḥ / hastī tu bhūmāv apatac cañcvāghātena mūrcchitaḥ // 7.2.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
nṛpe 'vatīrṇe sa gajo labhasaṃjño 'pi nāśakat / utthāpyamāno 'py utthātuṃ nirastakavalagrahaḥ // 7.2.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
pañcāhāni tathaivāsminvāraṇe patitasthite / duḥkhitaḥ sa nirāhāro rājā cāpy evam abravīt // 7.2.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bho lokapālā vrūtāsminnupāyaṃ saṃkaṭe mama / anyathopahariṣyāmi chittvāhaṃ svaśiro 'dya vaḥ // 7.2.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvaivāttakhaḍgaṃ taṃ svaśiraśchettumudyatam / aśarīrā jagādaivaṃ vāṇī tatkṣaṇamambarāt // 7.2.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mā sāhasaṃ kṛthā rājansādhvī kācitkaroti cet / hastasparśaṃ gajasyāsya taduttiṣṭhati nānyathā // 7.2.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvaivāmṛtalatāṃ nāma hṛṣṭaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ / mukhyāmānāyayām āsa nijāṃ devīṃ surakṣitām // 7.2.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tayā spṛṣṭaḥ sa hastena nodatiṣṭhadgajo yadā / tadā so 'nyā nijāḥ sarvā devīrānāyayannṛpaḥ // 7.2.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tābhiḥ kṛtakarasparśaḥ samastābhir api sphuṭam / dṛṣṭvā vilajjitānyeva sa rājā janasaṃnidhau // 7.2.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antaḥpurasahastrāṇi tām āśītim api sphuṭam / dṛṣṭvā vilajjitānyeva sa rājā janasaṃnidhau // 7.2.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vilakṣaḥ svapurāttasmādānāyya nikhilāḥ striyaḥ / krameṇa hastinas tasya hastasparśamakārayat // 7.2.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathāpi yatsa nottasthau gajendrastatsa bhūpatiḥ / kaṣṭaṃ pure me sādhvī strī naikāpīti trapāṃ yayau // 7.2.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tāvac ca harṣaguptākhyās tāmraliptyāḥ samāgataḥ / vaṇik tatrāyayau buddhvā vṛttāntaṃ taṃ sakautukaḥ // 7.2.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya karmakarī paścādājagāma pativratā / ekā śīlavatī nāma sā tad dṛṣṭvā tam abravīt // 7.2.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
spṛśāmy ahaṃ kareṇaitaṃ svabhartuścāparo mayā / manasāpi na ceddhyātastaduttiṣṭhatvayaṃ dvipaḥ // 7.2.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvopetya hastena sā ca pasparśa taṃ jagam / udatiṣṭhatsa ca svasthaḥ kavalaṃ ca tato 'grahīt // 7.2.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
imās tā viralāḥ sādhvyaḥ kāścideveśvaropamāḥ / sargapālanasaṃhārasamarthā jagato 'sya yāḥ // 7.2.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti śīlavatīṃ tatra kṛtakolāhalo janaḥ / tāṃ tuṣṭāva tadā dṛṣṭvā śvetaraśmiṃ tamutthitam // 7.2.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājāpi ratnādhipatiḥ parituṣyābhinandya tām / so 'pūrayadasaṃkhyātai ratnaiḥ śīlavatīṃ satīm // 7.2.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatsvāminaṃ ca vaṇijaṃ harṣaguptaṃ tathaiva tam / apūjayaddadau cāsya gṛhaṃ rājagṛhāntike // 7.2.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
parivarjitasaṃsparśā nijabhāryāstathaiva saḥ / piṇḍācchādanamātraikabhāginīrakarot tataḥ // 7.2.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athānāyya kṛtāhāro harṣaguptasya saṃnidhau / sādhvīṃ śīlavatīṃ tāṃ sa jagāda vijane nṛpaḥ // 7.2.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śīlavaty asti te kācitkanyā pitṛkulād iti / tāṃ me dāpaya jāne hi sāpi syāttvādṛśī dhruvam // 7.2.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktā tena sā rājñā śīlavatyabravīttadā / rājadatteti nāmnāsti tāmraliptyāṃ svasā mama // 7.2.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upayacchasva tāṃ deva ślāghyarūpāṃ yadīcchasi / ity uktaḥ sa tayā rājñā pratipede tatheti tat // 7.2.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
niścitya ca tadanyedyuḥ śīlavatyā tayā saha / tenāpi harṣaguptena tamāruhya svagāminam // 7.2.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śvetaraśmiṃ svayaṃ gatvā tāmraliptīṃ sa bhūpatiḥ / viveśa harṣaguptasya vaṇijas tasya mandiram // 7.2.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra papraccha tadaharlagnaṃ śīlavatīsvasuḥ / vivāhe rājadattāyā gaṇakānātmanastathā // 7.2.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
gaṇakāścobhayoḥ pṛṣṭvā nakṣatrāṇyevam abruvan / lagno vāṃ śobhano rājannasti māseṣvitastriṣu // 7.2.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adya vā vidyate yādṛktenaiṣā cedvivāhyate / rājadattā tato 'vaśyam asādhvī bhavati prabho // 7.2.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gaṇakair evam ukto 'pi kamanīyavadhūtsukaḥ / ekākī ciramasthāsnuḥ sa rājā samacintayat // 7.2.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alaṃ vicāreṇādyaiva rājadattām ihodvahe / śīlavatyāḥ svasā hy eṣā nirdarpā nāsatī bhavet // 7.2.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
yattatsamudramadhye 'sti dvīpakhaṇḍamamānuṣam / ekaśūnyacatuḥśālaṃ tatraitāṃ sthāpayāmi ca // 7.2.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
durgame 'tra parīvāraṃ strīrevāsyāḥ karomi ca / puruṣādarśanādevam asatī syādiyaṃ katham // 7.2.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti niścitya tadahaḥ pariṇinye sa bhūpatiḥ / tāṃ rājadattāṃ sahasā śīlavatya samarpitām // 7.2.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
kṛtodvāhaḥ kṛtācāro harṣaguptena tāṃ vadhūm / ādāya tenaiva samaṃ śīlavatyā tayā ca saḥ // 7.2.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
śvetaraśmiṃ tamāruhya kṣaṇena nabhasā nijam / mārgonmukhajanaṃ dvīpaṃ ratnakūṭaṃ tadāyayau // 7.2.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃvibheje ca tāṃ bhūyastathā śīlavatīṃ yathā / prāptasādhvīvrataphalā kṛtārthā samapādi sā // 7.2.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatas tatraiva kariṇi śvetaraśmau nabhaścare / āropya tāṃ navavadhūṃ rājadattāṃ sa cintite // 7.2.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
nītvā tatrābdhimadhyasthe dvīpe mānuṣadurgame / āsthāpayaccatuḥśāle nārīmayaparicchadām // 7.2.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yadyadvastūpayuktaṃ ca tasyāstattadaviśvasan / vyomnaiva prāpayām āsa tatra tena gajena saḥ // 7.2.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svayaṃ tadanuraktaś ca tatraivāsīt sadā niśi / āyayau rājakāyārthaṃ ratnakūṭaṃ divā punaḥ // 7.2.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā sa tayā sākaṃ pratyūṣe rājadattayā / rājā pratighnan duḥsvapnaṃ siṣeve pānamaṅgalam // 7.2.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tena mattām amuñcantīm api muktvā sa tāṃ yayau / ratnakūṭaṃ svakāryārthaṃ nityasnigdhā hi rājatā // 7.2.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tasthau saśaṅkena kurvan kāryāṇi cetasā / kṣībā kim ekakā muktā sā tvayetīva śaṃsatā // 7.2.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca rājadattā sā sthāne tatrātidurgame / mahānasādivyagrāsu dāsīṣvekākinī sthitā // 7.2.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
dvāre vidhimivānyaṃ tattadrakṣāvijigīṣayā / āgataṃ puruṣaṃ kaṃciddadarśāścaryadāyakam // 7.2.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kastvaṃ kathamidaṃ sthānamagamyaṃ cāgato bhavān / iti taṃ cāntikaprāptaṃ kṣībā papraccha sā kila // 7.2.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa dṛṣṭabahulakleśastāṃ puruṣo 'bravīt / mugdhe pavanasenākhyo vaṇikputro 'smi māthuraḥ // 7.2.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

tatrāṅgīkṛtya bhūpasya bhāgaṃ saṃvatsarāvadhi / khāte khanan kṣitiṃ ratnaṃ naikam apy asmi labdhavān // 7.2.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nandatsu labdharatneṣu madvidheṣv apareṣu ca / gatvābdhitīre duḥkhārtaḥ kāṣṭhānyahamupāharam // 7.2.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
agnipraveśāya citāṃ yāvattatra karomi taiḥ / jīvadattābhidhastāvatko 'py atra vaṇigāyayau // 7.2.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
nivārya maraṇāttena dattvā vṛttiṃ dayālunā / gṛhīto 'haṃ pravahaṇe svarṇadvīpaṃ yiyāsatā // 7.2.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tato 'kasmātpravahaṇenābdhimadhyena gacchatām / pañcasvahaḥsu yāteṣu megho 'kasmādadṛśyata // 7.2.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
pravṛṣṭe sthūladhārābhirmeghe 'smin mārutena tat / aghūrṇata pravahaṇaṃ mattahastiśiro yathā // 7.2.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
kṣaṇānnimajjya bhagne 'smin yānapātre vidhervaśāt / ekaḥ phalahakaḥ prāptastatkālaṃ majjatā mayā // 7.2.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadārūḍhas tataḥ śānte meghāṭope vidhervaśāt / imaṃ pradeśaṃ prāyāhamuttīrṇaḥ sāṃprataṃ vane // 7.2.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
vīkṣya cedaṃ catuḥśālaṃ praviśyābhyantaraṃ mayā / dṛṣṭā dṛṣṭisudhāvṛṣṭistvaṃ tāpaśamanī śubhe // 7.2.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavantaṃ paryaṅke niveśyaivāliliṅga tam / mohitā rājadattā sā madena madanena ca // 7.2.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
strītvaṃ kṣībatvam ekāntaḥ puṃso lābho 'niyantraṇā / yatra pañcāgnayas tatra vārtā śīlatṛṇasya kā // 7.2.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na caivaṃ kṣamate nārī vicāraṃ māramohita / yadiyaṃ cakame rājñī tamakāmyaṃ vipadgatam // 7.2.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca ratnādhipatiḥ sa rājā ratnakūṭataḥ / ājagāmotsukastūrṇaṃ dyucaradvipavāhanaḥ // 7.2.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
praviśaṃś cātra so 'paśyattādṛśenāpi tena tām / puruṣeṇa samaṃ bhāryāṃ rājadattāṃ ratisthitām // 7.2.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

jitaṃ śaktyā śivasyāpi viśvaiśvaryakṛtā tvayā / tvadanuprāṇitaṃ cedaṃ ceṣṭate bhuvanatrayam // 7.3.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
paritrātāstvayā lokā mahiṣāsurasūdini / paritrāyasva māṃ bhaktavatsale śaraṇāgatam // 7.3.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ādi samyag devīṃ tāṃ stutvā sahacaraiḥ saha / so 'tha niścayadatto 'tra śrānto nidrāmagāddrutam // 7.3.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttiṣṭhata sutā yāta vigataṃ bandhanaṃ hi vaḥ / ity ādideśa sā svapne devī taṃ cāparāṃś ca tān // 7.3.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prabudhya ca tadā rātrau dṛṣṭvā bandhānsvataścyutān / anyonyaṃ svapnam ākhyāya hṛṣṭās te niryayus tataḥ // 7.3.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā dūramathādhvānaṃ kṣīṇāyāṃ niśi te 'pare / ūcurniścayadattaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭatrāsā vaṇiksutāḥ // 7.3.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āstāṃ bahumlecchatayā digeṣā dakṣiṇāpatham / vayaṃ yāmaḥ sakhe tvaṃ tu yathābhimatamācara // 7.3.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktastairanujñāya yatheṣṭāgamanāya tān / ucīcīm eva tāmāśāmavalambya punaś ca saḥ // 7.3.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
eko niścayadatto 'tha pratasthe prasabhaṃ pathi / anurāgaparāpremapāśakṛṣṭo nirastadhīḥ // 7.3.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
krameṇa gacchanmilitaḥ sa mahāvratikaiḥ saha / caturbhiḥ prāpya saritaṃ vitastāmuttatāra saḥ // 7.3.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
uttīrya ca kṛtāhāraḥ sūrye 'stācalacumbini / viveśa tair eva samaṃ vanaṃ mārgavaśāgatam // 7.3.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tatra cāgrāgatāḥ kecittamūcuḥ kāṣṭhabhārikāḥ / kva gacchatha dine yāte grāmaḥ ko 'py asti nāgrataḥ // 7.3.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekastu vipine 'muṣminnasti śūnyaḥ śivālayaḥ / tatra tiṣṭhati yo rātrāvantarvā bahir eva vā // 7.3.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ śṛṅgotpādinī nāma śṛṅgotpādanapūrvakam / mohayitvā paśūkṛtya bhakṣayatyeva yakṣiṇī // 7.3.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvāpi sāvajñāste mahāvratinastadā / ūcurniścayadattaṃ te catvāraḥ sahayāyinaḥ // 7.3.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ehi kiṃ kurute 'smākaṃ varākī sātra yakṣiṇī / teṣu teṣu śmaśāneṣu niśāsu hi vayaṃ sthitāḥ // 7.3.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavadbhis taiḥ sākaṃ gatvā prāpya śivālayam / śūnyaṃ niścayadattastāṃ rātriṃ netuṃ viveśa saḥ // 7.3.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāṅgaṇe vidhāyāśu bhasmanā maṇḍalaṃ mahat / praviśya cāntare tasya prajvālyāgniṃ sahendhanaiḥ // 7.3.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dhīro niścayadattaḥ sa te mahāvratinastathā / manttraṃ japanto rakṣārthaṃ sarva evāvatasthire // 7.3.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
athāyayau vādayantī dūrātkaṅkālakiṃnarīm / nṛtyantī yakṣiṇī tatra sā śṛṅgotpādinī niśi // 7.3.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
etya teṣu caturṣvekaṃ sā mahāvratinaṃ prati / dattadṛṅmanttramapaṭhatsanṛttaṃ maṇḍalādvahiḥ // 7.3.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tena mantreṇa saṃjātaśṛṅgo mohita utthitaḥ / nṛtyaṃstasmiñjvalatyagnau sa mahāvratiko 'patat // 7.3.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
patitaṃ cārdhadagdhaṃ tamākṛṣyaivāgnimadhyataḥ / sā śṛṅgotpādinī hṛṣṭā bhakṣayām āsa yakṣiṇī // 7.3.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato dvitīye vratini nyastadṛṣṭistathaiva sā / taṃ śṛṅgotpādanaṃ mantraṃ papāṭha ca nanarta ca // 7.3.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi dvitīyas tanmantrajātaśṛṅgaḥ pranartitaḥ / patito 'gnau tayākṛṣya paśyatsvanyeṣv abhakṣyata // 7.3.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ krameṇa saṃmohya tānmahāvratino niśi / tayābhakṣyanta yakṣiṇyā catvāro 'pi saśṛṅgakāḥ // 7.3.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
caturthaṃ bhakṣayantyā ca tayā māṃsāsramattayā / svayaṃ kiṃnarikātodyaṃ daivādbhūmau nyadhīyata // 7.3.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca kṣipram utthāya tadgṛhītvaiva vādayan / dhīro niścayadatto 'pi pranṛtyan vihasan bhraman // 7.3.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ śṛṅgotpādanaṃ mantramasakṛcchrutaśikṣitam / pāpaṭhyate sma yakṣiṇyās tasyā nyastekṣaṇo mukhe // 7.3.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatprayogaprabhāveṇa vivaśā mṛtyuśaṅkinī / utthātukāmaśṛṅgī sā prahvā taṃ prāha yakṣiṇī // 7.3.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mā vadhīstvaṃ mahāsattva striyaṃ māṃ kṛpaṇāmimām / idānīṃ śaraṇaṃ tvaṃ me mantrapāṭhādi saṃhara // 7.3.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rakṣa māṃ vedmy ahaṃ sarvamīpsitaṃ sādhayāmi te / anurāgaparā yatra tatra tvaṃ prāpayāmy aham // 7.3.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti saprayayaṃ proktastayā dhīrastatheti saḥ / cakre niścayadatto 'tra mantrapāṭhādisaṃhṛtim // 7.3.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa tasyā yakṣiṇyāḥ skandhamāruhya tadgirā / nīyamānastayā vyomnā pratasthe tāṃ priyāṃ prati // 7.3.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
prabhātāyāṃ ca rajanau prāpyaikaṃ girikānanam / namrā niścayadattaṃ taṃ kuhyakī sā vyajijñapat // 7.3.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sūryodaye 'dhunā gantuṃ śaktir nāsi mamopari / tad asmin kānane kānte gamayedaṃ dinaṃ prabho // 7.3.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
phalāni bhuṅkṣva svādūni nirjharāmbhaḥ śubhaṃ piba / ahaṃ yāmi nijaṃ sthānameṣyāmi ca niśāgame // 7.3.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
neṣyāmi ca tadaiva tvāmanurāgaparāntikam / maulimālāṃ himagirernagarīṃ puṣkarāvatīm // 7.3.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ity uktvā tadanujñātā skandhāttatrāvatārya tam / yakṣiṇī punarāgantuṃ satyasaṃdhā jagāma sā // 7.3.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato niścayadatto 'syāṃ gatāyāmaikṣatātra saḥ / agādhamantaḥ saviṣaṃ svacchaśītaṃ bahiḥ saraḥ // 7.3.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
rāginstrīcittametādṛgityarkeṇa nidarśanam / prasāritakareṇeva prakaṭīkṛtya darśitam // 7.3.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tadviṣāktaṃ gandhena buddhvā mānuṣakṛtyataḥ / tyaktvāmbhorthī tṛṣārtaḥ sandivye tatrābhramadgirau // 7.3.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhramannunnatabhūbhāge padmarāgamaṇī iva / sphurantau dvāv apaśyac ca bhuvaṃ tāṃ nicakhāna ca // 7.3.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apāstamṛttikaścāsya jīvato markaṭasya saḥ / śiro dadarśa te cāsya padmarāgāvivākṣiṇī // 7.3.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vismayate yāvatkimetad iti cintayan / tāvanmanuṣyavācāsau markaṭastam abhāṣata // 7.3.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mānuṣo markaṭībhūto vipro 'haṃ māṃ samuddhara / kathayiṣyāmi te sādho svavṛttāntaṃ tato 'khilam // 7.3.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvaiva sāścaryo mṛttikāmapanīya saḥ / bhūmerniścayadattastamujjahārātha markaṭam // 7.3.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uddhṛtaḥ pādapatitastaṃ bhūyo 'pi sa markaṭaḥ / uvāca dattāḥ prāṇā me kṛcchrāduddharatā tvayā // 7.3.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tad ehi yāvac chrāntas tvam upayuṅkṣva phalāmbunī / tvatprasādādahaṃ cāpi kariṣye pāraṇaṃ cirāt // 7.3.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā tamanaiṣītsa dūraṃ girinadītaṭam / kapiḥ svādhīnasusvāduphalasacchāyapādapam // 7.3.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra snātvopabhuktāmbuphalaḥ sa kṛtapāraṇam / kapiṃ niścayadattastaṃ pratyāgatya tato 'bravīt // 7.3.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kathaṃ tvaṃ markaṭībhūto mānuṣo 'py ucyatāmiti / tataḥ sa markaṭo 'vādīcchṛṇvidānīṃ vadāmyadaḥ // 7.3.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
candrasvāmīti nāmnāsti vārāṇasyāṃ dvijottamaḥ / tasya patnyāṃ suvṛttāyāṃ jāto 'smyeṣa sutaḥ sakhe // 7.3.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
somasvāmīti pitrā ca kṛtanāmā kramādaham / ārūḍho madanavyālagajaṃ madaniraṅkuśam // 7.3.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ māṃ kadācidadrākṣīddūrādvātāyanāgragā / śrīgarbhākhyasya vaṇijastatpurīvāsinaḥ sutā // 7.3.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
taruṇī bandhudattākhyā māthurasya vaṇikpateḥ / bhāryā varāhadattasya piturveśmanyavasthitā // 7.3.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā madālokasaṃjātamanmathānviṣya nāma me / vayasyāṃ prāhiṇodāptāṃ mahyaṃ matsaṃgamārthinī // 7.3.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā tadvayasyā kāmāndhāmupagamya janāntikam / ākhyātatadabhiprāyā māmanaiṣīnnijaṃ gṛham // 7.3.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra māṃ sthāpayitvā ca gatvā guptaṃ tadaiva sā / tāṃ bandhudattām ānaiṣīd autsukyāgaṇitatrapām // 7.3.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ānītaiva ca sā me 'tra kaṇṭhāśleṣam upāgamat / ekavīro hi nārīṇāmatibhūmiṃ gataḥ smaraḥ // 7.3.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ dine dine svairam āgatyātra piturgṛhāt / araṃsta bandhudattā sā mayā saha sakhīgṛhe // 7.3.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā tāṃ nijagṛhaṃ netuṃ tatra cirasthitām / āgataḥ sa patis tasyā mathurāto mahāvaṇik // 7.3.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ pitrābhyanujñātā patyā tena ninīṣitā / rahasyajñāṃ dvitīyāṃ sā bandhudattābravītsakhīm // 7.3.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
niścitaṃ sakhi netavyā bhartrāhaṃ mathurāṃ purīm / na ca jīvāmy ahaṃ tatra somasvāmivinākṛtā // 7.3.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadatra ko 'bhyupāyo me kathayetyuditā tayā / sakhī sukhaśayā nāma yoginī tāṃ jagāda sā // 7.3.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dvau sto mantraprayogau me yayorekena sūtrake / kaṇṭhabaddhe jhagityeva mānuṣo markaṭo bhavet // 7.3.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dvitīyena ca mukte 'smin sūtrake saiṣa mānuṣaḥ / punarbhavetkapitve ca nāsya prajñā vilupyate // 7.3.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadyadīcchati suśroṇi somasvāmī priyaḥ sa te / tadetaṃ markaṭaśiśuṃ saṃpratyeva karomy aham // 7.3.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tataḥ krīḍānibhādetaṃ gṛhītvā mathurāṃ vraja / mantrayuktidvayaṃ caitad bhavatīṃ śikṣayāmy aham // 7.3.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃvidhāsyasi yenainaṃ pārśvasthaṃ markaṭākṛtim / rahaḥsthāne ca puruṣaṃ priyaṃ saṃpādayiṣyasi // 7.3.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
evam uktā tayā sakhyā bandhudattā tathaiva sā / rahasyānāyya sasnehaṃ tadarthaṃ māmabodhayat // 7.3.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtānujñaṃ ca māṃ baddhamantrasūtraṃ gale kṣaṇāt / tatsakhī sā sukhaśayā vyadhānmarkaṭapotakam // 7.3.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tadrūpeṇa svabhartre sā bandhudattopanīya mām / sakhyā mahyaṃ vinodāya datto 'sāv ity adarśayat // 7.3.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atuṣyatsa ca māṃ dṛṣṭvā krīḍanīyaṃ tadaṅkagam / ahaṃ ca kapirevāsaṃ prājño 'pi vyaktavāgapi // 7.3.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho strīcaritaṃ citramityantaś ca hasannapi / tathātiṣṭhamahaṃ ko hi kāmena na viḍambyate // 7.3.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sakhyā śikṣitatanmantrā bandhudattāhnyathāpare / mathurāṃ prati sā prāyādbhartrā saha piturgṛhāt // 7.3.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
māṃ cāpy ekasya bhṛtyasya skandhamāropayattadā / sa bhartā bandhudattāyāḥ pathi tatpriyakāmyayā // 7.3.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vayaṃ te sarve 'pi yānto madhye pathi sthitam / dinairdvitrair vanaṃ prāptā bahumarkaṭabhīṣaṇam // 7.3.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'bhyadhāvan dṛṣṭvā māṃ markaṭā gaṇaśo 'bhitaḥ / kṣiptaṃ kilakilārāvairāhvayantaḥ parasparam // 7.3.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
āgatya khādituṃ te ca prārabhanta plavaṃgamāḥ / durvārāstaṃ vaṇigbhṛtyaṃ yasya skandhe 'hamāsitaḥ // 7.3.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tena vihvalaḥ skandhāttyaktvaiva bhuvi māṃ bhayāt / palāyito 'bhūd atha mām agṛhṇaṃs te 'tra markaṭāḥ // 7.3.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
matsnehād bandhudattā ca tadbhartā tasya cānugāḥ / pāṣāṇair laguḍair ghnanto jetuṃ tān nāśakan kapīn // 7.3.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas te markaṭā mūḍhasyāṅge 'ṅge loma loma me / nakhair vyalumpan dantaiś ca kukarmakupitā iva // 7.3.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kaṇṭhasūtrasya māhātmyācchaṃbhoś ca smaraṇāt tataḥ / ahaṃ labdhabalastebhyo bandhamunmucya vidrutaḥ // 7.3.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praviśya gahane teṣāṃ vyatīto dṛṣṭigocarāt / kramādvanādvanaṃ gacchannidaṃ prāpto 'smi kānanam // 7.3.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhraṣṭasya bandhudattāyā janmanyatraiva te katham / markaṭatvaphalo jātaḥ paradārasamāgamaḥ // 7.3.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti duḥkhatamondhasya bhramataḥ prāvṛṣīha me / duḥkhāntaram api prattamasaṃtuṣṭena vedhasa // 7.3.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yanmāmakasmād āgatya karākrāntaṃ kareṇukā / meghāmbhaḥplutavalmīkakardamāntarnyaveśayat // 7.3.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhavitavyaniyuktā ca jāne sā kāpi devatā / yadyatnānnāśakaṃ tasmātpaṅkāccalitum apy alam // 7.3.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āśvāsyamāne caitasmin na mṛto 'smi na kevalam / yāvajjñānaṃ mamotpannamaniśaṃ dhyāyato haram // 7.3.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvatkālaṃ ca naivāsītkṣuttṛṣṇā ca sakhe mama / yāvadadyoddhṛtaḥ śuṣkapaṅkakūṭādahaṃ tvayā // 7.3.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jñāne prāpte 'pi śaktirme tāvatī naiva vidyate / mocayeyaṃ yayātmānamito markaṭabhāvataḥ // 7.3.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṇṭhasūtraṃ yadā kāpi tanmantreṇaiva mokṣyati / yoginī me tadā bhūyo bhavitāsmīha mānuṣaḥ // 7.3.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity eṣa mama vṛttāntastvaṃ tvagamyamidaṃ vanam / kim āgataḥ kathaṃ ceti brūhīdānīṃ vayasya me // 7.3.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ markaṭarūpeṇa somasvāmidvijena saḥ / ukto niścayadattaḥ svaṃ tasmai vṛttāntam abravīt // 7.3.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yathā vidyādharīhetorujjayinyāḥ sam āgataḥ / ānīto dhairyajitayā yakṣiṇyā ca tayā niśi // 7.3.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tataḥ śrutatadāścaryavṛttāntaḥ kapirūpadhṛt / dhīmānniścayadattaṃ taṃ somasvāmī jagāda saḥ // 7.3.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anubhūtaṃ tvayā duḥkhaṃ may aiva strīkṛte mahat / na ca śriyaḥ striyaśceha kadācitkasyacitsthirāḥ // 7.3.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃdhyāvatkṣaṇarāgiṇyo nadīvatkuṭilāśayāḥ / bhujagīvadaviśvāsyā vidyudvaccapalāḥ striyaḥ // 7.3.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatsā vidyādharī raktāpyanurāgaparā kṣaṇāt / prāpya kaṃcitsvajātīyaṃ virajyettvayi mānuṣe // 7.3.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadalaṃ strīnimittena prayāsenāmunādhunā / kiṃpākaphalatulyena viṣākavirasena te // 7.3.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mā gā vidyādharapurīṃ tāṃ sakhe puṣkarāvatīm / yakṣiṇīskandhamāruhya tāmebojjayinīṃ vraja // 7.3.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kuru madvacanaṃ mittraṃ pūrvaṃ mittravaco mayā / na kṛtaṃ rāgiṇā tena paritapye 'dhunāpyaham // 7.3.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bandhudattānuraktaṃ hi susnigdho brāhmaṇas tadā / vārayan bhavaśarmākhyaḥ suhṛn mām evam abravīt // 7.3.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
striyāḥ sakhe vaśaṃ mā gāḥ strīcittaṃ hy atidurgamam / tathā ca mama yadvṛttaṃ tad idaṃ vacmi te śṛṇu // 7.3.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vārāṇasyām ihaivāsīttaruṇī rūpaśālinī / brāhmaṇī somadā nāma capalā guptayoginī // 7.3.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tayā ca saha me daivātsamabhūtsaṃgamo rahaḥ / tatsaṃgamakramāttasyāṃ mama prītiravardhata // 7.3.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā tām ahaṃ svairamīrṣyākopādatāḍayam / taccāsahiṣṭa sā krūrā kopaṃ pracchādya tatkṣaṇam // 7.3.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyedyuḥ praṇayakrīḍāvyājāc ca mama sūtrakam / gale 'badhnādahaṃ dāntastatkṣaṇaṃ balado 'bhavam // 7.3.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'haṃ baladībhūtastayā dāntoṣṭrajīvinaḥ / ekasya puṃso vikrīto gṛhītābhīṣṭamūlyayā // 7.3.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tenāropitabhāraṃ māṃ kliśyamānamavaikṣata / badhamocanikā nāma yoginyatra kṛpānvitā // 7.3.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā jñānataḥ somadayā viditvā māṃ paśūkṛtam / mumoca kaṇṭhāt sūtraṃ me madgosvāminyapaśyati // 7.3.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tato 'haṃ mānuṣībhūtaḥ sa ca kṣiprādvilokayan / palāyitaṃ māṃ manvāno matsvāmī prābhramaddiśaḥ // 7.3.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ahaṃ ca bandhamocinyā tayā saha tato vrajan / daivādāgatayā dūrāddṛṣṭaḥ somadayā tayā // 7.3.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā krodhena jvalantī tāṃ jñāninīṃ bandhamocinīm / avādītkimayaṃ pāpastiryaktvānmocitastvayā // 7.3.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dhikprāpsyasi durācāre phalamasya kukarmaṇaḥ / prātastvāṃ nihaniṣyāmi sahitāṃ pāpmanāmunā // 7.3.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvaiva gatāyāṃ ca tasyāṃ sā siddhayoginī / tatpratīghātahetormāmavocadbandhamocinī // 7.3.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hantuṃ māṃ kṛṣṇaturagīrūpeṇaiṣābhyupaiṣyati / mayā ca śoṇavaḍavārūpamatrāśrayiṣyate // 7.3.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tato yuddhe pravṛtte nau pṛṣṭhataḥ khaḍgapāṇinā / somadāyāṃ prahartavyaṃ tvayāsyāmapramādinā // 7.3.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evametāṃ haniṣyāvastatprātastvaṃ gṛhe mama / āgaccherityuditvā sā gṛhaṃ me svamadarśayat // 7.3.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tasyāṃ praviṣṭāyāmahaṃ nijagṛhānagām / anubhūtādbhutānekajanāmutraiva janmani // 7.3.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātaḥ kṛpāṇapāṇiś ca gatavānasmi tadgṛham / athāgāt somadā sātra kṛṣṇāśvārūpadhāriṇī // 7.3.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpi śoṇahayārūpamakarodbandhamocinī / khuradantaprahāraiś ca tato yuddhamabhūttayoḥ // 7.3.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mayā pradattanistriṃśaprahārā kṣudraśākinī / nihatā bandhamocinyā tayā sā somadā tataḥ // 7.3.168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athāhaṃ nirbhayībhūtastīrṇatiryaktvadurgatiḥ / na kustrīsaṃgamaṃ bhūyo manasā samacintayam // 7.3.169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
cāpalaṃ sāhasikatā śākinīśambarādayaḥ / doṣāḥ strīṇāṃ trayaḥ prāyo lokatrayabhayāvahāḥ // 7.3.170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tacchākinīsakhīṃ bandhudattāṃ kimanudhāvasi / sneho yasyā na patyau sve tasyāstu tvayy asau kutaḥ // 7.3.171	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam ukto 'py ahaṃ tena mitreṇa bhavaśarmaṇā / nākārṣaṃ vacanaṃ tasya prāpto 'smīmāṃ gatiṃ tataḥ // 7.3.172	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atastvāṃ vacmi mā kārṣīranurāgaparāṃ prati / kleśaṃ sā hi svajātīye prāpte tvāṃ tyakṣyati dhruvam // 7.3.173	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhṛṅgīva puṣpaṃ puruṣaṃ strī vāñchati navaṃ navam / ato 'nutāpo bhavitā mam eva bhavataḥ sakhe // 7.3.174	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
ity etatkapirūpasthasomasvāmivaco hṛdi / tasya niścayadattasya nāviśadrāganirbhare // 7.3.175	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uvāca sa kapiṃ taṃ hi na sā vyabhicarenmayi / vidyādharādhipakule śuddhe jātā hy asāviti // 7.3.176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
evaṃ tayorālapatoḥ saṃdhyārakto 'stabhūdharam / yayau niścayadattasya priyecchur iva bhāskaraḥ // 7.3.177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
athāgatāyāṃ rajanāvagradūtyāmivāyayau / sā śṛṅgotpādinī tasya nikaṭaṃ tatra yakṣiṇī // 7.3.178	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
yayau niścayadattastatskandhārūḍhaḥ priyāṃ prati / prayātum āpṛcchya kapiṃ smartavyo 'smīti vādinam // 7.3.179	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
niśīthe ca himādrau tām anurāgaparā pituḥ / purīṃ vidyādharapateḥ prāptavān puṣkarāvatīm // 7.3.180	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tāvatprabhāvato buddhvā tadabhyāgamanāya sā / tato nagaryā niragādanurāgaparā bahiḥ // 7.3.181	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
iyamāyāti te kāntā niśi netrotsavapradā / indumūrtirdvitīyeva tadidānīṃ vrajāmy aham // 7.3.182	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā darśayitvā tāmaṃsāgrādavatāritam / natvā niścayadattaṃ tamatha sā yakṣiṇī yayau // 7.3.183	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sāpi cirautsukyasaṃrambhāliṅganādibhiḥ / upagamyābhyanandattamanurāgaparā priyam // 7.3.184	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'py āśliṣya bahukleśalabdhatatsaṃgamotsavaḥ / avartamānaḥ sve dehe tanuṃ tasyā ivāviśat // 7.3.185	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tena gāndharvavidhinā bhāryā bhūtvātha tasya sā / anurāgaparā sadyo vidyayā nirmame puram // 7.3.186	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmin niścayadatto 'sau bāhye tasthau tayā saha / tadvidyācchannadṛṣṭibhyāṃ tatpitṛbhyāmatarkitaḥ // 7.3.187	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pṛṣṭas tāṃs tādṛśāṃs tasyai mārgakleśāñ śaśaṃsa yat / tena sā bahu mene taṃ bhogaiś ceṣṭair upācarat // 7.3.188	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha tanmarkaṭībhūtasīmasvāmikathādbhutam / so 'tra niścayadattosyai vidyādharyai nyavedayat // 7.3.189	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

ity uktā tena sāvocad anurāgaparāpi tam / yoginyā mantramārgo 'yaṃ nāsmākaṃ viṣayaḥ punaḥ // 7.3.191	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathāpi sādhayiṣyāmi priyametadahaṃ tava / abhyarthya bhadrarūpākhyāṃ vayasyāṃ siddhayoginīm // 7.3.192	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sa vaṇikputro hṛṣṭastām avadatpriyām / tarhi taṃ paśya manmittramehi yāva tadantikam // 7.3.193	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadety ukte tayānyedyustadutsaṅgasthitaś ca saḥ / vyomnā niścayadatto 'gāt sakhyus tasyāspadaṃ vanam // 7.3.194	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra taṃ suhṛdasṃ dṛṣṭvā kapirūpamupetya saḥ / praṇamatpriyayā sākamapṛcchatkuśalaṃ tadā // 7.3.195	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)

tam abhyanandatpradadau tatpriyāyai tathāśiṣam / tataḥ sarve 'py upāvikṣaṃs tatra ramye śilātale // 7.3.197	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
cakruś ca tatkathālāpaṃ tattattasya kapeḥ kṛte / ādau niścayadattena cintitaṃ kāntayā saha // 7.3.198	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas taṃ kapimāpṛcchya preyasīsadanaṃ ca tat / yayau niścayadatto dyāmutpatyāṅke dhṛtastayā // 7.3.199	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyedyustām avādīc ca so 'nurāgaparāṃ punaḥ / ehi tasyāntikaṃ sakhyuḥ kṣaṇaṃ yāva kaperiti // 7.3.200	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sāpi tamāha sma tvamevādya vraja svayam / gṛhāṇotpatanīṃ vidyāṃ matto 'vataraṇīṃ tathā // 7.3.201	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktaḥ sa tadādāya tadvidyādvitayaṃ tataḥ / vyomnā niścayadatto 'gāt sakhyus tasyāntikaṃ kapeḥ // 7.3.202	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra yāvatsa kurute tena sākaṃ ciraṃ kathāḥ / sānurāgaparā tāvadudyānaṃ niryayau gṛhāt // 7.3.203	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatratasyāṃ niṣaṇṇāyāṃ vidyādharakumārakaḥ / ko 'py ājagāma nabhasā paribhrāmyanyadṛcchayā // 7.3.204	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
sa dṛṣṭvaiva smarāveśavivaśastāmupāyayau / vidyādharīṃ sa tāṃ buddhvā vidyayā martyabhartṛkām // 7.3.205	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpy upetaṃ tam ālokya subhagaṃ vinatānanā / kastvaṃ kim āgato 'sīti śanaiḥ papraccha kautukāt // 7.3.206	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa pratyavocattāṃ svavidyājñānaśālinam / viddhi vidyādharaṃ mugdhe nāmnā māṃ rājabhañjanam // 7.3.207	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'haṃ saṃdarśanādeva sahasā hariṇekṣaṇe / manobhuvā vaśīkṛtya tubhyam eva samarpitaḥ // 7.3.208	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadalaṃ devi sevitvā martyaṃ dharaṇigocaram / pitā vetti na yāvatte tāvattulyaṃ bhajasva mām // 7.3.209	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti tasmin bruvāṇe sā kaṭākṣārdhavilokinī / acintayadayaṃ yukto mameti capalāśayā // 7.3.210	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato labdhvāśayaṃ cakre bhāryā tenaiva tatra sā / apekṣate dvayoraikacittye kiṃ rahasi smaraḥ // 7.3.211	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha vidyādhare tasmin saṃpratyapasṛte tataḥ / āgānniścayadatto 'tra somasvāmisamīpataḥ // 7.3.212	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āgatasya na sā cakre viratkāliṅganādikam / anurāgaparā tasya vyapadiśya śirorujam // 7.3.213	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tu tadvyājamavidannṛjuḥ snehavimohitaḥ / asvāsthyam eva matvāsyā duḥkhaṃ tadanayaddinam // 7.3.214	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātaś ca durmanā bhūyastaṃ kapiṃ suhṛdaṃ prati / sa somasvāminaṃ prāyānnabhasā vidyayorbalāt // 7.3.215	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yāte tasminn upāgāt tāṃ so 'nurāgaparāṃ punaḥ / kāmī vidyādharo rātrikṛtonnidrastayā vinā // 7.3.216	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
niśāvirahasotkaṇṭhāṃ kaṇṭhe tām avalambya ca / suratāntapariśrānto nidrākrānto babhūva saḥ // 7.3.217	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpyaṅkasuptaṃ pracchādya priyaṃ vidyābalena tam / rātrijāgaraṇānnidrāmanurāgaparā yayau // 7.3.218	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvanniścayadatto 'pi prāpa tasyāntikaṃ kapeḥ / so 'pi papraccha taṃ kṛtvā svāgataṃ vānaraḥ suhṛt // 7.3.219	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
durmanaskamivādya tvāṃ kiṃ paśyāmyucyatāmiti / tato niścayadatto 'pi sa taṃ vānaram abravīt // 7.3.220	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anurāgaparātyarthamasvasthā mittra vartate / tenāsmi duḥsthitaḥ sā hi prāṇebhyo 'pi priyā mama // 7.3.221	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktas tena sa jñānī markaṭastam abhāṣata / gaccha suptāmidānīṃ tāṃ sthitāṃ kṛtvāṅgavartinīm // 7.3.222	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taddattavidyayā vyomnā tāmānaya madantikam / yāvanmahadihāścaryaṃ darśayāmyadhunaiva te // 7.3.223	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā khena gatvaiva so 'nurāgaparāṃ tataḥ / dṛṣṭvā niścayadattastāṃ suptām aṅke 'grahīllaghu // 7.3.224	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ tu vidyādharaṃ tasyā nāṅge lagnaṃ dadarśa saḥ / suptaṃ vidyābalenādāvadṛśyaṃ vihitaṃ tayā // 7.3.225	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
utpatya cāntarikṣaṃ tām anurāgaparāṃ kṣaṇāt / ānināya kapes tasya sa somasvāmino 'ntikam // 7.3.226	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa kapirdivyadṛktasmai tadā yogamupādiśat / yena vidyādharaṃ tasyāḥ kaṇṭhe lagnaṃ dadarśa saḥ // 7.3.227	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvā ca hā dhigetatkimiti taṃ vādinaṃ kapiḥ / sa eva tattvadarśī tadyathāvṛttam abodhayat // 7.3.228	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kruddhe niścayadatte 'tha tasmin vidyādharo 'tra saḥ / prabuddhastatpriyākāmī khamutpatya tirodadhe // 7.3.229	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpi prabuddhā tatkālamanurāgaparātmanaḥ / rahasyabhedaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā hriyā tasthavadhomukhī // 7.3.230	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tato niścayadattastāmuvācodaśrulocanaḥ / viśvasto 'haṃ kathaṃ pāpe tvay aivaṃ bata vañcitaḥ // 7.3.231	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayantacañcalasyeha pāradasya nibandhane / kāmaṃ vijñāyate yuktir na strīcittasya kācana // 7.3.232	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tato niścayadattaṃ taṃ suhṛnmarkaṭako 'bravīt / etāṃ yadanvadhāvastvaṃ vārito 'pi mayā priyām // 7.3.234	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyedaṃ tīvrarāgāgneḥ phalaṃ yadanutapyase / ko hi saṃpatsu capalāsvāśvāso vanitāsu ca // 7.3.235	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)

iti tasmātkapeḥ śrutvā śokamohaṃ vihāya tam / yayau niścayadatto 'tra viraktaḥ śaraṇaṃ śivam // 7.3.237	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha tatravane suhṛdā kapinā saha tiṣṭhatastato nikaṭam / tasyājagāma daivāttapasvinī mokṣadā nāma // 7.3.238	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
sā taṃ krameṇa dṛṣṭvā praṇataṃ papraccha mānuṣasya sataḥ / citraṃ katham iha jāto mittraṃ te markaṭo 'yamiti // 7.3.239	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
tataḥ svaṃ vṛttāntaṃ tadanu ca sa mittrasya caritaṃ samācakhyau tasyai kṛpaṇamatha tām evam avadat / prayogaṃ mantraṃ vā yadi bhagavatī vetti tad imaṃ kapitvātsanmittraṃ suhṛdamadhunā mocayatu me // 7.3.240	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
tac chrutvā sā tasya bāḍhaṃ kapes tat sūtraṃ kaṇṭhān mantrayuktyā mumoca / so 'tha tyaktvā mārkaṭīmākṛtiṃ tāṃ somasvāmī pūrvavanmānuṣo 'bhūt // 7.3.241	śālinī [11: mttgg]
tasyāṃ tataś ca taḍitīva tirohitāyāṃ divyaprabhāvabhṛti bhūri tapo vidhāya / kālena tatra kila niścayadattasomasvāmidvijau prayayatuḥ paramāṃ gatiṃ tau // 7.3.242	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
evaṃ nisargacapalā lalanā vivekavairāgyadāyibahuduścaritaprabandhāḥ / sādhvī tu kācidapi tāsu kulaṃ viśālaṃ yālaṃkarotyabhinavā khamivendulekhā // 7.3.243	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
ity etāṃ naravāhanadattaḥ sacivasya gomukhasya mukhāt / citrāmākarṇya kathāṃ tutoṣa ratnaprabhāsahitaḥ // 7.3.244	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)

tatheti ca gate tasmiṃstāṃ nināya niśāṃ nṛpaḥ / bhāviviśleṣasotkaṇṭhaḥ samaṃ madanamālayā // 7.4.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tataḥ prātaḥ sa rājā tu vihitāvaśyakakriyaḥ / nityadevārcanāgāraṃ viveśaiko japacchalāt // 7.4.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

prayaccha deva tenādya vareṇāṅgīkṛtena me / sauvarṇān pañca mahataḥ puruṣāṃs tān ihākṣayān // 7.4.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
yeṣāmiṣṭopabhogāya cchidyamānānyanāratam / tādṛśānyeva jāyante tānyaṅgāni punaḥ punaḥ // 7.4.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ bhavantu tadrūpāḥ puruṣāste yathecchasi / ity uktvā sa dhanādhyakṣo jagāmādarśanaṃ kṣaṇāt // 7.4.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājāpi tatkṣaṇaṃ so 'tra devagāre dadarśa tān / sthitān akasmāt sauvarṇānmahataḥ pañca pūruṣān // 7.4.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tataḥ praviṣṭo niragāt svāṃ pratijñāmavismaran / dyāmupatya yayau tāvatpuraṃ pāṭaliputrakam // 7.4.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrābhinandito 'mātyaiḥ paurairantaḥpuraiś ca saḥ / tasthau kāryāṇi kurvāṇaḥ pratiṣṭhānasthayā dhiyā // 7.4.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac cātra pratiṣṭhāne prāviśattasya sā priyā / cirapraviṣṭaṃ taṃ kāntaṃ vīkṣituṃ devasadma tat // 7.4.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)

itthaṃ niśamya marubhūtimukhādudārām etāṃ kathāṃ sa naravāhanadattabhūpaḥ / vidyādharottamakulaprabhavā ca sāsya ratnaprabhā navavadhurvyadhita pramodam // 7.4.161	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]

antaḥpuraśate tasya vidyamāne 'py abhūtprabhoḥ / ekā guṇavarā nāma rājñī prāṇādhikapriyā // 7.5.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
