tac chrutvā so 'bravīdvaidyo devaitatsādhayāmy aham / vanyacchagalakaḥ kiṃ tu devenānāyyatāṃ mama // 7.5.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ākarṇya bhiṣagvākyaṃ pratīhāraṃ sa bhūpatiḥ / ādiśyānāyayām āsa tasya cchagalakaṃ vanāt // 7.5.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ chāgaṃ rājasūdebhyaḥ samarpya sa bhiṣaktataḥ / tanmāṃsaiḥ sādhayām āsa rājñarthaṃ rasakottamam // 7.5.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ādiśyaikatra rājñīnāṃ melakaṃ devam arcitum / gate rājñi milanti sma devya ekatra tatra tāḥ // 7.5.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekā tu militā nāsīdrājño guṇavarātra sā / rājño devārcanasthasya tatkālaṃ nikaṭe sthitā // 7.5.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
militābhyaś ca tābhyastatpānārthaṃ cūrṇamiśritam / avibhāvy aiva rasakaṃ niḥśeṣaṃ sa dadau bhiṣak // 7.5.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
kṣaṇātkṛtārcanaḥ so 'tra rājāgatya priyāyutaḥ / vīkṣyāśeṣopayuktaṃ taddravyaṃ vaidyaṃ tam abhyadhāt // 7.5.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho na sthāpitaṃ kiṃcittvayā guṇavarākṛte / yatpradhāno 'yamārambhastadeva tava vismṛtam // 7.5.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā sa vilakṣaṃ taṃ vaidyaṃ sūdānnṛpo 'bravīt / kiṃ tasya cchagalasyāsti māṃsaśeṣo 'tra kaścana // 7.5.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śṛṅge pare sta ity ukte sūdair vaidyo 'tha so 'bravīt / sādhu tarhyuttamaṃ hi syādrasakaṃ śṛṅgagarbhajam // 7.5.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā kārayitvaiva tat tataḥ śṛṅgamāṃsataḥ / tasyai guṇavarāyai sa cūrṇamiśraṃ bhiṣagdadau // 7.5.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tasyātha navatirdevyo rājño navādhikāḥ / āsansagarbhāḥ kāle ca sarvāḥ suṣuvire sutān // 7.5.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
arvāgupāttagarbhā ca sā sarvottamalakṣaṇam / prāsūta sma mahādevī paścādguṇavarā sutam // 7.5.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śṛṅgamāṃsarasotpannaṃ nāmnā śṛṅgabhujaṃ ca tam / pītā vīrabhujaścakre rājā kṛtamahotsavaḥ // 7.5.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vardhamānaḥ sahānyaistairbhrātṛbhirvayasā param / kaniṣṭhaḥ so 'bhavatteṣāṃ guṇairjyeṣṭhatamastvabhūt // 7.5.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kramātsa rājaputraś ca rūpe kāmasamo 'bhavat / dhanurvede 'rjunasamo bhīmasenasamo bale // 7.5.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tataḥ saputrāṃ sutarāṃ dṛṣṭvā vīrabhujasya tām / priyāṃ guṇavarāṃ rājño devyo 'nyā matsaraṃ yayuḥ // 7.5.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha tāsvayaśolekhā nāma rājñī durāśayā / saṃmantrya tābhiranyābhiḥ saha kṛtvā ca saṃvidam // 7.5.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
samastābhiḥ sapatnībhistaṃ rājānaṃ gṛhāgatam / mṛṣādhṛtamukhaglāniḥ pṛcchantaṃ kṛcchrato 'bravīt // 7.5.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āryaputra kathaṃ nāma sahase gṛhadūṣaṇam / parasya rakṣitāvadyaṃ na rakṣasyātmanaḥ katham // 7.5.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yaḥ surakṣitanāmāyamantaḥpurapatiryuvā / tatsaktā hi tvadīyaiṣa rājñī guṇavarā kila // 7.5.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadanyasya na lābho 'sti sauvidallābhirakṣite / antaḥpure 'tra puṃso yadato 'sau tena saṃgatā // 7.5.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sarvatrāntaḥpure caitatprasiddham iha gīyate / ity uktaḥ sa tayā rājā dadhyau ca vimamarśa ca // 7.5.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā caikaikaśo rājñīranyāḥ papraccha tāḥ kramāt / tāś ca tasmai tathaivocuḥ sarvā racitakaitavāḥ // 7.5.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa matimānrājā jitakrodho vyacintayat / tayoḥ saṃbhāvyate naitatpravādaścāyamīdṛśaḥ // 7.5.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadāniścitya kāryo me pratibhedo na kasyacit / yuktyā tu parihāryau tau saṃpratyantamavekṣitum // 7.5.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti niścitya so 'nyedyur āsthāne 'ntaḥ purādhipam / surakṣitaṃ tam āhūya kṛtakopaḥ samabhyadhāt // 7.5.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
brāhmahatyā tvayā pāpa kṛtetyavagataṃ mayā / tattvāmakṛtasattīrthayātraṃ na draṣṭumutsahe // 7.5.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā taṃ samudbhrāntaṃ brahmahatyā kuto mayā / kṛtā deveti jalpantaṃ sa rājā punarabravīt // 7.5.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mā sma dhārṣṭyaṃ kṛthā gaccha kāśmīrān pāpanāśanān / yatra tadvijayakṣetraṃ nandikṣetraṃ ca pāvanam // 7.5.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vārāhaṃ yatra ca kṣetraṃ ye pūtāścakrapāṇinā / dhatte nāma vitasteti vahantī yatra jāhnavī // 7.5.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yatra tanmaḍavakṣetraṃ yatra cottaramānasam / tattīrthayātrāpūto māṃ punar drakṣyasi nānyathā // 7.5.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
evam uktvā tamavaśaṃ visasarja surakṣitam / sa yuktyā tīrthayātrāyāṃ dūraṃ vīrabhujo nṛpaḥ // 7.5.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato guṇavarādevyāḥ pūrvaṃ tasyā jagāma saḥ / sasnehaś ca sakopaś ca savimarśaś ca bhūpatiḥ // 7.5.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra sā khinnamanasaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvāpṛcchadākulā / āryaputra kimady aivamakasmaddurmanāyase // 7.5.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sa mahībhṛttām evaṃ kṛtakamabhyadhāt / adyāgatya mahājñānī devī māṃ ko 'py abhāṣata // 7.5.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājan guṇavarā devī kālaṃ kaṃcana bhūgṛhe / sthāpanīyā tvayā bhāvyaṃ svayaṃ ca brahmacāriṇā // 7.5.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājyabhraṃśo 'nyathā te syānmṛtyus tasyāś ca niścitam / ity uktvā sa gato jñānī viṣādo 'yaṃ tato mama // 7.5.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ tenodite rājñā rājñī guṇavarā tu sā / bhayānurāgavibhrāntā taṃ jagāda pativrata // 7.5.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tarhy āryaputra nādyaiva kiṃ māṃ kṣipasi bhūgṛhe / dhanyā hy asmi yadi prāṇair api syān me hitaṃ tava // 7.5.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mama vā mṛtyurastveva tava mā bhūd anirvṛtiḥ / ihāmutra ca nārīṇāṃ paramā hi gatiḥ patiḥ // 7.5.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti tasyā vacaḥ śrutvā sāśruḥ so 'cintayatprabhuḥ / śaṅke na pāpametasyāṃ na ca tasmin surakṣite // 7.5.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa hy amlānamukhacchāyo nirāśaṅko mayekṣitaḥ / kaṣṭaṃ tathāpi jijñāse pravādasyāsya niścayam // 7.5.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ālocya sa tāṃ rājā rājñīmāha sma duḥkhitaḥ / tadihaiva varaṃ dehi bhūgṛhaṃ kriyatāmiti // 7.5.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatheti ca tayā proktas tatraivāntaḥpure sugam / vidhāya bhūgṛhaṃ rājā devīṃ tāṃ nidadhe 'tha saḥ // 7.5.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
putraṃ śṛṅgabhujaṃ tasyā viṣaṇṇaṃ pṛṣtakāraṇam / āśvāsayat tad evoktvā rājñīṃ tāṃ sa yad uktavān // 7.5.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpi rājño hitamiti svargaṃ mene dharāgṛham / svasukhaṃ nāsti sādhvīnāṃ tāsāṃ bhartṛsukhaṃ sukham // 7.5.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ kṛte 'yaśolekhā tasya rājñyaparātha sā / nirvāsabhujanāmānaṃ svairaṃ svasutam abhyadhāt // 7.5.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājñāsmadvidhurā tāvatkhāte guṇavarārpitā / etatputraś ca deśāccedito gacchetsukhaṃ bhavet // 7.5.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tat sa śṛṅgabhujo deśān nirvāsyetācirād yathā / tāṃ putra cintayer yuktiṃ tvam anyair bhrātṛbhiḥ saha // 7.5.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti mātroditaḥ so 'nyān bhrātṝn uktvā samatsaraḥ / āste sma nirvāsabhujas tatropāyaṃ vicintayan // 7.5.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
ekadā te mahāstrāṇi prayuñjānāṃ nṛpātmajāḥ / prāsādāgre mahākāyaṃ sarve 'pi dadṛśurbakam // 7.5.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vikṛtaṃ pakṣiṇaṃ taṃ ca paśyatastānsavismayān / jñānī kṣapaṇakaḥ ko'pi pathā tenāgato 'bravīt // 7.5.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājaputrā bako nāyaṃ rūpeṇānena rākṣasaḥ / bhramatyagniśikhākhyo 'yaṃ nagarāṇi vināśayan // 7.5.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadvidhyatainaṃ kāṇḍena yāvadgacchatvito hataḥ / etatkṣapaṇakāc chrutvā navatiste navādhikāḥ // 7.5.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kāṇḍāni cikṣipur jyeṣṭhā naiko 'py āhatavān bakam / tato nagnakṣapaṇakaḥ punas tān abravīc ca saḥ // 7.5.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ayaṃ kanīyān yuṣmākaṃ bhrātā śṛṅgabhujo bakam / śaknoti hantumetaṃ tadgṛhṇātveṣa kṣamaṃ dhanuḥ // 7.5.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvaiva smaranmātustallabdhāvasaraṃ vacaḥ / sa nirvāsabhujo jālmastatkṣaṇaṃ samacintayat // 7.5.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'yaṃ śṛṅgabhujasyāsya syādupāyaḥ pravāsane / tad arpayāmas tātasya saṃbandhyasmai dhanuḥśaram // 7.5.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sauvarṇaṃ taccharaṃ hṛtvā viddho yāsyati cedbakaḥ / paścādeṣo 'pi gantāsya mārgastvasmāsu taṃ śaram // 7.5.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yadā ca lapsyate naitaṃ cinvanrakṣobakaṃ tadā / sthāsyatītastato bhrāmyannaiṣyatīha śaraṃ vinā // 7.5.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ālocya dadau tasmai pāpaḥ śṛṅgabhujāya saḥ / bakaghātāya saśaraṃ pitṛsaṃbandhi kārmukam // 7.5.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
sa gṛhītvā tadākṛṣya tena svarṇaśareṇa tam / ratnapuṅkhena vivyādha bakaṃ śṛṅgabhujo balī // 7.5.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa viddhamātras taṃ kāyalagnamādāya sāyakam / bakaḥ sravadasṛgdhāraḥ palāyy aiva tato yayau // 7.5.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ śṛṅgabhujaṃ vīraṃ sa nirvāsabhujaḥ śaṭhaḥ / tatsaṃjñāpreritāste ca bhrātaro 'nye tamabruvan // 7.5.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dehi hemamayaṃ taṃ nastātasaṃbandhinaṃ śaram / anyathādya śarīrāṇi tyakṣyāmaḥ puratastava // 7.5.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tātas tena vinā hy asmānito irvāsayiṣyati / na ca kartuṃ grahītuṃ vā śakyaṃ tatpratirūpakam // 7.5.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvaiva sa jihmāṃstānvīraḥ śṛṅgabhujo 'bravīt / dhīrā bhavata mā bhūd vo bhayaṃ kārpaṇyamujjhata // 7.5.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āneṣyāmi śaraṃ gatvā hatvā taṃ rākṣasādhamam / ity uktvā saśaraṃ cāpaṃ nijaṃ śṛṅgabhujo 'grahīt // 7.5.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yayau ca tāṃ samuddiśya diśaṃ yāṃ sa bako gataḥ / patitāṃ tadasṛgdhārāṃ bhūmāvanusarañjavāt // 7.5.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hṛṣṭeṣu teṣu cānyeṣu mātṛpārśvaṃ gateṣv atha / gacchansa kramaśaḥ prāpa dūrāṃ śṛṅgabhujo 'tavīm // 7.5.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāṃ dadarśa cinvāno vanasyāntarmahatpuram / bhogāyopanataṃ kāle phalaṃ puṇyataror iva // 7.5.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrodyānatarormūle sa viśrāntaḥ kṣaṇād iva / āścaryarūpām āyāntīm atra kanyāmavaikṣata // 7.5.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
virahe jīvitaharāṃ saṃgame prāṇadāyinīm / vicitrāṃ nirmitāṃ dhārā viṣāmṛtamayīm iva // 7.5.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
śanairupagatāṃ tāṃ ca cakṣuṣā premavarṣiṇā / paśyantīṃ tadgatamanāḥ sa papraccha nṛpātmajaḥ // 7.5.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
kiṃnāmadheyaṃ kasyedaṃ puraṃ hariṇalocane / tvaṃ ca kā kiṃ tavehāyamāgamaḥ kahyatāmiti // 7.5.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sācīkṛtamukhī nyastaddṛṣṭirmahītale / sā taṃ jagāda sudatī madhurasnigdhayā girā // 7.5.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
idaṃ dhūmapuraṃ nāma sarvasaṃpadgṛhaṃ puram / asminvasatyagniśikho nāma rākṣasapuṃgavaḥ // 7.5.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tasya rūpaśikhāṃ nāma sadṛśīṃ viddhi māṃ sutām / ihāgatām asāmānyatvadrūpāhṛtamānasām // 7.5.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvaṃ bhrūhi me 'dhunā ko 'si kim ihābhyāgato 'si ca / evam ukte tayā tasyai sarvaṃ śṛṅgabhujaṃ kṣaṇam // 7.5.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yo 'sau yannāmadheyaś ca yasya putro mahīpateḥ / yayā śaranimittena taddhūmapuram āgataḥ // 7.5.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato viditavṛttāntā sā taṃ rūpaśikhābhyadhāt / na tvayā sudṛganyo 'sti trailokye 'pi dhanurdharaḥ // 7.5.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yena tāto 'py asau viddho bakarūpo maheṣunā / sa ca hemamayo bāṇaḥ svīkṛtaḥ krīḍayā mayā // 7.5.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tātastu nirvraṇaḥ sadyo mahādaṃṣṭreṇa mantriṇā / viśalyakaraṇīmukhyamahauṣadhividā kṛtaḥ // 7.5.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadyāmi tātaṃ saṃbodhya nayāmyabhyantaraṃ drutam / tvāmāryaputra nyasto hi tvayyātmāyaṃ mayādhunā // 7.5.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ity uktvā tamavasthāpya tatra śṛṅgabhujaṃ kṣaṇam / yayau rūpaśikhā pārśvaṃ pituragniśikhasya sā // 7.5.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāta śṛṅgabhujo nāma rājasūnurihāgataḥ / ko 'py ananyasamo rūpakulaśīlavayoguṇaiḥ // 7.5.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jāne ko 'py avatīrṇo 'tra devāṃśo na sa mānuṣaḥ / sa cedbhartā na me syāttattyajeyaṃ jīvitaṃ dhruvam // 7.5.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktaḥ sa tayā tatra pitā tāṃ rākṣaso 'bravīt / mānuṣāḥ putri bhakṣyā nastathāpi yadi te grahaḥ // 7.5.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadastu rājaputraṃ tam ihaivānāyya darśaya / tac chrutvā sā yayau rūpaśikhā śṛṅgabhujāntikam // 7.5.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uktvā yathā kṛtaṃ tac ca taṃ nināyāntikaṃ pituḥ / so 'pi taṃ namramādṛtya tatpitāgniśikho 'bravīt // 7.5.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dadāmi rājaputraitāṃ tubhyaṃ rūpaśikhāmaham / yadi madvacanaṃ kiṃcinnātikrāmasi jātucit // 7.5.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavantaṃ taṃ so 'pi prahvaḥ śṛṅgabhujo 'bravīt / bāḍhamullaṅghayiṣyāmi naivājñāvacanaṃ tava // 7.5.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti śṛṅgabhujenoktastuṣṭaḥ so 'gniśikho 'bhyadhāt / uttiṣṭha tarhi snātvā tvamāgaccha snānaveśmanaḥ // 7.5.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tam evam uktvāvādīt tāṃ sutāṃ rūpaśikhāṃ ca saḥ / tvaṃ gaccha sarvā bhaginīrādāyāgaccha satvaram // 7.5.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
evam agniśikhenoktau tena nirjagmatus tataḥ / tatheti tāvubhau śṛṅgabhujo rūpaśikhā ca sā // 7.5.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas taṃ sā sudhīḥ śṛṅgabhujaṃ rūpaśikhābhyadhāt / āryaputra kumārīṇāṃ svasṝṇāmasti me śatam // 7.5.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sarvā vayaṃ sadṛśyaś ca tulyābharaṇavāsasaḥ / sarvāsāṃ santi kaṇṭheṣu tuyā hāralatāś ca naḥ // 7.5.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tattāto melayitvāsmāṃs tvāṃ vimohayituṃ priya / āsāṃ madhyādabhīṣṭāṃ vaṃ vṛṇīsveti vadiṣyati // 7.5.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jānāmy etam ahaṃ tasya vyājābhiprāyam īdṛśam / sarvāḥ saṃghaṭayaty asmān kimartham ayam anyathā // 7.5.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadā mūrdhni kariṣye ca kaṇṭhād dhāralatām aham / tadabhijñānalabdhāyāṃ vanamālāṃ mayi kṣipeḥ // 7.5.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhautaprāyaś ca tāto 'yaṃ buddhirnāsya vivekinī / tathā mayyapi mārgo 'sya jātisiddhaḥ kva gacchati // 7.5.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadeṣa vañcanārthaṃ te yadyatkiṃcidvadiṣyati / aṅgīkṛtya tvayā tattadvācyaṃ me vedmy ahaṃ param // 7.5.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā bhaginīnāṃ sā pārśvaṃ rūpaśikhā yayau / tathety uktvā ca gatavānsnātuṃ śṛṅgabhujo 'pi saḥ // 7.5.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
athāgāt svasṛbhiḥ sākaṃ pārśva rūpaśikhā pituḥ / so 'pi śṛṅgabhujaśceṭīsnapito 'trāyayau punaḥ // 7.5.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āsāṃ madhyānnijeṣṭāyāḥ prayacchaitāmiti bruvan / vanamālāṃ dadau śṛṅgabhujāyāgniśikho 'tha saḥ // 7.5.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'py ādāyaiva tāṃ rūpaśikhāyāḥ kṣiptavān gale / prāṅmūrdhanyastasaṃketahārayaṣṭer nṛpātmajaḥ // 7.5.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ so 'gniśikho rūpaśikhāṃ śṛṅgabhujānvitām / nijagāda vidhāsye vāṃ prātar udvāhamaṅgalam // 7.5.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā tau ca tāścānyā visasarja sutā gṛham / kṣaṇāc ca taṃ śṛṅgabhujaṃ samāhūy aivam abravīt // 7.5.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
gacchedaṃ dāntayugalaṃ samādāya purādbahiḥ / rāśisthaṃ bhuvi tatrādya tilakhārīśataṃ vapa // 7.5.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sa tathety uktvā gatvā śṛṅgabhujo 'bravīt / vigno rūpaśikhāyāstatsāpyevaṃ nijagāda tam // 7.5.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āryaputra na kāryaste viṣādo 'tra manāgapi / gaccha tvaṃ sādhayāmyetadahaṃ kṣipraṃ svamāyayā // 7.5.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā tatra gatvā sa dṛṣṭvā rājasutastilān / rāśisthānvihvalo yāvadaptuṃ prakramate kṛṣan // 7.5.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvad dadarśa bhūmiṃ tāṃ kṛṣṭam uptāṃś ca tāṃs tilān / priyāmāyābalāt sarvān krameṇaiva suvismitaḥ // 7.5.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā cāgniśikhāyaitatkṛtaṃ kāryaṃ nyavedayat / tataḥ sa vañcako bhūyastam abhāṣata rākṣasaḥ // 7.5.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na mamoptaistilaiḥ kāryaṃ gaccha rāśīkuruṣva tān / tac chrutvopetya tadrūpaśikhāyai so 'bravītpunaḥ // 7.5.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā taṃ visṛjya bhūmiṃ tāṃ sṛṣṭvāsaṃkhyāḥ pipīlikāḥ / tābhiḥ saṃghaṭayām āsa tilāṃstānnijamāyayā // 7.5.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad dṛṣṭvaiva punargatvā tasmai so 'gniśikhāya tān / nyavedayacchṛṅgabhujastilānrāśīkṛtānapi // 7.5.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tataḥ so 'gniśikho mūrkhaḥ śaṭho bhūyo 'py uvāca tam / ito dakṣiṇato gatvā yojanadvayamātrakam // 7.5.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asti devakulaṃ śūnyamaraṇye bhadra śāṃbhavam / tasmin dhūmaśikho nāma bhrātā vasati me priyaḥ // 7.5.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatredānīṃ vrajaivaṃ ca veder devakulāgrataḥ / bho dhūmaśikha dūtas te sānugasya nimantraṇe // 7.5.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prahito 'gniśikhenāhaṃ śīghramāgamyatāṃ tvayā / bhāvī rūpaśikhāyā hi prātaḥ pariṇayotsavaḥ // 7.5.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etāvad uktvaivātra tvam ihāyāhyadya satvaram / prātaḥ pariṇayasvaitāṃ sutāṃ rūpaśikhāṃ mama // 7.5.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktas tena pāpena tathety uktvā tathaiva ca / gatvā rūpaśikhāyāstatsarvaṃ śṛṅgabhujo 'bravīt // 7.5.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā sādhvī mṛttikāṃ toyaṃ kaṇṭakānagnim eva ca / dattvā tasmai varāśvaṃ ca nijam evaṃ jagāda tam // 7.5.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etamāruhya turagaṃ natvā devakulaṃ ca tat / drutaṃ dhūmaśikhasyoktvā tattātoktaṃ nimantraṇam // 7.5.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
āgantavyaṃ tvayā śīghramaśvenānena dhāvatā / pṛṣṭhato vīkṣitavyaṃ ca muhurvalitakaṃdharam // 7.5.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
paścāttam āgataṃ dhūmaśikhaṃ drakṣyasi cet tataḥ / tanmārge mṛttikaiṣā te prakṣeptavyātmapṛṣṭhataḥ // 7.5.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'pi paścād āgacchet sa te dhūmaśikho yadi / tathaiva pṛṣṭhatastyājyaṃ toyam evaṃ tvayāntarā // 7.5.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadapyeṣyati cetkṣepyāstadvadete 'sya kaṇṭakāḥ / tathāpi cetso 'nupatettanmadhye 'gnimimaṃ kṣipeḥ // 7.5.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
evaṃ kṛte hi nirdainyastvam ihaiṣyasi mā ca te / vikalpo bhūd vraja drakṣyasyadya vidyābalaṃ mama // 7.5.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktaḥ sa tayā śṛṅgabhujo dhṛtamṛdādikaḥ / tatheti taddhayārūḍho 'raṇye devakulaṃ yayau // 7.5.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra vāmasthagaurīkaṃ dakṣiṇasthavināyakam / dṛṣṭvā natvā ca viśveśamuktaivāgniśikhoditam // 7.5.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nimantraṇavacas tasya tūrṇaṃ dhūmaśikhasya tat / tataś cacāla caturaṃ pradhāvitaturaṃgamaḥ // 7.5.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
kṣaṇāc ca pṛṣṭhato yāvadvīkṣate valitānanaḥ / tāvaddhumaśikhaṃ paścādāgataṃ taṃ dadarśa saḥ // 7.5.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
cikṣepa cāśu mārge 'sya mṛttikāṃ tāṃ svapṛṣṭhataḥ / kṣiptayātra tayā madhye sadyo 'bhutparvato mahān // 7.5.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tamullaṅghya kathaṃcittam āgataṃ vīkṣya rākṣasam / tathaiva pṛṣṭhatastoyaṃ tatsa rājasuto 'kṣipat // 7.5.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena tatrāntarā jajñe velladvīcirmahānadī / tām apy utīrya katham apy āgate 'sminniśācare // 7.5.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
śīghraṃ śṛṅgabhujaḥ paścātkaṇṭakāṃstānavākirat / tair udbabhūva gahanaṃ vanaṃ madhye sakaṇṭakam // 7.5.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tato 'pi nirgate tasmin rakṣasyagniṃ svapṛṣṭhataḥ / jahau tena sa jajvāla mārgaḥ satṛṇakānanaḥ // 7.5.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ vīkṣya khāṇḍavam iva jvalitaṃ duratikramam / yayau dhūmaśikhaḥ khinno bhītaś ca sa yathāgatam // 7.5.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadā rūpaśikhāmāyāmohitaḥ sa hi rākṣasaḥ / padbhyāmāgādagāccaiva na sasmāra nabhogatim // 7.5.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha praśaṃsann antas tatpriyāmāyāvijṛmbhitam / gatabhīrāyayau dhūmapuraṃ śṛṅgabhujaḥ sa tat // 7.5.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato rūpaśikhāyai taṃ samarpyāśvaṃ nivedya ca / yathā kṛtaṃ sa hṛṣṭāyai jagāmāgniśikhāntikam // 7.5.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nimantrito mayā gatvā bhrātā dhūmaśikhastava / ity uktavantaṃ taṃ so 'tra saṃbhranto gniśikho 'bravīt // 7.5.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
yadi tatra gato 'bhūstvamabhijñānaṃ taducyatām / iti tenoditaḥ śṛṅgabhujo jihmaṃ jagāda tam // 7.5.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śṛṇvidaṃ vacmyabhijñānaṃ tatra devakule vibhoḥ / vāme 'sti pārvatī pārśve dakṣiṇe ca vināyakaḥ // 7.5.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā vismitaḥ so 'gniśikhaḥ kṣaṇam acintayat / kathaṃ gato 'pi madbhrātrā śakito naiṣa khāditum // 7.5.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tajjāne mānuṣo nāyaṃ devo 'yaṃ ko'pi niścitam / anurūpas tad eṣo 'stu bhartāsyā duhiturmama // 7.5.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti saṃcintya taṃ śṛṅgabhujaṃ rūpaśikhāntikam / kṛtārthaṃ vyasṛjatsvaṃ tu nāṅgabhedaṃ viveda saḥ // 7.5.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca śṛṅgabhujas tatra gatvā pariṇayotsukaḥ / bhuktapītastayā sākaṃ kathaṃcidanayanniśām // 7.5.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātaś cāgniśikhas tasmai tāṃ sa rūpaśikhāṃ dadau / ṛddhyā svasiddhyucitayā vidhivadvahnisākṣikam // 7.5.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
kva rākṣasasutā kutra rājaputraḥ kva caitayoḥ / vivāho bata citraiva gatiḥ prāktanakarmaṇām // 7.5.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa reje rājasūnustāṃ prāpya rakṣaḥsutāṃ priyām / peśalāṃ paṅkasaṃbhūtāṃ rājahaṃso 'bjinīm iva // 7.5.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasthau ca sa tayā tatra tadekamanasā saha / bhuñjāno vividhān bhogān rakṣaḥ siddhyupakalpitān // 7.5.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gateṣv atha dineṣv atra tāṃ sa rūpaśikhāṃ rahaḥ / avādīdehi gacchāvo vardhamānapuraṃ priye // 7.5.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā hi svā rājadhānī nas tasyāścaivaṃ pravāsanam / paraiḥ soḍhuṃ na śaknomi mānaprāṇā hi mādṛśāḥ // 7.5.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tanmuñca janmabhūmiṃ tvamatyājyām api matkṛte / āvedaya pitustaṃ ca haste hemaśaraṃ kuru // 7.5.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti śṛṅgabhujenoktā sā taṃ rūpaśikhābravīt / yadādiśasi tatkāryamāryaputra mayādhunā // 7.5.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kā janmabhūḥ kaḥ svajanaḥ sarvametadbhavānmama / na pativyatirekeṇa sustrīṇāmaparā gatiḥ // 7.5.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tātasyāvedanīyaṃ tu naitatso 'smān hi na tyajet / tasmād aviditaṃ tasya gantavyaṃ krodhanasya naḥ // 7.5.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āgamiṣyati cetpaścādbuddhvā parijanāt tataḥ / mohayiṣyāmyabuddhiṃ taṃ bhautatulyaṃ svavidyayā // 7.5.168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti tasyā vacaḥ śrutvā prahṛṣṭaḥ so 'pare 'hani / dattarājyārdhayānargharatnapūrṇasamudgayā // 7.5.169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tayaivānītataccārusuvarṇaśarayā saha / āruhya śaravegākhyaṃ tadīyaṃ turagottamam // 7.5.170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vañcayitvā parijanaṃ svairodyānabhramacchalāt / tataḥ śṛṅgabhujaḥ prāyād vardhamānapuraṃ prati // 7.5.171	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatayordūramadhvānaṃ buddhvā so 'gniśikhastayoḥ / daṃpatyorāyayau paścānnabhasā rākṣasaḥ krudhā // 7.5.172	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāgamanavegotthaṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā ca dūrataḥ / mārge rūpaśikhā sātha taṃ śṛṅgabhujam abravīt // 7.5.173	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āryaputrāgatastāto nivartayitumeṣa naḥ / tattvamāsveha niḥśaṅkaḥ paśyainaṃ vañcaye katham // 7.5.174	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
naiṣa drakṣyati sāśvaṃ tvāṃ vidyayācchāditaṃ mayā / ity uktvāśvāvatīrṇā sā puṃrūpaṃ māyayākarot // 7.5.175	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ihāyāti mahadrakṣastattvaṃ tūṣṇīṃ kṣaṇaṃ bhava / ity uktvā kāṣṭhikaṃ cātra dārvarthaṃ vanam āgatam // 7.5.176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkuṭhāreṇa kāṣṭhāni pāṭayantī kilāsta sā / tadā rūpaśikhā śṛṅgabhuje paśyati sasmite // 7.5.177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvatso 'gniśikhas tatra prāpyaitāṃ kāṣṭhikākṛtim / dṛṣṭvāvatīrya gaganānmūḍhaḥ papraccha rākṣasaḥ // 7.5.178	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
kiṃ bho dṛṣṭau pathānena yāntau strīpuruṣāviti / tataḥ kathaṃcit khinneva puṃveṣā sā tam abravīt // 7.5.179	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
na dṛṣṭau kaucidāvābhyāṃ svinnadṛgbhyāṃ pariśramāt / rakṣaḥpater mṛtasyādya dāhāyāgniśikhasya hi // 7.5.180	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āvāṃ kāṣṭhāni bhūyāṃsi pāṭayantāviha sthitau / tac chrutvā rākṣasaḥ so 'tra mūḍhabuddhirvyacintayat // 7.5.181	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho kathaṃ vipanno 'haṃ tatkiṃ me sutayā tayā / gacchāmi tāvat pṛcchāmi gṛhe parijanaṃ nijam // 7.5.182	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
iti saṃcintya sa gṛhaṃ tūrṇam agniśikho yayau / bhartrā samaṃ hasantī sā prāgvatprāsthita tatsutā // 7.5.183	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣaṇāc ca punarapyāgāt sāntarhāsātparicchadāt / pṛṣṭājjīvantamātmānaṃ śrutvā hṛṣṭaḥ sa rākṣasaḥ // 7.5.184	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
buddhvā ghoreṇa śabdena dūrāttaṃ punarāgatam / hayāvatīrṇā pracchādya māyayā pūrvavatpatim // 7.5.185	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
mārgāgatasya kasyāpi lekhahārasya has tataḥ / lekhamādāya puṃrūpaṃ cakre rūpaśikhā punaḥ // 7.5.186	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca pūrvavatprāptatadrūpāṃ tāṃ sa rākṣasaḥ / papraccha pathi sastrīkastvayā dṛṣṭaḥ pumāniti // 7.5.187	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ puruṣarūpā sā śvasantī nijagāda tam / na tvarāhṛtacittena tādṛkko 'pīkṣito mayā // 7.5.188	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahamagniśikhenādya raṇe śatruhatena hi / kiṃciccheṣāsunā rājyaṃ svamarpayitumicchatā // 7.5.189	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tac chrutvāgniśikhaḥ so 'tra kiṃ hato 'haṃ parairiti / saṃbhrāntaḥ prayayau bhūyaḥ svagṛhaṃ tadavekṣitum // 7.5.191	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ko hataḥ svastha eṣo 'ham ity abodhi tu naiva saḥ / ko 'py aho tāmasaś citro mūḍhasargaḥ prajāpateḥ // 7.5.192	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gṛhaṃ prāptaśca tadbuddhvāpyasatyaṃ lokahāsanam / punaḥ sa nāyayau mohaśrānto vismṛtya tāṃ sutām // 7.5.193	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

sa dṛṣṭvā śobhitaṃ vadhvā taṃ śaurim iva bhāmayā / prāptāṃ tadā navāṃ mene narendro rājyasaṃpadam // 7.5.197	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

so 'bhyetya mātaraṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭo bhūgṛhanirgatām / tayorvavande caraṇau pitrornavavadhūyutaḥ // 7.5.217	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)

āyayau sa tay aiva prāgayaśolekhayā mṛṣā / dūṣito 'ntaḥpurādhyakṣo bhrāntatīrthaḥ surakṣitaḥ // 7.5.224	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

sā cādau tac chrutenārtā dhyātayā nijavidyayā / ākhyātadayitodantā vignaṃ śvaśuram abravīt // 7.8.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karpūrikāṃ rājasutāṃ tāpasyā kathitāṃ vane / āryaputro gataḥ prāptuṃ puraṃ karpūrasaṃbhavam // 7.8.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
śīghraṃ ca kṛtakāryaḥ sann ihaiṣyati sagomukhaḥ / tadalaṃ cintayaitad dhi vidyāto 'dhigataṃ mayā // 7.8.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvāśvāsayatsā taṃ vatseśaṃ saparicchadam / ratnaprabhānyāṃ vidyāṃ ca bhartuḥ prāyuṅkta tasya sa // 7.8.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
naravāhanadattasya pathi kleśopaśāntaye / neṣyāṃ bhartṛhitaiṣiṇyo gaṇayanti hi sustriyaḥ // 7.8.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca dūramadhvānaṃ sa yayau vājipṛṣṭhagaḥ / naravāhanadatto 'syām aṭavyāṃ gomukhānvitaḥ // 7.8.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athākasmādupetyāta kumārī pathyuvāca tam / ahaṃ māyāvatī nāma vidyā ratnaprabheritā // 7.8.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rakṣāmyadṛśyā mārge tvāṃ niścintastadvrajādhunā / ity uktvā rupiṇī vidyā tiro 'bhūtsāsya paśyataḥ // 7.8.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatprabhāvāt tataḥ śāntakṣuttṛṣṇaḥ pathi sa vrajan / naravāhanadattastāṃ stuvanratnaprabhāṃ priyām // 7.8.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāyaṃ svacchasaraḥ prāpya vanaṃ svādutaraiḥ phalaiḥ / jalaiścāhārapānādi snātaścakre sagomukhaḥ // 7.8.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
naktaṃ ca tatra saṃyamya dattaghāsau hayāvadhaḥ / mantridvitīyo vāsārthamāruroha mahātarum // 7.8.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tasyoruśākhāsaṃviṣṭo vitrastahayaheṣitaiḥ / prabuddhaḥ so 'ntarādhastādapaśyatsiṃham āgatam // 7.8.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvā cāvatitīrṣuṃ tam aśvārthe gomukho 'bravīt / aho dehānapekṣaḥ sann amantreṇaiva ceṣṭase // 7.8.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śarīramūlā hi nṛpā mantramūlā ca rājatā / yuyutsase tat tīryagbhir nakhadaṃṣṭrāyudhaiḥ katham // 7.8.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
etadrakṣārthamevāvām ihārūḍhau hi saṃprati / iti gomukhavāgruddho yuvarājaḥ sa tatkṣaṇam // 7.8.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
siṃhaṃ taṃ turagaṃ ghnantaṃ dṛṣṭvā churikayā drutam / ājaghāna taroḥ pṛṣṭhātkṣiptayā sa nimagnayā // 7.8.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tathā tena viddho 'pi taṃ hatvaiva hayaṃ balī / siṃho vyāpādayām āsa dvitīyam api vājinam // 7.8.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vatseśvarasutaḥ khaḍgamādāya gomukhāt / tena kṣiptena madhye taṃ siṃhaṃ dvedhā cakāra saḥ // 7.8.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
avatīrya ca saṃgṛhya kṛpāṇīṃ siṃhadehataḥ / khaḍgaṃ cāruhya so 'traiva vṛkṣe rātrimuvāsa tām // 7.8.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātastato 'vatīrṇaś ca pratasthe gomukhānvitaḥ / naravāhanadatto 'tastāṃ sa karpūrikāṃ prati // 7.8.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha padbhyāṃ prayāntaṃ taṃ siṃhena hatavāhanam / dṛṣṭvā vinodayannevamuvāca pathi gomukhaḥ // 7.8.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
deva prāsaṅgikīmetāṃ kathāmākhyāmi te śṛṇu / astīhairāvatī nāma nagarī vijitālakā // 7.8.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāmabhūtparityāgaseno nāma mahīpatiḥ / babhūvatuś ca tasya dve devyau prāṇasame priye // 7.8.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekā svamantritanayā nāmato 'dhikasaṃgamā / nāmnā tu kāvyālaṃkārā dvitīyā rājavaṃśajā // 7.8.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tābhyāṃ samaṃ ca so 'putro rājā putrārthamambikām / ārādhayannirāhāro darbhaśāyī vyadhāttapaḥ // 7.8.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sā taṃ tapastuṣṭā svapne dattvā phaladvayam / divyaṃ samādiśatsākṣādbhavānī bhaktavatsalā // 7.8.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttiṣṭha dehi dārebhyo bhakṣyam etat phaladvayam / tato rājan pravīrau te janiṣyete sutāv ubhau // 7.8.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvāntardadhe gaurī prabuddhaḥ sa ca bhūpatiḥ / nananda prātar utthāya haste paśyannubhe phale // 7.8.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svapnena tena cānandya varṇitena parigraham / snāto mṛḍānīm abhyarcya cakāra vratapāraṇam // 7.8.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
naktaṃ copetya tāṃ pūrvaṃ rājñīmadhikasaṃgamām / phalam ekaṃ dadau tasyai sā ca tadbubhuje tadā // 7.8.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tanmandire tasyām uvāsa sa nṛpo niśi / tatpiturmantrimukhyasya nijasya kila gauravāt // 7.8.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac cātra nidadhe saṃpratyātmaśayyāśirontike / dvitīyasyāḥ kṛte devyā dvitīyaṃ kalpitaṃ phalam // 7.8.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
suptasyātra nṛpasyātha rājñī sādhikasaṃgamā / utthāyātmana eva dvāvicchantī sadṛśau sutau // 7.8.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śīrṣāntādbhakṣayām āsa dvitīyam api tatphalam / nisargasiddho nārīṇāṃ sapatnīṣu hi matsaraḥ // 7.8.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
prātaś cotthāya cinvānaṃ tatphalaṃ taṃ mahīpatim / mayaiva tatphalaṃ bhuktaṃ dvitīyamiti sābravīt // 7.8.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa rājā vimanā nirgatyātītya vāsaram / naktaṃ tasyā dvitīyasyā devyā vāsagṛhaṃ yayau // 7.8.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tatphalam ekaṃ tāṃ yācamānāṃ ca so 'bravīt / suptasya me tadapyaśnātsapatnī te chalād iti // 7.8.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sā tanayotpattihetumaprāpya tatphalam / babhūva kāvyālaṃkārā rājñī tūṣṇīṃ suduḥkhitā // 7.8.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
gacchatsvastha dineṣv atra rājñī sādhikasaṃgamā / sagarbhābhūd asūtātha kāle dvau yugapatsutau // 7.8.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājāpi sa tadutpattiphalitasvamanorathaḥ / nandati sma parityāgasenaḥ kṛtamahotsavaḥ // 7.8.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tayoś ca sutayorjyeṣṭhamindīvaranibhekṣaṇam / nāmnendīvarasenaṃ sa nṛpaścakre 'dbhutākṛtim // 7.8.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidadhe ca kanīyāṃsamanicchāsenamākhyayā / tajjananyā yato bhuktaṃ phalaṃ tattadanicchayā // 7.8.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athātra tasya rājñī sā dvitīyā bhūmipasya tat / ālokya kāvyālaṃkārā sāmarṣā samacintayat // 7.8.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
aho ahaṃ sutaprāpteḥ sapatnyā vañcitaitayā / tadetasyā mayāvaśyaṃ kāryā manyupratikriyā // 7.8.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vināśyau tanayāvetāvetadīyau svayuktitaḥ / iti saṃcintya sā tasthau tadupāyaṃ vicinvatī // 7.8.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yathā yathā ca tau tatra vavṛdhāte nṛpātmajau / tathā tathāsyā vavṛdhe hṛdaye vairapādapaḥ // 7.8.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
krameṇa yauvanasthau ca tau vijñāpayataḥ sma tam / rājaputrau svapitaraṃ jigīṣū bhujaśālinau // 7.8.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
astreṣu śikṣitau tāvad āvāṃ saṃprāptayauvanau / tadbhujān viphalān etān bibhratau katham āsvahe // 7.8.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣatriyasyājigīṣasya dhigbāhū dhik ca yauvanam / ato 'nujānīhy adhunā tāta digvijayāya nau // 7.8.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
iti sūnvorvacaḥ śrutvā rājā hṛṣṭo 'numanya saḥ / yātrārambhaṃ parityāgasenaḥ saṃvidadhe tayoḥ // 7.8.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yadyatra saṃkaṭaṃ jātu yuvayoḥ syāttadāmbikā / smartavyārtiharā devī tayā dattau hi me yuvām // 7.8.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā ca sa tau rājā yātrāyai prāhiṇotsutau / yuktau sainyaiḥ sasāmantairjananyā kṛtamaṅgalau // 7.8.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nijaṃ mantripradhānaṃ ca paścānmātām ahaṃ tayoḥ / prajñāsahāyaṃ vyasṛjannāmnā prathamasaṃgamam // 7.8.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
atha tau rājaputrau dvau sabalau bhrātarau kramāt / gatvā prācīṃ diśaṃ pūrvaṃ jigyatuḥ prājyavikramau // 7.8.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'pratihatau vīrau militānekapārthivau / jetuṃ siddhapratāpau tau jagmaturdakṣiṇāṃ diśam // 7.8.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāṃ ca vārtāṃ tayoḥ śrutvā pitarau tau nanandatuḥ / jajvālāparamātā tu sāntarvidveṣavahninā // 7.8.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etābhyāṃ bhujadarpeṇa pṛthvīṃ jitvā nihatya mām / rājyaṃ madīyaṃ svīkartuṃ matputrābhyāṃ vicintitam // 7.8.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tadyūyaṃ mayi bhaktāścettadetāvatra matsutau / avicāry aiva yuṣmābhirnihantavyāvubhāvapi // 7.8.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti tatkaṭakasthebhyaḥ sāmantebhyas tataḥ śaṭhā / rājādeśaṃ tadā rātrī tannāmnaivābhilikhya sā // 7.8.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃdhivigrahakāyasthenāhṛtenārthasaṃcayaiḥ / upāṃśu kāvyālaṃkārā vyasṛjallekhahārakam // 7.8.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sa ca guptaṃ tayorgatvā kaṭakaṃ rājaputrayoḥ / sāmantebhyo dadau tebhyastāṃllekhāṃllekhahārakaḥ // 7.8.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
te vācayitvā tānsarve rājanītiṃ sukarkaśām / vicintya tāṃ prabhorājñāmanullaṅghyāmavetya ca // 7.8.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
rātrau militvā saṃmantrya nihatuṃ tau nṛpātmajau / vivaśā niścayaṃ cakrustadguṇāvarjitā api // 7.8.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac ca buddhv aiva tanmadhyādekasya suhṛdo mukhāt / tau sa mātāmaho mantrī rājaputrau saha sthitaḥ // 7.8.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhodhayitvā yathātattvam āropya varavājinoḥ / apasāritavān guptaṃ tatkālaṃ kaṭakāt tataḥ // 7.8.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tenāpasāritau tau ca vrajantau niśi tadyutau / vindhyāṭavīṃ viviśaturmārgājñānānnṛpātmajau // 7.8.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatra rātrāvatītāyāṃ kramātprakrāmyatostayoḥ / madhyāhne 'titṛṣākrāntau hayau pañcatvamāpatuḥ // 7.8.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca mātāmaho vṛddhaḥ kṣuttṛṣṇāśuṣkatālukaḥ / vyapadyatātapaklāntaḥ śrāntayoḥ paśyatostayoḥ // 7.8.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anāgasau kathaṃ pitrā gamitau svo daśāmimām / sakāmāṃ kurvatā tāṃ nau duṣṭāmaparamātaram // 7.8.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti tau tatra śocantau duḥkhitau bhrātarau tataḥ / prākpitraivopadiṣṭāṃ tāṃ devīṃ dadhyaturambikām // 7.8.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyā dhyānaprabhāveṇa śaraṇyāyāstadaiva tau / vigatakṣutklamatṛṣau balinau ca babhūvatuḥ // 7.8.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatas tatpratyayāśvastāvavijñātapathaśramau / tām eva yayaturdraṣṭuṃ vindhyakāntāravāsinīm // 7.8.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra prāptau tadagre ca bhrātarau tāvubhāvapi / prārabhetāṃ nirāhārau tāmārādhayituṃ tapaḥ // 7.8.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atrāntare ca te tatra sāmantāḥ kaṭake sthitāḥ / saṃbhūya yāvadāyānti tayoḥ pāpaṃ cikīrṣavaḥ // 7.8.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvatkvacinna dadṛśurvicinvanto 'pi sarvataḥ / tau samātāmahau kvāpi rājaputrau palāyitau // 7.8.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataś cāśaṅkya taṃ mantrabhedaṃ sarve 'pi te bhayāt / rājñas tasya parityāgasenasyāntikamāyayuḥ // 7.8.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pradarśya tasmai lekhāṃś ca yathāvṛttaṃ tamabruvan / so 'tha buddhvā tadudbhrāntaḥ kruddhastānevam abravīt // 7.8.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
naite matprahitā lekhā indrajālaṃ kim apy adaḥ / yūyaṃ ca na kimetāvadapi jānītha bāliśāḥ // 7.8.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yadanalpatapaḥprāptāvahaṃ hanmi kathaṃ sutau / yuṣmābhistau hatāveva sukṛtaiḥ svaistu rakṣitau // 7.8.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mātāmahena ca tayor darśitaṃ mantritāphalam / ity uktvā tān sa sāmantān kāyasthaṃ kūṭalekhakam // 7.8.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ palāyitam apy āśu svaśaktyānāyya bhūpatiḥ / samyakpṛṣṭvā yathāvṛttaṃ yathāvannigṛhītavān // 7.8.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhāryāṃ ca kāvyālaṃkārāṃ tādṛkkāryavidhāyinīm / bhūgṛhe sa nicikṣepa pāpāṃ tāṃ putraghātinīm // 7.8.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
avicārya tu paryantamatidveṣāndhayā dhiyā / sahasā hi kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ kathaṃ mā bhūd vipattaye // 7.8.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ye ca te rājaputrābhyāṃ saha gatvābhyupāgatāḥ / sāmantāstānnivāryānyāṃstatpade sa nṛpo vyadhāt // 7.8.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasthau ca vārtām anviṣyan satataṃ putrayos tayoḥ / tanmātrā saha duḥkhārto dharmāsakto 'mbikāṃ smaran // 7.8.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca rājaputrasya tapasā sānujasya sā / tasyendīvarasenasya tuṣṭābhūd vindhyavāsinī // 7.8.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dattvā ca khaḍgaṃ svapne sā sākṣādevaṃ tamādiśat / asya prabhāvāt khaḍgasya śatrūñjeṣyasi durjayān // 7.8.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
cintayiṣyasi yatkiṃcittac ca saṃpatsyate tava / dvāvapyetena ca yuvāmiṣṭasiddhimavāpsyathaḥ // 7.8.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ity uktvāntarhitāyāṃ ca devyaṃ tasyāṃ prabudhya saḥ / tatrendīvarasenastaṃ hastasthaṃ khaḍgamaikṣata // 7.8.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha khaḍgena tatsvapnavarṇanena ca so nujam / āśvāsya cakre tadyuktaḥ prātarvanyena pāraṇam // 7.8.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tataḥ praṇamya devīṃ tāṃ tatprasādahṛtaklamaḥ / hṛṣṭastatkhaḍgahastaś ca samaṃ bhrātrā yayau tataḥ // 7.8.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā ca dūraṃ sa prāpadekaṃ puravaraṃ mahat / kurvāṇaṃ meruśikharabhrāntiṃ hemamayairgṛhaiḥ // 7.8.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatra raudraṃ dadarśaikaṃ pratolīdvāri rākṣasam / papraccha taṃ ca vīro 'sya purasyākhyāṃ patiṃ ca saḥ // 7.8.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
idaṃ śailapuraṃ nāma nagaraṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ / adhyāste yamadaṃṣṭrākhyaḥ svāmī naḥ śatrumardanaḥ // 7.8.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukte rakṣasā tena yamadaṃṣṭrajighāṃsayā / tatrendīvaraseno 'tha sa praveṣṭuṃ pravṛttavān // 7.8.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nirundhantaṃ ca taṃ dvāḥsthaṃ rākṣasaṃ sa mahābhujaḥ / ekakhaḍgaprahāreṇa śiraśchittvā nyapātayat // 7.8.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ hatvā rājabhavanaṃ praviśyāntardadarśa saḥ / śūraḥ siṃhāsanasthaṃ taṃ yamadaṃṣṭraṃ niśācaram // 7.8.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
daṃṣṭrāghoramukhaṃ vāmapārśvasthitavarāṅganam / āśritetarapārśvaṃ ca kumāryā divyarūpayā // 7.8.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvā ca so 'mbikādattakhaḍgahasto raṇāya tam / āhūtavānsa cottasthau khaḍgamākṛṣya rākṣasaḥ // 7.8.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pravṛtte ca tayoryuddhe chinnaśchinno 'tha rakṣasaḥ / tasyendīvarasenena mūrdhā muhurajāyata // 7.8.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāṃ tasya māyām ālokya tatpārśvasthitayā tayā / kurmāyā kṛtasaṃjñaḥ sandarśanenānuraktayā // 7.8.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa rājaputraś chittvaiva rakṣasas tasya tacchiraḥ / bhūyaḥ khaḍgaprahāreṇa laghuhasto dvidhākarot // 7.8.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tayāsya naṣṭamāyasya rakṣasaḥ pratimāyayā / nājāyata punarmūrdhā tena rakṣo vyapādi tat // 7.8.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hate tasmin prahṛṣṭe te tadvarastrīkumārike / sānujo rājaputro 'sāv upaviśyātha pṛṣṭavān // 7.8.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āsīt kim īdṛśe 'muṣmin pure dvāḥsthaikarakṣitaḥ / rākṣaso 'yaṃ yuvāṃ ke ca hate 'smin kiṃ ca hṛṣyathaḥ // 7.8.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvā tayor madhyāt kumārī sā jagāda tam / asmiñ śailapure vīrabhujo nāmābhavan nṛpaḥ // 7.8.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
eṣā madanadaṃṣṭreti bhāryā tasya sa cāmunā / māyayā rākṣasenaitya yamadaṃṣṭreṇa bhakṣitaḥ // 7.8.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
grastaḥ paricchadaścāsya surūpeti na bhakṣitā / ekā madanadaṃṣṭraiṣā bhāryā ca vihitātmanaḥ // 7.8.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vivikte ramye 'smin pure nirmāya kāñcanān / gṛhāneṣo 'nayā krīḍannāstāpāstaparicchadaḥ // 7.8.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ ca khaḍgadaṃṣṭrākhyā kanīyasyasya rakṣasaḥ / bhaginī kanyakā dṛṣṭe tvayi sadyo 'nurāgiṇī // 7.8.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ato hate 'smin hṛṣṭeyam ahaṃ ca tadihādhunā / upayacchasva māmāryaputra premasamarpitām // 7.8.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktavatīṃ khaḍgadaṃṣṭrā sa pariṇītavān / tāmindīvaraseno 'tha gāndharvavidhinā tadā // 7.8.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasthau cātraiva nagare devīkhaḍgaprabhāvataḥ / cintitopanamadbhogaḥ kṛtadāro 'nujānvitaḥ // 7.8.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā ca kanīyāṃsaṃ bhrātaraṃ vyomagāmini / svakhaḍgacintāratnasya prabhāvāddhyānanirmite // 7.8.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
vimāne vīramāropya so 'nicchāsenamaśramāt / prāhiṇodantikaṃ pitroḥ svodantāvedanāya tam // 7.8.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi gatvā vimānena tena kṣiprādvihāyasā / purīm anicchāsenas tāṃ pituḥ prāpadirāvatīm // 7.8.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatra tau nandayām āsa pitarau darśanena saḥ / tīvraduḥkhātapaklāntau cakoraviva candramāḥ // 7.8.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upetya cāṅghripatitaḥ paryāyāliṅgitastayoḥ / nirāsa pṛcchatoḥ śaṅkāṃ bhrātṛkalyāṇavārtayā // 7.8.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
śaśaṃsa taṃ ca vṛttāntametayoḥ purato 'khilam / āpātaduḥkhaṃ saukhyāntaṃ bhraturātmana eva ca // 7.8.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
śuśrāva cātra vihitaṃ tādṛśaṃ pāpayā tayā / dveṣeṇāparamātrā tadātmanāśāya kaitavam // 7.8.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ pitrotsavavatā yukto mātrā ca nirvṛtaḥ / tasthāv anicchāseno 'tra pūjyamāno janena sa // 7.8.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
yāte katipayāhe ca dṛṣṭaduḥsvapnaśaṅkitaḥ / bhrātaraṃ prati sotkaś ca pitaraṃ sa vyajijñapat // 7.8.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gacchāmi yuṣmadutkaṇṭhāmabhidhāyānayāmy aham / āryendīvarasenaṃ tamanujānīhi tāta mām // 7.8.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvānumatas tena pitrā putrotsukena saḥ / jananyā ca vimānaṃ svaṃ tadevāruhya satvaraḥ // 7.8.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāyād anicchāsenas tadvyomnā śailapuraṃ puram / prātaś ca tatra prāvikṣatsvabhrātus tasya mandiram // 7.8.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
dadarśa tatra niḥsaṃjñaṃ patitasthitamagrajam / rudatyorantike khaḍgadaṃṣṭrāmadanadaṃṣṭrayoḥ // 7.8.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kimetad iti saṃbhrāntaṃ pṛcchantaṃ tamadhomukhī / jagāda khaḍgadaṃṣṭrā sā ninditāparayā tayā // 7.8.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvayyasthite mayi snātuṃ gatāyām ekadānayā / tvadbhrātāyaṃ sahāraṃsta raho madanadaṃṣṭrayā // 7.8.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣaṇātsnātvāgatā cāhaṃ sākṣādenaṃ tathā sthitam / etayā yuktamadrākṣaṃ vācā ca nirabhartsayam // 7.8.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'nunītāpy etena niyatyevāvilaṅghyayā / īrṣyayā mohitātyarthamaham evam acintayam // 7.8.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho agaṇayitvaiva māmayaṃ bhajate 'parām / jāne 'sya khaḍgamāhātmyakṛtto darpo 'yamīdṛśaḥ // 7.8.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad asya gopayāmy enam iti saṃcintya mūḍhayā / etatkhaḍgo niśi kṣiptaḥ supte 'smin dahane mayā // 7.8.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kalaṅkitaś ca khaḍgo 'sau gataś caiṣa daśām imām / anutaptāsmi cākruṣṭā tato madanadaṃṣtrayā // 7.8.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaitasyāṃ ca mayi ca dvayoḥ śokāndhacetasoḥ / maraṇādhyavasāyinyorāgatastvam ihādhunā // 7.8.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadgṛhāṇa tvam evaitatkhaḍgaṃ nistriṃśakarmikām / atyaktajātidharmāṃ māmetenaiva nipātaya // 7.8.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktaḥ sa tayānicchāseno 'tra bhrātṛjāyayā / tāpādavadhyāṃ matvā tāṃ chettum aicchan nijaṃ śiraḥ // 7.8.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
m aivaṃ kārṣīrmṛto nāyaṃ rājaputra tavāgrajaḥ / khaḍgapramādakopena devyā tveṣa vimohitaḥ // 7.8.168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asyāṃ ca khaḍgadaṃṣṭrāyāṃ mantavyā nāparādhitā / yataḥ śāpāvatīrṇānāmetaddhastavijṛmbhitam // 7.8.169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

iti tatkālamudbhūtām antarikṣātsarasvatīm / śrutvā nivavṛte 'nicchāsenaḥ sa maraṇodyamāt // 7.8.171	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āruhy aiva vimānaṃ tadgṛhītvāgnikalaṅkitam / khaḍgaṃ taṃ vindhyavāsinyāḥ pādamūlaṃ jagāma saḥ // 7.8.172	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra mūrdhopahāreṇa toṣayiṣyannupoṣitaḥ / devīṃ tāmudgatāmetāṃ gaganādaśṛṇodgiram // 7.8.173	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

etaddivyaṃ vacaḥ śrutvā tatkṣaṇaṃ niṣkalaṅkatām / prāptaṃ dṛṣṭvā kare khaḍgaṃ kṛtvā tasyāḥ pradakṣiṇam // 7.8.175	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tatra dṛṣṭotthitaṃ sadyo labdhasaṃjñaṃ tamagrajam / jagrāha pādayoḥ sāśruḥ kaṇṭhe so 'py enamagrahīt // 7.8.177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvayā nau rakṣito bhartetyubhe te pādayos tataḥ / nipatya bhrātṛjāye tamanicchāsenamūcatuḥ // 7.8.178	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athendīvarasenāya pṛcchate so 'grajāya tat // 7.8.179	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)

tato bhrātrārpitaṃ khaḍgaṃ gṛhītvā tatprabhāvataḥ / dhyātopanatamāruhya vimānaṃ sumahac ca saḥ // 7.8.182	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sahemamandiro bhāryādvayena saha sānujaḥ / tāmindīvarasenaḥ svāṃ purīmāgādirāvatīm // 7.8.183	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāvatīrya nabhaso vismayālokito janaiḥ / rājaveśma pituḥ pārśvaṃ viveśa saparicchadaḥ // 7.8.184	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathabhūtaś ca pitaraṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā mātaraṃ ca saḥ / papāta pādayoścāśrudhārādhautamukhastayoḥ // 7.8.185	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

kathāprasaṅgād buddhvā ca tasya te pūrvanirmite / divyavākkathite bhārye yayatustau parāṃ mudam // 7.8.188	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vimānagatisauvarṇamandirānayanādinā / prabhāveṇa sutasyāsya vismayena nanandatuḥ // 7.8.189	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

ekadā ca parityāgasenaṃ taṃ janakaṃ nṛpam / vijñapya sānujaḥ prāyātpunardigvijayāya saḥ // 7.8.191	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
khaḍgaprabhāvāj jitvā ca pṛthvīṃ kṛtsnāṃ mahābhujaḥ / āyayau hemahastyaśvaratnānyāhṛtya bhūbhujām // 7.8.192	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

kambuvatyabhidānāyāṃ devyāṃ tasya sutau kramāt / jātau dvau padmasenaś ca rūpasenaś ca sadguṇau // 7.8.199	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

īrṣyāndhabhāryākalahaṃ soḍhuṃ śaknomi nānvaham / tapovanāya gacchāmi nirvedasyāsya śāntaye // 7.8.203	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

sābhilāṣo 'nusartuṃ tvāṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ yallakṣito mayā / tadeṣa rūpaseno 'pi bhāvī bhrātaiva tatra te // 7.8.208	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dvibhāryatvakṛtaṃ kiṃcidduḥkhaṃ tatrāpyavāpsyasi / evam uktvā viramyetthaṃ śāpāntamakarotsa naḥ // 7.8.209	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājaputro bhuvaṃ jitvā pṛthvīṃ pitroḥ pradāsyasi / yadā tadā sahāmībhirjātiṃ smṛtvā vimokṣyase // 7.8.210	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

sa padmasenas tātāyam ahaṃ jātaḥ sutastava / nāmnendīvaraseno 'tra kartavyaṃ ca kṛtaṃ mayā // 7.8.212	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
yo 'paro rūpasenaś ca vidyādharakumārakaḥ / anicchāsena ityeva jātaḥ so 'nuja eva me // 7.8.213	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yā sādityaprabhā bhāryā yā ca candrāvatīti me / viddhi te dve ime khaḍgadaṃṣṭrāmadanadaṃṣṭrike // 7.8.214	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

evam uktvārthalobhena preṣitā tena pāpmana / āgānmānaparā tasya pārśvaṃ sukhadhanasya sā // 7.9.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mārgati sma ca mūlyena tān vastrasahitān hayān / racitasvāgatāt tasmāt tadrūpāhṛtacakṣuṣaḥ // 7.9.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca tāṃ kāmavivaśo nītvaikānte 'bravīdvaṇik / mūlyena vastram ekaṃ te hayaṃ vā na dadāmy aham // 7.9.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vatsyasyekāṃ niśāṃ sākaṃ mayā cettaddadāmi te / śatāni vājināṃ pañcasahasrāṇi ca vāsasām // 7.9.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā so 'dhikenāpi tāṃ prārthayata sundarīm / strīṣvanargalaceṣṭāsu kasyecchā nopajāyate // 7.9.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sā pratyavocattam evaṃ pṛcchāmy ahaṃ patim / atrāpi hi sa jāne māṃ prerayedatilobhataḥ // 7.9.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā svagṛhaṃ gatvā patye tasmai tad abravīt / yaduktā tena vaṇijā rahaḥ sukhadhanena sā // 7.9.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
so 'tha pāpo 'rthalobhastaṃ kīnāśaḥ patirabravīt / priye vastrasahasrāṇi pañca vājiśatāni ca // 7.9.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekayā yadi labhyante rātryā doṣastadatra kaḥ / tadgaccha pārśvaṃ tasyādya prabhāte drutameṣyasi // 7.9.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
etac chrutvā vacas tasya bhartuḥ kāpuruṣasya sā / hṛdi mānaparā jātavicikitsā vyacintayat // 7.9.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dāravikrayiṇaṃ pāpaṃ hīnasattvaṃ dhig astv imam / lobhabhāvanayā nityaṃ bata tan mayatāṃ gatam // 7.9.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
varaṃ sa eva bhartā me yo māmaśvaśatairniśām / cīnapaṭṭasahasraiś ca krīṇātyekāmudāradhīḥ // 7.9.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ālocya na me doṣa ityanujñāpya taṃ tataḥ / kubhartāramagāt tasya gṛhaṃ sukhadhanasya sā // 7.9.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca tām āgatāṃ dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭvā buddhvā ca tattathā / citrīyamāṇas tatprāpteramaṃstātmani dhanyatām // 7.9.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
prāhiṇoccārthalobhāya tasmai tatpataye drutam / tacchulkabhūtān aśvāṃś ca vastrāṇi ca yathoditam // 7.9.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
uvāsa ca tayā sākaṃ pūrṇakāmaḥ sa tāṃ niśām / mūrtayeva ciraprāptanijasaṃpatphalaśriyā // 7.9.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātaś cāhvayakān bhṛtyān arthalobhena nisrapam / klībena tena prahitān sātha mānaparābravīt // 7.9.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
vikrītā saṃgatānyena bhūtvā tasya kathaṃ punaḥ / bhāryā bhavāmi nirlajjaḥ sa yahā kimahaṃ tathā // 7.9.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yūyam eva mama brūta yadyetacchobhate 'dhunā / tadyāta yena krītāsmi sa eva hi patirmama // 7.9.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ity uktāste tayā bhṛtyāstato gatvā tathaiva tat / abruvannarthalobhāya vākyaṃ tasyā adhomukhāḥ // 7.9.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tac chrutvā balādaicchadānetuṃ tāṃ narādhamaḥ / tato harabalo nāma vayasyastam abhāṣata // 7.9.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na sā sukhadhanāt tasmād ānetuṃ śakyate tvayā / pravīrasya na tasyāgre tava paśyāmi dhīratām // 7.9.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa hi tyāgānurāgiṇyā nāryā śūrīkṛtas tayā / balī ca balibhiścānyairyukto mittraiḥ sahāgataḥ // 7.9.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvaṃ tu kārpaṇyavikrītaviviktadayitojjhitaḥ / avamānanirutsāho garhitaḥ klībatāṃ gataḥ // 7.9.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na ca svato balī tādṛṅ na ca mittrabalānvitaḥ / tatkathaṃ tvaṃ samarthaḥ syās tasya pratyarthino jaye // 7.9.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājā ca kupyed buddhvā te dāravikrayaduṣkṛtam / tattūṣṇīṃ bhava bhūyo 'pi mā kṛthā hāsyavibhramam // 7.9.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti sakhyā niṣiddho 'pi krodhāgatvā sasainikaḥ / yāvad ruṇaddhy arthalobho gṛhaṃ sukhadhanasya saḥ // 7.9.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
tāvattasya samittrasya sainyaiḥ sukhadhanasya tat / sainyaṃ tadīyaṃ nirgatya kṛtsnaṃ bhagnamabhūtkṣaṇāt // 7.9.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tataḥ palāyitaḥ prāyātso 'rthalobho nṛpāntikam / dārāḥ sukhadhanākhyena vaṇijā deva me hṛtāḥ // 7.9.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti vyajijñapaccātra nṛpaṃ nihnutadurnayaḥ / nṛpo 'py aicchadavaṣṭabdhuṃ sa taṃ sukhadhanaṃ ruṣā // 7.9.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ saṃdhānanāmā taṃ mantrī rājānam abravīt / yathātathā na śakyo 'sav avaṣṭabdhuṃ vaṇikprabho // 7.9.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyaikādaśabhirmittraiḥ sahāyātairyutasya hi / lakṣamabhyadhikaṃ deva vartate varavājinām // 7.9.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tattvaṃ ca nātra vijñātaṃ nahyetatsyādakāraṇam / tatpreṣya dūtaṃ praṣṭavyaḥ kiṃ tāvatso 'tra jalpati // 7.9.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
iti mantrivacaḥ śrutvā rājā bāhubalas tataḥ / praṣṭuṃ tatprāhiṇoddūtaṃ tasmai sukhadhanāya saḥ // 7.9.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa dūtastaṃ tadādeśād gatvā yāvac ca pṛcchati / tāvanmānaparā sāsmai svavṛttāntaṃ tam abhyadhāt // 7.9.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutvaiva ca tadāścaryaṃ rūpaṃ tasyāś ca vīkṣitum / gṛhaṃ sukhadhanasyāgāt sārthalobho mahīpatiḥ // 7.9.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāpaśyatsukhadhane prahve mānaparāṃ sa tām / vidhātur api lāvaṇyalakṣmya vismayadāyinīm // 7.9.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
pādānatāyāḥ so 'syāś ca pṛṣṭāyāś ca svayaṃ mukhāt / aśṛṇottadyathāvṛttamarthalobhasya śṛṇvataḥ // 7.9.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutvā ca matvā satyaṃ tadarthalobhe niruttare / tām apṛcchatsa sumukhīṃ kimidānīṃ bhavatviti // 7.9.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tataḥ sā niścitāvādīddeva yenāsmyanāpadi / vikrītānyasya niḥsattvaṃ lubdhaṃ kathamupaimi tam // 7.9.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvā nṛpe tasmin sādhūktamiti vādini / avocatso 'rthalobho 'tra kāmakrodhatrapākulaḥ // 7.9.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayaṃ sukhadhano rājannahaṃ cānubalaṃ vinā / yudhyāvahe svasainyābhyāṃ sattvāsattvamavekṣyatām // 7.9.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity arthalobhasya vacaḥ śrutvā sukhadhano 'bhyadhāt / tarhi yudhyāvahe hy āvāṃ dvāveva kimu sainikaiḥ // 7.9.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
yaḥ prāpsyati jayaṃ mānaparā tasya bhaviṣyati / śrutvaitadbāḍhamastvevamiti rājāpyabhāṣata // 7.9.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato mānaparāyāṃ ca rājñi cāvekṣamāṇayoḥ / yuddhabhūmiṃ hayārūḍhau tāvavātaratāmubhau // 7.9.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pravṛtte cāhave tatra kuntāghātotpataddhayam / arthalobhaṃ sukhadhanaḥ paryāsthadvasudhātale // 7.9.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tathaiva vārāṃ strīn anyān hatāśvaṃ patitaṃ kṣitau / dhīrayandharmayodhī sa na taṃ sukhadhano 'vadhīt // 7.9.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vāre tu pañcame 'śvena patitvopari tāḍitaḥ / arthalobhaḥ sa niśceṣṭastato bhṛtyairanīyata // 7.9.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sukhadhanaṃ sarvaiḥ sādhuvādābhipūjitam / sa taṃ bāhubalo rājā yathocitamamānayat // 7.9.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prābhṛtaṃ ca tadānītaṃ tasma eva samarpayat / aharaccārthalobhasya sarvasvamaśubhārjitam // 7.9.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatpade cāparaṃ kṛtvā tuṣṭaḥ prāyātsvamandiram / nivṛttapāpasaṃparkāḥ santo yānti hi nirvṛtim // 7.9.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi prasahya viharann āsīt sukhadhanaḥ sukham / sahito mānaparayā bhāryayā cānuraktayā // 7.9.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
evaṃ dārāḥ palāyante hīnasattvāddhanāni ca / susattvasyopatiṣṭhante svayametya yatas tataḥ // 7.9.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadalaṃ cintayā nidrāṃ bhajasva nacireṇa hi / rājaputrīmavāptāsi tvaṃ tāṃ karpūrikāṃ prabho // 7.9.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti rājyadharāc chrutvā rātrau tatrārthavadvacaḥ / naravāhanadattaḥ sa bheje nidrāṃ sagomukhaḥ // 7.9.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātaś cātra kṛtāhāraḥ kṣaṇaṃ yāvatsa tiṣṭhati / tāvatsa gomukho dhīmāṃstaṃ rājyadharamabhyadhāt // 7.9.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kuru yantravimānaṃ tanmatprabhorasya yena tat / karpūrasaṃbhavapuraṃ prāpya prāpnoty asau priyām // 7.9.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
etac chrutvā sa takṣāsmai vātayantravimānakam / naravāhanadattāya pūrvakḷptamaḍhaukayat // 7.9.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāruhya manaḥśīghre khagāmini sagomukhaḥ / taddhairyālokasollāsamivocchalitavīcikam // 7.9.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
makarākaramullaṅghya prāpa tattīravarti saḥ / naravāhanadattastatpuraṃ karpūrasaṃbhavam // 7.9.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāvatīrṇānnabhaso vimānādavaruhya saḥ / purāntaḥ paribabhrāma kautukena sagomukhaḥ // 7.9.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
pṛṣṭāc ca lokato buddhvā tadevābhīpsitaṃ puram / prāptaṃ niḥsaṃśayaṃ hṛṣṭo yayau rājakulāntikam // 7.9.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatraikaṃ ruciraṃ veśma vṛddhayādhiṣṭhitaṃ striyā / sa viveśa nivāsāya namrayānumatastayā // 7.9.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yuktiṃ jijñāsamānaś ca kṣaṇāt papraccha tāṃ striyam / ārye kimabhidhāno 'tra rājāpatyaṃ ca tasya kim // 7.9.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rūpaṃ ca tasya naḥ śaṃsa yato vaideśikā vayam / ity uktā tena vṛddhā sā taṃ vilokyottamākṛtim // 7.9.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pratyuvāca mahābhāga śṛṇu sarvaṃ vadāmi te / iha karpūrako nāma rājā karpūrasaṃbhave // 7.9.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa cānapatyaḥ saṃtānahetoruddiśya śaṃkaram / buddhikāryā samaṃ devyā nirāhāro 'karottapaḥ // 7.9.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
trirātropoṣitaṃ devo haraḥ svapne tamādiśat / uttiṣṭha putrābhyadhikā sā te kanyā janiṣyate // 7.9.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
vidyādharāṇāṃ sāmrājyaṃ yasyāḥ patiravāpsyati / ity ādiṣṭo hareṇāsau prataḥ prābuddha bhūpatiḥ // 7.9.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
nivedya buddhikāryai ca devyai svapnaṃ tamutthitaḥ / prahṛṣṭo 'tha tayā sākaṃ cakāra vratapāraṇam // 7.9.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tasyācirādrājño rājñī garbhamadhatta sā / kāle cāsūta saṃpūrṇe kanyāṃ sarvāṅgasundarīm // 7.9.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yayā prabhājitās tatra jātaveśmani dīpakāḥ / kajjalodgāramiṣato niḥśvāsanamucann iva // 7.9.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
karpūriketi tasyāś ca nijaṃ nāma tataḥ pitā / eṣa karpūriko rājā vyadhatta vihitotsavaḥ // 7.9.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kramāc ca vṛddhiṃ prāptā sā lokalocanacandrikā / karpūrikā rājaputrī yauvanasthādya vartate // 7.9.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
pitā ceha nṛpas tasyā vivāhamabhikāṅkṣati / puruṣadveṣiṇī sā tu taṃ necchati manasvinī // 7.9.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kanyājanmaphalaṃ kasmādvivāhaṃ sakhi necchasi / iti matsutayā sā ca sakhyā pṛṣṭedam abravīt // 7.9.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sakhi jātismarāyā me prāgvṛttaṃ śṛṇu kāraṇam / asti tīre mahāmbhodhermahāṃścandanapādapaḥ // 7.9.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāsti nikaṭe phullanalinālaṃkṛtaṃ saraḥ / tatrāhamabhavaṃ haṃsī pūrvajanmani karmataḥ // 7.9.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāhamabdhitaṭājjātu tasmiṃścandanapādape / akārṣaṃ rājahaṃsena svena bhartrā sahālayam // 7.9.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrālaye vasantyā me prajātān potakān sutān / akasmād etya balavān samudrormir apāharat // 7.9.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
hṛteṣv apatyeṣv oghena krandanty aham anaśnatī / āsaṃ śucābdhitīrasthaśivaliṅgāgravartinī // 7.9.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa rājahaṃso māmupetya patirabhyadhāt / uttiṣṭha kimapatyāni vyatītānyanuśocasi // 7.9.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyāni nau bhaviṣyanti sarvaṃ jīvadbhir āpyate / iti tadvākśareṇāhaṃ hṛdi viddhā vyacintayam // 7.9.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dhig aho puruṣāḥ pāpā bālāpatyeṣv apīdṛśāḥ / niḥsnehā niṣkṛpāścaiva strīṣu bhaktimatīṣvapi // 7.9.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tanme kimamunā patyā kiṃ vā dehena duḥkhinā / ity ālocya haraṃ natvā kṛtvā bhaktyā ca taṃ hṛdi // 7.9.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatraiva puratas tasya patyur haṃsasya paśyataḥ / jātismarā rājaputrī bhūyāsaṃ jananāntare // 7.9.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
iti saṃkalpya tatkṣiptaṃ śarīraṃ jaladhau mayā / tato 'haṃ sakhi jātādya tathābhūteha janmani // 7.9.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pūrvajātau ca tasyāṃ tāṃ bhartus tasya nṛśaṃsatām / saṃsmarantyā na kasmiṃścidvare rajyati me manaḥ // 7.9.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ato vivāhaṃ necchāmi daivāyattamataḥ param / ity uktaṃ rājasutayā matsutāyai tayā rahaḥ // 7.9.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tayā matsutayāpyetan mahyam āgatya varṇitam / tadevaṃ te mayā khyātaṃ putra yatpṛṣṭavānasi // 7.9.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tav aiva bhāvinī bhāryā nūnaṃ caiṣā nṛpātmajā / sarvavidyādharāṇāṃ hi bhaviṣyaccakravartinaḥ // 7.9.168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mahiṣīyaṃ samādiṣṭā pūrvaṃ devena śaṃbhunā / tallakṣaṇaiś ca yuktaṃ tvāṃ paśyāmi tilakādibhiḥ // 7.9.169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃsvittadarthamānītaḥ ko'pi tvam iha vedhasā / uttiṣṭha tāvan madgehe drakṣyāmaḥ kiṃ bhaviṣyati // 7.9.170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)

sūryaprabhasya jāmātustatpituś ca tayoḥ punaḥ / upacāraṃ sa sadratnaiścakāra viṣayaistathā // 8.1.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tanmantriṇo yathāvac ca prahastādīnamānayat / cakāra sotsavaṃ hṛṣyadaśeṣanagarījanam // 8.1.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sūryaprabhaś ca tatrāsītpitṛyuktaḥ priyāsakhaḥ / tatkālaṃ vividhāhārapānageyādibhogabhuk // 8.1.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca tatra rambhasya sakāśādvajrarātrataḥ / āgāddūtaḥ sa cāsthāne jagāda svaprabhorvacaḥ // 8.1.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidyābalāvaliptena yuvarājena naḥ kṛtaḥ / sūryaprabheṇa tanayāharaṇotthaḥ parābhavaḥ // 8.1.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
adya ca jñātamasmābhiryadvīrabhaṭabhūbhṛtaḥ / pratipannāḥ stha saṃdhāne samānavyasanasya naḥ // 8.1.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathaiva cānumanyadhve yadyasmatsaṃdhimāśu tat / ihāpyāgamyatāṃ no cenmṛtyunā no 'tra niṣkṛtiḥ // 8.1.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā taṃ ca saṃmānya dūtaṃ vīrabhaṭārcitaḥ / prahastaṃ so 'bravīdrājā tatra candraprabhaḥ punaḥ // 8.1.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvam eva gaccha taṃ rambhamasmadvākyādidaṃ vada / kiṃ tapyase vṛthā bhāvī cakravartī hi nirmitaḥ // 8.1.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidyādharāṇāṃ giriśenaiṣa sūryaprabho 'dhunā / asyaitāstvatsutādyāś ca bhāryāḥ siddhairudāhṛtāḥ // 8.1.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatprāptā te sutā sthānaṃ karkaśastvaṃ tu nārthitaḥ / tatprīyasva sakhā nastvameṣyāmo 'trāpyamī vayam // 8.1.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti rājñoktasaṃdeśaḥ prahasto gaganena saḥ / gatvā praharamātreṇa vajrarātramavāpa tat // 8.1.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra rambhāya saṃdeśamuktvā tenānumoditaḥ / tathaivāgatya so 'vādīdrājñe candraprabhāya tat // 8.1.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
candraprabho 'tha sacivaṃ prabhāsaṃ preṣya śākalāt / ānāyayattāṃ rambhasya pārśvaṃ tārāvalīṃ sutām // 8.1.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tato yayau vimānena saha sūryaprabheṇa saḥ / rājñā vīrabhaṭenāpi sarvaiścānyaiḥ susevitaḥ // 8.1.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vajrarātraṃ ca saṃprāpa mārgonmukhajanākulam / rambheṇābhyudgatas tasya rājadhānīṃ viveśa saḥ // 8.1.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra rambho 'py asau kḷptavivāhaprakriyotsavaḥ / asaṃkhyahemahastyaśvaratnādi duhiturdadau // 8.1.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jāmātaraṃ ca sa tathā sūryaprabhamupācarat / yathā tasya nijā bhogāḥ sarve vismṛtimāyayuḥ // 8.1.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
yāvac ca tatra te tiṣṭhantyutsavānanditāḥ sukham / tāvadrambhāntikaṃ kāñcīnagaryā dūta āyayau // 8.1.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tasmācchrutasaṃdeśo rambhaścandraprabhaṃ nṛpam / prāha kāñciśvaro rājā kumbhīrākhyo 'sti me 'grajaḥ // 8.1.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tenāptaḥ preṣito me 'dya dūto vaktumidaṃ vacaḥ / mama sūryaprabheṇādau sutā nītā tatas tava // 8.1.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtaṃ cādya tvayā sakhyaṃ taiḥ saheti mayā śrutam / tanmamāpi tathaiva tvaṃ sakhyaṃ taiḥ saha sādhaya // 8.1.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āyāntu te mama gṛhaṃ yāvatsūryaprabhāya tām / svahastenārpayāmīha sutāṃ varuṇasenikām // 8.1.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity eṣābhyarthanā tasya kriyatāmiti vādinaḥ / rambhasya śraddadhe candraprabho rājā tadā vacaḥ // 8.1.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prahastaṃ prekṣya ca kṣipraṃ śākalāttām anāyayat / purādvaruṇasenāṃ sa kumbhīrasyāntikaṃ pituḥ // 8.1.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyedyuś ca vimānena sa ca sūryaprabhaś ca saḥ / rambho vīrabhaṭaḥ sarve kāñcīṃ te sānugā yayuḥ // 8.1.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kumbhīrābhyudgatās tāṃ ca nānāratnacitāṃ purīm / kāñcīṃ kāñcīm iva bhuvaḥ prāviśan guṇagumphitām // 8.1.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatratāṃ vidhinā dattvā sutāṃ sūryaprabhāya saḥ / varavadhvoradādbhūri kumbhīro draviṇaṃ tayoḥ // 8.1.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nirvṛtte cavivāhe 'tra bhuktottarasukhasthitam / candraprabhamuvācaivaṃ prahastaḥ sarvasaṃnidhau // 8.1.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
deva śrīkaṇṭhaviṣaye prabhraman gatavān aham / tatra prasaṅgadṛṣṭo māṃ kāntisenanṛpo 'bravīt // 8.1.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sūryaprabho mamādāya sutāṃ kāntimatīṃ hṛtām / gṛhametu kariṣyāmi vidhivattasya satkriyām // 8.1.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
no cettyakṣyāmy ahaṃ dehaṃ duhitṛsnehamohitaḥ / ity uktas tena tatrāhaṃ prastāve ca mayoditam // 8.1.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam ukte prahastena rājā candraprabho 'bhyadhāt / gaccha kāntimatīṃ tarhi tāṃ prāpaya tadantikam // 8.1.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tatra vayaṃ yāma ity uktas tena bhūbhṛtā / tadaiva nabhasā gatvā prahastastattathākarot // 8.1.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātaś ca te sakumbhīrāḥ sarve candraprabhādayaḥ / śrīkaṇṭhaviṣayaṃ jagmurvimānena dyugāminā // 8.1.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāpyagrāgato rājā kāntisenaḥ svamandiram / tāvatpraveśya duhiturvyadhādudvāhamaṅgalam // 8.1.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
dadau tasyi tadā kāntimatyai sūryaprabhāya ca / āścaryajananaṃ rājñāmamitaṃ ratnasaṃcayam // 8.1.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sthiteṣu teṣv atra nānābhogopaseviṣu / sarveṣu dūtaḥ kauśāmbyā āgatyaivamabhāṣata // 8.1.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
janamejayabhūpālo bravīti bhavatāmidam / hṛtā kenāpi naciraṃ parapuṣṭeti me sutā // 8.1.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
jñātaṃ cehāda yatprāptā hastaṃ sūryaprabhasya sā / tattayā saha so 'smākaṃ gṛhamāyātvaśaṅkitaḥ // 8.1.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
satkṛtya preṣayiṣyāmi sabhāryaṃ taṃ yathāvidhi / anyathā śatravo yūyaṃ mama yuṣmākam apy aham // 8.1.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā svāmivacanaṃ dūtastūṣṇīṃ babhūva saḥ / atha candraprabhaḥ sarvānekānte kṣitipo 'bravīt // 8.1.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
katham evaṃ sadarpoktergamyate tasya veśmani / tac chrutvā tasya siddhārthanāmā mantryevam abhyadhāt // 8.1.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nānyathā deva mantavyaṃ vaktum evaṃ hi so 'rhati / sa hi rājā mahādātā paṇḍitaḥ satkulodgataḥ // 8.1.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śūro 'śvamedhayājī ca sadaivānyāparājitaḥ / viruddhaṃ kiṃ nu tenoktaṃ yathāvastvabhidhāyinā // 8.1.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śatrutodāhṛtā yā vā sā vāsavakṛte 'dhunā / tadgantavyaṃ gṛhe tasya satyasaṃdho nṛpo hi saḥ // 8.1.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad api preṣyatāṃ kaścittasya cittopalabdhaye / iti siddhārthavacanaṃ sarve śraddadhuratra te // 8.1.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tato jijñāsituṃ candraprabhastaṃ janamejayam / prahastaṃ vyasṛjattaṃ ca dūtaṃ tasyāpyamānayat // 8.1.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prahastaś ca sa gatvā taṃ kauśāmbīśaṃ sasaṃvidam / vidhāyānīya tallekhaṃ candraprabhamatoṣayat // 8.1.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi rājā tamevāśu prahastaṃ preṣya śākalāt / janamejayapārśvaṃ tāṃ parapuṣṭāmanāyayat // 8.1.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataś candraprabhādyāste sūryaprabhapurogamāḥ / sakāntisenāḥ kauśāmbīṃ vimānenāgamannṛpāḥ // 8.1.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatra saṃbandhijāmātṛmukhān pratyudgamādinā / prahvastān pūjayām āsa sa rājā janamejayaḥ // 8.1.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dadau ca kṛtvā duhiturvivāhavidhisatkriyām / pañca hastisahasrāṇi lakṣaṃ ca varavājinām // 8.1.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ratnakāñcanasadvastrakarpūrāgarupūritaiḥ / bhārair bhṛtānām uṣṭrāṇāṃ sahasrāṇyapi pañca saḥ // 8.1.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
cakre ca vādyanṛttaikamayaṃ lokamahotsavam / pūjitabrāhmaṇavaraṃ mānitākhilarājakam // 8.1.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tāvaccāśaṅkitaṃ tatra nabhaḥ piñjaratāṃ yayau / raktāruṇatvamabhyarṇabhāvi śaṃsadivātmanaḥ // 8.1.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tumulākulaśabdāś ca babhūvuḥ sahasā diśaḥ / bhītā ivāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā parasainyaṃ vihāyasā // 8.1.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca tatkṣaṇaṃ vātuṃ pravṛtto 'bhūn mahānilaḥ / khecaraiḥ saha yuddhāya bhūcarānutkṣipann iva // 8.1.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣaṇāc ca dadṛśe vyomni vidyādharabalaṃ mahat / dīptidyotitadikcakram udyannādaṃ mahājavam // 8.1.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tanmadhye cātisubhagaṃ vidyādharakumārakam / ekaṃ sūryaprabhādyāste paśyanti sma suvismitāḥ // 8.1.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
āṣāḍheśvaratanayo dāmodara eṣa jayati yuvarājaḥ / re martya dharaṇigocara sūryaprabha nipata pādayorasya // 8.1.139	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
praṇama ca re janamejaya bhavatā dattā sutā kim asthāne / ārādhaya tam imaṃ taddevaṃ naiṣo 'nyathā kṣamate // 8.1.140	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
iti tasmin kṣaṇe vidyādharabandī tato 'mbarāt / tasya dāmodarasyāgrāvyājahāroccayā girā // 8.1.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā dṛṣṭatatsainyo gṛhītvā khaḍgacarmaṇī / sūryaprabho nabhaḥ krodhādutpapāta svavidyayā // 8.1.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anūtpetuś ca sacivās tasya sarve dhṛtāyudhāḥ / prahastaś ca prabhāsaś ca bhāsaḥ siddhārtha eva ca // 8.1.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
prajñāḍhyaḥ sarvadamano vītabhītiḥ śubhaṃkaraḥ / vidyādharāṇāṃ taiḥ sākaṃ prāvartata mahāhavaḥ // 8.1.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sūryaprabhaś cābhyadhāvad yato dāmodaras tataḥ / khaḍgenāghnan ripūn gṛhṇaṃs tacchastrāṇi svacarmaṇā // 8.1.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
te janāḥ kati saṃkhye ca lakṣasaṃkhyā nabhaścarāḥ / samatvam eva vividuryudhyamānāḥ parasparam // 8.1.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
babhuḥ khaḍgalatāś cātra sākulā rudhirāruṇāḥ / patantyaḥ śūrakāyeṣu kṛtāntasyeva dṛṣṭayaḥ // 8.1.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidyādharāś ca dharaṇau bhiyeva śaraṇārthinaḥ / śirobhiś ca śarīraiś ca petuścandraprabhāgrataḥ // 8.1.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sūryaprabho babhau lokadṛṣṭayā khecaraśriyā / sindūreṇeva kīrṇena nabho 'bhūd asṛjāruṇam // 8.1.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sūryaprabhaś ca saṃprāpya yuyudhe tena saṃmukham / khaḍgacarmadhareṇaiva saha dāmodareṇa saḥ // 8.1.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yudhyamānaś ca karaṇaprayogeṇa praviśya tam / khaḍgakhaṇḍitacarmāṇaṃ ripuṃ bhūmāvapātayat // 8.1.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
chettumicchati yāvac ca śiras tasya vivellataḥ / tāvad āgatya nabhasā huṃkāro viṣṇunā kṛtaḥ // 8.1.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tac chrutvā vīkṣya ca hariṃ namrastadgauraveṇa saḥ / dāmodaramamuñcattaṃ vadhātsūryaprabhas tataḥ // 8.1.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vadhamuktaṃ tamādāya bhaktaṃ kvāpi yayau hariḥ / bhagavānsa hi sadbhaktam ihāmutra ca rakṣati // 8.1.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dāmodarānugāste ca yayuḥ sarve yatas tataḥ / sūryaprabho 'pi gaganātpituḥ pārśvamavātarat // 8.1.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
sāmātyamakṣataprāptaṃ pitā candraprabhasya tam / abhyanandannṛpāścānye tuṣṭuvurdṛṣṭavikramam // 8.1.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'tra yāvat sarve te hṛṣṭāstatkathayā sthitāḥ / āgāt subhaṭasaṃbandhī tāvaddūto 'paras tataḥ // 8.1.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca candraprabhasyaiva lekhamagre samarpayat / tamudghāṭya ca siddhārthaḥ sadasyevam avācayat // 8.1.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrīmānunnatavaṃśamauktikamaṇiścandraprabho bhūpatī rājā śrīsubhaṭena sādaramidaṃ śrīkoṅkaṇādbodhyate / nītā me tanayāpahṛtya rajanau sattvena kenāpi yā sā prāptā tava sūnunetyavagataṃ yattena tuṣṭā vayam // 8.1.159	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
tadyuktena sutena tena saha tatsūryaprabheṇodyamo yuṣmābhiḥ kriyatām anargalam ihāpyasmadgṛhābhyāgame / yāvattāṃ paralokataḥ punar iva pratyāgatāmātmajāṃ paśyāmaś ca vivāhakāryamadhunā kurmaś ca tasyā vayam // 8.1.160	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
ity atra vācite lekhe siddhārthena tatheti saḥ / rājā candraprabho dūtaṃ saccakāra jaharṣa ca // 8.1.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ānāyayac ca subhaṭasyāntikaṃ candrikāvatīm / tatsutām aparāntaṃ taṃ prahastaṃ preṣya satvaram // 8.1.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātaś ca jagmuḥ sarve te kṛtvā sūryaprabhaṃ puraḥ / aparāntaṃ vimānena janamejayasaṃyutāḥ // 8.1.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tānsubhaṭo rājā duhitṛprāptinanditaḥ / bhṛśamānarca cakre ca sutāpariṇayotsavam // 8.1.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dadau ca candrikāvatyai so 'syai ratnādikaṃ tathā / yathā vīrabhaṭādyāste svadattena lalajjire // 8.1.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sūryaprabhe tatra sthite śvaśuraveśmani / āgāt pauravasaṃbandhī dūto lāvāṇakādapi // 8.1.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi candraprabham idaṃ nijasvāmivaco 'bhyadhāt / sutā sulocanā nītā śrīmatsūryaprabheṇa me // 8.1.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato me naiva saṃtāpastadyuktaḥ kiṃ tu madgṛham / ānīyatāṃ sa yuṣmābhirācāraṃ yad vidadhmahe // 8.1.168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvaiva mudābhyarcya dūtaṃ candraprabho nṛpaḥ / ānāyayatprahastena pituḥ pārśvaṃ sulocanām // 8.1.169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sasubhaṭāḥ sarve saha sūryaprabheṇa te / lāvāṇakaṃ vimānena yayurdhyātopagāminā // 8.1.170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrodvāhotsavaṃ kṛtvā sūryaprabhasulocane / ratnairapūrayatso 'pi pauravo 'rcitarājakaḥ // 8.1.171	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tenopacaryamāṇeṣu sukhastheṣv atra teṣu ca / prajighāya suroho 'pi dūtaṃ cīnanareśvaraḥ // 8.1.172	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'py anyavaddūtamukhenārthayām āsa pārthivaḥ / hṛtakanyastayā sākaṃ teṣāmāgamanaṃ gṛhe // 8.1.173	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataś candraprabho rājā hṛṣṭas tasyāpi tāṃ sutām / vidyunmālāṃ prahastenānāyayām āsa ketanam // 8.1.174	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyedyuś ca vimānena sahasūryaprabhā yayuḥ / candraprabhādyāḥ sarve te cīnadeśaṃ sapauravāḥ // 8.1.175	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatrāgre nirgato rājā nijakoṭṭaṃ praveśya tān / sa suroho 'pi duhituścakre vaivāhikaṃ vidhim // 8.1.176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ādāc ca vidyunmālāyai tasyai sūryaprabhāya ca / asaṃkhyahemahastyaśvaratnacīnāṃśukādikam // 8.1.177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasthuś ca tatra te tais tair bhogaiś candraprabhādayaḥ / dināni katicitsarve surohābhyarcitāstadā // 8.1.178	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āsītsūryaprabhaś cātra vilasaddhanayauvanaḥ / prāvṛṭkālo yathā vidyunmālayā śobhitastayā // 8.1.179	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ sa bubhuje tatra tatra śvaśuraveśmani / tattatkāntāsakhaḥ sūryaprabho bhogānsabāndhavaḥ // 8.1.180	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ saṃmantrya siddhārthapramukhaiḥ sacivaiḥ saha / kramādvīrabhaṭādīṃstānaśvīyasahitānnṛpān // 8.1.181	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
visṛjya nijadeśeṣu taṃ surohamahīpatim / āmantrya tatsutāyuktaḥ pitṛbhyāṃ saha sānugaḥ // 8.1.182	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhūtāsanavimānaṃ tadāruhya vyomavartmanā / svaṃ sa sūryaprabhaḥ prāyācchālakaṃ nagaraṃ kṛtī // 8.1.183	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kvacin nṛttāsaṅgaḥ kvacid api ca saṃgītakarasaḥ kvacit pānakrīḍā kvacana sudṛśāṃ maṇḍanavidhiḥ / kvacil labdhābīṣṭastutimukharavaitālikaravaḥ pure tasminn āsīt pramada iti tasyāgamanajaḥ // 8.1.184	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
tatrānyāḥ pitṛveśmasu sthitavatīrānāyya sa svapriyā dattais tatpitṛbhir gajāśvanivahais tābhiḥ sahaivāgataḥ / nānāratnasupūrṇabhāravinatair uṣṭraiś ca saṃkhyātigair līlādarśitadigjayotthavibhavaś cakre prajākautukam // 8.1.185	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
bahuvasu bhūrinidhānaṃ tena mahābhoginā tadādhyuṣitam / suradhanadabhujaganagaraiḥ kṛtam iva tac chākalaṃ vibabhau // 8.1.186	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
tato madanasenayā saha sa tatra sūryaprabho yathābhimatabhogabhuksakalapūrṇasaṃpatsukhī / uvāsa pitṛsaṃyutaḥ sasacivo 'nyapatnīyutaḥ kṛtāgamanasaṃvidaṃ mayam udīkṣamāṇo 'nvaham // 8.1.187	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
atha tatraikadāsthānasthite candraprabhe nṛpe / sūryaprabhe ca tatrasthe samagrasacivānvite // 8.2.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tato bhūvivarād ādau saśabdaḥ surabhir marut / āvirāsīt tataḥ paścād ujjagāma mayāsuraḥ // 8.2.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛṣṇonnataśiraḥ śṛṅgajvalatkeśamahauṣadhiḥ / raktāmbarocchaladdhātur niśāyām iva parvataḥ // 8.2.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

bhuktā bhogā ime bhaumā bhavadbhir adhunā ca vaḥ / kālo 'nyeṣāṃ tadudyoge matiṃ kuruta sāṃpratam // 8.2.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dūtān preṣyānayadhvaṃ svān nṛpān saṃbandhibāndhavān / tato vidyādharendreṇa miliṣyāmaḥ sumeruṇā // 8.2.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jeṣyāmaḥ śrutaśarmāṇaṃ prāpsyāmaḥ khacaraśriyam / sumeruś ca sahāyatve bandhubuddhyā sthito 'tra naḥ // 8.2.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rakṣeḥ sūryaprabhaṃ dadyās tvaṃ caitasmai nijāṃ sutām / ity ādāv eva devena sa hy ādiṣṭaḥ pinākinā // 8.2.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ mayāsureṇokte prahastādīn sa khecarān / candraprabhaḥ prahitavān dūtān sarvamahībhṛtām // 8.2.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
