jñātaṃ mayā yad yuṣmābhir maheśvaranideśataḥ / mayāsurasakhaiḥ sūryaprabhasyājñānamohitaiḥ // 8.2.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
asya martyaśarīrasya saṃsādhayitum iṣyate / sarvavidyādharādhīśacakravartipadaṃ mahat // 8.2.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad ayuktaṃ yad asmābhir dattaṃ hi śrutaśarmaṇe / vidyādharakulābdhīndos tac ca tasya kramāgatam // 8.2.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asmākaṃ prātipakṣyeṇa dharmabādhena caiva yat / kurudhve tad vināśāya niścitaṃ vaḥ prakalpate // 8.2.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pūrvaṃ ca rudrayajñena yajamāno bhavān mayā / prāg yajasvāśvamedhenety ukte ca kṛtavān na tam // 8.2.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

ity ukte śakrasaṃdeśe nāradena vihasya tam / mayo 'vādīn na sādhūktaṃ surendreṇa mahāmune // 8.2.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

martyā eva hi sattvāḍhyāḥ sarvasiddhyadhikāriṇaḥ / aindraṃ na sādhitaṃ pūrvaṃ padaṃ kiṃ nahuṣādibhiḥ // 8.2.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

śrutaśarmann are pāpa yady etāś cakravartinaḥ / bhāryāḥ sprakṣyasi tat sadyaḥ sasainyo mṛtyum āpsyasi // 8.2.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmān mātṛvad etās tvaṃ paśyan rakṣeḥ sagauravam / adhunaiva na hatvā tvāṃ yad etā mocitā mayā // 8.2.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāsti kāraṇaṃ kiṃcit tat tiṣṭhantv atra saṃprati / ity ukte divyayā vācā khecarās te tirodadhuḥ // 8.2.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājānas te ca nītās tā dṛṣṭvā vīrabhaṭādayaḥ / āsann anyonyayuddhena dehatyāge kṛtodyamāḥ // 8.2.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
naitāsām asti vidhvaṃsaḥ prāpsyathaitāḥ sutāḥ punaḥ / tat sāhasaṃ na yuṣmābhiḥ kāryaṃ kalyāṇam astu vaḥ // 8.2.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti vāṅ nābhasī teṣāṃ tam udyogaṃ nyavārayat / tataḥ pratīkṣamāṇās te tasthus tatraiva bhūbhujaḥ // 8.2.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atrāntare ca pātāle tasmin devakule sthitam / sarvair vṛtam avocat tam evaṃ candraprabhaṃ mayaḥ // 8.2.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rajann ekamanā bhūtvā śṛṇv idānīm anuttamam / upadekṣyāmi te yogam anyadehapraveśadam // 8.2.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvākhyāya sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca sarahasyakam / yuktiṃ dehāntarāveśe tasmād upadideśa saḥ // 8.2.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jagāda ca sa yogīndraḥ saiṣā siddhir idaṃ ca tat / jñānaṃ svātantryam aiśvaryam aṇimādiniketanam // 8.2.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atraiśvarye sthitā mokṣaṃ na vāñchanti sureśvarāḥ / etadarthaṃ japatapaḥkleśam anye 'pi kurvate // 8.2.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
saṃprāptam api necchanti svargabhogaṃ mahāśayāḥ / tathā ca śrūyatām atra kathāṃ vaḥ kathayāmy aham // 8.2.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āsīt ko'pi purākalpe kālo nāma mahādvijaḥ / sa gatvā puṣkare tīrthe japaṃ cakre divāniśam // 8.2.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
japatas tasya tatrāgād divyaṃ varṣaśatadvayam / tato 'sya śiraso 'cchinnam arcir āvir abhūn mahat // 8.2.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yena sūryāyuteneva prodgatenāmbare gatiḥ / siddhādīnāṃ niruddhābhūj jajvāla ca jagattrayam // 8.2.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
brahman yas te varo 'bhīṣṭas taṃ gṛhāṇa jvalanty amī / lokās tvadarciṣety ūcur brahmendrādyā upetya tam // 8.2.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
japād anyatra mā bhūn me ratir ity eṣa eva me / varo nānyad vṛṇe kiṃcid iti tān pratyuvāca saḥ // 8.2.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nirbandhaṃ teṣu kurvatsu tato gatvāpi dūrataḥ / uttare himavatpārśve japann āsīt sa jāpakaḥ // 8.2.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāpy asahyaṃ tattejaḥ saviśeṣaṃ kramād yadā / tadā vighnāya tasyendraḥ prajighāya surāṅganāḥ // 8.2.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa dhīro lobhayantīs tā na tṛṇāyāpy amanyata / nisṛṣṭārthaṃ tatas tasmai mṛtyuṃ visasṛjuḥ surāḥ // 8.2.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upetya sa tam āha sma brahman martyair iyac ciram / na jīvyate tad ātmānaṃ tyaja mā laṅghaya sthitim // 8.2.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sa dvijo 'vādīd yadi pūrṇo mamāvadhiḥ / āyuṣas tan na kasmān māṃ nayase kiṃ pratīkṣase // 8.2.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svayaṃ ca nāham ātmānaṃ tyajeyaṃ pāśahasta re / ātmaghātī bhaveyaṃ ca śarīraṃ kāmatas tyajan // 8.2.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavantaṃ taṃ netuṃ prabhāvān nāśakad yadā / tadā parāṅmukho mṛtyur jagāma sa yathāgatam // 8.2.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vijitakālaṃ taṃ kālaṃ sānuśayo dvijam / balād utkṣipya bāhubhyāṃ nināyendraḥ surālayam // 8.2.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tadbhogavimukho japād aviramaṃś ca saḥ / devāvatārito bhūyas tam evāgād dhimālayam // 8.2.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāpindrādayo bhūyo varārthaṃ bodhayanti tam / yāvat tāvan nṛpas tena mārgeṇekṣvākur āyayau // 8.2.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tad buddhvā yathāvastu jāpakaṃ tam abhāṣata / devebhyaś cen na gṛhṇāsi varaṃ matto gṛhāṇa bhoḥ // 8.2.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sa vihasyainaṃ jāpako 'bhyavadan nṛpam / tvaṃ śakto varadāne me tridaśebhyo 'py agṛhṇataḥ // 8.2.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ūcivāṃsaṃ taṃ vipram ikṣvākuḥ pratyuvāca saḥ / śakto na te 'haṃ śaktas tvaṃ mama tad dehi me varam // 8.2.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tataḥ sa jāpako 'vādīd yat te 'bhīṣṭaṃ vṛṇīṣva tat / dāsyāmy eveti tac chrutvā rājāntar vimamarśa saḥ // 8.2.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ dadāmi vipro 'yaṃ gṛhṇātīty ucito vidhiḥ / viparītam idaṃ gṛhṇāmy aham eṣa dadāti yat // 8.2.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti yāvat sa nṛpatir vicikitsan vilambate / tāvad vivadamānau dvau tatra viprāv upeyatuḥ // 8.2.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tau taṃ dṛṣṭvā nṛpaṃ tasya puro nyāyārtham ūcatuḥ / eko 'bravīt pradattā me gaur anena sadakṣiṇā // 8.2.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāṃ me pratidadānasya hastād gṛhṇāty asau na kim / athāparo 'bhyadhān nāhaṃ kṛtapūrvapratigrahaḥ // 8.2.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na cārthitā me tat kasmād grāhayaty eṣa māṃ balāt / etac chrutvā nṛpo 'vādīd ākṣeptāyaṃ na śudhyati // 8.2.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
pratigṛhya kathaṃ dātre balāt pratidadāti gām / ity uktavantaṃ taṃ bhūpaṃ śakro labdhāntaro 'bravīt // 8.2.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
rājañ jānāsi ced evaṃ nyāyyaṃ taj jāpakād dvijāt / varam abhyarthya saṃprāptaṃ kasmād gṛhṇāsi nāmutaḥ // 8.2.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato niruttaro rājā jāpakaṃ taṃ jagāda saḥ / bhagavan svajapasyārdhāt phalaṃ vitara me varam // 8.2.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bāḍham evaṃ japasyārdhān madīyasyāstu te phalam / iti tasmai tato rājñe jāpakaḥ sa varaṃ dadau // 8.2.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sarvalokagatiṃ lebhe tena rājā sa so 'pi ca / jāpakaḥ saśivākhyānaṃ devānāṃ lokam āptavān // 8.2.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra sthitvā bahūn kalpān punar āgatya bhūtale / prāpya svatantratāṃ yogāt siddhiṃ lebhe ca śāśvatīm // 8.2.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ svargādivimukhaiḥ siddhir evārthyate budhaiḥ / sā tvayāptā svatantras tad rājan svaṃ deham āviśa // 8.2.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktaḥ prattayogena mayena mumude param / sadāratanayāmātyo rājā candraprabho 'tha saḥ // 8.2.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato dvitīyaṃ pātālaṃ nītvā tena mayena saḥ / prāveśyata gṛhaṃ divyaṃ putrādisahito nṛpaḥ // 8.2.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāntar dadṛśus te ca sarve suptam iva sthitam / mahāntam ekaṃ puruṣaṃ patitaṃ śayanottame // 8.2.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
mahauṣadhighṛtābhyaktaṃ vikṛtākṛtibhīṣaṇam / viṣaṇṇavadanāmbhojadaityarājasutāvṛtam // 8.2.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'yam atra svadehas te pūrvabhāryāvṛtaḥ sthitaḥ / praviśaitam iti smāha tataś candraprabhaṃ mayaḥ // 8.2.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'tha tenopadiṣṭaṃ taṃ yogam āsthāya bhūpatiḥ / tasmin puruṣadehe 'ntas tyaktasvatanur āviśat // 8.2.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa jṛmbhikāṃ kṛtvā śanair unmīlya locane / gatanidra ivottasthau puruṣaḥ śayanīyataḥ // 8.2.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
diṣṭyā devaḥ sunītho 'dya pratyujjīvita eṣa naḥ / iti tatrodabhūn nādo hṛṣṭāsuravadhūkṛtaḥ // 8.2.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sūryaprabhādyāḥ sarve tu viṣaṇṇāḥ sahasābhavan / dṛṣṭvā nipatitaṃ candraprabhadeham ajīvitam // 8.2.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
candraprabhasunīthaś ca sukhasvāpād ivotthitaḥ / dṛṣṭvā mayaṃ vavande sa pitaraṃ pādayoḥ patan // 8.2.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa pitāpi tam āliṅgya pṛṣṭavān sarvasaṃnidhau / kaccit smarasi putra dve janmanī tvaṃ hi saṃprati // 8.2.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi smarāmīty uktvaiva yac candraprabhajanmani / sunīthajanmani ca yat tasya vṛttaṃ tad uktavān // 8.2.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
nāmagrāhaṃ sadevīkān sa ca sūryaprabhādikān / ekaikam āśvāsitavān pūrvabhāryāś ca dānavīḥ // 8.2.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
candraprabhatve jātaṃ ca dehaṃ dvairājyayuktitaḥ / bhavej jātūpayogīti sthāpayām āsa rakṣitam // 8.2.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'bhyanandan praṇatā jātapratyayanirvṛtāḥ / candraprabhasunīthaṃ taṃ hṛṣṭāḥ sūryaprabhādayaḥ // 8.2.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
mayāsuro 'tha sarvāṃs tān harṣān nītvā purāt tataḥ / anyat praveśayām āsa hemaratnacitaṃ puram // 8.2.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praviṣṭās tatra vaidūryavāpīṃ te dadṛśur bhṛtām / sudhārasena tasyāś ca tīre sarve 'py upāviśan // 8.2.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
papuś ca tatsudhāpānam amṛtādhikam atra te / sunīthabhāryopahṛtair vicitrair maṇibhājanaiḥ // 8.2.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tena pānena te sarve mattasuptotthitās tataḥ / saṃpedire divyadehā mahābalaparākramāḥ // 8.2.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
candraprabhasunīthaṃ ca tato 'vādīn mayāsuraḥ / putraihi yāmaḥ paśya svaṃ mātaraṃ sucirād iti // 8.2.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatas tatheti codyuktaḥ sunītho 'gresare maye / yayau caturthaṃ pātālaṃ saha sūryaprabhādibhiḥ // 8.2.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatra citrāṇi paśyanto nānādhātumayāni te / purāṇy ekaṃ puraṃ prāpuḥ sarve sarvahiraṇmayam // 8.2.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra ratnamayastambhe sarvasaṃpanniketane / dadṛśur mayabhāryāṃ tāṃ te sunīthasya mātaram // 8.2.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nāmnā līlāvatīṃ rūpeṇādhaḥkṛtasurāṅganām / vṛtām asurakanyābhiḥ sarvābharaṇabhūṣitām // 8.2.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā dṛṣṭvaiva sunīthaṃ tam udatiṣṭhat sasaṃbhramam / sunītho 'py apatat tasyā abhivādyaiva pādayoḥ // 8.2.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sā taṃ ciraspṛṣṭam āśliṣyodaśrur ātmajam / punas tatprāptihetuṃ taṃ praśasaṃsa mayaṃ patim // 8.2.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athābravīn mayo devi sumuṇḍīko 'paraḥ sa te / putraḥ putro 'sya putrasya jātaḥ sūryaprabho 'py ayam // 8.2.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
eṣa vidyādharendrāṇāṃ cakravartī purāriṇā / etenaiva śarīreṇa bhāvī devi vinirmitaḥ // 8.2.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvaivābhipaśyantyās tasyāḥ sotsukayā dṛśā / sūryaprabhaḥ papātaitya pādayoḥ sacivaiḥ saha // 8.2.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ sumuṇḍīkadehena vatsaitenaiva śobhase / iti līlāvatī dattvā cāśiṣaṃ tam abhāṣata // 8.2.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'tra putrābhyudaye mayo mandodarīṃ sutām / vibhīṣaṇaṃ ca sasmāra smṛtāv ājagmatuś ca tau // 8.2.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
gṛhītotsavasatkāraḥ sa taṃ prāha vibhīṣaṇaḥ / karoṣi yadi me vākyaṃ dānavendra vadāmi tat // 8.2.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dānaveṣu tvam evaikaḥ sukṛtī śubhajīvitaḥ / devaiḥ saha na te kāryā tad akāraṇavairitā // 8.2.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadvirodhe hi nāpāyād ṛte kaścid guṇo 'sti vaḥ / nihatā hi suraiḥ saṃkhyeṣv asurā nāsuraiḥ surāḥ // 8.2.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā taṃ mayo 'vocan na balāt kurmahe vayam / haṭhāt kurvati śakre tu kathaṃ brūhi sahāmahe // 8.2.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ye cāsurā hatā devais te babhūvuḥ pramādinaḥ / apramattās tu kiṃ naiva baliprabhṛtayo hatāḥ // 8.2.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityādyukto mayenātha mandodaryā sahaiva saḥ / rakṣasendras tam āmantrya jagāma vasatiṃ nijām // 8.2.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sūryaprabhādibhir yuktaḥ sunītho 'tha mayena saḥ / ninye tṛtīyaṃ pātālaṃ baliṃ rājānam īkṣitum // 8.2.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
svargād apy adhike tatra sarve te dadṛśur balim / āmuktahāramukuṭaṃ vṛtaṃ ditijadānavaiḥ // 8.2.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
nipetuḥ pādayos tasya sunīthādyāḥ krameṇa te / so 'pi tān mānayām āsa satkāreṇa yathocitam // 8.2.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mayāveditavṛttāntahṛṣṭaḥ so 'tra balis tataḥ / prahlādam ānāyitavāñ śīghram anyāṃś ca dānavān // 8.2.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tān apy atra sunīthādyāḥ pādayos te vavandire / te cāpy abhinanandus tān prahvān ānandanirbharāḥ // 8.2.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athātra balir āha sma bhūtvā candraprabho bhuvi / sunīthaḥ svatanuprāptyā pratyujjīvita eṣa naḥ // 8.2.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sumuṇḍīkāvatāraś ca prāptaḥ sūryaprabho 'py ayam / śarveṇa cāyam ādiṣṭo bhāvī vidyādhareśvaraḥ // 8.2.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etadyajñaprabhāvāc ca jāto 'haṃ ślathabandhanaḥ / tad etābhyām avāptābhyāṃ dhruvam abhyudayo 'sti naḥ // 8.2.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etad balivacaḥ śrutvā śukraḥ provāca tadguruḥ / dharmeṇa caratāṃ satye nāsty anabhyudayaḥ kva cit // 8.2.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmād dharmeṇa vartadhvaṃ kurutādyāpi madvacaḥ / tac chrutvā dānavās tatra tatheti niyamaṃ vyadhuḥ // 8.2.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saptapātālapatayo ye tatra militās tadā / baliś cātrotsavaṃ cakre sunīthaprāptiharṣataḥ // 8.2.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
atrāntare ca tatrāgāt sa punar nārado muniḥ / gṛhītārghopaviṣṭaś ca dānavāṃs tān uvāca saḥ // 8.2.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
preṣito 'ham ihendreṇa sa caivaṃ vakti vaḥ kila / sunīthajīvitaprāptyā saṃtoṣaḥ paramo mama // 8.2.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad idānīṃ na kāryaṃ naḥ punar vairam akāraṇam / viroddhavyaṃ na caivāsmatpakṣeṇa śrutaśarmaṇā // 8.2.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktendravākyaṃ taṃ prahlādo munim abravīt / sunīthajīvitāt tuṣṭir indrasyeti kim anyathā // 8.2.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akāraṇavirodhaṃ ca vayaṃ tāvan na kurmahe / adyaiva niyamo 'smābhiḥ kṛtaḥ sarvair guroḥ puraḥ // 8.2.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutaśarmā sapakṣatvam āśritya sa balād yadi / asmadviruddhaṃ kurute kāsmākaṃ tatra vācyatā // 8.2.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
sūryaprabhasya pakṣeṇa devadevena śaṃbhunā / prāg eva hy ayam ādiṣṭaḥ sa pūrvārādhito 'sya yat // 8.2.168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad asminn īśvarādiṣṭe kārye kiṃ kurmahe vayam / tan niṣkāraṇam evaitac chakro vakty asamañjasam // 8.2.169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukto dānavendreṇa prahlādena sa nāradaḥ / tatheti vāsavaṃ nindann adarśanam agān muniḥ // 8.2.170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmin gate dānavendrān uśanās tān abhāṣata / vairānubandhaḥ kārye 'smiṃs tāvad indrasya dṛśyate // 8.2.171	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kiṃ tv asmāsu prasādaikabaddhakakṣye maheśvare / kā tasya śaktiḥ kiṃ kuryād āsthā vā tasya vaiṣṇavī // 8.2.172	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
iti śukravacaḥ śrutvā dānavās te 'numanya ca / sahaprahlādam āmantrya baliṃ jagmur nijālayān // 8.2.173	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataś caturthaṃ pātālaṃ prahlāde svālayaṃ gate / utthāya sadaso rājā viveśābhyantaraṃ baliḥ // 8.2.174	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
mayaḥ sunīthaś cānye ca sarve sūryaprabhādayaḥ / praṇamya balim ājagmus tad eva svaṃ niketanam // 8.2.175	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrocitakṛtāhārapāneṣv eṣu sametya sā / līlāvatī sunīthaṃ taṃ jagāda jananī nijā // 8.2.176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
putra jānāsi yad imā bhāryās te mahatāṃ sutāḥ / tejasvatī dhaneśasya tumburor maṅgalāvatī // 8.2.177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
candraprabhaśarīreṇa pariṇītā ca yā tvayā / prabhāsasya vasor etāṃ vetsi kīrtimatīṃ sutām // 8.2.178	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tisras tad etā draṣṭavyāḥ samadṛṣṭyā suta tvayā / ity uktvā mukhyabhāryās tās tisro 'smai sā samarpayat // 8.2.179	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tasmin dine rātrau sunītho jyeṣṭhayā tayā / tejasvatyā samaṃ śayyāvāsaveśma viveśa saḥ // 8.2.180	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatropabhuṅkte sma tayā sucirotsukayā saha / ratakrīḍāsukhaṃ tat tat prāg bhuktam api nūtanam // 8.2.181	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sūryaprabhas tu sacivaiḥ saha vāsagṛhe 'pare / niśi tasyām apatnīko nyaṣīdac chayanīyake // 8.2.182	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
niḥsnehena kim etena svapriyās tyajatā bahiḥ / itīva nidrā strī nityasyaikasyāpy asya nāyayau // 8.2.183	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
prahastasya ca serṣyeva kāryacintaikasaṅginaḥ / anye tu paritaḥ sūryaprabhaṃ nidrāṃ yayuḥ sukham // 8.2.184	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvat sūryaprabhaḥ so 'tra prahastaś ca sakhīyutām / praviśantīṃ dadṛśartuvarakanyām anuttamām // 8.2.185	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
mā bhūt surāṅganāsargo vicchāyo 'syāḥ puro mama / ity utpādyāpi vidhinā pātāle sthāpitām iva // 8.2.186	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
sūryaprabhaś ca keyaṃ syād iti yāvad vimarśati / tāvat sā tatsakhīn etya suptān ekaikam aikṣata // 8.2.187	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
acakravarticihnāṃs tān hitvā tallakṣaṇānvitam / dṛṣṭvā sūryaprabhaṃ sā tam upāgān madhyaśāyinam // 8.2.188	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uvāca ca sakhīṃ so 'yaṃ sakhi tat spṛśa pādayoḥ / etaṃ toyasuśītābhyāṃ karābhyāṃ pratibodhaya // 8.2.189	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā tatsakhī sā tat tathā cakre sa cekṣaṇe / sūryaprabho vyājasuptaṃ vihāya prodaghāṭayat // 8.2.190	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
vīkṣya covāca kanye te ke yuvāṃ kim ihāgamaḥ / bhavatyor iti tac chrutvā tatsakhī tam abhāṣata // 8.2.191	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śṛṇu devāsti pātāle dvitīye 'dhipatir jayī / amīla iti daityendro hiraṇyākṣasuto balī // 8.2.192	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kalāvatīti tasyaiṣā prāṇebhyo 'py adhikā sutā / sa ito 'dya baleḥ pārśvād āgatyaitat pitābravīt // 8.2.193	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
diṣṭyādya jīvitaṃ prāptaḥ sunīthaḥ punar īkṣitaḥ / sumuṇḍīkāvatāraś ca dṛṣṭaḥ sūryaprabho yuvā // 8.2.194	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sṛṣṭaḥ khecarasaccakravartī bhāvī hareṇa yaḥ / tad ihānandasaṃmānaṃ sunīthasya karomy aham // 8.2.195	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sutāṃ sūryaprabhāyaitāṃ prayacchāmi kalāvatīm / sunīthasyaikagotratvād dātuṃ caiṣā na yujyate // 8.2.196	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sūryaprabhaś ca putro 'sya rājajanmani nāsure / tatsutasya ca saṃmānaḥ kṛtas tasya kṛto bhavet // 8.2.197	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etat pitur vacaḥ śrutvā tvadguṇākṛṣṭamānasā / matsakhīyam ihāyātā tvaddarśanakutūhalāt // 8.2.198	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ tayokte tatsakhyā nidrāti sma mṛṣaiva saḥ / tadabhiprāyatātparyaṃ jñātuṃ sūryaprabhas tadā // 8.2.199	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sātha kanyā vinidrasya prahastasyāntikaṃ śanaiḥ / gatvā sakhīmukhenoktvā sarvam asmai bahir yayau // 8.2.200	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prahastaś cāpy upāgatya deva jāgarṣi kiṃ na vā / iti sūryaprabhaṃ smāha sa conmiṣya tam abhyadhāt // 8.2.201	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sakhe jāgarmi nidrā hi mamādyaikākinaḥ kutaḥ / viśeṣaṃ tu vadāmy evaṃ śṛṇu gopyaṃ hi kiṃ tvayi // 8.2.202	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhunaiva praviṣṭeha mayā dṛṣṭā sakhīyutā / kanyakaikā samā yasyās trailokye 'pi na dṛśyate // 8.2.203	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣaṇena ca gatā kvāpi hṛtvaiva mama mānasam / tad gaveṣaya sadyas tām ihaiva kvacana sthitām // 8.2.204	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti sūryaprabheṇoktaḥ prahasto 'tha bahir gataḥ / dṛṣṭvātra tāṃ samaṃ sakhyā sthitāṃ kanyām abhāṣata // 8.2.205	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mayā tvaduparodhena svasvāmy eṣa vibodhitaḥ / tat tvaṃ maduparodhena punar dehy asya darśanam // 8.2.206	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
paśyāsya rūpaṃ bhūyo 'pi kṛtārthakaraṇaṃ dṛśoḥ / tava paśyatu caiṣo 'pi dṛṣṭimātravaśīkṛtaḥ // 8.2.207	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
prabuddhena hy anenāham uktaḥ kṛtvā bhavatkathām / kuto 'pi darśayānīya tāṃ me prāṇimi nānyathā // 8.2.208	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'haṃ tvām upāyātas tad ehy ālokaya svayam / iti prahastenoktā sā kanyāsulabhayā hriyā // 8.2.209	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
prasahya nāśakad gantuṃ vimṛśantī yadā tadā / haste gṛhītvā nītābhūt tena sūryaprabhāntikam // 8.2.210	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sūryaprabhaś ca tāṃ dṛṣṭvā pārśvāyātāṃ kalāvatīm / uvāca caṇḍi yuktaṃ te kim etad yad ihādya me // 8.2.211	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvayā suptasya cauryeṇa praviśya hṛdayaṃ hṛtam / tad ihānigṛhītā tvaṃ cauri na tyakṣyase mayā // 8.2.212	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvā vidagdhā sā tatsakhī vyājahāra tam / pūrvaṃ jñātvaiva pitraiva caurīyaṃ nigrahāya te // 8.2.213	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
niścitārpayituṃ yasmāt tasmāt kas te niṣedhakaḥ / asyāś cauryocitaṃ kāmaṃ nigrahaṃ na karoṣi kim // 8.2.214	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvāliṅgituṃ sūryaprabhe vāñchati satrapā / ma māryaputra kanyāsmīty avocat sā kalāvati // 8.2.215	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ prahasto 'vādīt tāṃ mā vikalpo 'stu devi te / gāndharvo hy eṣa sarveṣāṃ vivāhānām ihottamaḥ // 8.2.216	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvaiva samaṃ sarvaiḥ prahaste nirgate bahiḥ / sūryaprabhas tadaivaitāṃ bhāryāṃ cakre kalāvatīm // 8.2.217	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

te militvātha sarve 'pi prahlādasyāntikaṃ yayuḥ / sa tān yathārhaṃ saṃmānya sabhāstho mayam abravīt // 8.2.220	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sunīthasyotsave 'muṣmin priyaṃ kartavyam eva naḥ / tad adya yāvat sarve 'pi vayam ekatra bhuñjmahe // 8.2.221	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
evaṃ kurmo 'tra ko doṣa ity ukte ca mayena saḥ / dūtair nimantrayām āsa prahlādo 'trāsurādhipān // 8.2.222	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āyayuś cātra sarvebhyaḥ pātālebhyaḥ krameṇa te / pūrvam āgād balī rājā sahāsaṃkhyair mahāsuraiḥ // 8.2.223	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anantaramamīlaś ca durārohaś ca vīryavān / sumāyas tantukacchaś ca vikaṭākṣaḥ prakampanaḥ // 8.2.224	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dhūmaketur mahāmāyo ye cānye 'py asureśvarāḥ / ekaiko nijasāmantasahasreṇāyayau vṛtaḥ // 8.2.225	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apūryata sabhā taiś ca vihitānyonyavandanaiḥ / yathākramopaviṣṭāṃś ca prahlādas tān amānayat // 8.2.226	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāpte cāhārakāle te sarve saha mayādibhiḥ / gaṅgāsnātāḥ samājagmur bhojanāya mahāsabhām // 8.2.227	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śatayojanavistīrṇāṃ suvarṇamaṇikuṭṭimām / ratnastambhacitāṃ nyastavicitramaṇibhājanām // 8.2.228	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra prahlādasahitāḥ sasunīthamayāś ca te / sūryaprabheṇa sacivair yuktena ca sahāsurāḥ // 8.2.229	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)

bhuktapītāś ca gatvānyat sarve ratnamayaṃ sadaḥ / daityadānavakanyānāṃ dadṛśur nṛttam uttamam // 8.2.231	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatprasaṅge dadarśātra pranṛttāṃ pitur ājñayā / prahlādasya sutāṃ sūryaprabho nāmnā mahallikām // 8.2.232	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dyotayantīṃ diśaḥ kāntyā varṣantīm amṛtaṃ dṛśoḥ / kautukād iva pātālam āgatāṃ mūrtim aindavīm // 8.2.233	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

keśair arālair daśanaiḥ śikharair bibhratīṃ stanau / uromaṇḍalinau nṛttaṃ sṛjatīm iva nūtanam // 8.2.235	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvaiva ca tadā caṇḍī tasya sūryaprabhasya sā / api svīkṛtam anyābhir jahāra hṛdayaṃ haṭhāt // 8.2.236	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sāpy asurendrāṇāṃ madhye dūrād dadarśa tam / haradagdhe smare sṛṣṭaṃ dhātrāparam iva smaram // 8.2.237	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvaiva tadgatamanās tathābhūd acalad yathā / āṅgiko 'bhinayo 'py asyā dṛṣṭvevāvinayaṃ ruṣā // 8.2.238	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sabhāsthāś ca tayor bhāvaṃ taṃ dvayor apy alakṣayan / prekṣaṇaṃ copasaṃjahruḥ śrāntā rājasuteti te // 8.2.239	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sūryaprabhaṃ tiryak paśyantī sā mahallikā / pitrā visṛṣṭā vanditvā dānavendrān agād gṛham // 8.2.240	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
dānavendrāś ca te sarve yathāsvam agaman gṛhān / sūryaprabho 'pi svāvāsam ājagāma dinakṣaye // 8.2.241	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
pradoṣe ca kalāvatyā punar āgatayā saha / suṣvāpābhyantare guptaṃ bahiḥ suptākhilānugaḥ // 8.2.242	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvan mahallikā sāpi tatsaṃdarśanasotsukā / tatrāyayau savisrambhavayasyādvayasaṃgatā // 8.2.243	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antaḥ praveṣṭum icchantīṃ prajñāḍhyākhyo dadarśa tām / sūryaprabhasya sacivo nidrayā tatkṣaṇojjhitaḥ // 8.2.244	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
devi tiṣṭha kṣaṇaṃ yāvat praviśyābhyantarād aham / nirgacchāmīti sa ca tāṃ parijñāyotthito 'bhyadhāt // 8.2.245	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ruddhāḥ smaḥ kiṃ bahiḥ kasmād yūyaṃ ceti saśaṅkayā / tayā pṛṣṭaḥ sa bhūyo 'pi prajñāḍhyo nijagāda tām // 8.2.246	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svairaṃ suptasya sahasaivāntikaṃ kiṃ praviśyate / suptaś cāsmatprabhur asāv eko vratavaśād iti // 8.2.247	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)

sūryaprabhaś ca buddhvā tac chanair utthāya nirgataḥ / dṛṣṭvā mahallikām ātmatṛtīyām apy abhāṣata // 8.2.250	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nītaḥ kṛtārthatāṃ tāvad ayam abhyāgato janaḥ / nīyatāṃ sthānam apy etad āsanaṃ parigṛhyatām // 8.2.251	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvopaviveśātha sahānyābhyāṃ mahallikā / sūryaprabho 'py upāvikṣat sa prajñāḍhyayutas tataḥ // 8.2.252	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upaviśya sa covāca tanvi yady api me kṛtā / tvayāvajñā sadasy anyā prekṣyānte vardhamānayā // 8.2.253	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathāpi tāval lolākṣi dṛṣṭamātreṇa me tava / saundaryeṇeva nṛttena locane saphalīkṛte // 8.2.254	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti sūryaprabheṇoktā sā prahlādasutābravīt / nāryaputrāparādho 'sau mama so 'trāparādhyati // 8.2.255	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yenāhaṃ saṃsadi kṛtā bhagnābhinayalajjitā / etac chrutvā jito 'smīti hasan sūryaprabho 'bravīt // 8.2.256	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
jagrāha ca kareṇāsyāḥ karaṃ rājasuto 'tha saḥ / balātkāragrahād bhītam iva sasvedavepathum // 8.2.257	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
muñcāryaputra kanyāhaṃ pitṛvaśyeti vādinīm / tato 'surendratanayāṃ prajñāḍhyas tām uvāca saḥ // 8.2.258	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
kanyānāṃ kiṃ ca gāndharvo vivāho devi vidyate / na ca pradāsyaty anyasmai pitā tvāṃ lakṣitāśayaḥ // 8.2.259	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
etasya cātra saṃmānaṃ niścitaṃ sa kariṣyati / tad alaṃ sādhvasenedṛg vṛthā mā bhūt samāgamaḥ // 8.2.260	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ mahallikāṃ yāvat prajñāḍhyas tāṃ bravīti saḥ / tāvat sābhyantare tatra prabuddhābhūt kalāvatī // 8.2.261	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apaśyantī ca taṃ sūryaprabhaṃ sā śayanīyake / pratīkṣya kiṃcid udvignaśaṅkitā niragād bahiḥ // 8.2.262	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvā mahallikopetaṃ taṃ cātra nijavallabham / sakopā ca salajjā ca sabhayā ca babhūva sā // 8.2.263	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mahallikāpi dṛṣṭvaiva tām āsīd bhītalajjitā / sūryaprabhaś ca niḥspandas tasthāv ālikhito yathā // 8.2.264	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭā kathaṃ palāye 'haṃ jihremīrṣyāmi vā yadi / iti tatpārśvam evāgāt kalāvaty api sā tataḥ // 8.2.265	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kuśalaṃ sakhi kutra tvam āgataivam ito niśi / evaṃ mahallikāṃ tāṃ ca sābhyasūyam uvāca sā // 8.2.266	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato mahallikāvocan mamaitad gṛham atra tu / tvam anyapātālagṛhāt prāptā prāghuṇikādya me // 8.2.267	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tac chrutvā sā vihasyaitāṃ kalāvaty evam abravīt / satyaṃ dṛśyata evedaṃ yat tvaṃ sarvasya kasyacit // 8.2.268	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karoṣīhāgatasyaiva prāghuṇātithyasatkriyām / evam ukte kalāvatyā sā jagāda mahallikā // 8.2.269	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yadi prītyā mayoktā tvaṃ tat kiṃ sadveṣaniṣṭhuram / evaṃ vadasi nirlajje kim ahaṃ sadṛśī tava // 8.2.270	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kim ahaṃ bāndhavādattā dūrād etya parasthale / parasya śayane suptā rahasy ekākinī niśi // 8.2.271	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ pituḥ prāghuṇikaṃ svasthāne draṣṭum āgatā / ātithyenādhunaivaiṣā sakhīdvitayasaṃgatā // 8.2.272	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
yadāsmān vipralabhyādāv asau mantrī praviṣṭavān / tadaivaitan mayā jñātaṃ tvayā vyaktīkṛtaṃ svataḥ // 8.2.273	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ mahallikoktā sā kalāvaty agamat tataḥ / tiryak kopakaṣāyeṇa paśyantī cakṣuṣā priyam // 8.2.274	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato mahallikā sāpi bahuvallabha yāmy aham / saṃpratīti ruṣā sūryaprabham uktvā tato yayau // 8.2.275	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sūryaprabhaś ca vimanā yuktaṃ yad abhavat tadā / kāntābhyāṃ hi samaṃ tasya tadāsaktaṃ mano gatam // 8.2.276	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha jñātuṃ kalāvatyāḥ kalahāntaraceṣṭitam / prāhiṇod drutam utthāpya prabhāsaṃ sa svamantriṇam // 8.2.277	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mahallikāyās tadvac ca prahastaṃ sa visṛṣṭavān / svayaṃ ca tatpratīkṣaḥ sann āsīt prajñāḍhyasaṃyutaḥ // 8.2.278	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
athānviṣya kalāvatyāś ceṣṭitaṃ sa samāyayau / prabhāso nikaṭaṃ tasya pṛṣṭaś caivam uvāca tam // 8.2.279	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ito dvitīyapātālavarti tad gatavān aham / vāsaveśma kalāvatyāḥ svavidyācchāditātmakaḥ // 8.2.280	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bahis tatra dvayoś ceṭyor ālāpaś ca śruto mayā / ekābravīt sakhi kim adyodvignāste kalāvatī // 8.2.281	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tato dvitīyāpy avadat sakhi śṛṇv atra kāraṇam / sumuṇḍīkāvatāro hi caturthe 'dya rasātale // 8.2.282	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sthitaḥ sūryaprabho nāma rūpeṇa jitamanmathaḥ / tasmai gatvā svayaṃ guptam ātmā dattaḥ kilaitayā // 8.2.283	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatāyām adya caitasyāṃ tatsakāśaṃ niśāgame / prahlādaduhitāpy āgāt svayaṃ tatra mahallikā // 8.2.284	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tayā saherṣyākalahaṃ kṛtvā saty ātmaghātane / udyataiṣā sukhāvatyā svasrā dṛṣṭvaiva rakṣitā // 8.2.285	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataś cāntaḥ praviśyaiva nipatya śayanīyake / sthitā tayā saha svasrā pṛṣṭavṛttāntavignayā // 8.2.286	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ ceṭyoḥ kathāṃ śrutvā praviśyātra tathaiva te / kalāvatīsukhāvatyau dṛṣṭe tulyākṛtī mayā // 8.2.287	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti prabhāso yāvat taṃ vakti sūryaprabhaṃ rahaḥ / tāvat prahasto 'py atrāgāt pṛṣṭaḥ so 'py abravīd idam // 8.2.288	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ito mahallikāvāsagṛhaṃ yāvad ahaṃ gataḥ / tāvat tatra praviṣṭā sā sakhībhyāṃ saha durmanāḥ // 8.2.289	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ tatraiva cādṛśyo vidyāyuktyā praviṣṭavān / dṛṣṭā mayātra tasyāś ca sakhyo dvādaśa tatsamāḥ // 8.2.290	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāś ca sadratnaparyaṅkaniṣaṇṇāṃ parivṛtya tām / mahallikām upavikṣann ekā covāca tāṃ tataḥ // 8.2.291	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
sakhi kasmād akasmāt tvam udvignevādya dṛśyase / vivāhe prastute 'py eṣā bata kā te viṣāditā // 8.2.292	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā savimarśā sā tāṃ prahlādasutābravīt / ko me vivāho dattāsmi kasmai kenoditaṃ tava // 8.2.293	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
evaṃ tayokte sarvās tā jagadur niścitaṃ tava / prātar vivāho dattāsi sakhi sūryaprabhāya ca // 8.2.294	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tvajjananyā ca devyaitad adyoktaṃ tvadasaṃnidhau / asmān niyojayantyā te kautukapratikarmaṇi // 8.2.295	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad dhanyāsi ca yasyās te bhāvī sūryaprabhaḥ patiḥ / yadrūpalubdho nidrāti niśi nehāṅganājanaḥ // 8.2.296	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
asmākaṃ tu viṣādo 'yaṃ kvedānīṃ tvaṃ vayaṃ kva ca / tasmin hi bhartari prāpte tvam asmān vismariṣyasi // 8.2.297	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etan mahallikā tāsāṃ mukhāc chrutvā jagāda sā / kaccit sa dṛṣṭo yuṣmābhir manas tasmin gataṃ ca vaḥ // 8.2.298	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tac chrutvā tām avocaṃs tā harmyāt so 'smābhir īkṣitaḥ / kā ca sā strī mano yasyā na sa dṛṣṭo hared iti // 8.2.299	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sāpy avadat tarhi tātaṃ vakṣyāmy ahaṃ tathā / yuṣmān apy akhilās tasmai dāpayiṣyāmy amūr yathā // 8.2.300	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ittham anyonyaviraho na syān naḥ sahavāsataḥ / iti bruvāṇāṃ kanyās tāḥ saṃbhrāntāḥ saṃbabhāṣire // 8.2.301	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sakhi maivaṃ kṛthā naitad yuktam eṣā trapā hi naḥ / evam uktavatīr etāḥ sā jagādāsurendrajā // 8.2.302	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kim ayuktaṃ na tenaikā pariṇeyāham eva hi / tasmai sarve 'pi dāsyanti duhitṝr daityadānavāḥ // 8.2.303	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyāś ca rājatanayās tasyodūḍhā bhuvi sthitāḥ / pariṇeṣyati bahvīś ca sa vidyādharakanyakāḥ // 8.2.304	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tanmadhye pariṇītāsu yuṣmāsu mama kā kṣatiḥ / sukhaṃ pratyuta vatsyāmo vayaṃ sakhyaḥ parasparam // 8.2.305	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyābhis tu viruddhābhiḥ kas tābhiḥ saṃstavo mama / yuṣmākaṃ ca trapā kātra sarvam etat karomy aham // 8.2.306	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti tāsāṃ kathā yāvad vartate tvadgatātmanām / tāvat tato 'haṃ nirgatya svairaṃ tvatpārśvam āgataḥ // 8.2.307	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
etat prahastasya mukhāc chrutvā sūryaprabho 'tra saḥ / anidra eva śayane tāṃ niśām anayan mudā // 8.2.308	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
prātaḥ saha sunīthena mayena sacivaiś ca saḥ / asurādhipatiṃ draṣṭuṃ prahlādaṃ tatsabhāṃ yayau // 8.2.309	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sunīthaṃ tatra sa prāha prahlādo darśitādaraḥ / sutāṃ sūryaprabhāyāhaṃ dadāmy asmai mahallikām // 8.2.310	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asya hi prāghuṇātithyaṃ kāryaṃ me tava ca priyam / etat prahlādavacanaṃ sunītho 'bhinananda saḥ // 8.2.311	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tato vedīṃ samāropya madhyajvalitapāvakām / tatprabhābhrājitodagraratnastambhāvabhāsitām // 8.2.312	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mahallikāṃ tāṃ svasutāṃ prādāt sūryaprabhāya saḥ / prahlādo 'surasāmrājyasadṛśībhir vibhūtibhiḥ // 8.2.313	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
dadau sadratnarāśīṃś ca sa duhitre varāya ca / tridaśāvajayānītān sumeruśikharopamān // 8.2.314	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāta tā api dehy asmai sakhīr me dvādaśa priyāḥ / evaṃ mahallikā svairaṃ prahlādaṃ sā tadābravīt // 8.2.315	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
putri madbhrātradhīnās tās tena bandīkṛtā yataḥ / mama dātuṃ na yujyanta iti so 'pi jagāda tām // 8.2.316	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtodvāhotsavaś cāsmin yāte sūryaprabho dine / viveśa vāsakaṃ naktaṃ sa mahallikayā saha // 8.2.317	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sarvakāmopacārāḍhyaṃ tatra taṃ suratotsavam / anayā samanaḥprītisaukhyaṃ so 'nubabhūva ca // 8.2.318	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātar gate ca prahlāde sabhāṃ tasmin sahānuge / amīlo dānavādhīśaḥ prahlādādīn abhāṣata // 8.2.319	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
adya yuṣmābhir akhilair āgantavyaṃ gṛhe mama / tatrātithyaṃ yataḥ sūryaprabhasyāsya karomy aham // 8.2.320	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sutāṃ kalāvatīṃ tasmai dadāmi yadi vo hitam / etat tadvacanaṃ sarve tatheti pratipedire // 8.2.321	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato dvitīyaṃ pātālaṃ tasminn eva kṣaṇe ca te / sarve jagmuḥ samaṃ sūryaprabheṇa samayādinā // 8.2.322	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāmīlo dadau tasmai sutāṃ sūryaprabhāya tām / kalāvatīṃ prakriyayā dattātmānam api svayam // 8.2.323	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
kṛtvā vivāhaṃ prahlādagṛhe bhuktvāsurānvitaḥ / ninye bhogopacāreṇa dinaṃ sūryaprabho 'tra tat // 8.2.324	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
dvitīye 'hni tathaivaitān durāroho 'sureśvaraḥ / nimantrya sarvān anayat pañcamaṃ svarasātalam // 8.2.325	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tatra sūryaprabhāya svāṃ nāmnā sa kumudāvatīm / prādād anyavad ātithyahetor vidhivad ātmajām // 8.2.326	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sarvaiḥ sametas tair bhogair nītvā dinaṃ sa tat / vāsakaṃ kumudāvatyā bheje sūryaprabho niśi // 8.2.327	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra trilokasundaryā navasaṃgamasotkayā / sa snigdhamugdhayā sākaṃ tayā rātrim uvāsa tām // 8.2.328	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātaś ca tantukacchena prahlādapramukhair vṛtaḥ / nimantrya saptamaṃ ninye pātālaṃ sa svamandiram // 8.2.329	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāsurapatiḥ so 'smai sutāṃ nāmnā manovatīm / dadau saratnābharaṇāṃ taptajāmbūnadadyutim // 8.2.330	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tataḥ sūryaprabhaḥ so 'tra nītvādhikasukhaṃ dinam / manovatīnavāśleṣasukhinīm anayan niśām // 8.2.331	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aparedyuś ca taṃ sarvayuktaṃ kṛtanimantraṇaḥ / pātālam anayat ṣaṣṭhaṃ svaṃ sumāyo 'surādhipaḥ // 8.2.332	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra so 'pi dadau tasmai subhadrāṃ nāma kanyakām / dūrvālatāśyāmalāṅgīṃ mūrtiṃ pāñcaśarīm iva // 8.2.333	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
tayā suratasaṃbhogayogyayā śyāmayātra saḥ / sahāsīt tad ahaḥ sūryaprabhaḥ pūrṇenduvaktrayā // 8.2.334	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyedyuś ca balī rājā tadvad eva nināya tam / sūryaprabhaṃ svapātālaṃ tṛtīyaṃ so 'surānugaḥ // 8.2.335	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi tatra sutāṃ tasmai sundarīṃ nāma dattavān / bālapravālasacchāyāṃ mādhavīm iva mañjarīm // 8.2.336	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
strīratnena samaṃ tena reme sūryaprabho 'tra saḥ / surañjitas tad divasaṃ divyabhogavibhūṣitam // 8.2.337	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
apare 'hni mayaḥ so 'pi rājaputraṃ tathaiva tam / caturthapātālagataṃ bhūyo 'naiṣīt svamandiram // 8.2.338	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
vicitraratnaprāsādaṃ nijamāyāvinirmitam / navaṃ navam ivābhāsamānaṃ lakṣmyā pratikṣaṇam // 8.2.339	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra so 'pi dadau tasmai sumāyākhyāṃ nijāṃ sutām / jagadāścaryarūpāṃ svāṃ śaktiṃ mūrtimatīm iva // 8.2.340	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mānuṣatvāc ca tasmai tāṃ naivādeyām amanyata / so 'pi reme tayā sākam atra sūryaprabhaḥ kṛtī // 8.2.341	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidyāvibhaktadeho 'tha sarvābhir yugapat saha / araṃstāsurakanyābhis tābhiḥ saha nṛpātmajaḥ // 8.2.342	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāttvikena tu dehena bhajate sma sa bhūyasā / mahallikāṃ priyatamāṃ prahlādāsurakanyakām // 8.2.343	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ekadā ca niśi svairaṃ sthitas tāṃ sa mahallikām / evaṃ sūryaprabho 'pṛcchad abhijātāṃ kathāntare // 8.2.344	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
priye rātrau sahāyāte ye dve sakhyau tadā tava / te kutastye na paśyāmi kiṃ ca te kva gate iti // 8.2.345	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato mahallikāvādīt suṣṭhv ahaṃ smāritā tvayā / te na dve eva tāḥ santi vayasyā dvādaśeha me // 8.2.346	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
matpitṛvyeṇa ca svargād ānītā apahṛtya tāḥ / ekāmṛtaprabhā nāma dvitīyā keśinī tathā // 8.2.347	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
parvatasya muner ete tanaye śubhalakṣaṇe / kālindīti tṛtīyā ca caturthī bhadriketi ca // 8.2.348	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathā darpakamāleti pañcamī cārulocanā / etā mahāmunes tisro devalasyātmasaṃbhavāḥ // 8.2.349	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ṣaṣṭhī saudāmanī nāma saptamī cojjvalābhidhā / ete hāhābhidhānasya gandharvasya sute ubhe // 8.2.350	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṣṭamī pīvarā nāma gandharvasya huhoḥ sutā / navamy añjanikā nāma kālasya duhitā vibhoḥ // 8.2.351	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
piṅgalāc ca gaṇāj jātā daśamī kesarāvalī / ekādaśī mālinīti nāmnā kambalanandinī // 8.2.352	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
nāmnā mandāramāleti dvādaśī vasukanyakā / apsaraḥsu samutpannāḥ sarvā divyastriyas tu tāḥ // 8.2.353	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pātālaṃ prathamaṃ nītās tāś codvāhe kṛte mama / tubhyaṃ mayā ca deyās tās tadyuktā syāṃ sadā yathā // 8.2.354	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pratijñātaṃ mayā caitat tāsāṃ sneho hi tāsu me / tāto 'py ukto mayā tena na dattā bhrātrapekṣiṇā // 8.2.355	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvā savailakṣyas tāṃ sa sūryaprabho 'bravīt / priye mahānubhāvā tvam ahaṃ kuryāṃ kathaṃ tv idam // 8.2.356	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ sūryaprabheṇoktā ruṣāvocan mahallikā / matsamakṣaṃ vahasy anyā madvayasyās tu necchasi // 8.2.357	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yābhir viyuktā rajyeyaṃ nāham ekam api kṣaṇam / ity uktas tu tayā sūryaprabhas tuṣṭyānvamaṃsta tat // 8.2.358	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tad eva pātālaṃ nītvaiva prathamaṃ tayā / prahlādasutayā tasmai pradattā dvādaśāpi tāḥ // 8.2.359	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athāmṛtaprabhāmukhyās tāḥ sa sūryaprabhaḥ kramāt / pariṇīyopabhuṅkte sma tasyāṃ divyāṅganā niśi // 8.2.360	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātaś ca tāḥ prabhāsena nāyayitvā rasātalam / caturthaṃ sthāpayām āsa cchannāḥ pṛṣṭvā mahallikām // 8.2.361	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svayaṃ cālakṣitaḥ sākaṃ tayā tatraiva so 'gamat / sabhājanāya ca prāgvat prahlādasya sabhāṃ yayau // 8.2.362	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāsurendro vakti sma taṃ sunīthaṃ mayaṃ ca saḥ / yāta sarve ditidanū draṣṭuṃ devyāv ubhe iti // 8.2.363	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tathety atha rasātalāt sapadi nirgatās te tato yathāsvam asuraiḥ samaṃ mayasunīthasūryaprabhāḥ / vimānam anucintitaṃ tad adhiruhya bhūtāsanaṃ sumerugirisānugaṃ prayayur āśramaṃ kāśyapam // 8.2.364	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
tatra te ditidanū sahasthite sādarair munijanair niveditāḥ / abhyupetya dadṛśuḥ krameṇa te pādayoś ca śirasā vavandire // 8.2.365	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
te ca tān asuramātarāv ubhe sānugān samavalokya sādare / sāśru mūrdhni paricumbya saṃmadād āśiṣo 'nupadam ūcatur mayam // 8.2.366	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
prāptajīvitam amuṃ tavātmajaṃ vīkṣya putraka sunītham āvayoḥ / cakṣur adya saphalatvam āgataṃ tvāṃ ca puṇyakṛtam eva manmahe // 8.2.367	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
sumuṇḍīkaṃ caitaṃ kṛtinam iha sūryaprabhatayā punarjātaṃ divyākṛtidharam asādhāraṇaguṇam / citaṃ bhāviśreyaḥprathamapiśunair lakṣaṇagaṇair vilokyāntastoṣāt sphuṭam iha namāvaḥ svavapuṣi // 8.2.368	śikhariṇī [17: ymnsBlg]
tac chīghram uttiṣṭhata yāta vatsāḥ prajāpatiṃ draṣṭum ihāryaputram / taddarśanād vo bhavitārthasiddhiḥ kāryaṃ ca vas tadvacanaṃ śivāya // 8.2.369	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
iti tābhyām ādiṣṭā devībhyāṃ te tathaiva gatvā tam / kaśyapamuniṃ mayādyā dadṛśur divyāśrame tatra // 8.2.370	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
drutaśuddhahāṭakābhaṃ tejomayam āśrame ca devānām / jvālākapilajaṭādharam analasamānaṃ durādharṣam // 8.2.371	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
upagamya ca tasya pādayos te nipatanti sma sahānugaiḥ krameṇa / atha so 'pi muhuḥ kṛtocitāśīḥ paritoṣād upaveśya tān uvāca // 8.2.372	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
ānandaḥ paramo mamaiṣa yad amī dṛṣṭāḥ stha sarve sutāḥ ślāghyas tvaṃ maya satpathād acalito yaḥ sarvavidyāspadam / dhanyas tvaṃ ca sunītha yena gatam apy āptaṃ punar jīvitaṃ tvaṃ sūryaprabha puṇyavāṃś ca bhavitā yaḥ khecarāṇāṃ patiḥ // 8.2.373	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
tad dharme pathi vartitavyam adhunā boddhavyam asmadvaco bhokṣyadhve satataṃ sukhāni paramām āsādya yena śriyam / naiva syāc ca purā yathā paribhavo bhūyaḥ parebhyo 'tra vo dharmātikramiṇo 'surā hi murajiccakrasya yātā vaśam // 8.2.374	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
ye cāsurā devahatāḥ sunītha martyapravīrās ta ime 'vatīrṇāḥ / yo 'bhūt sumuṇḍīka ihānujas te sūryaprabhaḥ saiṣa kilādya jātaḥ // 8.2.375	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
anye 'pi te 'mī asurā vayasyā asyaiva jātāḥ khalu bāndhavāś ca / yaḥ śambarākhyaś ca mahāsuro 'bhūt saiṣo 'dya jātaḥ sacivaḥ prahastaḥ // 8.2.376	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
yaś cāsuro 'bhūt triśirā sa jātaḥ siddhārthanāmā sacivo mayasya / vātāpir ity āsa ca dānavo yaḥ prajñāḍhyanāmāsya sa eva mantrī // 8.2.377	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
ulūkanāmā danujaś ca yo 'bhūt so 'yaṃ vayasyo 'sya śubhaṃkarākhyaḥ / yo 'yaṃ vayasyo 'sya ca vītabhītiḥ sa kālanāmāpy abhavat surāriḥ // 8.2.378	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
yaś caiṣa bhāṣaḥ sacivo 'sya so 'yaṃ daityo 'vatīrṇo vṛṣaparvanāmā / yo 'yaṃ prabhāsaś ca sa eṣa daityo vatsāvatīrṇaḥ prabalābhidhānaḥ // 8.2.379	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
mahātmanā ratnamayena yena devair vipakṣair api yācitena / kṛtvā śarīraṃ dalaśo 'vatīrṇaṃ ratnāni jātāny akhilāni yasmāt // 8.2.380	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
tattoṣataś caṇḍikayāsya devyā varo 'nyadehānugataḥ sa dattaḥ / yena prabhāso 'dya sa eṣa jāto mahābalo duṣprasaho ripūṇām // 8.2.381	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
yau dānavāv abhūtāṃ pūrvaṃ sundopasundanāmānau / tāv etau sarvadamanabhayaṃkarāv asya mantriṇau jātau // 8.2.382	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
yaś ca hayagrīvākhyo vikaṭākṣaś cāsurāv abhūtāṃ dvau / sthirabuddhimahābuddhī utpannāv asya tāv imau sacivau // 8.2.383	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
anye 'py asya ya ete śvaśurāḥ sacivādibāndhavā ye ca / te 'py avatīrṇā asurā yair indrādyāḥ purā jitā bahuśaḥ // 8.2.384	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
tad yuṣmākaṃ pakṣaḥ punar apy evaṃ kramād gato vṛddhim / dhīrā bhavata samṛddhiṃ prāpsyatha dharmād avicyutāḥ paramām // 8.2.385	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
iti vadati kaśyaparṣau dākṣāyaṇyaḥ kilāsya patnyo 'tra / aditipramukhāḥ sarvā mādhyaṃdinasavanasamaya ājagmuḥ // 8.2.386	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
dattvāśiṣaṃ mayādiṣu namatsu bhartuḥ kṛtāhnikājñāsu / tāsv atha śakro 'trāgāt salokapālo 'pi taṃ muniṃ draṣṭum // 8.2.387	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
vanditasadārakaśyapamunicaraṇo vandito mayādyaiś ca / so 'tha saroṣaṃ paśyan sūryaprabham uktavān mayaṃ śakraḥ // 8.2.388	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
eṣo 'rbhakaḥ sa jāne vidyādharacakravartitākāmaḥ / tad asau svalpena kathaṃ saṃtuṣṭo nendratāṃ kim arthayate // 8.2.389	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
tac chrutvaiva mayas taṃ jagāda deveśa tat tvayindratvam / parameśvareṇa nirmitam ādiṣṭaṃ cāsya khecareśatvam // 8.2.390	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
iti mayavacanān maghavā sa tadā vihasann uvāca sāmarṣaḥ / atyalpaṃ hi tad asyāḥ sulakṣaṇasyākṛter amuṣyeti // 8.2.391	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
atha sa mayo 'py avadat taṃ śrutaśarmā yatra khecarendratve / yogyas tatrāsaṃśayam ākṛtir asyeyam arhatindratvam // 8.2.392	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
ity uktavate tasmai mayāya kupitaḥ sa vajram udyamya / maghavottasthau kaśyapamunir akaroc cātha kopahuṃkāram // 8.2.393	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
dhikkāramukharatāmrair vadanaiḥ kopaṃ yayuś ca dityādyāḥ / tata indraḥ śāpabhayād upāviśat saṃhṛtāyudho 'vanataḥ // 8.2.394	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
praṇipatya pādayor atha dārayutaṃ taṃ surāsuraprabhavam / kaśyapamuniṃ prasādya ca vijñāpitavān kṛtāñjaliḥ śakraḥ // 8.2.395	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
śrutaśarmaṇe mayā yad bhagavan vidyādharādhirājatvam / dattaṃ tad eṣa hartuṃ sūryaprabha udyato 'dhunā tasya // 8.2.396	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
eṣa ca sarvākāraṃ mayo 'sya tatsādhane kṛtodyogaḥ / tac chrutvā sa tam indraṃ ditidanusahitaḥ prajāpatir avocat // 8.2.397	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
iṣṭas te śrutaśarmā maghavan sūryaprabhaś ca śarvasya / na ca tasyecchāmi tathā tenājñaptaś ca pūrvam atra mayaḥ // 8.2.398	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
tat tvaṃ mayasya kiṃ khalu jalpasi kathayātra ko 'parādho 'sya / eṣa hi dharmapathastho jñānī vijñānavān gurupraṇataḥ // 8.2.399	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
bhasmākariṣyad asmatkrodhāgnis tvām aghaṃ vyadhāsyaś cet / na ca śaktas tvam imaṃ prati prabhāvam etasya kiṃ na jānāsi // 8.2.400	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
iti muninātra sadāreṇokte lajjābhayānate cendre / aditir uvāca sa kīdṛk śrutaśarmā darśyatām ihānīya // 8.2.401	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
etan niśamya śakro mātalim ādiśya tatkṣaṇaṃ tatra / ānāyayati sma sa taṃ śrutaśarmāṇaṃ nabhaścarādhīśam // 8.2.402	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
taṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛtavinatiṃ vīkṣya ca sūryaprabhaṃ tam aprākṣuḥ / kaśyapamuniṃ svabhāryāḥ ka etayo rūpalakṣaṇāḍhya iti // 8.2.403	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
atha sa munīndro 'vādīc chrutaśarmāsyāpi na prabhāsasya / etat sacivasya samaḥ kiṃ punar etasya nirupamānasya // 8.2.404	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
sūryaprabha eṣa yato divyais tai rūpalakṣaṇair yuktaḥ / yair asyādhyavasāyaṃ vidadhānasyindratāpi nāsulabhā // 8.2.405	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
iti kaśyaparṣivacanaṃ sarve 'pi śraddadhus tathety atra / tata eṣa mayāya varaṃ dadau muniḥ śṛṇvato mahendrasya // 8.2.406	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
yat putra nirvikāraṃ bhavatā sthitam udyatāyudhe 'pindre / tenājarāmaro 'ṅgair vajramayair akṣataś ca bhavitāsi // 8.2.407	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
etāv api te sadṛśau sunīthasūryaprabhau mahāsattvau / śaśvad aparibhavanīyau bhaviṣyataḥ sakalavairivargasya // 8.2.408	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
eṣa suvāsakumāraś cāpadrajanīṣu cintitopagataḥ / sāhāyakaṃ kariṣyati mattanayaḥ śaradijendusamakāntiḥ // 8.2.409	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
ity uktavato 'sya muner bhāryā ṛṣayaś ca lokapālāś ca / sadasi mayaprabhṛtibhyas tebhyaḥ sarve varān dadus tadvat // 8.2.410	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
aditir atha śakram avadad viramāvinayāt prasādayendra mayam / dṛṣṭaṃ vinayaphalaṃ hi tvayādya yad anena sadvarāḥ prāptāḥ // 8.2.411	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
tac chrutvā mayam indraḥ pāṇāv ālambya toṣayām āsa / sūryaprabhābhibhūtaḥ śrutaśarmā cābhavad dinendunibhaḥ // 8.2.412	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
praṇamya tam atha kṣaṇāt surapatir guruṃ kaśyapaṃ jagāma sa yathāgataṃ nikhilalokapālānvitaḥ / mayaprabhṛtayo 'pi te munivarasya tasyājñayā tataḥ khalu tadāśramāt prakṛtakāryasiddhyai yayuḥ // 8.2.413	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
tato mayasunīthau tau gatvā sūryaprabhaś ca saḥ / kaśyapasyāśramāt tasmāt saṃprāpuḥ sarva eva te // 8.3.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃgamaṃ candrabhāgāyā airāvatyāś ca yatra te / sthitāḥ sūryaprabhasyārthe rājāno mittrabāndhavāḥ // 8.3.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāptaṃ sūryaprabhaṃ te ca dṛṣṭvā tatra sthitā nṛpāḥ / rudanto 'gre samuttasthur viṣaṇṇā maraṇonmukhāḥ // 8.3.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
candraprabhādarśanajāṃ teṣām āśaṅkya duḥkhitām / sūryaprabho 'khilaṃ tebhyo yathāvṛttaṃ śaśaṃsa tat // 8.3.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathāpi vignāḥ pṛṣṭās te tena kṛcchrād avarṇayan / tasya bhāryāpaharaṇaṃ vihitaṃ śrutaśarmaṇā // 8.3.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)

tataḥ sūryaprabhas tatra pratijñām akarot krudhā / yadi brahmādayaḥ sarve 'py abhirakṣanti taṃ surāḥ // 8.3.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathāpy unmūlanīyo me śrutaśarmā sa niścitam / paradārāpaharaṇe chadmaprāgalbhyavāñ śaṭhaḥ // 8.3.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)

satyaṃ kṛtodyamas tvaṃ cet tad vadāmi mayā tadā / māyāṃ pradarśya nītvā te pātāle sthāpitāḥ priyāḥ // 8.3.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ tvaṃ vijayodyogaṃ karoṣi rabhasād iti / naivam eva tathā hy agnir jvaled vāterito yathā // 8.3.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad ehi yāmaḥ pātālaṃ priyās te darśayāmi tāḥ / evaṃ mayavacaḥ śrutvā nananduḥ sarva eva te // 8.3.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāktanena ca tenaiva praviśya vivareṇa te / jagmuś caturthaṃ pātālaṃ mayāsurapuraḥsarāḥ // 8.3.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatraikato vāsagṛhān mayaḥ sūryaprabhāya tāḥ / bharyā madanasenādyā ānīyāsau samarpayat // 8.3.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

mayāc chrutavaraprāptiḥ praṇataṃ taṃ ca so 'suraḥ / āttāyudho 'tha jijñāsuḥ kṛtakakrodham abhyadhāt // 8.3.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tac chrutvā nirvikāras taṃ paśyan sūryaprabho 'bravīt / maccharīraṃ tvadāyattam avinītaṃ praśādhi mām // 8.3.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavantaṃ prahlādo vihasya tam uvāca saḥ / prekṣito 'si mayā yāvad darpaleśo 'pi nāsti te // 8.3.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
varaṃ gṛhāṇa tuṣṭo 'smīty uktas tena tatheti saḥ / bhaktiṃ guruṣu śaṃbhau ca vavre sūryaprabho varam // 8.3.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tuṣṭeṣu sarveṣu tasmai sūryaprabhāya saḥ / prahlādo yāminīṃ nāma dvitīyāṃ tanayāṃ dadau // 8.3.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sahāyatve ca putrau dvau tasyādāt so 'sureśvaraḥ / tataḥ sarvaiḥ sahāmīlapārśvaṃ sūryaprabho yayau // 8.3.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi śrutavaraprāptituṣṭas tasmai sukhāvatīm / dadau dvitīyāṃ tanayāṃ sāhāyye ca sutadvayam // 8.3.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tataḥ sabhājayann anyān sāhāyyāyāsurādhipān / sthitaḥ sūryaprabhaḥ so 'tra teṣv ahaḥsu priyāsakhaḥ // 8.3.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tisraḥ sunīthabhāryāś ca svabhāryāś ca nṛpātmajāḥ / sarvāḥ sagarbhāḥ saṃjātā mayādisahito 'śṛṇot // 8.3.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
pṛṣṭāś ca dohadaṃ tulyaṃ śaśaṃsur akhilā api / mahāhavadidṛkṣāṃ tā nanandātha mayāsuraḥ // 8.3.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etāsu diṣṭyā saṃbhūtā asurā ye purā hatāḥ / tena jāto 'bhilāṣo 'yam etāsām iti so 'vadat // 8.3.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ yayuḥ ṣaḍdivasāḥ saptame te rasātalāt / bhāryādiyuktā nirjagmuḥ sarve sūryaprabhādayaḥ // 8.3.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
utpātamāyā vighnāya yā teṣāṃ darśitāribhiḥ / sā suvāsakumāreṇa smṛtāyātena nāśitā // 8.3.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataś cāndraprabhaṃ pṛthvīrājye ratnaprabhaṃ śiśum / abhiṣicya samārūḍhabhūtāsanavimānakāḥ // 8.3.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sarve vidyādharendrasya sumeros te niketanam / yayur mayagirā pūrvagaṅgātīratapovanam // 8.3.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tān sauhṛdaprāptān sa sumerur apūjayat / mayoktāśeṣavṛttāntaḥ pūrvājñāṃ śāṃbhavīṃ smaran // 8.3.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taddeśasthāś ca te svaṃ svaṃ sainyaṃ sūryaprabhādikāḥ / kārtsnyenānāyayām āsur bandhūṃś ca suhṛdas tathā // 8.3.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āyayuḥ prathamaṃ sūryaprabhasya śvaśurātmajāḥ / rājaputrā mayādiṣṭā vidyāḥ saṃsādhya sodyamāḥ // 8.3.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
teṣāṃ haribhaṭādīnāṃ ṣoḍaśānāṃ rathāyutam / dve cāyute padātīnām ekaikasyānugaṃ balam // 8.3.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadanu sthitasaṃketā ājagmur daityadānavāḥ / śvaśuryāḥ śvaśurā mittrāṇy anye caitasya bāndhavāḥ // 8.3.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hṛṣṭaromā mahāmāyaḥ siṃhadaṃṣṭraḥ prakampanaḥ / tantukaccho durārohaḥ sumāyo vajrapañjaraḥ // 8.3.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dhūmaketuḥ pramathano vikaṭākṣaś ca dānavaḥ / bahavo 'nye 'pi cājagmur ā saptamarasātalāt // 8.3.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaścid rathānām ayutaiḥ saptabhiḥ kaścid aṣṭabhiḥ / kaścit ṣaḍbhis tribhiḥ kaścid yo 'tisvalpo 'yutena saḥ // 8.3.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
padātīnāṃ tribhir lakṣaiḥ kaścil lakṣadvayena ca / kaścit kaścit tu lakṣeṇa lakṣārdhenādhamas tu yaḥ // 8.3.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekaikasya ca hastyaśvam āgāt tadanusārataḥ / asaṃkhyam āyayau cānyat sainyaṃ mayasunīthayoḥ // 8.3.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sūryaprabhasya cāmeyam ājagāma nijaṃ balam / vasudattādibhūpānāṃ sumeroś ca tathaiva ca // 8.3.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato mayāsuro 'pṛcchac cintitopasthitaṃ munim / taṃ suvāsakumārākhyaṃ saha sūryaprabhādibhiḥ // 8.3.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vikṣiptam etad bhagavan sainyaṃ nehopalakṣyate / tad brūhi kutra vistīrṇaṃ yugapad dṛśyatām iti // 8.3.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ito yojanamātre 'sti kalāpagrāmasaṃjñakaḥ / pradeśas tatra vistīrṇe gatvaitat pravilokyatām // 8.3.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukte tena muninā tadyuktāḥ sasumerukāḥ / yayuḥ kalāpagrāmaṃ taṃ sarve te svabalaiḥ saha // 8.3.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatronnatasthānagatā dadṛśus te pṛthak pṛthak / saṃniveśyāsurāṇāṃ ca nṛpāṇāṃ ca varūthinīḥ // 8.3.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sumerur āha sma śrutaśarmā balādhikaḥ / santi vidyādharādhīśās tasya hy ekottaraṃ śatam // 8.3.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
teṣāṃ ca pṛthag ekaiko rājñāṃ dvātriṃśataḥ patiḥ / tad astu bhittvā kāṃścit tān melayiṣyāmy ahaṃ tava // 8.3.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tat prātar etad gacchāmaḥ sthānaṃ valmīkasaṃjñitam / phālgunasyāsitā prātar aṣṭamī hi mahātithiḥ // 8.3.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāṃ cotpadyate tatra lakṣaṇaṃ cakravartinaḥ / tūrṇaṃ vidyādharā yānti tatkṛte cātra tāṃ tithim // 8.3.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ sumeruṇā prokte sainyasaṃvidhinā dinam / nītvā prātar yayus tat te valmīkaṃ sabalā rathaiḥ // 8.3.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra te dakṣiṇe sānau himādrer ninadadbalāḥ / niviṣṭā dadṛśuḥ prāptān bahūn vidyādharādhipān // 8.3.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
te ca vidyādharās tatra kuṇḍeṣv ādīpitānalāḥ / homapravṛttā abhavañ japavyagrāś ca kecana // 8.3.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tataḥ sūryaprabho 'py atra vahnikuṇḍaṃ mahad vyadhāt / svayaṃ jajvāla tatrāgnis tasya vidyāprabhāvataḥ // 8.3.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭir utpede sumeror matsaraḥ punaḥ / vidyādharāṇām udabhūt tadaikas tam abhāṣata // 8.3.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
vidyādharendratāṃ tyaktvā dhik sumero 'nuvartase / sūryaprabhābhidham imaṃ kathaṃ dharaṇigocaram // 8.3.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tac chrutvā sa sumerus taṃ sakopaṃ nirabhartsayat / sūryaprabhaṃ ca tannāma pṛcchantam idam abravīt // 8.3.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asti vidyādharo bhīmanāmā tasya ca gehinīm / brahmākāmayata svairaṃ tata eṣo 'bhyajāyata // 8.3.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
guptaṃ yad brahmaṇo jāto brahmaguptas tad ucyate / ata evaitad etasya svajanmasadṛśaṃ vacaḥ // 8.3.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvākāri tenāpi vahnikuṇḍaṃ sumeruṇā / tataḥ sūryaprabhas tena sahāhauṣīd dhutāśanam // 8.3.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣaṇāc ca bhūmivivarād ujjagāmātibhīṣaṇaḥ / ... kasmād ajagaro mahān // 8.3.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
taṃ grahītum adhāvat sa vidyādharapatir madāt / brahmaguptābhidhāno 'tha sumerur yena garhitaḥ // 8.3.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tenājagareṇātra mukhaphūtkāravāyunā / nītvā hastaśate kṣipto nyapataj jīrṇaparṇavat // 8.3.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tejaḥprabho nāma taṃ jighṛkṣur upāgamat / sarpaṃ vidyādharādhīśaḥ so 'py akṣepi tathāmunā // 8.3.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas taṃ duṣṭadamano nāma vidyādhareśvaraḥ / upāgāt so 'pi niḥśvāsenānyavat tena cikṣipe // 8.3.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato virūpaśaktyākhyaḥ khecarendras tam abhyagāt / so 'pi tena tathaivāstaḥ śvāsena tṛṇahelayā // 8.3.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athābhyadhāvatāṃ tadvad aṅgārakavijṛmbhakau / rājānau yugapat tau ca dūre śvāsena so 'kṣipat // 8.3.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ vidyādharādhīśāḥ kramāt sarve 'pi tena te / kṣiptāḥ kathaṃcid uttasthur aṅgair aśmāvacūrṇitaiḥ // 8.3.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato darpeṇa taṃ sarpaṃ śrutaśarmābhyupeyivān / jighṛkṣuḥ so 'pi tenātra cikṣipe śvāsamārutaiḥ // 8.3.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adūrapatitaḥ so 'tha punar utthāya dhāvitaḥ / tena dūrataraṃ nītvā śvāsenākṣepi bhūtale // 8.3.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vilakṣe cūrṇitāṅge 'sminn utthite śrutaśarmaṇi / sūryaprabho 'her grahaṇe preṣito 'bhūt sumeruṇā // 8.3.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
paśyataiṣo 'py ajagaraṃ grahītum imam utthitaḥ / aho ime nirvicārā markaṭā iva mānuṣāḥ // 8.3.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
anyena kriyamāṇaṃ yat paśyanty anuharanti tat / iti vidyādharāḥ sūryaprabhaṃ te jahasus tadā // 8.3.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
teṣāṃ prahasatām eva gatvā sūryaprabheṇa saḥ / stimitāsyo gṛhītaś ca kṛṣṭaś cājagaro bilāt // 8.3.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkṣaṇaṃ pratipede sa bhujagas tūṇaratnatām / mūrdhni sūryaprabhasyāpi puṣpavṛṣṭir divo 'patat // 8.3.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sūryaprabhākṣayaṃ tūṇaratnaṃ siddham idaṃ tava / tadgṛhāṇaitad ity uccair divyā vāg udabhūt tadā // 8.3.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vidyādharā mlāniṃ yayuḥ sūryaprabho 'grahīt / tūṇaṃ mayasunīthau ca sumeruś cābhajan mudam // 8.3.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutaśarmaṇi yāte 'tha vidyādharabalānvite / etya sūryaprabhaṃ dūtas tadīya idam abhyadhāt // 8.3.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvāṃ samādiśati śrīmāñ cchrutaśarmā prabhur yathā / samarpayaitat tūṇaṃ me kāryaṃ cej jīvitena te // 8.3.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sūryaprabho 'tha pratyāha dūtedaṃ brūhi gaccha tam / svadeha eva bhavitā tūṇas te maccharāvṛtaḥ // 8.3.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
etat prativacaḥ śrutvā gate dūte parāṅmukhe / prāhasan rabhasoktiṃ tāṃ sarve te śrutaśarmaṇaḥ // 8.3.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sūryaprabho 'tha sānandam āśliṣyoce sumeruṇā / diṣṭyādya śāṃbhavaṃ vākyaṃ phalitaṃ tad asaṃśayam // 8.3.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tūṇaratne hi siddhe 'smin siddhā te cakravartitā / tad ehi sādhayedānīṃ dhanūratnaṃ nirākulaḥ // 8.3.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etat sumeroḥ śrutvā te tasminn evāgrayāyini / sūryaprabhādayo jagmur hemakūṭācalaṃ tataḥ // 8.3.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
pārśve tasyottare te ca mānasākhyaṃ sarovaram / prāpuḥ samudranirmāṇe vidhātur iva varṇakam // 8.3.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mukhāni divyanārīṇāṃ krīḍantīnāṃ jalāntare / nihnuvānaṃ maruddhūtair utphullaiḥ kanakāmbujaiḥ // 8.3.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ālokayanti yāvac ca sarasas tasya te śriyam / tāvat tatrāyayuḥ sarve śrutaśarmādayo 'pi te // 8.3.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sūryaprabhas te ca homaṃ cakrur ghṛtāmbujaiḥ / kṣaṇāc cātrodagād ghoro meghas tasmāt sarovarāt // 8.3.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa vyāpya gaganaṃ megho mahad varṣam avāsṛjat / tanmadhye ca papātaiko nāgaḥ kālo 'mbudāt tataḥ // 8.3.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sumeruvākyāc cotthāya gāḍhaṃ sūryaprabheṇa yat / gṛhīto vidhyamāno 'pi tat sa nāgo 'bhavad dhanuḥ // 8.3.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmin dhanuṣṭvam āpanne dvitīyo 'bhrāt tato 'patat / nāgo viṣāgnivitrāsanaśyanniḥśeṣakhecaraḥ // 8.3.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi sūryaprabheṇātra gṛhītas tena pūrvavat / dhanurguṇatvaṃ saṃprāpa meghaś cāśu nanāśa saḥ // 8.3.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sūryaprabhāmitabalaṃ siddham etad dhanus tava / acchedyaś ca guṇo 'py eṣa ratne ete gṛhāṇa tat // 8.3.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity aśrāvi ca vāg divyā puṣpavṛṣṭipuraḥsarā / sūryaprabhaś ca saguṇaṃ dhanūratnaṃ tad agrahīt // 8.3.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
śrutaśarmāpy agād vignaḥ sānugaḥ sa tapovanam / sūryaprabho 'tha sarve ca harṣam āpur mayādayaḥ // 8.3.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pṛṣṭo 'tha dhanurutpattiṃ taiḥ sumerur uvāca saḥ / iha kīcakaveṇūnāṃ divyam asti vanaṃ mahat // 8.3.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato ye kīcakāś chittvā kṣipyante 'tra sarovare / mahānty etāni divyāni saṃpadyante dhanūṃṣi te // 8.3.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sādhitāni ca tāny eva devais tais taiḥ purātmanaḥ / asurair atha gandharvais tathā vidyādharottamaiḥ // 8.3.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhinnāni teṣāṃ nāmāni cakravartidhanūṃṣi tu / atrāmitabalākhyāni nikṣiptāni purā suraiḥ // 8.3.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāni caitaiḥ parikleśaiḥ sidhyanti śubhakarmaṇām / keṣāṃcid īśvarecchāto bhaviṣyaccakravartinām // 8.3.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac ca sūryaprabhasyaitat siddham adya mahad dhanuḥ / svocitāni vayasyās tat sādhayantv asya tāny amī // 8.3.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yeṣāṃ hi siddhavidyānāṃ vīrāṇām asti yogyatā / yathānurūpaṃ bhavyānāṃ siddhyanty adyāpi tāni hi // 8.3.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
etat sumeruvacanaṃ śrutvā sūryaprabhasya te / vayasyāḥ kīcakavanaṃ tat prabhāsādayo yayuḥ // 8.3.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tadrakṣakaṃ ca rājānaṃ caṇḍadaṇḍaṃ vijitya te / ānīya kīcakāṃs tatra nidadhuḥ saraso 'ntare // 8.3.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tattīropoṣitānāṃ ca japatāṃ juhvatāṃ tathā / sidhyanti sma dhanūṃṣy eṣāṃ saptāhāt sattvaśālinām // 8.3.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāptais tair uktavṛttāntair mayādyaiś ca sahātha saḥ / āgāt sūryaprabhas tāvat tat sumeros tapovanam // 8.3.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrovāca sumerus taṃ jito veṇuvaneśvaraḥ / tvanmittraiś caṇḍadaṇḍo yad ajeyo 'pi tad adbhutam // 8.3.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāsti mohinī nāma vidyā tena sa durjayaḥ / nūnaṃ sā sthāpitā tena pradhānasya ripoḥ kṛte // 8.3.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ataḥ prayuktā naiteṣu tvadvayasyeṣu saṃprati / sakṛd eva hi sā tasya phaladā na punaḥ punaḥ // 8.3.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
gurāv eva hi sā tena prabhāvāvekṣaṇāya bhoḥ / prayuktābhūd ataḥ śāpas tena datto 'sya tādṛśaḥ // 8.3.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac cintyam etad vidyānāṃ prabhāvo hi durāsadaḥ / tatkāraṇaṃ ca bhavatā pṛcchyatāṃ bhagavān mayaḥ // 8.3.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
asyāgre kim ahaṃ vacmi kaḥ pradīpo raveḥ puraḥ / evaṃ sumeruṇā sūryaprabhasyokte mayo 'bravīt // 8.3.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
satyaṃ sumeruṇoktaṃ te saṃkṣepāc chṛṇu vacmy adaḥ / avyaktāt prabhavantīha tās tāḥ śaktyanuśaktayaḥ // 8.3.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrodgataḥ prāṇaśakter nādo bindupathāśritaḥ / vidyādimantratām eti paratattvakalānvitaḥ // 8.3.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāsāṃ ca mantravidyānāṃ jñānena tapasāpi vā / siddhājñayā vā siddhānāṃ prabhāvo duratikramaḥ // 8.3.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tat putra sarvavidyās te siddhā dvābhyāṃ tu hīyase / mohinīparivartinyau na vidye sādhite tvayā // 8.3.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yājñavalkyaś ca te vetti tad gaccha prārthayasva tam / evaṃ mayoktyā tasya rṣer yayau sūryaprabho 'ntikam // 8.3.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sa munis taṃ ca saptāhaṃ nivāsya bhujagahrade / agnimadhye tryahaṃ caiva tapaścaryām akārayat // 8.3.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dadau soḍhāhidaṃśasya saptāhāc cāsya mohinīm / vidyāṃ visoḍhavahneś ca tryahād viparivartinīm // 8.3.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāptavidyasya bhūyo 'pi vahnikuṇḍapraveśanam / tasyādideśa sa muniḥ sa tathety akaroc ca tat // 8.3.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatkṣaṇaṃ ca mahāpadmavimānaṃ tasya kāmagam / abhūd upanataṃ sūryaprabhasya gaganecaram // 8.3.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṣṭottareṇa pattrāṇāṃ purāṇāṃ ca śatena yat / alaṃkṛtaṃ mahāratnair nānārūpair vinirmitam // 8.3.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
cakravartivimānaṃ te siddham etad amuṣya ca / pureṣv antaḥpurāṇy eṣu sarveṣu sthāpayiṣyasi // 8.3.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yena tāny apradhṛṣyāṇi bhaviṣyanti bhavaddviṣām / ity antarikṣād dhīraṃ tam uvācātha sarasvatī // 8.3.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tataḥ sa yājñavalkyaṃ taṃ guruṃ prahvo vyajijñapat / ādiśyatāṃ prayacchāmi kīdṛśīṃ dakṣiṇām iti // 8.3.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nijābhiṣekakāle māṃ smarer eṣaiva dakṣiṇā / gaccha tāvat svakaṃ sainyam iti taṃ so 'bravīn muniḥ // 8.3.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
natvā tatas taṃ sa muniṃ vimānaṃ cādhiruhya tat / tat sumerunivāsasthaṃ sainyaṃ sūryaprabho yayau // 8.3.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrākhyātasvavṛttāntaṃ sasunīthasumeravaḥ / siddhavidyāvimānaṃ tam abhyanandan mayādayaḥ // 8.3.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sunīthaḥ sasmāra taṃ suvāsakumārakam / sa cāgatya mayādīṃs tāñ jagādaivaṃ sarājakān // 8.3.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
siddhaṃ vimānaṃ vidyāś ca sarvāḥ sūryaprabhasya tat / udāsīnāḥ kim adyāpi sthitāḥ stha ripunirjaye // 8.3.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sa mayo 'vādīd yuktaṃ bhagavatoditam / kiṃ tu prāk preṣyatāṃ dūto nītis tāvat prayujyatām // 8.3.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ mayāsureṇokte so 'bravīn muniputrakaḥ / astv evaṃ kā kṣatis tarhi prahastaḥ preṣyatām ayam // 8.3.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
eṣa sapratibho vagmī gatijñaḥ kāryakālayoḥ / karkaśaś ca sahiṣṇuś ca sarvadūtaguṇānvitaḥ // 8.3.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti tadvacanaṃ sarve śraddhāya vyasṛjaṃs tataḥ / prahastaṃ dattasaṃdeśaṃ dautyāya śrutaśarmaṇe // 8.3.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmin gate 'bravīt sūryaprabhas tān nikhilān nijān / śrūyatāṃ yan mayā dṛṣṭam apūrvaṃ svapnakautukam // 8.3.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jāne 'dya kṣīyamāṇāyāṃ paśyāmi rajanāv aham / yāvan mahājalaughena vayaṃ sarve hriyāmahe // 8.3.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hriyamāṇāś ca nṛtyāmo na majjāmaḥ kathaṃ cana / athaughaḥ sa parāvṛttaḥ pratikūlena vāyunā // 8.3.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ kenāpi puruṣeṇaitya jvalitatejasā / uddhṛtya vahnau kṣiptāḥ smo na ca dahyamahe 'gninā // 8.3.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
etyātha megho raktaughaṃ pravṛṣṭas tena cāsṛjā / vyāptā diśas tato nidrā naṣṭā me niśayā saha // 8.3.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavantaṃ taṃ smāha sa suvāsakumārakaḥ / āyāsapūrvo 'bhyudayaḥ svapnenānena sūcitaḥ // 8.3.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
yo jalaughaḥ sa saṅgrāmo dhairyaṃ tad yad amajjanam / nṛtyatāṃ hriyamāṇānāṃ jalais tatparivartakaḥ // 8.3.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yo yuṣmākaṃ marut so 'pi śaraṇaḥ ko'pi rakṣitā / yaś coddhartā jvalattejāḥ pumān sākṣāt sa śaṃkaraḥ // 8.3.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣiptāḥ sthāgnau ca yat tena tan nyastāḥ stha mahāmṛdhe / meghodayas tato yac ca sa bhūyo 'pi bhayāgamaḥ // 8.3.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
raktaughavarṣaṇaṃ yac ca tad bhayasya vināśanam / diśāṃ yad raktapūrṇatvam ṛddhiḥ sā mahatī ca vaḥ // 8.3.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svapnaś cānekadhānyārtho yathārtho 'pārtha eva ca / yaḥ sadyaḥ sūcayaty artham anyārthaḥ so 'bhidhīyate // 8.3.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prasannadevatādeśarūpaḥ svapno yathārthakaḥ / gāḍhānubhavacintādikṛtam āhur apārthakam // 8.3.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rajomūḍhena manasā bāhyārthavimukhena hi / jantur nidrāvaśaḥ svapnaṃ tais taiḥ paśyati kāraṇaiḥ // 8.3.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ciraśīghraphalatvaṃ ca tasya kālaviśeṣataḥ / eṣa rātryantadṛṣṭas tu svapnaḥ śīghraphalapradaḥ // 8.3.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etan munikumārāt te śrutvā tasmāt sunirvṛtāḥ / utthāya dinakartavyaṃ vyadhuḥ sūryaprabhādayaḥ // 8.3.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvat prahastaḥ pratyāgāc chrutaśarmasakāśataḥ / pṛṣṭo mayādibhiś caivaṃ yathāvṛttam avarṇayat // 8.3.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ito gato 'haṃ tarasā trikūṭācalavartinīm / tāṃ trikūṭapatākākhyāṃ nagarīṃ hemanirmitām // 8.3.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāṃ praviśya cāpaśyam ahaṃ kṣattṛniveditaḥ / vṛtaṃ taṃ śrutaśarmāṇaṃ tais tair vidyādharādhipaiḥ // 8.3.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pitrā trikūṭasenena tathā vikramaśaktinā / dhuraṃdhareṇa cānyaiś ca śūrair dāmodarādibhiḥ // 8.3.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upaviśyātha tam ahaṃ śrutaśarmāṇam abhyadhām / śrīmatā prahitaḥ sūryaprabheṇāhaṃ tvadantikam // 8.3.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃdiṣṭaṃ tena cedaṃ te prasādād dhūrjaṭer mayā / vidyā ratnāni bhāryāś ca sahāyāś caiva sādhitāḥ // 8.3.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad ehi mila sainye me sahaitaiḥ khecareśvaraiḥ / nihantāhaṃ viruddhānāṃ rakṣitā namatāṃ punaḥ // 8.3.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yā cāgamyā hṛtājñāte sunīthatanayā tvayā / kāmacūḍāmaṇiḥ kanyā muñca tām aśubhaṃ hi tat // 8.3.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ mayokte sarve te kruddhās tatraivam abhyadhuḥ / ko nāma sa yad asmāsu darpāt saṃdiśatīdṛśam // 8.3.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
martyeṣu saṃdiśatv evaṃ kas tu vidyādhareṣu saḥ / varāko mānuṣo bhūtvāpy evaṃ dṛpyan vinaṅkṣyati // 8.3.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvoktaṃ mayā kiṃ kiṃ ko nāma sa niśamyatām / sa hareṇeha yuṣmākaṃ cakravartī vinirmitaḥ // 8.3.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
martyo vā yadi tan martyair devatvam api sādhitam / vidyādharaiś ca martyasya tasya dṛṣṭaḥ parākramaḥ // 8.3.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nāśaś cehāgate tasmin kadācid vo hi dṛśyate / ity evokte mayā kruddhā sā sabhā kṣobham āyayau // 8.3.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhāvatāṃ ca hantuṃ māṃ śrutaśarmadhuraṃdharau / evaṃ paśyāmi śauryaṃ vām ity avocam ahaṃ ca tau // 8.3.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato dāmodareṇaitāv utthāya vinivāritau / śāntaṃ dūtaś ca vipraś ca na vadhya iti jalpatā // 8.3.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vikramaśaktir mām avādīd gaccha dūta bhoḥ / tvatsvāmīva hi sarve 'pi vayam īśvaranirmitāḥ // 8.3.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad āyātu sa paśyāmas tasyātithyakṣamā vayam / evaṃ sagarvaṃ tenokte vihasann aham abravam // 8.3.168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
haṃsāḥ padmavane tāvan nādaṃ kurvanti susthitāḥ / yāvat paśyanti nāyāntaṃ megham ācchāditāmbaram // 8.3.169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvotthāya sāvajñaṃ nirgatyāham ihāgataḥ / etat prahastāc chrutvā tais tuṣṭiḥ prāpi mayādibhiḥ // 8.3.170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
niścitya cāhavodyogaṃ sarve senāpatiṃ vyadhuḥ / prabhāsam atha te sūryaprabhādyā raṇadurmadam // 8.3.171	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sarve ca raṇadīkṣāyāṃ te suvāsakumārataḥ / nideśaṃ prāpya tad ahaḥ prāviśan niyatavratāḥ // 8.3.172	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
rātrau sūryaprabhaś cātra vrataśayyāgṛhāntaram / praviṣṭām aikṣatāpūrvām anidro varakanyakām // 8.3.173	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā tasya vyājasuptasya prasuptasacivasya ca / svairaṃ nikaṭam āgatya sakhīm āha sahasthitām // 8.3.174	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yadi suptasya viśrāntavilāsāpīyam īdṛśī / rūpaśobhāsya tat kīdṛk prabuddhasya bhavet sakhi // 8.3.175	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad astu na prabodhyo 'sau pūritaṃ kautukaṃ dṛśoḥ / adhikaṃ hi nibaddhena kim atra hṛdayena me // 8.3.176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhaviṣyaty asya saṅgrāmaḥ samaṃ hi śrutaśarmaṇā / tat tatra ko vijānāti bhavitā kila kasya kim // 8.3.177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāṇavyayāya śūrāṇāṃ jāyate hi raṇotsavaḥ / tatrāsyāstu śivaṃ tāvat tato jñāsyāmahe punaḥ // 8.3.178	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kāmacūḍāmaṇir yena kiṃ ca vyomavihāriṇā / dṛṣṭā tasyāsya hṛdayaṃ mādṛśī kā nu rañjayet // 8.3.179	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
evaṃ tayokte sāvādīt tatsakhī kiṃ bravīṣy adaḥ / asaṅgo hṛdayasyāsminn āyattaś caṇḍi kiṃ tava // 8.3.180	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
yena dṛṣṭena hṛdayaṃ kāmacūḍāmaṇer hṛtam / so 'nyasyā na haret kasyā yadi sākṣād arundhatī // 8.3.181	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidyāvaśāc ca kalyāṇaṃ vetsi kiṃ nāsya saṃgare / etasya bhāryāś coktāḥ stha siddhaiḥ saccakravartinaḥ // 8.3.182	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kāmacūḍāmaṇis tvaṃ ca suprabhā caikagotrajā / eṣv eva pariṇītā ca dineṣv etena suprabhā // 8.3.183	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tat kim asyāśivaṃ yuddhe na hi siddhavaco mṛṣā / kiṃ cāhṛtaṃ suprabhayā cittaṃ yasyāsya tasya kim // 8.3.184	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
nāhared bhavatī tvaṃ hi rūpeṇābhyadhikānaghe / bāndhavāpekṣayā vā te vikalpo yadi tan na sat // 8.3.185	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhartāraṃ hi vinā nānyaḥ satīnām asti bāndhavaḥ / etatsakhīvacaḥ śrutvā sāvocad varakanyakā // 8.3.186	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
satyaṃ sakhi tvayā proktaṃ na kāryaṃ me 'nyabandhubhiḥ / saṃkhye cāsyāryaputrasya jayaṃ jāne svavidyayā // 8.3.187	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
siddhāni cāsya ratnāni vidyāś cādyāpi kiṃ punaḥ / naitasyauṣadhayaḥ siddhās tena me dūyate manaḥ // 8.3.188	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
candrapādagirau tāś ca sarvāḥ santi guhāntare / sidhyanti puṇyabhājaś ca cakravartina eva tāḥ // 8.3.189	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad eṣa sādhayed gatvā tatra sarvauṣadhīr yadi / bhadraṃ tat syād yad āsannaḥ prātar asya mahāhavaḥ // 8.3.190	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvākhilaṃ tyaktvā vyājanidrāṃ sa utthitaḥ / sūryaprabhaḥ savinayaṃ tām uvācātra kanyakām // 8.3.191	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
darśito 'tīva mugdhākṣi pakṣapāto mayi tvayā / tad eṣa tatra gacchāmi kāsi tvam iti śaṃsa me // 8.3.192	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvā śrutaṃ sarvam aneneti trapānatā / tūṣṇīṃ babhūva sā kanyā tatsakhī tu jagāda sā // 8.3.193	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
eṣā vidyādharendrasya sumeror anujātmajā / kanyā vilāsinī nāma tvaddarśanasakautukā // 8.3.194	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktavatīm eva tāṃ sakhīṃ sā vilāsinī / ehi saṃprati gacchāva ity uktvā prayayau tataḥ // 8.3.195	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ prabhāsādibhyas tat prabodhya tadudīritam / sūryaprabhaḥ svamantribhyaḥ śaśaṃsauṣadhisādhanam // 8.3.196	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
visasarja prahastaṃ ca yogyaṃ tatsādhanāya saḥ / tad ākhyātuṃ sunīthasya sumeroś ca mayasya ca // 8.3.197	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tair āgataiḥ śraddadhānaiḥ samaṃ sa sacivānvitaḥ / niśi sūryaprabhaḥ prāyāc candrapādācalaṃ prati // 8.3.198	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
gacchatāṃ ca kramāt teṣām uttasthur mārgarodhinaḥ / yakṣaguhyakakūṣmāṇḍā vighnā nānāyudhodyatāḥ // 8.3.199	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kāṃścid astrair vimohyaitān kāṃścit saṃstabhya vidyayā / candrapādagiriṃ taṃ te prāpuḥ sūryaprabhādayaḥ // 8.3.200	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatraiṣāṃ tadguhādvāraprāptānāṃ śāṃkarā gaṇāḥ / etya praveśaṃ rurudhur vicitravikṛtānanāḥ // 8.3.201	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
etaiḥ saha na yoddhavyaṃ kupyed dhi bhagavān haraḥ / tannāmāṣṭasahasreṇa tam eva varadaṃ stumaḥ // 8.3.202	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tenaiva te prasīdanti tadgaṇā ity avocata / sa suvāsakumāras tān atha sūryaprabhādikān // 8.3.203	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tatheti sarve te tathaiva haram astuvan / svāmistutiprasannāś ca tān vadanti sma te gaṇāḥ // 8.3.204	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mukteyaṃ vo guhāsmābhir gṛhṇītāsyāṃ mahauṣadhīḥ / sūryaprabheṇa tv etasyāṃ na praveṣṭavyam ātmanā // 8.3.205	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
prabhāsaḥ praviśatv etām etasya sugamā hy asau / etad gaṇavacaḥ sarve te tathety anumenire // 8.3.206	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ praviśatas tasya prabhāsasya tadaiva sā / guhā baddhāndhakārāpi suprakāśā kim apy abhūt // 8.3.207	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

atha praviśya saṃgṛhya divyāḥ saptauṣadhīḥ sa tāḥ / prabhāso nirgataḥ sūryaprabhāya nikhilā dadau // 8.3.209	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

gaṇair guhāyāṃ kiṃ caiṣa kiṃkarair api satkṛtaḥ / etac chrutvā sa sarveṣu śṛṇvatsu munir abhyadhāt // 8.3.213	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
