sainye sūryaprabhasyāpi prabhāso 'nīkinīpatiḥ / ardhacandraṃ vyadhād vyūhaṃ madhye tasyābhavat svayam // 8.4.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sakuñjarakumāraś ca prahastaś cāsya koṇayoḥ / sūryaprabhasunīthādyās tasthuḥ sarve 'tra pṛṣṭhataḥ // 8.4.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sumerau tatsamīpasthe sasuvāsakumārake / āhanyanta raṇātodyāny ubhayor api sainyayoḥ // 8.4.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca gaganaṃ devaiḥ saṅgrāmaṃ draṣṭum āgataiḥ / sendraiḥ salokapālaiś ca sāpsaraskair apūryata // 8.4.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āyayau cātra viśveśaḥ śaṃkaraḥ pārvatīyutaḥ / devatābhir gaṇair bhūtair mātṛbhiś cāpy anudrutaḥ // 8.4.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āgāc ca bhagavān brahmā sāvitryādibhir anvitaḥ / mūrtair vedaiś ca śāstraiś ca nikhilaiś ca maharṣibhiḥ // 8.4.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ājagāma ca devībhir lakṣmīkīrtijayādibhiḥ / dhṛtacakrāyudho devaḥ pakṣirājaratho hariḥ // 8.4.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sabhāryaḥ kaśyapo 'py āgād ādityā vasavo 'pi ca / yakṣarākṣasanāgendrāḥ prahlādādyās tathāsurāḥ // 8.4.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tair āvṛte nabhobhāge śastrasaṃpātadāruṇaḥ / prāvartata mahānādaḥ saṅgrāmaḥ senayos tayoḥ // 8.4.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dikcakre bāṇajālena ghanenācchādite tadā / anyonyaśarasaṃgharṣajātānalataḍillate // 8.4.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śastrakṣatagajāśvaugharaktadhārāvapūritāḥ / vīrakāyavahadgrāhā niryayuḥ śoṇitāpagāḥ // 8.4.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nṛtyatāṃ taratāṃ rakte nadatāṃ cotsavāya saḥ / śūrāṇāṃ pheravāṇāṃ ca bhūtānaṃ cābhavad raṇaḥ // 8.4.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śānte tumulasaṅgrāme nihatāsaṃkhyasainike / lakṣyamāṇe vibhāge ca śanaiḥ svaparasainyayoḥ // 8.4.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pratipakṣapravīrāṇāṃ prayuddhānāṃ sumerutaḥ / nāmādau śrūyamāṇe ca kramāt sūryaprabhādibhiḥ // 8.4.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pūrvaṃ subāhor nṛpater vidyādharapates tathā / aṭṭahāsābhidhānasya dvandvayuddham abhūd dvayoḥ // 8.4.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
suciraṃ yudhyamānasya tasya viddhasya sāyakaiḥ / aṭṭahāso 'rdhacandreṇa subāhor acchinac chiraḥ // 8.4.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvā subāhuṃ nihataṃ muṣṭiko 'bhyāpatat krudhā / so 'pi tenāṭṭahāsena hṛdi bāṇahato 'patat // 8.4.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
muṣṭike nihate kruddhaḥ pralambo nāma bhūpatiḥ / abhidhāvyāṭṭahāsaṃ taṃ śaravarṣair ayodhayat // 8.4.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṭṭahāso 'pi tatsainyaṃ hatvā hatvā ca marmaṇi / pralambam api taṃ vīraṃ rathapṛṣṭhe nyapātayat // 8.4.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vīkṣya pralambaṃ nihataṃ mohano nāma bhūpatiḥ / saṃnipatyāṭṭahāsaṃ taṃ tāḍayām āsa sāyakaiḥ // 8.4.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'ṭṭahāsas taṃ chinnakodaṇḍaṃ hatasārathim / dṛḍhaprahārābhihataṃ pātayām āsa mohanam // 8.4.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
dṛṣṭvāṭṭahāsena hatāṃś caturaś catureṇa tān / śrutaśarmabalaṃ harṣād unnanāda jayonmukham // 8.4.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad dṛṣṭvā kupito harṣaḥ sūryaprabhavayasyakaḥ / sasainyam abhyadhāvat tam aṭṭahāsaṃ sasainikaḥ // 8.4.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nivārya ca śarais tasya śarān sainyaṃ nihatya ca / vyāpādya sārathiṃ dvis trir dhanuś chittvā ca sadhvajam // 8.4.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
harṣo yad aṭṭahāsasya nirbibheda śaraiḥ śiraḥ / tenāsau rudhirodgārī nipapāta rathād bhuvi // 8.4.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṭṭahāse hate tādṛk kṣobho 'bhūd atra saṃyuge / kṣaṇād ardhāvaśeṣaṃ tad yena jajñe baladvayam // 8.4.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nipetur eva nihatās tatrāśvagajapattayaḥ / raṇamūrdhani cottasthuḥ kabandhā eva kevalam // 8.4.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vikṛtadaṃṣṭrākhyo harṣaṃ vidyādhareśvaraḥ / etyāṭṭahāsanidhanakruddho bāṇair avākirat // 8.4.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
harṣo 'pi tasya nirdhūya śarān sadhvajasārathīn / hatvā rathāśvāṃś ciccheda śiro lalitakuṇḍalam // 8.4.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
hate vikṛtadaṃṣṭre tu cakravāla iti śrutaḥ / rājā vidyādharo harṣam abhyadhāvad amarṣitaḥ // 8.4.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa yudhyamānam avadhīd asakṛcchinnakārmukam / cakravālo yudhi śrāntaṃ harṣaṃ śīrṇāparāyudham // 8.4.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkrodhād etya nṛpatiḥ pramāthas tam ayodhayat / so 'py ahanyata tenātha cakravālena saṃyuge // 8.4.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathaiva tena cātrānye 'py ekaśo dhāvitāḥ kramāt / catvāraś cakravālena rājamukhyā nipātitāḥ // 8.4.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṅkaṭaś ca viśālaś ca pracaṇḍaś cāṅkurī tathā / tad dṛṣṭvābhyapatat krodhān nirghāto nāma taṃ nṛpaḥ // 8.4.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tau cakravālanirghātau yudhyamānau ciraṃ kramāt / anyonyacūrṇitarathāv abhūtāṃ pādacāriṇau // 8.4.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
asicakradharau dvāv apy ākopamilitau ca tau / khaḍgāhatidvidhābhūtamūrdhānau bhuvi petatuḥ // 8.4.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vipannau vīkṣya tau vīrau viṣaṇṇe 'pi baladvaye / raṇāgram āyayau vidyādharendraḥ kālakampanaḥ // 8.4.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājaputro 'bhyadhāvac ca taṃ prakampananāmakaḥ / sa kālakampanenātra kṣaṇāt tena nyapātyata // 8.4.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmin nipatite tasya pañcānye 'bhyapatan rathāḥ / jālikaś caṇḍadattaś ca gopakaḥ somilo 'pi ca // 8.4.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pitṛśarmā ca sarve te śarāṃs tasmin sahāmucan / sa tu pañcāpi tān kālakampano virathīkṛtān // 8.4.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jaghāna yugapad vidhyan nārācair hṛdi pañcabhiḥ / praṇeduḥ khecarās tena vyaṣīdan manujāsurāḥ // 8.4.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'bhyadhāvann apare catvāras taṃ rathāḥ samam / unmattakaḥ praśastaś ca vilambakadhuraṃdharau // 8.4.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tān apy avadhīt kālakampano līlayākhilān / tathaiva dhāvitān anyān ṣaḍ rathān nijaghāna saḥ // 8.4.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tejikaṃ geyikaṃ caiva vegilaṃ śākhilaṃ tathā / bhadraṃkaraṃ daṇḍinaṃ ca bhūrisainyān mahārathān // 8.4.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
aparāṃś ca punaḥ pañca so 'vadhīn militān yudhi / bhīmabhīṣaṇakumbhīravikaṭān savilocanān // 8.4.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad dṛṣṭvā kadanaṃ kālakampanena kṛtaṃ raṇe / adhāvat sugaṇo nāma rājaputro 'sya saṃmukhaḥ // 8.4.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tena tāvad vidadhe samaṃ yuddham ubhāv api / hatāśvasārathī yāvad virathau tau babhūvatuḥ // 8.4.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas taṃ khaḍgayuddhena sugaṇaṃ pādacāriṇam / sa kālakampanaḥ pādacāry eva bhuvi jaghnivān // 8.4.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca mānuṣair vidyādharāṇāṃ samam āhavam / asaṃbhāvyaṃ vilokyeva khinno 'staṃ prayayau raviḥ // 8.4.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
raktāmbupūrabharitaṃ na paraṃ samarāṅgaṇam / yāvat saṃdhyākṛtapadaṃ yayau vyomāpi śoṇatam // 8.4.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
kabandhaiḥ saha bhūteṣu saṃdhyānṛttodyateṣv atha / saṃhṛtya yuddhaṃ yayatuḥ svaniveśāya te bale // 8.4.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
śrutaśarmabale tasmin dine vīrā hatās trayaḥ / trayastriṃśat pravīrās tu bale sauryaprabhe hatāḥ // 8.4.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena bāndhavamittrādinidhanena sudurmanāḥ / sūryaprabhas triyāmāṃ tām āsīd antaḥpurair vinā // 8.4.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anidra eva sacivaiḥ saha saṅgrāmasaṃkathāḥ / tās tāḥ kurvan nināyaitāṃ punaryuddhonmukho niśām // 8.4.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadbhāryāś ca milanti sma hatabāndhavaduḥkhitāḥ / ekatra tasyāṃ rajanāv anyonyāśvāsanāgatāḥ // 8.4.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
ruditāvasare 'py atra kathā nānāvidhā vyadhuḥ / strīṇāṃ na sa kṣaṇo yatra na kathāsv aparāśrayā // 8.4.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatprasaṅgena tatraikā rājaputrīdam abravīt / āścaryam āryaputro 'dya kathaṃ supto niraṅganaḥ // 8.4.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā vyājahārānyā saṅgrāme svajanakṣayāt / duḥkhito hy āryaputro 'dya ramate strījane katham // 8.4.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'parā bravīti sma prāpnoty abhinavāṃ yadi / varakanyāṃ sa tadduḥkhaṃ vismaraty adhunaiva tat // 8.4.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athetarābravīn maivaṃ yady api strīṣu lampaṭaḥ / tathāpi na sa duḥkhe 'sminn īdṛśaḥ syāt tathāvidhaḥ // 8.4.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti tāsu vadantīṣu jagādaikā savismayam / brūta strīlampaṭaḥ kasmād āryaputro batedṛśaḥ // 8.4.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āhṛtāsv api bhāryāsu bhūyasīṣu navā navāḥ / aniśaṃ rājaputrīr yat sa gṛhṇan naiva tuṣyati // 8.4.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvā vidagdhaikā tāsu nāmnā manovatī / uvāca śrūyatāṃ yena rājāno bahuvallabhāḥ // 8.4.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
deśarūpavayaśceṣṭāvijñānādivibhedataḥ / bhinnā guṇā varastrīṇāṃ naikā sarvaguṇānvitā // 8.4.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
karṇāṭalāṭasaurāṣṭramadhyadeśādideśajāḥ / yoṣā deśasamācārai rañjayanti nijair nijaiḥ // 8.4.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kāścid dharanti sudṛśaḥ śāradendunibhair mukhaiḥ / anyāḥ kanakakumbhābhaiḥ stanair unnatasaṃhataiḥ // 8.4.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
smarasiṃhāsanaprakhyair aparā jaghanasthalaiḥ / itarāś cetarair aṅgaiḥ svasaundaryamanoramaiḥ // 8.4.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kācit kāñcanagaurāṅgī priyaṅguśyāmalāparā / anyā raktāvadātā ca dṛṣṭvaiva haratīkṣaṇe // 8.4.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kācit pratyagrasubhagā kācit saṃpūrṇayauvanā / kācit prauḍhatvasurasā prasaradvibhramojjvalā // 8.4.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
hasantī śobhate kācit kācit kope 'pi hāriṇī / vrajantī gajavat kāpi haṃsavat kāpi rājate // 8.4.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ālapanty amṛteneva kācid āsiñcati śrutim / sabhrūvilāsaṃ paśyantī svabhāvād bhāti kācana // 8.4.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
nṛttena rocate kācit kācid gītena rājate / vīṇādivādanajñānenānyā kāntā ca rocate // 8.4.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kācid bāhyaratābhijñā kācid ābhyantarapriyā / prasādhanojjvalā kācit kācid vaidagdhyaśobhitā // 8.4.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhartṛcittagrahābhijñā cānyā saubhāgyam aśrute / kiyad vā vacmi bahavo 'py anye 'nyāsāṃ pṛthag guṇāḥ // 8.4.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tad evam iha kasyāścid guṇaḥ ko'pi varastriyaḥ / na tu sarvaguṇāḥ sarvās trilokyām api kāścana // 8.4.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ato nānārasāsvādalabdhakakṣyāḥ kileśvarāḥ / āhṛtyāpy āharantyeva bhāryā navanavāḥ sadā // 8.4.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttamās tu na vāñchanti paradārān kathaṃcana / tann āryaputrasyaiṣa syād doṣo nerṣyā ca naḥ kṣamā // 8.4.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
evamādyā manovatyā proktāḥ sūryaprabhāṅganāḥ / anyā madanasenādyās tathaivocuḥ kathāḥ kramāt // 8.4.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'tirasataś ca tā vigatayantraṇānargalāḥ parasparam upādiśan suratakāryatantrāṇy api / prasaṅgamilitāḥ kathāprasarasaktacittā mithas tad asti na kim apy aho yad iha nodvamanti striyaḥ // 8.4.120	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
atha katham api dīrghā sā kathā cātra tāsām avasitim upayātā sā ca rātriḥ krameṇa / timiravigamavelāvekṣaṇaikābhikāṅkṣo ripubalavijigīṣos tatra sūryaprabhasya // 8.4.121	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
atha yuddhabhuvaṃ prātar jagmuḥ sūryaprabhādayaḥ / śrutaśarmādayas te ca saṃnaddhāḥ sabalāḥ punaḥ // 8.5.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
punaś ca sendrāḥ sabrahmaviṣṇurudrāḥ surāsurāḥ / sayakṣoragagandharvāḥ saṅgrāmaṃ draṣṭum āyayuḥ // 8.5.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutaśarmabale cakravyūhaṃ dāmodaro vyadhāt / vajravyūhaṃ prabhāsaś ca sūryaprabhabale 'karot // 8.5.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ tayor ubhayasainyayoḥ / tūryaiḥ subhaṭanādaiś ca badhirīkṛtadiktaṭam // 8.5.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
samyak chastrahatāḥ śūrā bhindanti mama maṇḍalam / itīva śarajālāntaśchanno bhānur abhūd bhiyā // 8.5.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dāmodarakṛtaṃ cakravyuham anyena durbhidam / bhittvā prabhāsaḥ prāvikṣad atha sūryaprabhājñayā // 8.5.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
taṃ ca dāmodaro vyūhacchidram etyāvṛṇot svayam / prabhāso yayudhe taṃ ca tatraikaratha eva saḥ // 8.5.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praviṣṭam ekakaṃ taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā sūryaprabho 'tha saḥ / paścāt pañcadaśaitasya visasarja mahārathān // 8.5.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prakampanaṃ dhūmaketuṃ kālakampanakaṃ tathā / mahāmāyaṃ marudvegaṃ prahastaṃ vajrapañjaram // 8.5.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kālacakraṃ pramathanaṃ siṃhanādaṃ sakambalam / vikaṭākṣaṃ pravahaṇaṃ taṃ kuñjarakumārakam // 8.5.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
taṃ ca prahṛṣṭaromāṇam asurādhipasattamam / te pradhāvya yayuḥ sarve vyūhadvāraṃ mahārathāḥ // 8.5.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra dāmodaro pūrvaṃ svapauruṣam adarśayat / yad eka eva yuyudhe taiḥ pañcadaśabhiḥ saha // 8.5.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tad dṛṣṭvā nāradamuniṃ pārśvasthaṃ vāsavo 'bhyadhat / sūryaprabhādyā asurāvatārā akhilās tathā // 8.5.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
śrutaśarmā madaṃśaś ca sarve vidyādharā ime / devāṃśās tad ayaṃ yuktyā mune devāsurāhavaḥ // 8.5.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmiṃś ca paśya devānāṃ sahāyaḥ sarvadā hariḥ / dāmodaras tadaṃśo 'yam evaṃ tad iha yudhyate // 8.5.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ śakre vadaty asya dāmodaracamūpateḥ / mahārathāḥ samājagmuḥ sāhāyyāya caturdaśa // 8.5.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
brahmagupto vāyubalo yamadaṃṣṭraḥ suroṣaṇaḥ / roṣāvaroho 'tibalas tejaḥprabhadhuraṃdharau // 8.5.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
kuberadatto varuṇaśarmā kambalikas tathā / vīraś ca duṣṭamadano dohanārohaṇāv ubhau // 8.5.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
dāmodarayutās te 'pi vīrāḥ pañcadaśaiva tān / sūryaprabhīyān rurudhur vīrān vyūhāgrayodhinaḥ // 8.5.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tato 'tra dvandvayuddhāni teṣām āsan parasparam / dāmodareṇāstrayuddhaṃ samaṃ cakre prakampanaḥ // 8.5.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
brahmadattena ca samaṃ dhūmaketur ayudhyata / mahāmāyas tu yuyudhe sahaivātibalena ca // 8.5.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tejaḥprabheṇa yuyudhe dānavaḥ kālakampanaḥ / saha vāyubalenāpi marudvego mahāsuraḥ // 8.5.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
yamadaṃṣṭreṇa ca samaṃ yuyudhe vajrapañjaraḥ / samaṃ suroṣaṇenāpi kālacakro 'surottamaḥ // 8.5.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sākaṃ kuberadattena yuddhaṃ pramathano vyadhāt / siṃhanādaś ca daityendraḥ samaṃ varuṇaśarmaṇā // 8.5.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yuddhaṃ pravahaṇo duṣṭadamanena sahākarot / prahṛṣṭaromā roṣāvaroheṇāpi ca dānavaḥ // 8.5.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
dhuraṃdhareṇa ca samaṃ vikaṭākṣo vyadhād yudham / yuddhaṃ kambalikaś cakre samaṃ kambalikena ca // 8.5.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ārohaṇena ca samaṃ sa kuñjarakumārakaḥ / mahotpātāparākhyeṇa prahasto dohanena ca // 8.5.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ mahārathadvandveṣv eṣu tatra parasparam / vyūhāgre yudhyamāneṣu sunītho mayam abhyadhāt // 8.5.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṣṭam asmadrathāḥ śūrā nānāyuddhavido 'py amī / ruddhāḥ pratirathair etaiḥ paśya vyūhapraveśataḥ // 8.5.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prabhāsaś caika evāgre praviṣṭo 'trāvicāritam / tan na jānīmahe kasya kim ivātra bhaviṣyati // 8.5.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvā bravīti sma taṃ suvāsakumārakaḥ / trailokye 'pi na paryāptāḥ sasurāsuramānuṣāḥ // 8.5.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekasyāsya prabhāsasya kiṃ punaḥ khecarā ime / tad eṣā katham asthāne śaṅkā vo jānatām api // 8.5.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ munikumāre 'smin bruvāṇe kālakampanaḥ / vidyādharaḥ prabhāsasya yudhi saṃmukham āyayau // 8.5.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ prabhāso 'vādīt taṃ re re hy apakṛtaṃ tvayā / atīva nas tad adyeha paśyāmas tava pauruṣam // 8.5.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā vyasṛjat tasmin prabhāso viśikhāvalim / so 'pi taṃ sāyakaiḥ kālakampano 'vākirac chitaiḥ // 8.5.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
astrapratyastrayuddhena yuyudhāte mithas tataḥ / pradattabhuvanāścaryau tau vidyādharamānuṣau // 8.5.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha prabhāso viśikhenaikenāpātayad dhvajam / dvitīyenāvadhīt kālakampanasya ca sārathim // 8.5.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
caturbhiś caturaś cāśvān dhanur ekena cācchinat / dvabhyāṃ hastau bhujau dvābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ ca śravaṇāv ubhau // 8.5.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekena śitadhāreṇa śiraś ciccheda tasya ca / prabhāsaḥ pattriṇā śatror darśitādbhutalāghavaḥ // 8.5.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ prāṅnihitānekapravīrotthena manyunā / prabhāso nigrahaṃ kālakampanasya vyadhād iva // 8.5.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvā ca taṃ hataṃ vidyādhareśaṃ manujāsuraiḥ / nādaś cakre viṣādaś ca jagme sapadi khecaraiḥ // 8.5.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vidyutprabho nāma kālañjaragirīśvaraḥ / prabhāsam abhyadhāvat taṃ krudhā vidyādharādhipaḥ // 8.5.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāpi yudhyamānasya prabhāsaḥ sa mahādhvajam / chittvā cakarta kodaṇḍam āttam āttaṃ punaḥ punaḥ // 8.5.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa māyayotpatya cchanno vidyutprabho nabhaḥ / prabhāsasyopari hrīto vavarṣāsigadādikān // 8.5.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prabhāso 'pi vidhūyāstrais tadāyudhaparamparām / kṛtvā prakāśanāstreṇa prakāśaṃ taṃ nabhaścaram // 8.5.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dattvā mahāstram āgneyaṃ tattejodagdham ambarāt / vidyutprabhaṃ bhūmitale gatajīvam apātayat // 8.5.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tad dṛṣṭvā śrutaśarmā tān nijagāda mahārathān / paśyatānena nihatau dvau mahārathayūthapau // 8.5.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tat kiṃ sahadhve saṃbhūya yuṣmābhir hanyatām ayam / tac chrutvāṣṭau rathāḥ kruddhāḥ prabhāsaṃ paryavārayan // 8.5.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekaḥ kaṅkaṭakādrīndranivāsī rathayūthapaḥ / ūrdhvarometi vikhyāto vidyādharamahīpatiḥ // 8.5.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dharaṇīdharaśailādhipatir vikrośanābhidhaḥ / vidyādharāṇām adhipo dvitīyaś ca mahārathaḥ // 8.5.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
indumālī tṛtīyaś ca līlāparvataketanaḥ / vīro 'tirathayūthasya patir vidyādharaprabhuḥ // 8.5.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
malayādrinivāsī ca kākāṇḍaka iti śrutaḥ / rathayūthapatī rājā caturthaḥ khecarottamaḥ // 8.5.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
niketādripatir nāmnā darpavāhaś ca pañcamaḥ / ṣaṣṭhaś ca dhūrtavahano nāmnāñjanagirīśvaraḥ // 8.5.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
vidyādharāv imau cātirathayūthapatī ubhau / saptamo gardabharatho rājā kumudaparvate // 8.5.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
nāmnā varāhasvāmīti yo mahārathayūthapaḥ / tadrupo dundubhikṣmābhṛd ratho medhāvaro 'ṣṭamaḥ // 8.5.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ebhir aṣṭabhir āgatya muktān bāṇān vidhūya saḥ / prabhāso yugapat sarvān sāyakair vidhyati sma tān // 8.5.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jaghāna kasyacic cāśvān kasyacit sārathiṃ tathā / cakarta kasyacit ketuṃ kasyacic cācchinad dhanuḥ // 8.5.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
medhāvaraṃ caturbhis tu śarair viddhvā samaṃ hṛdi / apātayan mahīpṛṣṭhe sadyo 'pahṛtajīvitam // 8.5.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataś ca yodhayann anyān kuñcitodbaddhakuntalam / śareṇāñjalikenārād ūrdhvaromṇaḥ śiro 'cchinat // 8.5.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śeṣāṃś ca ṣaṭ tān ekaikabhallanirlūnakaṃdharān / hatāśvasārathīn kṛtvā sa prabhāso nyapātayat // 8.5.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
papāta puṣpavṛṣṭiś ca tasya mūrdhni tato divaḥ / uttejitāsuranṛpā vicchāyīkṛtakhecarā // 8.5.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tato 'nye tatra catvāraḥ preṣitāḥ śrutaśarmaṇā / mahārathāḥ prabhāsaṃ taṃ rundhanti sma dhanurdharāḥ // 8.5.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekaḥ kācarako nāma kuraṇḍakagireḥ patiḥ / dvitīyo diṇḍimālī ca pañcakādrisamāśrayaḥ // 8.5.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vibhāvasus tṛtīyaś ca rājā jayapurācale / caturtho dhavalo nāma bhūmituṇḍakaśāsitā // 8.5.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
te mahārathayūtādhipatayaḥ khecarottamāḥ / prabhāse pañca pañceṣuśatāni mumucuḥ samam // 8.5.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prabhāsaś ca kramāt teṣām ekaikasyāvahelayā / ekena dhvajam ekena dhanur ekena sārathim // 8.5.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
caturbhir aśvān iṣuṇā tv ekenāpātayac chiraḥ / śarair aṣṭabhir ekaikaṃ samāpyaivaṃ nanāda saḥ // 8.5.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha vidyādharā bhūyaḥ śrutaśarmājñayā yudhi / anye catvāra evāsya prabhāsasya samāgaman // 8.5.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekaḥ kuvalayaśyāmaḥ kṣetre viśvāvasor budhāt / jāto bhadraṃkaro nāma dvitīyaś ca niyantrakaḥ // 8.5.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
utpanno jambhakakṣetre bhaumād agninibhaprabhaḥ / tṛtīyaḥ kālakopākhyaḥ kṣetre dāmodarasya ca // 8.5.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jātaḥ śanaiścarāt kṛṣṇakṛṣṇaḥ kapilamūrdhajaḥ / jātaś coḍupateḥ kṣetre mahendrasacivād grahāt // 8.5.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nāmnā vikramaśaktiś ca caturthaḥ kanakadyutiḥ / trayo 'tirathayūthādhipatīnām eṣu yūthapāḥ // 8.5.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
caturthas tu mahāvīras tadabhyadhikavikramaḥ / te ca prabhāsaṃ divyāstrair yodhayām āsur uddhatāḥ // 8.5.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tāni nārāyaṇāstreṇa prabhāso 'strāṇy avārayat / teṣāṃ ca helayaikaikasyāṣṭakṛtvo 'cchinad dhanuḥ // 8.5.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tatprahitān prāsagadādīn pratihatya saḥ / hatāśvasārathīn sarvān virathān akaroc ca tān // 8.5.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad dṛṣṭvā visasarjānyāñ chrutaśarmā drutaṃ daśa / rathayūthapayūthādhipatīn vidyādharādhipān // 8.5.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
damākhyaṃ niyamākhyaṃ ca svarūpasadṛśākṛtī / ketumāleśvarakṣetre jātau dvāv aśvinoḥ sutau // 8.5.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vikramaṃ saṃkramaṃ caiva parākramam athākramam / saṃmardanaṃ mardanaṃ ca pramardanavimardanau // 8.5.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
kṣetrajān makarandasyāpy aṣṭau vasusutān samān / teṣv āgateṣu cādyās te 'py ārohann aparān rathān // 8.5.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taiś caturdaśabhiḥ kṛtsnair militaiḥ śaravarṣibhiḥ / niṣkampa eva yuyudhe prabhāsaś citram ekakaḥ // 8.5.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tataḥ sūryaprabhādeśād vyūhāgrāt tyaktasaṃgarau / sa kuñjarakumāraś ca prahastaś ca dhṛtāyudhau // 8.5.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
utpatya vyomamārgeṇa dhavalaśyāmalākṛtī / tasyopajagmatuḥ pārśvaṃ rāmakṛṣṇāv ivāparau // 8.5.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tau padātī rathasthau dvau damaṃ ca niyamaṃ ca tam / vyākulīcakratuś chinnacāpau nihatasārathī // 8.5.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhayād ārūḍhayor vyoma tayor ārohataḥ sma tau / sa kuñjarakumāraś ca prahastaś ca dhṛtāyudhau // 8.5.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad dṛṣṭvā rabhasāt sūryaprabho 'tra prāhiṇot tayoḥ / mahābuddhyacaladbuddhī sārathitve svamantriṇau // 8.5.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'tha prahasto dṛṣṭvā tāv adṛśyāv api māyayā / siddhāñjanaprayogeṇa sakuñjarakumārakaḥ // 8.5.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathā vivyādha bāṇaughaiḥ palāyya yayatur yathā / damaś ca niyamaś cobhau tau vidyādharaputrakau // 8.5.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prabhāso yudhyamānaś ca śeṣair dvādaśabhiḥ saha / teṣāṃ cakarta kodaṇḍān asakṛt kalitān api // 8.5.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prahasto 'bhyetya sarveṣām avadhīt sārathīn samam / sa kuñjarakumāro 'pi jaghānaiṣāṃ turaṃgamān // 8.5.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tatrārathāḥ sarve dvādaśāpi sametya te / hanyamānās tribhir vīraiḥ palāyya samarād yayuḥ // 8.5.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'nyau śrutaśarmā dvau rathātirathayūthapau / vidyādharau preṣitavān duḥkhakrodhatrapākulaḥ // 8.5.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
ekaṃ candrakulādrīndrapateḥ kṣetre niśākarāt / utpannaṃ candraguptākhyaṃ kāntaṃ candram ivāparam // 8.5.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dhuraṃdharācalādhīśakṣetre jātaṃ mahādyutim / nagaraṃgamanāmānaṃ dvitīyaṃ sacivaṃ svakam // 8.5.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāv api kṣiptabāṇaughau kṣaṇena virathīkṛtau / taiḥ prabhāsādibhis tyaktvā yuddhaṃ naṣṭau babhūvatuḥ // 8.5.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato nadatsu manujeṣv asureṣu ca sa svayam / āgāc caturbhiḥ sahitaḥ śrutaśarmā mahārathaiḥ // 8.5.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
mahaughārohaṇotpātavetravatsaṃjñakaiḥ kramāt / tvaṣṭur bhagasya cāryamṇaḥ pūṣṇaś cāpy ātmasaṃbhavaiḥ // 8.5.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
caturṇāṃ citrapādādividyādharamahībhujām / malayādyadrināthānāṃ kṣetrajaiḥ prājyavikramaiḥ // 8.5.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tenātyamarṣāndhenātmanā pañcamena te / ayudhyanta prabhāsādyās trayo 'tra śrutaśarmaṇā // 8.5.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadā tair muktam anyonyaṃ bāṇajālaṃ babhau divi / raṇalakṣmyā tapaty arke vitānakam ivātatam // 8.5.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vidyādharās te 'pi punas tatrāyayur mṛdhe / virathībhūya ye naṣṭā babhūvuḥ samarāt tadā // 8.5.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha tāñ śrutaśarmādīn militān āhave bahūn / dṛṣṭvā sūryaprabho 'nyān svān prabhāsādyanupoṣaṇe // 8.5.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mahārathān prahitavān prajñāḍhyaprabhṛtīn sakhīn / vīrasenaśatānīkamukhyān rājasutāṃs tadā // 8.5.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vyomnātra teṣāṃ yātānāṃ sa ca sūryaprabho rathān / bhūtāsanavimānena prajighāya dyuvartmanā // 8.5.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sarveṣu teṣv atra rathārūḍheṣu dhanviṣu / vidyādharendrāḥ śeṣā apy ājagmuḥ śrutaśarmaṇaḥ // 8.5.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
teṣāṃ vidyādhareśānāṃ taiḥ prabhāsādibhiḥ saha / saṃprahāraḥ pravṛtto 'bhūn mahāsainyakṣayāvahaḥ // 8.5.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra ca dvandvasaṅgrāmeṣv anyonyaṃ sainyayor dvayoḥ / hatā mahārathās te te mānuṣāsurakhecarāḥ // 8.5.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vīrasenena nihataḥ sānugo dhūmralocanaḥ / vīraseno 'pi virathībhūtaḥ san hariśarmaṇā // 8.5.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
hato vidyādharo vīro hiraṇyākṣo 'bhimanyunā / abhimanyuḥ sunetreṇa hato haribhaṭas tathā // 8.5.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sunetraś ca prabhāsena śiraś chitvā nipātitaḥ / jvālāmālī mahāyuś cāpy anyonyena hatāv ubhau // 8.5.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kumbhīrako nīrasakaḥ prāharan daśanair api / kharvaś ca bhujayoś chedāt suśarmā cogravikramaḥ // 8.5.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
trayaḥ śatrubhaṭavyāghrabhaṭasiṃhabhaṭā api / hatāḥ pravahaṇenaite vidyādharamahībhṛtā // 8.5.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa surohavirohābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ pravahaṇo hataḥ / śmaśānavāsinā dvau ca hatau siṃhabalena tau // 8.5.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa pretavāhanaḥ siṃhabalaḥ kapilako 'pi ca / citrāpīḍas tato vidyādharendro 'tha jagajjvaraḥ // 8.5.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ kāntāpatiḥ śūraḥ suvarṇaś ca mahābalaḥ / dvau ca kāmaghanakrodhapatī vidyādhareśvarau // 8.5.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
baladevas tato rājā vicitrāpīḍa eva ca / rājaputraśatānīkenaite daśa nipātitāḥ // 8.5.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ hateṣu vīreṣu dṛṣṭvā vidyādharakṣayam / śrutaśarmā śatānīkam abhyadhāvat svayaṃ krudhā // 8.5.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tayor ā dināntaṃ sainyakṣayakaraṃ mahat / āścaryam api devānāṃ tāvad yuddham abhūd dvayoḥ // 8.5.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
śatāni yāvad utthāya kabandhānāṃ samantataḥ / bhūtānāṃ cakrur ālambaṃ saṃdhyānṛttotsavāgame // 8.5.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahnaḥ kṣaye 'tha bahusainyavināśavignā vidyādharā nihatabāndhavaduḥkhitāś ca / martyāsurāḥ prasabhalabdhajayāś ca jagmuḥ saṃhṛtya yuddham ubhaye svaniveśanāni // 8.5.119	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
tatkālam atra ca sumeruniveditau dvau vidyādharāv adhipatī rathayūthapānām / abhyetya taṃ parihṛtaśrutaśarmapakṣau sūryaprabhaṃ jagadatur vihitapraṇāmau // 8.5.120	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
āvāṃ mahāyānasumāyasaṃjñāv ubhāv ayaṃ siṃhabalas tṛtīyaḥ / mahāśmaśānādhipatitvasiddhā vidyādharendrair aparair adhṛṣyāḥ // 8.5.121	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
teṣāṃ śmaśānāntasukhasthitānām asmākam āgan nikaṭaṃ kadācit / sadā prasannā śarabhānanākhyā sadyoginī divyamahāprabhāvā // 8.5.122	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
kutra sthitā tvaṃ vada kiṃ ca tatra dṛṣṭaṃ bhavatyā bhagavaty apūrvam / sāsmābhir itthaṃ praṇipatya pṛṣṭā vṛttāntam evaṃ vadati sma deva // 8.5.123	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
draṣṭuṃ prabhuṃ svaṃ saha yoginībhir devaṃ mahākālam ahaṃ gatāsam / vyajijñapat tatra ca matsamakṣam āgatya vetālapatis tam ekaḥ // 8.5.124	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
asmanmahāsainyapates tanūjāṃ vidyādhareśair nihatasya deva / paśyāgnikākhyasya haraty akāṇḍe tejaḥprabho nāma mahārgharūpām // 8.5.125	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
siddhaiś ca vidyādharacakravartipatnībhavitrī gaditā prabho sā / tan mocayaināṃ kuru naḥ prasādaṃ yāvan na dūraṃ hriyate haṭhena // 8.5.126	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
ity ārtavetālavaco niśamya prayāta tāṃ mocayateti so 'smān / devaḥ samādikṣad athāmbareṇa gatvaiva sāsmābhir avāpi kanyā // 8.5.127	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
saccakravartiśrutaśarmahetor etāṃ harāmīti ca taṃ vadantam / saṃstabhya tejaḥprabham ātmaśaktyā sāsmābhir ānīya vibhor vitīrṇā // 8.5.128	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
tenārpitā ca svajanāya kanyā dṛṣṭaṃ mayā kāmam apūrvam etat / tato 'tra kāṃścid divasān uṣitvā praṇamya devaṃ tam ihāgatāsmi // 8.5.129	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
ity uktavākyā śarabhānanā sā yoginy athāsmābhir apṛcchyataivam / ko brūhi vidyādharacakravartī bhaviṣyati tvaṃ khalu vetsi sarvam // 8.5.130	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
sūryaprabho hanta bhaviṣyatīti prokte tayā siṃhabalo 'bravīn nau / asatyam etan nanu baddhakakṣyā devā hi sendrāḥ śrutaśarmapakṣe // 8.5.131	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
śrutvaitad āryā vadati sma sā nau na pratyayaś cec chṛṇutaṃ bravīmi / yathā bhaviṣyaty acireṇa yuddhaṃ sūryaprabhasya śrutaśarmaṇaś ca // 8.5.132	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
haniṣyate siṃhabalo yadāyaṃ yuṣmatsamakṣaṃ yudhi mānuṣeṇa / yuvām abhijñānam idaṃ vilokya vijñāsyathaḥ satyam idaṃ vaco me // 8.5.133	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
etāvad uktvā kila yoginī sā yayau ca yātāni ca tāny ahāni / pratyakṣam adyeha ca dṛṣṭam etan martyena yat siṃhabalo hato 'sau // 8.5.134	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
tatpratyayān niścitam eva matvā tvām eva sarvadyucarādhirājam / avām imau pādasarojayugmaṃ samāśritau śāsanavartinau te // 8.5.135	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
ity uktavantau sa mayādiyuktaḥ sūryaprabhas tāv atha khecarendrau / śraddhāya saṃmānitavān yathārhaṃ hṛṣṭau mahāyānasumāyakau dvau // 8.5.136	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
tac chrutvā śrutaśarmaṇo 'tra sutarām udvegabhājo vyadhād āśvāsaṃ kila dūtyayā śatamakhaḥ saṃpreṣya viśvāvasum / dhīras tvaṃ bhava sarvadevasahitaḥ prātaḥ kariṣyāmi te sāhāyyaṃ raṇamūrdhanīti dhṛtikṛt saṃdeśya tatsnehataḥ // 8.5.137	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
sa ca parabalabhedālokanotpannatoṣaḥ samaraśirasi dṛṣṭārātipakṣakṣayaś ca / punar api nijakāntāḥ projjhya sūryaprabhas tā niśi sacivasameto vāsakaṃ svaṃ viveśa // 8.5.138	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
tataḥ sa rātrāv astrīkaḥ śayanastho raṇonmukhaḥ / sūryaprabhaḥ svasacivaṃ vītabhītim abhāṣata // 8.6.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
nidrā me nāsti tat kāṃcit sattvavīrāśritāṃ sakhe / kathām apūrvām ākhyāhi rātrāv asyāṃ vinodinīm // 8.6.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
etat sūryaprabhavaco vītabhītir niśamya saḥ / yathājñāpayasīty uktvā kathāṃ kathitavān imām // 8.6.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
asty alaṃkṛtir etasyāṃ pṛthvyām ujjayinī purī / ratnair aśeṣair nicitā sunirmalaguṇombhitaiḥ // 8.6.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tasyām abhūn mahāseno nāma rājā guṇipriyaḥ / kalānāṃ caikanilayaḥ sūryendūbhayarūpadhṛk // 8.6.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tasyāśokavatī nāma rājñī prāṇasamābhavat / yasyā rūpeṇa sadṛśī nāsīd anyā jagattraye // 8.6.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tayā devyā samaṃ tasya rājyaṃ rājño 'nuśāsataḥ / guṇaśarmābhidhāno 'bhūd vipro mānyas tathā priyaḥ // 8.6.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca śūro 'tirūpaś ca vedavidyāntago yuvā / kalāśastrāstravid vipraḥ siṣeve taṃ nṛpaṃ sadā // 8.6.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadāntaḥpure nṛttakathāprastāvataḥ sa tam / rājā rājñī ca pārśvasthaṃ guṇaśarmāṇam ūcatuḥ // 8.6.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sarvajñas tvaṃ na dolātra tad asmākaṃ kutūhalam / nartituṃ ced vijānāsi tat prasīdādya darśaya // 8.6.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvā smitamukho guṇaśarmā jagāda tau / jānāmi kiṃ tu tad yuktam asti nṛttaṃ na saṃsadi // 8.6.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
hāsanaṃ mūḍhanṛttaṃ tat prāyaśaḥ śāstragarhitam / tatrāpi rājñaḥ purato rājñāś ca dhig aho trapā // 8.6.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
ity uktavantaṃ taṃ rājā guṇaśarmāṇam atra saḥ / pratyuvāca tayā rājñā preryamāṇaḥ kutūhalāt // 8.6.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
nedaṃ raṅgādinṛttaṃ tad yat syāt puṃsas trapāvaham / mittragoṣṭhī rahasy eṣā svavaidagdhyapradarśinī // 8.6.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tadante ca dadau rājā vādanāyāsya vallakīm / tasyāṃ ca sāraṇām eṣa dadad evābravīn nṛpam // 8.6.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
devāpraśastā vīṇeyaṃ tad anyā dīyatāṃ mama / asyās tantryāṃ yad etasyāṃ śvavālo vidyate 'ntare // 8.6.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ hy etad vijānāmi tantrījhāṃkāralakṣaṇaiḥ / ity uktvā guṇaśarmāṅkāt tāṃ vipañcīṃ mumoca saḥ // 8.6.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa siktvā tantrīṃ tāṃ yāvad udveṣṭya bhūpatiḥ / vīkṣate niragāt tāvad vālas tadgarbhataḥ śunaḥ // 8.6.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sarvajñatāṃ tasya praśaṃsan so 'tivismitaḥ / vīṇām ānāyayām āsa mahāsenanṛpo 'parām // 8.6.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāṃ sa vāditavān gāyan guṇaśarmā trimārgagām / gaṅgām ivaughasubhagāṃ karṇapāvananiḥsvanām // 8.6.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tataś citrīyamāṇāya rājñe tasmai sajānaye / darśayām āsa śastrāstravidyā api sa tatkramāt // 8.6.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athāvocat sa rājā taṃ niyuddhaṃ yadi vetsi tat / ekaṃ me bandhakaraṇaṃ śūnyahastaṃ pradarśaya // 8.6.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
gṛhāṇa deva śastrāṇi mayi prahara ca kramāt / yāvat te darśayāmīti sa vipraḥ pratyuvāca tam // 8.6.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa rājā khaḍgādi yad yad āyudham agrahīt / tat tat praharatas tasya guṇaśarmāvahelayā // 8.6.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tenaiva bandhakaraṇenāpahṛtyāpahṛtya saḥ / babandha rājño hastaṃ ca gātraṃ cāpy akṣato muhuḥ // 8.6.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)

sā tv aśokavatī rājñī tasya rūpaṃ guṇāṃś ca tān / dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭvā dvijasyābhūt sadyas tadgatamānasā // 8.6.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etaṃ cet prāpnuyāṃ nāhaṃ tat kiṃ me jīvite phalam / iti saṃcintya yuktyā sā rājānam idam abravīt // 8.6.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āryaputra prasīdājñāṃ dehy asmai guṇaśarmaṇe / yathā māṃ śikṣayaty eṣa vīṇāṃ vādayituṃ prabho // 8.6.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tac cādya dadad evāhaṃ viṣaṃ vyañjanamadhyagam / lakṣito dhīmatānena prabhur jānāty ataḥ param // 8.6.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavantaṃ taṃ sūdaṃ nigṛhya guṇaśarmaṇe / prīto grāmasahasraṃ sa prāṇadāya dadau nṛpaḥ // 8.6.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyedyuś cānubadhnantyā rājñyā rājā sa yatnataḥ / vīṇāyā guṇaśarmāṇaṃ śikṣārambham akārayat // 8.6.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

vīṇāvādyāpadeśena tvaṃ sundara mayārthitaḥ / tvayi gāḍho 'nurāgo hi jāto me tad bhajasva mām // 8.6.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktavatīṃ rājñīṃ guṇaśarmā jagāda tām / maivaṃ vādīr mama tvaṃ hi svāmidārā na cedṛśam // 8.6.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asmādṛśaḥ prabhudrohaṃ kuryād virama sāhasāt / ity ūcivāṃsaṃ sā rājñī guṇaśarmāṇam āha tam // 8.6.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kim idaṃ niṣphalaṃ rūpaṃ vaidagdhyaṃ ca kalāsu te / mām īdṛśīṃ praṇayinīṃ nīrasopekṣase katham // 8.6.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tac chrutvā guṇaśarmā tāṃ sopahāsam abhāṣata / suṣṭhūktaṃ tasya rūpasya vaidagdhyasya ca kiṃ phalam // 8.6.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
paradārāpahāreṇa yan nākīrtimalīmasam / ihāmutra ca yan na syāt pātāya narakārṇave // 8.6.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukte tena sā rājñī sakopeva tam abravīt / maraṇaṃ me dhruvaṃ tāvan madvacasy akṛte tvayā // 8.6.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad ahaṃ mārayitvā tvāṃ mariṣyāmy avamānitā / guṇaśarmā tato 'vādīt kāmaṃ bhavatu nāma tat // 8.6.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
varaṃ yad dharmapāśena kṣaṇam ekaṃ hi jīvitam / paraṃ na yad adharmeṇa kalpakoṭiśatāny api // 8.6.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ślāghyaś cākṛtapāpasya mama mṛtyur agarhitaḥ / na punaḥ kṛtapāpasya garhitaṃ rājaśāsanam // 8.6.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvāpi sā rajñī punar evam uvāca tam / ātmano mama ca drohaṃ mā kṛthāḥ śṛṇu vacmi te // 8.6.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nātikrāmati rājāyam aśakyam api madvacaḥ / tad asya kṛtvā vijñaptiṃ viṣayān dāpayāmi te // 8.6.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kārayāmi ca sāmantān sarvāṃs tvadanuyāyinaḥ / tena saṃpatsyase rājā tvam eveha guṇojjvalaḥ // 8.6.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas te kiṃ bhayaṃ kas tvāṃ kathaṃ paribhaviṣyati / tan māṃ bhajasva niḥśaṅkam anyathā na bhaviṣyasi // 8.6.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti tāṃ bruvatīṃ matvā sānubandhāṃ nṛpāṅganām / guṇaśarmābravīd yuktyā tatkṣaṇaṃ sa vyapohitum // 8.6.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yadi te 'tyantanirbandhas tat kariṣye vacas tava / pratibhedabhayād devi sahasā tu na yujyate // 8.6.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sahasva divasān kāṃścit satyaṃ jānīhi madvacaḥ / sarvanāśaphalenārthas tvadvirodhena ko mama // 8.6.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity āśayā tāṃ saṃtoṣya pratipannavacās tayā / guṇaśarmā sa nirgatya yayāv ucchvasitas tataḥ // 8.6.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato dineṣu gacchatsu sa mahāsenabhūpatiḥ / gatvaiva veṣṭayām āsa koṭṭasthaṃ somakeśvaram // 8.6.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra prāptaṃ viditvā ca gauḍanāthaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ / etya vikramaśaktis taṃ mahāsenam aveṣṭayat // 8.6.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa guṇaśarmāṇaṃ mahāsenanṛpo 'bravīt / ekaṃ ruddhvā sthitāḥ santo ruddhāḥ smo 'nyena śatruṇā // 8.6.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad idānīm aparyāptāḥ kathaṃ yudhyāmahe dvayoḥ / ayuddhe ruddhake vīra sthāsyāmaś ca kiyac ciram // 8.6.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad asmin saṃkaṭe 'smābhiḥ kiṃ kāryam iti tena saḥ / pṛṣṭaḥ pārśvasthito rājñā guṇaśarmābhyabhāṣata // 8.6.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dhīro bhava kariṣyāmi devopāyaṃ tathāvidham / yenāsmān nistariṣyāmaḥ saṃkaṭād api kāryataḥ // 8.6.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity āśvāsya nṛpaṃ dattvā so 'ntardhānāñjanaṃ dṛśoḥ / rātrau vikramaśaktes tad adṛśyaḥ kaṭakaṃ yayau // 8.6.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praviśya cāntikaṃ tasya suptaṃ ca pratibodhya tam / jagāda viddhi māṃ rājan devadūtam upāgatam // 8.6.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃdhiṃ kṛtvā mahāsenanṛpeṇāpasara drutam / anyathā te sasainyasya nāśaḥ syād iha niścitam // 8.6.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
preṣite ca tvayā dūte sa saṃdhiṃ te 'numaṃsyate / iti vaktuṃ bhagavatā viṣṇunā prahito 'smi te // 8.6.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
bhaktas tvaṃ ca sa bhaktānāṃ yogakṣemam avekṣate / tac chrutvā cintitaṃ tena rajñā vikramaśaktinā // 8.6.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
niścitaṃ satyam evaitad duṣpraveśe 'nyathā katham / iha yaḥ praviśet kaścin naiṣā martyocitā kṛtiḥ // 8.6.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ālocya sa taṃ prāha rājā dhanyo 'smi yasya me / devaḥ samādiśaty evaṃ yathādiṣṭaṃ karomi tat // 8.6.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti vādina evāsya rājñaḥ pratyayam ādadhat / añjanāntarhito bhūtvā guṇaśarmā tato yayau // 8.6.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā yathākṛtaṃ tac ca mahāsenāya so 'bhyadhāt / so 'py abhyanandat kaṇṭhe taṃ gṛhītvā prāṇarājyadam // 8.6.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
prātar vikramaśaktiś ca sa dūtaṃ preṣya bhūpatiḥ / mahāsenena saṃdhāya sasainyaḥ prayayau tataḥ // 8.6.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mahāseno 'pi jitvā taṃ somakaṃ prāpya hastinaḥ / aśvāṃś cūjjayinīm āgāt prabhāvād guṇaśarmaṇaḥ // 8.6.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrasthaṃ ca nadīsnāne grāhād upavane ca tam / sarpadaṃśaviṣād bhūpaṃ guṇaśarmā rarakṣa saḥ // 8.6.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gateṣv atha dineṣv āptabalo rājā sa vairiṇam / mahāseno 'bhiyoktuṃ taṃ yayau vikramaśaktikam // 8.6.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi buddhvaiva tasyāgre nṛpo yuddhāya niryayau / tataḥ pravavṛte tatra saṅgrāmo 'timahāṃs tayoḥ // 8.6.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kramāc ca dvandvayuddhena militau tāv ubhāv api / rājānau sahasābhūtām anyonyaṃ virathīkṛtau // 8.6.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tayor dhāvitayoḥ prakopāt khaḍgahastayoḥ / ākulatvena caskhāla mahāsenanṛpaḥ kṣitau // 8.6.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
skhalite 'smin praharataś cakreṇa bhujam acchinat / rājño vikramaśakteḥ sa guṇaśarmā sakhaḍgakam // 8.6.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
punaś ca hṛdi hatvā taṃ parigheṇa nyapātayat / tac cotthāya mahāseno rājā dṛṣṭvā tutoṣa saḥ // 8.6.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ vacmi pañcamaṃ vāram idaṃ prāṇā ime mama / vipravīra tvayā dattā iti taṃ cāvadan muhuḥ // 8.6.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vikramaśaktes tat tasya sainyaṃ sarāṣṭrakam / ācakrāma mahāseno hatasya guṇaśarmaṇā // 8.6.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ākramya cānyān nṛpatīn sahāye guṇaśarmaṇi / āgatyojjayinīṃ tasthau sa rājā sukhitas tadā // 8.6.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā tv aśokavatī rājñī sotsukā guṇaśarmaṇaḥ / virarāma na nirbandhaprārthanāto divāniśam // 8.6.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tu nāṅgīcakāraiva tad akāryaṃ kathaṃcana / dehapātam apīcchanti santo nāvinayaṃ punaḥ // 8.6.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'śokavatī buddhvā niścayaṃ tasya vairataḥ / ekadā vyājakhedaṃ sā kṛtvā tasthau rudanmukhī // 8.6.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praviṣṭo 'tha mahāsenas tām ālokya tathāsthitām / papraccha rājā kim idaṃ priye kenāsi kopitā // 8.6.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
brūhi tasya karomy eṣa dhanaiḥ prāṇaiś ca nigraham / iti bruvāṇaṃ taṃ bhūpaṃ rājñī kṛcchrād ivāha sā // 8.6.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
yena me 'pakṛtaṃ tasya naiva tvaṃ nigrahe kṣamaḥ / na sa tādṛk tad etena mithyaivodghāṭitena kim // 8.6.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā sānubandhe sā rājñi mithyaivam abravīt / āryaputrātinirbandho yadi te vacmi tac chṛṇu // 8.6.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthaṃ gauḍeśvarāt prāptuṃ tena saṃsthāpya saṃvidam / guṇaśarmā tava drohaṃ kartum aicchac chalād ataḥ // 8.6.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ ca koṣanibandhādi gauḍaṃ kārayituṃ nṛpam / visasarja sa dūtaṃ svaṃ guptam āptaṃ dvijādhamaḥ // 8.6.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ dṛṣṭvā tatra sūdas tam āpto rājānam abhyadhāt / ahaṃ te sādhayāmy etat kāryaṃ mārthakṣayaṃ kṛthāḥ // 8.6.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā bandhayitvā taṃ sa dūtaṃ guṇaśarmaṇaḥ / sūdo mantrasrutiṃ rakṣann ihāgād viṣadāyakaḥ // 8.6.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tanmadhye ca palāyyaiva tato nirgatya bandhanāt / guṇaśarmāntikaṃ dūtas tadīyaḥ so 'py upāgamat // 8.6.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tenādhigatavṛttāntenoktvā sarvaṃ sa darśitaḥ / sūdo mahānase 'smākaṃ praviṣṭo guṇaśarmaṇe // 8.6.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato jñātvā sa dhūrtena sūpakṛd brahmabandhunā / viṣadānodyatas tena tubhyam āvedya ghātitaḥ // 8.6.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adya tasyeha sūdasya mātṛbhārye tathānujām / vārtām anveṣṭum āyātān guṇaśarmā sa buddhimān // 8.6.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
buddhvā tena hatā tasya bhāryā mātā ca so 'sya tu / bhrātā palāyitau daivāt praviśan mama mandiram // 8.6.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena tad varṇyate yāvat sarvaṃ me śaraṇārthinā / guṇaśarmā sa madvāsagṛhaṃ tāvat praviṣṭavān // 8.6.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ dṛṣṭvā nāma ca śrutvā bhrātā sūdasya tasya saḥ / bhayān nirgatya matpārśvān na jāne kva palāyitaḥ // 8.6.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
guṇaśarmāpi taṃ dṛṣṭvā svabhṛtyaiḥ pūrvadarśitam / abhūt sadyaḥ savailakṣyo vimṛśann iva kiṃcana // 8.6.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
guṇaśarman kim adyaivam anyādṛśa ivekṣyase / ity apṛccham ahaṃ taṃ ca jijñāsur vijane tataḥ // 8.6.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'tha svīkartukāmo mām āha smodbhedaśaṅkitaḥ / devi tvadanurāgāgnidagdho 'haṃ tad bhajasva mām // 8.6.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyathāhaṃ na jīveyaṃ dehi me prāṇadakṣiṇām / ity uktvā vāsake śūnye pādayor apatat sa me // 8.6.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'haṃ pādam ākṣipya saṃbhramād yāvad utthitā / tāvad utthāya tenāham abalāliṅgitā balāt // 8.6.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkṣaṇaṃ ca praviṣṭā me ceṭī pallavikāntikam / tāṃ dṛṣṭvaiva sa niṣkramya guṇaśarmā bhayād gataḥ // 8.6.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yadi pallavikā nātra prāvekṣyat tat sa niścitam / adhvaṃsayiṣyat pāpo mām ity evaṃ vṛttam adya me // 8.6.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ity uktvā sā mṛṣā rājñī virarāma ruroda ca / ādāv asatyavacanaṃ paścājjātā hi kustriyaḥ // 8.6.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
rājā ca sa tad ākarṇya jajvāla jhaṭiti krudhā / strīvacaḥpratyayo hanti vicāraṃ mahatām api // 8.6.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abravīc ca sa kāntāṃ svāṃ samāśvasihi sundari / tasyāvaśyaṃ kariṣyāmi drohiṇo vadhanigraham // 8.6.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ tu yuktyā sa hantavyo bhaved apayaśo 'nyathā / khyātaṃ hi yat pañcakṛtvo dattaṃ me tena jīvitam // 8.6.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
tvadāskandanadoṣaś ca loke vaktuṃ na yujyate / ity uktā tena rājñā sā rājñī taṃ pratyabhāṣata // 8.6.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avācya eṣa doṣaś cet tadā vācyo 'sya so 'pi kim / yo gauḍeśvarasakhyena prabhudreho samudyamaḥ // 8.6.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam ukte tayā yuktam uktam ity abhidhāya saḥ / yayau rājā mahāseno nijam āsthānasaṃsadam // 8.6.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra sarve samājagmur darśanāyāsya bhūpateḥ / rājāno rājaputrāś ca sāmantā mantriṇas tathā // 8.6.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca guṇaśarmāpi gṛhād rājakula prati / āgān mārge ca subahūny animittāny avaikṣata // 8.6.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
vāmas tasmābhavat kākaḥ śvā vāmād dakṣiṇaṃ yayau / dakṣiṇo 'haribhūd vāmaḥ saskandhaś cāsphurad bhujaḥ // 8.6.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśubhaṃ sūcayanty etāny animittāni me dhruvam / tan mamaivāstu yat kiṃcin mā bhūd rājñas tu matprabhoḥ // 8.6.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity antaś cintayan so 'tha nṛpasyāsthānam āviśat / mā syād rājakule kiṃcid viruddham iti bhaktitaḥ // 8.6.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praṇamyātropaviṣṭaṃ ca na taṃ rājā sa pūrvavat / abhyanandad apaśyat tu tiryak krodheddhayā dṛśā // 8.6.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kim etad iti tasmiṃś ca guṇaśarmaṇi śaṅkite / sa utthāyāsanād rājā tasya skandha upāviśat // 8.6.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vismitāṃś cābravīt sabhyān nyāyaṃ me guṇaśarmaṇaḥ / śṛṇuteti tatas taṃ sa guṇaśarmā vyajijñapat // 8.6.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhṛtyo 'haṃ tvaṃ prabhus tan nau vyavahāraḥ kathaṃ samaḥ / adhitiṣṭhāsanaṃ paścād yathecchasi tathādiśa // 8.6.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti dhīreṇa tenokto mantribhiś ca prabodhitaḥ / adhyāste smāsanaṃ rājā punaḥ sabhyān uvāca ca // 8.6.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
viditaṃ tāvad etad vo mantriṇo yat kramāgatān / vihāya guṇaśarmāyaṃ tāvad ātmasamaḥ kṛtaḥ // 8.6.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrūyatāṃ mama caitena kīdṛg dūtagatāgataiḥ / gauḍeśvareṇa kṛtvaikyaṃ drohaḥ kartum acintyata // 8.6.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā varṇayām āsa tat tebhyaḥ sa mahīpatiḥ / yad aśokavatī tasmai jagāda racitaṃ mṛṣā // 8.6.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yo 'py ātmadhvaṃsanākṣepas tayā tasya mṛṣoditaḥ / niṣkāsya lokān āptebhyaḥ so 'py uktas tena bhūbhujā // 8.6.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tataḥ sa guṇaśarmā tam uvācāsatyam īdṛśam / deva kenāsi vijñaptaḥ khacitraṃ kena nirmitam // 8.6.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvaiva nṛpo 'vādīt pāpa satyaṃ na ced idam / carubhāṇḍāntarasthaṃ tat kathaṃ jñātaṃ viṣaṃ tvayā // 8.6.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prajñayā jñāyate sarvam ity ukte guṇaśarmaṇā / aśakyam etad ity ūcus taddveṣeṇānyamantriṇaḥ // 8.6.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
deva tattvam ananviṣya vaktum eva na te kṣamam / prabhuś ca nirvicāraś ca nītijñair na praśasyate // 8.6.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity asya vadato bhūyaḥ sa rājā guṇaśarmaṇaḥ / dhāvitvā churikāghātaṃ dadau dhṛṣṭa iti bruvan // 8.6.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmin prahāre karaṇaprayogāt tena vañcite / anye tu praharanti sma vīre tasmin nṛpānugāḥ // 8.6.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa cāpi yuddhakaraṇair vañcayitvā kṛpāṇikāḥ / guṇaśarmā samaṃ teṣāṃ sarveṣām apy apāharat // 8.6.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
babandha caitān anyonyakeśapāśena veṣṭitān / kṛtvā karaṇayuktyaiva citraśikṣitalāghavaḥ // 8.6.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
niryayau ca tatas tasyāḥ prasahya nṛpasaṃsadaḥ / jaghāna śatamātraṃ ca yodhānām anudhāvatām // 8.6.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato dattvāñcalasthaṃ tad antardhānāñjanaṃ dṛśoḥ / adṛśyaḥ prayayau tasmād deśāt tatkṣaṇam eva saḥ // 8.6.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dakṣiṇāpatham uddiśya gacchaṃś cācintayat pathi / nūnaṃ tayāśokavatyā mūḍho 'sau prerito nṛpaḥ // 8.6.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
aho viṣād apy adhikāḥ striyo raktavimānitāḥ / aho asevyāḥ sādhūnāṃ rājāno tattvadarśinaḥ // 8.6.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ityādi cintayan prāpa guṇaśarmā kathaṃcana / grāmaṃ tatra vaṭasyādho dadarśaikaṃ dvijottamam // 8.6.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śiṣyān adhyāpayantaṃ tam upasṛtyābhyavādayat / so 'pi taṃ vihitātithyaḥ papraccha brāhmaṇaḥ kṣaṇāt // 8.6.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
he brahman katamāṃ śākhām adhīṣe kathyatām iti / tataḥ sa guṇaśarmā taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ pratyavocata // 8.6.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
paṭhāmi dvādaśa brahmañ śākhā dve sāmavedataḥ / ṛgvedād dve yajurvedāt sapta caikām atharvataḥ // 8.6.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā tarhi devas tvam ity uktvā brāhmaṇo 'tha saḥ / ākṛtyā kathitotkarṣaṃ prahvaḥ papraccha taṃ punaḥ // 8.6.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ko deśaḥ ko 'nvayo brūhi janmanālaṃkṛtas tvayā / kiṃ te nāma kathaṃ ceyat tvayādhītaṃ kva vā vada // 8.6.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā guṇaśarmā tam uvācojjayinīpuri / ādityaśarmanāmāsīt ko'pi brāhmaṇaputrakaḥ // 8.6.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pitā tasya ca bālasya sataḥ pañcatvam āyayau / mātā tena samaṃ patyā viveśa ca hutāśanam // 8.6.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa vavṛdhe tasyāṃ puri mātulaveśmani / ādityaśarmādhīyāno vedān vidyāḥ kalās tathā // 8.6.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
prāptavidyasya tasyātra japavrataniṣeviṇaḥ / pravrājakena kenāpi sakhyaṃ samudapadyata // 8.6.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa parivrāṭ samaṃ tena mittreṇādityaśarmaṇā / gatvā pitṛvane homaṃ yakṣiṇīsiddhaye vyadhāt // 8.6.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tasyāvirāsīc ca kārtasvaravimānagā / varakanyāparivṛtā divyakanyā svalaṃkṛtā // 8.6.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
sā taṃ madhurayā vācā babhāṣe maskarinn aham / vidyunmālābhidhā yakṣī yakṣiṇyaś cāparā imāḥ // 8.6.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad ito matparīvārād gṛhāṇaikāṃ yathāruci / etāvad eva siddhaṃ te mantrasādhanayānayā // 8.6.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvayā hi naiva vijñātaṃ pūrṇaṃ manmantrasādhanam / ato 'haṃ te na siddhaiva mānyaṃ kleśaṃ vṛthā kṛthāḥ // 8.6.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktas tayā yakṣyā parivrāḍ anumānya saḥ / yakṣiṇīm agrahīd ekāṃ tasmāt tatparivārataḥ // 8.6.168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataś ca vidyunmālā sā tiro 'bhūt tāṃ ca yakṣiṇīm / ādityaśarmā papraccha siddhā pravrājakasya yā // 8.6.169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
apy asti vidyunmālāto yakṣiṇī kācid uttamā / tac chrutvā yakṣiṇī sā taṃ pratyuvācāsti sundara // 8.6.170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidyunmālā candralekhā tṛtīyā ca sulocanā / uttamā yakṣiṇīṣv etā etāsv api sulocanā // 8.6.171	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā sā yathākālam āgantuṃ yakṣiṇī yayau / ādityaśarmaṇā sākam agāt pravrāṭ ca tadgṛham // 8.6.172	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra pratidinaṃ tasmai prītā pravrajakāya sā / prāyacchad yakṣiṇī bhogān iṣṭān kālopagāminī // 8.6.173	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadādityaśarmā ca pravrājakamukhena tām / sulocanāmantravidhiṃ ko jānātīti pṛṣṭavān // 8.6.174	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
sāpi tanmukha evāsmai yakṣiṇy evaṃ kilābravīt / asti tumbavanaṃ nāma sthānaṃ dakṣiṇadigbhuvi // 8.6.175	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāsti viṣṇuguptākhyo veṇātīrakṛtāspadaḥ / pravrājako bhadantāgryaḥ sa tad vetti savistaram // 8.6.176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
buddhvaitad yakṣiṇīvākyāt taṃ deśaṃ cotsukau yayau / ādityaśarmānugataḥ prītyā pravrājakena saḥ // 8.6.177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tatrānviṣya yathāvat taṃ bhadantam abhigamya ca / paricaryāparo bhaktyā trīṇi varṣāṇy asevata // 8.6.178	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upācarac ca yakṣiṇyā parivrāṭ siddhayā tayā / yathopayogopahṛtair upacārair amānuṣaiḥ // 8.6.179	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tatas tuṣṭo bhadanto 'sau tasmāy ādityaśarmaṇe / dadau sulocanāmantram arthitaṃ savidhānakam // 8.6.180	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataś cādityaśarmā taṃ mantraṃ prāpya samāpya ca / homaṃ cakāra saṃpūrṇaṃ gatvaikānte yathāvidhi // 8.6.181	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tasya vimānasthā yakṣiṇī sā sulocanā / prādurbabhūva rūpeṇa jagadāścaryadāyinā // 8.6.182	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jagāda caitam ehy ehi siddhāhaṃ tava kiṃ punaḥ / ṣaṇmāsaṃ kanyakābhāvo nāpaneyo mama tvayā // 8.6.183	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yadi matto mahāvīramṛddhipātraṃ sulakṣaṇam / sarvajñakalpam ajitaṃ putraṃ saṃprāptum icchasi // 8.6.184	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ity uktvā sā tathety enam uktavantaṃ ca yakṣiṇī / ādāyādityaśarmāṇaṃ vimānenālakāṃ yayau // 8.6.185	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca tatra samīpasthāṃ tāṃ paśyann āsta sarvadā / ādityaśarmā ṣaṇmāsān asidhārāvrataṃ caran // 8.6.186	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatas tuṣṭo dhanādhyakṣo divyena vidhinā svayam / ādityaśarmaṇe tasmai vyatarat tāṃ sulocanām // 8.6.187	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāṃ tasya dvijasyātra jāto 'yam aham ātmajaḥ / pitrā ca me kṛtaṃ nāma guṇaśarmeti sadguṇāt // 8.6.188	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tatraiva yakṣādhipater maṇidharābhidhāt / kramād vedāś ca vidyāś ca kalāś cādhigatā mayā // 8.6.189	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athaikadā kim apy āgāc chakro 'tra dhanadāntikam / udatiṣṭhaṃś ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā ye tatrāsata kecana // 8.6.190	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
matpitādityaśarmā tu tatkālaṃ vidhiyogataḥ / anyatra gatacittatvān nodatiṣṭhat sasaṃbhramaḥ // 8.6.191	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tam aśapat kruddhaḥ sa śakro dhig jaḍa vraja / svam eva martyalokaṃ taṃ neha yogyo bhavān iti // 8.6.192	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praṇipatyānunīto 'tha sa sulocanayā tayā / śakro 'bravīt tarhi mā gān martyalokamayaṃ svayam // 8.6.193	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
etat putras tu yātv eṣa putro hy ātmaiva kathyate / mā bhūn madvacanaṃ mogham ity uktvendraḥ śamaṃ yayau // 8.6.194	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ pitrāham ānīya nijamātulaveśmani / ujjayinyāṃ vinikṣipto bhavitavyaṃ hi yasya tat // 8.6.195	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrājāyata sakhyaṃ me rājñātratyena daivataḥ / tato 'tra mama yad vṛttaṃ tat sarvaṃ śṛṇu vacmi te // 8.6.196	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvāmūlavṛttāntaṃ yad aśokavatīkṛtam / yac ca rājñā kṛtaṃ tasya yuddhāntaṃ tad avarṇayat // 8.6.197	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
punaś covāca taṃ brahmann ittham asmi palāyitaḥ / deśāntaraṃ vrajan mārge bhavantam iha dṛṣṭavān // 8.6.198	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutvaitad brāhmaṇas taṃ sa guṇaśarmāṇam abhyadhāt / tarhi dhanyo 'smi saṃvṛttas tvadabhyāgamanāt prabho // 8.6.199	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad ehi me gṛhaṃ tāvad agnidattaṃ ca viddhi mām / nāmnā madagrahāraś ca grāmo 'yaṃ nirvṛto bhava // 8.6.200	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā so 'gnidattas taṃ gṛhaṃ prāveśayan nijam / ṛddhimad guṇaśarmāṇaṃ bahugomahiṣīhayam // 8.6.201	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra snānāṅgarāgābhyāṃ vastrair ābharaṇaiś ca tam / atithiṃ mānayām āsa bhojanair vividhaiś ca saḥ // 8.6.202	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adarśayac ca tasmai svāṃ kāmyarūpāṃ surair api / lakṣaṇāvekṣaṇam iṣāt sundarīṃ nāma kanyakām // 8.6.203	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
guṇaśarmāpi so 'nanyasamarūpāṃ vilokya tām / sapatnyo 'syā bhaviṣyantīty agnidattam uvāca tam // 8.6.204	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nāsāyāṃ tilako 'sty asyās tatsaṃbandhāc ca vacmy aham / urasy asti dvitīyo 'pi tayoś caitat phalaṃ viduḥ // 8.6.205	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ tenodite tasyā bhrātā pitur anujñayā / udghāṭayaty uro yāvat tāvat tīlakam aikṣata // 8.6.206	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'gnidattaḥ sāścaryo guṇaśarmāṇam abhyadhāt / sarvajñas tvam imau tv asyās tilakau nāśubhapradau // 8.6.207	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sapatnyo hi bhavantīha prāyaḥ śrīmati bhartari / daridro bibhṛyād ekām api kaṣṭaṃ kuto bahūḥ // 8.6.208	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā guṇaśarmā taṃ pratyuvāca yathāttha bhoḥ / sulakṣaṇāyā īdṛśyā hy akṛter aśubhaṃ kutaḥ // 8.6.209	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ity ūcivān prasaṅgena pṛṣṭas tasmai śaśaṃsa saḥ / pratyaṅgaṃ tilakādīnāṃ phalaṃ strīpuṃsayoḥ pṛthak // 8.6.210	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadā ca guṇaśarmāṇaṃ taṃ sā dṛṣṭvaiva sundarī / ity eṣa pātuṃ dṛṣṭyaiva cakorīvendum utsukā // 8.6.211	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tato 'gnidatto vijane guṇaśarmāṇam āha tam / mahābhāga dadāmy etāṃ kanyāṃ te sundarīm aham // 8.6.212	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
mā gā videśaṃ tiṣṭheha gṛhe mama yathāsukham / etat tadvacanaṃ śrutvā guṇaśarmāpy uvāca tam // 8.6.213	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
satyam evaṃ kṛte kiṃ kiṃ na saukhyaṃ mama kiṃ tu mām / mithyā rājāvamānāgnitaptaṃ prīṇāsti naiva tat // 8.6.214	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kāntā candrodayo vīṇāpañcamadhvanir ity amī / ye nandayanti sukhitān duḥkhitān vyathayanti te // 8.6.215	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
jāyā ca svarasā raktā bhaved avyabhicārinī / avaśā pitṛdattā tu syād aśokavatī yathā // 8.6.216	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
itaḥ pradeśān nikaṭā sā kiṃ cojjayinī puri / tad buddhvā sa nṛpo jātu mama kuryād upadravam // 8.6.217	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tat paribhramya tīrthāni prakṣālyājanmakilbiṣam / śarīram etat tyakṣyāmi bhaviṣyāmy atha nirvṛtaḥ // 8.6.218	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ity uktavantaṃ pratyāha so 'gnidatto vihasya tam / tavāpi moho yatredṛk tatrānyasya kim ucyatām // 8.6.219	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ajñāvamānād dhāniḥ kā vada śuddhāśayasya te / paṅko hi nabhasi kṣiptaḥ kṣeptuḥ patati mūrdhani // 8.6.220	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājaiva so cirāt prapsyaty aviśeṣajñatāphalam / mohāndham avivekaṃ hi śrīś cirāya na sevate // 8.6.221	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ cāśokavatī dṛṣṭvā vairasyaṃ strīṣu cet tava / satīṃ dṛṣṭvā na kiṃ tāsu śraddhā vetsi ca lakṣaṇam // 8.6.222	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nikaṭojjayinī vā cet tava dāsyāmy ahaṃ tathā / yathā tvām iha tiṣṭhantaṃ naiva jñāsyati kaścana // 8.6.223	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tīrthayātrā taveṣṭā vā tac chastā tasya sā budhaiḥ / saṃpattir vidhivan na syād vaidike yasya karmaṇi // 8.6.224	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyathā devapitragnikriyāvratajapādibhiḥ / gṛhe yā puṇyaniṣpattiḥ sādhvani bhramataḥ kutaḥ // 8.6.225	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhujopadhāno bhūśāyī bhikṣāśī kevalo 'dhanaḥ / muneḥ samatvaṃ prāpyāpi na kleśair mucyate 'dhvagaḥ // 8.6.226	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
dehatyāgāt sukhaṃ yad vā vāñchasy eṣa tava bhramaḥ / itaḥ kaṣṭataraṃ duḥkham amutra hy ātmaghātinām // 8.6.227	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad eṣo 'nucito moho yūnaś ca viduṣaś ca te / svayaṃ vicārayāvaśyaṃ kartavyaṃ madvacas tava // 8.6.228	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kārayāsmīha guptaṃ te bhūgṛhaṃ pṛthu sundaram / vivāhya sundarīṃ duḥkham amutra hy ātmaghātinām // 8.6.229	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti tenāgnidattena bodhitaḥ sa prayatnataḥ / guṇaśarmā tathety etat pratipadya jagāda tam // 8.6.230	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtaṃ mayā te vacanaṃ ko bhāryāṃ sundarīṃ tyajet / kiṃ tv etām akṛtī nāhaṃ pariṇeṣyāmi te sutām // 8.6.231	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ārādhayāmy ahaṃ tāvad devaṃ kaṃcit susaṃyataḥ / yena tasya kṛtaghnasya rājñaḥ kuryāṃ pratikriyām // 8.6.232	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti tadvacanaṃ hṛṣṭaḥ so 'gnidatto 'nvamanyata / so 'pi tāṃ guṇaśarmātra viśaśrāma sukhaṃ niśām // 8.6.233	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyedyuś cāgnidatto 'sya saukhyārthaṃ tatra guptimat / pātālavasatiprakhyaṃ kārayām āsa bhūgṛham // 8.6.234	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrasthaś cāgnidattaṃ sa guṇaśarmābravīd rahaḥ / ihāntar brūhi kaṃ devaṃ kena mantreṇa bhaktitaḥ // 8.6.235	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ārādhayāmy ahaṃ tāvad varadaṃ vratacaryayā / ity uktavantaṃ taṃ dhīram agnidatto 'bhyabhāṣata // 8.6.236	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
asti svāmikumārasya mantro me guruṇoditaḥ / tenārādhaya taṃ devaṃ senānyaṃ tārakāntakam // 8.6.237	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yasya janmārthibhir devaiḥ preṣitaḥ śatrupīḍitaiḥ / dagdho 'pi kāmaḥ saṃkalpajanmā śarveṇa nirmitaḥ // 8.6.238	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
maheśvarād agnikuṇḍād agneḥ śaravaṇād api / kṛttikābhyaś ca śaṃsanti vicitraṃ yasya saṃbhavam // 8.6.239	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
jātenaiva jagat kṛtsnaṃ duṣpradharṣeṇa tejasā / ānandya yena nihato durjayas tārakāsuraḥ // 8.6.240	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tan mantram imam ādatsva matta ity abhidhāya saḥ / agnidatto dadau tasmai mantraṃ taṃ guṇaśarmaṇe // 8.6.241	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tenārādhitavān skandaṃ guṇaśarmā sa bhūgṛhe / tayopacaryamāṇaḥ san sundaryā niyatavrataḥ // 8.6.242	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ pratyakṣatām etya sākṣād devaḥ sa ṣaṇmukhaḥ / tuṣṭo 'smi te varaṃ putra vṛṇīṣveti tam ādiśat // 8.6.243	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ākṣīṇakoṣo bhūtvā tvāṃ mahāsenaṃ vijitya ca / gatvāpratihataḥ putra pṛthvīrājyaṃ kariṣyasi // 8.6.245	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti dattvādhikaṃ tasmai varaṃ skandas tirodadhe / saṃprāptākṣayakośaś ca guṇaśarmāpi so 'bhavat // 8.6.246	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ṛddhyā tataḥ svamahimocitayāgnidattaviprātmajām anudinādhikabaddhabhāvām / bhāvyarthasiddhim iva rūpavatīm upetāṃ tāṃ sundarīṃ sa sukṛtī vidhinopayeme // 8.6.247	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
ākṣīṇakoṣanicayaprabhavaprabhāvāt saṃbhūtabhūrigajavājipadātisainyaḥ / dānaprasādamilitākhilapārthivānāṃ rundhan balair avanim ujjayinīṃ jagāma // 8.6.248	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
prakhyāpya tasyāṃ tad aśokavatyāḥ prajāsv aśīlaṃ samare ca bhūpam / jitvā mahāsenam apāsya rājyāt pṛthvīpatitvaṃ sa samāsasāda // 8.6.249	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
anyāś ca kanyāḥ pariṇīya rājñām abdhes taṭeṣv apy aparāṅmukhākṣaḥ / iṣṭān sa bhogān guṇaśarmasamrāṭ cirāya bhuṅkte sma sasundarīkaḥ // 8.6.250	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
iti puruṣaviśeṣājñānato mūḍhabuddhiḥ sapadi vipadam āpa prāṅ mahāsenabhūpaḥ / iti ca sa guṇaśarmā dhairyam ekaṃ sahāyaṃ kṛtamatir avalambya prāptavān ṛddhim agryām // 8.6.251	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
evaṃ kathāṃ svasacivasya mukhād udārāṃ sūryaprabho niśi niśamya sa vītabhīteḥ / vīro mahāsamarasāgaram uttitīrṣur utsāham abhyadhikam āpa śanaiś ca śiśye // 8.6.252	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
tataḥ sūryaprabhaḥ prātar utthāya sacivaiḥ saha / dānavādibalaiḥ sarvair yuto yuddhabhuvaṃ yayau // 8.7.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yāyayau śrutaśarmā ca vidyādharabalair vṛtaḥ / ājagmuś ca punar draṣṭuṃ sarve devāsurādayaḥ // 8.7.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sainye dve api te vyūhāv ardhacandrau ca cakratuḥ / prāvartata tato yuddhaṃ balayor ubhayos tayoḥ // 8.7.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saśabdam abidhāvanto nikṛntantaḥ parasparam / pattrārūḍhāḥ prajavino yuddhyante sma śarā api // 8.7.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
koṣān anāgraniryātāḥ sudīrghāḥ pītaśoṇitāḥ / lolāḥ khaḍgalatā reju kṛtāntarasanā iva // 8.7.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śūrotphullamukhāmbhojasaṃpataccakrasaṃhati / rājahaṃsakṣayāyāsīt tadāhavamahāsaraḥ // 8.7.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
utphaladbhiḥ patadbhiś ca nirlūnaiḥ śūramurdhabhiḥ / kṛtāntakandukakrīḍāsaṃnibhā samid ābabhau // 8.7.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣatajāsekanirdhūtadhūlidhvānte raṇājire / mahārathānām abhavan dvandvayuddhāny amarṣiṇām // 8.7.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
āsīt sūryaprabhasyātra saṅgrāmaḥ śrutaśarmaṇā / dāmodareṇa ca samaṃ prabhāsasyāhavo 'bhavat // 8.7.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
mahotpātena sākaṃ ca siddhārtho yuyudhe tadā / prahasto brahmaguptena saṃgamena ca vītabhīḥ // 8.7.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prajñāḍhyaś candraguptenāpy akrameṇa priyaṃkaraḥ / yuyudhe sarvadamanaḥ sahaivātibalena ca // 8.7.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
dhuraṃdhareṇa yuyudhe sa kuñjarakumārakaḥ / anye mahārathāś cānyair ayudhyanta pṛthak pṛthak // 8.7.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra pūrvaṃ mahotpātaḥ pratihatya śaraiḥ śarān / siddhārthasya dhanuś chittvā jaghānāśvān sasārathīn // 8.7.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
virathaḥ so 'pi siddhārtho dhāvitvā tasya taṃ krudhā / ayodaṇḍena mahatā sāśvaṃ ratham acūrṇayat // 8.7.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatas taṃ pādacārī sa siddhārthaḥ pādacāriṇam / bāhuyuddhena dharaṇau mahotpātam apātayat // 8.7.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
yāvac cecchati niṣpeṣṭuṃ sa taṃ tāvat sa khecaraḥ / bhagena rakṣitaḥ pitrā protthāya prayayau raṇāt // 8.7.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prahastabrahmaguptau cāpy anyonyaṃ virathīkṛtau / karaṇaiḥ khaḍgayuddhena yudhyete sma pṛthag vidhaiḥ // 8.7.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prahastaś cāsinirlūnacarmāṇaṃ karaṇakramāt / yuktyā taṃ pātayām āsa brahmaguptaṃ bhuvas tale // 8.7.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
patitasya śiras tasya sa yāvac chettum icchati / tavan nivārito dūrāt pitrāsya brahmaṇā svayam // 8.7.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sutān rakṣitum āyātā yūyaṃ na prekṣituṃ raṇam / ity uktvā dānavāḥ sarve devān vijahasus tadā // 8.7.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvad vītabhayaś chinnadhanvānaṃ hatasārathim / jaghāna hṛdaye viddhvā pradyumnāstreṇa saṃkramam // 8.7.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prajñāḍhyaś candraguptaṃ ca padātiṃ rathayoḥ kṣayāt / padātiḥ khaḍgayuddhena nyavadhīt kṛttam astakam // 8.7.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ putravadhakruddhaḥ svayam āgatya candramāḥ / rajñāḍhyaṃ yodhayām āsa yuddhaṃ cāsīt tayoḥ samam // 8.7.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
priyaṃkaraś ca viratho virathaṃ rathanāśataḥ / ekakhaḍgaprahāreṇa karoti smākramaṃ dvidhā // 8.7.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
chinne dhanuṣi nikṣiptenāṅkuśena hṛdi kṣatam / hatavān sarvadamano helayātibalaṃ raṇe // 8.7.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tato dhuraṃdharaṃ taṃ ca sa kuñjarakumārakaḥ / astrapratyastrayuddhena cakāra virathaṃ muhuḥ // 8.7.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
muhur vikramaśaktiś ca tasmai ratham aḍhaukayat / rarakṣa saṃkaṭe taṃ cāpy astrair astrāṇi vārayan // 8.7.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa kuñjarakumāro 'tha dhāvitvā mahatīṃ śilām / kruddho vikramaśakter drāk cikṣepa syandanopari // 8.7.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gate vikramaśaktau ca cūrṇitasyandane tataḥ / tayaiva śilayā taṃ sa dhuraṃdharam acūrṇayat // 8.7.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sūryaprabhaḥ prayuddho 'pi sahātra śrutaśarmaṇā / virocanavadhakrodhāj jaghānaikeṣuṇā damam // 8.7.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkrodhād aśvinau devau yuddhāyāpatitau śaraiḥ / sunīthaḥ pratijagrāha teṣāṃ yuddham abhūn mahat // 8.7.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sthirabuddhiś ca saṅgrāme śaktyā hatvā parākramam / vasubhis tadvadhakruddhaiḥ sahāṣṭābhir ayudhyata // 8.7.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
virathīkṛtabhāsaṃ ca prabhāso vīkṣya mardanam / dāmodararaṇāsakto 'py ekeneveṣuṇāvadhīt // 8.7.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prakampano 'strayuddhena hatvā tejaḥprabhaṃ yudhi / yuyudhe tadvadhakruddhenāgninā saha dānavaḥ // 8.7.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dhūmaketoś ca samare yamadaṃṣṭraṃ nijaghnuṣaḥ / kupitena yamenābhūt saha yuddhaṃ sudāruṇam // 8.7.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
cūrṇayitvā sa śilayā siṃhadraṣṭaṃ suroṣaṇam / samaṃ nirṛtinā yuddhe tadvadhāmarṣaśālinā // 8.7.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kālacakro 'pi cakreṇa cakre vāyubalaṃ dvidhā / ayudhyata ca tatkopāj jvalatā vāyunā saha // 8.7.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rūpair nāgādrivṛkṣāṇāṃ mahāmāyo vimohadam / kuberadattaṃ hatavāṃs tārkṣyavajrāgnirūpadhṛt // 8.7.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tataḥ kruddhaḥ kubero 'tra tena sākam ayudhyata / evam anye 'py ayudhyanta surā svāṃśavadhakrudhā // 8.7.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nijaghnire 'tra cānye 'pi te te vidyādharādhipāḥ / utpatadbhiḥ pratipadaṃ tais tair manujadānavaiḥ // 8.7.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tāvac cātra prabhāsasya saha dāmodareṇa tat / parasparāstrapratyastrabhīmaṃ yuddham avartata // 8.7.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
atha dāmodaraś chinnadhanvā nihatasārathiḥ / āttānyacāpaḥ saṃgṛhya svayaṃ raśmīn ayudhyata // 8.7.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sādhuvādapradaṃ cāsya papracchendro 'mbujāsanam / hīyamānaṃ prati kathaṃ tuṣṭo 'si bhagavann iti // 8.7.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tato brahmā jagādainaṃ kathaṃ naitasya tuṣyate / iyac ciraṃ prabhāsena saha yo 'nena yudhyate // 8.7.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dāmodaraṃ harer aṃśaṃ vinā kuryād idaṃ hi kaḥ / ekasya hi prabhāsasya sarve 'py alpāḥ surā raṇe // 8.7.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
namucir nāma yo hy āsīd asuraḥ suramardanaḥ / prabalākhyas tato jajñe sarvaratnamayaś ca yaḥ // 8.7.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tad dṛṣṭvā sarvasaṃhāri raudram astraṃ vijṛmbhitam / pramuktaṃ hariṇā cakraṃ sutasnehāt sudarśanam // 8.7.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

astraṃ svaṃ saṃharaitat tvaṃ yāvat svaṃ saṃharāmy aham / ity ukto hariṇā so 'tha prabhāsaḥ pratyuvāca tam // 8.7.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
muktam astraṃ vṛthā na syāt tat prayātu parāṅmukhaḥ / dāmodaro raṇaṃ hitvā tato 'straṃ saṃharāmy aham // 8.7.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tatheti hariṇā dāmodare vyāvartite raṇāt / prabhāsaḥ saṃjahārāstraṃ cakraṃ cāsyāpatad rathe // 8.7.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āruhyānyaṃ rathaṃ so 'tha yayau sūryaprabhāntikam / dāmodaro 'pi sa prāyāc chrutaśarmāntikaṃ tataḥ // 8.7.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca vāsavāṃśatvadṛptasya śrutaśarmaṇaḥ / sūryaprabhasya ca dvandvayuddhaṃ kāṣṭhāṃ parām agāt // 8.7.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutaśarmā prayuṅkte sma yad yad astraṃ prayatnataḥ / pratyastraiḥ pratihanti sma tat tat sūryaprabhaḥ kṣaṇāt // 8.7.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
māyā yā yā ca tenātra prayuktā śrutaśarmaṇā / sūryaprabheṇa sā sāsya nihatā pratimāyayā // 8.7.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato brahmāstram amucac chrutaśarmātikopataḥ / sūryaprabho 'pi prāmuñcad astraṃ pāśupataṃ kṛtī // 8.7.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tena raudramahāstreṇa brahmāstraṃ pratihatya tat / yāvat sa duṣpradharmeṇa śrutaśarmābhibhūyate // 8.7.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvad indraprabhṛtibhir lokapālaiḥ samantataḥ / vajrādīni prayuktāni paramāstrāṇy amarṣibhiḥ // 8.7.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tat tu pāśupataṃ tāni jitvā sarvāyudhāny api / jajvāla sutarām astraṃ śrutaśarmajighāṃsayā // 8.7.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sūryaprabhaḥ stutvā mahāstraṃ tad vyajijñapat / mā vadhīḥ śrutaśarmāṇaṃ baddhvā tvaṃ taṃ samarpaya // 8.7.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ prasahya niḥśeṣaiḥ saṃnaddham abhavat suraiḥ / tajjigīṣāvaśāc cānyaiḥ prekṣakair asurair api // 8.7.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkṣaṇaṃ vīrabhadrākhyaḥ śaṃbhunā prerito gaṇaḥ / āgatyaiva tadādeśam indrādibhyo 'bravīd idam // 8.7.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yūyaṃ prekṣitum āyātās tad yoddhuṃ vaḥ kramo 'tra kaḥ / maryādālaṅghanāc cānyad api syād asamañjasam // 8.7.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvāruvan devā hanyante ca hatāś ca naḥ / sarveṣām atra tanayās tan na yudhyāmahe katham // 8.7.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
dustyajo hi sutasnehas tad avaśyaṃ pratikriyā / tan nihantṛṣu kartavyā yathāśakty atra ko 'kramaḥ // 8.7.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavatsu deveṣu vīrabhadre tato gate / surāṇām asurāṇāṃ ca prāvartata mahāraṇaḥ // 8.7.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sunīthaḥ samam aśvibhyāṃ prajñāḍhyaś ca sahendunā / sthirabuddhiś ca vasubhiḥ kālacakraś ca vāyunā // 8.7.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
prakampano 'gninā siṃhadaṃṣṭro nirṛtinā tathā / varuṇena prathamano dhūmaketur yamena ca // 8.7.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
mahāmāyaḥ sa ca tadā dhanādhipatinā saha / ayudhyatāstrapratyastrair anyonyaiś ca samaṃ suraiḥ // 8.7.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
paryante paramāstraṃ ca yo yo yad yat suro 'kṣipat / tasya tasya haras tat tad dhuṃkāreṇa vyanāśayat // 8.7.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dhanadas tūdyatagadaḥ sāmnā śarveṇa vāritaḥ / bhagnāstrāś ca surās te te parityajyāhavaṃ yayuḥ // 8.7.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sūryaprabhaṃ śakraḥ svayaṃ krodhād ayodhayat / śaraugham amucat tasmiṃs tāni tāny āyudhāni ca // 8.7.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sūryaprabhaś ca nirdhūya tadastrāṇy avahelayā / ākarṇākṛṣṭanārācaśatenendram atāḍayat // 8.7.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ kruddhaḥ sa kuliśaṃ jagrāha ca surādhipaḥ / huṃkāraṃ cākarod rudraḥ kuliśaṃ ca nanāśa tat // 8.7.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ parāṅmukhe yāte śakre nārāyaṇaḥ svayam / prabhāsaṃ yodhayām āsa krodhāt koṭīmukhaiḥ śaraiḥ // 8.7.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
astrāṇy anyāni cāpy astrair niṣkampo yuyudhe samam / hatāśvo virathībhūto 'py āruhyānyaṃ rathaṃ ca saḥ // 8.7.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena daityāriṇā sārdhaṃ nirviśeṣam ayudhyata / tataḥ prakupito devo jvalac cakraṃ mumoca saḥ // 8.7.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prabhāso 'py abhimantryaiva divyaṃ khaḍgaṃ pramuktavān / tayor āyudhayor yudhyamānayor vīkṣya cakrataḥ // 8.7.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hīyamānaṃ śanaiḥ khaḍgaṃ huṃkāraṃ kṛtavān haraḥ / tena te khaḍgacakre dve antardhānam upeyatuḥ // 8.7.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato nanandur asurā viṣīdanti sma cāmarāḥ / sūryaprabhe labdhajaye baddhe ca śrutaśarmaṇi // 8.7.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
saṃstutyārādhayām āsur atha devā vṛṣadhvajam / tatas tuṣṭaḥ surān evam ādideśāmbikāpatiḥ // 8.7.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sūryaprabha pratijñātaṃ varjayitvārthyatāṃ varaḥ / deva yat te pratijñātaṃ kaḥ śaktaḥ kartum anyathā // 8.7.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ tv asmābhiḥ pratijñātaṃ yad asya śrutaśarmaṇaḥ / satyaṃ tad apy astu vibho mā bhūd vaṃśakṣayaś ca naḥ // 8.7.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
ity uktvā viratan devān bhagavān evam ādiśat / saṃdhau kṛte bhavaty etat saṃdhiś caivam ihāstu vaḥ // 8.7.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sūryaprabhaṃ praṇamatu śrutaśarmā sahānugaḥ / tatas tathā vadiṣyāmo yathobhayahitaṃ bhavet // 8.7.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
itīśvaravaco devāḥ pratipadya tatheti ca / sūryaprabhasya vidadhuḥ śrutaśarmāṇam ānatam // 8.7.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatas tayor mithas tyaktavairayoḥ kaṇṭhalagnayoḥ / saṃdhiṃ devāsurāś cakruḥ śāntavairāḥ parasparam // 8.7.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha śṛṇvatsu nikhileṣv asureṣu sureṣu ca / uvāca bhagavāñ śaṃbhuḥ sūryaprabham idaṃ vacaḥ // 8.7.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kuru dakṣiṇavedyarthe cakravartitvam ātmanaḥ / uttarasmiṃs tu vedyarthe dehi tac chrutaśarmaṇe // 8.7.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāptavyam acirāt putra tvayā hītaś caturguṇam / sāmrājyaṃ kiṃnarādīnām aśeṣāṇāṃ dyucāriṇām // 8.7.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmin prāpte ca dadyās tvaṃ vedyardham api dakṣiṇam / tat kuñjarakumārāya saviśeṣapade sthitaḥ // 8.7.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ye cātra nihatā vīrāḥ samity ubhayapakṣayoḥ / uttiṣṭhantv akṣatair aṅgair jīvantaḥ sarva eva te // 8.7.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvāntardadhe śaṃbhuḥ sarve cottasthur akṣatāḥ / suptaprabuddhā iva te ye 'trābhūvan raṇe hatāḥ // 8.7.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
atha sūryaprabho mūrdhni dhṛtaśāṃbhavaśāsanaḥ / gatvā viviktaṃ vistīrṇaṃ bhūmibhāgam ariṃdamaḥ // 8.7.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
upaviṣṭo mahāsthāne śrutaśarmāṇam āgatam / nijasiṃhāsanārdhe tam upāveśitavān svayam // 8.7.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadvayasyāḥ prabhāsādyā vayasyāḥ śrutaśarmaṇaḥ / dāmodarādyāś ca tayoḥ pārśvayoḥ sam upāviśan // 8.7.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
upāviśat sunīthaś ca mayaś cānye ca dānavāḥ / āsaneṣu yathārheṣu tathā vidyādhareśvarāḥ // 8.7.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tatrāyayuḥ saptapātālapatayo 'khilāḥ / prahlādapramukhā daityadānavendrāḥ praharṣataḥ // 8.7.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śakraś ca lokapālādiyuto gurupuraḥsaraḥ / vidyādharaḥ sumeruś ca sa suvāsakumārakaḥ // 8.7.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
danuprabhṛtayaḥ sarvāś cāyayuḥ kaśyapāṅganāḥ / bhūtāsanavimānena bhāryāḥ sūryaprabhasya ca // 8.7.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sarveṣv eṣu kṛtānyonyaprītyācāropaveśiṣu / siddhir nāma sakhī datvās tadvākyenaivam abhyadhāt // 8.7.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bho bhoḥ surāsurā devī danur yuṣmān bravīty asau / asmin prītisamāje yat saumanasyaṃ sukhaṃ ca naḥ // 8.7.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad brūta yadi yuṣmābhir anubhūtaṃ kadācana / tad anyonyaṃ na kartavyo virodho duḥkhadāruṇaḥ // 8.7.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hiraṇyākṣādibhir jyeṣṭhair dyurājyāya kṛtaḥ sa yaiḥ / te gatāḥ śakra evādya jyeṣṭhas tat kā virodhitā // 8.7.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nirvairasukhitās tasmād vartadhvam itaretaram / asmākaṃ yena saṃtoṣaḥ śivaṃ ca jagatāṃ bhavet // 8.7.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti siddhimukhāc chrutvā bhagavatyā danor vacaḥ / śakreṇa vīkṣitamukho bṛhaspatir uvāca tām // 8.7.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
