ity ukte devaguruṇā dānavendro mayo 'bravīt / syād vikāro 'surāṇāṃ cet tad dadyān nasmuciḥ katham // 8.7.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

adhikaṃ vā kiyad vacmi nityasaṃbhāvino 'surāḥ / chadmanā cen na bādhyante tad eṣāṃ nāsti vikriyā // 8.7.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

yad ādiśati devī māṃ paramo 'nugraho hy ayam / devenāpy ayam evārthaḥ prāg ādiṣṭo mamābhavat // 8.7.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

umā himavato jātā jātā ceyaṃ sumerutaḥ / itīva tatsamānena saundaryeṇa samāśritām // 8.7.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vedīṃ samāropya kṛtakautukaśobhitām / prasādhitāṃ sumerus tāṃ dadau sūryaprabhāya saḥ // 8.7.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

dvitīye lājamokṣe ca jayā ratnāvalīm adāt / yayā kaṇṭhasthayā mṛtyuḥ kṣuttṛṣṇā ca na bādhate // 8.7.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sumeruś ca dadāti sma dviguṇaṃ ratnasaṃcayam / uccaiḥśravaḥprasūtaṃ ca hayaratnam anuttamam // 8.7.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
lājamokṣe tṛtīye ca dadāv ekāvalīṃ jayā / yauvanaṃ kṣīyate naiva yayā kaṇṭhāvalagnayā // 8.7.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sumerus triguṇaṃ rāśiṃ ratnānāṃ pravitīrya ca / dattavān gulikāṃ divyāṃ sarvasiddhyupayoginīm // 8.7.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vivāhe nirvṛtte sumeruḥ sasurāsurān / vidyādharān devamātṛḥ sarvān evaṃ vyajijñapat // 8.7.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
bhoktavyam adya yuṣmābhiḥ sarvair eva gṛhe mama / anugrahaś ca kartavyo baddho mūrdhni mayāñjaliḥ // 8.7.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

etad anneṣu bhukteṣu tṛptiḥ syāc chāśvatī ca vaḥ / iti nandimukhāc chrutvā sarve sat pratipedire // 8.7.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'trājagmur amitāḥ śaṃkaraprahitā gaṇāḥ / vināyakamahākālavīrabhadrādyadhiṣṭhitāḥ // 8.7.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

dinānte ca sa sadratnaparyaṅkaṃ sādhunirmitam / kāmacūḍāmaṇer vadhvā vāsaveśma viveśa tat // 8.7.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatraitāṃ ca ghanāśleṣadaśanacchadakhaṇḍanaiḥ / tyājayitvā śanair lajjāṃ navoḍhāsulabhāṃ kramāt // 8.7.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anirvācyaṃ navaṃ mugdhavidagdhamadhuraṃ ratam / anāsvāditam anyābhyaḥ siṣeve sa tayā saha // 8.7.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
idānīṃ bahir anyāsāṃ niveśo hṛdaye 'stu me / antaḥ punas tavaikasyā iti tāṃ cānvarañjayat // 8.7.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato ratāntasuptasya priyāśleṣasukhāvahā / śanaiḥ samāptim agaman niśā nidrā ca tasya sā // 8.7.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
prabhāte ca sa utthāya gatvā sūryaprabhas tataḥ / ādyās tā rañjayām āsa nijabhāryāḥ saha sthitāḥ // 8.7.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tās taṃ navavadhūraktaṃ yāvat parihasanti ca / sanarmavakramadhurasnigdhamugdhair vacaḥkramaiḥ // 8.7.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
dvāḥsthenāveditas tāvad āgatya praṇipatya ca / vidyādharaḥ suṣeṇākhyaḥ kṛtinaṃ taṃ vyajijñapat // 8.7.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
deva trikūṭanāthādyaiḥ sarvair vidyādhareśvaraiḥ / preṣito 'ham ihaivaṃ ca devaṃ vijñāpayanti te // 8.7.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ṛṣabhādrau tṛtīye 'hni hy abhiṣekaḥ śubhas tava / saṃvādyatāṃ tat sarveṣām udyamo 'tra vidhīyatām // 8.7.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tac chrutvā pratyavocat taṃ dūtaṃ sūryaprabhas tadā / gaccha trikūṭādhipatiprabhṛtīn brūhi madgirā // 8.7.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
bhavanta eva kurvantu samārambhaṃ vadantu ca / ātmanaiva paraṃ sajjā vayam ete sthitāḥ punaḥ // 8.7.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃvādanaṃ tu sarveṣāṃ kariṣyāmo yathāyatham / ity āttapratisaṃdeśaḥ suṣeṇaḥ sa tato yayau // 8.7.168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sūryaprabho 'pi caikaikaṃ prabhāsaprabhṛtīn sakhīn / devānāṃ yājñavalkyādimunīnāṃ bhūbhṛtāṃ tathā // 8.7.169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidyādharāsurāṇāṃ ca visasarja pṛthak pṛthak / nimantraṇāya sarveṣāṃ svābhiṣekamahotsave // 8.7.170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svayaṃ jagāma caikākī kailāsaṃ parvatottamam / harasya cāmbikāyāś ca nimantraṇakṛtodyamaḥ // 8.7.171	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ārohaṃś ca tam adrākṣīc chubhrabhūtisitaṃ girim / sevyaṃ devarṣisiddhānāṃ dvitīyam iva śaṃkaram // 8.7.172	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ardhād adhikam āruhya durārohaṃ tataḥ param / sa taṃ paśyan dadarśātra vaidrumaṃ dvāram ekataḥ // 8.7.173	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yadā praveśaṃ naivātra siddhimān apy avāpa saḥ / tadaikāgreṇa manasā stauti sma śaśiśekharam // 8.7.174	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatas tad dvāram udghāṭya pumān gajamukho 'bravīt / ehi praviśa tuṣṭas te herambo bhagavān iti // 8.7.175	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sūryaprabhas tatra praviśyāntaḥ savismayaḥ / upaviṣṭe mahābhoge jyotīrasaśilātale // 8.7.176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dvādaśādityasaṃkāśam ekadaṃṣṭraṃ gajānanam / lambodaraṃ trinetraṃ ca jvalatparaśumudgaram // 8.7.177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vināyakaṃ parivṛtaṃ nānāprāṇimukhair gaṇaiḥ / dadarśātha vavande ca pādayoḥ praṇipatya tam // 8.7.178	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi taṃ vighnajitprītaḥ pṛṣṭvāgamanakāraṇam / ārohānena mārgeṇety avocat snigdhayā girā // 8.7.179	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena sūryaprabhaḥ so 'nyām ārūḍhaḥ pañcayojanīm / padmarāgamayaṃ dvāram apaśyad aparaṃ mahat // 8.7.180	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anavāptapraveśaś ca tatrāpi sa pinākinam / devaṃ nāmasahasreṇa tuṣṭāvānanyamānasaḥ // 8.7.181	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ kumāraputreṇa svayaṃ dvāraṃ vivṛtya tat / uktātmanā viśākhākhyenāntaḥ prāveśyatātra saḥ // 8.7.182	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praviṣṭaś ca dadarśātra skandaṃ jvālānaladyutim / yuktaṃ śākhaviśākhādyaiḥ sadṛśaiḥ pañcabiḥ sutaiḥ // 8.7.183	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa jātamātrakaprahvair duṣṭagrahaśiśugrahaiḥ / vṛtaṃ taṃ koṭisaṃkhyākair gaṇeśaiś caraṇānataiḥ // 8.7.184	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tenāpi parituṣṭena pṛṣṭvā kāraṇam āgame / tasyārohaṇamārgo 'tra vyādiṣṭaḥ śarajanmanā // 8.7.185	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ krameṇa cānyāni ratnadvārāṇi pañca saḥ / sabhairavamahākālavīrabhadreṇa nandinā // 8.7.186	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhṛṅgiṇā cānugaiḥ sākaṃ niruddhāni yathākramam / atītya prāpa pṛṣṭhe 'dreḥ sphāṭikaṃ dvāram uttamam // 8.7.187	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ stuvan devadevaṃ rudreṣv ekena sādaram / praveśitas tad adrākṣīc chaṃbhoḥ svargādhikaṃ padam // 8.7.188	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
divyagandhavahad vātaṃ sadāpuṣpaphaladrumam / gandharvārabdhasaṃgītam apsaronṛttasotsavam // 8.7.189	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatraikadeśe sphaṭikamayasiṃhāsane sthitam / trilocanaṃ śūlapāṇiṃ svacchasphaṭikasaṃnibham // 8.7.190	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
baddhapiṅgajaṭājūṭaṃ cārucandrārdhaśekharam / pārśvasthayā girijayā bhagavatyopasevitam // 8.7.191	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
sūryaprabhaḥ sa sānandaḥ paśyati sma maheśvaram / upetya cāpatat tasya sadevīkasya pādayoḥ // 8.7.192	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ pṛṣṭhe karaṃ dattvā tam utthāpyopaveśya ca / kim artham āgato 'sīti papraccha bhagavān haraḥ // 8.7.193	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pratyāsanno 'bhiṣeko me saṃnidhānaṃ tad arthaye / prabhos tatreti taṃ sūryaprabhaḥ pratyabravīc ca saḥ // 8.7.194	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ śaṃbhur uvācainam iyān kliṣṭo 'si tarhi kim / saṃnidhānāya kiṃ putra tata evāsmi na smṛtaḥ // 8.7.195	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad astu saṃnidhāsye 'ham ity uktvā bhaktavatsalaḥ / so 'ntikasthitam āhūya gaṇam ekaṃ samādiśat // 8.7.196	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gacchaitam abhiṣekārtham ṛṣabhaṃ parvataṃ naya / mahābhiṣekasthānaṃ hi tad eṣāṃ cakravartinām // 8.7.197	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ityādiṣṭo bhagavatā sa taṃ sūryaprabhaṃ gaṇaḥ / pradakṣiṇīkṛteśānam utsaṅge praṇato 'grahīt // 8.7.198	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
nītvā saṃsthāpayām āsa tasminn ṛṣabha parvate / svasiddhyā tatkṣaṇenaiva yayau cādarśanaṃ tataḥ // 8.7.199	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sūryaprabhasya cātrasthasyāyayuḥ svavayasyakāḥ / kāmacūḍāmaṇimukhā bhāryā vidyādharādhipāḥ // 8.7.200	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
sendrāś ca devā asurāḥ samayādyā maharṣayaḥ / śrutaśarmā sumeruś ca sa suvāsakumārakaḥ // 8.7.201	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sūryaprabhaś ca sarvāṃs tāny athocitam amānayat / uktarudrādivṛttāntam abhyanandaṃś ca te 'pi tam // 8.7.202	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha vividhauṣadhisahitaṃ nadīnadāmbhodhitīrthasaṃbhūtam / maṇikanakamayaiḥ kumbhaiḥ svayam āninyur jalaṃ prabhāsādyāḥ // 8.7.203	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
tāvad gaurīsahito bhagavān atrāyayau purārātiḥ / devāsuravidyādharanṛpatimaharṣipraṇamyamānāṅghriḥ // 8.7.204	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
sarveṣu teṣu suradānavakhecareṣu puṇyāhaghoṣamukhareṣv akhilair jalais te / sūryaprabhaṃ tam ṛṣayo dyucarādhirājye siṃhāsane sam upaveśitam abhyaṣiñcan // 8.7.205	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
babandha paṭṭaṃ mukuṭaṃ ca tasya sa prahṛṣya vijñānamayo mayāsuraḥ / nanāda tūryaiḥ saha devadundubhir varāpsaronṛttapuraḥ saro divi // 8.7.206	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
tāṃ ca maharṣisamūhaḥ sa kāmacūḍāmaṇiṃ samabhiṣicya / sūryaprabhasya vidadhe tasya samucitāṃ mahādevīm // 8.7.207	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
tato gateṣu tridaśāsureṣu sūryaprabho bandhusuhṛdvayasyaiḥ / sahātra vidyādharacakravartī mahābhiṣekotsavam ātatāna // 8.7.208	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
dinaiś ca vedyardhakam uttaraṃ tad dattvā haroktaṃ śrutaśarmaṇe saḥ / anyāḥ priyāḥ prāpya samaṃ vayasyair bheje ciraṃ khecararājalakṣmīm // 8.7.209	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
evaṃ haraprasādaprabhāvataḥ prāpi mānuṣeṇāpi / sūryaprabheṇa pūrvaṃ vidyādharacakravartitvam // 8.7.210	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
iti vidyādharadhuryo vyākhyāya kathāṃ sa vatsarājāgre / vajraprabhaḥ praṇamya ca naravāhanadattam udyayau gaganam // 8.7.211	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
tasmin gate ca naravāhanadattadevo devyā svayā madanamañcukayā sametaḥ / vatseśvarasya pitur āsta gṛhe sa vīro vidyādharendrapadalābham udīkṣamāṇaḥ // 8.7.212	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
idaṃ gurugirīndrajāpraṇayamandarāndolanāt purā kila kathāmṛtaṃ haramukhāmbudher udgatam / prasahya rasayanti ye vigatavighnalabdharddhayo dhuraṃ dadhati vaibudhīṃ bhuvi bhavaprasādena te // 9.0.1	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
niśumbhabharanamrūrvīkharvitāḥ parvatā api / yaṃ namantīva nṛtyantaṃ namāmas taṃ vināyakam // 9.1.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ vatseśvarasutaḥ kauśāmbyāṃ bhavane pituḥ / vasan vidyadharādhīśair ādāv eva kṛtānatiḥ // 9.1.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
naravāhanadattaḥ sa kadācin mṛgayāgataḥ / viveśa gomukhasakho muktasainyo mahad dhanam // 9.1.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
sa tatra dakṣiṇenākṣṇā sphuratoktaśubhāgamaḥ / divyavīṇāravonmiśram aśṛṇod ītaniḥsvanam // 9.1.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā tadanusāreṇa nātidūraṃ dadarśa saḥ / svayaṃbhyāyatanaṃ śaivaṃ saṃyatāśvo viveśa ca // 9.1.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatropavīṇayantīṃ ca deveśaṃ devakanyakām / apaśyad varakanyābhir bahvībhiḥ parivāritām // 9.1.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā dṛṣṭā tasya hṛdayaṃ prasaratkāntinirjharā / indumūrtir ivāmbhodheḥ kṣobhayām āsa tatkṣaṇam // 9.1.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpi taṃ sarasasnigdhamugdhenālokya cakṣuṣā / tad ekagatacittābhūd vismṛtasvarasāraṇā // 9.1.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
naravāhanadattasya cittajño gomukhas tataḥ / keyaṃ kasya sutā ceti yāvat pṛcchati tatsakhīḥ // 9.1.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca sadṛśī tasyāḥ pūrvaṃ hemāruṇaprabhā / paścād avatatāraikā prauḍhā vidyādharī divaḥ // 9.1.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā cāvatīrya kanyāyās tasyāḥ pārśva upāviśat / kanyāpy utthāya sā tasyāḥ pādayor apatat tadā // 9.1.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sarvavidyādharādhīśaṃ nirvighnaṃ patim āpnuhi / iti prauḍhāpi sā tasyāḥ kanyāyā āśiṣaṃ dadau // 9.1.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
naravāhanadatto 'tha tām upetya praṇamya ca / dattāśiṣaṃ paryapṛcchat saumyāṃ vidyādharīṃ śanaiḥ // 9.1.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
keyaṃ kanyā bhavaty amba tava kā kathyatām iti / tato vidyādharī sā tam uvāca śṛṇu vacmy adaḥ // 9.1.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asti gaurīguroḥ śaile śrīsundarapuraṃ puram / āste 'laṃkāraśīlākhyas tatra vidyādhareśvaraḥ // 9.1.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyodāraguṇasyāsti mahiṣī kāñcanaprabhā / tasyāṃ tasya ca kālena rājñaḥ sūnur ajāyata // 9.1.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
eṣa dharmaparo bhāvīty ādiṣṭam umayā yadā / svapne tadā dharmaśīlaṃ nāmnā tam akarot pitā // 9.1.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
krameṇa yauvanaprāptaṃ dharmaśīlaṃ sa taṃ sutam / rājā saṃyojya vidyābhir yauvarājye 'bhiṣiktavān // 9.1.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa yauvarājyastho dharmaikaparamo vaśī / arañjayad dharmaśīlaḥ pitur abhyadhikaṃ prajāḥ // 9.1.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
tato 'laṃkāraśīlasya rājñaḥ sā kāñcanaprabhā / antarvatnī satī rājñī tasya sūte sma kanyakām // 9.1.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
naravāhanadattasya bhāryaiṣā cakravartinaḥ / kanyā bhavitrīti tadā divyā vāgudaghoṣayat // 9.1.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tato 'tra tenālaṃkāravatīti kṛtanāmikā / pitrā krameṇāvardhiṣṭa bālā śaktikaleva sā // 9.1.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kālena yauvanasthā ca prāptavidyā nijātpituḥ / tattadāyatanaṃ śaṃbhorbhaktyā bhramitumudyatā // 9.1.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca dharmaśīlo 'sya bhrātā śānto yuvāpi san / raho 'laṃkāraśīlaṃ taṃ pitaraṃ svaṃ vyajijñapat // 9.1.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na māṃ bhogā ime tāta prīṇanti kṣaṇabhaṅgurāḥ / kiṃ tadasti hi saṃsāre paryantavirasaṃ na yat // 9.1.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathā caitattvayā kiṃ na śrutaṃ vyāsamunervacaḥ / sarve kṣayāntā nicayāḥ patanāntāḥ samucchrayāḥ // 9.1.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
saṃyogā viprayogāntā maraṇāntaṃ hi jīvitam / tadeṣu kā ratistāta naśvareṣu manasvinām // 9.1.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
paratra ca sahāyānti na bhogā nārthasaṃcayāḥ / ekastu bāndhavo dharmo na jahāti padātpadam // 9.1.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmādvanāya gatvāhaṃ sādhayāmyuttamaṃ tapaḥ / āsādayeyaṃ tad yena śāśvataṃ paramaṃ padam // 9.1.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ity uktavantaṃ taṃ putraṃ dharmaśīlaṃ samākulaḥ / rājālaṃkāraśīlo 'tha vakti smodaśrulocanaḥ // 9.1.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
bālasyaiva tavākāṇḍe ko 'yaṃ putra matibhramaḥ / upayukte hi tāruṇye praśamaḥ sadbhir iṣyate // 9.1.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtadārasya dharmeṇa rājyaṃ pālayatastava / bhogān bhoktum ayaṃ kālo na vairāgyasya sāṃpratam // 9.1.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etatpiturvacaḥ śrutvā dharmaśīlo 'bhyadhātpunaḥ / na śamāśamayor atra niyamo 'sti vayaḥkṛtaḥ // 9.1.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
īśvarānugṛhīto hi kaścidbālo 'pi śāmyati / vṛddho 'pi na śamaṃ yāti kaś citkāpuruṣaḥ punaḥ // 9.1.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na ca rājye ratirme 'sti na vā dāraparigrahe / mamaitajīvitaphalaṃ yacchivārādhanaṃ tapaḥ // 9.1.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
iti bruvāṇaṃ yatnenāpyanivāryamavekṣya tam / pitālaṃkāraśīlo 'sau vimucyāśrūṇyabhāṣata // 9.1.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
yadi yūno 'pi te putra vairāgyam idamīdṛśam / nāsti vṛddhasya me tatkimaham apy āśraye vanam // 9.1.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā martyalokaṃ ca gatvā bhārāyutaṃ dadau / brāhmaṇebhyo daridrebhyo ratnānāṃ kāñcanasya ca // 9.1.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etya ca svapuraṃ bhāryāmavocatkāñcanaprabhām / tvayā madājñayehaiva sthātavyaṃ nagare nije // 9.1.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rakṣālaṃkāravatyeṣā kanyā pūrṇe ca vatsare / asti vaivāhalagno 'syāstithāvadyatane śubhaḥ // 9.1.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
naravāhanadattāya dāsyāmyetāmahaṃ tadā / sa cakravartī jāmātā pāsyatīdaṃ puraṃ ca naḥ // 9.1.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ity uktvā dattaśapathāṃ bhāryāṃ rājā nivartya saḥ / sasutāṃ vilapantīṃ tāṃ saputraḥ śiśriye vanam // 9.1.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā tu svapuramadhyāsta tadbhāryā kāñcanaprabhā / duhitrā saha sādhvī strī bhartrājñāṃ kā hi laṅghayet // 9.1.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatsutātha tayā mātrā saha snehānuyātayā / alaṃkāravatī bhrāntā bahūnyāyatanāni ca // 9.1.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā tāṃ ca vakti sma vidyā prajñaptisaṃjñikā / kaśmīreṣu svayaṃbhūni gatvā kṣetrāṇi pūjaya // 9.1.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
naravāhanadattaṃ hi nirvighnaṃ taṃ patiṃ tataḥ / sarvavidyādharendraikacakravartinamāpsyasi // 9.1.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktā vidyayā gatvā kaśmīrānsā samātṛkā / alaṃkāravatī śaṃbhuṃ puṇyakṣetreṣv apūjayat // 9.1.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nandikṣetre mahādevagirāvamaraparvate / sureśvaryādriṣu tathā vijaye kapaṭeśvare // 9.1.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
evamādiṣu saṃpūjya kṣetreṣu girijāpatim / vidyādharendrakanyā sā tanmātā cāgate gṛhān // 9.1.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāmetāṃ viddhyalaṃkāravatīṃ subhaga kanyakām / tāṃ ca mātarametasyā viddhi māṃ kāñcanaprabhām // 9.1.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adya caiṣā mamānuktvaivāgatemaṃ śivālayam / tataḥ prajñaptividyāto vijñāyāhamihāgatā // 9.1.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tanmukhādeva ca jñātastvamapīhāgato mayā / tadetāṃ devatādiṣṭām upayacchasva me sutām // 9.1.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātaś ca so 'syāḥ pitroktaḥ prāpto vaivāhavāsaraḥ / tadadya putra kauśāmbīṃ svām eva nagarīṃ vraja // 9.1.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
āvāmitaś ca gacchāvaḥ prātaretya tapovanāt / rājālaṃkāraśīlas te dāsyatyetāṃ sutāṃ svayam // 9.1.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ tayokte 'laṃkāravatyās tasyāś ca tasya ca / naravāhanadattasya kāpyavasthā dvayor abhūt // 9.1.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyonyarajanīmātraviśleṣāsahanātmanoḥ / cakrāhvayor ivāsanne dinānte sāśrunetrayoḥ // 9.1.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvā tau tādṛśau dvāvapyavādītkāñcanaprabhā / kimekarātriviśleṣe hy adhair yaṃ yuvayor idam // 9.1.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aniścitāvadhiṃ dhīrāḥ sahante virahaṃ ciram / śrūyatāṃ rāmabhadrasya sītādevyās tathā kathā // 9.1.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājño daśarathasyāsīdayodhyādhipateḥ sutaḥ / rāmo bharataśatrughnalakṣmaṇānāṃ purāgrajaḥ // 9.1.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
viṣṇoravatatārāṃśo rāvaṇocchedanāya yaḥ / sītā tasyābhavadbhāryā prāṇeśā janakātmajā // 9.1.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa pitrā bharatanyastarāyena vidhiyogataḥ / preṣito 'bhūdvanaṃ sākaṃ sītayā lakṣmaṇena ca // 9.1.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tasyāharatsītāṃ māyayā rāvaṇaḥ priyām / nināya ca purīṃ laṅkāṃ pathi hatvā jaṭāyuṣam // 9.1.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa rāmo virahī sugrīvaṃ vālino vadhāt / svīkṛtya mārutiṃ preṣya tatpravṛttimabudhyata // 9.1.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā ca sāgare setuṃ baddhvā hatvā ca rāvaṇam / laṅkāṃ vibhīṣaṇe nyasya sītāṃ pratyājahāra saḥ // 9.1.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athāvṛttasya vanataḥ śāsato bharatārpitam / tasya rājyamayodhyāyāṃ sītā garbhamadhatta sā // 9.1.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac cātra prajāceṣṭāṃ jñātumalpaparicchadaḥ / svair aṃ paribhramannekaṃ so 'paśyatpuruṣaṃ prabhuḥ // 9.1.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
has te gṛhītvā gṛhiṇīṃ nirasyantaṃ nijād gṛhāt / parasyeyaṃ gṛhamagāditi doṣānukīrtanāt // 9.1.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
rakṣogṛhoṣitā sītā rāmadevena nojjhitā / ayam abhyadhiko yo māmujjhati jñātiveśmagām // 9.1.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti tadgṛhiṇīṃ tāṃ ca bruvatīṃ taṃ nijaṃ patim / rāmo rājā sa śuśrāva khinnaścābhyantaraṃ yayau // 9.1.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
lokāpavādabhītaś ca sītāṃ tatyāja tāṃ vane / sahate virahakleśaṃ yaśasvī nāyaśaḥ punaḥ // 9.1.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā ca garbhālasā daivādvālmīkeḥ prāpadāśramam / tenarṣiṇā samāśvāsya tatraiva grāhitā sthitim // 9.1.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nūnaṃ sītā sadoṣeyaṃ tyaktā bhartrānyathā katham / tadetaddarśanānnityaṃ pāpaṃ saṃkrāmatīha naḥ // 9.1.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vālmīkaḥ kṛpayā caināṃ nirvāsayati nāśramāt / etaddarśanajaṃ pāpaṃ tapasā ca vyapohati // 9.1.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadeta yāvad gacchāmo dvitīyaṃ kaṃcid āśramam / iti saṃmantrayāmāsustatrānye munayastadā // 9.1.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadbuddhvā tānsa vālmīkirabravīnnātra saṃśayaḥ / śuddhaiṣā prāṇidhānena mayā dṛṣṭā dvijā iti // 9.1.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathāpyapratyayasteṣāṃ yadā sīta tadābhyadhāt / bhagavanto yathā vittha tathā śodhayateha mām // 9.1.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśuddhāyāḥ śiraśchedanigrahaḥ kriyatāṃ mama / tac chrutvā jātakaruṇā jagadurmunayo 'tra te // 9.1.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
astyatra ṭīṭibhasaronāma tīrthaṃ mahadvane / ṭīṭibhī hi purā kāpi bhartrānyāsaṅgaśaṅkinā // 9.1.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
mithyaiva dūṣitā sādhvī cakrandāśaraṇā bhuvam / lokapālāṃś ca taistasyāḥ śuddhyarthaṃ tadvinirmitam // 9.1.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatraiṣā rāghavavadhūḥ pariśuddhiṃ karotu naḥ / ity uktavadbhis taiḥ sākaṃ jānakī tatsaro yayau // 9.1.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
yady āryaputrād anyatra na svapne 'pi mano mama / taduttareyaṃ sarasaḥ pāramamba vasuṃdhare // 9.1.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
ity uktvaiva praviṣṭā ca tasminsarasi sā satī / nītā ca pāramutsaṅge kṛtvāvirbhūtayā bhuvā // 9.1.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatastāṃ te mahāsādhvīṃ praṇemurmunayo 'khilāḥ / rāghavaṃ śaptum aicchaṃś ca tatparityāgamanyunā // 9.1.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yuṣmābhir āryaputrasya na dhyātavyamamaṅgalam / śaptumarhatha mām eva pāpāmañjalireṣa vaḥ // 9.1.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti yadvārayām āsa sītā tānsā pativratā / tena te munayas tuṣṭās tasyāḥ putrāśiṣaṃ daduḥ // 9.1.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sā tatra tiṣṭhantī samaye suṣuve sutam / taṃ ca nāmnā lavaṃ cakre sa vālmīkimuniḥ śiśum // 9.1.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bālam ādāya taṃ tasyāṃ gatāyāṃ snātum ekadā / tena śūnyaṃ taduṭajaṃ dṛṣṭvā so 'cintayanmuniḥ // 9.1.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
sthāpayitvārbhakaṃ yāti snātuṃ sā tat kva so 'rbhakaḥ / nītaḥ sa śvāpadeneha nūnam anyaṃ sṛjāmi tat // 9.1.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
snātvāgatānyathā sītā na prāṇāndhārayediha / iti dhyātvā kuśaiḥ kṛtvā pavitraṃ nirmame 'rbhakam // 9.1.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
lavasya sadṛśaṃ taṃ ca sa tathāsthāpayanmuniḥ / āgatā taṃ ca sā dṛṣṭvā muniṃ sītā vyajijñapat // 9.1.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svako 'yaṃ me sthito bālastadeṣo 'nyaḥ kuto mune / tac chrutvā sa yathāvṛttamuktvā munir uvāca tām // 9.1.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhavitavyaṃ gṛhāṇaitaṃ dvitīyamanaghe sutam / kuśasaṃjñaṃ mayāyaṃ yatsvaprabhāvātkuśaiḥ kṛtaḥ // 9.1.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktā tena muninā sītā lavakuśau sutau / tenaiva kṛtasaṃskārau vardhayām āsa tatra tau // 9.1.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
bālāveva ca tau divyamastragrāmamavāpatuḥ / vidyāś ca sarvā vālmīkamuneḥ kṣatrakumārakau // 9.1.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ekadā āśramamṛgaṃ hatvā tanmāṃsamādatuḥ / arcāliṅgaṃ ca vālmīkeścakratuḥ krīḍanīyakam // 9.1.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena khinno muniḥ so 'tha sītādevyānunāthitaḥ / prāyaścittaṃ tayor evamādideśa kumārayoḥ // 9.1.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā kuberasarasaḥ svarṇapadmānyayaṃ lavaḥ / tadudyānāc ca mandārapuṣpāṇyānayatu drutam // 9.1.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tair etau bhrātarāv etalliṅgam arcayatām ubhau / tenaitayor idaṃ pāpam upaśāntiṃ gamiṣyati // 9.1.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvaiva kailāsaṃ sa bālo 'pi lavo yayau / ācaskanda kuberasya saraścopavanaṃ ca tat // 9.1.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nihatya yakṣān ādāya padmāni kusumāni ca / āgacchan pathi sa śrānto viśaśrāma tarostale // 9.1.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
atrāntare ca rāmasya naramedhe sulakṣaṇam / cinvan puruṣam āgacchat tena mārgeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ // 9.1.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa lavaṃ samarāhūtaṃ mohanāstreṇa mohitam / kṣatradharmeṇa baddhvā tamayodhyāmanayatpurīm // 9.1.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca sītām āśvāsya lavāgamanaduḥsthitām / vālmīkaḥ svāśrame tatra jñānī kuśam abhāṣata // 9.1.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
nīto 'yodhyāmavaṣṭabhya lakṣmaṇena suto lavaḥ / gaccha mocaya taṃ tasmādebhir astrair vinirjitāt // 9.1.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā dattadivyāstrastena gatvā kuśas tataḥ / rodhyamānāmayodhyāyāṃ yajñabhūmiṃ rurodha saḥ // 9.1.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jigāya lakṣmaṇaṃ cātra tannimittaṃ pradhāvitam / yuddhe divyair mahāstraistaistato rāmastamabhyagāt // 9.1.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi prabhāvād vālmīker jetuṃ nāstraiḥ śaśāka tam / kuśaṃ yattena papraccha ko 'rthas te ko bhavāniti // 9.1.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kuśas tato 'bravīd baddhvā lakṣmaṇenāgrajo mama / ānīta iha tasyāhaṃ mocanārthamihāgataḥ // 9.1.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āvāṃ lavakuśau rāmatanayāviti jānakī / mātā nau vakti cety uktvā tadvṛttāntaṃ śaśaṃsa saḥ // 9.1.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sabāṣpo rāmastaṃ lavamānāyya tāvubhau / kaṇṭhe jagrāha saiṣo 'haṃ pāpo rāma iti bruvan // 9.1.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha sītāṃ praśaṃsatsu vīrau paśyatsu tau śiśū / paureṣu militeṣv atra sa tau rāmo 'grahītsutau // 9.1.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ānāyya sītādevīṃ ca vālmīker āśramāt tataḥ / tayā saha sukhaṃ tasthau putranyastabharo 'tha saḥ // 9.1.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ sahante virahaṃ dhīrāściramapīdṛśam / na sahethe yuvāṃ putrau kathamekām apikṣapām // 9.1.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityātmajāmalaṃkāravatīṃ pariṇayotsukām / naravāhanadattaṃ ca tamuktvā kāñcanaprabhā // 9.1.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nabhasā prātarāgantumagādādāya tāṃ sutām / naravāhanadatto 'pi kauśāmbīṃ vimanā yayau // 9.1.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrānidraṃ niśi smāha gomukhastaṃ vinodayan / pṛthvīrūpakathāṃ deva śṛṇvimāṃ kasthayāmi te // 9.1.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asti nāmnā pratiṣṭhānaṃ nagaraṃ dakṣiṇāpathe / pṛthvīrūpābhidhāno 'bhūdrājā tatrātirūpavān // 9.1.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ parijñāninau jātu śramaṇo dvāvupeyatuḥ / vilokyādbhutarūpaṃ ca tāvevaṃ nṛpamūcatuḥ // 9.1.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
devāvāṃ pṛthivīṃ bhrāntau na ca rūpeṇa te samam / anyaṃ pumāṃsaṃ nārīṃ vā dṛṣṭavantau kva citprabho // 9.1.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kiṃ tu muktipuradvīpe rājño rūpadharasya yā / asti hemalatādevyāṃ jātā rūpalatā sutā // 9.1.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

iti śramaṇavākyena samaṃ madanasāyakāḥ / praviśya śrutimārgeṇa rājñas tasyālagan hṛdi // 9.1.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ samutsuko rājā nijaṃ citrakarottamam / kumāridattanāmānāṃ pṛthvīrūpaḥ samādiśat // 9.1.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
paṭe yathāvallikhitāṃ samādāya madākṛtim / etābhyāṃ saha bhikṣubhyāṃ dvīpaṃ muktipuraṃ vraja // 9.1.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra rūpadharākhyasya rājñas tadduhitus tathā / yuktyā rūpalatāyāstvaṃ madākāraṃ pradarśaya // 9.1.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
paśya kiṃ sa nṛpastāṃ me dadāti tanayāṃ na vā / tāṃ ca rūpalatāṃ citre likhitvā tvamihānaya // 9.1.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktvābhilekhyaṃ svaṃ rūpaṃ citrapaṭe sa tam / sabhikṣukaṃ citrakaraṃ dvīpaṃ taṃ prāhiṇonnṛpaḥ // 9.1.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
te ca kramāccitrakaraśramaṇāḥ prasthitās tataḥ / prāpuḥ patrapuraṃ nāma nagaraṃ vāridhestaṭe // 9.1.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ pravahaṇārūḍhā gatvaivāmbudhivartmanā / te taṃ muktipuradvīpamavāpuḥ pañcabhir dinaiḥ // 9.1.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra citrakaro gatvā rājadvāri sa cīrikām / mama citrakarastulyo nānyo 'stītyudalambayat // 9.1.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadbuddhvaiva samāhūto rājñā rūpadhareṇa saḥ / praviśya rājabhavanaṃ taṃ praṇamya vyajijñapat // 9.1.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
pṛthvīṃ bhrāntvā mayā deva na dṛṣṭaścitrakṛtsamaḥ / taddevāsuramartyānāmālikhāmi kamādiśa // 9.1.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvānāyya nṛpatiḥ sa tāṃ rūpalatāṃ puraḥ / imāmālikhya matputrīṃ darśayetyādideśa tam // 9.1.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ kumāridattaḥ sa citrakṛdrājakanyakām / ālikhya darśayām āsa tadrūpām eva tāṃ paṭe // 9.1.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha rūpadharo rājā tuṣṭo matvā vicakṣaṇam / pṛcchati sma sa taṃ citrakaraṃ jāmātṛlipsayā // 9.1.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhadra pṛthvī tvayā bhrāntā tadbrūhi yadi kutracit / rūpe madduhitustulyā dṛṣṭā strī puruṣo 'pi vā // 9.1.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktastena rājñā sa citrakṛtpratyuvāca tam / naitattulyā mayā dṛṣṭā nārī kāpyathavā pumān // 9.1.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tac chrutvā kiṃ paṭaḥ so 'stīty uktastena sa bhūbhṛtā / astīty uktvā ca taṃ citrakaraḥ paṭamadarśayat // 9.1.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra dṛṣṭvā sa tadrūpaṃ pṛthvīrūpasya bhūpateḥ / rājā rūpadharo dadhne vismayāghūrṇitaṃ śiraḥ // 9.1.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jagāda ca vayaṃ dhanyā yair atra likhito 'py ayam / dṛṣṭo rājā namastebhyaḥ sākṣātpaśyanti ye tvamum // 9.1.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etatpitṛvacaḥ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā citre ca taṃ nṛpam / sotkā rūpalatā nānyacchuśrāva na dadarśa ca // 9.1.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāṃ māramohitāṃ dṛṣṭvā sutāṃ sa nṛpatistadā / kumāridattaṃ taṃ citrakaraṃ rūpadharo 'bhyadhāt // 9.1.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)

tac chrutvā kupito rājā pṛthvīrūpaḥ pradhāvya saḥ / jaghāna senāṃ bhillānāṃ kauravāṇāmivārjunaḥ // 9.1.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)

aśokamālādehaṃ ca nītvā vidyāprabhāvataḥ / adṛśyam eva cikṣepa gaṅgāyāmānṛśaṃsyataḥ // 9.2.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

naravāhanadattaṃ ca natvā taṃ bhāvinaṃ prabhum / svakāryasiddhaye prāyādutpatya sa nabhas tataḥ // 9.2.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vismiteṣv atha sarveṣu prasaṅgād atra gomukhaḥ / anaṅgaratisaṃbaddhāmimāmakathayatkathām // 9.2.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asti śūrapuraṃ nāma yathārthaṃ nagaraṃ bhuvi / mahāvarāha ityāsīdrājā tatrātidurmadaḥ // 9.2.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gauryārādhanatas tasya devyāṃ padmaratau sutā / jajñe 'naṅgaratir nāma bhūpasyānanyasaṃtateḥ // 9.2.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kālena yauvanārūḍhā sā ca rūpābhimāninī / necchati sma patiṃ kaṃcidyācamāneṣu rājasu // 9.2.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yaḥ śūro rūpavānekaṃ vijñānaṃ vetti śobhanam / tasmai mayātmā dātavya ity uvāca tu niścayāt // 9.2.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
atha tatrāyayurvīrāścatvāro dakṣiṇāpathāt / tatprepsavaḥ śrutodantāstadīpsitaguṇānvitāḥ // 9.2.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dvāḥsthair āveditāṃs tāṃś ca praviṣṭān pṛcchati sma saḥ / mahāvarāho nṛpatir anaṅgaratisaṃnidhau // 9.2.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
nāma kiṃ kasya yuṣmākaṃ jātirvijñānam eva ca / etadrājavacaḥ śrutvā teṣvekastaṃ vyajijñapat // 9.2.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pañcapaṭṭikanāmāhaṃ śūdro vijñānamasti me / vayāmi pratyahaṃ pañca paṭṭikāyugalāni yat // 9.2.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tebhya ekaṃ prayacchāmi brāhmaṇāya dadāmi ca / dvitīyaṃ parameśāya tṛtīyaṃ ca vase svayam // 9.2.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
caturthaṃ me bhavedbhāryā yadi tasyai dadāmi tat / śarīrayātrāṃ vikrīya pañcamena karomy aham // 9.2.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
atha dvitīyo 'pyācakhyāvahaṃ bhāṣājñasaṃjñakaḥ / vaiśyo rutaṃ vijānāmi sarveṣāṃ mṛgapakṣiṇām // 9.2.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatastṛtīyo 'yavadadahaṃ khaḍgadharābhidhaḥ / kṣatriyaḥ khaḍgayuddhena jīye nānyena kenacit // 9.2.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
caturthaścābravījjīvadattākhyo 'haṃ dvijottamaḥ / gauriprasādavidyābhyāṃ jīvayāmi mṛtāṃ striyam // 9.2.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktavatāṃ śeṣāṃ śūdraviṭkṣatriyāstrayaḥ / rūpaṃ śauryaṃ balaṃ caiva śaśaṃsuḥ pṛthagātmanaḥ // 9.2.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
brāhmaṇo rūpavarjaṃ tu balavīryaṃ śaśaṃsa saḥ / tato mahāvarāhaḥ svaṃ kṣattāramavadannṛpaḥ // 9.2.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nītvā viśramayaitāṃstvaṃ saṃprati svagṛhe 'khilān / tac chrutvā sa tathety uktvā kṣattā tānānayadgṛham // 9.2.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'bravītsa rājā tāmanaṅgaratimātmajām / eṣāṃ caturṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ putri ko 'bhimatastava // 9.2.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
śrutvaitatpitaraṃ taṃ sā prāhānaṅgaratistadā / caturṇām apitātaiṣāṃ na ko 'py abhimato mama // 9.2.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śūdraś ca vayakaścaikaḥ kriyate tasya kiṃ guṇaiḥ / vaiśyo dvitīyaḥ pakṣyādirutair jñātaiś ca tasya kim // 9.2.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tābhyāṃ kathamahaṃ dadyāmātmānaṃ kṣatriyā satī / tṛtīyastulyavarṇo me bhavati kṣatriyo guṇī // 9.2.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ tu sevopajīvī sa daridraḥ prāṇavikrayī / pṛthvīpatisutā bhūtvā kathaṃ syāṃ tasya gehinī // 9.2.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
caturtho brāhmaṇo jīvadatto 'py abhimato na me / sa virūpo vikarmasthaḥ patito vedavarjitaḥ // 9.2.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa te daṇḍayituṃ yuktaḥ kiṃ nu tasmai dadāsi mām / varṇāśramāṇāṃ dharmasya rājā tvaṃ tāta rakṣitā // 9.2.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
khaḍgaśūrāc ca nṛpaterdharmaśūraḥ praśasyate / khaḍgaśūrasahasrāṇāṃ dharmaśūro bhavetpatiḥ // 9.2.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityādyuktavatīm etāṃ sutām antaḥpuraṃ nijam / visṛjya ca samuttasthau snānādyarthaṃ sa bhūpatiḥ // 9.2.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dvitīye 'hni ca te vīrā gṛhātkṣatturvinirgatāḥ / babhramurnagare tatra catvaro 'pi sakautukāḥ // 9.2.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca padmakavalo nāmātra vyalavāraṇaḥ / bhagnālāno janaṃ mathnañ śālāyā niragān madāt // 9.2.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'py adhāvac ca tān dṛṣṭvā vīrān hantuṃ mahāgajaḥ / te cāpi tasyābhimukhaṃ prādhāvann udyatāyudhāḥ // 9.2.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tataḥ khaḍgadharākhyo yastanmadhye kṣatriyaḥ sa tān / anyānnivārya trīn eko gajamabhyāpapāta tam // 9.2.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
lulāva ca karaṃ tasya garjato 'graprasāritam / ekenāpi prahāreṇa visakandāvahelayā // 9.2.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
padamadhye ca nirgatya darśayitvā ca lāghavam / prahāraṃ pradadau pṛṣṭhe dvitīyaṃ tasya dantinaḥ // 9.2.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tṛtīyena ca ciccheda tasya pādāvubhāvapi / tato muktāraṭir hastī papāta ca mamāra ca // 9.2.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ dṛṣṭvā vikramaṃ tasya janaḥ sarvo visismiye / rājā mahāvarāhastadbuddhvā citrīyate sma ca // 9.2.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyedyuḥ sa gajārūḍho mṛgayāyai nṛpo yayau / vīrāḥ khaḍgadharādyās te catvāro 'pi tam anvaguḥ // 9.2.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra vyāghramṛgakroḍān sasainye rājñi nighnati / adhāvan kupitāḥ siṃhāḥ śrutavāraṇabṛṃhitāḥ // 9.2.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhyāpatantamekaṃ ca siṃhaṃ khaḍgadharo 'tha saḥ / ekena tīkṣṇanistriṃśaprahāreṇa dvidhākarot // 9.2.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dvitīyaṃ ca gṛhītvaiva caraṇe vāmapāṇinā / āsphoṭya bhūtale siṃhaṃ cakāra gatajīvitam // 9.2.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhāṣājño jīvadattaś ca pañcapaṭṭika eva ca / ekaikaḥ siṃhamekaikaṃ tathaivāsphoṭayadbhuvi // 9.2.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ krameṇa te rājñaḥ paśyataḥ pādacāribhiḥ / līlayā bahavo vīraiḥ siṃhavyāghrādayo hatāḥ // 9.2.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ savismayastuṣṭaḥ kṛtākheṭaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ / viveśa svapuraṃ te 'pi vīrāḥ kṣatturgṛhaṃ yayuḥ // 9.2.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca rājñā praviśyāntaḥpuraṃ śrānto 'pi tatkṣaṇam / tatraivānāyayām āsa tāmanaṅgaratiṃ sutām // 9.2.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ākhyāya teṣāṃ vīrāṇāmekaikasya parākramam / ākheṭake yathādṛṣṭaṃ tām uvācātivismitām // 9.2.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
pañcapaṭṭikabhāṣājñāvasavarṇāvubhau yadi / vipro 'pi jīvadattaścedrūpahīno vikarmakṛt // 9.2.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkṣitriyasya doṣo 'sti tasya khaḍgadharasya kaḥ / supramāṇasurūpasya balavikramaśālinaḥ // 9.2.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yena hastī hatas tādṛg yaḥ pinaṣṭi ca bhūtale / gṛhītvā pādataḥ siṃhān khaḍgenānyān nihanti ca // 9.2.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
daridraḥ sevakaśceti doṣastasyocyate yadi / ahaṃ taṃ sevyamanyeṣāṃ kariṣyāmīśvaraṃ kṣaṇāt // 9.2.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tattaṃ vṛṇīṣva bhartāraṃ yadi te putri rocate / ity uktā tena sānaṅgaratiḥ pitrā jagāda tam // 9.2.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tarhyānīteṣu sarveṣu teṣu vīreṣviha tvayā / gaṇakaḥ pṛcchyatāṃ tāvat paśyāmaḥ kiṃ bravīti saḥ // 9.2.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ tayoktaḥ sa nṛpo vīrānānāyya tatra tān / tatsaṃnidhau sānurodhaḥ papraccha gaṇakaṃ svayam // 9.2.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
paśyāsnaṅgaratereṣāṃ madhyātkena samaṃ mithaḥ / astyānukūlyaṃ lagnaś ca bhavettasyāḥ kadā śubhaḥ // 9.2.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tac chrutvā pṛṣṭanakṣatras teṣāṃ sa gaṇakottamaḥ / gaṇayitvā ciraṃ kālaṃ rājānaṃ tam abhāṣata // 9.2.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na cetkupyasi me devaṃ sphuṭaṃ vijñāpayāmi tat / asti tvadduhiturnaiṣāmekenāpyanukūlatā // 9.2.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na cehāsti vivāho 'syā eṣā śāpacyutātra yat / vidyādharī sa śāpo 'syāstribhir māsair nivartsyati // 9.2.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmānmāsatrayaṃ tāvat pratīkṣantāmamī iha / naiṣāṃ svalokaṃ yātā cettata etadbhaviṣyati // 9.2.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
etanmauhūrtikasyāsya vacaḥ sarve 'pi tatra te / śraddadhus tatra caivāsanvīrā māsatrayāvadhi // 9.2.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gate māsatraye rājā tān vīrān gaṇakaṃ ca tam / svāgramānāyayām āsa tām anaṅgaratiṃ ca saḥ // 9.2.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvā cādhikasaundaryāmakasmāttaṃ sutāṃ nṛpaḥ / jaharṣa gaṇakastāṃ tu prāptakālām amanyata // 9.2.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
idānīṃ brūhi yadyuktaṃ te hi māsāstrayo gatāḥ / iti yāvac ca taṃ rājā gaṇakaṃ pṛcchati sma saḥ // 9.2.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvajjātiṃ nijāṃ smṛtvā sānaṅgaratirānanam / ācchādya svottarīyeṇa mānuṣīṃ tāṃ tanuṃ jahau // 9.2.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evameṣā sthitā kiṃsviditi rājñā svayaṃ mukham / yāvaduddhāṭyate tasyās tāvat sā dadṛśe mṛtā // 9.2.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vyāvṛttanetrabhramarā vivarṇavadanāmbujā / haṃsamañjusvanonmuktā padminīva himāhatā // 9.2.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa sadyas tacchokavajrapātāhato bhuvi / bhūbhṛtpapāta niśceṣṭaḥ svapakṣacchedamūrcchitaḥ // 9.2.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājñī padmaratiḥ sāpi vyāmohapatitā yayau / bhraṣṭābharaṇapuṣpā kṣmāmibhabhagneva mañjarī // 9.2.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
muktākrande parijane teṣu vīreṣu duḥkhiṣu / labdhasaṃjñaḥ kṣaṇādrājā jīvadattam uvāca tam // 9.2.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
nātraiṣāṃ śaktir anyeṣām adhunāvasaro 'stu te / pratijñātaṃ tvayā nārīṃ jīvayāmi mṛtāmiti // 9.2.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yadi vidyābalaṃ te 'sti tajjīvaya sutāṃ mama / dāsyāmi tubhyamevaitāsṃ viprāya prāptajīvitām // 9.2.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
iti rājño vacaḥ śrutvā jīvadatto 'bhimantritaiḥ / abhyukṣya toyais tāṃ rājaputrīm āryām imāṃ jagau // 9.2.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
aṭṭāṭṭahāsahasite karaṅkamālākule durāloke / cāmuṇḍe vikarāle sāhāyyaṃ me kuru tvaritam // 9.2.159	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
evaṃ tena kṛte yatne jīvadattena sā yadā / bālā na jīvitaṃ prāpa viṣaṇṇaḥ so 'vadattadā // 9.2.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dattāpi vindhyavāsinyā vidyā me niṣphalā gatā / tadetenopahāsyena kiṃ kāryaṃ jīvitena me // 9.2.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā jīvadattaḥ svaṃ śiraśchettuṃ mahāsinā / yāvat pravartate tāvadudagādbhāratī divaḥ // 9.2.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bho jīvadatta mā kārṣīḥ sāhasaṃ śṛṇu saṃprati / eṣānaṅgaprabhā nāma sadvidyādharakanyakā // 9.2.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pitroḥ śāpena mānuṣyamiyantaṃ kālamāgatā / tyaktvādyaitāṃ tanuṃ yātā svalokaṃ svatanuṃ śritā // 9.2.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadvindhyavāsinīm eva gatvārādhaya tāṃ punaḥ / tatprasādādimāṃ prāpsyasy api vidyādharīṃ satīm // 9.2.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na caiṣā divyabhogasthā śocyā rājño na cāpi te / ity udīrya yathātattvaṃ divyā vāgvirarāma sā // 9.2.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sutāyāḥ saṃskāraṃ kṛtvā rājā jahau śucam / sadāro 'pi yayuste 'nye trayo vīrā yathāgatam // 9.2.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
jīvadattastu jātāstho gatvā tāṃ vindhyavāsinīm / tapasārādhayām āsa svapne sāpy ādideśa tam // 9.2.168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tuṣṭā tavāhamuttiṣṭha śṛṇu cedaṃ bravīmi te / asti vīrapuraṃ nāma nagaraṃ tuhinācale // 9.2.169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidyādharādhirājo 'sti samaro nāma tatra ca / tasyānaṅgavatīdevyāṃ sutānaṅgaprabhājani // 9.2.170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā rūpayauvanotsekā naicchatkaṃcitpatiṃ yadā / tadātidurgrahakruddhau pitarau śapataḥ sma tām // 9.2.171	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mānuṣyaṃ vraja tatrāpi na bhartṛsukhamāpsyasi / kanyeva ṣoḍaśābdā tāṃ tyaktvā tanumihaiṣyasi // 9.2.172	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
martyo virūpo bhāvī ca khaḍgasiddho 'tha te patiḥ / munikanyābhilāṣeṇa śāpānmartyatvamāgataḥ // 9.2.173	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
anicchantīm apitvāṃ ca martyalokaṃ sa neṣyati / tvayā tasya viyogo 'tra bhaviṣyatyanyanītayā // 9.2.174	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pūrvajanmani tenāṣṭau hṛtā hi parayoṣitaḥ / tenāṣṭajanmabhogārhaṃ duḥkhaṃ so 'nubhaviṣyati // 9.2.175	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvaṃ cātra janmany ekasmin naṣṭānām iva janmanām / duḥkhaṃ prāpsyasi vidyānāṃ bhraṃśena manujīkṛtā // 9.2.176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sarvasyaiva hi pāpiṣṭhasaṃparkaḥ pāpabhāgadaḥ / samapāpaḥ punaḥ strīṇāṃ bhartrā pāpena saṃgamaḥ // 9.2.177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
naṣṭasmṛtiḥ patīṃś cātra bahūn prāpsyasi mānuṣān / tvayocitavaradveṣadurgraho vihito yataḥ // 9.2.178	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yo 'yācata samānastvāṃ dyucaro madanaprabhaḥ / bhūtvā sa mānuṣo bhūbhṛdante bhāvī patistava // 9.2.179	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatastvaṃ śāpanirmuktā svalokaṃ punarāgatā / tam eva dyucarībhūtaṃ sasṃprāpsyasyucitaṃ patim // 9.2.180	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
tadevaṃ pitṛśaptā sā bhūtvānaṅgaratiḥ kṣitau / prāptādya pitrornikaṭaṃ jātānaṅgaprabhā punaḥ // 9.2.181	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
ato vīrapuraṃ gatvā jitvā tatpitaraṃ raṇe / jānantam apikaulīnarakṣitaṃ tāmavāpnuhi // 9.2.182	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
imaṃ gṛhāṇa khaḍgaṃ ca yena hastagatena te / gatir bhaviṣyaty ākāśe kiṃ cājeyo bhaviṣyasi // 9.2.183	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ity uktvārpitakhaḍgā sā tasya devī tirodadhe / sa ca prabubudhe divyaṃ khaḍgaṃ has te dadarśa ca // 9.2.184	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athotthāya prahṛṣṭātmā jīvadatto natāmbikaḥ / tatprasādāmṛtāpyāyaśāntāśeṣatapaḥ klamaḥ // 9.2.185	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
khaḍgahastaḥ kham utpatya paribhramya himālayam / prāpa vīrapurasthaṃ taṃ samaraṃ dyucareśvaram // 9.2.186	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena yuddhajitenātra pradattāṃ pariṇīya saḥ / tāmanaṅgaprabhāṃ bheje divyāṃ saṃbhogasaṃpadam // 9.2.187	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṃcitkālaṃ sthitaścātra śvaśuraṃ samaraṃ sa tam / jīvadatto jagādaivaṃ tāṃ cānaṅgaprabhāṃ priyām // 9.2.188	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
manuṣyalokasṃ gacchāvastaṃ pratyutkaṇṭhito 'smi yat / prāṇināṃ hi nikṛṣṭāpi janmabhūmiḥ parā priyā // 9.2.189	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvā vacas tasya śvaśuraḥ so 'nvamanyata / sā tvanaṅgaprabhā kṛcchrādanumene vijānatī // 9.2.190	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athāṅkopāttayā sākamanaṅgaprabhayā tayā / jīvadattaḥ sa nabhasā martyalokamavātarat // 9.2.191	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
dṛṣṭvātra ramyamekaṃ ca parvataṃ sā jagāda tam / śrāntānaṅgaprabhā kṣipramiha viśramyatāmiti // 9.2.192	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tatheti tatraiva so 'vatīrya tayā saha / cakārāhārapānādi tattadvidyāprabhāvataḥ // 9.2.193	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'naṅgaprabhāṃ jīvadatto 'sau vidhicoditaḥ / tām uvāca priye kiṃcinmadhuraṃ gīyatāṃ tvayā // 9.2.194	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā gātumārebhe sā bhaktyā dhūrjaṭeḥ stutim / tena tadgītaśabdena so 'tha nidrāmagāddvijaḥ // 9.2.195	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvadākheṭakaśrānto nirjharāmbhobhilāṣukaḥ / rājā harivaro nāma pathā tena kilāyayau // 9.2.196	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tena gītaśabdena śrutena hariṇo yathā / ākṛṣṭo 'bhyāpatattatra rathamunmucya kevalaḥ // 9.2.197	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śakunaiḥ pūrvamākhyātaśubho 'paśyatsa bhūpatiḥ / tāmanaṅgaprabhāṃ satyāmanaṅgasya prabhāmiva // 9.2.198	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadā tadgītarūpābhyaṃ nītaṃ tasya vihastatām / nirbibheda yathākāmaṃ hṛdayaṃ madanaḥ śaraiḥ // 9.2.199	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpi taṃ vīkṣya sahasā subhagaṃ puṣpadhanvanaḥ / patitā gocare 'naṅgaprabhā kṣaṇamacintayat // 9.2.200	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ko 'yaṃ kimayamunmuktapuṣpacāmo manobhavaḥ / kiṃ mūrto gītatuṣṭasya śarvasyānugraho mayi // 9.2.201	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti saṃcintya papraccha sā taṃ madanamohitā / kastvaṃ kathaṃ vanaṃ cedamāgato 'syucyatāmiti // 9.2.202	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato yathāgato yaḥ sa sarvaṃ tasyai śaśaṃsa tat / sa rājā tāmathāpṛcchatkā tvaṃ sundari śaṃsa me // 9.2.203	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yaś ca suptasthito 'trāyam eṣa kaḥ kamalānane / iti taṃ pṛṣṭavantaṃ ca saṃkṣepeṇa jagāda sā // 9.2.204	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ vidyādharī khaḍgasiddhaś caiṣaḥ patir mama / dṛṣṭamātre ca jātāsmi sānurāgādhunā tvayi // 9.2.205	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadehi tāvad gacchāvas tvadīyaṃ nagaraṃ drutam / tāvat prabudhyate nāyaṃ tatra vakṣyāmi vistarāt // 9.2.206	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutvaitattadvaco rājā pratipadya tatheti saḥ / trailokyarajyasaṃprāptiharṣaṃ harivaro dadhe // 9.2.207	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nṛpamaṅke gṛhītvemaṃ gacchāmyutpatya khaṃ javāt / ityanaṅgaprabhā sāntaḥ satvarā samacintayat // 9.2.208	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca bhraṣṭavidyābhūdbhartṛdroheṇa tena sā / smarantī pitṛśāpaṃ ca viṣādaṃ sahasā yayau // 9.2.209	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taddṛṣṭvā kāraṇaṃ pṛṣṭvā sa rājā tām abhāṣata / na viṣādasya kālo 'yaṃ prabudhyetaiṣa te patiḥ // 9.2.210	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
daivāyattaṃ ca vastvetacchocituṃ nārhasi priye / ko hi svaśirasaś chāyāṃ vidheścollaṅghayedgatim // 9.2.211	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadehi yāma ity uktvā tāṃ sa śraddhitatadgiram / aṅke harivaraścakrerājānaṅgaprabhāṃ drutam // 9.2.212	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato nidhānalabdhyeva tuṣṭo gatvā javāttataḥ / rājāruroha svarathaṃ sa bhṛtyair abhinanditaḥ // 9.2.213	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tena svanagaraṃ prāpa sa manaḥ śīghragāminā / rathena ramaṇīyuktaḥ prajānāṃ dattakautukaḥ // 9.2.214	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svanāmalāñchane tasminso 'naṅgaprabhayā tayā / saha divyasukhastasthau tato harivaro nṛpaḥ // 9.2.215	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpy anaṅgaprabhā tatraivāsīttadanurāgiṇī / vismṛtya svaṃ prabhāvaṃ taṃ sarvaṃ śāpavimohitā // 9.2.216	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atrāntare sa tatrādrau jīvadatto na kevalam / prabuddho naikṣatānaṅgaprabhāṃ yāvat svam apy asim // 9.2.217	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kva sānaṅgaprabhā kaṣṭaṃ kva sa khaḍgo 'pi kiṃ nu tam / hṛtvā gatā sā kiṃ vā tau nītau dvāvapi kenacit // 9.2.218	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ity udbhrānto bahūn kurvan vitarkān sa dinatrayam / giriṃ taṃ vicinoti sma dahyamānaḥ smarāgninā // 9.2.219	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'vatīrya cinvāno vanāni divasāndaśa / sa babhrāma na cāpaśyat tasyāḥ pādam apikva cit // 9.2.220	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hā durjanavidhe kṛcchrātsā dattāpi kathaṃ tvayā / khaḍgasiddhyā saha hṛtā priyānaṅgaprabhā mama // 9.2.221	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ityākrandannirāhāro bhramasnnekamavāptavān / grāmaṃ tatra viveśaikamāḍhyaṃ dvijagṛhaṃ ca saḥ // 9.2.222	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gṛhiṇī tatra subhagā suvastrās copaveśya tam / āsane priyadattākhyā svaceṭīḥ śīghram ādiśat // 9.2.223	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvaritaṃ jīvadattasya pādau kṣālayatāsya hi / nirāhārasya virahāddinamadya trayodaśam // 9.2.224	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tac chrutvā vismito jīvadatto 'ntarvimamarśa saḥ / ihānaṅgaprabhā prāptā kiṃ kimeṣātha yoginī // 9.2.225	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti dhyāyan dhautapādo bhuktataddattabhojanaḥ / praṇataḥ priyadattāṃ tāmatyārtyā pṛcchati sma saḥ // 9.2.226	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekaṃ brūhi kathaṃ vetsi madvṛttāntamanindite / dvitīyaṃ cāpi kathaya priyākhaḍgau kva me gatau // 9.2.227	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tac chrutvā tamavocatsā priyadattā pativratā / bharturanyo na me citte svapne 'pi kurute padam // 9.2.228	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
putrabhrātṛsamān anyān paśyāmi puruṣān aham / na ca me 'narcito yāti kadācid atithir gṛhāt // 9.2.229	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatprabhāveṇa jānāmi bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ ca bhāvi ca / sā cānaṅgaprabhā nītā rājñā harivareṇa te // 9.2.230	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
supte tvayi vidheryogāttanmārgāgāminā tadā / gītākṛṣṭopayātena svanāmapuravāsinā // 9.2.231	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā ca śaktyā na te prāptuṃ sa hi rājā mahābalaḥ / sā punastam apityaktvā kulaṭānyatra yāsyati // 9.2.232	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
khaḍgaṃca devī prādātte tatprāptyai tadvidhāya saḥ / tasyāṃ hṛtāyāṃ divyatvāddevyā evāntikaṃ gataḥ // 9.2.233	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kiṃca devyava te 'naṅgaprabhāśāpopavarṇane / svapne bhāvi yadādiṣṭaṃ tatkathaṃ vismṛtaṃ tava // 9.2.234	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadeṣa bhavitavye 'rthe vyāmohas te vṛthaiva kaḥ / pāpānubandhaṃ muñcainaṃ bhūyo bhūyo 'tiduḥkhadam // 9.2.235	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kiṃ vādhunā tava tayā pāpayanyānuraktayā / mānuṣībhūtayā bhrātastvaddrohabhraṣṭavidyayā // 9.2.236	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktaḥ sa tayā sādhvyā tyaktānaṅgaprabhāspṛhaḥ / taccāpalaviraktātmā jīvadatto jagāda tām // 9.2.237	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śāntastvadvacasā mohaḥ satyenāmbāmunā mama / kāmaṃ na śreyase kasya saṃgamaḥ paṇyakarmabhiḥ // 9.2.238	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pūrvapāpavaśādetadduḥkhamāpatitaṃ mama / tatkṣālanāya yāsyāmi tīrthānyujjhitamatsaraḥ // 9.2.239	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ko me 'naṅgaprabhāhetorvair eṇārthaḥ paraiḥ saha / jitakrodhena sarvaṃ hi jagadetadvijīyate // 9.2.240	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti yāvat sa vaktyatra tāvattasyāḥ patirgṛhe / āyayau priyadattāyā dhārmiko 'tithivatsalaḥ // 9.2.241	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtātithyena tenāpi tyajito duḥkhamatra saḥ / viśramya tīrthayātrāyai prāyādāpṛcchya tāvubhau // 9.2.242	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ krameṇa sarvāṇi pṛthvyāṃ tīrthāni so 'bhramat / visoḍhānekakāntārakaṣṭo mūlaphalāśanaḥ // 9.2.243	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhrāntatīrthaś ca tām eva sa yayau vindhyavāsinīm / tatra tepe tapastīvraṃ nirāhāraḥ kuśāstare // 9.2.244	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tapastuṣṭā ca sā sākṣāduvācaivaṃ tamambikā / uttiṣṭha putra yūyaṃ hi castvāro māmakā gaṇāḥ // 9.2.245	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pañcamūlacaturvakramahodaramukhāstrayaḥ / tvaṃ caturthaś ca vikaṭavadanāskhyaḥ kramottamaḥ // 9.2.246	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
te yūyaṃ jātu gaṅgāyā vihartuṃ pulinaṃ gatāḥ / tatra snāntī ca yuṣmābhir dṛṣṭaikā munikanyakā // 9.2.247	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
cāpalekheti kapilajaṭākhyasya muneḥ sutā / prārthyate sma ca sarvaiḥ sā bhavadbhir madanāturaiḥ // 9.2.248	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kanyāhamapayāteti tayokte te trayo 'pare / tūṣṇīmāsaṃstvayā sā tu haṭhādvāhāvagṛhyata // 9.2.249	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
krandati sma ca sā tāta tāta trāyasva māmiti / tac chrutvā nikaṭastho 'tra sa kruddho munirāgamat // 9.2.250	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ dṛṣṭvā sā tvayā muktā tato yuṣmāñ śaśāpa saḥ / manuṣyayoniṃ pāpiṣṭhāḥ sarve yāteti tatkṣaṇāt // 9.2.251	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
prārthitaḥ so 'tha śāpāntam evaṃ vo munirabhyadhāt / yadānaṅgaprabhā rājasutā yuṣmābhir arthitā // 9.2.252	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatā vaidyādharaṃ lokaṃ mokṣyāścāmī tadā trayaḥ / tvaṃ tu vidyādharībhūtāṃ prāpyaitāṃ hārayiṣyasi // 9.2.253	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ prāptāsi vikaṭavadana vyasanaṃ mahat / cirāc ca devīm ārādhya śāpād asmād vimokṣyase // 9.2.254	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tvayāsyāścāpalekhāyā hastasparśo yataḥ kṛtaḥ / paradārāpahārotthaṃ pāpamasti ca te bahu // 9.2.255	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti ye madgaṇā yūyaṃ śaptāstena maharṣiṇā / te 'tha jātāḥ stha catvāraḥ pravīrā dakṣiṇāpathe // 9.2.256	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pañcapaṭṭikahāṣājñau yau tau khaḍgadharaś ca yaḥ / sakhāyas te trayastvaṃ ca caturtho jīvadattakaḥ // 9.2.257	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
te ca trayo 'naṅgaratau prayātāyāṃ nijaṃ padam / ihāgatyaiva nirmuktā matprasādena śāpataḥ // 9.2.258	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvayā cārādhitāsmyadya jātaḥ śāpakṣayaś ca te / tadāgneyīṃ gṛhītvemāṃ dhāraṇāṃ svatanuṃ tyaja // 9.2.259	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṣṭajanmopabhogyaṃ ca pātakaṃ tatsakṛddaha / ity uktvā dhāraṇāṃ dattvā devī tasya tirodadhe // 9.2.260	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa martyadehaṃ pāpaṃ ca dagdhvā dhāraṇayā tayā / jīvadattaścirācchāpamukto jajñe gaṇottamaḥ // 9.2.261	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
devānām apy aho yena pāpena kleśa īdṛśaḥ / parastrīsaṃgamotthena hānyeṣāṃ tena kā gatiḥ // 9.2.262	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca tatra sānaṅgaprabhā harivare pure / rājño harivarasyāntaḥpurāṇāṃ prāpa mukhyatām // 9.2.263	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca rājā tadekāgramanāstasthau divāniśam / svamantriṇi sumantrākhye nyastarājyamahābharaḥ // 9.2.264	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā tasya rājñasya nikaṭaṃ madhyadeśataḥ / āgāllabdhavaro nāma nāṭyācāryo 'tra nūtanaḥ // 9.2.265	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa dṛṣṭakauśalastena bhūbhṛtā vādyanāṭyayoḥ / saṃmānyāntaḥpurastrīṇāṃ nāṭyācāryo vyadhīyata // 9.2.266	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tenānaṅgaprabhā nṛtte prakarṣaṃ prāpitā tathā / nṛtyanty api sapatnīnāṃ spṛhaṇīyābhavadyathā // 9.2.267	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sahavāsāc ca tasyātha nṛttaśikṣārasādapi / nāṭyācāryasya sānaṅgaprabhābhūdanurāgiṇī // 9.2.268	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāś ca rūpanṛttābhyāmākṛṣṭaḥ sa śanair aho / nāṭyācāryo 'pi kāmena kim apy anyadanṛtyata // 9.2.269	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vijane caikadānaṅgaprabhā sā nāṭyaveśmani / prasahya nāṭyācāryaṃ tam upāgād ratalālasā // 9.2.270	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
suratānte ca sātyantasānurāgā jagāda tam / tvayā vinā kṛtā nāhaṃ sthātuṃ śakṣyāmy api kṣaṇam // 9.2.271	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājā harivaraścaitad buddhvā naiva kṣamiṣyate / tadehyanyatra gacchāvo yatra rājā na buddhyate // 9.2.272	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asti hemahayoṣṭrādi dhanaṃ tava ca bhūbhṛtā / nāṭyatuṣṭena yaddattam asti cābharaṇaṃ mama // 9.2.273	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tat tatra tvaritaṃ yāmaḥ sthāsyāmo yatra nirbhayāḥ / etat sa tadvaco hṛṣṭo nāṭyācāryo 'nvamanyata // 9.2.274	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ puruṣaveṣaṃ sā kṛtvānaṅgaprabhā yayau / nāṭyācāryagṛhaṃ ceṭyā saha susnigdhayaikayā // 9.2.275	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tadaina tenoṣṭrapṛṣṭhārpitadhanārthinā / sākaṃ sā turagārūḍhā prāyānnāṭyopadeśinā // 9.2.276	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sādau vaidyādharīṃ lakṣmīṃ tyaktvā rājaśriyaṃ punaḥ / śiśriye cāraṇarddhiṃ sā dhik strīṇāṃ capalaṃ manaḥ // 9.2.277	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā ca nāṭyācāryeṇa tenānaṅgaprabhā saha / dūraṃ sā nagaraṃ prāpa viyogapurasaṃjñakam // 9.2.278	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tatsahitā tasthau sukhaṃ sā so 'pi labdhayā / tayā labdhavarākhyāṃ svāṃ satyāṃ mene naṭāgraṇīḥ // 9.2.279	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca tāṃ gatāṃ kvāpi buddhvānaṅgaprabhāṃ priyām / rājā harivaraḥ so 'bhūddehatyāgonmukhaḥ śucā // 9.2.280	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sumantro mantrī tam uvācāśvāsayannṛpam / deva kiṃ yanna vetsi tvaṃ paryālocaya tatsvayam // 9.2.281	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
khaḍgavidyādharaṃ tyaktvā patiṃ tvāṃ dṛṣṭam eva yā / upāśritā kathaṃ tasyāḥ sthair yaṃ syāttvayy api prabho // 9.2.282	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
laghuṃ kaṃcidgṛhītvā sā gatā sadvastuniḥspṛhā / tṛṇaratnaśalākeva tṛṇadṛṣṭyanurāgataḥ // 9.2.283	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nāṭyācāryeṇa sā nūnaṃ nītā sa hi na dṛśyate / saṃgītakagṛhe prātastau sthitāviti ca śrutam // 9.2.284	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taddeva vada kastasyāṃ jānato 'pi tavāgrahaḥ / vilāsinī hi sarvasya saṃdhyeva kṣaṇarāgiṇī // 9.2.285	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukto mantriṇā so 'tha vicārapatito nṛpaḥ / acintayadaho satyamuktaṃ me sudhiyāmunā // 9.2.286	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
paryantavirasā kaṣṭā pratikṣaṇavivartinī / bhavasthitirivānityasaṃbandhā hi vilāsinī // 9.2.287	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
patitaṃ majjayantīṣu darśitotkalikāsu ca / prājñaḥ patatyagādhāsu na strīṣu ca nadīṣu ca // 9.2.288	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vyasaneṣu nirudvegā vibhaveṣv apyagarvitāḥ / kāryeṣv akātarā ye ca te dhīrāstair jitaṃ jagat // 9.2.289	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityālocya śucaṃ tyaktvā mantriṇo vacanena saḥ / svadāreṣv eva saṃtoṣa rājā harivaro vyadhāt // 9.2.290	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpy anaṅgaprabhā tatra viyogapuranāmani / nāṭyācāryayutā tāvat kaṃcit kālaṃ sthitā pure // 9.2.291	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvattatrāpi saṃjajña nāṭyācāryasya daivataḥ / yūnā sudarśanākhyena dyūtakāreṇa saṃgatiḥ // 9.2.292	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena dyūtahṛtāśeṣadhano 'naṅgaprabhāgrataḥ / kṛtaḥ sudarśanenātra nāṭyācāryo 'cireṇa saḥ // 9.2.293	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadroṣādiva niḥśrīkaṃ tyaktvānaṅgaprabhātha tam / sā sudarśanamevaitaṃ prasahyāśiśriyatpatim // 9.2.294	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
naṣṭadāradhanaḥ so 'tha nāṭyācāryo 'pratiśrayaḥ / vair āgyāttapase baddhajaṭo gaṅgātaṭaṃ yayau // 9.2.295	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā tvanaṅgaprabhā tena dyūtakāreṇa saṃgatā / sudarśanena tatraiva tasthau navanavapriyā // 9.2.296	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā ca patistasyāstaskaraiḥ sa sudarśanaḥ / muṣitāśeṣasarvasvaḥ praviśya rajanau kṛtaḥ // 9.2.297	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tāṃ draviṇābhāvād duḥsthitām anutāpinīm / dṛṣṭvā sudarśano 'naṅgaprabhām idam uvāca saḥ // 9.2.298	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hiraṇyaguptanāmā yaḥ suhṛnme 'sti mahādhanaḥ / tatsakāśādṛṇaṃ kiṃcidehyadya mṛgayāmahe // 9.2.299	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā daivahatadhīḥ sa gatvaiva tayā saha / ṛṇaṃ hiraṇyaguptaṃ taṃ vaṇiṅmukhyamayācata // 9.2.300	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa cānaṅgaprabhāṃ dṛṣṭvā vaṇiksāpi ca taṃ tadā / anyonyasābhilāṣau tau babhūvaturubhāvapi // 9.2.301	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uvāca caivaṃ sa vaṇiktaṃ sudarśanamādarāt / prātardāsye hiraṇyaṃ vāmadyehaiva tu bhujyatām // 9.2.302	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvānyādṛśaṃ bhāvam upalakṣya tayor dvayoḥ / sudarśano 'bravīnnāhaṃ bhojane 'dya paṭuḥ sthitaḥ // 9.2.303	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vaṇikpatistato 'vādīttarhi tvadvanitā sakhe / bhuṅktāṃ prathamamasmākameṣā hi gṛhamāgatā // 9.2.304	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktastena tūṣṇīṃ sa babhūva kitavo 'pi san / sa cānaṅgaprabhāyukto yayāvabhyantaraṃ vaṇik // 9.2.305	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra cakre tayā sākaṃ pānāhārādinirvṛtim / atarkitopanatayā lasanmadavilāsayā // 9.2.306	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
sudarśanaḥ sa tasyāś ca nirgamaṃ pratipālayan / bahiḥ sthitaḥ saṃs tadbhṛtyair ūce tatpreritais tataḥ // 9.2.307	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
bhuktvā gṛhaṃ gatā sā te niryāntī na tvayekṣitā / tattvayā kimihādyāpi kriyate gamyatāmiti // 9.2.308	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāntaḥ sthitā na niryātā na yāsyāmīti sa bruvan / dattvā pādapraharāṃs tais tadbhṛtyair nirakālyata // 9.2.309	upagīti (12, 15, 12, 15)
tataḥ sudarśano gatvā duḥkhitaḥ sa vyacintayat / kathaṃ me vaṇijā dārā mittreṇāpyamunā hṛtāḥ // 9.2.310	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ihaivopanataṃ vā me svapāpaphalamīdṛśam / yanmayā kṛtamanyasya tadanyena kṛtaṃ mama // 9.2.311	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kupyāmi kiṃ tadanyasmai kopārhaṃ tatsvakarma me / tacchinadmi na yena syātpunarmama parābhavaḥ // 9.2.312	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

sā ca rūpādhikaṃ prāpya priyaṃ taṃ vaṇijaṃ patim / reme 'naṅgaprabhā bhṛṅgī puṣpātpuṣpamivāgatā // 9.2.314	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

dinaiś ca tadvyayaiḥ so 'bhūdvaṇigalpībhavaddhanaḥ / mlāyati śrīḥ kulastrīva gṛhe bandhakyadhiṣṭhite // 9.2.317	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

svasthūlavarṣadhāreṇa vāyunā balinā hatam / tato majjitumārebhe yānapātraṃ tadūrmiṣu // 9.2.324	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tam eva cakre sānaṅgaprabhā dāśapatiṃ patim / na strī calitacāritrā nimnonnatam avekṣate // 9.2.337	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
