yuddhe ca tatra tatyāja śarīramaparāṅmukhaḥ / na śūrā viṣahante hi strīnimittaṃ parābhavam // 9.2.360	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kimetayā varākyā te bhajāsmānehinandanam / itīva ca surastrībhiḥ sanīto 'bhūtsurālayam // 9.2.361	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpy anaṅgaprabhā tasminrājñi sāgaravarmaṇi / nadīva sāgare sthair yaṃ babandhānanyagāminī // 9.2.362	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhavitavyabalānmene tena patyā kṛtārthatām / so 'pi janmaphalaṃ prāptaṃ tayāmanyata bhāryayā // 9.2.363	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dinaiś ca tasya rājñī sā rājñaḥ sāgaravarmaṇaḥ / dadhre 'naṅgaprabhā garbhaṃ kāle ca suṣuve sutam // 9.2.364	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nāmnā samudravarmāṇaṃ taṃ sa rājā pitā śiśum / cakāra vihitodāraputrajanmamahotsavaḥ // 9.2.365	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kramāc ca vṛddhimāyātaṃ saguṇaṃ prāptayauvanam / yauvarājye 'bhyaṣiñcattaṃ sutaṃ sa bhujaśālinam // 9.2.366	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vivāhahetos tasyātha sūnoḥ samaravarmaṇaḥ / rājñaḥ kamalavatyākhyāṃ sutām āharati sma saḥ // 9.2.367	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtodvāhāya tasmai ca putrāyāvarjito guṇaiḥ / samudravarmaṇe rājyaṃ nijaṃ prādātsa bhūpatiḥ // 9.2.368	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi prāpyaiva tadrājyamojasvī kṣatradharmavit / samudravarmā pitaraṃ praṇatastaṃ vyajijñapat // 9.2.369	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
anujānīhi māṃ tāta diśo jetuṃ vrajāmy aham / ajigīṣuḥ patirbhūmernindyaḥ klība iva striyāḥ // 9.2.370	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dharmyā kīrtikarī sā ca lakṣmīriha mahībhujām / yā jitvā pararāṣṭrāṇi nijabāhubalārjitā // 9.2.371	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ teṣāṃ tāta rājatvaṃ kṣudrāṇāmabhibhūtaye / svaprajām eva khādanti mārjārā iva lolupāḥ // 9.2.372	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
icyūcivān sa tenoce pitrā sāgaravarmaṇā / nūtanaṃ putra rājyaṃ te tattāvattvaṃ prasādhaya // 9.2.373	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nāstyapuṇyamakīrtirvā prajā dharmeṇa śāsataḥ / anavekṣya ca śaktiṃ svāṃ yukto rājñāṃ na vigrahaḥ // 9.2.374	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vatsa yady api śūrastvaṃ sainyamasti ca te bahu / tathāpi naiva viśvāso jayaśrīścapalā raṇe // 9.2.375	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityādi pitrā prokto 'pi tam anujñāpya yatnataḥ / samudravarmā sa yayau tejasvī digjigīṣayā // 9.2.376	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
krameṇa ca diśo jitvā sthāpayitvā vaśe nṛpān / prāptahastyaśvahemādirāyayau nagaraṃ nijam // 9.2.377	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra pitrormahāratnair nānādeśodbhavaiś ca saḥ / caraṇau pūjayām āsa praṇataḥ parituṣṭayoḥ // 9.2.378	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadājñayā ca pradadau brāhmaṇebhyo mahāyaśāḥ / mahādānāni hastyaśvahemaratnamayāni saḥ // 9.2.379	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vasu tathārthibhyo bhṛtyebhyaś ca vavarṣa saḥ / eko daridraśabdo 'tra yathabhūdarthavarjitaḥ // 9.2.380	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad dṛṣṭvā putramāhātmyam ātmanaḥ kṛtakṛtyatām / rājā sāgaravarmā sa mene 'naṅgaprabhāyutaḥ // 9.2.381	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
utsavena ca nītvā tānyahāni nṛpatiḥ sa tam / putraṃ samudravarmāṇamavocanmantrisaṃnidhau // 9.2.382	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yanmayā putra kartavyaṃ kṛtaṃ tad iha janmani / bhuktaṃ rājyasukhaṃ dṛṣṭaḥ parebhyo na parābhavaḥ // 9.2.383	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭastvaṃ cāttasāmrājyaḥ kimanyatprāpyamasti me / tadāśrayāmyahaṃ tīrthaṃ yāvanme dhriyate tanuḥ // 9.2.384	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vinaśvare śarīre 'smin kim adyāpi gṛhe tava / itīvaiṣā jarā paśya karṇamūle bravīti me // 9.2.385	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā sa sute 'nicchaty api tasminnṛpaḥ kṛtī / yayau sāgaravarmātha prayāgaṃ priyayā saha // 9.2.386	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tamanuvrajya pitaraṃ sa cāgatya nijaṃ puram / samudravarmā svaṃ rājyaṃ yathāvidhi śaśāsa tat // 9.2.387	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
rājā sāgaravarmāpi so 'naṅgaprabhayā yutaḥ / prayāge tapasā devaṃ vṛṣadhvajamatoṣayat // 9.2.388	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa svapne tam uvācaivaṃ tripurārirniśākṣaye / tuṣṭo 'smi te sabhāryasya tapasā tadidaṃ śṛṇu // 9.2.389	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
eṣānaṅgaprabhā tvaṃ ca yuvāṃ vidyādharāvubhau / śāpakṣayānnijaṃ lokaṃ prātaḥ putra gamiṣyathaḥ // 9.2.390	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sa prabubudhe rājānaṅgaprabhā ca sā / tadvadālokitasvapnā taccānyonyamathocatuḥ // 9.2.391	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataś ca nṛpatiṃ taṃ sā hṛṣṭānaṅgaprabhābhyadhāt / āryaputra mayā jātiḥ kṛtsnātmīyā smṛtādhunā // 9.2.392	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ vidyādharendrasya samarasyātmasaṃbhavā / eṣānaṅgaprabhā nāma pure vīrapurābhidhe // 9.2.393	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pitṛśāpādihāgatya vidyābhraṃśena mānuṣī / bhūtvā vidyādharībhāvaṃ sāhaṃ vyasmaramātmanaḥ // 9.2.394	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
idānīṃ ca prabuddhāhamiti yāvac ca vakti sā / tāvat so 'vatatārātra samarastatpitā divaḥ // 9.2.395	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
namaskṛtaḥ sa tenātra rājñā sāgaravarmaṇā / uvāca pādapatitāṃ tāmanaṅgaprabhāṃ sutām // 9.2.396	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ehi putri gṛhāṇaitā vidyāḥ śāpaḥ sa te gataḥ / tvayāṣṭajanmaduḥkhaṃ hi bhuktamekatra janmani // 9.2.397	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvotsaṅgamāropya vidyāstasyai punardadau / tataḥ sāgaravarmāṇaṃ rājānaṃ tam abhāṣata // 9.2.398	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhavānvidyādharādhīśo madanaprabhasaṃjñakaḥ / ahaṃ ca samaro nāma sutānaṅgaprabhā mama // 9.2.399	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pradeyā pūrvameṣā ca varaistaistair ayācyata / na ca teṣāṃ kam apy aicchadbhartāraṃ rūpagarvitā // 9.2.400	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatastulyaguṇenaiṣā tvayātyutkena yācitā / vidhiyogāc ca na tadā tvam apy aṅgīkṛto 'nayā // 9.2.401	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
martyalokāgamāyāsyāstena śāpamadāmaham / bhūyānme martyaloke 'pi bhāryeyamiti rāgiṇā // 9.2.402	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃkalpya hṛdaye dhyātvā varadaṃ girijāpatim / yogena svā tanus tyaktā tato vaidyādharī tvayā // 9.2.403	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tvaṃ mānuṣo jāto jātā bhāryā tavāpyasau / āgacchatamidānīṃ svaṃ lokaṃ yuktau yuvāṃ mithaḥ // 9.2.404	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti samareṇa sa uktaḥ smṛtajātistāṃ tanuṃ prayāgajale / muktvā sāgaravarmā babhūva madanaprabhaḥ sadyaḥ // 9.2.405	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
sā punaradhigatavidyā dīptānaṅgaprabhāpi tenaiva / dehenānyeva babhau jātā vidyādharī jhagiti // 9.2.406	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
sānando madanaprabhaḥ sa ca tataḥ sā cāpy anaṅgaprabhā divyānyonyavapurvilokanalasadgāḍhānurāgāvubhau / sa śrīmānsamaraś ca khecarapatiḥ sarve samutpatya khaṃ jagmurvīrapuraṃ sahaiva kila te vaidyādharaṃ tatpuram // 9.2.407	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
sa tatra samaro yathāvidhi sutām anaṅgaprabhāṃ tadaiva madanaprabhadyucarabhūbhṛte tāṃ dadau / sa ca kṣapitaśāpayā samamathaitayā prītayā jagāma madanaprabhaḥ svapuramatra cāsītsukham // 9.2.408	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
itthaṃ svadurnayavipākavaśena divyāḥ śāpacyutā hy avataranti manuṣyaloke / bhuktvā phalaṃ taducitaṃ ca nijāṃ gatiṃ te pūrvārjitena sukṛtena punaḥ prayānti // 9.2.409	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
iti sa kathāṃ naravāhanadattaḥ sacivān niśamya gomukhataḥ / sālaṃkāravatīkas tutoṣa cakre tataś ca dinakṛtyam // 9.2.410	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
tato 'nyedyuralaṃkāravatīpārśvasthitaṃ sakhā / naravāhanadattaṃ taṃ marubhūtirvyajijñapat // 9.3.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
paśya paśya varāko 'yaṃ deva kārpaṭikastava / carmakhaṇḍaikavasano jaṭālaḥ kṛśadhūsaraḥ // 9.3.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
siṃhadvārāddivārātraṃ śīte vāpyātape 'pi vā / na calatyeva tannāsya kimadyāpi prasīdasi // 9.3.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kāle dattaṃ varaṃ hy alpamakāle bahunāpi kim / tadyāvanmriyate naiṣa tāvadasya kṛpāṃ kuru // 9.3.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā gomukho 'vādītsādhūktaṃ marubhūtinā / kiṃ punarnāparādho 'sti tava devātra kaścana // 9.3.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣayo yāvanna vṛtto hi pāpasya paripanthinaḥ / tāvaddānapravṛtto 'pi dātuṃ śaknoti na prabhuḥ // 9.3.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
parikṣīṇe punaḥ pāpe vāryamāṇo 'pi yatnataḥ / īśvaraḥ pradadātyeva karmāyattamidaṃ kila // 9.3.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathā ca lakṣadattasya rājñaḥ kārpaṭikasya ca / labdhadattasya devaitāṃ kathāmākhyāmi te śṛṇu // 9.3.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhūllakṣaparaṃ nāma nagaraṃ vasudhātale / tatrāsīllakṣadattākhyas tyāgināmagraṇīrnṛpaḥ // 9.3.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
lakṣādūnaṃ na dātuṃ sa jānāti sma kilārthine / saṃbabhāṣe tu yaṃ tasmai dadau lakṣāṇi pañca saḥ // 9.3.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tutoṣa yasmai sa punarnidrāridryaṃ cakāra tam / lakṣadatta iti khyātaṃ nāma tasyāta eva tat // 9.3.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyaiko labdhadattākhyaḥ siṃhadvāre divāniśam / tasthau kārpaṭikaścarmakhaṇḍaikakaṭikarpaṭaḥ // 9.3.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa nibaddhajaṭaḥ śītavarṣe grīṣmātape 'pi vā / na cacāla tataḥ kṣipraṃ sa rājā ca dadarśa tam // 9.3.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathā tasya ciraṃ tatra tiṣṭhataḥ kleśavartinaḥ / na sa rājā dadau kiṃciddātāpi sakṛpo 'pi san // 9.3.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athaikadā sa nṛpatirjagāmākheṭakāṭavim / sa ca taṃ laguḍaṃ bibhradanvakkārpaṭiko yayau // 9.3.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tasya sasainyasya vāhanasthasya dhanvinaḥ / vyāghrān varāhān hariṇān bāṇavarṣeṇa nighnataḥ // 9.3.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
agrataḥ pādacārī san sa kārpaṭika ekakaḥ / jaghāna laguḍenaiva varāhān hariṇān bahūn // 9.3.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa dṛṣṭvā vikramaṃ tasya citraṃ śūraḥ kiyānayam / iti dadhyau sa rājāntarna tvasmai kiṃcidapyadāt // 9.3.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtākheṭaḥ sa nagaraṃ svasukhāyāviśannṛpaḥ / sa ca kārpaṭikastasthau siṃhadvāre ca pūrvavat // 9.3.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kadācidekasīmāntagotrajāvajayāya saḥ / lakṣadatto yayau rājā yuddhaṃ cāsyābhavanmahat // 9.3.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra yuddhe sa tasyāgre rājñaḥ kārpaṭiko bahūn / dṛḍhakhādiradaṇḍāgraprahārair avadhītparān // 9.3.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jitaśatruḥ sa rājā ca nijaṃ pratyāyayau puram / na ca tasmai dadau kiṃcidapi dṛṣṭaparākramaḥ // 9.3.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ kārpaṭikasyātra labdhadattasya tiṣṭhataḥ / vyatīyuḥ pañca varṣāṇi tasya kāṣṭhena jīvataḥ // 9.3.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ṣaṣṭhe pravṛtte dṛṣṭvā tamekadā daivayogataḥ / sa rājā jātakaruṇo lakṣadatto vyacintayat // 9.3.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
nādyāpyasya mayā dattaṃ cirakliṣṭasya kiṃcana / tadyuktyā kiṃcidetasmai dattvā paśyāmyahaṃ na kim // 9.3.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ nāmāsya varākasya vṛttaḥ pāpakṣayo na vā / kiṃ dadāti na vādyāpi lakṣmīrasya ca darśanam // 9.3.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityālocya nṛpaḥ svair aṃ bhāṇḍāgāraṃ praviśya saḥ / ratnair bhṛtaṃ mātuluṅgaṃ samudgakam iva vyadhāt // 9.3.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
cakāra sarvāsthānaṃ ca sa vidhāya bahiḥ sabhām / tatra ca prāviśansarve paurasāmantamantriṇaḥ // 9.3.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tanmadhye ca praviṣṭaṃ taṃ rājā kārpaṭikaṃ svayam / ito nikaṭamehīti jagāda snigdhayā girā // 9.3.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ kārpaṭikaḥ śrutvā labdhadattaḥ praharṣavān / agre savidhamāgatya rājñastasyopaviṣṭavān // 9.3.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tamavadadrājā brūhi kiṃcitsubhāṣitam / tadākarṇyā papāṭhaitām āryāṃ kārpaṭiko 'tha saḥ // 9.3.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pūrayati pūrṇam eṣā taraṅgiṇīsaṃhatiḥ samudram iva / lakṣmīr adhanasya punar locanamārge 'pi nāyāti // 9.3.32	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
śrutvaitat pāṭhayitvā ca bhūyas tuṣṭaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ / sadratnapūrṇaṃ tasmai tan mātuluṅgaphalaṃ dadau // 9.3.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
yasya tuṣyati rājāyaṃ dāridryaṃ tasya kṛntati / śocyaḥ kārpaṭikas tv eṣa yam āhūyaivam ādarāt // 9.3.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mātuluṅgam idaṃ dattaṃ tuṣṭenānena bhūbhṛtā / kalpavṛkṣo 'py abhavyānāṃ prāyo yāti palāśatām // 9.3.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti sarve 'pi tad dṛṣṭvā tatrāsthāne viṣādinaḥ / ajñātaparamārthatvātsvair amūcuḥ parasparam // 9.3.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tu kārpaṭiko mātuluṅgamādāya niryayau / āyayau cāgratas tasya bhikṣureko viṣīdataḥ // 9.3.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa rājabandināmā taddattvā śāṭakamagrahīt / tasmātkārpaṭikānmātuluṅgaṃ dṛṣṭvā manoramam // 9.3.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praviśya ca sa bhikṣustadrājñe phalamaḍhaukayat / rājā ca tatparijñāya śramaṇaṃ pṛcchati sma tam // 9.3.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mātuluṅgaṃ kuta idaṃ bhadanta bhavatāmiti / tataḥ kārpaṭikaṃ so 'smai taddātāraṃ śaśaṃsa tam // 9.3.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha rājā viṣaṇṇaś ca vismitaś ca babhūva saḥ / aho adyāpi na kṣīṇaṃ pāpaṃ tasyeti cintayan // 9.3.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svīkṛtya mātuluṅgaṃ tadutthāyāsthānataḥ kṣaṇāt / cakāra dinakartavyaṃ lakṣadattaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ // 9.3.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi kārpaṭiko gatvā siṃhadvāre yathāsthitaḥ / kṛtabhojanapānādirāsīdvikrītaśāṭakaḥ // 9.3.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dvitīye 'hni sa rājā sa sarvāsthānaṃ tathaiva tat / vidadhe tatra sarve ca sapaurāḥ prāviśan punaḥ // 9.3.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvā kārpaṭikaṃ taṃ ca praviṣṭaṃ so 'tha bhūmibhṛt / tathaivāhūya punarapy upāveśayadantike // 9.3.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
pāṭhayitvā ca bhūyo 'pi tāmevāryāṃ prasādataḥ / gūḍharatnaṃ dadau tasmai mātuluṅgaṃ tad eva saḥ // 9.3.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho dvitīye divase tuṣṭo 'syāyaṃ vṛthā prabhuḥ / kiṃ tāvadetadityatra sarve dadhyuḥ savismayāḥ // 9.3.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca kārpaṭiko vigno has te kṛtvā tu tatphalam / rājaprasādaṃ saphalaṃ manvāno niryayau bahiḥ // 9.3.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tāvattasyāyayau ko'pi viṣayādhikṛto 'grataḥ / pravivikṣutadāsthānaṃ draṣṭukāmo mahīkṣitam // 9.3.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa dṛṣṭvā mātuluṅgaṃ tadvavre kārpaṭikāttataḥ / ādade śakunāpekṣī dattvāsmai vastrayor yugam // 9.3.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praviśya ca nṛpāsthānaṃ pādanamro nṛpāya tat / mātuluṅgaṃ dadāvādau tato 'nyatprābhṛtaṃ nijam // 9.3.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
parijñāya ca tadrājñā phalaṃ sa viṣayādhipaḥ / kuta etattavety ukto 'vocatkārpaṭikāditi // 9.3.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho dadāti nādyāpi lakṣmīstasyeha darśanam / ityantaścintayanso 'tha rājābhūdvimanā bhṛśam // 9.3.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttasthau mātuluṅgaṃ tadgṛhītvāsthānataś ca saḥ / so 'tha kārpaṭiko vastrayugmaṃ prāpyāpaṇaṃ yayau // 9.3.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
cakre bhojanapānādi vikrīyaikaṃ ca śāṭakam / dvitīyaṃ ca dvidhā kṛtvā vāsasī dve vyadhatta saḥ // 9.3.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatastṛtīye 'pi dine sarvāsthānaṃ sa pārthivaḥ / vyadhāttathaiva sarvaś ca praviveśa punarjanaḥ // 9.3.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmai praviṣṭāya ca tanmātuluṅgaṃ tathaiva saḥ / bhūyo 'pyāhūya tāmāryāṃ pāṭhayitvā nṛpo dadau // 9.3.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vismiteṣv atha sarveṣu so 'pi kārpaṭiko bahiḥ / gatvā rājavilāsinyai tadadādbījapūrakam // 9.3.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā tasmai rājasaṃmānataruvallīva jaṅgamā / jātarūpaṃ dadau puṣpamivāgraphalasūcakam // 9.3.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatsa vikrīya tadahastasthau kārpaṭikaḥ sukham / vilāsiny api sā rājñaḥ praviveśāntikaṃ tadā // 9.3.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmai ca sthūlaramyaṃ tanmātuluṅgamaḍhaukayat / so 'pi tatpratyabhijñāya tāṃ papraccha tadāgamam // 9.3.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato jagāda sā dattamidaṃ kārpaṭikena me / tac chrutvā sa nṛpo dadhyau lakṣmyā so 'dyāpi nekṣitaḥ // 9.3.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mandapuṇyo na yo vetti matprasādamaniṣphalam / mām eva caitānyāyānti mahāratnāny aho muhuḥ // 9.3.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
iti dhyātvā gṛhītvā tatsthāpayitvā ca rakṣitam / mātuluṅgaṃ sa utthāya cakre bhūpatirāhnikam // 9.3.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
caturthe 'hni ca so 'kārṣīdrājāsthānaṃ tathaiva tat / pūryate sma ca tatsarvaiḥ sāmantasacivādibhiḥ // 9.3.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tatra tamāyātaṃ bhūyaḥ kārpaṭikaṃ nṛpaḥ / upaveśyāgrataḥ prāgvatsa tamāryāmapāṭhayat // 9.3.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dadau ca mātuluṅgaṃ tattasmai tac ca drutojjhitam / tasya hastārdhasaṃprāptaṃ dvidhābhūtpatitaṃ bhuvi // 9.3.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pidhānasaṃdhibhagnāc ca tasmādratnāni niryayuḥ / bhāsayanti tadāsthānaṃ mahārghāṇi bahūni ca // 9.3.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāni dṛṣtvābruvan sarve paramārtham ajānatām / tryahaṃ mṛṣā bhramo 'bhūn naḥ prasādas tv īdṛśaḥ prabhoḥ // 9.3.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvābravīdrājā mayā yuktyānayā hy ayam / darśanaṃ śrīrdadātyasya kiṃ na veti parīkṣitaḥ // 9.3.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pāpāntaś ca tryahaṃ nāsya prāptaḥ prāpto 'sya so 'dya tu / tenaiva darśanaṃ lakṣmyā dattametasya sāṃpratam // 9.3.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā tāni ratnāni grāmān hastyaśvakāñcanam / dattvā cakāra sāmantaṃ sa taṃ kārpaṭikaṃ prabhuḥ // 9.3.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttathau ca tataḥ snātumāsthānātsaṃstuvajjanāt / yayau kārpaṭikaḥ so 'pi kṛtārtho vasatiṃ nijām // 9.3.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ yāvanna pāpānto vṛttastāvanna labhyate / prabhuprasādo bhṛtyena kṛtaiḥ kaṣṭaśatair api // 9.3.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ityākhyāya kathāmetāṃ mantrimukhyaḥ sa gomukhaḥ / naravāhanadattaṃ taṃ jagāda svaprabhuṃ punaḥ // 9.3.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taddeva jāne naitasya nūnaṃ kārpaṭikasya te / vṛttaḥ pāpakṣayo 'dyāpi yena nāsya prasīdasi // 9.3.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrūtvaitadgomukhavaco hanta sādhvity udīrya ca / tasmai kārpaṭikākhyāya nijakārpaṭikāya saḥ // 9.3.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vatseśvarasutaḥ sadyaḥ pradadau grāmasaṃcayam / hastyaśvaṃ hemakoṭiṃ ca sadvastrābharaṇāni ca // 9.3.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadaiva rājasadṛśaḥ so 'bhūtkārpaṭikaḥ kṛtī / kṛtajñe satparīvāre prabhau sevāphalā kutaḥ // 9.3.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam sthitasya tasyātra jātu sevārtham āyayau / naravāhanadattasya dākṣiṇātyo yuvā dvijaḥ // 9.3.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pralambabāhunāmā ca sa vīrastaṃ vyajijñapat / kīrtyākṛṣṭastavaiṣo 'haṃ pādau deva samāśritaḥ // 9.3.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
padātpadaṃ ca devasya padātirna calāmy aham / gajavājirathair bhūmau gacchato nāmbare punaḥ // 9.3.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidyādharendratā yasmācchrūyate bhāvinī prabhoḥ / dine dine svarṇaśataṃ dīyatāṃ vṛttaye mama // 9.3.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
evam uktavate tasmai tatkilātulatejase / naravāhanadattas tāṃ dadau vṛttiṃ dvijātaye // 9.3.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatprasaṅgāc ca vakti sma gomukho deva sevakāḥ / bhavantyevaṃvidhā rājñāṃ tathā ca śrūyatāṃ kathā // 9.3.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
astīha vikramapuraṃ nāmnā puravaraṃ mahat / tatra vikramatuṅgākhyo babhūva nṛpatiḥ purā // 9.3.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
taikṣṇyaṃ kṛpāṇe yasyābhūnna daṇḍe nayaśālinaḥ / dharme ca satatāsaktirna tu strīmṛgayādiṣu // 9.3.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmiṃś ca rājñi kulayo rajaḥsu guṇavicyutiḥ / sāyakeṣv avicāraś ca goṣṭheṣu paśurakṣinām // 9.3.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya vīravaro nāma śūro mālavadeśajaḥ / svākṛtiścāyayau rājño vipraḥ sevārthamekadā // 9.3.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yasya dharmavatī nāma bhāryā vīravatī sutā / putraḥ sattvavaraśceti trayaṃ parikaro gṛhe // 9.3.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sevāparikaraścānyattrayaṃ kaṭyāṃ kṛpāṇikā / pāṇau karatalaikasmiṃścarmānyasminsudarpaṇam // 9.3.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iyanmātre parikare vṛttaye 'rthayate sma saḥ / pratyahaṃ nṛpatestasmāddīnāraśatapañcakam // 9.3.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājā ca sa dadau tasmai vṛttiṃ tāṃ lakṣitaujase / paśyāmi tāvadetasya prakarṣamiti cintayan // 9.3.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dadau ca tasya cārānsa paścājjijñāsituṃ nṛpaḥ / kuryādiyadbhir dīnāraiḥ kiṃ dvibāhurasāviti // 9.3.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sa ca vīravarasteṣāṃ dīnārāṇāṃ dine dine / śataṃ has te svabhāryāyā bhojanādikṛte dadau // 9.3.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śatena vastramālyādi krīṇāti sma śataṃ punaḥ / snātvā hariharādīnāmarcanārthamakalpayat // 9.3.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dvijātikṛpaṇādibhyo dadāvanyacchatadvayam / evaṃ sa viniyuṅkte sma nityaṃ pañcaśatīmapi // 9.3.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasthau ca pūrvamadhyāhnaṃ siṃhadvāre 'sya bhūpateḥ / kṛtvāhnikādi cāgatya tatraivāsīn niśāṃ punaḥ // 9.3.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etāṃ taddinacaryāṃ ca nityaṃ cārā nyavedayan / rājñe tasmai tatastuṣṭaḥ sa tāṃścārānnyavartayat // 9.3.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi vīravaras tasya rājñastasthau divāniśam / snānādisamayaṃ muktvā siṃhadvāre dhṛtāyudhaḥ // 9.3.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athātra taṃ vīravaraṃ jetumicchannivāyayau / śūrapratāpāsahano garjitogro ghanāgamaḥ // 9.3.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tadā cavarṣati ghane ghorā dhārāśarāvalīḥ / na sa vīravaraḥ siṃhadvārātstambha ivācalat // 9.3.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājā vikramatuṅgaś ca prāsādādvīkṣya taṃ sadā / āruroha sa jijñāsuḥ prāsādaṃ taṃ punarniśi // 9.3.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
siṃhadvāre sthitaḥ ko 'tretyupariṣṭājjagāda saḥ / tac chrutvāhaṃ sthito 'treti so 'pi vīravaro 'bhyadhāt // 9.3.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho ayaṃ mahāsattvaḥ sumahatpadamarhati / siṃhadvāraṃ na yo muñcatyambude varṣatīdṛśe // 9.3.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti yāvac ca sa śrutvā vicintayati bhūmibhṛt / tāvaddūrātsakaruṇaṃ rudatīmaśṛṇotstriyam // 9.3.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
duḥkhito me na rāṣṭre 'sti tadeṣā kā nu roditi / ityālocyābravīdrājā sa taṃ vīravaraṃ tadā // 9.3.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bho vīravara kāpi strī dūre rodity asau śṛṇu / kaiṣā kiṃ duḥkhamasyāścetyatra gatvā nirūpaya // 9.3.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sa tathety uktvā gantuṃ pravavṛte tataḥ / dhunvan karatalaṃ vīravaro baddhāsidhenukaḥ // 9.3.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvā taṃ prasthitaṃ meghe jvaladvidyuti tādṛśe / dhārānipātasaṃruddharodorandhre sakautukaḥ // 9.3.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sakṛpaścābatīryaiva prāsādāttasya pṛṣṭhataḥ / alakṣitaḥ khaḍgapāṇiḥ pratasthe so 'pi bhūmipaḥ // 9.3.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
sa cānusarpanruditaṃ guptānvāgatabhūpatiḥ / gatvā bahiḥ purādekaṃ prāpa vīravaraḥ saraḥ // 9.3.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
hā nātha hā kṛpālo hā śūra tyaktā tvayā katham / vatsyāmīti ca tanmadhye rudatīṃ strīṃ dadarśa tām // 9.3.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kā tvaṃ śocasi kaṃ nāthamiti pṛṣṭā ca tena sā / uvāca putrā māmetāṃ viddhi vīravara kṣitim // 9.3.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tasyā vikramatuṅgo me rājā nātho 'dya dhārmikaḥ / mṛtyuś ca bhavitā tasya tṛtīye 'hani niścitam // 9.3.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etādṛśaś ca bhūyo 'pi patiḥ syātputra me kutaḥ / tenaitamanuśocāmi svātmānaṃ ca suduḥkhitā // 9.3.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ hi bhāvi paśyāmi divyadṛṣṭyā śubhāśubham / tridivastho yathādrākṣītsuprabho devaputrakaḥ // 9.3.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa hi puṇyakṣayātsvargātpatanaṃ bhāvi divyadṛk / saptāhātsūkarīgarbhe saṃbhavaṃ caikṣatātmanaḥ // 9.3.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa sūkarīgarbhavāsakleśaṃ vibhāvayan / devaputro 'nvaśocat tān divyān bhogān sahātmanā // 9.3.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hā svarga hā hāpsaraso hā nandanalatāgṛhāḥ / hā vatsyāmi kathaṃ kroḍīgarbhe tadanu kardame // 9.3.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityādi vilapantaṃ taṃ śrutvābhyetya surādhipaḥ / papraccha so 'pi svaṃ tasmai duḥkhahetumavarṇayat // 9.3.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tataḥ śakro jagādainam asty upāyo 'tra te śṛṇu / vrajoṃ namaḥ śivāyeti japañ śaraṇam īśvaram // 9.3.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ gatvā śaraṇaṃ hitvā pāpaṃ puṇyamavāpsyasi / yena prāpsyasi na kroḍayoniṃ svargān na ca cyutim // 9.3.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukto devarājena suprabho 'tha tatheti saḥ / uktvā namaḥ śivāyeti śaṃbhuṃ śaraṇam agrahīt // 9.3.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tanmayaḥ sa dinaiḥ ṣaḍbhis tatprasādān na kevalam / nikṣiptaḥ sūkarīgarbhe yāvat svargād uparyagāt // 9.3.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saptame 'hni ca taṃ svarge tatrāpaśyañ śatakratuḥ / vīkṣate yāvad adhikaṃ lokāntaram asau gataḥ // 9.3.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
itthaṃ śuśoca sa yathā dṛṣṭvāghaṃ bhāvi suprabhaḥ / tathaiva bhāvinaṃ mṛtyuṃ dṛṣṭvā śocāmi bhūbhṛtaḥ // 9.3.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktavatīṃ bhūmiṃ tāṃ sa vīravaro 'bravīt / yathāmba suprabhasyābhūdupāyaḥ śakravākyataḥ // 9.3.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathā yadyasti rājño 'sya rakṣopāyastad ucyatām / iti vīravareṇokte pṛthivī tam uvāca sā // 9.3.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
eka evāstyupāyo 'tra svādhīnaḥ sa tavaiva ca / tac chrutvaiva ca so 'vādīddhṛṣṭo vīravaro dvijaḥ // 9.3.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tarhi brūhi drutaṃ devi yadi śreyo bhavetprabhoḥ / prāṇair me putradārair vā tajjanma saphalaṃ mama // 9.3.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavantamavadatsā taṃ vīravaraṃ kṣitiḥ / astyatra caṇḍikādevī yaiṣā rājakulāntike // 9.3.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyai sattvavaraṃ putram upahārīkaroṣi cet / tato jīvati rājāsau nāstyupāyo 'paraḥ punaḥ // 9.3.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutvaitadvasudhāvākyaṃ dhīro vīravarastadā / yāmi devi karomyetadadhunaivetyuvāca saḥ // 9.3.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ko 'nyaḥ svāmihitas tvādṛgbhadraṃ te 'stu vrajeti bhūḥ / uktvā tiro 'bhūt sarvaṃ ca rājā so 'nvāgato 'śṛṇot // 9.3.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tato vikramatuṅge 'sminrājñi cchanne 'nugacchati / drutaṃ vīravarastasyāṃ rātrau sa svagṛhaṃ yayau // 9.3.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra prabodhya bhāryāyai dharmavatyai śaśaṃsa saḥ / svaputram upahartavyaṃ rājārthe vacanādbhuvaḥ // 9.3.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā tac chrutvābravītkāryamavaśyaṃ svāmino hitam / tatputrāścādya bhavatā pratibodhyocyatāmiti // 9.3.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tataḥ prabodhya bālāya tasmai vīravareṇa tat / ūce tadupahārāntaṃ rājārthe yadbhuvoditam // 9.3.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sa yathārthākhyo bālaḥ sattvavaro 'bhyadhāt / prabhukāryopayuktāsuḥ puṇyavāṃstāta nāsmi kim // 9.3.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhuktaṃ mayā tadannaṃ yacchodhanīyaṃ mayāpi tat / tannītvā tatkṛte devyā upahārīkuruṣva mām // 9.3.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityūcivāsaṃ taṃ sattvavaraṃ vīravaraḥ śiśum / satyaṃ bhavasi majjāta ityavocadaviklavam // 9.3.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
etadvikramatuṅgaḥ sa rājā śrutvā bahiḥ sthitaḥ / acintayadaho sarve samasattvā amī iti // 9.3.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vīravaraḥ skandhe sutaṃ sattvavaraṃ sa tam / bhāryā dharmavatī cāsya pṛṣṭhe vīravatīṃ sutām // 9.3.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gṛhītvā jagmatustau dvau rātrau taccaṇḍikāgṛham / rājā vikramatuṅgaś ca paścācchanno yayau tayoḥ // 9.3.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāvatāritaḥ skandhātpitrā sattvavaro 'tha saḥ / bālo 'pi dhair yarāśistāṃ natvā devīṃ vyajijñapat // 9.3.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
devi mūrdhopahāreṇa mama jīvatu naḥ prabhuḥ / nṛpo vikramatuṅgo 'tra śāstu ca kṣmāmakaṇṭakām // 9.3.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktavatas tasya sādhu putretyudīrya saḥ / kṛṣṭvā karatalāṃ sūnośchittvā vīravaraḥ śiraḥ // 9.3.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pradadau caṇḍikādevyau rājñaḥ śreyo 'stviti bruvan / nāstyaho svāmibhaktānāṃ putre vātmani vā spṛhā // 9.3.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sādhu vīravara prattaṃ svāmino jīvitaṃ tvayā / api prāṇaiḥ sutasyeti śuśruve vāktadā divaḥ // 9.3.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac cātivismite rājñi sarvam paśyati śṛṇvati / bālā vīravatī tasya bhrātur vīravarātmajā // 9.3.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hatasyopetya mūrdhānamāśliṣya paricumbya ca / hā bhrātariti cākrandya hṛtsphoṭena vyapādi sā // 9.3.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvā sutām apimṛtāṃ sā taṃ vīravaraṃ tadā / bhāryā dharmavatī dainyenābravīdracitāñjaliḥ // 9.3.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājñaḥ śivaṃ kṛtaṃ tāvattadanujñāṃ prayaccha me / yāvadāttamṛtāpatyadvayāgniṃ praviśāmy aham // 9.3.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bālā yatreyamajñānāpyevaṃ bhrātṛśucā mṛtā / kā śobhā jīvitenātra naṣṭe 'patyadvaye 'pi me // 9.3.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
niścayeneti jalpantīṃ tāṃ sa vīravaro 'bravīt / evaṃ kuruṣva kim vacmi nahīdānīm anindite // 9.3.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apatyaśokaikamaye saṃsāre 'sti sukhaṃ tava / tatpratīkṣasva yāvatte racayāmi citāmaham // 9.3.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvātra sthitair devīkṣetranirmāṇadārubhiḥ / nyastāpatyaśavāṃ cakre dīpāgnijvalitāṃ citām // 9.3.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato dharmavatī bhāryā pādau tasya praṇamya sā / janmāntare 'pi me bhūyādaryaputra patirbhavān // 9.3.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śivaṃ rājño 'stu cety uktvā sādhvī tasmiṃścitānale / jvālājaṭāle nyapatacchītalahradalīlayā // 9.3.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tatsa vikramatuṅgaś ca dṛṣṭvā guptasthito nṛpaḥ / kenaiṣāmanṛṇo 'haṃ syāmityāsīddhyānamohitaḥ // 9.3.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vīravaraḥ so 'pi dhīracetā vyacintayat / saṃpannaṃ svāmikāryaṃ me sākṣād divyā hi vākchrutā // 9.3.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhuktānnapiṇḍaḥ saṃśuddhaḥ prabhostadadhunā mayā / sarvamiṣṭaṃ vyayīkṛtya bharaṇīyaṃ kuṭumbakam // 9.3.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekasyātmabharitvena ca cakāstyeva jīvitam / tat kiṃ nātmopahāreṇāpy arcayāmy ambikām imām // 9.3.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti vīravaraḥ sattvaniṣṭhaḥ saṃkalpya caṇḍikām / devīṃ tāṃ varadāṃ pūrvaṃ sa stotreṇopatasthivān // 9.3.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
maheśvari namastubhyaṃ praṇatābhayadāyini / saṃsārapaṅkam agraṃ māṃ śaraṇāgatamuddhara // 9.3.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvaṃ prāṇaśaktir bhūtānāṃ tvayedaṃ ceṣṭate jagat / sṛṣṭer ādau svasaṃbhūtā svayaṃ dṛṣṭāsi śaṃbhunā // 9.3.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
jvalantī viśvamudbhāsya durnirīkṣyeṇa tejasā / uccaṇḍākāṇḍabālārkakoṭipaṅktirivoditā // 9.3.168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhujānāṃ cakravālena saṃchāditadigantarā / khaḍgakheṭakakodaṇḍaśaraśūlādidhāriṇā // 9.3.169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃstutāsi ca tenaiva devenaivaṃ triśūlinā / namas te caṇḍi cāmuṇḍe maṅgale tripure jaye // 9.3.170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekānaṃśe śive durge nārāyaṇi sarasvati / bhadrakāli mahālakṣmi siddhe ruruvidāriṇi // 9.3.171	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvaṃ gāyatrī mahārājñī revatī vindhyavāsinī / umā kātyāyanī ca tvaṃ śarvaparvatavāsinī // 9.3.172	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityādibhir nāmabhis tvām devi stutiparaṃ haram / śrutvā skando vasiṣṭhaś ca brahmādyās tvāṃ ca tuṣṭuvuḥ // 9.3.173	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
stuvantas tvāṃ ca bhagavaty amarā ṛṣayo narāḥ / īpsitābhyadhikān kāmān prāptāś ca prāpnuvanti ca // 9.3.174	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tanme prasīda varade gṛhāṇa tvamimāmapi / maccharīropahārārcāṃ śreyo rājño 'stu matprabhoḥ // 9.3.175	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity udīrya śiraśchettuṃ yāvadicchati sa svakam / udabhūdbhāratī tāvadaśarīrā nabhastalāt // 9.3.176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mā kārṣīḥ sāhasaṃ putra sattvenaivāmunā hy aham / suprītā tava tanmattaḥ prārthayesvepsitaṃ varam // 9.3.177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā so 'bravīdvīravarastuṣṭāsi devi cet / rajā vikramatuṅgastajjīvatvanyatsamāśatam // 9.3.178	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhāryāpatyāni jīvantu mama ceti vare 'rthite / tena bhūyaḥ samudabhūdevamastviti vāgdivaḥ // 9.3.179	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)

tato vīravaro hṛṣṭo bodhitāndevyanugrahāt / nītvā tānsvagṛhaṃ sarvānrājño dvāramagātpunaḥ // 9.3.181	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nṛpo vikramatuṅgaś ca taddṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭavismitaḥ / gatvā punastaṃ prāsādamārohastvamalakṣitaḥ // 9.3.182	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
siṃhadvāre sthitaḥ ko 'tretyupariṣṭāduvāca ca / tac chrutvādhaḥsthito vīravarastaṃ pratyuvāca saḥ // 9.3.183	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ sthito 'tra tāṃ ca strīṃ vīkṣituṃ gatavāhanam / devateva ca sā kvāpi dṛṣṭanaṣṭeva me gatā // 9.3.184	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutvaitatkṛtsnavṛttāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā so 'tyantamadbhutam / bhūbhṛdvikramatuṅgo 'tra rātrāveko vyacintayat // 9.3.185	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

gambhīro 'pi viśālo 'pi mahāsattvo 'pi nāmbudhiḥ / acalena mahāvātasparśe 'pi spardhate 'munā // 9.3.187	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
parokṣaṃ niśi yenaivaṃ putradāravyayena me / prāṇāḥ pradattās tasyāsya kuryāṃ kāṃ pratyupakriyām // 9.3.188	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ityādyākalayanrājā prāsādādavatīrya saḥ / praviśyābhyantaraṃ rātriṃ smayamāno nināya tām // 9.3.189	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tataḥ saṃstūyamānasya sarvair vīravarasya saḥ / babandha tasya sasutasyāpi paṭṭaṃ narādhipaḥ // 9.3.191	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
prādādbahūṃś ca viṣayānaśvānratnāni vāraṇān / daśa kāñcanakoṭīś ca vṛttiṃ ṣaṣṭiguṇāmapi // 9.3.192	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkṣaṇādrājatulyaś ca so 'bhūdvīravaro dvijaḥ / ucchritenātapatreṇa kṛtārthaḥ sakuṭumbakaḥ // 9.3.193	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti sa kathāṃ kathayitvā vidadhānaḥ prastutopasaṃhāram / naravāhanadattaṃ taṃ punaravadadgomukho mantrī // 9.3.194	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
evaṃ deva kṣmābhṛtāmekavīrā bhṛtyāḥ kecit puṇyayogān milanti / ye svāmyarthe tyaktadehādyapekṣāḥ asmyaglokau dvau susattvā jayanti // 9.3.195	śālinī [11: mttgg]
tadeṣa tādṛgvidha eva dṛśyate dvijapravīrastava deva sevakaḥ / navāgataḥ sattvaguṇādhikādhikaḥ pralambabāhuḥ sthirasauṣṭhavākṛtiḥ // 9.3.196	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
iti nijasacivādudārasattvo vipulamater avadhārya gomukhāt saḥ / naravāhanadattarājaputro hṛdi paritoṣamanuttamaṃ babhāra // 9.3.197	ajñātasamavṛtta [13: njjrg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
evaṃ sa nivasaṃs tatra vatseśasya pitur gṛhe / gomukhādyaiḥ svasacivaiḥ sevyamāno 'nurāgibhiḥ // 9.4.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
viharaṃś cāpy alaṃkāravatyā devyānuraktayā / mānavighnāsahodgāḍhatatpremamuṣiterṣyayā // 9.4.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
naravāhanadatto 'tha kadācinmṛgakānanam / jagāma rathamāruhya paścādārūḍhagomukhaḥ // 9.4.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pralambabāhau tasmiṃśca vipravīre 'grayāyini / cakārākheṭakakrīḍāṃ sa tatra sahito 'nugaiḥ // 9.4.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sarvaprāṇena dhāvatsu rathāśveṣvapi tasya saḥ / pralambabāhus tadvegaṃ vijitya purato yayau // 9.4.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
so 'vadhītsāyakaiḥ siṃhavyāghrādīnsyandane sthitaḥ / pralambabāhus tvasinā pādacārī jaghāna tān // 9.4.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
aho śauryamaho jaṅghājavo 'syeti visismiye / naravāhanadattaś ca dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭvā sa taṃ dvijam // 9.4.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtākheṭaḥ pariśrāntaḥ sa sasārathigomukhaḥ / pralambabāhau subhaṭe tasminnagrasare tataḥ // 9.4.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
rathārūḍhastṛṣākrāntaḥ salilānveṣaṇakramāt / vatseśvarātmajo dūraṃ viveśānyanmahāvanam // 9.4.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrotphullahiraṇyābjaṃ divyaṃ prāpa mahatsaraḥ / dvitīyam iva bahvarkabimbaṃ bhūmigataṃ nabhaḥ // 9.4.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra sa snātapītāmbhāḥ kṛtasnānādisānugaḥ / tadekadeśe caturo dūrādaikṣata pūruṣān // 9.4.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
divyākṛtīn divyavastrān divyābharaṇabhūṣitān / hemāmbujāni sarasastasmāduccitya gṛhṇataḥ // 9.4.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
upāgātkautukāttāṃś ca pṛṣṭaḥ ko 'sīti tair api / anvayaṃ nāma vṛttāntaṃ nijaṃ tebhyaḥ śaśaṃsa saḥ // 9.4.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
te 'pyevaṃ darśanaprītāḥ pṛṣṭavantaṃ tamabruvan / asti madhye mahāmbhodheḥ śrīmaddvīpavaraṃ mahat // 9.4.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yan nārikeladvīpākhyaṃ khyātaṃ jagati sundaram / tatra santi ca catvāraḥ parvatā diyabhūmayaḥ // 9.4.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
maināko vṛṣabhaścakro balāhaka iti smṛtāḥ / caturṣu teṣu catvāro nivasāma ime vayam // 9.4.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
eko 'smākaṃ rūpasiddhirnāmnā vividharūpadhṛt / pramāṇasiddhiraparo bṛhatsūkṣmapramāṇadṛk // 9.4.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)

tadbhaktā hi vayaṃ sarve tatprasādena cādriṣu / teṣu sveṣvādhipatyaṃ naḥ siddhiyuktāś ca saṃpadaḥ // 9.4.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

ity uktavadbhis taiḥ sākaṃ devaputrais tatheti saḥ / naravāhanadatto 'tra svādhīnāmbuphalādike // 9.4.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
gomukhādīnavasthāpya śvetadvīpaṃ vihāyasā / yayau gṛhītaḥ svotsaṅge tanmadhyāddevasiddhinā // 9.4.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatrāvatīrya gaganād dūrād evopasṛtya ca / pārśvasthitābdhitanayaṃ pādāntasthavasuṃdharam // 9.4.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
śaṅkhacakragadāpadmaiḥ sevyamānaṃ savigrahaiḥ / bhaktyopagīyamānaṃ ca gandharvair nāradādibhiḥ // 9.4.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praṇamyamānaṃ devaiś ca siddhair vidyādharais tathā / agropaviṣṭagaruḍaṃ śeṣaśayyāgataṃ harim // 9.4.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)

mā sma rājanvadhīrenamasau harṣapurādvaṇik / sādhuḥ samuraśūrākhyo viṣaye 'bhyāgatastava // 9.4.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṇṭhako yena nīto 'bhūtsa cauraḥ purarakṣiṇām / bhayena vihvalo naśyannipastyābdhau mṛto niśi // 9.4.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayaṃ tu tasya caurasya kāyaṃ prāpyādhiruhya ca / vaṇigbhagnapravahaṇastīrtvāmbhodhimihāgataḥ // 9.4.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tadā ca tatkaṭībaddhaśāṭakagranthito 'munā / vaṇijā kaṇṭhakaḥ prāpto na nīto 'nena ve gṛhāt // 9.4.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadacauramimaṃ rājanvaṇijaṃ muñca dhārmikam / saṃmānya prahiṇuṣvainam ity uktvā virarāma vāk // 9.4.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvā sa saṃtuṣya muktvā taṃ vaṇijaṃ vadhāt / samudraśūraṃ saṃmānya dhanai rājā visṛṣṭavān // 9.4.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sa ca prāptadhanaḥ krītabhāṇḍo bhūyo bhayaṃkaram / svadeśameṣyanvahanenottatārāmbudhiṃ vaṇik // 9.4.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tīrṇābdhiś ca tato gatvā sārthena saha sa kramāt / aṭavīṃ prāpadekasminvāsare divasātyaye // 9.4.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāmāvasite sārthe rātrau tasmiṃś ca jāgrati / samudraśūro nyapataccaurasenātra durjayā // 9.4.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
hanyamāne tayā sārthe bhāṇḍāṃstyaktvā palāyya saḥ / samūdraśūro nyagrodhamārūḍho 'bhūdalakṣitaḥ // 9.4.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
hṛtāśeṣadhane yāte caurasainye bhayākulaḥ / tatraiva tāṃ tarau rātriṃ duḥkhārtaś ca nināya saḥ // 9.4.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātas tasya taroḥ pṛṣṭhe gatadṛṣṭiḥ sa daivataḥ / dīpaprabhāmivāpaśyatsphurantīṃ pattramadhyagām // 9.4.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vismayāttatra cārūḍho gṛdhranīḍamavaikṣata / antaḥsthabhāsvarānargharatnābharaṇasaṃcayam // 9.4.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jagrāha tasmāt sarvaṃ tat tanmadhye prāpa kaṇṭhakam / taṃ sa yaṃ prāptavānsvarṇadvīpe gṛdhro 'harac ca yam // 9.4.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ prāptāmitadhano nyagrodhād avaruhya saḥ / hṛṣṭo gacchan kramāt prāpa nijaṃ harṣapuraṃ puram // 9.4.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tasthau vaṇikso 'tha vītānyadraviṇaspṛhaḥ / samudraśūraḥ svajanaiḥ saha nandanyathecchayā // 9.4.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
abdhau tatpatanaṃ so 'rthanāśastattaraṇaṃ tataḥ / sā kaṇṭhakasya ca prāptis tasyaivāpagamaḥ sa ca // 9.4.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā niṣkāraṇanigrāhyadaśāvāptiḥ sa tatkṣaṇam / tuṣṭvāddvīpeśvarāllābhastadabdhestaraṇaṃ punaḥ // 9.4.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'tha sarvāpahāraś ca pathiḥ sauraiḥ samāgamāt / paryante tasya vaṇijastarupṛṣṭhāddhanāgamaḥ // 9.4.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tadevamīdṛśaṃ deva vicitraṃ ceṣṭitaṃ vidheḥ / sukṛtī cānubhūyaiva duḥkham apy aśrute sukham // 9.4.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti gomukhataḥ śrutvā śraddhāyotthāya ca vyadhāt / naravāhanadatto 'tra snānādidivasakriyām // 9.4.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyedyuretya cāsthānagataṃ taṃ bālasevakaḥ / śūraḥ samaratuṅgākhyo rājaputro vyajijñapat // 9.4.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
deva saṅgrāmavarṣeṇa nāśito gotrajena me / deśaścaturbhir yuktena putrair vīrajitādibhiḥ // 9.4.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tadeṣa gatvā pañcāpi baddhvā tānānayāmy aham / prabhorviditamastvetadity uktvā tatra so 'gamat // 9.4.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tam alpasainyaṃ tān anyān bhūrisainyān avetya saḥ / vatseśvarasutas tasya dideśānu balaṃ nijam // 9.4.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'gṛhītvaiva tanmānī gatvā pañcāpi tānripūn / svabāhubhyāṃ raṇe jitvā saṃyamyānītavān samam // 9.4.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathā jayinamāyāntaṃ vīraṃ saṃmānya sa prabhuḥ / naravāhanadattas taṃ praśaśaṃsa svasevakam // 9.4.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
citram ākrāntaviṣayān sabalān indriyopamān / jitvānena ripūn pañca puruṣārthaḥ prasādhitaḥ // 9.4.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā gomukho 'vādīc chrutā ced deva nedṛśī / rājñaś camaravālasya kathā tac chṛṇu vacmi tām // 9.4.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hastināpuramityasti nagaraṃ tatra cābhavat / rājā cāmaravālākhyaḥ koṣadurgabalānvitaḥ // 9.4.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
babhūvus tasya samarabālādyā bhūmyanantarāḥ / rājāno gotrajāste ca saṃbhūyaivamacintayan // 9.4.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayaṃ camaravālo 'smānekaikaṃ bādhate sadā / tadete militāḥ sarve vidadhmo 'sya parābhavam // 9.4.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti saṃmantrya pañcaite tajjayāya yiyāsavaḥ / prasthānalagnaṃ kṣitipāḥ papracchurgaṇakaṃ rahaḥ // 9.4.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
apaśyansa śubhaṃ lagnaṃ paśyannaśakunāni ca / jagāda gaṇako nāsti lagnaṃ saṃvatsare 'tra vaḥ // 9.4.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yathā tathā ca yātānāṃ na yuṣmākaṃ bhavejjayaḥ / kiṃ cātra vo 'nubandhena samṛddhiṃ tasya paśyatām // 9.4.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhogo nāma phalaṃ lakṣmyāḥ sa tasmādadhiko 'sti vaḥ / na cecchrutā śrūyatāṃ tatkathātra vaṇijordvayoḥ // 9.4.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
babhūva kautukapuraṃ nāmeha nagaraṃ purā / tasminn anvarthanāmābhūd rājā bahusuvarṇakaḥ // 9.4.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
yaśovarmeti tasyāsītsevakaḥ kṣatriyo yuvā / tasmai dātāpi sa nṛpo nādātkiṃcitkadācana // 9.4.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
yadā yadā ca nṛpatistenārtyā yācyate sma saḥ / ādityaṃ darśayannevaṃ tam uvāca tadā tadā // 9.4.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahamicchāmi te dātuṃ kiṃ punarbhagavānayam / tubhyaṃ necchati me dātuṃ kiṃ karomyucyatāmiti // 9.4.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ so 'vasaraṃ cinvan yāvat tiṣṭhati duḥkhitaḥ / sūryoparāgasamayas tāvad atrāgato 'bhavat // 9.4.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatkālaṃ sa yaśovarmā gatvā satatasevakaḥ / nṛpaṃ bhūrimahādānapravṛttaṃ taṃ vyajijñapat // 9.4.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yo dadāti na te tubhyaṃ dātuṃ saiṣa raviḥ prabho / grasto 'dya vairiṇā yāvat tāvat kiṃcit prayaccha me // 9.4.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sa hasitvā ca dattadāno mahīpatiḥ / dadau vastrahiraṇyādi tasmai bahusuvarṇakam // 9.4.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kramattasmindhane bhukte khinnaḥ so 'dadati prabhau / mṛtajāniryaśovarmā prayayau vindhyavāsinīm // 9.4.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ nirarthena dehena jīvatāpi mṛtena me / tyakṣyāmyetaṃ puro devyā varaṃ prāpsyāmi vepsitam // 9.4.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityagre vindhyavāsinyāḥ saṃviṣṭo darbhasaṃstare / tanmanāḥ sa nirāhārastapo mahadatapyata // 9.4.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ādiśattaṃ ca sā svapne devī tuṣṭāsmi putra te / dadāmyarthaśriyaṃ kiṃ te kiṃ vā bhogaśriyaṃ vada // 9.4.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sa yaśovarma devīṃ tāṃ pratyabhāṣata / etayor nipuṇaṃ vedmi nāhaṃ bhedaṃ śriyoriti // 9.4.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tamavadaddevī svadeśe tarhi yau tava / bhogavarmārthavarmāṇau vidyete vaṇijāvubhau // 9.4.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tayor gatvā śriyaṃ paśya tato yatsadṛśī ca te / rociṣyate tatsadṛśī tvayāgatyārthyatāmiti // 9.4.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
etac chrutvā prabudhyaiva sa prātaḥ kṛtapāraṇaḥ / svadeśaṃ kautukaparaṃ yaśovarmā tato yayau // 9.4.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatrāgātprathamaṃ tāvat sa gṛhānarthavarmaṇaḥ / asaṃkhyahemaratnādivyavahārārjitaśriyaḥ // 9.4.168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
paśyaṃstāṃ saṃpadaṃ tasya yathāvattam upāyayau / kṛtātithyaś ca tenāsau bhojanāya nyamantryata // 9.4.169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'trābhuṅkta saghṛtaṃ samāṃsavyañjanaṃ ca saḥ / prāghuṇocitamāhāraṃ pārśve tasyārthavarmaṇaḥ // 9.4.170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthavarmā tu bhuṅkte sma ghṛtārdhapalasaṃyutān / saktūn bhaktam api stokaṃ māṃsavyañjanam alpakam // 9.4.171	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sārthavāha kimetāvadaśnāsīti sakautukam / sa yaśovarmaṇā pṛṣṭo vaṇigevam abhāṣata // 9.4.172	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adya tvaduparodhena samāṃsavyañjanaṃ mayā / bhuktaṃ stokaṃ ghṛtasyārdhapalaṃ bhuktaṃ ca saktavaḥ // 9.4.173	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sadā tu ghṛtakarṣaṃ ca saktūṃścāśnāmi kevalān / ato 'dhikaṃ me mandāgnerudare naiva jīryate // 9.4.174	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tac chrutvā sa yaśovarmā vicikitsannininda tām / hṛdayena śriyaṃ tasya viphalāmarthavarmaṇaḥ // 9.4.175	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato niśāgame bhaktaṃ kṣīraṃ cānāyayatpunaḥ / arthavarmā vaṇiktasya sa yaśovarmaṇaḥ kṛte // 9.4.176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yaśovarmā ca bhūyastadyathākāmamabhuṅkta saḥ / athavarmāpi sa tadā kīrasyekaṃ palaṃ papau // 9.4.177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatraiva caikasthāne tāv āstīrṇaśayanāv ubhau / yaśovarmārthavarmāṇau śanair nidrām upeyatuḥ // 9.4.178	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
niśīthe ca yaśovarmā svapne 'paśyad aśaṅkitam / praviṣṭān atra puruṣān daṇḍahastān bhayaṃkarān // 9.4.179	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
dhigalpābhyadhikaḥ karṣo ghṛtasya kimiti tvayā / māṃsaudanaś ca bhukto 'dya pītaṃ ca payasaḥ palam // 9.4.180	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti krodhādbruvāṇaistair ākṛṣyaivātha pādataḥ / puruṣair arthavarmā sa laguḍaiḥ paryatāḍyata // 9.4.181	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ghṛtakarṣapayomāṃsabhaktam abhyadhikaṃ ca yat / bhuktaṃ tatsarvamudarādācakarṣuś ca tasya te // 9.4.182	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
taddṛṣṭvā sa yaśovarmā prabuddho yāvadīkṣate / tāvattasyāyayau śūlaṃ vibuddhasyārthavarmaṇaḥ // 9.4.183	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ krandan parijanair madyamānodaraś ca saḥ / vamati smārthavarmā tadadhikaṃ yat sa bhuktavān // 9.4.184	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
śāntaśūle tatas tasminyaśovarmā vyacintayat / dhigdhigarthaśriyamimāṃ yasyā bhogo 'yamīdṛśaḥ // 9.4.185	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
khalīkṛteyamīdṛśyā bhūyādabhavaniḥ śriyaḥ / ityantaścintayanso 'tra rātriṃ tāmatyavāhayat // 9.4.186	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātastamarthavarmāṇamāmantryaṃ sa yayau tataḥ / yaśovarmā gṛhaṃ tasya vaṇijo bhogavarmaṇaḥ // 9.4.187	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrābhyāgādyathāvattaṃ tenāpi ca kṛtādaraḥ / nimantrito 'bhūdvaṇijā tadaharbhojanāya saḥ // 9.4.188	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
na cāsya vaṇijo 'paśyatsa kāṃciddhanasaṃpadam / apaśyattu śubhaṃ veśma vāsāṃsyabharaṇāni ca // 9.4.189	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sthite yaśovarmaṇy asmin prāvartatātra saḥ / bhogavarmā vaṇik kartuṃ vyavahāraṃ nijocitam // 9.4.190	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyasmādbhāṇḍamādāya dadāvanyasya tatkṣaṇam / vinaiva svadhanaṃ mahyāddīnārānudapādayast // 9.4.191	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvaritaṃ tān sa dīnārān bhṛtyahaste visṛṣṭavān / svabhāryāyai vicitrann apānasaṃpādanāya ca // 9.4.192	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣaṇāc ca suhṛdekastamicchābharaṇanāmakaḥ / upāgatyaiva rabhasādbhogavarmāṇam abhyadhāt // 9.4.193	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
siddhaṃ bhojanamasmākamuttiṣṭhāgaccha bhuñjmahe / suhṛdo militā hy anye tvatpratīkṣāḥ sthitā iti // 9.4.194	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adyāhaṃ nāgamiṣyāmi prāghuṇo 'yaṃ sthito hi me / iti bruvāṇaṃ punarapyenaṃ sa suhṛdabravīt // 9.4.195	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
bhavatā samamāyātu tarhi prāghuṇiko 'py ayam / eṣo 'pi na kimasmākaṃ mittramuttiṣṭha satvaram // 9.4.196	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity āgrahād bhogavarmā nīto mittreṇa tena saḥ / yaśovarmayuto gatvā bhuṅkte smāharam uttamam // 9.4.197	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
pītvā ca pānam āgatya sāyaṃ sa svagṛhe punaḥ / sa yaśovarmako bheje vicitraṃ pānabhojanam // 9.4.198	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāptāyāṃ niśi papraccha nijaṃ parijanaṃ ca saḥ / kimadya rātriparyāptamasti naḥ sarakaṃ na vā // 9.4.199	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svāminnāstīti tenoktaḥ sa bheje śayanaṃ vaṇik / pāsyāmo 'pararātre 'dya kathaṃ jalamiti bruvan // 9.4.200	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yaśovarmātha tatpārśve suptaḥ svapne 'tra dṛṣṭavān / praviṣṭhān puruṣān dvitrān anyāṃs teṣāṃ ca pṛṣṭhataḥ // 9.4.201	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kasmād apararātrārthaṃ sarakaṃ bhogavarmaṇaḥ / cintitaṃ nādya yuṣmābhiḥ kva bhavadbhiḥ sthitaṃ śaṭhāḥ // 9.4.202	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti paścāt praviṣṭās te puruṣā daṇḍapāṇayaḥ / pūrvapraviṣṭān krodhāt tān daṇḍāghātair atāḍayan // 9.4.203	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
aparādho 'yameko naḥ kṣamyatāmiti vādinaḥ / daṇḍāhatās te puruṣās te cānye niragus tataḥ // 9.4.204	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
yaśovarmātha taddṛṣṭvā prabuddhaḥ samacintayat / acintyopanatiḥ ślāghā bhogaśrīrbhogavarmaṇaḥ // 9.4.205	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhogahīnā samṛddhāpi nārthaśrīrarthavarmaṇaḥ / iti cintayatas tasya sāticakrāma yāminī // 9.4.206	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātaś ca sa yaśovarmā tamāmantrya vaṇigvaram / jagāma vindhyavāsinyāḥ pādamūlaṃ punas tataḥ // 9.4.207	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tapaḥsthaḥ svapnadṛṣṭāyāstasyāḥ pūrvoktayor dvayoḥ / śriyorbhogaśriyaṃ tatra vavre sāsmai dadau ca tām // 9.4.208	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

ahaṃ tayā hi tatrasthaḥ kadācitpreṣya ceṭikām / āhūto 'ntapuraṃ tasyā rājaputryā gato 'bhavam // 9.5.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

api rājarṣayo yatra purā daśarathādayaḥ / svargārtham aicchaṃs tatrāmba kathaṃ necchantu mādṛśāḥ // 9.5.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)

tarhi putra vadāmyekaṃ yam upāyaṃ kuruṣva tam / gatvā svāmikumāraṃ tvametadarthaṃ prasādaya // 9.5.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kumāradhārāṃ vighnāya patantīṃ mūrdhni duḥsahām / śarīrāntaḥpraviṣṭāyāḥ prabhavānme sahiṣyase // 9.5.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vighnajātaṃ vijityānyadapi prāpsyasi vāñchitam / ity uktvāntardadhe nāgī rājā hṛṣṭo 'kṣipatkṣapām // 9.5.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātarmantriṣu vinyasya rājyaṃ putrābhikāṅkṣayā / yayau svāmikumārasya pādamūlaṃ sa bhūpatiḥ // 9.5.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tīvraṃ tapaścakre tamārādhayituṃ prabhum / tayārpitabalo nāgyā śarīrāntaḥpraviṣṭayā // 9.5.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'śaninibhā rājñaḥ patituṃ tasya mūrdhani / kumāravāridhārā sā pravṛttābhūdanāratam // 9.5.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca sehe śarīrāntargatanāgībalena tām / tatas tasyādhivighnārthaṃ herambaṃ prair ayadguhaḥ // 9.5.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
herambaścāsṛjattatra dhārāmadhye mahāviṣam / tasyājagaramatyugraṃ na sa tenāpyakampata // 9.5.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vināyakaḥ sākṣāddantāghātānuraḥsthale / etya dātuṃ pravavṛte tasyājayyaḥ surair api // 9.5.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
matvā taṃ durjayaṃ devaṃ so 'tha stutibhir arcitum / rājā kanakavarṣastadviṣahyaivopacakrame // 9.5.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
namaḥ sarvārthasaṃsiddhinidhikumbhopamātmane / lambodarāya vighneśa vyālālaṃkaraṇāya te // 9.5.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
līlotkṣiptakarāghātavidhutāsanapaṅkajam / brahmāṇam apisotkampaṃ kurvañjaya gajānana // 9.5.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
surāsuramunīndrāṇām apisanti na siddhayaḥ / atuṣṭe tvayi lokaikaśaraṇye śaṃkarapriya // 9.5.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ghaṭodaraḥ śūrpakarṇo gaṇādhyakṣo madotkaṭaḥ / pāśahasto 'mbarīṣaś ca jambakastriśikhāyudhaḥ // 9.5.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
evamādyaiḥ stuvanti sma pāpaghnair aṣṭaṣaṣṭibhiḥ / tatsaṃkhyasthānaniyatair nāmabhistvāṃ surottamāḥ // 9.5.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
smarataḥ stuvataś ca tvāṃ vinaśyati bhayaṃ prabho / raṇarājakuladyūtacaurāgniśvāpadādijam // 9.5.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti stutipadair etair anyair bahuvidhaiś ca saḥ / nṛpaḥ kanakavarṣastaṃ vighneśvaramapūjayat // 9.5.168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tuṣṭo 'smi na kariṣyāmi vighnaṃ te putramāpnuhi / ity uktvāntardadhe tatra rājñas tasya sa vighnajit // 9.5.169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ svāmikumārastaṃ taddhārādhāriṇaṃ nṛpam / uvāca dhīra tuṣṭo 'smi tava yācasva tadvaram // 9.5.170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sa prahṛṣṭastaṃ devaṃ rājā vyajijñapat / tvatprasādena me nātha sūnurutpadyatāmiti // 9.5.171	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evamastu suto bhāvī bhavato madgaṇāṃśajaḥ / nāmnā hiraṇyavarṣaś ca bhaviṣyati sa bhūpate // 9.5.172	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā garbhagehāntaḥ praveśāya tamāhvayat / saviśeṣaprasādepsur nṛpatiṃ barhivāhanaḥ // 9.5.173	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tenādṛśyāsya niragānnāgī dehānnṛpasya sā / viśanti śāpabhītā hi na kumāragṛhaṃ striyaḥ // 9.5.174	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ kanakavarṣo 'sau svena mānuṣatejasā / viveśa garbhabhavanaṃ tasya devasya pāvakeḥ // 9.5.175	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
sa taṃ nāgyanadhiṣṭhānātpūrvatejovinākṛtam / dṛṣṭvā nṛpaṃ kim etat syād iti devo 'py acintayat // 9.5.176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jñātvā nāgībalavyājanirvyūḍhaviṣamavratam / praṇidhānāc ca taṃ kruddhaḥ śaśāpa sa nṛpaṃ guhaḥ // 9.5.177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

nirghātadāruṇaṃ śrutvā śāpametaṃ sa bhūpatiḥ / sūktaistuṣṭāva taṃ devaṃ mohaṃ muktvā mahākaviḥ // 9.5.179	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa subhāṣitatuṣṭo 'tha ṣaṇmukhastam abhāṣata / rājaṃstuṣṭo 'smi sūktaiste śāpāntaṃ tava vacmi tat // 9.5.180	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tatra tasyāmṛtasyando jyotsnāyām iva śītagoḥ / devyāṃ madanasundaryāṃ kramātsūnurajāyata // 9.5.183	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvā sutamukhaṃ so 'tha rājā rājñī ca sā muhuḥ / atyānandasamāyukte nāvartetāṃ tadātmani // 9.5.184	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkālaṃ cotsavaṃ cakre vasu varṣan sa bhūpatiḥ / nijāṃ kanakavarṣākhyāṃ nayan bhuvi yathārthatām // 9.5.185	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pañcarātre gate ṣaṣṭhyāṃ rajanau jātaveśmani / kṛte rakṣāvidhau tatra megho 'śaṅkitamāgataḥ // 9.5.186	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena vṛddhimavāptena tatrāvavre nabhaḥ kramāt / śatruṇopekṣiteneva rājyaṃ rājñaḥ pramādinaḥ // 9.5.187	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
madasyeva kṣipandhārā varṣasyonmūlitadrumaḥ / tato dhāvitumārebhe vātamattamataṅgajaḥ // 9.5.188	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkṣaṇaṃ sārgalam apidvāramudghāṭya bhīṣaṇā / strī kāpi kṣurikāhastā jātaveśma viveśa tat // 9.5.189	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā taṃ madanasundaryāḥ stanāsaktamukhaṃ sutam / hṛtvā devyāḥ pradudrāva saṃmohyaiva paricchadam // 9.5.190	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hā hā hṛto me rākṣasyā suta ityatha vihvalā / krandantī cānvadhāvattāṃ rājñī sā strīṃ tamasyapi // 9.5.191	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā ca gatvā papāta strī sarasyantaḥ sabālakā / rājñī cānvapatatsāpi tatraivāpatyatṛṣṇayā // 9.5.192	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣaṇānmegho nivavṛte jagāmāntaṃ ca yāminī / jātaveśmani cākrandaḥ parivārasya śuśruve // 9.5.193	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājā kanakavarṣo 'tha tac chrutvā jātavāsakam / etya putrapriyāśūnyaṃ dṛṣṭvā mohaṃ jagāma saḥ // 9.5.194	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
samāśvasya ca hā devi hā putraka śiśo iti / vilapannatha sasmāra śāpaṃ taṃ vatsarāvadhim // 9.5.195	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

bhrāmyaṃstṛṣṇātapaklānto vindhyapādamavāpya saḥ / pītanirjharapānīyastarumūla upāviśat // 9.5.202	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

sevayā prārthitenātra tvayā sāhāyake kṛte / vidyādharatvaṃ prāpto 'smi vīravetālasādhanāt // 9.5.208	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tena tvaṃ pratyabhijñāya kartuṃ te pratyupakriyām / tvajjighāṃsurayaṃ dṛṣṭvā siṃho vyapadito mayā // 9.5.209	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nāmnā bandhuprabhaścādya saṃvṛtto 'smīti vādinam / rājā kanakavarṣastaṃ jātaprītirabhāṣata // 9.5.210	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hanta smarāmi sā ceha maittrī nirvāhitā tvayā / tadbrūhi me kadā bhāvī bhāryāputrasamāgamaḥ // 9.5.211	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā buddhvā vidyāprabhāvataḥ / vidyādharo 'bravīdbandhuprabhastaṃ sa mahībhṛtam // 9.5.212	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭayā vindhyavāsinyā patnīputrau tvamāpsyasi / tattatra gaccha siddhyai tvaṃ svalokaṃ ca vrajāmy aham // 9.5.213	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā khaṃ gate tasminrājā labdhadhṛtiḥ śanaiḥ / prāyātkanakavarṣo 'sau draṣṭuṃ tāṃ vindhyavāsinīm // 9.5.214	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gacchantam abhyadhāvat taṃ nṛpaṃ vanyo mahān pathi / adhūtamastako mattaḥ prasāritakaraḥ karī // 9.5.215	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ dṛṣṭvā śvabhramārgeṇa sa rājāpāsarat tathā / yathānudhāvansa gajo vipede śvabhrapātataḥ // 9.5.216	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tataḥ so 'dhvaśramāyāsaklānto rājā vrajan kramāt / uddaṇḍapuṇḍarīkāḍhyaṃ prāpad ekaṃ mahatsaraḥ // 9.5.217	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra snātvā ca pītvā ca jalaṃ jagdhamṛṇālakaḥ / viśrāntaḥ pādapatale kṣaṇaṃ jahre sa nidrayā // 9.5.218	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tāvac ca tena mṛgayānivṛttāḥ śabarāḥ pathā / āgatā dadṛśuḥ suptaṃ taṃ rājānaṃ sulakṣaṇam // 9.5.219	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
te ca devyupahārāryaṃ baddhvā ninyustadaiva tam / svasya muktāphalākhyasya pārśvaṃ śabarabhūbhṛtaḥ // 9.5.220	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tadālokyādbhutaṃ matvā tasya taṃ devyanugraham / mumoca taṃ sa rājānaṃ śabarādhipatirvadhāt // 9.5.223	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ kanakavarṣasya tṛtīyādapamṛtyutaḥ / atikrāntasya tasyābhūtpūrṇaṃ tacchāpavatsaram // 9.5.224	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
