ity uktvā praṇataṃ sā taṃ nṛpaṃ nāgī tirodadhe / nṛpo 'pi svapnam iva tanmene bhāryāsutāgamam // 9.5.228	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tato 'sya rājño rājñyāś ca cirād āśliṣṭayor mithaḥ / agaladvirahakleśo harṣabāṣpāmbubhiḥ saha // 9.5.229	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ kanakavarṣaṃ taṃ buddhvā pṛthvīpatiṃ prabhum / muktāphalo 'patattasya śabarendraḥ sa pādayoḥ // 9.5.230	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣamayitvā ca pallīṃ svāṃ praveśya ca nijocitaiḥ / taistaiḥ sasutadāraṃ tam upacārair upācarat // 9.5.231	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'tha tatra sthito rājā dūtair ānāyayannṛpam / śvaśuraṃ devaśaktiṃ taṃ svasainyaṃ ca nijātpurāt // 9.5.232	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athāsthitakareṇukā madanasundarī tāṃ priyāṃ sutaṃ ca śarajanmanoditahiraṇyavarṣābhidham / vidhāya puratas tataḥ śvaśuraveśmavāsāditaś cacāla sa tadanvitaḥ kanakavarṣapṛthvīpatiḥ // 9.5.233	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
avāpa ca sa vāsaraiḥ katipayair gṛhaṃ śvāśuraṃ vidarbhaviṣayāśritaṃ tadatha kuṇḍinākhyaṃ puram / samṛddhimati tatra ca śvaśurasatkṛtaḥ kānicid dinānyabhajata sthitiṃ tanayadārasenāyutaḥ // 9.5.234	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
prasthāya tataś ca śanaiḥ kanakapuraṃ prāptavānnijaṃ nagaram / pauravadhūjananayanaiścirotsukaiḥ pīyamāna iva // 9.5.235	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
aviśac ca rājadhānīṃ sutasahito madanasundarīyuktaḥ / utsava iva vigrahavān pramodaśobhānvitaḥ sa nṛpaḥ // 9.5.236	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
abhiṣicya baddhapaṭṭāṃ tatra ca tāṃ madanasundarīmakarot / sarvāntaḥpuramukhyāmabhyudaye mānitaprakṛtiḥ // 9.5.237	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
devyā tayā saha sutena ca tena baddhanityotsavaḥ punar adṛṣṭaviyogaduḥkhaḥ / niṣkaṇṭakaṃ kanakavarṣanareśvaro 'tha bhūmaṇḍalaṃ sacaturantamidaṃ śaśāsa // 9.5.238	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
iti gomukhataḥ svamantrimukhyād rucirāṃ tatra kathāmimāṃ niśamya / naravāhanadattarājaputraḥ sadalaṃkāravatīyutastutoṣa // 9.5.239	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
tataḥ sa gomukhākhyātakathātuṣṭaḥ priyāsakhaḥ / dṛṣṭvā sakopavikṛtiṃ marubhūtiṃ tadīrṣyayā // 9.6.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
naravāhanadattas taṃ nijagādānurañjayan / marubhūte tvam apy ekāṃ kiṃ nākhyāsi kathām iti // 9.6.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa bāḍhamākhyāmīty uktvā tuṣṭena cetasā / samākhyātuṃ kathāmetāṃ marubhūtiḥ pracakrame // 9.6.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
candrasvāmītyabhūtpūrvaṃ rājñaḥ kamalavarmaṇaḥ / nagare deva kamalapurākhye brahmaṇottamaḥ // 9.6.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tasya lakṣmīsarasvatyostṛtīyā vinayojjvalā / bhāryā devamatir nāma samānā sumaterabhūt // 9.6.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāṃ tasya ca viprasya patnyāṃ jajñe sulakṣaṇaḥ / putraḥ sa yasya jātasya vāgevamudagāddivaḥ // 9.6.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
candrasvāmīnmahīpālo nāmnā kāryaḥ sutastvayā / rājā bhūtvā ciraṃ yasmātpālayiṣyatyayaṃ mahīm // 9.6.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etaddivyaṃ vacaḥ śrutvā sa mahīpālam eva tam / candrasvāmisutaṃ nāmna cakāra racitotsavaḥ // 9.6.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kramāc ca sa mahīpālo vivṛddho grāhito 'bhavat / śastrāstravedaṃ vidyāsu samaṃ sarvāsu śikṣitaḥ // 9.6.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tāvac ca suṣuve tasya sā candrasvāminaḥ punaḥ / bhāryā devamatiḥ kanyāṃ sarvāvayavasundarīm // 9.6.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā ca candravatī nāma mahīpālaḥ sa ca kramāt / bhrātarau vavṛdhāte tau svapitus tasya veśmani // 9.6.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athāvṛṣṭikṛtas tatra deśe durbhikṣaviplavaḥ / udapadyata dagdheṣu sasyeṣu raviraśmibhiḥ // 9.6.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taddoṣeṇa ca rājātra prārebhe taskarāyitum / adharmeṇa prajābhyo 'rthamākarṣanmuktasatpathaḥ // 9.6.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'vasīd atyatyarthaṃ deśe tasminn uvāca sā / bhāryā devamatir vipraṃ candrasvāminam atra tam // 9.6.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
āgaccha matpitṛgṛhaṃ vrajāmo nagarāditaḥ / ete hy apatye naśyetāmāvayor iha jātucit // 9.6.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tac chrutvā tāṃ sa vakti sma candrasvāmī svagehinīm / maivaṃ pāpaṃ mahadgehāddurbhikṣe hi palāyanam // 9.6.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadahaṃ bālakāvetau nītvā tatpitṛveśmani / sthāpayāmi tvamāsveha śīghraṃ caiṣyāmyahaṃ punaḥ // 9.6.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā sthāpayitvā tāṃ tathety uktavatīṃ gṛhe / bhāryāṃ ca candrasvāmī tau gṛhītvā dārakau nijau // 9.6.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
mahīpālaṃ ca taṃ tāṃ ca kanyāṃ candravatīmubhau / tataḥ pratasthe nagarātpatnīṃ pitṛgṛhaṃ prati // 9.6.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
gacchan kramāt tricaturair dinaiḥ prāpa mahāṭavīm / arkāṃśutaptasikatāṃ viśuṣkaviraladrumām // 9.6.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tasyāṃ tṛṣābhibhūtau tau sthāpayitvā sa dārakau / candrasvāmī yayau dūramanveṣṭuṃ vāri tatkṛte // 9.6.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tasyāyayāvagre sānugaḥ śabarādhipaḥ / akasmātsiṃhadaṃṣṭrākhyaḥ kāryāya prasthitaḥ kva cit // 9.6.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa taṃ dṛṣṭvānna pṛṣṭvā ca buddhvā bhillo jalārthinam / saṃjñāṃ kṛtvābravīdbhṛtyānnītvāmbhaḥ prāpyatāmayam // 9.6.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā tasya bhṛtyāste dvitrā labdhāśayā ṛjum / te candrasvāminaṃ pallīṃ nītvā baddhamakurvata // 9.6.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
naropahārāyātmānaṃ tebhyo buddhvā sa saṃyatam / candrasvāmī śuśoca svau dārakāvaṭavīgatau // 9.6.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
hā mahīpāla hā vatse candravatyapade katham / mayāraṇye yuvāṃ tyaktvā siṃhavyaghrāmiṣīkṛtau // 9.6.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ātmā ca ghātitaścaurair na cāsti śaraṇaṃ mama / ityākrandansa vipro 'rkaṃ vyomnyapaśyadasaṃmadāt // 9.6.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hanta mohaṃ vihāyaitaṃ svaṃ prabhuṃ śaraṇaṃ śraye / ityālocya dvijaḥ sūryaṃ sa stotum upacakrame // 9.6.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tubhyaṃ paraparākāśaśāyine jyotiṣe vibho / ābhyantaraṃ ca bāhyaṃ ca tamaḥ praṇudate namaḥ // 9.6.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvaṃ viṣṇustrijagadvyāpī tvaṃ śivaḥ śreyasāṃ nidhiḥ / suptaṃ viceṣṭayanviśvaṃ paramastvaṃ prajāpatiḥ // 9.6.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aprakāśau prakāśetāmetāsvityagnicandrayoḥ / nyastātmatejā dayayevāntardhiṃ yāsi yāminīm // 9.6.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
vidravanty api rakṣāṃsi prabhavanti na dasyavaḥ / pramodante ca guṇino bhāsvannabhyudite tvayi // 9.6.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tadrakṣa śaraṇāpannaṃ trailokyaikapradīpa mām / idaṃ duḥkhāndhakāraṃ me vidāraya dayāṃ kuru // 9.6.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityādibhistadā vākyair bhaktyā stutavato ravim / candrasvāmidvijasyāsya gaganāduccacāra vāk // 9.6.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tuṣṭo 'smi candrasvāmiṃs te na tvaṃ vadhamavāpsyasi / matprasādāc ca putrādisaṃgamas te bhaviṣyati // 9.6.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukto divyayā vācā jātasthas tatra tasthivān / candrasvāmī sa śabaropāhṛtasnānabhojanaḥ // 9.6.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tāvac ca taṃ mahīpālaṃ svasrā yuktamaraṇyagam / pitary anāyaty ākrandavidhuraṃ śaṅkitāśubham // 9.6.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
dadarśa tena mārgeṇa sārthavāhaḥ samāgataḥ / mahānsārthadharo nāma vṛttāntaṃ pṛcchati sma ca // 9.6.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tamāśvāsya kṛpayā śiśuṃ dṛṣṭvā sulakṣaṇam / sārthavāho nināya svaṃ deśaṃ svasṛsakhaṃ tataḥ // 9.6.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāsītsa mahīpālo bālye 'py agnikriyārataḥ / sadane tasya vaṇijaḥ putrasnehena paśyataḥ // 9.6.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ekadā nṛpatermantrī tārāpuranivāsinaḥ / tārādharmābhidhānasya kāryāttenāgataḥ pathā // 9.6.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
viveśa sārthavāhasya tasya mittraṃ dvijottamaḥ / gṛhān anantasvāmīti sahastyaśvapadātikaḥ // 9.6.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sa viśrānto 'tra taṃ dṛṣṭvā mahīpālaṃ śubhākṛtim / japāgnikāryādirataṃ vṛttāntaṃ paripṛcchya ca // 9.6.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
anapatyo viditvā ca savarṇaṃ sārthavāhataḥ / tasmādyayāce 'patyārthī mantrī tadbhaginīṃ ca tām // 9.6.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatas tau tena vaiśyena dattāvādāya dārakau / sārthavāhena so 'nantasvāmī tārāpuraṃ yayau // 9.6.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra putrīkṛtastena mahīpālaḥ sa mantriṇā / tasthau tadbhavane 'py asya vidyāvipulasaṃpadi // 9.6.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atrāntare ca baddhaṃ taṃ candrasvāminametya saḥ / bhillādhipaḥ siṃhadaṃṣṭraḥ pallyāṃ tasyām abhāṣata // 9.6.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
brahmansvapne 'hamādiṣṭas tathā devena bhānunā / yathā saṃpūjya moktavyo na hantavyo mayā bhavān // 9.6.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taduttiṣṭha vraja svecchamity uktvā sa mumoca tam / prattamuktāmṛgamadaṃ kḷptāraṇyānuyātrikam // 9.6.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
so 'tha muktastataścandrasvāmī tamanujāyutam / aprāpyāraṇyataḥ putraṃ mahīpālaṃ gaveṣayan // 9.6.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhramannabdhestaṭe prāpya nāmnā jalapuraṃ puram / praviveśātithirbhūtvā gṛhaṃ viprasya kasyacit // 9.6.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra bhuktottarākhyātasvavṛttāntaṃ prasaṅgataḥ / taṃ sa vipro gṛhapatiścandrasvāminam abhyadhāt // 9.6.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
vaṇikkanakavarmākhyo 'tīteṣvāgāddineṣviha / tenāṭavyāṃ svasṛsakhaḥ prāpto brāhmaṇadārakaḥ // 9.6.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tau cādāyātibhavyau dvau dārakau sa ito gataḥ / nārikelamahādvīpe noktaṃ tannāma tena tu // 9.6.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā māmakāveva nūnaṃ tāviti cintayan / candrasvāmī matiṃ cakre gantuṃ dvīpavaraṃ sa tam // 9.6.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nītvā ca rātrimanviṣya vaṇijā viṣṇuvarmaṇā / sa vyadhātsaṃgatiṃ dvīpaṃ nārikelaṃ prayāsyatā // 9.6.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tenaiva ca sahāruhya yānapātraṃ jagāma saḥ / candrasvāmī sutasnehād dvīpam abdhipathena tam // 9.6.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra pṛcchantamūcustaṃ vaṇijastannivāsinaḥ / vaṇikkanakavarmākhyaḥ kāmamāsīdihāgataḥ // 9.6.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
surūpāvaṭavīprāptāvādāya dvijadārakau / gataḥ kaṭāhadvīpaṃ tu tadyuktaḥ sa ito 'dhunā // 9.6.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tac chrutvā sa tato vipro vaṇijā dānavarmaṇā / potena gacchatā sākaṃ kaṭāhadvīpamabhyagāt // 9.6.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāpi sa dvijo 'śrauṣīd gataṃ taṃ vaṇijaṃ tataḥ / dvīpāt kanakavarmāṇaṃ dvīpaṃ karpūrasaṃjñakam // 9.6.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ krameṇa karpūrasuvarṇadvīpasiṃhalān / vaṇigbhiḥ saha gatvāpi taṃ prāpa vaṇijaṃ na saḥ // 9.6.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
siṃhalebhyastu śuśrāva gataṃ taṃ vaṇijaṃ nijam / deśaṃ kanakavarmāṇaṃ citrakūṭābhidhaṃ puram // 9.6.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ koṭīśvarākhyena vaṇijā sa samaṃ yayau / candrasvāmī citrakūṭaṃ tatpotottīrṇavāridhiḥ // 9.6.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
tasmin kanakavarmāṇaṃ vaṇijaṃ tam avāpa saḥ / ācakhyau cākhilaṃ tasmai svodantaṃ dārakotsukaḥ // 9.6.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ kanakavarmā tau jñātārtiḥ so 'sya dārakau / darśayām āsa yau tena labdhā nītavaraṇyataḥ // 9.6.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
candrasvāmī ca tau yāvadvīkṣate dārakāvubhau / tāvannaiva tadīyau tau tāvanyāveva kaucana // 9.6.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sabāṣpaṃ śokārto nirāśo vilalāpa saḥ / iyadbhrāntvāpi hā prāpto na putro na sutā mayā // 9.6.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
dhātrā kuprabhuṇevāśā darśitā me na pūritā / bhrāmito 'smi ca mithyaiva dūrāddūraṃ durātmanā // 9.6.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityādi śocanvaṇijā kramātkanakavarmaṇā / āśvāsitaḥ sa tenātha candrasvāmī śucābravīt // 9.6.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vatsareṇātmajau tau cenna prāpsyāmi bhuvaṃ bhraman / tatastyakṣyāmi tapasā gaṅgātīre śarīrakam // 9.6.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ity uktavantaṃ tatrastho jñānī ko'pi tam abhyadhat / nārāyaṇyāḥ prasādāttau prāpsyasyevātmajau vraja // 9.6.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sa prahṛṣṭātmā bhāskarānugrahaṃ smaran / vaṇigbhiḥ pūjitaḥ prāyāccandrasvāmī purāttataḥ // 9.6.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'grahārān grāmāṃś ca cinvan sa nagarāṇi ca / bhraman prāpaikadā sāyaṃ vanaṃ prāṃśubahudrumam // 9.6.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra kṣapayituṃ rātriṃ kṛtvā vṛttiṃ phalāmbubhiḥ / sa tasthau tarumāruhya siṃhavyāghrādiśaṅkayā // 9.6.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anidraś ca niśīthe 'tra dadarśa sa taroradhaḥ / mahannārāyaṇīmukhyaṃ mātṛcakraṃ samāgatam // 9.6.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upahārānsamāhṛtya nānārūpānnijocitān / pratīkṣamāṇaṃ devasya bhair avasya kilāgamam // 9.6.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
cirayaty adya kiṃ deva iti tatra ca mātaraḥ / nārāyaṇīm athāpṛcchan sā jahāsa tu nābravīt // 9.6.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atinirbandhapṛṣṭā ca tābhistāḥ pratyuvāca sā / lajjāvahaṃ yadapyetatsakhyastadapi vacmy aham // 9.6.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
astīha surasenākhyo rājā surapure pure / tasya vidyādharī nāma khyātarūpāsti cātmajā // 9.6.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pradeyāyāś ca tenāsyā rājñā rūpasamaḥ śrutaḥ / vimalākhyasya tanayo rājño nāmnā prabhākaraḥ // 9.6.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tasmai ditsati tāṃ tasminrājñi tenāpi sā śrutā / vimalena sutā asya nijaputrānurūpikā // 9.6.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa vimalastasmātsurasenādayācata / vidyādharīṃ dūtamukhātputrārthe tāṃ tadātmajām // 9.6.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
so 'py apekṣitasaṃpattyā tatsutāya sutāmadāt / prabhākarāya tasmai tāṃ suraseno yathāvidhi // 9.6.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sā prapya vimalapurākhyaṃ śvāśuraṃ puram / vidyādharī samaṃ bhartrā śayanīyam agān niśi // 9.6.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāsaṃbhogasuptaṃ sā patiṃ sotkā prabhākaram / yāvannirīkṣate tāvattamapaśyannapuṃsakam // 9.6.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hā hatāsmiḥ kathaṃ ṣaṇḍhaḥ patiḥ prāpto mayeti sā / śocantī cetasā rātriṃ rājaputrī nināya tām // 9.6.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
napuṃsakāya dattāhamananviṣya kathaṃ tvayā / iti lekhaṃ likhitvā ca pitre sā prāhiṇottataḥ // 9.6.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa lekhaṃ vācayitvaiva vimalenāsmi vañcitaḥ / chadmanetyagamatkrodhaṃ tatpitā vimalaṃ prati // 9.6.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sutāṃ napuṃsakāyāhaṃ yadvyājād dāpitas tvayā / putrāya tatphalaṃ bhuṅkṣva paśya tvām etya hanmy aham // 9.6.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti tasmai svalekhena saṃdideśa sa bhūpatiḥ / suraseno balodrikto vimalāya mahīkṣite // 9.6.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vimalaścādhigatyaitaṃ tallekhārthaṃ samantrikaḥ / vimṛśandurjaye tasminnopāyaṃ kaṃcidaikṣata // 9.6.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas taṃ piṅgadattākhyo mantrī vimalam abhyadhāt / eka evāstyupāyo 'tra taṃ deva śreyase kuru // 9.6.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asti sthūlaśirā nāma yakṣas tasya ca vedmy aham / mantramārādhanaṃ yena varamiṣṭaṃ dadāti saḥ // 9.6.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tenopāttena mantreṇa yakṣamārādhya saṃprati / liṅgaṃ yācasva putrārthaṃ sadyaḥ śāmyatu vigrahaḥ // 9.6.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukto mantriṇā tasmān mantram ādāya taṃ nṛpaḥ / sutārthaṃ yakṣamārādhya sa taṃ liṅgamayācata // 9.6.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena saṃprati datte ca liṅge yakṣeṇa tatsutaḥ / pumān prabhākaraḥ so 'bhūd yakṣas tvāsīn napuṃsakaḥ // 9.6.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā tu vidyādharī dṛṣṭvā pumāṃsaṃ taṃ prabhākaram / tena patyā sahāvāptaratasaukhyā vyacintayat // 9.6.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhrāntāhaṃ madadoṣeṇa na me bhartā napuṃsakaḥ / pumānevaiṣa subhago nātra kāryānyathā matiḥ // 9.6.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ityālocyainamevārthaṃ likhitvā lajjitā punaḥ / pitre sā prāhiṇollekhaṃ śamaṃ bheje ca tena saḥ // 9.6.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etaṃ jñātvā ca vṛttāntaṃ bhair aveṇādya kupyatā / ānāyya sa sthulaśirāḥ śapto devena guhyakaḥ // 9.6.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
liṅgatyāgena ṣaṇḍhatvamāśritaṃ yattvayā tataḥ / ṣaṇḍha eva bhavājīvaṃ pumān so 'stu prabhākaraḥ // 9.6.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ napuṃsakībhūto guhyakaḥ so 'dya duḥkhabhāk / prabhākaraś ca puruṣībhūto bhogasukhāya saḥ // 9.6.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tadetenādya kāryeṇa devasyāgamane manāk / jāto vilambaḥ kṣiprāc ca jānītāgatam eva tam // 9.6.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
iti nārāyaṇī devī mātṛryāvadbravīti sā / devaścakreśvarastāvadāyayau so 'tra bhair ava // 9.6.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃpūjitaś ca sarvābhir upahāraiḥ sa mātṛbhiḥ / tāṇḍavena kṣaṇaṃ nṛtyannakrīḍadyoginīsakhaḥ // 9.6.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac ca sarvaṃ taroḥ pṛṣṭhāccandrasvāmī vilokayan / nārāyaṇyā dadarśaikāṃ dāsīṃ sāpi tamaikṣata // 9.6.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyonyasābhilāṣau ca daivāddvau tau babhūvatuḥ / sā ca nārāyaṇī devī tathābhūtau viveda tau // 9.6.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gate 'tha mātṛsahite bhair ave sā vilambya tam / nārāyaṇī pādapasthaṃ candrasvāminamāhvayat // 9.6.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
avaruhyāgataṃ taṃ ca svadāsīṃ tāṃ ca sā tataḥ / papraccha kaccidanyonyamabhilāṣo 'sti vāmiti // 9.6.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asti devīti vijñaptā tābhyāṃ tathyaṃ tataś ca sā / devī vimuktakopā taṃ candrasvāminam abhyadhāt // 9.6.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
satyenoktena tuṣṭāhaṃ yuvayor na śapāmi vām / dadāmyetāṃ tu dāsīṃ te bhavataṃ nirvṛtau yuvām // 9.6.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā so 'bravīdvipro devi yady api cañcalam / mano ruṇadhmi tadapi spṛśāmi na parastriyam // 9.6.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
manasaḥ prakṛtirhyeṣā rakṣyaṃ pāpaṃ tu kāyikam / ityūcivāṃsaṃ taṃ dhīraṃ vipraṃ devī jagāda sā // 9.6.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
prītāsmi te varaś cāyaṃ putrādīñ śīghram apsyasi / idaṃ cotpalam amlāyi viṣādighnaṃ gṛhāṇa me // 9.6.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā nīrajaṃ dattvā candrasvāmidvijasya sā / nārāyaṇī sadāsīkā devī tasya tirodadhe // 9.6.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca prāptotpalo rātrau kṣīṇāyāṃ prasthitas tataḥ / tārāpuraṃ tan nagaraṃ prāpa vipraḥ paribhraman // 9.6.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
yatrāsya sa sthitaḥ putro mahīpālaḥ sutā ca sā / anantasvāminas tasya gṛhe viprasya mantriṇaḥ // 9.6.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra gatvā sa tasyaiva mantriṇo bhojanepsayā / dvāre prādhyayanaṃ cakre śrutvā tamatithiṃ priyam // 9.6.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca mantrī pratīhārair āvedyāntaḥ praveśitam / nyamantrayata dṛṣṭvaiva vidvāṃsaṃ bhojanāya tam // 9.6.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nimantrito 'tha sa śrutvā tatra pāpaharaṃ saraḥ / candrasvāmī yayau snātumanantahṛdasaṃjñakam // 9.6.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āgacchati tataḥ snātvā yāvattāvat samantataḥ / hākaṣṭaśabdaṃ śuśrāva nagare tatra sa dvijaḥ // 9.6.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatkāraṇaṃ ca pṛcchantaṃ tam evamavadajjanaḥ / iha sthito mahīpālo nāma brāhmaṇaputrakaḥ // 9.6.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṭavyāḥ sārthavāhena prāptaḥ sārthadhareṇa saḥ / tasmātsulakṣaṇo dṛṣṭvā yācitvā bhaginīsakhaḥ // 9.6.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anantasvāminā yatnādihānītaḥ sa mantriṇā / putrīkṛtaś cāputreṇa sa tena priyatāṃ gataḥ // 9.6.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tārāvarmanṛpasyeha rāṣṭrasyāsya ca sadguṇaḥ / so 'dya kṛṣṇāhinā daṣṭastena hāhāravaḥ pure // 9.6.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvā sa evaiṣa matputra iti cintayan / āyayau tvaritaścandrasvāmī mantrigṛhaṃ sa tat // 9.6.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra sarvair vṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā parijñāya ca taṃ sutam / nandati sma sa hastasthadevīdattāgadotpalaḥ // 9.6.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aḍhaukayac ca nāsāyāṃ mahīpālasya tasya tat / nīlotpalaṃ tadaivābhūttadgandhena sa nirviṣaḥ // 9.6.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttasthau ca mahīpālo nidrāyukta ivāsta saḥ / pure cātrotsavaṃ cakre janaḥ sarvaḥ sarājakaḥ // 9.6.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
candrasvāmī ca sa tadā devāṃśaḥ ko 'py asāv iti / anantasvāminā paurai rājñā cārthair apūjyata // 9.6.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasthau ca tatraiva sukhaṃ mantriveśmani so 'rcitaḥ / paśyan putraṃ mahīpālaṃ sutāṃ candravatīṃ ca tām // 9.6.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
parijñāyāpi cānyonyaṃ tūṣṇīṃ tasthustrayo 'pi te / kurvantyakāle 'bhivyaktiṃ na kāryāpekṣiṇo budhāḥ // 9.6.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
atha tasmai mahīpālāyāntaḥ saṃtoṣito guṇaiḥ / rājā bandhumatīṃ nāma tārāvarmā dadau sutām // 9.6.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pradattanijarājyārdhe tasminneva vyadhāttadā / sukhī rājyabharaṃ kṛtsnaṃ sa nṛpo 'nanyaputrakaḥ // 9.6.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mahīpālo 'pi sa prāptarājyaḥ prakhyāpya taṃ nijam / pitaraṃ svānujāṃ sthāne dattvā tasthau yathāsukham // 9.6.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā taṃ pitā candrasvāmī svair am abhāṣata / ehi svadeśaṃ gacchāvo māturānayanāya te // 9.6.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
rājyasthaṃ tvāṃ hi buddhvā sā kathaṃ tenāsmi vismṛtā / iti kruddhā śapejjātu putrāticiraduḥkhitā // 9.6.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
matāpitṛbhyāṃ śaptaḥ sanna jātu sukhamaśnute / tathā caitāṃ purāvṛttāṃ vaṇikputrakathāṃ śṛṇu // 9.6.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
cakro nāma vaṇikputro dhavalākhye 'bhavatpure / so 'nicchatoragātpitroḥ svarṇadvīpaṃ vaṇijyayā // 9.6.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa pañcabhir varṣair upārjitamahādhanaḥ / āgacchannārurohābdhau vahanaṃ ratnapūritam // 9.6.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alpāvaśeṣe gantavye vāridhau tasya connadan / udatiṣṭhanmahāvātavarṣavegākulo 'mbudaḥ // 9.6.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
pitarāvavamanyaiṣa kimāyāta itīva tat / krodhātpravahaṇaṃ tasya nirbabhañjurmahormayaḥ // 9.6.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatsthāḥ ke 'pi hṛtāstoyair makaraiḥ ke 'pi bhakṣitāḥ / cakrastvāyurbalānnītvā tīre kṣiptaś ca vīcibhiḥ // 9.6.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrastho niḥsahaḥ svapna iva raudrāsitākṛtim / pāśahastaṃ dadarśaikaṃ puruṣaṃ sa vaṇiksutaḥ // 9.6.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tenotkṣipya ca nīto 'bhūtsa cakraḥ pāśaveṣṭitaḥ / dūraṃ siṃhāsanasthena puruṣeṇāsthitāṃ sabhām // 9.6.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyājñayāsanasthasya tenaiva sa vaṇigyuvā / nītvā pāśabhṛtā lohamaye gehe nyaveśyata // 9.6.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāntaḥ pīḍyamānaṃ sa cakraḥ puruṣamaikṣata / mūrdhni taptena lauhena cakreṇa bhramatāniśam // 9.6.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kastvaṃ kenāśubhenedaṃ tava jīvasyaho katham / ityapṛcchatsa cakrastaṃ so 'pyevaṃ pratyuvāca tam // 9.6.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
khaḍgākhyo 'haṃ vaṇikputraḥ pitroryac ca vaco mayā / na kṛtaṃ tena saṃkruddhau tau māmaśapatāṃ krudhā // 9.6.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śiraḥsthāyasasaṃtaptacakrābhau nau dunoṣi yat / tadīdṛśyeva te pīḍā durācāra bhaviṣyati // 9.6.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā tau viramyobhau rudantaṃ māmavocatām / mā rodīrekamevāstu māsaṃ pīḍā tavedṛśī // 9.6.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tacchruvāhaṃ śucā nītvā taddinaṃ śayanāśritaḥ / niśi svapna ivādrākṣaṃ bhīmaṃ puruṣamāgatam // 9.6.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tenādāya balenāhamasmiṃllohamaye gṛhe / kṣipto nyastaṃ ca me mūrdhni jvalaccakramidaṃ bhramat // 9.6.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti me pitṛśāpo 'yaṃ tena prāṇa na yānti me / sa ca māso 'dya saṃpūrṇo na ca mucye tathāpy aham // 9.6.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavantaṃ taṃ khaḍgaṃ sa cakraḥ sakṛpo 'bravīt / pitroḥ pravasatārthārthaṃ mayāpi na kṛtaṃ vacaḥ // 9.6.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāptaṃ naṅkṣyati te vittamiti māṃ śapataḥ sma tau / tenābdhau me dhanaṃ naṣṭaṃ kṛtsnaṃ dvīpāntarārjitam // 9.6.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
eṣaiva vārtā cānyatra tatko 'rtho jīvitena me / dehyetanmūrdhni me cakraṃ khaḍga śāpo 'payātu te // 9.6.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti cakre vadaty eva vāṇī divyātra śuśruve / khaḍga mukto 'si cakrasya mūrdhny etac cakramarpaya // 9.6.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā cakraśirasi nyastacakrastadaiva saḥ / khaḍgaḥ kenāpyadṛśyena ninye pitṛhṛhaṃ tataḥ // 9.6.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāsītsa punaḥ pitroranullaṅghitaśāsanaḥ / cakrastvādāya tanmūrdhni cakraṃ tatraivam abhyadhāt // 9.6.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
papino 'nye 'pi mucyantāṃ pṛthvyāṃ tatpātakair api / ā papakṣayametanme cakraṃ bhrāmyatu mūrdhani // 9.6.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavantaṃ taṃ cakraṃ dhīrasattvaṃ nabhaḥsthitāḥ / puṣpavṛṣṭimuco devāḥ parituṣyaivam abruvan // 9.6.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sādhu sādhu mahāsattva śāntaṃ karuṇayānayā / pāpaṃ te vraja vittaṃ ca tavākṣayyaṃ bhaviṣyati // 9.6.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavatsu deveṣu cakrasya śirasaḥ kṣaṇāt / āyasaṃ tasya taccakraṃ jagāma kvāpy adarśanam // 9.6.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathopetyāmbarādeko vidyādharakumārakaḥ / tuṣṭendrapreṣitaṃ dattvā mahārghaṃ ratnasaṃcayam // 9.6.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅke kṛtvaiva taṃ cakraṃ nagaraṃ dhavalābhidham / nijaṃ tatprāpayām āsa jagāma ca yathāgatam // 9.6.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'tha cakro 'ntikaṃ pitroḥ prāpyānanditabāndhavaḥ / tasthāvākhyātavṛttāntas tatra dharmāparicyutaḥ // 9.6.168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityākhyāya mahīpālaṃ candrasvāmyavadatpunaḥ / īdṛkpāpaphalaṃ putra mātāpitrorvirodhanam // 9.6.169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kāmadhenus tu tadbhaktis tatrāpyetāṃ kathāṃ śṛṇu / āsīt ko'pi muniḥ pūrvaṃ vanacārī mahātapāḥ // 9.6.170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tarucchāyopaviṣṭasya tasyopari balākayā / viṣṭhā kadācin muktābhūt so 'tha kruddho dadarśa tām // 9.6.171	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
dṛṣṭam atraiva sā tena balākā bhasmasādabhūt / tapaḥ prabhāvāhaṃkāraṃ sa ca bheje tato muniḥ // 9.6.172	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ekadā nagare kvāpi sa brāhmaṇagṛhaṃ muniḥ / ekaṃ praviśya gṛhiṇīṃ tatra bhikṣāmayācata // 9.6.173	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
pratīkṣasva manāgbhartuḥ paricaryāṃ samāpaye / iti taṃ sā ca gṛhiṇī nijagāda pativratā // 9.6.174	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatas taṃ kruddhayā dṛṣṭyā vīkṣamāṇaṃ vihasya sā / abhāṣata mune nāhaṃ balākā mṛṣyatām iti // 9.6.175	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutvaitatsa munistasthavupaviśyātra sādbhutaḥ / etatkatham iva jñātamanayeti vicintayan // 9.6.176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ kṛtvāgnikāryādeḥ śuśrūṣāṃ bharturatra sā / sādhvī bhikṣāṃ samādāya tasyāgādantikaṃ muneḥ // 9.6.177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'tha baddhāñjalirbhūtvā munistāmavadatsatīm / kathaṃ balākāvṛttāntaḥ parokṣo 'pi mama tvayā // 9.6.178	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
jñāta ityādito brūhi bhikṣāṃ gṛhṇāmyahaṃ tataḥ / ity uktavantaṃ tamṛṣiṃ sāvocatpatidevatā // 9.6.179	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
na bhartṛbhakter aparaṃ dharmaṃ kaṃcana vedmy aham / tena me tatprasādena vijñānabalamīdṛśam // 9.6.180	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ ceha dharmavyādhākhyaṃ māṃsavikrayajīvinasm / gatvā paśya tataḥ śreyo nirahaṃkāramāpsyasi // 9.6.181	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ sarvavidā proktaḥ sa pativratayā muniḥ / gṛhītāthitibhāgastāṃ praṇamya niragāttataḥ // 9.6.182	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyedyuḥ sa munirdharmavyādhamanviṣya tatra tam / vipaṇistham upāgacchatkurvāṇaṃ māṃsavikrayam // 9.6.183	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

śrutvaitatpañca śakrādyāḥ svena rūpeṇa te 'bhavan / ṣaṣṭhaḥ satyanalaścābhūtsvarūpasthaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ // 9.6.276	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasminsā damayantī tāṃ phullendīvarasundarīm / dṛśaṃ varaṇamālāṃ ca hṛṣṭā rājñi nale nyadhāt // 9.6.277	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
papāta puṣpavṛṣṭiś ca nabhomadhyāttato nṛpaḥ / vivāhamaṅgalaṃ bhīmaścakre tasya nalasya ca // 9.6.278	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vihitocitapūjāś ca tena vaidarbhabhūbhṛtā / nṛpā yathāgataṃ jagmurdevāḥ śakrādayaś ca te // 9.6.279	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śakrādayastu dadṛśurdvau kalidvāparau pathi / buddhvā ca damayantyarthamāgatau tau ca te 'bruvan // 9.6.280	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
na gantavyaṃ vidarbheṣu tata evāgatā vayam / vṛttaḥ svayaṃvaro rājā damayantyā nalo vṛtaḥ // 9.6.281	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvaivocatuḥ pāpau tau kalidvāparau ruṣā / devān bhavādṛśāṃs tyaktvā yat sa martyo vṛtas tayā // 9.6.282	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadavaśyaṃ kariṣyāvo viyogamubhayostayoḥ / evaṃ kṛtapratijñau tau nivartya yayatus tataḥ // 9.6.283	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tatrāsītprema daṃpatyorgaurīśarvādhikaṃ tayoḥ / śarvasya gaurī dehārdhaṃ tasya tvātmaiva sābhavat // 9.6.285	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)

athaikadānupāsyaiva saṃdhyāmakṣālitāṅghrikaḥ / sa suṣvāpa nalaḥ pānamadena muṣitasmṛtiḥ // 9.6.288	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tadbhrātaraṃ puṣkarākhyaṃ tathaivotkrāntasatpatham / chidraṃ prāpya śarīrāntaḥpraviṣṭo dvāparo vyadhāt // 9.6.293	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

tatra sākaṃ tayā darbhabhinnapeśalapādayā / sa viśrāntaḥ sarastīre haṃsau dvāvaikṣatāgatau // 9.6.309	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āhārārthaṃ ca sa tayor grahaṇāyottarīyakam / cikṣepa tac ca hṛtvaiva haṃsau tau tasya jagmatuḥ // 9.6.310	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
haṃsarūpeṇa tāvetāvakṣau vāso 'py upetya te / hṛtvā gatāviti nalaḥ sa vācaṃ cāśṛṇoddivaḥ // 9.6.311	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)

ayaṃ mārgo vidarbheṣu priye pitṛgṛhe iva / ayamaṅgeṣu mārgo 'yamaparaḥ kośaleṣu ca // 9.6.313	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā damayantī sā śaṅkitevābhavattadā / tyakṣyannivārya putro me mārgaṃ kiṃ vakty asāv iti // 9.6.314	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

bālāṃ vane prasuptāṃ nṛśaṃsa saṃtyajya kumudinīkāntām / prāpyaivāmbarakhaṇḍaṃ candrādṛśyaḥ kva yāto 'si // 9.6.338	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)

antaḥśūnyaṃ sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā ghaṭaṃ yāvadvilambate / tāvatte guhyakā bhūyastamāhuḥ sasmitānanāḥ // 10.1.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śubhadatta na vetsi tvaṃ kṣipa hastaṃ ghaṭāntare / yatheṣṭaṃ lapsyase sarvaṃ ghaṭaḥ kāmaprado hy asau // 10.1.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā prakṣipatyantaḥ pāṇiṃ yāvaddhaṭāntare / tāvad āhārapānādi kāmitaṃ dṛṣṭavān asau // 10.1.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
... / śubhadatto dadau tebhyo bubhuje ca svayaṃ tataḥ // 10.1.35	ajñātasamavṛtta [2: ll] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
evaṃ paricaran yakṣān bhaktyā bhītyā ca so 'nvaham / tasthau kuṭumbacintārtaḥ śubhadattas tadantike // 10.1.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkuṭumbaṃ ca duḥkhārtaṃ svapnādeśena guhyakaiḥ / āśvāsitaṃ tatprasādād ramate sma tataś ca saḥ // 10.1.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
māsamātreṇa yakṣāste śubhadattaṃ tam abhyadhuḥ / tuṣṭāḥ smas te 'nayā bhaktyā brūhi kiṃciddadāma te // 10.1.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sa jagādaitāṃstuṣṭāḥ stha yadi satyataḥ / eṣa bhadraghaṭastanme yuṣmābhir dīyatāmiti // 10.1.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tam ūcur yakṣās te naitaṃ śakṣyasi rakṣitum / bhaṅge palāyate hyeṣa tadvṛṇīṣvāparaṃ varam // 10.1.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukto 'pi sa yakṣaistaiḥ śubhadatto 'paraṃ yadā / varaṃ naicchattadā tasmai te taṃ bhadraghaṭaṃ daduḥ // 10.1.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ praṇamya tān hṛṣṭo ghaṭam ādāya taṃ javāt / gṛhaṃ sa śubhadattaḥ svaṃ prāpa nanditabāndhavaḥ // 10.1.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tasmāddhaṭāllabdhvā bhojanādi niveśya tat / guptyarthamanyabhāṇḍeṣu so 'bhuṅkta svajanaiḥ saha // 10.1.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhāramukto bhajan bhogān pānamatto 'tha jātu saḥ / kutas tavaiṣā bhogaśrīr ity apṛcchyata bandhubhiḥ // 10.1.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sa vyaktamabruvanmūḍho gareṇepsitakāmadam / gṛhītvā ghaṭakaṃ skandhe prārebhe bata nartitum // 10.1.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nṛtyatas tasya ca skandhānmadodrekaskhaladgateḥ / sa bhadraghaṭako yātaḥ patitvā bhuvi khaṇḍaśaḥ // 10.1.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadaiva cākṣatībhūya sa jagāma yathāgatam / pūrvāvasthāṃ ca sa prāpa śubhadatto viṣādavān // 10.1.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadevaṃ pānadoṣādiprabhādāhatabuddhayaḥ / abhavyāḥ prāptamatyarthaṃ naiva jānanti rakṣitum // 10.1.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti bhadraghaṭākhyānahāsaṃ śrutvā vasantakāt / utthāya cakre vatseśaḥ snānāhārādikāḥ kriyāḥ // 10.1.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
naravāhanadatto 'pi snātvā bhuktvāntike pituḥ / dinānte sakhibhiḥ sākaṃ jagāma bhavanaṃ nijam // 10.1.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra rātrāvanidraṃ taṃ śayanīyagataṃ suhṛt / śṛṇvatsu saciveṣveteṣv avocanmarubhūtikaḥ // 10.1.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dāsīsaṅgecchayā deva jāne nāntaḥpuraṃ tvayā / āhūtaṃ sāpi nāhūtā tena nidrādya nāsti te // 10.1.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkimadyāpi veśyāsu jānannapyanurajyase / nahyāsāṃ cāsti sadbhāvas tathā caitāṃ kathāṃ śṛṇu // 10.1.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
astīha citrakūṭākhyamṛddhimannagaraṃ mahat / tatrābhūdratnavarmākhyo mahādhanapatirvaṇik // 10.1.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
īśvarārādhanādekas tasya sūnurajāyata / ataś ceśvaravarmāṇaṃ nāmnā cakre sa taṃ sutam // 10.1.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhītavidyamāsannayauvanaṃ vīkṣya taṃ ca saḥ / ekaputro vaṇiṅmukhyo ratnavarmā vyacintayat // 10.1.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rūpiṇī kusṛtiḥ sṛṣṭā dhanaprāṇāpahāriṇi / āḍhyānāṃ yauvanāndhānāṃ veśyā nāmeha vedhasā // 10.1.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadarpayāmi kuṭṭanyāḥ kasyāścidamumātmajam / veśyāvyājopaśikṣārthaṃ yena tābhir na vañcyate // 10.1.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityālocya sa putreṇa sahaiveśvaravarmaṇā / yamajihvābhidhānāyāḥ kuṭṭanyāḥ sadanaṃ yayau // 10.1.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra sthūlahanuṃ dīrghadaśanāṃ bhugnanāsikām / śikṣayantīṃ duhitaram kuṭṭanīṃ tāṃ dadarśa saḥ // 10.1.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
dhanena pūjyate putri sarvo veśyā viśeṣataḥ / tac ca nāsty anurāgiṇyā rāgaṃ veśyā tyajed ataḥ // 10.1.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
doṣāgradūto rāgo hi veśyāpaścimasaṃdhyayoḥ / mithyaiva darśayedveśyā taṃ naṭīva suśikṣitā // 10.1.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
rañjayettena sā pūrvaṃ duhyādraktaṃ tato dhanam / dugdhārthaṃ ca tyajedante prāptārthaṃ punarāharet // 10.1.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
samo yūni śiśau vṛddhe virūpe rūpavatyapi / veśyājano yo munivatsa cārthaṃ paramaśrute // 10.1.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
iti bruvāṇāṃ duhitustām upāgātsa kuṭṭanīm / ratnavarmā kṛtātithyastayā ca samupāviśat // 10.1.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
abravīttāṃ ca putro me tvayārye śikṣyatāmayam / veśayoṣitkalā yena vaidagdhyaṃ prāpnuyādasau // 10.1.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dīnārāṇāṃ sahasraṃ ca niṣkrayaṃ te dadāmy aham / tac chrutvā tasya kāmaṃ taṃ pratipede tatheti sā // 10.1.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vitīrya dīnārānputraṃ tasyai samarpya ca / sa tam īśvaravarmāṇaṃ ratnavarmā yayau gṛham // 10.1.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athātreśvaravarmā sa yamajihvāgṛhe kalāḥ / varṣeṇaikena śikṣitvā pitus tasya gṛhaṃ yayau // 10.1.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāptaṣoḍaśavarṣaś ca pitaraṃ tam uvāca saḥ / arthāddhi dharmakāmau naḥ pūjārthādarthataḥ prathā // 10.1.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktavate tasmai śraddhāya sa tatheti tat / pañcānāṃ dravyakoṭīnāṃ bhāṇḍaṃ prīto dadau pitā // 10.1.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadādāya vaṇikputraḥ sasārthaḥ sa śubhe 'hani / prāyād īśvaravarmātha svarṇadvīpābhivāñchayā // 10.1.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gacchan kramāt pathi prāpa sa kāñcanapurābhidham / nagaraṃ tatra cāsannabāhyodyāne samāvasat // 10.1.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
snātabhuktānuliptaś ca praviśya nagare 'tra saḥ / yuvā prekṣaṇakaṃ draṣṭumekaṃ devakulaṃ yayau // 10.1.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāpaśyac ca nṛtyantīṃ sundarīṃ nāma lāsikīm / tāruṇyavātocchalitāṃ rūpābdherlaharīmiva // 10.1.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
dṛṣṭvaiva tāṃ tadā so 'bhūttadekagatamānasaḥ / kruddheva kuṭṭanīśikṣā dūre tasyābhavadyathā // 10.1.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vayasyaṃ preṣya nṛttānte prārthayām āsa tāṃ ca saḥ / dhanyāsmīti vidantī ca prahvā sāpy anvamanyata // 10.1.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sthāpayitvā nivāse sve nipuṇāmbhāṇḍarakṣiṇaḥ / tasyā īśvaravarmāsau sundaryā vasatiṃ yayau // 10.1.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasminmakarakaṭyākhyā tanmātā tam upāgatam / amānayadgṛhācāraistaistaistatsamayocitaiḥ // 10.1.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
niśāgame vāsagṛhaṃ sphuradratnavitānakam / nyastaparyaṅkaśayanaṃ prāveśyata tayā ca saḥ // 10.1.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatrāramata sundaryā tayānumatayā saha / vicitrakaraṇe nṛtte surate ca vidagdhayā // 10.1.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gāḍhadarśitarāgāṃ tāṃ pārśvādanapagāminīm / dṛṣṭvā dvitīye 'hni tato nirgantuṃ nāśakac ca saḥ // 10.1.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
dadau ca hemaratnādilakṣāṇāṃ pañcaviṃśatim / tasyai dinadvaye tasminsundaryai sa vaṇigyuvā // 10.1.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāptaṃ mayā dhanaṃ bhūri nāhaṃ prāptā bhavādṛśam / sa eva cenmayā prāptaḥ kiṃ dhanena karomy aham // 10.1.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityasatyānubandhena sundarīṃ tadagṛhṇatīm / mātā makarakaṭyevamekāpatyaiva sāha tām // 10.1.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
idānīmasmadīyaṃ yattadasyaiva svakaṃ dhanam / tanmadhye sthāpayitvā tadgṛhyatāṃ putri kā kṣatiḥ // 10.1.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktā sundarī mātrā kṛcchrādiva tadagrahīt / mene ceśvaravarmā tāṃ mūḍhaḥ satyānurāgiṇīm // 10.1.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyā rūpeṇa nṛttena gītena ca hṛtātmanaḥ / vaṇijo 'tra sthitasyātha tasya māsadvayaṃ yayau // 10.1.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca tasyai sundaryai koṭyau dve sa dadau kramāt / athopetyārthadattākhyaḥ sakhā svair am uvāca tam // 10.1.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sakhe kiṃ kuṭṭanīśikṣā sā yatnopāritāpi te / kātarasyāstravidyeva niṣphalāvasare gatā // 10.1.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
veśyāpremaṇi sadbhāvo yad asmin budhyate tvayā / satyaṃ bhavati kiṃ jātu jalaṃ marumarīciṣu // 10.1.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatsarvaṃ kṣīyate yāvadihaiva na dhanaṃ tava / tāvadvrajāmo budhvā hi kṣametaitatpitā na te // 10.1.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ity uktas tena mittreṇa vaṇikputro jagāda saḥ / satyaṃ na veśyāsvāśvāsaḥ sundarī tu na tādṛśī // 10.1.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kṣaṇaṃ hi māmapaśyantī muñcetprāṇānasau sakhe / tadgatvā bodhayatyetāṃ gantavyaṃ yadi sarvathā // 10.1.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktaḥ sa tenārthadattastasyaiva saṃnidhau / māturmakarakaṭyāś ca sundarīmavadattataḥ // 10.1.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tava tāvadasāmānyā prītirīśvaravarmaṇi / gantavyaṃ cādhunāvaśyaṃ svarṇadvīpaṃ vaṇijyayā // 10.1.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ prāpsyatyayaṃ lakṣmīṃ yayāgatya tvadantike / yāvatkālaṃ sukhaṃ sthāsyatyanumanyasva tatsakhi // 10.1.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tacchrutvā sāśrunayanā paśyantīśvaravarmaṇaḥ / mukhaṃ kṛtaviṣādā sā sundarī ca tam abhyadhāt // 10.1.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
yūyaṃ jānīta kimahaṃ vacmyantamanavekṣya kaḥ / kasya pratyeti tadalaṃ yadvidhattāṃ vidhirmama // 10.1.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tac chrutvovāca mātā tāṃ mā duḥkhaṃ dhṛtirastu te / eṣyatyeva priyo 'yaṃ te siddhārthastvāṃ na hāsyati // 10.1.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti mātā kilāśvāsya kṛtasaṃvittayā saha / mārgāgre guptam ekasmin kūpe jālam akārayat // 10.1.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadā ceśvaravarmābhūttaddolārūḍhamānasaḥ / śucevālpālpamāhārapānaṃ cakre ca sundarī // 10.1.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gītavāditranṛtteṣu na babandha ratiṃ ca sā / āśvāsyate sma praṇayaistaistair īśvaravarmaṇā // 10.1.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tato dine vayasyokte sundarīmandirāttataḥ / cacāleśvaravarmā sa kuṭṭanīkṛtamaṅgalaḥ // 10.1.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anuvavrāja codaśruḥ sundarīṃ taṃ samātṛkā / nagarādbahirā kūpadbaddhāntarjālakāttataḥ // 10.1.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato nivartya yāvac ca sundarīṃ tāṃ prayāti saḥ / tāvadātmā tayā kūpe jālapṛṣṭhe nicikṣipe // 10.1.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hā hā svāmini hā putrītyākrandaḥ sumahāṃs tataḥ / dāsīnāṃ bhṛtyavargasya tanmātuścātra śuśruve // 10.1.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena pratinivṛttyaiva samittraḥ sa vaṇiksutaḥ / kūpe kṣiptatanuṃ kāntāṃ buddhvā mohamagātkṣaṇam // 10.1.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sapralāpaṃ ca śocantī tasmin makarakaṭy atha / svānavātārayadbhṛtyān kūpe snigdhān sasaṃvidaḥ // 10.1.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rajjubhiste 'vatīryaiva diṣṭyā jīvati jīvati / ity uktvā tāṃ tataḥ kūpādutkṣipanti sma sundarīm // 10.1.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
utkṣiptā mṛtakalpaṃ sā kṛtvātmānaṃ niveditam / pratyāgataṃ vaṇikputramālāpaṃ śanakair dadau // 10.1.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
samāśvastāṃ samādāya hṛṣṭastāṃ sānugaḥ priyām / agādīśvaravarmāsau pratyāvṛttyaiva tadgṛham // 10.1.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
niścitya sundarīpremapratyayaṃ janmanaḥ phalam / tatprāptim eva matvā sa yātrābuddhiṃ punarjahau // 10.1.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato baddhasthitiṃ tatra so 'rthadattaḥ sakhā punaḥ / tam abhyadhātsakhe mohātkimātmā nāśitastvayā // 10.1.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mā bhūtte sundarīsnehapratyayaḥ kūpapātataḥ / atarkyā kuṭṭanīkūṭaracanā hi vidherapi // 10.1.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pituś ca kṣapitārthaḥ kiṃ vakṣyase yāsyasi kva vā / tadito 'dyāpi niryāhi kalyāṇe cenmatistava // 10.1.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etat tasya vacaḥ sakhyur avadhīrya vaṇig yuvā / māsenānyadvyayīcakre tatra koṭitrayaṃ sa tat // 10.1.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato hṛtasvo dattārdhacandrakaḥ sundarīgṛhāt / tayā makarakaṭyātha kuṭṭanyā niravāsyata // 10.1.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthadattādayas te ca gatvā svanagaraṃ drutam / tatpitre tatsamācakhyuryathāvṛttamaśeṣataḥ // 10.1.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tatpitā ratnavarmā tad buddhvā duḥkhito bhṛśam / kuṭṭanīṃ yamajihvāṃ tāṃ gatvāvocad vaṇikpatiḥ // 10.1.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
gṛhītvā mūlyamīdṛksa tvayā me śikṣitaḥ sutaḥ / hṛtaṃ makarakaṭyā yatsarvasvaṃ tasya helayā // 10.1.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā putravṛttāntaṃ tasyai sa tamavarṇayat / tataḥ sā yamajihvāṃ taṃ vṛddhakuṭṭanyabhāṣata // 10.1.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

prakāśayām astv ātmānam asyai yenaitad arpitam / balaṃ mittrabalaṃ cānyat prāpya hanmo ripūn raṇe // 10.2.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ tasminvadatyeva mantriṇyatrāyayau punaḥ / sa guptaprahitaścāraḥ sa ca pṛṣṭo 'bravīdidam // 10.2.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vair ibhir viṣayo vyāptaḥ śaśilekhā tu lokataḥ / devī rājño mṛṣā śrutvā vipattiṃ vahnimāviśat // 10.2.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etaccāravacaḥ śrutvā śokāśanihatastadā / hā devi hā satītyādi vilalāpa sa bhūpatiḥ // 10.2.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ krameṇa vijñātatattvā kumudikātra sā / etya vikramasiṃhaṃ tamāśvāsyovāca bhūpatim // 10.2.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāgeva mama nādiṣṭaṃ kiṃ devenādhunāpi yat / dhanair madīyaiḥ sabalaiḥ kriyatāmarinigrahaḥ // 10.2.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
ity uktaḥ sa tayā kṛtvā taddhanair adhikaṃ balam / yayau rājā svamittrasya rājño balavato 'ntikam // 10.2.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadbalaiḥ svabalaistaiś ca saha gatvā nihatya tān / pañcāpy arinṛpānyuddhe tadrājyānyapyavāpa saḥ // 10.2.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatastuṣṭaḥ kumudikāṃ so 'bravīttāṃ saha sthitām / prīto 'smi te tavābhīṣṭaṃ kiṃ karomyucyatāmiti // 10.2.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
athāvocatkumudikā satyaṃ tuṣṭo 'si cetprabho / taduddharedaṃ hṛcchalyamekaṃ mama cirasthitam // 10.2.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ujjayinyāṃ dvijasutaṃ śrīdharaṃ nāma me priyam / rājñālpenāparādhena baddhaṃ tasmādvimocaya // 10.2.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvā tvāṃ bhāvikalyāṇamuttamai rājalakṣaṇaiḥ / etatkāryakṣamaṃ deva bhaktyā sevitavaty aham // 10.2.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhīṣṭasiddhinair āśyādārohaṃ tvaccitāmapi / viphalaṃ jīvitaṃ matvā vinā taṃ vipraputrakam // 10.2.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktavatīṃ tāṃ sa rājāvocadvilāsinīm / sādhayiṣyāmyahaṃ tatte dhīrā suvadane bhava // 10.2.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā mantrivacanaṃ saṃsmṛtyācintayac ca saḥ / satyaṃ veśyāsvasadbhāvaḥ prokto 'nantaguṇena me // 10.2.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
atastu pūraṇīyaiṣā varākhyāḥ kāmanā mayā / iti saṃkalpya sabalaḥ sa tāmujjayinīmagāt // 10.2.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
śrīdharaṃ mocayitvā taṃ dattvā ca draviṇaṃ bahu / vyādhātkumudikāṃ tatra priyasaṃgamasusthitām // 10.2.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āgatya ca svanagaraṃ mantrimantram alaṅghayan / kramād vikramasimho 'sau bubhuje sakalāṃ mahīm // 10.2.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ hṛdayamajñeyamagādhaṃ veśayoṣitām / ... // 10.2.54	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam
ityākhyāya kathāṃ tasminvirate tatra gomukhe / naravāhanadattāgre jagādātha tapantakaḥ // 10.2.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
deva na pratyayaḥ strīṣu capalāsvakhilāsvapi / ciraṇṭīṣvapi na grāhyo veśastrīṣv iva sarvadā // 10.2.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ihaiva yanmayā dṛṣṭamāśvaryaṃ vacmi tacchṛṇu / balavarmābhidhāno 'bhūdasyām eva vaṇikpuri // 10.2.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
candraśrīs tasya bhāryābhūt sā ca vātāyanāgrataḥ / bhavyaṃ śīlaharaṃ nāma dadarśaikaṃ vaṇiksutam // 10.2.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sakhīgṛhaṃ tamānīya tanmukhenaiva tatkṣaṇam / araṃsta madanākrāntā tena sākamalakṣitā // 10.2.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pratyahaṃ ca samaṃ tena yāvat sā ramate tathā / tāvattatsaṅginī jñātā samagrair bhṛtyabāndhavaiḥ // 10.2.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekas tu balavarmā tāṃ nājñāsīd asatīṃ patiḥ / prāyeṇa bhāryādauḥśīlyaṃ snehāndho nekṣate janaḥ // 10.2.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
atha dāhajvaras tasya samabhūdvalavarmaṇaḥ / tena cāntyāmavasthāṃ sa kramātsaṃprāptavānvaṇik // 10.2.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadavasthe 'pi tasmiṃś ca tadbhāryā sā dine dine / agādupapates tasya nikaṭaṃ svasakhīgṛhe // 10.2.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatraiva cāsyāṃ tiṣṭhantyāmanyedyustatpatirmṛtaḥ / agacchatsā ca tadbuddhvā tamāpṛcchyāśu kāmukam // 10.2.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ārohaca samaṃ tena patyā sā tacchucā citām / svajanair vāryamāṇāpi śīlajñaiḥ kṛtaniścayā // 10.2.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
itthaṃ duravadhāryaiva strīcittasya gatiḥ kila / anyāsaṅgaṃ ca kurvanti mriyante ca patiṃ vinā // 10.2.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ tapantakenokte kramāddhariśikho 'bhyadhāt / atrāpi devadāsasya yadvṛttaṃ tan na kiṃ śrutam // 10.2.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kuṭumbī devadāsākhyo grāme sa hy abhavatpurā / duḥśīleti ca tasyāsīnnāmnānvarthena gehinī // 10.2.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāṃ cānyapuruṣāsaktāṃ vividuḥ prātiveśikāḥ / ekadā devadāso 'sau kāryādrājakulaṃ yayau // 10.2.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ānīya sā ca tatkālaṃ tadbhāryā tadvadhaiṣiṇī / gṛhasyoparibhūmau taṃ nidadhe parapūruṣam // 10.2.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āgataṃ ca tatas taṃ sā devadāsaṃ nijaṃ patim / niśīthe tena jāreṇa bhuktasuptamaghātayat // 10.2.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
visṛjyopapatiṃ taṃ ca sthitvā tūṣṇīṃ niśātyaye / nirgatya cakranda hato bhartā me taskarair iti // 10.2.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tato 'tra bandhavo 'bhyetya dṛṣṭvāvocannayaṃ yadā / caurair hataḥ kathaṃ nītaṃ na kiṃcidapi tair itaḥ // 10.2.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvātra sthitaṃ bālaṃ papracchuste tadātmajam / tāto hatas te keneti tataḥ sa spaṣṭam abravīt // 10.2.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
pṛṣṭhabhūmāv ihāruhya ko 'pyāsīddivase yuvā / rātrau tenāvatīryaiva tāto me paśyato hataḥ // 10.2.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ambā tu māṃ gṛhītvādau tātapārśvāttadotthitā / ity ukte śiśunā buddhvā bhāryājāreṇa taṃ hatam // 10.2.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jaghnustadbandhavo 'nviṣya tajjāraṃ taṃ tadaiva te / svīkṛtya taṃ śiśuṃ tāṃ ca duḥśīlāṃ niravāsayan // 10.2.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity anyaraktacittā strībhujaṃgī hanty asaṃśayam / evaṃ hariśikhenokte babhāṣe gomukhaḥ punaḥ // 10.2.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kimanyeneha yadvṛttaṃ vajrasārasya saṃprati / vatseśa sevakasyeha hāsyaṃ tacchrūyatām idam // 10.2.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya śūrasya kāntasya surūpā mālavodbhavā / vajrasārasya bhāryābhūtsvaśarīrādhikapriyā // 10.2.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā tasya bhāryāyāstasyāḥ putrānvitaḥ pitā / nimantraṇāya mālavyaḥ sotkaṇṭho 'bhyāyayau svayam // 10.2.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vajrasāro 'tha satkṛtya taṃ sa rājñe nivedya ca / nimantritas tena samam sabhāryo mālavaṃ yayau // 10.2.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)

tato dineṣu yāteṣu vajrasāram upetya tam / akasmātkrodhano nāma suhṛdevam abhāṣata // 10.2.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhāryāṃ pitṛgṛhe tyaktvā kiṃ gṛhaṃ nāśitaṃ tvayā / tatrānyapuruṣāsaṅgaḥ pāpayā hi kṛtastayā // 10.2.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

iti saṃkalpya gatvaiva mālavaṃ śvaśurau sa tau / anujñāpya gṛhītvaitāṃ bhāryāṃ prasthitavāṃs tataḥ // 10.2.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tac chrutvā tamavādītsā tavaiṣa yadi niścayaḥ / tatkiṃ pṛcchasi māṃ yatte rocate tatkuruṣva me // 10.2.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

latābhistāḍitā baddhvā yathāhaṃ bhavatā tathā / yadyahaṃ tāḍayeyaṃ tvāṃ tata icchāmi nānyathā // 10.2.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tataḥ sahastapādaṃ taṃ sā babandha dṛḍhaṃ tarau / tacchastreṇaiva baddhasya karṇanāsaṃ cakarta sā // 10.2.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

atha tatrāgataḥ kaścid oṣadhyarthaṃ vane bhiṣak / dṛṣṭvā taṃ kṛpayonmucya sādhuḥ svaṃ nītavān gṛham // 10.2.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

iti rājakule sarvajanopahasito 'pi saḥ / vajrasāra ihaivāste vajrasāreṇa cetasā // 10.2.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

devīdvitīyaḥ pracchannaṃ sāyudho 'lpaparicchadaḥ / sa pratasthe tato rājā mālavaṃ śvaśurāspadam // 10.2.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
gacchan pathi ca so 'ṭavyāṃ siṃham ādhāvitaṃ puraḥ / śaraḥ khaḍgaprahāreṇa dvidhā cakre 'vahelayā // 10.2.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

ity uktvā ca tayā sākaṃ prāviśattatpiturhṛham / saṃbhramāttena pṛṣṭaś ca nijaṃ vṛttāntamuktavān // 10.2.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃmānya dattahastyaśvas tenaiva śvaśureṇa saḥ / gajānīkābhidhasyāgādrājño 'tibalino 'ntikam // 10.2.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
devīṃ tu kalyāṇavatīṃ bhāryāṃ tāṃ pitṛveśmani / tatraiva sthāpayām āsa vipakṣavijayodyataḥ // 10.2.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmin prayāte yāteṣu divaseṣv ekad atra sā / devī vātāyanāgrasthā kaṃcit puruṣam aikṣata // 10.2.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa dṛṣṭa eva rūpeṇa tasyāścittamapāharat / smareṇākṛṣyamāṇā ca tatkṣaṇaṃ sā vyacintayat // 10.2.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tayaivānāyya naktaṃ ca vātāyanapathena sā / antaḥpuraṃ taṃ paruṣaṃ rajjūtkṣiptaṃ nyaveśayet // 10.2.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)

taddṛṣṭvā bata nīco 'yamiti yāvadviṣīdati / rājñī sā tāvadatrāgādupariṣṭādbhramannahiḥ // 10.2.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ vilokya bhiyotthāya sahasā puruṣo 'tra saḥ / dhanurādāya bhujagaṃ jaghāna viśikhena tam // 10.2.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
vipannapatitaṃ taṃ ca gavākṣeṇākṣipadbahiḥ / harṣeṇa tadbhayottīrṇo nanarta sa ca kātaraḥ // 10.2.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nṛtyantaṃ vīkṣya taṃ vignā sā kalyāṇavatī bhṛśam / dadhyau dhigdhikkimetena niḥsattvenādhamena me // 10.2.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tāvat prakīrya kāṣṭhāsu prakāśaṃ tigmatejasi / prāpte pratīcīṃ kakubhaṃ saṃdhyāsaṃgamakāriṇīm // 10.3.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
śrāntaḥ kathaṃcidāvṛtya sa dadarśa mahatsaraḥ / tattīre tāṃ niśāṃ netukāmaścāśvādavātarat // 10.3.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dattvā tṛṇodakaṃ tasmāyāhṛtāmbuphalodakaḥ / viśrāntaścaikato 'kasmādaśṛṇodgītaniḥsvanam // 10.3.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā tadanusāreṇa kautukānnātidūrataḥ / so 'paśyacchivaliṅgāgre gāyantīṃ divyakanyakām // 10.3.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
keyamadbhutarūpā syād iti taṃ ca savismayam / sāpy udārākṛtiṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛtvātithyam avocata // 10.3.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kastvaṃ kathamimāṃ bhūmimekaḥ prāpto 'si durgamām / etac chrutvā svavṛttāntamuktvā papraccha so 'pi tām // 10.3.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvaṃ me kathaya kāsitvaṃ vane 'smin kā ca te sthitiḥ / iti taṃ pṛṣṭavantaṃ ca divyakanyā jagāda sā // 10.3.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kautukaṃ cenmahābhāga tadvacmi śṛṇu matkathām / ity uktvā sā lasadbaṣpapūrā vaktuṃ pracakrame // 10.3.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
astīha kāñcanābhākhyaṃ himādrikaṭake puram / padmakūṭābhidhāno 'sti tatra vidyādhareśvaraḥ // 10.3.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya hemaprabhādevyāṃ rājñaḥ putrādhikapriyām / manorathaprabhāṃ nāma viddhi māṃ tanayāmimām // 10.3.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāhaṃ vidyāprabhāveṇa sakhībhiḥ samamāśramān / dvīpāni kulaśailāṃś ca vanānyupavanāni ca // 10.3.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
krīḍitvā pratyahaṃ caivamāhārasamaye pituḥ / āgacchāmi svabhavanaṃ vāsarapraharaistribhiḥ // 10.3.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ekadāhamiha prāptā viharantī sarastaṭe / muniputrakamadrākṣaṃ savayasyamiha sthitam // 10.3.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadrūpaśobhayākṛṣṭā dūtyevāhaṃ tamabhyagām / so 'pi sākūtayā dṛṣṭyaivākarotsvāgataṃ mama // 10.3.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato mamopaviṣṭāyāḥ sakhī jñātobhayāśayā / kastvaṃ brūhi mahābhāgetyapṛcchattadvayasyakam // 10.3.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa cābravīt tadvayasyo nātidūramitaḥ sakhi / nivasaty āśramapade munir dīdhitimān iti // 10.3.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
sa brahmacārī sarasi snātumatra kadācana / āgato dadṛśe devyā tatkālāgatayā śriyā // 10.3.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā taṃ śarīreṇāprāpyaṃ praśāntaṃ manasaiva yat / sakāmā cakame tena putraṃ saṃprāpa mānasam // 10.3.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvaddarśanānmamotpannaḥ putro 'yaṃ pratigṛhyatām / iti nītvaiva tajjātaṃ sā dīdhitimataḥ sutam // 10.3.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bālakaṃ munaye tasmai samarpya śrīstirodadhe / so 'py anāyāsalabdhaṃ taṃ putraṃ hṛṣṭo 'grahīnmuniḥ // 10.3.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
raśmimāniti nāmnā ca kṛtvā saṃvardhya ca kramāt / upanīya samaṃ sarvā vidyāḥ snehādaśikṣayat // 10.3.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ raśmimantaṃ jānītametaṃ munikumārakam / śriyaḥ sutaṃ mayā sākaṃ viharantamihāgatam // 10.3.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā tadvayasyena pṛṣṭā tenāpi matsakhī / sā sanāmānvayaṃ sarvaṃ maduktaṃ taṃ tadabravīt // 10.3.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'nyonyānvayajñānānnitarāmanurāgiṇau / muniputraḥ sa cāhaṃ ca yāvattatra sthitāvubhau // 10.3.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvadetya dvitīyā māṃ svagṛhādavadatsakhī / uttiṣṭhāhārabhūmau tvāṃ pitā mugdhe pratīkṣate // 10.3.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā śrīghram eṣyāmīty uktvāvasthāpya cātra tam / muniputraṃ gatābhūvaṃ bhītyāhaṃ pitur antikam // 10.3.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra kiṃcitkṛtāhārā yāvac cāhaṃ vinirgatā / tāvadādyā sakhī sā mamāgatya svair am abravīt // 10.3.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āgato muniputrasya tasyeha sa sakhā sakhi / sthitaś ca prāṅgaṇadvāri satvaraś ca mamāvadat // 10.3.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
manorathaprabhāpārśvamahaṃ raśmimatādhunā / preṣito vyomagamanīṃ vidyāṃ dattvaiva paitṛkīm // 10.3.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
prāṇeśvarīṃ vinā tāṃ hi madanena sa dāruṇām / daśāṃ nīto na śaknoti praṇāndhārayituṃ kṣaṇam // 10.3.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvaivāsmi nirgatya tena yuktāgrayāyinā / muniputrakamittreṇa sakhyā cāhamihāgatā // 10.3.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāptā ca tamihādrākṣaṃ muniputraṃ vinā mayā / candrodgamenaiva samaṃ vṛttaprāṇodgamānmṛtam // 10.3.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tato 'haṃ tadviyogārtā nindantī tanumātmanaḥ / praveṣṭumaicchamanalaṃ gṛhītvā tatkalevaram // 10.3.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tāvaddivo 'vatīryaiva tejaḥpuñjākṛtiḥ pumān / ādāya taccharīraṃ sa cotpatya gaganaṃ yayau // 10.3.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athāhaṃ kevalaivāgnau patituṃ yāvadudyatā / tāvaduccarati smaivaṃ gaganādiha bhāratī // 10.3.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
manorathaprabhe maivaṃ kṛthā bhūyo bhaviṣyati / etena muniputreṇa tava kālena saṃgamaḥ // 10.3.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvā parāvṛttya maraṇāttatpratīkṣiṇī / sthitāsmīhaiva baddhāśā śaṃkarārcanatatparā // 10.3.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
muniputrasuhṛtso 'pi gato me kvāpy adarśanam / iti tāṃ vādinīṃ vidyādharīṃ somaprabho 'bhyadhāt // 10.3.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sthitāsyekākinī tarhi kathaṃ sāpi sakhī kva te / etac chrutvā tamāha sma sā vidyādharakanyakā // 10.3.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
siṃhavikrama ityasti nāmnā vidyādhareśvaraḥ / tasyānanyasamā cāsti tanayā makarandikā // 10.3.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā me sakhī prāṇasamā kanyā madduḥkhaduḥkhitā / tayā sakhī preṣitābhūdvārtāṃ jñātumihādya me // 10.3.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
tato mayāpi tatsakhyā samaṃ sā prahitā nijā / sakhī tadantikaṃ tena sthitāsmyekaiva saṃprati // 10.3.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ vadantī gaganādavatīrṇāṃ tadaiva tām / svasakhīṃ darśayām āsa tasmai somaprabhāya sā // 10.3.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāmathoktasakhīvārtāṃ parṇaśayyāmakārayat / somaprabhasya tadvāhasyāpi ghāsamadāpayat // 10.3.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato nītvā niśāṃ sarve tatra te prātar utthitāḥ / vyomno 'vatīrṇaṃ dadṛśurvidyādharam upāgatam // 10.3.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
sa ca vidyādharo devajayo nāma kṛtānatiḥ / manorathaprabhāmevam upaviśya jagāda tām // 10.3.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
manorathaprabhe rājā vakti tvāṃ siṃhavikramaḥ / yāvattava na niṣpanno varastāvanna matsutā // 10.3.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

etac chrutvā sakhisnehāttāṃ vidyādharakanyakām / gantuṃ pravṛttāṃ vakti sma rājā somaprabho 'tha saḥ // 10.3.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
draṣṭuṃ vaidyādharaṃ lokamanaghe kautukaṃ mama / tattatra naya māmaśvo dattaghāso 'tra tiṣṭhatu // 10.3.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sā tathety uktvā vyomnā sadyaḥ sakhīyutā / tena devajayotsaṅgāropitena samaṃ yayau // 10.3.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāptā tatra kṛtātithyā makarandikayā tayā / dṛṣṭvā somaprabhaṃ ko 'yamiti svair amapṛcchyata // 10.3.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tac chrutvā sāpy avocattāṃ tvayānaṅgīkṛte vare / kathaṃ vivāhamiccheyaṃ tvaṃ śarīrādhikā hi me // 10.3.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tataḥ somaprabho labdhadhṛtistuṣṭo jagāda tām / tvadāśramamahaṃ yāmi sāṃprataṃ tatra jātu me // 10.3.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
cinvānaṃ padavīṃ sainyamāgacchenmantryadhiṣṭhitam / māmaprāpyāhitāśaṅki tac ca gacchetparāṅmukham // 10.3.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadgatvā sainyavṛttāntaṃ buddhvāgatya tataḥ punaḥ / niścitya pariṇeṣyāmi śubhe 'hni makarandikām // 10.3.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sā tathety uktvā tamanaiṣīnnijāśramam / manorathaprabhā devajayāṅkāropitaṃ punaḥ // 10.3.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvat priyaṃkaro mantrī tasya somaprabhasya saḥ / vicinvānaś ca padavīṃ tatraivāgātsasainikaḥ // 10.3.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
militāya tatas tasmai prahṛṣṭo nijamantriṇe / somaprabhaḥ svavṛttāntaṃ yāvat sarvaṃ sa śaṃsati // 10.3.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvat tasyāyayau dūtaḥ śīghram āgamyatām iti / lekhe likhitvā saṃdeśam ādāya pitur antikāt // 10.3.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tena sainyaṃ samādāya sacivānumatena saḥ / pitrājñāmanatikrāmañjagāma nagaraṃ nijam // 10.3.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tātaṃ dṛṣṭvāhameṣyāmi nacirādity uvāca ca / manorathaprabhāṃ tāṃ ca taṃ ca devajayaṃ vrajan // 10.3.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'tha devajayo gatvā tatsarvaṃ makarandikām / tathaivābodhayattena jajñe sā virahāturā // 10.3.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tathaiva tasya bhāryā ca sā jātāraṇyasūkarī / so 'yaṃ śukaḥ purādhītaṃ vetti caiva tapobalāt // 10.3.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tato yenāhamabhavaṃ nītastatkṛpayāśramam / sa marīcimunis tatra gṛhītvā māmavardhayat // 10.3.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

niṣādahas te patitaḥ kramātprāptastvadantikam / idānīṃ ca mama kṣīṇaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ pakṣiyonijam // 10.3.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti sadasi kathām udīrya tasmin viduṣi śuke virate vicitravāci / sapadi sa sumanomahībhṛdāsīt pramadataraṅgitavismṛtāntarātmā // 10.3.167	puṣpitāgrā = [12: nnry] 1,3 + [12: njjrg] 2,4
atrāntare taṃ parituṣya śaṃbhuḥ svapne ca somaprabhamādideśa / uttiṣṭha rājansumanonṛpasya pārśvaṃ vraja prāpsyasi tatra kāntām // 10.3.168	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
muktālatākhyā pitṛśāpato hi bhūtvā niṣādī makarandikākhyā / ādāya taṃ svaṃ pitaraṃ gatāsya rājño 'ntikaṃ sā śukatāmavāptam // 10.3.169	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
smariṣyati tvāṃ tu vilokya jātiṃ vidyādharī sā vinivṛttaśāpā / anyonyavijñānavivṛddhaharṣaśobhī bhaviṣyaty atha saṃgamo vām // 10.3.170	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
iti bhūmipatiṃ nigadya taṃ giriśaḥ svāśramagāṃ tathaiva tām / aparāṃ sa manorathaprabhāṃ bhagavān bhaktakṛpālur abravīt // 10.3.171	viyoginī = [10: ssjg] 1,3 + [11: sBrlg] 2,4
yo raśmimān munisuto 'bhimato varas te jātaḥ sa saṃprati punaḥ sumanobhidhānaḥ / tat tatra gaccha tam avāpnuhi sa svajātiṃ sadyaḥ smariṣyati śubhe tava darśanena // 10.3.172	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
evaṃ te somaprabhavidyādharakanyake pṛthagvibhunā / svapnādiṣṭe nṛpates tasya sadaḥ sumanasastadā yayatuḥ // 10.3.173	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
somaprabhaṃ tatra ca taṃ vilokya saṃsmṛtya jātiṃ makarandikā svām / divyaṃ prapadyaiva nijaṃ vapus taj jagrāha kaṇṭhe ciraśāpamuktā // 10.3.174	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
so 'pi prasādādgirijāpatestāṃ saṃprāpya vidyādhararājaputrīm / somaprabhaḥ sākṛtidivyabhogalakṣmīm ivāśliṣya kṛtī babhūva // 10.3.175	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
sa cāpi dṛṣṭvaiva manorathaprabhāṃ smṛtasvajātiḥ sumanomahīpatiḥ / praviśya pūrvāṃ nabhasaścyutāṃ tanuṃ munīndraputraś ca babhūva raśmimān // 10.3.176	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
tayā ca saṃgamya punaḥ svakāntayā cirotsukaḥ sa prayayau svamāśramam / yayau sa somaprabhabhūpatiś ca tāṃ priyāṃ samādāya nijāṃ nijaṃ puram // 10.3.177	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
śuko 'pi muktvaiva sa vaihagīṃ tanuṃ jagāma dhāma svatapobhir arjitam / itīha dūrāntarito 'pi dehināṃ bhavaty avaśyaṃ vihitaḥ samāgamaḥ // 10.3.178	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
iti naravāhanadatto nijasacivādgomukhātkathāṃ śrutvā / adbhutavicitrarucirāṃ śaktiyaśaḥ sotsukastutoṣa tadā // 10.3.179	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)

aprāpnuvaṃś ca mithyā tānsa matsyānabravīdbakaḥ / ihāgato matsyaghātī puruṣaḥ ko'pi jālavān // 10.4.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
sa jālenācirād yuṣmān gṛhītvā nihaniṣyati / tat kurudhvaṃ mama vaco viśvāso vo 'sti cen mayi // 10.4.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
astyekānte saraḥ svacchamajñātamiha dhīvaraiḥ / ete tatra nivāsārthaṃ nītvaikaikaṃ kṣipāmi vaḥ // 10.4.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sabhayair ūce matsyaistair jaḍabuddhibhiḥ / evaṃ kuruṣva viśvastā vayaṃ tvayyakhilā iti // 10.4.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato bakas tān ekaikaṃ matsyān nitvā śilātale / vinyasya bhakṣayām āsa sa bahūn vipralambhakaḥ // 10.4.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvā mīnānnayantaṃ taṃ makarastatsarogataḥ / eko bakaṃ taṃ papraccha nayasi kva timīniti // 10.4.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatas taṃ sa tadevāha bako matsyānuvāca yat / tena bhīto jhaṣo 'vocatsa mām apinayeti tam // 10.4.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi tanmāṃsagardhāndhabuddhirādāya taṃ bakaḥ / utpatya prāpayati tadyāvavadhyaśilātalam // 10.4.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tāvattajjagdhamīnāsthiśakalānyatra vīṣya saḥ / taṃ budhyate sma makaro bakaṃ viśvāsya bhakṣakam // 10.4.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tataḥ śilātalanyastamātras tasya sa tatkṣaṇam / bakasya makaro dhīmāṃścakartāvihvalaḥ śiraḥ // 10.4.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā ca śeṣamatsyānāṃ yathāvatsa śaśaṃsa tat / te cāpy abhinanandustaṃ tuṣṭāḥ prāṇapradāyinam // 10.4.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prajñā nāma balaṃ tasmānniṣprajñasya balena kim / etāṃ ca siṃhāśaśayoḥ kathāmatrāparāṃ śṛṇu // 10.4.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
abhūtkvāpi vane siṃha ekavīro 'parājitaḥ / sa ca yaṃ yaṃ dadarśātra sattvaṃ taṃ taṃ nyapātayat // 10.4.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ so 'bhyarthitaḥ sarvaiḥ saṃbhūyātra mṛgādibhiḥ / āhārāya tavaikaikaṃ preṣayāmo dine dine // 10.4.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sarvān no yugapaddhatvā svārthahāniṃ karoṣi kim / iti tadvacanaṃ siṃhaḥ sa tathety anvamanyata // 10.4.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ prāṇinamekaikaṃ tasminnanvahamaśnati / ekadā śaśakasyāgādvāra ekasya tatkṛte // 10.4.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa sarvaiḥ preṣito gacchañ śaśo dhīmān acintayat / sa dhīro yo na saṃmoham āpatkāle 'pi gacchati // 10.4.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upasthite 'pi mṛtyau tadyuktiṃ tāvatkaromy aham / ityālocya sa taṃ siṃhaṃ vilambya śaśako 'bhyagāt // 10.4.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āgataṃ tu vilambena kesarī nijagāda saḥ / are velā vyatikrāntā mamāhāre kathaṃ tvayā // 10.4.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vadhādapyadhikaṃ kiṃ vā kartavyaṃ te mayā śaṭha / ity uktavantaṃ taṃ siṃhaṃ prahvaḥ sa śaśako 'bravīt // 10.4.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
na me devāparādho 'yaṃ svavaśo nāhamadya yat / mārge vidhārya siṃhena dvitīyenojjhitaścirāt // 10.4.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvāsphālya lāṅgūlaṃ siṃhaḥ krodhāruṇekṣaṇaḥ / so 'bravītko dvitīyo 'sau siṃho me darśyatāṃ tvayā // 10.4.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āgatya dṛśyatāṃ devety uktvā so 'pi nināya tam / tathety anvāgataṃ siṃhaṃ dūraṃ kūpāntikaṃ śaśaḥ // 10.4.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ihāntaḥsthaṃ sthitaṃ paśyety uktas tatra ca tena saḥ / śaśakena krudhā garjansiṃho 'ntaḥkūpamaikṣata // 10.4.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvā svacche ca toye svaṃ pratibimbaṃ niśamya ca / svagarjitapratiravaṃ matvā tatrātigarjitam // 10.4.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
pratisiṃhaṃ sa kopena tadvadhāya mṛgādhipaḥ / ātmānamakṣipastkūpe mūḍho 'traiva vyapādi ca // 10.4.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śaśaḥ sa prajñayottīrya mṛtyoruttārya cākhilān / mṛgān gatvā tad ākhyāya svavṛttaṃ tān anandayat // 10.4.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ prajñaiva paramaṃ balaṃ na tu parākramaḥ / yatprabhāveṇa nihataḥ śaśakenāpi kesarī // 10.4.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tadahaṃ sādhayāmyeva prajñayā svamabhīpsitam / evaṃ damanakenokte tūṣṇiṃ karaṭako 'bhavat // 10.4.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato damanakaścāpi tasya piṅgalakasya saḥ / siṃhasya svaprabhorāsīdantike durmanā iva // 10.4.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pṛṣṭaś ca kāraṇaṃ tena tam uvāca janāntikam / buddhvā na yujyate tūṣṇīṃ sthātuṃ deva vadāmyataḥ // 10.4.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aniyukto 'pi ca brūyādyadīcchetsvāmino hitam / tadvihāyānyathābuddhiṃ madvijñaptimimāṃ śṛṇu // 10.4.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vṛṣaḥ saṃjīvako 'yaṃ tvāṃ hatvā rājyaṃ cikīrṣati / mantriṇā hi satānena tvaṃ bhīruriti niścitaḥ // 10.4.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dhunoti tvāṃ jighāṃsuś ca śṛṅgayugmaṃ nijāyudham / nirbhayā jīvatha sukhaṃ mayi rājñi tṛṇāśane // 10.4.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tadeta hanmo yuktyāmuṃ mṛgendraṃ māṃsabhojanam / āśvāsyopajapatyevaṃ prāṇinaś ca vane vane // 10.4.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadetaṃ cintaya vṛṣaṃ nāstyasminsati śarma te / evaṃ damanakenoktaḥ sa taṃ piṅgalako 'bhyadhāt // 10.4.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
balīvardo varāko 'yaṃ kiṃ kuryāttṛṇabhuṅmama / dattābhayaṃ kathaṃ hanyāmenaṃ ca śaraṇāgatam // 10.4.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvā damanakaḥ prāha mā smaivamādiśa / yastulyaḥ kriyate rājñā na tadvacchrīḥ prasarpati // 10.4.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
dvayor dattapadā sā ca tayor ucchritayoścalā / na śaknoti ciraṃ sthātuṃ dhruvamekaṃ vimuñcati // 10.4.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prabhuś ca yo hitaṃ dveṣṭi sevate cāhitaṃ sadā / sa varjanīyo vidvadbhir vaidyair duṣṭāturo yathā // 10.4.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
apriyasya prathamataḥ pariṇāme hitasya ca / vaktā śrotā ca yatra syāttatra śrīḥ kurute padam // 10.4.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
na śṛṇoti satāṃ mantram asatāṃ ca śṛṇoti yaḥ / acireṇa sa saṃprāpyaḥ vipadaṃ paritapyate // 10.4.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad asmin ukṣṇi kaḥ snehas tava deva kim asya vā / druhyato 'bhayadānaṃ ca śaraṇāgatatā ca kā // 10.4.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ caitasya bhavetpārśve nityasaṃnihitasya goḥ / deva kītāḥ prajāyante te tanmūtrapurīṣayoḥ // 10.4.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
te ced viśanti mattebhadantāghātavranāvṛte / śarīre bhavataḥ kiṃ na vṛttaḥ syād yuktito vadhaḥ // 10.4.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
durjanaś cet svayaṃ dosaṃ vipaścin na karoti tat / utpatsyate sa tatsaṅgād atra ca śrūyatāṃ kathā // 10.4.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājñaḥ kasyāpi śayane ciramāsīdalakṣitā / yūkā kutaścidāgatya nāmnā mandavisarpiṇī // 10.4.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
akasmāt tatra copetya kuto 'pi pavaneritaḥ / viveśa śayanīyaṃ tat ṭiṭṭibho nāma matkuṇaḥ // 10.4.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mannivāsamimaṃ kasmādāgatastvaṃ vrajānyataḥ / iti mandavisarpiṇyā sa dṛṣṭvā jagade tayā // 10.4.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apītapūrvaṃ paśyāmi rajāsṛk tatprasīda me / dehīha vastum iti tām avādīt so 'pi ṭiṭṭibhaḥ // 10.4.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tato 'nurodhād āha sma sā taṃ yady evam āssva tat / kiṃ tvasya rājño nākāle daṃśo deyas tvayā sakhe // 10.4.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
deyo 'sya daṃśaḥ suptasya ratiśaktasya vā laghu / tac chrutvā ṭiṭṭibhaḥ so 'tra tathety uktvā vyatiṣṭhata // 10.4.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
naktaṃ śayyāsthitaṃ taṃ ca nṛpamāśu dadaṃśa saḥ / uttasthau ca tato rājā hā daṣṭo 'smīti sa bruvan // 10.4.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ palāyite tasmiṃstvaritaṃ matkuṇe śaṭhe / vicintya rājabhṛtyaiḥ sa labdhā yuktā vyapātyata // 10.4.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ ṭiṭṭibhasaṃparkānnaṣṭā mandavisarpiṇī / tatsaṃjīvakasaṃghas te na śivasya bhaviṣyati // 10.4.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na me pratyeṣi cettattvaṃ svayaṃ drakṣyasyupāgatam / śiro dhunānaṃ darpeṇa śṛṅgayoḥ śūlaśātayoḥ // 10.4.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ity uktvā vikṛtiṃ tena nīto damanakena saḥ / siṃhaḥ piṅgalakaścakre vadhyaṃ saṃjīvakaṃ hṛdi // 10.4.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
labdhvā tasyāśayaṃ svair aṃ kṣaṇāddamanakas tataḥ / tasya saṃjīvakasyāgāt sa viṣaṇṇa ivāntikam // 10.4.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kimīdṛgasi kiṃ mitra śarīre kuśalaṃ tava / iti pṛṣṭaś ca tenātra vṛṣeṇa sa jagādatam // 10.4.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ sevakasya kuśalaṃ kaś ca rājñāṃ sadā priyaḥ / ko 'rthī na lāghavaṃ yātaḥ kaḥ kālasya na gocaraḥ // 10.4.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavantaṃ papraccha taṃ sa saṃjīvakaḥ punaḥ / kimudvigna ivaivaṃ tvaṃ vayasyādyocyatāmiti // 10.4.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato damanako 'vādīcchṛṇu prītyā vadāmi te / mṛgarājo viruddho 'sau jātaḥ piṅgalako 'dya te // 10.4.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nirapekṣo 'sthirasneho hatvā tvāṃ bhoktumicchati / hiṃsraṃ paricchadaṃ cāsya paśyāmi prerakaṃ sadā // 10.4.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vaco damanakasyaitatsa pūrvapratyayādṛjuḥ / satyaṃ vicintya vṛṣabho vimanā nijagāda tam // 10.4.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
dhiksevāpratipanno 'pi kṣudraḥ kṣudraparigrahaḥ / prabhurvair itvamevaiti tathā cemāṃ kathāṃ śṛṇu // 10.4.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āsīnmadotkaṭo nāma siṃhaḥ kvāpi vanāntare / trayastasyānugāścāsandvīpivāyasajambukāḥ // 10.4.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa siṃho 'tra vane 'drākṣīdadṛṣṭacaramekadā / karabhaṃ sārthavibhraṣṭaṃ praviṣṭaṃ hāsanākṛtim // 10.4.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ko 'yaṃ prāṇīti sāścaryaṃ vadatyasminmṛgādhipe / uṣṭro 'yamiti vakti sma deśadraṣṭātra vāyasaḥ // 10.4.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato dattābhayastena siṃhenānāyya kautukāt / uṣṭraḥ so 'nucarīkṛtya svāntike sthāpito 'bhavat // 10.4.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā vraṇito 'svasthaḥ sa siṃho gajayuddhataḥ / upavāsān bahūṃś cakre svasthais taiḥ sahito 'nugaiḥ // 10.4.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ klāntaḥ sa bhakṣyārthaṃ bhramansiṃho 'navāpya tat / kiṃ kāryamityapṛcchattānuṣṭraṃ muktvānugānrahaḥ // 10.4.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
te tamūcuḥ prabho vācyamasmābhir yuktamāpadi / uṣṭreṇa sākaṃ kiṃ sakhyaṃ kiṃ nāsāveva bhakṣyate // 10.4.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tṛṇāśī cāyamasmākaṃ bhakṣya evāmiṣāśinām / bahūnāmāmiṣasyārthe kiṃ caikastyajyate na kim // 10.4.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dattābhayaṃ kathaṃ hanmītyucyate prabhuṇā yadi / dāpayāmaḥ svavācā tadyuktyā tanumamuṃ vayam // 10.4.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukte tair anujñātastena siṃhena vāyasaḥ / vadhāya saṃvidaṃ kṛtvā karabhaṃ tam abhāṣata // 10.4.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
eṣa svāmī kṣudhākrānto 'py asmānvakti na kiṃcana / tadasyātmapradānoktyā priyaṃ kurmo yathā vayam // 10.4.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathā tvam apikurvīthā yenāsau prīyate tvayi / ity ukto vāyasenoṣṭraḥ sādhustatpratyapadyata // 10.4.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upāyayau ca taṃ siṃha saha kākena tena saḥ / tataḥ kāko 'bravīddeva svāyattaṃ bhuṅkṣva māmimam // 10.4.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ tvayā svalpakāyenety ukte siṃhena jambukaḥ / māṃ bhuṅkṣvetyavadattaṃ ca sa tathaiva nirākarot // 10.4.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dvīpī tam abravīddeva māṃ bhuṅkṣveti tam apy asau / nābhuṅkta hariruṣṭro 'tha babhāṣe bhuṅkṣva māmiti // 10.4.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vākchalena sa tenaiva hatvā kṛtvā ca khaṇḍaśaḥ / uṣṭras tair bhakṣitaḥ sadyaḥ sasiṃhair vāyasādibhiḥ // 10.4.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ kenāpi piśunenaiṣa piṅgalako mayi / prerito 'kāraṇaṃ rājā pramāṇamadhunā vidhiḥ // 10.4.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
gṛdhro 'pi hi varaṃ rājā sevyo haṃsaparicchadaḥ / na gṛdhraparivārastu haṃso 'pi kimutāparaḥ // 10.4.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etatsaṃjīvakāc chrutvāvādīddamanako 'nṛjuḥ / dhair yeṇa sādhyate sarvaṃ śṛṇu vacmyatra te kathām // 10.4.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ko 'yāsīṭṭiṭṭibhaḥ pakṣī sabhāryo vāridhestaṭe / dhṛtagarbhā sati bhāryā ṭiṭṭibhī nijagāda tam // 10.4.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
ehi kvāpy anyato yāvaḥ prasūtāyā mameha hi / hared apatyāny ambhodhiḥ kadācid ayam ūrmibhiḥ // 10.4.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
etadbhāryāvacaḥ śrutvā ṭiṭṭibhaḥ sa jagāda tām / na śaknoti mayā sākaṃ virodhaṃ kartumambudhiḥ // 10.4.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā ṭiṭṭibhī prāha maivaṃ kā te tulābdhinā / hitopadeśo 'nuṣṭheyo vināśaḥ prāpyate 'nyathā // 10.4.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tathā ca kambugrīvākhyaḥ kūrmaḥ kvāpi sarasy abhūt / tasyāstāṃ suhṛdau haṃsau nāmnā vikaṭasaṃkaṭau // 10.4.168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadāvagrahakṣīṇajale sarasi tatra tau / haṃsavanyatsaro gantukāmau kūrmo jagāda saḥ // 10.4.169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yuvāṃ yatrodyatau gantuṃ nayataṃ tatra māmapi / tac chrutvā tāvubhau haṃsau kūrmaṃ taṃ mittramūcatuḥ // 10.4.170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
