kāṣṭhikebhyastato 'ṅgārāndṛṣṭvāpi krīṇato janān / sa kālāguru dagdhvā tadaṅgārānakarojjaḍaḥ // 10.5.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vikrīyāṅgāramūlyena tac cāgatya tato gṛham / tad eva kauśalaṃ śaṃsansa yayau lokahāsyatām // 10.5.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kathito 'gurudāhyeṣa śrūyatāṃ tilakārṣikaḥ / babhūva kaścid grāmīṇo bhūtaprāyaḥ kṛṣīvalaḥ // 10.5.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sa kadācit tilān bhṛṣṭān bhuktvā svādūn avetya tān / bhṛṣṭān evāvapadbhūrīṃs tādṛśotpattivāñchayā // 10.5.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhṛṣṭeṣu teṣv ajāteṣu naṣṭārthaṃ taṃ jano 'hasat / tilakārṣika ukto 'sau jale 'gnikṣepakaṃ śṛṇu // 10.5.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mandabuddhirabhūtkaś citpumānniśi sa caikadā / prabhāte devatāpūjāṃ kariṣyannityacintayat // 10.5.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upayuktau mama snānadhūpādyarthaṃ jalānalau / sthāpayāmi tadekasthau tau śīghraṃ prāpnuyāṃ yathā // 10.5.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityālocyāmbukumbhāntaḥ kṣiptvāgniṃ saṃviveśa saḥ / prātaś ca vīkṣate yāvadgato 'gnirnaṣṭamambu ca // 10.5.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅgāramaline toye dṛṣṭe tasyābhavanmukham / tādṛgeva sahāsasya lokasyāsītpunaḥ smitam // 10.5.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutastvayāgnikumbhākhyo nāsikāropaṇaṃ śṛṇu / babhūva kaś citpuruṣo mūrkho mūḍhamatiḥ kva cit // 10.5.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
sa bhāryāṃ cipiṭaghrāṇāṃ guruṃ cottuṅganāsikam / dṛṣṭvā tasya prasuptasya nāsāṃ chittvāgrahīdguroḥ // 10.5.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā ca nāsikāṃ chittvā bhāryāyāstāmaropayat / gurunāsāṃ mukhe tasyā na ca tatrāruroha sā // 10.5.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ bhāryāgurū tena cchinnanāsau kṛtāv ubhau / adhunā vanavāsī ca paśupālo niśāmyatām // 10.5.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
paśupālo mahāmugdhaḥ ko 'pyāsīddhanavānvane / tasya dhūrtāḥ samāśritya mittratve bahavo 'milan // 10.5.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
te taṃ jagadurāḍhyasya sutā nagaravāsinaḥ / tvatkṛte yācitāsmābhiḥ sā ca pitrā pratiśrutā // 10.5.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sa dadau tuṣṭastebhyo 'rthaṃ taṃ ca te punaḥ / vivāhastava saṃpanna ityūcurdivasair gataiḥ // 10.5.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa sutarāṃ tuṣṭastebhyo bhūri dhanaṃ dadau / dinaiś ca taṃ vadanti sma putro jātastaveti te // 10.5.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nananda tena sarvaṃ ca mūḍhastebhyaḥ samarpya saḥ / putraṃ pratyutsuko 'smīti prārodīccāpare 'hani // 10.5.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rudaṃścādatta lokasya hāsaṃ dhūrtaiḥ sa vañcitaḥ / paśubhya iva saṃkrāntajaḍimā paśupālakaḥ // 10.5.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
paśupālaḥ śruto deva śṛṇv alaṃkāralambakam / grāmyaḥ kaścit khanan bhūmiṃ prāpālaṃkaraṇaṃ mahat // 10.5.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rātrau rājakulāccaurair nītvā tatra niveśitam / yadgṛhītvā sa tatraiva bhāryāṃ tena vyabhūṣayat // 10.5.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
babandha mekhalāṃ mūrdhni hāraṃ ca jaghanasthale / nūpurau karayostasyāḥ karṇayor api kaṅkaṇau // 10.5.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hasadbhiḥ khyāpitaṃ lokair buddhvā rājā jahāra tat / tasmātsvābharaṇaṃ taṃ tu paśuprāyaṃ mumoca saḥ // 10.5.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ukto 'laṃkaraṇo deva śṛṇu vacmyatha tūlikam / mūrkhaḥ kaś citpumāṃstūlavikrayāyāpaṇaṃ yayau // 10.5.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśuddhamiti tattasya na jagrāhātra kaścana / tāvaddadarśa tatrāgnau hema niṣṭaptaśodhitam // 10.5.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svarṇakāreṇa vikrītaṃ gṛhītaṃ grāhakeṇa ca / tad dṛṣṭvāpi sa tattūlam icchañ śodhayituṃ jaḍaḥ // 10.5.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agnau cikṣepa dagdhe ca tasmiṃl loko jahāsa tam / śruto 'yaṃ tūliko devakharjūrīchedakaṃ śṛṇu // 10.5.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kecinmūrkhāḥ samāhūya nyayojyantādhikāribhiḥ / grāmyā rājakulādiṣṭaṃ kharjūrānayanaṃ prati // 10.5.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
te dṛṣṭvaikā sukhagrāhyāṃ kharjūrapatitāṃ svataḥ / kharjūrīṃ tatra kharjūrīḥ sarvā grāme svake 'cchinan // 10.5.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
patitāstāś ca kalitāśeṣakharjūrasaṃcayāḥ / utthāpyāropayāmāsurna caiṣāṃ siddhyati sma tat // 10.5.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataś cānītakharjūrā ādṛtāropaṇena te / kharjūrīchedanaṃ buddhvā rājñā pratyuta daṇḍitāḥ // 10.5.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uktaḥ kharjūrahāso 'yaṃ nidhyālokanamucyate / nidhānadarśī kenāpi ko 'pyājahre mahībhujā // 10.5.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
mā gātkvāpi palāyyāyamiti rājakumantriṇā / netre tasyodapāṭyetāṃ nidhānasthānadarśinaḥ // 10.5.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhūlakṣaṇānyapaśyantaṃ gatāvapyagatau samam / andhaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca taṃ mantrī sa jaḍo jahase janaiḥ // 10.5.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nidhānālokanaṃ śrutvā śrūyatāṃ lavaṇāśanam / babhūva gahvaro grāmavāsī ko'pi jaḍaḥ pumān // 10.5.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa mitreṇa gṛhaṃ jātu nīto nagaravāsinā / bhojito lavaṇasvādūnyannāni vyañjanāni ca // 10.5.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
keneyaṃ svādutānnāderityapṛcchatsa gahvaraḥ / prādhānyāllavaṇeneti tenoce suhṛdā tadā // 10.5.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadeva tarhi bhoktavyamity uktvā lavaṇasya saḥ / piṣṭasya muṣṭimādāya prakṣipyābhakṣayanmukhe // 10.5.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taccūrṇaṃ tasya durbuddheroṣṭhau śmaśrūṇi cālipat / hasatastu janasyātra mukhaṃ dhavalatāṃ yayau // 10.5.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
lavaṇāśī śruto deva tvayā godohakaṃ śṛṇu / grāmyaḥ kaścidabhūnmugdho gaurekā tasya cābhavat // 10.5.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā ca tasyāsnvahaṃ dhenuḥ payaḥ palaśataṃ dadau / kadāciccābhavattasya pratyāsannaḥ kilotsavaḥ // 10.5.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekavāraṃ grahīṣyāmi payo 'syāḥ prājyamutsave / iti mūrkhaḥ sa naivaitāṃ masamātraṃ dudoha gām // 10.5.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāptotsavaś ca yāvattāṃ dogdhi tāvat payo 'khilam / tattasyāśchinnamacchinnaṃ lokasya hasitaṃ tvabhūt // 10.5.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śruto godohako mūrkhaḥ śrūyatāmaparāvimau / khalatistāmrakumbhābhaśirāḥ kaś citpumānabhūt // 10.5.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vṛkṣamūlopaviṣṭaṃ taṃ taruṇaḥ kaścidaikṣata / āgato 'tra kapitthāni gṛhītvā kṣudhitaḥ pathā // 10.5.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa kapitthena tattasya krīḍayātāḍayacchiraḥ / khalatiḥ so 'pi tatsehe na tasyovāca kiṃcana // 10.5.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'nyaiḥ kramaśaḥ sarvaiḥ sa kapitthair atāḍayat / śiras tasya sa cātiṣṭatūṣṇīṃ rakte sravatyapi // 10.5.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca niṣphalatāruṇyakṛtakrīḍāvicūrṇitaiḥ / vinā kapitthaiḥ kṣutklānto yayau mūrkhayuvā tataḥ // 10.5.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kapitthaiḥ svādubhiḥ kiṃ na sahe ghātāniti bruvan / sa khalvāṭo galadraktaśirā mūrkho yayau gṛham // 10.5.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mūrkhasāmrājyabaddhena paṭṭeneva vṛtaṃ śiraḥ / raktena tasya taddṛṣṭvā hasati sma na tatra kaḥ // 10.5.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ devopahāsyatvaṃ loke gacchantyabuddhayaḥ / labhante nārthasiddhiṃ ca pūjyante tu subuddhayaḥ // 10.5.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti gomukhataḥ śrutvā mugdhahāsakathā imāḥ / naravāhanadattaḥ samutthāya vyadhitāhnikam // 10.5.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
niśāgame punastena niyuktaścotsukena saḥ / gomukhaḥ kathayām āsa prajñāniṣṭhāmimāṃ kathām // 10.5.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhūt kvāpi vanoddeśe mahāñ śālmalipādapaḥ / uvāsa laghupātīti kākas tatra kṛtālayaḥ // 10.5.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa kadācitsvanīḍastho dadarśātra taroradhaḥ / jālahastaṃ salaguḍaṃ raudraṃ puruṣamāgatam // 10.5.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tataḥ sa vīkṣate yāvatkākastāvadvitatya saḥ / jālaṃ bhuvi vikīryātra vrīhīṃśchanno 'bhavatpumān // 10.5.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca citragrīvākhyaḥ pārāvatapatir bhraman / tatrājagāma nabhasā pārāvataśatair vṛtaḥ // 10.5.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
sa vrīhiprakaraṃ dṛṣṭvā jāle 'trāhāralipsayā / patitaḥ pāśanikarair baddho 'bhutsaparicchadaḥ // 10.5.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
taddṛṣṭvā cānugānsarvāṃścitragrīvo jagāda saḥ / gṛhītvā cañcubhir jālaṃ khamutpatata vegataḥ // 10.5.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tatheti te jālamādāyotpatya vegataḥ / kapotā nabhasā gantuṃ bhītāḥ prārebhir e 'khilāḥ // 10.5.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pyutthāyordhvadṛgvigno lubdhakaḥ saṃnyavartata / nirbhayo 'tha jagādaitāṃścitragrīvo 'nuyāyinaḥ // 10.5.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
manmittrasya hiraṇyasya mūṣakasyāntikaṃ drutam / vrajāmaḥ sa imān pāśāṃś chittvāsmān mocayiṣyati // 10.5.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā so 'nugaiḥ sākaṃ gatvā tair jālakarṣibhiḥ / mūṣakasya biladvāraṃ prāpyākāśādavātarat // 10.5.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bho bho hiraṇya niryāhi citragrīvo 'hamāgataḥ / ityājuhāva taṃ tatra mūṣakaṃ sa kapotarāṭ // 10.5.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa śrutvā dvāramārgeṇa dṛṣṭvā taṃ cāgataṃ tathā / suhṛdaṃ niryayāvākhustasmācchatamukhādbilāt // 10.5.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upetya pṛṣṭvā vṛttāntaṃ saṃbhramātso 'pi mūṣakaḥ / pārāvatapateḥ pāśānsānugasyācchinatsuhṛt // 10.5.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
chinnapāśastamāmantrya mūṣakaṃ vacanaiḥ priyaiḥ / citragrīvaḥ khamutpatya yayau so 'nucaraiḥ saha // 10.5.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anvāgataḥ sa kāko 'tra laghupātī vilokya tat / bilapraviṣṭaṃ taddvāram āgatyovāca mūṣakam // 10.5.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
laghupātīti kāko 'haṃ dṛṣṭvā tvāṃ mittravatsalam / mittratvāya vṛṇomīdṛgvipaduddharaṇakṣamam // 10.5.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvābhyantarād dṛṣṭvā mūṣakas taṃ sa vāyasam / jagāda gaccha kā maittrī bhakṣyabhakṣakayor iti // 10.5.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa vāyaso 'vādīc chāntaṃ bhukte mama tvayi / tṛptiḥ kṣaṇaṃ syān mittre tu śaśvaj jīvitarakṣaṇam // 10.5.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ityādy uktvā saśapathaṃ kṛtvāśvāsaṃ ca tena saḥ / nirgatenākarot sakhyam ākhunā saha vāyasaḥ // 10.5.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa māṃsapeśīr ānaiṣīd ākhuḥ śālikaṇān api / ekatra saha bhuñjānau tasthatus tāv ubhau sukham // 10.5.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā ca sa kākas taṃ mittraṃ mūṣakam abravīt / ito 'vidūre mittrāsti vanamadhyagatā nadī // 10.5.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tasyāṃ mantharako nāma kūrmaścāsti suhṛnmama / tadarthaṃ yāmi tatsthānaṃ suprāpāmiṣabhojanam // 10.5.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛcchrātprāpya ihāhāro nityaṃ vyādhabhayaṃ ca me / ity uktavantaṃ taṃ kākaṃ mūṣako 'pi jagāda saḥ // 10.5.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sahaiva tarhi vatsyāmo naya tatraiva māmapi / mamāpyastīha nirvedo vakṣye tatraiva taṃ ca te // 10.5.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti vādinam ādāya cañcvā taṃ sa hiraṇyakam / nabhasā laghupātī tad yayau vananadītaṭam // 10.5.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
militvā saha kūrmeṇa tatra mantharakeṇa saḥ / kṛtāthithyena mittreṇa sa tasthau mūṣakānvitaḥ // 10.5.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kathāntare ca kūrmāya tasmai svāgamakāraṇasm / hiraṇyasakhyavṛttāntayuktaṃ kākaḥ śaśaṃsa saḥ // 10.5.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa kūrmas taṃ kṛtvā mittraṃ vāyasasaṃstutam / deśanirvāsanirvedahetuṃ papraccha mūṣakam // 10.5.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato hiraṇyaḥ sa tayor ubhayoḥ kākakūrmayoḥ / śṛṇvatornijavṛttāntakathāmetāmavarṇayast // 10.5.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ mahābile tatra nagarāsannavartini / vasanrājakulāddhāramānīyāsthāpayaṃ niśi // 10.5.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛśyamānena hāreṇa tena jātaujasaṃ ca mām / samarthamannāharaṇe mūṣakāḥ paryavārayan // 10.5.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
atrāntare ca tatrāsītkaścidasmadbilāntike / parivrāṇmaṭhikāṃ kṛtvā nānābhikṣānnavṛttikaḥ // 10.5.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa bhuktaśeṣaṃ bhikṣānnaṃ naktaṃ sthāpayati sma tat / bhikyabhāṇḍasthamullambya śaṅkau prātarjighatsayā // 10.5.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
suptasyātra ca tasyāham bilenāntaḥ praviśya tat / dattordhvajhampo niḥśeṣamanaiṣaṃ pratiyāmini // 10.5.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kadācittatra tasyāgātsuhṛtpravrājako 'paraḥ / bhuktottaraṃ samaṃ tena kathāṃ rātrau sa cākarot // 10.5.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvannetuṃ pravṛtte 'nnaṃ mayi jarjarakeṇa saḥ / pravrāḍavādayaddattakarṇastadbhāṇḍakaṃ muhuḥ // 10.5.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kathamācchidya kimidaṃ karoṣīti sa tena ca / āgantunā parivrājā pṛṣṭaḥ pravrāṭ tam abravīt // 10.5.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
iha me mūṣakaḥ śatrurutpanno 'tha sadaiva yaḥ / api dūrasthamutplutya nayatyannamito mama // 10.5.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ trāsayāmi calayañjarjareṇānnabhājanam / ity uktavantaṃ pravrājaṃ parivrāṭ so 'paro 'bravīt // 10.5.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
lobho nāmaiṣa jantūnāṃ doṣāyātra kathāṃ śṛṇu / tīrthāny ahaṃ bhraman prāpam ekaṃ nagaram ekadā // 10.5.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra caikasya viprasya nivāsāyāviśaṃ gṛham / sthite mayi sa vipraś ca vadati sma svagehinīm // 10.5.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛsaraṃ brāhmaṇakṛte parvaṇy adya pacer iti / kutas te nirdhanasyaitad ity avocac ca sāpi tam // 10.5.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa vipro 'vādīttāṃ priye kārye 'pi saṃcaye / nātisaṃcayadhīḥ kāryā śṛṇu cātra kathāmimām // 10.5.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vane kvāpi kṛtākheṭo vyādho yantritasāyakaḥ / prādāya māṃsaṃ dhanuṣi prādhāvatsūkaraṃ prati // 10.5.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tenaiva kāṇḍabiddhena nihataḥ potravikṣataḥ / sa vyapadyata taccātra dūrādaikṣata jambukaḥ // 10.5.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa cāgatya kṣudhārto 'pi cikīrṣuḥ saṃcayāya tat / kroḍavyādhāmiṣātkiṃcinna cakhādātibhūyasaḥ // 10.5.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhoktuṃ pravavṛte tattu gatvā dhanuṣi yatsthitam / tatkṣaṇaṃ coccaladyantraśaraviddho mamāra saḥ // 10.5.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tan nātisaṃcayaḥ kārya iti tena dvijena sā / bhāryoktā pratipadyaitat tilān prākṣipadātape // 10.5.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praviṣṭāyāṃ gṛhaṃ tasyāṃ prāśya śvā tān adūṣayat / tato na kṛṣarān etān kaścin mūlyādināgrahīt // 10.5.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadevaṃ nopabhogāya lobhaḥ kleśāya kevalam / ity uktvā punarāha sma pravrāḍāgantuko 'tha saḥ // 10.5.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
khanitramasti cettanme dīyatāṃ yāvadadya vaḥ / yuktyā nivārayāmyetaṃ mūṣakottham upadravam // 10.5.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā tannivāsī sa pravrāṭ tasmai khanitrakam / dadāvahaṃ ca cchannasthastaddṛṣṭvā prāviśaṃ bilam // 10.5.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatastena khanitreṇa pravrāḍāgantuko 'tha saḥ / matsaṃcārabilaṃ vīkṣya prārebhye khanituṃ śaṭhaḥ // 10.5.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kramāc ca tāvadakhanatpalāyanapare mayi / yāvattaṃ prāpa tatrasthaṃ hāraṃ me cānyasaṃcayam // 10.5.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tejasānena tasyābhūdākhostattādṛśaṃ balam / ityāha sthāninaṃ taṃ ca pravrājaṃ mayi śṛṇvati // 10.5.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nītvā ca tanme sarvasvaṃ hāraṃ mūrdhni nidhāya ca / āgantusthāyinau hṛṣṭau pravrājau svapataḥ sma tau // 10.5.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
prasuptayostayostaṃ ca hartuṃ māṃ punarāgatam / prabudhyātāḍayadyaṣṭyā pravrāṭ sthāyī sa mūrdhani // 10.5.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tenāhaṃ vraṇito daivān na mṛto bilam āviśam / bhūyaś ca śaktir nābhūn me tadannāharaṇaplave // 10.5.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
artho hi yauvanaṃ puṃsāṃ tadabhāvaś ca vārdhakam / tenāsyojo balaṃ rūpamutsāhaścāpi hīyate // 10.5.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athātmamātrabharaṇe yatnavantamavekṣya mām / parityajya gataḥ sarvaḥ sa mūṣakaparicchadaḥ // 10.5.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
avṛttike prabhuṃ bhṛtyā apuṣpaṃ bhramarāstarum / ajalaṃ ca saro haṃsā muñcanty api ciroṣitam // 10.5.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
itthaṃ tatra cirodvignaḥ suhṛdaṃ laghupātinam / prāpyaitaṃ kacchapaśreṣṭha tvatpārśvamahamāgataḥ // 10.5.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ hiraṇyakenokte kūrmo mantharako 'bhyadhāt / svam eva sthānametatte tanmā mitrādhṛtiṃ kṛthāḥ // 10.5.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gunino na videśo 'sti na saṃtuṣṭasya cāsukham / dhīrasya ca vipannāsti nāsādhyaṃ vyavasāyinaḥ // 10.5.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti tasminvadatyeva kūrme citrāṅgasaṃjñakaḥ / dūrato vyādhavitrasto mṛgastadvanamāyayau // 10.5.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ dṛṣṭvā tasya dṛṣṭvā ca paścādvyādhamanāgatam / āśvāsitena tenāpi sakhyaṃ kūrmādayo vyadhuḥ // 10.5.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nyavasaṃste tatas tatra kākakūrmamṛgākhavaḥ / parasparopacāreṇa sukhitāḥ suhṛdaḥ samam // 10.5.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā kvāpi citrāṅgaṃ cirāyātaṃ tamīkṣitum / āruhya tarumaikṣiṣṭa laghupātī sa tadvanam // 10.5.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dadarśa ca nadītīre kīlapāśena saṃyatam / citrāṅgamavaruhyaitadavadaccākhukūrmayoḥ // 10.5.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ saṃmantrya cañcvā taṃ gṛhītvākhuṃ hiraṇyakam / citrāṅgasyāntikaṃ tasya laghupātī nināya saḥ // 10.5.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hiraṇyakaś ca taṃ bandhavidhuraṃ muṣako mṛgam / kṣaṇādamuñcadāśvāsya daśanacchinnapāśakam // 10.5.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvanmantharako 'bhyetya nadīmadhyena kacchapaḥ / āruroha taṭaṃ teṣāṃ nikaṭaṃ sa suhṛtpriyaḥ // 10.5.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkṣaṇaṃ sa kuto 'pyetya lubdhakaḥ pāśadāyakaḥ / vidruteṣu mṛgādyeṣu labdhvā taṃ kūrmamagrahīt // 10.5.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣiptvā ca jālakāntas taṃ yāvan naṣṭamṛgākulaḥ / sa yāti tāvad duṣṭvaitad dīrghadṛśvākhuvākyataḥ // 10.5.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
mṛgo gatvā tato dūre patitvāsīnmṛto yathā / kākastu mūrdhni tasyāsīccakṣuṣī pāṭayanniva // 10.5.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taddṛṣṭvā sa gṛhītaṃ taṃ vyādho matvā mṛgaṃ mṛtam / gantuṃ pravavṛte nadyāstaṭe kūrmaṃ nidhāya tam // 10.5.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yātaṃ dṛṣṭvā tamabhyetya mūṣakas tasya jālikām / kūrmasya so 'cchinattena mukto nadyāṃ papāta saḥ // 10.5.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mṛgo 'pi nikaṭībhūtaṃ vyādhaṃ vīkṣya vikacchapam / utthāya sa palāyyāgātkāko 'pyārūḍhavāṃstarum // 10.5.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etya vyādho 'tra kūrmaṃ taṃ bandhacchedapalāyitam / aprāpyobhayavibhraṣṭo daivaṃ śocannagādgṛham // 10.5.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato milanti smaikatra hṛṣṭāḥ kūrmādayo 'tra te / mṛgastu prītimānevaṃ kūrmādīṃstānuvāca saḥ // 10.5.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
puṇyavānasmi yatprāptā bhavantaḥ suhṛdo mayā / praṇānupekṣya yair evaṃ mṛtyoradyāhamuddhṛtaḥ // 10.5.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ praśaṃsatā tena mṛgeṇa saha tatra te / anyonyaprītisukhitāḥ kākakūrmākhavo 'vasan // 10.5.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
prajñayā sādhayantyevaṃ tiryañco 'pi samīhitam / prāṇair api na muñcanti te 'pyevaṃ mittramāpadi // 10.5.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ ca śreyasī mittreṣv āsaktir nāṅganāsu tām / īrṣyāśrayatvāc chaṃsanti tathā ca śrūyatāṃ kathā // 10.5.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
nagare kvāpi ko 'py āsīd īrṣyāvān puruṣaḥ prabho / babhūva tasya bhāryā ca vallabhā rūpaśālinī // 10.5.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aviśvasto na tāṃ jātu mumocaikākinīṃ ca saḥ / tasyā hi śīlavibhraṃśaṃ citrasthebhyo 'py aśaṅkata // 10.5.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kenāpyavaśyakāryeṇa kadācitsa pumānatha / sahaivādāya tāṃ bhāryāṃ pratasthe viṣayāntaram // 10.5.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mārge sabhillāmaṭavīmagre dṛṣṭvā sa tadbhayāst / sthāpayitvā gṛhe grāmyavṛddhaviprasya tāṃ yayau // 10.5.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra sthitā ca sā dṛṣṭā bhillāṃs tenāgatān pathā / ekena yūnā bhillena saha dhṛṣṭā yayau tataḥ // 10.5.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tena yuktā ca tatpallīṃ yathākāmaṃ cacāra sā / utkrānterṣyālupatikā bhagnaseturivāpagā // 10.5.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tāvat sa tatpatiḥ kṛtvā kāryamāgatya taṃ dvijam / grāmyaṃ yayāce tāṃ bhāryāṃ so 'pi vipro jagāda tam // 10.5.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
na jāne 'haṃ kva yātā sā jānāmyetāvadeva tu / bhillā ihāgatā āsaṃstaiḥ sa nītā bhaviṣyati // 10.5.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā pallī nikaṭe ceha tattatra vraja satvaram / tataḥ prāpsyasi tāṃ bhāryāmanyathā mā matiṃ kṛthāḥ // 10.5.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktas tena sa rudan nindan buddhiviparyayam / jagāma bhillapallīṃ tāṃ bhāryāṃ tatra dadarśa ca // 10.5.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpi dṛṣṭvā tamabhyetya pāpā bhītā tadābravīt / na me doṣo 'hamānītā bhilleneha balāditi // 10.5.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āyāhi tatra gacchāvo yāvatkaścinna paśyati / iti bruvāṇaṃ rāgāndhaṃ tam uvāca patiṃ ca sā // 10.5.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tasyāgamanaveleyaṃ bhillasyākheṭagāminaḥ / āgataścānudhāvyaiva hanyāttvāṃ māṃ ca sa dhruvam // 10.5.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatpraviśya guhāmetāṃ pracchannastiṣṭha saṃprati / rātrau ca suptaṃ hatvā taṃ yāsyāvo nirbhayāvitaḥ // 10.5.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
evaṃ tayoktaḥ śaṭhayā praviśyāsīdguhāṃ sa tām / ko 'vakāśo vivekasya hṛdi kāmāndhacetasaḥ // 10.5.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sātha kustrī gṛhāntaḥsthamānītaṃ vyasanena tam / bhillāyādarśayattasmā āgatāya dinātyaye // 10.5.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca niṣkṛṣya taṃ bhillaḥ krūrakarmā parākramī / prātardevyupahārārthaṃ babandha sudṛḍhaṃ tarau // 10.5.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhuktvā ca paśyatas tasya rātrau tadbhāryayā saha / sa samāsevya surataṃ sukhaṃ suṣvāpa tadyutaḥ // 10.5.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
taṃ dṛṣṭvā suptamīrṣyāluḥ sa pumāṃstarusaṃyataḥ / caṇḍīṃ stutibhir abhyarcya yayau śaraṇamārtitaḥ // 10.5.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāvirbhūya varaṃ tasmai taṃ dadau yena tasya saḥ / tatkhaḍgenaiva bhillasya srastabandho 'cchinacchiraḥ // 10.5.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ehīdānīṃ hataḥ pāpo mayāyamiti so 'tha tām / prabodhya bhāryāṃ vakti sma sāpy uttasthau suduḥkhitā // 10.5.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
gṛhītvā tasya ca śiro bhillasyālakṣitaṃ niśi / tataḥ pratasthe kustrī sa patyā tena sahaiva ca // 10.5.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
prātaś ca nagaraṃ prāpya darśayantī śiro 'tra tat / bhartā hato me 'neneti cakrandākramya taṃ patim // 10.5.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tataḥ sa nītas tadyukto rājāgre purarakṣibhiḥ / pṛṣṭas tatra yathāvṛttam īrṣyālus tad avarṇayat // 10.5.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājātha tattvamanviṣya cchedayām āsa kustriyaḥ / tasyāḥ karṇau ca nāsāṃ ca tatpatiṃ ca mumoca tam // 10.5.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa muktaḥ svagṛhaṃ prāyātkustrīsnehagrahojjhitaḥ / evaṃ hi kurute deva yoṣidīrṣyāniyantritā // 10.5.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śikṣayastyatyapuruṣāsaṅgamīrṣyaiva hi striyaḥ / tadīrṣyāmaprakāśyaiva rakṣyā nārī subuddhinā // 10.5.168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
rahasyaṃ ca na vaktavyaṃ vanitāsu yathā tathā / puruṣeṇecchatā kṣemamatra ca śrūyatāṃ kathā // 10.5.169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nāgaḥ kaś citpalāyyāsīstkutracidgaṇikāgṛhe / mānuṣaṃ rūpamāsthāya vainateyabhayadbhuvi // 10.5.170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gaṇikāpyagrahīdbhāṭiṃ sa hastiśatapañcakam / svaprabhāvāc ca tattasyai sa nāgaḥ pratyahaṃ dadau // 10.5.171	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kuto 'nvahamiyantas te hastino brūhi ko bhavān / iti nirbandhataḥ sātha taṃ papraccha vilāsinī // 10.5.172	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mā vocaḥ kasyacittārkṣyabhayādevamiha sthitaḥ / nāgo 'hamiti vakti sma so 'pi tāṃ māramohitaḥ // 10.5.173	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā tadrahasi kuṭṭanyai śaśaṃsa gaṇikā tataḥ / atha tārkṣyo jagaccinvannatrāgātpuruṣākṛtiḥ // 10.5.174	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upetya kuṭṭanīṃ tāṃ ca jagāda tvatsutāgṛhe / ahamadya vasāmyārye bhāṭirme gṛhyatāmiti // 10.5.175	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iha nāgaḥ sthito nityamibhapañcaśatīṃ dadat / tatkimekāhabhāṭyeti kuṭṭany api jagāda tam // 10.5.176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa garuḍo nāgaṃ tatra sthitamavetya tam / viveśātithirūpeṇa tadvāravanitāgṛham // 10.5.177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra prāsādapṛṣṭhasthaṃ nāgaṃ tamavalokya saḥ / prakāśyātmānamutplutya jaghāna ca jaghāsa ca // 10.5.178	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ato na kathayetprājño rahasyaṃ strīṣvanargalam / ity uktvā gomukho mugdhakathāṃ punaravarṇayat // 10.5.179	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāmrakumbhopamaśirāḥ ko 'yāsītkhalatiḥ pumān / sa ca mūrkho 'rthavāṃlloke lajjate sma kacair vinā // 10.5.180	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha dhūrtastamāgatya ko 'pyuvācopajīvikaḥ / eko 'sti vaidyo yo vetti keśotpādanamauṣadham // 10.5.181	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
etac chrutvā tamāha sma tamāsnayasi cenmama / tato 'haṃ tava dāsyāmi dhanaṃ vaidyasya tasya ca // 10.5.182	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktavatas tasya dhanaṃ bhuktvācireṇa saḥ / mugdhasyānītavānekaṃ dhūrto dhūrtacikitsakam // 10.5.183	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upajīvya ciraṃ so 'pi khalvāṭaṃ taṃ bhiṣakchiraḥ / apāsya veṣṭanaṃ yuktvā mugdhāyāsmāy adarśayat // 10.5.184	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taddṛṣṭvāpyavimarśaḥ sanvaidyaṃ keśārthamauṣadham / taṃ yayāce sa jaḍadhīstato vaidyo 'bravītsa tam // 10.5.185	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
khalvāṭaḥ svayamanyasya janayeyaṃ kathaṃ kacān / iti te mūrkha nirloma darśitaṃ svaśiro mayā // 10.5.186	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathāpi tvaṃ na vetsyeva dhigity uktvā yayau bhiṣak / evaṃ deva sadā dhūrtāḥ krīḍanti jaḍabuddhibhiḥ // 10.5.187	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ śrutaḥ keśamugdhastailamugdho niśamyatām / mugdho 'bhūtpuruṣaḥ kaścidbhūtyaḥ śiṣṭasya kasyacit // 10.5.188	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tena svāminā tailamānetuṃ vaṇijo 'ntikam / preṣito jātu tattasmātpātre tailam upādade // 10.5.189	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tailapātraṃ gṛhītvā tadāgacchaṃs tatra kenacit / ūce mittreṇa rakṣedaṃ tailapātraṃ sravatyadhaḥ // 10.5.190	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā vīkṣitumadhaḥ pātraṃ tatparyavartayat / sa mūḍhastena tatsarvaṃ tailaṃ tasyāpatadbhuvi // 10.5.191	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadbuddhvā lokahāsyo 'sau nirastaḥ svāminā gṛhāt / tasmāt svabuddhir mugdhasya varaṃ na tvanuśāsanam // 10.5.192	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tailamugdhaḥ śrutasāvadasthimugdho niśamyatām / abhūn mūrkhaḥ pumān kaścid bhāryābhūt tasya cāsatī // 10.5.193	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
sā tasminnekadā patyau kāryāddeśāntaraṃ gate / dattakartavyaśikṣāṃ svamāptāṃ karmakarīṃ gṛhe // 10.5.194	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ananyadāsīṃ saṃsthāpya nirgatyaināntatas tataḥ / yayāvupapatergehaṃ nirargalasukhecchayā // 10.5.195	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
athāgataṃ tatpatiṃ sa sthitaśikṣāśrugadgadam / karmakaryavadadbharyā mṛtā dagdhā ca sā tava // 10.5.196	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā sā śmaśānaṃ ca nītvā tasmāyadarśayast / asthīny anyacitāsthāni tāny ādāya rudaṃś ca saḥ // 10.5.197	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtodako 'ha tīrtheṣu prakṣipyāsthīni tāni ca / prāvartata sa bhāryāyāstasyāḥ śrāddhavidhau jaḍaḥ // 10.5.198	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sadvipra ity upānītaṃ karmakaryā tayaiva ca / tam eva bhāryopapatiṃ śrāddhavipraṃ cakāra saḥ // 10.5.199	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tenopapatinā sārdhaṃ tadbhāryābhyetya tatra sā / udāraveṣā bhuṅkte sma mṛṣṭānnaṃ māsi māsi tat // 10.5.200	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
satīdharmaprabhāveṇa bhāryā te paralokataḥ / paśyāgatya svayaṃ bhuṅkte brāhmaṇena samaṃ prabho // 10.5.201	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti karmakarī sā tamavocattatpatiṃ yathā / tathaiva pratipede tatsarvaṃ mūrkhaśiromaṇiḥ // 10.5.202	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vañcyante helayaivaivaṃ kustrībhiḥ saralāśayāḥ / śruto 'sthimugdhaś caṇḍālakanyakā śrūyatāṃ tvayā // 10.5.203	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
abhūdrūpavatī kāpi mugdhā caṇḍālakanyakā / sārvabhaumavaraprāptau saṃkalpaṃ hṛdi sākarot // 10.5.204	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā jātu dṛṣṭvā rājānaṃ nagarabhramanirgatam / sarvottamaṃ bhartṛbuddheranuyātuṃ pracakrame // 10.5.205	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
tāvadāgātpathā tena munis tasya praṇamya saḥ / pādau gajāvarūḍhaḥ sanrājā svabhavanaṃ yayau // 10.5.206	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taddṛṣṭvā rājato 'pyenaṃ vicintya munimuttamam / caṇḍālakanyā rājānaṃ tyaktvā sā munimanvagāt // 10.5.207	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
muniḥ so 'pi vrajandṛṣṭvā śūnyamagre śivālayam / nyastajānuḥ kṣitau tatra śivaṃ natvā yayau tataḥ // 10.5.208	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadvīkṣya sāntyajā matvā munerapyuttamaṃ śivam / bhartṛbuddhyā muniṃ tyaktvā devaṃ tatraiva śiśriye // 10.5.209	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣaṇāccātra praviśya śvā devasyāruhya pīṭhikām / jaṅghāmutkṣipya jāteryatsadṛśaṃ tasya tadvyadhāt // 10.5.210	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadvilokyāntyajā matvā devācchvānaṃ tam uttamam / yāntaṃ tam evānvagāt sā tyaktvā devaṃ patīcchayā // 10.5.211	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
śvā cāgatyaiva caṇḍālagṛhaṃ paricitasya saḥ / caṇḍālayūnaḥ praṇayālluloṭhaikasya pādayoḥ // 10.5.212	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tadālokyottamaṃ matvā śunaścaṇḍālaputrakam / svajātituṣṭā vavre sā tam eva patimantyajā // 10.5.213	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
evaṃ kṛtapadā dūre patanti svapade jaḍāḥ / evaṃ ca mūrkhaṃ rājānaṃ saṃkṣepādaparaṃ śṛṇu // 10.5.214	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
mūrkhaḥ kaścidabhūdrājā kṛpaṇaḥ koṣavānapi / ekadā jagaduścaivaṃ mantriṇastaṃ hitaiṣiṇaḥ // 10.5.215	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dānaṃ harati deveha durgatiṃ pāralokikīṃ / tad dehi dānam āyūṃṣi bhaṅgurāṇi dhanāni ca // 10.5.216	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tacchrutvā sa nṛpo 'vādīddānaṃ dāsyāmyahaṃ tadā / durgatiṃ prāptamātmānaṃ mṛto drakṣyāmi cediti // 10.5.217	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataścāntarhasantas te tūṣṇīmāsata mantriṇaḥ / evaṃ nojjhati mūḍho 'rthānyāvadarthaiḥ sa nojjhitaḥ // 10.5.218	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājabhautaḥ śruto deva madhye mittradvayaṃ śṛṇu / babhūva candrāpīḍākhyaḥ kānyakubje mahīpatiḥ // 10.5.219	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tasyābhavac ca dhavalamukhākhyaḥ ko'pi sevakaḥ / bahir bhuktvā ca pītvā ca sadaiva prāviśadgṛham // 10.5.220	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhuktapītaḥ kuto nityamāyāsīti ca bhāryayā / pṛṣṭaḥ sa jātu dhavalamukhastāmevam abhyadhāt // 10.5.221	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
suhṛtpārśvādahaṃ śaśvadbhuktvā pītvā ca sundari / sadaivāyāmi yenāsti loke mittradvayaṃ mama // 10.5.222	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kalyāṇavarmanāmaiko bhojanādyupakārakṛt / dvitīyo vīrabāhuś ca prāṇair apy upakārakaḥ // 10.5.223	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ śrutvaiva dhavalamukho 'sau bhāryayā tayā / ūce mittradvayaṃ tanme bhavatā darśyatāmiti // 10.5.224	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato yayau sa tadyuktas tasya kalyāṇavarmaṇaḥ / gṛhaṃ so 'pi mahārhaistam upacārair upācarat // 10.5.225	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyedyuḥ sa yayau vīrabāhorbhāryāyuto 'ntikam / sa ca dyūtasthitaḥ kṛtvā svāgataṃ taṃ visṛṣṭavān // 10.5.226	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'bravīt sā dhavalamukhaṃ bhāryā sakautukā / kalyāṇavarmā mahatīṃ satkriyām akarot tava // 10.5.227	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
kṛtaṃ svāgatamātraṃ tu bhavato vīrabāhunā / tadāryaputra taṃ mittraṃ manyase 'bhyadhikaṃ katham // 10.5.228	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā so 'bravīdgaccha mithyā tau brūhyubhau kramāt / rājā naḥ kupito 'kasmāttato jñāsyasyatha svayam // 10.5.229	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktā tena gatvaiva sā tatheti tadaiva tat / kalyāṇavarmaṇo 'vocatsa śrutvaiva jagāda tām // 10.5.230	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhavatyahaṃ vaṇikputro brūhi rājñaḥ karomi kim / ity uktā tena sā prāyād vīrabāhor athāntikam // 10.5.231	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmai tathaiva sāśaṃsad rājakopaṃ svabhartari / sa śrutvaivāyayau dhāvan gṛhītvā khaḍgacarmaṇī // 10.5.232	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mantribhir vāritaḥ kopādrājāsau tadvrajeti tam / vīrabāhuṃ sa dhavalamukho 'tha prāhiṇodgṛham // 10.5.233	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
evaṃ tadantaraṃ tanvi mittrayor etayor mama / iti bhāryātha dhavalamukhenoktā tutoṣa sā // 10.5.234	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ityanyadupacāreṇa mittramanyattu satyataḥ / tulye 'pi snigdhatāyoge tailaṃ tailaṃ ghṛtaṃ ghṛtam // 10.5.235	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityākhyāya kathāmetāṃ mantrī mugdhakathāḥ kramāt / naravāhanadattāya gomukho 'kathayatpunaḥ // 10.5.236	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaścinmugdho 'dhvagastīrtvā kṛcchrāttṛṣṇāturo 'ṭavīm / nadīṃ prāpyāpi na papau vīkṣāṃcakre paraṃ jalam // 10.5.237	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tṛṣito 'pi pibasyambhaḥ kiṃ nety ukto 'tra kenacit / iyatkathaṃ pibāmīti mandabuddhir uvāca tam // 10.5.238	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ daṇḍayati rājā tvāṃ sarvaṃ pītaṃ na cettvayā / iti tenopahasito 'py ambu mugdhaḥ sa nāpibat // 10.5.239	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
evaṃ na śaknuvantīha yadyatkartumaśeṣataḥ / yathāśakti na tasyāṃśam apikurvantyabuddhayaḥ // 10.5.240	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jalabhītaḥ śruto deva śrūyatāṃ putraghātyayam / bahuputro daridraś ca mūrkhaḥ kaścidabhūtpumān // 10.5.241	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ekasminmṛte putre dvitīyamavadhītsvayam / kathaṃ bālo 'yamekākī pathi dūre vrajediti // 10.5.242	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa nindyo hāsyaś ca deśānnirvāsito janaiḥ / evaṃ paśuś ca mūrkhaś ca nirvivekamatī samau // 10.5.243	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutas tvayā putraghātī bhrātṛbhautam imaṃ śṛṇu / janamadhye kathāḥ kurvan ko 'py āsīt kvāpi mugdhadhīḥ // 10.5.244	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa bhavyaṃ puruṣaṃ dūrād dṛṣṭvā mūrkho 'bravīd idam / eṣa me bhavati bhrātā rikthamasya harāmyataḥ // 10.5.245	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ tu kaścin naitasya tena naitad ṛṇaṃ mama / ity uktavān sa mūḍho 'tra pāṣāṇānapyahāsayat // 10.5.246	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ mūḍhasya mūḍhatvaṃ svārthāndhasyāticitratā / bhrātṛbhautaḥ śruto deva brahmacārisutaṃ śṛṇu // 10.5.247	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaś citpitṛguṇākhyānapravṛttasakhimadhyagaḥ / mugdhaḥ svapiturutkarṣaṃ varṇayannevam abhyadhāt // 10.5.248	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ābalyādbrahmacārī me pitā nānyo 'sti tatsamaḥ / tac chrutvā tvaṃ kuto jāta iti taṃ suhṛdo 'bruvan // 10.5.249	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mānaso 'haṃ sutas tasyety evaṃ punar api bruvan / viśeṣato vihasitaḥ sa tair jaḍaśiromaṇiḥ // 10.5.250	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
atyārūḍhaṃ vadanty evam asaṃbaddhaṃ jaḍāśayāḥ / brahmacārisutaṃ śrutvā śrūyatāṃ gaṇako 'py ayam // 10.5.251	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
babhūva nāma gaṇakaḥ kaścidvijñānavarjitaḥ / sa bhāryāputrasahitaḥ svadeśādvṛttyabhāvataḥ // 10.5.252	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
gatvā deśāntaraṃ caivaṃ mithyāvijñānamātmanaḥ / kṛtakapratyayenārthapūjāṃ prāptamadarśayat // 10.5.253	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pariṣvajya sutaṃ bālaṃ sa taṃ sarvajanāgrataḥ / ruroda pṛṣṭaś ca janair evaṃ pāpo jagāda saḥ // 10.5.254	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyac ca jāne 'haṃ tadayaṃ śiśuḥ / vipatsyate me divase saptame tena rodimi // 10.5.255	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
ity uktvā tatra vismāpya lokaṃ prāpte 'ni saptame / pratyūṣa eva suptaṃ ca sa vyāpāditavānsutam // 10.5.256	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvātha taṃ mṛtaṃ bālaṃ saṃjātapratyayair janaiḥ / pūjito dhanamāsādya svadeśaṃ svair amāyayau // 10.5.257	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity arthalobhān mithyaiva vijñānakhyāpanecchavaḥ / mūrkhāḥ putram api ghnanti na rajyet teṣu buddhimān // 10.5.258	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayaṃ ca śrūyatāṃ mūrkhaḥ krodhanaḥ puruṣaḥ prabho / bahiḥ sthitasya kasyāpi puṃsaḥ kutrāpi śṛṇvataḥ // 10.5.259	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhyantare guṇān kaścic chaśaṃsa svajanāgrataḥ / tadā caiko 'bravīt tatra satyaṃ sa guṇavān sakhe // 10.5.260	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ tu dvau tasya doṣau staḥ sāhasī krodhanaś ca yat / iti vādinamevaitaṃ bahirvartī niśamya saḥ // 10.5.261	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pumān praviśya sahasā vāsasāveṣṭayadgale / re jālma sāhasaṃ kiṃ me krodhaḥ kaś ca mayā kṛtaḥ // 10.5.262	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uvāca ca sākṣepaṃ pumān krodhāgninā jvalan / tato hasantas tatrānye tam ūcuḥ kiṃ bravīty adaḥ // 10.5.263	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
pratyakṣadarśitakrodhasāhaso 'pi bhavāniti / evaṃ svadoṣaḥ prakaṭo 'py ajñair deva na budhyate // 10.5.264	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
idānīṃ śrūyatāṃ mugdhaḥ kanyāvardhayitā nṛpaḥ / rājābhūt ko'pi kanyaikā surūpājani tasya ca // 10.5.265	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa vardhayitukāmastāmatisnehena satvaram / vaidyānānīya nṛpatiḥ prītipūrvam abhāṣata // 10.5.266	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
sadauṣadhaprayogaṃ taṃ kaṃcitkuruta yena me / sutaiṣā vardhate śīghraṃ sadbhartre ca pradīyate // 10.5.267	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā te 'bruvanvaidyā upajīvayituṃ jaḍam / astyauṣadhamito dūrāttattu deśādavāpyate // 10.5.268	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ānayāmaś ca yāvattattāvadeva sutā tava / adṛśyā sthāpanīyaiṣā vidhānaṃ tatra hīdṛśam // 10.5.269	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā sthāspayāmāsuśchannāṃ te tāṃ nṛpatmajām / saṃvatsarānatra bahūnauṣadhaprāptiśaṃsinaḥ // 10.5.270	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
yauvanasthāṃ ca tāṃ prāptāmauṣadhena pravardhitām / bruvāṇā darśayāmāsuḥ sutāṃ tasmai mahībhṛte // 10.5.271	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi tān pūrayām āsa vaidyāṃs tuṣṭo dhanoccayaiḥ / iti vyājāj jaḍadhiyo dhūrtair bhujyanta īśvarāḥ // 10.5.272	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ayaṃ cākarṇyatām ardhapaṇopārjitapaṇḍitaḥ / abhūn nagaravāsyekaḥ pumān prajñābhimānavān // 10.5.273	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

śaśo 'driśikharārūḍho dhīmāṃstamavadadgajam / ahaṃ devasya candrasya dūtastvāṃ caivamāha saḥ // 10.6.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śītaṃ candrasaro nāma nivāso 'sti saro mama / tatrāsate śaśāsteṣāṃ rājāhaṃ te ca me priyāḥ // 10.6.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ata evāsmi śītāṃśuḥ śaśī ceti gataḥ prathām / tatsaro nāśitaṃ te ca śaśakā me hatāstvayā // 10.6.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhūyaḥ kartāsi cedevaṃ mattaḥ prāpsyasi tatphalam / etaddūtācchaśāc chrutvā gajendraḥ so 'bravīdbhayāt // 10.6.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
naivaṃ kariṣye bhūyo 'haṃ mānyo me bhagavāñ śaśī / tadehi darśayāmas te yāvat taṃ prārthayeḥ sakhe // 10.6.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityūcivān sa nāgendramānīya saraso 'ntare / tatra tasmai śaśaścandrapratibimbamadarśayat // 10.6.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taddṛṣṭvā dūrato natva bhayātkampasamākulaḥ / vanaṃ dvipendraḥ sa yayau bhūyas tatra ca nāyayau // 10.6.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
pratyakṣaṃ tac ca dṛṣṭvā sa śaśarājaḥ śilīmukhaḥ / saṃmānya taṃ śaśaṃ dūtamavasattatra nirbhayaḥ // 10.6.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā vāyaso bhūyaḥ pakṣiṇastānabhāṣata / evaṃ prabhuḥ svanāmnaiva yasya kaścinna bādhate // 10.6.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadulūko divāndho 'yaṃ kṣudro rājyaṃ kuto 'rhati / kṣudraś ca syādaviśvāsyas tatra caitāṃ kathāṃ śṛṇu // 10.6.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kadācitkvāpi vṛkṣe 'hamavasaṃ tatra cāpy adhaḥ / pakṣī kapiñjalo nāma vasati sma kṛtālayaḥ // 10.6.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa kadācid gataḥ kvāpi yāvan na divasān bahūn / āyāti tāvat tannīḍaṃ tam etya śaśako 'vasat // 10.6.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
dinaiḥ kapiñjalo 'trāgāttato 'sya śaśakasya ca / nīḍo me tava netyevaṃ vivāda udabhūddvayoḥ // 10.6.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nirṇetāraṃ tataḥ sabhyamanveṣṭuṃ prasthitāvubhau / tāvahaṃ kautukāddraṣṭumanvagacchamalakṣitaḥ // 10.6.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā stokaṃ sarastīre 'hiṃsādhṛtamṛṣāvratam / dhyānārdhamīlitadṛśaṃ mārjāraṃ tāvapaśyatām // 10.6.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
etam eva ca pṛcchāvaḥ kiṃ nyāyyamiha dhārmikam / ity uktvā tau biḍālaṃ tam upetyaivamavocatām // 10.6.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śṛṇu nau bhagavannyāyaṃ tapasvī tvaṃ hi dhārmikaḥ / śrutvaitadalpayā vācā biḍālastau jagāda saḥ // 10.6.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na śṛṇomi tapaḥkṣāmo dūrādāyāta me 'ntikam / dharmo hy asamyaṅ nirṇīto nihantyubhayalokayoḥ // 10.6.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ity uktvāśvāsya tāvagramānīyaṃ sa biḍālakaḥ / ubhāvapyavadhītkṣudraḥ sākaṃ śaśakapiñjalau // 10.6.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadevaṃ nāsti viśvāsaḥ kṣudrakarmaṇi durjane / tasmādulūko rājāyaṃ na kartavyo 'tidurjanaḥ // 10.6.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ity uktāḥ pakṣiṇastena vāyasena tatheti te / abhiṣekamulūkasya nivāryetastato yayuḥ // 10.6.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adyaprabhṛti yūyaṃ ca vayaṃ cānyonyaśatravaḥ / smara yāmītyulūkastaṃ kākamuktvā krudhā yayau // 10.6.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kāko 'pi yuktamuktaṃ tu matvā vignastato 'bhavat / vāṅmātrotpāditāsahyavair ātko nānutapyate // 10.6.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ vāgdoṣasaṃbhūtaṃ vairaṃ naḥ kauśikaiḥ saha / ity uktvā kākarājaṃ taṃ cirajīvyavadatpunaḥ // 10.6.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bahavo balinas te ca jetuṃ śakyā na kauśikāḥ / bahavo hi jayantīha śṛṇu cātra nidarśanam // 10.6.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
chāgaṃ krītaṃ gṛhītvāṃse grāmāt ko'pi vrajandvijaḥ / bahubhir dadṛśe mārge dhūrtaiśchāgaṃ jihīrṣubhiḥ // 10.6.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekaś ca tebhya āgatya tam uvāca sasaṃbhramam / brahman kathamayaṃ skandhe gṛhītaḥ śvā tvayā tyaja // 10.6.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā tamanādṛtya sa dvijaḥ prākramadyadā / tato 'nyau dvāvupetyāgre tadvadeva tamūcatuḥ // 10.6.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sasaṃśayo yāvad yāti cchāgaṃ nirūpayan / tāvad anye trayo 'bhyetya tam evam avadañ śaṭhāḥ // 10.6.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kathaṃ yajñopavītaṃ tvaṃ śvānaṃ ca vahase samam / nūnaṃ vyādho na vipras tvaṃ haṃsyanena śunā mṛgān // 10.6.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sa dvijo dadhyau nūnaṃ bhūtena kenacit / bhrāmito 'haṃ dṛśaṃ hṛtvā sarve paśyanti kiṃ mṛṣā // 10.6.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti vipraḥ sa taṃ tyaktvā chāgaṃ snātvā gṛhaṃ yayau / dhūrtāś ca nītvā tam ajaṃ yathecchaṃ samabhakṣayan // 10.6.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
ity uktvā cirajīvī taṃ vāyaseśvaram abravīt / tadevaṃ deva bahavo balavantaś ca durjayāḥ // 10.6.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tasmādbalivirodhe 'sminyadahaṃ vacmi tatkuru / kiṃcilluñcitapakṣaṃ māṃ tyaktvāsyaiva taroradhaḥ // 10.6.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yūyaṃ girimimaṃ yāta kṛtārtho yāvadevy aham / tac chrutvā taṃ tathetyatra krudhevolluñcitacchadam // 10.6.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtyādhastaṃ giriṃ prāyātkākarājaḥ sa sānugaḥ / cirajīvi tu tatrāsītpatitvā svatarostale // 10.6.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tatrāyayau rātrau sānugaḥ sa ulūkarāṭ / avamardo na cāpaśyattatraikam apivāyasam // 10.6.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvat sa cirajīvyatra mandaṃ mandaṃ virautyadhaḥ / śrutvā colūkarājastamavatīrya dadarśa saḥ // 10.6.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kas tvaṃ kim evaṃbhūto 'sīty apṛcchat taṃ savismayaḥ / tataḥ sa cirajīvī taṃ rujevālpasvaro 'vadat // 10.6.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
cirajīvītyahaṃ tasya sacivo vāyasaprabhoḥ / sa ca dātumavaskandamaicchatte mantrisaṃmatam // 10.6.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tanmantriṇo 'nyāṃstānnirbhartsyāhaṃ tam abravam / yadi pṛcchasi māṃ mantraṃ yadi cāhaṃ matastava // 10.6.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tan na kāryo balavatā kauśikendreṇa vigrahaḥ / kāryastvanunayas tasya nītiṃ cedanumanyase // 10.6.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutvaitacchatrupakṣo 'yamiti krodhātprahṛtya me / sa kākaḥ svaiḥ samaṃ mittrair mūrkho 'vasthāmimāṃ vyadhāt // 10.6.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣiptvā ca māṃ tarutale kvāpi sānucaro gataḥ / ity uktvā cirajīvī sa śvasannāsīdadhomukhaḥ // 10.6.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ulūkarājaś ca tataḥ sa papraccha svamantriṇaḥ / kimetasya vidhātavyamasmābhiś cirajīvinaḥ // 10.6.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā dīptanayano nāma mantrī jagāda tam / arakṣyo rakṣyate cauro 'py upakārīti sajjanaiḥ // 10.6.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathā hi pūrvaṃ kvāpy āsīdvaṇikko 'i sa kāmapi / vṛddho 'py arthaprabhāveṇa pariṇinye vaṇiksutām // 10.6.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā tasya śayane nityaṃ jarāto 'bhūtparāṅmukhī / vyatītapuṣpakāle 'tra bhramarīva tarorvane // 10.6.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā cāviśaccauro niśi śayyāsthayostayoḥ / taṃ dṛṣṭvā sā parāvṛtya tamāśliṣyatpatiṃ bhayāt // 10.6.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tamabhyudayamāścaryaṃ matvā yāvannirīkṣate / diśas tatra vaṇiktāvatkoṇe cauraṃ dadarśa tam // 10.6.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upakāryasi me tattvāṃ na bhṛtyair ghātayāmy aham / ity uktvā so 'tha cauraṃ taṃ rakṣitvā prāhiṇodvaṇik // 10.6.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ rakṣyo 'yamasmākaṃ cirajīvyupakārakaḥ / ity uktvā dīptanayano mantrī tūṣṇīṃ babhūva saḥ // 10.6.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tato 'nyaṃ vakranāsākhyaṃ mantriṇaṃ kauśikeśvaraḥ / sa pṛcchati sma kiṃ kāryaṃ samyagvaktuṃ bhavāniti // 10.6.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vakranāsatato 'vādīdrakṣyo 'yaṃ paramarmavit / asmākametayor vairaṃ śreyase svāmimantriṇoḥ // 10.6.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nidarśanakathā deva śrūyatāmatra vacmi te / kaścitpratigraheṇa dve gāvau prāpa dvijottamaḥ // 10.6.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya dṛṣṭvātha cauras te gāvau netumacintayat / tatkālaṃ rākṣasaḥ ko'pi tamaicchatkhādituṃ dvijam // 10.6.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadarthaṃ niśi gacchantau daivāttau caurarākṣasau / militvānyonyamuktārthau tatra prayayatuḥ samam // 10.6.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ dhenū harāmyādau tvadgṛhīto hy ayaṃ dvijaḥ / supto yadi prabuddhastaddhareyaṃ goyugaṃ katham // 10.6.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
maivaṃ harāmy ahaṃ pūrvaṃ vipraṃ no ced vṛthā mama / bhaved gokhuraśabdena prabuddhe 'smin pariśramaḥ // 10.6.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti praviśya tadviprasadanaṃ caurarākṣasau / yāvattau kalahāyete tāvat prābodhi sa dvijaḥ // 10.6.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
utthāyāttakṛpāṇe ca tasminrakṣoghnajāpini / brāhmaṇe jagmatuścaurarākṣasau dvau palāyya tau // 10.6.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ tayor yathā bhedo hitāyābhūddvijanmanaḥ / tathā bhedo hito 'smākaṃ kākendracirajīvinoḥ // 10.6.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukto vakranāsena kauśikendraḥ svamantriṇam / taṃ ca prākārakarṇākhyamapṛcchatso 'pyuvāca tam // 10.6.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
cirajīvyanukampyo 'yamāpannaḥ śaraṇāgataḥ / śaraṇāgatahetoḥ prāksvamāmiṣamadācchibiḥ // 10.6.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prākārakarṇāc chrutvaitat sacivaṃ krūralocanam / ulūkarājaḥ papraccha so 'pi tadvad abhāṣata // 10.6.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tato raktākṣanāmānaṃ sacivaṃ kauśikeśvaraḥ / tathaiva paripapraccha so 'pi prājño 'bravīdidam // 10.6.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājannapanayenaitair mantribhir nāśito bhavān / pratīyante na nītijñāḥ kṛtāvajñasya vairiṇaḥ // 10.6.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mūrkho dṛṣṭavyalīko 'pi vyājasāntvena tuṣyati / tathā hi takṣā ko 'pyāsīdbhāryābhūttasya tu priyā // 10.6.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tāṃ cānyapuruṣāsaktāṃ takṣā buddhvānyalokataḥ / tattvaṃ jijñāsamānastāṃ bhāryāmavadadekadā // 10.6.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
priye rājājñayā dūraṃ svavyāpārāya yāmy aham / tattvayā mama saktvādi pātheyaṃ dīyatāmiti // 10.6.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatheti dattapātheyastayā nirgatya gehataḥ / saśiṣyo guptamāgatya tatraiva praviveśa saḥ // 10.6.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadadṛṣṭastu khaṭvāyāstasthau śiṣyayutasthale / sāpy athānāyayattaṃ svaṃ tadbhāryā parapūruṣam // 10.6.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena sākaṃ ca khaṭvāyāṃ ramamāṇā patiṃ padā / spṛṣṭvā kathaṃcit taṃ pāpā mene tatrastham eva tam // 10.6.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kṣaṇāccopapatis tatra vyākulaḥ pṛcchati sma tām / brūhi priye kimadhikaṃ priyo 'haṃ tava kiṃ patiḥ // 10.6.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tac chrutvā kūṭakuśalā taṃ jāraṃ nijagāda sā / priyo mama patis tasya kṛte prāṇāṃstyajāmy aham // 10.6.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
idaṃ tu cāpalaṃ strīṇāṃ sahajaṃ kriyate 'tra kim / amedhyam apibhakṣyaṃ syānnāsāṃ syuryadi nāsikāḥ // 10.6.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etattasyā vacaḥ śrutvā kulaṭāyāḥ sa kṛtrimam / tuṣṭaḥ śayyātalāttakṣā nirgataḥ śiṣyam abhyadhāt // 10.6.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvaṃ tvayādya sākṣī tvaṃ mama bhakteyamīdṛśī / amumevāśritā kāntaṃ tadetāṃ mūrdhnyahaṃ vahe // 10.6.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā sahasotkṣipya khaṭvāsthāveva tāvubhau / saśiṣyaḥ sa jaḍo jāyātajjārau śirasāvahan // 10.6.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
itthaṃ pratyakṣadṛṣṭe 'pi doṣe kapaṭasāntvataḥ / mūrkhastuṣyati hāsyatvaṃ nirvivekaś ca gacchati // 10.6.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadeṣa cirajīvī te rakṣyo nāriparigrahaḥ / upekṣito hy ayaṃ deva hanyādroga iva drutam // 10.6.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti raktākṣataḥ śrutvā kauśikendro 'bravītsa tam / kurvannasmaddhitaṃ sādhuḥ prāpto 'vasthāsmimāmayam // 10.6.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkathaṃ syānna saṃrakṣyaḥ kiṃ kuryādekakaśca naḥ / iti tatsa nirācakre mantrivākyamulūkarāṭ // 10.6.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āśvāsayām āsa ca taṃ vāyasaṃ cirajīvinam / tataḥ sa cirajīvī tamulūkeśaṃ vyajijñapat // 10.6.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ mamaitadavasthasya jīvitena prayojanam / tanme dāpaya kāṣṭhāni yāvadagniṃ viśāmy aham // 10.6.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ulūkayoniṃ ca varaṃ prārthaye 'haṃ hutāśanam / tartuṃ vāyasarājasya tasya vairapratikriyām // 10.6.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavantaṃ vihasanraktākṣo nijagāda tam / asmatprabhoḥ prasādāttvaṃ svastha eva kimagninā // 10.6.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
na ca tvaṃ kauśiko bhāvī yāvatkākatvamasti te / yādṛśo yaḥ kṛto dhātrā bhavettādṛśa eva saḥ // 10.6.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathā ca prāṅmuniḥ kaścic chyenahastacyutaṃ śiśum / mūṣikāṃ prāpya kṛpayā kanyāṃ cakre tapobalāt // 10.6.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
vardhitāmāśrame tāṃ ca sa dṛṣṭvā prāptayauvanām / munirbalavate dātumicchannādityamāhvayat // 10.6.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
baline ditsitāmetāṃ kanyāṃ pariṇayasva me / ity uvāca sa carṣistaṃ tatas taṃ so 'bravīdraviḥ // 10.6.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
matto 'pi balavānmeghaḥ sa māṃ sthagayati kṣaṇāt / tac chrutvā taṃ visṛjyārkaṃ meghamāhūtavānmuniḥ // 10.6.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṃ tathaiva ca so 'vādīttenāpyevamavādi saḥ / matto 'pi balavānvāyuryo vikṣipati dikṣu mām // 10.6.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukte tena sa munirvayumāhvayati sma tam / sa tathaiva ca tenoktastam evamavadanmarut // 10.6.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
mayāpi ye na cālyante mattas te balino 'drayaḥ / śrutvaitadekaṃ śailendramāhvayanmunisattamaḥ // 10.6.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tathaiva yāvat taṃ vakti tāvat so 'drir jagāda tam / mūṣakā balino matto ye me chidrāṇi kurvate // 10.6.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti krameṇa praty ukto daivatair jñānibhiḥ sa taiḥ / maharṣirājuhāvaikaṃ mūṣakaṃ vanasaṃbhavam // 10.6.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kanyāṃ vadaitām ity uktas tenovāca sa mūṣakaḥ / kathaṃ pravekṣyati bilaṃ mamaiṣā dṛśyatāmiti // 10.6.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)

evaṃ sudūraṃ gatvāpi yo yādṛk tādṛg eva saḥ / tadulūko na jātu tvaṃ cirajīvin bhaviṣyasi // 10.6.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktaścirajīvī sa raktākṣeṇa vyacintayat / nītijñasya na caitasya rājñānena kṛtaṃ vacaḥ // 10.6.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śeṣā mūrkhā ime sarve tatkāryaṃ siddham eva me / iti saṃcintayantaṃ tam ādāya cirajīvinam // 10.6.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

asādhyaṃ satyasādhvīnāṃ kimasti hi jagattraye / tau ca viprau tadālokya vismayaṃ yayatuḥ param // 10.7.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nītvā ca rātriśeṣaṃ taṃ prabhāte sa yaśodharaḥ / lakṣmīdharaś ca viprau tau bhrātarau prasthitau tataḥ // 10.7.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāyaṃ ca nirjanāraṇye vṛkṣamūlamavāpatuḥ / jalaprepsū ca tasmāttau vṛkṣācchuśruvaturgiram // 10.7.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
he viprau tiṣṭhataṃ tāvadahamadya karomi vām / snānānnapānair ātithyaṃ gṛhaṃ me hy āgatau yuvām // 10.7.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ity uktvā vyaramad vāk ca jajñe tatrāmbuvāpikā / athopatasthe tattīre vicitraṃ pānabhojanam // 10.7.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kimetaditi sāścaryau tatas tau dvijaputrakau / snātvā vāpyāṃ yathākāmamāhārādyatra cakratuḥ // 10.7.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ saṃdhyām upāsyaitau yāvattarutale sthitau / tāvac ca kāntaḥ puruṣastarostasmādavātarat // 10.7.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
sa cābhivāditastābhyāṃ vihitasvāgataḥ kramāt / upaviṣṭo dvijātibhyāṃ ko bhavānityapṛcchyata // 10.7.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa puruṣo 'vādītpurāhaṃ durgato dvijaḥ / abhūvaṃ tasya me jātā daivācchramaṇasaṃgatiḥ // 10.7.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kurvaṃstadupadiṣṭaṃ ca jātu vratam upoṣaṇam / śaṭhena sāyaṃ kenāpi bhojito 'smi balātpunaḥ // 10.7.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tenāhaṃ khaṇḍitāttasmādvratājjāto 'smi guhyakaḥ / pūrṇaṃ yadyakariṣyaṃ tadabhaviṣyaṃ suro divi // 10.7.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ mayoktaḥ svodanto yuvāṃ kathayataṃ tu me / kuto yuvāṃ kimetāṃ ca praviṣṭau stho marusthalīm // 10.7.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā so 'bravīttasmai svavṛttāntaṃ yaśodharaḥ / tatas tau brāhmaṇau yakṣaḥ punarevam abhāṣata // 10.7.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yadyevaṃ tadahaṃ vidyāḥ svaprabhāvāddadāmi vām / kṛtavidyau gṛhaṃ yātaṃ videśabhramaṇena kim // 10.7.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā sa dadau tābhyāṃ vidyāstau ca tadaiva tāḥ / tatprabhāvājjagṛhatuḥ so 'tha yakṣo jagāda tau // 10.7.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ekāmidānīṃ yāce 'haṃ bhavadbhyāṃ gurudakṣiṇām / yuvābhyāṃ matkṛte kāryaṃ vratametadupoṣaṇam // 10.7.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
satyābhibhāṣaṇaṃ brahmacaryaṃ devapradakṣiṇām / bhojanaṃ bhikṣuvelāyāṃ manasaḥ saṃyamaḥ kṣamā // 10.7.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekarātraṃ vidhāyaitadarpaṇīyaṃ phalaṃ mayi / pūrṇavrataphalaṃ yena divyatvaṃ prāpnuyāmaham // 10.7.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityūcivānvinamrābhyāṃ tābhyāṃ yakṣas tatheti saḥ / viprābhyāṃ pratipannārthastatraivāntardadhe tarau // 10.7.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tau cāprayāsasiddhārthau prahṛṣṭau bhrātarāvubhau / rātriṃ nītvā parāvṛttya svamevājagmaturgṛham // 10.7.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrākhyāya svavṛttāntamānandya pitarau nijau / upoṣaṇavrataṃ tattau yakṣapuṇyāya cakratuḥ // 10.7.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athaitya sa gururyakṣo vimānastho jagāda tau / yuṣmatprasādād devatvaṃ prāpto 'smy uttīrya yakṣatām // 10.7.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tadātmārthamidaṃ kāryaṃ yuvābhyām apitadvratam / bhavitā yena devatvaṃ dehānte yuvayor iti // 10.7.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akṣīṇārthāv idānīṃ ca varān mama bhaviṣyathaḥ / ity uktvā sa vimānena kāmacārī yayau divam // 10.7.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato yaśodharo lakṣmīdharaś ca bhrātarāv ubhau / kṛtvā vrataṃ tatprāptārthavidyāv āstāṃ yathāsukham // 10.7.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
evaṃ dharmapravṛttānāṃ śīlaṃ kṛcchre 'py amuñcatām / devatā api rakṣanti kurvantīṣṭārthasādhanam // 10.7.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
itthaṃ vasantakākhyātakathādbhutavinoditaḥ / vatseśvarasutaḥ prepsuḥ sa śaktiyaśasaṃ priyām // 10.7.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āhārasamaye pitrā samāhūtastadantikam / naravāhanadatto 'tha yayau svasacivaiḥ saha // 10.7.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athānurūpaṃ bhuktvā ca tatra sāyaṃ svamandiram / vayasyaiḥ sa nijaiḥ sākamāyayau gomukhādibhiḥ // 10.7.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra taṃ gomukho bhūyo vinodayitum abravīt / śrūyatāmimamanyaṃ vo devākhyāmi kathākramam // 10.7.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āsīdvalīmukho nāma paribhraṣṭaḥ svayūthataḥ / udumbaravane tīre vāridhervānararṣabhaḥ // 10.7.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya bhakṣayato hastāścyutamekamudumbaram / jaghāsa śiśumāro 'tra vārirāśijalāśrayaḥ // 10.7.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatphalāsvādahṛṣṭaś ca sa pracakre kalaṃ ravam / yadrasātsa bahūnyasmai phalāni kapirakṣipat // 10.7.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathaiva cākṣipannityaṃ phalāni sa tathaiva ca / śiśumāro rutaṃ cakre jajñe sakhyaṃ tatas tayoḥ // 10.7.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tenānvahaṃ taṭasthasya jalastho nikaṭe kapeḥ / śiśumāro dinaṃ sthitvā sa sāyaṃ svagṛhaṃ yayau // 10.7.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jñātārthā tasya bhāryā ca sadā virahadaṃ divā / kapisakhyamanicchantī māndyavyājamaśiśriyat // 10.7.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
brūhi priye kimasvāsthyaṃ tava kena ca śāmyati / ityārtastaṃ sa papraccha śiśumāraḥ priyāṃ muhuḥ // 10.7.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nirbandhapṛṣṭāpi yadā na sā prativaco dadau / rahasyajñā sakhī tasyāstadā taṃ pratyabhāṣata // 10.7.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
yady api tvaṃ na kuruṣe necchatyeṣā tathāpy aham / bravīmi vibudhaḥ khedaṃ janānāṃ nihnute katham // 10.7.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tādṛgasyā bhāryāyāstavotpanno mahāgadaḥ / vinā vānarahṛtpadmayūṣaṃ na śamameti yaḥ // 10.7.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktaḥ sa priyāsakhyā śiśumāro vyacintayat / kaṣṭaṃ vānarahṛtpadmaṃ kutaḥ saṃprāpnuyām aham // 10.7.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sakhyuḥ karomi ceddrohaṃ kapestatkiṃ mamocitam / sakhyā kimathavā bhāryā prāṇebhyo 'py adhikapriyā // 10.7.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityālocya svabhāryāṃ tāṃ śiśumāro jagāda saḥ / tarhyānayāmyakhaṇḍaṃ te kapiṃ kiṃ dūyase priye // 10.7.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā sa yayau yasya mittrasya nikaṭaṃ kapeḥ / kathāprasaṅgamutpādya tam evamavadatkapim // 10.7.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

bhujyate yatra nānyonyaṃ gṛhametya nirargalam / pradṛśyante na dārāś ca kaitavaṃ tan na sauhṛdam // 10.7.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti pratārya jaladhāvavatāryāvalambya ca / vānaraṃ śiśumāras taṃ gantuṃ pravavṛte 'tra saḥ // 10.7.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

śrutvaitatsa vacas tasya kapiḥ prājño vyacintayat / hantaitadarthamānītaḥ pāpenāhamihāmunā // 10.7.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

itthaṃ saṃcintya ca prāha śiśumāraṃ sa vānaraḥ / yadyevaṃ tattvayaitanme kiṃ noktaṃ prathamaṃ sakhe // 10.7.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

utpatyāruhya vṛkṣāgraṃ śiśumāram uvāca tam / gaccha re mūrkha hṛdayaṃ dehādbhavati kiṃ pṛthak // 10.7.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
mayaivaṃ mocito hy ātmā na cātraiṣyāmyahaṃ punaḥ / kimatra na śrutā mūrkha gardabhākhyāyikā tvayā // 10.7.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āsīdgomāyusacivaḥ siṃhaḥ ko'pi vane kva cit / ... // 10.7.125	na kiṃcid adhyavasitam

tatra sthitaṃ gate tasmin rājñy anāhāraniḥsaham / taccheṣāmiṣavṛttiḥ san gomāyuḥ sacivo 'bhyadhāt // 10.7.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nirgatya kiṃ yathāśakti nāhāraṃ cinuṣe prabho / sīdatyeva śarīraṃ te samaṃ parijanena yat // 10.7.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktaḥ sa sṛgālena tena siṃho jagāda tam / sakhe nāhaṃ vraṇākrāntaḥ śaknomi bhramituṃ kva cit // 10.7.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svarasya karṇahṛdayaṃ bhakṣyaṃ prāpnomi cedaham / tanme vraṇāni rohanti prakṛtistho bhavāmi ca // 10.7.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadānaya kuto 'pi tvaṃ gatvā gardabhamāśu me / ity uktastena gomāyuḥ sa tatheti yayau tataḥ // 10.7.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhramañjalāntike labdhvā rajakasya sa gardabham / prītyevopetya vakti sma durbalaḥ kiṃ bhavāniti // 10.7.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛśībhūto 'smi rajakasyāsya bhāraṃ vahansadā / ity uktavantaṃ ca kharaṃ tam uvāca sa jambukaḥ // 10.7.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
iha kiṃ vahasi kleśamehi tvāṃ prāpayāmy aham / vanaṃ svargasukhaṃ yatra kharībhiḥ saha vardhase // 10.7.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sa tathety uktvā gardabho bhogalolupaḥ / vanaṃ siṃhasya tasyāgāttena gomāyunā saha // 10.7.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ ca dṛṣṭvaiva tasyaitya pṛṣṭhato gardabhasya saḥ / siṃho dadau karāghātaṃ prāṇavaiklavyadurbalaḥ // 10.7.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

siṃhastvasiddhakāryaḥ svāṃ tvaritaṃ prāviśadguhām / tatas taṃ jambuko mantrī sopālambham abhāṣata // 10.7.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tac chrutvā so 'bravītsiṃho yathā vetsi tathā punaḥ / tamānaya kharaṃ tāvat sajjo bhūtvā nihanmy aham // 10.7.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

ahaṃ sattvena kenāpi tāḍito 'treti vādinam / taṃ ca bhūyaḥ sa gomāyurvihasya kharam abravīt // 10.7.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

nikṛtya gardabhaṃ taṃ ca sthāpayitvā ca rakṣakam / tasya taṃ jambukaṃ śrāntaḥ siṃhaḥ snātuṃ jagāma saḥ // 10.7.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

śṛṇvidānīṃ kramādanyānupahāsyānimāñjaḍān / tatremaṃ śṛṇu gāndharvaparitoṣakaraṃ jaḍam // 10.7.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaścidgāndharvikenāḍhyo gītavādyena toṣitaḥ / bhāṇḍāgārikamāhūya tatsamakṣam abhāṣata // 10.7.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

gāndharviko 'tha gatvā tān paṇāṃs tasmād ayācata / na cāsmai sthitasaṃvittān paṇān bhāṇḍāriko dadau // 10.7.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athāḍhyastena vijñaptastatkṛte vaiṇikena saḥ / uvāca kiṃ tvayā dattaṃ yena pratidadāni te // 10.7.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vīṇāvādyena me kṣipraṃ tvayā śrutisukhaṃ kṛtam / tathaiva dānavākyena kṛtaṃ kṣipraṃ mayāpi te // 10.7.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā vihatāśo 'pi hasitvā vaiṇiko yayau / kīnāśoktyāsnayā kiṃ na hāso grāvṇo 'pi jāyate // 10.7.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhautaśiṣyadvayaṃ cedaṃ devedānīṃ niśamyatāsm / guroḥ kasyapyabhūtāṃ dvau śiṣyāvanyonyamatsarau // 10.7.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tayor eko guros tasya dakṣiṇaṃ pādamanvaham / abhyañjankṣālayām āsa vāmaṃ pādaṃ tathetaraḥ // 10.7.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dakṣiṇābhyañjake jātu grāmaṃ saṃpreṣite guruḥ / abhyaktavāmapādaṃ taṃ dvitīyaṃ śiṣyam abhyadhāt // 10.7.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvam eva dakṣiṇaṃ pādamabhyajya kṣālayādya me / śrutvaitanmūrkhaśiṣyo 'sau guruṃ svair am abhāṣata // 10.7.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pratipakṣasya saṃbandhī na pādo 'bhyaṅgya eṣa me / evam uktavataścāsya nirbandhaṃ so 'karodguruḥ // 10.7.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vipakṣatacchiṣyaroṣād ādāya tasya tam / guroḥ śiṣyaḥ sa caraṇaṃ balād grāvṇā ca bhagnavān // 10.7.168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
muktākrande gurau tasmin kuśiṣyo 'nyaiḥ praviśya saḥ / tāḍyamānaḥ saśokena guruṇā tena mocitaḥ // 10.7.169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyedyuḥ so 'paraḥ śiṣyaḥ prāpto grāmād vilokya tām / aṅghripīḍāṃ guroḥ pṛṣṭavṛttāntaḥ prajvalan krudhā // 10.7.170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nāhaṃ bhanajmi kiṃ pādaṃ tasya saṃbandhinaṃ dviṣaḥ / ityākṛṣya dvitīyāṅghrīṃ guros tasya babhañja saḥ // 10.7.171	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'tra tāḍyamāno 'nyair api bhagnobhayāṅghriṇā / guruṇā tena kṛpayā duḥśiṣyaḥ so 'py amocyata // 10.7.172	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
sarvadveṣyopahāsyau tau śiṣyau dvau yayatus tataḥ / guruś ca svakṣamāślāghyaḥ svasthaḥ so 'py abhavatkramāt // 10.7.173	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evamanyonyavidviṣṭo mūrkhaḥ parijanaḥ prabho / svāmino 'rthaṃ nihantyeva na cātmahitamaśnute // 10.7.174	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayaṃ ca dviśiraḥsarpavṛttānto 'py avadhāryatām / kasyāpy aher dve śirasī abhūtām agrapucchayoḥ // 10.7.175	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
paucchaṃ śirastvabhūdandhaṃ cakṣuṣmatprakṛtaṃ punaḥ / ahaṃ mukhyamahaṃ mukhyamityāsīdāgrahastayoḥ // 10.7.176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sarpastu prakṛteneva mukhena vicacāra saḥ / ekadāsya śiraḥ paucchaṃ mārge kaṣṭamavāpa tat // 10.7.177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
veṣṭayitvā dṛḍhaṃ tac ca sarpasyāsyāruṇadgatim / tatas tadbalavanmene sa sarpo 'graśirojayi // 10.7.178	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tenaiva cāndhena tataḥ sa mukhena bhramannahiḥ / avaṭe 'gnau paribraṣṭo mārgādṛṣṭeradahyata // 10.7.179	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ guṇasya ye 'lpasya bahavo nāntaraṃ viduḥ / te hīnaguṇasaṅgena mūḍhā yānti parābhavam // 10.7.180	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
imaṃ ca śṛṇutedānīṃ bhautam taṇḍulabhakṣakam / agāt kaścit pumān mūrkhaḥ prathamaṃ śvāśuraṃ gṛham // 10.7.181	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tatra taṇḍulāñ śvaśrvā pākārthaṃ sthāpitān sitān / dṛṣṭvā bhakṣayituṃ teṣāṃ muṣṭiṃ prākṣipad ānane // 10.7.182	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkṣaṇādāgatāyāṃ ca śvaśrvāṃ mūrkhaḥ sa taṇḍulān / nāśakattānnigirituṃ na cāpy udgirituṃ hriyā // 10.7.183	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatpīnocchūnagallaṃ ca nirālāpamavetya tam / tadrogaśaṅkayāhūya tacchvaśrūḥ patimānayat // 10.7.184	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pyālokya nināyāśu vaidyaṃ vaidyo 'py apāṭayat / śophaśaṅkī hanuṃ tasya mūḍhasyākramya mastakam // 10.7.185	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
niryayurlokahāsena samaṃ tasya ca taṇḍulāḥ / ityakāryaṃ karotyajño na ca jānāti gūhitum // 10.7.186	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kecic ca dārakā mūrkhā dṛṣṭadohā gavādiṣu / gardabhaṃ prāpya saṃrudhya dogdhumārebhire rasāt // 10.7.187	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaściddudoha kaścic ca kṣīrakuṇḍamadhārayat / ahaṃ prathamikānyeṣāṃ payaḥ pātumavartata // 10.7.188	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na ca te lebhir e kṣīraṃ kurvanto 'pi pariśramam / avastuni kṛtakleśo mūrkho yātyavahāsyatām // 10.7.189	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaścic ca deva mūrkho 'bhūdvipraputraḥ pitā ca tam / sāyaṃ jagāda gantavyo grāmaḥ putra tvayā prage // 10.7.190	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutvetyapṛṣṭvā kāryaṃ taṃ pitaraṃ prātareva saḥ / gatvā vṛthaiva taṃ grāmaṃ sāyamāgātkṛtaśramaḥ // 10.7.191	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
grāmaṃ gatvāhamāyāta ityāha pitaraṃ ca saḥ / gate tvayi na kiṃ siddhamiti cāha sa tatpitā // 10.7.192	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadeti nirabhiprāyaceṣṭito lokahāsyatām / mūrkho 'nubhavati kleśaṃ na kāryaṃ kurute punaḥ // 10.7.193	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityākarṇya kathāṃ pradhānasacivācchikṣāvatīṃ gomukhād ātmānaṃ ca nivedya śaktiyaśasaḥ saṃprāptibaddhaspṛham / bhūyiṣṭhāṃ ca gatāmavetya rajanīṃ vatseśvarasyātmajo nidrāmudritalocanaḥ sa śayanaṃ bheje vayasyair yataḥ // 10.7.194	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
tato 'nyedyuḥ punarnaktaṃ nijavāsagṛhe sthitam / naravāhanadattaṃ taṃ dayitāprāptisotsukam // 10.8.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vatseśvarasutaṃ mantrī tanniyogāt sa gomukhaḥ / vinodayan kathās tasya kramād evam avarṇayat // 10.8.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
babhūva devaśarmākhyo brāhmaṇo nagare kva cit / tasyābhūd devadatteti gehinī sadṛśānvayā // 10.8.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dhṛtagarbhā ca sā tasya kālena suṣuve sutam / daridro 'pi sa taṃ mene nidhiṃ labdham iva dvijaḥ // 10.8.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sūtakānte ca sā tasya bhāryā snātumagānnadīm / devaśarmā sa tasthau tu gṛhe rakṣansutaṃ śiśum // 10.8.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvadāhvāyikā tasya rājāntaḥpurato drutam / ceṭikā brāhmaṇasyāgātsvastivācanajīvinaḥ // 10.8.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa dakṣiṇālobhānnakulajṃ rakṣakaṃ śiśoḥ / sthāpayitvā yayau gehe ciramābālyavardhitam // 10.8.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmin gate 'trākasmāc ca śiśos tasyāntikāgatam / sarpam ālokya nakulaḥ svāmibhaktyā jaghāna tam // 10.8.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
atha taṃ devaśarmāṇamāgataṃ vīkṣya dūrataḥ / sarpāsrasikto nakulo hṛṣṭo 'sya niragātpuraḥ // 10.8.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
sa devaśarmā tadrūpaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvaivāśmanāvadhīt / dhruvaṃ sa bālaḥ putro me hato 'neneti saṃbhramāt // 10.8.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
praviśya cāntar dṛṣṭvā taṃ bhujagaṃ nakulāhatam / jīvantaṃ ca sthitaṃ bālaṃ brāhmaṇo 'ntar atapyata // 10.8.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
avicāryopakārī sa nakulaḥ kiṃ hatastvayā / ity upālabhatāyātā bhāryāpi tadavetya tam // 10.8.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmān na buddhimān kuryāt sahasā deva kiṃcana / sahasā ceṣṭamāno hi hanyate lokayor dvayoḥ // 10.8.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kurvaṃścāvidhinā karma virodhiphalamaśnute / tathā ca vāyunākrāntadehaḥ ko 'py abhavatpumān // 10.8.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bastyarthamauṣadhaṃ dattvā babhāṣe jātu taṃ bhiṣak / tvaṃ peṣayaitatsvagṛhaṃ gatvā yāvadupaimy aham // 10.8.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
evam uktvā gato vaidyo yāvac cirayati kṣaṇam / tāvattadauṣadhaṃ piṣṭvā mūrkho 'sau vāriṇāpibat // 10.8.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
utpannavyapadaṃ tena tamāgatya bhiṣaktataḥ / sa dattvā vamanaṃ kṛcchrānmṛtakalpamajīvayat // 10.8.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bastyauṣadhaṃ gude mūrkha dīyate na tu pīyate / ahaṃ pratīkṣitaḥ kiṃ netyupālabhyata tena saḥ // 10.8.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
itīṣṭam apy aniṣṭāya jāyate 'vidhinā kṛtam / tasmānna vidhimutsṛjya prājñaḥ kurvīta kiṃcana // 10.8.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aprekṣāpūrvakārī ca nindyate 'vadyakṛtkṣaṇāt / tathā ca kutracitkaścijjaḍabuddhirabhūtpumān // 10.8.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya deśāntaraṃ jātu gacchato 'nvāgataḥ sutaḥ / aṭavyāṃ vāsite cārthe viveśa viharanvanam // 10.8.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pāṭito markaṭaiḥ so 'tra kṛcchrājjīvannupetya tam / ṛkṣānabhijñaḥ pitaraṃ pṛcchantamavadajjaḍaḥ // 10.8.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
vane 'smi pāṭitaḥ kaiścillomaśaiḥ phalabhakṣibhiḥ / tac chrutvā krodhakṛṣṭāsistatpitā tadvanaṃ yayau // 10.8.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvā phalāny ādadānāñ jaṭilāṃs tatra tāpasān / so 'bhyadhāvatkṣato 'mībhiḥ suto me lomaśair iti // 10.8.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ṛkṣaiste pāṭitaḥ putro maddṛṣṭair mā vadhīrmunīn / ityavāryata pānthena tadvadhātso 'tha kenacit // 10.8.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa daivād uttīrṇaḥ pātakāt sārtham āgataḥ / tan na jātucidaprekṣāpūrvakārī bhaved budhaḥ // 10.8.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kimanyatsarvadā bhāvyaṃ jantunā kṛtabuddhinā / lokopahasitāḥ śaśvatsīdantyeva hy abuddhayaḥ // 10.8.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathā ca nirdhanaḥ kaś citprāptavānadhvani vrajan / sārthavāhasya kasyāpi cyutāṃ hemabhṛtāṃ dṛtim // 10.8.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa mūḍhastāṃ gṛhītvaiva na jagāmānyato 'pi ca / sthitvā tatraiva saṃkhyātumārebhe hema tac ca tat // 10.8.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvat smṛtvā hayārūḍhaḥ pratyāgatya sa satvaram / sārthavāho 'sya hṛṣṭasya hemabhastrāṃ jahāra tām // 10.8.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa dṛṣṭanaṣṭārthaḥ śocan prāyād adhomukhaḥ / prāpto 'py arthaḥ kṣaṇād eva hāryate mandabuddhinā // 10.8.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaścic ca pārvaṇaṃ candraṃ didṛkṣuḥ kenacijjaḍaḥ / aṅgulyabhimukhaṃ paśyetyūce dṛṣṭanavendunā // 10.8.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa hitvā gaganaṃ tasyaivāṅguliṃ tāṃ vilokayasn / tasthau na cendumadrākṣīdadrākṣīddhasato janān // 10.8.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prajñayā sādhyate 'sādhyaṃ tathā ca śrūyatāsṃ kathā / kācid grāmāntaraṃ nārī gantuṃ prāvartataikakā // 10.8.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)

sa taṃ tasyāstaruṃ mūḍho bhujābhyāṃ kapirāvṛṇot / sāpy asya bāhū hastābhyāṃ tatraivāpīḍayattarau // 10.8.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tāvac ca tasmin niḥspande jātakrodhe ca vānare / pathā tenāgataṃ kaṃcid ābhīraṃ strī jagāda sā // 10.8.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

idānīṃ śṛṇu devaitāṃ vicitrāmadbhutāṃ kathām / ghaṭakarparanāmānau caurāvāstāṃ pure kva cit // 10.8.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tayoḥ sa karparo jātu bahirnyasya ghaṭaṃ niśi / saṃdhiṃ dattvā nṛpasutāvāsaveśma praviṣṭavān // 10.8.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatra koṭhasthitaṃ taṃ sā vinidrā rājakanyakā / dṛṣṭvaiva sadyaḥ saṃjātakāmā svair am upāhvayat // 10.8.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
rantvā ca tena sākaṃ sā dattvā cārthaṃ tam abravīt / dāsyāmyanyatprabhūtaṃ te punareṣyasi cediti // 10.8.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
