yāvat sa nīyate vadhyabhuvaṃ tāvat sakhāsya saḥ / rātrāvanāgatasyāgādanveṣṭuṃ padavīṃ ghaṭaḥ // 10.8.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tamāgataṃ sa dṛṣṭvātha ghaṭaṃ karparakaḥ punaḥ / hṛtvā rājasutāṃ rakṣerityāha sma svasaṃjñayā // 10.8.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ghaṭenāṅgīkṛteccho 'tha saṃjñayaiva sa karparaḥ / nītvollambya tarau kṣipraṃ vadhakair avaśo hataḥ // 10.8.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato gatvā ghaṭo gehamanuśocanniśāgame / bhittvā suraṅgāṃ prāvikṣatsa tadrājasutāgṛham // 10.8.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatraikakāṃ saṃyamitāṃ dṛṣṭopetya jagāda saḥ / tvatkṛte 'dya hatasyāhaṃ karparasya sakhā ghaṭaḥ // 10.8.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
apanetum itas tvāṃ ca tatsnehād aham āgataḥ / tad ehi yāvan nāniṣṭaṃ kiṃcit te kurute pitā // 10.8.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ity ukte tena sā hṛṣṭā rājaputrī tatheti tat / pratipede sa caitasyā bandhanāni nyavārayat // 10.8.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tayā samaṃ sadyaḥ samarpitaśarīrayā / nirgatya sa yayau cauraḥ svaniketuṃ suruṅgayā // 10.8.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātaś ca khātadurlakṣyasuruṅgeṇa nijāṃ sutām / kenāpyapahṛtāṃ buddhvā sa rājā samacintayat // 10.8.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dhruvaṃ tasyāsti pāpasya nigṛhītasya bāndhavaḥ / kaś citsāhasiko yena hṛtaivaṃ sā sutā mama // 10.8.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti saṃcintya nṛpatiḥ sa karparakalevaram / rakṣituṃ sthāpayām āsa svabhṛtyānabravīc ca tān // 10.8.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
yaḥ śocannimamāgacchetkartuṃ dāhādikaṃ ca vaḥ / avaṣṭabhyastato lapsye pāpāṃ tāṃ kuludūṣikām // 10.8.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti rājñā samādiṣṭā rakṣiṇo 'tra tatheti te / rakṣantas tasthur aniśaṃ tatkarparakalevaram // 10.8.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tat so 'nviṣya ghaṭo buddhvā rājaputrīm uvāca tām / priye bandhuḥ sakhā yo 'bhūt paramaḥ karparo mama // 10.8.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yatprasādān mayā prāptā tvaṃ sasadratnasaṃcayā / snehānṛṇyamakṛtvāsya nāsti me hṛdi nirvṛtiḥ // 10.8.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tattaṃ gatvānuśocāmi prekṣamāṇaḥ svayuktitaḥ / kramāc ca saṃskaromyagnau tīrthe 'syāsthīni ca kṣipe // 10.8.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhayaṃ mā bhūc ca te nāhamabuddhiḥ karparo yathā / ity uktvā tāṃ tadaivābhūtsa mahāvrativeṣabhṛt // 10.8.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa dadhyodanamādāya kasrpare karparāntikam / mārgāgata ivopāgāccakre 'tra skhalitaṃ ca saḥ // 10.8.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nipātya hastād bhaṅktvā ca taṃ sadadhyann akarparam / hā karparāmṛtabhṛtetyādi tat tac chuśoca saḥ // 10.8.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
rakṣino menare tac ca bhinnabhāṇḍānuśocanam / kṣaṇāc ca gṛhamāgatya rājaputryai śaśaṃsa tat // 10.8.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyedyuś ca vadhūveṣaṃ bhṛtyaṃ kṛtvaikamagrataḥ / anyaṃ dhṛtasadhattūrabhakṣyabhāṇḍaṃ ca pṛṣṭhataḥ // 10.8.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svayaṃ ca mattagrāmīṇaveṣo bhūtvā dinātyaye / praskhalan nikaṭe teṣām agāt karpararakṣiṇām // 10.8.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kas tvaṃ keyaṃ ca te bhrātaḥ kva yāsīti ca tatra taiḥ / pṛṣṭaḥ sa dhūrtas tān evam uvāca skhalitākṣaram // 10.8.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
grāmyo 'hameṣā bhāryā me yāmītaḥ śvāśuraṃ gṛham / bhakṣyakośalikā ceyamānītā tatkṛte mayā // 10.8.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃbhāṣaṇac ca yūyaṃ me saṃjātāḥ suhṛdo 'dhunā / tadardhaṃ tatra neṣyāmi bhakṣyāṇāmardhamastu vaḥ // 10.8.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā bhakṣyamekaikaṃ sa dadau teṣu rakṣiṣu / te hasanto gṛhītvaiva bhuñjate smākhilā api // 10.8.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena rakṣiṣu dhattūramohiteṣveṣu so 'gnisāt / niśi cakre ghaṭo dehaṃ karparasyāhṛtendhanaḥ // 10.8.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gate tasmims tataḥ prātar buddhvā rājā nivārya tān / vimūḍhān sthāpayām āsa rakṣiṇo 'nyānuvāca ca // 10.8.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rakṣyāṇyasthīnyapīdānīṃ yastānyādātumeṣyati / sa yuṣmābhir grahītavyo bhakṣyaṃ kiṃcic ca nānyataḥ // 10.8.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti rājñoditāste ca sāvadhānā divāniśam / tatrāsanrakṣiṇastaṃ ca vṛttāntaṃ bbubudhe ghaṭaḥ // 10.8.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa caṇḍikādattamohamantraprabhāvavit / mittraṃ pravrājakaṃ kaṃciccakārāśvāsaketanam // 10.8.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra gatvā samaṃ tena pravrājā mantrajāpinā / rakṣiṇo mohayitvā tān karparāsthīni so 'grahīt // 10.8.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣiptvā ca tāni gaṅgāyāmetyākhyāya yathākṛtam / rājaputryā samaṃ tasthau sukhaṃ pravrājakānvitaḥ // 10.8.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājāpi so 'sthiharaṇaṃ buddhvā tadrakṣimohanam / ā sutāharaṇātsarvaṃ mene tadyogiceṣṭitam // 10.8.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
yenedaṃ yoginākāri tanayāharaṇādi me / dadāmi tasmai rājyārdhamabhivyaktiṃ sa yāti cet // 10.8.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
iti rājā svanagare dāpayām āsa ghoṣaṇāsm / tāṃ śrutvā caicchadātmānaṃ ghaṭo darśayituṃ tadā // 10.8.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
maivaṃ kṛthā na kāryo 'sminviśvāsaśchadmaghātini / rājñītyavāryata tayā rājaputryā tataś ca saḥ // 10.8.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
athodbhedabhayāttena sākaṃ pravrājakena saḥ / ghaṭo deśāntaraṃ yāyādrājaputryā tayā yutaḥ // 10.8.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mārge ca rājaputrī sā pravrājaṃ taṃ raho 'bravīt / ekena dhvaṃsitānyena bhraṃśitāsmy amunā padāt // 10.8.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taccauraḥ sa mṛto nāyaṃ ghaṭo me tvaṃ bahupriyaḥ / ity uktvā tena saṃgamya sā viṣeṇāvadhīddhaṭam // 10.8.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatastena samaṃ yāntī pāpā pravrājakena sā / dhanadevābhidhānena saṃjagme vaṇijā pathi // 10.8.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ko 'yaṃ kapālī tvaṃ preyānmamety uktvā yayau samam / vaṇijā tena saṃsuptaṃ sā pravrājaṃ vihāya tam // 10.8.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
pravrājakaś ca sa prātaḥ prabuddhaḥ samacintayat / na sneho 'sti na dākṣiṇyaṃ strīṣvaho cāpalādṛte // 10.8.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yadviśvāsyāpi māṃ pāpā hṛtārthā ca palāyitā / saiṣa lābho 'thavā yanna hato 'smi ghaṭavattayā // 10.8.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityālocya nijaṃ deśaṃ yayau pravrājako 'tha saḥ / vaṇijā saha taddeśaṃ prāptā rājasutāpi sā // 10.8.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praveśayāmi sahasā bandhakīṃ kim imāṃ gṛham / iti svadeśaprāptaś ca dhanadevo vicintayan // 10.8.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
vaṇiktatra kilaikasyā vṛddhayā veśma yoṣitaḥ / praviveśa tayā sākaṃ rājaputryā dinātyaye // 10.8.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra naktaṃ sa vṛddhāṃ tāṃ papracchāparijānatīm / dhanadevavaṇiggehavārtām ambeha vetsi kim // 10.8.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sābravīdvṛddhā kā vārtā yatra tatra sā / puṃsā navanavenaiva tadbhāryā ramate sadā // 10.8.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
carmapeṭā gavākṣeṇa rajjvā tatra hi lambyate / nasktaṃ viśati yastasyāṃ sa evāntaḥ praveśyate // 10.8.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
niṣkālyate tathaivātra paścimāyāṃ punarniśi / pānamattā ca sā naiva nibhālayati kiṃcana // 10.8.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
eṣā ca tatsthitiḥ khyātiṃ nagare 'trākhile gatā / bahukālo gato 'dyāpi na cāyāti sa tatpatiḥ // 10.8.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etadvṛddhāvacaḥ śrutvā dhanadevastadaiva saḥ / yuktya nirgatya tatrāgātsāntarduḥkhaḥ sasaṃśayaḥ // 10.8.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvā sa tatra dāsībhiḥ peṭāṃ rajjvavalambitām / viveśa sa tatastābhir utkṣipyāntaranīyata // 10.8.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praviṣṭaḥ sa tayāliṅgya śayyāṃ ninye madāndhayā / avijñātaḥ svagehinyā haṭhātkṣībatvamūḍhayā // 10.8.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
riraṃsā tasya yāvac ca nāsti taddoṣadarśanāt / tāvat sā madadoṣeṇa nidrāṃ tadgehinī yayau // 10.8.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
niśānte ca sa dāsībhiḥ satvaraṃ rajjupeṭayā / gavākṣeṇa bahiḥ kṣiptaḥ khinno vaṇigacintayat // 10.8.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alaṃ me gṛhamohena gṛhe nāryo nibandhanam / tāsāmevedṛśī vārtā tasmāc chreyo vanaṃ param // 10.8.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti niścitya saṃtyajya sa tāṃ rājasutāmapi / dhanadevaḥ pravavṛte gantuṃ dūraṃ vanāntaram // 10.8.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
gacchatas tasya mārge ca milito mittratāmagāt / brāhmaṇo rudrasomākhyaḥ pravāsādagataścirāt // 10.8.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tenoktaḥ svavṛttāntaṃ svabhāryāśaṅkito dvijaḥ / tenaiva vaṇijā sākaṃ sāyaṃ svagrāmamāsadat // 10.8.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra svabhavanopānte gopaṃ dṛṭvā nadītaṭe / mādyantam iva gāyantaṃ narmaṇā pṛcchati sma saḥ // 10.8.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gopa te taruṇī kācitkaccidastyanurāgiṇī / yenaivaṃ gāyasi madān manyamānas tṛṇaṃ jagat // 10.8.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tac chrutvā so 'hasadgopo gopyaṃ vastu kiyanmayā / ciraviproṣitasyeha rudrasomadvijanmanaḥ // 10.8.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
grāmādhipasya taruṇīmahaṃ bhāryāṃ sadā bhaje / praveśayati taddāsī strīveṣaṃ tadgṛhe 'tra mām // 10.8.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
etadgopālataḥ śrutvā manyumantarnigṛhya ca / tattvaṃ jijñāsamānastaṃ rudrasomo jagāda saḥ // 10.8.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yadyevamatithiste 'haṃ svaveṣaṃ dehyamuṃ mama / yāvattvam iva tatrādya yāmyahaṃ kautukaṃ hi me // 10.8.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ kuru gṛhāṇemaṃ madīyaṃ kālakambalam / laguḍaṃ cāsva caiveha taddāsī yāvadeṣyati // 10.8.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
madbuddhyā ca tayāhūya svair aṃ dattāṅganāmbaraḥ / naktaṃ tatra vrajāhaṃ ca viśrāmyāmi niśāmimām // 10.8.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktavatastasmādgopāllaguḍakambalau / gṛhītvā rudrasomo 'tra tadveṣeṇa sa tasthivān // 10.8.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gopaś ca vaṇijā sākaṃ dhanadevena tena saḥ / dūre tatra manāk tasthau dāsī sā cāyayau tataḥ // 10.8.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā taṃ tamasi tūṣṇīkāmetya strīveṣaguṇṭhitam / ehīty uktvā tato rudrasomaṃ gopadhiyānayat // 10.8.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca nītaḥ svabhāryāṃ tāṃ dṛṣṭvā gopālabuddhitaḥ / utthāyaiva kṛtāśleṣāṃ rudrasomo vyacintayat // 10.8.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃnikṛṣṭe nikṛṣṭe 'pi kaṣṭaṃ rajyanti kustriyaḥ / pāpānuraktā yadiyaṃ gope 'pyāsannavartini // 10.8.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
iti dhyāyanmiṣaṃ kṛtvā tadaivāsphuṭayā girā / nirgatyaiva viraktātmā dhanadevāntikaṃ yayau // 10.8.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uktasvagṛhavṛttānto vaṇijaṃ tam uvāca saḥ / tvayā sahāham apy emi vanaṃ yātu gṛhaṃ kṣayam // 10.8.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ūcivān rudrasomo dhanadevavaṇik ca saḥ / vanaṃ prati pratasthāte tadaiva saha tau tataḥ // 10.8.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
militaś ca tayor mārge dhanadevasuhṛcchaśī / kathāsprasaṅgāt tau tasmai svavṛttāntaṃ śaśaṃsatuḥ // 10.8.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sa tac chrutvā śaśīrṣyāluścirāddeśāntarāgataḥ / sāśaṅko 'bhūtsvagehinyāṃ nyastāyām apibhūgṛhe // 10.8.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prakrāmaṃś ca samaṃ tābhyāṃ sāyaṃ sa svagṛhāntikam / śaśī prāpa gṛhātithyaṃ tayoḥ kartumiyeṣa ca // 10.8.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca durgandhavaham kuṣṭhaśīrṇakarāṅghrikam / tatrāpaśyat saśṛṅgāraṃ gāyantaṃ puruṣaṃ sthitam // 10.8.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vismayāc ca tamaprākṣīdīdṛśaḥ ko bhavāniti / kāmadevo 'hamasmīti kuṣṭhī so 'pi jagāda tam // 10.8.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kā bhrāntiḥ kāmadevastvaṃ rūpaśobhaiva vakti te / ity uktaḥ śaśinā bhūyaḥ so 'vādīcchṛṇu vacmi te // 10.8.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iha dhūrtaḥ śaśī nāma dattaikaparicārikām / bhāryāṃ nikṣipya bhūgehe serṣyo deśāntaraṃ gataḥ // 10.8.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadbhāryayā vidhivaśādiha dṛṣṭasya me tayā / arpitaḥ sadya evātmā madanākṛṣṭacittayā // 10.8.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayā samaṃ ca satataṃ rātrau rātrāvahaṃ rame / pṛṣṭhe gṛhītvā taddāsī praveśayati tatra māsm // 10.8.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tadbrūhi kiṃ na kāmo 'haṃ prāptiḥ kasyānyayoṣitām / yaccitrākāradhāriṇyā bhāryāyāḥ śaśinaḥ priyaḥ // 10.8.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etatkuṣṭhivacaḥ śrutvā śaśī nirghātadāruṇam / duḥkhaṃ nigūhya jijñāsurniścayaṃ tam uvāca saḥ // 10.8.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
satyaṃ bhavasi kāmastvaṃ tad evaṃ tvāhamarthaye / tvattaḥ śrutāyām utpannaṃ tasyāṃ kautūhalaṃ mama // 10.8.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tadadyaiva niśāṃ tatra tvadveṣeṇa viśāmy aham / prasīdānvahalabhye 'rthe tavātra kiyatī kṣatiḥ // 10.8.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktaḥ śaśinā tena sa kuṣṭhī tam abhāṣata / evamastu gṛhāṇemaṃ madveṣaṃ dehi me nijam // 10.8.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tiṣṭhāham iva saṃveṣṭya pāṇipādaṃ ca vāsasā / yāvadāyāti sā tasyā dāsī tamasi jṛmbhite // 10.8.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
madbuddhyā ca tayā pṛṣṭhe gṛhīto 'ham iva vraja / ahaṃ hi pādavaikalyādgacchāmyatra tathā sadā // 10.8.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

akurvāṇaṃ vacas tasya śaptavān sa pitā krudhā / śauryābhimānī durbuddhe siṃhastvaṃ bhava sāṃpratam // 10.9.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
evaṃ tasya pituḥ śāpāddevaghoṣaḥ punaś ca saḥ / vidyādharāvatāraḥ sansiṃho jāto 'tra kānane // 10.9.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tam imaṃ viddhi māṃ siṃhaṃ so 'haṃ daivādbhramanniśi / kūpe 'dya patito 'muṣminmahāsattvoddhṛtastvayā // 10.9.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadyāmi tāvadāpac ca yadā syātkvāpi te tadā / māṃ smarerupakāraṃ te kṛtvā mokṣye svaśāpataḥ // 10.9.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityūdīrya gate siṃhe bodhisattvena tena saḥ / pṛṣṭaḥ suvarṇacūlo 'tha pakṣī svodantam abhyadhāt // 10.9.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asti vidyādharādhīśo vajradaṃṣṭro himācale / tasya devyāmajāyanta pañca kanyā nirantarāḥ // 10.9.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa haramārādhya tapasā prāptavānsutam / rājā rajatadaṃṣṭrākhyaṃ jīvitādadhikapriyam // 10.9.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tena pitrā bālo 'pi vidyāḥ snehena lambhitaḥ / vṛddhiṃ rajatadaṃṣṭro 'tra bandhunetrotsavo yayau // 10.9.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā bhaginīṃ jyeṣṭhāṃ nāmnā somaprabhāṃ ca saḥ / gauryāḥ puraḥ piñjarakaṃ vādayantīmavaikṣata // 10.9.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
dehi piñjarakaṃ mahyaṃ vādayāmy aham apy adaḥ / ityayācata tāṃ so 'tha bālatvādanubandhataḥ // 10.9.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā tannādādyadā tasmai tadā cāpalataḥ svayam / tasyāstatso 'pahṛtyaiva pakṣīvodapatan nabhaḥ // 10.9.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sātha svasā tamaśapadyanme piñjarakaṃ haṭhāt / hatvoḍḍīno 'si tatpakṣī svarṇacūlo bhaviṣyasi // 10.9.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā pādapatitenaitya sā tena yācitā / svasā rajatadaṃṣṭreṇa tasya śāpāntam abravīt // 10.9.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
pakṣī bhūtvāndhakūpe tvaṃ yadā mūḍha patiṣyasi / uddhariṣyati kaścic ca tadā tvāṃ karuṇāparaḥ // 10.9.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya kṛtvopakārāṃśaṃ śāpametaṃ tariṣyasi / ity uktaḥ sa tayā bhrātā svarṇacūlaḥ khago 'jani // 10.9.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa eṣa svarṇacūlo 'haṃ pakṣī bhraṣṭo 'vaṭe niśi / ihoddhṛto 'smi bhavatā tadidānīṃ vrajāmy aham // 10.9.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
āpadi tvaṃ smarermāṃ ca tava kṛtvā hyupakriyām / śāpānmokṣye 'hamity uktvā so 'pi pakṣī yayau tataḥ // 10.9.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa bodhisattvena tena pṛṣṭo bhujaṃgamaḥ / svodantaṃ kathayām āsa tasmāyatra mahātmane // 10.9.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
purā munikumāro 'hamabhūvaṃ kaśyapāśrame / abhavattatra caiko me vayasyo muniputrakaḥ // 10.9.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā cāvatīrṇe 'sminsaraḥ snātuṃ vayasyake / taṭasthito 'hamadrākṣaṃ triphaṇaṃ sarpamāgatam // 10.9.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena bhīṣayituṃ taṃ ca vayasyaṃ narmaṇā mayā / tatsaṃmukhaṃ taṭānte sa baddho mantrabalādahiḥ // 10.9.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣaṇātsnātvā taṭaṃ prāpto madvayasyo vilokya saḥ / aśaṅkitaṃ mahāhiṃ taṃ trasto moham upāgamat // 10.9.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
cirādāśvāsitaḥ so 'tha mayā dhyānādavetya tat / matkṛtaṃ trāsanaṃ kopācchapati sma sakhāpi mām // 10.9.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gacchedṛgeva triphaṇaḥ sarpo bhava mahāniti / anunīto 'tha śāpāntamṛṣiputraḥ sa me 'vadat // 10.9.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sarpībhūtaṃ cyutaṃ kūpe yo 'sau tvāmuddhariṣyati / tasyopakṛtyāvasare śāpamukto bhaviṣyasi // 10.9.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
ity uktvaiva gate tasminneṣo 'haṃ sarpatāṃ gataḥ / uddhṛto 'smi tvayā cādya kūpāttadyāmi saṃprati // 10.9.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
smṛtaścaityopakāraṃ te kṛtvā mokṣye svaśāpataḥ / ity uktvā bhujage yāte strī svavṛttamavarṇayat // 10.9.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ kṣatriyaputrasya bhāryā rājopasevinaḥ / śūrasya tyāgino yūnaścārurūpasya māninaḥ // 10.9.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛto 'nyapuruṣāsaṅgo mayā tadapi pāpayā / tadvijñāya sa bhartā me nigrahāyākaronmatim // 10.9.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sakhīmukhāc ca tadbuddhvā tadaibāhaṃ palāyitā / rātrau vanaṃ praviṣṭedaṃ kūpabhraṣṭoddhṛtā tvayā // 10.9.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvatprasādādidānīṃ ca gatvā jīvāmi kutracit / bhūyāttanme dinaṃ yatra kuryāṃte pratyupakriyām // 10.9.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā bodhisattvaṃ taṃ kulaṭā nikaṭāttataḥ / gotravardhanasaṃjñasya rājñaḥ sā nagaraṃ yayau // 10.9.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya saṃgatimutpādya parivārajanaiḥ saha / tasthau rājamahādevyā dāsībhāvāśrayeṇa sā // 10.9.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāpi bodhisattvasya tasyāḥ saṃbhāṣaṇātstriyāḥ / nāvirāsīdvane naṣṭasiddhermūlaphalādikam // 10.9.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ kṣuttṛṣṇayā klāntaḥ prāksa siṃhaṃ tamasmarat / smṛtāgataḥ sa caitasya vyadhādvṛttiṃ mṛgāmiṣaiḥ // 10.9.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṃcitkālaṃ sa tanmāṃsaiḥ prakṛtisthaṃ vidhāya tam / kesarī so 'bravītkṣīṇaḥ saśāpo me vrajāmy aham // 10.9.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā siṃhatāṃ muktvā bhūtvā vidyādharaś ca saḥ / jagāma tadanujñātastamāmantrya nijaṃ padam // 10.9.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa bodhisattvāṃśo vṛttiglānaḥ punaḥ khagam / sasmāra svarṇacūlaṃ tam upāgātso 'pi tatsmṛtaḥ // 10.9.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āveditārtis tenāsau gatvānīya khagaḥ kṣaṇāt / ratnābharaṇasaṃpūrṇāṃ dadau tasmai karaṇḍikām // 10.9.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
uvāca caitenārthena vṛttiḥ syāc chāśvatī tava / mama jātaś ca śāpāntaḥ svasti te sādhayāmy aham // 10.9.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā so 'pi bhūtvaiva vidyādharakumārakaḥ / svalokaṃ nabhasā gatvā prāpa rājyaṃ nijātpituḥ // 10.9.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi ratnāni vikretuṃ bodhisattvaḥ paribhraman / tatprāpa nagaraṃ yatra sā strī kūpoddhṛtā sthitā // 10.9.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatraikasyāś ca vṛddhāyā brāhmaṇyā vijane gṛhe / nidhāya tānyābharaṇānyāpaṇaṃ yāvadeti sasḥ // 10.9.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
tāvaddadarśa tām eva vane kūpātsamuddhṛtām / striyaṃ saṃmukhamāyāntīṃ sāpi strī paśyati sma tam // 10.9.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃbhāṣaṇe kṛte 'nyonyamatha sā strī kathākramāt / svaṃ rājamahiṣīpārśvasthitamasmai nyavedayat // 10.9.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi pṛṣṭasvavṛttāntastayā tasyai śaśaṃsa tām / ratnābharaṇasaṃprāptiṃ svarṇacūlakhagādṛjuḥ // 10.9.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nītvā cābharaṇaṃ tasyai vṛddhāveśmany adarśayat / sāpi gatvā śaṭhā rājñyai svasvāminyai śaśaṃsa tat // 10.9.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāś ca rājñyā gehāntaḥ svarṇacūlena pakṣiṇā / nītaṃ chalena paśyantyā evābharaṇabhāṇḍakam // 10.9.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac ca sā svapuraprāptaṃ rājñī tasyā mukhātstriyāḥ / biddhvā viditavedyāyā rājānaṃ taṃ vyajijñapat // 10.9.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājāpi bodhisattvaṃ taṃ darśitaṃ kustriyā tayā / ānāyayatsābharaṇaṃ bhṛtyair baddhvā gṛhāttataḥ // 10.9.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
paripṛcchya ca vṛttāntaṃ satyaṃ matvāpi tadvacaḥ / sthāpayām āsa baddhaṃ taṃ gṛhītvābharaṇāny api // 10.9.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa bandhastho 'tra sasmāra bodhisattvo bhujaṃgamam / ṛṣiputrāvatāraṃ tam upatasthe ca so 'pi tam // 10.9.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvā ca taṃ sa pṛṣṭārthaḥ sarpaḥ sādhum abhāṣata / gatvāhaṃ veṣṭayāmyetamā mūrdhāntaṃ mahīpatim // 10.9.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na ca muñcāmyamuṃ yāvadāgatyokto 'smi na tvayā / mokṣyāmyahaṃ nṛpaṃ sarpāditi tvaṃ ca vaderiha // 10.9.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvayyāgate tvadvacasā mokṣyāmy ahamato nṛpam / manmuktaścaiṣa rājā te svarājyārdhaṃ pradāsyati // 10.9.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā taṃ sa gatvaiva pariveṣṭitavānahiḥ / rājānamāsta caitasya mūrdhni kṛtvā phaṇatrayam // 10.9.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hā hā daṣṭo 'hinā rājetyākrandati jane 'tha saḥ / bodhisattvo 'bravīdrakṣāmyahaṃ nṛpamaheriti // 10.9.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutavadbhiś ca tadvākyaṃ vijñaptaḥ so 'nujīvibhiḥ / ānāyya bodhisattvaṃ taṃ sarpākrānto 'bravīnnṛpaḥ // 10.9.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yadi māṃ mocayasyasmātsarpāttatte dadāmy aham / rājyārdhamantarasthāś ca tavaite mantriṇo 'tra me // 10.9.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā bāḍhamity ukte mantribhiḥ sa jagāda tam / bhujaṃgaṃ bodhisattvāṃśo muñca rājānamāśviti // 10.9.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatastenāhinā mukto rājyārdhaṃ nṛpatirdadau / sa tasmai bodhisattvāya so 'pi svastho 'bhavatkṣaṇāt // 10.9.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sarpaś ca kṣīṇaśāpaḥ san bhūtvā munikumārakaḥ / sadasyākhyātavṛttānto jagāma nijamāśramam // 10.9.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ niścitamabhyeti śubham eva śubhātmanām / evaṃ cātikramo nāma kleśāya mahatāmapi // 10.9.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aviśvāsāspadaṃ caiva strīṇāṃ spṛśati nāśayam / prāṇadānopakāro 'pi kiṃ tāsāmanyaducyate // 10.9.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityākhyāya kathāṃ vatsarājaputraṃ sa gomukhaḥ / uvāca kathayāmyetāḥ punarmugdhakathāḥ śṛṇu // 10.9.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
babhūva śramaṇaḥ kaścidvihāre kvāpi mūḍhadhīḥ / sa rathyāyāṃ bhramañjātu śunā jānunyadaśyata // 10.9.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śvadaṣṭaḥ sa vihāraṃ svam upāgatya vyacintayat / kiṃ vṛttaṃ jānuni tavetyekaikaḥ prakṣyatīha mām // 10.9.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
pratyāyayiṣyāmy evaṃ ca kiyato 'haṃ kiyac ciram / tadupāyaṃ karomy atra sarvān bodhayituṃ sakṛt // 10.9.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityālocya samāruhya sa vihāropari drutam / gṛhītvā granthimusalaṃ mūḍho bhikṣuravādayat // 10.9.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
akāraṇamakāle kiṃ granthiṃ vādayasīti tam / śrutvāścasryeṇa militāḥ papracchuratha bhikṣavaḥ // 10.9.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
śunā me bhakṣitaṃ jānu tadekaikasya pṛcchataḥ / bruve 'haṃ kiyadityevaṃ yūyaṃ saṃghaṭitā mayā // 10.9.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad budhyadhvaṃ samaṃ sarve jānu me paśyateti saḥ / bhikṣūn pratyabravīd etāñ śvadaṣṭaṃ jānu darśayan // 10.9.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ pārśvopapīḍaṃ te samagrā bhikṣavo 'hasan / kiyanmātre kṛto 'nena saṃrambho 'yaṃ kiyāniti // 10.9.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ākhyātaḥ śramaṇo mūrkhaṣṭakkvamūrkho niśamyatāsm / kadaryaḥ ko 'py abhūtkvāpi mūrkhaṣṭakko mahādhanaḥ // 10.9.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sabhāyaḥ sa sadā bhuṅkte saktūṃllavaṇavarjitān / anyasyānnasya bubudhe naiva svādaṃ sa jātucit // 10.9.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ekadā prerito dhātrā sa bhāryām abravīnnijām / kṣīriṇīṃ prati jātā me śraddhā tāmadya me paca // 10.9.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatheti tasya sā bhāryā papāca kṣīriṇīṃ tadā / tasthau cābhyantare guptaṃ sa ṭakkaḥ śayanaṃ śritaḥ // 10.9.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvā prāghuṇikaḥ kaścid atra me mā sma bhūditi / tāvattasya suhṛddhūrtaṣṭakkastatraika yāyayau // 10.9.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kva te bharteti papraccha sa ca tāṃ tasya gehinīm / sāpy adattotarā tasya prāviśadbharturantikam // 10.9.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ākhyātamittrāgamanā so 'pi bhāryāṃ jagāda tām / upaviśyeha rudatī pādāvādāya tiṣṭha me // 10.9.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
bhartā me mṛta ityevaṃ vadeś ca suhṛdaṃ mama / tato gate 'sminn āvābhyāṃ bhoktavyā kṣīriṇī sukham // 10.9.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ity uktā tena yāvat sā pravṛttā rodituṃ tadā / tāvat praviśya so 'pṛcchatkimetaditi tāṃ suhṛt // 10.9.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhartā mṛto me paśyeti tayāktaḥ sa vyacintayat / kva pacantī mayā dṛṣṭā sukhitā kṣīriṇāmiyam // 10.9.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kvādhunaiva vipanno 'yametadbhartā vinā rujam / nūnaṃ māṃ prāghunaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛtamābhyāmidaṃ mṛṣā // 10.9.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tanmayā naiva gantavyamityalocyopaviśya saḥ / dhūrto hā mittra hā mittretyākrandaṃs tatra tasthivān // 10.9.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutākrandāḥ praviśyātra bāndhavā mṛtavatsthitam / śmaśānaṃ bhautaṭakkaṃ taṃ netumāsansamudyatāḥ // 10.9.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttiṣṭha bāndhavair yāvadetair nītvā na dahyase / ity upāṃśvavadatkarṇamūle bhāryā tadā ca tam // 10.9.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
maivaṃ śaṭho 'yaṃ ṭakko me kṣīriṇīṃ bhoktumicchati / nottiṣṭhāmi tad etasminn agate 'haṃ mṛto yadi // 10.9.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāṇebhyo 'py annamuṣṭirhi mādṛśānāṃ garīyasi / iti pratyabravīdbhāryām upāṃśveva sa tāṃ jaḍaḥ // 10.9.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatastena kumittreṇa nītvā taiḥ svajanaiś ca saḥ / dahyamāno 'pi niśceṣṭo dadau nāmaraṇādvacaḥ // 10.9.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ sa mūḍho vijahau prāṇānna kṣīriṇīṃ punaḥ / kleśārjitaṃ ca bubhuje tasyānyair helayā dhanam // 10.9.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
śrutaḥ kadaryaḥ śrūyantāmamī mārjārabhautakāḥ / ujjayinyām upādhyāyo mugdhaḥ ko 'py abhavanmaṭhe // 10.9.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra nidrā na tasyābhūnmūṣakopadravānniśi / tatkhinnastac ca suhṛde sa kasmaicidavarṇayast // 10.9.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
mārjāraṃ sthāpayānīya so 'tra khādati mūṣakān / iti so 'pi suhṛdviprastamupādhyāyamabravīt // 10.9.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mārjāraḥ kīdṛśaḥ kvāste na sa dṛṣṭacaro mayā / ity uktavatyupādhyāye taṃ suhṛtso 'bravītpunaḥ // 10.9.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kācare locane tasya varṇaḥ kapiladhūsaraḥ / pṛṣṭhe ca lomaśaṃ carma rathyāsvaṭati ceha saḥ // 10.9.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadebhistvamabhijñānair anviṣyānāyayāśu tam / mitra mārjāramity uktvā tatsuhṛtsa yayau gṛham // 10.9.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ śiṣyānupādhyāyaḥ sa jagāda jaḍo nijān / abhijñānāni yuṣmābhiḥ śrutānyeva sthitair iha // 10.9.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadanviṣyata mārjāraṃ rathyāsu tamiha kva cit / tatheti te gatāḥ śiṣyās tatra bhremuritas tataḥ // 10.9.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathāpi na tu tair dṛṣṭo mārjāraḥ sa kadācana / athaikaṃ te baṭuṃ rathyāmukhādaikṣanta nirgatam // 10.9.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kācaraṃ netrayugale varṇe dhūsarapiṅgalam / pṛṣṭhopari dadhānaṃ ca lomaśaṃ hariṇājinam // 10.9.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvā taṃ saiṣa mārjāraḥ prāpto 'smābhir yathāśrutaḥ / ityavaṣṭabhya taṃ ninyurupādhyāyāntikaṃ ca te // 10.9.168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upādhyāyo 'pi mittroktair yuktaṃ mārjāralakṣaṇaiḥ / dṛṣṭvā taṃ sthāpayām āsa rātrau tatra maṭhāntare // 10.9.169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mārjāro nūnamastīti mene so 'pi baṭurjaḍaḥ / mārjārākhyāṃ kṛtāṃ śṛṇvannātmanastair abuddhibhiḥ // 10.9.170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca bhauto baṭuḥ śiṣyas tasya viprasya yena tat / upādhyāyasya tasyoktaṃ maitryā mārjāralakṣaṇam // 10.9.171	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātaḥ so 'trāgato vipro baṭumantarvilokya tam / iha kenāyamānīta iti bhautānuvāca tān // 10.9.172	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutopalakṣaṇastvatto mārjāro 'smābhir eṣa saḥ / ānīta ity upādhyāyo bhautaḥ śiṣyāś ca te 'vadan // 10.9.173	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vihasya so 'vādīdvipro mūḍhāḥ kva mānuṣaḥ / kva ca tiryaksa mārjāraścatuṣpātpucchavānapi // 10.9.174	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā taṃ baṭuṃ muktvā te 'bruvanmandabuddhayaḥ / tarhyanviṣyānayāmastaṃ mārjāraṃ tādṛśaṃ punaḥ // 10.9.175	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktavato mūḍhāñjanas tatra jahāsa tān / ajñatā nāma kasyeha nopahāsāya jāyate // 10.9.176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mārjārabhautaḥ kathitaḥ śrūyantāmapare 'py amī / āsīdbahūnāṃ mugdhānāṃ mukhyo mugdho maṭhe kva cit // 10.9.177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sa kenacid vācyamānād dharmaśāstrāt kadācana / taḍāgakartur aśrauṣīd amutra sumahatphalam // 10.9.178	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa dhanasaṃpūrṇo vipulaṃ vāripūritam / taḍāgaṃ kārayām āsa nātidūre nijānmaṭhāt // 10.9.179	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā sa taḍāgaṃ taṃ draṣṭuṃ mugdhāgraṇīrgataḥ / kenāpyutpāṭitānyasya pulināni vyalokayat // 10.9.180	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathaivāgatya so 'nyedyurutkhātaṃ taṭamanyataḥ / dṛṣṭvā tasya taḍāgasya sodvegaḥ samacintayat // 10.9.181	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātaḥ prabhātād ārabhya sthāsyāmīhaiva vāsaram / drakṣyāmi kaḥ karoty etad ity ālocya yayau prage // 10.9.182	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyedyuryāvadetyāste tāvattatra dadarśa saḥ / divo 'vatīrya śṛṅgābhyāṃ khanantaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ taṭam // 10.9.183	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
divyo vṛṣo 'yaṃ tatkiṃ na divaṃ yāmi sahāmunā / ity upetya vṛṣasyāsya hastābhyāṃ pucchamagrahīt // 10.9.184	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ pucchāgralagnaṃ taṃ bhautamutkṣipya vegataḥ / kṣaṇānnināya kailāsaṃ svaṃ dhāma bhagavānvṛṣaḥ // 10.9.185	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra divyāni bhakṣyāṇi modakādīny avāpya saḥ / bhuñjāno nyavasad bhauto dināni katicit sukhaṃ // 10.9.186	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatātagāni kurvāṇaṃ sa dṛṣṭvā taṃ mahāvṛṣam / acintayata bhautānāṃ mukhyo daivena mohitaḥ // 10.9.187	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gacchāmi vṛṣapucchāgralagnaḥ paśyāmi bāndhavān / kathayitvādbhutamidaṃ tathaivaiṣyāmyahaṃ punaḥ // 10.9.188	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
iti saṃcintya vṛṣabhasyaikadopetya tasya saḥ / ālambya gacchataḥ pucchamāgādbhauto bhuvastalam // 10.9.189	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ prāpto maṭhe bhautair anyair āśliṣya tatsthitaiḥ / kva gato 'sīti pṛṣṭastaṃ svavṛttāntaṃ śaśaṃsa saḥ // 10.9.190	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sarve śrutāścasryā bhautāste prārthayanta tam / prasīda naya tatrāsmānapi bhojaya modakān // 10.9.191	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sa tathetyetānyuktimuktvāpare dine / taḍāgopāntamanayatsa ca tatrāyayau vṛṣaḥ // 10.9.192	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
jagrāha tasya lāṅgūlaṃ mukhyaḥ pāṇidvayena saḥ / tasyāspyagṛhṇāccaraṇāvanyastasyāpi cetaraḥ // 10.9.193	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
ityanyonyāṅghrilagnaistair bhautair yāvac ca śṛṅkhalā / racitā sa vṛṣastāvadutpapāta javānnabhaḥ // 10.9.194	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yāti tasmiṃś ca vṛṣabhe lāṅgūlālambibhautake / mukhyabhautaṃ tamaprākṣīdeko bhauto 'tha daivataḥ // 10.9.195	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
śraddhāmākhyāhi nastāvadyatheṣṭasulabhā divi / kiyatpramāṇā bhavatā modakā bhakṣitā iti // 10.9.196	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tato bhraṣṭānusaṃdhāno vṛṣapucchaṃ vimucya tam / padmākārau karau kṛtvā saṃśliṣṭau bhautanāyakaḥ // 10.9.197	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iyatpramāṇā ity āśu yāvat tān prativakti saḥ / tāvat so 'nye ca te sarve khān nipatya vipedire // 10.9.198	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vṛṣaḥ prāyāc ca kailāsaṃ jano dṛṣṭvā jahāsa ca / doṣāya nirvimarśaivaṃ bhautapraśnottarakriyā // 10.9.199	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutā dyugāmino bhautāḥ śrūyatāmaparo 'py ayam / kaścidbhauto visasmāra mārgaṃ mārgāntaraṃ vrajan // 10.9.200	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tarornadītaṭasthasya gacchāsyoparivartmanā / ity ucyate sma panthānaṃ paripṛcchañjanaiś ca saḥ // 10.9.201	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tasya taroḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ gatvārūḍhaḥ sa mūḍhadhīḥ / etatpṛṣṭhena me panthā upadiṣṭo janair iti // 10.9.202	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatpṛṣṭhe sarpataścāsya bharātparyantavartinī / śākhā nanāma yatnena papātālambya naiṣa tām // 10.9.203	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāmālambya sthito yāvattāvattenāyayau pathā / āroheṇoparisthena nadyāṃ pītajalaḥ karī // 10.9.204	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ dṛṣṭvā taruśākhāgralambhī bhautaḥ sa dīnavāk / mahātmanmāṃ gṛhāṇeti hastyāroham uvāca tam // 10.9.205	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hastyārohaś ca bhautaṃ tam avatārayituṃ taroḥ / pādayor agrahīd dvābhyāṃ pāṇibhyām ujjhitāṅkuśaḥ // 10.9.206	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca nirgatya gate gaje bhautasya tasya saḥ / lalambe pādayohastipako vṛkṣāgralambinaḥ // 10.9.207	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa tvarayan bhauto hastyārohaṃ tam abhyadhāt / yadi jānāsi tacchrighraṃ yat kiṃcid gīyatāṃ tvayā // 10.9.208	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ito 'vatārayejjātu yacchrutvāgatya nau janaḥ / patitāvanyathādhastāddharedāvāmiyaṃ nadī // 10.9.209	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktaḥ sa gajārohastena mañju tathā jagau / yathā sa eva bhauto 'tra paritoṣamagātparam // 10.9.210	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sādhuvādaṃ ca sa dadadvismṛtyojjhitapādapaḥ / dātuṃ prāvartata dvābhyāṃ hastābhyāṃ choṭikāṃ jaḍaḥ // 10.9.211	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkṣaṇaṃ vinipatyaiva sahastyāroha eva saḥ / nadyāṃ vipede mūrkhair hi saṅgaḥ kasyāsti śarmaṇe // 10.9.212	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ityākhyāya kathāṃ bhūyo vatseśvarasutāya saḥ / gomukhaḥ kathayām āsa hiraṇyākṣakathāmimām // 10.9.213	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
astīha himavatkukṣau deśaḥ pṛthvīśiromaṇiḥ / kaśmīra iti vidyānāṃ dharmasya ca niketanam // 10.9.214	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrādhiṣṭhānamabhavaddhiraṇyapuranāmakam / kanakākṣa iti khyātastasminrājā babhūva ca // 10.9.215	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya ratnaprabhādevyāṃ śaṃkarārādhanodbhavaḥ / putro hiraṇyākṣa iti kṣmāpaterudapadyata // 10.9.216	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
sa jātu gulikākrīḍāṃ kurvan gulikayā chalāt / tāpasīṃ rājatanayo mārgāyātām atāḍayat // 10.9.217	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
sā tāpasī jitakrodhā rājaputraṃ vihasya tam / yogīśvarī hiraṇyākṣam uvāca vikṛtānanā // 10.9.218	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svayauvanādikair īdṛg darpaś cet tava tāṃ yadi / mṛgāṅkalekhām āpnoṣi bhāryāṃ tat kīdṛśo bhavet // 10.9.219	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tac chrutvā kṣamayitvā tāṃ rājaputraḥ sa pṛṣṭavān / keṣā mṛgāṅkalekhākhyā bhagavatyucyatāmiti // 10.9.220	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas taṃ sābravīdasti śaśitejā iti śrutaḥ / vidyādharendro himavatyacalendre mahāyaśāḥ // 10.9.221	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
mṛgāṅkalekhā tasyāsti tanayā varakanyakā / rūpeṇa dyucarendrāṇā niśāsūnnidrakapradā // 10.9.222	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā cānurūpā bhāryā te tasyāstvamucitaḥ patiḥ / ity uktaḥ siddhatāpasyā hiraṇyākṣo jagāda tām // 10.9.223	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kathaṃ bhagavati prāpyā mayā sā tarhi kathyatām / tac chrutvā sā hiraṇyākṣaṃ taṃ yogeśvaryabhāṣata // 10.9.224	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvāhaṃ tvatkathākhyānādupalapsye tadāśayam / āgatya cāham eva tvāṃ tatra neṣyāmyataḥ param // 10.9.225	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ihāsti yo 'mareśākhyo devastatketane tvayā / prātaḥ prāpsyāsmi nityaṃ hi tamarcitum upaimy aham // 10.9.226	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā nabhasā prāyāttāpasī sā svasiddhitaḥ / tasyā mṛgāṅkalekhāyā nikaṭaṃ tuhinācalam // 10.9.227	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tasyai hiraṇyākṣaguṇān yuktyā śaśaṃsa sā / tathā yathā divyakanyā sātyutkaivam uvāca tām // 10.9.228	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
tādṛśaṃ cenna bhartāraṃ prāpnuyāṃ bhagavaty aham / tanniṣphalena kiṃ kāryamamunā jīvitena me // 10.9.229	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityārūḍhasmarāveśā nītvā tatkathayā dinam / mṛgāṅkalekhā tāpasyā sahovāsa tayā niśām // 10.9.230	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tāvat so 'pi hiraṇyākṣastaccintānītavāsaraḥ / suptaḥ kathaṃcijjagade gauryā svapne niśākṣaye // 10.9.231	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
vidyādharaḥ san prāptas tvaṃ muniśāpena martyatām / tāpasyāḥ karasaṃsparśādetasyā mokṣyase tataḥ // 10.9.232	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
mṛgāṅkalekhāṃ ca tatastāmāśu pariṇeṣyasi / taccintā nātra kāryā te pūrvabhāryā hi sā tava // 10.9.233	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityādiśyaiva sā devī tiro 'bhūttasya so 'pi ca / prabudhya prātar utthāya cakre snānādimaṅgalam // 10.9.234	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'vareśvarasyāgre gatvā tasthau praṇamya tam / yatra saṃketakaṃ tasya tāpasyā vihitaṃ tayā // 10.9.235	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atrāntare ca katham apy āptanidrāṃ svamandire / mṛgāṅkalekhām apitāṃ gaurī svapne samādiśat // 10.9.236	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
kṣīṇaśāpaṃ hiraṇyākṣaṃ jātaṃ vidyādharaṃ punaḥ / karasparśena tāpasyāḥ patiṃ prāpsyasy alaṃ śucā // 10.9.237	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvāntarhitāyāṃ ca devyāṃ prātaḥ prabudhya sā / mṛgāṅkalekhā tāpasyai tasyai svapnaṃ śaśaṃsa tam // 10.9.238	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sā tac chrutvaiva cāgatya bhūlokaṃ siddhatāpasī / sthitaṃ kṣetre 'mareśasya hiraṇyākṣaṃ tam abhyadhāt // 10.9.239	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ehi vaidyādharaṃ lokaṃ putrety uktvā kareṇa sā / praṇataṃ taṃ samādāya bāhāvudapatan nabhaḥ // 10.9.240	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvat sa sa hiraṇyākṣo bhūtvā vidyādhareśvaraḥ / smṛtvā śāpakṣayājjātiṃ tāpasīṃ tām abhāṣata // 10.9.241	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
himādrau vajrakūṭākhye pure jānīhi māmiyam / vidyādharāṇāṃ rājānaṃ nāmnāpyamṛtatejasam // 10.9.242	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
so 'hamullaṅghanakrodhācchāpaṃ prāpya purā muneḥ / martyayonim upāgacchaṃ tvatkarasparśanāvadhim // 10.9.243	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śaptasya me tadā bhāryā yā duḥkhādajahattanum / saiṣā mṛgāṅkalekhādya jātā pūrvapriyā mama // 10.9.244	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
idānīṃ ca tvayā sārdhaṃ gatvā prāpsyāmi tāmaham / tvatkarasparśapūtasya śāntaḥ śāpo hi so 'dya me // 10.9.245	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti bruvaṃstayā sākaṃ tāpasyā gaganena saḥ / jagāmāmṛtatejāstaṃ himādriṃ dyucarādhipaḥ // 10.9.246	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mṛgāṅkalekhām udyānasthitāṃ tatra dadarśa saḥ / sāpy apaśyat tam āyāntaṃ tāpasyāveditaṃ tayā // 10.9.247	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
citraṃ śrutipathenādau praviśyānyonyamānasam / anirgatyāpyaviśatāṃ dṛṣṭimārgeṇa tau punaḥ // 10.9.248	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
vivāhasiddhaye pitre tvayedaṃ kathyatāmiti / ūce mṛgāṅkalekhātra tāpasyā prauḍhayā tayā // 10.9.249	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato lajjānatamukhī sā gatvā pitaraṃ nijam / sakhīmukhena tatsarvaṃ bodhayām āsa tatkṣaṇam // 10.9.250	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi svapne 'mbikādiṣṭastatpitā khecareśvaraḥ / tamanaiṣītsvabhavanaṃ saṃmānyāmṛtatejasam // 10.9.251	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
dadau mṛgāṅkalekhāṃ ca tasmai tāṃ sa yathāvidhi / kṛtodvāhaś ca taṃ vajrakūṭaṃ svaṃ prayayau puram // 10.9.252	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra so 'mṛtatejāḥ svaṃ rājyaṃ prāpya sabhāryakam / ānītaṃ siddhatāpasyā martyatvātpitaraṃ nijam // 10.9.253	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kanakākṣaṃ tamabhyarcya bhogaiḥ prāpayya bhūtalam / mṛgāṅkalekhayā sākaṃ tāmṛddhiṃ bubhuje ciram // 10.9.254	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti pūrvakarmavihitaṃ bhavitavyaṃ jagati yasya jantoryat / tadayatnena sa purataḥ patitaṃ prāpnotyasādhyamapi // 10.9.255	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
evaṃ gomukhakathitāṃ śaktiyaśasyutsuko niśamya kathām / śayane niśi naravāhanadatto nidrāmasau bheje // 10.9.256	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
tato 'nyedyuḥ punarnaktaṃ vinodārthaṃ sa gomukhaḥ / naravāhanadattāya kathāmetāmavarṇayat // 10.10.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dhāreśvarābhidhe śaive siddhakṣetre purāvasat / upāsyamāno bahubhiḥ śiṣyaiḥ ko'pi mahāmuniḥ // 10.10.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
so 'bravījjātu śiṣyānsvānyuṣmāsu yadi kenacit / apūrvamīkṣitaṃ kiṃcicchrutaṃ vā tannivedyatām // 10.10.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukte tena muninā śiṣya eko jagāda tam / mayā śrutamapūrvaṃ yattadākhyāmi niśamyatām // 10.10.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vijayākhyaṃ mahākṣetraṃ kaśmīreṣv asti śāṃbhavam / tatra pravrājakaḥ kaścidāsīdvidyābhimānavān // 10.10.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jayī sarvatra bhūyāsam ity āśaṃsan praṇamya saḥ / śaṃbhuṃ pratasthe vādāya pravrāṭ pāṭaliputrakam // 10.10.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
gacchaṃś ca mārge 'tikrāmanvanāni sarito girīn / prāpyāṭavīṃ pariśrānto viśaśrāma tarostale // 10.10.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣaṇāc ca vāpīśiśire tatra dūrādhvadhūsaram / dadarśa dhārmikaṃ daṇḍakuṇḍikāhastamāgatam // 10.10.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kutastvaṃ kutra yāsīti niṣaṇṇo 'tra ca tena saḥ / pravrājakena pṛṣṭastamityabhāṣita dhārmikaḥ // 10.10.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āgato 'haṃ sakhe vidyākṣetrātpāṭaliputrakāt / kaśmīrānyāmi tatratyāñjetuṃ vādena paṇḍitān // 10.10.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutvaitaddhārmikavacaḥ sa parivrāḍacintayat / ihaiko na jito 'yaṃ cenmayā pāṭaliputrakaḥ // 10.10.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tat tatra gatvā jeṣyāmi katham anyān bahūn aham / ity ālocya sa taṃ pravrāḍ ākṣipyāha sma dhārmikam // 10.10.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
viparītamidaṃ kiṃ te vada dhārmika ceṣṭitam / kva dhārmiko mumukṣustvaṃ kva vādī vyasanāturaḥ // 10.10.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vādābhimānabandhena saṃsārānmokṣamicchasi / śamayasyagninoṣmāṇaṃ śītaṃ haṃsi himena ca // 10.10.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttitīrṣasi pāṣāṇanāvā mūḍha mahodadhim / vātena jvalitaṃ vahniṃ nivārayitumīhase // 10.10.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
brāhmaṃ śīlaṃ kṣamā nāma kṣātramāpannarakṣaṇam / mumukṣuśīlaṃ ca śamaḥ kalaho rakṣasāṃ smṛtam // 10.10.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tasmācchāntena dāntena bhavitavyaṃ mumukṣuṇā / nirastadvandvaduḥkhena saṃsārakleśabhīruṇā // 10.10.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ataḥ śamakuṭhāreṇa cchindhīmaṃ bhavapādapam / hetuvādābhimānāmbusekaṃ tasya tu mā sma dāḥ // 10.10.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukto dhārmikastena parituṣṭaḥ praṇamya tam / gururbhavānmamety uktvā jagāma sa yathāgatam // 10.10.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pravrāḍḍhasansthito 'traiva tarumūle tadantarāt / yakṣasyālāpamaśṛṇotkrīḍato bhāryayā saha // 10.10.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
karṇaṃ dadāti yāvac ca sa pravrāṭ tāvad atra saḥ / yakṣaḥ puṣpasrajā bhāryāṃ narmaṇā tāmatāḍayat // 10.10.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca mṛtakalpaṃ sā kṛtvātmānaṃ śaṭhā mṛṣā / tasthau tatparivāraś ca muktākrando jhagityabhūt // 10.10.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
cirāccāgatajīveva sā dṛśāvudamīlayat / kiṃ tvayā dṛṣṭamiti tāṃ yakṣo 'prākṣīttataḥ patiḥ // 10.10.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
atha mithyaiva sāvocattvayāhaṃ mālayā yadā / abhyāhatā tadāpaśyaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ puruṣamāgatam // 10.10.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pāśahastaṃ jvalannetraṃ prāṃśumūrdhvaśiroruham / bhayānakaṃ nijacchāyāmalinīkṛtadiktaṭam // 10.10.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena nītāhamabhavaṃ duṣṭena yamamandiram / tyajitāsmi ca tatratyaistaṃ nivāryādhikāribhiḥ // 10.10.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam tayokte yakṣiṇyā hasan yakṣo jagāda tām / aho vinendrajālena strīṇāṃ ceṣṭā na vidyate // 10.10.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ko mṛtyuḥ kusumāghātādāvṛttiḥ kā yamālayāt / mūḍhe pāṭaliputrastrīvṛttānto 'nukṛtastvayā // 10.10.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmin hi nagare rāja yo 'sti siṃhākṣanāmakaḥ / tadbhāryā mantrisenānīpurohitabhiṣagvadhūḥ // 10.10.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sahādāya trayodaśyāṃ śuklapakṣe kadācana / sanāthīkṛtataddeśāmāgāddraṣṭuṃ sarasvatīm // 10.10.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tanmārgamilitaiḥ sarvāḥ kubjāndhapaṅgubhiḥ / vyādhitair ity ayācyanta bhūpālapramukhāṅganāḥ // 10.10.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
rogāturāṇāṃ dīnānāmauṣadhaṃ naḥ prayacchata / yena mucyāmahe rogātkurutārtānukampanam // 10.10.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
samudralaharīlolo vidyutsphuritabhaṅguraḥ / jīvaloko hy ayaṃ yātrādyutsavakṣaṇasundaraḥ // 10.10.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadasāre 'tra saṃsāre sāraṃ dīneṣu yā dayā / kṛpaṇeṣu ca yaddānaṃ guṇavān kva na jīvati // 10.10.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āḍhyasya kiṃ ca dānena suhitasyāśanena kim / kiṃ ca ndanena śītāloḥ kiṃ dhanena himāgame // 10.10.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadetānuddharata naḥ kṛpaṇānāmayāpadaḥ / ity uktā vyādhitaistaistā nṛpabhāryādayo 'bruvan // 10.10.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
suṣṭhūpapannaṃ jalpanti kṛpaṇā vyādhitā ime / sarvasvenāpyato 'smābhiḥ kāryameṣāṃ cikitsitam // 10.10.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
evamanyonyamālapya devīmabhyarcya yoṣitaḥ / vyādhitāṃstānsvabhavanānyāninyustāḥ pṛthakpṛthak // 10.10.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
svabhartṝn prerya teṣāṃ ca mahāsattvān mahauṣadhaiḥ / cikitsāṃ kārayām āsur nottasthuś ca tadantikāt // 10.10.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sahavāsāc ca tair eva saṅgamudbhūtamanmathaiḥ / tathā yayustāḥ saṃsāraṃ tanmayaṃ dadṛśuryathā // 10.10.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kva rogiṇo 'mī kṛpaṇā bhartāraḥ kva nṛpādayaḥ / iti na vyamṛśattāsāṃ manmathāndhīkṛtaṃ manaḥ // 10.10.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataś ca tā asaṃbhāvyarogisaṃbhogasaṃbhavaiḥ / nakhadantakṣatair yuktāḥ patayo dadṛśurnijāḥ // 10.10.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
te ca bhūpālatanmantrisenāpatimukhādayaḥ / tadācakhyuḥ sasaṃdehāḥ parasparamatandritāḥ // 10.10.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato rājābravīdanyānyūyaṃ saṃprati tiṣṭhata / ahamadya nijāṃ bhāryāṃ tāvat pṛcchāmi yuktitaḥ // 10.10.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā tānvisṛjyaiva gatvā vāsagṛhaṃ ca saḥ / pradarśitasnehabhayo bhāryāṃ papraccha tāṃ nṛpaḥ // 10.10.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
daṣṭaḥ kenādharo 'yaṃ te kṣatau kena nakhaiḥ stanau / satyamākhyāsi cedasti śreyas te nānyathā punaḥ // 10.10.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā tena rājñā sā rājñī kṛtakam abravīt / avācyam apy athanyāhaṃ vacmyāścaryamidaṃ śṛṇu // 10.10.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
citrabhitterito rātrau pumāṃścakragadādharaḥ / nirgatyaivopabhuṅkte māṃ prātaścātraiva līyate // 10.10.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yadaṅgaṃ candrasūryābhyām apidṛṣṭaṃ na jātu me / tatredṛgetya kriyate tenāvasthā sthite tvayi // 10.10.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
etattasyāḥ saduḥkhāyā iva śrutvā vaco nṛpaḥ / pratyeti sma tathā mūrkho māyāmāśaṅkya vaiṣṇavīm // 10.10.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śaśaṃsa mantryādibhyaś ca tebhyas te 'pi tathā jaḍāḥ / matvācyutopabhuktās tā bhāryās tūṣṇīṃ kilābhavan // 10.10.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityasatyaikaracanācaturāḥ kustriyaḥ śaṭhāḥ / vañcayante jaḍamatīnnāhaṃ mūrkhastu tādṛśaḥ // 10.10.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
iti yakṣo bruvan bhāryāṃ sa vilakṣīcakāra tām / tac ca pravrājako 'śrauṣīt sarvaṃ tarutale sthitaḥ // 10.10.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ kṛtāñjaliryakṣaṃ taṃ sa pravrāḍ vyajijñapat / bhagavannāśramaprāptastavāhaṃ śaraṇāgataḥ // 10.10.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkṣamasvāparādhaṃ me tvadvaco yanmayā śrutam / ity uktaḥ satyavacanāttasya yakṣastutoṣa saḥ // 10.10.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
sarvasthānagatākhyo 'haṃ yakṣastuṣṭastavāsmi ca / gṛhāṇa varamityūce pravrāḍ yakṣeṇa tena saḥ // 10.10.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
manyumasyāṃ svabhāryāyāṃ mā kṛthā eṣa eva me / varo 'stviti tamāha sma sa pravrāḍapi guhyakam // 10.10.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa yakṣo 'vādīttaṃ tuṣṭo 'smi sutarāṃ tava / tadeṣa te varo datto mayānyaḥ prārthyatāmiti // 10.10.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ pravrājako 'vādīttarhyayaṃ me 'paro varaḥ / adyaprabhṛti putraṃ māṃ jānītaṃ daṃpatī yuvām // 10.10.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutvaitatsa sabhāryo 'pi pratyakṣībhūya tatkṣaṇam / yakṣastam abravīdbāḍhaṃ putra putrastvamāvayoḥ // 10.10.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asmastprasādānna ca te bhaviṣyati vipatkva cit / vivāde kalahe dyūte vijayī ca bhaviṣyasi // 10.10.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukvāntarhitaṃ yakṣaṃ taṃ praṇamyativāhya ca / rātrimatrāyayau pravrāṭ sa taṃ pāṭaliputrakam // 10.10.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra dvāḥsthamukhenāntas tasmai siṃhākṣabhūbhṛte / kaśmīrāgatam ātmānam ākhyāti sma sa vādinam // 10.10.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anujñātapraveśaś ca tenāsthāne mahībhujā / praviśyātra sthitānvādāyācikṣepa sa paṇḍitān // 10.10.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jitvā vādena tānyakṣavaramāhātmyato 'khilān / rājāgre sa punasteṣāṃ cakārākṣepamīdṛśam // 10.10.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
citrabhittervinirgatya gadācakradharaḥ pumān / daṣṭādharauṣṭhīṃ daśanaiḥ kṣatastanataṭāṃ nakhaiḥ // 10.10.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
kṛtvopabhujya rātrau māṃ tadbhittāveva līyate / etatkimiti vaḥ pṛcchāmyuttaraṃ me 'tra dīyatām // 10.10.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvā vaco nātra budhāḥ prativaco daduḥ / paramārthamajānānā anyonyānanadarśinaḥ // 10.10.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato rājā sa siṃhākṣaḥ svayam eva tam abravīt / yadetaduktaṃ bhavatā tadācakṣva tvam eva naḥ // 10.10.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
etac chrutvā sa rājñe 'smai pravrāṭ sarvaṃ śaśaṃsa tat / tadbhāryāvyājacaritaṃ yakṣādaśrāvi tena yat // 10.10.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
na tatkuryādabhiṣvaṅgaṃ pāpajñaptyekahetave / strībhiḥ kadācana janastamityūce nṛpaṃ ca saḥ // 10.10.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tuṣṭastasmai nijaṃ rājyaṃ rājā datumiyeṣa saḥ / sa tu svadeśaikarataḥ pravrāṭ tannāgrahīdyadā // 10.10.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tadā saṃmānayām āsa rājā ratnotkareṇa tam / āttaratnaḥ sa kaśmīrān pravrāṭ svaṃ deśam āgamat // 10.10.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra yakṣaprasādena sa nirdainyaḥ sukhaṃ sthitaḥ / ityākhyāya sa śiṣyastaṃ mahāmunim abhāṣata // 10.10.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ pravrājakāttasmādevaṃ tac chrutavāniti / tataḥ sa vismitaḥ sānyaśiṣyaściramabhūnmuniḥ // 10.10.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā gomukho bhūyo vatseśātmajam abravīt / evametāni kustrīṇāṃ ceṣṭitāni ca vedhasaḥ // 10.10.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vicitrāṇi sadā deva lokasya caritāni ca / iyaṃ ca śrūyatāmanyā nāryekādaśamārikā // 10.10.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
grāmavāsī pumānāsītkuṭumbī ko'pi mālave / tasyodapādi duhitā dvitriputrakanīyasī // 10.10.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tasyāṃ ca jātamātrāyāṃ bhāryā tasya vyapadyata / tato 'lpair divasais tasya putra eko vyapādi ca // 10.10.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasminvipanne bhrātāsya vṛṣaśṛṅgahato mṛtaḥ / so 'tha kanyāṃ kuṭumbī tāṃ nāmnā cakre trimārikām // 10.10.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
trayo 'nayā lakṣaṇayā jātayā māritā iti / kālena yauvanasthāṃ tāṃ pitustasmādayācata // 10.10.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
trimārikām āḍhyaputraḥ kaścit tadgrāmasaṃbhavaḥ / pitā ca tasmai prādāttāṃ sa yathāvat kṛtotsavaḥ // 10.10.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tena bhartrā sahāraṃsta kālaṃ kam apitatra sā / acirāc ca tatas tasyāḥ sa bhartā pañcatāmagāt // 10.10.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
divasair eva sā cānyaṃ capalā patimagrahīt / so 'py alpenaiva kālena vipattiṃ prāpa tatpatiḥ // 10.10.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sā yauvanonmattā tṛtīyaṃ patimādade / so 'pi tasyā vipanno 'bhūtpatighnyāḥ patiranyavat // 10.10.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ krameṇa patayo daśa tasyā vipedire / tato hāsyena sā nāmnā paprathe daśamārikā // 10.10.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
athānyabhartṛsvīkārāt pitrā hrītena vāritā / sā varjyamānā ca janais tasthau tasya pitur gṛhe // 10.10.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
ekadā ca viveśātra pāntho bhavyākṛtiryuvā / ekarātrinivāsārthaṃ tatpitrānumato 'tithiḥ // 10.10.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ dṛṣṭvā tadgatamanāḥ sābhavaddaśamārikā / pāntho 'pi taruṇīṃ dṛṣṭvā so 'bhūttadabhilāṣukaḥ // 10.10.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sā pāramuṣitatrapā pitaram abhyadhāt / ekametamahaṃ tāta vṛṇomi pathikaṃ patim // 10.10.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vipatsyate ced eṣo 'pi grahīṣyāmi tato vratam / evaṃ śṛṇvati pānthe tāṃ bruvatīṃ sa pitābravīt // 10.10.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
mā putri lajjā mahatī daśa te patayo mṛtāḥ / tad etasminn api mṛte hasiṣyatitarāṃ janaḥ // 10.10.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tac chrutvaiva trapāṃ tyaktvā pathiko 'pi jagāda saḥ / nāhaṃ mriye daśa mṛtāḥ kramādbhāryā mamāpi hi // 10.10.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
samāvāvāṃ śamāpyatra pādasparśena dhūrjaṭeḥ / ity ukte tena pānthena nācitrīyata tatra kaḥ // 10.10.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
buddhvā ca militair grāmyair dattānumatayā tayā / daśamārikayā so 'tha pathiko jagṛhe patiḥ // 10.10.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena sākaṃ ca yāvat sā kālaṃ kam apitiṣṭhati / tāvac chītajvarākrāntaḥ so 'pi tasyāḥ kṣayaṃ yayau // 10.10.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sā hāsinī grāvṇām apy ekādaśamārikā / vignā gaṅgātaṭaṃ gatvā pravrajyām eva śiśriye // 10.10.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā hasitaṃ vatsarājaputraṃ sa gomukhaḥ / bhūyo 'bravītkathāmanyāṃ śṛṇvimāṃ dāntajīvinaḥ // 10.10.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pumān kaścid daridro 'bhūd grāme kvāpi kuṭumbavān / eka eva balīvardas tasya cābhūd gṛhe dhanam // 10.10.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa niḥsattvo 'śanābhāvātsīdaty api kuṭumbake / sopavāso 'pi taṃ dāntaṃ vyakrīṇīta na lobhataḥ // 10.10.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā tu vindhyavāsinyāḥ purato darbhasaṃstare / patitvā sa tapaścakre nirāhāro 'rthakāmyayā // 10.10.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttiṣṭhaiko balīvardaḥ sarvadā dhanamasti te / atastam eva vikrīya jīviṣyasi sadā sukham // 10.10.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityādiṣṭastayā svapne devyā prātaḥ prabudhya saḥ / utthāya pāraṇaṃ kiṃcitkṛtvā svagṛhamāyayau // 10.10.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etyāpyadhīro vikretuṃ nokṣāṇaṃ taṃ śaśāka saḥ / vikrīte 'sminnahaṃ niḥsvo naiva varteya jātviti // 10.10.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha taṃ kathitasvapnadevyādeśaṃ prasaṅgataḥ / upavāsakṛśaṃ kaściduvāca sumatiḥ suhṛt // 10.10.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
eka evāsti dāntas te taṃ tvaṃ vikrīya sarvadā / jīviṣyasīti devyoktaṃ tajjñātaṃ mūḍha na tvayā // 10.10.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadvikrīyaitamukṣāṇaṃ nirvāhaya kuṭumbakam / tato bhaviṣyaty anyas te tataś cānyas tato 'paraḥ // 10.10.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ity uktastena mittreṇa grāmīṇaḥ sa tathākarot / ekaikavṛṣapaṇyāc ca jijīva satataṃ sukhī // 10.10.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ phalati sarvasya vidhiḥ sattvānusārataḥ / tatsusattvo bhavetsattvahīnaṃ na vṛṇate śriyaḥ // 10.10.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śṛṇutānyāṃ kathāṃ cemāṃ dhūrtasyālīkamantriṇaḥ / āsīt pṛthvīpatir nāma nagare dakṣiṇāpathe // 10.10.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadrāṣṭre ko 'py abhūddhūrtaḥ paravañcanajīvikaḥ / sa caikadā mahecchatvādasaṃtuṣṭo vyacintayat // 10.10.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dhūrtatvenedṛśā kiṃ me yadāhārādimātrakṛt / prāpyate mahatī yena śrīstādṛṅ na karomi kim // 10.10.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityālocya vaṇigveṣamatyudāraṃ vidhāya saḥ / upāsarpatpratīhāraṃ gatvā dvāraṃ mahīpateḥ // 10.10.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tanmukhena praviśyāntaḥ prābhṛtaṃ copanīya saḥ / ekānte me 'sti vijñaptiriti vyajñāpayannṛpam // 10.10.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājñāpi veṣabhrāntena prābhṛtāvarjitena ca / tatheti racitaikāntas tam evaṃ sa vyajijñapat // 10.10.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
dine dine mayā sākamāsthāne sarvasaṃnidhau / bhūtvaikānte kathālāpaṃ kṣaṇamekaṃ kuru prabho // 10.10.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvatāhaṃ pratidinaṃ dīnāraśatapañcakam / dadāmy upāyanaṃ devasyārthaye na tu kiṃcana // 10.10.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvācintayadrājā ko doṣaḥ kimayaṃ mama / gṛhītvā yāti dīnārāndadāti pratyutānvaham // 10.10.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mahatā vaṇijā sārdhaṃ kathālāpena kā trapā / iti sa pratipadyaitadrājā tasya kathākarot // 10.10.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi tasmai dadau rājñe dīnārāṃstānyathoditān / lokastaṃ ca mahāmantripadaṃ prāptamamanyata // 10.10.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekasmiṃś ca dine dhūrto muhuḥ paśyanniyoginaḥ / sākūtaṃ mukhamekasya cakre rājñā samaṃ kathām // 10.10.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nirgataś ca bahistena mukhālokanakāraṇam / etyādhikāriṇā pṛṣṭaḥ sa svair aṃ taṃ mṛṣāvadat // 10.10.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
deśo me luṇṭhito 'nenety evaṃ te kupito nṛpaḥ / mayātas te mukhaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śamayiṣyāmyahaṃ ca tam // 10.10.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktastena so 'līkamantriṇā sabhayo gṛham / āgatyādhikṛtaḥ svarṇasahasraṃ tasya dattavān // 10.10.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyedyuś ca samaṃ rājñā kathāṃ kṛtvā tathaiva saḥ / nirgatya dhūrto 'vādīttaṃ niyoginam upāgatam // 10.10.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
yuktiyuktermayā vākyaistava rājā prasāditaḥ / dhīro bhavādhunāhaṃ te sarvacchidreṣu rakṣakaḥ // 10.10.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti svīkṛtya taṃ yuktyā visasarja ca so 'pi tam / adhikārī sadā taistair upacārair upācarat // 10.10.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ krameṇa sarvebhyo niyogibhyaḥ sa buddhimān / rājabhyo rājaputrebhyaḥ sevakebhyaś ca yuktibhiḥ // 10.10.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bahvībhir ādadāno 'rthānarjayām āsa sarvataḥ / pañca koṭīḥ suvarṇasya kurvanrājā samaṃ kathāḥ // 10.10.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato rahasi rājānaṃ dhūrtamantrī jagāda saḥ / deva dattvāpi nityaṃ te dīnāraśatapañcakam // 10.10.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvatprasādānmayā prāptāḥ pañca kāñcanakoṭayaḥ / tatprasīda gṛhāṇaitastvaṃ svarṇamahamatra kaḥ // 10.10.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā prakaṭaṃ rājñe kanakaṃ tan nyavedayat / rājāpi kṛcchrāt tat tasya jagrāhārdhaṃ tato dhanāt // 10.10.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tuṣṭaś ca sthāpayāmāsa mahāmantripade sa tam / so 'pi prāpya śriyaṃ dhūrto dānabhogairamānayat // 10.10.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ prāpnoti mahataḥ prājño 'rthānnātipāpataḥ / kūpakhānakavatprāpte phale doṣaṃ nihanti ca // 10.10.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā gomukhaḥ prāha vatsarājasutaṃ punaḥ / ekām idānīm udvāhasotsukaḥ śṛṇv imāṃ kathām // 10.10.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
babhūva durmadārātikarīndrakulakesarī / ratnākarākhye nagare nāmnā buddhiprabho nṛpaḥ // 10.10.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
ratnarekhābhidhānāyāṃ rājñyāṃ tasyodapadyata / kanyā hemaprabhā nāma sarvalokaikasundarī // 10.10.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā ca vidyādharī śāpādavatīrṇā yadā tadā / nabhovihārasaṃskāramadāccikrīḍa dolayā // 10.10.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pātabhītyā niṣiddhāpi sā tato na cacāla yat / tattasyāḥ sa pitā rājā capeṭaṃ kupito dadau // 10.10.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvatā sāvamānena rājaputrī vanaiṣiṇī / vihāravyapadeśena jagāmopavanaṃ bahiḥ // 10.10.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pānamatteṣu bhṛtyeṣu saṃcarantī ca tatra sā / praviśya vṛkṣagahanaṃ teṣāṃ dṛṣṭipathādyayau // 10.10.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
gatvā caikākinī dūraṃ vanaṃ viracitoṭajā / phalamūlāśinī tasthau harārādhanatatparā // 10.10.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatpitāpi sa rājā tāṃ buddhvā kvāpi tato gatām / anviyeṣa na ca prāpa mahad duḥkham uvāha ca // 10.10.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
cirāt kiṃcit tanūbhūtaduḥkhaś cittaṃ vinodayan / buddhiprabhaḥ sa niragān mṛgayāyai mahīpatiḥ // 10.10.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
bhramaṃś ca daivāt tat prāpa sudūraṃ sa vanāntaram / tapasyantī sutā sāsya yatra hemaprabhā sthitā // 10.10.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
uṭajaṃ tatra dṛṣṭvā sa rājābhyetya tadantare / aśaṅkitaṃ tapaḥkṣāmāṃ tāṃ dadarśa nijāṃ sutām // 10.10.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpi dṛṣṭvā tam utthāya pādayoḥ sahasāgrahīt / āliṅgya sa pitā tāṃ ca sāśrur aṅke nyaveśayat // 10.10.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tau cānyonyaṃ cirāddṛṣṭvā tathā rurudatus tataḥ / udaśravo yathā tatra vane 'bhūvanmṛgā api // 10.10.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ śanaiḥ samāśvāsya rājāvocatsa tāṃ sutām / tyaktvā rājaśriyaṃ putri kimidaṃ vihitaṃ tvayā // 10.10.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadehi jananīpārśvaṃ vanavāsamimaṃ tyaja / ityūcivāṃsaṃ janakaṃ sā taṃ hemaprabhābhyadhāt // 10.10.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
daivenaiva niyuktāsmi śaktistāta mamātra kā / nacaiṣyāmi gṛhaṃ bhoktuṃ na tyajāmi tapaḥsukham // 10.10.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti bruvāṇā sā tasmānniścayānna cacāla yat / tadrājākārayat tasyā vane tatraiva mandiram // 10.10.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā ca rājadhānīṃ svāṃ preṣayām āsa so 'nvaham / tasyā atithipūjārthaṃ pakvānnāni dhanāni ca // 10.10.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā ca hemaprabhā tatra dhanair annaiś ca taiḥ sadā / pūjayantyatithīnāsītphalamūlāśinī svayam // 10.10.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā cāyayau tasyā rājaputryāstamāśramam / pravrājikaikā bhrāmyantī kaumārabrahmacāriṇī // 10.10.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sa tayābhyarcitā hemaprabhayā svakathāntare / pravrajyākāraṇaṃ pṛṣṭvā bālapravrājikābravīt // 10.10.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃvāhayantī caraṇāv ahaṃ kanyā satī pituḥ / sīdatkarayugābhūvaṃ nidrākulitalocanā // 10.10.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ nidrāsīti pādena tataḥ pitrāhamāhatā / tanmanyunā pravrajitā nirgatyaivāsmi tadgṛhāt // 10.10.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
iti pravrājikām uktavatīṃ hemaprabhātha sā / samānaśīlaprītā tāṃ vanavāsasakhī vyadhāt // 10.10.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ekadā tāmavocatsā prātaḥ pravrājikāṃ sakhīm / sakhi svapne 'dya jāne 'hamuttīrṇā vipulāṃ nadīm // 10.10.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ārūḍhāsmi tataḥ śvetaṃ gajaṃ tadanu parvatam / tatrāśrame mayā dṛṣṭo bhagavānambikāpatiḥ // 10.10.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadagre prāpya vīṇāṃ ca gāyanty ahamavādayam / tato 'drākṣaṃ ca puruṣaṃ divyākāram upāgatam // 10.10.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
taṃ dṛṣṭvā ca tvayā sākamahamutpatitā nabhaḥ / iyaddṛṣṭvā prabuddhāsmi vyatikrāntā ca yāminī // 10.10.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvaiva tāṃ hemaprabhāmāha sma mā sakhī / śāpāvatīrṇā kāpi tvaṃ divyā kalyāṇi niścitam // 10.10.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
pratyāsannaṃ ca śāpāntaṃ tava svapno vadatyasau / śrutvaitadabhyanandatsā rājaputrī sakhīvacaḥ // 10.10.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato bhūyiṣṭhamudite jagaddīpe divākare / āyayau turagārūḍho rājaputro 'tra kaścana // 10.10.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tāṃ hemaprabhāṃ dṛṣṭvā tāpasīveṣadhāriṇīm / jātaprītirupāgatya vavande muktavāhanaḥ // 10.10.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpi taṃ racitātithyā kṛtāsanaparigraham / saṃjātapraṇayāprākṣīn mahātman ko bhavān iti // 10.10.168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājaputro 'tha so 'vādīnmahābhāge mahīpatiḥ / pratāpasena ityasti śubhanāmānukīrtanaḥ // 10.10.169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tapyamānaḥ putrārthaṃ harasyārādhanaṃ tapaḥ / tenādiśyata devena prādurbhūya prasādinā // 10.10.170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidyādharāvatāras te putra eko bhaviṣyati / sa ca śāpakṣaye lokaṃ nijam eva prapatsyate // 10.10.171	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dvitīyastu suto bhāvī vaṃśarajyadharastava / ity uktaḥ śaṃbhunotthāya hṛṣṭaścakre sa pāraṇam // 10.10.172	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kālena jātas tasyaiko lakṣmīsenābhidhaḥ sutaḥ / śūrasenābhidhānaś ca dvitīyo nṛpateḥ kramāt // 10.10.173	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadimaṃ māṃ vijānīhi lakṣmīsenaṃ varānane / ānītam iha vātāśvenākṛṣyākheṭanirgatam // 10.10.174	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktā tena sāpy uktvā svodantaṃ tasya pṛcchataḥ / sadyo hemaprabhā jātiṃ smṛtvā hṛṣṭā jagāda tam // 10.10.175	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvayi dṛṣṭe mayā jātir vidyābhiḥ saha saṃsmṛtā / sākaṃ sakhyānayā śāpacyutā vidyādharī hy aham // 10.10.176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvaṃ ca vidyādharaḥ śāpacyutaḥ svasacivānvitaḥ / bhartā me tvaṃ ca matsakhyā asyāstvatsacivaś ca saḥ // 10.10.177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣīṇaś ca sasakhīkāyāḥ sa śāpo mama sāṃpratam / loke vaidyādhare bhūyaḥ sarveṣāṃ naḥ samāgamaḥ // 10.10.178	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktā divyarūpatvaṃ prāpya sakhyā samaṃ tayā / hemaprabhā khamutpatya sā svalokamagāttadā // 10.10.179	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
lakṣmīsenaś ca yāvat sa sāścaryo 'tra sthitaḥ kṣaṇāt / tāvat sa sacivas tasya cinvāno mārgamāyayau // 10.10.180	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmai sa rājaputraś ca sakhye yāvadbravīti tat / tāvadbuddhiprabho 'pyāgātsa rājā svasutotsukaḥ // 10.10.181	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'dṛṣṭvaiva sutāṃ dṛṣṭvā lakṣmīsenasḥ samantrikaḥ / smṛtvā śāpakṣayājjātiṃ svalokaṃ nabhasā yayau // 10.10.182	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
tato buddhiprabhe vigne lakṣmīsenaḥ samantrikaḥ / smṛtvā śāpakṣayāj jātiṃ khalokaṃ nabhasā yayau // 10.10.183	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāpya hemaprabhāṃ bhāryāmāgatya ca tayā saha / buddhiprabhaṃ tamāmantrya vyasṛjatsa nijaṃ puram // 10.10.184	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā ca prāptabhāryeṇa tena sakhyā samaṃ tataḥ / pitre pratāpasenāya svavṛttāntamavarṇayat // 10.10.185	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena dattaṃ kramaprāptaṃ rājyaṃ dattvānujanmane / śūrasenāya sa yayau vaidyādharapuraṃ nijam // 10.10.186	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatra vidyādharaiśvaryasukhaṃ hemaprabhāyutaḥ / lakṣmīsenaḥ sa bhuṅkte sma sakhyā tenānvitaściram // 10.10.187	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
itthaṃ kathā nigaditāḥ kila gomukhena śṛṇvan kramāt sa naravāhanadattadevaḥ / āsannavartinavaśaktiyaśovivāhasūtko 'pi tāṃ kṣaṇam iva kṣaṇadāṃ nināya // 10.10.188	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
evaṃ vinodya ca dināni sa rājaputraḥ prāpte vivāhadivase piturantikasthaḥ / vatseśvarasya nabhasaḥ sahasāvatīrṇaṃ vaidyādharaṃ tapanadīpti balaṃ dadarśa // 10.10.189	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
tanmadhye ca svakaduhitaraṃ ditsitāṃ tāṃ gṛhītvā prītyā prāptaṃ sphaṭikayaśasaṃ vīkṣya vidyādharendram / pratyudgamya śvaśura iti taṃ pūjayām āsa harṣādvatseśena prathamavihitātithyamarghyādinā saḥ // 10.10.190	mandākrāntā [17: mBnttgg]
so 'pyāvedya yathārthamambaracarādhīśaḥ kṣaṇātkalpitā śeṣasvocitadivyavaibhavavidhiḥ siddhiprabhāvāttataḥ / ratnaughapratipūritāya vidhivadvatseśaputrāya tāṃ tasmai svāṃ vitatāra śaktiyaśasaṃ pūrvapradiṣṭāṃ sutām // 10.10.191	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
sa ca naravāhanadatto bhāryāṃ vidyādharendratanayāṃ tām / saṃprāpya śaktiyaśasaṃ padma ivārkadyutiṃ vyarucat // 10.10.192	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
sphaṭikayaśasyupayāte kauśāmbyāṃ puri sa vatsarājasutaḥ / śaktiyaśovadanāmbujasaktekṣaṇaṣaṭpadas tadā tasthau // 10.10.193	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
idaṃ gurugirīndrajāpraṇayamandarāndolanāt purā kila kathāmṛtaṃ haramukhāmbudher udgatam / prasahya rasayanti ye vigatavighnalabdharddhayo dhuraṃ dadhati vaibudhīṃ bhuvi bhavaprasādena te // 11.0.1	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
namatāśeṣavighnaughavāraṇaṃ vāraṇānanam / kāraṇaṃ sarvasiddhīnāṃ duritārṇavatāraṇam // 11.1.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ sa śaktiyaśasaṃ prāpyānyāḥ prathamāś ca tāḥ / ratnaprabhādyā devīṃ ca mukhyāṃ madanamañcukām // 11.1.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
atiṣṭhadviharanvatsayuvarājaḥ suhṛdyutaḥ / naravāhanadatto 'tha kauśāmbyāṃ pitṛpārśvagaḥ // 11.1.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

vicaranmunikanyāyāṃ tasyāṃ cādrākṣamekataḥ / kanyāṃ liṅgārcanavyagrāṃ vanaveṣe 'pi śobhinīm // 11.1.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

iti māṃ cintayantaṃ sa saiveyamiti dakṣiṇam / locanaṃ vadati smaivaṃ sāhlādaṃ prasphuranmuhuḥ // 11.1.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tanvi prāsādavāsārhā tvamaraṇye 'tra kā vada / iti pṛṣṭā tataḥ sā ca mayā nāha sma kiṃcana // 11.1.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
muniśāpabhayenātha latāgulmāntarāśritaḥ / sthitavānasmi tāṃ paśyannavitṛptena cakṣuṣā // 11.1.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtārcanā sā ca muhuḥ sasnehaṃ parivṛtya mām / paśyantī vimṛśantī ca kiṃcitprāyāttataḥ śanaiḥ // 11.1.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatāyāṃ dṛkpathāttasyāṃ tamondhā paśyato diśaḥ / niśācakrāhvasadṛśī kāpyavasthā mamābhavat // 11.1.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
kṣaṇāccāśaṅkitāyātāṃ tejasārkaprabhānibhām / sutāṃ mataṅgasya munerābālyādbrahmacāriṇīm // 11.1.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
yamunākhyāṃ tapaḥ kṣāmaśarīrāṃ divyacakṣuṣam / sākṣāddhṛtimivāpaśyamahaṃ kalyāṇadarśanām // 11.1.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā māmavadadālambya candrasāra dhṛtiṃ śṛṇu / śikharākhyo vaṇigyo 'sāvasti dvīpāntare mahān // 11.1.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa rūpavatyāṃ jātāyāṃ kanyāyāṃ suhṛdā kila / jinarakṣitasaṃjñena jñānināvādi bhikṣuṇā // 11.1.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
svayaṃ tvayā na deyeyaṃ kanyaiṣā hy anyamātṛkā / doṣaḥ syātte svayaṃ dāne vihitaṃ tādṛśaṃ hitam // 11.1.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukto bhikṣuṇā so 'tha tāṃ pradeyāṃ sutāṃ vaṇik / tanmātāmahahastena dātum aicchat tvadarthitām // 11.1.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ataḥ sā siṃhaladvīpaṃ tena mātāmahāntikam / pitrā visṛṣṭā vahane bhagne nyapatadambudhau // 11.1.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
āyurbaleva cānīya daiveneva mahormiṇā / velātaṭe samudreṇa nikṣiptā sā vaṇiksutā // 11.1.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvat pitā me bhagavānmataṅgamunirambudhau / saśiṣyaḥ snātumāyāto mṛtakalpāṃ dadarśa tām // 11.1.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa dayāluḥ samāśvāsya tāṃ svamāśramamānayat / yamune tava pālyeyamiti ca nyastavānmayi // 11.1.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

āpāṇigrahaṇāṃ tāṃ ca navayauvanaśobhinīm / dūyate candrasāraitāṃ darśaṃ darśaṃ mano mama // 11.1.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā ca prāgjanmabhāryā te buddhvā ca tvām ihāgatam / praṇidhānādahaṃ putra saṃprāptaiṣā tavāntikam // 11.1.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadāgacchopayacchasva velāṃ tāmasmadarpitām / kleśo 'nubhūtaḥ sāphalyaṃ bhajatāṃ yuvayor ayam // 11.1.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ityānandya girānabhravṛṣṭyeva nayati sma sā / yamunā māṃ bhagavatī mataṅgasyāśramaṃ pituḥ // 11.1.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
vijñaptaś ca tayā tatra tāṃ mataṅgamuniḥ sa me / dadau velāṃ manorājyasaṃpattim iva rūpiṇīm // 11.1.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tayā samaṃ tatra velayāhaṃ sukhasthitaḥ / ekadā tadyuto 'kārṣaṃ jalakeliṃ sarombhasi // 11.1.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apaśyatā savelenāpyavelaṃ kṣipatā jalam / siktaḥ snānapravṛtto 'tra sa mataṅgamunirmayā // 11.1.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tena kupitaḥ śāpaṃ sabhārye mayyapātayat / viyogo bhavitā pāpau daṃpatyoryuvayor iti // 11.1.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tayā dīnagirā velayā pādalagnayā / prārthitaḥ sa munirdhyātvā śāpāntaṃ nau samādiśat // 11.1.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
jetā kareṇuvegena yo 'śvaratnayugaṃ balī / naravāhanadattaṃ taṃ bhāvividyādhareśvaram // 11.1.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
candrasāra yadā drakṣyasyārādvatseśvarātmajam / saṃgaṃsyase tadā śāpāpraśamādbhāryayānayā // 11.1.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā sa mataṅgarṣiḥ kṛtvā snānādikāṃ kriyām / darśanāya harervyomnā śvetadvīpaṃ gato 'bhavat // 11.1.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

svayaṃ cāroḍhumicchāmi yāvattāvat samīraṇaḥ / muniśāpātsuhṛtpotaṃ taṃ dūramaharanmama // 11.1.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tato 'tra tāpasaḥ kaścidāgato vīkṣya mūrcchitam / kṛpayā māṃ samāśvāsya nītavānāśramaṃ śanaiḥ // 11.1.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pṛṣṭvā cātra yathāvṛttaṃ śrutvā śāpavijṛmbhitam / buddhvā ca sāvadhiṃ śāpaṃ dhṛtibandhaṃ vyadhātsa me // 11.1.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'bdhau bhagnavahanottīrṇaṃ prāpya vaṇigvaram / sakhāyaṃ milito 'bhūvamanviṣyaṃstāṃ priyāṃ punaḥ // 11.1.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
śāpakṣayāśayā dattahastālambaś ca durgamān / tāṃstānullaṅghayandeśāndivasāṃś ca bahūnaham // 11.1.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kramāc ca vaiśākhapuraṃ saṃprāpyedaṃ śruto mayā / tvaṃ vatseśvarasadvaṃśamukāmaṇirihāgataḥ // 11.1.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭe ca dūrād dhastinyā vijitāśvayuge tvayi / ujjhitaḥ sa mayā śāpabhāro laghvantarātmanā // 11.1.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣaṇāc ca saṃmukhāyātāmadrākṣamiha tāṃ priyām / velāṃ vaṇigbhir ānītāṃ tena potena sādhubhiḥ // 11.1.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tayāhaṃ yamunāprattasadratnahastayā / militastvatprasādena tīrṇaśāpamahārṇavaḥ // 11.1.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ataḥ praṇantuṃ tvāmasmi vatsarājasutāgataḥ / nirvṛto yāmi cedānīṃ svadeśaṃ dayitāyutaḥ // 11.1.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti sa vaṇiji tasminn ātmavṛttāntam uktvā gatavati caritārthe candrasāre praṇamya / abhavad ativinamro vatsarājātmaje 'smin sa kila ruciradevo dṛṣṭamāhātmyahṛṣṭaḥ // 11.1.112	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
prādāc ca tāṃ svabhaginīm upacāravṛttim ālambya yuktimanurāgahṛtāya tasmai / prāgditsitāṃ susadṛśīṃ sa jayendrasenāṃ sadyaḥ kareṇuturagottamayugmayuktām // 11.1.113	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
sa ca tāmādāya vadhūṃ sāśvavaśāṃ ruciradevamāmantrya / naravāhanadattaḥ svāṃ kauśāmbīmāyayau nagarīm // 11.1.114	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
tasyāmāsta ca viharannanditavatseśvarastayā sahitaḥ / anyābhiś ca sa sukhito devībhir madanamañcukādyābhiḥ // 11.1.115	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
idaṃ gurugirīndrajāpraṇayamandarāndolanāt purā kila kathāmṛtaṃ haramukhāmbudher udgatam / prasahya rasayanti ye vigatavighnalabdharddhayo dhuraṃ dadhati vaibudhīṃ bhuvi bhavaprasādena te // 12.0.1	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
avyādvo vighnavidhvaṃsakīrtistambhamivotkṣipan / karaṃ gaṇapatiḥ krīḍālīnabhṛṅgākṣarāvalim // 12.1.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

bahubhāryo 'pi tāmādyāṃ daivīṃ madanamañcukām / prāṇebhyo 'py adhikāṃ mene rukmiṇīm iva mādhavaḥ // 12.1.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tac chrutveva taduddhātāsmṛtvā nirvrīḍayantraṇam / rūpaṃ taddayitāyāḥ sā tasyāḥ kṛtvāliliṅga tam // 12.1.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa netre unmīlya dṛṣṭvā tāṃ svapriyākṛtim / aho vijñānamity uktvā kaṇṭhe jagrāha sasmitaḥ // 12.1.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sātha hitvā trapāṃ rūpaṃ svaṃ pradarśya jagāda tam / āryaputra gṛhāṇemāṃ māmidānīṃ svayaṃvarām // 12.1.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktavatīṃ tāṃ ca pariṇinye sa kanyakām / naravāhanadatto 'tra gāndharvavidhinā tadā // 12.1.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nītvātha tatra tāṃ rātriṃ yathāvatsa tayā saha / prātastāṃ dayitāṃ yuktyā kulajijñāsayābhyadhāt // 12.1.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
priye śṛṇu kathāmetāmapūrvāṃ kathayāmi te / brahmasiddhiriti kvāpi munirāsīttapovane // 12.1.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāśramasamīpe ca yogasiddhasya sanmuneḥ / abhūcchṛgālī jaratī guhāyāṃ vihitāspadā // 12.1.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
