ekadā rājasevārthaṃ sthitas tatkaṭake ca saḥ / gṛhādetya pitṛvyena nijena jagade rahaḥ // 12.1.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
naṣṭamasmatkulaṃ putra yato bhāryā mayā tava / dṛṣṭā mahiṣapālena tvadīyenaiva saṃgatā // 12.1.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etat pitṛvyād ākarṇya kaṭake taṃ niveśya ca / sa vāmadattaḥ khaḍgaikasakhaḥ svagṛhamāyayau // 12.1.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatra guptaṃ sthito yāvat puṣpārāme praviśya saḥ / naktamāgātsa tatraiva tāvanmahiṣapālakaḥ // 12.1.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣaṇāc ca tam upāgātsā tatropapatimutsukā / tadbhāryā vividhāhārahastā mahiṣapālakam // 12.1.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato bhuktavatā tena sākaṃ sā śasyanaṃ yayau / taddṛṣṭvā vāmadatto 'sau so 'bhyadhāvadudāyudhaḥ // 12.1.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āḥ pāpau gacchathaḥ kveti vadatas tasya gehinī / sā dṛṣṭvotthāya dhigjālmety uktvā dhūliṃ mukhe nyadhāt // 12.1.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadā sa mānuṣo 'pyāśu mahiṣaḥ samapadyata / vāmadattaḥ smṛtistvasya tadbhāve na vyalupyata // 12.1.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato mahiṣamadhye sā nikṣipya laguḍaiḥ śaṭhā / bhāryā mahiṣapālena tāḍayām āsa tena tam // 12.1.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadaiva taṃ ca kasyāpi vaṇijo mahiṣārthinaḥ / vikrīṇīte sma sā krūrā tiryaktvavivaśīkṛtam // 12.1.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tenāropitabhāro 'tha mahiṣībhāvapīḍitaḥ / sa vāmadatto nīto 'bhūdgrāmaṃ gaṅgāsamīpagam // 12.1.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
viśvas tasya gṛhe bhāryā sudurvṛttāpyatarkitā / kakṣāntarapraviṣṭeva bhujagī kasya śarmaṇe // 12.1.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti taṃ cintayantaṃ ca tatrodvāṣpaṃ suduḥkhitam / bhārakleśāsthiśeṣāṅgamapaśyatkāpi yoginī // 12.1.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā buddhvā jñānataḥ sarvaṃ tadvṛttāntaṃ kṛpākulā / mantratoyena siktvā taṃ mahiṣatvādamocayat // 12.1.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāptamānuṣarūpāya saiva nītvā nijaṃ gṛham / tasmai kāntimatīṃ nāma kanyāṃ duhitaraṃ dadau // 12.1.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ebhir āhatya durbhāryāmādyāṃ tāṃ vaḍavāṃ kuru / ity uktvā pradadau cāsmai sarṣapānabhimantritān // 12.1.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa tāṃ kāntimatīṃ bhāryāmādāya nūtanām / svagṛhaṃ vāmadattastadājagāma sasarṣapaḥ // 12.1.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
hatvā mahiṣapālaṃ taṃ tatra kṛtvā ca sarṣapaiḥ / vaḍavāmādyabhāryāṃ tāṃ śālābaddhāṃ vyadhatta saḥ // 12.1.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dattvā ca pratyahaṃ tasyai laguḍāhatisaptakam / sa cakre bhojanaṃ baddhapratijño vairaśuddhaye // 12.1.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ tatra sthitasyāsya kāntimatyā samaṃ punaḥ / bhāryayā vāmadattasya ko 'pyāgādatithirgṛhe // 12.1.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhoktuṃ tasmin pravṛtte ca so 'bhuktvā niryayau drutam / vāmadattaḥ smṛtādattakubhāryālaguḍāhatiḥ // 12.1.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dattvā ca tasyai vaḍavārūpāyai laguḍāhatīḥ / niyatās tāḥ praviśyātra bubhuje jātanirvṛtiḥ // 12.1.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'tithir vismitaḥ sa taṃ papraccha sakautukaḥ / tyaktāhāraḥ kva yāto 'bhūtsaṃbhrameṇa bhavāniti // 12.1.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa vāmadatto 'tra tasmāyatithaye 'bravīt / tamā mūlātsvavṛttāntamatha so 'pi tam abhyadhāt // 12.1.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
durgraheṇa kim etena paśutvaṃ te hṛtaṃ yayā / tām evārādhya svaśvaśrūṃ pakarṣaṃ kaṃcid āhara // 12.1.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
ity ukto 'tithinā tena vāmadattas tatheti tat / śraddhāya so 'tithiṃ prātaḥ satkṛtya visasarja tam // 12.1.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athākasmādgṛhāyātāṃ śvaśrūṃ tāṃ siddhayoginīm / anugrahārthī so 'bhyarcya prārthayām āsa yatnataḥ // 12.1.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sātha yogeśvarī tasmai sabhāryāya yathāvidhi / kālasaṃkarṣiṇīṃ vidyāṃ dīkṣāpūrvam upādiśat // 12.1.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ śrīparvataṃ gatvā sa vidyāṃ tāmasādhayat / sā ca siddhā satī sākṣāttasmai khaḍgottamaṃ dadau // 12.1.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāptakhaḍgaś ca saṃpannaḥ sa tayā bhāryayā saha / kāntimatyā kṛtī vāmadatto vidyādharottamaḥ // 12.1.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato rajatakūṭākhye śṛṅge malayabhūbhṛtaḥ / kṛtaṃ puravaraṃ tena nijasiddhiprabhāvataḥ // 12.1.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vidyādharendrasya tatra kālena kanyakā / tasyāṃ patnyāṃ samutpannā nāmnā lalitalocanā // 12.1.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jātamātraiva yā vidyādharasaccakravartinaḥ / bhāryā bhavitrī nirdiṣṭā gaganodbhūtayā girā // 12.1.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tāmāryaputra māṃ viddhi viditārthāṃ svavidyayā / anuraktāṃ tavānetrīmasminsve malayācale // 12.1.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityākhyātakulāṃ tāṃ buddhvā vidyādharīṃ sa bahu mene / naravāhanadatto 'tha prītamanā lalitalocanāṃ bhāryām // 12.1.72	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
āsta ca tatra tayā saha saṃprati taṃ cāsya vatsarājādyāḥ / ratnaprabhādividyāvibhavādvṛttāntam adhijagmuḥ // 12.1.73	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
tatastāṃ nūtanāṃ prāpya bhāryāṃ lalitalocanām / naravāhanadattaḥ sa tasminmalayaparvate // 12.2.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
madhupravṛttisubhage vijahāra tayā saha / teṣu teṣu vanānteṣu puṣpitadrumaśobhiṣu // 12.2.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekasmiṃś ca vane krīḍākusumāvacayakramāt / tasyāṃ priyāyāṃ gahane gatāyāṃ dṛṣṭigocarāt // 12.2.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
saṃcaransa dadarśaikaṃ mahadacchajalaṃ saraḥ / satārakamivākāśaṃ puṣpaistīratarucyutaiḥ // 12.2.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
puṣpāṇy uccinvatī yāvan na samabhyeti sā priyā / tāvat snātvā sarasy asmin kṣaṇam āse sarastaṭe // 12.2.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti saṃcintya sa snātvā kṛtadevārcano 'tra ca / sacandanatarucchāyam adhyāste sma śilātalam // 12.2.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrastho rājahaṃsīnāṃ dṛṣṭvā tatsadṛśīṃ gatim / śrutvā tannibhamālāpaṃ pikīnāṃ cūtavalliṣu // 12.2.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vilokya hariṇīnāṃ ca tannetrābhe vilocane / dūrasthāṃ tāṃ sa sasmāra priyāṃ madanamañcukām // 12.2.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
smṛtvaivodbhūtakāmāgnisaṃtaptaś ca mumūrccha saḥ / tatkṣaṇaṃ cāyayau snātuṃ tatraiko punipuṃgavaḥ // 12.2.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa piśaṅgajaṭo nāma tadavasthamavekṣya tam / asiñcatsvapriyāsparśatulyaiścandanavāribhiḥ // 12.2.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ prabuddhaṃ praṇataṃ divyadṛṣṭiḥ sa taṃ muniḥ / uvāca putra prāpnoṣi yatheṣṭaṃ dhair yamāpnuhi // 12.2.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tena hi prāpyate sasrvaṃ tathā caitya madāśramam / kathāṃ mṛgāṅkadattīyāṃ mattaḥ śṛṇu na cecchrutā // 12.2.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā sa muniḥ snātvā nināya nijamāśramam / naravāhanadattaṃ taṃ cakre ca tvarayāhnikam // 12.2.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtvātithyaṃ phalais tasya tatra bhuktaphalaḥ svayam / sa piṅgalajaṭo vaktuṃ kathāṃ tasmai pracakrame // 12.2.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
astyayodhyeti nagarī bhuvanastrayaviśrutā / tasyāmamaradattākhyaḥ pūrvamāsīnmahīpatiḥ // 12.2.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya nityānuraktaikā pradīptataratejasaḥ / bhāryā vahneriva svāhā babhūva surataprabhā // 12.2.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāṃ mṛgāṅkadattākhyaḥ sutastasyodapadyata / svakodaṇḍa ivābhūdyaḥ koṭiprāptaguṇānataḥ // 12.2.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyābhavaṃś ca sacivā rājasūnornijā daśa / pracaṇḍaśaktiḥ sa sthūlabāhurvikramakesarī // 12.2.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
dṛḍhamuṣṭir meghabalas tathā bhīmaparākramaḥ / tadvad vimalabuddhiś ca vyāghrasenaguṇākarau // 12.2.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
vicitrakathasaṃjñaś ca daśamas te ca satkulāḥ / sarve yuvānaḥ śūrāś ca prājñāḥ prabhuhitaiṣiṇaḥ // 12.2.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
taiḥ samaṃ sa sukhaṃ tiṣṭhanrājaputraḥ pitur gṛhe / mṛgāṅkadattaḥ sadṛśīṃ na bhāryāṃ tāvadāptavān // 12.2.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
ekadā ca rahasyeko mantrī bhīmaparākramaḥ / tamāha śrūyatāṃ deva rātrau vṛttaṃ mamādya yat // 12.2.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ prāsādasupto 'dya prabuddho 'śaṅkitaṃ niśi / vajrogranakharaṃ siṃham apaśyam abhidhāvitam // 12.2.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
utthite churikāhas te mayi so 'tha palāyitum / siṃhaḥ prāvartatāhaṃ ca tam evānvapataṃ javāt // 12.2.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca gatvā nadīpāraṃ prasārya rasanāṃ mayi / āsīdahaṃ ca tāmasya dīrghāṃ churikayācchidam // 12.2.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tayaiva setupṛthvyā ca yāvattīrṇo 'smi tāṃ nadīm / tāvat sa siṃhaḥ sumahānsaṃpanno vikṛtaḥ pumān // 12.2.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
ko bhavāniti pṛṣṭaś ca mayā sa puruṣo 'bravīt / vetālo 'haṃ tvayā vīra sattvenāsmi ca toṣitaḥ // 12.2.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvāhaṃ tamaprākṣaṃ yadyevaṃ tattvayocyatām / bhāryā mṛgāṅkadattasya kā bhaviṣyati me prabhoḥ // 12.2.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etanmadvacanaṃ śrutvā sa vetālo 'bravīttadā / asyujjayinyāṃ nṛpatiḥ karmasena iti śrutaḥ // 12.2.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tasyāsti tanayā rājño lāvaṇyanyakkṛtāpsarāḥ / nidhānabhūmiḥ saundaryasargasyeva prajāpateḥ // 12.2.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sā śaśāṅkavatī nāma bhāryā tasya bhaviṣyati / tvatprabhustadavāptyā ca pṛthvīrājyaṃ kariṣyati // 12.2.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā sa tiro 'bhūnme vetālo 'haṃ tathaiva ca / āgato gṛhamityetanniśi vṛttaṃ mama prabho // 12.2.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etanmṛgāṅkadatto 'sau śrutvā bhīmaparākramāt / āhūya śrāvayām āsa sarvāṃstānnijamantriṇaḥ // 12.2.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jagāda caitāñ śṛṇuta svapne dṛṣṭaṃ mayā ca yat / jāne mahāṭavīṃ kāṃcit praviṣṭā nikhilā vayam // 12.2.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrādhvatṛṣitāḥ kṛcchrātprāpya toyaṃ pipāsavaḥ / ruddhāḥ smaḥ sāyudhaiḥ puṃbhistata utthāya pañcabhiḥ // 12.2.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tān hatvā punar icchāmaḥ pātuṃ yāvat tṛṣāturāḥ / tāvan na tatra puṃsas tān apaśyāma na tajjalam // 12.2.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ kṛcchrāṃ daśāṃ prāptāścandrojjvalamaśaṅkitam / vṛṣabhārūḍhamāyāntamaikṣāmahi maheśvaram // 12.2.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'smāsu praṇateṣv akṣṇo dakṣiṇādaśruṇaḥ kaṇam / bhūmāv apātayatso 'tra samudraḥ samapadyata // 12.2.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmānmuktāvalīṃ prāptāṃ śubhāṃ baddhvā mayā gale / pīto raktānuliptena nṛkapālena so 'mbudhiḥ // 12.2.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkṣaṇaṃ ca prabuddho 'smi prayātā ca vibhāvarī / evaṃ mṛgāṅkadattena svapnāścarye nivedite // 12.2.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mantrī vimalabuddhistaṃ nandatsvanyeṣv abhāṣata / tvaṃ deva dhanyo yasyaivaṃ vihitānugraho haraḥ // 12.2.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
svapne muktāvalīṃ labdhvā yatpītaś ca tvayāmbudhiḥ / tacchaśāṅkavatīṃ prāpya bhoktāsi pṛthivīṃ dhruvam // 12.2.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyan manāk tu kleśāyety ukte vimalabuddhinā / tato mṛgāṅkadattas tān uvāca sacivān punaḥ // 12.2.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
yathā phalaṃ me svapnasya yathā bhīmaparākramaḥ / śrutavāniha vetālāt tathā yady api bhāvi tat // 12.2.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathāpi karmasenasya baladurgābhimāninaḥ / prajñābalānmayā prāpyā sā śaśāṅkavatī sutā // 12.2.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prajñābalaṃ ca sarveṣu mukhyaṃ kāryeṣu sādhanam / tathā ca śṛṇutātraitāṃ kathāṃ vaḥ kathayāmy aham // 12.2.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhadrabāhurabhūnnāmnā magadheṣu mahīpatiḥ / tasyāsīnmantraguptākhyo mantrī buddhimatāṃ varaḥ // 12.2.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa rājā taṃ nijāmātyaṃ kadācitsvair am abravīt / anaṅgalīleti sutā rājño vārāṇasīpateḥ // 12.2.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
asti yā dharmagopasya jagattritayasundarī / tāmārthito 'pi dveṣānme na sa rājā prayacchati // 12.2.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
dantino bhadradantasya prabhāvātsa ca durjayaḥ / notsahe jīvituṃ cāhaṃ tayā tatsutayā vinā // 12.2.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad atra nāstyupāyo me sakhe kiṃ kāryamucyatām / iti tenodite rājñā sa mantrī nijagāda tam // 12.2.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ deva vikramādeva siddhirasti na buddhitaḥ / tadalaṃ cintayāhaṃ te svabuddhyā sādhayāmyadaḥ // 12.2.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā nṛpamanyedyuḥ pañcasaptānugānvitaḥ / mahāvratikaveṣaḥ sanmantrī vārāṇasīṃ yayau // 12.2.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra taṃ śiṣyaveṣāste siddho 'yamiti sarvataḥ / svānugāḥ khyāpayāmāsurbhaktiprahvamilajjanam // 12.2.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā ca niśi bhrāmyan kāryayuktyupalabdhaye / sānugaḥ sa dadarśātra dūrād gṛhavinirgatām // 12.2.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gṛhiṇīṃ hastipālasya śaṅkātvaritagāminīm / nīyamānāṃ tricaturaiḥ puruṣaiḥ kvāpi sāyudhaiḥ // 12.2.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
dhruvaṃ vyutthāya yāteyaṃ tatpaśyāmaḥ kva gacchati / iti saṃcintya sa svair aṃ sānugo 'nusasāra tām // 12.2.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā praviṣṭā sā yatra tac ca gehaṃ vidūrataḥ / dṛṣṭvā nivāsasthānaṃ svam ājagāma tadaiva saḥ // 12.2.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
prātaś ca hastipālasya hṛtārthā tāṃ gatāṃ priyām / cinvānasyāntikaṃ yuktyā prāhiṇodbhramato 'nugān // 12.2.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
te taṃ dṛṣṭvā tadaprāptiduḥkhajagdhaviṣaṃ tadā / nivāritaviṣaṃ cakruḥ kṛpayeva svavidyayā // 12.2.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āgacchāsmadguroḥ pārśvaṃ jñānī sarvaṃ hi vetti saḥ / ity uktvā ca tamāninyurnikaṭaṃ tasya mantriṇaḥ // 12.2.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca hastipako dṛṣṭvā pādayoś ca praṇamya tam / bhāryāpravṛttiṃ papraccha vratākalpopaśobhitam // 12.2.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
so 'pi mantrī mṛṣā dhyātvā sābhijñānaṃ śaśaṃsa tat / sthānaṃ tasmai parair nītā puruṣair yatra sā niśi // 12.2.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ praṇamya taṃ gatvā samaṃ nagararakṣibhiḥ / sa hastipālakaḥ prāpya sthānaṃ tatparyaveṣṭayat // 12.2.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abadhītpuruṣāṃstāṃś ca pāpāndārāpahāriṇaḥ / prāpa sābharaṇāṃ tāṃ ca sadhanāṃ nijayoṣitām // 12.2.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dvitīye 'hni sa ca prātaretya natvā kṛtasthitiḥ / cakāra vyājasiddhasya tasyāhāranimantraṇam // 12.2.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gṛhapraveśān icchoś ca naktabhojitvavādinaḥ / pradoṣe hastiśālāyāṃ tasyāhāramakalpayat // 12.2.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi mantrabalātsarvaṃ vaṃśanāḍīniveśitam / guptaṃ gṛhītvā gatvātra mantrī bhuṅkte sma sānugaḥ // 12.2.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tato gate hastipāle supteṣv anyeṣu tatra saḥ / hastino bhadradantasya vaṃśanāḍyā niveśya tam // 12.2.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
karṇe suptasya bhujagaṃ rātriṃ nītvaiva tatra tām / yayau svadeśaṃ magadhān hastī tena vyapādi ca // 12.2.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
hatvā taṃ dharmagopasya gajaṃ darpamivāgate / tasminmantrivare rājā bhadrabāhurnananda saḥ // 12.2.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vārāṇasīṃ tasmai dharmagopāya yācitum / anaṅgalīlāṃ kanyāṃ tāṃ dūtaṃ ca visasarja saḥ // 12.2.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
so 'pi tāṃ pradadau tasmai tadgajābhāvadurbalaḥ / bhajanti vaitasīṃ vṛttiṃ rājānaḥ kālavedinaḥ // 12.2.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadevaṃ prajñayā tasya mantraguptasya mantriṇaḥ / anaṅgalīlāṃ saṃprāpa bhadrabāhuḥ sa bhūpatiḥ // 12.2.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tasmānmayāpi buddhyā sā bhāryā prāpyeti vādinam / mṛgāṅkadattaṃ sacivastaṃ vicitrakatho 'bravīt // 12.2.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
sarvaṃ setsyati te hārāt svapnadṛṣṭād anugrahāt / amogho devatānāṃ ca prasādaḥ kiṃ na sādhayet // 12.2.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathā ca śṛṇutātraikāṃ varṇyamānāṃ mayā kathām / āsīttakṣaśilāpūryāṃ bhadrākṣo nāma bhūpatiḥ // 12.2.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa putrakāmaḥ padmānāṃ śatenāṣṭabhir eva ca / sitānāṃ pūjayām āsa khaḍge lakṣmīṃ dine dine // 12.2.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadārcayatas tasya rājño maunamamuñcataḥ / ūnamekamabhūtpadmaṃ daivādgaṇayato dhiyā // 12.2.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa hṛtpadmaṃ vipāṭya svaṃ dadau devyai tataś ca sā / tuṣṭā tasmai dadau sārvabhaumaputrapradaṃ varam // 12.2.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtvā cākṣatadehaṃ taṃ nṛpaṃ prāyādadarśanam / atha tasya suto rājño mahādevyāmajāyata // 12.2.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hṛtpuṣkaraprasādena jāsto 'yamiti taṃ ca saḥ / puṣkarākṣaṃ nṛpaścakre nāmnā putraṃ sulakṣaṇam // 12.2.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kramāc ca yauvanaprāptaṃ tanayaṃ taṃ guṇānvitam / rājye 'bhiṣicya bhadrākṣaḥ sa rājā śiśriye vanam // 12.2.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
puṣkarākṣo 'pi saṃprāpya rājyaṃ pratidinaṃ haram / pūjayannekadābhyarcya bhāryāṃ tasmādayācata // 12.2.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sarvaṃ saṃpatsyate putra yathābhilaṣitaṃ tava / iti śuśrāva sa giraṃ gaganādudgatāṃ tadā // 12.2.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tataḥ prahṛṣṭo jātāsthaḥ sa tiṣṭhañjātucinnṛpaḥ / ākheṭakavinodāya jagāma mṛgakānanam // 12.2.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra saṃbhogasaṃsaktabhujaṃgamithunāśane / pravṛttaṃ karabhaṃ dṛṣṭvā śokākrānto nyapātayat // 12.2.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa nipātitamātraḥ sanmuktvā tāṃ karabhastanum / bhūtvā vidyādharaḥ prītaḥ puṣkarākṣaṃ tam abravīt // 12.2.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhavān kṛtopakāro me tatte yad vacmi tac chṛṇu / raṅkumālīti nāmnāsti rājan vidyādharottamaḥ // 12.2.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ rūpalubdhā taruṇaṃ vavre dṛṣṭvānurāgiṇī / svayaṃ tārāvalī nāma vidyādharavarātmajā // 12.2.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāḥ pitā ca svecchātastayoḥ kṛtavivāhayoḥ / kopādapātayacchāpaṃ kaṃcitkālaṃ viyogadam // 12.2.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatastārāvalīraṅkumālinau tau vijahratuḥ / daṃpatī prasaratprītī tāsu tāsu svabhūmiṣu // 12.2.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kadācittena śāpena mitho dṛṣṭipathāccyutau / anyonyaviprayuktau tau jātau kvāpi vanāntare // 12.2.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatastārāvalī sā tamanviṣyantī patiṃ kramāt / paścimābdheragātpāre vanaṃ siddharṣisevitam // 12.2.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra sāpaśyadutphullamekaṃ jambumahātarum / āśvāsayantaṃ prītyeva madhurair bhramarāravaiḥ // 12.2.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
upāviśac ca viśrāntyai bhṛṅgīrūpaṃ vidhāya sā / vṛkṣe tasminn athaikasmin kusume madhupāyinī // 12.2.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣaṇāddaivāttamatraiva prāptaṃ dṛṣṭvā cirātpatim / harṣacyutena vīryeṇa siktaṃ puṣpaṃ tayāśu tat // 12.2.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tyaktvā bhṛṅgīvapurgatvā saṃgatābhūc ca tena sā / jyotsneva śaśinā bhartrā cinvatā raṅkumālinā // 12.2.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatastena samaṃ tasyāṃ gatāyāṃ svaniketanam / tadvīryasiktā tatrābhūjjambupuṣpāttataḥ phalam // 12.2.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tasya cāntaḥ phalasyātra kālayogena kanyakā / samabhūnnahi divyānāṃ vīryaṃ bhajati moghatām // 12.2.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kadācitphalamūlārthaṃ vijitāśvābhidho muniḥ / tatrāgādapatattac ca pakvaṃ jambutaroḥ phalam // 12.2.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmātpatitabhagnāc ca divyā nirgatya kanyakā / avandata munes tasya caraṇau vinayānatā // 12.2.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa divyadṛṣṭir dṛṣṭvā tāṃ buddhvā tattvaṃ savismayaḥ / nītvāśramaṃ svaṃ vinayavatīṃ nāmnākaronmuniḥ // 12.2.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tatra kālena sā vṛddhiṃ prāptā tasyāśrame muneḥ / dṛṣṭā vinayavatyeṣā nabhasā gacchatā mayā // 12.2.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'haṃ rūpagarveṇa madanena ca mohitaḥ / upetya tāmanicchantīṃ haṭhāddhartuṃ pravṛttavān // 12.2.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkṣaṇaṃ sa muniḥ kruddhaḥ krandantyā śrāvitastayā / vijitāsurupāgatya śāpaṃ mahyamadānnṛpa // 12.2.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rūpagarvita sarvāṅganinditaḥ karabho bhava / puṣkarākṣānnṛpātprāpte vadhe śāpādvimokṣyase // 12.2.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhartā vinayavatyāś ca sa evāsyā bhaviṣyati / ityahaṃ muninā śapto jāto 'syāṃ karabho bhuvi // 12.2.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jātaś ca so 'dya śāpāntastvattastatpaścimāmbudheḥ / pārasthaṃ tadvanaṃ gaccha nāmnā surabhimārutam // 12.2.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhāryāmāpnuhi tāṃ divyāṃ rūpadarpaharāṃ śriyaḥ / ity uktvā puṣkarākṣaṃ sa divaṃ vidyādharo yayau // 12.2.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
puṣkarākṣo 'pi gatvā svāṃ purīṃ vinyasya mantriṣu / rājyaṃ rātrau tataḥ prāyādeko 'śvamadhiruhya saḥ // 12.2.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gacchan kramāc ca saṃprāpya paścimābdhes taṭaṃ punaḥ / kathaṃ tareyam ambhodhim iti tatra vyacintayat // 12.2.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato dadarśa tatraikaṃ sa śūnyaṃ caṇḍikāgṛham / praviśya ca tataḥ snātvā devīṃ tāṃ praṇanāma ca // 12.2.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kenāpi nihitāṃ tatra vīṇāmādāya sādaraḥ / upavīṇayati smaitāṃ devīmatra svagītakaiḥ // 12.2.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upavīṇitatuṣṭā ca suptaṃ tatraiva sā niśi / bhūtagrāmeṇa taṃ svena pāramabdheranāyayat // 12.2.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ prātaḥ prabuddho 'bdhestīre rājā dadarśa saḥ / vanāntaḥsthitamātmānaṃ na tasmiṃścaṇḍikāgṛhe // 12.2.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
utthāya vismitaścātra bhramannāśramamaikṣata / praṇamantamivātithyātphalabhārānatair drumaiḥ // 12.2.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kurvāṇaṃ svāgatam iva kvaṇitena patatriṇām / praviśya tatra cāpaśyatsthitaṃ śiṣyair vṛtaṃ munim // 12.2.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
upetya ca vavande tamṛṣiṃ rājā sa pādayoḥ / so 'pyenaṃ vihitātithyo jñānavānmunirabravīt // 12.2.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
puṣkarākṣa yadarthaṃ tvamāgataḥ sā kṣaṇaṃ gatā / idhmādihetor vinayavatī tattiṣṭha saṃprati // 12.2.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
upayacchasva tāṃ pūrvabhāryāmadyaiva bhūpate / ity ukto muninā so 'pi puṣkarākṣo vyacintayat // 12.2.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
diṣṭyā muniḥ sa evāyaṃ vijitāsustadeva ca / vanametaddhruvaṃ devyā tārito 'haṃ mahārṇavam // 12.2.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
citraṃ ca pūrvabhāryaiṣā mamoktā munināmunā / ityālocyaiva hṛṣṭastaṃ sa papraccha muniṃ nṛpaḥ // 12.2.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhagavan pūrvabhāryaiṣā kathaṃ me kathyatām iti / tato jagāda sa muniḥ śrūyatāṃ yadi kautukam // 12.2.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
babhūva dharmasenākhyas tāmraliptyāṃ purā vaṇik / vidyullekheti nāmnā ca bhāryā tasyābhavacchubhā // 12.2.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa daivānmuṣitaścauraiḥ śastraiścābhyāhato vaṇik / mumūrṣurniragādvahniṃ praveṣṭuṃ bhāryayā saha // 12.2.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apaśyatāmakasmāc ca tāvubhāvapi daṃpatī / ākāśenāgataṃ haṃsamithunaṃ rucirākṛti // 12.2.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tadgatacittau tau praviśya dahanaṃ mṛtau / rājahaṃsau samutpannau punarbhāryāpatī ubhau // 12.2.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kadācittau ca varṣāsu rātrau kharjūrapādape / nīḍasthitau tamunmūlya taruṃ vātyā vyayūyujat // 12.2.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātaḥ sa haṃsas tāṃ haṃsīṃ cinvañ śānte prabhañjane / saraḥsv atha diganteṣu na kutaścid avāptavān // 12.2.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tatkālasaṃsevyaṃ haṃsānāṃ mānasaṃ saraḥ / smarārtaḥ sa yayau haṃsyā janitāśo 'nyayā pathi // 12.2.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tāṃ prāpya haṃsīṃ svāṃ nītvā ca jaladāgamam / giriśṛṅgaṃ jagāmaikaṃ vihartuṃ sa tayā saha // 12.2.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tasya hatāṃ haṃsīṃ mṛtām ādāya vīkṣya ca / dūrān mārgāgatān kāṃścit puruṣān sāyudhān bahūn // 12.2.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
lubdhakas tāṃ hatāṃ haṃsīṃ mṛtām ādāya vīkṣya ca / dūrān mārgāgatān kāṃścit puruṣān sāyudhān bahūn // 12.2.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
drutaṃ churikayā chinnaistāmācchādya tṛṇair bhuvi / haṃsīṃ nyadhādvilokyaitāṃ hareyurjātvamī iti // 12.2.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gateṣu teṣu puruṣeṣūpagamya jighṛkṣataḥ / lubdhakasyoddhṛtatṛṇā haṃsī sā tasya paśyataḥ // 12.2.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tattṛṇāntarnikṛttāyā mṛtasaṃjīvanauṣadheḥ / rasena jīvitaṃ prāpya khamutpatya tato yayau // 12.2.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvat sa haṃsas tadbhartā gatvaikasminsarastaṭe / mūḍho 'patad dhaṃsayūthe paśyaṃstām eva tanmanāḥ // 12.2.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
tatkṣaṇaṃ dhīvaraḥ ko'pi kṣiptvā jālaṃ nibadhya tān / haṃsānsarvānupāvikṣadāhārārthaṃ kila kṣaṇāt // 12.2.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac cāgatya tatraiva sā haṃsī cinvatī patim / dadarśa jālabaddhaṃ taṃ diśaścārtā vyalokayat // 12.2.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ snātuṃ pravṛttena kenāpyatra sarastaṭe / puṃsā vastropari nyastāmapaśyadratnakaṇṭhikām // 12.2.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā cāpaśyatas tasya tāṃ gṛhītvaiva kaṇṭhikām / dāśāya darśayantī sā tasmai vyomnā śanair yayau // 12.2.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dāśo 'pi so 'nvadhāvat tāṃ dṛṣṭvā cañcvāttakaṇṭhikām / haṃsīṃ gṛhītalaguḍaḥ pakṣijālaṃ vihāya tat // 12.2.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
haṃsī ca gatvā śailāgre dūre tāṃ kaṇṭhikāṃ nyadhāt / dhīvaro 'pi sa tallobhāttatrāroḍhuṃ pracakrame // 12.2.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad dṛṣṭvā sā drutaṃ gatvā haṃsī patyuḥ samīpage / baddhasya vṛkṣe saṃsuptaṃ kapiṃ cañcvākṣṇy atāḍayat // 12.2.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sa kapistāḍitastrastaḥ patitvoparyapāṭayat / jālaṃ tattena nirjagmurhaṃsāḥ sarve 'pi te tataḥ // 12.2.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha tau saṃgatāvuktasvavṛttāntau parasparam / haṃsau bhāryāpatī hṛṣṭau yathākāmaṃ vijahratuḥ // 12.2.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dāśaṃ taṃ cāgataṃ prāptakaṇṭhikaṃ pakṣilobhataḥ / lebhe 'tra sa pumāṃś cinvan hṛtā sā yasya kaṇṭhikā // 12.2.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa bhītisūcitasyāsya hastātsaṃprāpya kaṇṭhikām / dāśasya dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ pumāṃśchurikayācchinat // 12.2.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tau cāpi jātu haṃsau dvau chattīkṛtyaikamambujam / madhyāhnakāle sarasaḥ protthāya vyomni ceratuḥ // 12.2.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
kṣaṇāc ca nadyāḥ kasyāścitkhagau tau tīramāpatuḥ / muninādhyāsitaṃ kenāpyarcāvyagreṇa dhūrjaṭeḥ // 12.2.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra vyādhena kenāpi yāntau tau saha daṃpatī / hatāvekena yugapacchareṇa bhuvi petatuḥ // 12.2.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ātapatrāmbujaṃ tac ca tadīyamapatattadā / munerarcayatas tasya śivaliṅgasya mūrdhani // 12.2.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vyādhaḥ sa dṛṣṭvā tau haṃsaṃ svīkṛtya haṃsikām / tāṃ dadau munaye tasmai so 'pyānarca śivaṃ tayā // 12.2.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
talliṅgamūrdhni sras tasya tasyābjasya prabhāvataḥ / sa puṣkarākṣa haṃsastvaṃ jāto rājanvaye 'dhunā // 12.2.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
haṃsī ca saiṣā vinayavatī vidyādharānvaye / jātā viśeṣato hy asyā māṃsair abhyarcito haraḥ // 12.2.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
itthaṃ te pūrvabhāryāsāv ity ukto vijitāsunā / muninā puṣkarākṣaḥ sa rājā taṃ punar abravīt // 12.2.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
katham agnipraveśasya tasyāghaughavighātinaḥ / pakṣiyonāv abhūj janma bhagavan phalam āvayoḥ // 12.2.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavantaṃ rājānaṃ taṃ sa pratyabravīnmuniḥ / yadbhāvitātmā mriyate jantūstadrūpamaśnute // 12.2.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tathā hyujjayinīpuryāṃ naiṣṭhikī brahmacāriṇī / lāvaṇyamañjarī nāma kumārī brāhmaṇī purā // 12.2.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yuvānaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā kamalodayasaṃjñakam / sahasā tadgatasvāntā dahyamānā smarāgninā // 12.2.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amuñcantī svaniyamaṃ tadbhogadhyānabhāvitā / gatvā gandhavatītīraṃ tīrthe tatyāja jīvitam // 12.2.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tayā bhāvanayā kiṃ na jātābhūdbhogasaṃginī / nagaryāmekalavyāyāṃ veśyā rūpavatīti sā // 12.2.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tīrthavrataprabhāvāc ca saiva jātismarā satī / prasaṅgāccoḍakarṇāya jāpakāya dvijanmane // 12.2.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svapūrvajanmavṛttāntarahasyaṃ tadavarṇayat / japakarmaikacittatve kurvāṇasyānuśāsanam // 12.2.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ante ca śuddhasaṃkalpā yayau veśyāpi sadgatim / tadrājanyo 'tra yaccittastanmayatvam upaiti saḥ // 12.2.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktvā sa rājānaṃ snānāya visasarja tam / munirmadhyāhnasavanaṃ svayaṃ ca niravartayat // 12.2.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
rājā sa puṣkarākṣo 'pi gato vananadītaṭam / tāṃ dadarśātra vinayavatīṃ puṣpāṇi cinvatīm // 12.2.168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
bhāsamānāṃ svavapuṣā prabhām iva vivasvataḥ / adṛṣṭapūrvaṃ gahanaṃ praviṣṭāṃ kautukādvanam // 12.2.169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
keyaṃ syāditi yāvac ca sa cintayati sotsukaḥ / tāvatkathāṃ niṣaṇṇā sā visrabdhāmavadatsakhīm // 12.2.170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sakhi vidyādharo yo māṃ hartumaicchatpurā sa me / āgatya śāpamukto 'dya bhartṛprāptimihoktavān // 12.2.171	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā pratyavocattāṃ sā sakhī munikanyakām / astyetanmayi śṛṇvatyāṃ muñjakeśo 'dya hi prage // 12.2.172	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
itthamukto nijaḥ śiṣyo muninā vijitāsunā / gaccha tārāvalīraṅkumālināvānaya drutam // 12.2.173	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kāmaṃ vinayavatyā hi vatseha duhitustayoḥ / rājñaś ca puṣkarākṣasya vivāho 'dya bhaviṣyati // 12.2.174	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukto guruṇā muñjakeśo yātas tatheti saḥ / ata ehyāśramapadaṃ gacchāvaḥ sakhi saṃprati // 12.2.175	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
evaṃ tayokte vinayavatī sātha tato yayau / puṣkarākṣaś ca śuśrāva sa taddūrādalakṣitaḥ // 12.2.176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
jvalatkāmāgnisaṃtāpādiva nadyāṃ nimajjya ca / jagāma vijitāsostamāśramaṃ sa punarnṛpaḥ // 12.2.177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tārāvalīr aṅkumālinau tau samāgatau / ānarcatustaṃ praṇataṃ parivavruś ca tāpasāḥ // 12.2.178	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tato vedyāṃ svatejobhir bhāsitāyāṃ maharṣiṇā / dvitīyeneva mūrtena vahninā vijitāsunā // 12.2.179	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmai sa rājñe vinayavatīṃ tāṃ pratyapādayat / raṅkumālī dadau cāsmai rathaṃ divyaṃ nabhaścaram // 12.2.180	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
catuḥ samudrāṃ pṛthivīṃ praśādhi samametayā / ityetasmai varaṃ cādādvijitāsurmahāmuniḥ // 12.2.181	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
athaiṣa tadanujñayā navavadhūm upādāya tāṃ nṛpo gaganagāminaṃ tamadhiruhya divyaṃ ratham / vilaṅghya ca payonidhiṃ sapadi puṣkarākṣastato jagāma nagarīṃ nijāṃ prakṛtinetracandrodayaḥ // 12.2.182	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
tatra ca jitvā pṛthivīṃ rathaprabhāvādavāptasāmrājyaḥ / āste sma vinayavatyā sahito bhogāṃścirāya bhuñjānaḥ // 12.2.183	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
itthaṃ suduṣkaram apisvarasena kāryaṃ siddhyatyanugrahavatīṣviha devatāsu / tatsvapnadṛṣṭagirijādayitaprasādāt setsyaty abhīṣṭam acireṇa tavāpi deva // 12.2.184	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
etāṃ niśamya sa vicitrakathāmamātyād autsukyavānadhigamāya śaśāṅkavatyāḥ / rājātmajaḥ svasacivaiḥ samamujjayinyāṃ buddhiṃ babandha gamanāya mṛgāṅkadattaḥ // 12.2.185	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
evaṃ mṛgāṅkadatto 'tra karmasenanṛpātmajām / tāṃ śaśāṅkavatīṃ prāptukāmo vetālavarṇitām // 12.3.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gantumujjayinīṃ guptaṃ svanagaryā nivirgamam / mahāvratikaveṣeṇa so 'mantrayata mantribhiḥ // 12.3.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ādideśa ca khaṭvāṅgakapālādisamāhṛtau / sa rājaputraḥ sacivaṃ svair aṃ bhīmaparākramam // 12.3.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tena tac cāhṛtaṃ svasmin gṛhe cārādabudhyata / mṛgāṅkadattasya pitur mantrī mukhyo 'tra bhūpateḥ // 12.3.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tatkālaṃ cātra so 'kasmāt saṃcaran harmyapṛṣṭhataḥ / mṛgāṅkadattas tāmbūlaniṣṭhīvanarasaṃ jahau // 12.3.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sa ca tasyāpatanmūrdhni daivāttatpitṛmantriṇaḥ / adṛṣṭasya kilādhastāttena mārgeṇa gacchataḥ // 12.3.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
buddhvā mṛgāṅkadattena muktaṃ niṣṭhīvanaṃ sa tat / mantrī paribhavakrodhaṃ kṛtasnāno hṛdi nyadhāt // 12.3.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athātrāmaradattasya rājño daivādviṣūcikā / mṛgāṅkadattajanakasyānyedyurudapadyata // 12.3.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tataḥ so 'vasaraṃ labdhvā mantrī taṃ vijane nṛpam / sahasod bhūtarogārtamavadadyācitābhayaḥ // 12.3.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhicāraḥ prabho bhīmaparākramagṛhe tava / mṛgāṅkadattenārabdhaḥ kartuṃ tenāsi pīḍitaḥ // 12.3.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
mayā cāramukhājjñātaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tac ca dṛśyate / tannirākuru deśāttaṃ dehādvyādhimivātmajam // 12.3.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sa samudbhrāntaḥ prāhiṇottadavekṣaṇe / nijaṃ senāpatiṃ bhīmaparākramagṛhaṃ nṛpaḥ // 12.3.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca keśakalāpādi labdhvā senāpatis tataḥ / ānīya tatkṣaṇaṃ tasmai rājñe sākṣādadarśayat // 12.3.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājyalubdhaḥ sa putro me drohī nirvāsyatāmitaḥ / nagaryāḥ sahito 'mātyaistvayādyaivāvilambitam // 12.3.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityādiśatsa taṃ kruddho rājā senāpatiṃ tataḥ / āśvasto vetti kusṛtiṃ prabhuḥ ko hi svamantriṇām // 12.3.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
so 'tha senāpatirgatvā rājādeśaṃ nivedya tam / mṛgāṅkadattaṃ sāmātyaṃ nagaryā nirakālayat // 12.3.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
so 'py apekṣitasaṃpattirhṛṣṭo 'rcitavināyakaḥ / mṛgāṅkadatto manasā praṇamya pitarau tataḥ // 12.3.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)

mṛte pitari codbhūtagotrajaḥ svabalena saḥ / madvijñaptena tātena pitrye rājye 'dhiropitaḥ // 12.3.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tattasya nikaṭaṃ tāvadgacchāmaḥ suhṛdas tataḥ / krameṇojjayinīṃ yāmastāṃ śaśāṅkavatīṃ prati // 12.3.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavāṃs tathety uktavadbhistaiḥ sacivaiḥ saha / prayayau sa tataḥ prāpa sāyaṃ caikāṃ mahāṭavīm // 12.3.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāṃ nirvṛkṣatoyāyāṃ kṛcchrādekamavāpa saḥ / tīropāntaprarūḍhaikaśuṣkapādapakaṃ saraḥ // 12.3.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasminsāṃdhyamanuṣṭhāya vidhiṃ pītvā jalāni saḥ / śrāntaḥ suṣvāpa sāmātyas tasya śuṣkataroradhaḥ // 12.3.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

bhuktavatsu ca teṣv atra paśyatsvevākhileṣu saḥ / śuṣkavṛkṣaḥ kṣaṇādviprakumāraḥ samapadyata // 12.3.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tasyāhaṃ śrutadhir nāma putraḥ sa ca mayā saha / durbhikṣe mṛtajāniḥ san bhraman prāpad imāṃ bhuvam // 12.3.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iha kenāpi dattāni prāpya pañca phalāni saḥ / kṣutkṣāmas trīṇi me prādāddve cāsthāpayad ātmane // 12.3.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ snātuṃ saras toyaṃ gate tasmin phalāny aham / tānīha bhuktvā niḥśeṣāṇy akārṣaṃ vyājasuptakam // 12.3.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)

gacchaṃś ca sa prāpya vanaṃ karimaṇḍitasaṃjñakam / dadarśa puruṣān pañca bhūrikeśān durākṛtīn // 12.3.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
upetya praśrayātte ca tamūcurjātavismayam / kāśipuryāṃ vayaṃ jātā viprā dhenūpajīvinaḥ // 12.3.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

so 'pi buddhvā kirāteśo nirgatyāgre tamānataḥ / mṛgāṅkadattaṃ sāmātyaṃ puraṃ prāveśayannijam // 12.3.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatastenopacaritastasthau tatra sa kāṃścana / mṛgāṅkadatto divasānuktāgamanakāraṇaḥ // 12.3.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
svakārye prāptakālaṃ ca sāhāyye śaktirakṣitam / sthāpayitvātra sajjaṃ tamāmantrya ca nṛpātmajaḥ // 12.3.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātiṣṭhata sa puṇyāhe punarujjayinīṃ prati / śaśāṅkavatyā hṛtadhīrātmanā dvādaśas tataḥ // 12.3.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
gacchaṃś ca so 'ṭavīṃ prāpya śūnyāṃ tarutalasthitam / tapasvinaṃ dadarśaikaṃ bhasmājinajaṭābhṛtam // 12.3.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nirāśramapade 'raṇye kimekākīha tiṣṭhasi / bhagavannity upāgamya sa taṃ papraccha sānugaḥ // 12.3.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'tha taṃ tāpaso 'vādīdahaṃ śiṣyo mahāguroḥ / śuddhakīrtyabhidhānasya nānāmantraughasiddhimān // 12.3.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'haṃ kadāpyakaravaṃ svasthāveśaṃ prasaṅgataḥ / śubhalakṣaṇamāsādya kaṃcitkṣatrakumārakam // 12.3.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa kumāraḥ samāviṣṭaḥ pṛṣṭo nānāvidhāni me / siddhauṣadhirasakṣetrāṇyudīryedamathābravīt // 12.3.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
astīhottaradigbhāge kevalaḥ śiṃśapātaruḥ / vindhyāṭavyāmadhaścāsya nāgendrabhavanaṃ mahat // 12.3.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac cārdradhūlipracchannajalaṃ sadupalakṣyate / madhyāhne haṃsamithunauḥ krīḍadbhiḥ sāmbusārasaiḥ // 12.3.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatra pārāvatākhyo 'sti nāmnā nāgavaro balī / tasya devāsuraraṇātprāptaḥ khaḍgo 'styanuttamaḥ // 12.3.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
vaidūryakāntir nāmnā taṃ khaḍgaṃ prāpnoti yo naraḥ / sa siddhādhipatir bhūtvā vicaratyaparājitaḥ // 12.3.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa cāsiḥ prāpyate vīraiḥ sahāyair ity udīrite / tenāviṣṭena tasyāhamathākārṣaṃ visarjanam // 12.3.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'nyavimukhaḥ khaḍgaṃ prepsustaṃ pṛthivīmaham / bhrāntvā sahāyān aprāpya khinno martum ihāgataḥ // 12.3.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
etanmṛgāṅkadatto 'tra śrutvā tasmātsa tāpasāt / ahaṃ sahāyaḥ sāmātyas taveti tam abhāṣata // 12.3.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sa cābhinandya tattena sānugena samaṃ yayau / tasya nāgasya bhavanaṃ pādalepena tāpasaḥ // 12.3.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatrābhijñānasaṃprāpte mantrabaddhāsu dikṣu ca / rātrau mṛgāṅkadattādīnsthāpayitvābhimantritaiḥ // 12.3.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sarṣapaiḥ prakaṭīkṛtya kṣiptaistaddhūlito jalam / sa nāgadamanair mantrair homaṃ kartuṃ pracakrame // 12.3.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vighnāṃścotpātameghādīnmantraśaktyā jigāya saḥ / tato 'tra niryayau tasmād divyā strī śiṃśapātaroḥ // 12.3.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mohamantraṃ paṭhantīva sā ratnābharaṇāravaiḥ / upetya taṃ kṣaṇāccakre kaṭākṣakṣatamānasam // 12.3.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hṛtadhair yā ca sā tasya samāliṅgya ghanastanī / hastādvismṛtamantrasya homabhāṇḍamapātayat // 12.3.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
labdhāntaraś ca tatkālaṃ sa nāgo bhavanāttataḥ / pārāvatākhyaḥ kalpāntaghanāghana ivodagāt // 12.3.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
taṃ dṛṣṭvā nayanajvālāghoraṃ garjitadāruṇam / sa naṣṭadivyanārīko hṛtsphoṭaṃ prāpa tāpasaḥ // 12.3.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasminvinaṣṭe tasyātra kṛtasāhāyakānsa tān / nāgo mṛgāṅkadattādīnaśapacchāntavaikṛtaḥ // 12.3.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
yuṣmābhir etat saṃghātāt kṛtaṃ niṣkāraṇaṃ yataḥ / viprayuktāstato 'nyonyaṃ kaṃcitkālaṃ bhaviṣyatha // 12.3.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvāntarhite nāge sarve te tatra tatkṣaṇam / dhvāntaruddhadṛśo dhvastaśabdaśravaṇaśaktayaḥ // 12.3.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jagmurmṛgāṅkadattādyā viprayuktā yatas tataḥ / śāpaprabhāvāt krośantiś cinvantaś ca parasparam // 12.3.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
mṛgāṅkadattaś ca tataḥ sa gate rātrivibhrame / bhrāmyannitastato 'ṭavyāṃ tatrāsītsacivair vinā // 12.3.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
gateṣv evaṃ ca māseṣu dvitreṣv atrātha tasya saḥ / akasmāc chrutadhirvipro vicinvan prāpad antikam // 12.3.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa pādapatitaḥ sāśruḥ śrutadhistaṃ kṛtādaram / svamantrivārtāṃ pṛcchantaṃ samāśvāsyaivam abhyadhāt // 12.3.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
na dṛṣṭāste mayā kiṃ tu jāne yāsyanti te prabho / purīmujjayinīṃ saiva gantavyā vartate hi vaḥ // 12.3.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityādyuktavatā tena preritastadyuto 'tha saḥ / mṛgāṅkadattaḥ śanakaiḥ prāyādujjayinīṃ prati // 12.3.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
gacchanstokaiś ca divasair mārgeṇāśaṅkitāgatam / hṛṣṭo vimalabuddhiṃ sa saṃprāpa nijamantriṇam // 12.3.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
taddarśanodvāṣpadṛśaṃ praṇataṃ parirabhya saḥ / upaveśya ca papraccha vārtāmitaramantriṇām // 12.3.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vimalabuddhistaṃ bhṛtyapriyam uvāca saḥ / na jāne deva kasteṣu kva gato nāgaśāpataḥ // 12.3.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvaṃ tu tān prāpsyasīty etad yathā jāne tathā śṛṇu / tadāhaṃ nāgapāśena dūrākṛṣṭaḥ paribhraman // 12.3.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṭavyāḥ pūrvadigbhāge klāntaḥ kenāpi sādhunā / āśramaṃ prāpito 'bhūvaṃ maharṣerbrahmadaṇḍinaḥ // 12.3.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tenarṣiṇā dattaiḥ phalāmbhobhir gataklamaḥ / paryaṭannāśramādārādadrākṣaṃ bṛhatīṃ guhām // 12.3.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praviśya kautukāttasyāṃ dṛṣṭvāntarmaṇimandiram / pravṛttavānahaṃ jālagavākṣais tatra vīkṣitum // 12.3.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvat sthitāntaś cakraṃ strī bhrāmayantī sabhṛṅgakam / bhṛṅgāste 'thāśritā bhedenātrasthau vṛṣagardabhau // 12.3.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tābhyāṃ ca vāntau kṣīrāsṛkphenau pītvā yathāśrayam / dvaye sitāsitā bhūtvā jātāste jālakārakāḥ // 12.3.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
svaviṣṭhābhistatas taiś ca dvividhair vividhāḥ kṛtāḥ / jālapāśāḥ supuṣpaiś ca viṣapuṣpaiś ca saṃgatāḥ // 12.3.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
teṣu pāśeṣu te saktā jālakārā yathāsukham / śvetakṛṣṇobhayamukhenaitya daṣṭā mahāhinā // 12.3.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
nānāghaṭeṣv atha kṣiptās tayā nāryā samutthitāḥ / punas tathaiva tān eva pāśāñ śliṣṭvā yathātatham // 12.3.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
viṣodvegāc ca tatpuṣpajālastheṣvāraṭatsvatha / anye 'pi te 'nyajālasthāḥ pravṛttāḥ krandituṃ tadā // 12.3.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tacchabdabhagnadhyānena tatrasthena kṛpālunā / kenāpi bhālato muktā tato jvālā tapasvinā // 12.3.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tayā nirdagdhapāśāste daṇḍaṃ suṣiravaidrumam / praviśyaiva tadūrdhvasthe līnā jyotiṣi bhāsvare // 12.3.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvatkvāpi gatā sā strī sacakravṛṣagardabhā / taddṛṣṭvā vismito yāvat sthito 'haṃ tatra paryaṭan // 12.3.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvat puṣkariṇīṃ hṛdyāmapaśyaṃ bhṛṅganāditaiḥ / ihāpyāgatya vīkṣasvetyāhvayantīmivāmbujaiḥ // 12.3.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tīropaviṣṭas tasyāś ca vīkṣe yāvadvanaṃ mahat / jālāntare vane caiko lubdhakas tatra tena ca // 12.3.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
daśabāhuravāpyaikaḥ siṃhapoto vivardhya ca / anāyatta iti krodhādvanāttasmātpravāsitaḥ // 12.3.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi siṃhaḥ samākarṇya siṃhāḥ śabdaṃ vanāntare / tatra gacchanmahāvātenāvakīrṇabhujaḥ kṛtaḥ // 12.3.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato lambodareṇaitya puṃsāropitabāhukaḥ / saṃpāditaḥ sa yātastadvanaṃ kesariṇīkṛte // 12.3.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tasyāḥ kṛte kleśamanubhūya vanāntare / prāgāttāṃ prāpya tadyuktaḥ sa nijaṃ vanamāgataḥ // 12.3.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sabhāryamāgataṃ taṃ ca dṛṣṭvaiva karimardanam / vanaṃ samarpya tattasmai lubdhakaḥ sa tato gataḥ // 12.3.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etadapy ahamālokya gatvāśramapadaṃ tataḥ / ubhayaṃ tanmahāścaryamavocaṃ brahmadaṇḍine // 12.3.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'tha prītyā trikālajño munirmāmevam abhyadhāt / dhanyo 'si darśitaṃ sarvaṃ prasanneneśvareṇa te // 12.3.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yā dṛṣṭā strī tvayā tatra sā māyā bhramitaṃ ca yat / tayā saṃsāracakraṃ tadye bhṛṅgāste ca jantavaḥ // 12.3.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vṛṣagardabharūpau tau dharmādharmau pṛthakpṛthak / śritāstadbāntadugdhāsṛgrūpe sukṛtaduṣkṛte // 12.3.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svāsvāśrayotthe saṃsevya bhūtvā ca śvetakalmaṣāḥ / dvividhā jālakārābha viṣṭabdhā nijavīryataḥ // 12.3.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
nirmāya dvividhāneva jālapāśānsutādikān / satpuṣpaviṣapuṣpābhasukhaduḥkhānuṣaṅgiṇaḥ // 12.3.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yathāsvaṃ teṣu saṃsaktāḥ kālenoragarūpiṇā / śubhāśubhābhyāṃ vaktrābhyāṃ hatāḥ putra yathocitam // 12.3.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tato ghaṭakarūpāsu nānāyoniṣu māyayā / strīrūpayā tayā kṣiptās tathaivotthāya te punaḥ // 12.3.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tulyāsu patitāḥ śvetakṛṣṇāsvākṛtiṣu dvidhā / putrādijālapāśeṣu sukhaduḥkhānubandhiṣu // 12.3.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ kṛṣṇā nijair jālair baddhā duḥkhaviṣārditāḥ / pravṛttāḥ krandituṃ vignāḥ śaraṇaṃ parameśvaram // 12.3.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taddṛṣṭvā jātavair āgyāste śvetā api jantavaḥ / prārabdhā nijajālasthāstam evākrandituṃ prabhum // 12.3.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ prabudhya devena tena tāpasarūpiṇā / jñānāgnijvālayā dagdhapāśāḥ sarve 'pi te kṛtāḥ // 12.3.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena vidrumasaddaṇḍarūpamādityamaṇḍalam / praviśya tattadūrdhvasthaṃ paramaṃ dhāma te śritāḥ // 12.3.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
naṣṭā ca cakrākāreṇa saṃsāreṇa sahaiva sā / māyā vṛṣakharākāradharmādharmasamanvitāḥ // 12.3.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ bhramanti saṃsāre śuklakṛṣṇāḥ svakarmabhiḥ / īśvarārādhanādeva vimucyante ca jantavaḥ // 12.3.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti te mohaśāntyarthamīśvareṇa pradarśitam / vāpījale ca yaddṛṣṭaṃ bhavatā tadidaṃ śṛṇu // 12.3.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mṛgāṅkadattabhāvyarthapradarśanamidaṃ jale / pratibimbamivotpādya kṛtaṃ bhagavatā tava // 12.3.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa hi bālamṛgārātipotatulyo bhujopamaiḥ / sacivair daśabhir yukto vardhito vanasaṃnibhāt // 12.3.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
deśāllubdhakatulyena pitrā kopātpravāsitaḥ / avantideśād udbhūtāṃ khyātimanyavanopamāt // 12.3.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
śaśāṅkavatyās tatsiṃhyā iva śrutvā pradhāvitaḥ / nāgaśāpena vātena bhraṣṭamantribhujaḥ kṛtaḥ // 12.3.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vināyakenātra sa lambodararūpiṇā / saṃghāṭitāmātyabhujaḥ prakṛtisthaḥ punaḥ kṛtaḥ // 12.3.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tato gatvānubhūyātikleśaṃ prāptāṃ tato 'nyataḥ / tāṃ śaśāṅkavatīṃ siṃhīmādāyātrāgataś ca saḥ // 12.3.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataś ca nikaṭaṃ prāptaṃ vidyutārātivāraṇam / mṛgāṅkadattasiṃhaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhāryāsamanvitam // 12.3.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatsvadeśavanaṃ tasmai samarpya sakalaṃ svataḥ / tatpitā lubdhakanibhaḥ sa prayātastapovanam // 12.3.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
iti saṃpannavadbhāvi darśitaṃ vibhunā tava / tadyuṣmānmantriṇo bhāryāṃ rājyaṃ cāpsyati vaḥ prabhuḥ // 12.3.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ahaṃ munivareṇa bodhitas tena labdhadhṛtirāśramāttataḥ / nirgato 'tha śanakair upāvrajann adya deva militāstvayā saha // 12.3.130	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
tasmādabhimatamāpsyasi sacivāṃllabdhvā pracaṇḍaśaktimukhān / prasthānakālapūjāprasannavighneśvaro niyatam // 12.3.131	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
iti svasacivāt kṣaṇaṃ vimalabuddhitaḥ so 'dbhutaṃ niśamya paritoṣavān api mṛgāṅkadattaḥ punaḥ / vicārya saha tena tām aparamantryavāptyai kramād avantinagarīṃ prati vrajitavānsvakāryāya ca // 12.3.132	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
tataḥ śrutadhiyuktena samaṃ vimalabuddhinā / sa śaśāṅkavatīhetorgacchannujjayinīṃ prati // 12.4.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mṛgāṅkadattaḥ saṃprāpadantarā narmadānadīm / vīcivelladbhujalatāṃ vilasatphenapāṇḍurām // 12.4.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
diṣṭyā miladamātyo 'yaṃ saṃvṛtta iti vīkṣya tam / harṣādiva pranṛtyantīṃ hasantīṃ capalāśayām // 12.4.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāṃ snānāvatīrṇe ca tasmin kaścid upāyayau / tatra māyābaṭur nāma snātuṃ śabarabhūpatiḥ // 12.4.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ snāntaṃ sahasotthāya trayo 'tra jalamānuṣāḥ / yugapajjagṛhurbhillaṃ bhītinaśyatparicchadam // 12.4.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad dṛṣṭvākṛṣṭakhaḍgo 'ntaḥ praviśya jalamānuṣān / hatvā mṛgāṅkadattas tān bhillendraṃ tam amocayat // 12.4.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tadgrāhabhayānmukto bhillarājo jalotthitaḥ / taṃ rājaputraṃ papraccha patitvā pādayos tataḥ // 12.4.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
dhātrā kastvamihānītaḥ prāṇatrāṇāya me vada / kasya cālaṃkṛto vaṃśastvayā sukṛtinaḥ pituḥ // 12.4.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ko vā kaṭākṣitaḥ puṇyair deśo yatra gamiṣyasi / ity uktvā śrutadheḥ śrutvā tadvṛttāntamaśeṣataḥ // 12.4.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sutarāṃ praṇatastaṃ sa śabarendro 'bravītpunaḥ / tarhyahaṃ te yathādiṣṭe sahāyo 'trābhivāñchite // 12.4.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sakhyā durgapiśācena mātaṅgapatinā saha / tatprasādaṃ kuruṣvehi gṛhān bhṛtyasya me prabho // 12.4.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti sapraṇayaistaistair vacobhiḥ prārthya taṃ tataḥ / mṛgāṅkadattaṃ pallīṃ svāṃ śabarendro nināya saḥ // 12.4.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
upācarac ca taṃ tatra yathāvatsvavibhūtibhiḥ / rājaputramaśeṣeṇa pallīlokena pūjitam // 12.4.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi mātaṅgarājo 'tra sametyābhinananda tam / dāsībhūya suhṛtprāṇapradaṃ nyastaśirā bhuvi // 12.4.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato māyābaṭos tasya bhillendrasyānurodhataḥ / mṛgāṅkadattas tatraiva tasthau kāṃścitsa vāsarān // 12.4.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ekadā ca sthite tasmindyūtaṃ sa śabareśvaraḥ / samaṃ nijapratīhāreṇārebhe caṇḍaketunā // 12.4.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvannabhasi megheṣu garjatsu gṛhabarhiṇaḥ / pranṛttāndraṣṭumuttasthau sa māyābaṭubhūpatiḥ // 12.4.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa dyūtarasikaḥ pratīhārastam abhyadhāt / kimebhiḥ prekṣitai rājannasuśikṣitatāṇḍavaiḥ // 12.4.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa mayūro gṛhe me 'sti nāsti yo 'nyatra bhūtale / darśayiṣyāmi taṃ prātastubhyaṃ tadrasiko 'si cet // 12.4.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā darśanīyo me sarvathā sa tvayeti ca / uktvā sa taṃ pratīhāraṃ dinakṛtyaṃ vyadhānnṛpaḥ // 12.4.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mṛgāṅkadatto 'pyākarṇya sarvaṃ tattatra sānugaḥ / tathaivotthāya vidadhe snānāhārādikāḥ kriyāḥ // 12.4.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tato rātrāvupetāyāmandhe tamasi jambhite / kastūrikānuliptāṅgo vasāno nīlavāsasī // 12.4.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa rājaputraḥ svoddeśādvīracaryārthamekakaḥ / suptānugādvāsagṛhātkhaḍgapāṇirviniryayau // 12.4.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
bhramaṃś ca tatra kenāpi puṃsā mārgāgatena saḥ / apaśyatā dhvāntavaśādaṃsenāṃse 'bhyahanyata // 12.4.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tataḥ so 'bhyabhavatkruddho yuddhāyāhvayati sma tam / sa cāhataḥ pumān prauḍhas tatkālocitam abhyadhāt // 12.4.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ tāmyasyavicāryaiva vicārayasi cettataḥ / vācyo niśāpatiryena niśaiṣā na prakāśitā // 12.4.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dhātā vā yena pūrṇo 'sya nādhikāro 'tra nirmitaḥ / yena vairāṇi jāyante tamasīdṛśyakāraṇam // 12.4.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā satyamity uktvā tuṣṭo nāgarikoktitaḥ / mṛgāṅkadattaḥ ko 'sīti sa taṃ papraccha pūruṣam // 12.4.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
cauro 'hamiti tenoktaḥ puṃsā so 'py avadanmṛṣā / hastamānaya sa brahmacārī mama bhavāniti // 12.4.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtvā ca sakhyaṃ jijñāsuḥ sa tenaiva saha vrajan / mṛgāṅkadattaḥ saṃprāpa jīrṇakūpajṃ tṛṇāvṛtam // 12.4.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
tatra tena praviṣṭena puṃsā saha suruṅgayā / gatvā māyābaṭos tasya rājño 'ntaḥpuramāptavān // 12.4.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra dīpena dṛṣṭvā taṃ parijajñe sa pūruṣam / yāvat so 'tra pratīhāraścaṇḍaketurna taskaraḥ // 12.4.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pratīhāras tu na sa taṃ mandālokaikakoṇagam / parijajñe 'nyaveṣasthaṃ rājastrīchannakāmukaḥ // 12.4.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājavadhvā ca sa tayā prāpta evāsnuraktayā / utthāya kaṇṭhe jagṛhe mañjumatyabhidhānayā // 12.4.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
upaveśya ca paryaṅke sa pṛṣṭo 'bhūttayā tadā / adyaiva bhavatā ko 'yamihānītaḥ pumāniti // 12.4.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
suhṛnmamāyaṃ viśvastā bhavety uktā ca tena sā / pratīhāreṇa sodvegā mañjumatyevam abravīt // 12.4.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kuto me mandabhāgyāyā viśvāso yadasau nṛpaḥ / mṛtyormṛgāṅkadattena mukhaṃ prāpto 'pi rakṣitaḥ // 12.4.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sa pratīhārastāmavādīdalaṃ śucā / nṛpaṃ mṛgāṅkadattaṃ ca haniṣyāmyacirātpriye // 12.4.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavantaṃ taṃ daivātsābravītkiṃ vikatthase / ākrānto 'bhūdyadā grāhair nṛpo 'sau narmadāmbhasi // 12.4.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
mṛgāṅkadatta evaikastadā tadrakṣaṇodyataḥ / tvayā kiṃ na hatas tatra bhīto hi tvaṃ palāyitaḥ // 12.4.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tattūṣṇīṃ bhava mā kaścidetacchroṣyasi te vacaḥ / tato mṛgāṅkadattātvaṃ śūrādaśivamāpsyasi // 12.4.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktavatīṃ tāṃ ca jāraḥ kṣattā na cakṣame / pāpe mṛgāṅkadatte tvaṃ baddhabhāvādhunā dhruvam // 12.4.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadasyānubhavedānīmadhikṣepasya me phalam / ity uktvā ca sa hantuṃ tāmuttasthau sāsidhenukaḥ // 12.4.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato rahasyadhāriṇyā tatra ceṭikayaikayā / dhāvitvā churikā tasyāvaṣṭabdhābhūtkareṇa sā // 12.4.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvadyayau mañjumatī tato nirgatya sānyataḥ / kṣattā ca tasyāś ceṭyās tāṃ nikṛttāṅgulitaḥ karāt // 12.4.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ākṣipya churikāṃ prāyātsvagṛhaṃ sa yathāgatam / mṛgāṅkadattena samamākulo vismitātmanā // 12.4.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
gacchāmy ahaṃ bhavān prāpto gṛhān iti ca tatra tam / mṛgāṅkadattaḥ kṣattāraṃ tamasyaprakaṭo 'bravīt // 12.4.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
iha nidrāṃ bhaja kṣipraṃ pariśrānto bhṛśaṃ hy asi / iti so 'pi pratīhāro rājaputraṃ tam abhyadhāt // 12.4.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tatheti tenokte tacceṣṭālokanaiṣiṇā / kṣattā svabhṛtyamatraikaṃ samāhūya jagāda saḥ // 12.4.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa mayūraḥ sthito yatra tatrainaṃ naya vāsakam / puruṣaṃ viśramāyāsmai śayanīyaṃ prayaccha ca // 12.4.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatheti ca sa tadbhṛtyas tasmin prāveśayed gṛhe / nītvā mṛgāṅkadattaṃ taṃ dattaśayyaṃ sadīpake // 12.4.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gate tasmin bahirdvāraṃ baddhvā śṛṅkhalayātra saḥ / mṛgāṅkadatto 'paśyat taṃ mayūraṃ pañjarasthitam // 12.4.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
so 'yamukto 'munā kṣattrā śikhītyālocya kautukāt / tasya coddhāṭayām āsa mayūrasya sa pañjaram // 12.4.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mayūraḥ sa ca nirgatya nipuṇaṃ vīkṣya pādayoḥ / mṛgāṅkadattasya muhurnipapāta luloṭha ca // 12.4.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
luṭhatas tasya dṛṣṭvā ca kaṇṭhabaddhaṃ sa sūtrakam / rājaputro mumocāśu matvā taṃ tena pīḍitam // 12.4.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa muktakaṇṭhasūtraś ca mayūras tasya paśyataḥ / saṃpanno 'bhūttadā tasya mantrī bhīmaparākramaḥ // 12.4.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato mṛgāṅkadattastamāśliṣyotsukamānatam / sakhe kathaya kiṃ nvetaditi papraccha vismayāt // 12.4.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avocad atha saṃhṛṣṭaḥ sa taṃ bhīmaparākramaḥ / śṛṇu deva svavṛttāntamā mūlātkathayāmi te // 12.4.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadāhaṃ nāgaśāpena vibhraṣṭo bhavadantikāt / bhramannaṭavyāṃ saṃprāpamekaṃ śālmalipādapam // 12.4.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tasminnikhātarūpāṃ ca gaṇeśapratimāmaham / dṛṣṭvā praṇamya tanmūle pariśrānta upāviśam // 12.4.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
acintayaṃ ca dhiksarvamidaṃ pāpaṃ mayā kṛtam / rāstrivetālavṛttāntamāvedya svāmine tadā // 12.4.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadihaiva tyajāmyetamātmānamaparādhinam / ityālocyātra devāgre sthito 'bhūvamabhojanaḥ // 12.4.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gate katipayāhe ca ko'pi tenāgataḥ pathā / vṛddhapānthas taros tasya cchāyāyāṃ sam upāviśat // 12.4.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ mlānamukhaḥ putra kiṃ sthito 'sīha nirjane / iti dṛṣṭvā ca so 'pṛcchatsādhurmāmanubandhataḥ // 12.4.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato mayā svavṛttānte yathāvadvinivedite / sa vṛddhapathikaḥ prītyā dhīrayanmām abhāṣata // 12.4.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ātmānaṃ haṃsi vīro 'pi kathaṃ strīvatstriyo 'pi vā / dhair yamāpadi nojjhanto tathā cemāṃ kathāṃ śṛṇu // 12.4.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nagaryāṃ kośalākhyāyāṃ vimalākara ityabhūt / rājā tasya ca putro 'bhūtkamalākarasaṃjñakaḥ // 12.4.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yastejorūpadātṛtvaguṇaiḥ ślāghyo vinirmame / dhātreva skandakaṃdarpakalpadrumajigīṣayā // 12.4.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyaikadā kumārasya dikṣu stutyasya bandibhiḥ / gāthāmekāṃ papāṭhaiko bandī paricitaḥ puraḥ // 12.4.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
padmāsādanasotsavanānāmukharadvijāliparigītam / kamalākaramaprāptā kva ratiṃ haṃsāvalīṃ labhatām // 12.4.70	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
evaṃ muhuḥ paṭhan pṛṣṭas tena bandī jagāda tam / sa manorathasiddhyākhyaḥ kumāraṃ kamalākaram // 12.4.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
deva bhrāmyan gato 'bhūvaṃ rājño 'haṃ meghamālinaḥ / nagarīṃ vidiśāṃ nāma līlodyānabhuvaṃ śriyaḥ // 12.4.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra dardurakākhyasya gītācāryasya veśmani / aham āsaṃ sa caivaṃ māṃ prasaṅgenaikadābravīt // 12.4.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iha haṃsāsvalī nāma duhitā nṛpateḥ puraḥ / navīnaśikṣitaṃ prātaḥ svanṛttaṃ darśayiṣyati // 12.4.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā kautukādyuktvā samaṃ tenāpare 'hani / ahaṃ rājakulaṃ gatvā prāviśaṃ raṅgamaṇḍapam // 12.4.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāhatamahātodye tāmapaśyaṃ sumadhyamām / haṃsāsvalīṃ rājakanyāṃ nṛtyantīṃ pituragrataḥ // 12.4.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
ālolapuṣpābharaṇāṃ pāṇipreṅkhitapallavām / vallīm iva smarataroryauvanānilaghūrṇitām // 12.4.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tataścācintayamahaṃ naivāsyā hariṇīdṛśaḥ / bhartāsti kaścid yogo 'nyaḥ kumārātkamalākarāt // 12.4.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tena cettādṛśeneyaṃ yujyate nedṛśī tataḥ / kāmasya kiṃ kṛte puṣpakārmukāropaṇagrahaḥ // 12.4.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadupāyaṃ karomyatra tāvadityanucintayan / prekṣaṇānte tato rājakuladvāramagāmaham // 12.4.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
citraṃ likhatu yo 'trāsti citrakṛtsadṛśo mayā / abhilikhyeti tatrāhaṃ cīrikāmudalambayam // 12.4.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apāṭitāyām anyena tasyāṃ buddhvā nṛpo 'tra tat / āhūya svasutāvāse citrakṛtye nyayuṅkta mām // 12.4.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vāsagṛhe tasyā haṃsāvalyāḥ sabhṛtyakaḥ / bhittau mayābhilikhitastvaṃ deva kamalākara // 12.4.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
spaṣṭaṃ cetkhyāpayāmyetattaddhūrtaṃ vetti māmiyam / tadetāṃ rājatanayāṃ yuktyaitadbodhayāmy aham // 12.4.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
iti saṃcintya suhṛdaṃ viśvastaṃ kṛtasaṃvidam / tatraikamahamunmattarūpaṃ ramyamakārayam // 12.4.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa unmatto bhraman gāyan nṛtyaṃś cālokya dūrataḥ / ānāyyata krīḍanako rājaputrair nijāntikam // 12.4.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tataḥ krīḍāvaśāddṛṣṭvā haṃsāvalyā svavāsakam / praveśitaś ca saṃpaśyansa citraṃ tvatstutiṃ vyadhāt // 12.4.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
diṣṭyā dṛṣṭo 'bjaśaṅkhāṅkapāṇirlakṣmīvilāsabhūḥ / so 'yaṃ haririvānantaguṇaughaḥ kamalākaraḥ // 12.4.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityādi nṛtyatastasmādrājakanyā niśamya sā / māmapṛcchatkimāhāyaṃ kaścaiṣa likhitastvayā // 12.4.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti tāmanubandhena pṛcchantīmahamuktavān / dṛṣṭapūrvo 'munā nūnamunmattenaiṣa sundari // 12.4.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājaputro mayā yo 'yaṃ likhito rūpagauravāt / ity uktvā tvaṃ mayā tasyai guṇair nāmnā ca varṇitaḥ // 12.4.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sphūrjadbhavatpremarasāsekāplute hṛdi / saṃbhūto 'bhinavastasyā haṃsāvalyāḥ smaradrumaḥ // 12.4.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athāgatena rājñātra pitrā tasyā vilokya saḥ / nṛtyannanmattako 'haṃ ca krodhānniṣkālitau tataḥ // 12.4.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ prabhṛti cotkā sā kṣiyamāṇā dine dine / kṛṣṇapakṣendulekheva yātā lāvaṇyaśeṣatām // 12.4.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
māndyavyājāc ca pāpaghnamāśrityāyatanaṃ hareḥ / vijanāsevinī yuktyā jātā sānujñayā pituḥ // 12.4.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhavaccintāvinidrā ca candracandrātapā sahā / sthitā niśāvāsarayor atra bhedamajānatī // 12.4.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tatra cāyatanoddeśātpraviṣṭaṃ māṃ vilokya sā / āhūya vastrābharaṇaiḥ sagauravamapūjayat // 12.4.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
pūjito nirgataścāhaṃ taddattavasanāñcale / gāsthāmapaśyaṃ likhitāṃ tvatkṛte śṛṇu tāṃ punaḥ // 12.4.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
padmāsādanasotsavanānāmukharadvijāliparigītam / kamalākaramaprāptā kva ratiṃ haṃsāvalī labhatām // 12.4.99	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
vācayitvāhametāṃ ca labdhataccittaniścayaḥ / tvadbodhanārthamāgatya tavaināṃ purato 'paṭham // 12.4.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
idaṃ vastraṃ ca tadyatra gāthaiṣā likhitā tayā / iti bandivacaḥ śrutvā gāthāṃ tāṃ pravilokya ca // 12.4.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa śrotreṇota netreṇa praviṣṭām iva tāṃ hṛdi / tadā haṃsāvalīṃ dhyāyañ jaharṣa kamalākaraḥ // 12.4.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatprāptyupāyaṃ yāvac ca sa cintayati sūtsukaḥ / tāvat pitā tamāhūya rājā daivādabhāṣata // 12.4.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
alasāḥ putra rājāno mantrabaddhā ivoragāḥ / naśyantyanye tu naṣṭā apyudayante kathaṃ punaḥ // 12.4.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvayā ca dṛṣṭā nādyāpi jigīṣā sukhasaṅginā / tadudyukto bhavālasyamutsṛjya mayi tiṣṭhasi // 12.4.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vijayasvāgrato gatvā tvam aṅgādhipatiṃ ripum / asmān prati kṛtārambhaṃ nijadeśād vinirgatam // 12.4.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etatpitṛvaco hṛṣṭaḥ pratipede tatheti saḥ / śūraḥ priyāṃ prati ca tāṃ yiyāsuḥ kamalākaraḥ // 12.4.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tataḥ pitrā samādiṣṭaiḥ pratasthe sa balaiḥ saha / ākampayanmahīpṛṣṭhaṃ hṛdayāni ca vidviṣām // 12.4.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha prayāṇakaiḥ kaiścitprāpyāṅgādhipateścamūm / pratyavaskandabhagnena sahāyudhyata tena saḥ // 12.4.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abdherjalamivāgastyastejasvī tasya ca dviṣaḥ / balaṃ papau sa jagrāha jīvagrāhaṃ ca taṃ jayī // 12.4.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prajighāya ca saṃyamya pituḥ pāsrśvamamuṃ ripum / pratīhārasya dhuryasya has te dattvānuyāstrikān // 12.4.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tato jayan krameṇānyān nṛpānupacito balaiḥ / sa prāpa vidiśāpuryā nikaṭaṃ kamalākaraḥ // 12.4.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra sthitaś ca vyasṛjatsa dūtaṃ meghamāline / rājñe haṃsāvalīpitre yācituṃ tāṃ tadātmajāsm // 12.4.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi dūtādaduṣṭaṃ taṃ buddhvā kanyārthamāgatam / meghamālī nṛpaḥ prītyā tatpārśvaṃ svayamāyayau // 12.4.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtātithyo 'bravīccainaṃ rājaputraṃ kṛtādaram / svayaṃ pariśramo dūtasādhye 'rthe kiṃ kṛtastvayā // 12.4.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mamābhivāñchitaṃ hyetatkāraṇaṃ śṛṇu cātra yat / etāṃ haṃsāvalīṃ bālye 'py acyutārcanatatparām // 12.4.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śirīṣasukumārāṅgīṃ dṛṣṭvā cintā mamodabhūt / īdṛgguṇāyāḥ sadṛśo varaḥ ko 'syā bhavediti // 12.4.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
apaśyataś ca sadṛśaṃ varamasyāstamo mama / taccintayā vinidrasya hyudapādi mahāñjvaraḥ // 12.4.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatpraśāntyai ca saṃpūjya kṛtavijñaptimārtitaḥ / rātrāvīṣatsanidraṃ māṃ hariḥ svapne samādiśat // 12.4.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

matpūjāpāvanenaiṣā yaṃ yaṃ hastena saṃspṛśet / tasya tasya hy asādhyo 'pi jvaro naśyedasaṃśayam // 12.4.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etadvivāhacintā ca na kāryā bhavatā punaḥ / rājaputraḥ patir bhāvī yato 'syāḥ kamalākaraḥ // 12.4.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tato haṃsāvalīhastasparśājjāto 'smi vijvaraḥ / tadaivaṃ yuvayor eṣa saṃyogo devanirmitaḥ // 12.4.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatte haṃsāvalī dattā mayety uktvā prakalpya ca / lagnaṃ sa rājadhānīṃ svāṃ meghamālī nṛpo yayau // 12.4.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatroktaṃ tena tatsarvaṃ śrutvā haṃsāvalī rahaḥ / saskhīmāha rahasyajñāsṃ nāmnā kanakamañjarīm // 12.4.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
tvayāsau dṛśyatāṃ gatvā rājaputraḥ sa eva kim / citrakṛllikhiteneha yena me hṛdayaṃ hṛtam // 12.4.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tātaḥ kadācidanyasmai sabalāyāgatāya mām / dadyāttannāmadheyāya bhayāddhi prābhṛtīkṛtām // 12.4.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā preṣitā svair aṃ tayā kanakamañjarī / sākṣasūtrājinajaṭaṃ tāpasīveṣaḍambaram // 12.4.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
vidhāya gatvā kaṭakaṃ rājaputrasya tasya sā / āveditā parijanaiḥ praviśyaiva vilokya tam // 12.4.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
kāmasyeva jagajjaitramohanāstrādhidaivatam / tadrūpahṛtacittābhūtsamādhistheva tatkṣaṇam // 12.4.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sotkā cācintayat syān me saṃgamo nedṛśena cet / dhigjanma tarhi yuktaṃ tatkariṣye 'tra yad astv iti // 12.4.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athopasṛtya dattāśīstasmai maṇim upānayat / uvāca copaviṣṭā tamāttaratnaṃ kṛtādaram // 12.4.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

guṇānurāgāc ca mayā tubhyameṣa samarpitaḥ / yasthā tavopayukto 'yaṃ rājaputra na me tathā // 12.4.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

vimucya tāpasīveṣaṃ kṛtvodvignamivānanam / haṃsāvalīm upāgātsā pṛṣṭā tāṃ ca mṛṣābravīt // 12.4.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tato 'haṃ tena tasyaiva sakāśaṃ devi tatkṣaṇam / rājaputrasya kamalākarasyātra praveśitā // 12.4.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)

śrutvaitadracitaṃ tasyā vaco nirghātadāruṇam / ṛjvī haṃsāvalī kṣipraṃ saṃmuhyaiva jagāda tām // 12.4.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tac chrutvā rājaputrī sā kusakhīṃ tām abhāṣata / tvam eva tarhi madveṣaṃ kṛtvātmānaṃ vivāhaya // 12.4.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena rājasutenānyā kā mamāptā bhavādṛśī / ity uktā sā tayā pāpāvocatkanakamañjarī // 12.4.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tayaiva sahitā tāṃcas tānyahānyanvasevata / haṃsāvalīṃ vimanasaṃ kṛtakartavyasaṃvidam // 12.4.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
prāpte codvāhadivase vare sāyam upāgate / tasmin gajāśvapādātasahite kamalākare // 12.4.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sarvasminnutsavavyagre jane yuktyānyaceṭikāḥ / nivārya vāsakaṃ guptaṃ prasādhananibhāddrutam // 12.4.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
haṃsāvalīṃ praveśyaiva kṛtvā tadveṣamātmanaḥ / cakre 'śokakarīveṣāṃ tāṃ sā kanakamañjarī // 12.4.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśokakaryāḥ svaṃ veṣaṃ sahacaryā vidhāya ca / prāpte niśāgame haṃsāvalīmetām uvāca sā // 12.4.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
paścimena vinirgatya dvāreṇāsyāḥ puro bahiḥ / krośamātre purāṇo 'sti suṣiraḥ śālmalidrumaḥ // 12.4.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā tasyāntare sthitvā pratīkṣasva madāgamam / kṛte kārye ca tatrāhaṃ tvām upaiṣyāmi niścitam // 12.4.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktā sā tayā vyājasakhyā haṃsāvalī tadā / niragāttatsakhīveṣā tathetyantaḥpurānniśi // 12.4.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāyāc ca janyākīrṇena purīdvāreṇa tena sā / nirgatyālakṣitā tasya mūlaṃ śālmaliśākhinaḥ // 12.4.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvāndhakāragahanaṃ tadgarbhaṃ nāviśac ca sā / bibhyatī tatsamīpasthaṃ tvāruroha vaṭadrumam // 12.4.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

tenaivāśvāsya coktāhaṃ putryamuṃ dāhayestarum / etasmānniriyātstrī cetkṣeptavyātraiva sā punaḥ // 12.4.174	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ śivaṃ syād ity uktvā dvije tasmiṃs tirohite / prabuddhāhaṃ smṛtaṃ caitad dṛṣṭvā tarum amuṃ mayā // 12.4.175	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

sāpi haṃsāvalī tasyāṃ rātrau tatra vaṭe sthitā / śrutvā dṛṣṭvā ca tatsarvaṃ vañcitāsmītyabudhyata // 12.4.182	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

aho dagdhvaiva māmasmānnirvṛtiṃ prāptumīpsati / aśreyase na vā kasya viśvāso durjane jane // 12.4.184	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

ityālocyāsvaruhyātha vaṭāstprāṇavyayonmukhī / jātabuddhirvidheryogādityantarvimamarśa sā // 12.4.186	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ tyajāmi vṛthāstmānaṃ jīvantī nacirādaham / manyupratikriyāṃ tasyāḥ kariṣyāmi sakhīdruhaḥ // 12.4.187	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tātasya hitadā svapne jvarāskrāntasya śauriṇā / tacchāntiṃ matkarasparśādādiśyoktamabhūdidam // 12.4.188	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tadgatvā kvāpi paśyāmi tāvadityavadhārya sā / haṃsāvalī tataḥ prāyānnirjanāmaṭavīṃ prati // 12.4.190	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dūraṃ gatāyās tasyāś ca klāntāyāḥ praskhaladgateḥ / mārgaprakaṭanāyeva dayayā sā yayau kṣapā // 12.4.191	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
taddarśanasamudbhūtakṛpāveśavaśādiva / mumoca dyauravaśyāsyabāṣpavārikaṇotkaram // 12.4.192	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tataḥ sā kiṃciducchvastā nirastajanadarśanā / utpathaiḥ kramaśo yāntī kuśakaṇṭakavikṣatā // 12.4.194	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tathāpi kusumair ebhiḥ pūjayantī ramāpatim / ihaiva tāvat tiṣṭhāmi kṣapayantī svaduṣkṛtam // 12.4.200	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
iti saṃcintya vāpīṣu snāntī tasthau phalāśanā / tatra pūjāparā śaureḥ prepsuḥ sā kamalākaram // 12.4.201	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atrāntare kośalāyāṃ vidhiyogājjvareṇa saḥ / cāturthikena dīrgheṇa jagṛhe kamalākaraḥ // 12.4.202	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
taddṛṣṭvā tatra sā pāpā kūṭahaṃsāvalī tadā / bhītā vyacintayaccetasyevaṃ kanakamañjarī // 12.4.203	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

trāyadhvamiti cakranda yadāśokakarī muhuḥ / tenābhyadhāvannagarīrakṣiṇo 'trābhito janāḥ // 12.4.222	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)

buddhvāśokakarīvaktrādyathātattvaṃ tataś ca te / dve te rājakulaṃ ninyuḥ puraskṛtya purādhipam // 12.4.224	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tayoścānītayor bhītyā prahāravyathayā ca sā / tīvrayotkrāntajīvābhūtsadyaḥ kanakamañjarī // 12.4.226	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tato 'dhigatatattvārthaḥ sa rājā kamalākaraḥ / evaṃ śuśoca tatkālamātmānaṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitaḥ // 12.4.229	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tac chrutvā vīkṣya so 'vādīd bandī diṣṭyābhivardhase / deva haṃsāvalīprāptyā saiva hy eṣātra tiṣṭhati // 12.4.250	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tasyāṃ gatāyāṃ pāpāyāṃ prabuddho 'haṃ ca tatkṣaṇam / paśyāmi yāvat prāpto 'smi mayūratvaṃ sthitasmṛtiḥ // 12.4.277	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tato dināni katicid vigno bhrāmyann itas tataḥ / jīvañ śākunikenāhaṃ gṛhīto 'bhūvam ekadā // 12.4.278	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa cānīya dadāti sma māmasmai caṇḍaketave / bhillarājapratīhāramukhyāya prābhṛtīkṛtam // 12.4.279	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pratīhāro 'py ayaṃ prādātsvabhāryāyai tadaiva tām / tayāhasṃ sthāpitaścāsmi maṇḍape krīḍanīyakaḥ // 12.4.280	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
adyeha daivānītena tvayā me kaṇṭhasūtrake / mukte prāpto 'smi tāṃ deva punaḥ svāṃ manuṣākṛtim // 12.4.281	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad ito maṅkṣu gacchāvaḥ pratīhāro hi hanty asau / rātricaryāsakhīn pāpaḥ pratibhedabhayāt sadā // 12.4.282	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvaṃ cānīto 'munā rātricaryādraṣṭādya tatprabho / yoginīnirmitaṃ baddhvā kaṇṭhe sūtramidaṃ bhavān // 12.4.283	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mayūrībhūya niryātu gavākṣeṇāmunā bahiḥ / tataḥ prasāritabhujaḥ sūtraṃ kaṇṭhāttavocchritāt // 12.4.284	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
muktvā baddhvātmanaḥ kaṇṭhe tadvanniryāsmyahaṃ drutam / tvayātha mukte me sūtre bhavāvaḥ prakṛtisthitau // 12.4.285	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
bahirargalitenāsti dvāreṇa na vinirgamaḥ / evam uktavati prājñe tasmin bhīmaparākrame // 12.4.286	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mṛgāṅkadattas tadyuktas tatheti niragāttataḥ / jagāma ca svanilayaṃ sthitānyasacivadvayam // 12.4.287	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatra sarve 'pi te 'nyonyakṛtsnavṛttāntavarṇanaiḥ / ninyur mṛgāṅkadattādyāḥ prahṛṣṭāstāṃ vibhāvarīm // 12.4.288	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātarmṛgāṅkadattasya pārśvaṃ tasyājagāma saḥ / māyābaṭur bhillarājas tasyāṃ pallyāmadhīśvaraḥ // 12.4.289	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
sa pṛṣṭarātrisaukhyāstaṃ rājaputraṃ vinodayan / akṣaiḥ krīḍāma ehīti māyābaṭurabhāṣata // 12.4.290	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas taṃ sapratīhāraṃ vīkṣya bhillaṃ samāgatam / sakhā mṛgāṅkadattasya so 'tha śrutadhirabhyadhāt // 12.4.291	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kimakṣair vismṛtaṃ kiṃ vā dṛśyamadya hi vartate / pratīhāramayūrasya nṛtyamuktaṃ hy a eva yast // 12.4.292	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

kathaṃ pramādād vismṛtya na sa cauro mayā hataḥ / sākṣī rātrirahasyasya kṣipto 'pi śikhiveśmani // 12.4.294	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

atha bhītaviṣaṇṇaḥ sa gatvā svaṃ nṛpam abravīt / niśi caureṇa me nītaḥ sa mayūraḥ prabho iti // 12.4.297	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tathā mṛgāṅkadattaḥ svaṃ kṣattuḥ saṃbandhinaṃ ca tam / vṛttāntaṃ śabarendrāya tasmai sarvaṃ śaśaṃsa saḥ // 12.4.302	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadbuddhvāchurikāparikṣatakarāmantaḥpure ceṭikāṃ dṛṣṭvā tāmatha vīkṣya kaṇṭharacite tasmin kṣaṇaṃ sūtrake / bhūyo bhīmaparākramasya śikhitāṃ śuddhāntavidhvaṃsinaṃ kṣattāraṃ śabareśvaraḥ sapadi taṃ māyābaṭuṃ so 'vadhīt // 12.4.303	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
tāṃ tvavinītāṃ rājñīṃ mṛgāṅkadattena rakṣitāṃ vadhataḥ / dūrasthitāṃ cakāra sa mañjumatīṃ parihṛtasparśām // 12.4.304	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
tatpūjitaḥ sa ca tato 'tra pulindapallyām āsīd dināni kila tāni mṛgāṅkadattaḥ / baddhodyamo 'py adhigamāya śaśāṅkavatyāḥ saṃprāptaśeṣasakhisaṃgamasavyapekṣaḥ // 12.4.305	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]

tāvattatsaṃnidhāvetya tamātmīyaścamūpatiḥ / ekadā śabarādhīśaṃ sasaṃrambho vyajijñapat // 12.5.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvadādeśādvicinvadbhir bhagavatyāḥ kṛte prabho / upahārāya puruṣaḥ prāpto 'smābhiḥ sa tādṛśaḥ // 12.5.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
yenāsmadvīrayodhānāṃ khaṇḍitaṃ śatapañcakam / ānītaś ca sa bhūyiṣṭhaprahāravivaśīkṛtaḥ // 12.5.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
