dadau ca tasmai muktaḥ sannītighnaṃ svāṅgulīyakam / prahvo mumoca dāsyāc ca nāgaṃ taṃ gandhamālinam // 12.5.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
gandhamālī ca mudito vinītamataye tadā / tasmai sutāṃ tāṃ vijayavatīṃ dattvā gṛhānagāt // 12.5.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tataḥ khaḍgāṅgulīyāśvakanyāratnayutaḥ kṛtī / sa vinītamatirjāte prabhāte gṛhamāyayau // 12.5.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrābhinanditaḥ pitrā pṛṣṭavṛttāntatoṣiṇā / rājñā ca svena tāṃ nāgakanyāṃ sa pariṇītavān // 12.5.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha ratnaiścaturbhistair guṇaiḥ svaiścopabṛṃhitam / pitā kadācitkamalamatiḥ provāca taṃ rahaḥ // 12.5.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
ihāsyodayatuṅgasya sutaiṣā yāsti bhūpate / putrodayavatī nāma sarvavidyāsu śikṣitā // 12.5.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāṃ paṇaḥ kṛto 'nena yo vipraḥ kṣattriyo 'pi vā / vāde parājayetaitāṃ tasmai dadyāmimāmiti // 12.5.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
parājitāś ca vādena vādino 'nye 'nayākhilāḥ / jagadāścaryarūpeṇa rūpeṇevāmarāṅganāḥ // 12.5.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvaṃ caikavīraḥ svakṣatravāde tūṣṇīṃ ca tatkatham / sthito 'si vijayasvaināṃ vāde pariṇayasva ca // 12.5.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktastena pitrā savinītamatirabravīt / peśalābhiḥ saha strībhir vādaḥ kastāta mādṛśām // 12.5.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathāpyetaṃ tvadādeśaṃ kariṣyāmītyudīrite / prauḍhena tena sa yayau tatpitā kṣitipāntikam // 12.5.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
rājaputryā samaṃ vādaḥ prātardeva kariṣyate / vinītamatinetyatra sa taṃ bhūpaṃ vyajijñapat // 12.5.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhūpena pratipannārtho gṛhametya ca sūnave / vinītamataye tasmai tat tathaiva śaśaṃsa saḥ // 12.5.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ prāptaḥ svayaṃ tena rājahaṃsena saṃśritām / vinītamatirāgatya vādī vidvatsabhābjinīm // 12.5.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhāsvān sa bhāsayām āsa lolalocanaṣaṭpadaiḥ / vilokyamāno 'bhimukhair guṇivṛndais tadāśritaiḥ // 12.5.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
kṣaṇāntare cāyayau sā tatrodayavatī śanaiḥ / rājaputrī guṇākṛṣṭā kāmasyeva dhanurlatā // 12.5.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
śobhitā guṇavadbhiḥ svaiścāruśabdair vibhūṣaṇaiḥ / tatpūrvapakṣopakṣepam iva kurvadbhir āditaḥ // 12.5.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
nirdoṣe nirmalā cetsyādindulekhāmbare tataḥ / bhajetsāmyaṃ niṣaṇṇāyāstasyā marakatāsane // 12.5.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
cakre 'tha pūrvapakṣaṃ sā sphuraddantāṃśutantuṣu / gumphayantīva suślakṣṇapadaratnamayīṃ srajam // 12.5.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tamavadyārthasiddhāntaṃ sa vinītamatirvyadhāt / kṣaṇānniruttarīkṛtya sumukhīṃ tāṃ pade pade // 12.5.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sabhyaiḥ stute tasminsātmano rājaputrikā / parājaye 'pi sadbhartṛlābhājjayamamanyata // 12.5.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa cāpy udayatuṅgo 'tha rājā hṛṣṭo 'tra tāṃ sutām / tasmai vinītamataye dadau vādapaṇārjitām // 12.5.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
taddattaratnapūrṇo 'tra sa vinītamatis tataḥ / tābhyāṃ nāgasutārājasutābhyāṃ saha tasthivān // 12.5.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā jīyamāno 'nyair dyūtastho vyākulāśayaḥ / nirbandhādbrāhmaṇenaitya sa bhojanamayācyata // 12.5.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa karṇe bhṛtyasya kathayitvā krudhā vṛtaḥ / vastreṇācchādya sikatāpātramasmāyadāpayat // 12.5.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
sa tadvipro gṛhītvaiva gurutvātsahiraṇyakam / matvā praharṣād ekāntamṛjurgatvodaghāṭayat // 12.5.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
dṛṣṭvā ca vālukāpūrṇamutsārya dharaṇītale / vipralabdho 'smi teneti viṣaṇṇaḥ svagṛhaṃ yayau // 12.5.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vinītamatirapyetadavicintya vimucya tat / dyūtaṃ tasthau yathākāmaṃ svagṛheṣu priyāsakhaḥ // 12.5.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yāti kāle ca jarasā viśliṣyatsaṃdhivigrahaḥ / so 'bhūd udayatuṅgo 'tra rājā rājyabharākṣamaḥ // 12.5.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato jāmātaraṃ rājye vinītamatim eva tam / so 'bhiṣicya yayau gaṅgāmaputro dehamuktaye // 12.5.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāptarājyaś ca nacirātsa vinītamatis tataḥ / aśvakhaḍgaprabhāveṇa jigāyāpi diśo daśa // 12.5.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ītighnasyāṅgulīyasya prabhāvādasya cābhavat / rāṣṭraṃ nīrogadurbhikṣaṃ rājño raghupateriva // 12.5.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadābhyāyayau taṃ ca bhikṣurdeśāntarānnṛpam / ratnacandramatir nāma vādidviradakesarī // 12.5.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca bhikṣuḥ kṛtātithyo rājānaṃ taṃ guṇipriyam / prārthayām āsa vādārthamīdṛśaṃ ca paṇaṃ jagau // 12.5.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvayā jitena rājendra grāhyaṃ sugataśāsanam / mayā jitena śuśrūṣyā viprāḥ saṃtyajya cīvaram // 12.5.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvā tathety uktvā vādaṃ tena sahākarot / sa vinītamatī rājā bhikṣuṇā dinasaptakam // 12.5.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṣṭame 'hani bhikṣustaṃ sa jigāya mahīpatim / yenodayavatī vādimuṇḍamudgarikā jitā // 12.5.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatastenopadiṣṭaṃ sa bhikṣuṇā saugataṃ matam / sattvopakārapuṇyāḍhyaṃ jātaśraddho 'grahīnnṛpaḥ // 12.5.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhīkṣūṇāṃ brāhmaṇādīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ ca cakāra saḥ / vihārasattravasatīr jinapūjāparāyaṇaḥ // 12.5.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tadabhyāsopaśāntaś ca bhikṣostasmādayācata / sa bodhisattvacaryāyāmājñāṃ sattvopakāriṇīm // 12.5.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'tha bhikṣustamāha sma rājanvigatakalmaṣaiḥ / bodhisattvamahācaryā caritavyeha netaraiḥ // 12.5.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tava cāsmādṛśair lakṣyaṃ sthūlaṃ nāsty eva kilbiṣam / kiṃ tu tvaṃ sūkṣmamanayā yuktyānviṣya śamaṃ naya // 12.5.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ity uktvopādiśat tasmai sa bhikṣuḥ svapnamāṇavam / so 'pi tena nṛpaḥ svapnaṃ dṛṣṭvāsmai prātarabhyadhāt // 12.5.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ācārya jāne svapne 'dya paralokamahaṃ gataḥ / tatra kṣudhārthitānnaṃ māṃ puruṣā daṇḍino 'bruvan // 12.5.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhuṅkṣvaitā bhūyasī rājannarjitāstaptavālukāḥ / yā dattāḥ kṣudhitāya prāgbrāhmaṇāyārthine tvayā // 12.5.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dattvā daśa svarṇakoṭīḥ pāpādasmādvimokṣyase / ity ukto daṇḍahastaistaiḥ prabuddho 'haṃ niśākṣaye // 12.5.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktvā tadākhyāya mūlaṃ dattvā ca tā daśa / svarṇakoṭīḥ punaścakre sa rājā svapnamāṇavam // 12.5.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvā punaś ca sa svapnam utthāyoṣasyavarṇayat / adyāpi dattaṃ svapne taiḥ kṣudhitasya paratra me // 12.5.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
vālukābhojanaṃ puṃbhiḥ pṛṣṭāste ca tato mayā / datte 'pi dāne bhokṣyāmi kimimāḥ sikatā iti // 12.5.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatas te mā rudanti sma taddānaṃ tava niṣphalam / tatraikaṃ viprasaṃbandhi suvarṇamabhavadyataḥ // 12.5.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvā prabuddho 'hamiti svapnamudīrya saḥ / rājā prāyacchadarthibhyaḥ svarṇakoṭīḥ punardaśa // 12.5.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
cakre tataś ca bhūyo 'pi niśāyāṃ svapnam āṇavam / dṛṣṭvā punaś ca sa svapnamutthāyoṣasyavarṇayat // 12.5.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adyāpyaho taiḥ puruṣaistadeva sikatāśanam / dattaṃ paratra me svapne pṛṣṭaścokto 'smi tair idam // 12.5.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājaṃstadapi te dānaṃ niṣphalaṃ dasyubhir yataḥ / aṭavyāṃtava deśe 'dya muṣitvā nihato dvijaḥ // 12.5.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na ca rakṣā tvadīyābhūdarakṣāviphalaṃ tataḥ / tattavādyatanaṃ dānaṃ taddehi dviguṇaṃ punaḥ // 12.5.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutvaiveha prabuddho 'hamityākhyāya sa bhikṣave / gurave nṛpatiḥ svapnaṃ dānaṃ taddviguṇaṃ dadau // 12.5.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato jagāda taṃ bhikṣumācārya kathamīdṛśaḥ / bahucchidro 'nupālyaḥ syāddharmo jagati mādṛśaiḥ // 12.5.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā so 'bravīdbhikṣurdeva naitāvatā budhaiḥ / dharmasya rakṣaṇavidhau kāryānutsāhinī matiḥ // 12.5.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
dhīrānutsāhasaṃpannānsvadharmānavamāninaḥ / devatā abhir akṣanti puṣṇantyeṣāṃ ca vāñchitam // 12.5.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathā cedaṃ bhagavato bodhisattvasya jātakam / vārāhaṃ na śrutaṃ rājanyadi tacchrūyatāṃ tvayā // 12.5.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
purā guhāyāṃ vindhyādrāvāsīdbuddhāṃśasaṃbhavaḥ / varāhaḥ ko'pi suhṛdā markaṭena samaṃ sudhīḥ // 12.5.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
sa sarvasattvahitakṛtsakhyā tena yutaḥ sadā / atithīn pūjayan kālaṃ nināya svocitaiḥ kramaiḥ // 12.5.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā codabhūt tatra durdinaṃ pañca vāsarān / acchinnadhārāvicchinnaprāṇisaṃcāradāruṇam // 12.5.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
pañcame 'hni varāhasya suptasya sakaperniśi / agāttasya guhādvāraṃ siṃho bhāryāsutānvitaḥ // 12.5.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa siṃhas tatra bhāryāṃ tāmavādīddurdine dhruvam / mariṣyāmo 'dya dīrghe 'sminnaprāptaprāṇinaḥ kṣudhā // 12.5.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sābravītsiṃhī sarve tāvatkṣudhā vayam / na bhavāmastadekāṃ māṃ bhuktvā dvau jīvataṃ yuvām // 12.5.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvaṃ hi prabhurayaṃ putraḥ prāṇasarvasvamāvayoḥ / mādṛśī bhavitānyā te tanmayaivāstu vāṃ śivam // 12.5.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evamanyonyasaṃlāpo jāyāpatyostayostadā / daivātprabuddhaḥ śuśrāva sa varāho mahāśayaḥ // 12.5.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
prītaścācintayaddiṣṭyā kva niśeyaṃ kva durdinam / kva cedṛgatithiprāptiraho puṇyodayo 'dya me // 12.5.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadvighno na bhavedyāvattāvatkṣaṇavināśinā / kimanena na dehena tarpayāmyatithīnamūn // 12.5.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity utthāya sa nirgatya varāhaḥ snigdhayā girā / siṃhaṃ jagāda taṃ bhadra mā gamastvaṃ viṣāditām // 12.5.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayaṃ sasutadārasya bhakṣyaḥ prāpto 'smyahaṃ tava / tadbhuṅkṣva māmiti kroḍenokte tena sa kesarī // 12.5.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hṛṣṭastām abravīdbhāryāṃ pūrvaṃ bhuṅktāmayaṃ śiśuḥ / anantaramahaṃ bhokṣye bhokṣyase tvamataḥ param // 12.5.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathety ukte tayā pūrvaṃ siṃhapotena bhakṣite / kroḍasya tasya māṃse 'tha siṃho bhoktuṃ pracakrame // 12.5.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhuñjānaṃ catamāha sma mahāsattvaḥ sa sūkaraḥ / śīghraṃ pibaitad raktaṃ me yāvad bhūmau na līyate // 12.5.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kuru tṛptiṃ ca manmāṃsaiḥ śeṣamaśnātu te priyā / iti jalpan kramāt tena sa siṃhenāsthiśeṣatām // 12.5.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nīto 'pi sūkaraḥ prāṇaiḥ sattvastho na vyamucyata / tatra taddhair yaparyantamavekṣitum iva sthitaiḥ // 12.5.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca sā kṣudhāklāntā siṃhī tatra vyapadyata / sa sutaḥ kvāpy agāt siṃhaḥ kṣīyate sma ca yāminī // 12.5.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atrāntare prabuddhaḥ sa sakā nirgatya markaṭaḥ / varāhaṃ taṃtathābhūtaṃ dṛṣṭvā papraccha saṃbhramāt // 12.5.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kenāsvasthā kṛteyaṃ te brūhi śaknoṣi cetsakhe / tac chrutvā sa yathāvṛttaṃ dhīro 'smai sūkaro 'bhyadhāt // 12.5.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato rudansa taṃ natvā pādayoḥ kapirabravīt / tvaṃ devatāṃśo yenātmā tiryaktvānmocito 'mutaḥ // 12.5.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatkaṃcidabhilāṣaṃ me brūhi saṃsādhayāmi te / ity uktastena kapinā sa varāho jagādatam // 12.5.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
yo vayasyābhilāṣo me duḥsādhyo vidhināpi saḥ / paśyato me mṛtā yeyaṃ kṣudhā siṃhī tapasvinī // 12.5.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
eṣā saṃprāptapūrvāṅgaṃ punarmāṃ prāsptajīvitā / bhuktvā tṛpyatviti sakhe ceto hi mama vāñchati // 12.5.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
iti taṃ vādinaṃ kroḍaṃ pratyakṣībhūya pāṇinā / parāmṛśya vyadhāddharmo munīndraṃ divyavigraham // 12.5.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uvāca ca mayaiveyaṃ māyā siṃhādirūpiṇās / kṛtābhūttvāṃ parārthaikabaddhakakṣyaṃ jigīṣatā // 12.5.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvayā tvakhaṇḍasattvena parārthe prāṇadāyinā / vijitya māmimaṃ dharmaṃ prāptaivādya munīndratā // 12.5.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā dharmamālokya puraḥsthaṃ so 'bravīnmuniḥ / sakhyāvasminnasaṃtyaktatiryaktve markaṭe 'dhunā // 12.5.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na māṃ prīṇāti bhagavan prāptāpy eṣā munīndratā / śrutvaitat sa muniṃ cakre dharmas tam api markaṭam // 12.5.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
dhruvaṃ phalāya mahate mahadbhiḥ saha saṃgamaḥ / atha dharmastiro 'bhūtsa siṃhī cāntardadhe mṛtā // 12.5.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ sattvabalāttyaktadharmotsāhair adurlabhāḥ / devatākṛtasāhāyyai rājanvāñchitasiddhayaḥ // 12.5.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti bhikṣorvacaḥ śrutvā sa vinītamatiḥ punaḥ / dānaśūro nṛpaścakre rātrau taṃ svapnamāṇavam // 12.5.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvā śaśaṃsa ca svapnaṃ prātastasmai sa bhikṣave / jāne svapne 'dya māmevaṃ divyaḥ ko 'py avadanmuniḥ // 12.5.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
putra niṣkalmaṣo bodhisattvacaryāṃ carādhunā / tac chrutvaiva ca tadvākyaṃ prabuddho 'smyadya nirvṛtaḥ // 12.5.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ nivedya gurave bhikṣave sa mahīpatiḥ / jagrāha tāṃ mahācaryāṃ śubhe 'hni tadanujñayā // 12.5.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasthau ca kāmānarthibhyo varṣann avirataṃ tataḥ / dhanaṃ cāsyākṣayaṃ jajñe dharmamūlā hi saṃpadaḥ // 12.5.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
athaikadā tamabhyetya brāhmaṇo 'rthī vyajijñapat / vipro 'haṃ deva vāstavyaḥ pure pāṭaliputrake // 12.5.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāgniśālām āvṛtya putro 'pi brahmarakṣasā / āvṛto me na caitasminn upāyaḥ kramate mama // 12.5.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ato 'rthikalpavṛkṣaṃ tvāmāgato 'smīha yācitum / dehyetatsarvadoṣaghnamaṅgulīyaṃ śivāya me // 12.5.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityarthitaḥ sa vipreṇa tena rājāṅgulīyakam / kālajihvādavāptaṃ tattasmai prādādavihvalaḥ // 12.5.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ādāya tadgate tasminvipre taya ca bhūpateḥ / bodhisattvavratayaśo diganteṣv api paprathe // 12.5.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tataḥ kadācidaparastasyāgāduttarāpathāt / ko 'pīndukalaśo nāma rājaputro 'tithiḥ prabhoḥ // 12.5.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa kṛtapraśrayastena rājñā jñātottamānvayaḥ / pṛṣṭakāmaś ca dhīreṇa rājaputrastam abravīt // 12.5.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvaṃ tāvadarthisārthasya khyātaścintāmaṇirbhuvi / prāṇānām apite hy arthī na prayāti parāṅmukhaḥ // 12.5.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ cāskandya kanakakalaśākhyena rājyataḥ / bhrātrā nirvāsitaḥ pitryādarthitvāttvam upāgataḥ // 12.5.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadaśvakhaḍgaratne te ye state vīra dehi me / yatprabhāveṇa dāyādaṃ jitvā rājyamavāpnuyām // 12.5.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tacchrutvaivāśvakhaḍgau tau rājyarakṣāmaṇī api / dadau rājasutāyāsmai sa vinītamatirnṛpaḥ // 12.5.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na ca tasyābhavatkaścidvikalpo dhīracetasaḥ / adhomukheṣu muñcatsu niḥśvāsānapi mantriṣu // 12.5.168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'tha prāptāśvakhaḍgaḥ san gatvā rājasutas tataḥ / tatprabhāveṇa jitvā taṃ bhrātaraṃ rājyam āptavān // 12.5.169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadbhrātā so 'pi kanakakalaśo rājyataścyutaḥ / tasyaṃ tāṃ nagarīmāgādvinītamatibhūpateḥ // 12.5.170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
agnipraveśaṃ kartuṃ ca duḥkhenārabhatātra saḥ / tadbuddhvā sa nṛpo 'mātyānvinītamatirabravīt // 12.5.171	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
eṣa sādhurimāṃ prāpto daśāṃ madaparādhataḥ / tatsvarājyapradānena bhavāmyasyānṛṇo 'dhunā // 12.5.172	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
parārthānupayuktena kiṃ rājyenāmunā ca me / eṣa evānapatyasya putro me 'stu ca rājyabhṛt // 12.5.173	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityuktvāhūya kanakakalaśāya sa taddadau / tasmai svarājyaṃ saciveṣvanicchatsvapi bhūpatiḥ // 12.5.174	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
dattarājyaś ca niragānnagaryāstatkṣaṇaṃ tataḥ / bhāryābhyāṃ sahito dvābhyāṃ nirvikalpena cetasā // 12.5.175	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
hā hā dhigjagadāpyāyī saṃpūrṇo 'mṛtadīdhitiḥ / jātaś cāntaritaś caitya meghenākāṇḍapātinā // 12.5.176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pravṛttaiścaiṣa sarvāśāpūraṇe sarvadehinām / nītaś ca vidhinā kvāpi prajākalpadrumo nṛpaḥ // 12.5.177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityādyākrandamukharāstaddṛṣṭvā vihvalāstadā / bāṣpāmbusiktavasudhāḥ paurāstamanu niryayuḥ // 12.5.178	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
nivartya ca kathaṃcittānsabhāryo 'kampitas tataḥ / sa vinītamatiḥ prāyādaraṇyaṃ pratyavāhanaḥ // 12.5.179	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kramātprāpārkasaṃtaptasikatāṃ nirjaladrumām / marubhūmiṃ sa vidhinā sṛṣṭāṃ dhair yamavekṣitum // 12.5.180	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tadekadeśe tṛṣṇārto dūrādhvaklamaviklavaḥ / niṣaṇṇaḥ sa kṣaṇaṃ jahre sapatnīko 'pi nidrayā // 12.5.181	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
prabuddho vīkṣate yāvattāvattatra dadarśa saḥ / svasattvotkarṣaniṣpannaṃ mahadudyānamadbhutam // 12.5.182	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
phullābjaśītalasvacchasalilāpūrṇavāpikam / nīlaśādvalasaṃchannaṃ phalabhārānatadrumam // 12.5.183	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pracchāyagatasuślakṣṇapṛthutuṅgaśilātalam / dānaprabhāveṇākṛṣṭaṃ tridivād iva nandanam // 12.5.184	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
svapnaḥ kiṃ nu bhramo vāyaṃ devatānugraho 'tha me / iti tadvīkṣya vīkṣyaiṣa yāvac citrīyate nṛpaḥ // 12.5.185	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvaddyucāriṇā haṃsadvandvarūpeṇa kenacit / siddhadvayena gaganādīritāmaśṛṇodgiram // 12.5.186	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
rājan svasattvamāhātmye tava ko 'trātivismayaḥ / tad asmin kānane svecchaṃ sadāpuṣpaphale vasa // 12.5.187	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti siddhavacaḥ śrutvā nirvṛtas tatra kānane / tapasyansaha patnībhyāṃ vinītamatirāsta saḥ // 12.5.188	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā ca dadarśārācchilātalagato 'tra saḥ / udbandhanena puruṣaṃ kam apy ātmavadhodyatam // 12.5.189	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
drutaṃ gatvā priyair vākyair anunīya nivārya ca / maraṇātkāraṇaṃ tatra puruṣaṃ taṃ sa pṛṣṭavān // 12.5.190	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa puruṣo 'vādīdāmūlaṃ śṛṇu vacmi te / nāgaśūrasuto nāmnā somaśūro 'smi somakaḥ // 12.5.191	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'haṃ jātakanirdiṣṭacauryastacchāstravedibhiḥ / tadbhītyādhyāpitaḥ pitrā dharmaśāstraṃ prayatnataḥ // 12.5.192	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadadhītyāpi caurye 'haṃ pravṛtto duṣṭasaṃgateḥ / kasya prākkarma keneha śakyate kartumanyathā // 12.5.193	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athaikadā cauramadhyādgṛhītvā purarakṣibhiḥ / śūlādhiropaṇasthānaṃ vadhāya prāpito 'bhavam // 12.5.194	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkṣaṇaṃ rājasaṃbandhī bhagnālāno mahādvipaḥ / matto vyapādayañjantūṃstadeva sthānamāgamat // 12.5.195	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tattrāsān māṃ parityajya kvāpi te vadhakā gatāḥ / ahaṃ ca tumule tasmin palāyyaiva tato gataḥ // 12.5.196	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vadhāya nīyamānaṃ māṃ śrutvaivotkrāntajīvitam / pitaraṃ lokato 'śrauṣaṃ mātrā me 'nugataṃ tataḥ // 12.5.197	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha śokāturo bhrāmyan khinno dehavyayonmukhaḥ / kramādidam ahaṃ prāpto vijano kānanaṃ mahat // 12.5.198	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iha praviṣṭamātraṃ māmakasmāddattadarśanā / upetya kāpi divyā strī kṛtāśvāsābhyabhāṣata // 12.5.199	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvaṃ vinītamateḥ putra rājarṣerimamāśramam / prāpto gataṃ ca te pāpaṃ jñānaṃ tasmāc ca lapsyase // 12.5.200	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
idamuktvā tiro 'bhūtsā bhrāmyaṃścāhamanāpnuvan / rājarṣiṃ taṃ śucātmānaṃ tyaktumicchaṃstvayekṣitaḥ // 12.5.201	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavanta nītvā taṃ somaśūraṃ nijoṭajam / āvedyātmānamatithiṃ sa rājarṣirapūjayat // 12.5.202	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
kṛtāhāraś ca taṃ prahvaṃ nānādharmakathāntare / nivārayiṣyann ajñānāt sa rājamunir abravīt // 12.5.203	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ajñānaṃ vatsa hātavyaṃ viparyastadhiyāṃ hi tat / lokadvaye 'pi doṣāya śṛṇu cātrāgamaśrutim // 12.5.204	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pāñcāleṣu purā devabhūtināmābhavaddvijaḥ / tasyābhūdbhogavatyākhyā bhāryā vedavataḥ satī // 12.5.205	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā snānāya gate tasmiñ śākārthaṃ śākavāṭikām / praviṣṭā dhāvakakharaṃ khādantaṃ śākamaikṣata // 12.5.206	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
gṛhītalaguḍā taṃ ca sābhyadhāvatkharaś ca saḥ / palāyamānaḥ patitaḥ śvabhre bhagnakhuro 'bhavat // 12.5.207	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tadbuddhvā so 'tra tatsvāmī krodhādāgatya dhāvakaḥ / laguḍaiḥ pādaghātaiś ca brāhmaṇīṃ tāmatāḍayat // 12.5.208	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena sākāṇḍavibhraṣṭagarbhābhūdgarbhiṇī satī / tataḥ sa kharamādāya dhāvakaḥ svagṛhaṃ yayau // 12.5.209	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
snātvāgato 'tha tadbhartā tadbuddhvā vīkṣya tāṃ ca saḥ / bhāryāṃ vipraḥ purādhyakṣaṃ gatvodvigno vyajijñapat // 12.5.210	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa balāsuranāmānaṃ tadaivānīya dhāvakam / śrutvā tayor dvayor vādaṃ mūrkho vivṛtavānidam // 12.5.211	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
khurabhaṅgātkharasyāsya dhāvakasya vahatvayam / kharabhāraṃ dvijo yāvat prakṛtistho bhavetkharaḥ // 12.5.212	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dhāvako 'py ayametasya bhāryāyāmagrajanmanaḥ / garbhaṃ prajanayatvanyaṃ tasyāṃ tadgarbhapātanāt // 12.5.213	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
eṣo 'nayor dvayor daṇḍa ity ukte tena sa dvijaḥ / saṃtāpādbhakṣitaviṣaḥ sabhāryo 'pi jahāvasūn // 12.5.214	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tadbuddhvā tatra nihato rājñā durabadhārakaḥ / brahmahā sa purādhyakṣastiryagyoniṃ gataściram // 12.5.215	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityajñānatamaśchannāḥ svadoṣonmārgagāminaḥ / apuraskṛtasacchāstradīpā bhraśyanti niścitam // 12.5.216	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktvā sa rājarṣirupadeśārthinaṃ punaḥ / somaśūraṃ vinetuṃ taṃ vinītamatirabhyadhāt // 12.5.217	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vatsa pāramitārthaṃ te vacmi tāvatkramācchṛṇu / pūrvaṃ rājā kurukṣetre malayaprabha ityabhūt // 12.5.218	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ kadācitprajābhyo 'rthaṃ durbhikṣe dadataṃ nṛpam / mantribhir vāritaṃ lobhājjagādenduprabhaḥ sutaḥ // 12.5.219	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upekṣase prajāstāta kathaṃ durmantriṇāṃ girā / tvaṃ hi kalpadrumastāsāṃ tāś ca te kāmadhenavaḥ // 12.5.220	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nirbandhāditi jalpantaṃ putraṃ mantrivaśo nṛpaḥ / khedāttaṃ so 'bravīdvatsa kiṃ me 'sti dhanamakṣayam // 12.5.221	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vinā tena prajākalpapādapaścedbhavāmy aham / tattvam eva kimetāsāṃ na dhatse kalpavṛkṣatām // 12.5.222	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvā pituścakre pratijñāṃ sa nṛpātmajaḥ / martavyaṃ kalpavṛkṣatvaṃ sādhyaṃ vā tapasā mayā // 12.5.223	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti niścitya sa prāyānmahāsattvastapovanam / ārūḍha eva tasmiṃś ca sa durbhikṣo nyavartata // 12.5.224	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'rthitavarastīvratapastuṣṭānmahendrataḥ / svasminneva sa saṃjajñe nagare kalpapādapaḥ // 12.5.225	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ākarṣanniva dūrasthānāhvayanniva cārthinaḥ / prasāritābhiḥ śākhābhir dikṣu śabdaiś ca pakṣiṇām // 12.5.226	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
dadau ca kāmānarthibhyo duṣprāpān api so 'nvaham / cakre ca tā nirākāṅkṣāḥ prajāḥ svargasthitā iva // 12.5.227	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kālena ca mahendrastamāgatyovāca lobhayan / pūrṇaḥ paropakāras te svargāyāgamyatāmiti // 12.5.228	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ kalpadrumībhūtastaṃ sa rājasuto 'bhyadhāt / yatra puṣpaiḥ phalai ramyair apyanyataravo 'py amī // 12.5.229	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pārārthyam eva satataṃ bhajanti svārthaniḥspṛhāḥ / tatra kalpatarurbhūtvā svasukhāya kathaṃ divam // 12.5.230	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
iyato 'sya janasyāśācchedaṃ kṛtvā vrajāmy aham / ity udāraṃ vacas tasya śrutvā śakro 'bravītpunaḥ // 12.5.231	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tarhi prajāpi te kṛtsnā svargamāyātvasāviti / tatas tamavadadrājasūnuḥ kalpadrumo 'pi saḥ // 12.5.232	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tuṣṭo 'si cennaya svargaṃ prajā nārtho 'sti tena me / ahaṃ paropakāraikasiddhyai tapsye tapo mahat // 12.5.233	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavantaṃ stutvā taṃ sugatāśaṃ tatheti saḥ / ādāya ca prajāstuṣṭaḥ surendrastridivaṃ yayau // 12.5.234	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi tāṃ tarutāṃ tyaktvā rājaputraḥ svarūpabhṛt / tapasenduprabhaḥ prāpa vanastho bodhisattvatām // 12.5.235	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ syāddānasaktānāṃ siddhiratyuditā mayā / dānapāramitaiṣā te śīlapāramitāṃ śṛṇu // 12.5.236	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
purā śukānāṃ rājābhūdvindhyādrau sugatāṃśajaḥ / prāgjanmābhyastaśīlāḍhyo nāmnā hemaprabho vaśī // 12.5.237	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya jātismarasyāsīdapi dharmopadeśinaḥ / rāgimūrkhaḥ pratīhāro nāmnā cārumatiḥ śukaḥ // 12.5.238	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa jātu pāśinā bhāryāṃ vyādhena nihatāṃ śukīm / śocannavasthāṃ karuṇāṃ tadviyogāturo yayau // 12.5.239	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tataḥ sa śukarājastaṃ yuktyā śokaṃ nivārayan / hemaprabho hitāyaivam uvāca matimānmṛṣā // 12.5.240	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na sā tava mṛtā bhāryā pāśācchākunikasya sā / gatā palāyya dṛṣṭā hi jīvantyeva mayādhunā // 12.5.241	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
darśayāmyehi tubhyaṃ tāmity uktvā sa nināya tam / rājā cārumatiṃ vyomamārgeṇaikaṃ jalāśayam // 12.5.242	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra saṃdarśya tasyaiva pratibimbaṃ jalāntare / tam abravīdiyaṃ sā te bhāryāṃ paśyeha tiṣṭhati // 12.5.243	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā vīkṣya cātrātmapratibimbaṃ sa mūḍhadhīḥ / hṛṣṭaḥ praviśya toye tāmāliliṅga cucumba ca // 12.5.244	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aprāpnuvan priyāsparśam aśṛṇvaṃs tadvacaś ca saḥ / sparśālāpau priyā kiṃ me na dadātīty acintayat // 12.5.245	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kopāśaṅkī tato gatvaivānīyāmalakaṃ tataḥ / cāṭvarthaṃ dayitābuddhyā nyadhāstve pratibimbake // 12.5.246	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tanmagnotpatitaṃ kāntāpratikṣiptamavetya ca / gatvā sakhedo rājānaṃ taṃ hemaprabham abhyadhāt // 12.5.247	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
deva bhāryā na sā sparśamālāpaṃ vā dadāti me / kiṃ caitayā pratikṣiptaṃ dattamāmalakaṃ mayā // 12.5.248	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvā sa rājā taṃ śanaiḥ kṛcchrād ivābravīt / na yuktam etad vaktuṃ me vacmi snehāt tathāpi te // 12.5.249	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
anyānuraktā hy adyaiṣā tvayi prītiṃ kathaṃ bhajet / darśayāmi ca te sākṣādehyatraiva jalāntare // 12.5.250	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā tatra nītvā taṃ svaṃ tadīyaṃ ca vāriṇi / pratibimbe ubhe rājā tasmai śliṣṭe adarśayat // 12.5.251	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
te dṛṣṭvaiva sa tāṃ bhāryāṃ mūrkho mastvānyasaṃgatām / saṃnivṛtya viraktastaṃ svaṃ rājānaṃ vyajijñapat // 12.5.252	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
deva tvadupadeśo yan mayā mūḍhena na śrutaḥ / tasyaiṣa pākas tan me 'tra kartavyamadhunādiśa // 12.5.253	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
iti taṃ kṛtavijñaptiṃ rājā hemaprabho 'tha saḥ / labdhopadeśāvasaraḥ pratīhāram abhāṣata // 12.5.254	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
varaṃ hālāhalaṃ bhuktamahirbaddho varaṃ gale / na punaḥ strīṣu viśvāso maṇimantrādyagocaraḥ // 12.5.255	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

evaṃ taranti kṣamiṇaḥ saṃsāramiti varṇitā / kṣamāpāramitā tubhyaṃ dhair yapāramitāṃ śṛṇu // 12.5.277	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
āsīnmālādharo nāma pūrvaṃ brāhmaṇaputrakaḥ / so 'paśyadekadā siddhakumāraṃ vyomagāminam // 12.5.278	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatspardhayā tṛṇamayān pakṣān ābadhya pārśvayoḥ / utplutyoplutya gagane gatyabhyāsam aśikṣata // 12.5.279	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)

tato hṛṣṭo 'bhyadhāttaṃ sa viśeṣātsiṃhavikramaḥ / bhagavanna yathā mṛtyurbhavenmama tathā kuru // 12.5.332	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tataḥ prabhṛti yatraiva śveto vasati tatra saḥ / na jantūn bādhate 'pyānapyājñayā yantritaḥ prabhoḥ // 12.5.335	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa cādhunā śvetamuniḥ pāre pūrvāmbudheḥ sthitaḥ / taraṅgiṇīṃ nāma nadīṃ samuttīrya tapovane // 12.5.336	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)

bhukttottaraṃ ca tam ahaṃ viśrānto 'tra vyajijñapam / ko bhavān kiṃ ca mām evaṃ mumūrṣuṃ trātavān asi // 12.6.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
mayā hy avaśyaṃ tyaktavyaṃ śarīraṃ svaprabhuṃ vinā / ity uktvā varṇitas tasmai svavṛttānto 'khilo mayā // 12.6.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataś ca sa mahātmā māṃ prītimānevam abravīt / yakṣo 'hamete madbhārye tvaṃ ca prāpto 'dya me 'tithiḥ // 12.6.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
yathāśaktyatitheḥ pūjā dharmo hi gṛhamedhinām / mayārcito 'syataḥ kiṃ ca prāṇān kasmān mumukṣasi // 12.6.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
viyogo nāgaśāpena kaṃcitkālamayaṃ hi vaḥ / avaśyaṃ kṣīṇaśāpānāṃ yuṣmākaṃ syātsamāgamaḥ // 12.6.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nirduḥkho nāma kaścātra saṃsāre bhadra jāyate / yakṣeṇāpi mayā duḥkhaṃ yaddṛṣṭaṃ vacmi tacchṛṇu // 12.6.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
astyasyā vasudhāvadhvā maulimaṇḍanamālikā / trigartā nāma nagarī sumanoguṇagumphitā // 12.6.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tasyāṃ dvijayuvā ko'pi pavitradhara ityabhūt / dhanair daridraḥ svajanair adaridraḥ kulādibhiḥ // 12.6.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
sa vasañ śrīmatāṃ madhye dvijo mānī vyacintayat / eṣām arthavatāṃ madhye vṛtthastho 'pi na bhāmy aham // 12.6.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekaḥ satkāvyaśabdānām iva śabdo nirarthakaḥ / manasvī ca na śaknomi sevāṃ nāpi pratigraham // 12.6.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadgatvā kva cidekānte yakṣiṇīṃ sādhayāmy aham / asti mantropadeśo hi tatra me guruvakrataḥ // 12.6.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti saṃkalpya vidhivadgatvāraṇyāya yakṣiṇīm / bhāryātve sādhayām āsa sa pavitradharo dvijaḥ // 12.6.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
siddhayā ca tayā yuktaḥ saudāminyabhidhānayā / tasthau ghorahimottīrṇo viṭapīva madhuśriyā // 12.6.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā taṃ sutotpattiṃ vinā duḥkhitacetasam / dṛṣṭvā sā yakṣiṇī bhāryā pavitradharam abravīt // 12.6.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
māryaputra kṛthāścintāṃ sūnurūtpadyate hi nau / imaṃ ca śṛṇu vṛttāntamatrāhaṃ kathayāmi te // 12.6.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asti dakṣiṇadikprānte prāvṛṣo janmabhūriva / pihitārkā ghanaśyāmā tamālavanavīthikā // 12.6.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāṃ pṛthūdaro nāma yakṣo vasati viśrutaḥ / tasyāhamiyamekaiva nāmnā saudāminī sutā // 12.6.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā snehāttena pitrāhaṃ nīyamānā kulādriṣu / teṣu teṣu sadākrīḍaṃ divyopavanabhūmiṣu // 12.6.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā ca samaṃ sakhyā krīḍantī kapiśabhruvā / adrākṣamaṭṭahāsākhyaṃ kailāse yakṣaputrakam // 12.6.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi māṃ sakhimadhyastho dṛṣṭavānatha tatkṣaṇam / jātāvāvāṃ kilānyonyarūpākṛṣṭavilocanau // 12.6.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taddṛṣṭvā tulyasaṃyogamavetyāhūya cātra tam / sadyo 'ṣṭahāsaṃ tātena vivāho nau viniścitaḥ // 12.6.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sthāpite lagnadivase tāte māmanayadgṛham / aṭṭahāso 'pi muditaḥ samitraḥ svagṛhānagāt // 12.6.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
anyedyuś ca viṣaṇṇeva kapiśabhrūḥ sakhī mama / āgātsamīpaṃ pṛṣṭā ca kṛcchrādevam abhāṣata // 12.6.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
anākhyeyamapīdaṃ te kathayāmyapriyaṃ sakhi / adyāyāntyā mayā dṛṣṭaḥ so 'ṭṭahāso varastava // 12.6.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
citrasthalākhye himavatsānūdyāne tvadutsukaḥ / vinodayadbhiḥ sakhibhiḥ krīḍayā yakṣarāṭ kṛtaḥ // 12.6.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
bhrātā dīptaśikhas tasya tatputr onaḍakūbaraḥ / kalpitastaiḥ svayaṃ te ca tasya sācivyamāśrayan // 12.6.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ kṛtavinodaṃ taṃ vayasyais tvatpriyaṃ tadā / vyomnā yadṛcchayās gacchann apaśyan naḍakūbaraḥ // 12.6.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tamāhūya saṃkruddho dhanādhipasuto 'śapat / bhṛtyo bhūtvā prabhorlīlāmabhivāñchasi yattataḥ // 12.6.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
durmate bhava martyastvamūrdhvamicchannadho vraja / ity uktastena vignastaṃ so 'ṭṭahāso vyajijñapat // 12.6.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
autsukyaṃ nudatā deva mūrkheṇedaṃ mayā kṛtam / nādhikārābhimānena tatkṣamāṃ kuru me prabho // 12.6.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityārtaṃ tadvacaḥ śrutvā praṇidhānāttathaiva tat / buddhvā śāpāntahetostaṃ so 'bravīnnaḍakūbaraḥ // 12.6.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yasyāṃ tvamutsukastasyāṃ yakṣiṇyāṃ mānuṣo bhavan / janayitvānujaṃ dīptaśikhamevaitamātmajam // 12.6.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śāpādvimuktaḥ svapadaṃ tayā patnyā sahāpsyasi / bhrātā tu te suto bhūtvā kṛtvā rājyamasau bhuvi // 12.6.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
śāponmokṣyata ity ukte tena vitteśasūnunā / so 'ṭṭahāsastirobhūtaḥ kvāpi śāpaprabhāvataḥ // 12.6.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taddṛṣṭvāhamihāyātā pārśvaṃ te sakhi duḥkhitā / ity uktāhaṃ tayā sakhyā duḥkhātkām apy agāṃ daśām // 12.6.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ātmānamanuśocyātha gatvā pitrornivedya tat / anaiṣaṃ tamahaṃ kālaṃ punaḥ saṃgamavāñchayā // 12.6.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'ṭṭahāsastvamutpannaḥ sā cāhaṃ militāvubhau / adyehāvāṃ tad evaṃ nau janitaivācirātsutaḥ // 12.6.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ tayokte jñāninyā saudāminyā praharṣavān / abhūdutpannaputrāsthaḥ sa pavitradharo dvijaḥ // 12.6.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kālena tasya yakṣiṇyāṃ tasyāṃ sūnurajāyata / gṛhaṃ cittaṃ ca jātena tayor yena prakāśitam // 12.6.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvā ca tasya putrasya sa pavitradharo mukham / saṃpede so 'ṭṭahāso 'tra yakṣo divyākṛtiḥ kṣaṇāt // 12.6.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uvāca yakṣiṇīṃ caitā priye śāpo gataḥ sa nau / jātaḥ saiṣo 'ṭṭahāso 'hamehi yāvo nijāṃ gatim // 12.6.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavantaṃ taṃ bhāryā sāvādīcchiśureva te / bhrātā śāpātsutībhūtā kathaṃ syāditi cintyatām // 12.6.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā dhyānato 'vekṣya so 'ṭṭahāso jagāda tām / devadarśana ityasti brāhmaṇo 'syāṃ puri priye // 12.6.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pañcāgnes tasya cānyau dvāvadhikaṃ jvalataḥ kṣudhā / jaṭharāgnī sabhāryasya daridrasya prajādhanaiḥ // 12.6.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dhanaputrārthinaṃ taṃ ca tapasi sthitamekadā / ārādhayantaṃ bhagavānagniḥ svapne samādiśat // 12.6.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
auraso nāsti putras te kṛtrimastu bhaviṣyati / tadvaśādeva ca brahmandāridryaṃ te nivartsyati // 12.6.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityagnyādeśato viprastatpratīkṣo 'dya saṃsthitaḥ / tasmai śiśurayaṃ deyo bhavitavyamidaṃ hi tat // 12.6.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā tāṃ priyāṃ svarṇapūrṇakumbhopari sthitam / kṛtvā ca taṃ galābaddhadivyaratnasrajaṃ śiśum // 12.6.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣiptvā tasya gṛhe rātrau prasuptasya dvijanmanaḥ / sabhāryaya sabhāryaḥ svāṃ so 'ṭṭahāso yayau gatim // 12.6.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi prabudhya vipro 'tra visphuradratnatārakam / apaśyadbālacandraṃ taṃ sabhāryo devadarśanaḥ // 12.6.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kimetaditi vismitya hemakumbhaṃ vilokya tam / sa svapnādeśamāgneyaṃ sasmāra ca nananda ca // 12.6.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jagrāha bālakaṃ taṃ ca putraṃ vidhisamarpitam / dhanaṃ ca tatprabhāte ca vidadhe sa mahotsavam // 12.6.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekādaśe ca divase taya putrasya tatra saḥ / bālasya svocitaṃ nāma śrīdarśana iti vyadhāt // 12.6.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato mahādhano bhūtvā tasthau kratvādikāḥ kriyāḥ / kurvan bhogāṃś ca bhuñjānaḥ sa vipro devadarśanaḥ // 12.6.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi śrīdarśanas tatra vṛddhiṃ prāptaḥ pitur gṛhe / prakarṣaṃ vedavidyāsu prāpāstreṣu ca vīryavān // 12.6.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kālena yauvanasthasya sa pitā devadarśanaḥ / tīrthayātrāgatas tasya prayāge praśamaṃ yayau // 12.6.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadbuddhvā tasya māstāpi praviṣṭāgniṃ tataś ca saḥ / vyadhācchrīdarśanaḥ śocaṃstayoḥ śāstroditāḥ kriyāḥ // 12.6.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śanaiś ca sa tanūbhūtaśoko 'kṛtaparigrahaḥ / dyūtakrīḍāprasakto 'bhūddaivātprājño 'py abāndhavaḥ // 12.6.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
acireṇa ca kālena tasya kṣīṇārthasaṃpadaḥ / tena durvyasanenāsīdbhojane 'pi kadarthanā // 12.6.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā dyūtaśālāyāṃ nirāhārasthitaṃ try aham / aśaknuvantaṃ nirgantuṃ lajjayānucitāmbaram // 12.6.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
anyair dattamabhuñjānaṃ duḥkhitaṃ kitavaḥ sakhā / kaścinmukharako nāma taṃ śrīdarśanam abhyadhāt // 12.6.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ muhyasīd dṛg evedaṃ dyūtavyasanapātakam / aśrīkaṭākṣapātāḥ kimakṣā na viditāstava // 12.6.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bāhū prāvaraṇaṃ śayyā pāṃsavaścatvaraṃ gṛham / bhāryā vidhvastatā dhātrā kitavasya hi nirmitam // 12.6.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ tan na bhuṅkṣe vidvān apy ātmānaṃ kim upekṣase / jīvan hi dhīro 'bhimataṃ kiṃ nāma na yadāpnuyāt // 12.6.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tathā ca citrām atraitāṃ bhūnandanakathāṃ śṛṇu / astīhābharaṇaṃ bhūmeḥ kaśmīrā iti maṇḍalam // 12.6.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛśyabhogaṃ vidhāyaikaṃ tridivaṃ sukṛtāṃ kṛte / bhogyabhogaṃ vidhātā yaddvitīyam iva nirmame // 12.6.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahamatrādhikā nāhamityanyonyamiverṣyayā / praviṣṭābhyāṃ śritaṃ dvābhyāṃ sarasvatyā śriyā ca yat // 12.6.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dharmadruhaḥ praveśo tra kalermā bhūditīva yat / svadehapariveṣeṇa rakṣyate tuhinādriṇā // 12.6.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
devatīrthamayāddūramito yāhīti kalmaṣam / vīcihastair nudantyeva bhūṣitaṃ yadvitastayā // 12.6.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yasminsitasudhādhautāstuṅgāḥ prāsādapaṅktayaḥ / kurvantyāsannahimavatpādaśailāvalībhramam // 12.6.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tasmin varṇāśramaguruḥ prajānandanacandramāḥ / abhūd vidyāgamabudho nāmnās bhūnandano nṛpaḥ // 12.6.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
nakharājiniyukteṣu vireje yasya vikramaḥ / kāminīkucayugmeṣu maṇḍaleṣu ca vidviṣām // 12.6.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yasya nītimato 'py āsan prajāḥ śaśvadanītayaḥ / kṛṣṇaikāsaktacittasyāpy akṛṣṇataramānasāḥ // 12.6.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa jātu rājā dvādaśyāṃ vidhivatpūjitācyutaḥ / svapne kām apy upāyātāmapaśyaddaityakanyakām // 12.6.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tayā saṃprāpya saṃyogaṃ prabuddho na dadarśa tām / vyaktaṃ dadarśa saṃbhogacihnamaṅge tu vismitaḥ // 12.6.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nāyaṃ svapnaḥ sphuṭo hyeṣa saṃbhogastarkayāmy aham / vipralabdhastayā nūnaṃ nāryā kim apidivyayā // 12.6.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityavetya ca taccittas tathābhūdvirahāturaḥ / yathā sa rājakāryāṇi jahau sarvāṇy api kramāt // 12.6.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apaśyan prāptyupāyaṃ ca tasyāḥ so 'cintayan nṛpaḥ / hareḥ prasādāt so 'bhūn me tathā tatsaṃgamakṣaṇaḥ // 12.6.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ārādhayāmi tatprāptyai gatvaikānte tam eva tat / rājyapāśaṃ vimucyemaṃ hā tadvirahanīrasam // 12.6.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti saṃkalpya saṃbodhya sacivānanujāya saḥ / sunandanābhidhānāya rājyaṃ bhūnandano dadau // 12.6.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tyaktarājyaś ca sa yayau pādanyāsodbhavaṃ hareḥ / tīrthaṃ kramasaro nāma trivikramakṛtaṃ purā // 12.6.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
yadadhyāsitam abhyarṇaparvatāgraniveśibhiḥ / śṛṅgākārais tribhir devair brahmaviṣṇumaheśvaraiḥ // 12.6.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yena viṣṇupadenānyā kāśmīreṣu surāpagā / sṛṣṭā viṣuvatī nāma vitastā matsarādiva // 12.6.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāsītsa tapaḥ kurvanrājānyarasaniḥspṛhaḥ / klāmyannavyarasākāṅkṣī nidāgha iva cātakaḥ // 12.6.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vyatītadvādaśābde ca tasmiṃs tatra tapaḥsthite / agāttena pathā ko'pi tapasvī jñānināṃ varaḥ // 12.6.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
piṅgalāgrajaṭaścīravāsāḥ śiṣyagaṇānvitaḥ / tattīrthaśailaśikharādavatīrṇa iveśvaraḥ // 12.6.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
sa taṃ dṛṣṭvaiva rājānaṃ jātaprītirupetya ca / prahvaḥ pṛṣṭvā ca vṛttāntaṃ dhyātvā kṣaṇamivābravīt // 12.6.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājansā daityakanyā te priyā pāstālavāsinī / tadāśvasihi tasyāstvāmantikaṃ prāpayāmy aham // 12.6.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ hi dākṣiṇātyasya yajñasaṃjñasya yajvanaḥ / putro bhūtivasur nāma brāhmaṇo yogināṃ guruḥ // 12.6.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'haṃ saṃkramitajñānaḥ pitrā pātālaśāstrataḥ / śikṣitvā haṭakeśānamantratantravidhikramam // 12.6.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā śrīparvate 'kārṣaṃ tryambakārādhanaṃ tapaḥ / tena tuṣṭo 'tha māṃ tatra sākṣādityādiśacchivaḥ // 12.6.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gaccha daityāṅganāyukto bhuktvā bhogānrasātale / mām upaiṣyasyupāyaṃ ca tatprāptau śṛṇu vacmi te // 12.6.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
santi bhūyāṃsi pātālavivarāṇyatra bhūtale / prakāśaṃ tv asti kaśmīreṣv ekaṃ mayakṛtaṃ mahat // 12.6.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yena praveśya guptāsu dānavodyānabhūmiṣu / uṣā bāṇasutā kāsntamaniruddhaṃ vyanodayat // 12.6.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pradyumnaś ca tadā putraṃ rakṣituṃ taṃ vyadhatta yat / prakaṭaṃ giriśṛṅgeṇa prakalpya dvāramekataḥ // 12.6.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taddvārarakṣāhetoś ca yatra durgāṃ nyaveśayat / ārādhya sa stutiśataḥ śārikānām adhāriṇīm // 12.6.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
yena pradyumnaśikharaṃ śārikākūṭamityapi / nāmadvayena tattatra sthānamadyābhidhīyate // 12.6.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
gaccha tena bilāgreṇa praviśyānucaraiḥ saha / pātālaṃ matprasādāc ca siddhiste 'tra bhaviṣyati // 12.6.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvāntarhite deve tatprasādaprabhāvataḥ / utpannākhilavijñānaḥ kaśmīrānāgato 'smyamūn // 12.6.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad asmābhiḥ samaṃ rājañ śārikākūṭam ehi tat / yāvad iṣṭāṅganāpārśvaṃ pātālaṃ tvāṃ nayāmy aham // 12.6.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktavatā tena tathesi sa tapasvinā / samaṃ tacchārikākūṭaṃ yayau bhūnandano nṛpaḥ // 12.6.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra snātvā vitastāyāmarcayitvā vināyakam / saṃpūjya śārikāṃ devīṃ digbandhādipuraḥ saram // 12.6.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidhivatsarṣapakṣepāddharānugrahaśālinā / mahātapasvinā tena vivare prakaṭīkṛte // 12.6.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praviśya tenaiva samaṃ saśiṣyeṇa sa bhūpatiḥ / jagāma pātālapathaṃ pañcāhāni divāniśam // 12.6.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
ṣaṣṭhe 'hni sarve 'pyuttīrya gaṅgāṃ pātālavāhinīm / bhūmau rajatamayyāṃ te divyamaikṣanta kānanam // 12.6.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

tataś ca sa tapasvī tānsvaśiṣyāṃstaṃ ca bhūpatim / bhūnandanaṃ jñānivaro jātāścaryānabhāṣata // 12.6.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)

tac chrutvāpi cakhādaikastacchiṣyastatphalaṃ kṣudhā / khāditvaiva ca saṃpede niśceṣṭaḥ sthāvarākṛtiḥ // 12.6.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

yatsuślakṣṇamahānīlamayabhūbhaganirmitam / divaḥ pṛṣṭhamivārūḍhaṃ vimānavijigīṣayā // 12.6.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

nīlotpalasavarṇāṅgalekhā ratirivaikikā / haradagdhasya kāmasya dhūmena śyāmalīkṛtā // 12.6.196	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā taṃ śrīdarśanaṃ dṛṣṭvā premanirbharayā dṛśā / upetya darśanaprītaṃ savayasyamabhāṣata // 12.6.197	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kutrāgatau mahābhāgau yuvāmiha vipattaye / kimajñānājjvalatyagnau patitau sthaḥ pataṅgavat // 12.6.198	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etacchrutvā sa saṃbhrāntaḥ kanyāṃ mukharako 'tra tām / papraccha kā tvaṃ kiṃ caitattvayoktaṃ kathyatām iti // 12.6.199	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tato 'bravītsā saṃkṣepādvacmyetacchṛṇutaṃ yuvām / astyagrahāraḥ sumahānsughoṣo nāma viśrutaḥ // 12.6.200	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tatrābhūtpadmagarbhākhyo brāhmaṇo vedavittamaḥ / tasyottamakulā bhāryā nāmnā śaśikalābhavat // 12.6.201	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāṃ ca tasyāpatye dve jāte āstāṃ sujanmanaḥ / suto mukharako nāma padmiṣṭheti sutāpy aham // 12.6.202	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa me mukharako bhrātā dyūtavyasanaviplutaḥ / bālye 'pi nirgatya gṛhātkvāpi deśāntaraṃ gataḥ // 12.6.203	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tena śokena paścatvaṃ gatāyāṃ mama mātari / matpitobhayaduḥkhārtastyaktavānsa gṛhasthitim // 12.6.204	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekākī ca gṛhītvā māṃ taṃ gaveṣayituṃ sutam / bhrāmyagnitastataḥ prāpadimaṃ grāmaṃ vidhervaśāt // 12.6.205	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

teneha prāpya pāpena sabhṛtyena piturmama / tasya prāṇāḥ suvarṇaṃ ca śarīrāntargataṃ hṛtam // 12.6.207	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ ca tena nītvaiva gṛhaṃ bandīkṛtā satī / subhūtināmne putrāya pradātuṃ parikalpitā // 12.6.208	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)

tadeṣa cauro dṛṣṭvā vāṃ kuryādatyāhitaṃ dhruvam / vimucyethe yathaitasmādupāyaṃ kurutaṃ tathā // 12.6.210	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

tac chrutvā sāpi padmiṣṭhā vignā dṛṣṭe 'graje tathā / kṛpayevākhilair duḥkhaiḥ parivavre javādyathā // 12.6.213	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tataḥ śrīdarśano māndyaṃ vidhāyāsīnnipatya saḥ / tīre tasya taḍāgasya kṛśaḥ pūrvair abhojanaiḥ // 12.6.217	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pādau tasya gṛhītvā ca tasthau mukharako rudan / padmiṣṭhā ca yayau tasya pārśvaṃ caurapaterdrutam // 12.6.218	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abravīc ca taḍāgānte mandaḥ ko 'pyāgataḥ sthitaḥ / pānthas tasya dvitīyaś ca tatrāste paricārakaḥ // 12.6.219	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvaiva sa cauro 'tra bhṛtyāṃścaurānvisṛṣṭavān / te gatvā tau tathārūpau dṛṣṭvā mukharakaṃ tayoḥ // 12.6.220	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tato hate 'pi paṭahe yadā prāpto na tādṛśaḥ / vīraḥ ko'pi tadā rājā sacivānevamādiśat // 12.6.262	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

etac chrutvā sapadmiṣṭhaṃ sā taṃ mukharakānvitam / nītvā vṛddhā maṭhe tatra maṭhādhipatim abhyadhāt // 12.6.269	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

gacchārdhakrośamātre 'sti paścimāyāmito diśi / citāgnitāpanirdagdhapallapaḥ śiṃśapātaruḥ // 12.6.285	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tatas tatheti sa gatas tatra śrīdarśano drutam / anyena nīyamānaṃ taṃ kenāpi śavamaikṣata // 12.6.287	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
dhāvitvā tasya ca skandhāccakarṣa tamamuñcataḥ / muñca dāhyaṃ kva me mittraṃ nayasy etam iti bruvan // 12.6.288	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ so 'pi dvitīyo 'tra taṃ śrīdarśanam abravīt / na mokṣyāmi mama hy eṣa mittraṃ ko 'sya bhavān iti // 12.6.289	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ tayor ubhayataḥ skandhayoḥ karṣatoḥ śavaḥ / vetālānupraviṣṭaḥ sannamuñcadbhair avaṃ ravam // 12.6.290	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

tāvac cātra dvitīyaḥ sa mṛto 'pyutthāya pūruṣaḥ / vetālādhiṣṭhito rundhaṃstaṃ śrīdarśanamuktavān // 12.6.292	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

ahamevaṃ bruve mahyamāhāraṃ yaḥ prayaṃcchati / kṣudhitāya sa me mittraṃ svecchaṃ nayatu māṃ ca saḥ // 12.6.296	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

nagaryāmekalavyāyāṃ purā śrutadharābhidhaḥ / rājābhūttasya cābhūtāṃ sutau dvau bhāryayor dvayoḥ // 12.7.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tayoḥ śīladharaṃ nāma jyeṣṭhaṃ tasmindivaṃ gate / rājyātsatyadharo nāma kanīyānniravāsayat // 12.7.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'tha śīladharo gatvā tenāmarṣeṇa śaṃkaram / ārādhya tapasā tuṣṭāttasmādvaramayācata // 12.7.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhūyāsaṃ deva gandharvo yenāmbaracaro bhavan / taṃ satyadharadāyādaṃ hanyāmevāvahelayā // 12.7.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā bhagavānevaṃ śaṃbhurādiśati sma tam / etatte bhāvi kiṃ tvadya sa śatruste mṛtaḥ svayam // 12.7.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
janiṣyate ca rāḍhāyāṃ punarugrabhaṭasya saḥ / nṛpasya putraḥ samarabhaṭo nāma pitṛpriyaḥ // 12.7.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tvaṃ ca bhīmabhaṭo nāma tasya dvaimāturo 'grajaḥ / bhrātā janiṣyate taṃ ca hatvā rājyaṃ kariṣyasi // 12.7.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāmarṣeṇa tvayā caitadyatastaptaṃ tapas tataḥ / muniśāpātpadabhraṣṭo vanyo hastī bhaviṣyasi // 12.7.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jātismaro vyaktavān kva bhavān āśvāsayiṣyati / yadāvasannam atithiṃ svavṛttāntaṃ ca vakṣyati // 12.7.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tadā gajatvān nirmukto gandharvas tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi / upakāraś ca tasyāpi bhaviṣyaty atithes tadā // 12.7.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityādiśya tirobhūte bharge śīladharo 'tra saḥ / dṛṣṭvā ciratapaḥkṣīṇāṃ gaṅgāyāṃ tanumakṣipat // 12.7.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atrāntare kathāsaṃdhau pūrvoddiṣṭasya bhūpateḥ / tasyograbhaṭasaṃjñasya rāḍhāyāṃ puri tulyayā // 12.7.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
manoramākhyayā devyā samaṃ nivasataḥ sukham / pārśvaṃ deśāntarādāgāllāsako nāma nartakaḥ // 12.7.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca nāṭyaprayogaṃ taṃ rājñe tasmāyadarśayat / daityānāṃ hariṇā yatra hṛtaṃ strīrūpiṇāmṛtam // 12.7.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra cāmṛtikābhūmau nṛtyantīṃ nartakasya saḥ / dadarśa tanayāṃ tasya nāmnā lāsyavatīṃ nṛpaḥ // 12.7.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāḥ sa rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvaiva viśvakṣobhitadānavam / satyāmṛtāyā iva tadrājā kāmavaśaṃ yayau // 12.7.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
nṛttānte ca dhanaṃ bhūri tatpitre pravitīrya saḥ / prāveśayattāṃ tatkālaṃ kanyāmantaḥpuraṃ svakam // 12.7.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatas tayā sa nartakyā vihitodvāhayā saha / lāsyavatyā nṛpastasthau tanmukhāsaktalocanaḥ // 12.7.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā sa yajuḥsvāmisaṃjñaṃ prāha purohitam / putro nāstīha me tattvaṃ putreṣṭiṃ mama kurviti // 12.7.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tatheti vidhivattāmiṣṭiṃ tasya bhūpateḥ / purohitaḥ sa vidadhe vidvadbhir brāhmaṇaiḥ saha // 12.7.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
prāśayanmantrapūtaṃ ca taddevīṃ tāṃ manoramām / bhāgamagryaṃ carorjyeṣṭhāṃ sa pūrvārādhitastayā // 12.7.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śeṣaṃ tasyai dvitīyasyai lāsyavatyai dadau ca saḥ / tataś ca tau tayoḥ śīladharasatyadharāvubhau // 12.7.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ubhayor udare rājñyoḥ pūrvoktau saṃbabhūvatuḥ / prāpte ca samaye cātra devī tasya mahīpateḥ // 12.7.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
manoramā prasūte sma putraṃ kalyāṇalakṣaṇam / eṣa bhīmabhaṭo nāma jātaḥ khyātayaśā nṛpaḥ // 12.7.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uccacāra tatkālaṃ suspaṣṭā bhāratī divaḥ / tato 'nyedyuḥ prasuṣuve sāpi lāsyavatī sutam // 12.7.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
pitā cataṃ sa samarabhaṭaṃ nāmnākaronnṛpaḥ / atha tau kṛtasaṃskārāvavardhetāṃ śanaiḥ śiśū // 12.7.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
jyeṣṭho bhīmabhaṭastaṃ tu kaniṣṭhamajayadguṇaiḥ / tatsaṃgharṣeṇa cānyonyaṃ tayor vairamavardhata // 12.7.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā bāhunā bāhuyuddhakelau samatsaraḥ / hanti sma kaṇṭhe samarabhaṭo bhīmabhaṭaṃ haṭhāt // 12.7.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tato bhīmabhaṭaḥ krodhādbhujābhyāṃ pariveṣṭya tam / nyadhādutkṣipya samarabhaṭaṃ caṭaditi kṣitau // 12.7.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
sa tenābhihato gāḍhaṃ sarvadvārair asṛgvaman / samutthāpyāntikaṃ māturnīto 'bhūnnijasevakaiḥ // 12.7.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā taṃ dṛṣṭvā ca buddhvā ca vṛttāntaṃ snehakātarā / tasya mūrdhani mūrdhānamāsajya prārudadbhṛśam // 12.7.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvadrājñā praviṣṭena taddṛṣṭvākulacetasā / kimetaditi pṛṣṭā sā lāsyavatyevam abravīt // 12.7.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iyaṃ bhīmabhaṭenāsya kṛtāvasthā sutasya me / sadā cābhibhavatyenaṃ na cāhaṃ deva vacmi te // 12.7.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
idaṃ dṛṣṭvā tu jāne 'haṃ tavaiva syācchivaṃ katham / tasminnevaṃvidhe putre vicārayatu vā bhavān // 12.7.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ tayoktaḥ priyayā sa tamugrabhaṭo nṛpaḥ / kruddho bhīmabhaṭaṃ svātmasaṃnikarṣānnyavārayat // 12.7.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
hṛtavṛttiṃ ca kṛtvainaṃ rājaputraśataṃ vyadhāt / rakṣārthaṃ tasya samarabhaṭasya saparicchadam // 12.7.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
svādhīnaṃ cākarottasya bhāṇḍāgāraṃ kanīyasaḥ / taṃ tu bhīmabhaṭaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ sarvākāramapākarot // 12.7.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato mātā tamāhūya sā vakti sma manoramā / nartakīrāgiṇā tāvat pitrā tvaṃ parivarjitaḥ // 12.7.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tanmātāmahaśālāṃ tvaṃ gaccha pāṭaliputrakam / tatra mātāmahaḥ svaṃ te rājyaṃ dāsyatyaputrakaḥ // 12.7.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iha tvāṃ caiṣa samarabhaṭo hanyādripurbalī / iti māturvacaḥ śrutvā tāṃ sa bhīmabhaṭo 'bravīt // 12.7.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣatriyaḥ sanna deśaṃ svaṃ tyakṣyāmi klībavadbhayāt / dhīrā bhavāmba kaḥ śakto varāko māṃ prabādhitum // 12.7.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavantaṃ taṃ mātā sābravīt tarhi bhūyasaḥ / sahāyān kuru rakṣārthaṃ madīyais tvaṃ dhanair iti // 12.7.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato bhīmabhaṭo 'vādīd etad amba na śobhate / evaṃ hi satyaṃ tātasya prātipakṣyaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavet // 12.7.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tanme tvadāśiṣaiva syātkalyāṇaṃ nirvṛtā bhava / ityāśvāsya sa tāṃ bhīmabhaṭo niragamattataḥ // 12.7.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca tatra buddhvā tatpaurāḥ sarve vyacintayan / anaucityaṃ paraṃ rājñā kṛtaṃ bhīmabhaṭasya tu // 12.7.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
naivāsya rājyaṃ samarabhaṭo hartuṃ pragalbhate / tadeṣa pūrvasevāyāḥ kālo bhīmabhaṭasya naḥ // 12.7.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti niścitya guptaṃ te paurā bhīmabhaṭaṃ dhanaiḥ / tathāpuṣyanyathā so 'tra tasthau bhṛtyaiḥ samaṃ sukham // 12.7.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaniṣṭhaḥ sa tu tasyāsīdvadham eva nirūpayan / pituḥ paricchadakṛtaḥ parikalpya tadāśayam // 12.7.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tāvac ca śaṅkadattākhyo vipraḥ śūro yuvā dhanī / dvayor vayasyaḥ samarabhaṭam etya tam abravīt // 12.7.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
bhrātrā vairaṃ na yuktaṃ te naiṣa dharmo na ca tvayā / jyāyānsa bādhituṃ śakyaḥ syādakīrtiḥ paraṃ tava // 12.7.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti bruvannadhikṣipya sa tena nirabhartsyata / hitopadeśo mūrkhasya kopāyaiva na śāntaye // 12.7.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatas tatkopato gatvā dhīrastadvijigīṣayā / śaṅkhadatto vyadhādekasakhyaṃ bhīmabhaṭena saḥ // 12.7.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athātra maṇidattākhyaḥ ko'pi deśāntarāgataḥ / ānītavān aśvaratnam ekam atyuttamaṃ vaṇik // 12.7.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
śaśāṅkadhavalaṃ śuddhaśaṅkhādiśravyaniḥsvanam / dugdhābdheriva kallolajālamucchritamutthitam // 12.7.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rocamānaiḥ samāyuktacūḍāmaṇyaṅgadādibhiḥ / gandharvakulasaṃbhūtisaṃsiddhair iva bhūṣitam // 12.7.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ākhyātaṃ śaṅkhadattena taṃ ca gatvā hayottamam / krīṇāti sma dhanair bhīmabhaṭastasmādvaṇigvarāt // 12.7.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkṣaṇaṃ cātra samarabhaṭo buddhvā tadaitya saḥ / mūlyena dviguṇenāśvaṃ vaṇijo mārgati sma tam // 12.7.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
paratantrīkṛtaṃ taṃ ca tasmai nādādvaṇigyadā / tadā so 'śvaṃ balānnetuṃ taṃ prāvartata matsarāt // 12.7.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tenobhayostayo rājaputrayoḥ śastrapāṇiṣu / bhṛtyeṣu dhāviteṣv atra samabhūdyuddhamuddhatam // 12.7.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra bhīmabhaṭoccaṇḍadordaṇḍanihatānugaḥ / tyaktvā hayaṃ sa samarabhaṭo 'bhajyata tadbhayāt // 12.7.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
bhajyamānaṃ ca dhāvitvā keśeṣvākṛṣya pṛṣṭhataḥ / nihanti śaṅkhadattas taṃ yāvan manyubharākulaḥ // 12.7.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvadbhīmabhaṭaḥ paścādupetyainaṃ nyavārayat / āstāṃ saṃprati tātasya duḥkhamevaṃ bhavediti // 12.7.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa śaṅkhadattena mukto raktaṃ vraṇair vaman / trastaḥ palāyya samarabhaṭaḥ pārśvamagātpituḥ // 12.7.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tato 'tra svīkṛtāṃśvaṃ taṃ vīraṃ bhīmabhaṭaṃ kṣaṇāt / upetya brāhmaṇaḥ kaścinnītvā vijanam abravīt // 12.7.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mātā manoramā devī yajuḥsvāmī purohitaḥ / pitṛmantrī sa sumatistvāmidaṃ bruvate 'dhunā // 12.7.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
jānāsi yādṛśo vatsa rājā tvayi viśeṣataḥ / asminvyatikare vṛtte śatrutām eva te gataḥ // 12.7.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadātmānaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca yaśaś ca yadi rakṣasi / āyatiṃ yadi jānāsi yadyasmānmanyase hitān // 12.7.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadarko 'staṃ gato yāvaditastāvadalakṣitaḥ / nirgatya sāṃprataṃ siddhyai mātāmahagṛhaṃ vraja // 12.7.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti saṃdiṣṭavadbhiś ca sadratnasvarṇapūritam / tair idaṃ preṣitaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ maddhastena ca gṛhyatām // 12.7.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etattasmāddvijāc chrutvā sa tathetyabhinandya ca / sudhīstatsvarṇasadratnabhāṇḍaṃ bhīmabhaṭo 'grahīt // 12.7.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dattvā ca pratisaṃdeśamanurūpaṃ visṛjya tam / dvijaṃ kṛpāṇapāṇistamārūḍho 'bhūtturaṅgamam // 12.7.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gṛhītahemaratnena dvitīyāśvādhirohiṇā / sahitaḥ śaṅkhadattena so 'tha prasthitavāṃs tataḥ // 12.7.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dūraṃ vyatītya cādhvānaṃ niśīthe sa nṛpātmajaḥ / prāpadbhīmabhaṭo mārgamadhye śaravaṇaṃ mahāt // 12.7.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrānavarataṃ tasya savayasyasya gacchataḥ / patadvājikhurakṣuṇṇaśaraśabdaprabodhitam // 12.7.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
utthāya siṃhamitunamudgarjatpotakaiḥ saha / apāṭayattu turagau nakhair udarayor adhaḥ // 12.7.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
sadvitīyaś ca tānsarvānsiṃhāvīraḥ sa tatkṣaṇam / khaḍgaprahāralūnāṅgānakarodgatajīvitān // 12.7.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
samittro 'py avaruhyātha turagau yāvadīkṣate / tāvadvigalitāntrau tau bhūmāv apatatāmubhau // 12.7.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taddṛṣṭvā sa viṣaṇṇastaṃ śaṅkhadattam abhāṣata / sakhe viruddhātsvajanādvayaṃ yatnātpalāyitāḥ // 12.7.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
brūhi yatnaśatenāpi kva palāyāmahe vidheḥ / yenehāpi hatāḥ smo 'dya vāhamātrāsahiṣṇunā // 12.7.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yatkṛte vihito deśatyāgaḥ so 'pi hayo mṛtaḥ / tadasmābhiḥ kathaṃ padbhyāṃ gamyeyamaṭavī niśi // 12.7.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktastena sa suhṛcchaṅkhadattastam abravīt / naitan navaṃ jayati yatpauruṣaṃ vidhuro vidhiḥ // 12.7.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
nisarga evaṃ tasyāyaṃ dhairyeṇa tu sa jīyate / vāto 'drer iva kiṃ kuryād dhīrasyākampitasya saḥ // 12.7.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadehyārūḍhadhair yāśvau vrajāvo 'treti vādinā / śaṅkhadattena sa samaṃ prāyādbhīmabhaṭas tataḥ // 12.7.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
vyatikrāntasya śanakaiḥ kāntāramatha tasya tat / śarapāṭitapādasya śarvarī paryahīyata // 12.7.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
udite 'tha jagaddīpe bhānau naiśatamomuṣi / mārgābjinīsarojeṣu madhurakvaṇitāliṣu // 12.7.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
diṣṭyā siṃhādisaṃkīrṇā tīrṇo 'yamaṭavīmimām / jalpatsvivotphullamukheṣv anyonyamavalokya tam // 12.7.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
krameṇa gacchann uṭajaiḥ samakīrṇaṃ tapasvinām / pulinaṃ jahnukanyāyāḥ prāpat sa savayasyakaḥ // 12.7.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra śārvaśirovāsalagnacandrāmṛtair iva / tajjalaiḥ svādubhiḥ śītaiḥ snāto viśrāmyati sma saḥ // 12.7.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vyādhānmārgāgatātkrītair bhṛṣṭaiś ca hariṇāmiṣaiḥ / śaṅkhadattopanītaiś ca dehavṛttiṃ vyadhatta saḥ // 12.7.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttarītum aśakyāṃ ca pūrṇām ālokya jāhnvavīm / taraṅgahastair asakṛd vārayantīm ivocchritaiḥ // 12.7.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tasyāḥ kūlena sa tato gatvā brāhmaṇaputrakam / svādhyāyāsaktamadrākṣīdvijanasthoṭajāṅgaṇe // 12.7.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
upetya tamapṛcchac ca kastvaṃ kimiha nirjane / ekākyeva karoṣīti tataḥ so 'pyenam abhyadhāt // 12.7.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ vārāṇasīvāsī śrīkaṇṭhākhyadvijātmajaḥ / nīlakaṇṭhābhidhaḥ pitrā kṛtasaṃskārapaddhatiḥ // 12.7.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'haṃ gurukulādhītavidyo bālye nijaṃ gṛham / upaimi yāvat tāvan me vinaṣṭāḥ sarvabāndhavāḥ // 12.7.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tenānātho 'rthahīnaś ca gārhasthyāsiddhiduḥsthitaḥ / nirviṇṇo 'hamihāgatya tapastīvramaśiśriyam // 12.7.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ svapne 'bravīddevī gaṅgā dattvā phalāni me / etāni khādaṃs tiṣṭheha yāvat prāpsyasi vāñchitam // 12.7.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
etac chrutvā prabuddhyaiva gatvā snātvā niśākṣaye / prāpaṃ phalāni gaṅgāyāmāgatāni jalāntare // 12.7.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tānyānīyāmṛtasvādūnyuṭaje 'haṃ ca bhuktavān / evaṃ tānyanvahaṃ prāptānyāśnannahamiha sthitaḥ // 12.7.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti tenodite śaṅkhadattaṃ bhīmabhaṭo 'bravīt / asmai gārhasthyaparyāptaṃ dadāmi guṇine dhanam // 12.7.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā śraddhitavacāstena rājasuto 'tha saḥ / mātrā nisṛṣṭaṃ taddravyamadāttasmai dvijanmane // 12.7.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
aluptasattvakoṣāṇāṃ mahattvaṃ mahatāṃ hi kim / ākarṇitāṃ parasyārtiṃ na cecchindanti tatkṣaṇam // 12.7.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtārthīkṛtya taṃ vipraṃ tato gatvā sa sarvataḥ / cinvannuttaraṇopāyaṃ gaṅgāyāṃ nāptavānyadā // 12.7.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadā bhīmabhaṭo mūrdhanibaddhāsivibhūṣaṇaḥ / śaṅkhadattayuto dorbhyāṃ tarītuṃ tāmavātarat // 12.7.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
madhyabhāge ca vāryoghadūrīkṛtavayasyakaḥ / kathaṃcit tīrṇavān pāraṃ hriyamāṇaḥ sa vīcibhiḥ // 12.7.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pāraṃ prāptasya mittraṃ taṃ śaṅkhadattamapaśyataḥ / anviṣyataścānutaṭaṃ tasyāstamagamadraviḥ // 12.7.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tato nirāśo hā mittretyākrandannatiduḥkhitaḥ / gaṅgāyāṃ kṣeptumātmānamudyato 'bhūnniśāgame // 12.7.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
jīvitaṃ me sahā devi jāhnavyapahṛtastvayā / tacchūnyaṃ deham apy etaṃ tvaṃ gṛhāṇādhunā mama // 12.7.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā yāvadātmānaṃ kṣeptumicchati tatra saḥ / tāvadāvirabhūtsākṣādgaṅgā tasyāmbumadhyataḥ // 12.7.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abravīttīvrasaṃvegatuṣṭā sā taṃ ca tatkṣaṇam / mā putra sāhasaṃ kārṣīḥ sa te jīvansakhā sthitaḥ // 12.7.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
acireṇa ca saṃyogastava tena bhaviṣyati / pratilomānulomākhyāṃ vidyāṃ caitāṃ gṛhāṇa me // 12.7.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adṛśyaḥ syāt parasyaitām anulomāṃ paṭhan naraḥ / pratilomāṃ paṭhan kuryād iṣṭarūpaprakāśanam // 12.7.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etatprabhāvā vidyeyaṃ yat sā saptākṣarobhitā / etatprabhāvāt tvaṃ cāsyāṃ pṛthvyāṃ rājā bhaviṣyasi // 12.7.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ity uktvā dattavidyā sā tiro 'bhūttasya jāhnavī / jātāsthaḥ sakhilābhādau maraṇātso 'py upāramat // 12.7.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mittraprāptyutsuko nītvā kṛcchrāt padma iva kṣapām / prātar bhīmabhaṭas taṃ sa cinvan prasthitavāṃs tataḥ // 12.7.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athānveṣṭuṃ kramādetaṃ śaṅkhadattaṃ paribhraman / deśaṃ sa lāṭaviṣayaṃ kadācitprāpadekakaḥ // 12.7.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
yatrāsaṃkīrṇavarṇo 'pi janaścitrojjvalasthitiḥ / nilayo 'pi kalānāṃ yo na doṣākaraśabdabhāk // 12.7.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāntarnagare devakulāvāsānvilokayan / bhrāntvā sa dyūtakārāṇāmekāṃ śālāmavāptavān // 12.7.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra praviśya cāpaśyatkitavānakṣadevinaḥ / kaṭikarpaṭamātraikavasanānapi peśalaiḥ // 12.7.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vibhaktaiḥ pīvaraiścāṅgair bhogavyāyāmasūcakaiḥ / śaṃsato gūḍham aiśvaryam arthārthāśritatatkalam // 12.7.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtālāpaiś ca taiḥ sākaṃ dyūtamārabhate sma saḥ / ayaṃ sābharaṇo 'smākaṃ bhakṣya ityāttabuddhibhiḥ // 12.7.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatastena hṛtaṃ teṣāṃ jitvākṣair akhilaṃ dhanam / dhūrtair yadvañcayitvānyāṃstair abhūtsam upārjitam // 12.7.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hāritārthāṃś ca kitavān svagṛhān gantum udyatān / dvārārpitabhujo ruddhvā sa tān bhīmabhaṭo 'bravīt // 12.7.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kva gacchathedaṃ gṛhṇīta dhanaṃ kimamunā mama / mayaitaddeyamiṣṭebhyo yūyaṃ ceṣṭā na kiṃ mama // 12.7.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhavadbhiḥ sadṛśān iṣṭān sakhīn prāpnomy ahaṃ kutaḥ / iti tasmin vadaty eva teṣv agṛhṇatsu ca hriyā // 12.7.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akṣakṣapaṇako nāma tatraikaḥ kitavo 'bravīt / taddyūtaparibhāṣaiṣā hāritaṃ yanna dīyate // 12.7.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathāpyeṣa suhṛdbhūtvā yadyasmabhyaṃ prayacchati / svecchayā jitam apy arthaṃ tadgṛhṇīmo vayaṃ na kim // 12.7.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā te 'bruvannanye sakhyaṃ cedeṣa śāśvatam / tādṛśaṃ kurute 'smābhistadaitadupapadyate // 12.7.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktavatastānsa matvā vīrāṃs tatheti taiḥ / vyadhādbhīmabhaṭaḥ sakhyamadāttebhyaś ca taddhanam // 12.7.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadarthitaś ca taiḥ sākamudyāne sakuṭumbakaiḥ / gatvā bhojanapānādyair vyaharattadupāhṛtaiḥ // 12.7.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'kṣakṣapaṇādyais taiḥ pṛṣṭas tebhyo 'bravīn nijam / sa vaṃśanāmavṛttāntam apṛchac ca tathaiva tān // 12.7.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athaivamakṣakṣapaṇastasmai svodantam abhyadhāt / śivadattābhidhāno 'bhūdbrāhmaṇo hastināpure // 12.7.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāhaṃ vasudattākhyo mahādhanavataḥ sutaḥ / bālye mayā śastravidyā vedavidyāś ca śikṣitāḥ // 12.7.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
tato vivāhaḥ pitrā me vihitaḥ sadṛśātkulāt / mātā tu me mahāraudrā durārādhyātikopanā // 12.7.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tayā codvejito 'py arthaṃ dṛṣṭvā māṃ saparigraham / pitā me svagṛhaṃ tyaktvā sa gataḥ kvāpy atarkitaḥ // 12.7.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad dṛṣṭvā sabhayo 'mbāyāś cittagrahavidhāvaham / yatnān niyuktavān bhāryāṃ sāpi bhītā tathākarot // 12.7.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ambā tu tasyā nātuṣyatkathaṃcitkalahodyatā / tūṣṇīṃsthānamavajñānaṃ dainyālāpaṃ ca kaitavam // 12.7.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
pratyāyanaṃ vivādaṃ ca manyamānā durāśayā / ko hi tyājayituṃ śakto vahneḥ svāṃ dahanātmatām // 12.7.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tasyā viruddhaistaiśceṣṭitaiḥ sā mamācirāt / khinnā bhāryāpi nirgatya na jāne kva gatā gṛhāt // 12.7.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athodvigno gṛhaṃ tyaktumanā api balādaham / militvā bandhubhiḥ pāpair vivāhaṃ kārito 'param // 12.7.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpi bhāryā mama tayā tathā saṃtāpitāmbhayā / udbadhya pāśenātmānaṃ vyāpāditavatī yathā // 12.7.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tato 'haṃ nitarāṃ khinno videśaṃ gantumudyataḥ / nivārayadbhyo bandhubhyo 'varṇayaṃ mātṛduṣṭatām // 12.7.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
pitṛpravāsanādau me kāraṇāntaravādinām / teṣāṃ yatpratyayo nābhūttadyuktyā dāruputrikā // 12.7.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kārayitvā mayaikānte pariṇītā mṛṣā punaḥ / ānīya sthāpitā cāntargṛhe 'nyatrārpitārgale // 12.7.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rakṣikaikā kṛtā cāsyā nārī karmakarīnibhā / mayaiṣā nūtanā bhāryā sthāpitaiva pṛthaggṛhe // 12.7.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvaṃ cāhaṃ cādhunātraiva svagṛhe pṛthagāsvahe / na gantavyaṃ tvayā tatra nāgantavyamitastayā // 12.7.168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ārādhanaṃ tavāprauḍhā na sā vetti hi saṃprati / ityambām abravaṃ cāhamanvamanyata sāpi tat // 12.7.169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato dineṣu yāteṣu yadā tāṃ kapaṭasnuṣām / na kathaṃcidapi prāpatsārgale 'ntargṛhe sthitām // 12.7.170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadāśmanā sā mūrdhānamāhatya svayamekadā / tāramākrandati smāmbā raktāktā svagṛhāṅgaṇe // 12.7.171	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutvākrandaṃ praviṣṭena mayā sarvaiś ca bāndhavaiḥ / dṛṣṭvā kim etad brūhīti pṛṣṭā sāsūyam abhyadhāt // 12.7.172	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
īdṛśī snuṣayāgatya vināhetuḥ kṛtā mama / avasthā tadidānīṃ me maraṇenaiva niṣkṛtiḥ // 12.7.173	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvaiva sakopāste tāṃ sahādāya bāndhavāḥ / tatrāgacchanmayā sākaṃ yatra sā dāruputrikā // 12.7.174	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apāsyārgalamuddhāṭya dvāraṃ yāvaddiśanti te / tāvatkāṣṭhamayīṃ nārīmapaśyaṃs tatra kevalām // 12.7.175	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato viḍambitātmānaṃ hasanto 'mbāṃ vilakṣitām / utpannapratyayā yātā bāndhavāste yathāgatam // 12.7.176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ ca tyaktataddeśo bhrāmyannimamavāptavān / pradeśamiha ca dyūtaśālāṃ daivātkilāviśam // 12.7.177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atraitānahamadrākṣaṃ pañcākṣair dīvyato janān / imaṃ caṇḍabhujaṃgākhyametaṃ pāṃsupaṭaṃ tathā // 12.7.178	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amuṃ śmaśānavetālamimaṃ kālavarāṭakam / śāriprastarametaṃ ca śūrāṃstulyaparākramān // 12.7.179	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etaiḥ samaṃ ca dyūtena tatra krīḍitavānaham / dāsaḥ syādvijito jeturiti baddhvā mithaḥ paṇam // 12.7.180	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato dyūtena vijitā mama dāsyamime gatāḥ / ahaṃ guṇair jitastveṣāṃ dāsatāmāgataḥ svayam // 12.7.181	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ebhiḥ samaṃ ca vasataḥ svaduḥkhaṃ vismṛtaṃ mama / nāmnāvasthocitenātra viddhyakṣakṣapaṇaṃ ca mām // 12.7.182	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityahaṃ satkulotpannair ihaivaṃ gūhitātmabhiḥ / etaiḥ saha sthitaḥ puṇyaistvaṃ cādya milito 'tra naḥ // 12.7.183	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadidānīṃ tvamasmākaṃ prabhuḥ prāgeva caitayā / buddhyā tavāttamasmābhistaddhanaṃ guṇarāgibhiḥ // 12.7.184	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityakṣakṣapaṇenokte svavṛttānte krameṇa te / sarve bhīmabhaṭāyānye 'pyudantānsvānavarṇayan // 12.7.185	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'rthārtham upāttābhiḥ kalābhiś chāditātmanaḥ / pravīrāṃstānsakhīnmatvā kṛtvānyā vividhāḥ kathāḥ // 12.7.186	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nītvā vihāreṇa dinaṃ dṛṣṭvā pauraṃdarīṃ diśam / udbhāsamānaśītāṃśutilakālaṃkṛtānanām // 12.7.187	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
agād bhīmabhaṭas tasmād udyānāt sa nṛpātmajaḥ / akṣakṣapaṇakādyais taiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ saha tadāspadam // 12.7.188	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taiḥ samaṃ tiṣṭhataścātra tasya prāvṛḍupāgamat / śaṃsantīva suhṛtprāptiṃ pravṛṣṭaghanagarjitaiḥ // 12.7.189	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadā cātra vipāśākhyā nadī mattā samudragā / pratīpavāhinī jātā sāgaraugheṇa pūritā // 12.7.190	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
samāpūrya mahāvāripūreṇa pulinaṃ ca sā / oghapraśāntāv ambhodhisaṃmukhīva jagāma sā // 12.7.191	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tasmin kāle 'tra cānīya kṣiptas tenaughavāriṇā / mahāmatsyo garīyas tvād vyāsakto 'bhūn nadītaṭe // 12.7.192	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvā ca taṃ pradhāvyaiva nihantuṃ vividhāyudhaiḥ / tatratyāḥ pāṭayāmāsurjanāstasyodaraṃ timeḥ // 12.7.193	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pāṭitānniragāccātra tasmājjīvanyuvā dvijaḥ / taddarśanādbhutāttatra lokaḥ kolāhalaṃ vyadhāt // 12.7.194	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā saha mittraistair gato bhīmabhaṭo 'tra saḥ / apaśyacchaṅkhadattaṃ taṃ mittraṃ matsyādvinirgatān // 12.7.195	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
samāśliṣac ca dhāvitvā siñcandhārāśrubhiḥ sa tam / mīnodaradarīvāsavisraṃ prakṣālayanniva // 12.7.196	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi tadvipaduttīrṇaḥ prāpya taṃ parirabhya ca / suhṛdaṃ śaṅkhadatto 'gādutsavādutsavaṃ tadā // 12.7.197	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato bhīmabhaṭenātra tena pṛṣṭaḥ sa kautukāt / śaṅkhadattaḥ svavṛttāntaṃ saṃkṣepādevam abravīt // 12.7.198	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadā gaṅgormivegena hṛtas tvaddṛṣṭigocarāt / aśaṅkitaṃ nigīrṇo 'smi matsyenātimahīyasā // 12.7.199	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyodaramahāveśmapraviṣṭo 'haṃ tataś ciram / atiṣṭhaṃ churikotkṛttaṃ tanmāṃsaṃ bhakṣayan kṣudhā // 12.7.200	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adya so 'yamihānīya dhātrā kṣiptaḥ kathaṃcana / matsyo hato janair ebhiḥ kṛṣṭaś cāsyodarād aham // 12.7.201	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭo mayā tvamarkaś ca prakāśaṃ me gatā diśaḥ / eṣa me mittra vṛttānto vedmi nāhamataḥ param // 12.7.202	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktaḥ śaṅkhadattena tena bhīmabhaṭaś ca saḥ / anye ca sarve tatrasthā vismayādevamabruvan // 12.7.203	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kva gaṅgāyāṃ nigaraṇaṃ matsyenābdhau kva tadgatiḥ / kva ca tadvartmanā tasya vipāśāyāṃ niveśanam // 12.7.204	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kva vadhas tasya tasmāc ca jīvataḥ kvāsya nirgamaḥ / aho vidheracintyaiva gatiradbhutakarmaṇaḥ // 12.7.205	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityādi taiḥ saha vadannakṣakṣapaṇakādibhiḥ / anayacchaṅkhadattaṃ sa dhāma bhīmabhaṭo nijam // 12.7.206	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra copācaratsnānavastrādyaistaṃ sa sotsavaḥ / tenaiva vapuṣā jātam iva matsyodarātpunaḥ // 12.7.207	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tena samaṃ deśe tasmin bhīmabhaṭe sthite / āgād yātrotsavas tatra nāgarājasya vāsukeḥ // 12.7.208	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taddarśanāya sa prāyādrājaputraḥ suhṛdvṛtaḥ / milanmahājanaṃ tasya nāgamukhyasya ketanam // 12.7.209	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra praṇamya tanmūrtiṃ prāsāde mālyadāmabhiḥ / bhṛte bhogigaṇākāraiḥ pāstālodakasaṃnibhe // 12.7.210	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā dakṣiṇato 'paśyanmahāntaṃ tasya sa hradam / phaṇāratnaprabhāpuñjair iva raktāmbujaiścitam // 12.7.211	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
viṣāgnidhūmapaṭalair iva nīlotpalair bhṛtam / vṛtaṃ vātapatatpuṣpair arcadbhir iva pādapaiḥ // 12.7.212	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
svalpaḥ samudro 'mudrasya puro 'sya pratibhāti me / ananyahāriśrīkasya hṛtaśrīkaḥ sa śauriṇā // 12.7.213	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
iti yāvac ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā sa cintayati vismitaḥ / tāvat snānārthamāyātāmadrākṣīttatra kanyakām // 12.7.214	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājño lāṭeśvarasyātra candrādityasya putrikām / jātāṃ kuvalayāvalyāṃ nāmnā haṃsāvalīṃ śubhām // 12.7.215	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅgair apahnuto 'py anyair yasyā divyānukāribhiḥ / cakṣuṣā capalenokto martyabhāvo nimeṣataḥ // 12.7.216	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā puṣpapelavavapuṣkoṭiprāptasphuradguṇā / muṣṭigrāhyeṇa madhyena mānmathīva dhanurlatā // 12.7.217	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvaiva tiryag valitair api locanasāyakaiḥ / amohayadbhīmabhaṭaṃ hṛdi nirbhidya taṃ tadā // 12.7.218	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
so 'pi tasyāḥ praviśyaiva tiryaṅ nayanavartmanā / hṛtkoṣamaharaddhair yaṃ jagatsaundaryataskaraḥ // 12.7.219	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato guptavisṛṣṭāptadakṣaceṭīmukhena sā / anviṣyati sma mittrebhyas tasya nāmāspadādikam // 12.7.220	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athāgātsā parijanair nīyamānā svamandiram / snātā vivartitamukhī muhustadgatayā dṛśā // 12.7.221	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tato bhīmabhaṭaḥ so 'pi svāvāsaṃ sakhibhiḥ saha / pratyāgāttatpriyāpremapāśabandhaskhaladgatiḥ // 12.7.222	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tasmai kṣaṇāddūtīṃ tāṃ ceṭīṃ rājakanyakā / haṃsāvalī sā vyasṛjaddattvā saṃdeśamīpsitam // 12.7.223	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
sābhupetya tamāha sma ceṭī bhīmabhaṭaṃ rahaḥ / deva haṃsāvalī rājasutā tvāmanunāthati // 12.7.224	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hriyamāṇaṃ smaraugheṇā dṛṣṭvā praṇayinaṃ janam / imaṃ drutamanādṛtya na yuktā te taṭasthatā // 12.7.225	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti saṃprāpya dūtīto dayitāvacanāmṛtam / labdhajīvitahṛṣṭastāṃ so 'tha bhīmabhaṭo 'bravīt // 12.7.226	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
oghastho na taṭastho 'hamiti vetti na kiṃ priyā / tadvacastu kariṣyāmi kāmaṃ labdhāvalambanaḥ // 12.7.227	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etya saṃbhāvayiṣyāmi naktamantaḥpure 'dya tām / vidyācchannaṃ viśantaṃ ca nahi drakṣyati ko'pi mām // 12.7.228	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktā tena ceṭī sā tuṣṭā gatvā śaśaṃsa tat / haṃsāvalyai tataḥ sāpi tasthau tatsaṃgamonmukhī // 12.7.229	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi pradoṣasamaye divyābharaṇabhūṣitaḥ / gaṅgāvitīrṇavidyāyā ānulomyena pāṭhataḥ // 12.7.230	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
adṛśyībhūya gatvā tattasyā antaḥpurottamam / samāviśadbhīmabhaṭaḥ prāgviviktīkṛtaṃ tayā // 12.7.231	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
ratiprītikare tatra kālāgurusugandhini / daśārdhavarṇavinyastapuṣpaprakaraśobhite // 12.7.232	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

prātilomyena vidyāṃ ca tāṃ paṭhitvā sa dṛśyatām / sahasā subhagastasyā rājaputryā gato 'bhavat // 12.7.234	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā taṃ dṛṣṭvaiva sānandapulakotkampasādhvasā / raṇatsvābharaṇātodyeṣv anṛtyadiva tatkṣaṇam // 12.7.235	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

pulako 'ṅgeṣu kiṃ caitadvidalatsaṃdhi kañcukam / ityādibhir vacobhistāmanyaiś ca praṇayakramaiḥ // 12.7.238	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tāṃ ca haṃsāvalīṃ tatra praviṣṭāḥ svamahattarāḥ / prātarantaḥpure 'drākṣuryuktāṃ saṃbhogalakṣaṇaiḥ // 12.7.241	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
lulitālakakeśāntāmārdradantanakhakṣatām / sākṣātsmaraśaraśreṇivraṇavyākulitāmiva // 12.7.242	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

so 'tha bhīmabhaṭo mittraiḥ sahitaś ca sukhaṃ dinam / nītvā pradoṣe bhūyastatpriyāntaḥ puramāgamat // 12.7.244	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
alakṣitapraviṣṭaṃ taṃ tatra vidyāprabhāvataḥ / dṛṣṭvā saṃbhāvya siddhaṃ ca cārāste niryayus tataḥ // 12.7.245	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
