bhagne ca sainye samarabhaṭaḥ so 'tha rathasthitaḥ / pradhāvyārabhata kruddho raṇābdhau mandarāyitam // 12.7.289	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato bhīmabhaṭas tasya vāraṇastho 'bhipatya saḥ / dhanuśchittvāvadhīdbāṇaiścaturo 'pi rathe hayān // 12.7.290	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
viratho 'py atha dhāvitvā tomareṇa gajottamam / hanti sma kumbhe samarabhaṭo bhīmabhaṭasya saḥ // 12.7.291	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
sa ca tattomarahato gajastasyāpatadbhuvi / tatas tau virathau dvāvapyabhūtāṃ pādacāriṇau // 12.7.292	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
gṛhītacarmakhaḍgau ca padātī eva tau tadā / dvandvayuddhena nṛpatī ayudhyetāmamarṣaṇau // 12.7.293	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
vidyāvaśādadṛśyatvaṃ kṛtvā śakto 'pi tadvadhe / dharmāpekṣī na taṃ śatruṃ tathā bhīmabhaṭo 'vadhīt // 12.7.294	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prasahya yudhyamānastu tasya mūrdhānamacchinat / khaḍgena khaḍgayuddhajño nartakītanayasya saḥ // 12.7.295	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hate ca tasminsamarabhaṭe samyaksasainike / pradatte sādhuvāde ca gaganātsiddhacāraṇaiḥ // 12.7.296	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
gate samāptiṃ saṅgrāme bandimāgadhasaṃstutaḥ / rāḍhāpurīṃ bhīmabhaṭaḥ prāviśatsakhibhiḥ saha // 12.7.297	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
cirapravāsopayāto hatāris tatra mātaram / sa rāma iva kauśalyāṃ darśanotkāmanandayat // 12.7.298	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
paurābhinanditaścātha kṛtī siṃhāsane pituḥ / upāviśattatsacivaiḥ pūjyamāno guṇapriyaiḥ // 12.7.299	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
saṃmānya prakṛtīḥ kṛtsnāstataś ca vihitotsavaḥ / śubhe 'hni śaṅkhadattāya lāṭarājyaṃ sa dattavān // 12.7.300	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ preṣya lāṭaviṣayaṃ taddeśajabalānvitam / tebhyo 'kṣakṣapaṇādibhyo dadau grāmānvasūni ca // 12.7.301	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tair yukto 'tha sa tatrāsīt praśāsan paitṛkaṃ padam / lāṭendrasutayā devyā haṃsāvalyā tayā saha // 12.7.302	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kramāc ca jitvā pṛthivīmāhṛtya nṛpakanyakāḥ / tatsaṃbhogaikasakto 'bhūtso 'tha bhīmabhaṭo nṛpaḥ // 12.7.303	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
mantriṣu nyastabhāraś ca krīḍannantaḥpuraiḥ saha / abhyantarānna niragātpānādivyasanena saḥ // 12.7.304	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
athaikadā munirdraṣṭuṃ tamuttaṅko yadṛcchayā / pūrvaśarvasamādeśapākakāla ivāgamat // 12.7.305	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dvāraṃ prāpte munau cāsmindvāḥstheṣvāvedayatsu ca / rājā rāgamadaiśvaryadarpāndho na kilāśṛṇot // 12.7.306	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ kruddho muniḥ so 'smai rājñe śāpamadādimam / madāndha rājyād bhraṣṭas tvaṃ vanyo hastī bhaviṣyasi // 12.7.307	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tac chrutvā sa bhayādbhraṣṭamado nirgatya bhūpatiḥ / dīnaiḥ prāsādayadvākyair muniṃ taṃ caraṇānataḥ // 12.7.308	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa śāntakopaḥ sanmaharṣistam abhāṣata / bhaviṣyasi dvipastāvadrājanna syāttadanyathā // 12.7.309	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ tu pracaṇḍaśaktyākhyaṃ nāgaśāpāvasāditam / mṛgāṅkadattasacivaṃ cakṣurvaikalyamāgatam // 12.7.310	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
samāśvāsyātithībhūtaṃ yadā tasmai pravakṣyasi / svavṛttāntaṃ tadaitasmānmokṣaṃ prāpsyasi śāpataḥ // 12.7.311	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac ca prāggiriśādiṣṭaṃ gandharvatvamavāpsyasi / sa cātithiste cakṣuṣmāneva saṃpadyate tadā // 12.7.312	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ity uktvaiva muniḥ prāyāduttaṅkaḥ sa yathāgatam / so 'pi bhīmabhaṭo hastī saṃpanno rājyavicyutaḥ // 12.7.313	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tam imaṃ māṃ gajībhūtaṃ viddhi bhīmabhaṭaṃ sakhe / sa ca pracaṇaśaktistvaṃ jāne śāpānta eṣa me // 12.7.314	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktvā gajākāraṃ tyaktvā bhīmabhaṭo 'tra saḥ / tatkṣaṇaṃ divyavibhavo gandharvaḥ samapadyata // 12.7.315	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
pracaṇḍaśaktiś cotpannalocanālokanotsavaḥ / tatkālam eva saṃjajñe paśyan gandharvam atra tam // 12.7.316	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca vallījālāntaḥ sthitaḥ śrutvā tayoḥ kathām / sahito 'nyaiḥ sa sacivaiḥ sudṛḍhotpannaniścayaḥ // 12.7.317	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
mṛgāṅkadattaḥ kālajñaḥ pradhāvya rabhasāddrutam / pracaṇḍaśaktiṃ jagrāha kaṇṭhe taṃ nijamantriṇam // 12.7.318	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
so 'py akāṇasudhāvarṣasiktāṅga iva vīkṣya tam / pracaṇḍaśaktiḥ sahasā pādayor agrahītprabhum // 12.7.319	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tatas tau ciraviśliṣṭasaṃśliṣṭau bhṛśaduḥkhitau / sa bhīmabhaṭagandharvo rudantau paryasāntvayat // 12.7.320	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mṛgāṅkadatto 'pi sa taṃ gandharvaṃ praṇato 'bravīt / yadasmābhir ayaṃ labdhaḥ sakhā yaccāmunā punaḥ // 12.7.321	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
cakṣuṣmattvamavāptaṃ tattvanmāhātmyānnamo 'stu te / śrutvaitatso 'pi gandharvo rājaputram uvāca tam // 12.7.322	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
acirāt sacivāñ śeṣāṃl labdhvā kṛtsnān avāpsyasi / tāṃ śaśāṅkavatīṃ bhāryāṃ sāmrājyaṃ ca mahītale // 12.7.323	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadadhair yaṃ na kāryaṃ te kalyāṇinsādhayāmy aham / tadā ca saṃnidhāsye te yadā tvaṃ māṃ smariṣyasi // 12.7.324	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti sa vigataśāpaḥ prāptakalyāṇatoṣaḥ prakaṭitasakhibhāvo rājaputraṃ tamuktvā / prasabhamudapataddyāṃ cārukeyūrahārakvaṇitamukharitāśo 'nanyagandharvadhuryaḥ // 12.7.325	mālinī [15: nnmyy]
so 'pi pracaṇḍaśaktiṃ prāpya vane tatra mantribhiḥ sahitaḥ / anayan mṛgāṅkadatto jātavṛtir nṛpasutas tadahaḥ // 12.7.326	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
jitaṃ vighnajitā yasya puṣpavṛṣṭir ivāmbarāt / tārāvalī karāghātacyutā patati nṛtyataḥ // 12.8.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'tivāhya rātriṃ tāṃ prabhāte kānanāt tataḥ / pracaṇḍaśaktipramukhaiḥ prasthitaḥ sacivaiḥ saha // 12.8.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
sa śaśāṅkavatīhetoḥ punar ujjayinīṃ prati / mṛgāṅkadattaḥ prayayau cinvañ śeṣān svamantrinaḥ // 12.8.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
gacchatā dadṛśe tena mārge vikramakesarī / mantrī puṃsātivikṛtenohyamāno nabhastale // 12.8.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
darśyate cānyamantribhyo yāvat tena sa saṃbhramāt / tāvat sa mantrī gaganāt tatsamīpe 'vatīrṇavān // 12.8.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
avaruhya ca tasyāśu puṃsaḥ skandhād upetya saḥ / mṛgāṅkadattaṃ jagrāha pādayoḥ sāśrulocanaḥ // 12.8.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tenāśliṣṭaś ca hṛṣṭena tathā tanmantribhiḥ kramāt / visasarja pumāṃsaṃ taṃ smṛto 'bhyeṣyasi mām iti // 12.8.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato mṛgāṅkadattena kautukād upaviśya saḥ / pṛṣṭaḥ svodantam ācakhyau vane vikramakesarī // 12.8.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadā bhavadbhyo vibhraṣṭo nāgaśāpāt paribhraman / bahūny ahāni cinvāno yuṣmān aham acintayam // 12.8.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
gacchāmy ujjayinīṃ tatra gantavyaṃ tair dhruvaṃ yataḥ / evaṃ niścitya ca prāyām ahaṃ tāṃ nagarīṃ prati // 12.8.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kramāt tannikaṭaṃ prāpya grāmaṃ brahmasthalābhidham / vāpītaṭe 'ham ekasmin vṛkṣamūla upāviśam // 12.8.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatraitya sarpadaṃśārto vṛddho māṃ brāhmaṇo 'bravīt / ita uttiṣṭha mā putra madīyāṃ gatim āpsyasi // 12.8.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ihāsti hi mahāsarpo yena daṣṭo rujārditaḥ / udyato 'syāṃ mahāvāpyām eṣo 'haṃ deham ujjhitam // 12.8.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavantaṃ kṛpayā dehatyāgān nivārya tam / tatrākārṣam ahaṃ vipraṃ nirviṣaṃ viṣavidyayā // 12.8.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa vipraḥ sākūtam udantaṃ kṛtsnam ādarāt / pṛṣṭvā māṃ prītimān evaṃ viditārtho 'bhyabhāṣata // 12.8.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāṇās tvayā mama prattā tat pravīra gṛhāṇa me / vetālasādhanaṃ mantram imaṃ prāptaṃ mayā pituḥ // 12.8.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvādṛśām upayukto 'yaṃ siddhikṛt sattvaśālinām / mādṛśāḥ punar ete na klībāḥ kiṃ nāma kurvate // 12.8.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktas tena tam ahaṃ pratyavocaṃ dvijottamam / mṛgāṅkadattaviyuto vetālaiḥ kiṃ karomy aham // 12.8.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tac chrutvā sa vihasyaivaṃ vipro māṃ punar abravīt / kiṃ na jānāsy abhīṣṭaṃ yad vetālāt sarvam āpyate // 12.8.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
api vidyādharaiśvaryaṃ vetālasya prasādataḥ / kiṃ trivikramasenena na prāptaṃ bhūbhujā purā // 12.8.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathā ca kathayāmy etāṃ tadīyāṃ te kathāṃ śṛṇu pratiṣṭhānābhidhāno 'sti deśo godāvarītaṭe // 12.8.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra vikramasenasya putraḥ śakraparākramaḥ / prāk trivikramasenākhyaḥ khyātakīrtir abhūn nṛpaḥ // 12.8.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya pratyaham āsthānagatasyopetya bhūpateḥ / sevārthaṃ kṣāntiśīlākhyo bhikṣuḥ phalam upānayat // 12.8.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi rājā tad ādāya phalam āsannavartinaḥ / haste dadau pratidinaṃ koṣāgārādhikāriṇaḥ // 12.8.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
itthaṃ gateṣu varṣeṣu daśasv atra kilaikadā / dattvā rājñe phalaṃ tasmai bhikṣāv āsthānato gate // 12.8.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa rājā tat phalaṃ prādāt praviṣṭāyātra daivataḥ / krīḍāmarkaṭapotāya hastabhraṣṭāya rakṣiṇām // 12.8.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa markaṭas tad aśnāti yāvat tāvat phalāt tataḥ / vibhinnamadhyān niragād anarghaṃ ratnam uttamam // 12.8.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tad dṛṣṭvādāya papraccha taṃ bhāṇḍāgārikaṃ nṛpaḥ / bhikṣūpanītāni mayā yāni nityaṃ phalāni te // 12.8.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
haste dattāni tāni kva sthāpitāni sadā tvayā / tac chrutvā taṃ sa sabhayaḥ koṣādhyakṣo vyajijñapat // 12.8.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
kṣiptāni tāny anudghāṭya mayā gañje gavākṣataḥ / yady ādiśasi tad deva tam udghāṭya gaveṣaye // 12.8.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ūcivān anumato rājñā gatvā kṣaṇena saḥ / koṣādhyakṣaḥ samāgatya prabhuṃ vyajñāpayat punaḥ // 12.8.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
śīrṇāni nātra paśyāmi koṣe tāni phalāny aham / ratnarāśiṃ tu paśyāmi raśmijvālākulaṃ vibho // 12.8.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā tān manīn dattvā tuṣṭo 'smai koṣarakṣiṇe / rājānyedyur apṛcchat sa bhikṣuṃ taṃ prāgvad āgatam // 12.8.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhikṣo dhanavyayenaivaṃ sevase māṃ kim anvaham / nedānīṃ te grahīṣyāmi phalaṃ yāvan na vakṣyasi // 12.8.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavantaṃ rājānaṃ bhikṣus taṃ vijane 'bravīt / vīrasācivyasāpekṣaṃ mantrasādhanam asti me // 12.8.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra vīrendra sāhāyyaṃ kriyamānaṃ tvayārthaye / tac chrutvā pratipede tat tathety asya sa bhūpatiḥ // 12.8.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa śramaṇas tuṣṭo nṛpaṃ puna uvāca tam / tarhi kṛṣṇacaturdaśyām āgāminyāṃ niśāgame // 12.8.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ito mahāśmaśānāntarvaṭasyādhaḥ sthitasya me / āgantavyaṃ tvayā deva pratipālayato 'ntikam // 12.8.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bāḍham evaṃ kariṣyāmīty ukte tena mahībhujā / sa kṣāntiśīlaḥ śramaṇo hṛṣṭaḥ svanilayaṃ yayau // 12.8.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
atha tāṃ sa mahāsattvaḥ prāpya kṛṣṇacaturdaśīm / prārthanāṃ pratipannāṃ tāṃ bhikṣos tasya nṛpaḥ smaran // 12.8.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pradoṣe nīlavasanas tamālakṛtaśekharaḥ / niryayau rājadhānītaḥ khaḍgapāṇir alakṣitaḥ // 12.8.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
yayau ca ghoranibiḍadhvāntavrātamalīmasam / citānalogranayanajvālādāruṇadarśanam // 12.8.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
asaṃkhyanarakaṅkālakapālāsthiviśaṅkaṭam / hṛṣyatsaṃnihitottālabhūtavetālaveṣṭitam // 12.8.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhairavasyāparaṃ rūpam iva gambhīrabhīṣaṇam / sphūrjan mahāśivārāvaṃ śmaśānaṃ tad avihvalaḥ // 12.8.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vicitya cātra taṃ prāpya bhikṣuṃ vaṭataror adhaḥ / kurvāṇaṃ maṇḍalanyāsam upasṛtya jagāda saḥ // 12.8.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
eṣo 'ham āgato bhikṣo brūhi kiṃ karavāṇi te / tac chrutvā sa nṛpaṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭo bhikṣur uvāca tam // 12.8.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājan kṛtaḥ prasādaś cet tad ito dakṣiṇāmukham / gatvā vidūram ekākī vidyate śiṃśapātaruḥ // 12.8.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasminn ullambitamṛtaḥ ko 'py ekaḥ puruṣaḥ sthitaḥ / tam ihānaya gatvā tvaṃ sānāthyaṃ kuru vīra me // 12.8.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvaiva tathety uktvā sa rājā satyasaṃgaraḥ / dakṣiṇāṃ diśam ālambya pravīraḥ prayayau tataḥ // 12.8.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āttadīptacitālātalakṣitena pathātra saḥ / gatvā tamasi taṃ prāpa kathaṃcic chiṃśapātarum // 12.8.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya skandhe citādhūmadagdhasya kravyagandhinaḥ / so 'paśyal lambamānaṃ taṃ bhūtasyeva śavaṃ taroḥ // 12.8.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āruhya cātra bhūmau taṃ chinna rajjum apātayat / patitaś cātra so 'kasmāc cakranda vyathito yathā // 12.8.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'varuhya kṛpayā jīvāśaṅkī sa tasya yat / rājāṅgaṃ prāmṛśat tena so 'ṭṭahāsaṃ vyadhāc chavaḥ // 12.8.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa rājā matvā taṃ vetālādhiṣṭhitaṃ tadā / kiṃ hasasy ehi gacchāva iti yāvad akampitaḥ // 12.8.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vakti tāvan na bhūmau savetālaṃ śavam aikṣata / aikṣatātraiva vṛkṣe tu lambamānaṃ sthitaṃ punaḥ // 12.8.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'dhiruhya bhūyo 'pi tam avātārayat tataḥ / vajrād api hi vīrāṇāṃ cittaratnam akhaṇḍitam // 12.8.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āropya ca savetālaṃ skandhe maunena taṃ śavam / sa trivikramaseno 'tha rājā gantuṃ pracakrame // 12.8.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yāntaṃ ca taṃ śavāntaḥstho vetālo 'ṃsasthito 'bravīt / rājann adhvavinodāya kathām ākhyāmi te śṛṇu // 12.8.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asti vārāṇasī nāma purārivasatiḥ purī / sthalīva kailāsagirer yā puṇyajanasevitā // 12.8.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
bhūrivāribhṛtā śaśvadupakaṇṭhaniveśinī / hārayaṣṭir ivābhāti yasyāḥ svargataraṅgiṇī // 12.8.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pratāpānalanirdagdhavipakṣakulakānanaḥ / tasyāṃ pratāpamukuṭo nāma rājābhavat purā // 12.8.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tasyābhūd vajramukuṭas tanayo rūpaśauryayoḥ / kurvāṇo darpadalanaṃ smarasyārijanasya ca // 12.8.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
rājaputrasya tasyātra mantriputro mahāmatiḥ / āsīd buddhiśarīrākhyaḥ śarīrābhyadhikaḥ sakhā // 12.8.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena sakhyā saha krīḍan sa kadācin nṛpātmajaḥ / jagāma dūram adhvānaṃ mṛgayāti prasaṅgataḥ // 12.8.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śauryaśrīcāmarāṇīva siṃhānāṃ mastakāni saḥ / chindac charaiḥ saṭālāni viveśaikaṃ mahāvanam // 12.8.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāsthāne smarasyeva paṭhat kokilabandini / dattopakāre tarubhir mañjarīcalacāmaraiḥ // 12.8.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
so 'nvito mantriputreṇa tenāpaśyat sarovaram / vicitrakamalotpattidhāmāmbudhim ivāparam // 12.8.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmiṃs tadaiva sarasi snānārthaṃ kācid āgatā / tena divyākṛtiḥ kanyā dadṛśe saparicchadā // 12.8.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
pūrayantīva lāvaṇyanirjhareṇa sarovaram / dṛṣṭipātaiḥ sṛjantīva tatrotpalavanaṃ navam // 12.8.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pratyādiśantīva mukhenāmbujāni jitendunā / sā jahāra manas tasya rājaputrasya tatkṣaṇam // 12.8.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'py ahārṣīt tathā tasyā yuvā dṛṣṭvā vilocane / yathā naikṣata sā kanyā lajjāṃ svām apy alaṃkṛtim // 12.8.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yūni paśyati tasmin sā keyaṃ syād iti sānuge / saṃjñāṃ svadeśādyākhyātuṃ vilāsacchadmanākarot // 12.8.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
karoti smautpalaṃ karṇe gṛhītvā puṣpaśekharāt / ciraṃ ca dantaracanāṃ cakārādāya ca vyadhāt // 12.8.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
padmaṃ śirasi sākūtaṃ hṛdaye cādadhe karam / rājaputraś ca tasyās tāṃ saṃjñāṃ na jñātavāṃs tadā // 12.8.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mantriputras tu bubudhe sa sakhā tasya buddhimān / kṣaṇāc ca sā yayau kanyā nīyamānānugais tataḥ // 12.8.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāpya ca svagṛhaṃ tasthau paryaṅge 'ṅgaṃ nidhāya sā / cittaṃ tu nijasaṃjñārtham āsthāt tasmin nṛpātmaje // 12.8.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi rājasuto bhraṣṭavidyo vidyādharo yathā / gatvā svanagarīṃ kṛcchrāṃ prāpāvasthāṃ tayā vinā // 12.8.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sakhyā ca mantriputreṇa tena pṛṣṭas tadā rahaḥ / śaṃsatā tām aduṣprāpāṃ tyaktadhairyo jagāda saḥ // 12.8.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yasyā na nāma na grāmo nānvayo vāvabudhyate / sā kathaṃ prāpyate tan mām āśvāsayasi kiṃ mṛṣā // 12.8.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukto rājaputreṇa mantriputras tam abhyadhāt / kiṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ tvayā tad yat saṃjñayā sūcitaṃ tayā // 12.8.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nyastaṃ yad utpalaṃ karṇe tenaitat te tayoditam / karṇotpalasya rāṣṭre 'haṃ nivasāmi mahībhṛtaḥ // 12.8.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtā yad dantaracanā tenaitat kathitaṃ tayā / tatra jānīhi māṃ dantaghāṭakasya sutām iti // 12.8.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
padmāvatīti nāmoktaṃ tayottaṃsitapadmayā / tvayi prāṇā iti proktaṃ hṛdayārpitahastayā // 12.8.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaliṅgadeśe hy asty atra khyātaḥ karṇotpalo nṛpaḥ / tasya prasādavitto 'sti mahān yo dantaghāṭakaḥ // 12.8.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṅgrāmavardhanākhyasya tasyāpy asti jagattraye / ratnaṃ padmāvatī nāma kanyā prāṇādhikapriyā // 12.8.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac ca lokato deva yathāvad viditaṃ mama / ato jñātā mayā saṃjñā tasyā deśādiśaṃsinī // 12.8.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukto mantriputrena tena rājasuto 'tha saḥ / tutoṣa tasmai sudhiye labdhopāyo jaharṣa ca // 12.8.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
saṃmantrya ca samaṃ tena sa tadyuktaḥ svamandirāt / priyārthī mṛgayāvyājāt punas tām agamad diśam // 12.8.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ardhamārge ca vātāśvavegavañcitasainikaḥ / taṃ mantriputraikayutaḥ kaliṅgaviṣayaṃ yayau // 12.8.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tatra tau prāpya nagaraṃ karṇotpalamahībhṛtaḥ / anviṣya dṛṣṭvā bhavanaṃ dantaghāṭasya tasya ca // 12.8.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tad adūre ca vāsārtham ekasyā vṛddhayoṣitaḥ / gṛhaṃ prāviśatāṃ mantriputrarājasutāv ubhau // 12.8.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dattāmbuyavasau vāhau gupte 'vasthāpya cātra saḥ / rājaputre sthite vṛddhāṃ mantriputro jagāda tām // 12.8.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaccid vetsy amba saṅgrāmavardhanaṃ dantaghāṭakam / tac chrutvā sā jaradyoṣit saśraddhā tam abhāṣata // 12.8.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vedmy eva dhātrī tasyāsmi sthāpitā tena cādhunā / padmāvatyāḥ svaduhituḥ pārśve jyeṣṭhatarety aham // 12.8.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
kiṃ tv ahaṃ na sadā tatra gacchāmy upahatāmbarā / kuputraḥ kitavo vastraṃ dṛṣṭvā hi harate mama // 12.8.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktavatīṃ prītaḥ svottarīyādidānataḥ / saṃtoṣya so 'tra vṛddhāṃ tāṃ mantriputro 'bravīt punaḥ // 12.8.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mātā tvaṃ tad vadāmas te guptaṃ yat tat kuruṣva naḥ / dantaghāṭasutām etāṃ gatvā padmāvatīṃ vada // 12.8.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'trāgato rājaputro dṛṣṭo yaḥ sarasi tvayā / tena ceha tad ākhyātuṃ preṣitā praṇayād aham // 12.8.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sā tathety uktvā vṛddhā dānavaśīkṛtā / gatvā padmāvatīpārśvam ājagāma kṣaṇāntare // 12.8.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pṛṣṭā jagāda tau rājasutamantrisutau ca sā / yuṣmadāgamanaṃ gatvā guptaṃ tasyā mayoditam // 12.8.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tayā śrutvā ca nirbhartsya pāṇibhyām aham āhatā / dvābhyāṃ karpūraliptābhyām ubhayor gaṇḍayor mukhe // 12.8.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ paribhavodvignā rudaty aham ihāgatā / etās tad aṅgulīmudrāḥ putrau me paśyataṃ mukhe // 12.8.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ tayokte nairāśyaviṣaṇṇaṃ taṃ nṛpātmajam / jagāda sa mahāprājño mantriputro janāntikam // 12.8.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
mā gā viṣādaṃ rakṣantyā mantraṃ nirbhartsya yat tayā / karpūraśubhrā vaktre 'syāḥ svāṅgulyo daśa pātitāḥ // 12.8.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tad etad uktaṃ pakṣe 'smiñ śukle candravatīr imāḥ / rātrīr daśa pratīkṣadhvaṃ saṃgamānucitā iti // 12.8.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity āśvāsya sa taṃ rājasutaṃ mantrisutas tataḥ / vikrīya guptaṃ hastasthaṃ kāñcanaṃ kiṃcid āpaṇe // 12.8.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
vṛddhayā sādhayāmāsa mahārhaṃ bhojanaṃ tayā / tatas tau bubhujāte dvau tat tayā saha vṛddhayā // 12.8.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ nītvā daśāhāni jijñāsārthaṃ punaḥ sa tām / padmāvatyantikaṃ vṛddhāṃ mantriputro visṛṣṭavān // 12.8.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpi mṛṣṭānnapānādilubdhā tad anurodhataḥ / gatvā vāsagṛhaṃ tasyā bhūyo 'bhyetya jagāda tau // 12.8.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ito gatvādya tūṣṇīm apy ahaṃ tatra sthitā tayā / yuṣmatkathāparādhaṃ tam udgirantyā svayaṃ punaḥ // 12.8.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā laktakābhis tisṛbhiḥ karāṅgulibhir āhatā / urasy asminn athaiṣāham ihāyātā tad antikāt // 12.8.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā rājaputraṃ taṃ svairaṃ mantrisuto 'bravīt / mā kārṣīr anyathā śaṅkām asyā hi hṛdaye tayā // 12.8.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā laktakāṅgulīmudrātrayaṃ vinyasya yuktitaḥ / rajasvalā niśās tisraḥ sthitāham iti sūcitam // 12.8.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktvā nṛpasutaṃ mantriputras tryahe gate / padmāvatyai punas tasyai vṛddhāṃ tāṃ prajighāya saḥ // 12.8.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā gatā mandiraṃ tasyās tayā saṃmānya bhojitā / prītyā pānādilīlābhir dinaṃ cātra vinoditā // 12.8.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāyaṃ ca yāvat sā vṛddhā gṛham āgantum icchati / udabhūd bhayakṛt tāvat tatra kolāhalo bahiḥ // 12.8.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
hā hā bhraṣṭo 'yam ālānāj janān mathnan pradhāvati / mattahastīti lokasya tatrākrando 'tha śuśruve // 12.8.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ padmāvatī sā tāṃ vṛddhām evam abhāṣata / spaṣṭena hastiruddhena gantuṃ yuktaṃ na te pathā // 12.8.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tat pīṭhikāṃ samāropya baddhālambanarajjukām / bṛhadgavākṣeṇānena tvām atra prakṣipāmahe // 12.8.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
gṛhodyāne tato vṛkṣam āruhyāmuṃ vilaṅghya ca / prākāram avaruhyānyavṛkṣeṇa svagṛhaṃ vraja // 12.8.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā sā gavākṣeṇa kṣepayāmāsa tatra tām / vṛddhāṃ ceṭībhir udyāne rajjupīṭhikayā tataḥ // 12.8.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sātha gatvā yathoktena pathā sarvaṃ śaśaṃsa tat / yathāvad rājaputrāya tasmai mantrisutāya ca // 12.8.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa mantriputras taṃ rājaputram abhāṣata / siddhaṃ taveṣṭaṃ mārgo hi yuktyā te darśitas tayā // 12.8.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tad gacchādyaiva tatra tvaṃ pradoṣe 'smin nṛpāgate / etenaiva pathā tasyāḥ priyāyā mandiraṃ viśa // 12.8.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktas tena tadyukto rājaputro yayau sa tat / udyānaṃ vṛddhayoktena tena prākāravartmanā // 12.8.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāpaśyac ca rajjuṃ tāṃ lambamānāṃ sapīṭhikām / mārgonmukhābhiś ceṭībhir upariṣṭād adhiṣṭhitām // 12.8.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ārūḍhas tāṃ ca dṛṣṭvaiva dāsībhis tābhir āśu saḥ / rajjūtkṣipto gavākṣeṇa praviveśa priyāntikam // 12.8.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmin praviṣṭe sa yayau mantriputraḥ svam āspadam / rājaputras tu tāṃ padmāvatīṃ tatra dadarśa saḥ // 12.8.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
pūrṇāmṛtāṃśuvadanāṃ prasaratkānticandrakām / kṛṣṇapakṣabhayād guptasthitāṃ rākāniśām iva // 12.8.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpi dṛṣṭvā tam utthāya cirautsukyocitais tataḥ / kaṇṭhagrahādibhis tais tair upacārair amānayat // 12.8.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tayā sa gāndharvavidhinodūḍhayā saha / guptaṃ rājasutas tasthau pūrṇecchas tatra kāntayā // 12.8.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sthitvā cāhāni katicid rātrau tām avadat priyām / sakhā mama sahāyāto mantriputra iti sthitaḥ // 12.8.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa cātra tiṣṭhaty ekākī tvajjyeṣṭhatarikāgṛhe / gatvā saṃbhāvya taṃ tanvi puna eṣyāmi te 'ntikam // 12.8.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā tam avocat sā dhūrtā padmāvatī priyam / hantāryaputra pṛcchāmi tāḥ saṃjñā matkṛtās tvayā // 12.8.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jñātā kiṃ kim uvā tena sakhyā mantrisutena te / evam uktavatīm etāṃ rājaputro jagāda saḥ // 12.8.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na jñātaṃ tan mayā kiṃcij jñātvā sarvaṃ ca tena me / ākhyātaṃ mantriputreṇa divyaprajñānaśālinā // 12.8.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvā vicintyaiva bhāminī sā jagāda tam / tarhy ayuktaṃ kṛtaṃ yan me cirāt sa kathitas tvayā // 12.8.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa me bhrātā sakhā yas te tasya ca prathamaṃ mayā / tāmbūlādisamācāraḥ kartavyo hi sadā bhavet // 12.8.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavatyānumatas tayā pūrvapathena saḥ / rajāputro 'ntikaṃ tasya sakhyur āgāt tato niśi // 12.8.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
śaśaṃsa ca kathāmadhye tat tasmai yat tadāśrayam / saṃjñāvijñānakathanaṃ kṛtaṃ tena priyāntike // 12.8.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
mantriputras tu so 'yuktam iti na śraddadhe 'sya tat / tāvac ca sā tayos tatra vibhātābhūd vibhāvarī // 12.8.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athaitayor vidhau sāṃdhye nivṛtte kurvatoḥ kathāḥ / āgāt pakvānnatāmbūlahastā padmāvatīsakhī // 12.8.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā mantriputraṃ kuśalaṃ pṛṣṭvā dattopacārikā / niṣeddhuṃ rājaputrasya bhojanaṃ tatra yuktitaḥ // 12.8.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kathāntare svāminīṃ svāṃ bhojanādau tadāgamam / pratīkṣamāṇām āvedya kṣaṇād guptaṃ tato yayau // 12.8.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatas taṃ mantriputraḥ sa rājaputram abhāṣata / kautukaṃ paśya devaikaṃ darśayāmy adhunā tava // 12.8.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā bhakṣyam ekaṃ sa pakvānnaṃ dattavāṃs tataḥ / sārameyāya sa ca tat khāditvaiva vyapadyata // 12.8.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tad dṛṣṭvā kim idaṃ citram iti rājasuto 'tra saḥ / papraccha mantriputraṃ taṃ sa caitaṃ pratyabhāṣata // 12.8.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃjñājñānena dhūrtaṃ māṃ viditvā hantukāmayā / tayā viṣānnaṃ prahitaṃ mama tvadanuraktayā // 12.8.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
nāsmin sati madekāgro rājaputro bhaved ayam / etadvaśaś ca muktvā māṃ nagarīṃ svāṃ vrajed iti // 12.8.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tan muñca manyum etasyāṃ bandhutyāgān mahātmanaḥ / kuryās tvaṃ haraṇe yuktiṃ vakṣyāmy ālocya yām aham // 12.8.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavantaṃ taṃ mantrisuto rājasuto 'tra saḥ / satyaṃ buddhiśarīras tvam iti yāvat praśaṃsati // 12.8.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśaṅkitaṃ bahis tāvad duḥkhākulajanāravaḥ / hā dhig rājñaḥ suto bālo vipanna iti śuśruve // 12.8.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadākarṇanahṛṣṭo 'tha mantriputro nṛpātmajam / jagāda hanta gacchādya padmāvatyā gṛhaṃ niśi // 12.8.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tāṃ pāyayes tāvad yāvat pānamadena sā / niḥsaṃjñā naṣṭaceṣṭā ca gatajīveva jāyate // 12.8.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tasyāḥ sanidrāyāḥ śūlenāṅkaṃ kaṭītaṭe / dattvāgnitaptenādāya tadābharaṇasaṃcayam // 12.8.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
āgacches tvaṃ gavākṣeṇa rajjulambavinirgataḥ / tataḥ paraṃ yathā bhadraṃ bhavej jñāsyāmy ahaṃ tathā // 12.8.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā kārayitvā ca kroḍavālanibhāśrikam / mantriputro dadau tasmai triśūlaṃ rājasūnave // 12.8.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājaputraḥ sa haste tat kṛtvā kuṭilakarkaśam / kālāyasa dṛḍhaṃ cittam iva kāntāvayasyayoḥ // 12.8.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatheti pūrvavad rātrāv agāt padmāvatīgṛham / avicāryaṃ prabhūṇāṃ hi śucer vākyaṃ svamantriṇaḥ // 12.8.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tāṃ madyaniśceṣṭāṃ śūlena jaghane 'ṅkitām / hṛtālaṃkaraṇāṃ kṛtvā tasyāgāt sakhyur antikam // 12.8.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
darśitābharaṇas tasmai śaśaṃsa ca yathākṛtam / tataḥ sa mantriputro 'pi siddhaṃ mene manīṣitam // 12.8.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātar gatvā śmaśānaṃ ca so 'bhūt tāpasaveṣabhṛt / svairaṃ rājasutaṃ taṃ ca vidadhe śiṣyarūpiṇam // 12.8.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abravīt taṃ ca gacchaikam ito 'laṃkaraṇād imām / muktāvalīṃ samādāya tvaṃ vikretum ivāpaṇe // 12.8.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bahumūlyaṃ vadeś cāsyā yenaitāṃ naiva kaś cane / gṛhṇīyād bhrāmyamāṇāṃ ca sarvaḥ ko'pi vilokayet // 12.8.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
guruṇā mama vikretum iyaṃ dattety anākulaḥ / brūyāś ca yadi gṛhṇīyur atra tvāṃ purarakṣiṇaḥ // 12.8.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti sa preṣitas tena gatvā rājasutas tadā / atiṣṭhad āpaṇe bhrāmyan vyaktaṃ muktāvalīṃ dadhat // 12.8.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathābhūtaś ca jagṛhe sa dṛṣṭvā purarakṣibhiḥ / dantaghāṭasutāmoṣajñapteś cauregaveṣibhiḥ // 12.8.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ninye ca nagarādhyakṣanikaṭaṃ taiḥ sa tatkṣaṇāt / sa ca taṃ tāpasākāraṃ dṛṣṭvā papraccha sāntvataḥ // 12.8.168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kuto muktāvalīyaṃ te bhagavann iha hāritā / dantaghāṭakakanyāyā hṛtaṃ hy ābharaṇaṃ niśi // 12.8.169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā rājaputras taṃ so 'vādīt tāpasākṛtiḥ / guruṇā mama datteyam etyāsau pṛcchyatām iti // 12.8.170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataś copetya taṃ natvā papraccha nagarādhipaḥ / muktāvalīyaṃ bhagavan kutas te śiṣyahastagā // 12.8.171	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
śrutvaitad vijanaṃ kṛtvā sa dhūrtas tam abhāṣata / ahaṃ tapasvī bhrāmyāmi sadāraṇyeṣv itas tataḥ // 12.8.172	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
so 'haṃ daivād iha prāptaḥ śmaśāne 'tra sthito niśi / apaśyaṃ yoginīcakraṃ samāgatam itas tataḥ // 12.8.173	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tanmadhye caikayānīya yoginyā rājaputrakaḥ / udghāṭitahṛdambhojo bhairavāya niveditaḥ // 12.8.174	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pānamattā ca sā hartuṃ japato me 'kṣamālikām / prāvartata mahāmāyā vikārān kurvatī mukhe // 12.8.175	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atipravṛttā ca mayā kruddhena jaghanasthale / aṅkitā sā triśūlena mantraprajvālitāśriṇā // 12.8.176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
hṛtā muktāvalī ceyaṃ tasyāḥ kaṇṭhān mayā tadā / saiṣādya tāpasānarhā vikreyā mama vartate // 12.8.177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvā purādhyakṣo gatvā bhūpaṃ vyajijñapat / bhūpo 'py ākarṇya tat tāṃ ca buddhvā tanmauktikāvalīm // 12.8.178	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prekṣaṇapreṣitāyātavṛddhāptavanitāmukhāt / śrutvā ca dṛśyaśūlāṅkāṃ jaghane satyam eva tām // 12.8.179	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
grastaḥ suto me ḍakinyā tayety utpannaniścayaḥ / svayaṃ tasyāntikaṃ gatvā mantriputratapasvinaḥ // 12.8.180	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

nirvāsitāṭavīsthā sā vignāpi na jahau tanum / upāyaṃ mantriputreṇa taṃ saṃbhāvya tathā kṛtam // 12.8.182	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dinānte tāṃ ca śocantīm aśvārūḍhāv upeyatuḥ / tyaktatāpasaveṣau tau mantriputranṛpātmajau // 12.8.183	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āśvāsyāropya turage svarāṣṭraṃ ninyatuś ca tām / tatra tasthau tayā sākaṃ rājaputraḥ sa nirvṛtaḥ // 12.8.184	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
dantaghāṭas tv araṇye tāṃ kravyādair bhakṣitāṃ sutām / matvā vyapādi śokena bhāryā cānujagāma tam // 12.8.185	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ākhyāya sa bhūyas taṃ vetālo nṛpam abravīt / tan me 'tra saṃśayaṃ chinddhi daṃpatyor etayor vadhāt // 12.8.186	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

jānānaś ca na ced rājan mama tattvaṃ vadiṣyasi / tad eṣa śatadhā mūrdhā niścitaṃ te sphuṭiṣyati // 12.8.188	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavantaṃ vetālaṃ vijānañ śāpabhītitaḥ / sa trivikramasenas tam evaṃ pratyabravīn nṛpaḥ // 12.8.189	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
yogeśvara kim ajñeyam etan naiṣāṃ hi pātakam / trayāṇām api rājñas tu pāpaṃ karṇotpalasya tat // 12.8.190	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vetālo 'py āha rājñaḥ kiṃ te hi tatkāriṇas trayaḥ / kākāḥ kim aparādhyanti haṃsair jagdheṣu śāliṣu // 12.8.191	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājā tato 'bravīc cainaṃ na duṣyanti trayo 'pi te / mantrisūnor hi tat tāvat prabhukāryam apātakam // 12.8.192	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
padmāvatīrājaputrau tau hi kāmaśarāgninā / saṃtaptāv avicārārhāv adoṣau svārtham udyatau // 12.8.193	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
karṇotpalas tu rājā sa nītiśāstreṣv aśikṣitaḥ / caraiḥ prajāsv ananviṣyaṃs tattvaśuddhiṃ nijāsv api // 12.8.194	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ajānan dhūrtacaritānīṅgitādyavicakṣaṇaḥ / tathā tan nirvicāraṃ yac cakre tena sa pāpabhāk // 12.8.195	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ākarṇya vimuktamaunam udite samyaṅ nṛpeṇottare skandhāt tasya sa dārḍhyam ākalayituṃ māyābalāt tatkṣaṇam / vetālo nṛkalevarāntaragataḥ kvāpy apratarkyo yayau niḥkampaḥ sa ca bhūpatiḥ punar amuṃ prāptuṃ vyadhān niścayam // 12.8.196	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
tato 'tra puna ānetuṃ taṃ vetālam agān nṛpaḥ / sa trivikramasenas tac chiṃśapāpādapāntikam // 12.9.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāpto 'tra vīkṣate yāvac citālokavaśān niśi / tāvad dadarśa taṃ bhūmau kūjantaṃ patitaṃ śavam // 12.9.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha taṃ mṛtadehasthaṃ vetālaṃ sa mahīpatiḥ / āropya skandham ānetuṃ tūṣṇīṃ pravavṛte javāt // 12.9.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ skandhāt sa vetālo bhūyas taṃ nṛpam abravīt / rājan mahaty anucite kleśe 'smin patito bhavān // 12.9.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
atas tava vinodāya khatayāmi khatāṃ śṛṇu / asty agrahāraḥ kālindīkūle brahmasthalābhidhaḥ // 12.9.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
agnisvāmīti tatrāsīd brāhmaṇo vedapāragaḥ / tasyātirūpā mandāravatīty ajani kanyakā // 12.9.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
yāṃ nirmāya navānarghalāvaṇyāṃ niyataṃ vidhiḥ / svargastrīpūrvanirmāṇaṃ nijam evājugupsata // 12.9.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāṃ ca yauvanasthāyām āyayuḥ kānyakubjataḥ / samasarvaguṇās tatra trayo brāhmaṇaputrakāḥ // 12.9.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
teṣāṃ cātmārtham ekaikas tatpitus tām ayācata / anicchan dānam anyasmai tasyāḥ prānavyayād api // 12.9.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatpitā sa tu tanmadhyān naikasmā api tāṃ dadau / bhīto 'nyayor vadhāt tena tasthau kanyaiva sā tataḥ // 12.9.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
te ca trayo 'pi tadvaktracandraikāsakta dṛṣṭhayaḥ / cakoravratam ālambya tatraivāsan divāniśam // 12.9.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athākasmātsamutpanna dāhajvaravaśena sā / jagāma mandāravatī kumārī kila pañcatām // 12.9.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tatas tāṃ vipraputrās te parāsuṃ śokaviklavāḥ / kṛtaprasādhanāṃ nītvā śmaśānaṃ cakrur agnisāt // 12.9.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekaś ca teṣāṃ tatraiva vidhāya maṭhikāṃ tataḥ / kṛtatadbhasmaśayyaḥ sann āstāyācitabhaikṣabhuk // 12.9.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
dvitīyo 'sthīny upādāya tasyā bhāgīrathīṃ yayau / tṛtīyas tāpaso bhūtvā bhrāntuṃ deśāntarāṇy agāt // 12.9.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa bhrāmyaṃs tāpasaḥ prāpa grāmaṃ vakrolakābhidham / tatrātithiḥ san kasyāpi viprasya prāviśad gṛham // 12.9.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatpūjitaḥ sa yāvac ca bhoktuṃ tatra pracakrame / tāvad ekaḥ śiśus tatra pravṛtto 'bhūt praroditum // 12.9.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa sāntvyamāno 'pi yadā na vyaraṃsīt tadā krudhā / bāhāv ādāya gṛhiṇī jvalaty agnau tam akṣipat // 12.9.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)

evaṃ vadantaṃ taṃ so 'tra gṛhasthaḥ prāha paśya me / śaktiṃ paṭhitasiddhasya mantrasya mṛtajīvanīm // 12.9.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

tenodatiṣṭhat tadrūpa eva jīvan sa bālakaḥ / tataḥ sa nirvṛtas tatra bhuktavān vipratāpasaḥ // 12.9.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

supte gṛhapatau tasmin svairam utthāya śaṅkitaḥ / sa priyājīvitārthī tāṃ pustikāṃ tāpaso 'grahīt // 12.9.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gṛhītvaiva ca nirgatya tato rātridinaṃ vrajan / kramāc chmaśānaṃ tat prāpa yatra dagdhāsya sā priyā // 12.9.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
dadarśa cātra tatkālaṃ taṃ dvitīyam upāgatam / yaḥ sa gaṅgāmbhasi kṣeptuṃ tadasthīni gato 'bhavat // 12.9.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas taṃ ca tam ādyaṃ ca tasyā bhasmani śāyinam / nibaddhamaṭhikaṃ tatra dvāv apy etau jagāda saḥ // 12.9.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
maṭhikāpāsyatām eṣā yāvad utthāpayāmi tām / jīvantīṃ bhasmataḥ kāntāṃ mantraśaktyā kayāpy aham // 12.9.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti tau prerya nirbandhān nirloṭhya maṭhikāṃ ca saḥ / udghāṭya tāpaso vipraḥ pustikāṃ tām avācayat // 12.9.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhimantrya ca mantreṇa dhūliṃ bhasmany avākṣipat / udatiṣṭhac ca jīvantī sā mandāravatī tataḥ // 12.9.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vahniṃ praviśya niṣkrāntaṃ vapuḥ pūrvādhikadyuti / tadā babhāra sā kanyā kañcaneneva nirmitam // 12.9.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tādṛśīṃ tāṃ punar jātāṃ te dṛṣṭvaiva smarāturāḥ / prāptukāmās trayo 'py evam anyonaṃ kalahaṃ vyadhuḥ // 12.9.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
eko 'bravīd iyaṃ bhāryā mama mantrabalārjitā / tīrthaprabhāvajā bhāryā mameyam iti cāparaḥ // 12.9.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rakṣitvā bhasma tapasā jīviteyaṃ mayeha yat / tad eṣā mama bhāryeti tṛtīyo 'tra jagāda saḥ // 12.9.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vivādanirṇaye teṣāṃ tvaṃ tāvan me mahīpate / niścayaṃ brūhi kasyaiṣā kanyā bhāryopapadyate // 12.9.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidaliṣyati mūrdhā te yadi jānan na vakṣyasi / iti vetālataḥ śrutvā taṃ sa rājaivam abhyadhāt // 12.9.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yaḥ kleśam anubhūyāpi mantreṇaitām ajīvayat / pitā sa tasyās tatkāryakaraṇān na punaḥ patīḥ // 12.9.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
yaś cāstīni nināyāsya gaṅgāyāṃ sa suto mataḥ / yas tu tad bhasmaśayyaṃ tām āśliṣyāsīt tapaś caran // 12.9.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śmaśāna eva tat prītyā bhartā tasyāḥ sa ucyate / kṛtaṃ tadanurūpaṃ hi tena gāḍhānurāgiṇa // 12.9.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ nṛpāt trivikramasenāc chrutvaiva muktamaunāt saḥ / tasya skandhād agamad vetālo 'tarkitaḥ svapadam // 12.9.41	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
rājātha bhikṣvarthasamudyatas taṃ prāptuṃ sa bhūyo 'pi mano babandha / prāṇātyaye 'pi pratipannam arthaṃ tiṣṭhanty anirvāhya na dhīrasattvāḥ // 12.9.42	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
atha bhūyo 'pi vetālam ānetuṃ nṛpasattamaḥ / sa trivikramasenas tam upāgāc chiṃśapātarum // 12.10.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrastham etaṃ saṃprāpya mṛtadehagataṃ punaḥ / skandhe gṛhītvaivāgantuṃ tūṣṇīṃ pravavṛte tataḥ // 12.10.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
prayāntaṃ ca tam āha sma sa vetālo 'sya pṛṣṭhagaḥ / citraṃ nodvijase rājan niśi kurvan gamāgamam // 12.10.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad akhedāya bhūyas te varṇayāmi kathāṃ śṛṇu / asti pāṭaliputrākhyaṃ khyātaṃ bhūmaṇḍale puram // 12.10.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāsīn nṛpatiḥ pūrvaṃ nāmnā vikramakesarī / guṇānām iva ratnānām āśrayaṃ yaṃ vyadhād vidhiḥ // 12.10.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra śāpāvatīrṇo 'bhūd divyavijñānavāñ śukaḥ / vidagdhacūdamaṇir ity ākhyayā sarvaśāstravit // 12.10.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tenopadiṣṭāṃ sadṛśīṃ rājaputrīṃ nṛpātmajaḥ / māgadhīm upayeme sa bhāryāṃ candraprabhābhidhām // 12.10.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyā api tathābhūtā sarvavijñānaśālinī / śārikā somikā nāma rājaputryāḥ kilābhavat // 12.10.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
te caikapañjarasthe dve tatrāstāṃ śukaśārike / sevamāne svaviñjānair daṃpatī tau nijaprabhū // 12.10.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā sābhilāṣas tāṃ śārikāṃ so 'bravīc chukaḥ / ekaśayyāsanāhāraṃ subhage bhaja mām iti // 12.10.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nāhaṃ puruṣasaṃsargam icchāmi puruṣā yataḥ / duṣṭāḥ kṛtaghnā iti sā sārikā pratyuvāca tam // 12.10.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
na duṣṭāḥ puruṣā duṣṭā nṛśaṃsahṛdayāḥ striyaḥ / iti bhūyaḥ śukenokte vivādo 'trālagat tayoḥ // 12.10.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtadāsatvabhāryātvapaṇau tau śakunī mithaḥ / niścayāyātha sabhyaṃ taṃ rājaputram upeyatuḥ // 12.10.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa vivādapadaṃ śrutvā tayor āsthānagaḥ pituḥ / kathaṃ kṛtaghnāḥ puruṣā brūhīty āha sma śārikām // 12.10.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tataḥ sā śṛṇutety uktvā nijapakṣaprasiddhaye / puṃdoṣākhyāyinīm etāṃ śārikākathayat kathām // 12.10.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asti kāmandikā nāma yā mahānagarī bhuvi / arthadattābhidhāno 'sti vaṇik tasyāṃ mahādhanaḥ // 12.10.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dhanadattābhidhānaś ca putras tasyodapadyata / pitary uparate so 'pi babhūvocchṛṅkhalo yuvā // 12.10.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dyūtādisaṅge dūrtāś ca militvā tam apātayan / kāmaṃ vyasanavṛkṣasya mūlaṃ durjanasaṃgatiḥ // 12.10.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
acirād vyasanakṣīṇadhano daurgatyalajjayā / so 'tha tyaktvā svadeśaṃ taṃ bhrāntuṃ deśāntarāṇy agāt // 12.10.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gacchaṃś ca candanapuraṃ nāma sthānam avāpya saḥ / viveśa bhojanārthī sann ekasya vaṇijo gṛham // 12.10.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa vaṇik sukumāraṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭvānvayādikam / jñātvā kulīnaṃ satkṛtya svīcakre daivayogataḥ // 12.10.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
dadau ca sadhanāṃ tasmai nāmnā ratnāvalīṃ sutām / tataḥ sa dhanadatto 'tra tasthau śvaśuraveśmani // 12.10.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dineṣv eva ca yāteṣu sukhavismṛtadurgatiḥ / svadeśaṃ gantukāmo 'bhūt prāptārtho vyasanonmukhaḥ // 12.10.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'numānya katham apy avaśaṃ śvaśuraṃ śaṭhaḥ / taṃ duhitrekasaṃtānaṃ gṛhītvā tām alaṃkṛtām // 12.10.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhāryāṃ ratnāvalīṃ yuktām ekayā vṛddhayā striyā / sa ātmanā tṛtīyaḥ sandeśāt prasthitavāṃs tataḥ // 12.10.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kramāt prāpyāṭavīṃ dūrām uktvā taskarajāṃ bhiyam / gṛhītvābharaṇaṃ tasyā bhāryāyāḥ svīcakāra saḥ // 12.10.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛśyatāṃ dyūtaveśyādikaṣṭavyasanasaṅginām / hṛdayaṃ hā kṛtaghnānāṃ puṃsāṃ nistriṃśakarkaśam // 12.10.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'tha pāpo 'rthahetos tāṃ bhāryāṃ guṇavatīm api / hantuṃ śvabhre nicikṣepa tayā vṛddhastriyā yutām // 12.10.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣiptvaiva ca gate tasmin sātha vṛddhā vyapadyata / tad bhāryā tu latāgulmavignayā na vyapādi sā // 12.10.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttasthau ca tataḥ śvabhrāt krośantī karuṇaṃ śaṇaiḥ / ālambya tṛṇagulmādi saśeṣatvāt kilāyuṣaḥ // 12.10.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āyayau vikṣatāṅgī ca pṛṣṭvā mārgaṃ pade pade / yathāgatenaiva pathā kṛcchrāt tat sadanaṃ pituḥ // 12.10.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tatrākasmāt tathābhūtā prāptā pṛṣṭā sasaṃbhramam / mātrā pitrā ca rudatī sādhvī saivam abhāṣata // 12.10.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
muṣitāḥ sma pathi stenair nīto baddhvā ca matpatiḥ / vṛddhā mṛtā nipatyāpi śvabhre nāhaṃ mṛtā punaḥ // 12.10.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athāgatena kenāpi pathikena kṛpālunā / uddhṛtāhaṃ tataḥ śvabhrāt prāptāsmīha ca daivataḥ // 12.10.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktavatī mātrā pitrā cāśvāsitā tataḥ / bhartṛcittaiva sā tasthau tatra ratnāvalī satī // 12.10.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yāti kāle ca tadbhartā sa svadeśagataḥ punaḥ / dyūtakṣapitatadvitto danadatto vyacintayat // 12.10.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ānayāmi punar gatvā mārgitvā śvaśurād dhanam / gṛhe sthitā me tvat putrīty abhidhāsye ca tatra tam // 12.10.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
evaṃ sa hṛdaye dhyātvā prāyāc chvaśuraveśma tat / prāptaṃ ca tatra taṃ dūrāt svabhāryā paśyati sma sā // 12.10.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dhāvitvā cāpatat tasya sā pāpasyāpi pādayoḥ / duṣṭe 'pi patyau sādhvīnāṃ nānyathāvṛttimānasam // 12.10.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
bhītāya ca tatas tasmai tad aśeṣaṃ nyavedayat / yan mṛṣā caurapātādi pitroḥ prāg varṇitaṃ tayā // 12.10.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tayā samaṃ tatra nirbhayaḥ śvāśure gṛhe / praviṣṭaḥ śvaśurābhyāṃ sa harṣād dṛṣṭvābhyanandyata // 12.10.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
diṣṭyā jīvann ayaṃ muktaś caurair iti mahotsavaḥ / tena tacchvaśureṇātha cakre militabandhunā // 12.10.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa dhanadatto 'tra bhuñjānaḥ śvaśuraśriyam / ratnāvalyā tayā sākam āsīt patnyā yathāsukham // 12.10.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā tatra rātrau ca sa nṛśaṃsaś cakāra yat / kathoparodhataḥ śāntam avācyam api kathyate // 12.10.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hatvāṅkasuptāṃ bhāryāṃ tāṃ tadābharaṇasaṃcayam / apahṛtya tataḥ prāyāt sa svadeśam alakṣitaḥ // 12.10.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
īdṛśāḥ puruṣāḥ pāpā iti śārikayodite / tvam idānīṃ vadety āha rājaputras tadā śukam // 12.10.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato jagāda sa śuko deva duḥsahasāhasāḥ / striyo duścaritāḥ pāpās tathā ca śrūyatāṃ kathā // 12.10.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
asti harṣavatī nāma nagarī tatra cābhavat / agraṇīr dharmadattākhyo bahukoṭīśvaro vaṇik // 12.10.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vasudattābhidhānā ca rūpe 'nanyasamā sutā / babhūva tasya vaṇijaḥ prāṇebhyo 'py adhikapriyā // 12.10.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
sā ca tena samānāya rūpayauvanaśāline / dattā varāṅganānetracakorāmṛtaraśmaye // 12.10.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nāmnā samudradattāya vaṇikputrāya sādhave / nagaryām āryajuṣṭāyāṃ tāmraliptyāṃ nivāsine // 12.10.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kadācit sā svadeśasthe patyau svasya pitur gṛhe / sthitā vaṇiksutā dūrāt kaṃcit puruṣam aikṣata // 12.10.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ yuvānaṃ sukāntaṃ sā capalā māramohitā / guptaṃ sakhīmukhānītaṃ bheje pracchannakāmukam // 12.10.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥprabhṛti tenaiva saha tatra sadā rahaḥ / rātrau rātrāv araṃstāsau tadekāsaktamānasā // 12.10.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā ca sa kaumāraḥ patis tasyāḥ svadeśataḥ / ājagāmātra tatpitroḥ pramoda iva mūrtimān // 12.10.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sotsave ca dine tasmin sā naktaṃ kṛtamaṇḍanā / mātrānupreṣitā bheje śayyāsthāpi na taṃ patim // 12.10.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prārthitā tena cālīkasuptaṃ cakre 'nyamānasā / pānamatto 'dhvakhinnaś ca so 'pi jahre 'tha nidrayā // 12.10.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataś ca supte sarvasmin bhuktapīte jane śanaiḥ / saṃdhiṃ bhittvā viveśātra cauro vāsagṛhāntare // 12.10.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkālaṃ tam apaśyantī sāpy utthāya vaṇiksutā / svajārakṛtasaṃketā niragān nibhṛtaṃ tataḥ // 12.10.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadālokya sa cauro 'tra vighniteccho vyacintayat / yeṣām arthe praviṣṭo 'haṃ tair evābharaṇair vṛtā // 12.10.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
niśīthe nirgataiṣā tad vīkṣe 'haṃ sā kva gacchati / ity ākalayya nirgatya sa cauras tāṃ vaṇiksutām // 12.10.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vasudattām anu yayau dattadṛṣṭir alakṣitaḥ / sāpi puṣpādihastaikasasaṃketasakhīyutā // 12.10.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā bāhyaṃ praviṣṭābhūd udyānaṃ nātidūragam / tatrāpaśyac ca taṃ vṛkṣe lambamānaṃ svakāmukam // 12.10.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃketakāgataṃ rātrau labdhvā nagararakṣibhiḥ / ullambitaṃ caurabuddhyā pāśakaṇṭhaṃ mṛtaṃ sthitam // 12.10.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
tataḥ sā vihvalodbhrāntā hā hatāsmīti vādinī / papāta bhūmau kṛpaṇaṃ vilapantī ruroda ca // 12.10.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
avatāryātha vṛkṣāt taṃ gatāsuṃ nijakāmukam / upaveśyāṅgarāgeṇa puṣpaiś cālaṃcakāra sā // 12.10.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
samāliṅgya ca niḥsaṃjñaṃ rāgaśokāndhamānasā / unnamayya mukhaṃ yāvat tasyārtā paricumbati // 12.10.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvat sa tasyāḥ sahasā nirjīvaḥ parapūruṣaḥ / vetālānupraviṣṭaḥ sad dantaiś ciccheda nāsikām // 12.10.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena sā vihvalā tasmāt savyathāpasṛtāpy aho / kiṃ svij jīved iti hatā puna etya tam aikṣata // 12.10.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
dṛṣṭvā ca vītavetālaṃ niśceṣṭaṃ mṛtam eva tam / sā bhītā paribhūtā ca cacāla rudatī śanaiḥ // 12.10.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac channaḥ sthitaḥ so 'tha cauraḥ sarvaṃ vyalokayat / acintayac ca kim idaṃ pāpayā kṛtam etayā // 12.10.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
aho batāśayaḥ strīṇāṃ bhīṣaṇo ghanatāmasaḥ / andhakūpa ivāgādhaḥ pātāya gahanaḥ param // 12.10.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad idānīm iyaṃ kiṃ nu kuryād iti vicintya saḥ / kautukād dūrataś cauro bhūyo 'py anusasāra tām // 12.10.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpi gatvā praviśyaiva tat suptasthitabhartṛkam / gṛhaṃ tadā svakaṃ prauccaiḥ prarudaty evam abravīt // 12.10.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
paritrāyadhvam etena duṣṭena mama nāsikā / chinnā niraparādhāyā bhartṛrūpeṇa śatruṇā // 12.10.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutvaitaṃ muhur ākrandaṃ tasyāḥ sarve sasaṃbhramam / udatiṣṭhan prabudhyātra patiḥ parijanaḥ pitā // 12.10.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etyātha tatpitā dṛṣṭvā tām ārdracchinnanāsikām / kruddhas taṃ bandhayāmāsa bhāryādrohīti tat patim // 12.10.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tu naivābravīt kiṃcid badhyamāno 'pi mūkavat / viparyasteṣu sarveṣu śṛṇvatsu śvaśurādiṣu // 12.10.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato jñatvaiva tac caure tasminn apasṛte laghu / kolāhalena tasyāṃ ca vyatītāyāṃ kramān niśi // 12.10.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ninye vaṇijā tena śvaśureṇa vaṇiksutaḥ / rājāntikaṃ tayā sārdhaṃ bhāryayā chinnanāsayā // 12.10.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājā ca kṛtavijñaptiḥ svadāradrohy asāv iti / tasyādiśad vaṇiksūnor vadhaṃ nyakkṛtatadvacāḥ // 12.10.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vadhyabhuvaṃ tasmin nīyamāne saḍiṇḍimam / upāgamya sa cauro 'tra babhāṣe rājapūruṣān // 12.10.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
niḥkāraṇaṃ na vadhyo 'yaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ tu vedmy aham / māṃ prāpayata rājāgraṃ yāvat sarvaṃ vadāmy ataḥ // 12.10.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ūcivān sa nītas tair nṛpasyāgraṃ vṛtābhayaḥ / ā mūlād rātrivṛttāntaṃ cauraḥ sarvaṃ nyavedayat // 12.10.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abravīc ca na ced deva madvāci pratyayas tava / tat sā nāsā mukhe tasya śavasyādyāpi vīkṣyatām // 12.10.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā vīkṣituṃ bhṛtyān preṣya satyam avetya tat / sa rājā taṃ vaṇikputraṃ muktavān vadhanigrahāt // 12.10.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāṃ ca karṇāv api chitvā duṣṭāṃ deśān nirastavān / tad bhāryāṃ śvaśuraṃ cāsya taṃ sarvasvam adaṇḍayat // 12.10.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
cauraṃ ca taṃ purādhyakṣaṃ tuṣṭaś cakre sa bhūpatiḥ / evaṃ striyo bhavantīha nisargaviṣamāḥ śaṭhāḥ // 12.10.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavān eva śuko bhūtvā citrarathābhidhaḥ / kṣīṇendraśāpo gandharvo divyarūpo divaṃ yayau // 12.10.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
śārikā sāpi tatkālaṃ bhūtvā svaḥstrī tilottamā / tathaiva kṣīṇatacchāpā jagāma sahasā divam // 12.10.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vivādaś cāpy anirṇītaḥ sabhāyāṃ so 'bhavat tayoḥ / ity ākhyāya kathāṃ bhūyas taṃ vetālo 'bravīn nṛpam // 12.10.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad bhavān vaktu kiṃ pāpāḥ puruṣāḥ kimuta striyaḥ / ajalpato jāna tas te śiro yasyati khaṇḍaśaḥ // 12.10.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
etan niśamya vacanaṃ vetālasyāṃsavartinas tasya / sa jagāda bhūpatis taṃ yogeśvara yoṣitaḥ pāpāḥ // 12.10.93	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
puruṣaḥ ko'pi hi tādṛk kvāpi kadācid bhaved durācāraḥ / prāyaḥ sarvatra sadā striyas tu tādṛgvidhā eva // 12.10.94	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ity uktavato nṛpateḥ prāgvat skandhāt sa tasya vetālaḥ / naṣṭo 'bhūt sa ca rājā jagrāha punas tadānayanayatram // 12.10.95	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
tato gatvā punas tasya nikaṭaṃ śiṃśapātaroḥ / sa trivikramaseno 'tra śmaśānaṃ niśi bhūpatiḥ // 12.11.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
labdhvā muktāttahāsaṃ taṃ vetālaṃ nṛśarīragam / niḥkampaḥ skandham āropya tūṣṇīm udacalat tataḥ // 12.11.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
calantaṃ ca tam aṃsastho vetālaḥ so 'bravīt punaḥ / rājan kubhikṣor etasya kṛte ko 'yaṃ tava śramaḥ // 12.11.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
āyāse niṣphale 'muṣmin viveko bata nāsti te / tad imāṃ śṛṇu mattas tvaṃ kathāṃ pathi vinodinīm // 12.11.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asti śobhāvatī nāma satyākhyā nagarī bhuvi / tasyāṃ ca śūdrakākhyo 'bhūd bhūpatiḥ prājyavikramaḥ // 12.11.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yasya jajvāla jayinaḥ pratāpajvalano niśam / bandīkṛtārilalanādhūtacāmaramārutaiḥ // 12.11.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
aluptadharmacaraṇasphītā manthe vasuṃdharā / rājñi yasmin visasmāra rāmādīn api bhūpatīn // 12.11.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ kadācin mahīpālaṃ priyaśūram upāyayau / sevārthaṃ mālavād eko namnā vīravaro dvijaḥ // 12.11.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yasya dharmavatī nāma bhāryā satvavaraḥ sutaḥ / kanyā vīravatī ceti trayaṃ gṛhaparicchadaḥ // 12.11.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sevāparicchadaś cānyat trayaṃ kaṭyāṃ kṛpāṇikā / kare karatalaikatra cāru carma paratra ca // 12.11.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvanmātraparīvāro dīnāraśatapañcakam / pratyahaṃ prārthayāmāsa rājñas tasmāt sa vṛttaye // 12.11.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājāpi sa tam ākārasūcitodārapauruṣam / vīkṣya tasmai dadau vṛttiṃ sūdrakas tāṃ yathepsitām // 12.11.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alpe parikare 'py ebhir iyadbhiḥ svarṇarūpakaiḥ / kim eṣa vyasanaṃ puṣṇāty atha kaṃcana sadvyayam // 12.11.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity anveṣṭuṃ samācāraṃ kautukāt sa mahīpatiḥ / pracchannān sthāpayāmāsa cārānasyātra pṛṣṭhataḥ // 12.11.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca vīravaraḥ prātaḥ kṛtvā bhūpasya darśanam / sthitvā ca tasyā madhyāhnaṃ siṃhadvāre dhṛtāyudhaḥ // 12.11.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
gatvā svavṛttilabdhānāṃ dīnārāṇāṃ śataṃ gṛhe / bhojanārthaṃ svabhāryāyā haste prādāt kilānvaham // 12.11.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vastrāṅgarāgatāmbūlaṃ krīṇāti sma śatena ca / śataṃ snātvā ca pūjārthaṃ vyadhād viṣṇoḥ śivasya ca // 12.11.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
viprebhyaḥ kṛpaṇebhyaś ca dadau dānaṃ śatadvayam / evaṃ vibheje pañcāpi tāni nityaṃ śatāny asau // 12.11.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tataḥ kṛtvāgnikāryādi bhūktvā gatvaikako niśi / siṃhadvāre punas tasthau pāṇau karatalāṃ dadhat // 12.11.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etāṃ satatacaryāṃ ca tasya vīravarasya saḥ / rājā cāramukhāc chrutvā tutoṣa hṛdi śudrakaḥ // 12.11.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nivārayāmāsa ca tāṃś cārāṃs tasyānumārgagān / mene viśeṣapūjārhaṃ puruṣātiśayaṃ ca tam // 12.11.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha yāteṣu divaseṣv avahelāvalaṅghite / grīṣme vīravareṇātra supracaṇḍārkatejasi // 12.11.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadīrṣyāta ivodbhūtavidyutkaratalāṃ dadhat / dhārāprahārī ninadann ājagāma ghanāgamaḥ // 12.11.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tadā ca ghora meghaughe pravarṣati divāniśam / siṃhadvāre tathaivāsīt so 'tra vīravaro 'calaḥ // 12.11.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā divā rājā prāsādāgrāt sa śūdrakaḥ / niśi bhūyas tadārohaj jijñāsus tasya tāṃ sthitim // 12.11.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jagāda ca tataḥ ko nu siṃhadvāre sthito 'tra bhoḥ / tac chrutvāhaṃ sthito 'treti so 'pi vīravaro 'bravīt // 12.11.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho sudṛḍhasattvo 'yaṃ bhakto vīravaro mayi / tad eṣa prāpaṇīyo me 'vaśyam eva mahat padam // 12.11.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti saṃcintya nṛpatiḥ prāsādād avatīrya saḥ / śūdrakaḥ śayanaṃ bheje praviśyāntaḥpuraṃ tataḥ // 12.11.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyedyuś ca bhṛśaṃ meghe dhārāsāreṇa varṣati / pradoṣe guptabhavane kāle tamasi jṛmbhite // 12.11.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
punaḥ sa rājā jijñāsuḥ prāsādam adhiruhya tam / siṃhadvāre sthitaḥ ko 'trety ekākī prāha taṃ sphuṭam // 12.11.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ sthita iti prokte punar vīravareṇa ca / yāvad vismayate so 'tra rājā taddhairyadarśanāt // 12.11.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvad vidūre śuśrāva sahasā rudatīṃ striyam / viṣādavikalām ekāṃ pralāpakaruṇasvanam // 12.11.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
na me rāṣṭre parābhūto na daridro na duḥkhitaḥ / kaś cid asti tad eṣā kā rodity ekākinī niśi // 12.11.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti cācintayac chrutvā sa jātakaruṇo nṛpaḥ / ādideśa ca taṃ vīravaram ekam adhaḥ sthitam // 12.11.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bho vīravara śṛṇv eṣā dūre strī kāpi roditi / kāsau roditi kiṃ ceti tvayā gatvā nirūpyatām // 12.11.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sa tathety uktvā gantuṃ vīravaras tataḥ / prāvartata nibaddhāsidhenuḥ karatalākaraḥ // 12.11.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na ca meghāndhakāraṃ taj jvaladvidyudvilocanam / sthūladhārāśilāvārṣi rakṣorūpam ajīgaṇat // 12.11.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prasthitaṃ vīkṣya tādṛśyāṃ tasyāṃ rātrau tam ekakam / karuṇākautukāviṣṭo rājā prāsādapṛṣṭhataḥ // 12.11.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āvatīrya gṛhītāsir ekākī tasya pṛṣṭhataḥ / so 'pi pratasthe tatraiva śudrako 'nupalakṣitaḥ // 12.11.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sa ca vīravaro gatvā ruditānusṛtikriyaḥ / bahirnagaryāḥ prāpaikaṃ saras tatra dadarśa ca // 12.11.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
hā śūra hā kṛpālo hā tyāgiñ śūnyā tvayā katham / vatsyāmītyādi rudatīṃ tāṃ striyaṃ vārimadhyagām // 12.11.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
kā tvaṃ rodiṣi kiṃ caivam ity anvakprāptabhūpatiḥ / papraccha tāṃ ca sāścaryas tataḥ sāpy evam abhyadhāt // 12.11.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bho vīravara jānīhi vatsa māṃ pṛthivīm imām / tasyā mamādhunā rājā śūdrako dhārmikaḥ patiḥ // 12.11.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tṛtīye ca dine tasya rājño mṛtyur bhaviṣyati / tādṛśaṃ ca patiṃ prāpsyāmy aham anyaṃ nṛpaṃ kutaḥ // 12.11.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atas tam anuśocāmi duḥkhitātmānam eva ca / etac chrutvā sa tāṃ trasta iva vīravaro 'bravīt // 12.11.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
he devi kac cid apy asti ko 'py upāyaḥ sa tādṛśaḥ / yenāsya na bhavenmṛtyur jagadrakṣāmaṇeḥ prabhoḥ // 12.11.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti tad vacanaṃ śrutvā sā jagāda vasuṃdharā / eko 'sty upāyas taṃ caikaḥ kartuṃ śakto bhavān iti // 12.11.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tato vīravaro 'vādīt tarhi devi vada drutam / yāvat tat sādhayāmy āśu ko 'rthaḥ prāṇair mamānyathā // 12.11.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvovāca vasudhā viraḥ ko 'nyas tvayā samaḥ / svāmibhaktas tad etasya śarmopāyam imaṃ śṛṇu // 12.11.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājñā kṛtapratiṣṭāsti yaiṣā rājakulāntike / uttamā caṇḍikā devī sāṃnidhyotkarṣaśālinī // 12.11.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyai sattvavaraṃ putram upahārīkaroṣi cet / tan naiṣa rājā mriyate jīvaty anyat samāśatam // 12.11.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
adyaiva caitad bhavatā kṛtaṃ ced asti tac chivam / anyathāsya tṛtīye 'hni prāpte nāsty eva jīvitam // 12.11.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktaḥ sa tayā pṛthvyā vīro vīravaras tadā / yāmi devi karomy etad adhunaivety abhāṣata // 12.11.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato bhadraṃ tavety uktvā vasudhā sā tirodadhe / tac ca sarvaṃ sa śuśrāva guptam anvaksthito nṛpaḥ // 12.11.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataś ca gūḍhe jijñāsau tasmin rājñy anugacchati / śūdrake tvaritaṃ gehaṃ niśi vīravaro yayau // 12.11.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra putropahāro 'sya rājārthe dharayā yathā / uktas tathābravīt patnyai dharmavatyai vibodhya saḥ // 12.11.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sā tam āha sma nātha kāryaṃ śivaṃ prabhoḥ / tatprabodhya sutasyāsya śiśor vaktu bhavān iti // 12.11.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ prabodhya suptaṃ taṃ bālaṃ sattvavaraṃ sutam / ākhyāya taṃ ca vṛttāntam evaṃ vīravaro 'bravīt // 12.11.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tat putra caṇḍikādevyā upahārīkṛte tvayi / rājā jīvaty asau no cet tṛtīye 'hni vipadyate // 12.11.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvaiva bālo 'pi yathārthaṃ nāma darśayan / aklībacittaḥ pitaraṃ taṃ sa sattvavaro 'bravīt // 12.11.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
kṛtārtho 'haṃ mama prāṇai rājā cet tāta jīvati / bhuktasya hi tadannasya dattā syān niṣkṛtir mayā // 12.11.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkiṃ vilambyate nītvā bhagavatyāḥ puro 'dhunā / upahārīkurudhvaṃ mām astu śāntir mayā prabhoḥ // 12.11.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti sattvavareṇokte tena vīravaro 'tra saḥ / sādhu satyaṃ prasūto 'si mattaḥ putrety abhāṣata // 12.11.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etat so 'nvāgato rājā sarvaṃ śrutvā bahiḥ sthitaḥ / aha eṣāṃ samaṃ sattvaṃ sarveṣām ity acintayat // 12.11.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vīravaraḥ skandhe kṛtvā sattvavaraṃ sutam / bharyā dharmavatī cāsya kanyāṃ vīravatīm api // 12.11.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ubhau tau yayatus tasyāṃ rātrau tac caṇḍikāgṛham / rājāpi śūdrakaś channaḥ pṛṣṭataḥ sa tayor yayau // 12.11.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra devyāḥ puraḥ skandhāt so 'tha pitrāvatāritaḥ / devīṃ sattvavaro natvā dhairyarāśir vyajijñapat // 12.11.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mama mūrdhopahāreṇa rājā jīvatu śudrakaḥ / anyad varṣaśataṃ devi kuryād rājyam akaṇṭakam // 12.11.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktavatas tasya sādhu sādhv ity udīrya saḥ / sūnoḥ sattvavarasyātha kṛṣṭvā karatalāṃ śiśoḥ // 12.11.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
chittvā śiraś caṇḍikāyai devyai vīravaro dadau / matputreṇopahāreṇa rājā jīvatv iti bruvan // 12.11.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sādhu kaḥ svāmibhakto 'nyaḥ samo vīravara tvayā / yenaivam ekasatputraprāṇavyayavidhāyinā // 12.11.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
datto jīvaś ca rājyaṃ ca śudrakasyāsya bhūpateḥ / ity antarikṣād udagāt tatkṣaṇaṃ tatra bhāratī // 12.11.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tac ca sarvaṃ nṛpe tasmiṃś channe śṛṇvati pasyati / kanyā vīravatī sā tu bālā vīravarātmajā // 12.11.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upetyāśliṣya mūrdhāṇaṃ tasya bhrātur hatasya tam / vilapanty uruśokāndhā hṛtsphoṭena vyapadyata // 12.11.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vīravaraṃ bhāryā dharmavaty evam abravīt / rājñas tāvat kṛtaṃ śreyas tad idānīṃ vadāmi te // 12.11.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nirjñānā yatra bālāpi bhrātṛśokād iyaṃ mṛtā / naṣṭe 'patyadvaye 'py asmiṃs tatra kiṃ jīvitena me // 12.11.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāg eva rājñaḥ śreyorthaṃ mūḍhayā svaśiro mayā / devyai nopahṛtaṃ tasmād dehy anujñāṃ mamādhunā // 12.11.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
praviṣamy analaṃ tāvad āttāpatyakalevarā / ityāgrahād vadantīṃ tāṃ so 'tha vīravaro 'bravīt // 12.11.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ kuruṣva bhadraṃ te kā hi saṃprati te ratiḥ / apatyaduḥkhaikamaye jīvitavye manasvini // 12.11.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
kiṃ na datto mayaivātmety eṣā mā bhūc ca te vyathā / dadyāṃ kiṃ nāham ātmānam anyasādhyaṃ bhaved yadi // 12.11.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tat pratīkṣasva yāvat te citām atra karomy aham / amībhir dārubhir devīkṣetranirmāṇasaṃbhṛtaiḥ // 12.11.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā dārubhis taiḥ sa kṛtvā vīravaraś citām / dīpāgre jvālayāmāsa nyastāpatyaśavadvayām // 12.11.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato dharmavatī patnī patitvā sāsya pādayoḥ / praṇamya devīṃ caṇḍīṃ tāṃ vyajijñapad apāṃsulā // 12.11.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
janmāntare 'py ayaṃ bhūyād āryaputraḥ patir mama / etat prabhos tu rājño 'stu maddehenāmunā śivam // 12.11.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity udīryaiva sā sādhvī tasminn ambhovahelayā / jvālākalāpajaṭile nipapāta citānale // 12.11.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tataś ca cintayāmāsa vīro vīravaro 'tra saḥ / niṣpannaṃ rājakāryaṃ me vāg divyā hy udgatā yathā // 12.11.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhuktasya cānnapiṇḍasya jāto 'ham anṛṇaḥ prabhoḥ / tad idānīṃ mamaikasya keyaṃ jīvitagṛdhnutā // 12.11.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bharaṇīyaṃ priyaṃ kṛtsnaṃ vyayīkṛtya kuṭumbakam / jīvayann ekam ātmānaṃ mādṛśaḥ ko hi śobhate // 12.11.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tat kim ātmopahāreṇāpy etāṃ prīṇāmi nāmbikām / ity ālocya sa devīṃ tāṃ stutyā prāg upatasthivān // 12.11.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jaya mahiṣāsuramāriṇi dāriṇi rurudānavasya śūlakare / jaya vibudhotsavakāriṇi dhāriṇi bhuvanatrayasya mātṛvare // 12.11.90	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
jaya jagad arcitacaraṇe śaraṇe niḥśreyasasya bhaktānām / jaya dhṛtabhāskarakiraṇe haraṇe duritāndhakāravṛndānām // 12.11.91	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
jaya kāli jaya kapālini jaya kaṅkālini śive namas te 'stu / śūdrakanṛpater adhunā prasīda manmastakopahāreṇa // 12.11.92	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
ity upasthāya devyāṃ sa tasyāṃ vīravaraḥ punaḥ / sadyaḥ karatalāghātenottamāṅgaṃ svamacchinat // 12.11.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad ālokyākhilaṃ tatra channasthaḥ śudrako nṛpaḥ / sākulaś ca saduḥkhaś ca sāścaryaś ca vyacintayat // 12.11.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho kim apy anenaitad anyatrādṛṣṭam aśrutam / sādhunā sakuṭumbena duḥkaraṃ matkṛte kṛtam // 12.11.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vicitre 'py atra saṃsāre dhīraḥ syādīdṛśaḥ kutaḥ / akhyāpayan prabho arthe parokṣaṃ yo dadāty asūn // 12.11.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etasya copakārosya na kuryāṃ sadṛśaṃ yadi / tan me kā prabhutā kiṃ ca jīvitavyaṃ paśor iva // 12.11.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

ayaṃ vīravaro vipro nāmānuguṇaceṣṭitaḥ / madartham ujjhitaprāṇaḥ sakuṭumbo 'pi jīvatu // 12.11.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity udīryāsinā rājā śiraś chettuṃ sa śūdrakaḥ / yāvat pravartate tāvad udabhūd bhāratī divaḥ // 12.11.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mā sāhasaṃ kṛthās tuṣṭā sattvenānena te hy aham / pratyujjīvatu sāpatyadāro vīravaro dvijaḥ // 12.11.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā vyaramad vāk sā sa cottasthau saputrakaḥ / sākaṃ duhitrā patnyā ca jīvan vīravaro 'kṣataḥ // 12.11.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tad vilokyādbhutaṃ rājā channo bhūtvā punaś ca saḥ / paśyann atṛptas tām āsīd dṛṣṭyā harṣāśrupūrṇayā // 12.11.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
so 'pi vīravaro dṛṣṭvā suptotthita ivāśu tam / putradāraṃ tathātmānam abhūd vibhrāntamānasaḥ // 12.11.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
papraccha ca pṛthaṅ nāmagrāhaṃ dārasutān sa tān / bhasmībhūtāḥ kathaṃ yūyaṃ jīvantaḥ puna utthitāḥ // 12.11.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mayāpi svaśiraś chinnaṃ jīvāmy eṣaś ca kiṃ nv idam / kiṃ vibhramo 'yam āho svit suspaṣṭo devyanugrahaḥ // 12.11.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ vadan sa tair ūce dārāpatyair alakṣitaḥ / devyanugraha evāyaṃ jīvāmo yad amī iti // 12.11.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa tat tathā matvā natvā vīravaro 'mbakām / ādāya putradārāṃs tānsiddhakāryo gṛhaṃ yayau // 12.11.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra praveśya putraṃ taṃ bhāryāṃ duhitaraṃ ca tām / siṃhadvāram agād rājño rātrau tasyāṃ sa pūrvavat // 12.11.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājā sa śūdrako 'py etad dṛṣṭvā sarvam alakṣitaḥ / gatvāruroha svāvāsaprāsādaṃ taṃ punas tadā // 12.11.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
vyāharac ca sthitaḥ ko 'tra siṃhadvārīti pṛṣṭhataḥ / tato vīravaro 'vādīt saiṣa tiṣṭhāmy ahaṃ prabho // 12.11.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
devādeśād gataś cāham abhūvaṃ tāṃ striyaṃ prati / rākṣasīva ca sā kvāpi dṛṣṭanaṣṭaiva me gatā // 12.11.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvā vacas tasya rājā vīravarasya saḥ / sutarāṃ vismayāviṣṭo dṛṣṭodanto vyacintayat // 12.11.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho samudragambhīradhīracittā manasvinaḥ / kṛtvāpy ananyasāmānyam ullekhaṃ nodgiranti ye // 12.11.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ādy ākalayaṃs tūṣṇīṃ prāsādād avaruhya saḥ / praviśyāntaḥpuraṃ rājā rātriśeṣaṃ nināya tam // 12.11.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

dadau tasmai saputrāya prītyā vīravarāya ca / lāṭadeśe tato rājyaṃ sa karṇāṭayute nṛpaḥ // 12.11.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'tra tulyavibhavāv anyonyasyopakāriṇau / āsātāṃ tau sukhaṃ vīravaraśūdrakabhūpatī // 12.11.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ākhyāya kathām etāṃ vetālo 'tyadbhutāṃ tadā / taṃ trivikramasenaṃ sa rājānam avadat punaḥ // 12.11.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad brūhi rājann eteṣu vīraḥ sarveṣu ko 'dhikaḥ / pūrva eva sa śāpas te yadi jānan na vakṣyasi // 12.11.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvā sa bhūpālo vetālaṃ pratyuvāca tam / eteṣu śudrako rājā pravīraḥ so 'khileṣv iti // 12.11.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'bravīt sa vetālo rājan vīravaro na kim / so 'dhiko yasya tulyo 'syāṃ pṛthvyām eva na jāyate // 12.11.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatpatnī nādhikā kiṃ vā strībhutā yānvamanyata / tathopahārapaśutāṃ sūnoḥ pratyakṣadarśinī // 12.11.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)

tat kasmāc chudrakaṃ bhūpam ebhyas tvaṃ bhāṣase 'dhikam / ity uktavantaṃ vetālaṃ sa jagāda punar nṛpaḥ // 12.11.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
maivaṃ vīravaras tāvat sa tādṛkkulaputrakaḥ / tasya prāṇaiḥ sutair dāraiḥ svāmisaṃrakṣaṇaṃ vratam // 12.11.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

ity ākarṇya vacaḥ sa tasya nṛpater aṃsād asaṃlakṣitaḥ vetālaḥ sahasā yayau nijapadaṃ bhūyo 'pi tanmāyayā / rājāpy uccalito babhūva punar apy ānetum etaṃ pathā pūrveṇaiva suniścitaḥ pitṛvane tasmin sa tasyāṃ niśi // 12.11.132	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
tatas tasya punar gatvā śiṃśapāśākhino 'ntikam / tathaivollambamānaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā naraśarīragam // 12.12.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

ujjayinyām abhūd vipraḥ puṇyasenasya bhūpateḥ / anujīvī priyo 'mātyo harisvāmīti sadguṇaḥ // 12.12.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyātmano 'nurūpāyāṃ bhāryāyāṃ gṛhamedhinaḥ / guṇavān sadṛśaḥ putro devasvāmīty ajāyata // 12.12.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tac chrutvā tādṛśaṃ tasyāś cinvann ekatamaṃ varam / tatpitā sa harisvāmī yāvac cintāṃ vahaty alam // 12.12.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

vijñānino jñānino vā śūrād vā nāparaṃ patim / matputrīcchati tat teṣāṃ madhyāt kathaya ko bhavān // 12.12.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktas tena bhāryārthaḥ sa harisvāminā dvijaḥ / ahaṃ jānāmi vijñānam iti taṃ pratyabhāṣata // 12.12.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

māyāyantrarathe tatra taṃ harisvāminaṃ kṣaṇāt / āropya nītvā svargādīṃ lokāṃs tasmā adarśayat // 12.12.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ānināya ca tuṣṭaṃ taṃ tatraiva kaṭakaṃ punaḥ / dākṣiṇātyasya nṛpater yatrāyātaḥ sa kāryataḥ // 12.12.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
