ity uktvā tatkṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā rathaṃ sarvāstrasaṃyutam / tatrāropya harisvāmijñāniśūrān khagāmini // 12.12.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tān sa saṃprāpayāmāsa kṣaṇād vindhyāṭavībhuvi / jñāninā tāṃ samākhyātāṃ vasatiṃ tatra rakṣasaḥ // 12.12.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra taṃ rākṣasaṃ kruddhaṃ jñātavṛttāntanirgatam / śūro 'tha yodhayāmāsa harisvāmipuraskṛtaḥ // 12.12.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadāścaryam abhūd yuddhaṃ tayor mānuṣarakṣasoḥ / citrāstrayodhinoḥ stryarthaṃ rāmarāvaṇayor iva // 12.12.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣaṇena ca sa saṅgrāmadurmadasyāpi rakṣasaḥ / ardhacandreṇa bāṇena śūras tasyācchinac chiraḥ // 12.12.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hate rakṣasi tāṃ somaprabhām āptāṃ tadāspadāt / ādāya vijñānirathenājagmus te tato 'khilāḥ // 12.12.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
harisvāmigṛhaṃ prāpya teṣāṃ lagne 'py upasthite / jñānivijñāniśūrāṇāṃ vivāda udabhūn mahān // 12.12.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jñānī jagāda nāhaṃ cej jānīyāṃ tad iyaṃ katham / prāpyeta kanyā gūḍhasthā deyā mahyam asāv itaḥ // 12.12.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
vijñānī tv avadan nāhaṃ kuryāṃ ced vyomagaṃ ratham / gamāgamau kathaṃ syātāṃ devānām iva vaḥ kṣaṇāt // 12.12.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kathaṃ syāc cārathaṃ yuddhaṃ rathinā rakṣasā saha / tasmān mahyam iyaṃ deyā lagno hy eṣa mayājitaḥ // 12.12.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śūro 'py uvāca hanyāṃ cen nāhaṃ taṃ rākṣasaṃ raṇe / tad yuvābhyāṃ kṛte yatne 'py etāṃ kanyāṃ ka ānayet // 12.12.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tan mahyam eṣā dātavyety evaṃ teṣu vivādiṣu / harisvāmī kṣaṇaṃ tūṣṇīm āsīd udbhrāntamānasaḥ // 12.12.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tat kasmai sātra deyeti rājan vadatu me bhavān / na vadiṣyasi jānaṃś cet tat te mūrdhā sphuṭiṣyati // 12.12.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti vetālatas tasmāc chrutvā maunaṃ vihāya ca / sa trivikramasenas tam uvācaivaṃ mahīpatiḥ // 12.12.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śūrāya sā pradātavyā yena prāṇapaṇodyamāt / arjitā bahuvīryeṇa hatvā taṃ yudhi rākṣasam // 12.12.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jñānivijñāninau tv asya dhātrā karmakarau kṛtau / sadā gaṇakatakṣāṇau paropakaraṇe na kim // 12.12.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktaṃ manujapater niśamya tasya skandhāgrāt sapadi sa pūrvavaj jagāma / vetālo nijapadam eva so 'pi rājānudvegaḥ punar api taṃ prati pratasthe // 12.12.50	praharṣiṇī [13: mnjrg]
tato gatvā punas tasmāt prāpya taṃ śiṃśapātaroḥ / vetālaṃ prāgvad ādāya skandhe maunena bhūpatiḥ // 12.13.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa trivikramaseno 'tra yāvad āgacchati drutam / tāvat pathi sa vetālo bhūyo 'py evam uvāca tam // 12.13.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājan sudhīḥ susattvaś ca bhavāṃs tena priyo 'si me / ato vinodinīṃ vacmi kathāṃ praśnaṃ ca me śṛṇu // 12.13.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āsīd rājā yaśaḥketur iti khyāto mahītale / tasya śobhāvatī nāma rājadhāny abhavat purī // 12.13.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyām abhūn nagaryāṃ ca gauryāyatanam uttamam / tasya dakṣiṇataś cāsīd gaurītīrthābhidhaṃ saraḥ // 12.13.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāṣāḍhacaturdaśyāṃ śuklāyāṃ prativatsaram / yātrāyāṃ snātum eti sma nānādigbhyo mahājanaḥ // 12.13.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā ca tithau tasyāṃ snātum atrāyayau yuvā / rajako dhavalo nāma grāmād brahmasthalābhidhāt // 12.13.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'paśyad rajakasyātra tīrthe snānāgatāṃ sutām / kanyāṃ śuddhapaṭākhyasya nāmnā madanasundarīm // 12.13.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
indor lāvaṇyahāriṇyā tayā sa hṛtamānasaḥ / anviṣya tannāmakule kāmārto 'tha gṛhaṃ yayau // 12.13.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tatrānavasthitas tiṣṭhan nirāhāras tayā vinā / pṛṣṭho mātrārtayā tasyai tac chaśaṃsa manogatam // 12.13.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā gatvā vimalākhyāya tat svabhartre nyavedayat / so 'py āgatya tathāvasthaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ sutam abhyadhāt // 12.13.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ viṣīdasi putraivam aduṣprāpye 'pi vāñchite / sa hi madyācitaḥ śuddhapaṭo dāsyati te sutām // 12.13.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyūnā hi vayaṃ tasmāt kulenārthena karmaṇā / taṃ vedmy ahaṃ sa māṃ vetti tenaitan me na duḥkaram // 12.13.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity āśvāsya sa taṃ putram āhārādau pravartya ca / tadyukto vimalo 'nyedyur yayau śuddhapaṭāspadam // 12.13.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yayāce cātra putrasya tasyārthe dhavalasya saḥ / kanyāṃ tasmāt sa cāsmai tāṃ pratiśuśrāva sādaram // 12.13.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
lagnaṃ niścitya cānyedyus tāṃ sa śuddhapaṭaḥ sutām / dhavalāya dadau tasmai tulyāṃ madanasundarīm // 12.13.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtodvāhaś ca sa tayā sākaṃ darśanasaktayā / bhāryayā svapitur gehaṃ jagāma dhavalaḥ kṛtī // 12.13.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sukhasthitasya tasyātha kadācic chvaśurātmajaḥ / tasyā madanasundaryā bhrātā tatrāgato 'bhavat // 12.13.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa kṛtapraśrayaḥ sarvaiḥ svasrāśliṣyābhinanditaḥ / saṃbandhipṛṣṭakuśalo viśrāntaś ca jagāda tān // 12.13.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ahaṃ madanasundaryā jāmātuś ca nimantraṇe / tātena preṣito yasmād devīpūjotsavo 'sti naḥ // 12.13.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śraddhāya caitat tadvākyaṃ yathārhaiḥ pānabhojanaiḥ / te saṃbandhyādayaḥ sarve tad ahas tam upācaran // 12.13.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātar madanasundaryā svaśuryeṇa ca tena saḥ / sahito dhavalaḥ prāyād gṛhaṃ tac chvāśuraṃ prati // 12.13.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāpya śobhāvatīṃ tāṃ ca purīm ātmatṛtīyakaḥ / dadarśa nikaṭaṃ prāpya sa gauryāyatanaṃ mahat // 12.13.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nijagāda ca tau bhāryāśvaśuryau śraddhayā tataḥ / etam etāṃ bhagavatīṃ paśyāmo devatām iha // 12.13.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tac chrutvā sa śvaśuryas taṃ niṣedhaṃ pratyabhāṣata / iyanto riktahastāḥ kiṃ paśyāmo devatām iti // 12.13.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ tāvad vrajāmy eko yuvām atraiva tiṣṭhatam / ity uktvā dhavalo draṣṭuṃ devīṃ tāṃ sa tato yayau // 12.13.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praviśyāyatanaṃ tasyāḥ praṇamya ca vibhāvya ca / tām aṣṭādaśadordaṇḍakhaṇḍitoccaṇḍadānavām // 12.13.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pādapadmatalākṣiptamahiṣāsuramardinīm / sa vidhipreraṇotpannabuddhir evam acintayat // 12.13.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jīvopahārair vividhair imāṃ devīṃ jano 'rcati / ahaṃ tu siddhyai kiṃ naitāṃ prīṇāmy ātmopahārataḥ // 12.13.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
iti dhyātvaiva tadgarbhagṛhād ādāya nirjanāt / khaḍgaṃ sāṃyātrikaiḥ kaiścid devyāḥ prāk prābhṛtīkṛtam // 12.13.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
baddhvā śiroruhair ghaṇṭāśṛṅkhalāyāṃ nijaṃ śiram / cicchedaitena khaḍgena tac chinnaṃ cāpatad bhuvi // 12.13.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ciraṃ yāvat sa nāyāti tāvad gatvā tam īkṣitum / tatraiva devībhavane tacchvaśuryo viveśa saḥ // 12.13.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
so 'pi dṛṣṭvā tam utkṛttamūrdhānaṃ bhaginīpatim / vyāmohitas tathaiva svaṃ śiras tenāsinācchinat // 12.13.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi yāvac ca nāyāti tāvad udbhrāntamānasā / taddevībhavanaṃ sāpi yayau madanasundarī // 12.13.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praviśya dṛṣṭvaiva patiṃ bhrātaraṃ ca tathāgatau / hā kim etad dhatāsmīti vilapanty apatad bhuvi // 12.13.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣaṇāc cotthāya śocantī tāv akāṇḍahatāv ubhau / kiṃ mamāpy adhunānena jīvitenety acintayat // 12.13.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vyajijñapac ca devīṃ tāṃ dehatyāgonmukhī satī / devi saubhāgyacāritravidhānaikādhidevate // 12.13.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhyāsitaśarīrārdhe bhartur māraripor api / aśeṣalalanālokaśaraṇye duḥkhahāriṇi // 12.13.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hṛtāv ekapade kasmād bhartā bhrātā ca me tvayā / na yuktam etan mayi te nityabhaktā hy ahaṃ tvayi // 12.13.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tan me śritāyāḥ śaraṇaṃ śṛṇv ekaṃ kṛpaṇaṃ vacaḥ / etāṃ tāvat tyajāmy atra daurbhāgyopahatāṃ tanum // 12.13.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
janiṣye devi bhūyas tu yatra kutrāpi janmani / tatraitāv eva bhūyāstāṃ dvau bhartṛbhrātarau mama // 12.13.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti saṃstutya vijñapya devīṃ natvā ca tāṃ punaḥ / pāśaṃ viracayāmāsa latayāśokapādape // 12.13.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrārpayati yāvac ca pāśe kaṇṭhaṃ vitatya sā / tāvat tatroccacāraivaṃ bhāratī gaganāṅgaṇāt // 12.13.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mā kṛthāḥ sāhasaṃ putri bālāyā api te 'munā / sattvotkarṣeṇa tuṣṭāsmi pāśam etaṃ parityaja // 12.13.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃśleṣaya śiraḥ svaṃ svaṃ bhartṛbhrātṛkabandhayoḥ / uttiṣṭhatāṃ te jīvantāv etau dvāv api madvarāt // 12.13.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
etac chrutvaiva saṃtyajya pāśaṃ harṣād upetya sā / avibhāvyātirabhasād bhrāntā madanasundarī // 12.13.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
bālā bhartṛśiro bhrātṛdehena samayojayat / bhartṛdehena ca bhrātṛśiro vidhiniyogataḥ // 12.13.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'kṣatāṅgau jīvantāv ubhāv uttasthatuś ca tau / śirovinimayāj jātasaṃkarau kāyayor mithaḥ // 12.13.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
athānyonyoditasvasvayathāvṛttāntatoṣiṇaḥ / praṇamya devīṃ śarvānīṃ yatheṣṭaṃ te yayus trayaḥ // 12.13.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
yāntī ca dṛṣṭvā svakṛtaṃ śirovinimayaṃ tayoḥ / vignā kiṃkāryatāmūḍhā sābhūn madanasundarī // 12.13.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad brūhi rājan ko bhartā tasyāḥ saṃkīrṇayos tayoḥ / purvoktaḥ syāt sa śāpas te jānāno na bravīṣi cet // 12.13.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ākarṇya kathāpraśnaṃ rājā vetālatas tataḥ / sa trivikramaseno 'tra tam evaṃ pratyabhāṣata // 12.13.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yat saṃsthaṃ tatpatiśiraḥ saiṣa tasyāḥ patis tayoḥ / pradhānaṃ ca śiro 'ṅgeṣu pratyabhijñā ca tadgatā // 12.13.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavato nṛpates tasyāṃsāt punar atarkitaḥ sa yayau / vetālaḥ sa ca rājā jagāma bhūyas tam ānetum // 12.13.54	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
tato gatvā punaḥ prāpya vetālaṃ śiṃśapātaroḥ / sa trivikramasenas taṃ skandhe jagrāha bhūpatiḥ // 12.14.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gṛhītvā prasthitaṃ taṃ ca vetālaḥ so 'bravīt pathi / rājañ śramavinodārthaṃ kathām ākhyāmi te śṛṇu // 12.14.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
astīha tāmraliptīti purī pūrvāmbudhes taṭe / caṇḍasenābhidhānaś ca rājā tasyām abhūt puri // 12.14.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
parāṅmukhaḥ parastrīṣu yo na saṅgrāmabhūmiṣu / hartā ca śatrulakṣmīṇāṃ na paradravyasaṃpadām // 12.14.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyaikadā dākṣiṇātyo rājaputro janapriyaḥ / āyayau sattvaśīlākhyaḥ siṃhadvāre 'tra bhūpateḥ // 12.14.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra cātmānam āvedya nairdhanyāttaṃ nṛpaṃ prati / kapaṭaṃ pāṭayāmāsa rājaputraiḥ sahāparaiḥ // 12.14.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ kārpaṭiko bhūtvā bahūny abdāni tatra saḥ / tasthau kurvan sadā sevān naiva prāpa phalaṃ nṛpāt // 12.14.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yadi rājānvaye janma nirdhanatvaṃ kim īdṛśam / nirdhanatve 'pi kiṃ dhātrā kṛteyaṃ me mahecchatā // 12.14.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayaṃ hi sevamānaṃ mām evaṃ kliṣṭaparicchadam / ciraṃ kṣudhāvasīdantaṃ rājā nādyāpi vīkṣate // 12.14.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti yāvac ca sa dhyāyaty atra kārpaṭikas tataḥ / tāvad ākheṭakārthaṃ sa niragād ekadā nṛpaḥ // 12.14.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmin kārpaṭike dhāvaty agre laguḍavāhini / jagāma cāśvapādātayutaḥ so 'tha mṛgāṭavīm // 12.14.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtākheṭaś ca tatrārān mahāntaṃ mattasūkaram / anudhāvan kṣaṇāt prāpad atidūraṃ vanāntaram // 12.14.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra parṇatṛṇacchannamārge hāritasūkaraḥ / śrānto mahāvane so 'tha rājā diṅmoham āyayau // 12.14.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekaḥ kārpaṭikaś cātha sa taṃ vātāśvapṛṣṭhagam / prānānapekṣo 'nuyayau padātiḥ kṣuttṛṣārditaḥ // 12.14.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā tathābhūtam anvāyātaṃ sa bhūpatiḥ / sasneham avadat kaccid vetsi mārgaṃ yathāgatam // 12.14.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadākarṇyāñjaliṃ baddhvā sa taṃ kārpaṭiko 'bhyadhāt / vedmi kiṃ ca kṣaṇaṃ tāvad iha viśrāmyatu prabhuḥ // 12.14.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dyuvadhūmekhalāmadhyamaṇir eṣa hi saṃprati / dedīpyate sphuradraśmiśikhājālo 'bjinīpatiḥ // 12.14.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvā sa rājā taṃ soparodham abhāṣata / tarhi kvāpīha pānīyaṃ bhavatā prekṣyatām iti // 12.14.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathety āruhya sa tatas tuṅgaṃ kārpaṭikas tarum / nadīṃ dṛṣṭvāvaruhyātha nṛpaṃ tatra nināya tam // 12.14.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad vāhaṃ ca viparyānīkṛtaṃ kṛtavivartanam / dattāmbuśaṣpakavalaṃ vidadhe vigataśramam // 12.14.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
kṛtasnānāya rājñe ca pronmucya vasanāñcalāt / prakṣālyopānayat tasmai hṛdyāny āmalakāni saḥ // 12.14.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etāni kuta ity etaṃ pṛcchantaṃ sa ca bhūpatim / evaṃ vyajijñapaj jānusthitaḥ sāmalakāñjaliḥ // 12.14.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etadvṛttir ahaṃ nityaṃ vyatītadaśavatsaraḥ / carāmy ārādhayan devam anekāntamunivratam // 12.14.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā satyanāmā tvaṃ sattvaśīlaḥ kim ucyate / ity uktvā sa kṛpākrānto hrītaś cācintayan nṛpaḥ // 12.14.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dhiṅ nṛpān kliṣṭam akliṣṭaṃ ye bhṛtyeṣa na jānate / dhik ca taṃ parivāraṃ yo na jñāpayati tāṃs tathā // 12.14.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti saṃcintya jagrāha sa rājāmalakadvayam / hastāt kārpaṭikasyātha kathaṃcid anubadhnataḥ // 12.14.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhuktvā ca tan nipīyāmbu viśaśrāmātra sa kṣaṇam / jagdhāmalakasaṃpītajalakārpaṭikānvitaḥ // 12.14.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sajjīkṛtaṃ tena vāhaṃ kārpaṭikena saḥ / āruhyāgresare tasminn eva mārgapradarśini // 12.14.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
paścādbhāgam anārūḍhe hayasyābhyarthite 'py alam / yayau sa rājā svapuriṃ pathi prāptātmasainikaḥ // 12.14.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tatra prakhyāpya tadbhaktiṃ vasubhir viṣayaiś ca tam / apūrayat kārpaṭikaṃ na cāmanyata niṣkṛtim // 12.14.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tataḥ kṛtārthaḥ pārśve 'sya caṇḍasiṃhasya bhūpateḥ / muktakārpaṭikācāraḥ sattvaśīlaḥ sa tasthivān // 12.14.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā tena rājñā ca sa siṃhalapateḥ sutām / yācituṃ siṃhaladvīpam ātmārthaṃ preṣito 'bhavat // 12.14.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrābdhivartmanā gacchann arcitābhīṣṭadevataḥ / āruroha pravahaṇaṃ rājādiṣṭaiḥ saha dvijaiḥ // 12.14.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
gate tasmin pravahaṇe madhyabhāgam aśaṅkitam / uttasthau jaladhes tasmād dhvajo janitavismayaḥ // 12.14.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhramlihāgraḥ sumahāñ jāmbūnadavinirmitaḥ / vicitravarṇavicaladvaijayantīvirājitaḥ // 12.14.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatkālaṃ cātra sahasā samunnamya ghanāvalī / bhṛśaṃ varṣitum ārebhe vavau tīvraś ca mārutaḥ // 12.14.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tair varṣavātaiḥ sa balād ākṛṣyādhoranair iva / āsajyata dhvajastambhe tasmin pravahaṇadvipaḥ // 12.14.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca sa dhvajas tasmin vāridhau vīciviplute / vahanena samaṃ tena prāvartata nimajjitum // 12.14.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato dvijās te tatrasthāś caṇḍasiṃhaṃ svabhūpatim / uddiśyodghoṣayāmāsur abhrahmaṇyaṃ bhayākulāḥ // 12.14.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad ākarṇyāsahiṣṇuś ca svāmibhakter anudhvajam / sa sattvaśīlo nistriṃśahasto baddhottarīyakaḥ // 12.14.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ātmānam akṣipat tatra nirapekṣo mahodadhau / udadheḥ kāraṇāśaṅkī vīraḥ pratividhitsayā // 12.14.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
magne ca tasmin vātormidūrotkṣiptam abhajyata / vahanaṃ tac ca tatstāś ca nipetur yādasāṃ mukhe // 12.14.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca magno 'mbudhau tatra sattvaśīlo nirīkṣate / yāvat tāvad dadarśātra purīṃ divyāṃ na vāridhim // 12.14.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmin maṇimayasthambhair bhāsvare hemamandire / sadratnabaddhasopānavāpīkodyānaśobhini // 12.14.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nānāmaṇiśilābhittiratnacitrocchritadhvajam / kātyāyanīdevagṛhaṃ merupronnatam aikṣata // 12.14.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tatra praṇamya devīṃ tāṃ stutyābhyarcya tadagrataḥ / indrajālaṃ kim etat syād ity āścaryād upāviśat // 12.14.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca devyagragataprabhāmaṇḍalakāntarāt / akasmān niragāt kanyā divyodghāṭya kavāṭakam // 12.14.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
indī varākṣī phullābjavadanā kusumasmitā / mṛṇālanālamṛdvaṅgī jaṅgameva sarojinī // 12.14.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
strīsahasraparīvārā devīgarbhagṛhaṃ ca sā / viveśa sattvaśīlasya hṛdayaṃ ca tataḥ samam // 12.14.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
niragāt kṛtapūjā ca devīgarbhagṛhāt tataḥ / na punaḥ sattvaśīlasya hṛdayāt sā kathaṃ cana // 12.14.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāviśat sā ca tatraiva prabhāmaṇḍalakāntare / sattvaśīlo 'py asau tasyāḥ paścāt tatra praviṣṭavān // 12.14.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praviśya ca dadarśāntar anyad evottamaṃ puram / saṃketodyānam iva yat sarvāsāṃ bhogasaṃpadām // 12.14.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatrāntarmaṇiparyaṅkaniṣaṇṇāṃ tāṃ vilokya saḥ / kanyām upetya tatpārśve sattvaśīla upāviśat // 12.14.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āsīc ca tanmukhāsaktalocano likhito yathā / aṅgaiḥ sotkampapulakair vadann āliṅganotkatām // 12.14.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
dṛṣṭvā ca taṃ smarāviṣṭaṃ ceṭīnām atra sā mukham / adrākṣīt tāś ca tatkālam iṅgitajñās tam abruvan // 12.14.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atithis tvam iha prāptas tad asmatsvāminīkṛtam / bhajasvātithyam uttiṣṭha snāhi bhuṅksva tataḥ param // 12.14.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā so 'valambyāśāṃ khatam apy utthitas tataḥ / yayau pradarśitāṃ tābhir ekām udyānavāpikām // 12.14.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāṃ nimagnaś cottasthau tāmraliptyāṃ sa tatkṣaṇāt / caṇḍasiṃhanṛpodyānavāpīmadhyāt sasaṃbhramaḥ // 12.14.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra prāptam akasmāc ca vikṣyātmānam acintayat / aho kim etat kvodyānam idaṃ divyaṃ kva tat puram // 12.14.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatrāmṛtāsārasamaṃ kva tat tasyāś ca darśanam / kva cānantaram evedaṃ tadviśleṣamahāviṣam // 12.14.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
svapnaś ca nāyaṃ suspaṣṭo vinidro 'nubhavo hi me / dhruvaṃ pātālakanyābhis tābhir mūḍho 'smi vañcitaḥ // 12.14.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti dhyāyan vinā tāṃ sa kanyām unmādavān iva / udyāne tatra babhrāma kāmārto vilalāpa ca // 12.14.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadavasthaṃ ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā piśaṅgaiḥ puṣpareṇubhiḥ / vātoddhūtaiḥ parītāṅgaṃ viprayogānalair iva // 12.14.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
udyānapālā gatvaiva caṇḍasiṃhamahībhṛtam / vyajijñapan sa codbhrāntaḥ svayam etya dadarśa tam // 12.14.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāntvayitvā ca papraccha kim idaṃ brūhi naḥ sakhe / kva prasthitas tvaṃ kva prāptaḥ kvāstaḥ kva patitaḥ śaraḥ // 12.14.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tac chrutvā sa svavṛttāntaṃ tasmai sarva śaśaṃsa tam / sattvaśīlo nṛpataye so 'py athaivam acintayat // 12.14.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
hanta vīro 'pi matpuṇyaiḥ kāmenaiṣo viḍambitaḥ / ānṛṇyaṃ gantum etasya labdho hy avasaro mayā // 12.14.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity antaś cintayitvā sa vīro rājā jagāda tam / tahri muñca mudhā śokam ahaṃ tvāṃ prāpayāmi tām // 12.14.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nītvā tenaiva mārgeṇa priyām asurakanyakām / iti cāśvāsayāmāsa taṃ sa snānādinā nṛpaḥ // 12.14.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyedyur mantrivinyastarājyas tena samaṃ ca saḥ / prāyāt pravahaṇārūḍhas taddarśitapatho 'mbudhim // 12.14.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāpya tanmadhyabhāgaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā taṃ prāgvad utthitam / sapatākaṃ dhvajaṃ sattvaśīlas taṃ nṛpam abhyadhāt // 12.14.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'yam abhyutthito divyaprabhāvo 'tra mahādhvajaḥ / mayi magne 'tra maṅktavyaṃ devenaitam anu dhvajam // 12.14.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā nikaṭaṃ prāpya dhvajasyāsya nimajjataḥ / mārge sa sattvaśīlo 'sau pūrvam ātmānam akṣipat // 12.14.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato rājāpi cikṣepa tatrātmānaṃ tathaiva saḥ / anto magnau ca tau kṣipraṃ tad divyaṃ prāpatuḥ puram // 12.14.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra dṛṣṭvā sa sāścaryo rājā devīṃ praṇamya tām / pārvatīṃ sattvaśīlena sahitaḥ samupāviśat // 12.14.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca niragāt tatra sā sakhījanasaṃgatā / rūpinīva prabhā kanyā prabhāmaṇḍalakāt tataḥ // 12.14.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iyaṃ sā sumukhīty ukte sattvaśīlena tāṃ nṛpaḥ / dṛṣṭvā yuktam abhiṣvaṅgaṃ tasya tasyām amanyata // 12.14.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpi taṃ vīkṣya rājānaṃ śubhaśārīralakṣaṇam / puruṣātiśayo 'pūrvaḥ ko 'yaṃ syād ity acintayat // 12.14.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
viveśa cāmbikādhāma pūjāyai sā nṛpo 'pi saḥ / jagāmodyānam ādāya sattvaśīlam avajñayā // 12.14.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣaṇāc ca kṛtapūjā sā niragād daityakanyakā / yācitvā satpatiprāptiṃ devyā garbhagṛhāntarāt // 12.14.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nirgatya sā jagādaikāṃ sakhīṃ sakhi gaveṣyatām / yo 'sāv iha mayā dṛṣṭo mahātmā kva sa tiṣṭhati // 12.14.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ātithyaṃ gṛhyatām etya prasādaḥ kriyatāṃ tvayā / iti caiṣo 'rthyatāṃ pūjyaḥ pumān ko 'py uttamo hy asau // 12.14.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ sakhī tayoktā sā vicityodyānavartine / svasvāminīnideśaṃ taṃ prahvā tasmai nyavedayat // 12.14.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sa nṛpo vīraḥ sāvahelam uvāca tām / eṣaivātithyam asmākam anyat kim upayujyate // 12.14.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvā tayā gatvā sakhyā sā śrāvitā tadā / mene mānyam udāraṃ taṃ sarvathā daityakanyakā // 12.14.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataś cākṛṣyamāneva dhairyapāśena tena sā / nṛpeṇa mānuṣāyogye 'py ātithye niḥspṛhātmanā // 12.14.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
patyarthaṃ pārvatīsevāparipākasamarpitam / matvā tat svayam udyānaṃ viveśāsuraputrikā // 12.14.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vicitraśakunālāpair vātāñcitalatābhujaiḥ / vikīrṇakusumair ārān nandyamāneva pādapaiḥ // 12.14.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upagamya ca sā tatra yathāvat praśrayānatā / ātithyagrahaṇārthaṃ taṃ prārthayāmāsa pārthivam // 12.14.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa sattvaśīlaṃ tam uddiśyovāca tāṃ nṛpaḥ / anena kathitāṃ devīm ihāhaṃ draṣṭum āgataḥ // 12.14.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gaurīṃ dhvajapathaprāpyaparamādbhutaketanām / sā dṛṣṭā tadanu tvaṃ ca kānyātithyārthitātra naḥ // 12.14.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sābravīt kanyā kautukāt tarhi vīkṣitum / āgamyatāṃ dvitīyaṃ me puraṃ trijagadadbhutām // 12.14.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktavatīṃ tāṃ ca sa vihasya nṛpo 'bravīt / tad apy anenaivoktaṃ me yatra sā snānavāpikā // 12.14.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tataḥ sā kanyakāvādīd deva mā smaivam ādiśa / na viḍambanaśīlāhaṃ kā vā pūjye viḍambanā // 12.14.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ hi sattvotkarṣeṇa yuṣmākaṃ kiṃkarīkṛtā / tanmama prārthanābhaṅgaṃ naivaivaṃ kartum arhatha // 12.14.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvā tathety uktvā sattvaśīlasakhaḥ sa tat / prabhāmaṇḍalakopāntaṃ yayau rājā tayā saha // 12.14.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apāvṛtakavāṭe ca tasminn antas tathaiva saḥ / praveśito dadarśāsyās tad divyam aparaṃ puram // 12.14.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nitya saṃnaddhasarvartu sadāpuṣpaphaladrumam / merupṛṣṭham ivāśeṣaṃ nirmitaṃ ratnakāñcanaiḥ // 12.14.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ratnāsane mahārhe taṃ rājānam upaveśya sā / yathocitopanītārghyā daityarājasutābravīt // 12.14.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kanyāham asurendrasya kālanemer mahātmanaḥ / cakrāyudhena ca sa me svargatiṃ prāpitaḥ pitā // 12.14.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
viśvakarmakṛtaṃ cedaṃ paitṛkaṃ me puradvayam / na jarātra na mṛtyuś ca bādhate sarvakāmade // 12.14.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
idānīṃ ca pitā tvaṃ me sapurāhaṃ vaśe tava / ity arpitātmasarvasvāṃ tām uvāca sa bhūpatiḥ // 12.14.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yady evaṃ tat sute hy asmai mayā dattāsy anindite / sattvaśīlāya vīrāya suhṛde bāndhavāya ca // 12.14.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ devīprasādena mūrteneva nṛpeṇa sā / uktā guṇajñā vinatā tat tathety anvamanyata // 12.14.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tataḥ kṛtārthaṃ taṃ tasyāḥ kṛtapāṇigrahaṃ nṛpaḥ / dattāsurapuraiśvaryaṃ sattvaśīlam uvāca saḥ // 12.14.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
buktayor āmalakayos tayor ekaṃ mayā tava / saṃśodhitam asaṃśuddhād ṛṇī te 'haṃ dvitīyataḥ // 12.14.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti praṇatam uktvā taṃ daityaputrīṃ jagāda tām / mārgo me darśyatāṃ yena svapurīṃ prāpnuyām iti // 12.14.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'parājitaṃ nāma khaḍgaṃ bhakṣyaṃ phalaṃ ca sā / ekaṃ jarāmṛtyuharaṃ tasmai daityasutā dadau // 12.14.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tābhyāṃ yuktas tayoktāyāṃ vāpyaṃ magnaḥ svadeśataḥ / utthāya sarvasaṃsiddhakāmo 'bhūt sa kramān nṛpaḥ // 12.14.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sattvaśīlo 'pi daityastrīpurarājyaṃ śaśāsa saḥ / tad brūhi ko 'bdhipatane dvayoḥ sattvādhiko 'nayoḥ // 12.14.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
iti śrutvā tathā praśnaṃ vetālāc chapabhītitaḥ / sa trivikramasenas taṃ bhūpatiḥ pratyabhāṣata // 12.14.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etayoḥ sattvaśīlo 'tra sa me sattvādhiko mataḥ / sa hy avijñātatattvārtho nirāsthaḥ patito 'mbudhau // 12.14.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājā tu tattvaṃ vijñāya viveśāmbhodhim āsthayā / daityakanyāṃ ca nāvañchad asādhyā spṛhayeti saḥ // 12.14.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti tasyākarṇya vaco nirastamaunasya bhūpateḥ skandhāt / sa jagāma pūrvavat taṃ vetālaḥ śiṃśapātaruṃ svapadam // 12.14.114	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
rājāpi tathaiva sa taṃ punar apy ānetum anujagāma javāt / prārabdhe hy asamāpte kārye śithilībhavanti kiṃ sudhiyaḥ // 12.14.115	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
gatvā tāṃ śiṃśapāṃ bhūyo vetālaṃ prāpya bhūmipaḥ / taṃ trivikramaseno 'tra skandhe kṛtvoccacāla saḥ // 12.15.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prayāntaṃ sa punas taṃ ca vetālaḥ skandhato 'bravīt / śramavismṛtaye rājan mattaḥ praśnam imaṃ śṛṇu // 12.15.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅgadeśe 'grahāro 'sti mahān vṛkṣaghaṭābhidhaḥ / viṣṇusvāmīti tatrāsīd dvijo yajvā mahādhanaḥ // 12.15.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya ca svānurūpāyāṃ patnyāṃ jātāḥ kramāt trayaḥ / babhūvus taruṇāḥ putrā divyavaidagdhyaśālinaḥ // 12.15.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
te pitrā preṣitās tena kūrmahetoḥ kadācana / prārabdhayajñena yayus te trayo bhrātaro 'mbudhim // 12.15.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
prāpya kūrmaṃ tato jyāyān kaniṣṭhau tāv abhāṣata / gṛhṇātu yuvayor ekaḥ kūrmaṃ kratukṛte pituḥ // 12.15.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aham etaṃ na śaknomi grahītuṃ visrapicchalam / ity uktavantaṃ taṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ kaniṣṭhau tāv avocatām // 12.15.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tavātra vicikitsā cen nāvayor api sā katham / tac chrutvā so 'bravīj jyeṣṭho gṛhṇītaṃ gacchataṃ yuvām // 12.15.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pitur yajñakriyālopo bhaved yuṣmatkṛto 'nyathā / tato narakapātaḥ syād yuvayos tasya ca dhruvam // 12.15.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktāv anujau tena tau vihasya tam ūcatuḥ / dharmaṃ vetsy āvayor eva samānam api nātmanaḥ // 12.15.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato jyeṣṭho 'bravīt kiṃ me jānītho naiva caṅgatām / ahaṃ bhojanacaṅgo 'smi nārhaḥ spraṣṭuṃ jugupsitam // 12.15.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etat tasya vacaḥ śrutvā bhrātaraṃ madhyamo 'bravīt / ahaṃ tarhy adhikaś caṅgo nārīcaṅgo vicakṣaṇaḥ // 12.15.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
madhyamenaivam ukte tu jyāyān puna uvāca saḥ / kūrmaṃ gṛhṇātu tarhy eṣa kanīyān āvayor iti // 12.15.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa bhrukuṭiṃ kṛtvā kanīyān apy uvāca tau / he mūrkhau tūlikācaṅgaś caṅgo 'haṃ hi viśeṣataḥ // 12.15.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ te kalahāsaktās trayo 'pi bhrātaro mithaḥ / nirṇayāyābhimānaikagrastāḥ kūrmaṃ vihāya tam // 12.15.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājñaḥ prasenajinnāmnas tatpradeśabhuvo 'ntikam / nagaraṃ sahasā jagmur viṭaṅkapuranāmakam // 12.15.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra pratīhāramukhenāvedyāntaḥ praviśya ca / nṛpaṃ vijñāpayāmāsuḥ svavṛttāntaṃ tathaiva te // 12.15.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tiṣṭhatehaiva yāvad vaḥ parīkṣiṣye kramād aham / ity uktas tena rājñā ca tasthus tatra tatheti te // 12.15.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svāhārakāle cānāyya tebhyaḥ so 'grāsanaṃ nṛpaḥ / rājārhaṃ dāpayāmāsa ṣaḍrasaṃ svādubhojanam // 12.15.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhuñjāneṣu ca sarveṣu tadaiko bubhuje na saḥ / vipro bhojanacaṅgo 'tra jugupsākūṇitānanaḥ // 12.15.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kathaṃ na bhojanaṃ bhuṅkte brahman svādu sugandhy api / iti rajñā svayaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ śanair vipro jagāda saḥ // 12.15.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śavadhūmadurāmodaḥ śālibhakte 'tra vidyate / tena nāham idaṃ bhoktum utsahe svādv api prabho // 12.15.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukte tena sarve 'pi tatrāghrāya nṛpājñayā / ūcuḥ kalamaśālyannam adoṣaṃ tat sugandhi ca // 12.15.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tu bhojanacaṅgas tan nāśnāt pihitanāsikaḥ / tataḥ sa rājā saṃcintya yāvad anviṣyati kramāt // 12.15.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tāvan niyogijanatas tad annaṃ bubudhe tathā / grāmaśmaśānanikaṭakṣetrasaṃbhavaśālijam // 12.15.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tato 'tivismitas tuṣṭaḥ sa rājā tam abhāṣata / satyaṃ bhojanacaṅgas tvaṃ tadanyadbhujyatām iti // 12.15.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtāhāraś ca sa nṛpo viprān vāsagṛheṣu tān / visṛjyānāyayāmāsa svam ekāṃ gaṇikottamām // 12.15.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāṃ ca tasmai dvitīyasmai prāhiṇot kṛtamaṇḍanām / viprāya nāricaṅgāya sāyaṃ sarvāṅgasundarīm // 12.15.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā ca vāsagṛhaṃ tasya rājabhṛtyānvitā yayau / rākāniśeva purṇendumukhī kaṃdarpadīpinī // 12.15.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praviṣṭāyāṃ ca tasyāṃ sa prabhābhāsitaveśmani / utpannamūrcchaḥ saṃruddhanāsāgro vāmapāṇinā // 12.15.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
nārīcaṅgo 'bravīd rājabhṛtyān niṣkāsyatām iti / na cen mṛto 'haṃ niryāti gandho 'syāś chāgalo yataḥ // 12.15.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ity uktās tena ninyus te vignāṃ tāṃ rājapūruṣāḥ / rājño 'ntikaṃ vāravadhūṃ vṛttāntaṃ jagaduś ca tam // 12.15.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
rājāpy ānāyya tatkālaṃ nārīcaṅgam uvāca tam / yeyaṃ śrīkhaṇḍakarpūrakālāgurumadottamaiḥ // 12.15.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtaprasādhanā dikṣu prasaraccārusaurabhā / tasyā vāravilāsinyā gandhaḥ syāc chāgalaḥ kutaḥ // 12.15.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukto 'pi sa rājñā tan nārīcaṅgas tadā na yat / pratipede tadā rājā vicārapatito 'bhavat // 12.15.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pṛcchaṃś ca yuktyā bubudhe tām ajakṣīravardhitām / tanmukhād eva bālatve mātṛdhātrīviyogataḥ // 12.15.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'tivismitas tasya nārīcaṅgasya caṅgatām / praśaṃsan nṛpatis tasmai tṛtīyāya dvijanmane // 12.15.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadrasāt tūlikācaṅgāyāśu śayyām adāpayat / paryaṅkopari vinyastasaptasaṃkhyākatūlikām // 12.15.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāṃ ca tūlikācaṅgo mahārhe vāsavesmani / suṣvāpa dhautasuślakṣṇapaṭapracchadavāsasi // 12.15.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yāmārdha eva ca gate sa rātrau śayanāt tataḥ / uttasthau pāṇyavaṣṭabdhapārśvaḥ krandan vyathārditaḥ // 12.15.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
dadṛśe tasya pārśve ca tatratyai rājapūruṣaiḥ / gāḍhalagnasya bālasya mudreva kuṭilāruṇā // 12.15.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā ca tais tadākhyātaṃ rājñe rājāpy uvāca tān / tūlikānāṃ tale kiṃcin mā syāt tad vīkṣyatām iti // 12.15.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvekṣante ca te yāvad ekaikaṃ tūlikātalam / tāvat sarvatalād āpur vālaṃ paryaṅkapṛṣṭataḥ // 12.15.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nītvā cādarśayan rājñe so 'py ānītasya vīkṣya tat / tadrūpaṃ tūlikācaṅgasyāṅgaṃ rājā visismiye // 12.15.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saptabhyas tūlikābhyo 'sya vālo lagnas tanau khatam / iti citrīyamāṇas tāṃ rājā rātriṃ nināya saḥ // 12.15.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātaś cādbhutavaidagdhyasaukumāryā amī iti / tebhyas tribhyo 'pi caṅgebhyo hemalakṣatrayaṃ dadau // 12.15.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas te sukhitās tatra tasthur vismṛtakacchapāḥ / pitur vighnitayajñārthaphalopārjitapātakāḥ // 12.15.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ākhyāya kathādbhutam aṃsaniṣaṇṇaḥ punaḥ sa vetālaḥ / papraccha taṃ trivikramasenaṃ pṛthvīpatiṃ praśnam // 12.15.48	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
rājan vicintya śāpaṃ pūrvoktaṃ brūhi me tvam eteṣām / bhojananārīśayyācaṅgānāṃ ko 'dhikaś caṅgaḥ // 12.15.49	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
tac chrutvaiva sa dhīmān vetālaṃ pratyuvāca taṃ nṛpatiḥ / aham eṣāṃ niḥkaitavam adhikaṃ jānāmi tūlikācaṅgam // 12.15.50	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
yasyāṅge pratyakṣaṃ vālapratibimbam udgataṃ dṛṣṭam / itarābhyāṃ hi bhavet tat pūrvaṃ jātv anyato 'vagatam // 12.15.51	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
iti tasyoktavato 'ṃsād vetālo bhūpater yayau prāgvat / so 'pi tathaiva ca rājā tam anvayāsīd anirviṇṇaḥ // 12.15.52	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
tato gatvā punas tasmāc chiṃśapāpādapān nṛpaḥ / sa trivikramasenas taṃ skandhe vetālam agrahīt // 12.16.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prasthitaś ca tatas tena vetālenābhyadhāyi saḥ / rājan kva rājyaṃ kvaitasmiñ śmaśāne bhramaṇaṃ niśi // 12.16.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kim etan nekṣase bhūtasaṃkulaṃ rātribhīṣaṇam / citādhūmair iva dhvāntair niruddhaṃ pitṛkānanam // 12.16.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṣṭaṃ kīdṛg graho 'yaṃ te bhikṣos tasyānurodhataḥ / tad idaṃ śṛṇu tāvan me praśnaṃ mārgavinodanam // 12.16.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avantiṣv asti nagarī yugādau devanirmitā / śaivī tanur ivoddāmabhogibhūtivibhūṣitā // 12.16.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
padmāvatī bhogavatī yā hiraṇyavatīti ca / kṛtādiṣu triṣu khyātā kalāv ujjayinīti ca // 12.16.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāṃ ca vīradevākhyo rājābhūd bhūbhṛtāṃ varaḥ / tasya padmaratir nāma mahādevī babhūva ca // 12.16.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'tha rājā tayā sākaṃ gatvā mandākinītaṭe / haram ārādhayāmāsa tapasā putrakāmyayā // 12.16.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ciraṃ tapaḥsthitaś cātra parituṣṭeśvaroditām / kṛtasnānārcanavidhiḥ śuśrāvemāṃ giraṃ divaḥ // 12.16.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
rājann utpatsyate putraḥ śūras tava kulodbhavaḥ / kanyā cānanyasāmānyalāvaṇyanyakkṛtāpsarāḥ // 12.16.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutvaitāṃ nābhasīṃ vāṇīṃ siddhābhīṣṭaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ / vīradevaḥ svanagarīm āyayau mahiṣīsakhaḥ // 12.16.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatrāsya śūradevākhye jāte prathamam ātmaje / tasyāṃ padmaratau devyāṃ kramād ajani kanyakā // 12.16.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anaṅgasyāpi rūpeṇa ratim utpādayed iyam / ity anaṅgaratir nāmnā pitrā tena vyadhāyi sā // 12.16.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vṛddhiṃ gatāyās tasyāś ca sa pitā sadṛśaṃ varam / prepsur ānāyayat pṛthvyāṃ paṭeṣu likhithān nṛpān // 12.16.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
teṣv eko 'pi na yat tasya tattulyaḥ pratyabhāsata / tena rājā sa vātsalyāt tāṃ sutāṃ pratyabhāṣata // 12.16.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ tāvan na paśyāmi sadṛśaṃ putri te varam / tat kuruṣva nṛpān sarvān melayitvā svayaṃvaram // 12.16.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etat pitṛvacaḥ śrutvā rājaputrī jagāda sā / tāta svayaṃvaraṃ kartuṃ hrepaṇān nāham utsahe // 12.16.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ tv ekaṃ vetti yo 'pūrvaṃ vijñānaṃ svākṛtir yuvā / tasmai tvayāhaṃ dātavyā nārtho 'nyenādhikena me // 12.16.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ity anaṅgarates tasyāḥ śrutvā svaduhitur vacaḥ / tādṛśaṃ tadvaraṃ yāvad anviṣyati sa bhūpatiḥ // 12.16.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvat tallokato buddhvā catvāras tam upāyayuḥ / vīrā vijñānino bhavyāḥ puruṣā dakṣiṇāpathāt // 12.16.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
te rājñā pūjitās tasmai svaṃ svaṃ vijñānam ekaśaḥ / śaśaṃsuḥ saṃnidhau tasyā rājaputryās tadarthinaḥ // 12.16.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
eko jagāda śūdro 'ham ākhyayā pañcapaṭṭikaḥ / pañcāgryavastrayugmāni karomy eko 'ham anvaham // 12.16.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tebhya ekaṃ prayacchāmi devāyaikaṃ dvijanmane / ekaṃ ca parigṛhṇāmi vāsasor ātmanaḥ kṛte // 12.16.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekaṃ dadāmi bhāryāyai yadi sā bhavatīha me / ekaṃ vikrīya cāhārapānādi vidadhāmy aham // 12.16.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ vijñānine 'naṅgaratir me dīyatām iti / ity ekenodite tena dvitīyaḥ puruṣo 'bravīt // 12.16.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhāṣājño nāma vaiśyo 'haṃ sarveṣāṃ mṛgapakṣiṇām / rutaṃ vedmi tad eṣā me rājaputrī pradīyatām // 12.16.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam ukte dvitīyena tṛtīyaḥ proktavāṃs tataḥ / ahaṃ khaḍgadharo nāma doḥśālī kṣatriyo nṛpa // 12.16.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na khaḍgavidyāvijñāne pratimallo 'sti me kṣitau / tad eṣā tanayā rājaṃs tvayā mahyaṃ vitīryatām // 12.16.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukte tu tṛtīyena caturtha idam abhyadhāt / vipro 'haṃ jīvadattākhyo vijñānaṃ ca mamedṛśam // 12.16.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jantūṃ mṛtān apy ānīya darśayāmy āśu jīvataḥ / tadvīracaryāsiddhaṃ māṃ patim eṣā prapadyatām // 12.16.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
evaṃ vaktṝn sa tān paśyan divyaveṣākṛtīn nṛpaḥ / vīradevaḥ sutāyukto dolārūḍha ivābhavat // 12.16.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ākhyāya kathām etāṃ vetālaḥ pṛṣṭavān nṛpam / sa trivikramasenaṃ taṃ dattapūrvoktaśāpabhīḥ // 12.16.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad bhavān vaktu tāvan me kasmai deyā viśāmpate / teṣāṃ caturṇāṃ madhyāt sā kanyānaṅgaratir bhavet // 12.16.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
etac chrutvā sa rājā taṃ vetālaṃ pratyabhāṣata / maunaṃ tyājayati prāyaḥ kālakṣepāya māṃ bhavān // 12.16.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyathā gahanaḥ ko 'yaṃ praśno yogeśvarocyatām / śūdrāya hi kuvindāya kṣatriyā dīyate katham // 12.16.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vaiśyāyāpi kathaṃ deyā kṣatriyā yac ca tad gatam / mṛgādibhāṣāvijñānaṃ kārye tat kvopayujyate // 12.16.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)

tāvad buddhvā tṛtīyāsya sā mṛgāṅkavatī priyā / tatpārśvam āgantumanā niryayau nijamandirāt // 12.18.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
nirgatā sāśṛṇot kvāpi gṛhe dhānyāvaghātajam / niḥśabdāyāṃ niśi vyaktaṃ vidūre musaladhvanim // 12.18.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutvaiva hā mṛtāsmīti bruvāṇā dhunvatī karau / upāviśad vyathākrāntā mārge sā mṛgalocanā // 12.18.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ pratinivṛtyaiva nītvā parijanena sā / svam evāntaḥpuraṃ bālā rudatī śayane 'patat // 12.18.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dadarśa tatra tasyāś ca cinvan sāśruḥ paricchadaḥ / ālīnabhramarau padmāv iva hastau kiṇāṅkitau // 12.18.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā ca so 'bravīd rājñe rājāpy āgatya vihvalaḥ / kim etad iti papraccha so 'tha dharmadhvajaḥ priyām // 12.18.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpi pradarśya hastau tam ity uvāca rujānvitā / śrute musalaśabde me jatāv etau kiṇāṅkitau // 12.18.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa dāhaśamanaṃ dāpayāmāsa hastayoḥ / tasyāś candanalepādi rājādbhutaviṣādavān // 12.18.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekasyā utpalenāpi patatā kṣatam āhitam / dvitīyasyāḥ punar dagdham aṅgaṃ śaśikarair api // 12.18.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekasyās tu tṛtīyasyāḥ śrutenāpi vinirgatāḥ / kaṣṭaṃ musalaśabdena hastayor īdṛśāḥ kiṇāḥ // 12.18.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho yugapad etāsāṃ preyasīnāṃ mamādhunā / guṇo 'py atyabhijātatvaṃ jāto doṣāya daivataḥ // 12.18.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti cintayatas tasya bhramato 'ntaḥpureṣu ca / triyāmā śatayāmeva kṛcchrāt sā nṛpater yayau // 12.18.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātaś ca sa bhiṣakśalyahartṛbhiḥ saha saṃvyadhāt / tathā yathābhūd acirāt svasthāntaḥpuranirvṛtaḥ // 12.18.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
evam etāṃ kathām uktvā vetālo 'tyadbhutāṃ tadā / sa trivikramasenaṃ taṃ papracchāṃsasthito nṛpam // 12.18.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhijātataraitāsu rājan rājñīṣu kā vada / pūrvoktaḥ so 'stu śāpas te jānan yadi na jalpasi // 12.18.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā so 'bravīd rājā sukumāratarātra sā / aspṛṣṭe musale yasyāḥ śabdenaivodgatāḥ kiṇāḥ // 12.18.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
utpalendukaraiḥ sparśe vṛtte tv itarayor dvayoḥ / saṃjātā vraṇavisphoṭās tena tasyā na te same // 12.18.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti tasyoktavato 'ṃsād rājño bhūyo jagāma sa svapadam / vetālaḥ sa ca rājā tathaiva taṃ sudṛḍhaniścayo 'nuyayau // 12.18.39	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
sa trivikramaseno 'tha punas taṃ śiṃśapātarum / gatvā prāpya ca vetālaṃ rājā skandhe cakāra tam // 12.19.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pratasthe ca tam ādāya tūṣṇīm eva sa pūrvavat / tato bhūyas tam āha sma vetālaḥ so 'ṃsapṛṣṭhataḥ // 12.19.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājann evam anudvignaḥ paryāptam asi me priyaḥ / tad etāṃ śṛṇv akhedāya hṛdyām ākhyāmi te kathām // 12.19.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅgadeśe yaśaḥketur iti rājābhavat purā / kṣmām āśrito 'ṅgaguptyartham adagdho 'nya iva smaraḥ // 12.19.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bāhuvīryajitāśeṣavairivargasya tasya ca / dīrghadarśīty abhūn mantrī śakrasyeva bṛhaspatiḥ // 12.19.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmin mantriṇi vinyasya rājyaṃ sa hatakaṇṭakam / śanaiḥ sukhaikasakto 'bhūd vayorūpamadān nṛpaḥ // 12.19.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasthāv antaḥpure śaśvan nāsthāne pramadāspade / śuśrāva raktimad gītaṃ vacanaṃ na hitaiṣiṇām // 12.19.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rajyati sma ca niścinto jālavātāyaneṣu saḥ / na punā rājakāryeṣu bahucchidreṣu jātv api // 12.19.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dīrghadarśī tu tad rājyacintābhāraṃ samudvahan / atiṣṭhat sa mahāmantrī divāniśam atandritaḥ // 12.19.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nāmamātre kṛtadhṛtiṃ prakṣipya vyasane nṛpam / mantrī rājñaḥ śriyaṃ bhuṅkte dīrghadarśīha sāmpratam // 12.19.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity utpanne mahaty atra janavāde 'tha gehinīm / svairaṃ medhāvinīṃ nāma dīrghadarśī jagāda saḥ // 12.19.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
priye rājñi sukhāsakte tadbhāraṃ vahato 'pi me / rājyaṃ bhakṣitam etenety utpannam ayaśo jane // 12.19.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
lokavādaś ca mithyāpi mahatām iha doṣakṛt / tatyāja kiṃ na rāmo 'pi janavādena jānakīm // 12.19.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad atra kiṃ mayā kāryam ity ukte tena mantriṇā / bhāryā medhāvinī dhīrā sānvarthā tam abhāṣata // 12.19.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tīrthayātrāpadeśena yuktyāpṛcchya mahīpatim / kaṃcit kālaṃ videśaṃ te gantuṃ yuktaṃ mahāmate // 12.19.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ te niḥspṛhasyaiṣa janavādo nivartsyati / tvayy asthite tato rājyam udvakṣyati nṛpaḥ svayam // 12.19.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataś cāsya śanair etad vyasanaṃ hānimeṣyati / āgatasyātra nirgarhā bhavitrī mantritā ca te // 12.19.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukto bhāryayā gatvā dīrghadarśī tatheti saḥ / kathāprasaṅge taṃ bhūpaṃ yaśaḥketuṃ vyajijñapat // 12.19.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
anujānīhi māṃ rājan divasān kāṃścid apy aham / vrajāmi tīrthayātrāyai dharmo hi prepsitaḥ sa me // 12.19.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā so 'bravīd rājā maivaṃ tīrthair vinā paraḥ / dānādiḥ kiṃ na dharmo 'sti svargyas te svagṛheṣv api // 12.19.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athāvocat sa mantrī tam arthaśuddhyādi mṛgyate / dānādau nityaśuddhāni tīrthāni nṛpate punaḥ // 12.19.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yāvac ca yauvanaṃ rājaṃs tāvad gamyāni dhīmatā / aviśvāsye śarīre hi saṃgamas taiḥ kuto 'nyadā // 12.19.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti tasmin vadaty eva rājñi caivaṃ niṣedhati / praviśyātra pratīhāro rājānaṃ taṃ vyajijñapat // 12.19.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
deva vyomasaromadhyam aṃśumālī vigāhate / tad uttiṣṭhata saiṣā vaḥ snānavelātivartate // 12.19.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutvaitat sahasā snātum udatiṣṭhan mahīpatiḥ / yātronmukhaḥ sa mantrī ca taṃ praṇamya gṛhaṃ yayau // 12.19.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāvasthāpya bhāryāṃ tām anuyātrānivāritām / sa pratasthe tato yuktyā svabhṛtyair apy atarkitaḥ // 12.19.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tatra pattana ekasminn adūre 'bdheḥ praviśya saḥ / ekaṃ devakulaṃ śaivaṃ tatprāṅgaṇa upāviśat // 12.19.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrārkakarasaṃtāpaklāntaṃ dūrādhvadhūsaram / dadarśa nidhidattākhyo vaṇig devārcanāgataḥ // 12.19.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa taṃ tathāvidhaṃ dṛṣṭvā sopavītaṃ sulakṣaṇam / saṃbhāvya cottamaṃ vipram ātitheyo 'nayad gṛham // 12.19.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra cāpūjayat snānabhojanādyais tam uttamaiḥ / kaḥ kutas tvaṃ kva yāsīti viśrāntaṃ ca sa pṛṣṭavān // 12.19.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dīrghadarśīti vipro 'ham aṅgadeśād ihāgataḥ / tīrthayātrārtham ity eva gāmbhīryāt so 'py uvāca tam // 12.19.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa nidhidatto 'pi taṃ jagāda mahāvaṇik / suvarṇadvīpagamanāyodyato 'haṃ vaṇijyayā // 12.19.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tat tvaṃ tiṣṭheha madgehe yāvad eṣyāmy ahaṃ tataḥ / tīrthayātrāpariśrānto viśrānto hy atha yāsyasi // 12.19.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā so 'bravīd dīrghadarśī tarhi mameha kim / tvayaiva saha yāsyāmi sārthavāha yathāsukham // 12.19.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam astv iti tenokte sādhunā so 'tha tadgṛhe / cirād avāptaśayano niśāṃ mantrī nināya tām // 12.19.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)

tena gacchan pravahaṇenābdhim adbhutabhīṣaṇam / vilokayan sa saṃprāpa svarṇadvīpaṃ krameṇa tat // 12.19.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kva mantrimukhyatā cāsya kva vādhvollaṅghitāmbudhiḥ / ayaśobhīravaḥ kiṃ na kurvate bata sādhavaḥ // 12.19.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

āgacchaṃś ca tato 'kasmāt tadyukto vahanasthitaḥ / kalpavṛkṣaṃ dadarśābdhāv ūrmeḥ paścāt samutthitam // 12.19.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

aho kim etad ity evaṃ yāvad dhyāyati sa kṣaṇam / tāvat sā vīṇinī kanyā gātum evaṃ pracakrame // 12.19.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yat karmabījam uptaṃ yena purā niścitaṃ sa tad bhuṅkte / pūrvakṛtasya hi śakyo vidhināpi na kartum anyathābhāvaḥ // 12.19.45	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
ity udgāya kṣaṇāt tasminn ambhodhau divyakanyakā / sakalpadrumaparyaṅkaśayyātraiva mamajja sā // 12.19.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

yadi vā vandya eṣo 'bdhir ākaraḥ śaśvad īdṛśām / lakṣmīndupārijātādyā nāsmāt te te kim udgatāḥ // 12.19.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

idānīṃ gantum icchāmi svadeśaṃ bhadram astu te / ity uktvā tam anicchantam apy āmantrya vaṇikpatim // 12.19.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dīrghadarśī sa sattvaikasahāyaḥ prasthitas tataḥ / kramollaṅghitadūrādhvā prāpāṅgaviṣayaṃ nijam // 12.19.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra taṃ dadṛśuś cārā bahir nagaram āgatam / ye yaśaḥketunā rājñā prāṅnyastās tadgaveṣaṇe // 12.19.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tad brūhi ke tvayā bhrāntā deśā dṛṣṭaṃ ca kiṃ navam / iti tatra ca taṃ rājā sa jagāda svamantriṇam // 12.19.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

guptam eko hi yāsyāmi rājyaṃ rakṣyaṃ tu me tvayā / madvaco mānyathā kārṣīḥ śāpito 'si mamāsubhiḥ // 12.19.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā tatprativaco nirasya visasarja tam / mantriṇaṃ svagṛhaṃ rājā cirotkaṃ svajanaṃ prati // 12.19.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrānalpotsave 'py āsīd dīrghadarśī sudurmanāḥ / svāminy asādhyavyasane sukhaṃ sanmantriṇāṃ kutaḥ // 12.19.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
anyedyuś ca sa taddhastanyastarājyabharo nṛpaḥ / yaśaḥketus tataḥ prāyān niśi tāpasaveṣabhṛt // 12.19.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gacchaṃś ca kuśanābhākhyaṃ muniṃ mārge dadarśa saḥ / so 'tra taṃ tāpasākalpaṃ praṇataṃ munir ādiśat // 12.19.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
lakṣmīdattena vaṇijā saha potena vāridhau / gatvā prapsyasi tām iṣṭāṃ kanyāṃ vraja nirākulaḥ // 12.19.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti tadvacasā prītās taṃ praṇamya sa pārthivaḥ / gacchan deśān nadīr adrīn krāntvā taṃ prāpad ambudhim // 12.19.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sutāraśaṅkhadhavalair vīcibhrūbhir vikasvaraiḥ / vīkṣamāṇam ivāvartanetrair ātithyasaṃbhramāt // 12.19.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tattīre vaṇijā tena muniproktena saṃgatiḥ / lakṣmīdattena jajñe 'sya svarṇadvīpaṃ yiyāsunā // 12.19.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tenaiva saha cakrāṅkapādamudrādi darśanāt / prahveṇāruhya vahanaṃ pratasthe so 'mbudhau nṛpaḥ // 12.19.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
madhyam abdheś ca saṃprāpte vahane vārimadhyataḥ / udagāt kalpaviṭapiskandhasthā sātra kanyakā // 12.19.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
yāvat paśyati tāṃ rājā cakora iva candrikām / tāvat sā gāyati smaivaṃ vallakīvādyasundaram // 12.19.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yat karmabījam uptaṃ yena purā niścitaṃ sa tad bhuṅkte / pūrvakṛtasya hi śakyo vidhināpi na kartum anyathābhāvaḥ // 12.19.79	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
tasmād yatra yathā yad bhavitavyaṃ yasya daivayogena / tatra tathā tatprāptyai vivaśo 'sau nīyate 'tra na bhrāntiḥ // 12.19.80	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
iti sūcitabhavyārthāṃ gāyantīṃ tāṃ vibhāvayan / niḥspandaḥ sa kṣaṇaṃ tasthau rājā smaraśarāhataḥ // 12.19.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ratnākara namaḥ satyam agādhahṛdayāya te / yena tvayaitāṃ pracchādya vipralabdho hariḥ śriyā // 12.19.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tat surair apy alabhyāntaṃ sapakṣakṣmābhṛdāśrayam / śaraṇaṃ tvāṃ prapanno 'ham iṣṭasiddhiṃ vidhatsva me // 12.19.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ yāvat samudraṃ taṃ sa nataḥ stauti bhūmipaḥ / tāvat sā kanyakā tatra nimamajja sapādapā // 12.19.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad dṛṣṭvaivānumārge 'syāḥ sa rājātmānam akṣipat / vāridhāv atra kāmāgnisaṃtāpasyeva śāntaye // 12.19.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad vīkṣyāśaṅkitaṃ matvā vinaṣṭaṃ taṃ sa sajjanaḥ / lakṣmīdatto vaṇig duḥkhād dehatyāgodyato 'bhavat // 12.19.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mā kārṣīḥ sāhasaṃ nāsti magnasyāsyāmbhudhau bhayam / eṣo rājā yaśaḥketur nāmnā tāpasaveṣabhṛt // 12.19.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etat kanyārtham āyātaḥ pūrvabhāryeyam asya ca / etāṃ prāpya punaś cāsāv aṅgarājyaṃ sameṣyati // 12.19.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity athāśvāsito vācā tatkālaṃ gaganotthayā / sārthavāho yathākāmaṃ sa jagāmeṣṭasiddhaye // 12.19.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa rājāpi yaśaḥketur nimagno 'nto mahodadhau / akasmān nagaraṃ divyam apaśyaj jātavismayaḥ // 12.19.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhāsvanmaṇimayastambhaiḥ kāñcanojjvalabhittibhiḥ / virājamānaṃ prāsādair muktājālagavākṣakaiḥ // 12.19.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
nānāratnaśilāpaṭṭabaddhasopānavāpikaiḥ / kāmadaiḥ kalpavṛkṣāḍhyair udyānair upaśobhitam // 12.19.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
samṛddhe 'pi pure tatra nirjane 'tha gṛhaṃ gṛham / anupraviśya na yadā tāṃ dadarśa priyāṃ kvacit // 12.19.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tadā vicinvan dṛṣṭvaikam uttuṅgaṃ maṇimandiram / āruhya dvāram udghāṭya praviveśa sa bhūpatiḥ // 12.19.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
praviśya cāntaḥ sadratnaparyaṅkasthitam ekakam / vastrācchāditasarvāṅgaṃ śayānaṃ kaṃcid aikṣata // 12.19.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ syāt saiveti sotkaṇṭham udghāṭayati tanmukham / yāvat tāvad apaśyat tāṃ svepsitām eva so 'ṅganām // 12.19.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
srastanīlāṃśukadhvāntahasanmukhaśaśiśriyam / jyotsnāvadātāṃ pātālagatām iva divā niśām // 12.19.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
taddarśanena cāsyābhūd avasthā kāpi sā tadā / grīṣmartau marupānthasya saritsaṃdarśanena yā // 12.19.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpy unmīlitacakṣus taṃ kalyāṇākṛtilakṣaṇam / vīkṣyākasmāt tathāprāptaṃ saṃbhramāc chayanaṃ jahau // 12.19.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtātithyā natamukhī pūjayantīva pādayoḥ / phullekṣaṇotpalanyāsaiḥ śanair etam uvāca ca // 12.19.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ko bhavān kim agamyaṃ ca praviṣṭho 'si rasātalam / rājacihnāṅkitatanoḥ kiṃ ca te tāpasavratam // 12.19.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ity ādiśa mahābhāga prasādo yadi te mayi / evaṃ tasyā vacaḥ śrutvā sa rājā pratyuvāca tām // 12.19.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅgarājo yaśaḥketur iti nāmnāsmi sundari / āptād anvahadṛśyāṃ ca tvām aśrauṣam ihāmbudhau // 12.19.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tvadarthaṃ kṛtvemaṃ veṣaṃ rājyaṃ vimucya ca / āgatyaiṣa praviṣṭo 'ham anumārgeṇa te 'mbudhim // 12.19.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tan me kathaya kāsi tvam ity ukte tena cātha sā / salajjā sānurāgā ca sānandā caivam abhyadhāt // 12.19.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mṛgāṅkasena ity asti śrīmān vidyādharādhipaḥ / māṃ mṛgāṅkavatīṃ nāmnā viddhi tasya sutām imām // 12.19.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa mām asmin svanagare vimucyaikākinīṃ pitā / na jāne hetunā kena gataḥ kvāpi sapaurakaḥ // 12.19.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tenāhaṃ śūnyavasater nirviṇṇonmajjya vāridheḥ / yantrakalpadrumārūḍhā gāyāmi bhavitavyatām // 12.19.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktavatī tena smaratā tan muner vacaḥ / tathārajyata sā rājñā vacobhiḥ premapeśalaiḥ // 12.19.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yathānurāgavivaśā bhāryātvaṃ tasya tatkṣaṇam / aṅgīcakāra vīrasya samayaṃ tv ekam abhyadhāt // 12.19.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
śuklakṛṣṇacaturdaśyām aṣṭamyāṃ cāryaputra te / pratimāsam anāyattā caturo divasān aham // 12.19.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yatra kvāpi dineṣv eṣu gacchantī cāsmi na tvayā / praṣṭavyā na niṣeddhavyā kāraṇaṃ hy atra vidyate // 12.19.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ tām uktasamayāṃ sa rājā divyakanyakām / tathety uktvaiva gāndharvavidhinā pariṇītavān // 12.19.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
bheje tataś ca saṃbhogasukhaṃ tatra tayā saha / yathābhūd anya evāsyā mānmatho maṇḍanakramaḥ // 12.19.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
keśeṣu srastamālyeṣu kacagrahanakhāvalī / bimbādhare 'tha niṣpītanīrāge daśanakṣatiḥ // 12.19.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kucayoḥ karajaśreṇir bhinnamāṇikyamālayoḥ / luptāṅgarāgeṣv aṅgeṣu gāḍhāliṅganarāgitā // 12.19.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
iti taddivyasaṃbhogasukhāvasthitam atra tam / sā mṛgāṅkavatī bhāryā bhūpaṃ prāhedam ekadā // 12.19.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvam ihaiva pratīkṣethāḥ kāryārthaṃ kvāpi yāmy aham / adya saiṣā hi saṃprāptā mama kṛṣṇacaturdaśī // 12.19.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iha sthas tv āryaputrāmuṃ mā sma gāḥ sphāṭikaṃ gṛham / mātra vāpyāṃ nipatito bhūlokaṃ tvaṃ gamiṣyasi // 12.19.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ity uktvā sā tam āmantrya yayau tasmāt purād bahiḥ / rājāpi prāptakhaḍgas tāṃ channo jijñāsur anvagāt // 12.19.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāpaśyat tamaḥśyāmaṃ vyāttavakrabilaṃ ca saḥ / sākāram iva pātālam āyāntaṃ rākṣasaṃ nṛpaḥ // 12.19.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa rākṣaso nipatyaiva muktaghoraravas tadā / tāṃ mṛgāṅkavatīṃ vaktre nikṣipyaiva nigīrṇavān // 12.19.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad dṛṣṭvaivātikopena sahasā sa jvalann iva / nirmokamuktabhujagaśyāmalena mahāsinā // 12.19.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
koṣākṛṣṭena dhāvitvā rājasiṃho 'bhidhāvataḥ / ciccheda rakṣasas tasya saṃdaṣṭauṣṭhapuṭaṃ śiraḥ // 12.19.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rakṣaḥkabandhavāntena rājñas tasyāsravāriṇā / krodhajo 'tha śaśāmāgnir na tu kāntāviyogajaḥ // 12.19.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato mohaniśāndhe 'smin vinaṣṭagatike nṛpe / akasmān meghamalinasyāṅgaṃ bhittveva rakṣasaḥ // 12.19.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tasyoddyotitadikcakrā candramūrtir ivāmalā / sā mṛgāṅkavatī jīvanty akṣatāṅgī viniryayau // 12.19.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāṃ tathā saṃkaṭottīrṇāṃ dṛṣṭvā kāntāṃ sasaṃbhramam / ehy ehīti vadan rājā pradhāvyaivāliliṅga saḥ // 12.19.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
priye kim etat svapno 'yam uta māyeti tena sā / pṛṣṭā nṛpeṇa saṃsmṛtya vidyādhary evam abravīt // 12.19.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
śṛṇv āryaputra na svapno na māyeyam ayaṃ punaḥ / vidhyādharendrāt svapituḥ śāpo 'bhūd īdṛśo mama // 12.19.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
bahuputro 'pi sa hi me pitā pūrvaṃ vasann iha / mayā vinātivātsalyān nāhāram akarot sadā // 12.19.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ ca sarvadā śarvapūjāsakteha nirjane / caturdaśyor athāṣṭamyor āgacchaṃ pakṣayor dvayoḥ // 12.19.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā ca caturdaśyām ihāgatya rasān mama / ciraṃ gaurīṃ samarcantyā daivād avasitaṃ dinam // 12.19.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad ahar matpratīkṣaḥ san kṣudhito 'pi sa matpitā / nābhuṅkta nāpibat kiṃcid āsīt kruddhas tu māṃ prati // 12.19.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato rātrāv upetāṃ māṃ sāparādhām adhomukhīm / bhavitavyabalagrastamatsnehaḥ śapati sma saḥ // 12.19.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yathā tvadavalepena grasto 'dyāham ayaṃ kṣudhā / māsi māsi tathāṣṭamyoś caturdaśyoś ca kevalam // 12.19.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
harārcanarasād yantīm atraiva tvāṃ bahiḥ pure / nāmnā kṛtāntasaṃtrāso rākṣaso nigariṣyati // 12.19.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhittvā bhittvāsya hṛdayaṃ jīvantī ca nireṣyasi / na smariṣyasi śāpaṃ ca na tāṃ nigaraṇavyathām // 12.19.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sthāsyasy ekākinī cātrety uktaśāpavacāḥ śanaiḥ / so 'nunīto mayā dhyātvā śāpāntaṃ me 'bravīt pitā // 12.19.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhartā bhūtvā yaśaḥketunāmāṅganṛpatir yadā / rākṣasena nigīrṇāṃ tvāṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ nihaniṣyati // 12.19.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadā tvaṃ mokṣyase śāpād dhṛdayāt tasya nirgatā / saṃsmariṣyasi śāpādi vidyāḥ sarvās tathā nijāḥ // 12.19.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ādiśya sa śāpāntaṃ tyaktvā mām ekakām iha / niṣadhādriṃ gatas tāto bhūlokaṃ saparicchadaḥ // 12.19.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ tathā carantī ca śāpamohād ihāvasam / kṣīṇaś caiṣa sa śāpo me jātā sarvatra ca smṛtiḥ // 12.19.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tat tātapārśvam adhunā niṣadhādriṃ vrajāmy aham / śāpānte svāṃ gatiṃ yāma ity eṣa samayo hi naḥ // 12.19.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvam ihāsva svarāṣṭraṃ vā vraja svātantryam atra te / evaṃ tayokte sa nṛpo duḥkhito 'rthayate sma tām // 12.19.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
saptāhāni na gantavyaṃ prasīda sumukhi tvayā / kṣipāva tāvad autsukyam udyāne krīḍanair iha // 12.19.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvaṃ gacchātha pituḥ sthānaṃ yāsyāmy aham api svakam / etat tadvacanaṃ mugdhā tathety aṅgīcakāra sā // 12.19.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'tra reme sa tayā sahodyāneṣu kāntayā / sajalotpalanetrāsu vāpīṣu ṣaḍahaṃ nṛpaḥ // 12.19.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
mā sma yātaṃ vihāyāsmān iti pūt kurvatīṣv iva / utkṣiptavīcihastāsu haṃsasārasaniḥsvanaiḥ // 12.19.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saptame 'hni sa yuktyā tāṃ priyāṃ tatrānayad gṛhe / bhūlokaprāpiṇī yatra sā yantradvāravāpikā // 12.19.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra kaṇṭhe gṛhītvā tāṃ tasyāṃ vāpyāṃ nipatya saḥ / uttasthau svapurodyānavāpīmadhyāt tayā saha // 12.19.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra kāntāsakhaṃ prāptaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvodyānapālakāḥ / hṛṣṭās tan mantriṇe gatvā jagadur dīrghadarśine // 12.19.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'py etya pādapatitas tam ānītepsitāṅganam / dṛṣṭvā prāveśayan mantrī sapauro 'bhyantaraṃ nṛpam // 12.19.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho saiṣā kathaṃ prāptā rājñā divyāṅganāmunā / vyomnīva vidyud iva yā kṣaṇadṛśyā mayekṣitā // 12.19.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
yad yasya likhitaṃ dhātrā lalāṭākṣarapaṅktiṣu / tad avaśyam asaṃbhāvyam api tasyopatiṣṭhate // 12.19.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity atra mantrimukhye 'smin dhyāyaty anyajane 'pi ca / divyastrīprāptisāścaryaṃ rājāgamanasotsave // 12.19.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā mṛgāṅkavatī dṛṣṭvā taṃ svadeśagataṃ nṛpam / iyeṣa pūrṇasaptāhā yātuṃ vaidyādharīṃ gatim // 12.19.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nāvirāsīc ca vidyāsyāḥ smṛtāpy utpatanī tadā / tataḥ sā muṣitevātra viṣādam agamat param // 12.19.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kim akasmād viṣaṇṇeva dṛśyase vada me priye / ity uktā tena rājñā sā vidhyādary evam abravīt // 12.19.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sthitāhaṃ śāpamuktāpi tvatsnehād yad iyac ciram / tena vidyā mama bhraṣṭā naṣṭā divyā ca sā gatiḥ // 12.19.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā hanta siddheyaṃ mama vidyādharīti saḥ / rājā tato yaśaḥketuḥ pūrṇaṃ cakre mahotsavam // 12.19.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad dṛṣṭvā dīrghadarśī sa mantrī gatvā gṛhaṃ niśi / śayanīyagato 'kasmād dhṛtsphoṭena vyapadyata // 12.19.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'nubhūya tacchokaṃ dhṛtarājyabharaḥ svayam / yaśaḥketuś ciraṃ tasthau sa mṛgāṅkavatīyutaḥ // 12.19.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity etāṃ kathayitvā mārge tasmai kathāṃ sa vetālaḥ / avadat punas trivikramasenaṃ nṛpatiṃ tam aṃsagataḥ // 12.19.164	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
tad brūhi bhūpate te saṃpanne svāminas tathābhyudaye / hṛdayaṃ sapadi sphuṭitaṃ tasya mahāmantriṇaḥ kim iti // 12.19.165	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
divyastrī na mayā kiṃ prāpteti śucāsphuṭad dhṛdayam / kiṃ vā rājyam abhīpsor rājāgamajena duḥkhena // 12.19.166	upagīti (12, 15, 12, 15)
etac ca yadi na vakṣyasi mahyaṃ jānann apīha tad rājan / dharmaś ca tava vinaṅkṣyati yāsyati dalaśaś ca jhaṭiti śiraḥ // 12.19.167	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
śrutveti tu trivikramaseno rājā jagāda vetālam / naitat tasmin dvayam api śubhacarite yujyate hi mantrivare // 12.19.168	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
kiṃ tu strīmātrarasād upekṣitaṃ yena bhūbhujā rājyam / tasyādhunā tu divyastrīraktasyātra kā vārtā // 12.19.169	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
tan me kaṣṭe 'pi kṛte pratyuta doṣo batādhikībhūtaḥ / iti tasya vibhāvayato hṛdayaṃ tanmantriṇaḥ sphuṭitam // 12.19.170	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ity ukte narapatinā punaḥ sa māyī vetālo nijapadam eva taj jagāma / rājāpi prasabham avāptum anvadhāvad bhūyo 'pi drutam atha taṃ sa dhīracetāḥ // 12.19.171	praharṣiṇī [13: mnjrg]
atha gatvā punaḥ prāpya śiṃśapātas tato nṛpaḥ / sa trivikramasenas taṃ skandhe vetālam ādade // 12.20.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āyāntaṃ ca sa vetālo bhūyas taṃ nṛpam abravīt / rājañ śṛṇu kathām ekāṃ saṃkṣiptāṃ varṇayāmi te // 12.20.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asti vārāṇasī nāma purī haranivāsabhūḥ / devasvāmīti tatrāsīn mānyo narapater dvijaḥ // 12.20.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mahādhanasya tasyaiko harisvāmīty abhūt sutaḥ / tasya bhāryā ca lāvaṇyavatīty atyuttamābhavat // 12.20.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tilottamādinākastrīnirmāṇe prāptakauśalaḥ / anargharūpalāvaṇyāṃ manye yāṃ nirmame vidhiḥ // 12.20.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tayā sa kāntayā sākaṃ harisvāmī kadācana / ratiśrānto yayau nidrāṃ harmye candrāṃśuśītale // 12.20.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tat kālaṃ tena mārgeṇa kāmacārī vihāyasā / āgān madanavegākhyo vidyādharakumārakaḥ // 12.20.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tatra lāvaṇyavatīṃ patyuḥ pārśve dadarśa tām / suptāṃ ratiklamasrastavastravyaktāṅgasauṣṭhavām // 12.20.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadrūpahṛtacittaḥ san madanāndhaḥ sa tat kṣaṇam / suptām eva nipatyaitāṃ gṛhītvā nabhasā yayau // 12.20.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣaṇāt prabuddho 'tha yuvā harisvāmī sa tatpatiḥ / prāṇeśvarīm apaśyaṃs tām udatiṣṭhat sasaṃbhramaḥ // 12.20.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho kim etat kva gatā kupitā sā nu kiṃ mayi / channā jijñāsituṃ kiṃ me cittaṃ parihasaty uta // 12.20.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity anekavikalpaughavyākulas tām itas tataḥ / harmyaprāsādavalabhīṣv anviṣyan so 'bhraman niśi // 12.20.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
agṛhodyānataś cinvan yan na prāpa kuto 'pi tām / tat sa śokāgnisaṃtapto vilalāpāśrugadgadam // 12.20.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hā candrabimbavadane hā jyotsnāgauri hā priye / rātryā tulyaguṇadveṣāt kiṃ nu soḍhāsi nānayā // 12.20.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvayā kāntyā jito bibhyad iva candanaśītalaiḥ / karair asukhayad yo māṃ so 'yam indus tvayā vinā // 12.20.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
labdhāntara ivedānīṃ tair eva tudati priye / prajvaladbhir ivāṅgārair viṣadigdhair ivāśugaiḥ // 12.20.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ādi krandatas tasya sā harisvāminas tadā / kṛcchrād vyatīyāya niśā na punar virahavyathā // 12.20.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
prātar bibheda viśvasya karaiḥ saṃtamasaṃ raviḥ / bhettuṃ na cakṣame tasya mohāndhatamasaṃ punaḥ // 12.20.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vilabdha iva cakrāhvais tasya tīrṇaniśais tadā / bheje śatagunībhāvaṃ karuṇākranditadhvaniḥ // 12.20.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svajanaiḥ sāntvyamāno 'pi viyogānaladīpitaḥ / na ca lebhe dvijayuvā dhṛtiṃ tāṃ preyasīṃ vinā // 12.20.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
iha sthitam iha snātaṃ kṛtam atra prasādhanam / vihṛtaṃ ca tayātreti yayau tv ita ito rudan // 12.20.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mṛtā tāvan na sā tat kim ātmaivaṃ hanyate tvayā / avaśyaṃ tām avāptāsi jīvañ jātu kutaścana // 12.20.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad dhairyam avalambasva tāṃ gaveṣaya ca priyām / aprāpyaṃ nāma nehāsti dhīrasya vyavasāyinaḥ // 12.20.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti bandhusuhṛdvākyair bodhitaḥ so 'tha kṛcchrataḥ / dinaiḥ kaiścid dharisvāmī babandha dhṛtim āsthayā // 12.20.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
acintayac ca sarvasvaṃ kṛtvā brāhmaṇasād aham / bhramāmi tāvat tīrthāni kṣapayāmy aghasaṃcayam // 12.20.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
pāpakṣayād dhi tāṃ jātu priyāṃ bhrāmyann avāpnuyām / ity ālocya yathāvasthaṃ snānādy utthāya so 'karot // 12.20.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyedyuś ca vicitrānnapānaṃ sattre dvijanmanām / cakārāvāritaṃ kiṃ ca dadau dhanam aśeṣataḥ // 12.20.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
brāhmaṇyamātravittasya nirgatyaiva svadeśataḥ / priyāprāptīcchayā so 'tha tīrthāni bhramituṃ yayau // 12.20.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

priyāvirahasaṃtaptapānthaniḥśvāsamārutaiḥ / nyastoṣmāṇa ivātyuṣṇā vānti sma ca samīraṇāḥ // 12.20.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

bhojanārthi harisvāmī prāpa grāmaṃ kvacid bhraman / padmanābhābhidhānasya gṛhaṃ viprasya sattriṇaḥ // 12.20.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra dṛṣṭvā sa bhuñjānān viprān abhyantare bahūn / dvāraśākhāṃ samālambya tasthau niḥśabdaniścalaḥ // 12.20.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

dūrādhvābhyāgataḥ snātas tāvat kṣīṇendriyaḥ kṣudhā / tad eṣaś cānnadānasya pātram ity avadhārya sā // 12.20.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

prakṣālya pāṇipādaṃ ca vāpyām ācamya cātra saḥ / yāvad bhakṣayituṃ tuṣṭaḥ paramānnam upaiti tat // 12.20.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvad gṛhītvā kṛṣṇāhiṃ cañcvā pādayugena ca / śyenaḥ kutaścid āgatya tarau tasminn upāviśat // 12.20.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

sā tatrādhaḥsthite tasminn annapātre 'patat tadā / tac cādṛṣṭvā harisvāmī sa etyānnam abhuṅkta tat // 12.20.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣudhārtasya tadā tasya mṛṣṭānnaṃ tat kṣaṇena tat / kṛtsnaṃ bhuktavatas tīvrā prodabhūd viṣavedanā // 12.20.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tat trivikramasena tvaṃ rajan brūhi mamādhunā / kasya sā brahmahatyeti pūrvaḥ śāpaḥ sa te 'nyathā // 12.20.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tasya tat pātakaṃ tāvat sarpasya yadi vāsya kaḥ / vivaśasyāparādho 'sti bhakṣyamāṇasya śatruṇā // 12.20.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

sa trivikramaseno 'tha gatvā taṃ śiṃśapātaroḥ / bhūyo 'py āsādya vetālaṃ skandhe jagrāha bhūpatiḥ // 12.21.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prasthitaṃ ca tam urvīśaṃ sa vetālo 'bhyadhāt punaḥ / rājañ śrānto 'si tac citrāṃ kathām ākhyāmi te śṛṇu // 12.21.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asty ayodhyeti nagarī rājadhānī babhūva yā / rakṣaḥkulakṛtāntasya rāmarūpasya śārṅgiṇaḥ // 12.21.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāṃ rājābhavad vīraketur nāma rarakṣa yaḥ / kṣoṇīm imāṃ mahābāhuḥ prākāro nagarīm iva // 12.21.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmin mahīpatāv asyāṃ puryām eko mahāvaṇik / ratnadattābhidhāno 'bhūd vaṇiṅnīvahanāyakaḥ // 12.21.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

sā ca tasya pitur veśmany avardhata manasvinī / rūpalāvaṇyavinayaiḥ sahaiva sahajair guṇaiḥ // 12.21.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
yauvanasthāṃ ca tāṃ tasmād ratnadattān na kevalam / mahānto vaṇijo yāvad rājāno 'pi yayācire // 12.21.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā tu puṃdveṣiṇī naicchad bhartāram api vāsavam / prāṇatyāgodyatā sehe na vivāhakathām api // 12.21.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena tasyāḥ pitā tūṣṇīṃ tasthau vātsalyaduḥsthitaḥ / sa ca pravādo 'yodyāyāṃ tasyāṃ sarvatra paprathe // 12.21.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
atrāntare sadā caurair muṣyamāṇāḥ kilākhilāḥ / saṃbhūyātra nṛpaṃ paurā vīraketuṃ vyajijñapan // 12.21.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nityaṃ muṣyāmahe caurai rātrau rātrāv iha prabho / lakṣyante te ca nāsmābhis tad devo vettu yat param // 12.21.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti pauraiḥ sa vijñapto rājā tām abhitaḥ purīm / taskarānveṣaṇe channān ādiśad ratrirakṣakān // 12.21.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
te 'pi prāpur na yac caurān purī sāmuṣyataiva ca / tadaikadā svayaṃ rājā niśi svairaṃ viniryayau // 12.21.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
