niḥśabdapadavinyāsavicitragatikauśalam / saśaṅkalolanayanaṃ paśyantaṃ pṛṣṭato muhuḥ // 12.21.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ayaṃ sa nūnaṃ cauro me muṣṇāty ekacaraḥ purīm / iti matvaiva nikaṭaṃ sa tasyopayayau nṛpaḥ // 12.21.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tataḥ sa cauro dṛṣṭvā taṃ nṛpaṃ ko 'sīty abhāṣata / cauro 'ham iti rājā taṃ cauraṃ pratyabravīt sa tam // 12.21.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'tha cauro 'bhyadhād dṛṣṭvā tarhi tulyo 'si me suhṛt / tad ehi madgṛhaṃ tāvan mitrācāraṃ karomi te // 12.21.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sa tathety uktvā tenaiva saha bhūpatiḥ / yayau vanāntardharaṇīkhātāntarvarti tadgṛham // 12.21.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
aśeṣabhogabhogāḍhyaṃ bhāsvaddīpaprakāśitam / navīnam iva pātālaṃ balirājānadhiṣṭhitam // 12.21.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra praviṣṭe tasmiṃś ca kṛtāsanaparigrahe / rājñi so 'bhyantaragṛhaṃ praviveśātha taskaraḥ // 12.21.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tat kṣaṇaṃ ca tam etyaikā dāsī tatrāvadan nṛpam / mahābhāga praviṣṭas tvam iha mṛtyumukhe katham // 12.21.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekacauro hy asau pāpaṃ nirgatyātaḥ kariṣyati / dhruvaṃ visvāsaghātīti tad itas tvaritaṃ vraja // 12.21.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktaḥ sa tayā rājā nirgatyaiva tato drutam / gatvā svarājadhānīṃ ca niśi sainyāny asajjayat // 12.21.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃnaddhasainyaś cāgatya dasyos tasya rurodha tat / bhūgṛhadvāravivaraṃ rasattūryākulair balaiḥ // 12.21.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tato ruddhe gṛhe vṛttaṃ pratibhedam avetya saḥ / maraṇe niścitaś cauraḥ śūro yuddhāya niryayau // 12.21.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nirgataś ca raṇe cakre parākramam amānuṣam / karāṃś cakarta kariṇāṃ jaṅghāś ciccheda vājinām // 12.21.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
jahāra ca śirāṃsy eko bhaṭānāṃ khaḍgacarmabhṛt / tatas taṃ kṣapitānīkam abhyadhāvat svayaṃ nṛpaḥ // 12.21.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tasya khaḍgavidyājño rājā karaṇayuktitaḥ / hastāj jahāra nistriṃśam atha tāṃ kṣurikām api // 12.21.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśastraṃ muktaśastro 'tha bāhuyuddhena taṃ nṛpaḥ / cauraṃ nihatya dharaṇau sajīvagrāham agrahīt // 12.21.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
nināya taṃ ca saṃyamya sadhanaṃ nagarīṃ nijām / prātaś cājñāpayat tasya śūlāropaṇanigraham // 12.21.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nīyamānaṃ ca taṃ vadhyabhūmiṃ cauraṃ saḍiṇḍimam / dadarśa sā ratnavatī vaṇikkanyātra harmyataḥ // 12.21.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
vraṇitaṃ dhūliliptāṅgam apy etaṃ māramohitā / dṛṣṭvaiva gatvā pitaraṃ ratnadattam uvāca sā // 12.21.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
vadhāya nīyate yo 'yam eṣa bhartā vṛto mayā / tan nṛpād rakṣa tātainaṃ na ced enam anu mriye // 12.21.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā tāṃ pitāvādīt kim idaṃ putri bhāṣase / yā tvaṃ necchasi bhūpālām api bhartṝn abhīpsataḥ // 12.21.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā pāpaṃ taskaram imaṃ vāñchasy āpadgataṃ katham / ity ādi pitrā proktāpi niścayān na cacāla sā // 12.21.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tataḥ sa tatpitā gatvā tasya caurasya satvaram / sarvasvenāpi rājānaṃ vadhān mokṣam ayācata // 12.21.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājā tu taṃ na tatyāja hemakoṭiśatair api / svaśarīrapaṇānītaṃ cauraṃ sarvāpahāriṇam // 12.21.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ pitary upāyāte vimukhe sā vaṇiksutā / anumartuṃ kṛtasnānā vāryamāṇāpi bandhubhiḥ // 12.21.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āruhya śibikāṃ tasya dasyor vadhyabhuvaṃ yayau / anvīyamānā rudatā pitrā mātrā janena ca // 12.21.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tāvac ca vadhakaiḥ so 'tra cauraḥ śūle 'dhiropitaḥ / tāṃ dadarśa galatprāṇas tathā sajñātim āgatām // 12.21.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
janāc chrutvā ca vṛttāntam aśru muktvā kṣaṇaṃ tataḥ / hasan sa cauraḥ kim api prāṇāñ śūlagato jahau // 12.21.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tato 'vatāritaṃ śūlāt sā taccaurakalevaram / ādāya cārurohātra citāṃ sādhvī vaṇiksutā // 12.21.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tat kṣaṇaṃ ca śmaśāne 'tra bhairavaḥ kṛtasaṃnidhiḥ / adṛśyo bhagavān evaṃ tām uvācāntarikṣataḥ // 12.21.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asmin svayaṃvarapatāv evaṃ bhaktyā tavānayā / tuṣṭo 'smi tad varaṃ mattaḥ prārthayasva pativrate // 12.21.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvaiva varaṃ devād evaṃ vavre praṇamya sā / nātha putraśataṃ bhūyād aputrasyāpi matpituḥ // 12.21.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yenānanyasuto naiṣaḥ prāṇāñ jahyān mayā vinā / iti proktavatīm enāṃ sādhvīṃ devo 'bravīt punaḥ // 12.21.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pituḥ putraśataṃ te 'stu varam anyaṃ vṛṇīṣva ca / tvādṛśī dṛḍhasattvā hi naitāvanmātram arhati // 12.21.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad ākarṇyātha sāvādīt prasanno mayi cet prabhuḥ / taj jīvatv eṣa bhartā me dhārmikaś ca sadāstv iti // 12.21.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam astv akṣato jīvann uttiṣṭhatv eṣa te patiḥ / dhārmikaś cāstu rājāsya vīraketuś ca tuṣyatu // 12.21.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavaty anālakṣyamūrtau śarve nabhaḥsthite / uttasthāv akṣatāṅgo 'tra cauro jīvaṃs tadaiva saḥ // 12.21.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vismitahṛṣṭaḥ san ratnadattaḥ sutāṃ vaṇik / ādāya tāṃ ratnavatīṃ cauraṃ jāmātaraṃ ca tam // 12.21.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
prahṛṣṭair bāndhavaiḥ sākaṃ praviśya nijamandiram / labdhaputravaraś cakre svānandocitam utsavam // 12.21.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jñātavṛttāntatuṣṭaś ca tadaivānāyya taṃ nṛpaḥ / ekavīraṃ vīraketuś cauraṃ senāpatiṃ vyadhāt // 12.21.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
cauryān nivṛtto 'tha sa tāṃ pariṇīya vaṇiksutām / ekavīraḥ sukhaṃ tasthau mārgastho rājasaṃmataḥ // 12.21.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti kathayitvā sa kathāṃ vetālo dattapūrvaśāpabhayam / aṃsasthitas trivikramasenaṃ papraccha taṃ kṣitipam // 12.21.57	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
rājan brūhi sapitṛkām upasthitāṃ tāṃ vaṇiksutāṃ dṛṣṭvā / caureṇa śūlapṛṣṭe ruditaṃ hasitaṃ ca kiṃ tena // 12.21.58	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
atha rājā pratyavadad ruditaṃ caureṇa duḥkhatas tena / nāsyānṛṇyam akāraṇabandhor yāto 'smi vaṇija iti // 12.21.59	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
āścaryataś ca hasitaṃ kim iyaṃ kanyā nṛpān varān hitvā / mayy asminn anuraktā strīcittam aho vicitram iti // 12.21.60	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ity uktavākyasya mahībhṛto 'ṃsān māyī svaśaktyaiva tadā jagāma / svaṃ dhāma vetālavaraḥ sa rājāpy etaṃ punaḥ pūrvavad anvagacchat // 12.21.61	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
tato gatvā punaḥ prāpya vetālaṃ śiṃśapātaroḥ / sa trivikramasenas tam ādāyodacalat punaḥ // 12.22.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āyāntaṃ taṃ ca rājānaṃ sa vetālo 'ṃsapṛṣṭhagaḥ / jagāda bhūyo 'py etāṃ te rājan vacmi kathāṃ śṛṇu // 12.22.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
abhūn nepālaviṣaye nāmnā śivapuraṃ puram / yathārthanāmā tatrāsīd yaśaḥketuḥ purā nṛpaḥ // 12.22.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sa mantriṇi nyasya bharaṃ prajñāsāgarasaṃjñake / candraprabhākhyayā devyā sārdhaṃ bhogān asevata // 12.22.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kālena tasyāṃ devyāṃ ca tasyājāyata kanyakā / rājñaḥ śaśiprabhā nāma jagannetraśaśiprabhā // 12.22.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
krameṇa yauvanasthā sā madhumāse kadācana / yayau yātrotsavaṃ draṣṭum udyānaṃ saparicchadā // 12.22.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatraikadeśe 'paśyat tāṃ kusumāvacayodyatām / utkṣiptabāhulatikālakṣitaikapayodharām // 12.22.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
prasūnavṛntavigalatsaṃdaṃśakaraśobhinīm / āḍhyaputro manaḥsvāmī nāma yātrāgato dvijaḥ // 12.22.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tayā dṛṣṭayā sadyo hṛtasya manaso yuvā / manaḥsvāmy api naivābhūt svāmī madanamohitaḥ // 12.22.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mārgaṇānāṃ kṛte kiṃ svid ratir eṣā manobhuvaḥ / vasantasaṃbhṛtānīha puṣpāṇy uccinute svayam // 12.22.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ vārcayitukāmeyaṃ mādhavaṃ vanadevatā / iti saṃcintayantaṃ taṃ sāpy apaśyan nṛpātmajā // 12.22.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭamātre ca sā tasmin sāṅge nava iva smare / na puṣpāṇi na cāṅgāni sotkā nātmānam asmarat // 12.22.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity anyonanavapremasarasau yāvad atra tau / tiṣṭhatas tāvad udabhūd dhāhāheti mahāravaḥ // 12.22.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
kim etad iti cotkṣiptakaṃdharaṃ paśyatos tayoḥ / āyād atropalabdhānyagajagandhotthayā ruṣā // 12.22.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhagnālāno vinirgatya matto mārgadrumān rujan / patitādhorano dhāvaṃl lambamānāṅkuśaḥ karī // 12.22.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ parijane trastavidrute tāṃ sasaṃbhramam / rājaputrīṃ pradhāvyaiva dorbhyām utkṣipya caikakām // 12.22.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅgaiḥ kiṃcit kṛtāśleṣāṃ bhayaprematrapākulām / nināya sa manaḥsvāmī sudūraṃ gajagocarāt // 12.22.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athāgataiḥ parijanaiḥ stuvadbhis taṃ dvijottamam / muhur vivṛtya paśyantī sā ninye nijamandiram // 12.22.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tasthau tam evārtā smarantī prāṇadāyinam / smarāgnipuṭapākena pacyamānā divāniśam // 12.22.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'py udyānān manaḥsvāmī tadā tasmād anuvrajan / svāntaḥpurapraviṣṭāṃ tāṃ dṛṣṭvā sotko vyacintayat // 12.22.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
naitāṃ vinādhunā sthātuṃ jīvituṃ vāham utsahe / tan me śrīmūladevo 'tra dhūrthaḥ siddho gurur gatiḥ // 12.22.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti saṃcintya katham apy asminn avasite dine / prato yayau guros tasya mūladevasya so 'ntikam // 12.22.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
dadarśa taṃ ca mitreṇa śaśinā nitya saṃgatam / siddhamāyādbhutapathaṃ saśarīram ivāmbaram // 12.22.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
nyavedayac ca tat tasmai praṇamya svamanīṣitam / so 'pi sādhayituṃ tasya pratipede vihasya tat // 12.22.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa yogagulikāṃ kṣiptvā dhūrtapatir mukhe / mūladevo vyadhād vṛddhabrāhmaṇākṛtim ātmanaḥ // 12.22.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
dvitīyāṃ gulikāṃ dattvā mukhakṣepyāṃ cakāra ca / sukāntakanyakārūpaṃ taṃ manaḥsvāminaṃ dvijam // 12.22.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadrūpaṃ taṃ samādāya gatvā dhūrtādhipo 'tha saḥ / tatpriyājanakaṃ bhūpam āsthāne taṃ vyajijñapat // 12.22.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājann eko 'sti me putraḥ kanyā dūrāc ca tatkṛte / mayaiṣā yācitānītā sa ca kvāpi gato 'dhunā // 12.22.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tam anveṣṭum ahaṃ yāmi tad eṣā rakṣyatāṃ tvayā / ānayāmi sutaṃ yāvat tvaṃ hi viśvasya rakṣitā // 12.22.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā śāpabhītyā ca pratipadya sa bhūpatiḥ / sutām ānāyayāmāsa yaśaḥketuḥ śaśiprabhām // 12.22.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jagāda caitāṃ putrīmāṃ kanyāṃ rakṣeḥ svamandire / svapārśva eva cāhāraṃ śayyāṃ cāsyāḥ prakalpayeḥ // 12.22.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti pitroktayā ninye kanyārūpas tatheti saḥ / antaḥpuraṃ manaḥsvāmī rājaputryā tayā nijam // 12.22.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yathāruci tato yāte muladeve dvijākṛtau / kanyārūpaḥ sa tatrāsīn manaḥsvāmī priyāntike // 12.22.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dinaiś ca tāṃ sakhīprītivisrambhaṃ samyagāgatām / ekadā virahakṣāmāṃ śayanīyaluṭhattanum // 12.22.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rātrau raho rājasutām āsannaśayanasthitaḥ / kanyārūpapraticchanno manaḥsvāmī sa pṛṣṭavān // 12.22.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sakhi kiṃ pāṇḍuracchāyā kṣīyamāṇā dine dine / kāntapakṣaviyukteva duḥkhitāsi śaśiprabhe // 12.22.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
brūhi me ko hy aviśvāsaḥ snigdhamugdhe sakhījane / idānīṃ naiva bhokṣye 'haṃ na vadiṣyasi cen mama // 12.22.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sā viniḥśvasya śanai rājasutābravīt / kiṃ me tvayy apy aviśvāsaḥ śṛṇu tat sakhi vacmi te // 12.22.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadāhaṃ madhūdyānayātrāṃ draṣṭuṃ gatābhavam / tatrāpaśyaṃ ca subhagaṃ kaṃcid brāhmaṇaputrakam // 12.22.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
himamuktendusaśrīkaṃ darśanoddīpitasmaram / madhumāsam ivālokakrīḍālaṃkṛtakānanam // 12.22.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
cakorāyitum ete ca pravṛtte yāvad unmukhe / tanmukhendudyutisudhāpāyinī me vilocane // 12.22.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tāvat sravanmadajalas tatrākasmān nirargalaḥ / akālakālameghābho garjann āgān mahāgajaḥ // 12.22.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatsaṃbhramāt parijane naṣṭe 'haṃ bhayavihvalā / utkṣipya vipraputreṇa nītā tenaiva dūrataḥ // 12.22.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrīkhaṇḍenānulipteva sikteva sudhayā tathā / ahaṃ tadaṅgasparśena na jāne kāṃ daśām agām // 12.22.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kṣanāc ca parivāreṇa militenāvaśā tataḥ / ihānītāsmi nikṣiptā svargād iva bhuvas tale // 12.22.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadāprabhṛti saṃkalpais tais taiḥ kalpitasaṃgamam / paśyāmi taṃ prabuddhāpi pārśvasthaṃ prāṇadaṃ patim // 12.22.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
suptā svapne ca kurvāṇaṃ cāṭūny ālokayāmi tam / tyājayantaṃ haṭhāl lajjāṃ cumbanāliṅganādhibhiḥ // 12.22.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na ca prāpnomy abhavyā tannāmādyajñānamohitā / tad evaṃ māṃ dahaty eṣa prāṇeśavirahānalaḥ // 12.22.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti vāksudhayā tasyāḥ pūrṇasvaśravaṇodaraḥ / sānandaḥ sa manaḥsvāmī viprakanyāvapurdharaḥ // 12.22.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtārthamānī matvā taṃ kālam ātmaprakāśane / svarūpaṃ prakaṭīcakre niṣkṛṣya gulikāṃ mukhāt // 12.22.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
jagāda ca vilolākṣi so 'ham evaiṣa yas tvayā / udyāne darśanakrīto nīto nirvyājadāsatām // 12.22.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvat saṃstavakṣaṇabhraṃśāt kleśaṃ taṃ cāptavān aham / yasyaiṣaḥ pariṇāmo me kanyārūpagraho 'bhavat // 12.22.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmāt saphalayaitāṃ me visoḍhāṃ virahavyathām / ātmanaś ca na tanvaṅgi kṣamate 'taḥ paraṃ smaraḥ // 12.22.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ vadantaṃ sahasā prāṇeśaṃ taṃ vilokya sā / āsīd rājasutā kṣipraṃ snehāścaryatrapākulā // 12.22.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
athātyautsukyanirvṛttagāndharvodvāhayos tayoḥ / premṇas tasya mato yādṛk tādṛśo 'bhūd ratotsavaḥ // 12.22.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ so 'tra manaḥsvāmī kṛtī tasthau dvirūpabhṛt / divā sagulikāḥ kanyā rātrāv agulikāḥ pumān // 12.22.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gateṣv atha dineṣv atra yaśaḥketor mahīpateḥ / mṛgāṅkadattasaṃjñena svaśuryeṇa nijā sutā // 12.22.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dattā mṛgāṅkavatyākhyā mahārhavibhavottarā / dvijātaye mahāmantriprajñāsāgarasūnave // 12.22.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmin mātulaputryāḥ sā rājaputrī śaśiprabhā / vivāhe mātulagṛhaṃ taj jagāma nimantritā // 12.22.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tayā saha yayau so 'pi kanyakāparivārayā / vipraputro manaḥsvāmī kāntakanyāsvarūpadhṛt // 12.22.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra taṃ kanyakārūpadharaṃ mantrisuto 'tha saḥ / dṛṣṭvā kila smaravyādhagāḍhabāṇāhato 'bhavat // 12.22.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato muṣitacittaḥ saṃs tayā kapaṭakanyayā / yayau mantrisutaḥ śūnyaṃ svagṛhaṃ svavadhūsakhaḥ // 12.22.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tanmukhalāvanyadhyānāsakto jagāma saḥ / tīvrarāgamahāvyāladaṣṭo moham aśaṅkitam // 12.22.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kim etad iti saṃbhrānte jane tatrotsavojjhite / tam upāgād drutaṃ buddhvā sa prajñāsāgaraḥ pitā // 12.22.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena cāśvāsyamāno 'pi pitrā mohāt prabudhya saḥ / pralapann iva sonmādam ujjagāra manogatam // 12.22.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asvādhīnaṃ ca taṃ matvā tat pitary ativihvale / tasmin rājāpi tad buddhvā tatraiva samupāyayau // 12.22.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā jhaṭity eva gāḍhābhiṣvaṅgato gatam / saptamīṃ madanāvasthāṃ jagāda prakṛtīr nṛpaḥ // 12.22.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kathaṃ brāhmaṇanikṣepaḥ kanyā sāsmai pradīyate / tayā vinā ca niyataṃ paścimām ety asau daśām // 12.22.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
asmin naṣṭe pitāsyaiṣo mama mantrī vinaṅkṣyati / etannāśe rājyanāśas tad iha brūta kā gatiḥ // 12.22.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
ity uktās tena rājñā tāḥ sarvāḥ prakṛtayo 'bruvan / rājño dharmaṃ nijaṃ prāhuḥ prajānāṃ dharmarakṣaṇam // 12.22.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mūlaṃ tasya vidur mantraṃ sa ca mantriṣv avasthitaḥ / mantrināśe mūlanāśād rakṣyā dharmakṣatir dhruvam // 12.22.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
pāpaṃ ca syād dvijasyāsya sasūnor mantriṇo vadhāt / tasmād rakṣyo 'yam āsanno 'vaśyaṃ te dharmaviplavaḥ // 12.22.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dātavyā mantriputrāya vipranyastā kumārikā / kālāntarāgate vipre kruddhe pratividhāsyate // 12.22.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktaḥ prakṛtibhis tatheti pratyapadyata / sa rājā mantriputrāya dātuṃ tāṃ kūṭakanyakām // 12.22.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

anyenānyārtham ānītām anyasmai māṃ dadāsi cet / kāmaṃ tad astu rājā tvaṃ dharmādharmau tavādya tau // 12.22.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ vivāham icchāmi samayenedṛśena tu / ekaśayyāṃ na netavyā patyā tāvad ahaṃ haṭhāt // 12.22.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

ity ukte samaye tena yūnā kanyāvapurbhṛtā / rājñā sa bodhitaḥ prāpa nirvṛttiṃ mantriputrakaḥ // 12.22.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tāṃ mṛgāṅkavatīm ādyāṃ vadhūṃ kūṭavadhūṃ ca tām / jagāma tīrthayātrāyai mūḍaḥ kāntāpriyecchayā // 12.22.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa covāsa manaḥsvāmī strīrūpo 'tra tayā saha / mṛgāṅkavatyekagṛhe samānaśayanāsanaḥ // 12.22.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tathā sthitaṃ kadācit taṃ sā mṛgāṅkavatī niśi / śayyāgṛhe raho 'vādīd bahiḥsupte paricchade // 12.22.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kathāṃ kāṃcit tvam ākhyāhi nidrā nāsti hi me sakhi / tac chrutvākathayat so 'syai strīrūpas tāṃ kathāṃ yuvā // 12.22.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yatrelākhyasya rājarṣeḥ sūryavaṃśabhuvaḥ purā / prāptasya gaurīśāpena strītvaṃ viśvaikamohanam // 12.22.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
anyonyadarśanaprītyā devodyānavanāntare / abhūd budhena saṃyogaḥ samabhūc ca purūravāḥ // 12.22.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāṃ kathāṃ kathayitvā ca dhūrtaḥ puna uvāca saḥ / tad evaṃ devatādeśān mantrauṣadhavaśena vā // 12.22.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
puruṣaḥ strī kadācit syāt strī vā jātu pumān bhavet / bhavanti caivaṃ saṃyogāḥ kāmajā mahatām api // 12.22.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
śrutvaitat taruṇī mugdhā vivāhaproṣitānukā / sā mṛgāṅkavatī smāha viśvastā sahavāsataḥ // 12.22.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tac chrutvā so 'ṅganārūpo vipraḥ puna uvāca tām / etāni kāmacihnāni nanv apūrvāṇi te sakhi // 12.22.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mayaitāny anubhūtāni nigūhe na hy ahaṃ tava / iti tenoditāvādīt sā mṛgāṅkavatī śanaiḥ // 12.22.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

vaiṣṇavo 'sti prasādo me yenāhaṃ svecchayā niśi / puruṣaḥ syāṃ tad eṣo 'dya bhavāmi tvatkṛte pumān // 12.22.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā sa manaḥsvāmī niṣkṛṣya gulikāṃ mukhāt / yauvanoddāmam ātmānaṃ tasyai kāntam adarśayat // 12.22.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

ity uktvā dhūrtarājaṃ taṃ kṛtakakrodhaniṣṭhuram / vibruvāṇaṃ jaradviprarūpaṃ prārthya sa bhūpatiḥ // 12.22.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

iti vetālataḥ śrutvā tasmāt skandhāgravartinaḥ sa trivikramasenas taṃ nṛpatiḥ pratyabhāṣata // 12.22.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
manye śaśina evāsau bhāryā nyāyyā nṛpātmajā / yasmai pradattā prakaṭaṃ pitrā dharmyeṇa vartmanā // 12.22.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)

iti tasya vaco niśamya rājño vetālaḥ sa yayau punas tad eva / sahasaiva tad aṃsataḥ svadhāma kṣitipaḥ so 'pi tam anviyāya tūrṇam // 12.22.115	ajñātasamavṛtta [11: ssjgg] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
atha gatvā punaḥ skandhe vetālaṃ śiṃśapādrumāt / sa trivikramasenas tam ādāyodacalat tataḥ // 12.23.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āgacchantaṃ ca taṃ bhūpaṃ sa vetālo 'bravīt punaḥ / rājañ śṛṇu kathām ekām udārāṃ kathayāmi te // 12.23.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
astīha himavān nāma nagendraḥ sarvaratnabhūḥ / yo gaurīgaṅgayos tulyaḥ prabhavo harakāntayoḥ // 12.23.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tasyāsīt svagṛhodyāne kalpavṛkṣo 'nvayāgataḥ / yathārthanāmā prathito yo manorathadāyakaḥ // 12.23.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
taṃ prārthya devatātmānaṃ sa rājā tat prasādataḥ / prāpa jātismaraṃ putraṃ bodhisattvāṃśasaṃbhavam // 12.23.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

nāsmin sati hi śakro 'pi bādhetāsmān kuto 'paraḥ / etac chrutvā sa jīmūtavāhano 'ntaracintayat // 12.23.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho batedṛśam imaṃ saṃprāpyāmarapādapam / nāsāditaṃ kim apy asmāt pūrvair nas tādṛśaṃ phalam // 12.23.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

adaridrāṃ yathā pṛthvīm imāṃ drakṣye tathā kuru / bhadraṃ te vraja datto 'si lokāyārthārthine mayā // 12.23.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavati jīmūtavāhane racitāñjalau / tyaktas tvayaiṣo jāto 'smīty udabhūd vāk taros tataḥ // 12.23.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kṣaṇāc cotpatya sa divaṃ kalpavṛkṣas tathā vasu / vavarṣa bhuvi naivāsīt ko 'py asyāṃ durgato yathā // 12.23.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tasya tayā tīvrasarvasattvānukampayā / jīmūtavāhanasyātra trailokye paprathe yaśaḥ // 12.23.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena tadgotrajāḥ sarve mātsaryād asahiṣṇavaḥ / taṃ lokasātkṛtārtighnakalpavṛkṣavinākṛtam // 12.23.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jeyaṃ sapitṛkaṃ matvā saṃbhūya kṛtaniścayāḥ / yuddhāya samanahyanta tad rājyāpajihīrṣayā // 12.23.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad dṛṣṭvā prāha pitaraṃ svaṃ sa jīmūtavāhanaḥ / tāta kasyāparasyāsti śaktis tvayi dhṛtāyudhe // 12.23.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ tv asya pāpakasyārthe śarīrasya vināśinaḥ / hatvā bandhūn akṛpano rājyaṃ ko nāma vāñchati // 12.23.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tat kiṃ rājyena naḥ kāryaṃ gatvānyatra kvacid vayam / dharmam eva cariṣyāmo lokadvayasukhāvaham // 12.23.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
modantāṃ kṛpaṇā ete dāyādā rājyalolupāḥ / ity uktavantaṃ jīmūtaketus taṃ sa pitābravīt // 12.23.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ahaṃ tvadartham icchāmi rājyaṃ putra tvam eva cet / taj jahāsi kṛpāviṣṭas tan me vṛddhasya tena kim // 12.23.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ kṛtābhyanujñena pitrā mātrā ca so 'nvitaḥ / malayādrim agāt tyaktarājyo jīmūtavāhanaḥ // 12.23.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra candanasaṃchannavahan nirjharakandare / śuśrūṣamāṇaḥ pitaraṃ sa tasthau kalpitāśramaḥ // 12.23.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
mitraṃ cāsyātra saṃpede mitrāvasur iti śrutaḥ / viśvāvasoḥ sutaḥ siddharājasyaitannivāsinaḥ // 12.23.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā cātra sa bhrāmyan viveśopavanasthitam / draṣṭum āyatanaṃ devyā gauryā jīmūtavāhanaḥ // 12.23.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatropavīṇayantīṃ ca dadarśa varakanyakām / sakhījanānvitāṃ śailatanayārādhanodyatām // 12.23.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ākarṇyamānasaṃgītamañjuvīṇāravāṃ mṛgaiḥ / dṛṣṭalocanalāvanyalajjitair iva niścalaiḥ // 12.23.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dadhatā tārakaṃ kṛṣṇam arjunena svacakṣuṣā / pāṇḍavīyām iva camūṃ karṇamūlaṃ vivikṣatīm // 12.23.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
paraḥparavimardena mukhendor iva darśanam / atṛptāv iva vāñchantau bibhrantīṃ saṃmukhau stanau // 12.23.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dhātur ghaṭayato muṣṭigraheṇeva nipīḍite / valīmagnāṅgulīmudre madhye kṣāmamanoramām // 12.23.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭayā ca tayā sadyaḥ so 'bhūj jīmūtavāhanaḥ / tanvyā muṣitacitto 'nto dṛṣṭimārgapraviṣṭayā // 12.23.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpi taṃ bhūṣitodyānaṃ dṛṣṭvotkaṇṭhāvikāradam / kāmāṅgadāhavairāgyād vanaṃ madhum ivāśritam // 12.23.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathānurāgavivaśā bheje kanyā vihastatām / yathā sakhīva vīṇāsyā vyākulālāpatāṃ yayau // 12.23.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa papraccha sakhīṃ tasyā jīmūtavāhanaḥ / kiṃ dhanyaṃ nāma sakhyās te ko vaṃśo 'laṃkṛto 'nayā // 12.23.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sā sakhī prāha nāmnā malayavaty asau / mitrāvasusvasā siddharājaviśvāvasoḥ sutā // 12.23.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktvā sahṛdayā sā taṃ jīmūtavāhanam / nāmānvayau ca pṛṣṭvāsya muniputraṃ sahāgatam // 12.23.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāṃ bravīti sma malayavatīṃ smitamitākṣaram / sakhi vidyādharendrasya nāsyātithyaṃ karoṣi kim // 12.23.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
jagatpūjyo 'tithir hy eṣa prāpta ity udite tayā / sābhūd vidyādharasutā tūṣṇīṃ lajjānatānanā // 12.23.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
lajjāvatīyaṃ matto 'rcā gṛhyatām iti vādinī / ekātha tat sakhī tasmai sārghyāṃ mālām upānayat // 12.23.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa cādāyaiva jīmūtavāhanaḥ premanirbharaḥ / kaṇṭhe malayavatyās tāṃ mālāṃ tasyāḥ samarpayat // 12.23.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpi tiryakprasṛtayā paśyantī snigdhayā dṛśā / nīlotpalamayīṃ mālām iva tasmin nyaveśayat // 12.23.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity anyonakṛtāśabdasvayaṃvaraviśeṣayoḥ / tayor etya jagādaikā ceṭī tāṃ siddhakanyakām // 12.23.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jananī rājaputri tvāṃ smaraty āgaccha māciram / tac chrutvākṛṣya kāmeṣukīlitām iva kṛcchrataḥ // 12.23.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sotkāṃ priyamukhād dṛṣṭiṃ kathaṃcit sā yayau gṛham / jīmūtavāhano 'py āgāt tan natātmā svamāśramam // 12.23.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sātha svāṃ jananīṃ dṛṣṭā prāṇeśavirahāturā / gatvā malayavaty āśu papāta śayanīyake // 12.23.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athāntargatakāmāgnidhūmenevāvilekṣaṇā / aśrudhārāṃ pramuñcantī saṃtāpakvathitāṅgakā // 12.23.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sakhībhiś candanair liptā vījitā cābjinīdalaiḥ / ratiṃ na bheje śayane nāṅke sakhyā na bhūtale // 12.23.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
gate 'tha vāsare kvāpi raktayā saha saṃdhyayā / hasatprācīmukhaṃ candre samākramya ca cumbati // 12.23.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
smareṇa preryamāṇāpi dūtīsaṃpreṣaṇādi sā / lajjayā nāśakat kartuṃ jīvitaspṛhayojjhitā // 12.23.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nināya ca niśām induviṣamām abjinīva tām / baddhamohālipaṭale hṛdi saṃkocam etya sā // 12.23.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tāvac ca tadviyogārtaḥ so 'pi jīmūtavāhanaḥ / śayanastho 'pi patito haste kusumadhanvanaḥ // 12.23.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
nūtanodbhinnarāgo 'pi pronmiṣatpāṇḍuracchaviḥ / hrīmūko 'pi vadan pīḍāṃ kāmajām anayan niśām // 12.23.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātaś cātyutsuko bhūyas tad gauryāyatanaṃ yayau / yatra dṛṣṭābhavat tena sā siddhādhipaputrikā // 12.23.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tena sa mitreṇa muniputreṇa pṛṣṭhataḥ / āgatyāśvāsyate yāvan madanānalavihvalaḥ // 12.23.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvat tatraiva sāpy āgān nirgatyaikaiva nirjane / guptaṃ malayavaty ātmatyāgāya virahāsahā // 12.23.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alakṣayantī kāntaṃ svaṃ pādapāntaritaṃ ca sā / udaśrulocanā bālā devīṃ gaurīṃ vyajijñapat // 12.23.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvadbhaktyā devi saṃvṛtto nāsmiñ janmani cen mama / jīmūtavāhano bhartā tad bhūyāt so 'nyajanmani // 12.23.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā racayāmāsa svottarīyeṇa tat kṣaṇam / aśokataruśākhāyāṃ pāśaṃ sā girijāgrataḥ // 12.23.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hā nātha viśvavikhyātakaruṇenāpi na tvayā / katham asmi paritrātā deva jīmūtavāhana // 12.23.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktvā gale yāvat sā taṃ pāśaṃ niyacchati / uccacāra divas tāvad bhāratī devyudīritā // 12.23.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
putri mā sāhasaṃ kārṣīś cakravartī patis tava / vidyādharendro jīmūtavāhano hi bhaviṣyati // 12.23.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ity uktavatyāṃ devyāṃ sa śrutvaiva savayasyakaḥ / jīmūtavāhano hṛṣṭāṃ priyām upajagāma tām // 12.23.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
saiṣa devyā varaḥ paśya vitīrṇaḥ satya eva te / iti jalpati bālāṃ tāṃ tanmitre muniputrake // 12.23.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jīmūtavāhanas tat tad bruvan praṇayapeśalam / svahastenaiva taṃ tasyāḥ kaṇṭhāt pāśam apānayat // 12.23.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'kasmāt sudhāvarṣam iva manvānayos tayoḥ / bhuvaṃ malayavatyāṃ ca likhantyāṃ hrītayā dṛśā // 12.23.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
cinvānāgatya sahasā sakhī hṛṣṭā jagāda tām / sakhi kalyāṇinī diṣṭyā vardhase 'bhīṣṭasiddhitaḥ // 12.23.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
adyaiva hi mahārājas tava viśvāvasuḥ pitā / kumāramitrāvasunā vijñaptaḥ saṃnidhau mama // 12.23.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
ihāgato jaganmānyas tāta kalpatarupradaḥ / vidyādharendratanayo yo 'yaṃ jīmūtavāhanaḥ // 12.23.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
atithitvāt sa naḥ pūjyo varaś cānyo na tādṛśaḥ / tasmān malayavatyāsau kanyāratnena pūjyatām // 12.23.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatheti śraddhite rājñā bhrātā mitrāvasuḥ sa te / tādarthyena mahābhāgasyāsyāśramapadaṃ gataḥ // 12.23.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jāne sadyaś ca bhāvī te vivāhas tat svamandiram / āyāhi yātu caiṣo 'pi mahābhāgaḥ svam āspadam // 12.23.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktā sā tayā sakhyā rājaputrī śanais tataḥ / yayuḥ saharṣā sotkā ca muhur valitakaṃdharā // 12.23.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
jīmūtavāhano 'py āśu gatvā svāśramam āgatāt / mitrāvasor yathābhīṣṭaṃ kāryaṃ śrutvābhinandya ca // 12.23.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jātismaraḥ samācakhyau tasmai svaṃ pūrvajanma saḥ / yatra mitraṃ sa tasyāsīt sā ca bhāryaiva tatsvasā // 12.23.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato mitrāvasuḥ prītas tatpitroḥ parituṣyatoḥ / āvedya gatvā pitarau kṛtārthaḥ svāv anandayat // 12.23.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
nināya ca tadaiva svān gṛhāñ jīmūtavāhanam / cakre cotsavasaṃbhāraṃ svasiddhyucitavaibhavam // 12.23.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasminn eva ca dhanye 'hni tasya vidyādharaprabhoḥ / svasur malayavatyāś ca vivāhaṃ samapādayan // 12.23.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato navoḍhayā sākaṃ tayā jīmūtavāhanaḥ / tasthau malayavatyā sa tatra siddhamanorathaḥ // 12.23.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā kautukāc cātra sa mitrāvasunā saha / malayādrau bhramann abdher velāvanam upeyivān // 12.23.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāsthirāśīn subahūn dṛṣṭvā mitrāvasuṃ sa tam / keṣām ete 'sthisaṃghātāḥ prāṇinām iti pṛṣṭavān // 12.23.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato mitrāvasuḥ śyālas taṃ kāruṇikam abravīt / śṛṇu vṛttāntam atremaṃ saṃkṣepād varṇayāmi te // 12.23.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nāgamātā purā kadrūr vinatāṃ tārkṣyamātaram / nināya kila dāsatvaṃ savyājapaṇanirjitām // 12.23.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena vaireṇa garuḍas tām unmocyāpi mātaram / balī bhakṣayituṃ nāgān kadrūputrān pracakrame // 12.23.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sadā praviśya pātālaṃ so 'tha kāṃścij jaghāsa tān / kāṃścin mamarda kecit tu svayaṃ trāsād vipedire // 12.23.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad dṛṣṭvaikapade sarvakṣayam āśaṅkya nāgarāṭ / vāsukiḥ prārthanāpūrvaṃ tārkṣyasya samayaṃ vyadhāt // 12.23.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekam ekam ahaṃ nāgam āhārārthaṃ khagendra te / pratyahaṃ preṣayāmy atra puline dakṣiṇodadheḥ // 12.23.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvayā tu na praveṣṭavyaṃ pātāle 'smin kathaṃcana / ko hi svārtho vinaṣṭeṣu nāgeṣv ekapade tava // 12.23.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukte nāgarājena samayaṃ pratyapadyata / svārthadarśī tathety eva garuḍo guruvikramaḥ // 12.23.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadāprabhṛti caikaikaṃ nāgaṃ bhuṅkte dine dine / vāsukipreṣitaṃ so 'tra khagendraḥ puline 'mbudheḥ // 12.23.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atas tadbhakṣyamāṇānāṃ nāganām asthisaṃcayāḥ / ete 'tra giriśṛṅgābhā vṛddhiṃ kālakramād gatāḥ // 12.23.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti mitrāvasor vaktrāt sāntarduḥkho niśamya saḥ / nijagāda dayādhairyanidhir jīmūtavāhanaḥ // 12.23.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śocyaḥ sa vāsukī rājā yaḥ svahastena vidviṣe / upahārīkaroti svāḥ prajāḥ klībo dine dine // 12.23.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dhṛtānanasahasraḥ sann ekenāpy ānanena saḥ / mām ādau bhuṅkṣva tārkṣyeti bhāṣituṃ nāśakat katham // 12.23.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kathaṃ cābhyarthayāmāsa niḥsattvaḥ svakulakṣayam / tārkṣyaṃ nāgāṅganākrandanityākarṇananirghṛṇaḥ // 12.23.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tārkṣyo 'pi kāśyapir vīraḥ kṛṣṇādhiṣṭhānapāvanaḥ / īdṛśaṃ kurute pāpam aho mohasya gāḍhatā // 12.23.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā sa mahāsattvo hṛdi cakre manoratham / apy asāreṇa dehena sāram atrāpnuyām aham // 12.23.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekasyāpy adya nāgasya kuryāṃ jīvitarakṣaṇam / abāndhavasya bhītasya dattvātmānaṃ garutmate // 12.23.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti saṃcintayaty eva tasmiñ jīmūtavāhane / mitrāvasoḥ pituḥ pārśvāt kṣattāhvānārtham āyayau // 12.23.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vraja tvam aham eṣyāmi paścād iti tataś ca tam / mitrāvasuṃ sa jīmūtavāhano vyasṛjad gṛham // 12.23.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gate tasmin sa cātraiko vāñchitārthonmukho bhraman / kṛpālur aśṛnod dūrāt karuṇaṃ ruditadhvanim // 12.23.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā dadarśa cottuṅgaśilātalasamīpagam / yuvānam ekaṃ puruṣaṃ duḥkhitaṃ sundarākṛtim // 12.23.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
puṃsā rājabhaṭeneva tyaktam ānīya tat kṣaṇam / nivartayantaṃ rudatīṃ vṛddhāṃ sānunayaṃ striyam // 12.23.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
ko 'yaṃ syād iti yāvac ca jijñāsuḥ so 'tra tiṣṭhati / karuṇākulitaś channaḥ śṛṇvañ jīmūtavāhanaḥ // 12.23.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvat sā tatra vṛddhā strī duḥkhabhārātipīḍitā / prāvartata yuvānaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭvānuśocitum // 12.23.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hā śaṅkhacūḍa hā duḥkhaśatasaṃprāpta hā guṇin / kulaikatanto hā putra kva tvāṃ drakṣyāmy ahaṃ punaḥ // 12.23.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
vatsa tvanmukhacandre 'smin gate 'staṃ sa pitā tava / sokāndhakārapatitaḥ kathaṃ vṛddho bhaviṣyati // 12.23.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
athārkakarasaṃsparśād aṅgaṃ dūyeta yat tava / kathaṃ śakṣyati tat soḍhuṃ tārkṣyabhakṣaṇajāṃ rujam // 12.23.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vistīrṇe nāgaloke 'pi dhātrā nāgādhipena ca / labdhas tvaṃ kim abhavyāyā vicityaikasuto mama // 12.23.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti tāṃ vilapantīṃ ca sa yuvā tanayo 'bravīt / duḥkhārtam api mām amba kiṃ duḥkhayasi hā bhṛśam // 12.23.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nivartasva gṛhān eṣa praṇāmaḥ paścimas tava / ihāgamanavelā hi bhavej jātu garutmataḥ // 12.23.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā hā hatāsmīha ko me pāsyati putrakam / ita cakranda sā vṛddhā dikṣu kṣiptārtalocanā // 12.23.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca bodhisattvāṃśaḥ sa taj jīmūtavāhanaḥ / śrutvā dṛṣṭvā ca kṛpayā gāḍhākrānto vyacintayat // 12.23.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
hantāyaṃ śaṅkhacūḍākhyo nāgo vāsukinā bata / āhārahetos tārkṣyasya tapasvī preṣito 'dhunā // 12.23.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
iyaṃ caitasya jananī snehenehānvag āgatā / etadekasutā vṛddhā duḥkhadīnapralāpinī // 12.23.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad enam ekam ārtaṃ ced dehenaikāntanāśinā / rakṣāmi nāmunā nāgaṃ tan me dhig janma niḥphalam // 12.23.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ālocyopagamyaiva mudā jīmūtavāhanaḥ / vṛddhām uvāca tāṃ mātaḥ putraṃ rakṣāmy ahaṃ tava // 12.23.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā bhāvitabhayā vṛddhā garuḍaśaṅkhinī / saṃtrastā tārkṣya māṃ bhuṅkṣva māṃ bhuṅkṣveti jagāda sā // 12.23.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
śaṅkhacūḍas tato 'vādīn naiṣas tārkṣyo 'mba mā trasīḥ / kvāyaṃ candra ivāhlādī kva sa tārkṣyo bhayaṃkaraḥ // 12.23.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukte śaṅkhacūḍena prāha jīmūtavāhanaḥ / vidyādharo 'ham āyāto rākṣituṃ sutam amba te // 12.23.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dāsyāmi hi śarīraṃ svaṃ vastracchannaṃ garutmate / kṣudhitāya prayāhi tvam ādāyainaṃ sutaṃ gṛham // 12.23.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sābravīd vṛddhā maivaṃ tvaṃ hy adhiko mama / putro yasyedṛśe kāle kṛpāsmāsv iyam īdṛśī // 12.23.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvā sa jīmūtavāhanaḥ punar abravīt / na me manorathasyāsya bhaṅgaṃ kartum ihārhatha // 12.23.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
grahād evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ ca śaṅkhacūḍo jagāda tam / darśitaiva mahāsattva tvayā satyaṃ kṛpālutā // 12.23.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na tv ahaṃ tvaccharīreṇa rakṣyāmi svaśarīrakam / ratnavyayena pāṣāṇaṃ ko hi rakṣitum arhati // 12.23.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mādṛśais tu jagat pūrṇaṃ svātmamātrānukampibhiḥ / anukampyaṃ jagad yeṣāṃ viralās te bhavādṛśāḥ // 12.23.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na cāhaṃ malinīkartuṃ śaṅkhapālakulaṃ śuci / kalaṅka iva tīkṣṇāṃśubimbaṃ śakṣyāmi sanmate // 12.23.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti taṃ pratiṣidhyaiva śaṅkhacūḍaḥ svamātaram / jagādāmba nivartasva kāntārād durgamād itaḥ // 12.23.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na paśyasi kim atraitan nāgāsṛkkardamokṣitam / kṛtāntalīlāparyaṅkaraudraṃ vadhyaśilātalam // 12.23.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ahaṃ cābdhitaṭe gatvā natvā gokarṇam īśvaram / āgacchāmi drutaṃ yāvan nāyāti garuḍo 'tra saḥ // 12.23.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā kṛpaṇākrandāṃ praṇamyāpṛcchya mātaram / sa gokarṇapraṇāmārthaṃ śaṅkhacūḍo yayau tataḥ // 12.23.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asmiṃś ced antare prāptas tārkṣyaḥ siddho mamepsitaḥ / parārtha iti jīmūtavāhano 'py akarod dhṛdi // 12.23.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac cāsannapakṣīndrapakṣānilacalāṃs tarūn / vilokyātra sa mā meti nivāraṇaparān iva // 12.23.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
matvā garuḍavelāṃ ca prāptāṃ jīmūtavāhanaḥ / parārthaprāṇado vadhyaśilām adhyāruroha tām // 12.23.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pavanāghūrṇite cābdhau sphuradratnaprabhādṛśā / taṃ sattvātiśayaṃ tasya paśyatīva savismayam // 12.23.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āgatyācchāditanabhā nipatyaitacchilātalāt / cañcvā garutmān āhatya mahāsattvaṃ jahāra tam // 12.23.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
srutāsṛgdhāram utkhātaśiroratnaṃ ca taṃ javāt / nītvā bhakṣayituṃ śṛṅge malayādreḥ pracakrame // 12.23.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam eva parārthāya dehaḥ syāt pratijanma me / mā bhūtāṃ svargamokṣau tu paropakṛtivarjitau // 12.23.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti tārkṣyādyamānasya tasyānudhyāyatas tadā / vidyādharendor apatat puṣpavṛṣṭir nabhotalāt // 12.23.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
atrāntare sa tad raktadhārāsravaśiromaṇiḥ / tasyā malayavatyāś ca tatpatnyāḥ prāpatat puraḥ // 12.23.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā tad dṛṣṭvā parijñāya cūḍāratnaṃ suvihvalā / antikasthā śvaśurayos tābhyāṃ sāśrur adarśayat // 12.23.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tau ca jāyāpatī sūnoḥ śiroratnaṃ vilokya tam / kim etad iti saṃbhrāntau sahasaiva babhūvatuḥ // 12.23.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ svavidyānudhyānād yathāvṛttam avetya tat / rājā jīmūtaketuḥ sā rājñī kanakavaty api // 12.23.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vadhvā malayavatyā tau prāvartetāṃ saha drutam / gantuṃ tatraiva tau yatra tārkṣyajīmūtavāhanau // 12.23.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvat sa śaṅkhacūḍo 'tra natvā gokarṇam āgataḥ / dadarśa rudhirārdraṃ tad vigno vadhyaśilātalam // 12.23.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hā hato 'smi mahāpāpo dhruvaṃ tena mahātmanā / ātmā garutmate datto matkṛte sukṛpālunā // 12.23.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad anviṣyāmi nītaḥ sa kṣaṇe 'smin kvāhivairiṇā / majjeyaṃ nāyaśaḥpaṅke jīvantaṃ cet tam āpnuyām // 12.23.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity udaśrur vadan so 'tha sādhur dṛṣṭvā nirantarām / patitāṃ bhuvi tadraktadhārām anusaran yayau // 12.23.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atrāntare bhakṣayaṃs taṃ dṛṣṭvā jīmūtavāhanam / hṛṣṭaṃ viramya garuḍaś cintayāmāsa tat kṣaṇam // 12.23.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
aho apūrvaḥ ko 'py eṣa bhakṣyamāno 'pi yo mayā / prahṛṣyati mahāsattvo na tu prāṇair viyujyate // 12.23.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
bibharti luptaśeṣe ca gātre romāñcakañcukam / kiṃ copakāriṇīvāsya mayi dṛṣṭiḥ prasīdati // 12.23.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tan naiṣa nāgaḥ ko'py eṣa sādhuḥ pṛcchāmi nādmy amum / iti tārkṣyaṃ vimṛśyantaṃ prāha jīmūtavāhanaḥ // 12.23.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
pakṣīndra kiṃ nivṛtto 'si na hi me māṃsaśoṇitam / dehe nāsti na cādyāpi paritṛpto 'si buṅkṣva tat // 12.23.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvātisāścaryas taṃ papraccha sa pakṣirāṭ / nāgo naivāsi tad brūhi mahātman ko bhavān iti // 12.23.168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nāga evāsmi ko 'yaṃ te praśnaḥ prakṛtam ācara / prastutārthaviruddhaṃ hi ko 'bhidadhyād abāliśaḥ // 12.23.169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ prativadaty eva tārkṣyaṃ jīmūtavāhane / prāptaḥ sa śaṅkhacūḍo 'tra dūrād evābhyabhāṣata // 12.23.170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mā mā kṛthā mahāpāpaṃ sāhasaṃ vinatātmaja / ko 'yaṃ bhramas te na hy eṣa nāgo nāgo 'ham eṣa te // 12.23.171	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ity uktvā drutam āgatya madhye sthitvā tayor dvayoḥ / dṛṣṭvā ca tārkṣyaṃ vibhrāntaṃ śaṅkhacūḍo 'bravīt punaḥ // 12.23.172	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kiṃ bhrāmyasi phaṇāḥ kiṃ me jihve dve ca na paśyasi / vidyādharasya kiṃ cāsya saumyāṃ paśyasi nākṛtim // 12.23.173	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śaṅkhacūḍe vadaty evaṃ bhāryā ca pitarau ca tau / jīmūtavāhanasyātra sarve satvaram āyayuḥ // 12.23.174	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
viluptāṅgaṃ ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā pitarau tasya tat kṣaṇam / cakrandatus tau hā putra hā hā jīmūtavāhana // 12.23.175	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
hā kāruṇika hā vatsa parārthaprattajīvita / hā kathaṃ vainateyedam avimṛśya kṛtaṃ tvayā // 12.23.176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvaiva tārkṣyo 'tra so 'nutapto vyacintayat / hā kathaṃ bodhisattvāṃśaḥ saṃmohād bhakṣito mayā // 12.23.177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jīmūtavāhanaḥ so 'yaṃ parārthaprāṇadāyakaḥ / yasya bhramati kṛtsne 'smiṃs trailokye kīrtighoṣaṇā // 12.23.178	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tan me mṛte 'smin pāpasya prāptam agnipraveśanam / adharmaviṣavṛkṣasya pacyate svādu kiṃ phalam // 12.23.179	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti cintākule tārkṣye dṛṣṭvā bandhūn nipatya saḥ / vraṇavyathāyāṃ pañcatvaṃ prāpa jīmūtavāhanaḥ // 12.23.180	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tato vilapatos tatra tatpitroḥ śokadīnayoḥ / utkruśya muhur ātmānaṃ śaṅkhacūḍe ca nindati // 12.23.181	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhāryā malayavaty asya nabho dṛṣṭvāśrugadgadam / pūrvaprasannāṃ varadām ity upālabhatāmbikām // 12.23.182	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
vidyādharādhipo bhāvicakravartī patis tava / bhavitety aham ādiṣṭā devi gaurī tadā tvayā // 12.23.183	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tan mithyāvādinī jātā tvam apy asi kathaṃ mayi / ity uktavatyāṃ tasyāṃ sā gaurī pratyakṣatām agāt // 12.23.184	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
na me mithyā vacaḥ putrīty uktvā sā svakamaṇḍaloḥ / amṛtenāśu jīmūtavāhanaṃ siñcati sma tam // 12.23.185	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena so 'kṣatasarvāṅgaḥ pūrvādhikataradyutiḥ / jīvan sadyaḥ samuttasthau kṛtī jīmūtavāhanaḥ // 12.23.186	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
utthitaṃ praṇataṃ taṃ ca sarveṣu praṇamatsu sā / uvāca devī tuṣṭāsmi dehadānena te 'munā // 12.23.187	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tad eṣā tvābhiṣiñcāmi putrātmīyena pāṇinā / vidyādharāṇām ākalpaṃ cakravartipade 'dhunā // 12.23.188	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
evaṃ vadantī jīmūtavāhanaṃ kalaśāmbudhiḥ / tam abhyaṣiñcac charvānī pūjitā ca tirodadhe // 12.23.189	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
nipetuś cātra tat kālaṃ divyāḥ kusumavṛṣṭayaḥ / nadanti sma ca sānandaṃ devadundubhayo divi // 12.23.190	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athovāca sa taṃ prahvas tārkṣyo jīmūtavāhanam / cakravartinn ahaṃ prītaḥ puruṣātiśaye tvayi // 12.23.191	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apūrvodāramatinā trijagatkautukāvaham / brahmāṇḍabhittilikhitaṃ yena citram idaṃ kṛtam // 12.23.192	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tan māṃ praśādhi mattaś ca vṛṇuṣvābhīpsitaṃ varam / ity uktavantaṃ garuḍaṃ mahāsattvo jagāda saḥ // 12.23.193	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
na bhakṣyāḥ sānutāpena bhūtvā nāgāḥ punas tvayā / te 'py asthiśeṣā jīvantu ye tvayā pūrvabhakṣitāḥ // 12.23.194	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
evam astu na bhokṣye 'haṃ nāgāñ śāntamataḥ param / prāg ye ca bhuktās te jīvantv iti tārkṣyo 'py uvāca saḥ // 12.23.195	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tato 'stiśeṣā ye 'py āsan nāgās tatpūrvabhakṣitāḥ / te 'pi sarve samuttasthus tadvarāmṛtajīvitāḥ // 12.23.196	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
surair nagair muniganaiḥ sānandair militair atha / sa lokatritayābhikhyām uvāha malayācalaḥ // 12.23.197	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tat kālaṃ taṃ ca jīmūtavāhanodantam adbhutam / gauryāḥ prasādād vividuḥ sarve vidyādhareśvarāḥ // 12.23.198	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
āgatya te ca caraṇāvanatā himādriṃ ninyuḥ kṣaṇān muditabandhusuhṛtsametam / taṃ pārvatīsvakarakḷptamahābhiṣekaṃ saccakravartinam atha pratimuktatārkṣyam // 12.23.199	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
tatra sa pitrā mātrā mitrāvasunā ca malayavatyā ca / nijagṛhagatāgatena ca saṃyuktaḥ śaṅkhacūḍena // 12.23.200	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
lokottaracaritādbhutasiddhāṃ jīmūtavāhanaḥ suciram / abhajata ratnopacitāṃ vidyādharacakravartidhuram // 12.23.201	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ity atyudārasarasām ākhyāya kathāṃ tadā sa vetālaḥ / puna eva taṃ trivikramasenaṃ papraccha rājānam // 12.23.202	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
tad brūhi śaṅkhacūḍaḥ kiṃ vā jīmūtavāhano 'bhyadhikaḥ / sattvena tayor ubhayoḥ pūrvoktaś cātra samayas te // 12.23.203	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ity asmād vetālāc chrutvā maunaṃ vihāya śāpabhayāt / tam uvāca sa trivikramaseno nṛpatir nirudvegaḥ // 12.23.204	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
bahujanmasiddham etac citraṃ jīmūtavāhanasya kiyat / ślāghyaḥ sa śaṅkhacūḍo maraṇottīrṇo 'pi yo ripave // 12.23.205	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
anyaprattātmānaṃ prāpya sudūraṃ gatāya tārkṣyāya / paścād dhāvan gatvā svaṃ deham upānayat prasabham // 12.23.206	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
etan niśamyaiva nṛpasya tasya vākyaṃ sa vetālavaro jagāma / punaḥ svadhāmaiva tadaṃsapṛṣṭhān nṛpo 'pi taṃ so 'nuyayau tathaiva // 12.23.207	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]

ity ālocayatas tasya klāntasyānambarasya ca / mandīkṛtātapo 'stādriṃ ravis tyaktāmbaro yayau // 12.25.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca bhūtidigdhāṅgas tatrāyāti sma tāpasaḥ / mahāvratī jaṭāśūladharo hara ivāparaḥ // 12.25.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa candrasvāminaṃ dṛṣṭvā ko 'sīti paripṛcchya ca / srutvā tasmāc ca vṛttāntaṃ prahvaṃ taṃ tāpaso 'bravīt // 12.25.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvaṃ mamehāśramaṃ prāptaḥ kṣutklānto 'cintito 'tithiḥ / tad uttiṣṭha kṛtasnāno bhikṣābhāgaṃ mamāhara // 12.25.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukto vratinā so 'tha candrasvāmī jagāda tam / vipro 'haṃ bhagavan bhokṣye bhikṣābhāgaṃ kathaṃ tava // 12.25.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sa vratī siddhaḥ praviśya maṭhikāṃ nijām / iṣṭasaṃpādinīṃ vidyāṃ sasmārātithivallabhaḥ // 12.25.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃsmṛtopasthitāṃ tāṃ ca kiṃ karomīti vādinīm / amuṣyātithyam atitheḥ kuruṣveti śaśāsa tām // 12.25.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tathety ukte tayā tatra sodyānaṃ sāṅganājanam / puraṃ sauvarṇam utpannaṃ candrasvāmī dadarśa saḥ // 12.25.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vismitaṃ ca tam abhyetya tasmād vārāṅganāḥ purāt / ūcur uttiṣṭha bhadraihi snāhi bhuṅkṣva tyaja śramam // 12.25.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvābhyantaraṃ nītvā snāpayitvānulipya ca / tābhiḥ sa dattasadvastro ninye 'nyad vāsakottamam // 12.25.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāntaḥ sa dadarśaikāṃ pradhānayuvatiṃ yuvā / sarvāṅgasundarīṃ dhātrā kautukād iva nirmitām // 12.25.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tayā sa sotkayotthāya svāsanārdhopaveśitaḥ / bubhuje divyam āhāraṃ tayaivātra samaṃ tataḥ // 12.25.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhuktapakvaphalasvādutāmbūlaḥ svarasena ca / paryaṅkaśayane bheje tatsaṃbhogasukhaṃ niśi // 12.25.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātaḥ prabuddhaś cāpaśyat tad evātra śivāyalam / nāpi divyāṅganāṃ nāpi puraṃ tan na paricchadam // 12.25.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa vigno niryātaṃ maṭhikātaḥ smitānanam / pṛṣṭarātrisukhaṃ prātas tāpasaṃ taṃ vyajijñapat // 12.25.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatprasādād ahaṃ rātrāv uṣito bhagavan sukham / kiṃ tu yāsyanti me prāṇās tayā divyastriyā vinā // 12.25.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sa tapasvī taṃ hasan kāruṇiko 'bravīt / ihaivāssva punar naktaṃ bhaviṣyati tathaiva te // 12.25.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukte vratinā tena tadyuktyaiva pratikṣapam / candrasvāmy atra so 'bhuṅkta bhogāṃs tāṃs tatprasādataḥ // 12.25.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
buddhvā ca taṃ śanair vidyāprabhāvaṃ vidhicoditaḥ / ekadā tāpasendraṃ taṃ sa prasādyānvayācata // 12.25.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
satyaṃ kṛpā ced bhagavan mayi te śaraṇāgate / tad etāṃ dehi me vidyāṃ yatprabhāvo 'yam īdṛśaḥ // 12.25.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti bruvāṇaṃ nirbandhāt taṃ pratyāha sa tāpasaḥ / asādhyā tava vidyeyaṃ sādhyate 'ntarjale hy asau // 12.25.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra caiṣā sṛjaty āśu japataḥ sādhakasya tat / māyājālaṃ vimohāya yena siddhiṃ na so 'śnute // 12.25.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa hi tatra punar jātaṃ bālam ātmānam īkṣate / tato yuvānam udvyūḍhadāraṃ jātātmajaṃ tathā // 12.25.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
suhṛn me 'yam ayaṃ śatrur iti mithyā sa muhyati / na ca smarati janmedaṃ na vidyāsādhane kriyām // 12.25.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yas tu triraṣṭavarṣaḥ san guruvidyāprabodhitaḥ / janma smṛtvā viditvā tad dhīro māyāvijṛmbhitam // 12.25.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadvaśo 'py atra kurute tathaivāgnipraveśanam / paramārthaṃ jalottīrṇaḥ siddhavidyaḥ sa paśyati // 12.25.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

evaṃ tapasvinokte 'pi candrasvāmī graheṇa saḥ / śikṣyāmi sarvaṃ mā bhūd vaś cintātreti tam abravīt // 12.25.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tato 'smai pratipede tāṃ vidyāṃ dātuṃ sa tāpasaḥ / batāśritānurodhena kiṃ na kurvanti sādhavaḥ // 12.25.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato nītvā nadītīraṃ sa taṃ smāha mahāvratī / vatsa vidyāṃ japan māyāṃ yadi drakṣyasi tāṃ tadā // 12.25.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
māyāgnim eva praviśer vidhyayā bodhito mayā / ahaṃ ca tāvat sthāsyāmi tavehaiva nadītaṭe // 12.25.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ity uktvādhyāpayāmāsa tam ācāntaṃ śuciṃ śuciḥ / sa candrasvāminaṃ vidyāṃ samyak tāṃ vratināṃ varaḥ // 12.25.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tīre sthite tasmin gurau mūrdhnā praṇamya tam / candrasvāmī sa rabhasān nadīm avatatāra tām // 12.25.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tasyām antarjale vidyāṃ tāṃ japan sahasaiva saḥ / tanmāyāmohito mithyā sarvaṃ vismṛtya janma tat // 12.25.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vīkṣate yāvad anyasyām utpannaḥ svātmanā puri / putro viprasya kasyāpi buddhiṃ sa śanakair gataḥ // 12.25.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtopanayano 'dhītavidyo dārān avāpya ca / tadduḥkhasukhasaṃmūḍhaḥ saṃpūrṇo 'patyavān kramāt // 12.25.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataś cātra sutasnehasvīkṛtas tat tad ācarat / sthito baddharatiḥ sārdhaṃ pitṛbhyāṃ bandhubhis tathā // 12.25.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ janmāntaraṃ mithyā tasyānubhavato 'tra saḥ / kāle prabodhinīṃ vidyāṃ guruḥ prāyuṅkta tāpasaḥ // 12.25.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tadvidyāprayogeṇa sadyas tena prabodhitaḥ / smṛtvātmānaṃ guruṃ taṃ ca māyājālam avetya tat // 12.25.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

bahudhā bodhyamāno 'pi tair divyasukhalolupaḥ / sa sajjitacitaṃ prāyān nadītīraṃ sabāndhavaḥ // 12.25.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

kaṣṭaṃ mriyante svajanāḥ sarve me viśato 'nalam / na ca jānāmi kiṃ satyaṃ guros tad vacanaṃ na vā // 12.25.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tat kiṃ nu praviśāmy agnim uta na praviśāmi kim / athavā tat kathaṃ mithyā syāt saṃvādi guror vacaḥ // 12.25.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad viśāmy analaṃ kāmam ity antaḥ pravimṛśya saḥ / agnipraveśaṃ vidadhe candrasvāmī kila dvijaḥ // 12.25.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
anubhūtahimasparśo vahneś ca sa savismayaḥ / śāntamāyo nadītīrād utthāyopayayau taṭam // 12.25.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra sthitaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā taṃ guruṃ natvā ca pādayoḥ / pṛcchantaṃ cāgniśaityāntaṃ svam udantam abodhayat // 12.25.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas taṃ sa guruḥ prāha vatsa śaṅke kṛtas tvayā / apacāro 'tra śītas te kathaṃ jāto 'gnir anyathā // 12.25.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adṛṣṭam etad etasyā vidyāyāḥ sādhane yataḥ / etad guror vacaḥ śrutvā candrasvāmī jagāda saḥ // 12.25.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nāpacāro mayā kaścid vihito bhagavann iti / tataḥ sa tadgurur vidyāṃ jijñāsus tāṃ samasmarat // 12.25.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na ca sāvirabhūt tasya na tacchiṣyasya tasya vā / naṣṭavidyāv athobhau tau viṣaṇṇau jagmatus tataḥ // 12.25.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ākhyāya kathām atha vetālaḥ pṛṣṭavān sa taṃ bhūyaḥ / pṛthvīpatiṃ trivikramasenaṃ samayaṃ nigadya pūrvoktam // 12.25.82	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
rājan saṃśayam etaṃ chinddhi mama brūhi hetunā kena / vihite 'pi yathoddiṣṭe karmaṇi vidyobhayos tayor naṣṭā // 12.25.83	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
etat sa vetālavaco niśamya taṃ pratyavocan manujendravīraḥ / jāne bhavān me kṣipatīha kālaṃ yogeśvaraivaṃ tad api bravīmi // 12.25.84	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
na duṣkareṇāpi hi karmaṇaiva śuddhena siddhiḥ puruṣasya labhyā / yāvan na niṣkramya vikalpaśuddhaṃ dhīraṃ mano nirmalasattvavṛtti // 12.25.85	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
tasyātra mandasya tu viprayūnaś cittaṃ prabudhyāpi vikalpate sma / vidyā na sā tena gatāsya siddhir asthānadānāc ca guror vinaṣṭā // 12.25.86	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
iti tasya nṛpasya sṛṣṭavāco bata vetālavaro 'ṃsataḥ sa bhūyaḥ / nijam eva padaṃ yayāv alakṣyo nṛpatis taṃ ca tathaiva so 'nvayāsīt // 12.25.87	aupacchandasika = [11: ssjgg] 1,3 + [12: sBry] 2,4
atha gatvā punaḥ skandhe vetālaṃ śiṃśapādrumāt / sa trivikramasenas taṃ gṛhītvodacalan nṛpaḥ // 12.26.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āgacchantaṃ ca taṃ bhūyo vetālaḥ so 'bhyabhāṣata / rājañ śṛṇu katham ekāṃ hṛdyāṃ te kathayāmy aham // 12.26.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
asti vakrolakaṃ nāma puraṃ surapuropamam / tasmin sūryaprabhākhyo 'bhūd rājā jambhārisaṃnibhaḥ // 12.26.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saukaryodyatayā mūrtyā dattānando vasuṃdharām / imāṃ harir ivoddhṛtya yo babhāra ciraṃ bhuje // 12.26.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dhūmāsaṅge 'śrusaṃpātaḥ śṛṅgāre mārasaṃkathāḥ / dvāḥstheṣu hemadaṇḍāś ca rāṣṭre yasyābhavan prabhoḥ // 12.26.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sarvasaṃpatsamṛddhasya tasyaikābhūd anirvṛtiḥ / nodapadyata yat putro bahuṣv antaḥpureṣv api // 12.26.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etasmiṃś ca kathāsaṃdhau tāmraliptyāṃ mahāpuri / babhūva dhanapālākhyo dhuryo dhanavatāṃ vanik // 12.26.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya cājāyataikaiva nāmnā dhanavatī sutā / vidyādharī cyutā śāpāt saundaryeṇaiva sūcitā // 12.26.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāṃ ca yauvanasthāyāṃ sa vaṇik pañcatāṃ yayau / taddhanaṃ rājasānāthyād ākrāntam atha gotrajaiḥ // 12.26.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

dhanavatyā tayā sākaṃ svaduhitrā niśāmukhe / palāyya dāyādabhayād gṛhād guptaṃ viniryayau // 12.26.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
dhvāntena bahir antaś ca sā duḥkhenāndhakāritā / kṛcchrād bahiḥpuraṃ prāyāt sutāhastāvalambinī // 12.26.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra saṃtamase yāntī vidhiyogād alakṣitam / aṃsenātāḍayac cauraṃ śūlāgrāropitasthitam // 12.26.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa sajīvas tadaṃsāgraghaṭṭanādhikapīḍitaḥ / āḥ kṣate kṣāram etan me kṣiptaṃ kenety abhāṣata // 12.26.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tatraiva sā ko 'sīty apṛcchat taṃ vaṇigvadhūḥ / pratyuvāca tataś cauraś cauro 'ham iha sūcitaḥ // 12.26.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śūle pāpasya cādyāpi notkrāmanti mamāsavaḥ / tad ārye tvaṃ mama brūhi kāsikvaivaṃ prayāsi ca // 12.26.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā taṃ vaṇigbhāryā yāvat svodantam āha sā / tāvat tilakitaṃ prācyā mukham udbhāsitendunā // 12.26.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato dikṣu prakāśāsu sa cauras tāṃ vaṇiksutām / dṛṣṭvā dhanavatīṃ kanyāṃ tanmātaram uvāca tām // 12.26.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

kim etayā tavety ukto hasantyātha tayātra saḥ / punaś cauro 'bravīn nāsti putro mama gatāyuṣaḥ // 12.26.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na cāputro 'śnate lokāṃs tad eṣā yaṃ madājñayā / kutracij janayet putraṃ kṣetrajaḥ sa bhaven mama // 12.26.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
