tadā ca tatropādhyāyo viṣṇusvāmīty abhūt pure / manaḥsvāmīti tasyāsīc chiṣyo vipro 'tirūpavān // 12.26.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidhyābhijanayukto 'pi sa yauvanavaśīkṛtaḥ / tatra haṃsāvalīṃ nāma vāñchati sma vilāsinīm // 12.26.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā ca sauvarṇadīnāraśatapañcakam agrahīt / bhāṭiṃ tasya ca tan nābhūd vyaṣīdat tena so 'nvaham // 12.26.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā ca tam adrākṣīt tādṛśaṃ sā vaṇiksutā / kṣāmābhirāmavapuṣaṃ dhanavaty atra harmyataḥ // 12.26.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tadrūpahṛtacittā ca bhartuś caurasya tasya sā / smṛtvānujñāṃ samīpasthāṃ yuktyāvocat svamātaram // 12.26.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amba viprasutasyāsya paśyaite rūpayauvane / kīdṛśe bata viśvasya nayanāmṛtavarṣiṇī // 12.26.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvaiva tasmiṃs tāṃ baddhabhāvām avetya ca / tan mātā sā vaṇigbhāryā manasy evam acintayat // 12.26.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
madduhitrānayā tāvad varaṇīyaḥ sutāptaye / kaścid bhartrājñayā tasmād eṣa evārthyate na kim // 12.26.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ākalayya vyasṛjat tat saṃdiśya manīṣitam / rahasyadhāriṇīṃ ceṭīṃ tam ānetuṃ sutākṛte // 12.26.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā gatvā vijane nītvā ceṭī tasmai śaśaṃsa tat / sa ca śrutvā dvijayuvā vyasanī tām abhāṣata // 12.26.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
yadi haṃsāvalīhetor dīnāraśatapañcakam / sauvarṇaṃ dīyate sahyaṃ tad ekām emi yāminīm // 12.26.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti tenoktayā ceṭyā tayā gatvā tathaiva sā / uktā vaṇikstrī tasmai tat taddhaste prāhiṇod dhanam // 12.26.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tad gṛhītvā manaḥsvāmī tatputryā vāsakaṃ yayau / tasyāḥ sa tannisṛṣṭāyā dhanavatyaḥ saceṭikaḥ // 12.26.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tāṃ vitatotkaṇṭhāṃ kāntāṃ bhūṣitabhūtalām / sa cakora iva jyotsnāṃ dadarśa ca jaharṣa ca // 12.26.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tayā samaṃ ca nītvā tāṃ rātriṃ saṃbhogalīlayā / nirgatya sa tato guptaṃ yayau prātar yathāgatam // 12.26.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpi tasmād dhanavatī sagarbhābhūd vaṇiksutā / kāle ca suṣuve putraṃ lakṣaṇānumitāyatim // 12.26.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
parituṣṭāṃ tadā tāṃ ca sutotpattyā samātṛkām / ādideśa haraḥ svapne darśitasvavapur niśi // 12.26.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yuktaṃ hemasahasreṇa nītvā bālam uṣasy amum / sūryaprabhanṛpasyeha mañcasthaṃ dvāri muñcatam // 12.26.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ syāt kṣemam ity uktā śūlinā sā vaṇiksutā / tanmātā ca prabudhyaitaṃ svapnann anyonam ūcatuḥ // 12.26.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nītvā ca taṃ tatyajatur bhagavatpratyayāc chiśum / rājñaḥ sūryaprabhasyāsya siṃhadvāre sahemakam // 12.26.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca tam api svapne sutacintāturaṃ sadā / tatra sūryaprabhaṃ bhūpam ādideśa vṛṣadhvajaḥ // 12.26.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttiṣṭha rājan bālas te siṃhadvāre sakāñcanaḥ / kenāpi sthāpito bhavyo mañcakasthaṃ gṛhāṇa tam // 12.26.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktaḥ śaṃbhunā prātaḥ prabuddho 'pi tathaiva saḥ / dvāḥsthaiḥ praviśya vijñapto niryayau nṛpatiḥ svayam // 12.26.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvā ca siṃhadvāre taṃ bālaṃ sakanakotkaram / rekhācchattradhvajādyaṅkapāṇipādaṃ śubhākṛtim // 12.26.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
datto mamocitaḥ putraḥ śaṃbhunāyam iti bruvan / svayaṃ gṛhītvā bāhubhyāṃ rājadhānīṃ viveśa saḥ // 12.26.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
cakāra cotsavaṃ tāvad asaṃkhyātaṃ dadad vasu / daridraśabdasyaikasya yāvad āsīn nirarthatā // 12.26.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
nṛttavādyādibhir nītvā dvādaśāhaṃ tataḥ sa tam / putraṃ candraprabhaṃ nāmnā cakre suryaprabho nṛpaḥ // 12.26.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vavṛdhe rājaputro 'tra so 'tha candraprabhaḥ kramāt / vapuṣeva guṇaughenāpy āśritānandadāyinā // 12.26.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śanair yuvā ca saṃjañje śauryaudāryaśrutādibhiḥ / āvarjitaprakṛtikaḥ kṣmābhārodvahanakṣamaḥ // 12.26.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tādṛśaṃ ca tato dṛṣṭvā taṃ sa sūryaprabhaḥ pitā / rājye 'bhiṣicyaiva kṛtī vṛddho vārāṇasīṃ yayau // 12.26.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
pṛthvīṃ śāsati tasmiṃś ca tanaye nayaśālina / sa rājā tatra tatyāja caraṃs tīvratapas tanum // 12.26.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
buddhvā pitṛvipattiṃ tām anuśocya kṛtakriyaḥ / so 'tha candraprabho rājā sacivān dhārmiko 'bravīt // 12.26.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tātasya tāvat kenāham anṛṇo bhavituṃ kṣamaḥ / tathāpy ekāṃ svahastena dadāmy etasya niṣkṛtim // 12.26.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
nītvā kṣipāmi gaṅgāyām asthīny asya yathāvidhi / gatvā sarvapitṛhyaś ca gayāṃ piṇḍaṃ dadāmy aham // 12.26.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prasaṅgāt tīrthayātrāṃ ca karomy āpūrvasāgaram / ity uktavantaṃ rājānaṃ mantriṇas taṃ vyajijñapan // 12.26.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
na deva yujyate kartum etad rājñaḥ kathaṃcana / na hi rājyaṃ bahuchidraṃ kṣaṇaṃ tiṣṭhaty arakṣitam // 12.26.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
tad eṣā parahastena kāryā te pitrupakriyā / svadharmapālanād anyā tīrthayātrā ca kā tava // 12.26.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bahvapāyaṃ kva pānthatvāṃ nityaguptāḥ kva pārthivāḥ / iti mantrivacaḥ śrutvā rājā candraprabho 'bravīt // 12.26.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
alaṃ vikalpaiḥ pitrarthe gantavyaṃ niścitaṃ mayā / draṣṭavyāni ca tīrthāni yāvan me kṣamate vayaḥ // 12.26.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
paścā ko vetti kiṃ bhāvi śarire kṣaṇanaśvare / rājyaṃ cāgamanaṃ yāvad rakṣyaṃ yuṣmābhir eva me // 12.26.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutvaitaṃ niścayaṃ rājñas tūṣṇīm āsata mantriṇaḥ / tataḥ prayaṇasaṃbhāraṃ sajjīcakre sa bhūpatiḥ // 12.26.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athāhni sa śubhe snāto hutāgniḥ pūjitadvijaḥ / suyuktaṃ ratham āsthāya prayataḥ śāntaveṣabhṛt // 12.26.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāmantān rajaputrāṃś ca paurāñ janapadān api / nivartyānicchataḥ kṛcchrād āsīmāntānuyāyinaḥ // 12.26.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
brāhmaṇair vāhanārūḍhaiḥ samaṃ sa sapurohitaḥ / pratasthe sacivanyastarājyaś candraprabho nṛpaḥ // 12.26.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vicitraveṣabhāṣādivilokanavinoditaḥ / paśyan nānāvidhān deśān kramāt prāpa ca jāhnavīm // 12.26.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dadarśa tā ca jantūnāṃ jalakallolapaṅktibhiḥ / tridivārohasopānapaddhatiṃ sṛjatīm iva // 12.26.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
himavatprabhavāṃ śaṃbhoḥ kṛtakrīḍākacagrahām / bibhratīṃ cāmbikālīlāṃ devarṣigaṇavanditām // 12.26.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rathāvatīrṇas tasyāṃ ca kṛtasnāno yathāvidhi / cikṣepāsthīni bhūpasya tasya sūryaprabhasya saḥ // 12.26.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
dattadānaḥ kṛtaśrāddho rathārūḍhas tato 'pi ca / prasthitaḥ kramaśaḥ prāpa prayāgam ṛṣisaṃstutam // 12.26.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yatrārcirādyadhūmādim āgrāv iva samāgatau / gaṅgāyamunayor vāhau bhātaḥ sugataye nṛṇām // 12.26.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatropoṣya kṛtasnānadānaśrāddhādisatkriyaḥ / vārāṇasīṃ jagāmātha sa candraprabhabhūpatiḥ // 12.26.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
eta mokṣaṃ prayāteti vadantām iva dūrataḥ / vātākṣiptasamutkṣiptaiḥ surasadmadhvajāṃśukaiḥ // 12.26.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāṃ dināny upoṣya trīṇy abhyarcyātha vṛṣadhvajam / bhogair nijocitais tais taiḥ prayayau sa gayāṃ prati // 12.26.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ phalaughanamitair mañjuguñjadvihaṃgamaiḥ / pade pade sapraṇāmaṃ stūyamāna ivāṅghripaiḥ // 12.26.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
vikṣiptavanyakusumair arcyamāna ivānilaiḥ / nānāraṇyāny atikramya puṇyaṃ prāpa gayāśiraḥ // 12.26.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidhāya tatra ca śrāddhaṃ vidhivad bhūridakṣiṇam / candraprabhaḥ sa rājātra dharmāraṇyam upeyivān // 12.26.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gayākūpe 'sya dadataḥ pituḥ piṇḍaṃ tadantarāt / samuttasthus tam ādātuṃ trayo mānuṣapāṇayaḥ // 12.26.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad dṛṣṭvaiva sa vibhrāntaḥ kim etad iti pārthavaḥ / kasmin haste kṣipe piṇḍam ity apṛcchan nijān dvijān // 12.26.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
te tam ūcur ayaṃ tāvad ekaś caurasya niścatam / hasto lohamayaḥ śaṅkur yasmin devaiṣa dṛśyate // 12.26.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dvitīyo brāhmaṇasyāyaṃ karo dhṛtapavitrakaḥ / rājñaḥ pāṇis tṛtīyo 'yaṃ sāṅgulīyaḥ sulakṣaṇaḥ // 12.26.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tan na vidmaḥ kva piṇḍo 'yaṃ nikṣepyaḥ kim idaṃ bhavet / ity uktas tair dvijaiḥ so 'tra rājā lebhe na niścayam // 12.26.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ākhyāya kathāścaryaṃ vetālo 'ṃsasthitas tadā / sa trivikramasenaṃ taṃ jagāda nṛpatiṃ punaḥ // 12.26.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tat kasya haste deyaḥ syāt sa piṇḍa iti vaktu me / bhavāṃs tāvat sa evātra prāktanaḥ samayaś ca te // 12.26.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti vetālataḥ śrutvā muktamaunaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ / taṃ trivikramaseno 'tra dharmajñaḥ pratyabhāṣata // 12.26.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
caurasya haste dātavyaḥ sa piṇḍaḥ kṣetrajo yataḥ / candraprabaḥ sa nṛpatiḥ putras tasyaiva nānyayoḥ // 12.26.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
viprasya janakasyāpi sa hi putro na budhyate / vikrīto hi dhanenātmā tām ekāṃ tena yāminīm // 12.26.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājñaḥ sūraprabasyāpi saṃskārādānavardhanaiḥ / bhavet sa putro na syāc cet svadhanaṃ tasya tatkṛte // 12.26.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
śiśos tasya hi śīrṣānte mañcasthasyaiva hema yat / nyastam āsīt tad evāsya mūlyaṃ saṃvardhanādike // 12.26.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmād dhastodakaprāptā tanmātā yasya yena sā / ajñā tajjanane dattā yasya tan nikhilaṃ dhanam // 12.26.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya sa kṣetrajaḥ putraś caurasyaiva mahīpatiḥ / piṇḍas tasyaiva haste ca deyas teneti me matiḥ // 12.26.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavato nṛpates tasyāṃsāt svapadam eva vetālaḥ / prayayau sa ca trivikramaseno rājā tam anvayād bhūyaḥ // 12.26.102	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
tato gatvā gṛhītvāṃse vetālaṃ śiṃśapātaroḥ / sa trivikramasenas tam uccacāla punar nṛpaḥ // 12.27.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
maunena prasthitaṃ taṃ ca vetālo 'ṃsād uvāca saḥ / rājan kas te 'nubandho 'yaṃ gaccha rātrisukhaṃ bhaja // 12.27.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na yuktaṃ tava netuṃ māṃ kubhikṣos tasya gocaram / graho vā tatra ced astu kathām ekām imāṃ śṛṇu // 12.27.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asti svarekhānutkrāntavarṇabhedavyavasthiti / nagaraṃ citrakūṭākhyaṃ bibhrāṇaṃ satyanāmatām // 12.27.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāmṛtarasāsāravarṣī praṇayicakṣuṣām / candrāvaloka ity āsīd rājā rājaśikhāmaṇiḥ // 12.27.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ālānaṃ śauryakariṇas tyāgasyotpattiketanam / vilāsaveśma rūpasya śaśaṃsur yaṃ vicakṣaṇāḥ // 12.27.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
satīṣu sarvasaṃpatsu yan na prāpa nijocitām / bhāryāṃ saikā paraṃ cintā yūnas tasyābhavad dhṛdi // 12.27.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā ca tadudvegavinodāya mahāṭavīm / jagāmāśvīyasahito mṛgayāyai sa bhūpatiḥ // 12.27.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatra sūkaravṛndāni bhindan bāṇair nirantaraiḥ / śyāmalāmbararociṣṇus tamāṃsīva raviḥ karaiḥ // 12.27.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śāyayañ śaraśayyāsu siṃhān samaradurmadān / mūrdhajair dhavalair bhīṣmān arjunādhikavikramaḥ // 12.27.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vipakṣīkṛtya śarabhān pātayan parvatopamān / dambholikarkaśaprāsapātair jambhārivikramaḥ // 12.27.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
rasād vivikṣuḥ sa nṛpo vanābhyantaram ekakaḥ / tīvrapārṣṇiprahāreṇa prerayāmāsa vājinam // 12.27.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa vājī tena ca kaśāghātenottejito bhṛśam / pārṣṇighātena viṣamaṃ samaṃ cāgaṇayan kṣaṇāt // 12.27.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
vanāntaraṃ tato 'naiṣīd vātādhikajavo nṛpam / mohitendriyavṛttiṃ taṃ vyatītya daśayojanīm // 12.27.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tasmin sthite vāhe rājā diṅmoham etya saḥ / bhramañ śrānto dadarśaikam ārāt suvipulaṃ saraḥ // 12.27.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mārutenābhimukhyena namitonnamitair muhuḥ / ita ehīti hastābhaiḥ saṃjñāṃ kurvad ivāmbujaiḥ // 12.27.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra gatvā ca turagaṃ viparyāṇopavartitam / snātapītaṃ tarucchāyābaddhaṃ dattatṛṇotkaram // 12.27.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtvā svayaṃ kṛtasnānaḥ pītāmbur galitaśramaḥ / ramyeṣu tatpradeśeṣu dadau dṛṣṭim itas tataḥ // 12.27.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekatra cāśokataror adhastān munikanyakām / āmuktapuṣpābharaṇāṃ valkalāṃśukaśobhinīm // 12.27.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
mugdhabaddhajaṭājūṭasaviśeṣamanoramām / sakhīdvitīyām āścaryarūpāṃ rājā dadarśa saḥ // 12.27.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
acintayac ca puṣpeṣoḥ patitaḥ śaragocare / keyaṃ syāt sarasi snātuṃ sāvitrī kiṃ svid āgatā // 12.27.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ harasyāṅkavibhraṣṭā gaurī bhūyaḥ śritā tapaḥ / ahany astaṃgatasyendoḥ kāntiḥ kiṃ vā dhṛtavratā // 12.27.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad etām upasṛtyeha śanair upalabhe varam / ity ālocya yayau tasyāḥ kanyāyāḥ so 'ntikaṃ nṛpaḥ // 12.27.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpi dṛṣṭvā tam āyāntaṃ tadrūpākulitekṣaṇā / pūrvaprārabdhapuṣpasraksannahastā vyacintayat // 12.27.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ko 'yam īdṛg araṇye 'smin siddho vidyādharo nu kim / batāsya rūpaṃ viśvasya kṛtārthīkaraṇaṃ dṛśoḥ // 12.27.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
evaṃ vitarkya paśyantī tiryak taṃ trapayā tataḥ / utthāya sorustambhāpi gantuṃ prāvartataiva sā // 12.27.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
athopetya sa rājā tām evaṃ nāgariko 'bravīt / āstāṃ prathamadṛṣṭasya darśanaikaphalārthinaḥ // 12.27.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
janasya dūrāyātasya sundari svāgatādikam / ko 'yaṃ nv āśramiṇāṃ dharmo yad etasmāt palāyyate // 12.27.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukte bhūbhujā tasyāḥ sakhī tadvad vicakṣaṇā / tatropaveśya nṛpateś cakārātithyasatkriyām // 12.27.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
atha sapraṇayaṃ rājā tāṃ sa papraccha sotsukaḥ / bhadre kaḥ puṇyavān vaṃśas tvatsakhyālaṃkṛto 'nayā // 12.27.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kāni śrotrāmṛtasyandīny asyā nāmākṣarāṇi ca / kiṃ caivam anayā puṣpasukumāram idaṃ vapuḥ // 12.27.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāpasocitayā vṛttyā vijane 'smin kadarthyate / iti rājño vacaḥ śrutvā tatsakhī pratyuvāca sā // 12.27.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
eṣā maharṣeḥ kaṇvasya duhitā vardhitāśrame / menakāsaṃbhavā kanyā nāmnā cendīvaraprabhā // 12.27.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ihāsmin sarasi snātum āgatānujñayā pituḥ / ito 'tra nātidūre 'sti tasyaitat pitur āśramaḥ // 12.27.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktaḥ sa tayā hṛṣṭo rājāruhya turaṅgamam / yācituṃ tāṃ sutāṃ tasya kaṇvarṣer āśramaṃ yayau // 12.27.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
viveśa ca vinītas taṃ bahiḥ sthāpitavāhanaḥ / jaṭāvalkalibhiḥ pūrṇaṃ pādapair iva tāpasaiḥ // 12.27.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tanmadhye ca tam adrākṣīd ṛṣibhiḥ parivāritam / tejasāhlādanaṃ kaṇvamuniṃ candram iva grahaiḥ // 12.27.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upetya pādayos taṃ ca vavande so 'pi taṃ muniḥ / kalpitātithyaviśrāntaṃ jñānī kṣiprād abhāṣata // 12.27.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vatsa candravalokaitac chṛṇu yad vacmi te hitam / jānāsi yādṛk saṃsāre prāṇināṃ mṛtyuto bhayam // 12.27.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tan niḥkāraṇam evaitān varākān haṃsi kiṃ mṛgān / śastraṃ hi bhītarakṣārthaṃ dhātrā kṣatrasya nirmitam // 12.27.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tat prajā rakṣa dharmeṇa samun mūlaya kaṇṭakān / hastyaśvāstrādiyogyābhiś calalakṣmyādi sādhaya // 12.27.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhuṅkṣva rājyasukhaṃ dehi dhanaṃ dikṣu yaśaḥ kira / kṛtāntakrīḍitaṃ hiṃsraṃ mṛgayāvyasanaṃ tyaja // 12.27.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hantur vadhyasya cānyasya yatra tulyā pramāditā / kiṃ tena bahvanarthena pāṇḍor vṛttaṃ na kiṃ śrutam // 12.27.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etat kaṇvamuner vākyaṃ śrutvā samabhinandya ca / rājā candrāvalokas tam arthajñaḥ pratyabhāṣata // 12.27.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anuśiṣṭo 'smi bhagavan kṛto me 'nugrahaḥ paraḥ / mṛgayāyā nivṛtto 'haṃ prāṇinaḥ santu nirbhayāḥ // 12.27.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvovāca sa munis tuṣṭo 'ham amunā tava / prāṇiṣv abhayadānena tad vṛṇīṣvepsitaṃ varam // 12.27.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktas tena muninā kālajñaḥ sa nṛpo 'bhyadhāt / tuṣṭo 'si cet sutāṃ dehi mahyam indīvaraprabhām // 12.27.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity arthitavate so 'smai rājñe snānagatāṃ muniḥ / apsaraḥsaṃbhavāṃ kanyāṃ tāṃ dadāv anurūpikām // 12.27.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ kṛtavivāhas tāṃ munibhāryāprasādhitām / kṛtānuyātrām udbāṣpais tāpasair ā nijāśramāt // 12.27.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
indīvaraprabhāṃ bhāryām ādāyāruhya vājinam / candrāvalokas tarasā pratasthe sa tato nṛpaḥ // 12.27.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
gacchataś cāsya vitataṃ dṛṣṭvā taddinaceṣṭitam / raviḥ khinna ivāstādrim astake samupāviśat // 12.27.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
dadṛśe mṛganetrā ca kramād udriktamanmathā / dhvāntanīlapaṭacchannarūpā rātryabhisārikā // 12.27.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmin kāle pathi prāpa sa rājāśvatthapādapam / sajjanāśayasusvacchavāpījalataṭasthitam // 12.27.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śākhāpattraughasaṃchannaśādvalaśyāmalasthalam / dṛṣṭvā ca taṃ vasāmīha rātrim ity akarod dhṛdi // 12.27.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'vatīrya turagād dattvā tasmai tṛṇodakam / viśramya puline vāpyā upayuktāmbumārutaḥ // 12.27.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
muniputrikayā sārdhaṃ tayā tasya taros tale / priyayā puṣpaśayyāyāṃ saṃviveśa sa bhūpatiḥ // 12.27.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkṣaṇaṃ ca samākramya timirāṃśukahāriṇā / sarāgam ānanaṃ prācyāś cucumbe śaśalakṣmaṇā // 12.27.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
virejuś candrakiraṇaiḥ samāśliṣya prasāritāḥ / vītamānāvakāśāś cāśeṣā vitamaso diśaḥ // 12.27.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
atrāntare latāgulmavivaraprasṛtaiḥ karaiḥ / aindavai ratnadīpābhais tarumūle vibhāsite // 12.27.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi rājā siṣeve tām āśliṣyendīvaraprabhām / navasaṃgamasotkaṇṭhasarasaṃ suratotsavam // 12.27.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
visraṃsayāmāsa śanair nīvīṃ tasyās trapām iva / akhaṇḍayac ca daśanair mugdhabhāvam ivādharam // 12.27.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
racayāmāsa kucayor yauvanadvipakumbhayoḥ / karajakṣatasadratnanavanakṣatramālikām // 12.27.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
mukhaṃ kapolau nayane muhuḥ paricucumba ca / lāvaṇyāmṛtaniḥṣyandam āpibann iva sarvataḥ // 12.27.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
itthan nidhuvanakrīḍāsukhena sa tayā saha / nināya kāntayā tatra rājā kṣaṇam iva kṣapām // 12.27.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātaś ca muktaśayanaḥ sāṃdhyasyānantaraṃ vidheḥ / svasainyāvāptaye yātum unmukho 'bhūd vadhūsakhaḥ // 12.27.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca naktaṃ luptābjakhaṇḍaśobhaṃ niśāpatim / bhiyevāstādrikuharapralīnaṃ dhvastatejasam // 12.27.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
hantukāma iva krodhād ātāmratararociṣi / prasāritakarotkṣiptamaṇḍalāgre vivasvati // 12.27.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akasmād ājagāmātra vidyutpiṅgaśiroruhaḥ / kajjalaśyāmalaḥ kālameghābho brahmarākṣasaḥ // 12.27.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
antramālākṛtottaṃsaḥ keśayajñopavītabhṛt / khādan naraśiromāṃsaṃ kapālena pibann asṛk // 12.27.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'ṭṭahāsaṃ vimucyograṃ mukhenāgniṃ vaman krudhā / daṃṣṭrākarālo rājānaṃ bhartsayan nijagāda tam // 12.27.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
pāpa jvālāmukhaṃ nāma viddhi māṃ brahmarākṣasam / nivāsaś caiṣa me 'śvattho devair api na laṅghyate // 12.27.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'yaṃ tvayā samākramya paribhuktaḥ striyā saha / rātricaryāgatasyādya tad bhuṅkṣvāvinayāt phalam // 12.27.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
eṣo 'haṃ te durācāra kāmopahatacetasaḥ / utpāṭya hṛdayaṃ bhokṣye pāsyāmy eva ca śoṇitam // 12.27.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvaiva tathā ghoraṃ tam avadhyam avekṣya ca / trastāṅganaḥ savinayaṃ bhayāt pratyabravīn nṛpaḥ // 12.27.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ajānatāparāddhaṃ yan mayā te tat kṣamasva me / tavāham āśrame hy asminn atithiḥ śaraṇāśritaḥ // 12.27.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dāsyāmi cepsitaṃ tubhyam ānīya puruṣaṃ paśum / yena te bhavitā tṛptis tat prasīda krudhaṃ tyaja // 12.27.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti rājño vacaḥ śrutvā śāntaḥ sa brahmarāksasaḥ / astu ko doṣa ity anto vicintyaivam abhāṣata // 12.27.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yaḥ saptavarṣadeśyo 'pi mahāsattvo vivekavān / tvadarthe svecchayātmānaṃ dadyād brāhmaṇaputrakaḥ // 12.27.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hanyamānaṃ ca yaṃ mātā hastayoḥ pādayoḥ pitā / avaṣṭabhyātisudṛḍhaṃ saṃniveśya mahītale // 12.27.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tādṛśaṃ puruṣaṃ mahyam upahārīkaroṣi cet / svayaṃ khaḍgaprahāreṇa hatvā saptadināntare // 12.27.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tat te kṣamiṣye nyakkāram anyathā tu mahīpate / sadyo vināśayiṣyāmi tvām ahaṃ saparicchadam // 12.27.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutvaitat sa bhayād rājā pratipede tatheti tat / tirobabhūva ca brahmarākṣasaḥ so 'pi tat kṣaṇam // 12.27.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha candrāvaloko 'sau rājā sendīvaraprabhaḥ / hayārūḍhas tataḥ prāyāt sainyaṃ cinvan sudurmanāḥ // 12.27.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho ahaṃ mṛgayayā madanena ca mohitaḥ / gataḥ pāṇḍur ivākāṇḍe vināśaṃ bata bāliśaḥ // 12.27.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāpyate hy upahāro 'sya rākṣasas tādṛśaḥ kutaḥ / tan nijaṃ nagaraṃ tāvad yāmi paśyāmi bhāvi kim // 12.27.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti dhyāyan sa ca prāpa svasainyaṃ cinvad āgatam / tadyuktaś ca sadāraḥ svaṃ citrakūṭam agāt puram // 12.27.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tasyocitāṃ bhāryāprāptiṃ vīkṣya kṛtotsave / rāṣṭre 'ntargataduḥkhasya dinaśeṣo jagāma saḥ // 12.27.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dvitīye 'hni rahaḥ sarvaṃ svavṛttāntaṃ śaśaṃsa saḥ / mantribhyas teṣu caikas taṃ mantrī sumatir abravīt // 12.27.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
viṣādo deva te mā bhūd upahāraṃ hi tādṛśam / āneṣyāmy aham anviṣya bahvāścaryā hi medinī // 12.27.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam āśvāsya rājānaṃ sa sauvarṇīm akārayat / mantrī saptābdadeśīyabālakapratimāṃ drutam // 12.27.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ratnair alaṃkṛtāṃ tāṃ ca kṛtvā karṇirathārpitām / bhrāmayāmāsa nagaragrāmaghoṣeṣv itas tataḥ // 12.27.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
yaḥ saptavarṣadeśīyaḥ svecchayā vipraputrakaḥ / dadāti sarvasattvārtham ātmānaṃ brahmarakṣase // 12.27.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upahārāya sattvastho mātāpitror anujñayā / hanyamānaś ca yas tābhyāṃ hastapāde pragṛhyate // 12.27.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmai grāmaśatopetāṃ hemaratnamayīm imām / dadāti pratimāṃ rājā pitror upacikīrṣave // 12.27.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti ca bhrāmyamānāyās tasyāḥ pratikṛteḥ śiśoḥ / paṭahodghoṣaṇāṃ mantrī so 'gre 'jasram adāpayat // 12.27.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac chrutvā tad ekasminn agrahāre dvijārbhakaḥ / ko'pi saptābdadeśīyo 'py atidhīro 'dbhutākṛtiḥ // 12.27.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pūrvābhyāsena bālye 'pi sadā parahite rataḥ / prajāpuṇyaparīpāka iva sākāratāṃ gataḥ // 12.27.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uvācodghoṣakān etya yuṣmadarthe dadāmy aham / ātmānaṃ pitarau gatvā bodhayitvābhyupaimi ca // 12.27.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ūcivāṃs tān muditān sa bālo 'numataś ca taiḥ / gatvā gṛhaṃ jagāda svau pitarau racitāñjaliḥ // 12.27.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
dadāmi sarvasattvārthaṃ deham etaṃ vinaśvaram / tan mām abhyanujānītaṃ hatāṃ cāpadam ātmanaḥ // 12.27.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ātmapratikṛtiṃ hy etāṃ gṛhītvā vitarāmi vām / hemaratnamayīṃ rājñā dattāṃ grāmaśatānvitām // 12.27.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ me yuṣmadānṛṇyaṃ parārthaś caiva sidhyati / yuvāṃ ca dhvastadāridryau bahūn putrān avāpsyathaḥ // 12.27.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavantaṃ sahasā pitarau tau tam ūcatuḥ / kim etad bhāṣase putra vātena kṣubhito 'si kim // 12.27.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ vā grahagṛhīto 'si pralapasy anyathā katham / ko hy arthair ghātayet putraṃ dehaṃ dadyāc ca kaḥ śiśuḥ // 12.27.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etat pitror vacaḥ śrutvā bālaḥ puna uvāca saḥ / na buddhimohāj jalpāmi śṛṇutaṃ me 'rthavad vacaḥ // 12.27.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
avācyāśucisaṃpūrṇam utpattyaiva sugupsitam / duḥkhakṣetraṃ vināśy eva śarīram acirād idam // 12.27.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad etenātyasāreṇa sukṛtaṃ yad upārjyate / tad eva sāraṃ saṃsāre kṛtabuddhibhir ucyate // 12.27.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sarvabhūtopakārāc ca kim anyat sukṛtaṃ param / tatrāpi pitror bhaktiś cet kiṃ dehād dṛśyate phalam // 12.27.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ityādivākyaiḥ sa śiśuḥ śocantau dṛḍhaniścayaḥ / tāv aṅgīkārayāmāsa pitarau svamanīṣitam // 12.27.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā ca rājabhṛtyebhyaḥ pratimāṃ taṃ hiraṇmayīm / ānīya pradadau tābhyāṃ sagrāmaśataśāsanām // 12.27.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ kṛtvāgrato rājabhṛtyāṃs tān eva sa drutam / pitṛbhyām anvitaḥ prāyāc citrakūṭaṃ nṛpāntikam // 12.27.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tad ekā gatir atra tvaṃ yathā vetsi tathā kuru / ityuktavākye kamalākare mālatikābravīt // 12.28.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
anaṅgamañjarīm adya guptaṃ tāṃ prāpayāmy aham / naktaṃ svabhavanodyānaṃ tvaṃ tiṣṭhes tatra bāhyataḥ // 12.28.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ praveśayiṣyāmi tvām atrāntaḥ svayuktitaḥ / evaṃ yatheṣṭo yuvayor bhaviṣyati samāgamaḥ // 12.28.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
ity uktvānandya taṃ vipraputraṃ mālatikā tataḥ / gatvā kṛtārthā sānaṅgamañjarīm apy anandayat // 12.28.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
athāhnā saha yāte 'rke kvāpi saṃdhyānurāgiṇi / aindryā diśendutilakenānane suprasādhite // 12.28.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tyaktapadmākarā prāptā śrīr mayetīva harṣataḥ / hasaty uphullavadane viśade kumudākare // 12.28.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
kṛtaprasādhanaḥ sotkaḥ svairaṃ sa kamalākaraḥ / kāmī kāntāgṛhodyānadvārabāhyam upāgamat // 12.28.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca sā mālatikā tāṃ yuktyānaṅgamañjarīm / ānināya tad udyānaṃ kṛcchrād gamitavāsarām // 12.28.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
upaveśya ca tāṃ madhye gulmake cūtaśākhinām / prāveśayat taṃ nirgatya tatraiva kamalākaram // 12.28.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sa ca praviśya pattraughaghanapādapamadhyagām / tām adhvaga iva chāyāṃ dadarśānaṅgamañjarīm // 12.28.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
upaiti yāvac ca sa tāṃ tāvad dṛṣṭvā pradhāvya sā / kāmavegahṛtavrīḍā kaṇṭhe taṃ sahasāgrahīt // 12.28.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kva yāsi labdho 'si mamety ālapantī ca tat kṣaṇam / sātiharṣabharastabdhaniḥśvāsā pañcatām agāt // 12.28.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
papāta ca mahīpṛṣṭhe vātarugṇā lateva sā / vicitro bata kāmasya vipākaviṣamaḥ kramaḥ // 12.28.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad dṛṣṭvāśanipātograṃ sadyaḥ sa kamalākaraḥ / hā hā kim etad ity uktvā mūrcchito nyapatad bhuvi // 12.28.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
labdhasaṃjñaḥ kṣaṇenātha tām aṅkāropitāṃ priyām / āliṅgan paricumbaṃś ca tat tac ca vilapan bahu // 12.28.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathā dukhātibhāreṇa sa prasahya nipīḍitaḥ / yathā tasya ṭasatkṛtya kṣaṇād dhṛdayam asphuṭat // 12.28.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha tau mālatikayā śocyamānāv ubhāv api / dṛṣṭvā prāptakṣayau śokād iva kṣīṇābhavat kṣapā // 12.28.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāta udyānapālebhyo jñātvā bandhujanas tayoḥ / tatrāyayau trapāścaryaduḥkhamohākulīkṛtaḥ // 12.28.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āsīt kartavyatāmūḍhaś ciraṃ khedād avāṅmukhaḥ / kaṣṭāḥ kulakhalīkārahetavo bata kustriyaḥ // 12.28.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca tāmraliptītaḥ sa tasyāḥ patir āgamat / sotkaṇṭho 'naṅgamañjaryā maṇivarmā pitur gṛhāt // 12.28.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa śvāśuraṃ gṛhaṃ prāpya yathātattvam avetya tat / bāṣpāndhalocano dhyāyaṃs tad evodyānam āyayau // 12.28.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra bhāryāṃ gatāsuṃ tāṃ dṛṣṭvānyasahitām api / śokāgnijvalito rāgī sadyaḥ so 'pi jahāv asūn // 12.28.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ krandati tatrasthe jane kolāhalākulāḥ / āyayur jñātavṛttāntāḥ paurāḥ sarve 'tra vismitāḥ // 12.28.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athātrānaṅgamañjaryāḥ pitrā pūrvāvatāritā / devī saṃnihitā caṇḍī vijñaptābhūn nijair gaṇaiḥ // 12.28.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvadākārapratiṣṭhākṛd arthadattaḥ sadaiṣa te / bhakto vaṇik tad asyāsmin duḥkhe devi dayāṃ kuru // 12.28.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etad gaṇebhyaḥ śrutvā sā śaraṇyā śaṅkarapriyā / śāntānaṅgās trayo 'py ete jīvantv iti samādiśat // 12.28.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha sarve 'pi te suptapratibuddhā iva kṣaṇāt / tatprasādāt samuttasthur jīvanto vītamanmathāḥ // 12.28.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato dṛṣṭvā tad āścaryaṃ sānande sakale jane / lajjānatamukhaḥ prāyāt svagṛhaṃ kamalākaraḥ // 12.28.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arthadatto 'pi tāṃ hrītām ādāyānaṅgamañjarīm / sutāṃ svabhartṛsahitāṃ yayau baddhotsavo gṛhān // 12.28.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
iti kathayitvā tasyāṃ rātrau mārge kathāṃ sa vetālaḥ / nijagāda taṃ trivikramasenaṃ kṣoṇīpatiṃ bhūyaḥ // 12.28.92	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
rājan kasya vadaiteṣv adhiko moho 'nurāgamūḍheṣu / so 'tra ca pūrvoktas te śāpo jānan na ced vadasi // 12.28.93	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ity etad vetālāc chrutvā sa pratyuvāca taṃ nṛpatiḥ / eteṣu rāgamūḍhaḥ pratibhāti mamādhikaḥ sa maṇivarmā // 12.28.94	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
itarau hi tāv ubhāv api kālakramapakvamanmathāvasthau / anyonasānurāgau yadi jīvitam ujjhataḥ sma tad bhavatu // 12.28.95	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
maṇivarmā tv atimūḍho yo bhāryām anyapuruṣasaktamṛtām / dṛṣṭvaiva kopakāle pratyuta raktaḥ śucāmucat prāṇān // 12.28.96	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
iti gaditavataḥ sa tasya rājño bata vetālapatiḥ punar jagāma / nijam eva padaṃ tad aṃsapīṭhād atha rājāpi tam anvagāt sa bhūyaḥ // 12.28.97	ajñātasamavṛtta [13: Btjrl] (? 2 eva pādāḥ yuktāḥ)
tato rājā punar gatvā vetālaṃ śiṃśapāgrataḥ / sa trivikramasenas taṃ prāpyāṃsāropitaṃ vyadhāt // 12.29.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āyāntaṃ taṃ ca rājānaṃ sa vetālo 'bravīt pathi / rājan sādhuḥ susattvas tvaṃ tad apūrvāṃ kathāṃ śṛṇu // 12.29.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
babhūva pūrvaṃ kusumapurākhyanagareśvaraḥ / pṛthvītale 'smin dharaṇīvarāho nāma bhūpatiḥ // 12.29.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tasya brāhmaṇabhūyiṣṭhe rāṣṭre brahmasthalābhidhaḥ / agrahāro 'bhavat tatra viṣṇusvāmīty abhūd dvijaḥ // 12.29.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyānurūpā bhāryābhūd yathā svāhā havir bhujaḥ / tasyāṃ ca tasya catvāraḥ kramād utpedire sutāḥ // 12.29.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhītavedeṣūtkrāntaśaiśaveṣu ca teṣu saḥ / viṣṇusvāmī divaṃ prāyād bhāryayānugatas tayā // 12.29.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas te tatra tatputrāḥ sarve 'py ānāyya duḥsthitāḥ / gotrajair hṛtasarvasvā mantrayāṃcakrire mithaḥ // 12.29.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nāstīha gatir asmākaṃ tad vrajāmo vayaṃ na kim / ito mātāmahagṛhaṃ grāmaṃ yañjasthalābhidham // 12.29.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
etad eva viniścitya prasthitā bhaikṣyabhojanāḥ / mātāmahagṛhaṃ prāpus te 'tha tad bahubhir dinaiḥ // 12.29.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra mātāmahābhāvān mātulair dattasaṃśrayāḥ / bhuñjānās tadgṛhe tasthuḥ svādhyāyābhyāsatatparāḥ // 12.29.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kālakramāc ca teṣāṃ te mātulānām akiṃcanāḥ / avajñāpātratāṃ jagmur bhojanācchādanādiṣu // 12.29.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ svajanasaṃsphūrjadavamānahatātmanām / teṣāṃ rahaḥ sacintānāṃ jyeṣṭho bhrātābravīd idam // 12.29.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bho bhrātaraḥ kiṃ kriyate sarvam āceṣṭate vidhiḥ / na śakyaṃ puruṣasyeha kvacit kiṃcit kadācana // 12.29.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ hy udvegato bhrāmyan prāpto 'dya pitṛkānane / vipannasthitam adrākṣaṃ trastāṅgaṃ puruṣaṃ bhuvi // 12.29.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
acintayaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā tam ahaṃ tāṃ spṛhayan gatim / dhanyo 'yam evaṃ viśrānto duḥkhabhāraṃ vimucya yaḥ // 12.29.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
iti saṃcintya tat kālaṃ kṛtvā maraṇaniścayam / vṛkṣāgrasaṅginā pāśenātmānam udalambayam // 12.29.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yāvac ca me visaṃjñasya tadā niryānti nāsavaḥ / tāvat truṭitapāśo 'tra patito 'smi mahītale // 12.29.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
labdhasaṃjñaś ca kenāpi puṃsā kṣiprāt kṛpālunā / āśvāsyamānam ātmānam apaśyaṃ paṭamārutaiḥ // 12.29.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sakhe kathaya vidvān apy evaṃ kaṃ prati khidyase / sukhaṃ hi sukṛtād duḥkhaṃ duḥkṛtād eti nānyataḥ // 12.29.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
duḥkhād yadi tavodvegaḥ sukṛtaṃ tat samācara / kathaṃ tu nārakaṃ duḥkham ātmatyāgena vāñchasi // 12.29.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā māṃ samāśvāsya sa ca kvāpi gataḥ pumān / ahaṃ cehāgatas tyaktvā tādṛśaṃ maraṇodyamam // 12.29.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad evaṃ necchati vidhau na martum api labhyate / idānīṃ ca tanuṃ tīrthe tapasā dāhayāmy aham // 12.29.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
yena nirdhanatāduḥkhabhāgī na syām ahaṃ punaḥ / ity uktavantaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ taṃ kaniṣṭhā bhrātaro 'bruvan // 12.29.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
arthair vinā kathaṃ prājño 'py ārya duḥkena bādhyase / kiṃ na vetsi yad arthānāṃ śaradabhracalā gatiḥ // 12.29.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āhṛtya rakṣyamāṇāpi yatnenāntavirāgiṇī / asanmaitrī ca veśyā ca śrīś ca kasya kadā sthirā // 12.29.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad udyogena sa guṇaḥ ko 'py upārjyo manasvinā / ānīyante haṭād baddhvā yenārthahariṇā muhuḥ // 12.29.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukto bhrātṛbhir dhairyaṃ kṣaṇāj jyeṣṭho 'valambya saḥ / uvāca ko guṇas tādṛgarjanīyo bhaved iti // 12.29.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vicitya sarve te vadanti sma parasparam / vicintya pṛthvīṃ vijñānaṃ kiṃcic chikṣāmahe vayam // 12.29.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
niścityaitac ca saṃketasthānam uktvā samāgame / ekaikaśas te catvāraś catasraḥ prayayur diśaḥ // 12.29.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
yāti kāle ca militās te saṃketaniketane / kiṃ kena śikṣitam iti bhrātaro 'nyonyam abruvan // 12.29.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
athātraiko 'bravīd īdṛg vijñānaṃ śikṣitaṃ mayā / yenāsthiśakalaṃ prāpya prāṇino yasya kasyacit // 12.29.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
utpādayāmy ahaṃ tasmin māṃsaṃ taducitaṃ kṣaṇāt / etat tasya vacaḥ śrutvā dvitīyas teṣv abhāṣata // 12.29.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ tatraiva saṃjātamāṃse 'sthiśakale kila / jāne janayituṃ lomatvacaṃ tatprāṇisaṃbhavi // 12.29.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tṛtīyo 'py avadaj jāne tatraiva cāsmy aham / tatprānyavayavān sraṣṭuṃ jātatvaṅmāṃsalomani // 12.29.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
caturthaś ca tato 'vādīd utpannāvayavākṛtim / tam eva prāṇinaṃ prānair yuktaṃ kartum avaimy aham // 12.29.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktvā mithaḥ svasvavijñānaprathanāya te / catvāro 'py asthikhaṇḍāya prayayur bhrātaro 'ṭavīm // 12.29.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra siṃhasya te prāpur asthikhaṇḍaṃ vidher vaśāt / avijñātaviśeṣāś ca gṛhnanti sma tathaiva tat // 12.29.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekaś ca tat samucitais tato māṃsair ayojayat / dvitīyo 'janayat tasya tadvat tvaglomasaṃhatīḥ // 12.29.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tṛtīyaś cākhilair aṅgais tadyogyais tad apūrayat / caturthaś ca dadau tasya siṃhībhūtasya jīvitam // 12.29.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
udatiṣṭhad athoddhūtasaṭābhāro 'tibhairavaḥ / sa daṃṣṭrāsaṃkaṭamukhaḥ siṃhaḥ kharanakhāṅkuśaḥ // 12.29.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
dhāvitvā ca svanirmātṝṃs tān eva caturo 'pi saḥ / avadhīt kesarī tṛpto viveśa ca vanaṃ tataḥ // 12.29.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ te siṃhanirmāṇadoṣān naṣṭā dvijātayaḥ / duṣṭaṃ hi jantum utthāpya kasyātmani sukhaṃ bhavet // 12.29.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
itthaṃ copārjito yatnād guṇo 'pi vidhure vidhau / saṃpattaye na na paraṃ jāyate tu vipattaye // 12.29.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
mūle hy avikṛte daive sikte prajñānavāriṇā / nayālavālaḥ phalati prāyaḥ pauruṣapādapaḥ // 12.29.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
iti tasyāṃ niśi mārge vetālenāṃsataḥ kathāṃ tena / ākhyāya sa trivikramaseno rājā punar jagade // 12.29.45	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
rājaṃs teṣv aparādhyati caturṣu kas tatra siṃhanirmāṇe / yan nyavadhīt tatkḷpto vada samayaḥ so 'tra pūrvas te // 12.29.46	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
iti vetālāc chrutvā rājā so 'cintayad vimaunasya / icchati gantum ayaṃ me yātv āneṣyāmy amuṃ bhūyaḥ // 12.29.47	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
iti hṛdi niścitya sa taṃ mahīpatiḥ pratyuvāca vetālam / yas tasya jīvadāyī siṃhasya sa pāpabhāk teṣu // 12.29.48	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
prāṇiviśeṣam abuddhvā māṃsatvaglomagātranirmāṇam / yuktibalāt tu kṛtaṃ yais teṣāṃ doṣo 'sti nājñānāt // 12.29.49	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
yena tu siṃhākāraṃ dṛṣṭvā vidyāprakāśanotkena / prāṇās tasya vitīrṇās tena kṛtā brahmahatyās tāḥ // 12.29.50	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
etat sa rājño vacanaṃ niśamya svadhāma vetālavaro jagāma / tasyāṃsatas tat puna eva māyī rājāpi taṃ so 'nusasāra bhūyaḥ // 12.29.51	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
tato gatvā punaḥ prāpa śiṃśapāpādapāt tataḥ / sa trivikramasenas taṃ vetālaṃ rājasattamaḥ // 12.30.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
skandhe kṛtvā ca taṃ maunī darśitānekavaikṛtam / yāvat pratiṣṭhate tāvat sa vetālas tam abravīt // 12.30.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājann akārye 'py etasmin durvāro 'yaṃ grahas tava / tat te śramavinodāya kathayāmi kathāṃ śṛṇu // 12.30.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
āsīt kaliṅgaviṣaye nāmnā śobhāvatī purī / divīva śakranagarī vasatiḥ śubhakarmaṇām // 12.30.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
yāṃ pradyumna ivaiśvaryavīryātiśayaviśrutaḥ / pradyumnanāmā nṛpatiḥ śaśāsorjitaśāsanaḥ // 12.30.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
guṇāpakarṣaś cāpeṣu murajeṣu karāhatiḥ / yugeṣv aśrūyata kalir yasyāṃ prajñāsu tīkṣṇatā // 12.30.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ekadeśe puras tasyā nṛpeṇa pratipāditaḥ / yajñasthalābhidhāno 'bhūd agrahāro bahudvijaḥ // 12.30.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāsīd yajñasomākhyo brāhmaṇo vedapāragaḥ / mahādhano 'gnihotrī ca pūjitātithidevataḥ // 12.30.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya vyatīte tāruṇye manorathaśataiḥ sutaḥ / bhāryāyām anurūpāyām eka evodapadyata // 12.30.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vavṛdhe ca pituḥ so 'sya gṛhe bālaḥ sulakṣaṇaḥ / kṛtābhidhāno vidhivad devasoma iti dvijaiḥ // 12.30.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
prāptaṣoḍaśavarṣaś ca sa vidyāvinayādibhiḥ / āvarjitajano 'kasmāj jvareṇa prāpa pañcatām // 12.30.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ parāsuṃ snehāt tam āśliṣya saha bhāryayā / yajñasenaḥ pitā śocan na dāhāya jahau ciram // 12.30.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
brahman saṃsāragandharvanagarasya na vetsi kim / parāvarajño 'pi gatiṃ vāribudbudabhaṅgurām // 12.30.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
ye sainyaiḥ pūritadharā harmyapṛṣṭheṣu hāriṣu / lasatsaṃgītanādeṣu ratnaparyaṅkavartinaḥ // 12.30.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrīkhaṇḍadravaliptāṅgā varastrīparivāritāḥ / vyalasann amaraṃmanyā bhūloke 'smin narādhipāḥ // 12.30.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
te 'py ekakāḥ śmaśāneṣu rudatpretānuyāyiṣu / citādhiśayino yatra jagdhāḥ kravyātkṛśānubhiḥ // 12.30.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śivābhir valitopāntāḥ kālena kavalīkṛtāḥ / na roddhuṃ śakitāḥ kaiścit tatrānyeṣāṃ kathaiva kā // 12.30.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad etaṃ pretam āśliṣya vidvan vada karoṣi kim / ityādy abodhayan vṛddhā militās taṃ dvijaṃ tataḥ // 12.30.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tena kathaṃcit taṃ muktam āropya tatsutam / śibikāyāṃ gataprāṇaṃ kṛtapretaprasādhanam // 12.30.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bāndhavā vaiśasodaśrumiladbandhujanānvitāḥ / śmaśānaṃ prāpayāmāsuḥ kolāhalasamākulāḥ // 12.30.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atrāntare ca tatrāsīc chmaśāne ko'pi tāpasaḥ / vṛddhaḥ pāśupato yogī maṭhikāyāṃ kṛtasthitiḥ // 12.30.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vayasā tapasā cātibhūyasā sukṛśāṃ tanum / bibhrāṇo bhaṅgabhītyeva sirābhiḥ pariveṣṭitam // 12.30.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nāmnā vāmaśivo bhasmapāṇḍuromāvṛtākṛtiḥ / vidyutpiṅgajaṭājūṭo maheśvara ivāparaḥ // 12.30.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tāpaso 'tra tat kālaṃ dattopālambhakheditam / mūrkhaṃ śaṭhaṃ dhyānayogādyavaliptam ahaṃkṛtam // 12.30.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
bhikṣāphalavratadharaṃ śiṣyam antikavāsinam / jagāda dūrāc chrutvā taṃ janakolāhalaṃ bahiḥ // 12.30.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
uttiṣṭha gatvātra bahir vijñāyāgaccha satvaram / kuto 'trāśrutapūrvo 'yaṃ śmaśāne tumulāravaḥ // 12.30.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukte guruṇā tena sa śiṣyaḥ pratyuvāca tam / nāhaṃ yāmi svayaṃ yāhi bhikṣāvelā hy apaiti me // 12.30.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvovāca sa gurur dhiṅ mūrkhodaratatpara / ahno 'rdhaprahare yāte bhikṣāvelātra kā tava // 12.30.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutvaivaitat sa taṃ kruddhaḥ kuśiṣyaḥ prāha tāpasam / dhig jarājīrṇa nāhaṃ te śiṣyo na tvaṃ gurur mama // 12.30.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aham anyatra yāsyāmi vaha pātrīm imāṃ svayam / ity uktvotthāya sa prāyāt tyaktvāgre daṇḍakuṇḍikām // 12.30.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vihasann atha nirgatya maṭhikāyāḥ sa tāpasaḥ / tatrāgād yatra dāhārtham ānītaḥ sa dvijārbhakaḥ // 12.30.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvā ca taṃ janatayā śocyamānāgryayauvanam / yogī praveṣṭuṃ taddehaṃ matiṃ cakre jarārditaḥ // 12.30.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
gatvā ca drutam ekānte muktakaṇṭhaṃ prarudya ca / nanarta sa tataḥ kṣipram aṅgahārair yathocitaiḥ // 12.30.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato viveśa yogāt tad dvijaputrakalevaram / kṣaṇāt sa svatanuṃ tyaktvā tapasvī yauvanecchayā // 12.30.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tat kṣaṇaṃ racitāyāṃ ca citāyāṃ sahasaiva saḥ / labdhajīvo dvijayuvā prottasthau kṛtajṛmbhikaḥ // 12.30.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tad dṛṣṭvā bandhuvargasya diṣṭyā jīvati jīvati / ity udbabhūva nādo 'tra nikhilasya janasya ca // 12.30.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athāmokṣyan vrataṃ sarvān mṛṣā yogesvaraḥ sa tān / vipraputraśarīrāntaḥpraviṣṭas tāpaso 'bravīt // 12.30.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
lokāntaragatasyādya mahāpāśupatavratam / grāhyaṃ sākṣān mamābhāṣya dattaṃ śarveṇa jīvitam // 12.30.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhunaiva ca dhāryaṃ tad gatvaikānte vrataṃ mayā / jīvitaṃ me 'nyathā nāsti tad yūyaṃ yāta yāmy aham // 12.30.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti sarvān sa tatrasthān saṃbodhya dṛḍhaniścayaḥ / svagṛhān preṣayāmāsa harṣaśokākulān vratī // 12.30.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svayaṃ ca gatvā śvabhre tat kṣiptvā pūrvakalevaram / āttavrato mahāyogī yuvībhūto 'nyato yayau // 12.30.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti vyākhyāya vetālaḥ kathāṃ niśi tadā pathi / taṃ trivikramasenaṃ sa rājānaṃ punar abravīt // 12.30.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājan brūhi sa yogīndraḥ kasmāt parapure vasan / praruroda nanartātha kautukaṃ mahad atra me // 12.30.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti vetālataḥ śrutvā śāpaśaṅkī sa bhūpatiḥ / vimucya maunam evaṃ tam avādīd dhīmatāṃ varaḥ // 12.30.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śṛṇu tatra babhūvāsya yo 'bhiprāyas tapasvinaḥ / saha vṛddhaṃ cirāyedaṃ śarīraṃ siddhisādhanam // 12.30.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pitṛbhyāṃ lālitaṃ bālye tyajāmy adyeti duḥkhitaḥ / sa jarat tāpaso 'rodīd dehasneho hi dustyajaḥ // 12.30.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
navaṃ dehaṃ pravekṣyāmi sādhayiṣyāmy ato 'dhikam / iti harṣād anṛtyac ca kasya neṣṭaṃ hi yauvanam // 12.30.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etat tasya vaco niśamya nṛpater aṃsat sa bhūyo 'py agād vetālo mṛtapūruṣāntaragatas taṃ śiṃśapāpādapam / rājā so 'pi tam anvadhāvad adhikotsāhaḥ punaḥ prepsayā kalpānte 'py acalaṃ kulādrivijayi sthairyaṃ hi dhīrātmanām // 12.30.48	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
tatas tāṃ timiraśyāmāṃ citāgnijvalitekṣaṇām / smaśāne bhīṣaṇe tasmin vīro rajanirākṣasīm // 12.31.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ghorām agaṇayan rājā gatvā tāṃ śiṃśapāṃ punaḥ / sa trivikramasenas taṃ tasyā vetālam ādade // 12.31.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
skandhe kṛtvā ca taṃ yāvat prakrāmati sa pūrvavat / tāvad bhūyaḥ sa vetālo naradevam uvāca tam // 12.31.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bho rājann aham udvigno na punas tvaṃ gatāgataiḥ / tad ekaṃ me mahāpraśnam imaṃ kathayataḥ śṛṇu // 12.31.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āsīn māṇḍalikaḥ ko'pi nṛpatir dakṣiṇāpathe / dharmābhidhāno dhaureyaḥ sādhūnāṃ bahugotrajaḥ // 12.31.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tasya candravatīnāma bhāryā mālavadeśajā / abhūn mahākulotpannā varastrīmaulimālikā // 12.31.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāṃ ca tasya bhāryāyāṃ bhūpater udapadyata / ekaiva lāvaṇyavatī nāmānvarthābhidhā sutā // 12.31.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
pradeyāyāṃ ca tasyāṃ sa sutāyāṃ dharmabhūpatiḥ / unmūlito 'bhūn militair dāyādai rāṣṭrabhedibhiḥ // 12.31.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tataḥ palāyya niragāt sa deśād bhāryayā saha / duhitrā ca tayā rātrav āttasadratnasaṃcayaḥ // 12.31.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
mālavaṃ prati ca svairaṃ prasthitaḥ śvaśurāspadam / vindhyāṭavīṃ tayā rātryā prāpa bhāryāsutāyutaḥ // 12.31.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāṃ praviṣṭasyodaśrur ivāvaśyāyaśīkaraiḥ / niśānuyātrāṃ dattveva yayau tasya mahīkṣitaḥ // 12.31.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ārurohātha pūrvādrim utkṣiptāgrakaro raviḥ / mā gāś caurāṭavīm etām iti taṃ vārayann iva // 12.31.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'tra sasutājāniḥ kṣatāṅghriḥ kuśakaṇṭakaiḥ / padātiḥ sa nṛpo gacchan bhillānāṃ prāpa pallikām // 12.31.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pareṣāṃ prāṇasarvasvahāribhiḥ puṃbhir āvṛtām / varjitāṃ dhārmikair durgāṃ kṛtāntanagarīm iva // 12.31.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra dṛṣṭvaiva taṃ dūrāt savastrābharaṇaṃ nṛpam / moṣituṃ bahavo 'dhāvañ śabarā vividhāyudhāḥ // 12.31.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tān vilokya sutābhārye rājā dharmo jagāda saḥ / purā spṛśanti vāṃ mlecchās tad ito viśataṃ vanam // 12.31.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti rājñoditā rajñī vanamadhyaṃ viveśa sā / lāvaṇyavatyā sutayā sārdhaṃ candravatī bhayāt // 12.31.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
rājāpy abhimukhāyātān khaḍgacarmadharo 'tra saḥ / avadhīt tān bahūñ śūraḥ śabarāñ śaravartiṇaḥ // 12.31.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tenākhilā pallī patyājñaptā nipatya tam / prahārakṣatacarmāṇam avadhīn nṛpam ekakam // 12.31.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gṛhītābharaṇe yāte dasyusainye vilokya tam / bhartāraṃ nihataṃ dūrād vanagulmāntarasthitā // 12.31.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājñī candravatī sātra duhitrā saha vihvalā / palāyamānā gahanaṃ dūram anvag agād vanam // 12.31.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tatra madhyāhnatāpārtāsv iva mūlāni śākhinām / chāyāsv api praviṣṭāsu śiśirāṇi sahādhvagaiḥ // 12.31.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadeśe 'bjasarasas tīre 'śokataros tale / śokārtā rudatī śrāntā sasutā samupāviśat // 12.31.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvat tad vanam abhyarṇanivāsī mṛgayākṛte / mahāmanuṣyaḥ ko 'py āgād aśvārūḍhaḥ saputrakaḥ // 12.31.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)

ity uktavantaṃ taṃ smāha putraḥ siṃhaparākramaḥ / yasyāḥ sūkṣmāv imau pādau sā bhāryā pratibhāti me // 12.31.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā hi svalpavayā nūnaṃ jāne samucitā mama / bṛhatpādā tu yogyeyam etajjyeṣṭhavayās tava // 12.31.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tādṛśe sukalatre ca gate kānyatra vāsanā / tac chrutvā so 'pi putras taṃ caṇḍasiṃham abhāṣata // 12.31.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

yatra ghanastanajaghanā nāste mārgāvalokinī kāntā / ajaḍaḥ kas tad anigaḍaṃ praviśati gṛhasaṃjñakaṃ durgam // 12.31.32	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
taj jīvitena me tāta śāpito 'si na tāṃ yadi / dvitīyāṃ madabhīṣṭāyāṃ bhāryārthe svīkarīṣyasi // 12.31.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etat putravacaḥ śrutvā pratipadya ca tatsakhaḥ / sa caṇḍasiṃho 'nusaran padapaṅktiṃ śanair yayau // 12.31.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)

lāvaṇyavatyā sutayā jyotsnayevāvadātayā / naiśīṃ dyām iva madhyāhne tarucchāyām upāśritām // 12.31.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

praviṣṭe sthaḥ kathaṃ ceha bata nirmānuṣe vane / ratnaprāsādavāsārham idaṃ hi yuvayor vapuḥ // 12.31.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kathaṃ varāṅganotsaṅgayogyau kaṇṭakinīm imām / bhuvaṃ vāṃ caraṇau bhrāntāv iti nau manasi vyathā // 12.31.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
eṣā ca citraṃ yuvayoḥ patantī dhūlir ānane / vātoddhūtā hatacchāyam āvayoḥ kurute mukham // 12.31.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhavatyor eṣa cāṅge 'smin nipatan puṣpapeśale / kiraṇoṣmā dahaty asmān uccaṇḍaś caṇḍadīdhiteḥ // 12.31.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad brūtam ātmavṛttāntaṃ dūyate hṛdayaṃ hi naḥ / draṣṭuṃ na śaknumo 'raṇye sthitiṃ vāṃ svāpadāvṛte // 12.31.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukte caṇḍasiṃhena rājñī niḥsvasya sā śanaiḥ / lajjāśokākulā tasmai svaṃ vṛttāntam avarṇayat // 12.31.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato niḥsvāmikāṃ matvā tām āśvāsya ca sātmajām / svīcakre madhurair vākyaiś caṇḍasiṃho 'nurañjayan // 12.31.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

sāpi janmāntaragatevāvaśāṅgīcakāra tam / anāthā kṛcchrapatitā videśe strī karoti kim // 12.31.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatas tāṃ sūkṣmapādatvād rājñīṃ siṃhaparākramaḥ / caṇḍasiṃhasutas tatra bhāryāṃ candravatīṃ vyadhāt // 12.31.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatsutāṃ tāṃ ca lāvaṇyavatīṃ nṛpatikanyakām / bṛhattvāt pādayor bhāryāṃ caṇḍasiṃhaś cakāra saḥ // 12.31.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāg ghi sūkṣmabṛhatpādamudrāpaṅktidvayekṣaṇāt / pratipannaṃ tathā tābhyāṃ satyaṃ kaś cātivartate // 12.31.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

itthaṃ saṃprāpya tau caṇḍasiṃhasiṃhaparākramau / tasthatus tatra lāvaṇyavatīṃ candravatīṃ ca te // 12.31.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti vyāvarṇya vetālas tadā pathi kathāṃ niśi / sa trivikramasenaṃ taṃ papraccha nṛpatiṃ punaḥ // 12.31.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tayor mātāduhitror ye putrapitros tayor nṛpa / sakāśāj jantavo jātāḥ kramād ubhayapakṣayoḥ // 12.31.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tatas tadaṃsakūṭastho vetālo vihasan hṛdi / mṛtapūruṣadehānto niviṣṭaḥ samacintayat // 12.31.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

upāgāc ca sa taṃ rājā so 'pi bhikṣur vilokya tam / ānītamaṭakaṃ harṣād utthāyovāca saṃstuvan // 12.32.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
duḥkaro me mahārāja vihito 'nugrahas tvayā / tvā dṛśāḥ kva kva ceṣṭeyaṃ deśakālau kva cedṛśau // 12.32.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
niḥkampaṃ satyam evāhur mukhyaṃ tvāṃ kulabhūbhṛtām / evam ātmānapekṣeṇa parārtho yena sādhyate // 12.32.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

rājann ihāsya mantrādhirājasya kṛtasaṃvidheḥ / praṇāmam aṅgair aṣṭābhir nipatya kuru bhūtale // 12.32.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)

nāhaṃ jānāmi tat pūrvaṃ pradarśayatu me bhavān / tatas tathaiva tad ahaṃ kariṣye bhagavann iti // 12.32.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)

yaḥ ślokamātram apy asyāḥ kathayiṣyati sādaraḥ / yo vā śroṣyati tau sadyo muktapāpau bhaviṣyataḥ // 12.32.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yakṣavetālakūṣmāṇḍaḍākinīrākṣasādayaḥ / na tatra prabhaviṣyanti yatraiṣā kīrtayiṣyate // 12.32.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

sādhu vatsa hato 'dyāyaṃ yat tvayā kūṭatāpasaḥ / vidyādharamahācakravartitāhaṭhakāmukaḥ // 12.32.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

ataḥ sadvīpapātālāṃ sthāpayitvā mahīṃ vaśe / vidyādharāṇam acirād adhirājo bhaviṣyasi // 12.32.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
bhuktvā divyāṃś ciraṃ bhogān udvignaḥ svecchayaiva tān / tyaktvā mamaiva sāyujyam ante yāsyasy asaṃśayam // 12.32.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aparājitanāmānaṃ khaḍgaṃ caitaṃ gṛhāṇa me / yasya prasādāt sarvaṃ tvaṃ prāpsyasy etad yathoditam // 12.32.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)

atha dṛṣṭvaiva samāptaṃ kāryam aśeṣaṃ niśi prabhātāyām / praviveśa sa trivikramasenaḥ svapuraṃ nṛpaḥ pratiṣṭhānam // 12.32.39	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
tatra kramāvagatarātriviceṣṭitābhir abhyarcitaḥ prakṛtibhir vitatotsavābhiḥ / snānapradānagiriśārcananṛttagītavādyādibhis tad akhilaṃ sa dinaṃ nināya // 12.32.40	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
alpair eva ca vāsaraiḥ sa nṛpatiḥ śārvasya vīryād aseḥ sadvīpāṃ sarasā talāṃ ca bubhuje niḥkaṇṭakāṃ medinīm / saṃprāpyātha harājñayā sumahatīṃ vidyādharādhīśatāṃ bhuktvā tāṃ suciraṃ jagāma bhagavatsāyujyam ante kṛtī // 12.32.41	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]

evaṃ deva sa vṛddho vipro vetālapañcaviṃśatikām / etāmākhyāya kathāṃ grāme tasminnuvāca māṃ bhūyaḥ // 12.32.43	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
tatputra sa trivikramaseno rājā kilaivamaklībaḥ / vetālānugrahataḥ kim iva na yatprāptavāniṣṭam // 12.32.44	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)

nahyaprāpyaṃ kiṃcid utsāhabhājāṃ bhagnotsāho vatsa ko nāvasīdet / tat te prītyā vacmi yat tat kuruṣva tvaṃ me bandhuḥ sarpadaṃśārtihartā // 12.32.46	śālinī [11: mttgg]
ity uktavatas tasmād viprād ādāya sakriyaṃ mantram / taṃ cāmantrya tato 'haṃ devojjayinīṃ gato 'bhūvam // 12.32.47	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)

athābravīn māṃ sa sakhe dṛḍhena sattvena tuṣṭo 'smyamunādhunā te / tatpūrvavadvīra bhavākṣatāṅgo vṛṇīṣva matto varamīpsitaṃ cā // 12.32.51	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
ity uktavantaṃ tam ahaṃ tadaiva pratyabravaṃ māṃ naya deva tatra / yatra prabhurme sa mṛgāṅgadatto nātaḥ paro 'nyo 'bhimato varo me // 12.32.52	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
etat sa vetālapatir niśamya mām abhyadhāttarhi mamāṃsapṛṣṭham / āroha yāvattarasā bhavantaṃ tasyāntikaṃ svasya vibhornayābhi // 12.32.53	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
ity eva tasyoktavatas tatheti skandhāgramārohamahaṃ prasahya / tatovahanmāṃ sa nabhaḥpathena prātiṣṭhata pretatanupraviṣṭaḥ // 12.32.54	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
ānīya cehādya vilokya yuṣmān mārge 'vatāryāmbarataś ca tena / etena vetālavareṇa deva saṃprāpito 'haṃ tava pādamūlam // 12.32.55	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]

iti vikramakesariṇo nijasacivāc chrutaviyogavṛttāntaḥ / mārge mṛgāṅkadatto gacchan kāntānimittam ujjayinīm // 12.32.57	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
pārāvatākhyaśāpabhraṣṭakramamilitakatipayāmātyaḥ / mumude sa rājaputraḥ saṃbhāvitasakalasādhyasaṃpattiḥ // 12.32.58	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)

kṣīṇe 'hni cābdhau patite sūrye jyotirbhir ambare / tatpātocchalitair ambhaḥśīkarair iva pūrite // 12.34.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadvair āgyādiva prācīśailaśṛṅgatapovanam / saṃvītacandrikādhautavalkale śaśini śrite // 12.34.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekasthānopaviṣṭānāṃ kṛtāśeṣasvakarmaṇām / munīnāmāśrame tatra darśanāya gatā vayam // 12.34.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praṇipatyopaviṣṭāś ca kṛtātithyaiḥ priyaṃvadaiḥ / kuto yūyamiti kṣiprātpṛṣṭāḥ smastair maharṣibhiḥ // 12.34.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato munikumāreṇa tena tebhyo niveditaḥ / tadāśramapraveśānto vṛttānto 'smannibandhanaḥ // 12.34.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athāsmān atra kaṇvākhyo jñānī munir abhāṣata / kimevaṃ vīrapuruṣā api klaibyaṃ gatāḥ stha bhoḥ // 12.34.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
āpadyabhagnadhair yatvaṃ saṃpadyanabhimānitā / yadutsāhasya cātyāgastaddhi satpuruṣavratam // 12.34.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mahāntaś ca mahānty eva kṛcchrāṇy uttīrya dhairyataḥ / mahato 'rthānsamāsādya mahacchabdamavāpnuvan // 12.34.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iyaṃ sundarasenasya tathā ca śrūyatāṃ kathā / yathā mandāravatyarthe kleśastenānvabhūyata // 12.34.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā sa muniḥ kaṇvaḥ sarveṣv atra maharṣiṣu / asmāsu copaśṛṇvatsu kathāmetāmavarṇayat // 12.34.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
astyalaṃkṛtakauberīdiṅmukho niṣadhābhidhaḥ / deśastatrālakā nāma babhūva nagarīṃ purā // 12.34.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yasyāṃ sadaiva sarvārthasamṛddhisukhito janaḥ / kevalaṃ ratnadīpānāmāsīcchaśvadanirvṛtiḥ // 12.34.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāmanvarthanāmābhūnmahāseno mahīpatiḥ / śarajanmādbhutāpyugragratāpapluṣṭaśātravaḥ // 12.34.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya rājño mahāmantrī guṇapālita ityabhūt / śauryālayo mahībhāravoḍhā śeṣa ivāparaḥ // 12.34.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasminnyastabharasyāsya sukhinaḥ kṣapitadviṣaḥ / devyāṃ śaśiprabhākhyāyāmutpede nṛpateḥ sutaḥ // 12.34.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nāmnā sundaraseno yaḥ śiśurevāśiśurguṇaiḥ / śauryasaundaryalakṣmībhyāṃ svayaṃvarapatirvṛtaḥ // 12.34.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya rājasutasyātra śūrāstulyavayoguṇāḥ / ā bālyātsaha saṃvṛddhā babhūvuḥ pañca masntriṇaḥ // 12.34.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
caṇḍaprabho bhīmabhujas tathā vyāghraparākramaḥ / vīro vikramaśaktiś ca dṛḍhabuddhiś ca pañcamaḥ // 12.34.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
te ca sarve mahāsattvā balabuddhisamanvitāḥ / kulīnāḥ svāmibhaktāś ca rutajñā api pakṣiṇām // 12.34.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taiḥ samaṃ sa uvāsātra rājaputraḥ pitur gṛhe / anurūpāṃ vinā bhāryāṃ taruṇo 'py aparigrahaḥ // 12.34.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anamrākramaṇaṃ śauryaṃ dhanaṃ nijabhujārjitam / bhāryā rūpānurūpā ca puruṣasyeha pūjyate // 12.34.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyathā tu kimetena trayeṇāpītyacintayat / sa ca sundaraseno 'tha vīrastaiḥ sacivaiḥ saha // 12.34.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā cānvitaḥ sainyair vayasyaistaiś ca pañcabhiḥ / niryayau mṛgayāhetornagaryāḥ sa nṛpātmajaḥ // 12.34.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
niryātaṃ ca dadarśaitaṃ dūradeśāntarāgatā / kāpi kātyāyanī nāma prauḍhā pravrājikottamā // 12.34.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arohiṇīkaś candro 'yaṃ kiṃ vāpyaratikaḥ smaraḥ / iti cāmānuṣaṃ vīkṣya tadrūpaṃ sā vyacintayat // 12.34.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
buddhvā ca rājaputraṃ taṃ pṛṣṭāttatparivārataḥ / dhātuḥ sā sargavaicitryaṃ praśaṃsantī visismiye // 12.34.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athārāttāradīrgheṇa rājaputraṃ svareṇa tam / kumāra vijayasveti vadantī praṇanāma sā // 12.34.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi sundarasenastadanākarṇyaiva tatkṣaṇam / yayau svasacivārabdhakathāvyagreṇa cetasā // 12.34.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athoccaiḥ śrāvayantī taṃ sā kruddhovāca tāpasī / na śṛṇoṣyāśiṣaṃ kasmādrājaputra mamāpyaho // 12.34.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kasyāhaṃ nārcitā pṛthvyāṃ rājño rājasutasya vā / evam eva ca darpo 'yaṃ yadi te yauvanādibhiḥ // 12.34.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tanmandāravatīṃ kanyāṃ haṃsadvīpeśvarātmajām / jagallalāmabhūtāṃ ca bhāryātvena tvamāpsyasi // 12.34.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato manye mahendrāderapi śroṣyasi na dhruvam / madāvalepādvacanaṃ ke varākāstu mānuṣāḥ // 12.34.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
evam uktavatīṃ śrutvā tāmāhūya sakautukaḥ / prahvaḥ sundaraseno 'sau kṣamayām āsa tāpasīm // 12.34.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prajighāya ca bhṛtyānāṃ has te viśramaṇāya saḥ / gṛhaṃ vikramaśaktestāṃ praṣṭukāmaḥ svamantriṇaḥ // 12.34.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato gatvā kṛtākheṭaḥ pratyāgatya kṛtāhnikaḥ / tāmānāyya sa papraccha kumāro bhuktabhojanām // 12.34.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhagavatyucyatāṃ kaiṣā tvayādya parikīrtitā / kanyā mandāravatyākhyā paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi naḥ // 12.34.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā tāpasī sā tam uvāca śṛṇu vacmyadaḥ / tīrthādihetoḥ sadvīpāṃ bhramāmi pṛthivīmimām // 12.34.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
bhramantī prāptavatyasmi haṃsadvīpaṃ prasaṅgataḥ / tatra mandāradevasya rājño dṛṣṭā mayā sutā // 12.34.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
devaputropabhogārhā dṛśyā nāpuṇyakarmabhiḥ / yā mandāravatītyākhyāṃ dhatte śrīriva nāndanī // 12.34.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bibhratī hāriṇīṃ mūrtiṃ darśanoddīpitasmarā / dhātrā sudhāmayī sṛṣṭā yā cānyevaindavī tanuḥ // 12.34.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyā rūpeṇa sadṛśo nāstyevānyatra bhūtale / jāne 'nuharati tveko bhavāṃstadrūpasaṃpadam // 12.34.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
yaiḥ sā na dṛṣṭā viphale teṣāṃ netre ca janma ca / iti śrutvā ca tāpasyā mukhādrājasuto 'bravīt // 12.34.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāstattādṛśaṃ rūpaṃ paśyāmo 'mba vayaṃ katham / etattadvacanaṃ śrutvā sāpi pravrājikābhyadhāt // 12.34.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ citrapaṭe tāṃ ca tatkālalikhitāṃ rasāt / vahe valgulikāntaḥsthāṃ kautukaṃ yadi dṛśyatām // 12.34.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktavatī tasmai tuṣṭāya nṛpasūnave / kṛṣṭvā valgulikātaḥ sā citrasthāṃ tāmadarśayat // 12.34.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi sundarasenas tāṃ kanyāṃ citragatāmapi / vicitrarūpām ānandaniḥspandaṃ pravilokayan // 12.34.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
romāñcakaṇṭakacitair aṅgair āste sma tatkṣaṇam / kīlitaḥ puṣpacāpasya bāṇair iva nirantaraiḥ // 12.34.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
śanair aśṛṇvannavadannapaśyaṃścaiva kiṃcana / tanmayībhūya citrastha iva so 'py abhavacciram // 12.34.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
taddṛṣṭvā mantriṇas tasya jagadustāṃ tapasvinīm / ārye sundarasenaṃ tvaṃ devamatra paṭe likha // 12.34.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sadṛśālekhyavijñānaṃ tāvadvīkṣāmahe tava / tac chrutvaiva lilekhaitaṃ kumāraṃ sā kṣaṇātpaṭe // 12.34.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ cātisadṛśaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve 'py atraivamabruvan / nāstyālekhyavisaṃvādo bhagavatyā manāgiti // 12.34.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayaṃ kumāra eveti citre 'smiñjāyate hi dhīḥ / tanmandāravatīdevīrūpaṃ nātra visaṃvadet // 12.34.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavatsu saciveṣvāttacitrapaṭadvayaḥ / prītaḥ sundarasenas tāṃ pūjayām āsa tāpasīm // 12.34.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

kiṃ mukhaṃ kimu kāntyāsyāḥ kṣālitāṅkamalaḥ śaśī / rājyābhiṣekakalaśau smarasyaitāvuta stanau // 12.34.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)

iti citragatāṃ tatra pratyaṅgaṃ tā vibhāvayan / sa mandāravatīṃ tasthau nipatya śayanīyake // 12.34.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathaiva cānvahaṃ tiṣṭhannāhārādiparāṅmukhaḥ / smarajvarabharākrāntaḥ so 'lpair evābhavaddinaiḥ // 12.34.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadbuddhvāgatya pitarau tasya papracchatuḥ sakhīn / śaśiprabhāmahāsenau svair amasvāsthyakāraṇam // 12.34.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadvayasyāś ca te tābhyāṃ tathā sarvaṃ tadabruvan / yathātra hetutāṃ prāptā haṃsadvīpanṛpātmajā // 12.34.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sundarasenaṃ taṃ mahāseno jagāda saḥ / putra kiṃ gūhyate sthāne khalvabhiṣvaṅga eṣa te // 12.34.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kanyāratnaṃ hi mandāravatī yogyā tavaiva sā / mittraṃ mandāradevaś ca paramaṃ tatpitā mama // 12.34.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taddūtasādhye yukte ca kasminnarthe kadarthanā / evaṃ tamuktvā saṃmantrya kanyāṃ tāṃ tasya yācitum // 12.34.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
rājño mandāradevasya haṃsadvīpaṃ visṛṣṭavān / dūtaṃ suratadevākhyaṃ sa mahāsenabhūpatiḥ // 12.34.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dadau sundarasenaṃ taṃ tāpasyā likhitaṃ tayā / has te citrapaṭe tasya rūpotkarṣaprakāśakam // 12.34.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa dūtaścaturaṃ gatvā prāpyāmbudhitaṭe puram / mahendrādityanṛpateḥ śaśāṅkapurasaṃjñakam // 12.34.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tataḥ pravahaṇārūḍho haṃsadvīpamavāpa tat / dinair mandāradevasya nṛpates tasya mandiram // 12.34.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dvāḥsthair āveditas tatra praviśyāntarvilokya saḥ / yathāvṛttaṃ nṛpaṃ dūto dattakośaliko 'bhyadhāt // 12.34.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃdiṣṭaṃ te mahārāja mahāsenena bhūbhujā / dehi sundarasenāya matputrāya nijāṃ sutām // 12.34.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
paṭe ca likhitā sā hi kātyāyanyabhidhānayā / tāpasyā kanyakāratnamityānīyeha darśitā // 12.34.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rūpānurūpyāc cāsmābhir jātecchair likhitaṃ paṭe / rūpaṃ sundarasenasyāpyatra prahitamīkṣyatām // 12.34.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
eṣa cāsadṛśo rūpe bhāryāṃ svasadṛśīṃ vinā / necchatyudvāhamekā ca tvatsutāsyānukāriṇī // 12.34.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti saṃdiśya has te me paṭo rājñāyamarpitaḥ / dṛśyatāṃ yujyatāṃ devamadhunā mādhavī latā // 12.34.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etaddūtavacaḥ śrutvā harṣādānāyayannṛpaḥ / suptāṃ sa mandāravatīṃ devīṃ tasyāś ca mātaram // 12.34.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)

jagāda cāmunā rājaputreṇa yadi yujyate / tadasyā rūpanirmāṇaṃ sutāyāḥ saphalaṃ mama // 12.34.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tasthau citrapaṭanyastaṅiścalotphullalocanā / adhiṣṭhiteva supteva vinidrā likhiteva ca // 12.34.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

anyedyuḥ prāhiṇottaṃ ca pratidūtaṃ ca sa svakam / vipraṃ kumāradattākhyaṃ mahāsenanṛpaṃ prati // 12.34.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jagāda cobhāvapi tau gatvā tamalakeśvaram / mama vākyānmahāsenaṃ rājānaṃ vadataṃ drutam // 12.34.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sauhārdena mayā tāvatkanyā dattā tad ucyatām / tvatputraḥ kimihāyātu kiṃ kanyātra prahīyatām // 12.34.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti rājñoktasaṃdeśau tataḥ pravahaṇena tau / saha prayayaturdūtāvabdhimārgeṇa satvaram // 12.34.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śaśāṅkapuramāsādya tataḥ sthalapathena tau / prāpatustāṃ purīmṛddhāmalakāmalakāmiva // 12.34.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upetya rājasadmātha praviśya ca yathocitam / kṛtādaraṃ mahāsenaṃ rājānaṃ tāvapaśyatām // 12.34.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ ca mandāradevoktaṃ pratisaṃdeśamūcatuḥ / rājñe tasmai sa ca śrutvā tuṣṭastau dvāvapūjayat // 12.34.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pṛṣṭvā ca kanyājanmarkṣaṃ tasmāt tatpitṛdūtataḥ / lagnaṃ vivāhe papraccha sūnoḥ sa gaṇakānnṛpaḥ // 12.34.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
te ca māsatraye śuklapañcamyāṃ māsi kārtike / lagnaṃ tasmai vadanti sma śubhaṃ vadhvā varasya ca // 12.34.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmiṃllagne vivāhaṃ ca sūnoś ca preṣaṇaṃ tadā / tasmai mandāradevāya saṃdideśālakāpatiḥ // 12.34.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
haste kumāradattasya taddūtasyāparasya ca / candrasvāmyabhidhānasya svasya lekhe 'bhilikhya saḥ // 12.34.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tau ca dūtau tato gatvā lekhaṃ dattvā tathaiva ca / haṃsadvīpeśvarasyāgre tasya sarvaṃ śaśaṃsatuḥ // 12.34.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi rājā tathety uktvā candrasvāminamarcitam / vyasṛjyattaṃ mahāsenadūtaṃ svasvāmino 'ntikam // 12.34.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

dadarśa tac ca nānāsthikapālaśakalākulam / dhṛtamānuṣakaṅkālakarālaṃ vīrasevitam // 12.35.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bahubhūtagaṇākīrṇamākrīḍaḍḍākinīpriyam / mahābhairava māsannacitādhūmamalīmasam // 12.35.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

girīndraśikharākāraiḥ prākāraiḥ pariveṣṭitām / duṣpraveśāmavijñātair hastyaśvarathasaṃkulām // 12.35.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vilokya tādṛśīṃ tāṃ ca sarvato 'py atidurgamām / mṛgāṅkadatto vimanāḥ sacivānsvānuvāca saḥ // 12.35.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
kaṣṭaṃ kleṃśaśatair evamabhavyasyāgatasya me / praveśa eva nāstīha priyāprāptau tu kā gatiḥ // 12.35.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā te 'py avocaṃstaṃ kimeṣā pratibhāti te / asmākamiyatāṃ deva balasādhyā mahāpurī // 12.35.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upāyo 'tra vicetavyaḥ sa cāvaśyaṃ bhaviṣyati / daivatair bahuśo hyetadādiṣṭaṃ vismṛtaṃ katham // 12.35.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktaḥ sacivais tasyā nagaryā bahir eva saḥ / mṛgāṅkadatto divasān kāṃścit tasthau paribhraman // 12.35.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
