madarthaṃ bata rājāno rājaputrā dine dine / vīrāste te ca hanyante samityubhayasainyayoḥ // 12.36.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca rājasuto devyā svapne hy ambikayānayā / ādiṣṭaḥ pūrvabhartā me madarthaprārthitāhavaḥ // 12.36.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hṛdayaṃ ca yam ācchidya dattvā śaraparamparām / siddhalakṣeṇa kāmena nītvā tasmai samarpitam // 12.36.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tātastu mandapuṇyāṃ māṃ naiva tasmai pradāsyati / pūrvavair āc ca darpāc ca lekhādityadya hi śrutam // 12.36.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vāme vidhau ca kaḥ svapnadevatādeśaniścayaḥ / priyaprāptau ca paśyāmi na kāṃcitsarvathā diśam // 12.36.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadyāvannāhitaṃ kiṃcittasya tātasya vā raṇe / śṛṇomi tāvadātmānaṃ hatāśaṃ na tyajāmi kim // 12.36.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity utthāya puro gatvā gauryāḥ sāśokapādape / pāśaṃ viracayām āsa svottarīyeṇa duḥkhitā // 12.36.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvanmṛgāṅkadatto 'pi savayasyaḥ praviśya tam / udyānaṃ tarubaddhāśvo gauryāgārāśramaṃ gataḥ // 12.36.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tatsacivenārādrājaputrīṃ vilokya tām / mṛgāṅkadatto jagade svairaṃ vimalabuddhinā // 12.36.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
deva paśyātra kāpyeṣā pāśena varakanyakā / udyatā hantumātmānaṃ tatkā nāma bhavediyam // 12.36.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvaiva vilokyaitāṃ rājasūnur uvāca saḥ / aho keyaṃ ratiḥ kiṃsvidrūpiṇī kimu nirvṛtiḥ // 12.36.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sākārā kāntirindorvā manmathājñāya jaṅgamā / kiṃ vāmarāṅganā maivamasyāḥ pāśodyamaḥ katham // 12.36.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tattāvadiha tiṣṭhāmaḥ pādapantaritāḥ kṣaṇam / yāvajjānīmahe keyamiti vyaktaṃ kathaṃcana // 12.36.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā savayasyo 'tra yāvac channaḥ sa tiṣṭhati / sā śaśāṅkavatī tāvadvignā devīṃ vyajijñapat // 12.36.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asmiñjanmani ceddevi na sa rājasutaḥ patiḥ / devo mṛgāṅkadatto me niṣpannaḥ pūrvaduṣkṛtaiḥ // 12.36.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvatprasādena tadbhūyādanyasminnapi janmani / sa bhartā gauri bhagavatyāpannārtihare mama // 12.36.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
iti vijñapya devīṃ sā rājaputrī praṇamya ca / kaṇṭhe samarpayām āsa pāśaṃ bāṣpārdralocanā // 12.36.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkṣaṇaṃ ca prabuddhyaiva tadadarśanavihvalāḥ / cinvantyaḥ sahasā tasyāḥ sakhyo 'ntikam upāyayuḥ // 12.36.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hā hā kim idamārabdhaṃ sakhi dhiksāhasaṃ tvayā / ity uktvaiva ca tāstasyāḥ pāśaṃ kaṇṭhādapāharan // 12.36.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha hrītaviṣaṇṇā sā yāvadbālātra tiṣṭhati / udabhūdbhāratī tāvadgaurīgarbhagṛhāntarāt // 12.36.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mā viṣādaṃ kṛthāḥ putri śaśāṅkavati naiva tat / vaco mṛṣā me yatsvapne tavoktaṃ subhage mayā // 12.36.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
so 'yaṃ mṛgāṅkadatto hi pūrvabhartā tavāntike / prāpta eva vrajānena saha bhuṅkṣvākhilāṃ bhuvam // 12.36.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutvaitāṃ sahasā vāṇīṃ sā śaśāṅkavatī śanaiḥ / yāvadvilokayatyatra pārśve kiṃcitsasādhvasā // 12.36.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvanmṛgāṅkadattasya mantrī vikramakesarī / tam upāgamya vakti sma darśayannagrapāṇinā // 12.36.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
devi satyaṃ bhavānyā te samādiṣṭamayaṃ hi saḥ / rājaputraḥ patiḥ premapāśākṛṣṭastavāgrataḥ // 12.36.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tacchrtuvā sā tatastiryaṅnyastadṛṣṭirdadarśa tam / kāntaṃ tejasvinaṃ madhyavartinaṃ sahacāriṇām // 12.36.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
grahaiḥ parivṛtaṃ candramavatīrṇamivāmbarāt / rūpopamānām anyeṣām amṛtasyandanaṃ dṛśoḥ // 12.36.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tataḥ patadanaṅgeṣupuṅkhapakṣmacitair iva / aṅgaiḥ kaṇṭakitair yāvadāste sā stambhaniścalā // 12.36.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvan mṛgāṅkadattas tām upetya tyājayan hriyam / sa kālocitam āha sma girā premamadhuś cyutā // 12.36.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tyājayitvā nijaṃ deśaṃ rājyaṃ bandhūṃś ca dūrataḥ / dāsīkṛtyāhamānīto guṇair baddhvā natāṅgi te // 12.36.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tanmayāraṇyavāsasya vasudhāśayanasya ca / phalāhārasya tīvrārkatāpasaṃsevanasya ca // 12.36.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tapaḥkaṣṭasya tanvaṅgi saṃprāptaṃ phalamīdṛśam / yaddṛṣṭā netrapīyūṣavṛṭireṣā tanustava // 12.36.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yadi snehānurodhaś ca mayi te hariṇākṣi tat / asmatpurīpuraṃdhrīṇāṃ prayaccha nayanotsavam // 12.36.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṅgrāmaḥ śāmyatu śreyo bhavatūbhayapakṣayoḥ / kṛtārthaṃ jāyatāṃ janma saha gurvāśiṣā mama // 12.36.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ mṛgāṅkadattena sā śaśāṅkavatī tadā / uktā jagāda vasudhāvinyastanayanā śanaiḥ // 12.36.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ayaṃ tāvadguṇakrīto janaḥ svādhīna eva te / tadāryaputra kuśalaṃ yadavaiṣi kuruṣva tat // 12.36.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
iti vāksudhayā tasyāḥ kṛtī nirvāpito 'tha saḥ / mṛgāṅkadatto devīṃ tāṃ gaurīṃ stutvā praṇamya ca // 12.36.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
āropya rājaputrīṃ ca tāṃ turaṃge svapṛṣṭhataḥ / tatsakhībhiḥ samārūḍhapaścād bhāgāśvapṛṣṭhagaiḥ // 12.36.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
daśabhiḥ sahito vīraiḥ sacivaiḥ śastrapāṇibhiḥ / uccacāla tato rātrau rājaputro dhṛtāyudhaḥ // 12.36.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
te caikādaśa dṛṣṭvāpi tatra roddhuṃ na śekire / nagarīrakṣibhiḥ kruddhā rudrā eva durāsadāḥ // 12.36.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vinirgatyojjayinyāś ca jagmur māyābaṭor gṛham / saśaśāṅkavatīkāste yathā śrutadhinoditam // 12.36.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ka ete kva prayātāścetyudbhrānteṣv atra rakṣiṣu / sā cojjayinyāṃ bubudhe kramādrājasutā hṛtā // 12.36.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
taccākhyātuṃ mahādevī karmasenāya bhūbhṛte / satvaraṃ nagarādhyakṣaṃ prāhiṇotkaṭakaṃ prati // 12.36.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atrāntare ca kaṭake tatra rātrāvupetya tam / cārādhikārī rājānaṃ karmasenaṃ vyajijñapat // 12.36.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
deva pradoṣa egvādya guptaṃ nirgatya sainyataḥ / mṛgāṅkadattaḥ sāmātyo hayair ujjayinīṃ gataḥ // 12.36.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tāṃ śaśāṅkavatīṃ hartuṃ gauryāyatanavartinīm / iti samyaṅ mayā jñātaṃ prabhur jānāty ataḥ param // 12.36.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityākarṇya samāhūya karmasenaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ / rahaḥ svasenāpataye yathāśrutamavarṇayat // 12.36.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
jagāda ca varāśvānāṃ sahitaḥ pañcabhiḥ śataiḥ / śūrādhirūḍhaiḥ pracchannaṃ drutamujjayinīṃ braja // 12.36.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
mṛgāṅkadattaṃ jahi taṃ pāpaṃ prāpya badhāna vā / viddhi māmāgataṃ paścātpṛṣṭhasthāpitasainikam // 12.36.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktastena rājñā sa yathādiṣṭabalānvitaḥ / prāyātsenāpatī rātrau tathetyujjayinīṃ prati // 12.36.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mārge tan nagarādhyakṣānmilitādaśṛṇoc ca saḥ / rājaputrīṃ hṛtāṃ vīrair yathānyair eva kaiścana // 12.36.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sanagarādhyakṣaḥ pratyāgatya tathaiva tat / karmasenaṃ sa rājānaṃ yathāvṛttamabodhayat // 12.36.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tadbuddhvā vicintyaiva tadaśakyaṃ tato nṛpaḥ / avaskandanivṛttastāṃ tūṣṇīmevānayanniśām // 12.36.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mṛgāṅkadattasainye 'pi māyābaṭumukhā nṛpāḥ / ninyus tathaiva tāṃ rātriṃ saṃnaddhāḥ śrutadhergirā // 12.36.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātaścānviṣṭhavṛttāntaḥ karmasenanṛpaḥ sudhīḥ / mṛgāṅkadattakaṭake rājñāṃ dūtaṃ visṛṣṭavān // 12.36.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
mṛgāṅkadattena hṛtā sutā tāvac chalena me / tadastu ko 'paro hy asyāstādṛśaḥ sadṛśaḥ patiḥ // 12.36.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadidānīṃ sa yuṣmābhiḥ samamāyātu madgṛham / karomi yāvadudvāhaṃ tanayāyā yathāvidhi // 12.36.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ sa saṃdideśāsya mukhe dūtasya bhūpatiḥ / tac ca te saśrutadhayo rājānaḥ śraddadhustadā // 12.36.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ūcuś ca dūtaṃ svapurīṃ tarhi yātveṣa vaḥ prabhuḥ / yāvattamānayāmo tra gatvā rājasutaṃ vayam // 12.36.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvaiva tathā tena gatvā dūtena varṇite / sa karmasenaḥ sabalas tathetyujjayinīmagāt // 12.36.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
taddṛṣṭvā te 'pi rājāno māyābaṭupuraḥsarāḥ / mṛgāṅkadattaṃ prati taṃ celuḥ śrutadhinā saha // 12.36.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tāvanmṛgāṅkadatto 'pi sa śaśāṅkavatīyutaḥ / māyābaṭugṛhaṃ prāpa tatkāñcanapuraṃ puram // 12.36.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra so 'ntaḥ purais tasya yathārhakṛtasatkriyaḥ / savayasyo viśaśrāma siddhakāryaḥ priyāsakhaḥ // 12.36.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyedyuḥ saśrutadhayo nṛpāste 'tra sam āyayuḥ / sa kirātapatirbīraḥ sasainyaḥ śaktirakṣitaḥ // 12.36.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
śabarādhipatiḥ so 'pi rājā māyābaṭurbalī / śūro durgapiśācaś ca sa mātaṅgacamūpatiḥ // 12.36.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sarve śaśāṅkavatyā te yuktaṃ rātry eva kairavam / mṛgāṅkadattaṃ dṛṣṭvā tam abhyanandan kṛtotsavāḥ // 12.36.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
yathārhakṛtamānāya tasmai taṃ ca nyavedayan / saṃdeśaṃ karmasenīyaṃ praveśaṃ ca nije gṛhe // 12.36.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃniveśyātha kaṭakaṃ calannagarasaṃnibham / mṛgāṅkadatto mantrāya samaṃ sarvair upāviśat // 12.36.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
vivāhāyojjayinyaṃ kiṃ gantavyamuta no mayā / ucyatāmiti papraccha nṛpatīnsacivāṃś ca saḥ // 12.36.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
duṣṭaḥ sa rājā tadgehagamane kuśalaṃ kutaḥ / kāryaṃ ca tatra nāstyeva prāptaiva hi tadātmajā // 12.36.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityaikamatyena nṛpāḥ sacivāścābruvanyadā / tadā mṛgāṅkadattastamapṛcchacchrutadhiṃ dvijam // 12.36.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
udāsīna iva brahmaṃstūṣṇīmevaṃ sthito 'si kim / kimetadevābhimataṃ tavāpyuta na vā vada // 12.36.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tataḥ śrutadhirāha sma yadi śroṣyasi vacmi tat / gantavyaṃ karmasenasya gṛheṣviti matirmama // 12.36.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśāṭhyena hi saṃdiṣṭametattenānyathā katham / sutāpahāre sa balī yuddhaṃ tyaktvā gṛhaṃ vrajet // 12.36.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
sabalasya ca kiṃ kuryātprāptasyāpi gṛhaṃ sa te / prītistu tatra yātasya bhavettena samaṃ tava // 12.36.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sahāyo 'gre sa ca syānnaḥ snehena duhituḥ punaḥ / necchatyavidhinodvāhaṃ tenaivaṃ vakti tattvataḥ // 12.36.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadyuktaṃ gamanaṃ tatrety ukte śrutadhinā tadā / sādhu sādhviti tatrocuḥ sarve śraddhāya tadvacaḥ // 12.36.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato mṛgāṅkadattastānavocatsarvamastvadaḥ / kiṃ tu tātaṃ vināmbāṃ ca vivāho me na rocate // 12.36.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadambātātayoḥ kaścid āhvānāya vrajatv itaḥ / buddhvā ca tadabhiprāyaṃ kariṣyāmo yathocitam // 12.36.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityūcivān sa saṃmantrya pitroḥ pārśvaṃ svamantriṇam / tatrastha eva vyasṛjadvīro bhīmaparākramam // 12.36.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tāvac ca tatrāyodhyāyāṃ puri rājā sa tatpitā / kālenāmaradattastajjñātavāṃs tasya lokataḥ // 12.36.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
mṛgāṅkadattasya kṛtaṃ deśanirvāsanapradam / vinītamatinā mithyā rājaputrasya paiśunam // 12.36.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ kumantriṇaṃ kopāttaṃ nihatya sa sānvayam / putranirvāsanodagraduḥkhakaṣṭāmagāddaśām // 12.36.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nirgatya ca purībāhye tasthāvāyatane hareḥ / rājā sa nandigrāmākhye carandāraiḥ samaṃ tapaḥ // 12.36.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatra sthite cirāttasminsa cārāveditāgamaḥ / ayodhyāṃ prāpa vātāśvavegādbhīmaparākramaḥ // 12.36.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tāmapaśyadudvignāṃ gatarājasutāṃ purīm / rāmapravāsavaidhuryakaṭaṃ punarivāgatām // 12.36.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājaputrasya pṛcchadbhir vārtāṃ paurair vṛto 'tha saḥ / tanmukhāc chrutavṛttānto nandigrāmaṃ tato yayau // 12.36.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrābhīṣṭasutodantasotsukaṃ mahiṣīyutam / dadarśāmaradattaṃ taṃ tapaḥkṣāmatanuṃ nṛpam // 12.36.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tam etya pādapatitaḥ kṛtakaṇṭhagrahaṃ nṛpam / pṛṣṭodantam avocat sa sāsraṃ bhīmaparākramaḥ // 12.36.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāptā mṛgāṅkadattena sūnunā te svavīryataḥ / sā śaśāṅkavatī deva karmasenanṛpātmajā // 12.36.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadvivāhaś ca devena vinā devyā ca sarvathā / na tasya pitṛbhaktasya śobhanaḥ pratibhāsate // 12.36.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

ity uktvopāttamadirāvatīveṣaḥ suhṛtsa me / nirgatyaiva tataḥ prāyānnaktaṃ tadanugair vṛtaḥ // 13.1.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ ca madirāvatyānargharatnasrajā samam / dvāreṇānyena niṣkramya rātryā yāto 'smi yojanam // 13.1.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātarnirvartitāhāraḥ kramādgacchandinair aham / prāpto 'calapuraṃ nāma nagaraṃ dayitāsakhaḥ // 13.1.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mittrībhūya gṛhe datte tatraikena dvijanmanā / pariṇītā mayā sātra sattvaraṃ madirāvatī // 13.1.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'tra vasataḥ siddhayatheṣṭasukhitasya me / kiṃ syānmitrasya me vṛttaṃ tasyetyeṣābhavadvyathā // 13.1.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadanantaram eṣo 'dya dṛṣṭo 'kāraṇabāndhavaḥ / mayeha gaṅgāsnānārtham āgatenottarāyaṇe // 13.1.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ciraṃ caitaṃ savailakṣyamivāśliṣyopaviśya ca / yāvat pṛcchāmi vṛttāntaṃ tāvaddeva ihāgataḥ // 13.1.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tametamaparaṃ viddhi prāṇadārapradaṃ mama / kṛcchraikamittraṃ pārśvasthaṃ vipraṃ vatseśanandana // 13.1.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)

idaṃ gurugirīndrajāpraṇayamandarāndolanāt purā kila kathāmṛtaṃ haramukhāmbudher udgatam / prasahya rasayanti ye vigatavighnalabdharddhayo dhuraṃ dadhati vaibudhīṃ bhuvi bhavaprasādena te // 14.0.1	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]

kaliṅgasenā sadyaś ca vihīnā sutayā tayā / vidyādharīva vibhraṣṭavidyā saṃmūḍhatāṃ yayau // 14.1.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

harmyāgre tāṃ tadā kanyāṃ satīṃ madanamañcukām / dṛṣṭvāvatīrya nabhasaḥ sadyo vidyādharo yuvā // 14.1.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
yo 'sau mānasavegākhyo nāmoktvā samayācata / kaliṅgasenām abhyetya dehyetāṃ me sutāmiti // 14.1.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tenaitayā niṣiddhena satā gatvā yathāgatam / idānīṃ guptamāgatya hṛtā sā kiṃ na māyayā // 14.1.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
paradāragṛhaṃ naiva divyā yady api kurvate / tathāpyamārgaṃ mārgaṃ vā rāgāndhaḥ ko hi paśyati // 14.1.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
śrutvaitaccittamākopavimarśavirahotplutam / naravāhanadattasya jajñe vīciṣvivāmbujam // 14.1.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rumaṇvānatha vakti sma purīyaṃ rakṣyate 'bhitaḥ / praveśanirgamau neha vidyete gamanaṃ vinā // 14.1.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
haraprasādāc cāsty asyā nāniṣṭaṃ tad iha sthitā / kva citpraṇayakopātsā tathā ca śrūyatāṃ kathā // 14.1.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
muniḥ purāṅgirā nāma vivāhārthamayācata / aṣṭāvaktrasya tanayāṃ sāvitrīṃ nāma kanyakām // 14.1.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
aṣṭāvakro na tāṃ tasmai dadāvaṅgirase sutām / saguṇāyāpi sāvitrīmanyasmai pūrvakalpitām // 14.1.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tadbhrātṛtanayamaśrutāṃ nāma so 'ṅgirāḥ / upayeme tayā sākaṃ sa tasthau bhāryayā sukham // 14.1.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā ca bhāryāsya vetti sma sāvitrīṃ pūvavāñchitām / ekadā so 'ṅgirā maunī japannāsīcciraṃ muniḥ // 14.1.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhāryātha sā taṃ papraccha muhuḥ sapraṇayāśrutā / ciraṃ kimāryaputraivaṃ cintayasyucyatāmiti // 14.1.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
priye dhyāyāmi sāvitrīmity ukte tena sāśrutā / sāvitrīṃ tāṃ munisutāṃ matvātmani cukopa ha // 14.1.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
durbhago 'yamiti tyaktuṃ dehaṃ gatvā vanaṃ ca sā / śubhaṃ bharturanudhyāya kaṇṭhe pāśaṃ samarpayat // 14.1.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mā putri sāhasaṃ kārṣīḥ patyā dhyātā na te 'ṅganā / dhyātāhaṃ tena sāvitrīty uktvā pāśādrarakṣa tām // 14.1.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prakaṭībhūya gāyatrī sākṣasūtrakamaṇḍaluḥ / bhaktānukampinī caitāṃ samāśvāsya tirodadhe // 14.1.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaiṣāṅgirasā bhartrā saṃprāptānviṣyatā vanāt / tadevaṃ duḥsahaṃ strīṇāmiha praṇayakhaṇḍanam // 14.1.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatsvalpenāparādhena kupiteha kva citsthitā / anveṣyā śaṃbhurakṣyā sā rājaputravadhūḥ punaḥ // 14.1.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ rumaṇvatā prokte rājā vatseśvaro 'bravīt / evametan na duritaṃ tasyāḥ saṃbhāvyate yataḥ // 14.1.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
naravāhanadattasya bhāryā devavinirmitā / kāmāṃśasyāvatīrṇaiṣā ratirmadanamañcukā // 14.1.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asau vidyādharaiśvaryaṃ divyaṃ kalpaṃ sahānayā / kariṣyatīti divyā vāgabravīnna ca tanmṛṣā // 14.1.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadeṣānviṣyatāṃ samyagiti rājñodite svayam / naravāhanadattaḥ sa tadavastho 'pi niryayau // 14.1.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yathāyathā hi cinvāno na tāṃ prāpa tathātathā / teṣu teṣu pradeśeṣu sonmāda iva so 'bhramat // 14.1.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
opete tatpurāt tasmin pihitadvārakā gṛhāḥ / tadduḥkhadarśanodvegād iva saṃmīlitekṣaṇāḥ // 14.1.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vaneṣu taṃ ca pṛcchantaṃ calatpallavapāṇayaḥ / na sā dṛṣṭā tavāsmābhir ityūcuriva pādapāḥ // 14.1.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
udyāneṣūtpatantaś ca khagāstasmai vicinvate / itaḥ sā na gatetyevaṃ śaśaṃsuriva sārasāḥ // 14.1.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
marubhūtirhariśikho gomukhaḥ savasantakaḥ / te te ca sacivā bhremustāmanveṣṭuṃ samantataḥ // 14.1.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
atrāntare vegavatī nāma vidyādharī kila / kanyā dṛṣṭacarodāravapurmadanamañcukā // 14.1.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadīyaṃ rūpamāsthāya tasthāvupavanāntare / āgatyaikākinī svair amatrāśokataroradhaḥ // 14.1.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāṃ dadarśa vicinvāno marubhūtiḥ paribhraman / sadyo viśalyakaraṇīṃ saśalyasyeva cetasaḥ // 14.1.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
naravāhanadattaṃ taṃ gatvā hṛṣṭo jagāda saḥ / samāśvasihi dṛṣṭā te mayodyāne sthitā priyā // 14.1.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityevoktavatā tena sākaṃ tatkṣaṇam eva saḥ / naravāhanadattas tadudyānaṃ mudito yayau // 14.1.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrātivirahaklānto bhāryāsṃ madanamañcukām / tāmapaśyatsa tṛṣito vāridhārāmivādhvagaḥ // 14.1.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: na-vipulā)
dṛṣṭvaivāliṅgituṃ tāṃ ca bhṛśārto yāvadicchati / tāvat sā taṃ jagādaivaṃ dhūrtā pariṇayaiṣiṇī // 14.1.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
māṃ tvaṃ saṃprati mā sprākṣīḥ śṛṇu tāvadvaco mama / mayopayācitā yakṣāstvatprāptyai prāgvivāhataḥ // 14.1.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vivāhe vaḥ pradāsyāmi svahastena balīniti / vivāhakāle te tasminmama prāṇeśa vismṛtāḥ // 14.1.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatkopāttair ahamito yakṣair apahṛtābhavam / gaccha bhūyo vivāhaṃ taṃ kṛtvā dattvā baliṃ ca naḥ // 14.1.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
nijaṃ patim upeyāstvaṃ nānyathā te śivaṃ bhavet / ity uktvā tair ihānīya yakṣair muktāsmi sāṃpratam // 14.1.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tanmāṃ pariṇayasvāśu punaryāvaddadāmy aham / yakṣebhyo 'bhimatāsṃ pūjāṃ tataḥ pūraya vāñchitam // 14.1.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
tac chrutvaiva samāhūya śāntisomaṃ purohitam / kṣaṇātsaṃbhṛtya saṃbhārānmāyāmadanamañcukām // 14.1.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidyādharīṃ vegavatīm upayeme sa tatkṣaṇam / naravāhanadattas tāṃ viyogakṣaṇakātaraḥ // 14.1.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
prahṛṣṭavatsarājo 'tha devyānandī mahotsavaḥ / nandatkaliṅgaseno 'bhūt tatrātodyaravākulaḥ // 14.1.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dadau baliṃ ca yakṣebhyo māyāmadanamañcukā / vidyādharī svahastena sā madyapiśitādibhiḥ // 14.1.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
naravāhanadatto 'tha vāsakasthastayā saha / papau sa sotsavaḥ pānaṃ pānaśauṇḍo 'pi tadgirā // 14.1.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
siṣeve ca tayā sākaṃ jīvalokasukhaṃ tataḥ / chāyayeva dinādhīśaḥ parivartitarūpayā // 14.1.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rahaḥsthā cābravītsā taṃ suptā nāhaṃ priya tvayā / sahasā mukhamudghāṭya vīkṣaṇīyeha saṃprati // 14.1.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sa kim etat syād iti yāvat sakautukaḥ / suptāyā rājaputro 'syā mukhamanyedyurīkṣate // 14.1.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvadanyaiva sā kāpi na sā madanamañcukā / svāpavelāvaśadhvastamāyārūpavivartanā // 14.1.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa jāgrad evāsīd yāvat prabubudhe 'tra sā / kā tvaṃ satyaṃ vadety evam atha tāṃ pṛcchati sma saḥ // 14.1.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpy anidropaviṣṭaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā rūpe nije sthitā / vaktuṃ pracakrame jātapratibhedā manasvinī // 14.1.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śṛṇvidānīṃ bravīmyetadyathāvastu tava priya / astyāṣāḍhapuraṃ nāma vidyādharapuraṃ giriḥ // 14.1.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra vegavato rājñaḥ putro vidyādharādhipaḥ / asti mānasavegākhyo rājā bhujabaloddhataḥ // 14.1.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya vegavatī nāma bhaginyasmi kanīyasī / sa ca bhrātā na me vidyāṃ dātumaicchadatidviṣan // 14.1.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato mayā tāḥ kleśena tapovanagatātpituḥ / prāptāstadvarataścaitāḥ sarvādhikabalā mama // 14.1.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāhaṃ dṛṣṭavatī dīnāmudyāne rakṣibhir vṛtām / āṣāḍhādripure tasminsthitāṃ madanamañcukām // 14.1.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
māyayāpahṛtā tena bhrātrā me dayitā tava / rāvaṇeneva duḥkhārtā rāmabhadrasya jānakī // 14.1.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anicchantī ca sā sādhvī tenākrāntuṃ na śakyate / strīṇāṃ haṭhopabhoge hi śāpastasyāsti mṛtyujaḥ // 14.1.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatastena prayuktāhaṃ kubhrātrā tatprabodhane / tasyāḥ samīpamagamaṃ tvatpralāpamayātmanaḥ // 14.1.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatprasaṅgāc ca kāmājñātulye tvannāmnyudīrite / tayā sādhvyā tvadekāgramidaṃ jātaṃ mano mama // 14.1.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa te patiḥ syādyanāmni śrute smaravaśā bhaveḥ / ityādyaś ca tadā devīsvapnādeśo mayā smṛtaḥ // 14.1.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃsmṛtya grāhayitvā tāṃ dhṛtiṃ madanamañcukām / tadrūpaṇe mayāgatya yuktyātmeha vivāhitaḥ // 14.1.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadehi yatra tvadbhāryā sthitā madanamañcukā / tatraiva tatkṛpāviṣṭā prāṇeśa tvāsṃ nayāmy aham // 14.1.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
tvatpriyeti tavevāhaṃ sapatnyā api kiṃkarī / mamātmanirapekṣā hi kāpi tvatpremavaśyatā // 14.1.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā sā svavidyānāṃ balādvegavatī niśi / naravāhanadattaṃ taṃ gṛhītvodapatan nabhaḥ // 14.1.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śanaiḥ prayāti sā vyomnā yāvattāvadadarśanāt / jāyāpatyostayoḥ prāptaḥ parivāro 'tra cukṣubhe // 14.1.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac ca vatseśvaro buddhvā saha vāsavadattayā / padmāvatyādibhiś cāśu vajrāhata ivābhavat // 14.1.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yaugandharāyaṇādyāś ca saṃpaurās tasya mantriṇaḥ / marubhūtimukhaiḥ putraiḥ sahābhūvansuvihvalāḥ // 14.1.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'ntarikṣatas tatra dvitīya iva bhāskaraḥ / avātarat prabhābaddhamaṇḍalo nārado muniḥ // 14.1.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidyādharyā nijabhuvaṃ nītaḥ śīghramihaiṣyati / putras te tava dhṛtyarthaṃ preṣitaścāsmi śūlinā // 14.1.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā vatsarājāya kṛtārghāya tato muniḥ / sa vegavatyāścaritaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ śaśaṃsa tat // 14.1.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tatas tasminsamāśvas te muniḥ so 'tra tirodadhe / atrāntare vegavatī vyomnā prāpayati sma sā // 14.1.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
naravāhanadattaṃ taṃ tamāṣāḍhapuraṃ girim / buddhvā mānasavegastatsa hantuṃ tāvadhāvata // 14.1.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatastena samaṃ bhrātrā yuddhaṃ vidyābaloddhatam / vegavatyā abhūtstrīṇāṃ patiḥ prāṇā na bāndhavāḥ // 14.1.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha nijavidyābalato bhairavarūpaṃ vidhāya vikaṭaṃ sā / mānasavegaṃ sahasā saṃmohya tam agniparvate nidadhe // 14.1.88	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
tam apica vidyāhas te naravāhanadattamādito nyastam / nītvā gandharvapure kūpe cikṣepa rakṣituṃ vijale // 14.1.89	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
tatra sthitaṃ ca tam uvāca manāg iha tvaṃ tiṣṭhāryaputra bhavitā ca śivaṃ tavātra / mā cādhṛtiṃ hṛdi kṛthāḥ śubhapātra sarvavidyādharādhipatitā tava bhāvinīha // 14.1.90	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
yāmi prasādhayitumadya punaryato 'haṃ jyeṣṭhavyatikramaṇadurbalitāḥ svavidyāḥ / tvāmabhyupaimi nacirāditi sā tamuktvā vidyādharī kvacana vegavatī jagāma // 14.1.91	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
tataḥ kūpasthitaṃ tatra gandharvaḥ ko 'py avaikṣata / naravāhanadattaṃ taṃ vīṇādatta iti śrutaḥ // 14.2.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
parārthaphalajanmāno na syurmārgadrumā iva / tāpacchido mahāntaścejjīrṇāraṇyaṃ jagadbhavet // 14.2.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yaddṛṣṭvā taṃ sa sujanaḥ pṛṣṭvā cānvayanāmanī / has te 'valambyodaharatkūpāttasmāduvāca ca // 14.2.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
mānuṣo 'si na devaścedgandharvanagaraṃ katham / mānuṣāgamyametattvamāgataḥ kathyatāmiti // 14.2.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidyādharyāhamānīya kṣipto 'trātmabalāditi / naravāhanadatto 'pi sa taṃ pratyabravīttadā // 14.2.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas taṃ vīkṣya saccakravarticihnaṃ guṇī gṛham / nītvā sa vīṇādattaḥ svair upacārair upācarat // 14.2.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
anyedyustatpuraṃ dṛṣṭvā vīṇāhastākhilaprajam / naravāhanadattas taṃ vīṇādattaṃ sa pṛṣṭavān // 14.2.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sarve 'pyābālamete kiṃ vīṇāhastā janā iti / vīṇādatto 'pi sa tatas tam evaṃ pratyabhāṣata // 14.2.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
rājā sāgaradattākhyo gandharvāṇāmihāsti yaḥ / tasya gandharvadattākhyā sutāsti nyakkṛtāpsarāḥ // 14.2.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dhātrā kṛtaṃ sudhācandracandanādyair ivocitaiḥ / sarvasundaranirmāṇavarṇakāyeva yadvapuḥ // 14.2.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
satataṃ sā ca gāyantī vīṇāyāṃ śauriṇā svayam / dattaṃ svagītakaṃ kāṣṭhāṃ gāndharve paramāṃ gatā // 14.2.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yo vādayati vīṇāyāṃ tribhir grāmaiś ca gāyati / gāndharve kovidaḥ samyagvaiṣṇavaṃ stutigītakam // 14.2.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa me patiḥ syād ity asyā rājaputryāś ca niścayaḥ / tena sarve 'tra vīṇāsu śikṣante na ca tadviduḥ // 14.2.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvaiva sānando vīṇādattamukhādvacaḥ / naravāhanadatto 'sau rājaputro jagāda tam // 14.2.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ kalānāṃ sarvāsāṃ svayaṃvaravṛtaḥ patiḥ / jānāmi sarvaṃ gāndharvaṃ trailokyodaravarti yat // 14.2.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ity uktavantaṃ sa suhṛdvīṇādatto nināya tam / rājñaḥ sāgaradattasya pārśvaṃ tatra jagāda ca // 14.2.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
naravāhanadatto 'yaṃ vatsarājasutaḥ kila / iha vidyādharīhastādvibhaṣṭo nagare tava // 14.2.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gāndharvācārya evāyaṃ keśavastutigītakam / vetti gandharvadattāyā trayopari mahānrasaḥ // 14.2.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā so 'bravīdrājā satyametanmayā śrutam / gandharvāṇāṃ mukhātpūrvaṃ tanmānyo 'yamihādya naḥ // 14.2.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
devāṃśaścaiṣa na bhrāntirdevabhūmau kimanyathā / iha vidyādharīsaṅgādāgacchenmānuṣo bhavan // 14.2.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ānīyatāṃ tad gandharvadattā vīkṣāmahe 'dbhutam / iti rājñodite jagmurānetuṃ tāṃ mahattarāḥ // 14.2.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
āgāc ca sā tataḥ kāntā kusumābharaṇojjvalā / yauvanena vighūrṇantī vātenevārtavī latā // 14.2.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upaviśya pituḥ pārśve tadvākyāc ca kṣaṇāntare / bhṛtyaiḥ kathitavṛttāntā vīṇāyāṃ gītakaṃ jagau // 14.2.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svarāñ śrutiṣu yuñjantyās tasyā brāhmyā iva śriyaḥ / naravāhanadatto 'bhūd gīte rūpe ca vismitaḥ // 14.2.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājaputri na te vīṇā susvarā pratibhāti me / jāne bālaḥ sthitas tantryām iti so 'tra jagāda ca // 14.2.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'ta vīkṣyate yāvadbālastāvadavāpi saḥ / tena sarve 'pi te jagmurgandharvā api vismayam // 14.2.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājaputra gṛhāṇemāṃ karṇau siñcāmṛtena naḥ / iti rājā sutāhastādvīṇāṃ tasmai dadau vadan // 14.2.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi tāṃ vādayanviṣṇoragāyadgītakaṃ tathā / yathā te tatra gandharvāścitranyastā ivābhavan // 14.2.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato gandharvadattā sā dṛṣṭyaiva praṇayārdrayā / taṃ vavre phullanīlābjamālayevāstayā svayam // 14.2.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadālokya tathārūpāṃ tatpratijñāṃ smaraṃś ca saḥ / rājā gandharvadattāṃ tāṃ sadyastasmai sutāṃ dadau // 14.2.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
divyātodyādikaścātra vivāho yastayor abhūt / kopamā kathyate tasya yenānyadupamīyate // 14.2.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tayā samaṃ tatra tasthau gandharvadattayā / naravāhanadatto 'sau divyair bhogair navoḍhayā // 14.2.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekasmiṃś ca dine draṣṭuṃ nirgato nagaraśriyam / tāṃs tān pradeśān ālokya purodyānaṃ viveśa saḥ // 14.2.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatra vyomno 'varohantīṃ so 'paśyaddivyayoṣitam / samaṃ duhitrānabhre 'pi savṛṣṭim iva vidyutam // 14.2.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
vatsarājasutaḥ so 'yaṃ putri bhāvi patistava / iti tāṃ vīkṣya jalpantīṃ jñānatastāṃ nijāṃ sutām // 14.2.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kā tvaṃ kimāgatāsīti so 'pṛcchattām upāgatām / sapīpsitopakramiṇī divyayoṣittam abravīt // 14.2.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
devasiṃhābhidhānasya vidyādharapateraham / bhāryā dhanavatī nāma kanyaiṣā ca sutā mama // 14.2.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
caṇḍasiṃhasya bhaginī nāmneyamajināvatī / asyā bhartā tvamādiṣṭo gaganodgatayā girā // 14.2.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vegavatyātra nikṣiptaṃ bhāvividyādhareśvaram / buddhvāhaṃ nijavidyātastvāṃ prāptā vaktumīpsitam // 14.2.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na vidyādharagamye 'tra sthāne yuktaṃ tavāsitum / te hi dveṣeṇa hanyustvāmaprāptapadamekakam // 14.2.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadehi tadagamyāṃ tvāṃ nayāvaḥ sāṃprataṃ bhuvam / nenduḥ kṣipati kiṃ kālaṃ parikṣīṇo 'rkamaṇḍale // 14.2.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃprāpte 'vasare caitāṃ sutāṃ me pariṇeṣyasi / ity uktvaiva tamādāya sasutā sā khamudyayau // 14.2.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrāvasyāṃ puri nītvaiva nikṣipyopavane ca tam / samaṃ tayājināvatyā sutayā sā tirodadhe // 14.2.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra prasenajidrājā dūrādākheṭakāgataḥ / dadarśa rājaputraṃ tamudārākāralakṣaṇam // 14.2.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa sakautukamabhyetya pṛṣṭvā nāma kulaṃ tathā / prītaḥ sapraśrayaṃ rājā nināyaitaṃ svamandiram // 14.2.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ābaddhavāraṇaghaṭaṃ vājirājivirājitam / bhramaṇaśrāntarājaśrīviśrāntibhavanopamam // 14.2.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
yatra tatra sthitaṃ sotkā naraṃ kalyāṇabhājanam / saṃpado 'bhisarantyeva priyaṃ janamivāṅganāḥ // 14.2.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yatsa tasmai dadau rājā guṇalubdho nijāṃ sutām / naravāhanadattāya bhagīrathayaśobhidhām // 14.2.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tayā samaṃ ca tatrāsīnmahārhavibhavaḥ sukham / lakṣmy eva mūrtayā dhātrā tadvinodāya sṛṣṭayā // 14.2.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadābhyudite lokalocanānandavarṣiṇi / rajanīramaṇe prācīdigvadhūmukhamaṇḍane // 14.2.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nirabhranirmalavyomadarpaṇapratibimbite / bhagīrathayaśovaktra ivāmṛtamanorame // 14.2.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaumudīsudhayā dhaute harmyāgre sa tayā saha / pradoṣe priyayā pānamasevata tadicchayā // 14.2.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
papau priyatamāvaktrapratimālaṃkṛtaṃ madhu / rasanāyā ivānandadāyi locanayor api // 14.2.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
priyāsmukhasamaṃ kāntaminduṃ mene tadā na saḥ / tasya te samadātāmranetrabhrūvibhramāḥ kutaḥ // 14.2.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sevitāpānalīlaś ca praviśyābhyantaraṃ tataḥ / bhagīrathayaśoyuktaḥ sa bheje śayanīyakam // 14.2.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra priyāyāṃ suptāyāṃ tasyāṃ suptavinidrakaḥ / naravāhanadatto 'sau smṛtvākasmātkilābravīt // 14.2.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhagīrathayaśaḥprītivismṛtā eva tā mama / anyabhāryāḥ kathaṃ tatsyāditi cātra vidhiḥ prabhuḥ // 14.2.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sacivā ye ca me dūre tebhyo 'pi marubhūtikaḥ / vikramaikaraso nītimātre hariśikhaḥ sthitaḥ // 14.2.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tābhyāṃ na sāṃprataṃ kṛtyaṃ gomukhaścasturaḥ punaḥ / sarvāvasthāsu me mittraṃ vidūrastho dunoti mām // 14.2.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ullapansa tatrāśu nidrāghnaṃ madhuraṃ mṛdu / hā duḥkhamiti śuśrāva nāryevodīritaṃ vacaḥ // 14.2.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutvā ca dīpradīpe 'tra sarvato yāvadīkṣate / tāvannāryā mukhaṃ divyaṃ gavākṣāntardadarśa saḥ // 14.2.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
samalo vyomni dṛṣṭo 'dya candro 'neneti kautukāt / avyomni darśitaṃ dhātrā candramanyamivāmalam // 14.2.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅgaṃ śeṣamapaśyaṃś ca tasyāstaddarśanotsukaḥ / tadrūpākṛṣṭanayano chagityevamacintayat // 14.2.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ātāpidaityo yuktyā prāgbrahmaṇā sargavighnakṛt / āścaryaṃ paśya gatvātrety uktvā praiṣyata nandanam // 14.2.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tenādbhutākāro dṛṣṭo 'ṅghriḥ kevalaṃ striyaḥ / vipannaś ca tadanyāṅgadidṛkṣāvyasanena saḥ // 14.2.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ mamāpi dhātredaṃ mukhamātraṃ vipattaye / sṛṣṭaṃ syāditi yāvac ca so 'trākalayati kṣaṇam // 14.2.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvad gavākṣād divyā strī pradarśya karapallavam / ita ehīti sāṅgulyā saṃjñāṃ tasyākarot tadā // 14.2.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ saṃsuptadayitātsvair aṃ nirgatya vāsakāt / tasyāḥ samīpaṃ saṃprāpa sa sotko divyayoṣitaḥ // 14.2.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
anyāsaktaṃ praśaṃsantī patiṃ madanamañcuke / hā hatāsīti sā cāsminnikaṭopagate 'bravīt // 14.2.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā tāṃ priyāṃ smṛtvā prajvaladvirahānalaḥ / naravāhanadattas tāṃ pṛcchati sma sa bhāminīm // 14.2.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kā tvaṃ kutra tvayā dṛṣṭā priyā madanamañcukā / mām upetā kimarthaṃ ca bhavatī kathyatāmiti // 14.2.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vidūraṃ nītvā taṃ prauḍhā rājasutaṃ niśi / śṛṇu sarvaṃ tvamity uktvā sātha vaktuṃ pracakrame // 14.2.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
nagaryāṃ puṣkarāvatyāmagnyārādhanapiṅgalaḥ / asti piṅgalagāndhāro nāma vidyādhareśvaraḥ // 14.2.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya prabhāvatīṃ nāma sutāsṃ māṃ viddhi kanyakām / ārādhitaprasannāddhi varātprāptāṃ vibhāvasoḥ // 14.2.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
sāhaṃ tadāṣāḍhapuraṃ draṣṭuṃ vegavatīṃ sakhīm / agacchaṃ na ca tāṃ tatra prāpaṃ kvāpi tapaḥsthitām // 14.2.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tanmātuḥ pṛthivīdevyā mukhānmadanamañcukām / buddhvā tāṃ tvatpriyāsṃ cātra sthitāṃ draṣṭumagāpaham // 14.2.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
apaśyaṃ tāmanāhārakṛśāṃ pāṇḍuradhūsarām / baddhaikaveṇīṃ rudatīṃ tvadguṇaikapralāpinīm // 14.2.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
vṛtāṃ vidyādharādhīśakanyāvṛndair udaśrubhiḥ / taddarśanatvacchravaṇaprodyadduḥkhasukhākulaiḥ // 14.2.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tayoktatvasvarūpā ca bhavadānayanena tām / āśvāsya tatkṛpākrānā tvadguṇākṛṣṭamānasā // 14.2.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidyāprabhāvād buddhvā ca saṃprati tvām iha sthitam / āgatāsmi tavābhyāśaṃ tadarthasvārthasiddhaye // 14.2.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vismṛtādya priyaṃ dṛṣṭvā vāmihānyapralāpinam / mayā hā duḥkhamity uktvā sā te bhāryānuśocitā // 14.2.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktaḥ sa tayā sotko rājaputro jagāda tām / naya māṃ tatra sā yatra niyuṅkṣva ca yathecchasi // 14.2.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sā tamādāya khamutpatya prabhāvatī / vidyādharī candravatyāṃ gantuṃ pravavṛte niśi // 14.2.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
yāntī kvāpy agnimālokya jvālantaṃ sā pradakṣiṇam / naravāhanadattasya tasyādāya karaṃ vyadhāt // 14.2.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tenodvāhavidhiṃ yuktyā prauḍhā sā niravartayat / saṃkalpaikapradhānā hi divyānāmakhilāḥ kriyāḥ // 14.2.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato nabhastalāttasya pṛthivīṃ vedikāmiva / nadīrbhujaṃgīsadṛśīrvalmīkāniva parvatān // 14.2.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tāni tāni tathānyāni kautukāni pade pade / darśayantī priyasyātra yayau dūraṃ krameṇa sā // 14.2.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ākāśagamanaśrānte tṛṣārte 'smiñjalārthini / naravāhanadatte sā vyomamargādavātarat // 14.2.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nināya ca vanāntaṃ taṃ candrāṃśudhavalāmbhasaḥ / rājatena draveṇeva bhṛtasya saraso 'ntikam // 14.2.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra śāntaṃ jalatṛṣā tasya pītāmbhaso vane / utpannaṃ ramaṇīye tu kāntāsaṃbhogatṛṣṇayā // 14.2.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato haṭhārthitā kṛcchrātsaṃbhoge sā prabhāvatī / sānukrośā kṛtaśvāsāṃ dhyātvā madanamañcukām // 14.2.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
naravāhanadattasya tasya pravavṛte tadā / parārthapratipannā hi nekṣante svārthamuttamāḥ // 14.2.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jagāda taṃ ca mā maṃsthā āryaputra tvamanyathā / abhiprāyo mamāstīha tathā cātra kathāṃ śṛṇu // 14.2.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
purā pāṭaliputre 'bhūtkāpi strī mṛtabhartṛkā / bālaikaputrā taruṇī nirdhanā rūpaśālinī // 14.2.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
sā cātmaparitoṣāya parapūruṣasaṃgamam / vidadhānā yayau gehādrātrau rārau yatas tataḥ // 14.2.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
modakaṃ putra te prātarāneṣyāmīti taṃ sutam / bālaṃ cāśvāsya sāyāsīttaṃ ca sānvahamānayat // 14.2.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca bālo gṛhe tūṣṇīṃ tayāsīnmodakāśayā / ekadā na tayānīto vismṛtyāsya sa modakaḥ // 14.2.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yācamānaṃ ca taṃ bālaṃ modakaṃ sā kilābravīt / ahaṃ svakāmukaṃ vedmi modakaṃ nāparaṃ suta // 14.2.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā nānayānīto modako me 'nyasaktayā / iti tasya nirāśasya śiśorhṛdayamasphuṭat // 14.2.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadahaṃ priya pūrvaṃ tvāṃ sutarāṃ svīkaromi cet / tanmayaiva kṛtāśvāsā tvatsaṃgamamahotsave // 14.2.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
matta eva nirāśā ced buddhvā madanamañcukā / bhavet taddhṛdayaṃ tasyāḥ sphuṭet kusumapeśalam // 14.2.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadetenānṛśaṃsyena tāmanāśvāsya saṃprati / na tathābhilaṣāmi tvām apiprāṇādhikaṃ priyam // 14.2.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktaḥ sa prabhāvatyā tayā sānandavismayaḥ / naravāhanadatto 'tra tatkālaṃ samacintayat // 14.2.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho navanavāścaryanirmāṇe rasiko vidhiḥ / acintyodāracaritā yena sṛṣṭā prabhāvatī // 14.2.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
iti dhyāyan sa tāṃ premṇā stutvā rājasuto 'bravīt / tarhi māṃ naya sā yatra sthitā madanamañcukā // 14.2.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā ca gṛhītvā taṃ nabhasā sā prabhāvatī / kṣaṇena prāpayām āsa tamāṣāḍhapuraṃ girim // 14.2.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra saṃgamayām āsa tena śuṣyattanuṃ cirāt / pūreṇeva nadīṃ vṛṣṭiḥ sā tāṃ madanamañcukām // 14.2.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'py apaśyadviyogārtāṃ kāntāṃ tāṃ kṛśapāṇḍurām / naravāhanadatto 'tra parvaṇīndukalāmiva // 14.2.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tadā prāṇalābhāya tayor anyonyasaṃgamaḥ / babhūva jagadānandī śarvarīśaśinoriva // 14.2.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tataḥ prabhāvatīvidyābalena niśi kalpitān / bubhujāte 'tra tau sadyaḥ svair aṃ bhogānubhāvapi // 14.2.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

hate mānasavege 'sau moktavyāsryasutena me / mṛtāyāḥ pakṣibhir vāpi veṇī dāhyāthavāgninā // 14.2.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

kṣipto 'pi na mṛto hyeṣa vegavatyāgniparvate / tvaṃ cādṛśyā prabhāvatyā vihito 'tra svamāyayā // 14.2.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

evam uktastayā patnyā sādhvyā kālānurodhavān / naravāhanadatto 'tra sāntvayansa jagāda tām // 14.2.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sasṃpatsyate 'yaṃ kāmas te haniṣyāmyacirādamum / śatruṃ vidyāḥ samāsādya pratīkṣasva manākpriye // 14.2.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
ityādyuktvā samāśvāsya sa tāṃ madanamañcukām / naravāhanadatto 'tra tasthau vaidyādhare pure // 14.2.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha prabhāvatī tasya cakre vidyāprabhāvataḥ / atarkyaṃ rūpamātmīyaṃ svayamantarhitā satī // 14.2.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

atra dundubhidaityaś ca guhāyāṃ vālinā hataḥ / valisugrīvayor vaire yadabhūtkāraṇaṃ purā // 14.3.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sugrīvo hi bhramānmatvā hataṃ daityena vālinam / guhāyāḥ parvatair dvāraṃ pidhāya sabhayo yayau // 14.3.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vālī ca bhittvā taddvāraṃ nirgatya niravāsayat / sugrīvaṃ rājyakāmo 'tra māmabadhnādasāviti // 14.3.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa sugrīvaḥ palāyyāsminnṛṣyamūke kapīśvaraḥ / hanumatpramukhaiḥ sārdhamatra sānau padaṃ vyadhāt // 14.3.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athaitya hemahariṇavyājavañcitacetasaḥ / jahāra rāmadevasya rāvaṇo janakātmajām // 14.3.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sītāpravṛttyarthī sa vālinidhanārthinā / sugrīveṇa samaṃ sakhyamatra cakre raghūdvahaḥ // 14.3.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bibheda ca balajñaptyai tālānsaptātra pattriṇā / ekaṃ yeṣv abhinatkṛcchrātso 'pi vālī mahābalaḥ // 14.3.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ito gatvā ca kiṣkindhāṃ helāmuktaikasāyakaḥ / hatvā taṃ vālinaṃ vīraḥ sugrīve tacchriyaṃ nyadhāt // 14.3.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha sītāpravṛttyarthaṃ hanumatprabhṛtiṣvitaḥ / caturdikkaṃ prayāteṣu sugrīvasyānuyāyiṣu // 14.3.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iha rāmeṇa varṣāsu saha meghair virāvibhiḥ / pataddhārāśrutoyaiś ca samaduḥkhair ivāsitam // 14.3.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃpātivacanottīrṇavāridheś ca hanūmataḥ / yatnātpravṛttau jñātāyāṃ gatvā kapibalaiḥ saha // 14.3.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
baddhvābdhiṃ setunā tena hatvā laṅkeśvaraṃ ripum / āninye jānakī devī vimānenāmunā pathā // 14.3.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ prāpsyasi kalyāṇam āryaputra bhavān api / āpatsu dhīrān puruṣān svayam āyānti saṃpadaḥ // 14.3.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
ityādi kathayantyā sa prabhāvatyā tayā saha / naravāhanadatto 'tra krīḍannāsīditas tataḥ // 14.3.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā taṃ ca pampāyāṃ vidyādharyāvubhe divaḥ / dhanavatyajināvatyāvavatīryopajagmatuḥ // 14.3.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yābhyāṃ sa gandharvapurāc chrāvastīṃ prāpito 'bhavat / bhagīrathayaśā yasyāṃ tena sā paryaṇīyata // 14.3.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
prabhāvatyājināvatyāṃ militāyāṃ svasakhyataḥ / naravāhanadattaṃ sā dhanavatyevam abravīt // 14.3.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
eṣājināvatī prākte vācā dattā sutā mayā / tasmātpariṇayasvaināmāsanno bhyudayo hi te // 14.3.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etaddhanavatīvākyaṃ sakhīsnehātprabhāvatī / naravāhanadattaś ca tathetyabhinanandatuḥ // 14.3.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato dhanavatī tasmai dadau tāmajināvatīm / sā vatseśvaraputrāya yathārhavidhinā sutām // 14.3.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svavidyākalpitodāradivyasaṃbhārasundaram / nirvartayām āsa ca tatsā sutodvāhamaṅgalam // 14.3.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
naravāhanadattaṃ sā tamanyedyurathābravīt / na putra yatra tatrehaṃ sthātuṃ yuktaṃ ciraṃ tava // 14.3.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
māyī vidyādharajano na ca kāryam ihāsti te / tad gaccha bhāryāyuktas tvaṃ kauśāmbīmadhunā nijām // 14.3.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ahaṃ ca tatraivaiṣyāmi caṇḍasiṃhena sūnunā / saha vidyādharendrai śca svakair abhyudayāya te // 14.3.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktvā dhanavatī sajyotsnām iva sāhnyapi / sitātmavasrtraprabhayā kurvāṇā divamudyayau // 14.3.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
prabhāvatyajināvatyau prāpayāmāsatuś ca tam / naravāhanadattaṃ te kauśāmbīṃ nabhasā purīm // 14.3.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'tra prāptastadudyānaṃ tasyāṃ vyomno 'vatāritaḥ / naravāhanadatto 'bhūddṛṣṭaḥ parijanair nijaiḥ // 14.3.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āgato rājaputro 'yaṃ diṣṭyā vardhāmahe vayam / iti tatrodabhūnnādo janasyātha samantataḥ // 14.3.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'kāṇḍasudhāsārasaṃsikta iva sotsavaḥ / vatsarājo 'tha tadbuddhvā yukto vāsavadattayā // 14.3.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
padmāvatyā vadhūbhiś ca drutaṃ ratnaprabhādibhiḥ / yaugandharāyaṇādyāś ca ye vatseśvaramantriṇaḥ // 14.3.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaliṅgasenā sve caiva sacivā gomukhādayaḥ / yathārhaṃ tam upājagmurgrīṣme hradamivādhvagāḥ // 14.3.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
dadṛśuste ca madhye taṃ sudaśārhakulaṃ dvayoḥ / patnyoḥ kṛṣṇamivāsīnaṃ rukmiṇīsatyabhāmayoḥ // 14.3.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅgeṣv eva na varteranphuṭatsv iti bhayād iva / teṣāṃ taddarśane harṣabāṣpaiḥ pidadhire dṛśaḥ // 14.3.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vatsarājaś ca devyau ca cirādāliṅgya taṃ sutam / na śekurmoktumaṅgeṣu protaṃ kaṇṭakiteṣviva // 14.3.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ prahatatūrye 'tra vartamāne mahotsave / naravāhanadattasya bhāryā vegavataḥ sutā // 14.3.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svasā mānasavegasya dyumārgeṇāvatīrya sā / āgādvegavatī buddhvā siddhasvidyāprabhāvataḥ // 14.3.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
patitvā pādayoḥ śvaśrūśvaśurāṇāṃ nijaṃ patim / naravāhanadattaṃ sa jagāda caraṇānatā // 14.3.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvatkṛte durbalībhūtāḥ sādhayitvā tapovane / vidyā punarahaṃ prāptā tava kalyāṇino 'ntikam // 14.3.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktavatī patyā taiścānyair abhinanditā / prabhāvatyajināvatyau sakhyāvupajagāma sā // 14.3.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tābhyāmāśliṣya sā madhye yāvadatropaveśyate / tāvanmātājināvatyā āyayau dhanavatyapi // 14.3.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ājagmuś ca tayā sākaṃ te te vidyādharādhipāḥ / ācchāditāmbaratalair meghair iva balair vṛtāḥ // 14.3.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tasyā eva suto vīraś caṇḍasiṃho mahābhujaḥ / tathāmitagatir nāma tadbandhuḥ sumahābalaḥ // 14.3.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca piṅgalagāndhāraḥ prabhāvatyāḥ pitā balī / so 'pi vāyupathaḥ pūrvapratipannaḥ sabhāpatiḥ // 14.3.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca hemaprabhaḥ śūro rājā ratnaprabhāṣitā / vajraprabheṇa putreṇa sākaṃ balasamanvitaḥ // 14.3.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gandharvarājo gandharvadattayā sutayā yutaḥ / āgātsāgaradatto 'pi saha citrāṅgadena saḥ // 14.3.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
upāgatāś ca te samyagvatsarājena pūjitāḥ / saputreṇāsanevatra yathocitam upāviśan // 14.3.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha piṅgalagāndhāro rājā jāmātaraṃ kṣaṇāt / naravāhanadattaṃ taṃ jagāda sadasi sthitam // 14.3.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvaṃ cakravartī sarveṣām asmākaṃ devanirmitaḥ / atisnehavaśāt tvāṃ ca vayaṃ sarve 'bhyupāgatāḥ // 14.3.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
iyaṃ dhanavatī devī śvaśrūste niyatavratā / divyajñānavatī sākṣasūtra kṛṣṇājināmbarā // 14.3.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rakṣituṃ tvāṃ kṛtodyogā sākṣādbhagavatī yathā / sāvitrī siddhavidyā vā vandyā vidyādharottamaiḥ // 14.3.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadasti kāryasiddhiste kiṃ tu yadvacmi tacchṛṇu / iha vidyādharāṇāṃ dvau vedyardhau sto himācale // 14.3.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttaro dakṣiṇaścaiva nānātacchṛṅgabhūmigau / parataḥ kila kailāsāduttaro 'rvāktu dakṣiṇaḥ // 14.3.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrottarādhipatyārthamidānīṃ duścaraṃ tapaḥ / eṣo 'mitagatiḥ kṛtvā śaṃkaraṃ paryatoṣayat // 14.3.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
naravāhanadattas te cakravartī samīhitam / kariṣyatīti tenāyamādiṣṭastvām upāgataḥ // 14.3.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

yastu dakṣiṇamadhye 'sti gair imuṇḍa iti śrutaḥ / rājā vidyāprabhāveṇa sa duṣṭātmātidurjayaḥ // 14.3.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tattvaṃ sādhaya sotkarṣaṃ śīghraṃ vidyābalaṃ mahast / iti piṅgalagāndhāreṇokte dhanavatī jagau // 14.3.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ putra yathāyaṃ te rājā vadati tat tathā / siddhakṣetramato gatvā vidyāsiddhyarthamīśvaram // 14.3.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ārādhaya prakarṣo hi tatprasādaṃ vinā kutaḥ / militāścātra rakṣanti rājānastvāmamī iti // 14.3.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataś citrāṅgado 'vādīdevametadahaṃ punaḥ / sarveṣāmagrayāyyeṣa vijayaḥ kriyatāmiti // 14.3.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athaitad eva niścitya kṛtvā prasthānamaṅgalam / pitror udbāṣpayoḥ pādau gurūṇāṃ ca praṇamya saḥ // 14.3.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dattāśīs taiḥ samāruhya bhāryābhiḥ sacivais tathā / sahāmitagatiprajñākalpitāṃ śibikottamām // 14.3.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
naravāhanadatto 'taḥ pratasthe sthagayannabhaḥ / kalpāntapavanoddhūtasāgarāmbhonibhair balaiḥ // 14.3.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
senānādapratiśrudbhir diganteṣu dyucāriṇām / āgataścakravartīva iti saṃvādayanniva // 14.3.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣaṇāttaiś ca sa gandharvapatividyādhareśvaraiḥ / dhanavatyā ca nīto 'bhūttaṃ siddhakṣetraparvatam // 14.3.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrādiṣṭavrataḥ siddhaiḥ prātaḥsnāyī phalāśanaḥ / bhūmiśāyī tapaścakre śaṃkarārādhanāya saḥ // 14.3.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
parivārya ca taṃ tasthū rājānas te dyucāriṇām / sarvataḥ kṛtasaṃrakṣā divāniśamatandritāḥ // 14.3.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidyādharakumāryo 'tra tapasyantaṃ tamutsukāḥ / netraprabhābhiḥ saṃvītakṛṣṇājinam iva vyadhuḥ // 14.3.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
taccintānarmukhair netraiḥ karaiścoraḥsthalārpitaiḥ / adarśayannivānyāstaṃ praviṣṭaṃ hṛdi tatkṣaṇam // 14.3.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pañcāparāś ca dṛṣṭvā taṃ sadvidyādharakanyakāḥ / madanānalasaṃtaptāścakrire samayaṃ mithaḥ // 14.3.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayaṃ pañcabhir asmābhiḥ sakhībhir yugapatpatiḥ / varaṇīyo vivāhaś ca tadvatkāryo na bhedataḥ // 14.3.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekā yadi pṛthakkuryādvivāhamamunā tataḥ / praveṣṭavyo 'gniranyābhistāmuddiśya sakhīdruham // 14.3.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti divyāsu kanyāsu kṣubhyatīṣu vibhāvya tam / tatrākasmānmahotpātāḥ prādurāsaṃstapovane // 14.3.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vavau vāyurmahāraudro bhadrānunmūlayandrumān / evaṃ śūrāḥ patiṣyanti raṇe 'treti vadanniva // 14.3.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kimatra syāditi bhayādiva bhūmirakampata / bhītāvakāśadānārthamivādīryanta sānavaḥ // 14.3.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidyādharāḥ prabhuṃ yatnādamuṃ rakṣata rakṣata / ityabravīdivānabhraṃ ghoraśabdaṃ nabhastalam // 14.3.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
naravāhanadattaś ca so 'sminn utpātasaṃbhrame / dhyāyanniṣkampa evāsīdbhagavantaṃ trilocanam // 14.3.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃnaddhāste ca gandharvarājavidyādhareśvarāḥ / aniṣṭāśaṅkino vīrāstaṃ rakṣanto 'vatasthire // 14.3.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mumucuḥ siṃhanādāṃś ca vyādhūtāsilatāvanāḥ / bhartsayanta ivotpātānahitāgamaśaṃsinaḥ // 14.3.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'nyedyurakasmāc ca kalpāntāsmbudameduram / vidyādharabalaṃ vyomni ghoranādamadṛśyata // 14.3.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'yaṃ mānasavegena gaurimuṇḍaḥ sahāgataḥ / ity uvāca smarantī svāṃ vidyāṃ dhanavatī tadā // 14.3.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vidyādharendrāṃstānsagandharvānudāyudhān / samaṃ mānasavegena gaurimuṇḍo 'bhyadhāvata // 14.3.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kva mānuṣo 'yaṃ kva vayaṃ tadetatpakṣapātinām / darpaṃ vaḥ śamayāmyadya dyucarā iti vādinam // 14.3.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
citrāṅgado 'tha taṃ krodhād dhāvan pratyabhiyuktavān / rājā sāgaradattaś ca gandharvāṇām adhīśvaraḥ // 14.3.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
caṇḍasiṃhāmitagatī rājā vāyupathas tathā / kiṃ ca piṅgalagāndhāraḥ sarve vidyādhareśvarāḥ // 14.3.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
pāpaṃ mānasavegaṃ tam abhyadhāvanmahārathāḥ / siṃhā ivābhigarjantaḥ senāsamudayānvitāḥ // 14.3.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sainyareṇughanākīrṇaṃ śastrajvālātaḍillatam / patadraktāmbu tadabhuddhoraṃ samaradurdinam // 14.3.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
śoṇitāsavasaṃpūrṇaṃ kīrṇaśatruśirobalim / cakrurbhūtamahāyāgam iva citrāṅgadādayaḥ // 14.3.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kabandhagrāhasaṃkīrṇā vahadāyudhapannagāḥ / prāvartanta milanmedoḍiṇḍīrā rudhirāpagāḥ // 14.3.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hatasainyo vadhaprāpto gaurimuṇḍas tataś ca saḥ / pūrvārādhitasuprītāṃ gaurīvidyāṃ samasmarat // 14.3.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āvirbhūya ca sā sākṣāt trinetrā triśikhāyudhā / naravāhanadattīyān pravīrāṃs tān amohayat // 14.3.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato labdhabalo bāhuyuddhāyābhyapatan nadan / naravāhanadattaṃ taṃ gaurimuṇḍaḥ pradhāvya saḥ // 14.3.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadbāhuyuddhaviddhaś ca māyī sasmāra tāṃ punaḥ / sadvidyāṃ tadbalāt taṃ ca bāhvor ādāya khaṃ yayau // 14.3.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hantuṃ dhanavatīvidyābalāttaṃ tu sa nāśakat / gaurimuṇḍo nṛpasutaṃ cikṣepa tvagniparvate // 14.3.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
so 'pi mānasavegas tāṃs tatsakhīn gomukhādikān / gṛhītvotpatya gaganaṃ dikṣu prāsthadanāsthayā // 14.3.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
utkṣiptāste ca rakṣitvā dhanavatyā prayuktayā / rūpiṇyā vidyayā bhinnāḥ sthāpyante sma mahītale // 14.3.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
siddhakāryaṃ kuśalinaṃ śīghraṃ prāpsyatha taṃ prabhum / ityāśvāsyaikaśastānsā vidyā teṣāṃ tirodadhe // 14.3.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vijitamasmābhir iti matvā yathāgatam / saha mānasavegena gaurimuṇḍo yayau gṛhān // 14.3.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
naravāhanadatto vaḥ siddhakāryaḥ sameṣyati / na tasyāniṣṭamastīti dhanavatyābhyudīrite // 14.3.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
te 'py astamohā gandharvanātha vidyādhareśvarāḥ / citrāṅgadādayaḥ svāni jagmuḥ sthānāni saṃprati // 14.3.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpi tatra sapatnībhiḥ sahitāmajināvatīm / svasutāṃ tāṃ gṛhītvā svaṃ yayau dhanavatī gṛham // 14.3.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi mānasavegastāṃ gatvā madanamañcukām / uvāca sa hato bhartā tava tadbhaja māmiti // 14.3.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa vo hantā na taṃ hanyātkaściddevavinirmitam / iti sā tatpurasthāpi hasantī pratyuvāca tam // 14.3.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
naravāhanadattaṃ ca taddviṣā vahniparvate / kṣipyamāṇaṃ tadāgatya divyaḥ ko 'py agrahītpumān // 14.3.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nināya cāśu rakṣitvā śītaṃ mandākinītaṭam / ko bhavāniti pṛṣṭaś ca tenāśvāsya jagāda tam // 14.3.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amṛtaprabhanāmāhaṃ deva vidyādharādhipaḥ / preṣitaś ca hareṇāhaṃ rakṣārthaṃ bhavato 'dhunā // 14.3.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayaṃ ca tannivāso 'driḥ kailāsas te sthito 'grataḥ / atrārādhya śivaṃ śreyo nirvighnaṃ tvamavāpsyasi // 14.3.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadehyatra nayāmi tvāmity uktvā tatra tatkṣaṇāt / prāpayyāmantrya ca yayau so 'tha vidyādharottamaḥ // 14.3.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
naravāhanadatto 'pi kailāsaṃ samavāpya saḥ / tapasā toṣayām āsa tatrāgrasthaṃ vināyakam // 14.3.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena dattābhyanujñaś ca prāviśya girijāpateḥ / āśramaṃ niyamakṣāmo dadarśa dvāri nindinam // 14.3.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtapradakṣiṇaṃ caitaṃ sa nandī sadayo 'bravīt / prāyaḥ siddho 'si vighnā hi praśāntāste tavādhunā // 14.3.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadihasthastapasya tvaṃ bhagavattoṣaṇāvadhi / duritaghnatapaḥśuddhisavyapekṣā hi siddhayaḥ // 14.3.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukte nandinā dhyāyan devaṃ devīṃ ca pārvatīm / naravāhanadatto 'graṃ tapastepe 'nilāśanaḥ // 14.3.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tapastuṣṭaś ca bhagavān sa dattvā darśanaṃ śivaḥ / devyā girijayā sārdham eva prahvaṃ tamādiśat // 14.3.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidyādharāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ cakravartī bhavādhunā / sarvāḥ sarvātiśāyinyo vidyāḥ prādurbhavantu te // 14.3.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
asmatprabhāvāc chatrūṇām avijeyo bhaviṣyasi / acchedyaścāpy abhedyaś ca haniṣyasyakhilānnripūn // 14.3.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭe tvayi na vidyāś ca prabhaviṣyanti te dviṣām / tad gaccha gaurīvidyāpi tvadāyattā bhaviṣyati // 14.3.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
iti gauryā samaṃ dattvā varaṃ tasmai dadau haraḥ / cakravartimahāpadmavimānaṃ brahmanirmitam // 14.3.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tasyāvirāsaṃstā vidyāḥ sarvāḥ savigrahāḥ / kimādiśasi yatkurma ityājñāsādhanotsukāḥ // 14.3.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti naravāhanadattaḥ siddhavaraughaḥ praṇamya parameśau / adhiruhya tac ca divyaṃ padmavimānaṃ tadabhyanujñātaḥ // 14.3.135	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
prathamaṃ tāvadayāsīdamitagates tasya vakrapurasaṃjñam / puramāveditamārgo vidyābhiḥ siddhacāraṇodgītaḥ // 14.3.136	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
so 'pyārūḍhavimānaṃ vyomnā prāptaṃ vilokya taṃ dūrāt / amitagatiḥ sam upetya svagṛhaṃ prāveśayatkṛtapraṇatiḥ // 14.3.137	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
pradadau ca tatra varṇitanijasiddhiprāptaye mudā tasmai / naravāhanadattāya sa sulocanākhyām upāyanaṃ svasutāsm // 14.3.138	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
so 'tra tayā saha vidyādharalakṣmyevāptayā tadāparayā / nayati sma cakravartī tatotsavaṃ prītimāṃstadahaḥ // 14.3.139	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
tato vakrapure tatra sthitamāsthānavartinam / naravāhanadattaṃ taṃ nūtanaṃ cakravartinam // 14.4.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyedyur avatīryaiva vetrahasto nabhastalāt / upagamya pumānekaḥ praṇamyaivaṃ vyajijñapat // 14.4.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
cakravartipratīhāraṃ viddhi deva kramāgatam / māṃ paurarucidevākhyaṃ svasevārtham upāgatam // 14.4.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā so 'mitagatermukhamaikṣata tena ca / satyaṃ deveti vijñaptaḥ kṣattṛtve 'bhinananda tam // 14.4.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha prabhāvato buddhvā vegavatyādibhiḥ saha / tatpatnībhir dhanavatī caṇḍasiṃhaś ca tatsutaḥ // 14.4.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tathā piṅgalagāndhāro rājā vāyupathānvitaḥ / samaṃ sāgaradattena tatra citrāṅgadaś ca saḥ // 14.4.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āyayuḥ sainyaruddhārkāḥ saha hemaprabhādibhiḥ / paratejo 'sahiṣṇutvaṃ sūcayanta ivāgrataḥ // 14.4.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upetya pādayos tasya nipetuścakravartinaḥ / so 'pi saṃmānayām āsa yathārhaṃ svāgatena tān // 14.4.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dhanavatyāstu caraṇau gauravātpraṇanāma saḥ / sāpi jāmātaraṃ prītā tamāśīrbhir avardhayat // 14.4.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
uktātmasiddhivṛttāntastena te prabhuṇā tataḥ / caṇḍasiṃhādayaḥ sarve pramodaṃ sutarāṃ dadhuḥ // 14.4.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pārśvopayāstāḥ patnīś ca dṛṣṭvā dhanavatīṃ tadā / cakravartī sa papraccha kva te me sacivā iti // 14.4.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣiptā mānasavegena rakṣitvā sthāpitā mayā / vidyāmukhena te bhinnā iti sā pratyuvāca tam // 14.4.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataś cānāyayat tān sa vidyāmādiśya rūpiṇīm / āgatān pṛṣṭhakuśalān pādalagnāñ jagāda ca // 14.4.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
iyanto divasāḥ kena kathaṃ kutrātivāhitāḥ / ityekakena yuṣmābhiś citraṃ me kathyatāmiti // 14.4.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'vādītsvavṛttāntamādāvevaṃ sa gomukhaḥ / dviṣā kṣiptaṃ tadā kāpi devī māṃ hastayor adhāt // 14.4.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āśvāsya dūre 'raṇye ca sthāpayitvā tirodadhe / tato 'haṃ duḥkhito dehaṃ tyaktumaicchaṃ prapātataḥ // 14.4.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
maivaṃ gomukha siddhārthaṃ punardrakṣyasi taṃ prabhum / iti māṃ tapasastāvatko 'py upetya nyavārayat // 14.4.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kastvaṃ kathaṃ ca vetsyetadity uktaś ca mayā tataḥ / ehyāśramaṃ me vakṣyāmi tatraitaditi so 'bravīt // 14.4.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tato mannāmavijñānasūcitajñānasaṃpadā / ahaṃ tena sahāgacchaṃ śivakṣetraṃ tadāśramam // 14.4.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra me sa kṛtātithyaḥ kathāṃ svāmevam abhyadhāt / nāgasvāmīti nāmāhaṃ kuṇḍinākhyātpurāddvijaḥ // 14.4.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pitari svargate so 'haṃ gatvā pāṭaliputrakam / jayadattam upādhyāyaṃ vidyāhetor upāsadam // 14.4.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śikṣyamāṇo 'pi jāḍyena na yadākṣaram apy aham / avidaṃ tena māṃ tatra cchāttrāḥ sarve 'py upāhasan // 14.4.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'vamānagrasto 'haṃ prasthito vindhyavāsinīm / draṣṭum ardhapathe prāpaṃ puraṃ vakrolakābhidham // 14.4.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra mahyaṃ praviṣṭāya bhikṣārthaṃ gṛhiṇī gṛhāt / ekasmādraktakamalaṃ pradadau bhikṣayā saha // 14.4.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tadgṛhītvāparaṃ gehaṃ prāptaṃ māṃ vīkṣya cābravīt / tatratyā gehinī hā dhigyoginyā svīkṛto bhavān // 14.4.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
paśya datto nṛhastas te raktābjavyājato 'nayā / tac chrutvā yāvadīkṣe 'haṃ tāvat pāṇiḥ sa nāmbujam // 14.4.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tattyaktvātha patitvāsyāḥ pādayor aham abravam / mātaḥ kuruṣvopāyaṃ me yathā jīvāmy ahaṃ tathā // 14.4.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tac chrutvā māmavādītsā gaccheto yojanatraye / devarakṣita ityasti grāme karabhake dvijaḥ // 14.4.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāsti kapilā gehe sākṣātsurabhir uttamā / sādya tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ prāptaṃ rakṣiṣyati niśāmimām // 14.4.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ tayoktaḥ sabhayo dhāvann asmi dinakṣaye / prāptavān karabhagrāme gṛhaṃ tasya dvijanmanaḥ // 14.4.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
praviśya tatra dṛṣṭvāhaṃ kapilāṃ tāṃ praṇamya ca / bhītastvāṃ śaraṇaṃ devi prāpto 'smīti vyajijñapam // 14.4.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvat sā tarjayantī māmanyābhiḥ saha yoginī / tatrāgānnabhasā naktaṃ manmāṃsarudhirārthinī // 14.4.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taddṛṣṭvā kapilā sātha khuramadhye niveśya mām / arakṣadyodhayantī tā yoginīrakhilāṃ niśām // 14.4.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātastāsu gatāsveṣā kapilā vyaktayā girā / māmavocanna putrāhaṃ tvāṃ śakṣyāmyadya rakṣitum // 14.4.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadgaccha pañcayojanyāmito 'raṇye śivālaye / asti bhūtiśivo nāma jñānī pāśupatottamaḥ // 14.4.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa rakṣiṣyati rātriṃ tvāmadyaikāṃ śaraṇāgatam / tac chrutvā tāṃ praṇamyaiva tato 'haṃ prasthito 'bhavam // 14.4.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
drutaṃ bhūtiśivaṃ taṃ ca prāpyāhaṃ śaraṇaṃ śritaḥ / naktaṃ ca tatra yoginyas tās tathaivāgaman punaḥ // 14.4.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ praveśya mām antargṛhaṃ bhūtiśivaḥ sa tāḥ / triśūlahasto dvārastho yoginīr nirabhartsayat // 14.4.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
jitvaitā bhojayitvā māṃ prātarbhūtiśivo 'bhyadhāt / brahmanna śakṣyāmyadhunā rakṣituṃ tvāmahaṃ punaḥ // 14.4.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tadasti saṃdhyavāsākhye yojaneṣu daśasvitaḥ / grāme vasumatir nāma viprastasyātikaṃ vraja // 14.4.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tṛtīyām adya tvaṃ rātrim uttīrya mokṣyase / ity uktas tena natvā taṃ tataḥ prasthitavān aham // 14.4.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
gacchataś cādhvano dairghyād gato 'staṃ me 'ntarā raviḥ / yoginyas tāś ca māṃ naktam agṛhṇannetya pṛṣṭhataḥ // 14.4.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
māṃ gṛhītvā ca yāvattā hṛṣṭā yānti vihāyasā / tāvattāsāṃ puro 'pūrvā yoginyo 'nyāḥ parāpatan // 14.4.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tābhiḥ sahodabhūdāsāmakasmādyuddhamuddhatam / tena tāsāmahaṃ hastādbhraṣṭo deśe 'tinirjane // 14.4.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekamevātha tatrāhamapaśyaṃ mandiraṃ mahat / praviśeti bruvadiva dvāreṇāpāvṛtena mām // 14.4.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
palāyyābhyantare tatra praviśyāhaṃ bhayākulaḥ / adrākṣamadbhutākārāṃ nārīṃ nārīśatānvitām // 14.4.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prakāśamānāṃ prabhayā pradoṣajvalitāmiva / rakṣāmahauṣadhiṃ sṛṣṭāṃ dhātrā madanukampayā // 14.4.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣaṇānmayā samāśvasya pṛṣṭā sā mām abhāṣata / yakṣiṇyahaṃ sumittrākhyā śāpādevamiha sthitā // 14.4.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mānuṣeṇa ca me saṅgaḥ pradiṣṭaḥ śāpaśāntaye / tanmāmaśaṅkitaprāpto bhajasva bhava nirbhayaḥ // 14.4.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā kṣipramāviśya dāsīḥ snānavilepanaiḥ / vastrair āhārapānaiś ca hṛṣṭaṃ sā mām upācarat // 14.4.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kva ḍākinībhir bhītiḥ sā kva sukhaṃ tac ca tatkṣaṇam / acintyo bata daivenāpyāpātaḥ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ // 14.4.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tayā samaṃ tatra yakṣiṇyā tāny ahāny aham / sukhamāsam atha svairam ekadā sābravīc ca mām // 14.4.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣīṇaḥ śāpaḥ sa me brahmaṃstadito 'dya vrajāmy aham / matprasādāca divyaṃ te vijñānaṃ saṃbhaviṣyati // 14.4.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tapasvī siddhabhogaś ca nirbhayaś ca bhaviṣyasi / ihastho madgṛhasyāsya mā drākṣīrmadhyamaṃ puram // 14.4.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktvā tiro 'bhūtsā tato 'haṃ kautukena tat / madhyamaṃ puramārūḍhastatrāpaśyaṃ turaṃgamam // 14.4.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tenāhaṃ nikaṭaprāptaḥ kṣipto 'śvena khurāhataḥ / kṣaṇād adrākṣam ātmānaṃ sthitam asmiñ śivālaye // 14.4.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ prabhṛti cātrāhaṃ sthitaḥ siddho 'smi ca kramāt / taditthaṃ mānuṣasyāpi trikālajñānamasti me // 14.4.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ ca kleśabahulāḥ sarvasyāpīha siddhayaḥ / tad ihāssva tavābhīṣṭasiddhiṃ śaṃbhur vidhāsyati // 14.4.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukto jñāninā tena tatreyanti dināny aham / tvatpādaprāptijātāsthaḥ sthito 'bhūvaṃ tadāśrame // 14.4.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svapnādiṣṭabhavatsiddhiḥ śarveṇādya kila prabho / kayāpy ahamihānīto gṛhītvā divyayā striyā // 14.4.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityeṣa mama vṛttānta ity uktvā gomukhe sthite / naravāhanadattāgre marubhūtirathābravīt // 14.4.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣiptaṃ mānasavegena māṃ tadā kāpi devatā / pāṇyorvidhāya vinyasya dūre 'ṭavyāṃ tiro 'bhavat // 14.4.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'haṃ tatra duḥkhārto maraṇopāyacintayā / bhrāmyannadīparikṣiptaṃ dṛṣṭavānekamāśramam // 14.4.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra praviśya cāpaśyam upaviṣṭaṃ śilātale / jaṭābhistāpasaṃ taṃ ca praṇamyāham upāgamam // 14.4.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kastvaṃ kathamanuprāpto 'syetāṃ bhūmimamānuṣīm / iti pṛṣṭaś ca tenāhaṃ tasmai sarvamavarṇayam // 14.4.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa buddhvāvocan māṃ mātmānaṃ sāṃprataṃ vadhīḥ / jñāsyasīha prabhor vārtāṃ tataḥ kartāsi yatkṣamam // 14.4.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti tadvacanādyuṣmadvārtājijñāsayā sthite / mayi tatra striyo divyā nadīṃ tāṃ snātumāgaman // 14.4.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'tha māṃ tāpaso 'vādīdgacchāsyā vastramānaya / āsu snāntyāstvamekasyā vārtāṃ jñāsyasyataḥ prabhoḥ // 14.4.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvāhaṃ tathākārṣaṃ māmanvāgāc ca sā vadhūḥ / hṛtavastrārdravasanā sahastasvastikastanī // 14.4.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
naravāhanadattasya vartāmākhyāya vāsasī / gṛhāṇetyuditā tena tāpasenātha sābravīt // 14.4.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
naravāhanadatto 'dya haramārādhayansthitaḥ / kailāse divasair vidyādharasamrāḍ bhaviṣyati // 14.4.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktavatī tasya saṃpede tāpasasya sā / bhāryā śāpavaśāddivyā tatkathāsaṃstavādvadhūḥ // 14.4.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tayā samaṃ tasthau vidyādharyā sa tāpasaḥ / tadgirā cāhamatrāsaṃ jātāsthastvatsamāgame // 14.4.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dinaiḥ sagarbhā ca satī garbhaṃ dyustrī prasūya tam / sāvocattāpasaṃ śāntaḥ śāpastvatsaṅgato mama // 14.4.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhūyo matsaṅgavāñchā te yadi tattaṇḍulaiḥ saha / paktvā bhuktvānvagādetāṃ khamutpatya sa tāpasaḥ // 14.4.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvāsyām prayātāyām etadgarbhaṃ sataṇḍulam / paktvā bhuktvānvagād etaṃ bhuṅkṣva prāpsyasi mām tataḥ // 14.4.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ tadukto 'pyādau tannāśnāṃ siddhimavekṣya tu / bhaktasikthadvayaṃ prāpya pākabhāṇḍādabhakṣayam // 14.4.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena yatrāham aṣṭhīvam abhūt tat tatra kāñcanam / athādainyaḥ paribhrāmyan prāpam ekam ahaṃ puram // 14.4.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra veśyāgṛhe hemnā tenodāravyayasya me / vasato vamanaṃ prādājjijñāsuḥ kuṭṭanī chalāt // 14.4.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

nirgate eva kuṭṭanyā gṛhīte bhakṣite ca te / naṣṭātha hemasiddhiḥ sā kuṭṭanyāpahṛtā tayā // 14.4.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sacandrārdhaḥ śivo 'dyāspi hariryaccaḥ sakaustubhaḥ / tattayor vedmi kuṭṭanyā gocarāpatane phalam // 14.4.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

ityahaṃ vimṛśan khinnas tvatprāptyai caṇḍikāgṛham / agacchaṃ tapasā devīṃ tām ārādhayituṃ tataḥ // 14.4.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
trirātropoṣitaṃ sā māṃ devī svapne samādiśat / siddhakāmaḥ sa te svāmī saṃpanno gaccha paśya tam // 14.4.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvā prabuddho 'smi prātardevyā kayāpy aham / tvatpādamūlamānīta ityeṣā deva me kathā // 14.4.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

athoccacāla cchannārkaṃ vidyādharabalaṃ divi / vair iśītakarākālarāhūdayakṛtabhramam // 14.4.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

āropya pattreṣu sakhīṃścaṇḍasiṃhādikeṣu ca / puraḥsareṣu nabhasā pratasthe vijayāya saḥ // 14.4.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)

mandaraḥ samahādaṃṣṭraḥ svasakhā cāmṛtaprabhaḥ / samaṃ sāgaradattena vīraścitrāṅgado 'pi saḥ // 15.1.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ete cānye ca ye 'trāsan gaurimuṇḍavyapāśritāḥ / samagrās te 'nvadhāvaṃstaṃ vijigīṣuṃ balānvitāḥ // 15.1.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadā tatsenayā channe gagane kvāpi bhāskaraḥ / mamajja lajjayevātra tattejonihnutaprabhaḥ // 15.1.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha mānasamullaṅghya devarṣivrātasevitam / atītya gaṇḍaśailaṃ ca līlodyānaṃ dyuyoṣitām // 15.1.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa cakravartī saṃprāpa sphaṭikāpāṇḍuratviṣaḥ / mūlaṃ nijayaśorāśeriva kailāsabhūbhṛtaḥ // 15.1.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra mandākinītīre niṣaṇṇaṃ nijagāda tam / vidyādharādhipo dhīmānmandaro bandhuraṃ vacaḥ // 15.1.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ihaiva tāvad devādya sthīyatāṃ dyunadītaṭe / na yuktam imamullaṅghya kailāsaṃ gantumagrataḥ // 15.1.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
harāspadasya hyetasya vidyā naśyanti laṅghanāt / triśīrṣaguhayā tasya gantavyaṃ pārśvamuttaram // 15.1.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
devamāyābhidhānena sā ca rājñābhir akṣyate / sa cātidṛptas tasmāt tam ajitvā gamyate katham // 15.1.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)

tatrastho devamāyāya dūtaṃ sāmnā vyasarjayat / sa ca sāntvena naivāsya śāsanaṃ pratyapadyata // 15.1.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'paredyuḥ saṃnaddhaistaistaiḥ svai rājabhiḥ saha / sa cakravartī taṃ prāyāddevamāyaṃ prati prabhuḥ // 15.1.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)

anyonyaghaṭṭitaiḥ puṣpaiḥ kāṃsyatālavatīriva / saṃgītā iva bhṛṅgīnāṃ virutair vātavepitāḥ // 16.1.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
