alimālāślathajyeyaṃ dṛśyatāṃ cūtamañjarī / viśrāntasya jagajjitvā kāmasyeva dhanurlatā // 16.1.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad atra rucirodyāne deva mandākinītaṭe / madhūtsavamimaṃ tāvadehi gatvopabhuñjmahe // 16.1.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktaḥ sacivaiḥ so 'tha sāvarodhavadhūjanaḥ / naravāhanadattas tadyayau mandākinītaṭam // 16.1.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra cikrīḍa codyāne nānāvihaganādite / elālavaṅgabakulāśokamandāramaṇḍite // 16.1.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
upaviṣṭaś ca vipule candrakāntaśilātale / pārśve kṛtvā mahādevīṃ vāme madanamañcukām // 16.1.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyāvarodhasahitastaistair vidyādhareśvaraiḥ / caṇḍasiṃhāmitagatipramukhaiḥ parivāritaḥ // 16.1.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
āpānaṃ sevamāno 'tra tās tāḥ kurvan kathās tathā / vicārya tam ṛtuṃ samrāṭ sacivān svān uvāca saḥ // 16.1.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sukhasparśo mṛdurvāto dakṣiṇo vimalā diśaḥ / puṣpitāni sugandhīni kānanāni pade pade // 16.1.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
madhurāḥ kokilālāpāḥ pānalīlāsukhāni ca / sukhaṃ kiṃ na madhau preyoviyogastvatra duḥsahaḥ // 16.1.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyasyāstāṃ tiraścām apy atra kaṣṭā viyogitā / tathā ca virahaklāntāmetāṃ paśyata kokilām // 16.1.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
eṣā hi naṣṭamanviṣya kūjantī suciraṃ priyam / aprāpya taṃ sthitā cūte mṛtevālīya niḥsvanā // 16.1.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavantaṃ samrājaṃ mantrī taṃ gomukho 'bravīt / satyaṃ kāle 'tra viraho duḥsahaḥ sarvadehinām // 16.1.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tathāhi deva śrāvasyāṃ yadvṛttaṃ vacmi tac chṛṇu / tatraiko rājaputro 'bhūdgrāmabhugrājasevakaḥ // 16.1.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
śūrasenābhidhānasya tasya mālavadeśajā / anurūpā suṣeṇeti bhāryābhūjjīvitādhikā // 16.1.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa jātu bhūpenāhūtaḥ kaṭakaṃ gantum udyataḥ / śūraseno 'nurāgiṇyā jagade bhāryayā tayā // 16.1.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
āryaputra na muktvā mām ekakāṃ gantum arhasi / nahi śakṣyāmy ahaṃ sthātuṃ kṣaṇam atra tvayā vinā // 16.1.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ tayoktaḥ priyayā śūraseno jagāda tām / rājāhūto na gacchāmi kathaṃ tanvi na vetsi kim // 16.1.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājaputraḥ parāyattavṛttirasmi hi sevakaḥ / tac chrutvā sāśrunayanā sā bhāryā tam abhāṣata // 16.1.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
gantavyaṃ yadyavaśyaṃ te satsahiṣye kathaṃcana / dinam apy anatikrāmannupaiṣyasi madhau yadi // 16.1.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutvaitatso 'py avādīttāmantato niścitaṃ priye / tyaktvāpi kāryameṣyāmi caitrasya prathame 'hani // 16.1.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavān katham api priyayānumatas tayā / rājñaḥ samīpaṃ kaṭakaṃ śūraseno jagāma saḥ // 16.1.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tadbhāryāpyāśayā tasthau gaṇayantī dināni sā / tadāgamāvadhimadhuprārambhadivasekṣiṇī // 16.1.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
gateṣv atha dineṣvāgātsa madhūtsavavāsaraḥ / manmathāhvānamantrābhavilasatkokiladhvaniḥ // 16.1.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śuśruve kusumāmodamādyanmadhukarāravaḥ / kāmenāropyamāṇasya kārmukasyeva niḥsvanaḥ // 16.1.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'yaṃ madhūtsavaḥ prāpto dhruvamadyaiṣyati priyaḥ / iti tasmindine tasya śūrasenasya sā vadhūḥ // 16.1.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vicintya vihitasnānā suṣeṇābhyarcitasmarā / udvīkṣyamāṇā tanmārgaṃ tasthau racitamaṇḍanā // 16.1.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
dinātyaye 'pi na yadā sa tasyāḥ patirāyayau / tadā sā niśi nair āśyavidhurā samacintayat // 16.1.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
mṛtyoḥ kālo 'yam āyāto na tvāyātaḥ patiḥ sa me / parasevaikasaktānāṃ ko hi sneho nije jane // 16.1.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityevaṃ cintayantyāś ca tasyāstadgatacetasaḥ / niryayuḥ smaradāvāgnidahyamānā ivāsavaḥ // 16.1.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca bhūpātkatham apy ātmānaṃ pratimocya saḥ / śūraseno 'natikrāmandinaṃ taddayitotsukaḥ // 16.1.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
āruhya karabhaśreṣṭhamullaṅghyādhvānamāyatam / āgataḥ paścime yāme rātreḥ prāpa nijaṃ gṛham // 16.1.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāpaśyadgataprāṇāṃ priyāṃ tāṃ kṛtamaṇḍanām / latāmutphullakusumāṃ vātenonmūlitāmiva // 16.1.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
dṛṣṭvaiva vihvalasyaitāṃ kurvato 'ṅke viniryayuḥ / pralāpaiḥ saha tasyāpi prāṇā virahiṇaḥ kṣaṇāt // 16.1.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathā vipannau dṛṣṭvā tau daṃpatī kuladevatā / kṛpayā jīvayām āsa devī caṇḍī varapradā // 16.1.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ pratyāgataprāṇau tataḥ prabhṛti tāvubhau / dṛṣṭānurāgāv anyonyam aviyuktau babhūvatuḥ // 16.1.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
itthaṃ vasantasamaye malayānilavījitaḥ / keṣāṃ na dehināṃ deva duḥsaho virahānalaḥ // 16.1.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityevaṃ gomukhenokte tad eva kila bhāvayan / naravāhanadatto 'bhūt so 'kasmād vimanā iva // 16.1.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mahātmanāṃ vinā hetorduḥsthitaḥ susthito 'pi vā / sūcayantyantarātmā hi puro bhāvi śubhāśubham // 16.1.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato dine hy avasite samrāṭ saṃdhyām upāsya saḥ / vāsaveśmani viśrāntaḥ praviśya śayanīyake // 16.1.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
svapne niśavasāne svaṃ pitaraṃ kṛṣṇayā striyā / ākṛṣya dakṣiṇāmāśāṃ nīyamānamavaikṣata // 16.1.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taddṛṣṭvaiva prabuddhaḥ saṃstātasyāniṣṭaśaṅkayā / dhyātām upasthitāṃ vidyāṃ prajñaptiṃ nāma pṛṣṭavān // 16.1.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
brūhi tātasya vṛttānto vatsarājasya ko mama / tannimittaṃ hi duḥsvapnadarśanādasmi śaṅkitaḥ // 16.1.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktā tena vidyā sā rūpiṇī tam abhāṣata / śṛṇu yadvatsarājasya vṛttaṃ deva pitustava // 16.1.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa kauśāmbīsthito 'kasmādujjayinyāḥ samāgatāt / dūtāccaṇḍamahāsenaṃ vipannamaśṛṇonnṛpam // 16.1.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāṅgāravatīṃ devīṃ kṛtānugamanāṃ tathā / tasmādeva sa śuśrāva mohādbhūmau papāta ca // 16.1.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
labdhasaṃjñaś ciraṃ caitau samaṃ vāsavadattayā / devyā śuśoca śvaśurau svargatau saparicchadaḥ // 16.1.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
bhaṅgure 'smin bhave kasya sthiratā sa ca bhūpatiḥ / aśocyo yasya jāmātā bhavān gopālakaḥ sutaḥ // 16.1.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
naravāhanadattaś ca dauhitra iti mantribhiḥ / prabodhyotthāpitaḥ so 'tha dadau śvaśurayor jalam // 16.1.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ śvaśūryaṃ śokārtaṃ snehāt pārśvasthitaṃ tadā / gopālakaṃ sa vatseśo vāṣpakaṇṭho 'bhyabhāṣata // 16.1.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttiṣṭhojjayinīṃ gaccha rājyaṃ pālaya paitṛkam / pratīkṣante prajā hi tvāmiti dūtamukhāc chrutam // 16.1.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sa rudanvatsarājaṃ gopālako 'bravīt / na deva gantuṃ śaknomi tyaktvā tvāṃ bhaginīṃ tathā // 16.1.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
na cotsahe tātaśūnyāṃ svapurīṃ draṣṭum apy aham / tatpālako 'nujo me 'tra rājāstu madanujñayā // 16.1.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ vadanyadā naicchadrājyaṃ gopālakastadā / senāpatiṃ rumaṇvantaṃ visṛjyojjayinīṃ purīm // 16.1.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vatseśvaraḥ kaniṣṭhaṃ taṃ śvaśuryaṃ pālakābhidham / dattābhyanujñaṃ jyeṣṭhena tasyāṃ rājye bhyaṣecayat // 16.1.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ālokya cāsthiraṃ sarvaṃ virakto viṣayeṣu saḥ / yaugandharāyaṇādibhyaḥ sacivebhyo 'bravīdidam // 16.1.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asāre 'smin bhave tāvadbhāvāḥ paryantanīrasāḥ / kṛtaṃ ca rājyamasmābhir bhuktā bhogā jitā dviṣaḥ // 16.1.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidyādharādhirājatvaṃ prāpto dṛṣṭaḥ sutas tathā / idānīṃ ca vayo 'tītamasmākaṃ bāndhavaiḥ saha // 16.1.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mṛtyave dātumāttāś ca keśeṣu jarasā vayam / klībarājyamivākrāntaṃ śarīraṃ valibhiś ca naḥ // 16.1.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmātkālaṃjaragirau gatvā dehamaśāśvatam / tyaktvemaṃ sādhayāmyatra yathoktaṃ śāśvataṃ padam // 16.1.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktāstena sacivā rājñā sarve vicārya tat / devī vāsavadattā ca samacittāstamabruvan // 16.1.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
yathābhir ucitaṃ deva bhavatastvatprasādataḥ / vayam apy upayāsyāmaḥ paratrāpyuttamāṃ gatim // 16.1.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ātmatulyair uktas taiḥ sa rājā kṛtaniścayaḥ / gopālakaṃ taṃ tatrasthaṃ śvaśuryaṃ dhuryam abhyadhāt // 16.1.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
naravāhanadattaś ca tvaṃ ca tulyau sutau mama / tadetāṃ rakṣa kauśāmbīṃ rājya tubhyaṃ mayārpitam // 16.1.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ vatseśvareṇoktastaṃ sa gopālako 'bravīt / yuṣmākaṃ yā gatiḥ sā me nāhaṃ vastyaktumutsahe // 16.1.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etadevānubandhena sa jalpansvasṛvatsalaḥ / vatsarājena jagade kopaṃ kṛtvaiva kṛtrimam // 16.1.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
adyaiva tvamanāyatto jāto mithyānuvṛtta me / khapadāc cyavamānasya kasyājñāṃ ko hi manyate // 16.1.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukto 'vāṅmukho rājñā rūkṣaṃ gopālako rudan / vanāya kṛtabuddhiḥ sansaṃpratyatra nyavartata // 16.1.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato rājā gajārūḍho devyāvāsavadattayā / padāvatyā ca sahitaḥ sa pratasthe samantrikaḥ // 16.1.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
kauśāmbyā nirgataṃ tasyāḥ sākrandāḥ sāśrudurdināḥ / sayoṣidbālavṛddhāś ca paurāstamanu niryayuḥ // 16.1.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gopālako vaḥ pāteti tānāśvāsya kathaṃcana / nivartya ca sa vatseśaḥ prāyātkālaṃjaraṃ girim // 16.1.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāpya taṃ ca samāruhya praṇamya ca vṛṣadhvajam / sarvakālapriyāṃ vīṇāṃ kṛtvā ghoṣavatīṃ kare // 16.1.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pārśvagābhyāṃ sa devībhyāmanvito mantribhiḥ saha / yaugandharāyaṇādyaistaiḥ patito 'bhūtprapātataḥ // 16.1.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
patanneva vimānena bhāsvareṇa sa bhūpatiḥ / āgatenānugaiḥ sārdhaṃ dyotamāno divaṃ gataḥ // 16.1.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etadvidyāmukhāc chrutvā hā tātetyabhidhāya saḥ / naravāhanadatto 'tra papāta bhuvi mūrcchitaḥ // 16.1.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
labdhasaṃjñaś ca pitaraṃ mātaraṃ pitṛmantriṇaḥ / anvaśocannijāmātyaiḥ pramītapitṛkaiḥ saha // 16.1.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

anuśocasi cāśocyān kṛtakṛtyān pitṝn katham / yeṣāṃ vidyādharendraikacakravartī bhavān sutaḥ // 16.1.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti vidyādharādhīśair dhanavatyā ca bodhitaḥ / sa pitṛbhyo jalaṃ dattvā vidyāṃ papraccha tāṃ punaḥ // 16.1.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mātulo me sa gopālaḥ kvāste kimakaroditi / tato vidyāpi sā bhūyaḥ samrājaṃ tam abhāṣata // 16.1.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gate mahāpathagiriṃ vatsarāje 'nuśocya tam / bhaginīṃ cādhruvaṃ matvā sarvaṃ sthitvā bahiḥ puraḥ // 16.1.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ujjayinyāstamānāyya bhrātaraṃ pālakaṃ ca saḥ / prādādgopālakastasmai kauśāmbīrājyam apy adaḥ // 16.1.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājyadvayasthe tasmiṃś ca so 'nuje 'tha tapovanam / vair āgyeṇāsitagiriṃ prayātaḥ kaśyapāśramam // 16.1.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatra valkalamādāya tapasyanmunimadhyagaḥ / mātulastiṣṭhati sa te deva gopālako 'dhunā // 16.1.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
śrutvaitaddraṣṭumutkastaṃ mātulaṃ saparicchadaḥ / naravāhanadatto 'gādvimānenāsitācalam // 16.1.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāvatīrya gaganādvṛto vidyādhareśvaraiḥ / apaśyadāśramapadaṃ sa muneḥ kaśyapasya tat // 16.1.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
saprekṣitamivānekakṛṣṇasāramṛgabhramaiḥ / sasvāgatācāram iva kvaṇitena patattriṇām // 16.1.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
juhvatām agnihotrāṇi dhūmarājisamudgamaiḥ / pradarśayadivārohamārgaṃ divi tapasvinām // 16.1.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tatra madhye jaṭālaṃ taṃ taruvalkalavāsasam / mūrtaṃ śamamivādrākṣīnmātulaṃ munibhir vṛtam // 16.1.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

athobhau tau navībhūtaśokau bandhūnaśocatām / svajanālokavāteddho duḥkhāgniḥ kaṃ na tāpayet // 16.1.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadduḥkhadarśanārteṣu tiryakṣvapyatra tau tataḥ / upetyāśvāsayāmāsurmunayaḥ kaśyapādayaḥ // 16.1.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha tasminnahani gate prātargopālakaṃ sa taṃ samrāṭ / ehi madaiśvarye tvaṃ nivasetyabhyarthayāmāsa // 16.1.104	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
gopālako 'pi tam uvāca sa kiṃ na vatsa paryāptam evamamunā tava darśanena / snehas tavāsti mayi cet tad ihaiva varṣākālaṃ samāgatam imaṃ nivasāśrame tvam // 16.1.105	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
iti naravāhanadattas tenokto mātulena tatkālam / sāricchadaḥ sa tasminnasitagirau kaśyapāśrame tasthau // 16.1.106	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
athāsitagirau tasminnāsthānasthaṃ vyajijñapat / naravāhanadattaṃ taṃ svasenāpatirekadā // 16.2.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adyāhaṃ deva harmyastho rakṣansainyāni dṛṣṭavān / divyena puṃsā nabhasi hriyamāṇāṃ niśi striyam // 16.2.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
krandantīṃ hāryaputreti kāntisarvasvahāriṇīm / labdhvaivānāyitāṃ buddhvāṃ tatkālabalinendunā // 16.2.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āḥ pāpa paradārāṃstvamapahṛtya kva yāsyasi / naravāhanadattasya rājye devasya rakṣituḥ // 16.2.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yojanānāṃ sahasreṣu ṣaṣṭau vaidyādhare pade / tiryañco 'pi hi nādharmaṃ kurvanty anyeṣu kā kathā // 16.2.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvaiva pradhāvyāśu sānugena mayā svayam / saṃyamya sa pumānvyomnaḥ sanārīko 'vatāritaḥ // 16.2.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avatārya ca paśyāmo yāvat syālaḥ sa te prabho / bhrātā yuṣmanmahādevyā ityakākhyo nabhaścaraḥ // 16.2.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
devyāṃ kaliṅgasenāyāṃ jāto madanavegataḥ / keyaṃ kimetāṃ harasīty ukto 'smābhiś ca so 'bhyadhāt // 16.2.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
iyaṃ mataṅgadevasya vidyādharapateḥ sutā / utpannāśokamañjaryāṃ nāmnā suratamañjarī // 16.2.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

kenārye pariṇītā tvaṃ kathaṃ prāptāsi cāmunā / iti sātha mayā pṛṣṭāvocatsuratamañjarī // 16.2.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asty ujjayinyāṃ nṛpatiḥ śrīmān pālakasaṃjñakaḥ / kumāras tasya putro 'sti sunāmāvantivardhanaḥ // 16.2.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
teneha pariṇītāhaṃ suptā harmyatale 'dya ca / āryaputrasya suptasya hṛtāsmyetena pāpmanā // 16.2.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktavatī sā ca saṃyatasthaḥ sa cetyakaḥ / mayeha sthāpitau tau dvau pramāṇamadhunā prabhuḥ // 16.2.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ hariśikhātsenāpateḥ śrutvā sasaṃśayam / gatvā gopālakāyaitaccakravartī śaśaṃsa saḥ // 16.2.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gopālako 'pi so 'vādīdvatsaitadviditaṃ na me / sāṃprataṃ pariṇītaiṣā jāne pālakasūnunā // 16.2.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

prāptau kṛtapraṇāmau ca sa tau gopālakānvitaḥ / snehādarābhyāṃ saṃmānya prakṛtaṃ pṛcchati sma tam // 16.2.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)

satsu vāyupathādyeṣu munu tiṣṭhati kaśyape / so 'nyeṣu ca jagādaivaṃ mantrī bharatarohakaḥ // 16.2.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tāvat sa rākṣaso 'vādīnmā rājanmāṃ vadhīrmṛṣā / anya eva sa ko 'pīha yaḥ khādati purādhipān // 16.2.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ko 'sau brūhīti rājñā tatpṛṣṭaṃ rakṣo 'bravītpunaḥ / astīhāṅgārako nāma pātālanilayo 'suraḥ // 16.2.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

vakti rajyadarajyadvā kāryākārye satāṃ manaḥ / atra caiṣā kathā devi na śrutā cenniśamyatām // 16.2.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prākprasenajito rājñaḥ supratiṣṭhitasaṃjñake / pure kuraṅgī nāmnābhūdatirūpavatī sutā // 16.2.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sā jātudyānaniryātā bandhabhraṣṭena hastinā / uccikṣipe savahanā dhāvitvopari dantayoḥ // 16.2.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
vidrute parivāre 'syāḥ sākrande taṃ gajaṃ prati / tatrāttakhaḍgaś caṇḍālakumāraḥ ko'py adhāvata // 16.2.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sa taṃ lūnakaraṃ khaḍgaprahāreṇa mahāgajam / hatvā tāṃ mocayām āsa pravīro rājakanyakām // 16.2.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato milatparijanā sā jagāma svamandiram / ākṛṣṭahṛdayā tasya vīryasaundaryasaṃpadā // 16.2.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa me vāraṇatastrātā bhartā vā mṛtyureva vā / iti saṃcintayantī ca tasthau tadbirahāturā // 16.2.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa caṇḍālakumāro 'pi śanair gatvā nijaṃ gṛham / tadrūpahṛtacittaḥ sandhyāyaṃstāṃ paryatapyata // 16.2.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kutrāhamantyajanmāyaṃ kutra sā rājakanyakā / kākasya rājahaṃsyāś ca kīdṛśaḥ kva samāgamaḥ // 16.2.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hāsyametac ca śaknomi na vaktuṃ nāpy upekṣitum / tasmānmaraṇamevātra saṃkaṭe śaraṇaṃ mama // 16.2.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityālocya sa gatvā ca niśāyāṃ pitṛkānanam / snātvā kṛtvā citāmagniṃ prajvālyaiva vyajijñapat // 16.2.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
eva pāvaka viśvātmaṃstvayyātmāhutidānataḥ / janmāntare 'pi sā bhūyādbhāryā rājasutā mama // 16.2.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavantaṃ hutabhujyātmānaṃ kṣeptumudyatam / prakaṭībhūya sākṣāt taṃ prasanno 'gnir abhāṣata // 16.2.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
mā kṛthāḥ sāhasaṃ bhāryā bhaviṣyati tavaiva sā / nahi tvaṃ pūrvacaṇḍālo yaś ca tvāṃ vacmi tacchṛṇu // 16.2.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āste kapilaśarmākhyo nagare 'smin dvijottamaḥ / tasyānnyagāre pratyakṣaḥ sakāraḥ sanvasāmy aham // 16.2.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatra jātvantikaprāptāṃ tatsutāṃ rūpalobhataḥ / kanyāmakaravaṃ bhāryāṃ varotsāritadūṣaṇām // 16.2.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyaṃ tadaiva jātastvaṃ mama vīryeṇa putraka / tayā ca lajjayā rathyāmukhe kṣipto 'si tatkṣaṇam // 16.2.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatastvaṃ prāpya caṇḍālair ajākṣīreṇa vardhitaḥ / tadaivaṃ brāhmaṇīgarbhasaṃbhūtastvaṃ mamātmajaḥ // 16.2.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato nāstyapavitratvaṃ mattejaḥ saṃbhavasya te / prāpsyasyeva ca bhāryāṃ tāṃ kuraṅgīṃ rājakanyakām // 16.2.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvāntardadhe vahniḥ so 'pi saṃprāptasaṃmadaḥ / mātaṅgakṛtrimasuto jātāsthaḥ svagṛhaṃ yayau // 16.2.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tataḥ prasenajidrājā svapne 'gniprerito dadau / anviṣṭatattvas tasmai tāṃ sutāṃ pāvakasūnave // 16.2.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
evaṃ bhavanti pracchannā divyā devi sadā bhuvi / tadeṣā kāpi divyaiva nāntyā suratamañjarī // 16.2.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyadeva hi tadratnaṃ matsūnoḥ sā ca niścitam / janmāntarapriyatamā cakṣūrāgopavarṇitā // 16.2.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
evamasmāsu tiṣṭhatsu rājñi bruvati pālake / avarṇayamahaṃ tatra kaivartīyāmimāṃ kathām // 16.2.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abhunmalayasiṃhākhyo rājā rājagṛhe purā / tasya māyāvatītyāsīdrūpeṇāpratimā sutā // 16.2.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā krīḍantī madhūdyāne rūpayauvanaśālinā / kaivartakakumāreṇa dṛṣṭā kenāpi jātucit // 16.2.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca tāṃ suprahārākhyo dṛṣṭvā smaravaśo 'bhavat / sādhyāsādhyavicāraṃ hi nekṣate bhavitavyatā // 16.2.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā ca svagṛhaṃ tyaktvā pāṭhīnāharaṇādi saḥ / tasthau tadekacittaḥ sañ śayyāyām ujjhitāśanaḥ // 16.2.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anubandhena pṛṣṭaś ca svābhiprāyaṃ śaśaṃsa saḥ / mātre rakṣitakānāmnyai sāpi putraṃ tam abhyadhāt // 16.2.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
viṣādaṃ muñca putra tvamāhāraṃ bhaja niścitam / etatte sādhayāmyeva svayuktyāhamabhīpsitam // 16.2.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvāśvāsite tasmiñjātāsthe bhuktabhojane / matsyānādāya hṛdyānsā yayau rajasutāgṛham // 16.2.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra ceṭībhir ākhyātā sevoddeśātpraviśya sā / dāśī rakṣitikā tasyai tanmatsyaprābhṛtaṃ dadau // 16.2.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tenaiva ca krameṇaitaddadatī sā dine dine / vacanākāṅkṣiṇīṃ cakre tām ārādhya nṛpātmajām // 16.2.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
brūhi vāñchasi yanmattastatkuryām apiduṣkaram / iti prītātha sāvocattāṃ dāśīṃ rājakanyakā // 16.2.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sā dhīvarī prāha rahastāṃ yācitābhayā / udyānadṛṣṭāṃ tvāṃ devi vinā klāmyati me sutaḥ // 16.2.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
āśāṃ pradarśya ca mayā prāṇatyāgātsa rakṣyate / tatkṛpā mayi cettanme sutaṃ sparśena jīvaya // 16.2.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ tayoktā kaivartayoṣitā sā nṛpāmajā / salajjā sānurodhā ca vimṛśyaivam uvāca tām // 16.2.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
guptamānaya taṃ tāvannaktaṃ manmandiraṃ sutam / tac chrutvaiva prahṛṣṭā sa yayau dāśī sutāntikam // 16.2.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
naktaṃ ca sā yathāśakti svair aṃ racitamaṇḍanam / tamānināya tadrājakanyāntaḥpuramātmajam // 16.2.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra taṃ rājaputrī sā suprahāraṃ cirotsukam / has te gṛhītvā śayane kṛtaprītirnyaveśayat // 16.2.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
āśvāsayām āsa ca taṃ klāntāṅgaṃ virahāgninā / śrīkhaṇḍaśiśirasparśakarasaṃvāhanena sā // 16.2.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi tena sudhāsikta iva dāśīsutaściram / kṛtārthamānī viśrānto jahre sapadi nidrayā // 16.2.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
supte cāsmin nṛpasutā gatvā suṣvāpa sānyataḥ / yuktirañjitakaivartasutā rakṣitaviplavā // 16.2.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'sya tatkarasparśavigamapratibodhinaḥ / hastopanatavibhraṣṭāṃ vallabhāṃ tāmapaśyataḥ // 16.2.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nidhikumbhīmivātīva daridrasya viṣādinaḥ / dāśasūnornirāśasya sadyaḥ prāṇā viniryayuḥ // 16.2.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadbuddhvāgatya nindantī sātmānaṃ rājakanyakā / prātastena sahāroḍhuṃ citāṃ vyavasitābhavat // 16.2.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato malayasiṃho 'syāḥ pitā buddhvā nṛpo 'tra tat / etyānivāryāṃ dṛṣṭvaitāmācamyaivaṃ vaco 'bravīt // 16.2.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
yadi satyam ahaṃ bhakto devadeve trilocane / tan me vadata kartavyaṃ lokapālā yathocitam // 16.2.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavantaṃ rājānaṃ divyā vāgevam abravīt / pūrvabhāryeyametasya dāśayūno bhavatsutā // 16.2.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
grāme nāgasthalākhye hi mahīdharasutaḥ purā / abhūdbaladharo nāma brāhmaṇo guṇavattaraḥ // 16.2.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa gate pitari svargaṃ hṛtavittaḥ svagotrajaiḥ / virakto bhāryayā sākaṃ jagāma dyunadītaṭam // 16.2.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dehaṃ tyakṣyannirāhāraḥ sthitas tatra vilokya saḥ / dāśān bhakṣayato matsyān manasā śraddadhe kṣudhā // 16.2.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'tra pañcatāṃ yātaṃ tatsaṃkalpakalaṅkitam / svabhāryā śuddhasaṃkalpā tapaḥsthaiva tamanvagāt // 16.2.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa eṣa jātaḥ saṃkalpadoṣāddāśakule dvijaḥ / bhāryāsya sā ca sutapā jātaiṣā te sutā nṛpa // 16.2.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tadetaṃ pūrvabhartāraṃ rājanneṣā tvadātmajā / jīvayatvāyuṣo 'rdhena gatāyuṣamaninditā // 16.2.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etattapaḥprabhāvāddhi tattīrthapramayāt tathā / pūto 'yaṃ tava jāmātā bhūtvā rājā bhaviṣyati // 16.2.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukto divyayā vācā suprahārāya tāṃ sutām / dattāyurardhāṃ ca dadau tasmai labdhāsave nṛpaḥ // 16.2.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
taddattair bhūmihasyaśvaratnair bhūtvā sa bhūpatiḥ / suprahāraḥ kṛtī tasthau prāpya bhāryāṃ tadātmajām // 16.2.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ prāgjanmasaṃbandhaḥ prāyaḥ prītyai śarīriṇām / kiṃ caivaṃ caurasaṃbaddhāpy atreyaṃ śrūyatāṃ kathā // 16.2.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ayodhyāyāmabhūdrājā vīrabāhuriti śrutaḥ / yo rarakṣa svasaṃtānanirviśeṣaṃ sadā prajāḥ // 16.2.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kadācit taṃ ca rājānam etya paurā vyajijñapan / caurā muṣṇanti nagarīm imāṃ pratiniśaṃ prabho // 16.2.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
jāgradbhir api cāsmābhiḥ śakyā lakṣayituṃ na te / tac chrutvā sthāpayām āsa so 'tra cārān nṛpo niśi // 16.2.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
te 'pi prāpurna yaccaurānna cāśāmyadupadravaḥ / tena rājā svayaṃ rātrau tadanveṣṭuṃ viniryayau // 16.2.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekākī khaḍahastaś ca paribhrāmyansa sarvataḥ / saṃcarantaṃ dadarśaikaṃ prākāropari pūruṣam // 16.2.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhayāllaghupadanyāsaṃ kākacañcalalocanam / mṛgārim iva paśyantaṃ muhurvalitakaṃdharam // 16.2.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vikoṣāsiviniryātair lakṣitaṃ khaḍgaraśmibhiḥ / tāraratnāpahārārtham iva seraṇa rajjubhiḥ // 16.2.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvā cācintayadrājā cauro 'yaṃ vedmi niścitam / dhruvamekacareṇeyaṃ muṣyate 'nena me purī // 16.2.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityālocya nṛpaścauraṃ caturastam upāgamat / cauro 'pi sa tamaprākṣītsaśaṅkaṃ ko bhavāniti // 16.2.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato rājābravīdetaṃ bahuvyasanadurbharaḥ / ahaṃ sāhasikaścaurastvaṃ ca me brūhi ko bhavān // 16.2.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
cauro 'pyuvācaikacarastaskaro 'haṃ mahādhanaḥ / tadehi madgṛhaṃ yāvaddhanecchāṃ pūrayāmi te // 16.2.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā dasyunā tena samaṃ rājā tatheti saḥ / yayau vanāntas tadveśma kṣmātale khātanirmitam // 16.2.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
adhiṣṭhitaṃ varastrībhir bhūriratnaprakāśitam / sadā navopabhogaṃ ca bhujaṃganagaropamam // 16.2.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato garbhagṛhaṃ tasmin praviṣṭe taskare nṛpam / bāhyasthānasthitaṃ dāsī tam ekā sakṛpābhyadhāt // 16.2.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kvāsi praviṣṭo niryāhi śīghraṃ viśvastaghātakaḥ / hanyādekacaro hi tvāṃ pratibhedabhayādayam // 16.2.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā nirgato rājā drutaṃ gatvā svamandiram / senāpatiṃ samāhūya sasainyaḥ punarāyayau // 16.2.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āgatya ruddhvā tadveśma śūrānantaḥ praveśya ca / hṛtārthasaṃcayaṃ cauramavaṣṭabhyānināya tam // 16.2.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatāyāṃ niśi tenātha sa rājñādiṣṭanigrahaḥ / cauro vipaṇimadhyena vadhyabhūmimanīyata // 16.2.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nīyamānaṃ ca taṃ tatra dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭyanurāgiṇī / vaṇiksutaikā pitaraṃ tatkṣaṇaṃ svam abhāṣata // 16.2.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
yo 'yaṃ vadhyabhuvaṃ tāta nīyate dattaḍiṇḍimaḥ / asau cet syān na me bhartā tan mṛtāṃ viddhi mām iti // 16.2.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vīkṣyātha durnivārāṃ tāṃ gatvā bhūpaṃ sa tatpitā / dravyakoṭyāpi caurasya tasya muktimayācata // 16.2.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhūpo 'pi tasmai vaṇije cukrodha na tu taskaram / taṃ mumocāvilambyaiva śūlāyāṃ taṃ nyaveśayat // 16.2.168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sā vāmadattākhyā vaṇikkanyā kalevaram / caurasyādāya tasyāgniṃ praviveśānurāgataḥ // 16.2.169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ prāgjanmasaṃbandhaparāyat teṣu jantuṣu / bhāvi ko vastv atikrāmet ko vā kiṃ kasya vārayet // 16.2.170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmātputrasya te kāpi pūrvasaṃbandhanirmitā / avantivardhanasyaiṣā rājansuratamañjarī // 16.2.171	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyathā kathametasya rājasūnoḥ sujanmanaḥ / mātaṅgyāmiha tasyāṃ syādabhiṣvaṅgo 'yamīdṛśaḥ // 16.2.172	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmādutpalahastaḥ sa mātaṅgastatpitā prabho / tāṃ sutāṃ yācyatāṃ tāvat paśyāmaḥ kiṃ bravītyasau // 16.2.173	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam ukto mayā rājā pālakaḥ prāhiṇottadā / dūtānutpalahastāya tāṃ kanyāṃ tatra yācitum // 16.2.174	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca tair yācito dūtair mātaṅgo nijagāda tān / etanme 'bhimataṃ kiṃ tu yo bhojayati madgṛhe // 16.2.175	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṣṭādaśasahasrāṇi viprāṇāṃ puravāsinām / tasmai mayāsau dātavyā sutā suratamañjarī // 16.2.176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
etac chrutvā vacas tasya sapratijñaṃ tathaiva te / āgatya dūtā rājñe tatpālakāya nyavedayan // 16.2.177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
etatsakāraṇaṃ matvā saṃghāṭya brāhmaṇān puri / ujjayinyāṃ samākhyātavṛttāntaḥ kṣitipo 'bravīt // 16.2.178	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhuṅgdhvamutpalahas tasya mātaṅgasyeha veśmani / aṣṭādaśasahasrāṇi yūyaṃ neccheyamanyathā // 16.2.179	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktā bhūbhṛtā bhītāścaṇḍālānnāc ca te dvijāḥ / kartavyamūḍhāḥ saṃśritya mahākālaṃ vyadhustapaḥ // 16.2.180	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)

rājannuttiṣṭha vakṣyāvaḥ sabhāryāsacivasya te / prātaḥ sarvaṃ yathātattvaṃ vijane pāraṇe kṛte // 17.1.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā tau tirobhūtau haṃsau rājā prabuddhya ca / bhāryāmantriyutaḥ prātaścakārotthāya pāraṇam // 17.1.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhuktottaraṃ ca tatrāmbulīlāgehāntare sthitam / nṛpaṃ svabhāryāmātyaṃ taṃ haṃsau tāv abhyupeyatuḥ // 17.1.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kau yuvāṃ brūtamity uktau tenābhyarcyaiva bhūbhujā / kramāttasmai svavṛttāntam evamācakhyatuś ca tau // 17.1.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asti mandara ityadrirājo jagati viśrutaḥ / viharatsurasaṃghātavirājadratnakānanaḥ // 17.1.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yasyāmṛtena sikteṣu mathitakṣīravāridheḥ / jarāmṛtyuharaṃ puṣpaphalamūlāmbusānuṣu // 17.1.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kailāsādhikakāntasya yasya śṛṅgāgrabhūmayaḥ / nānāsadratnaracitā līlodyānāni dhūrjaṭeḥ // 17.1.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatra jātu kṛtakrīḍo devo 'vasthāpya pārvatīm / devakāryānurodhena kenapyantardadhe haraḥ // 17.1.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tadvirahākrāntā tatkrīḍāketaneṣu sā / babhrāmāśvāsyamānātra pārvatī devatāntaraiḥ // 17.1.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā ca madhuprāptisodvegā sā gaṇair vṛtā / devī tarutale yāvat priyacintākulā sthitā // 17.1.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvajjayāsutāṃ tatra devyāścāmaradhāriṇīm / kumārīṃ candralekhākhyāṃ sābhilāṣāvalokinīm // 17.1.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
samānarūpatāruṇyo nikaṭastho guṇottamaḥ / maṇipuṣpeśvaro nāma sābhilāṣo vyalokayat // 17.1.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taddṛṣṭvānyau gaṇau nāmnā piṅgeśvaraguheśvarau / babhūvatuḥ smitamukhāv anyonyānanadarśinau // 17.1.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tau cālokya tathābhūtau kasyaitau hasato 'pade / ityantaḥ kupitā devī dadau dṛṣṭimitas tataḥ // 17.1.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvattāvatra cānyonyamukhe smerārpitekṣaṇau / dadarśa candralekhāṃ tāṃ maṇipuṣpeśvaraṃ ca tam // 17.1.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato virahasodvegā kruddhā devī jagāda sā / devasyāsaṃnidhau suṣṭhu smaraprekṣaṇakaṃ kṛtam // 17.1.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etābhyāṃ hāsaśīlābhyāṃ hasitaṃ prekṣya suṣṭhu ca / tanmartyayonau kāmāndhau strīpuṃsau patatāmimau // 17.1.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatraiva daṃpatī caitāv avinītau bhaviṣyataḥ / hāsaśīlāv imau kleśān prāpsyatas tu bahūn bhuvi // 17.1.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
brāhmaṇau duḥkhitau pūrvaṃ tadanu brahmarākṣasau / tataḥ piśācakau paścāccaṇḍālau taskarau tataḥ // 17.1.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
chinnapucchau tataḥ śvānau vividhau ca tataḥ khagau / bhaviṣyato gaṇāvetau parihāsāparādhinau // 17.1.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ābhyāṃ hi svasthacittābhyāmeṣa durvinayaḥ kṛtaḥ / iyādiṣṭavatīṃ devīṃ dhūrjaṭākhyo 'vadadgaṇaḥ // 17.1.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atyayuktamidaṃ devi na khalvete guṇottamāḥ / iyantaṃ śāpamarhanti svalpādevāparādhataḥ // 17.1.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvaivābravīt kopād devī tam api dhūrjaṭam / martyayonāvanātmajña bhavānapi patatviti // 17.1.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dattaśāpapratāpāṃ tāṃ pratīhārī jayāmbikām / jananī candralekhāyāḥ pādalagnā vyajijñapat // 17.1.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prasīda devi śāpāntaṃ kurvasyā duhiturmama / eteṣāṃ ca svabhṛtyānāmajñānavihitāgasām // 17.1.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vijñapteti pratīhāryā jayayā girijābravīt / yadā sarve miliṣyanti jñānaprāptivaśātkramāt // 17.1.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
brahmādīnāṃ tapaḥkṣetre dṛṣṭvā siddhīśvaraṃ tadā / eṣyanti padamasmākaṃ muktaśāpā ime punaḥ // 17.1.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
manuṣye candralekheyametatkāntaḥ sa dhūrjaṭaḥ / sukhino 'mī bhaviṣyanti trayo dvau duḥkhināvimau // 17.1.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā viratā yāvat sā devī tāvadāyayau / tatrāsuraḥ kila jñātaharāsaṃnidhirandhakaḥ // 17.1.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa devīṃ prepsurutsiktastatparicchadabhartsitaḥ / gato vijñāya devena jñātvā tatkāraṇaṃ hataḥ // 17.1.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtakāryo 'ntikāyātastuṣṭāmuktāndhakāgamām / so 'tha devo jagādaivaṃ girijāṃ girijāpatiḥ // 17.1.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mānasaḥ pūrvaputras te so 'ndhako 'dya hato mayā / tvagasthiśeṣo bhṛṅgī ca bhaviṣyaty adhuneha saḥ // 17.1.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ity uktvā sa samaṃ devyā tatrāsīd viharan haraḥ / maṇipuṣpeśv arādyāś ca pañca te 'vātaran bhuvi // 17.1.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tāvaddvayo rājaṃs tasya piṅgeśvarasya ca / guheśvarasya codantaṃ citrāyitam imaṃ śṛṇu // 17.1.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asti yajñasthalākhyo 'sminn agrahāro mahītale / tatrābhūd yajñasomākhyo brāhmaṇo dhanavān guṇī // 17.1.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya dvāvudapadyetāṃ putrau vayasi madhyame / harisomastayor jyeṣṭhaḥ kaniṣṭho devasomakaḥ // 17.1.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tayos tasya samuttīrṇabālyayor upanītayoḥ / viprasyādau dhanaṃ kṣīṇaṃ sabhāryasyāyuṣā tataḥ // 17.1.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tau tatsutau dīnau pitṛhīnāvavṛttikau / hṛtāgrahārau dāyādair mantrayāmāsaturmithaḥ // 17.1.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
bhikṣaikavṛttī jātau svo na ca bhikṣāmavāpnuvaḥ / taddūram apigacchāvo varaṃ mātāmahaṃ gṛham // 17.1.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhraṣṭau yady api nau ko 'tra śraddadhyātsvayamāgatau / tathāpi yāvaḥ kiṃ kurvo nahyanyāstyāvayor gatiḥ // 17.1.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
iti saṃmantrya yayaturbhikṣamāṇau krameṇa tau / tamagrahāraṃ tadyatra mātāmahagṛhaṃ tayoḥ // 17.1.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatra taṃ somadevākhyaṃ mṛtaṃ mātāmahaṃ janāt / pṛcchantau tāvabudhyetāṃ mandabhāgyau sabhāryakam // 17.1.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataś ca tau yajñadevakratudevābhidhānayoḥ / rajorūkṣau viviśaturvignau mātulayor gṛham // 17.1.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatrādṛtya samāśvāsya tābhyāṃ kḷptāśanāmbarau / sadviprābhyāmadhīyānau yāvattau tatra tiṣṭhataḥ // 17.1.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tavattāvapy upakṣīṇadhanībhūtāvabhṛtyakau / mātulau bhāgineyau tau prītipūrvamavocatām // 17.1.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
putrau daridrībhūtānām asmākaṃ paśupālakam / kartuṃ nāsty adya sāmarthyaṃ tad yuvāṃ rakṣakaṃ paśūn // 17.1.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktau mātulābhyāṃ tau bāṣpakaṇṭhau tatheti tat / harisomadevasomau tadvaco 'bhyupajagmatuḥ // 17.1.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: asamīcīna)
tato 'ṭavyāṃ paśūnnītvā satataṃ tau rarakṣatuḥ / pariśrāntau ca sāyaṃ tāvādāyājagmaturgṛham // 17.1.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathā tayoḥ pāśupālyaṃ kurvatordaivaśaptayoḥ / ahāryata paśuḥ kaś citkaścidvyāghrair abhakṣyata // 17.1.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tau mātulau yāvadudvignau tāvadekadā / dhenuśchāgaś ca yajñārthau dvau tayoḥ kvāpi neśatuḥ // 17.1.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadbhayāt tān gṛhaṃ nītvaivānyān asamaye paśūn / palāyitau tau cinvantau dūraṃ viviśitur vanam // 17.1.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatra vyāghrārdhajagdhaṃ taṃ chāgaṃ dadṛśaturnijam / śocitvopahatātmānāvevaṃ jagadatuś ca tau // 17.1.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
chāgo 'yaṃ mātulābhyāṃ nau yajñārthaṃ paryakalpyata / tasminnaṣṭe ca durvārastayoḥ kopo bhaviṣyati // 17.1.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadasya māṃsaṃ saṃskṛtya vahnau bhuktvā hatakṣudhau / śeṣamādāya gacchāvaḥ kvāpy āvāṃ bhaikṣyajīvinau // 17.1.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti saṃcintya yāvattaṃ chāgaṃ saṃskuruto 'nale / tāvadājagmatuḥ paścāddhāvantau mātulau tayoḥ // 17.1.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tābhyāṃ chāgaṃ pacantau tau dṛṣṭvāvutthāya saṃbhramāt / dūrāttaddarśanatrastau palāyya yayatus tataḥ // 17.1.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

iti tau mātulau kruddhau tayoḥ śāpaṃ viteratuḥ / abhūtāṃ dvijaputrau ca sadyastau brahmarakṣasau // 17.1.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
daṃṣṭrāviśaṅkaṭamukhau dīptakeśau bubhukṣitau / prāṇinaḥ prāpya khādantāvaṭavyāṃ bhrematuś ca tau // 17.1.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā tāpasaṃ hantuṃ yoginaṃ tāvadhāvatām / tatprāpatuḥ piśācatvaṃ śaptau tena pratighnatā // 17.1.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
piśācatve 'pi tau hantuṃ harantau brāhmaṇasya gām / tanmantrabhagnau tacchāpaccaṇḍālatvamavāpatuḥ // 17.1.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
caṇḍālatve dhanuṣpāṇī bhramantau kṣunnipīḍitau / kadāciccaurapallīṃ tāṃ prāpaturbhojanārthinau // 17.1.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra dṛṣṭvaiva taddvārarakṣakāścauraśaṅkayā / caurāvaṣṭabhya tau cakruśchinnaśravaṇanāsikau // 17.1.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathāvidhau ca tau baddhau ninyuste taskarās tataḥ / pārśvaṃ pradhānacaurāṇāṃ laguḍāhatitāḍitau // 17.1.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra pṛṣṭau pradhānaistau cauraistair bhayaviklavau / kṣudduḥkhāvaptasaṃkleśaṃ svavṛttāsntamaśaṃsatām // 17.1.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas te kṛpayā mukhyacaurā bandhādvimucya tau / ūcustiṣṭhatamaśnītamiha mā bhūdbhayaṃ ca vām // 17.1.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṣṭamyāmadya senānipūjanāvasare yuvām / asmākamatithī prāptau saṃvibhāgamihārhathaḥ // 17.1.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvārcitadevīkāś caurās te svāgrabhojitau / tatyajur naiva tau daivād utpannaprītayo 'ntikāt // 17.1.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ krameṇa kurvāṇau cauryaṃ tair dasyubhiḥ saha / mahāsenāpatī teṣāṃ saṃvṛttau tau svaśauryataḥ // 17.1.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā cauracāroktaṃ śaivakṣetraṃ mahatpuram / senāpatī tau muṣituṃ sasainyau jagmaturniśi // 17.1.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
animitte 'pi dṛṣṭe tāvanivṛttāvavāpya tat / luṇṭhayāmāsatuḥ kṛtsnaṃ sadevabhuvanaṃ puram // 17.1.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tadakasmādvilokyaiva matvā śārvamanugraham / paurāḥ saṃbhūya dasyūṃstānnijaghnurlaguḍāśmabhiḥ // 17.1.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

taddṛṣṭvā vismitāḥ sarve savipravaṇijo janāḥ / gatacaurabhayā hṛṣṭā hasantaḥ svagṛhānyayuḥ // 17.1.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tathaiva dṛśyamānau tair yāvat tau divasān bahūn / śvānau sthitau gaṇas tāvad evaṃ śaṃbhuṃ vyajijñapan // 17.1.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
deva śaptāvimau devyā piṅgeśvaraguheśvarau / bahukālaṃ gaṇau kliṣṭau tatkṛpāmetayoḥ kuru // 17.1.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvovāca bhagavānidānīṃ sārameyatām / parityajya gaṇāvetau vāy asau bhavatāmiti // 17.1.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

kālena bhaktituṣṭasya nideśāc chaṃkarasya tau / bhāsāvabhūtāṃ prathamaṃ tato 'pi ca śikhaṇḍinau // 17.1.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tato 'pi haṃsatāṃ prāptau tau kālena gaṇeśvarau / tatrāpi parayā bhaktyā tāvārādhayatāṃ haram // 17.1.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tīrthasnānair vratair dhyānaiḥ pūjanaistoṣiteśvarau / hemaratnamayau tau ca saṃjātau jñāninau tathā // 17.1.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvāvāṃ pārvatīśāpaprāptakleśaparamparau / viddhyetau haṃsatāṃ prāptau piṅgeśvaraguheśvarau // 17.1.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jayātmajābhilāṣī yo maṇipuṣpeśvaro gaṇaḥ / devyā śaptaḥ sa jātastvaṃ brahmadatto nṛpo bhuvi // 17.1.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

punaḥ prāpsyasi rājyaṃ ca kanyāṃ sarvottamāmapi / vidyuddhvajāntako yasyā vīro bhartā bhaviṣyati // 17.2.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityādiṣṭo hareṇāhaṃ tavaitadvaktumāgataḥ / gandharvendrāditi śrutvā candraketur uvāca saḥ // 17.2.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mamāpyetasya duḥkhasya śāntyai gatvā maheśvaraḥ / ārādhyastamanārādhya na santīpsitasiddhayaḥ // 17.2.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti niścitya tapase divyaṃ kṣetraṃ triśūlinaḥ / muktāvalyā samaṃ patnyā candraketurjagāma saḥ // 17.2.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi svavaravṛttāntamindrāyoktvā ripukṣaye / utpannāstho yayau somabhuvanaṃ padmaśekharaḥ // 17.2.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ surapatis tatra sa samādhisthale sthitaḥ / jātāsthaḥ saṃkṣaye śatror amartyagurum asmarat // 17.2.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃsmṛtopasthitaṃ tatra prahvaḥ satkṛtya so 'bravīt / tapastuṣṭaḥ śivaḥ padmaśekharasya samādiśat // 17.2.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidyuddhvajasya hantāraṃ bhāvijāmātaraṃ kila / tadasya duṣkṛtasyāntastāvannaḥ kiṃ tvahaṃ ciram // 17.2.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nivasanniha nirviṇṇaḥ svapadabhraṃśaduḥsthitaḥ / taccintayātra bhagavannapāyaṃ śīghrakāriṇam // 17.2.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
iti devaguruḥ śakrādvacaḥ śrutvā jagāda tam / kāmaṃ tasya ripoḥ prāpto duṣkṛtaistapasaḥ kṣayaḥ // 17.2.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmād avasaro 'smākaṃ svaprayatnavidherayam / tadehi brahmaṇe brūmaḥ sa upāyaṃ vadiṣyati // 17.2.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukto guruṇā śakrastadyukto brahmaṇo 'ntikam / yayau praṇamya tasmai ca śaśaṃsa svamanogatam // 17.2.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ svayaṃbhūr avadac cintaiṣā na mamāpi kim / kiṃ tu śarvakṛtaṃ śarveṇaiva śakyaṃ vyapohitum // 17.2.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca devaściraṃ prāpyastadeva nikaṭaṃ hareḥ / tadabhinnātmano yāmaḥ so 'bhyupāyaṃ vadiṣyati // 17.2.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti saṃmantrya sa brahmā śakraḥ suraguruś ca saḥ / haṃsayānam upāruhya śvetadvīpam upāgaman // 17.2.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yatra sarvo janaḥ śaṅkhacakrapadmagadādharaḥ / caturbhujaś ca mūrtau ca citte ca bhagavanmayaḥ // 17.2.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra te dadṛśurdevaṃ mahāratnagṛhāntare / sevitāṅghriṃ kamalayā śeṣaśayyāgataṃ harim // 17.2.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
kṛtapraṇāmās tasmai te yathārhaṃ tena satkṛtāḥ / devarṣivanditāścātra yathocitam upāviśan // 17.2.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhagavatpṛṣṭakuśalā devāste taṃ vyajijñapan / kuśalaṃ kimivāsmākaṃ deva vidyuddhvaje sati // 17.2.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
jānāty eva hi tatsarvaṃ devo yat tena naḥ kṛtam / tadarthaścāgamo 'yaṃ nastaddevo vettyataḥ param // 17.2.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktavato devāṃstānuvāca janārdanaḥ / kiṃ na jānāmi yadbhagnā sthitistenāsureṇa me // 17.2.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ tu svayaṃ yadīśena kṛtaṃ tripuraghātinā / tattenaivānyathā kartuṃ śakyate na punarmayā // 17.2.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tata eva ca tasya syātkṣayo daityasya pāpmanaḥ / tvaradhvaṃ yadi tāvadvo vacmyupāyaṃ niśamyatām // 17.2.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tatparāste harirbrahmā devendro diviṣadguruḥ / tepire haramuddiśya catvāro duścaraṃ tapaḥ // 17.2.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

śāpāvatīrṇo mānuṣye kṛtāmarahitaś ca yaḥ / gandharvarājaduhituḥ padmāvatyāstapobalāt // 17.2.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
punaḥ svapadam āsādya tayaiva saha bhāryayā / sarvaṃ vidyādharaiśvaryaṃ daśa kalpān kariṣyati // 17.2.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti dattavare deve tirobhūte sabhāryakaḥ / candraketustadaivāgātsa vāyubhuvanaṃ punaḥ // 17.2.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

uttiṣṭhatālaṃ kleśena yuṣmatpakṣyeṇa toṣitaḥ / vidyādhareśvareṇāhaṃ tapasā candraketunā // 17.2.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
madaṃśaśaṃbhavas tasya vīraḥ putro janiṣyate / yastaṃ vidyuddhvajaṃ daityaṃ haniṣyatyacirādraṇe // 17.2.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

padmāvatyākhyayā sārdhaṃ tayā gauryaṃśajātayā / patnyā dyucarasāmrājyaṃ kṛtvā mām eva caiṣyati // 17.2.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatsahadhvaṃ manāgeṣaḥ kāmaḥ saṃpanna eva vaḥ / ity acyutādīn uktvā tāñ jagāmādarśanaṃ śivaḥ // 17.2.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tato hṛṣṭo haribrahmā śakrāmaragurū ca tau / jagmuḥ sthānāni tānyeva te bhūyo yebhya āgatāḥ // 17.2.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha vidyādharendrasya tasya muktāvalī priyā / candraketoḥ sagarbhābhūtkāle ca suṣuve sutam // 17.2.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

papāta puṣpavṛṣṭiś ca jñātārthaḥ padmaśekharaḥ / śakraścayayatus tatra ye ca cchannāḥ sthitāḥ surāḥ // 17.2.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

ity uktvā sa vibhustasmai khaḍgaṃ dattvā tirodadhe / sa cāśu rājaputro 'bhūnmahāstrabalavikramaḥ // 17.2.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

dadarśa sa jalaṃ tasyāḥ kapiśaṃ puṣpareṇubhiḥ / madagandhānuviddhaṃ ca vīcivikṣobhitaṃ mahat // 17.2.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tac chrutvopari yātāste paśyanti smāsurā jale / krīḍantaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ śārvaṃ saha śākreṇa dantinā // 17.2.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āgatya ca tamūcuste daityendraṃ deva śāṃbhavaḥ / uparyetya vṛṣaḥ krīḍatyair āvaṇayuto 'mbhasi // 17.2.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tanmālyairāvaṇamadavyāmiśritam idaṃ payaḥ / śrutvetyagaṇayañ śarvaṃ madāc cukrodha so 'suraḥ // 17.2.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

tato gatvā jighṛkṣanti yāvattau te kilāsurāḥ / tāvattāñjaghnatuḥ kruddhau tau pradhāvya vṛṣadvipau // 17.2.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hataśeṣāś ca jagadurgatvā vidyuddhvajāya tat / sa kruddhaḥ prāhiṇottau pratyāsuraṃ sumahadbalam // 17.2.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
mathitvā tac ca tatsainyaṃ pāpapākāgatakṣayam / vṛṣo harāntikaṃ prāyādindramair āvaṇo 'bhyagāt // 17.2.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
indro 'tha tasya ditijasya viceṣṭitaṃ tad airāvaṇānucararakṣigaṇān niśamya / saṃprāptanāśasamayaṃ tamamanyatāriṃ gaurīpater bhagavato 'pi kṛtāvamānam // 17.2.155	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
āvedya tatkamalajāya tataḥ sametya vidyādharādisahitaḥ saha devasainyaiḥ / hantuṃ ripuṃ tamadhirūḍhasurebhamukhyaḥ śakraḥ śacīracitamāṅgalikaḥ pratasthe // 17.2.156	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
tatastriviṣṭapaṃ prāpya sa śakraḥ paryaveṣṭayat / harānugrahasotsāhair labdhakālabalair balaiḥ // 17.3.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taddṛṣṭvā niryayau vidyuddhvajaḥ saṃnaddhasainikaḥ / prāvartantānimittāni tasya nirgacchatastadā // 17.3.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dhvajeṣu vidyutaḥ petur bhremur gṛdhrās tathopari / abhajyanta mahācchattrāṇyaśivaṃ cāruvañ śivāḥ // 17.3.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tānyariṣṭānyagaṇayanniragādeva so 'suraḥ / devāsurāṇaṃ ca tataḥ prāvartata mahāhavaḥ // 17.3.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
sa muktāphalaketuḥ kiṃ nādyāpyetīti vajriṇā / pṛṣṭo 'tha candraketustaṃ khecarendro vyajijñapat // 17.3.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vismṛtya tvarayā tasya noktamāgacchatā mayā / sa tu buddhvā dhruvaṃ paścādāgacchatyeva satvaram // 17.3.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvā sa devendraścaturaṃ vāyusārathim / śrīmuktāphalaketuṃ tamānetuṃ prāhiṇodratham // 17.3.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pitā ca tatsamaṃ tasya candraketuḥ sasainikam / āhvānāya pratīhāraṃ visasarja rathānugam // 17.3.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

prasthitasyāpatattasya puṣpavṛṣṭirnabhastalāt / devāś ca dundubhīñjaghnurvāyavaś ca vavuḥ śivāḥ // 17.3.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
militvā parivavruś ca te taṃ devagaṇās tataḥ / āsan palāyya pracchannā ye vidyuddhvajabhītitaḥ // 17.3.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tena sainyena mahatā saha gacchandadarśa saḥ / mārge meghavanaṃ nāma pārvatyāyatanaṃ mahat // 17.3.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadanullaṅghayan bhaktyā gajād atrāvatīrya saḥ / āhṛtya divyapuṣpāṇi devīṃ prāvartatārcitum // 17.3.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atrāntare ca gandharvapateḥ sa prāptayauvanā / padmāvatī sutā padmaśekharasya sakhīvṛtā // 17.3.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhartuḥ saṅgrāmayātasya śreyorthaṃ tapasi sthitām / mātaraṃ svāmanujñāpya vimānenendulokataḥ // 17.3.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

varo nādyāpi te kaścinniścito yo yudhi sthitaḥ / pituḥ śreyonimittaṃ ca mātā te saṃśritā tapaḥ // 17.3.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvaṃ tu kanyā tapaḥ kasya kṛte sakhi cikīrṣasi / ity uktā pathi sakhyā sā padmāvatyabravīdidam // 17.3.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pitaiva sakhi kanyānāṃ daivataṃ sarvasiddhikṛt / varo 'py ananyasāmanyaguṇo niścita eva me // 17.3.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidyuddhvajaṃ nihantuṃ yo jāto vidyādharendrataḥ / sa muktāphalaketurme vyādiṣṭaḥ śaṃbhunā patiḥ // 17.3.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

iti saṃcintya sā bālā śanair ekākinī tataḥ / yuktyāvaruhya gantuṃ tatpurodyānaṃ pracakrame // 17.4.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
padbhyāṃ gantumaśaktā sā svavibhūterupasthitaiḥ / pakṣibhir vāhanībhūya tadudyānamanīyata // 17.4.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāntaḥ kadalīkhaṇḍagṛhe puṣpāstaropari / upāviśac chrūyamāṇe divyageyādiniḥsvane // 17.4.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
na ca sātra ratiṃ lebhe na tasyāḥ śāmyati smaraḥ / vinā priyeṇa kāmāgniḥ pratyutāvardhatādhikam // 17.4.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato didṛkṣuś citrastham api taṃ priyam utsukā / sāgrahīc citraphalakaṃ varṇavartīś ca siddhitaḥ // 17.4.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
sraṣṭuṃ dvitīyaṃ dhātāpi neṣṭe yatsadṛśaṃ punaḥ / tamālikheyaṃ sotkaṇṭhā sannapāṇirahaṃ katham // 17.4.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tathāpyātmavinodārthamālikhāmi yathā tathā / iti saṃcintya phalake sā tu yāvattamālikhat // 17.4.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tāvattasyāstamuddeśamāyayau cinvatī sakhī / sā manohārikā nāma tadadarśanavihvalā // 17.4.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā tāmekākinīṃ tatra rājaputrīṃ latāgṛhe / sacitraphalakāmutkāmapaśyatpṛṣṭhataḥ sthitā // 17.4.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
paśyāmi tāvatkimiyaṃ karotyevamihaikikā / iti saṃcintya tasthau ca channā sā tatra tatsakhī // 17.4.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvat sāpi tamuddiśya citrābhilikhitaṃ priyam / padmāvatī jagādaivamudaśrunayanotpalā // 17.4.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
drujayān asurān hatvā yenendro rakṣitas tvayā / ālāpamātreṇa sa māṃ kathaṃ mārān na rakṣasi // 17.4.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
kalpadrumo 'py adātṛtvaṃ sugato 'py adayālutām / āyāti mandapuṇyasya suvarṇam apicāśmatām // 17.4.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
smarajvarānabhijñaś ca nūnaṃ vetsi na madvyathām / daityājitasya puṣpeṣuḥ kiṃ tapasvī karoti te // 17.4.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ vā vacmi vidhirvāmo mama yenāśruṇā dṛśau / pidadhannecchati prāyāścitre 'pi tava darśanam // 17.4.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā rājatanayā sā prāvartata roditum / chinnahāragalatsthūlamuktābhair aśrubindubhiḥ // 17.4.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkṣaṇaṃ tām upāsarpat sā manohārikā sakhī / sāpy āchādyaiva taccittraṃ rājaputrī jagāda tām // 17.4.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iyacciraṃ na dṛṣṭā tvaṃ sakhi kutra sthitāsyaho / tac chrutvā vihasantī tāṃ sā manohārikābravīt // 17.4.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvām eva sakhi cinvānā ciraṃ bhrāntāsmi tattvayā / citraṃ kiṃ chādyate dṛṣṭaṃ mayā citramatha śrutam // 17.4.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ tayoktā sakhyā sā padmāvatyaśrugadgadam / lajjānatamukhī has te gṛhītvā tām abhāṣata // 17.4.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sakhi prāg eva viditaṃ sarvam te kiṃ nigūhyate / rājaputreṇa tenāhaṃ tasmin gauryāśrame tadā // 17.4.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
uddhṛtāpi mahāghorarākṣasīvahnimadhyataḥ / durvāravirahajvāle nikṣiptā madanāsnale // 17.4.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tan na jāne kva gacchāmi kasmai vacmi karomi kim / āśraye kam upāyaṃ vā durlabhāsaktamānasā // 17.4.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti bruvāṇāṃ tāṃ rājaputrīm āha sma sā sakhī / abhiṣvaṅgo 'nurūpo 'yaṃ sthāne te manasaḥ sakhi // 17.4.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
itaretaraśobhāyai saṃyogo yuvayoḥ kila / navacandrakalāśārvajaṭāmukuṭayor iva // 17.4.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adhṛtiścātra mā bhūtte dhruvaṃ sa bhavatīṃ vinā / na sthāsyati tvayā kiṃ sa tathābhūto na lakṣitaḥ // 17.4.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
striyo 'pīcchanti puṃbhāvaṃ yāṃ dṛṣṭvā rūpalolubhāḥ / tasyāste ko bhavennārthī tulyarūpaḥ sa kiṃ punaḥ // 17.4.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śarvo 'py alīkavādī kiṃ yenoktau daṃpatī yuvām / adūrage 'py abhīṣṭe 'rthe ko vārto bhajate dhṛtim // 17.4.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadāśvasihi bhāvī te sa eva nacirāt patiḥ / na tvayā durlabhaḥ kaścit tvaṃ tu sarveṇa durlabhā // 17.4.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktā sā tayā sakhyā rājaputrī jagāda tām / sakhī yady api jānāmi tathāpi karavāṇi kim // 17.4.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
idaṃ tu me tadāsaktaṃ ceto notsahate kṣaṇam / sthātuṃ vinā taṃ prāṇeśaṃ kṣamate na ca manmathaḥ // 17.4.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tam eva hi smarantyā me mano nirvāti na kṣaṇam / dahyante 'ṅgāni saṃtāpenotkrāmantīva cāsavaḥ // 17.4.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ vadantī mohena mohitā puṣpapelavā / aṅke tasya vayasyāyā rājaputrī papāta sā // 17.4.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
athāmbusekakadalīpallavānilavījanaiḥ / sāśrur āśvāsayām āsa sā vayasyā krameṇa tām // 17.4.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
mṛṇālahāravalayaṃ śrīkhaṇḍārdravilepanam / nalinīdalaśayyāṃ ca yāni sā vidadhe sakhī // 17.4.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyās tāny api saṃtāpasamāsaktāni saṃgataḥ / saṃtapya samaduḥkhatvam iva śuṣyanti bhejire // 17.4.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sā vihvalā padmāvatī tāmavadatsakhīm / kliśnāsi kiṃ vṛthātmānaṃ naivaṃ śāmyati me vyathā // 17.4.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yena śāmyati taccettvaṃ kuruṣe tacchivaṃ bhavet / evam uktavatīmāsrtāṃ vayasyā tām abhāṣata // 17.4.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kuryāṃ kiṃ yanna nāmāhaṃ tavārthe brūhi tatsakhi / tac chrutvā sā hriyā kiṃcid iva rājasutābravīt // 17.4.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tamihānaya me kantaṃ gatvā priyasakhi drutam / nānyathopaśamo me syāttātaścaiva na kupyati // 17.4.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pratyutehāgatāyaiva māmeṣo 'smai pradāsyati / evaṃ tayoktā sotsāhaṃ vayasyā sāpy uvāca tāsm // 17.4.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
yady evaṃ tadgṛhāṇa tvaṃ dhair yaṃ kāryamidaṃ kiyat / eṣāhaṃ sakhi yāmyeva tvatpriyānayanāya yat // 17.4.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatpituḥ khecarendrasya candraketoḥ purottamam / khyātaṃ candrapuraṃ nāma nirvṛtā bhava kiṃ śucā // 17.4.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti sāśvāsitā sakhyā tayā rājasutābhyadhāt / taduttiṣṭha śivaḥ panthā astu te vraja satvaram // 17.4.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
trātā trayāṇāṃ lokānāṃ sa ca sapraṇayaṃ tvayā / madgirā sakhi vaktavyo vīraḥ prāṇeśvaro mama // 17.4.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmin gauryāyatane tathā paritrāya rākṣasībhayataḥ / strīghnena hanyamānāṃ rakṣasi māṃ makaraketunā na katham // 17.4.65	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
bhuvanoddharaṇasahānāṃ bhavādṛśāmeṣa nātha ko dharmaḥ / āpadyupekṣyate yatpūrvatrāsto jano 'nuvṛtto 'pi // 17.4.66	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
evaṃ vadestaṃ kalyāṇi yathā jānāsi vā svayam / iti vyāhṛtya sā padmāvatī tāṃ vyasṛjatsakhīm // 17.4.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā ca svasiddhyupanataṃ pakṣivāhanamāsthitā / tanmanohārikā prāyādvidyādharapuraṃ prati // 17.4.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

tatra dāsīparivṛtā praviśya nijavāsakam / snātvā gauripatiṃ bhaktyā pūjayitvā vyajijñapat // 17.4.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

tadvidyādharasaccakravartiputraṃ tamīpsitam / na dāsyasi patiṃ cenme dehaṃ tyakṣyāmi te 'grataḥ // 17.4.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ vihitavijñaptiṃ śaśāṅkamukuṭasya tām / śrutvā sakhedaḥ sāścaryaḥ parivārajano 'vadat // 17.4.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
svadehanirapekṣaiva kimevaṃ devi bhāṣase / tavāpi kimasuprāpyaṃ nāmāstyatra jagattraye // 17.4.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

etac chrutvā guṇākṛṣṭā rājaputrī jagāda sā / samāśrayaḥ saśakrāṇāṃ devānāmeka eva yaḥ // 17.4.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
arkeṇeva tamo dhvastaṃ yenaikenāsuraṃ balam / prāṇadātā ca yo 'smākaṃ prārthanīyaḥ kathaṃ na saḥ // 17.4.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityādi bruvatī sotkā tayaiva kathayā tataḥ / atiṣṭhatsamamāptena tatra dāsījanena sā // 17.4.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atrāntare candrapuraṃ sā manohārikāpi tat / vidyādharendranagaraṃ satvaraṃ prāpa tatsakhī // 17.4.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
gīrvāṇanagaraṃ kṛtvāpyasaṃtoṣādivādbhutam / nirmame viśvakarmā yadasāmānyavibhūtikam // 17.4.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāsaṃprāpya aṃ muktāphalaketuṃ vicinvatī / khagasthā tatpurodyānaṃ sā manohārikāgamat // 17.4.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atarkyasiddhivibhavaṃ bhāsvanmaṇimayadrumam / ekavṛkṣodgatānekajātīyakusumotkaram // 17.4.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
divyagītaravonmiśraśakuntarutasundaram / paśyantī tac ca sā reme nānāratnaśilātalam // 17.4.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
udyānapālair dṛṣṭvā ca vicitraiḥ pakṣirūpibhiḥ / upetyābhyarthya suvyaktavacanaiḥ priyavādibhiḥ // 17.4.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

abhinandya ca tāṃ pūjāṃ cintayāmasa tatra sā / aho vidyādharendrāṇāṃ citrāḥ siddhivibhūtayaḥ // 17.4.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
acintyopanamadbhogaṃ yeṣāmudyānamīdṛśam / surastrībaddhasaṃgītaṃ patattriparicārakam // 17.4.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti saṃcintya pṛṣṭvā ca tānevodyanapālakān / cinvatī pārijātāditarukhaṇḍamavāpa sā // 17.4.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāntaścandanāsiktakusumāstaraśāyinam / sā muktāphalaketuṃ taṃ sa kalpakamivaikṣata // 17.4.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

aṅgārāstuhine nyastāḥ kakūlāgniś ca candane / mārute dāvavahniś ca smareṇa mama niścitam // 17.4.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tatrādirājatanayāsaṃgatastatsamāgame / tapasārādhitaḥ śaṃbhurupāyaṃ me vidhāsyati // 17.4.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā yāvadutthātuṃ rājaputraḥ sa icchati / sa manohārikā tāvattuṣṭātmānamadarśayat // 17.4.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vayasya vardhase diṣṭyā siddhaṃ tava samīhitam / paśyeyamāgatā tasyāḥ priyāyāste 'ntikaṃ sakhī // 17.4.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vatpārśvasthena dṛṣṭā hi mayāsāv ambikāśrame / iti harṣāc ca taṃ rājaputraṃ saṃyatako 'bravīt // 17.4.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

netrapīyūṣavṛṣṭiṃ tāṃ paprachopāgatāṃ ca saḥ / upaveśyāntike kāntāśarīrakuśalaṃ tadā // 17.4.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

yadāprabhṛti dṛṣṭena hṛtaṃ tasyāstvayā manaḥ / tata ārabhya vimanā na śṛṇoti na paśyati // 17.4.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
mṛṇālahāraṃ dadhatī bālāhāraṃ vimucya sā / luṭhatyambujinīpattraśayane śayanojjhitā // 17.4.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
asahiṣṭa na yā pūrvaṃ hriyā varakathāmapi / imāmavasthāṃ saiṣādya prāptā priyatamaṃ vinā // 17.4.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
iti tasyā hasantīva svānyevāṅgāni saṃprati / saṃtāpaśuṣyacchrīkhaṇḍasitāni kṛtināṃ vara // 17.4.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
evaṃ ca sā bravīti tvāmity udīrya papāṭha te / sā manohārikā padmāvatīsaṃdeśagītake // 17.4.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tac chrutvākhilaṃ muktāphalaketurgatavyathaḥ / tāṃ manohārikāṃ harṣādabhinandyābhyabhāṣata // 17.4.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
