muktāphaladhvajākhyas te śivāṃśo janitā sutaḥ / eko gaṇāvatāraś ca dvitīyo malayadhvajaḥ // 17.5.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tapodhanānmunervidyāḥ kāmarūpaṃ ca vāhanam / muktāphaladhvajaḥ prāpsyatyastrāṇi ca sahānujaḥ // 17.5.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mahāpāśupatāstraṃ ca punaḥ prāpya sa durjayaḥ / kariṣyati vaśe pṛthvīṃ pātālaṃ ca hatāsuraḥ // 17.5.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvaṃ ca vyomacarāv etau samahāstrau gṛhāṇa me / vāraṇaṃ kāñcanagiriṃ tathā kāñcanaśekharam // 17.5.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ity uktvāstragajāndattvā preṣitaḥ so 'tha vajriṇā / āgānmerudhvajo hṛṣṭo bhūtale nagaraṃ nijam // 17.5.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
te tu cchalakṛtāvadyās tasya pātālasaṃśrayāt / khecaratvaṃ gatasyāpi prāpyā nāsan kilāsurāḥ // 17.5.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ śakrāc chrutasyāsau rājā putrecchur āśramam / tapodhanasya tasyarṣer yayau divyebhavāhanaḥ // 17.5.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrābhigamya tamṛṣiṃ śakrādeśaṃ nivedya tam / bhagavannādiśopāyaṃ śīghraṃ me 'treti so 'bravīt // 17.5.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca tasyācireṇeṣṭasiddhaye munirādiśat / vratamārādhanaṃ śaṃbhoḥ sabhāryasya mahībhujaḥ // 17.5.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tenārādhayām āsa vratenorvīpatiḥ śivam / tuṣṭaḥ sa ca vibhuḥ svapne tam evamavadannṛpam // 17.5.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uttiṣṭha rājan prāptāsi krameṇaivāvilambitam / śeṣāsuravināśāya dvau putrāvaparājitau // 17.5.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvā prabudhyaiva prātaruktvā muneś ca saḥ / sabhāryaḥ pāraṇaṃ kṛtvā rāja svapuramāyayau // 17.5.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tasya mahādevī rājñī merudhvajasya sā / ṛtuṃ dinaiḥ katipayaiḥ pratipede sulakṣaṇā // 17.5.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tasyāḥ sa garbhe samabhūn muktvā śāpavaśena tām / vaidyādharīṃ tanum muktāphalaketur atarkitam // 17.5.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā ca tasya tanus tatra nije candrapure pure / vidyāprabhāvād amlānā tasthau bāndhavarakṣitā // 17.5.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sāpi merudhvajasyātra rājño devasabhe pure / rājñī sagarbhā saṃpadya nandayām āsa taṃ patim // 17.5.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
yathā yathā ca sā rājñī jajñe garbhabharālasā / tathā tathā sa sotsāhastasyāḥ patirabhūnnṛpaḥ // 17.5.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāpte ca samaye putraṃ sāsūta smārkasaṃnibham / bālamevogramahasaṃ kumāram iva pārvatī // 17.5.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
babhūva cotsavaḥ kṛtsne na paraṃ vasudhātale / yāvannabhastale 'pyāsīddevaprahatadundubhau // 17.5.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svayam āgān muniś cātra divyadṛk sa tapodhanaḥ / diṣṭyā vardhayituṃ merudhvajaṃ taṃ pṛthivīpatim // 17.5.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena sākaṃ sa muninā nāmnā śakroditena tam / muktāphaladhvajaṃ cakre putraṃ rājā kṛtotsavaḥ // 17.5.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato gate munau tasmiṃs tasya saṃvatsarāntare / rājño dvitīyastanayo rājñāṃ tasyāmajāyata // 17.5.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
taṃ ca nāmnā sa nṛpatiścakāra malayadhvajam / tathaiva harṣāyātena tenaiva muninā saha // 17.5.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tataḥ saṃyatakaḥ so 'pi śāpāttanmantriṇaḥ sutaḥ / jajñe nāma pitā cāsya mahābuddhiriti vyadhāt // 17.5.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tau siṃhaśāvābhāv avardhetāṃ nṛpātmajau / krameṇa tejasā sārdhaṃ mantriputreṇa tena ca // 17.5.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gateṣv athāṣṭamātreṣu varṣeṣu sa tapodhanaḥ / etyopanayanaṃ cakre rājasūnvostayor muniḥ // 17.5.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṣṭau cānyāni varṣāṇi vidyāsu ca kalāsu ca / mahāstreṣu ca sarveṣu vinīyete sma tena tau // 17.5.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato yuvānau dṛṣṭvā tau sarvaśastrās trayodhinau / putrau kṛtinamātmānaṃ mene merudhvajo nṛpaḥ // 17.5.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha taṃ svāśramaṃ gantum icchantaṃ so 'bravīn munim / abhīṣṭā dakṣiṇedānīṃ bhagavan gṛhyatām iti // 17.5.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
eṣaiva dakṣiṇābhīṣṭā mama tvatto mahīpate / asurān yajñahantṝn yat saputro me haniṣyasi // 17.5.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityūcivāṃsamavadattaṃ maharṣiṃ sa bhūpatiḥ / ata evādhunā grāhyā bhagavandakṣiṇā tvayā // 17.5.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadārabhasva yajñaṃ tvaṃ tadvighnāyāsurāś ca te / eṣyantyahaṃ ca tatkālaṃ tatraiṣyāmi saputrakaḥ // 17.5.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pūrvakālaṃ hi daityāste kṛtvā doṣaṃ chalena vaḥ / khamutpatya nipatyābdhau pātālamagamanmune // 17.5.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
idānīṃ tv indradattau me vidyete khacarau gajau / tābhyāṃ saha saputras tān prāpsyāmi vyomagān api // 17.5.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sa munistuṣṭas tam uvāca narādhipam / tarhi tvaṃ yajñasaṃbhāraṃ yathāyogyaṃ kuruṣva me // 17.5.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yāvaddigviśrutaṃ gatvā tatra yāgaṃ samārabhe / preṣayāmi ca vo dūtaṃ śiṣyametaṃ dṛḍhavratam // 17.5.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃjātakāmagoddāmamahābalakhagākṛtim / muktāphaladhvajasyāsya bhavitā saiṣa vāhanam // 17.5.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā sa muniḥ prāyātsvāśramaṃ sa ca bhūpatiḥ / prāhiṇotsarvasaṃbhārāṃstasyānupadam eva tān // 17.5.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prārabdhe tena yajñe ca miladdevarṣisaṃsadi / buddhvā pātālanilayā dānavāḥ kṣobham āyayuḥ // 17.5.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tajjñātvā sa muniḥ śiṣyaṃ prāhiṇottaṃ dṛḍhavratam / śāspakalpitapakṣīndrarūpaṃ devasabhaṃ puram // 17.5.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra prāptaṃ ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā smṛtvā munivacaś ca saḥ / sajjīcakāra tau divyau rājā merudhvajo gajau // 17.5.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āruroha tayor mukhyaṃ sa kāñcanagiriṃ svayam / kanīyase ca putrāya dadau kāñcanaśekharam // 17.5.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛḍhavratakhagendraṃ ca taṃ sa muktāphaladhvajaḥ / ārurohāttadivyāstro bandivṛndābhivanditaḥ // 17.5.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas te prayayur vīrās trayaḥ khecaravāhanāḥ / dattāśiṣo dvijavaraiḥ puraḥ prahitasainikāḥ // 17.5.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
prāptānāṃ cāśramaṃ teṣāṃ sa muniḥ prītamānasaḥ / abhedyāḥ sarvaśastrāṇāṃ bhūyāsteti varaṃ dadau // 17.5.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvac ca dānavabalaṃ nihantuṃ yajñamāyayau / abhyadhāvaca taddṛṣṭvā merudhvajabalaṃ nadat // 17.5.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāvartata tato yuddhaṃ daityānāṃ mānuṣaiḥ saha / daityās tu mānuṣān svasthā bhūtalasthān babādhire // 17.5.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa pakṣivahano daityānmuktāphaladhvajaḥ / pradhāvya śaravarṣeṇa cakarta ca mamātha ca // 17.5.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā vihaṃgasthaṃ jvalantam iva tejasā / taccheṣāḥ prādravandaityāste nārāyaṇaśaṅkitāḥ // 17.5.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā bhayāc ca pātālaṃ sarvaṃ trailokyamāline / tatkālaṃ daityarājāya śaśaṃsuste tathaiva tat // 17.5.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tadbuddhvā drutaṃ cārair anviṣya tamavetya ca / muktāphaladhvajaṃ martyaṃ mānuṣābhibhavākṣamī // 17.5.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃghaṭya sarvapātāladānavānasureśvaraḥ / vāryamāṇo 'pi śakunair yoddhumāgāttamāśramam // 17.5.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
muktāphaladhvajādyāś ca tatraivāvahitāḥ sthitāḥ / tam abhyadhāvan dṛṣṭvaiva sabalaṃ dānavādhipam // 17.5.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tataḥ pravṛtte bhūyo 'tra martyāsuramahāhave / vimānair āyayurdraṣṭuṃ rudrendrapramukhāḥ surāḥ // 17.5.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
muktāphaladhvajaścātra tatkṣaṇopasthitaṃ puraḥ / dadarśālaṅghyatejaskamastraṃ pāśupataṃ mahat // 17.5.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atipramāṇamudvahnijvālaṃ tryakṣaṃ caturmukham / ekāṅghrimaṣṭabāhuṃ ca kalpāntānalasaṃnibham // 17.5.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
viddhi māṃ śaṃkarādeśādāyātaṃ vijayāya te / iti bruvāṇaṃ so 'bhyarcya rājaputrastadagrahīt // 17.5.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tāvac ca gagane taistair asurair astravṛṣṭibhiḥ / merudhvajabalaṃ tāmyadadhaḥsthitamabādhyata // 17.5.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tadrakṣituṃ citrayodhī muktāphaladhvajaḥ / śarajālaṃ dadau madhye yuyudhe cāsuraiḥ saha // 17.5.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pitṛbhrātṛyutaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ nabhaścaravāhanam / trailokyamālī daityendraḥ pannagāstraṃ mumoca saḥ // 17.5.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tasmān nirgacchato 'saṃkhyān ghorān āśīviṣān ahīn / garuḍair gāruḍāstrotthair ardayan malayadhvajaḥ // 17.5.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato yadyatsa daityendraḥ saputro 'stramavāsṛjat / muktāphaladhvajastattannirāsyat tasya helayā // 17.5.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha kruddhaḥ sa devāristatputro 'nye ca dānavāḥ / āgneyādīni yugapattasminnastrāṇi cikṣipuḥ // 17.5.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tāni tasyāgrato dṛṣṭvā sthitaṃ pāśupataṃ jvalat / bhītānyastrāṇi sarvāṇi vimukhāni kṣaṇādyayuḥ // 17.5.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas te yāvadicchanti bhītā daityāḥ palāyitum / tāvattadāśayaṃ buddhvā vīro muktāphaladhvajaḥ // 17.5.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
babandha teṣām ūrdhvaṃ ca caturdikkaṃ ca tatkṣaṇam / śarajālaṃ sa durbhedaṃ vajrapañjarasaṃnibham // 17.5.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāntarbhramatastāṃś ca śakuntāniva dānavān / pitrā bhrātrā ca sahitaḥ sa jaghāna śitaiḥ śaraiḥ // 17.5.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
nipetuś ca karāḥ pādāḥ śarīrāṇi śirāṃsi ca / chinnāni teṣāṃ daityānāmavahaṃścāsranimnagāḥ // 17.5.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sādhuvāde tato datte puṣpavarṣānuge suraiḥ / mohanāstraṃ dadau teṣāṃ dviṣāṃ muktāphaladhvajaḥ // 17.5.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena saṃmohitān bhūmau patitāṃs tān sarājakān / asurān vāruṇāstreṇa pāśabaddhāṃś cakāra saḥ // 17.5.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tapodhano 'tha so 'vādīnmerudhvajanṛpaṃ muniḥ / na vadhyamāsuraṃ sainyaṃ hataśeṣamidaṃ khalu // 17.5.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svīkṛtena hy anenaiva pravekṣyadhvaṃ rasātalam / daityendrastu saputro 'yaṃ baddhvā nītvā samantrikaḥ // 17.5.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mahāsurair duṣṭanāgair yukto mukhyaiś ca rākṣasaiḥ / sthāpyo devasabhāsanne śvetaśailaguhāntare // 17.5.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukto muninā daityayodhānmerudhvajo 'bravīt / mā bhaiṣṭa yūyaṃ nāsmābhir vadhyā sabhrātṛkasya tu // 17.5.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
muktāphaladhvajasyāsya vartadhvaṃ śāsane 'dhunā / ity uktā dānavā rājñā hṛṣṭāstatpratipedire // 17.5.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa rājā taṃ daityarājaṃ trailokyamālinam / putrādibhistaiḥ sahitaṃ śvetaśailamanāyayat // 17.5.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tadguhābhyantare taṃ ca sthāpayām āsa saṃyatam / bhūriśūrabalopetapradhāsnāmātyarakṣitam // 17.5.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato nivṛtte saṅgrāme muktamandaravṛṣṭiṣu / vaimānikeṣu yāteṣu pravṛtte jagadutsave // 17.5.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa tatra putrau vakti sma rājā merudhvajo jayī / ihaiva yajñarakṣārthamahaṃ tiṣṭhāmi saṃprati // 17.5.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
yuvāṃ prayātaṃ pātālametaiḥ svaiḥ sainikaiḥ saha / prāptadaityavimānaughaiḥ śeṣāsurabalena ca // 17.5.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
āśvāsya sthāpayitvā ca vaśe pātālavāsinaḥ / pradhānādhiṣṭhitān kṛtvā svīkṛtyehāgamiṣyathaḥ // 17.5.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvā tathetyāśu divyakāmagavāhanaḥ / muktāphaladhvajo vīraḥ sa cāpi malayadhvajaḥ // 17.5.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rasātalaṃ viviśatuḥ sasainyau bhrātarāvubhau / saha dānavasainyena praṇatenāgrayāyinā // 17.5.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
hatvā carakṣiṇaḥ sthānasthāneṣu paripanthinaḥ / adātāmatra tau śeṣajanasyābhayaḍiṇḍimam // 17.5.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
viśvastapraṇate caitau jane sapta rasātalāsn / svīcakratuḥ puraśatair nānāratnamayair yutān // 17.5.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
bubhujāte ca tān ramyān udyānaiḥ sarvakāmadaiḥ / divyāsavabhṛtān ekaratnasopān avāpikaiḥ // 17.5.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrādbhutākṛtī tau ca dadṛśurdānavāṅganāḥ / tatkanyāś ca taruṣvantarmāyācchāditavigrahāḥ // 17.5.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ārebhe ca tadā tatra bharturbaddhasya śarmaṇe / tapaḥ svayaṃprabhā nāma bhāryā trailokyamālinaḥ // 17.5.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāḥ sute ca trailokyaprabhātribhuvanaprabhe / ārebhāte tapastadvatkumāryau śreyase pituḥ // 17.5.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tau ca rājasutau tatra pātāle sakalaṃ janam / labdhapraśamanasvasthaṃ saṃmānya vividhaiḥ priyaiḥ // 17.5.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sthāpayitvā ca saṅgrāmasiṃhādīnadhikāriṇaḥ / tapovanāśramapadaṃ pituḥ pārśvam upeyatuḥ // 17.5.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tāvattatra muneryajñaḥ sa samāptim upāyayau / gantuṃ prārebhir e devāḥ svadhiṣṇyānyṛṣayas tathā // 17.5.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato merudhvajaḥ śakraṃ parituṣṭaṃ vyajijñapat / āgamyatāṃ mannagaraṃ deva tuṣṭo 'si cenmayi // 17.5.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tac chrutvā tatpriyāyāgānmunimāmantrya vāsavaḥ / rājñā tena saputreṇa saha devasabhaṃ puram // 17.5.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra copācarattaṃ sa rājā lokadvayeśvaraḥ / tathā śakraṃ yathā divyaṃ sukhaṃ vismarati sma saḥ // 17.5.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ prītaḥ sa śakro 'pi taṃ saputraṃ mahīpatim / divyātmavāhanārūḍhaṃ nināya svaṃ triviṣṭapasm // 17.5.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra nāradarambhādisaṃgītasukhasundare / sa viśramayya taṃ merudhvajaṃ samalayadhvajam // 17.5.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
muktāphaladhvajaṃ cendraḥ pārijātamayīḥ srajaḥ / dattvā sadivyamukuṭāḥ saṃmānya prāhiṇodgṛham // 17.5.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
te cāgatyātra bhūloke pātāle ca gatāgatam / kurvāṇāścakrire rajyaṃ nṛdevā lokayor dvayoḥ // 17.5.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato merudhvajo muktāphaladhvajam uvāca saḥ / vijitāḥ śatravaḥ putra yuvānau bhrātarau yuvām // 17.5.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svādhīnā rājakanyāś ca mayā tāś ca gaveṣitāḥ / vartante prāptakālastatkriyatāṃ dārasaṃgrahaḥ // 17.5.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti pitrodite 'vādītso 'tha muktāphaladhvajaḥ / na me pariṇaye tāta manastāvat pravartate // 17.5.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ tapaścariṣyāsmi saṃpratyārādhituṃ haram / eṣa vatsastu kurutāṃ vivāhaṃ malayadhvajaḥ // 17.5.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
etac chrutvaiva malayadhvajastaṃ so 'nujo 'bravīt / vivāho mama yuktaḥ kimārya tvayyaparigrahe // 17.5.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājyaṃ vā tvayyarājyasthe tava mārgānugo hy aham / ity ukte tena malayadhvajenovāca bhūpatiḥ // 17.5.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
merudhvajastaṃ tanayaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ muktāphaladhvajam / yuktam evāmunā tāvadanujena tavoditam // 17.5.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvaṃ tvayuktaṃ vadasyetan nava evātra yauvane / ko nāma kālastapaso bhogakālo hy ayaṃ tava // 17.5.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tadakālocitaḥ putra mucyatāmeṣa durgrahaḥ / iti tenocyamāno 'pi rājñā jyeṣṭhaḥ suto 'tra ca // 17.5.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nāṅgīcakre yadā saṃpratyudvāhaṃ niścayena saḥ / tadā sa nṛpatistūṣṇīṃ tasthau kālaṃ pratīkṣitum // 17.5.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atrāntare ca pātāle bhāryāṃ trailokyamālinaḥ / svayaṃprabhām ūcatus tāṃ tapaḥsthe te svakanyake // 17.5.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
āvayor amba saptāṣṭavarṣayoḥ saṃyataḥ pitā / rājyabhraṃśaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ kasmād akṛtapuṇyayoḥ // 17.5.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṣṭamaṃ varṣametac ca tapasyantyorna nau haraḥ / prasīdati na tāto 'yaṃ mucyate 'dyāpi bandhanāt // 17.5.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadyāvadāvayor na syādripoḥ paribhavo 'thavā / nirlakṣaṇāmimāṃ tāvadanale juhuvustanum // 17.5.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktā duhitṛbhyāṃ sā jagādaivaṃ svayaṃprabhā / putryau pratīkṣyatāṃ tāvadudayo hy asti naḥ punaḥ // 17.5.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tapaḥsthitāṃ hi māṃ svapne jāne devo 'bravīcchivaḥ / vatse kuryā dhṛtiṃ rājyaṃ punaḥ prāpsyati te patiḥ // 17.5.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
muktāphaladhvajaścaiṣa tathaiva malayadhvajaḥ / duhitrostava bhartārau rājaputrau bhaviṣyataḥ // 17.5.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mānuṣāviti mā caitau vijñāsīretayor yataḥ / eko vidyādharavaro dvitīyo māmako gaṇaḥ // 17.5.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ityādiṣṭeśvareṇāhaṃ prabuddhā rajanīkṣaye / ityāśayaitayā caiṣa soḍhaḥ kleśo mahānmayā // 17.5.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmādāvedayāmyetadarthaṃ yuṣmatpituḥ prabhoḥ / tadicchayā yatiṣye ca yuṣmadudvāhasiddhaye // 17.5.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evamāśvāsya sā rājñī kanyake sve svayaṃprabhā / uvācendumatīṃ nāma vṛddhāmantaḥpurastriyam // 17.5.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āryaputrasya nikaṭaṃ śvetaśailaguhāṃ vraja / nipatya pādayostaṃ ca vijñāpaya girā mama // 17.5.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
nirmitāsmi mahārāja dhātrānyenaiva dāruṇā / tvadviyogāgninādyāpi na dahye jvalatāpi yā // 17.5.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ātmā tu na mayā tyaktaḥ punastvaddarśanāśayā / ity uktvā māmakaṃ śārvaṃ svapnādeśaṃ nivedayeḥ // 17.5.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ kanyāvivāhārthaṃ pṛcchestaṃ yac ca vakṣyati / tattvayāgatya me vācyaṃ vidhāsye 'haṃ tathāvidham // 17.5.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvendumatīṃ tāṃ sā praiṣayatsāpi nirgatā / pātālātprāpa tacchailaguhādvāraṃ surakṣitam // 17.5.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rakṣiṇo 'bhyarthya tatrāntaḥ praviśyālokya saṃyatam / trailokyamālinaṃ taṃ sā sāśrurjagrāha pādayoḥ // 17.5.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatpṛṣṭakuśalā tac ca śanaistasmai śaśaṃsa sā / kṛtsnaṃ svabhāryāsaṃdeśaṃ tato rājā jagāda saḥ // 17.5.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
yaḥ prokto rājyalābho naḥ śarveṇāstu tathaiva saḥ / merudhvajasyātmajayoḥ kanyādāne tu kā kathā // 17.5.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
ihaivāhaṃ vipadyeya na tu dadyāṃ nijātmaje / śatrubhyāṃ mānuṣābhyāṃ ca saṃyataḥ sannupāyanam // 17.5.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvendumatī rājñā preṣitā tena sā tataḥ / etya svayaṃprabhāyai tattatpatnyai tadvaco 'bhyadhāt // 17.5.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutvā tatas te trailokyaprabhātribhuvanaprabhe / daityendrakanye jananīmūcatustāṃ svayaṃprabhām // 17.5.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
āvayor yauvanabhayadagnirevādhunā gatiḥ / tadambāsyāṃ caturdaśyāṃ tatpraveśaṃ vidadhvahe // 17.5.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtaniścayayor evaṃ tayoḥ sāpy akarottadā / niścayaṃ maraṇāyaiva tanmātā saparicchadā // 17.5.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāptāyāṃ ca caturdaśyāṃ tāḥ pāparipunāmani / tīrthe sarvāścitāś cakrurarcitvā hāṭakeśvaram // 17.5.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvanmerudhvajo rājā tithau tasyāṃ saputrakaḥ / sabhāryaścāyayau tāvaddhāṭakeśvaramarcitum // 17.5.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa pāpariputīrthaṃ tatsnānārthaṃ sānugo vrajan / dūraddadarśa tattīre vanāntardhūmamudgatam // 17.5.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dhūmodgamaḥ kuto 'treti pṛcchantaṃ taṃ ca bhūpatim / ūcuḥ saṅgrāmasiṃhādyāḥ pātālādhikṛtā nijāḥ // 17.5.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
trailokyāmālino bhāryā mahārāja svayaṃprabhā / duhitṛbhyāṃ kumārībhyāṃ sahātra tapasi sthitā // 17.5.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nūnaṃ tā agnikāryādi kiṃcid atrādya kurvate / yadi vātitapaḥkhinnāḥ kurvantyagnipraveśanam // 17.5.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā saha putrābhyāṃ patnyā taiścādhikāribhiḥ / draṣṭuṃ sa rājā tatrāgānniṣiddhānyaparicchadaḥ // 17.5.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
dadarśa cātra pracchannaḥ sthitas te daityakanyake / samātṛke pūjayantyau susamiddhaṃ citānalam // 17.5.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
mukhalāvaṇyasaṃdohaniḥsyandair dikṣu sarvataḥ / candrabimbaśatānīva racayantyau rasātale // 17.5.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
lolahārāmbupūrābhyāṃ kāmasyevābhiṣecanam / kucakāñcanakumbhābhyāṃ kurvatyau trijagajjaye // 17.5.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bibhrāṇe jaghanābhogaṃ vipulaṃ baddhamekhalam / nakṣatramālāṅkam iva smasradvipaśiraḥsthalam // 17.5.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
vahantyau keśapāśau ca pannagāviva nirmitau / dātrā lāvaṇyasarvasvanidhānaṃ rakṣituṃ tayoḥ // 17.5.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvā te cintayāsmāsa sa rājā jātavismayaḥ / aho viśvasṛjaḥ sṛṣṭirlasannavanavādbhutā // 17.5.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadetayor na rambhāpi norvaśī na tilottamā / rūpe bhajati tulyatvamasurādhipakanyayoḥ // 17.5.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti cintayatas tasya rājñaḥ sā daityakanyakā / jyeṣṭhārcayitvā trailokyaprabhā vahniṃ vyajijñapat // 17.5.168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
uktaḥ svapnaharādeśo yataḥ prabhṛti me 'mbayā / tataḥ prabhṛti baddhvaiva bhartṛbuddhiryato mayā // 17.5.169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmin guṇanidhau rājaputre muktāsphaladhvaje / tat sa eva patir bhūyād bhagavan me 'nyajanmani // 17.5.170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iha janmani tātena saṃyatasthena māninā / ditsitāpyambayā tasmai dātuṃ nāṅgīkṛtāsmi yat // 17.5.171	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā tadvadevātra sāpi tribhuvanaprabhā / vavre hutāśānmalayadhvajaṃ janmāntare patim // 17.5.172	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tato merudhvajo rājā sa tacchravaṇaharṣulaḥ / tadbhāryā ca mahādevī parasparamavocatām // 17.5.173	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāpnuyātāmime bhārye yadyasmattanayāvimau / tadetābhyāmavāptaṃ syāllokadvayajayātphalam // 17.5.174	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadyāvadasminnanale nātmānaṃ kṣipataḥ kṣaṇam / tāvatkiṃ nopasṛtyaite vārayāmaḥ samātṛke // 17.5.175	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ devyā sahālocya rājāvocadupetya tāḥ / mā kārṣṭa sāhasaṃ duḥkhaṃ śamayiṣyāmyahaṃ hi vaḥ // 17.5.176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutvaitacchrotrapīyūṣavarṣābhaṃ bhūpatervacaḥ / dṛṣṭvā ca taṃ tāḥ sakalāḥ praṇemurasurāṅganāḥ // 17.5.177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
paśyanto 'pi vayaṃ pūrvaṃ māyācchannā na lakṣitāḥ / lokadvayeśvareṇeha dṛṣṭāḥ smo 'dya punas tvayā // 17.5.178	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvaddṛṣṭānāṃ ca duḥkhānto bhavatyevācireṇa naḥ / kiṃ punaḥ svagirā datte devenābhyarthite vare // 17.5.179	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadgṛhṇītārghyapādyādi kṛtāsanaparigrahāḥ / bhavanto hi jagatpūjyā ayaṃ casmākamāśramaḥ // 17.5.180	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti svayaṃprabhāmuktavatīmāha hasannṛpaḥ / jāmātṛbhyāṃ tvayaitābhyāṃ pādyārghyaṃ dīyatāmiti // 17.5.181	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ svayaṃprabhāvādīttadetābhyāṃ vṛṣadhvajaḥ / devo dāpayitārghādi yuṣmābhistvadya gṛhyatām // 17.5.182	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
merudhvajo jagādātha sarvamāttamidaṃ mayā / yūyaṃ ca maraṇodyogānnivartadhvamito 'dhunā // 17.5.183	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praviśya tiṣṭhataikasminsvapure sarvakāmade / tato 'ham eva jñāsyāmi yathā vaḥ kuśalaṃ bhavet // 17.5.184	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ity uktavantaṃ rājānaṃ sā jagāda svayaṃprabhā / devādeśānnivṛttāḥ smaḥ śarīratyāganiścayāt // 17.5.185	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kārāsthe tu prabhau yuktā kathaṃ naḥ svagṛhasthitiḥ / tadihaiva vayaṃ tāvattiṣṭhāsmo deva saṃprati // 17.5.186	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yāvaddevaḥ svayaṃ dattaṃ varaṃ naḥ pālayiṣyati / sasutāmātyamasmākaṃ mocayiṣyati ca prabhum // 17.5.187	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
muktastvadadhikārī sansa ca rājyaṃ kariṣyati / arpayiṣyati rājyaṃ ca tubhyam eva tvadicchayā // 17.5.188	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
samayapratibandhaṃ ca sa kariṣyati tādṛśam / antarasthā vayaṃ cātra saha pātālavāsibhiḥ // 17.5.189	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pātālebhyo 'smadīyāni ratnāni svīkuruṣva ca / evam uktavatīṃ tāṃ sa rājā merudhvajo 'bravīt // 17.5.190	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vijñāsyāmy ahamevaitatsmartavyaṃ svavacastu vaḥ / ity uktvā sa nṛpaḥ snātvā hāṭakeśamapūjayat // 17.5.191	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
daityarājasute te ca tayor evaṃ svadṛṣṭayoḥ / tatputrayostadekāgragatacitte babhūvatuḥ // 17.5.192	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha sa rasātalanilayair nikhilaistrailokyamālino muktim / praṇipatya yācyamāno rājā merudhvajaḥ sukṛtī // 17.5.193	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
chattraiḥ svayaśaḥśubhraiḥ sthagayannāśāḥ sadārasutabhṛtyaḥ / nirgatyāsuralokāttasmādāgānnijaṃ nagaram // 17.5.194	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
tatrāsya putro malayadhvajastāṃ kanīyasīṃ dānavarājaputrīm / dhyāyannanidro 'pi nimīlitākṣaḥ smasrajvarārto rajanīṃ nināya // 17.5.195	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
sadhair yajaladhistu tām apivicintya muktāphaladhvajo 'surapateḥ sutāṃ dṛḍhanibaddhabhāvāṃ yuvā / munīndramanasām apismaravikāradāṃ jyāyasīṃ purārthitavaro munerna khalu cukṣubhe cetasā // 17.5.196	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
merudhvajas tu tam avetya sutaṃ niṣiddhadārakriyaṃ smaravaśaṃ malayadhvajaṃ ca / kanyāpradānavimukhaṃ ca mahāsuraṃ tam āsīd upāyaghaṭanākulacittavṛttiḥ // 17.5.197	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
tato merudhvajo rājā taṃ tathā malayadhvajam / paśyansmarajvarākrāntaṃ devīṃ svāmevam abravīt // 17.6.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pātāladṛṣṭe trailokyamālinas te sute na cet / bhārye matputrayoḥ syātāṃ tanmayā kiṃ kṛtaṃ bhavet // 17.6.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tayoḥ kaniṣṭhāṃ ca vinā putro me malayadhvajaḥ / lajjānigūḍhakāmāgniḥ puṭapākena pacyate // 17.6.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadarthaṃ ca mayādyāpi mokṣastrailokyamālinaḥ / pratiśruto 'pi tatpatnyai satvaraṃ na vidhīyate // 17.6.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bandhamukto duhitarāvasuratvābhimānataḥ / putrābhyāṃ mānuṣābhyāṃ me sa dadyānnahi jātucit // 17.6.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadetamarthaṃ sāntvena brūmastasyādhunā varam / ity ālocya samaṃ devyā sa pratīhāram ādiśat // 17.6.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
śvetaśailaguhāṃ gatvā prītyā madvacanena tam / trailokyamālinaṃ brūhi daityendraṃ saṃyatasthitam // 17.6.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
daivayogādiha kliṣṭā yūyaṃ daityapate ciram / tadidānīṃ mama vacaḥ kṛtvā kleśaṃ śamaṃ naya // 17.6.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
dehi dṛṣṭyānurāgiṇyau matsutābhyāṃ svakanyake / ito muktaḥ svarājyaṃ ca vihitapratyayaḥ kuru // 17.6.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā preṣito rājñā gatvā tatra guhāntare / daityendrāyābravīttasmai kṣattā rājavacaḥ sa tat // 17.6.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mānuṣābhyāmahaṃ kanye na dāsyāmīti tena ca / praty uktaḥ sa tathaivetya kṣattā rājānam abhyadhāt // 17.6.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athopāyaṃ vicinvāne tasminmerudhvaje nṛpe / divaseṣu ca yāteṣu vijñātatadudantayā // 17.6.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pātālāt preṣitā bhūyaḥ sā svayaṃprabhayā tayā / āgād indumatī tatra dūtī saṃdeśahāriṇī // 17.6.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā cāgatya pratīhārya mukhenāveditātmakā / praviveśa mahādevyā nikaṭaṃ tatkṛtādarā // 17.6.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praṇipatyābravīttāṃ ca devi devi svayaṃprabhā / vijñāpayati kiṃ vastadvismṛtaṃ vacanaṃ nijam // 17.6.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abdhayaḥ kuśalailāś ca bhavanti pralaye 'nyathā / bhavādṛśāṃ tu vacanaṃ na tadāpyanyathā bhavet // 17.6.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
yadyapy upagataṃ nāsmatsvāminā kanyakārpaṇam / tat sa baddho duhitarau kathaṃ dadyādupāyanam // 17.6.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
aucityenopakārāya yuṣmābhiś cetsa mucyate / tanniścitaṃ sutādānātkuryādvaḥ pratyupakriyām // 17.6.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sakanyāpi tyajet prāṇān anyathā sā svayaṃprabhā / tena na syātsutāprāptirna ca vaḥ satyapālanam // 17.6.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkuruṣva tathā devi samayapratyayādinā / yatha rājā vimuñcettaṃ prabhuṃ naḥ sarvasiddhaye // 17.6.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svayaṃrabhāvisṛṣṭaṃ ca gṛhāṇedaṃ vibhūṣaṇam / divyaistaistaiścitaṃ ratnaiḥ khecaratvādidāyibhiḥ // 17.6.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktavatīmindumatīṃ rajñī jagāda sā / duḥkhitāyāḥ kathaṃ tasyā mayaitadgṛhyatāmiti // 17.6.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agṛhīte tvayāy asminn asmākam adhṛtir bhavet / gṛhīte tu nijaṃ duḥkhaṃ śāntaṃ manyāmahe vayam // 17.6.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
itīndumatyā rājñī sā tayā yatnena bodhitā / āśvāsahetos tasyās tadratnābharaṇam agrahīt // 17.6.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ihaiva tāvat tiṣṭhārye rājā yāvad upaiṣyati / ity uktvā tāṃ ca tatraiva rājñī sthāpayati sma sā // 17.6.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvat sa rājā tatrāgādutthāyendumatī ca sā / rājñīniveditā bhūpaṃ praṇanāma tadādṛtā // 17.6.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
svayaṃprabhavitīrṇaṃ ca cūḍāratnaṃ samarpayat / viṣarakṣojarārogaharaṃ tasmai nṛpāya sā // 17.6.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svasatyamanupālyaitadgrahīṣyāmīti vādinam / nṛpamindumatī sā tam evaṃ prauḍhā vyajijñapat // 17.6.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
devena pratipannaṃ cet satyaṃ pālitam eva tat / asmin gṛhīte tv asmākam āśvāsaḥ sutarāṃ bhavet // 17.6.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
evaṃ tayokte sādhūktamity uktvaivāsya bhūpateḥ / cūḍāratnaṃ tadādāya rājñī mūrdhni babandha sā // 17.6.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ svayaṃprabhāvākyaṃ yathā rājñyai niveditam / tathā śaśaṃsa sā rājñe tasmāy indumatī punaḥ // 17.6.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato rājñyā tathaivokto 'vādīd indumatīṃ nṛpaḥ / ihaivādya pratīkṣasva prātar vakṣyāmy ahaṃ tava // 17.6.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā tāṃ niśaṃ nītvā pratarāhūya mantriṇaḥ / sa tāmindumatīmevaṃ rājā merudhvajo 'bravīt // 17.6.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ebhir manmantribhiḥ sākaṃ rājñe trailokyamāline / āvedya gatvā pātālādānayāsurayoṣitaḥ // 17.6.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
svayaṃprabhādyāḥ sarvāṃś ca mukhyān pātālavāsinaḥ / hāṭakeśvarasaṃbandhi mudritaṃ koṣavāri ca // 17.6.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
amadvaśe vartitavyaṃ nityaṃ trailokyamālinā / sabhṛtyabandhunā bhāvyaṃ nāgaiścāsasyaghātibhiḥ // 17.6.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
atrārthe bhartṛcaraṇānspṛṣṭvā manmantrisaṃnidhau / svayaṃprabhādyāḥ śapathair antarasthā bhavantu naḥ // 17.6.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
pātālavāsinaḥ santu tadvatpratibhuvo 'khilāḥ / apatyāni ca sarve 'i sthāpayantu sarājakāḥ // 17.6.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sarājakāś ca likhitaṃ kurvantu nikhilā api / hāṭakeśvarasarvāṅgavārikoṣaṃ pibantu ca // 17.6.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato mokṣyāmyahaṃ kārāgṛhāttrailokyamālinam / ity uktvendumatīṃ rājā sāmātyāṃ visasarja saḥ // 17.6.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā gatvā mantrisahitāṃ procya trailokyamāline / tacchraddhitā tathaivendumatī pātālamāviśat // 17.6.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
svayaṃprabhādīn ānīya koṣavāri ca sā tataḥ / rājoktaṃ tadamātyāgre sarvān sarvam akārayat // 17.6.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vihitapratyayam taṃ ca mumoca saparicchadam / trailokyamālinaṃ merudhvajaḥ kārāgṛhān nṛpaḥ // 17.6.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ānīya ca gṛhaṃ samyaksaṃmānya saparigraham / svīkṛtāsuraratnaughaḥ svarājye visasarja tam // 17.6.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi trailokyamālī svaṃ punaretya rasātalam / prāptarājyo nananda svaiḥ sahito bhṛtyabāndhavaiḥ // 17.6.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
merudhvajaś ca pātālaprabhavair arthasaṃcayaiḥ / pṛthivīṃ pūrayām āsa prāvṛḍghana ivāmbubhiḥ // 17.6.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha trailokyamālī sa saṃmantrya nijabhāryayā / kanyāratnadvayaṃ ditsustatsutābhyāṃ svaveśmani // 17.6.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nṛpaṃ merudhvajaṃ netuṃ taṃ nimantrya sabāndhavam / smṛtopakāro daityendraḥ pātālātsvayamāyayau // 17.6.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
āgatya taṃ ca rājānaṃ kṛtātithyam uvāca saḥ / yuṣmābhir nātinirvṛtyā tadā dṛṣṭaṃ rasātalam // 17.6.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
paricaryāpareṣv asmāsvidānīmetya dṛśyatām / kanyāratne madīye ca gṛhyetāṃ sutayoḥ kṛte // 17.6.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukte 'surarājena tena merudhvajo 'tha saḥ / tatraivānāyayām āsa bhāryāṃ putrau ca tāvubhau // 17.6.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tebhyo 'surendravākyaṃ tatkanyādānāntam abravīt / tato jagāda taṃ jyeṣṭhaḥ putro muktāphaladhvajaḥ // 17.6.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vivāhaṃ na kariṣye 'hamanārādhitaśaṃkaraḥ / uktaṃ mayā prāk kṣantavyam etasmān me 'parādhataḥ // 17.6.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
mayi prayāte bhavanaṃ karotu malayadhvajaḥ / vinā pātālakanyāṃ tāṃ nāstyevāsya hi nirvṛtiḥ // 17.6.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tacchruvā sa kanīyāṃstamavādīnna tvayi sthite / ayaśasyamadharmyaṃ ca karomyāryāhamīdṛśam // 17.6.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato merudhvaje rājñi prayatnādbodhayatyapi / muktāphaladhvajo naicchatsvavivāhakriyāṃ yadā // 17.6.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadā trailokyamālī taṃ khinnamāmantrya bhūpatim / yayau svam eva pātālaṃ sānugaḥ sa yathāgatam // 17.6.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra vṛttāntamāvedya bhāryāṃ putraṃ ca so 'bhyadhāt / nyakkāraikaparo 'smākaṃ kīdṛśaḥ paśyataṃ vidhiḥ // 17.6.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mānuṣau nādya gṛhṇītaḥ kanye me prārthitāvapi / pūrvaṃ ye prārthite tābhyāṃ dātuṃ nāṅgīkṛte mayā // 17.6.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā tau jagadatuḥ ko jānāti kathaṃ vidheḥ / cetasyetatsthitaṃ kiṃ hi śāṃbhavaṃ syādvaco 'nyathā // 17.6.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityādi teṣāṃ vadatāṃ buddhvā te tatra cakratuḥ / kanye pratijñāṃ trailokyaprabhātribhuvanaprabhe // 17.6.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
dvādaśāhaṃ nirāhārasthitayor āvayor yadi / devo vivāhasaṃpattiprasādaṃ na kariṣyati // 17.6.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataś ca kāryamāvābhyāṃ sahaivāgnipraveśanam / na tu dhāryaṃ nikārārthaṃ vṛttyarthaṃ vā śarīrakam // 17.6.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ niyamya devasya puratastasthatuś ca te / nirāhāre japadhyānapare daityendrakanyake // 17.6.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadbuddhvā ca tayor mātā pitā ca ditijeśvaraḥ / tathaivātra nirāhārāvāstāṃ duhitṛvatsalau // 17.6.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ svayaṃprabhā sā tāṃ tanmātendumatīṃ punaḥ / merudhvajamahādevyai vaktuṃ tatprāhiṇoddrutam // 17.6.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tayā gatvā tadākhyātaṃ svasvāmigṛhasaṃkaṭam / rājñyai tasyai vivedātha rājā merudvhajo 'pi tat // 17.6.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tadanurodhāttau jahatus tatra daṃpatī / āhāraṃ tau ca tatputrau pitṛbhaktyanurodhinau // 17.6.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ lokadvaye rājagṛhayoḥ saṃkaṭasthayoḥ / muktāphaladhvajo 'naśnan dhyātavāñ śaraṇaṃ śivam // 17.6.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ṣaḍrātre ca gate rājaputraḥ prātaḥ prabudhya saḥ / pūrvaṃ saṃyatakaṃ mittraṃ mahābuddim abhāṣata // 17.6.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sakhe svapne 'dya jāne 'hamārūḍho vāhane nije / tapodhanamunipratte kāmarūpe manogatau // 17.6.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vimānatām upagate nirvedānmerupārśvagam / gaurīśāyatanaṃ divyamatidūramito gataḥ // 17.6.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāpaśyamahaṃ kāṃciddivyakanyāṃ tapaḥkṛśām / tāmuddiśyābravīnmāṃ ca jaṭābhṛtpuruṣo hasan // 17.6.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekasyāḥ kanyakāyāstvaṃ palāyyaivamihāgataḥ / ihaiṣā ca dvitīyā te saṃprāptā paśya tiṣṭhati // 17.6.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadākarṇya vacas tasya tatkanyārūpadarśane / atṛpta eva sahasā prabuddho 'smi niśākṣaye // 17.6.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tasmāttatraiva gacchāmi prāptuṃ tāṃ divyakanyakām / prāpsyāmi cenna tāṃ tatra pravekṣyāmi hutāśanam // 17.6.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāṃ tathopanatāṃ hitvā daityakanyāṃ mano mama / rajyate svapnadṛṣṭāyāmasyāṃ kiṃ kriyate vidheḥ // 17.6.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jāne ca tatra yātasya niścitaṃ śubhamasti me / ity uktvā tatsa sasmāra munidattaṃ svavāhanam // 17.6.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadāruhya vimānatvaṃ prāptaṃ sakhyā samaṃ ca saḥ / manaḥsaṃkalpitasthānaprāpakaṃ kāmarūpakṛt // 17.6.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
muktāphaladhvajaḥ prāyāddivyaṃ gaurīśadhāma tat / prāpya tac ca yathā svapne dṛṣṭaṃ paśyañjaharṣa saḥ // 17.6.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ pravavṛte tatra sa siddhodakanāmani / tīrthe snānādikaṃ kartuṃ sakhyekaparicārakaḥ // 17.6.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvattaṃ kvāpy avijñātagataṃ buddhvā sa tatpitā / rājā merudhvajo bhāryāsutādisahitastadā // 17.6.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upavāsakṛśo duḥkhakṣobhaṃ svapurago dadhau / tathā tadaiva pātāle 'pyetatsarvamabudhyata // 17.6.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatastrailokyamālī sa gṛhītvā te svakanyake / sopavāsaḥ sabhāryādis tatraivāgān nṛpāntikam // 17.6.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
caturdaśyāṃ gataḥ so 'dya nūnaṃ kvāpy arcituṃ haram / tatpratīkṣāmahe tāvadihaivaitaddinaṃ vayam // 17.6.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātaryatra sa tatraiva yāsyāmo nāgato yadi / tato yadbhavatītyeva sarve te niścayaṃ vyadhuḥ // 17.6.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atrāntare meghavane tasmin gauryāśrame sthitā / sāpi padmāvatī tasmin dine 'vādīn nijāḥ sakhīḥ // 17.6.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sakhyaḥ svapne 'dya jāne māṃ siddhīśvaragatāṃ pumān / jaṭādharo 'bravīt ko'pi devāgārādvinirgataḥ // 17.6.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
duḥkhaṃ samāptamāsanno bhartrā te putri saṃgamaḥ / ityevoktvā gate 'sminme gate nidrāniśe api // 17.6.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadeta tatra gacchāma ity uktvā sā jagāma tat / merupārśvasthitaṃ padmāvatī gaurīśaketanam // 17.6.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra siddhodake snāntaṃ dūrānmuktāphaladhvajam / dṛṣṭvā savismayā sā taṃ svasakhīrevam abravīt // 17.6.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sadṛśo me priyasyāyaṃ pumān paśyata kīdṛśaḥ / āścaryaṃ kiṃ sa eva syān nāsty etanmānuṣo hy ayam // 17.6.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā tāḥ sakhyastāmevamabruvan / na kevalaṃ susadṛśo devyayaṃ preyasastava // 17.6.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
yāvad etadvayasyo 'yaṃ tvatkantasuhṛdaḥ kila / tasya saṃyatakasyāpi paśya sādṛśyam aśnute // 17.6.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yattvayā varṇitaṃ devi yathādya svapnadarśanam / tathā jānīmahe vyaktaṃ śāpānmānuṣatāṃ gatau // 17.6.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvevaitāvihānītāvīśvareṇa svayuktitaḥ / mānuṣāgamanaṃ devabhūmāv asyāṃ kuto 'nyathā // 17.6.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ sakhībhir uktā sā padmāvatyarciteśvarā / tasthau devāntike channā taṃ jijñāsitumutsukā // 17.6.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvat snātvārcituṃ devaṃ tatra muktāphaladhvajaḥ / āgataḥ sarvato vīkṣya mahabuddhim uvāca tam // 17.6.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadevāyatanaṃ citramidaṃ svapne yadīkṣitam / liṅgāntardṛśyagaurīśamūrti ratnamayaṃ mayā // 17.6.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tān eva caitān paśyāmi svapnadṛṣṭān ihādhunā / pradeśān divyavihagasphuradratnaprabhadrumān // 17.6.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatkāladṛṣṭāṃ divyāṃ tu kanyāṃ paśyāmi neha tām / aprāptayā tayā ceha dehaṃ tyakṣyāmi niścitam // 17.6.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukte tena sakhyastāmūcuḥ padmāvatīṃ rahaḥ / śṛṇu nūnamiha svapne dṛṣṭvā tvāmayamāgataḥ // 17.6.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvaddarśanenaiva vinā tyaktuṃ prāṇānsamīhate / tannigūḍhasthitā eva paśyāmo devi niścayam // 17.6.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti cchannāsu tāsvatra sthitāsvantaḥ praviśya saḥ / muktāphaladhvajo devamarcayitvā viniryayau // 17.6.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nirgatya yāvatkurute bhaktitastriḥ pradakṣiṇam / tāvat sa ca sakhā cāsya jātiṃ sasmaraturnijām // 17.6.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
harṣāc ca pūrvavṛttāntaṃ yāvadanyonyamāhatuḥ / tāvat padmāvatī dṛṣṭigocaraṃ sā yayau tayoḥ // 17.6.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
muktāphaladhvajaḥ pūrvajanmavṛttaṃ smaraṃś ca saḥ / tāṃ dṛṣṭvaiva tamāha sma vayasyaṃ harṣanirbharaḥ // 17.6.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭā seyamiha svapne devī padmāvatī mayā / diṣṭyā prāptā ca tadimāmāśu saṃbhāvayāmy aham // 17.6.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ity uktvopetya sāśrustāmavocaddevi mādhunā / kvāpi yāsīrahaṃ muktāphalaketuḥ sa te priyaḥ // 17.6.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛḍhavratasya śāpena mānuṣībhūya saṃsmṛtā / jātirmayādyety uktvā tamaicchadāśleṣṭumutsukaḥ // 17.6.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sā tūdbhrāntā tirobhūya tatrāsītsāśrulocanā / so 'pi rājasuto 'paśyaṃstāṃ mohādapatadbhuvi // 17.6.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ saduḥkhamākāśe tadvayasyo jagāda saḥ / yadarthaṃ sa tapaḥkleśo devi padmāvati tvayā // 17.6.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anubhūtaḥ kathaṃ prāptaṃ tam evaṃ nābhibhāṣase / ahaṃ saṃyatakaṃ so 'pi vayasyo dayitasya te // 17.6.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadyuṣmadarthaṃ śaptasya kiṃ me nālapasi priyam / ity uktvā sa samāśvāsya tam uvāca nṛpātmajam // 17.6.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathānurāgopagatā daityarājasutā tvayā / yattyaktā tasya pāpasya tavāgatamidaṃ phalam // 17.6.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sā sakhīrāha cchannā padmāvatī tadā / śṛṇutāsurakanyāsu na kilāyaṃ pravartate // 17.6.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sakhyo 'pi tāmūcuḥ sarvaṃ saṃvādi dṛśyate / kiṃ na smarasi yattena śāpakāle priyeṇa te // 17.6.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mānuṣye me mano 'nyatra mā gātpadmāvatīṃ vinā / ityartito varastasmānmuneḥ pūrvaṃ tapodhanāt // 17.6.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatprabhāvādayaṃ nūnamanyastrīṣu na rajyate / śrutvaitad rājaputrī sā saṃjajñe saṃśayākulā // 17.6.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
muktāphaladhvajaḥ so 'pi dṛṣṭanaṣṭapriyas tataḥ / cakranda hā priye padmāvati kiṃ naitadīkṣase // 17.6.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vidyādharatve yatprāptaḥ śāpo meghavane mayā / tvadarthamiha cādyāhaṃ mṛtyuṃ prāpsyāmyasaṃśayam // 17.6.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityādi kranditaṃ tasya śrutvā padmāvatī sakhīḥ / prāha sarvāṇi saṃvādīnyabhijñānāni yadyapi // 17.6.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathāpi pāramparyeṇa śrutāny etāni jātucit / ābhyāṃ bhaveyuriti me na ceto 'bhyeti niścayam // 17.6.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tannārtamasya śaknomi vacaḥ śrotuṃ vrajāmy aham / tadgauryāyatanaṃ tāvat pūjākālaś ca tatra me // 17.6.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā sasakhīkā sā padmāvatyambikāśramam / tajjagāmārcayitvā ca devīmevaṃ vyajijñapat // 17.6.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa siddhiśvaradṛṣṭaścetsatyaṃ pūrvapriyo mama / tat tathā kuru yena syācchrīghrametena saṃgamaḥ // 17.6.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti padmāvatī yāvat sākāṅkṣā tatra tiṣṭhati / muktāphaladhajastāvat so 'pi siddhiśvare sthitaḥ // 17.6.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pūrvaṃ saṃyatakaṃ mittraṃ mahābuddhim uvāca tam / jāne sā svāspadaṃ yātā tadgauryāyatanaṃ sakhe // 17.6.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad ehi yāvas tatraivety uktvāruhya manogatau / tasminvimāne so 'pyāgādambikāśramam eva tat // 17.6.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
dūrāddṛṣṭvāvatīrṇaṃ taṃ vimānena nabhastalāt / sakhyaḥ padmāvatīmūcurdevi paśyedamadbhutam // 17.6.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ihāpyeṣa divyena vimānenāgataḥ kila / mānuṣasyāpi divyo 'sya prabhāvaḥ kathamīdṛśaḥ // 17.6.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ padmāvatī smāha sakhyaḥ smaratha kiṃ na tat / yatsa śāpapradātāsya mayā śapto dṛḍhavrataḥ // 17.6.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mānuṣatve 'vatīrṇasya vāhanaṃ kāmarūpabhṛt / icchānugatamasyaiva bhaviṣyati bhavāniti // 17.6.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tattena muniśiṣyeṇa vāhanenaiṣa niścitam / vimānarūpaṃ dadhatā svecchaṃ bhramati sarvataḥ // 17.6.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
evaṃ tayokte sakhyastāmūcurevamavaiṣi cet / tan na saṃbhāvayasyetaṃ kasmāddevi kimīkṣase // 17.6.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
etatsakhīvacaḥ śrutvā padmāvatyavadatpunaḥ / evaṃ saṃbhāvyate sakhyo niścayo 'dyāpi nāsti me // 17.6.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
satyaṃ sa eva yadi vā bhavatyeṣa tathāpi me / abhigamyo 'nyadehasthaḥ svadehānāśritaḥ katham // 17.6.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tacchannā eva paśyāmastāvadasyeha ceṣṭitam / ity uktvā rājaputrīṃ sā channaivāsītsakhīvṛtā // 17.6.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvattatrāvatīryaiva vimānādambikāśrame / muktāphaladhvajaḥ sotko vayasyaṃ tam uvāca saḥ // 17.6.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
amutra rākṣasītrastā pūrvaṃ saṃbhāvitā mayā / svayaṃvarāgatā ceha dṛṣṭodyānāntare punaḥ // 17.6.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iha cāvāptaśāpaṃ māmanusartumanāstadā / priyā padmāvatī kṛcchrānmunīndreṇa nivartitā // 17.6.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saivādya paśya me mitra dṛṣṭimārgātpalāyate / etattasya vacaḥ śrutvā padmavatyabravītsakhīḥ // 17.6.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
satyaṃ sakhyaḥ sa evāyaṃ pūrvadehamanāśritam / kathaṃ tūpaimyamuṃ tanme so 'tra siddhīśvaro gatiḥ // 17.6.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tenaiva dattaḥ svapno me sa eva ca kariṣyati / upāyamiti niścitya sāgātsiddhiśvaraṃ punaḥ // 17.6.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
pūrvadehasthitenaiva priyeṇa mama saṃgamam / kuru vā dehi vā mṛtyuṃ tṛtīyā na gatirmama // 17.6.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti vijñāpayām āsa sā tamabhyarcya dhūrjaṭim / sasakhīkā ca tatraiva tasthau devakulāṅgane // 17.6.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvadgauryāśrame tatra tāṃ sa muktāphaladhvajaḥ / anviṣyāprāpya codvignastamavādīdvayasyakam // 17.6.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
itaḥ prāptā na sā yāvo dhāma tacchāṃbhavaṃ punaḥ / tato 'pi cenna lapsye tāṃ pravekṣyāmyagnim eva tat // 17.6.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sa sakhāvocadbhāvi kalyāṇam eva te / na mṛṣā syānmunivacaḥ svapnādeśaś ca śāṃbhavaḥ // 17.6.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ityāśvāsayatā tena sakhyā muktāphaladhvajaḥ / saha siddhiśvaraṃ prāyādvimānamadhiruhya saḥ // 17.6.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāptaṃ dṛṣṭvātra taṃ padmāvatī tasthāvalakṣitā / paśyatehaiva saṃprāpta iti covāca sā sakhīḥ // 17.6.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi praviśya devāgraṃ dṛṣṭvā pratyagrapūjitam / muktāphaladhvajo devaṃ vayasyaṃ tam abhāṣata // 17.6.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sakhe kenāpi paśyāyamadhunaivārcito vibhuḥ / nūnaṃ saiva priyā me 'tra sthitā kvāpy arcitastayā // 17.6.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā so 'tra cinvāno yadā na prāpa tāṃ tadā / cakranda hā priye padmāvatīti virahī muhuḥ // 17.6.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pikīrute tadālāpabuddhyā tatkabarīdhiyā / barhibarhe sarasije tanmukhabhrāntitas tathā // 17.6.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
dhāvansmarajvarāveśavivaśastena kṛcchrataḥ / āśvāsya jagade sakhyā rājaputro 'nunīya saḥ // 17.6.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bahūpavāsaklāntena kim ārabdham idaṃ tvayā / jitabhūlokapātālaṃ kim ātmānam upekṣase // 17.6.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvayyantikamanāyāte pitā merudhvajastava / rājā trailokyamālī ca śvaśuro dānaveśvaraḥ // 17.6.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvadarthinī ca trailokyaprabhā sāpi tadātmajā / mātā ca te vinayavatyanujo malayadhvajaḥ // 17.6.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
aniṣṭāśaṅkinaḥ sarve sopavāsā jahatyasūn / tadehi tāvad gatvā tān rakṣāvo 'vasitaṃ hy ahaḥ // 17.6.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
iti taṃ vādinaṃ prāha mittraṃ muktāphaladhvajaḥ / tvam eva madvimānena gatvāśvāsaya tāniti // 17.6.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas taṃ sa sakhāvocatsa mamopanametkatham / śāpena muniśiṣyo yastava vāhanatāṃ gataḥ // 17.6.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavantaṃ suhṛdaṃ rājaputro 'bravītsa tam / tarhi tiṣṭha sakhe tāvat paśyāvaḥ kiṃ bhavediha // 17.6.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ śrutvā tadālāpaṃ padmāvatyavadatsakhīḥ / jāne 'bhijñānasaṃvādaiḥ sa pūrvapriya eṣa me // 17.6.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kāmaṃ mānuṣadehasthaḥ śāpenaivaṃ kadarthyate / siddhakanyopahāsāc ca śāpadoṣo mamāpy ayam // 17.6.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti yāvac ca sā vakti tāvadālohitacchaviḥ / viyogivanadāvāgnirudagānmṛgalāñchanaḥ // 17.6.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pūrayām āsa ca śanair jagajjyotsnā samantataḥ / kaṃdarpadahanajvālā taṃ ca muktāphaladhvajam // 17.6.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tatkālacakrāhva iva krandannṛpātmajaḥ / channasthayaiva jagade padmāvatya sa vignayā // 17.6.168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
rājaputra sa eva tvaṃ yadi me pūrvavallabhaḥ / tathāpyanyaśarīrastho mamāsi parapūruṣaḥ // 17.6.169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ te paradārāś ca tadākrandasi kiṃ muhuḥ / upāyo bhavitāvaśyaṃ satyaṃ cettanmunervacaḥ // 17.6.170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvā vacastasyāstāmapaśyaṃś ca so 'bhyagāt / muktāphaladhvajo harṣaviṣādaviṣamāṃ daśām // 17.6.171	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jagāda ca mayā devi smṛtaprāktanajanmanā / dṛṣṭvā tvaṃ pratyabhijñātā svām eva dadhatī tanum // 17.6.172	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvaṃ tu vaidyādhare dehe vartamānaṃ vilokya mām / adhunā parijānīṣe martyadehagataṃ katham // 17.6.173	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadavaśyaṃ mayā tyājyamidaṃ hataśarīrakam / ity uktvā so 'bhavattūṣṇīṃ channāsītsāpi tatpriyā // 17.6.174	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato bhūyiṣṭhayātāyāṃ rātrau nidrāgate śramāt / pūrvasaṃyatake tasminmahābuddhau vayasyake // 17.6.175	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aprāpyāṃ tena dehena jānan padmāvatīṃ sa tām / muktāphaladhvajo dārūṇyāhṛtyāgnim adīpayat // 17.6.176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhagavaṃstvatprasādena prāktanīṃ tāṃ tanuṃ śritaḥ / prāpyāsamacireṇaiva priyāṃ padmāvatīmaham // 17.6.177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti bruvan praṇamyaiva liṅgamūrtiṃ sa śaṃkaram / juhāva jvalite tasminn agnau rājasutas tanum // 17.6.178	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvat prabuddhaḥ sa mahābuddhirmuktāphaladhvajam / tamapaśyanvicityāpi paśyannagnimudarciṣam // 17.6.179	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vicintya taṃ hutātmānaṃ vayasyaṃ virahākulam / agnau tatraiva tacchokātso 'pyātmānamapātayat // 17.6.180	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taddṛṣṭvā sāpi duḥkhārtā padmāvatyabravītsakhīḥ / dhigaho hṛdayaṃ strīṇāṃ kaṭhinaṃ kuliśādapi // 17.6.181	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
paśyantya vaiśasamidaṃ notkrāntaṃ yanmamāsubhiḥ / tatkiyacciramātmānamadhanyo dhāryate mayā // 17.6.182	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
nāsti me 'dyāpi duḥkhānto madapuṇyair munerapi / vacas tasyānyathā jātaṃ tacchreyo maraṇaṃ mama // 17.6.183	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
parapūruṣamadhye tu praveṣṭumanale 'tra me / na yuktaṃ tadanāyāsaḥ pāśa eva hi me gatiḥ // 17.6.184	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā sāgrataḥ śaṃbhorupetyāśokapādape / pāśaṃ vidhātuṃ latayā rājaputrī pracakrame // 17.6.185	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
āśāpradarśibhir vākyair yāvattāṃ sa sakhījanaḥ / vārayatyāyayau tāvanmuniḥ so 'tra tapodhanaḥ // 17.6.186	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mā putri sāhasaṃ na syādasatyaṃ tadvaco mama / dhīrā bavādhunaiveha prāptaṃ paśyasi taṃ priyam // 17.6.187	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvadīyenaiva tapasā tasya śāpakṣayo 'cirāt / saṃvṛttastadanāstheyaṃ svatapasyeva te katham // 17.6.188	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
pratyāsanne vivāhe ca kā taveyaṃ viṣāditā / praṇidhānādavetyāhamidaṃ sarvamihāgataḥ // 17.6.189	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti taṃ vyāharantaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā munim upāgatam / praṇamya dolārūḍheva sābhūt padmāvatī kṣaṇam // 17.6.190	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
atha martyadehadāhādvaidyādharamātmadehamāśritya / savayasyo muktāphalaketuḥ so 'trāyayau priyastasyāḥ // 17.6.191	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
taṃ vīkṣya cātakavadhūriva nūtanābhraṃ rākāśaśāṅkamuditaṃ ca kumudvatīva / vidyādharendratanayaṃ gaganāgataṃ sā padmāvatī hṛdi dadhau kam apipramodam // 17.6.192	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
sa ca muktāphalaketurmumude dṛṣṭyaiva tāmavekṣya piban / ciramarubhūmibhramaṇaśrāntaḥ pāntho yathā saritam // 17.6.193	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
tau ca śāparajanīkṣayādubhau cakravākavadavāptasaṃgamau / jagmatustapanatejaso munes tasya pādapatanena tṛptatām // 17.6.194	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
yadyuvām iha punaḥ samāgatau tīrṇaśāpamuditau sa eva me / cetaso 'dya paritoṣa ity asāv abhyanandad atha tau mahāmuniḥ // 17.6.195	rathoddhatā [11: rnrlg]
yātāyāṃ niśi cendravāraṇagatastatraiva so 'pyāyayau cinvandārakaniṣṭhaputrasahito merudhvajo bhūpatiḥ / trailokyaprabhayā samaṃ tanayayā trailokyamālī tathā daityānām adhipo vimānavahanaḥ sāntaḥpuraḥ sānugaḥ // 17.6.196	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
tataḥ sa muktāphalaketumetayoḥ pradarśya vṛttāntamavarṇayanmuniḥ / yathā sa kāryārthamavāpa śāpato manuṣyatāṃ muktim upāgatas tataḥ // 17.6.197	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
buddhvā tadagnau patanonmukhās te merudhvajādyā muninopadiṣṭam / siddhodakasnānaharārcanādi kṛtvā viśokāḥ sahasā babhūvuḥ // 17.6.198	indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
trailokyaprabhayā punaratra tayā jātimāśu saṃsmṛtya / samacintyata siddhādhipakanyā devaprabhāsmi sā hanta // 17.6.199	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
vidyādharādhināthaḥ patirastu mameti yā tapasyantī / padmāvatyupahasitā prāviśamanalaṃ svakāmanāsiddhyai // 17.6.200	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
jātāsmyasmiṃś ca tato ditijakule yatra cānuraktāsmi / so 'pyeṣa rājaputraḥ prāpto vaidyādharīṃ punaḥ svatanum // 17.6.201	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
na ca yujyate 'nyarūpo dehenānena samabhigantumayam / tadimāmetatprāptyai tanuṃ juhomyāsurīṃ punarjvalane // 17.6.202	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
evaṃ vimṛśya hṛdi tac ca nivedya pitror muktāphaladhvajahutāśam anupraviṣṭām / ādāya tāṃ karuṇayārpitapūrvadehām āvirbabhūva hutabhuksvayam abravīc ca // 17.6.203	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
bho miktāphalaketo tvāmiyamuddiśya mayi vimuktatanuḥ / tadimāṃ siddheśasutāṃ gṛhāṇa devaprabhāṃ bhāryām // 17.6.204	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ity etad uktvaiva tirohite 'nale brahmātra sendrair amaraiḥ sahāyayau / gandharvarājaḥ saha candraketunā vidyādharendreṇa ca padmaśekharaḥ // 17.6.205	indravaṃśā [12: ttjr]
prahvāya sarvair abhinanditāya tair gandharvarāḍvyagraparigrahas tataḥ / prādātsa muktāphalaketave sutāṃ padmāvatīṃ tāṃ vidhivadvibhūtimān // 17.6.206	indravaṃśā [12: ttjr]
sa cātra vidyādhararājaputraś cirotsukastāṃ dayitāmavāpya / mene phalaṃ janmataroravāptam uvāha tām apy atha siddhakanyām // 17.6.207	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
sa ca tayā ditijeśvarakanyayā vidhivad atra pitṛpravitīrṇayā / nṛpasutaḥ samayujyata kāntayā tribhuvanaprabhayā malayadhvajaḥ // 17.6.208	drutavilambita [12: nBBr]
tataḥ kṛtitvādabhiṣicya putraṃ sadvīpapṛthvīvalayaikarājye / merudhvajaḥ sve malayadhvajaṃ taṃ vanaṃ sadārastapase jagāma // 17.6.209	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
trailokyamālī saparigrahaś ca prāyāt padaṃ svaṃ ditijādhirājaḥ / śakro 'tha muktāphalaketave tāṃ dadau sa vidyuddhvajarājyalakṣmīm // 17.6.210	upajāti : upendravajrā [11: jtjgg], indravajrā [11: ttjgg]
muktāphalaketur ayaṃ bhuṅktāṃ vidyādharāsuraiśvaryam / svapadāni yāntu ca surā itthaṃ vāguccacāra divaḥ // 17.6.211	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
tāmākaṇya yayus tataḥ pramuditāste brahmaśakrādayaḥ śāpānmuktavatā tapodhanamuniḥ śiṣyeṇa sākaṃ yayau / śrīmuktāphalaketunā ca sahito bhāryādvayabhrājinā putreṇātha sa candraketuragamadvaidyādharaṃ svaṃ padam // 17.6.212	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
bhuktvā ca tatra gaganecaracakravartilakṣmīṃ sutena saha tena ciraṃ sa rājā / tasminniveśya nijarājyadhuraṃ virakto devyā samaṃ munitapovanamāśrito 'bhūt // 17.6.213	vasantatilakā [14: tBjjgg]
sa ca muktāphalaketuḥ prāgindrādasurarājyamāsādya / prāpya punaś ca pitustadvidyādharacakravartitvam // 17.6.214	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
padmāvatyā sahito daśakalpānmūrtayeva nirvṛtyā / bheje susamṛddhobhayasamrājyasukhaśriyaṃ sukṛtī // 17.6.215	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ālocya bhāvān avasānanīrasān saṃśritya cānte sa munīndrakānanam / jyotiḥ paraṃ prāpya tapaḥprakarṣataḥ sāyujyamīśasya jagāma dhūrjaṭeḥ // 17.6.216	indravaṃśā [12: ttjr]
evaṃ haṃsayugānniśamya sarasāmetāṃ kathāṃ tanmukhāj jñānaṃ prāpya ca labdhadivyagatikaḥ sa brahmadatto nṛpaḥ / tadbhāryāsacivau ca tau ca vihagau gatvaiva siddhiśvaraṃ tyaktvā śāpatanūḥ śivānucaratāṃ prāpurnijāṃ te 'khilāḥ // 17.6.217	śārdūlavikrīḍitā [19: msjsttg]
ity ahamākarṇya kathāṃ gomukhato madanamañcukāvirahe / he munayaḥ kṣaṇamātraṃ dhṛtyā ceto vinoditavān // 17.6.218	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
evaṃ kathitakathe kila naravāhanadattacakravartini te / gopālakena sahitāḥ paritutuṣuḥ kaśyapāśrame munayaḥ // 17.6.219	gīti (12, 18, 12, 18)
idaṃ gurugirīndrajāpraṇayamandarāndolanāt purā kila kathāmṛtaṃ haramukhāmbudher udgatam / prasahya rasayanti ye vigatavighnalabdharddhayo dhuraṃ dadhati vaibudhīṃ bhuvi bhavaprasādena te // 18.0.1	pṛthvī [17: jsjsylg]
candrānanārdhadehāya candrāṃśusitabhūtaye / candrārkanalanetrāya candrārdhaśirase namaḥ // 18.1.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kareṇa kuñcitāgreṇa līlayonnamitena yaḥ / bhāti siddhīr iva dadat sa pāyād vo gajānanaḥ // 18.1.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tato 'sitagirau tatra kaśyapasyāśrame muneḥ / naravāhanadattas tānmunīnevam abhāṣata // 18.1.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyac ca devīvirahe nītvāhaṃ sānurāgayā / vegavatyā yadā nyasto vidyāhas te 'bhir akṣitum // 18.1.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadā śarīratyāgaiṣī virahī paradeśagaḥ / vanānte dṛṣṭavān asmi bhraman kaṇvaṃ mahāmunim // 18.1.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa māṃ pādānataṃ dṛṣṭvā praṇidhānādavetya ca / duḥkhitaṃ svāśramaṃ nītvā sadayo munirabhyadhāt // 18.1.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
