sa ca kāpālikaḥ prāptāṃ dṛṣṭvā māṃ darpamohitaḥ / agātkathaṃcidācāntuṃ nadīṃ daivādadūragām // 18.2.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkṣaṇaṃ saṃmṛtabrahmavacanāhamacintayam / kiṃ nākrandāmi rājānaṃ sa rātrau jātviha bhramet // 18.2.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityetaccintayitvoccaistatrākranditavaty aham / paritrāyasva māṃ deva vikramāditya bhūpate // 18.2.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
jagradrakṣāmaṇe paśya valātkulavadhūṃ satīm / gṛhiṇīṃ maṇibhadrasya dhanādhyakṣānujanmanaḥ // 18.2.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dundubhestanayāṃ yakṣīṃ nāmnā madanamañjarīm / kāpāliko 'yaṃ tvadrājye māṃ dhvaṃsayitumudyataḥ // 18.2.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ityākranditavatyeva jvalantam iva tejasā / kṛpāṇapāṇimāyāntaṃ tamadrākṣamahaṃ nṛpam // 18.2.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca māmavadadbhadre mā bhaiṣīrnivṛtā bhava / ahaṃ kāpālikādasmādrakṣāmī bhavatīṃ śubhe // 18.2.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ko hi rājye mamādharmamīdṛśaṃ kartumīśvaraḥ / ity uktvāgniśikhaṃ nāma vetālaṃ sa samāhvayat // 18.2.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa cāhūto jvalannevaḥ pāṃśurūrdhvaśiroruhaḥ / upetyaivābravīdbhūpaṃ kiṃ karomyādiśeti tam // 18.2.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha rājābravīdeṣe paradārāpahārakṛt / pāpaḥ kāpāliko hatvā bhavatā bhakṣyatāmiti // 18.2.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ so 'gniśikhas tasmiñ śave 'rcāmaṇḍalasthite / praviśyādhāvadutthāya prasāritabhujānanaḥ // 18.2.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agrahījjaṅghayoḥ paścāttaṃ cācāntaparāgatam / kāpālikaṃ sa vetālaḥ palāyanaparāyaṇam // 18.2.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nabhasi bhrāmayitvā ca kṣipramāsphoṭya ca kṣitau / dehaṃ manorathaṃ caiva samamasya vyacūrṇayat // 18.2.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hataṃ kāpālinaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhūteṣvāmiṣagardhiṣu / āgādyamaśikho nāma vetālas tatra durmadaḥ // 18.2.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etyaiva tadagṛhṇātsa kāpālikakalevaram / tataḥ so 'gniśikhaḥ pūrvo vetālastama bhāṣata // 18.2.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
are śrīvikramādityadevasyādeśato mayā / kāpāliko 'yaṃ nihato durācāra tvamasya kaḥ // 18.2.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
etac chrutvā yamaśikhaḥ prāha tvaṃ brūhi tarhi me / kiṃprabhāvaḥ sa rājeti tataḥ so 'gniśikho 'bravīt // 18.2.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatprabhāvaṃ na cedvetsi tadahaṃ śṛṇu vacmi te / ihābhūḍḍākineyākhyaḥ sudhīraḥ kitavaḥ puri // 18.2.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa jātu hṛtasarvasvaḥ kitavaidyūrtamāyayā / adhikāvarjitānyārthanimittaṃ tair abadhyata // 18.2.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asvatvādadadantaṃ ca tair eva laguḍādibhiḥ / tāḍyamāno 'vatasthe ca grāvabhūto mṛto yathā // 18.2.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa sabhyaiḥ sarvaistarnītvā pāpaiḥ sa cikṣipe / mahāndhakūpe saṃbhāvya jīvato 'smātpratikriyām // 18.2.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sa ca tatrātigambhīre kitavo ḍākineyakaḥ / kūpe bhraṣṭo dadarśo 'gnau mahāntau puruṣāvubhau // 18.2.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tau ca taṃ patitaṃ sāmnā dṛṣṭvā bhītam apṛcchatām / kas tvaṃ kutaś ca kūpe 'smin patito 'syucyatām iti // 18.2.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athāśvasya svavṛttāntaṃ dyūtakāro nivedya saḥ / tāv apy apṛcchad brūtaṃ me kau kutaś ca yuvām iha // 18.2.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tac chrutvā tau jagadatuḥ puruṣāvavaṭasthitau / āvāmasyāḥ puro bhadra śmaśāne brahmarākṣasau // 18.2.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
agṛhṇīva ca tāvāvāmihaiva puri kanyake / mukhyamantrisutāmekāmanyāṃ mukhyavaṇiksutām // 18.2.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na ca mocayituṃ kaś citte śaknoti sma kanyake / māntriko dīptamantro 'pi pṛthvyāmasmatsakāśataḥ // 18.2.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
buddhvātha vikramādityadevastatpitṛvatsalaḥ / tatrāgādyatra kanye te pitroḥ sakhyātsaha sthite // 18.2.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ dṛṣṭvaiva nṛpaṃ muktvā kanyake te palāyitum / icchantāvapi naivāvāṃ tato gantumaśaknuvaḥ // 18.2.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āpaśyāva diśaḥ sarvā jvalantīs tasya tejasā / tato 'badhnātsa nṛpatirdṛṣṭvā nau svaprabhāvataḥ // 18.2.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
jātamṛtyubhayau dīnau vīkṣya caivaṃ samādiśat / bhoḥ pāpāvandhakūpāntarvasataṃ vatsarāvadhi // 18.2.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
muktābhyāṃ ca tataḥ kāryaṃ bhavadbhyāṃ nedṛśaṃ punaḥ / kariṣyataścettadahaṃ nigrahīṣyāmi vāṃ tataḥ // 18.2.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
ityādiśyāndhakūpe 'tra tenāvāṃ kṣapitāvimau / rājñā viṣamaśīlena kṛpayā na vipāditau // 18.2.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṣṭabhir divasaiḥ kūpanivāsasyāsya cāvayoḥ / avadhiḥ pūryate varṣādito mucyāvahe tataḥ // 18.2.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadbhakṣyaṃ kiṃcidetāni yadyahāni dadāsi nau / taduddhṛtyāmutaḥ kūpāttvāṃ kṣipāvo bahiḥ sakhe // 18.2.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṅgīkṛtya na ceddāsyasyāvābhyāṃ bhakṣyamuddhṛtaḥ / tatastvāṃ bhakṣayiṣyāvo niścitaṃ nirgatāvitaḥ // 18.2.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā brahmarakṣobhyāṃ tābhyāṃ sa kitavas tataḥ / tatheti pratipannārthaḥ kūpādbahirudasyata // 18.2.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa kūpādudgatopaśyaṃstadarthaprāptimanyathā / paṇāyituṃ mahāmāṃsaṃ śmaśānaṃ prāviśanniśi // 18.2.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkālaṃ tiṣṭhatā tatra sa dṛṣṭaḥ kitavo mayā / gṛhṇātu kaścid vikrīṇe mahāmāṃsam iti bruvan // 18.2.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ahaṃ gṛhṇāmi kiṃ mūlyaṃ mārgasītyudite mayā / rūpaprabhāvau svau dehi mahyamityabravīc ca saḥ // 18.2.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
vīra kiṃ kuruṣe tābhyāmity uktaś ca mayā punaḥ / uktvā kṛtsnaṃ svavṛttāntam evaṃ sa kitavo 'bhyadhāt // 18.2.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tat tvadrūpaprabhāvābhyāṃ tān ākṛṣya dadāmy aham / kitavān brahmarakṣobhyāṃ bhakṣyaṃ sabhyayutān arīn // 18.2.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā dhair yatuṣṭena tasmai dyūtakṛte mayā / dattau rūpaprabhāvau svavābhāṣya dinasaptakam // 18.2.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tābhyām ākṛṣya kūpe tān kramāt kṣiptvāpakāriṇaḥ / nayati sma sa saptāhādbrahmarākṣasabhakṣyatām // 18.2.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato mayā svīkṛtayoḥ svayo rūpaprabhāvayoḥ / so 'bravīḍḍākineyo māṃ dyūtakāro bhayākulaḥ // 18.2.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
nādya dattaṃ mayā bhakṣyamaṣṭamaṃ tadahastayoḥ / tanmāṃ nirgatya tau brahmarākṣasau bhakṣayiṣyataḥ // 18.2.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad atra kiṃ mayā kāryaṃ brūhi mitraṃ hi me bhavān / ity uktavantaṃ tamahaṃ saṃstavaprītito 'bravam // 18.2.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
yadyevaṃ tattvayā tābhyāṃ rākṣasābhyāṃ hi khāditāḥ / kitavāste tavārthe tau rākṣasāvadmy ahaṃ punaḥ // 18.2.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tattau darśaya me mitrety uktavāṃstena tatkṣaṇam / nītastatūpanikaṭaṃ kitavena tathety aham // 18.2.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
avāṅmukhaś ca yāvattaṃ kūpaṃ paśyāmyaśaṅkitaḥ / tāvattenāsmi dattvārdhacandraṃ kṣiptastadantare // 18.2.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kūpāntaḥ patitasyātha rakṣobhyāṃ bhakṣyabuddhitaḥ / gṛhītasya samaṃ tābhyāṃ bāhuyuddhamabhūnmama // 18.2.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yadātivartituṃ bāhubalaṃ nāśaknutāṃ mama / yuddhaṃ tyaktvā tadā kastvamiti tau māmapṛcchatām // 18.2.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato mayā ḍākineyavṛttāntātprabhṛti svake / vṛttānte kathite maitrīṃ kṛtvā māṃ vadataḥ sma tau // 18.2.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho tavāvayosteṣāṃ kitavānāṃ ca kīdṛśī / avasthā vihitā tena kitavena durātmanā // 18.2.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yeṣāṃ na maittrī na ghṛṇā nopakāraḥ spṛśenmanaḥ / teṣu cchalaikavidyeṣu viśvāsaḥ kitaveṣu kaḥ // 18.2.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāhasaṃ nair apekṣyaṃ ca kitavānāṃ nisargajam / ṭhiṇṭhākarālasya kathā tathā ca śrūyatāṃ tvayā // 18.2.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
asyāmevojjayinyāṃ sa dyūtakāro 'bhavatpuri / pūrvaṃ ṭhiṇṭhākarālākhyo viṣamo 'nvarthanāmakaḥ // 18.2.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasya hārayato nityaṃ dyūte ye jayino 'pare / te pratyahaṃ dyūtakārāḥ kapardakaśataṃ daduḥ // 18.2.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
tenāpaṇātsa godhūmacūrṇaṃ krītvā dinātyaye / cakārāpūpikāḥ kvāpi mṛditvā karpare 'mbhasā // 18.2.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā śmaśāne paktvā tāścitāgnāvetya cāgrataḥ / mahākālasya taddīpaghṛtābhyaktā abhakṣayat // 18.2.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatraiva ca mahākāladevāgārāṅgaṇe sadā / upadhānīkṛtabhujaḥ sa suṣvāpa kṣitau niśi // 18.2.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ekadā rajanau tatra mahākālaniketane / mātṛmaṇḍalayakṣādipratimās tasya paśyataḥ // 18.2.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sphurantīrmantrasāṃnidhyānmatirevamajāyata / na karomi kimarthārtham upāyamiha yuktitaḥ // 18.2.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
siddhaścedbhadramathavā na siddhaḥ kā kṣatirmama / ityālocyābravīddyūtāyākṣipandevatāḥ sa tāḥ // 18.2.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
eta bhoḥ saha yuṣmābhir dīvyāmīhāham eva ca / sabhyas tathā pātayitā jitaṃ sadyaś ca dīyate // 18.2.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
ity uktāstena tāstūṣṇīṃ yattasthustadapātayat / ṭhiṇṭhākarālaḥ sa paṇaṃ kṛtvā citrā varāṭikāḥ // 18.2.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
aṅgīkṛtaṃ pātanaṃ syātkitavenāniṣedhatā / iti dyūte hi sarvatra sthitirdyūtakṛtāṃ sadā // 18.2.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato jitvā bahu svarṇaṃ devatāstā jagāda saḥ / jitaṃ prayacchata dhanaṃ mahyamābhāṣitaṃ yathā // 18.2.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ity ucyamānāḥ kitavenāsakṛt tena tā yadā / devatā nālapan kiṃcit tadā vakti sma sa krudhā // 18.2.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
yadi sthitāḥ sthas tūṣṇīṃ tatkriyate kitavasya yat / adattahāritārthasya śilābhūtasya tiṣṭhataḥ // 18.2.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
yamadaṃṣṭrāgratīkṣṇena krakacenāṅgapāṭanam / tadahaṃ vaḥ kariṣyāmi nahyapekṣāsti kāpi me // 18.2.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā yāvadādāya krakacaṃ so 'bhidhāvati / tāvattasmai daduḥ svarṇaṃ devatāstā yathājitam // 18.2.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hārayitvā ca tatprātarnaktametya tathaiva saḥ / ācakarṣa haṭhadyūtenārthaṃ mātṛgaṇātpunaḥ // 18.2.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ sa kurute yāvat pratyahaṃ tāvadekadā / jagāda devī cāmuṇḍā mātṛstāḥ khinnamānasāḥ // 18.2.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ito 'haṃ nirgato dyūtādityāhūto bravīti yaḥ / sa nākṣepya iti dyūte śailīyaṃ mātṛdevatāḥ // 18.2.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmādāhvayamānaṃ taṃ tadevoktvā nirasyata / iti cāmuṇḍayoktāstā devyaścetasi tadvyadhuḥ // 18.2.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
niśi prāptaṃ kṛtāhvānaṃ kitavaṃ taṃ ca devane / nirgatāḥ sma ito dyūtādityūcuḥ sarvadevatāḥ // 18.2.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ nirākṛtaṣṭhiṇṭhākarālastābhir eva saḥ / tatprabhuṃ taṃ mahākālamevāhvayata devitum // 18.2.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi labdhāvakāśaṃ taṃ matvā haṭhadurodare / nirgato 'ham ito dyūtād iti devaḥ kilābravīt // 18.2.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
akṣīṇadoṣādviṣamādiṣṭāniṣṭabhayojjhitāt / durjanādbata devā apyaśaktā iva bibhyati // 18.2.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathā durodarācārabhagnakaitavayuktinā / tena ṭhiṇṭhākarālena khinnenaivamacintyata // 18.2.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho dyūtasthitiṃ devaiḥ śikṣitvāsmi nirākṛtaḥ / tad etam eva deveśam idānīṃ śaraṇaṃ śraye // 18.2.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityākalayya hṛdaye parigṛhyaiva pādayoḥ / stuvaṃṣṭhiṇṭhākarālastaṃ mahākālaṃ vyajijñapat // 18.2.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
devyā dyūtajiteṣvinduvṛṣakuñjaracarmasu / jānunyastakapolaṃ te naumi nagnāṅgamāsitam // 18.2.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yadicchāmātratas tās tā vibhūtīr dadate surāḥ / yo nirīho jaṭābhasmakapālaikaparigrahaḥ // 18.2.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa salobho 'dya jātastvaṃ mandapuṇye kathaṃ mayi / yadalpahetor mām evaṃ hā vañcayitum īhase // 18.2.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kalpavṛkṣo 'py adhanyānāṃ nāśāṃ pūrayati dhruvam / yadbibharṣi na māṃ nātha bhṛtaviśvo 'pi bhair ava // 18.2.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatprapannasya me kaṣṭavyasanāviṣṭacetasaḥ / vyatikramam api sthāṇo bhagavan kṣantum arhasi // 18.2.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tryakṣastvaṃ tādṛgevāhaṃ bhasmāṅge te mamāpi tat / tvaṃ kapāle yathā bhuṅkṣe tathaivāhaṃ dayasya me // 18.2.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yuṣmābhiḥ samamālapya kathaṃ nu kitavair aham / sahālapiṣyāmi punastanmāmāpannamuddhara // 18.2.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
ityādi tāvadastauṣītkitavastaṃ sa bhair avam / tāvat sa parituṣyaivaṃ devaḥ sākṣāduvāca tam // 18.2.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ṭhiṇṭhākarāla tuṣṭo 'smi tava mā smādhṛtiṃ kṛthāḥ / ahaṃ dāsyāmi te bhogān ihaivāssva mamāntike // 18.2.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti devājñayā tatra tasthau sa kitavastadā / tatprasādādupanatāṃ bhuñjāno bhogasaṃpadam // 18.2.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ekadā ca mahākālatīrthe 'tra snātumāgatāḥ / rātrāvapsaraso dṛṣṭvā sa devo vyādideśa tam // 18.2.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āsāṃ snātuṃ pravṛttānāṃ sarvāsāṃ surayoṣitāsm / taṭanyastāni vāsāṃsi laghu hṛtvā tvamānaya // 18.2.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yāvadetā na dāsyanti tubhyametāṃ kalāvatīm / apsaraḥkanyakāṃ tāvadāsāṃ vastrāṇi mā mucaḥ // 18.2.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃsa bhair aveṇokto gatvāmaramṛgīdṛśām / ṭhiṇṭhākarālaḥ snāntīnāṃ tāsāṃ vastrāṇyapāharat // 18.2.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
muñca muñcāmbarāṇyasmānmā sma kārṣīrdigambarāḥ / iti bruvāṇāś ca sa tā vyājahāra haraujasā // 18.2.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
kanyāṃ kalāvatīmetāṃ yadi mahyaṃ prayacchatha / tadahaṃ vo vimokṣyāmi vāsāṃsyetāni nānyathā // 18.2.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā taṃ durādharṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā smṛtvā ca tādṛśam / śakraśāpaṃ kalāvatyāstāścaitatpratipedire // 18.2.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
daduḥ kalāvatīṃ tāṃ ca tasmāy ujjhitavāsase / ṭhiṇṭhākarālāya tato vidhinālambuṣāsutām // 18.2.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
athāpsaraḥsu yātāsu kalāvatyā tayā saha / tasthau ṭhiṇṭhākarālo 'sau devecchānirmitāspadaḥ // 18.2.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kalāvatī ca devendram upasthātumagāddivā / tridivaṃ rajanau taṃ ca sadā patim upāyayau // 18.2.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvatprāptihetunā śakraśāpena mama vallabha / varāyitamiti prītyā kadācidbruvatī ca sā // 18.2.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena ṭhiṇthākarālena patyā tacchāpakāraṇam / pṛṣṭvā satī suravadhūḥ kalāvaty abravīd idam // 18.2.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
dṛṣṭvodyāne surāñjātu maryabhogāḥ stutā mayā / nindantyā dviviṣadbhogān dṛṣṭimātropabhogadān // 18.2.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadbuddhvā devarājo māmaśapadgaccha bhokṣyase / martyena pariṇītā tvaṃ bhogāṃstanmānuṣāniti // 18.2.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tenāyamāvayor jātaḥ saṃyogo 'nyonyasaṃmataḥ / śvaś ca nākāccireṇaiṣyābhyahaṃ mā bhūc ca te 'dhṛtiḥ // 18.2.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rambhā navaprayogaṃ hi nartiṣyati hareḥ puraḥ / ā tatsamāpter asmābhiḥ sthātavyaṃ tatra ca priya // 18.2.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tataṣṭhiṇṭhākarālastāṃ premadurlalito 'bhyadhāt / ahaṃ drakṣyāmi tannṛtyaṃ guptaṃ tatraiva māṃ naya // 18.2.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvā kalāvatyā tayā sa jagade patiḥ / yujyate kathametanme kupyedbuddhvā hi devarāṭ // 18.2.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam ukto 'pi nirbandhaṃ yadā tasyāścakāra saḥ / tadā kalāvatī snehānnetuṃ taṃ pratyapadyata // 18.2.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātaḥ prabhāvagūḍhaṃ taṃ kṛtvā karṇotpalāntare / ṭhiṇṭhākarālamanayatsā mahendrasya mandiram // 18.2.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
surebhaśobhitadvāraṃ nandanodyānasundaram / dṛṣṭvā ṭhiṇṭhākarālastaddevamānī tutoṣa saḥ // 18.2.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dadarśa cātra vṛtrārerāsthāne tridaśāśrite / pragītasvarvadhūsārthaṃ rambhānṛttotsavādbhutam // 18.2.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nāradādipraṇītāni sarvātodyāni cāśṛṇot / prasanne hi kimaprāpyamastīha parameśvare // 18.2.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ prekṣaṇakasyānte tatrotthāya pravṛttavān / divyaśchāgākṛtirbhaṇḍo nartituṃ divyabhaṅgibhiḥ // 18.2.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ṭhiṇṭhākarālo dṛṣṭvā taṃ parijñāya vyacintayat / aho etamahaṃ paśyamyujjayinyāmajaṃ paśum // 18.2.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ihendrasya puraścāyamīdṛśo bhaṇḍanartakaḥ / atarkyā divyamāyeyaṃ vicitrā bata kācana // 18.2.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ ṭhiṇṭhākarālasya tasya cintayato hṛdi / nṛttānte chāgabhaṇḍasya śakrāsthānaṃ nyavartata // 18.2.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ kalāvatī hṛṣṭā sā karṇotpalasaṃśritam / ṭhiṇṭhākarālaṃ svasthānamānināya tathaiva tam // 18.2.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ṭhiṇṭhākarālaś cānyedyur ujjayinyāṃ tam āgatam / dṛṣṭvā chāgākṛtiṃ darpād devabhaṇḍam abhāṣata // 18.2.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
are mamāgrato nṛtya nṛtyasīndrāgrato yathā / anyathā na kṣamiṣye te tannṛtaṃ bhaṇḍa darśaya // 18.2.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā vismitaśchāgastūṣṇīm eva babhūva saḥ / kuto 'yaṃ mānuṣo 'pyevaṃ māṃ jānātīti cintayan // 18.2.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nirbandhenocyamāno yannaiva cchāgo nanarta saḥ / tatsa ṭhiṇṭhākarālastaṃ laguḍair mūrdhnyatāḍayat // 18.2.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa gatvā śakrāya tathaiva cchāgalo 'khilam / sravadraktena śirasā yathāvṛttaṃ nyavedayat // 18.2.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
indro 'pi praṇidhānena bubudhe tadyathā divam / ṭhiṇṭhākarālamānaiṣīdrambhānṛtte kalāvatī // 18.2.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yathā ca cchāganṛttaṃ taddṛṣṭaṃ tenāparādhinā / tataḥ kalāvatīmevamāhūyendraḥ śaśāpa saḥ // 18.2.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nṛttārthamasya cchāgasya yenāvasthā kṛtedṛśī / rāgāttaṃ mānuṣaṃ guptaṃ yadihānītavatyasi // 18.2.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadgaccha narasiṃhena rājñā nāgapure pure / devāgāre kṛte stambhe bhava tvaṃ sālabhañjikā // 18.2.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavān kalāvatyā mātrālambuṣayā tayā / śakro 'nunāthitaḥ kṛcchrād evaṃ śāpāntam ādiśat // 18.2.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yadā bahvabdaniṣpannaṃ devaveśma vinaśya tat / bhaviṣyati samaṃ bhūmerasyāḥ śāpakṣayastadā // 18.2.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
itīndraśāpaśāpāntāvevaṃ sāśruḥ śaśaṃsa sā / tasmai kalāvatī ṭhiṇṭhākarālāya savācya tam // 18.2.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dattvā svābharaṇaṃ tasmai tirobhūya viveśa ca / gatvā nāgapure devagṛhastambhāgraputrikām // 18.2.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ṭhiṇṭhākarālo 'pi tatas tadviyogaviṣāhataḥ / na dadarśa na śuśrāva luloṭha bhuvi mūrcchitaḥ // 18.2.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho rahasyaṃ matvāpi mūḍhenāviṣkṛtaṃ mayā / nisargacapalānāṃ hi mādṛśāṃ saṃyamaḥ kutaḥ // 18.2.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadidānīmayaṃ prāpto viyogo viṣamo mayā / ityādilabdhasaṃjñaś ca kitavo vilalāpa saḥ // 18.2.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣaṇāccācintayatkālo vaiklavyasyaiva naiva me / gṛhītadhair yaḥ śāpāsntahetostasyā na kiṃ yate // 18.2.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ity ālocya vicāryātha pravrāḍveṣaṃ vidhāya saḥ / sākṣasūtrājinajaṭaṃ dhūrto nāgapuraṃ yayau // 18.2.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatrāṭavyāṃ catasṛṣu nyadhāddikṣu purādbahiḥ / kāntālaṃkārakalaśānnikhāya caturo bhuvi // 18.2.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
pañcamaṃ ca mahāratnasapūrṇaṃ nicakhāna saḥ / nagarāntarniśi svair aṃ devāgrāpaṇabhūtale // 18.2.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ kṛtvā sa tatrāsīnnadyāstīre kṛtoṭajaḥ / āśritya kaitavatapaḥ kṛtakadhyānajapyavān // 18.2.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
kurvandinasya triḥ snānaṃ bhuñjāno bhaikṣyamambubhiḥ / prakṣālya dṛṣadi prāpa sa mahātāpasaprathām // 18.2.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kramāc chrutipathāyāto rājñā so 'bhyarthito 'pi yat / nāgātadantikaṃ tatsa rājā tatpārśvamāyayau // 18.2.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sthitvā kathābhiś ca ciraṃ sāyaṃ tasmin yiyāsati / rājñy akasmāc chivā cakre śabdaṃ tatra vidūrataḥ // 18.2.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā tāpasacchadmā kitavo hasati sma saḥ / kimetaditi pṛṣṭaś ca kimanenetyabhāṣata // 18.2.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nirbandhāc ca nṛpe pṛcchatyuvācaivaṃ sa māyikaḥ / aṭavyāṃ nagarasyāsya pūrvato vetasītale // 18.2.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ratnābharaṇapūrṇo 'sti kalaśastadgṛhāṇa tam / ity uktaṃ me rutajñasya nṛpate śivayaitayā // 18.2.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
uktvaivaṃ kautukāviṣṭaṃ nītvā taṃ tatra bhūpatim / khātvā sa bhūmimuddhṛtya tasmai taṃ kalaśaṃ dadau // 18.2.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa labdhābharaṇaḥ saṃjātapratyayo nṛpaḥ / jñāninaṃ satyavācaṃ taṃ mene niḥspṛhatāpasam // 18.2.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ānīya svāśramaṃ taṃ ca muhurnatvā ca pādayoḥ / sa yayau mandiraṃ naktaṃ sāmātyastadguṇānstuvan // 18.2.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ kramāttamāyāntaṃ dhūrto rutamiṣānnṛpam / so 'nyāṃs trīn ratnakalaśān digbhyo 'nyabhyo vyalambhayat // 18.2.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tataḥ sa rājā paurāś ca mantriṇo 'ntapurāṇi ca / tattāpasaikabhaktāni tanmayānyeva jajñire // 18.2.168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā nīyamānaś ca devāgārekṣaṇāya saḥ / rājñā kutāpaso 'śrauṣīd āpaṇe kākavāśitam // 18.2.169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'bravīttaṃ rājānaṃ śrutā kākasya vāktvayā / āpaṇe 'traiva devāgre nikhāto bhuvi tiṣṭhati // 18.2.170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sadratnapūrṇaḥ kalaśaḥ kasmātso 'pi na gṛhyate / ity etad uktaṃ kākena tadehi svīkuruṣva tat // 18.2.171	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ity uktvā tatra nītvā taṃ bhūmer uddhṛtya bhūbhṛte / sadratnakalaśaṃ prādāt sa tasmai kūṭatāpasaḥ // 18.2.172	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'tiparitoṣātsa svayaṃ has te 'valambya tam / kapaṭajñāninaṃ rājā devāgāraṃ praviṣṭavān // 18.2.173	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra stambhe samādhūya parivrāṭ sālabhañjikām / anupraviṣṭāṃ priyayā kalāvatyā dadarśa tām // 18.2.174	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
kalāvatī ca tatsālabhañjikārūpadhāriṇī / duḥkhitā taṃ patiṃ dṛṣṭvā prārebhe tatra roditum // 18.2.175	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taddṛṣṭvā sānugo rājā savismayaviṣādavān / jñānābhāsamapṛcchattaṃ kimidaṃ bhagavanniti // 18.2.176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato viṣaṇṇavibhrānta iva dhūrto jagāda saḥ / ehi svabhavanaṃ tatra vacmyavaktavyam apy adaḥ // 18.2.177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā sa nṛpaṃ nītvā rājadhānīm uvāca tam / asthāne kumuhūrte ca devāgāramidaṃ tvayā // 18.2.178	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yatkṛtaṃ tattṛṭīye 'hni bhaviṣyatyahitaṃ tava / atastvaddarśanātsaiṣā prārodītstambhaputrikā // 18.2.179	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taccharīreṇa cet kṛtya tava nirloṭhya tan nṛpa / adyaivaitaddrutaṃ devakulaṃ bhūmisamaṃ kuru // 18.2.180	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
susthāne sumuhūrte ca kurvanyatra surālayam / animittaṃ śamaṃ yātu sarāṣṭrasyāstu te śivam // 18.2.181	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktastena sa nṛpaḥ samājñāpya bhayātprajāḥ / ekāhenaiva taddevagṛhaṃ bhūmisamaṃ vyadhāt // 18.2.182	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sthānāntare ca prārebhe kartuṃ devakulaṃ punaḥ / aho viśvāsya vañcyante dhūrtaiśchadmabhir īśvarāḥ // 18.2.183	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
siddhakāryas tatas tyaktvā pravrāḍveṣaṃ palāyya saḥ / ṭhiṇṭhākarālaḥ kitavaḥ prāyād ujjayinīṃ tataḥ // 18.2.184	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
kalāvatī ca tadbuddhvā śāpamuktābhyupetya tam / mārge hṛṣṭā samāśvāsya draṣṭumindramagāddivam // 18.2.185	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
indro 'pi vismito buddhvā tanmukhāttasya tatpateḥ / māyāṃ tāṃ dyūtakārasya jahāsa ca tutoṣa ca // 18.2.186	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ prārśvasthitaḥ śakraṃ tam uvāca bṛhaspatiḥ / vicitramāyāḥ kitavā īdṛśā eva sarvadā // 18.2.187	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
purākalpe tathā cābhūnnagare kitavaḥ kva cit / kuṭṭinīkapaṭo nāma kapaṭadyūtakovidaḥ // 18.2.188	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
paralokagataṃ taṃ ca dharmarājaḥ kilābravīt / kalpaṃ narakavāsas te kitavāsti svapātakaiḥ // 18.2.189	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekaṃ tu dinamindratvamasti dānavaśāttava / dattaṃ brahmavide hyekaṃ suvarṇaṃ jātucittvayā // 18.2.190	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadbrūhi pūrvaṃ kiṃ bhuṅkṣe narakaṃ kim utendratām / tac chrutvā kitavo 'vocadbhuñje prāgindratāmiti // 18.2.191	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa dharmarājena preṣitaḥ kitavo divi / ekāhamindramutthāpya devai rājye 'bhyaṣicyata // 18.2.192	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃprāptadevarājyaḥ sannānāyya kitavān sakhīn / saveśyāś ca divaṃ devānādideśādhipatyataḥ // 18.2.193	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nītvāsmānsarvatīrtheṣu sarvānsnapayata kṣaṇāt / divyeṣv api ca bhaumeṣu saptadvīpagateṣv api // 18.2.194	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anupraviśya cādyaiva bhūpatīn nikhilān bhuvi / prayacchata mahādānāny asmadartham anāratam // 18.2.195	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityādiṣṭāḥ surāstena sarvaṃ cakrustadaiva tat / dhūtapāpaḥ sa taiḥ puṇyair dhūrtaḥ prāpendratāṃ sthirām // 18.2.196	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadvayasyāś ca veśyāś ca ye tenānāyitā divam / amaratvaṃ yayuste 'pi tatprasādāddhatāṃhasaḥ // 18.2.197	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dvitīye 'hni sthiraprāptadevarājyam svabuddhitaḥ / kitavaṃ dharmarājāya citraguptaḥ śaśaṃsa tam // 18.2.198	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sucaritaṃ buddhvā dharmarājo visismiye / aho bata dyūtakṛtā vañcitāḥ sma iti bruvan // 18.2.199	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
īdṛśāḥ kitavā vajrinnity uktvā virate gurau / ṭhiṇṭhākarālaṃ dyāmindro 'naiṣītpreṣya kalāvatīm // 18.2.200	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatra tadbuddhidhair yābhyāṃ tuṣṭaḥ saṃmānya devarāṭ / dattvā kalāvatīṃ cakre taṃ sa pārśvasthamātmanaḥ // 18.2.201	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa devavaddhīraḥ kalāvatyā samaṃ sukhī / ṭhiṇṭhākarālo nyavasacchaṃkarānugrahāddivi // 18.2.202	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
taddīdṛgdyūtakārāṇāṃ māyāsāhasayor gatiḥ / tadagniśikha vetāla kiṃ citraṃ kitavena yat // 18.2.203	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ḍākineyena nikṣiptaḥ kūpe 'sminmāyayā bhavān / tattvaṃ niryāhi mittrāvāṃ nireṣyāvo 'vaṭāditaḥ // 18.2.204	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukto brahmarakṣobhyāṃ nirgatyāhaṃ tato 'vaṭāt / rātrāvasyāṃ puri prāpaṃ kṣudhārtaḥ pathikaṃ dvijam // 18.2.205	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ ca gṛhṇāmi dhāvitvā vipraṃ yāvajjighṛtsayā / tāvac chrīvikramādityadevamākrandati sma saḥ // 18.2.206	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tato 'ṅghrilagnas tenaiva rakṣito 'smy ujjhitadvijaḥ / evaṃprabhāvo devo 'sau vikramādityabhūpatiḥ // 18.2.209	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tadājñayā hataścāyaṃ khaṇḍakāpāliko mayā / tadetaṃ mama vetāla bhakṣyaṃ yamaśikhaṃ tyaja // 18.2.210	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tataḥ śrīvikramādityaḥ prakāśyātmāsnamatra saḥ / ālikhya puruṣaṃ bhūmau pāṇiṃ tasyāsinācchinat // 18.2.212	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

vighnāyājagmatuḥ pūrvaṃ prajāsarge prajāpateḥ / ghorau ghaṇṭanighaṇtākhyau dānavau devadurjayau // 18.2.229	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

dṛṣṭvaivātyadbhute caite harantau tau mahāsurau / parasparaṃ yudhyamānau jagmaturdvāvapi kṣayam // 18.2.231	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)

ityāsthāne nṛpānso 'tra pratīhāraniveditān / samrāṭ saṃmānayām āsa sāmantānsainikānapi // 18.3.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
siṃhalenrasutādivyakanyāhemamṛgāṃś ca tān / yathārhaṃ satkaroti sma sa savikramaśaktikān // 18.3.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taiḥ samaṃ sabalo 'nyedyuḥ pratasthe ca tataḥ kṛtī / sa rājā vikramādityaḥ prāpa cojjayinīṃ purīm // 18.3.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃmānitavisṛṣṭeṣu svadeśānatha rājasu / jagadānandini prāpte vasantasamayotsave // 18.3.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
latāsu puṣpābharaṇair maṇḍanaṃ kurvatīṣviva / tanvatīṣviva saṃgītaṃ bhṛṅgayoṣitsu guñjitaiḥ // 18.3.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
nṛtyantīṣviva cāśliṣṭamarutsu vanarājiṣu / pikeṣu kalaśabdeṣu maṅgalāni paṭhatsviva // 18.3.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'tra tā vikramādityaḥ pariṇinye śubhe 'hani / siṃhaleśvarakanyāṃ tāṃ te ca dve divyakanyake // 18.3.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
siṃhaleśvarakanyāyā jyeṣṭho bhrātā sahāgataḥ / siṃhavarmā dadau vedyāṃ mahāntaṃ ratnasaṃcayam // 18.3.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkālametya ca tayor yakṣiṇī divyakanyayoḥ / asaṃkhyānratnarāśīnsā dadau madanamañjarī // 18.3.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
śaktāhaṃ gantumānṛṇyaṃ deva tvatsukṛtasya kim / kiṃ tu darśayituṃ bhaktiṃ naitatkiṃcitkṛtaṃ mayā // 18.3.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatprasādo 'nayoḥ kāryaḥ kanyayor hariṇasya ca / ity uktvā ca tiro 'bhūtsā yakṣī rājñābhipūjitā // 18.3.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ saṃprāpya bhāryāstāḥ sadvīpāṃ ca mahīṃ kṛtī / śaśāsa vikramādityo rājā rājyamakaṇṭakam // 18.3.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sukhitaścāsta viharaṃstadā codyānabhūmiṣu / grīṣme jaleṣu sarasāṃ dhārāyantragṛheṣu ca // 18.3.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
varṣāsvantaḥpureṣūdyanmṛdaṅgaravahāriṣu / śaradīndūdayāpānahṛdyaharmyataleṣv api // 18.3.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āstīrṇasukhaśayyeṣu kālāgurusugandhiṣu / vāsaveśmasu hemante ca nṛpo 'ntaḥpurair vṛtaḥ // 18.3.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyedṛśasya rājñaś ca nagarasvāmisaṃjñakaḥ / babhūva grāmaśatabhuk citrakṛjjitaviśvakṛt // 18.3.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
sa dvyahena dvyahenāsmai rājñe prābhṛtaputrikām / likhitvānyānyayā rūpabhaṅgyā citrakaro dadau // 18.3.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā cotsavavaśādvismṛtya likhitā na sā / tena citrakṛtā daivātputrikā nṛpateḥ kṛte // 18.3.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāpte ca prābhṛtadine smṛtvā yāvat samākulaḥ / āste citrakaro hā kiṃ ḍhaukayeyaṃ prabhoriti // 18.3.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāvaddūrāgataḥ ko'pi pāntho 'kasmāttam abhyadhāt / sa cāsya pustikāṃ has te nyasyaiva kvāpy agāllaghu // 18.3.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kautukāc ca sa yāvattāmudghāṭayati citrakṛt / tāvaddadarśa tatrāntaścitrasthāṃ putrikāṃ paṭe // 18.3.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvaivādbhutarūpāṃ tāṃ nītvā nṛpataye dadau / prābhṛtaṃ pratyutedṛṅme siddhamadyeti harṣulaḥ // 18.3.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nṛpatistāṃ tu dṛṣṭvaiva sāścaryaḥ sa jagāda tam / na bhadra tava rekheyaṃ rekheyaṃ viśvakarmaṇaḥ // 18.3.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mānuṣo hi kuto vetti likhituṃ rūpamīdṛśam / tac chrutvā citrakṛdrājñe yathāvṛttaṃ śaśaṃsa saḥ // 18.3.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ so 'nanyadṛgrājā tāṃ paśyan putrikāṃ sadā / svapne dvīpāntare 'drākṣīttadrūpām eva kanyakām // 18.3.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃgamaṃ bhajate yāvat sokaḥ sotsukayā tayā / tāvat prabodhitaḥ so 'bhūdyāmikena niśākṣaye // 18.3.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prabuddho bhagnatatsvapnasamāgamasukhaś ca saḥ / yāmikaṃ taṃ krudhā rājā nagaryā nirakālayat // 18.3.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kva pānthaḥ pustikā kvāsya kva tasyāṃ citraputrikā / tasyā eva sajīvāyāḥ svapne saṃdarśanaṃ kva ca // 18.3.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadeṣā daivaghaṭanā kanyā sāstīti vakti me / na ca jānāmi taddvīpaṃ prāpnuyāṃ tatkathaṃ nu tām // 18.3.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityādi cintayanso 'tha sarvatrāratimānnṛpaḥ / smarajvareṇa jajvāla paryākulaparicchadaḥ // 18.3.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sasaṃtāpaś ca vijaye kṣatrā bhadrāyudhena saḥ / śanaistatkāraṇaṃ pṛṣṭo jagādaivaṃ mahīpatiḥ // 18.3.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
śṛṇu tadvacmi te mittraṃ jñātaṃ tāvadadastvayā / yaccitraputrikā tena dattā citrakareṇa me // 18.3.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāṃ cintayaṃś ca supto 'haṃ svapne jānāmi vāridhim / uttīrya prāpya nagaraṃ praviṣṭo 'smy atisundaram // 18.3.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatrāpaśyamahaṃ bahvīḥ sāyudhāḥ kanyakāḥ puraḥ / tā māṃ dṛṣṭvā jahi jahītyuccaiḥ kalakalaṃ vyadhuḥ // 18.3.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tataḥ sasaṃbhramā kāpi jāne māmetya tāpasī / praveśyaiva nijaṃ gehaṃ saṃkṣepādidam abravīt // 18.3.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
puruṣadveṣiṇī putra rājaputrīyamāgatā / ito malayavatyākhyā viharantī yadṛcchayā // 18.3.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭamātraṃ ca puruṣaṃ kanyābhir ghātayaty asau / etābhistena rakṣārthaṃ mayeha tvaṃ praveśitaḥ // 18.3.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā tāpasī sadyaḥ strīveṣaṃ sā vyadhānmama / avadhyāḥ kanyakāstāstu matvā soḍhaṃ mayāpi tat // 18.3.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yāvat praviṣṭām atraiva sakanyāṃ tāṃ nṛpātmajām / paśyāmi tāvac citrasthā yā mayādarśi saiva sā // 18.3.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
acintayaṃ ca dhanyo 'haṃ yaccitralikhitāmimām / dṛṣṭvā punaś ca paśyāmi sākṣātprāṇasamāmiti // 18.3.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājaputrī ca sā tāvat tāpasīṃ tāṃ sakanyakā / dṛṣṭo 'smābhiḥ praviṣṭo 'tra pumān ko 'pīty abhāṣata // 18.3.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pumān kutaḥ prāghuṇikā sthitaiṣā me svasuḥ sutā / iti tāṃ tāpasī sāpi pratyavocat pradarśya mām // 18.3.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sā rājatanayā strīrūpam apivīkṣya mām / vismṛtya puruṣadveṣaṃ sadyaḥ smaravaśābhavat // 18.3.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
āsītkaṇṭakitā kiṃciccintayantīva niścalā / labdhacchidreṇa kāmena kīliteva samaṃ śaraiḥ // 18.3.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣaṇāc ca tāpasīṃ tāṃ sā vyāharadrajakanyakā / tarhyāryetvatsvasṛsutā mamāpi prāghuṇī na kim // 18.3.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
āyātu madguhamiyaṃ praheṣyāmyarcitāmimām / ity uktvādāya pāṇau māmanaiṣītsā svamandiram // 18.3.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ ca labdhacitto 'syā jāne tatra tathetyagām / anvamanyata māṃ sāpi vidagdhā vṛddhatāpasī // 18.3.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'haṃ sthitavāṃs tatra rājaputryā tayā saha / krīḍantyā kanyakānyonyavivāhādivinodanaiḥ // 18.3.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na ca māmamucatpārśvātkṣaṇaṃ sā madgatekṣaṇā / yatra nāhaṃ na sā tasyai kācanārocata kriyā // 18.3.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha tāḥ kanyakāḥ kṛtvā vadhūṃ tāṃ rājakanyakām / māṃ varaṃ cāvayor jāne vivāhaṃ krīḍayā vyadhuḥ // 18.3.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtodvāhau tataścāvāṃ praviṣṭau vāsakaṃ niśi / niḥśaṅkā tatra māṃ sā ca kaṇṭhe rājasutāgrahīt // 18.3.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkālaṃ ca mayātmānaṃ prakāśyāliṅgitaiva sā / siddheṣṭahṛṣṭā dṛṣṭvā māmāsīllajjānatā kṣaṇam // 18.3.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
pravartayāmi surate yāvac caitāṃ hṛtatrapām / tāvat prabodhito 'smīha yāmikena durātmanā // 18.3.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadbhadrāyudha nedānīṃ citre svapne ca dṛṣṭayā / tayā malayavatyāhaṃ vinā jīvitumutsahe // 18.3.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavantaṃ rājānaṃ sayasvapnamavetya saḥ / bhadrāyudhaḥ pratīhārastamāśvāsyaivamuktavān // 18.3.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṛtsnaṃ cetsmaryate samyaktattadālikhatāṃ paṭe / devena nagaraṃ yāvadupāyo 'tra nirūpyate // 18.3.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti bhadrāyudhenoktaḥ sa rājā likhati sma tat / paṭe puravaraṃ sarvaṃ tadvṛttāntaṃ ca tatkṣaṇam // 18.3.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
taṃ citrapaṭamādāya pratīhārastadaiva saḥ / maṭhaṃ navaṃ kārayitvā tatra bhittāvalambayat // 18.3.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
maṭhe cātrākarod dūradeśād āgatabandinām / sattre saḍrasam āhāraṃ savastrayugakāñcanam // 18.3.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yaścitrasthamidaṃ vetti puraṃ ko'pi sa eti cet / mamāvedya iti prādādajñāṃ ca maṭhavartinām // 18.3.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atrāntare grīṣmavanaṃ mallikāmodimārutam / chāyāniṣaṇṇapathikaṃ dṛṣṭvā puṣpitapāṭalam // 18.3.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ājagāmāmbudaśyāmo gurugambhīragarjitaḥ / ketakodāmadaśanaḥ prāvṛṭkālamadadvipaḥ // 18.3.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatkālaṃ tasya paurastyapavaneddha ivāyayau / vṛddhiṃ virahadāvāgnirvikramādityabhūpateḥ // 18.3.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
himaṃ hāralate dehi siñca citrāṅgi candanaiḥ / pattralekhe 'bjinīpattraśayanaṃ śiśiraṃ kuru // 18.3.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaṃdarpasene kadalīdalair vitara mārutam / iti tadvāranārīṇāṃ tadā śuśruvire giraḥ // 18.3.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kramāc ca vidyudviṣamaḥ śaśāmāsya ghanāgamaḥ / rājñaḥ savirahajvālo na punarmadanajvaraḥ // 18.3.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
pānthāḥ pathi pravartantāṃ dūrasthānāṃ pravṛttayaḥ / priyāḥ priyāṇāṃ grathyantāṃ jāyantāṃ tatsamāgamāḥ // 18.3.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ityādiśantīva tataḥ kalahaṃsaravaiḥ śarat / āgātphullāmbujamukhī sakāśakusumasmitā // 18.3.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tasyāṃ dūrāgato bandī tatra kṣattṛkṛte maṭhe / bhojanārthī viveśaiko niśamya khyātimekadā // 18.3.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nāmnā śambarasiddhiḥ sa maṭhe 'tra kṛtabhojanaḥ / āttavastrayugaścitrapaṭaṃ bhittau dadarśa tam // 18.3.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vibhāvya tatra citrasthaṃ nagaraṃ tatsa vismitaḥ / jagāda bandī kenedamaho ālikhitaṃ puram // 18.3.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
yadekena mayā dṛṣṭaṃ likhitaṃ yena tena ca / dvitīyeneti jāne 'haṃ nāpareṇeti kenacit // 18.3.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvā maṭhajanenoktaṃ bhadrāyudhasya tat / tattena svayametyāsau bandī ninye nṛpāntikam // 18.3.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ tvayā nagaram satyaṃ taddṛṣṭam iti bhūbhṛtā / tatra śambarasiddhiḥ sa paripṛṣṭo 'bravīd idam // 18.3.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭaṃ mayā tanmalayapuraṃ nāma mahāpuram / bhramatā bhuvamuttīrya vāridhiṃ dvīpamadhyagam // 18.3.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasminmalayasiṃhākhyo nagare 'sti mahīpatiḥ / tasyāsti nāmnā malayavatītyanupamā sutā // 18.3.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
puruṣadveṣiṇī sā ca svapne jātu kathaṃcana / vihāranirgatā kaṃcinmahāpuruṣamaikṣata // 18.3.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tenālokitamātreṇa sa bhīta iva tatkṣaṇam / niryayau manasastasyāḥ puruṣadveṣadurgrahaḥ // 18.3.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nītvātha taṃ svabhavanaṃ svapna eva vidhāya ca / vivāhaṃ tena sahitā vāsaveśma viveśa sā // 18.3.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tatra tena sama myāvat sevate suratotsavam / tāvadvāsasthayā dāsyā sā niśānte prabodhitā // 18.3.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato nirvāsya kopāt tāṃ dāsīṃ svapnāvalokitam / taṃ smarantī priyatamaṃ prājvaladvirahāgninā // 18.3.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
apaśyantī gatiṃ kāṃcitsmareṇa vivaśīkṛtā / utthāyotthāya śayane srastāṅgī nyapatatparam // 18.3.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
mūkeva bhūtākrānteva tamaḥsaṃmohiteva ca / nottaraṃ pṛcchataḥ kiṃcid dadau parijanasya sā // 18.3.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vijñāya pitrā mātrā ca tataḥ pṛṣṭātikṛcchrataḥ / śaśaṃsa svapnavṛttāntaṃ sā tamāptasakhīmukhe // 18.3.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ pitrā kṛtāśvāsā pratijñām akaroc ca sā / viśrāmyagniṃ tam āpnomi ṣaḍbhir māsair na ced iti // 18.3.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pañca māsā gatāścādya tasyāḥ ko vetti bhāvi kim / itīdṛktatra vṛttāntaḥ pure parigato mayā // 18.3.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ tena sasaṃvādamukte śambarasiddhinā / jātārthaniścaye hṛṣṭe rājñi bhadrāyudho 'bhyadhāt // 18.3.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
siddhaṃ kāryaṃ sa deśo hi tvadvaśaḥ sanṛpaḥ prabho / tattatra gamyatāṃ yāvanmāsaḥ ṣaṣṭho na yātyataḥ // 18.3.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti tenodite kṣattrā tadākhyātārthavistaram / kṛtvā śambarasiddhiṃ tam agre bhūridhanārcitam // 18.3.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
raviraśmiṣu saṃpātaṃ pāṇḍimānaṃ dhaneṣu ca / sarittoyeṣu kārśyaṃ ca nirasyeva nijaṃ nṛpaḥ // 18.3.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nirātaṅkaḥ sa saṃpadya tadaiva dayitāṃ prati / pratasthe vikramādityaḥ sainyena laghunā vṛtaḥ // 18.3.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā krameṇa tīrṇābdhiryāvat prāptaḥ puraṃ sa tat / tāvaddadarśa tatrāgre janaṃ kolāhalākulam // 18.3.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
eṣā malayavatyadya pūrṇe ṣāṇmāsike 'vadhau / aprāptadayitā vahniṃ rājaputrī vivikṣati // 18.3.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityatra śuśrāva janātpṛṣṭādatha sa bhūpatiḥ / upāgāc ca sa taṃ deśaṃ racitā yatra taccitā // 18.3.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
taddarśanādapasṛte jane tatra dadarśa tam / dṛśorakāṇḍapīyūṣavarṣaṃ sā rājakanyakā // 18.3.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'yaṃ prāṇeśvaraḥ svapnapariṇetā mamāgataḥ / tattātasyocyatāṃ śīghram iti smāha ca sā sakhīḥ // 18.3.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tābhir gatvā tathaivoktastatpitā so 'tha bhūpatiḥ / nirduḥkho jātaharṣastaṃ prahvo rājānamabhyagāt // 18.3.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkālamutkṣipya bhujaṃ tena śambarasiddinā / uccair avasarajñena vandinedamapaṭhyata // 18.3.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
jaya nijatejaḥsādhitabhūtagaṇa mlecchavipinadāvāgne / jaya deva saptasāgarasīmamahīmāninīnātha // 18.3.103	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
jaya vijitasakalapārthivavinataśirodhāritātigurvājña / jaya viṣamaśīla vikramavārinidhe vikramāditya // 18.3.104	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
ity ukte vandinā taṃ sa vikramādityamāgatam / buddhvā malayasiṃho 'tra rājā jagrāha pādayoḥ // 18.3.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
viveśa ca kṛtātithyastena sākaṃ svamandiram / tayā malayavatyā ca duhitrā mṛtyumuktayā // 18.3.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dadau ca tāṃ sutāṃ tasmai vikramādityabhūbhṛte / sa rājā tena jāmātrā manvānaḥ kṛtakṛtyatām // 18.3.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yathā citre tathā svapne yathā svāpne tathaiva tām / vilokya sākṣānmalayavatīmaṅkagatāṃ priyām // 18.3.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
sa cāpi vikramādityastadadbhutamamanyata / phalaṃ śailasutākāntaprasādasuraśākhinaḥ // 18.3.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha tāmādāya vadhūṃ nirvṛtim iva rūpiṇīṃ sa malayavatīm / uttīrya vārirāśiṃ sotkalikaṃ suciravirahamiva // 18.3.110	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
tattatprābhṛtahastaiḥ praṇamyamānaḥ pade pade bhūpaiḥ / nijanagarīmujjayinīṃ pratyāgādvikramādityaḥ // 18.3.111	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
prabhāvam ālokya ca tatra tasya taṃ yathecchasatyīkṛtacitrakautukam / visismiye ko na jaharṣa ko na vā cakāra ko vā na mahotsavaṃ janaḥ // 18.3.112	vaṃśastha [12: jtjr]
tato 'sya vikramādityasyaikadātra kathāntare / rājñī kaliṅgasenākhyā sapatnīrevam abravīt // 18.4.1	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājñā malayavatyarthe yatkṛtaṃ na tadadbhutam / sadā viṣamaśīlo hi devo 'yaṃ prathito bhuvi // 18.4.2	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ na pariṇītā kim avaskandyāmunā balāt / madrūpāṃ putrikāṃ dṛṣṭvā gatenānaṅganighnatām // 18.4.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etannimittamākhyātā kathā kārpaṭikena yā / devasenena me tāṃ vaḥ kathayāmi niśamyatām // 18.4.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pariṇītāsmyavidhinā kathaṃ rājñeti duḥkhitām / māmetyāśvāsayannevaṃ sa hi kārpaṭiko 'bravīt // 18.4.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
mā sma manyuṃ kṛthā devi śraddhayā parayā hy asi / pariṇītātisaṃrambhādatrāmūlātkathāṃ śṛṇu // 18.4.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ kārpaṭiko bhūtvā sevāṃ kurvan bhavatprabhoḥ / aṭavyāṃ dūrato 'drākṣaṃ mahāntaṃ kroḍam ekadā // 18.4.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
daṃṣṭrāviśaṅkaṭamukhaṃ tamālaśyāmalacchavim / kṛṣṇapakṣaṃ śaśikalāḥ khādantam iva rūpiṇam // 18.4.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
etya cāvedito devi mayā rājñe tathaiva saḥ / rājāpi tadrasākṛṣṭo niragānmṛgayākṛte // 18.4.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mṛgāṭavīṃ ca saṃprāpya kurvanvyāghramṛgakṣayam / āveditaṃ mayā dūrādvarāhaṃ paśyati sma tam // 18.4.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvādbhutaṃ ca taṃ matvā kaṃcitkāraṇasūkaram / ratnākarākhyamārohadaśvamuccaiḥśravaḥsutam // 18.4.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

ekadoccaiḥśravā muktastadā ravirathādvane / dṛṣṭām upetya rājño 'śvāṃ taṃ turaṃgamajījanat // 18.4.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasminnāruhya vātāśve javādanvapatac ca tam / varāhaṃ vidrutaṃ rājā bhūmiṃ dūrāddavīyasīm // 18.4.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra dṛṣṭipathātso 'sya naṣṭo 'bhūtkvāpi sūkaraḥ / uccaiḥśravaḥsutādaśvāttasmādapi javādhikaḥ // 18.4.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato rājā tamaprāpya dūrojjhitaparicchadaḥ / ekamanvāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā māmevaṃ paripṛṣṭavān // 18.4.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
api jānāsi kiyatīṃ vayaṃ bhūmim upāgatāḥ / tac chrutvā devi rājānaṃ pratyavocamahaṃ tadā // 18.4.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
yojanānāṃ śatāni trīṇyāgatāḥ smaḥ prabho iti / tato rājābravīttarhi tvaṃ padbhyāṃ kathamāgataḥ // 18.4.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ savismayenāhaṃ rājñā pṛṣṭastam abravam / devāsti pādalepo me vṛttāntaṃ cātra taṃ śṛṇu // 18.4.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pūrvaṃ bhāryāviyogena tīrthayātrāvinirgataḥ / pathi devakulaṃ sāyaṃ sodyānaṃ prāptavānaham // 18.4.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra cāhaṃ niśāṃ netuṃ praviṣṭo 'paśyamantare / striyamekāmatiṣṭhaṃ ca tatrātithyādṛtastayā // 18.4.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rātrau ca sā nabhasyekamoṣṭhaṃ kṛtvāparaṃ bhuvi / vyāttāsyā prāha māmīdṛgdṛṣṭaṃ kvāpi mukhaṃ tvayā // 18.4.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'sidhenumākṛṣya sabhrūbhaṅgamabibhyatā / tvayā cedṛkpumāndṛṣṭaḥ kvāpīty uktā mayāpi sā // 18.4.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha saumyavapurbhūtvā sābravīnmāmavaikṛtā / yakṣī caṇḍyabhidhānāhaṃ tuṣṭā dhair yeṇa cāsmi te // 18.4.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

parituṣṭāsi cetsatyaṃ tatkuruṣva tathā mama / akleśena yathā tīrthānyaṭeyaṃ nikhilānyapi // 18.4.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ mayoktā yakṣī sā pādalepamadānmama / tena tīrthānyahaṃ bhrāntastvaṃ cehādyānudhāvitaḥ // 18.4.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tenaiva pratyahaṃ cāhamihāgatyāṭavībhuvi / bhuktvā phalānyujjayinīmetya sevāṃ karomi te // 18.4.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
iti devi mayā rājā vijñapto 'ntaramanyata / prasannadṛṣṭikathitaṃ yogyaṃ māmanuyāyinam // 18.4.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)

nāhaṃ bhokṣye na me kiṃcid upayuktaṃ bhavān punaḥ / bhuṅktāṃ kiṃcit pariśrānta iti rājādiśac ca mām // 18.4.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ karkaṭikāṃ tatra saṃprāpyāhamabhakṣayam / tayā cājagaro 'bhūvamahaṃ bhakṣitamātrayā // 18.4.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvā cājagarībhūtamakasmāddevi māṃ tadā / devo viṣamaśīlo 'bhūtsaviṣādaḥ savismayaḥ // 18.4.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekākī cātra vetālaṃ bhūtaketuṃ samasmarat / prāṅnetrarogād dṛṣṭyaiva mocayitvā vaśīkṛtam // 18.4.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sa vetālaḥ smṛtāyātaḥ prahvo rājānam abravīt / kiṃ smṛto 'smi mahārāja nideśo dīyatāmiti // 18.4.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atha rājābravīdetaṃ bhadra kārpaṭikaṃ mama / sahasājagarībhūtaṃ prāpaya prakṛtiṃ nijām // 18.4.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

ityālocya savetālo rājā pallīṃ jagāma tām / tatra sābharaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ caurāḥ paryavārayan // 18.4.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiratāṃ śaravarṣāṇi teṣāṃ pañcaśatāni ca / bhūtaketuḥ sa vetālo rājādeśādabhakṣayat // 18.4.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śeṣāḥ palāyya gatvā tatsvasenāpataye 'bruvan / ekākikesarī nāma sa cāgātsabalaḥ krudhā // 18.4.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

tato niveditātmānaṃ prahvaṃ pratyabhinandya tam / pṛṣṭvā ca kuśalaṃ rājā senāpatim abhāṣata // 18.4.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mama kārpaṭiko bhuktvā phalaṃ karkaṭikāṃ vane / gato 'jagaratāṃ tasya yuktiṃ tanmuktaye kuru // 18.4.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etadrājavacaḥ śrutvā senāpatir uvāca saḥ / devānugo 'yaṃ matputrāyāsmai taṃ darśayatviti // 18.4.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tataḥ sa tena tatputro vetālena sahaitya mām / oṣadhīrasanasyena pūrvavanmānuṣaṃ vyadhāt // 18.4.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upāgacchāma ca tato hṛṣṭā rājāntikaṃ vayam / rājā ca tamudantaṃ māṃ pādānatamabodhayat // 18.4.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekākikesarī so 'tha bhillasenāpatirnijam / gṛhamabhyarthya rājānamanaiṣīdasmadanvitam // 18.4.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

ityālocyātha tenāhaṃ mārgeṇa prasthito 'bhavam / sa ca me markaṭo 'gre 'gre prāyātpaśyanvivṛtya mām // 18.4.58	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

ekabhaktyā ca sa mayā tato 'pyārādhitaḥ prabhuḥ / mahyamevāntakāle 'tra rājyaṃ prādādaputrakaḥ // 18.4.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

evaṃ svodantamākhyāya sa rājānaṃ savismayam / ekākikesarī bhūyo bhillarājo vyajijñapat // 18.4.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tanmayā vānaraphalādyatkṛtaṃ cirajīvitam / pūrṇaṃ tato 'dya saṃprāptaṃ phalaṃ tvatpādadarśanam // 18.4.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)

bhāryāyāṃ kṣatriyāyāṃ me devotpannāsti kanyakā / ananyatulyā rūpeṇa nāmnā madanasundarī // 18.4.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kanyāratnaṃ ca tad evādṛte nānyatra śobhate / tat prayacchāmi tāṃ tubhyam udvahasva yathāvidhi // 18.4.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: pathyā)
dāso 'haṃ ca dhanurlakṣadvayenānugataḥ prabho / iti tenārthito rājā sa tathetyanvamanyata // 18.4.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śubhe lagne ca tāṃ tasya tanayāṃ pariṇītavān / muktākastūrikābhārabhṛtoṣṭraśatadāyinaḥ // 18.4.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saptarātramuṣitvā ca rājā prasthitavāṃs tataḥ / tayā madanasundaryā sabhillānīkayā saha // 18.4.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
atrāntare 'śvāpahṛte rājñi tanmṛgayāvane / sthitamasmadbalaṃ vignaṃ kṣattā bhadrāyudho 'bhyadhāt // 18.4.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
alaṃ viṣādenāyāti nacirād eva vaḥ prabhuḥ / nāsya divyaprabhāvasya kiṃcidatyahitaṃ bhavet // 18.4.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ na smaratha yadgatvā pātālātpariṇīya ca / nāgakanyāṃ surūpākhyāmekakaḥ sa ihāgataḥ // 18.4.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gandharvalokaṃ gatvā ca vīraḥ pratyāgatas tataḥ / tārāvalīm upādāya gandharvādhipakanyakām // 18.4.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvāśvāsitāḥ sarve tena bhadrāyudhena te / atiṣṭhannaṭavīdvāre rājño mārgāvalokinaḥ // 18.4.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājāpi spaṣṭamārgeṇa samaṃ śabarasainikaiḥ / tasyāṃ madanasundaryāṃ prakrāmantyāṃ yathecchayā // 18.4.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāviśatturagārūḍhaḥ savetālo mayā saha / vanaṃ tatpūrvadṛṣṭasya varāhasya didṛkṣayā // 18.4.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praviṣṭasya ca tatrāgādvarāhas tasya so 'grataḥ / dṛṣṭvaiva ca sa rājā tamavadhītpañcabhiḥ śaraiḥ // 18.4.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
hatasya tasya dhāvitvā vetālena vidāritāt / udarāddevi niragādakasmātsubhagaḥ pumān // 18.4.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ko bhavāniti yāvattaṃ rājā pṛcchati vismayāt / jaṅgamādrinibhastāvadāgāttatra vanadvipaḥ // 18.4.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āpatantaṃ tamāraṇyaṃ rājā dṛṣṭvaiva kuñjaram / ekenaiva pṛṣatkena marmāhatamapātayat // 18.4.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāpi pāṭitāttena vetālenodarāntarāt / puruṣo niragāddivyaḥ strī ca sarvāṅgasundarī // 18.4.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
praṣṭukāmaṃ ca rājānaṃ varāhodaranirgataḥ / sa pumānavadadrājansvodantaṃ śṛṇu vacmi te // 18.4.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āvāṃ devakumārau dvau bhadrākhyo 'yamahaṃ śubhaḥ / tau bhramantāvapaśyāva kaṇvaṃ dhyānasthitaṃ munim // 18.4.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gajasūkarayo rūpamāvābhyāṃ krīḍayā kṛtam / kṛtvā ca trāsito mohānmaharṣiḥ śapati sma nau // 18.4.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aṭavyāmīdṛśāveva bhavataṃ gajasūkarau / vikramādityabhūpena hatau muktimavāpsyathaḥ // 18.4.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityāvāṃ muniśāpena gajasūkaratāṃ gatau / tvayādya mocitau strī tu svodantaṃ vaktviyaṃ svayam // 18.4.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etaṃ ca sūkaraṃ kaṇṭhe pṛṣṭe ca spṛśa vāraṇam / kṛpāṇacarmaṇī divye tavaitau hi bhaviṣyataḥ // 18.4.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā sadvitīyaḥ sa tiro 'bhūttau ca bhūpateḥ / kroḍadvipau karaspṛṣṭau saṃpannau khaḍgacarmaṇī // 18.4.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sā strī svavṛttāntaṃ pṛṣṭā saty evam abravīt / bharyāhaṃ dhanadattākhyasyojjayinyāṃ vaṇikpateḥ // 18.4.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā harmyatalasuptāhamāgatyānena dantinā / nirgīyaivamihānītā na cāsyāntaḥ pumānabhūt // 18.4.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhinnodarāttu niryātaḥ pumānasmānmayā saha / evam uktavatīṃ rājā dīnāṃ tāmavadatstriyam // 18.4.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dhīrā bhava gṛhān bhartur bhavatīṃ prāpayāmy aham / samaṃ madavarodhena gaccha prakamanirbhayā // 18.4.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvānāyayitvā tāṃ vetālena samarpayat / rājñyai madanasundaryai prakrāmantyai pṛthakpathā // 18.4.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pratyāgate 'tha vetāle tatrāpaśyāva kānane / akasmādrājakanye dve bhūribhavyaparicchade // 18.4.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ānāyayac ca māṃ preṣya tayo rājā mahattarān / kutaḥ ke kanyake caite iti pṛṣṭāś ca te 'bruvan // 18.4.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asti dvīpaṃ kaṭāhākhyaṃ ketanaṃ sarvasaṃpadām / anvarthanāmā tatrāsti nṛpatirguṇasāgaraḥ // 18.4.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tasyājani mahādevyāṃ nāmnā guṇavatī sutā / nirmātureva dhāturyā rūpeṇāścaryadāyinī // 18.4.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāś ca siddhair ādiṣṭaḥ saptadvīpeśvaraḥ patiḥ / tataś ca tatpitā rājā so 'mantrayata mantribhiḥ // 18.4.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
vikramādityadevo 'syā yogyo me duhiturvaraḥ / tatpāṇigrahaṇāyaitāṃ tasyaiva preṣayāmy aham // 18.4.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti saṃmantrya vahane jaladhau saparicchadām / āropya sadhanāṃ tāṃ ca sa rājā vyasṛjatsutām // 18.4.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
suvarṇadvīpanikaṭaṃ prāptaṃ daivānnyagīryata / sarājakanyaṃ sajanaṃ vahanaṃ śaphareṇa tat // 18.4.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
sa cābdhivelayā nītvā vidhigatyeva rodhasi / kṣiptastaddvīpasaṃlagno mahāmatsyo 'vasannavān // 18.4.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvaiva tatra dhāvitvā nānāpraharaṇo janaḥ / vyāpādyāścaryamatsyasya tasyodaramapāṭayat // 18.4.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
niragāc ca tataḥ pūrṇaṃ janaistadvahanaṃ mahat / buddhvaitadvismayādāgāttatra taddvīpabhūpatiḥ // 18.4.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa candraśekharo rājā guṇasāgarabhūbhṛtaḥ / syālo janādvahanagādyathātattvamabudhyata // 18.4.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tato buddhvā guṇavatīṃ bhagineyīṃ sa tāṃ nṛpaḥ / praveśya rājadhānīṃ svāmānandādutsavaṃ vyadhāt // 18.4.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyedyuś ca sutāṃ candravatīṃ nāma sa bhūpatiḥ / vikramādityadevāya dātuṃ prākparikalpitām // 18.4.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
guṇavatya tayā sākaṃ tatkṛte vibhavottarām / prāsthāpayatpravahaṇe sumuhūrte 'dhiropitām // 18.4.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
te ime tīrṇajaladhī prakrāmantyau kramādiha / rājakanye ubhe prāpte vayaṃ parikaro 'nayoḥ // 18.4.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
iha prāptāṃś ca naḥ kroḍavāraṇāvabhyadhāvatām / sumahāntau tato 'smābhir evamākranditaṃ prabho // 18.4.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āgate vikramādityadevasyaite svayaṃvare / kanyake lokapālāstattasya dharmeṇa rakṣata // 18.4.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvāvocatāṃ tau naḥ kroḍebhau vyaktayā girā / dhīrā bhavata bhīrnāsti rājanāmagraheṇa vaḥ // 18.4.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ihaiva taṃ ca rājānamāgataṃ drakṣyathādhunā / ity uktvā tau gajakroḍau divyau kaucidito gatau // 18.4.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
eṣo 'smadīyavṛttānta ity ukte tair mahattaraiḥ / ayaṃ sa eva rājeti devi tānaham abravam // 18.4.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas te pādapatitā hṛṣṭāste rājakanyake / tasmai guṇavatīcandravatyau rājñe samarpayan // 18.4.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājāpyādiśya vetālaṃ sundaryau te anāyayat / sārdhaṃ madanasundaryā samaṃ tisro 'pi yāntiti // 18.4.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
svayaṃ ca tena vetālenāgatena tataḥ kṣaṇāt / mayā ca sahitaḥ prāyadutpatehnaiva devi saḥ // 18.4.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gacchatāṃ ca vane 'smākaṃ ravirastam upāgamat / tatkālaṃ tatra cāsmābhir aśrāvi murajadhvaniḥ // 18.4.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kuto murajaśabdo 'yasmiti rājani pṛcchati / vetālaḥ so 'bravīddevakulaṃ devātra vidyate // 18.4.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
divyakautūhalaṃ tac ca nirmitaṃ viśvakarmaṇā / tatraiṣa murajadhvānaḥ saṃdhyāprekṣaṇake prabho // 18.4.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavān sa vetālo rājā cāhaṃ ca kautukāt / tatrāgacchāma saṃyamya turagaṃ praviśāma ca // 18.4.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
apaśyāmārcitaṃ cātra tārkṣyaratnamayaṃ mahat / liṅgaṃ tadagre codagradīpakaṃ prekṣaṇīyakam // 18.4.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
anṛtyansuciraṃ tatra divyarūpā varastriyaḥ / caturvidhena vādyena gānagāndharvayoginā // 18.4.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prekṣyānte dṛṣṭamasmābhistatrāścaryaṃ praviśya yat / stambhasthaputrikāsvantarnartakyo layamāgatāḥ // 18.4.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gāyanā vādakādyāś ca citrasthapuruṣeṣv api / taddṛṣṭvā vismite rājñi sa vetālo 'bravīdidam // 18.4.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
māyeyamīdṛśī divya viśvakarmakṛtākṣayā / satataṃ hi bhavatyetatsaṃdhyayor ubhayor api // 18.4.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukte tena tatrāntarbhramantau vayamekataḥ / saviśeṣamapaśyāma rūpeṇa stambhaputrikām // 18.4.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rājā tu tāṃ vilokyaiva tallāvaṇyavimohitaḥ / śūnyaḥ stabdhaḥ kṣaṇaṃ so 'pi stambhotkīrṇa ivābhavat // 18.4.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
abravīc ca na paśyāmi rūpeṇānena cedaham / sajīvāmaṅganāṃ tanme kiṃ rājyaṃ kiṃ ca jīvitam // 18.4.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvā sa vetālo 'vādīnnaitaddurāsadam / kaliṅgasenā nāmāsti kaliṅgādhipateḥ sutā // 18.4.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tāṃ dṛṣṭvā rūpakāreṇa tadrūpahaṭanepsunā / vardhamānapurīyeṇa kṛteyaṃ sālabhañjikā // 18.4.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadgatvojjayinīṃ tasmātkāliṅgānnṛpateḥ prabho / tāmarhayasva tatkanyāṃ vikrameṇa harāthavā // 18.4.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti vetālavacanaṃ nyadhādrājā tathā hṛdi / tato nītvātra tāṃ rātriṃ prātaḥ saṃprasthitā vayam // 18.4.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
yāntaścāśokavṛkṣasya tale 'paśyāma pūruṣau / bhavyau dvau tau ca rājānamutthāyānamatāṃ tataḥ // 18.4.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kau yuvāṃ kimaraṇyasthāviti rājñoktayostayoḥ / eko vakti sma devaitacchrūyatāṃ kathayāmy aham // 18.4.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dhanadattābhidhāno 'ham ujjayinyāṃ vaṇiksutaḥ / so 'haṃ harmyatale jātu saṃsupto bhāryayā saha // 18.4.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātaḥ prabudhya paśyāmi yāvat sā tatra nāsti me / bhāryā harmye na cānyeṣu prāsādopavanādiṣu // 18.4.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na tasyāścittamanyādṛkḷpto 'tra pratyayas tathā / yadi sādhvyasmi tadiyaṃ na mlāyeddhruvamityasau // 18.4.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
mālā mahyaṃ tayā dattā sā cāmlānaiva vartate / tan na jāne kva yātā sā nīta bhūtādinā nu kim // 18.4.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti saṃcintayaṃścinvannākrandanvilapanrudan / atiṣṭhaṃ tadviyogāgnijvalito 'hamabhojanaḥ // 18.4.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bāndhavāśvāsitaḥ kiṃcit kṛtāhāro 'tha duḥkhitaḥ / brāhmaṇān bhojayann āsaṃ devāgāre kṛtasthitiḥ // 18.4.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra jātu pariśrānto vipro māmayam abhyadhāt / mayā viśramitaścāyaṃ snānāhārādinā tadā // 18.4.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kutas tvam iti pṛṣṭaś ca bhuktottaram asau mayā / vārāṇasīsamīpasthād grāmād asmīty abhāṣata // 18.4.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
madbhṛtyākyātamad duḥkhas tata eṣo 'bravīt punaḥ / ātmāvasādito mittra kimanudyoginā tvayā // 18.4.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vyavasāyī hi duṣprāpamati prāpnoti tatsakhe / uttiṣṭha tava bhāryāṃ tāmanviṣyāvaḥ sakhāsmi te // 18.4.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kathaṃ sānviṣyate yasyā diṅmātraṃ naiva budhyate / ity uktavantamatha māṃ prītyā bhūyo 'bravīdayam // 18.4.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
maiva kiṃ kesaṭo na prāgasaṃbhāvyasamāgamām / prāpa rūpavatīṃ bhāryāṃ tathā caitatkathāṃ śṛṇu // 18.4.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pure pāṭaliputre 'bhūddhanāḍhyabrāhmaṇātmajaḥ / kesaṭākhyo dvijayuvā rūpe kāma ivāparaḥ // 18.4.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
sa bhāryāṃ sadṛśīṃ prepsuḥ pitroravidito gṛhāt / nirgatya deśān babhrāma tāṃs tāṃs tīrthāpadeśataḥ // 18.4.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
kramāc ca narmadātīraṃ prāpto jātu dadarśa saḥ / mahāntamāgataṃ tena janyayātrājanaṃ pathā // 18.4.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dṛṣṭvā ca dūrāt tanmadhyād etyaikas taṃ dvijāgraṇīḥ / saṃbhāṣya kesaṭaṃ vṛddhaḥ prāha sapraṇayaṃ rahaḥ // 18.4.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvatto 'hamarthaye kiṃcil līlāsādhyaṃ ca tat tava / mama tūpakṛtiḥ pūrṇā karoṣi yadi vacmi tat // 18.4.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā kesaṭo 'vādīdārya śakyaṃ bravīṣi cet / tanniścitaṃ mayā kāryaṃ bhavatūpakṛtistava // 18.4.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vṛddhadvijo 'vādīcchṛṇu putrāsti te sutaḥ / sa cāgraṇīrvirūpāṇāṃ surūpāṇāṃ bhavāniva // 18.4.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
danturaścipiṭaghrāṇaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ kātaralocanaḥ / pṛthūdaro vakrapādaḥ śūrpakarṇapuṭaś ca saḥ // 18.4.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
tādṛśasya kṛte snehātkṛtvā rūpābhivarṇanam / brāhmaṇādratnadattākhyātkanyakā yācitā mayā // 18.4.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sā ca rūpavatī nāma pitrā dātuṃ pratiśrutā / tenānvarthābhidhā tasmai so 'dya pāṇigrahastayoḥ // 18.4.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadarthamāgatā ete vayaṃ dṛṣṭe ca matsute / na saṃbandhī sutāṃ dadyādārambho 'yaṃ vṛthā bhavet // 18.4.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
upāyaṃ dhyāyatā cātra mayā labdho bhavāniha / tadvācā pratipannaṃ drāgidaṃ me vāñchitaṃ kuru // 18.4.168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asmābhiḥ samamāgatya kanyāṃ tāṃ pariṇīya ca / matputrāya prayacchādya vadhvāstvaṃ hy anurūpakaḥ // 18.4.169	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā taṃ tathety uktavantamādāya kesaṭam / naubhiḥ sa narmadāṃ tīrtvā pāraṃ vṛddhadvijo yayau // 18.4.170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prāpya caikaṃ puraṃ so 'tha vyaśramatsānugo bahiḥ / ākāśapathiko 'stādrau tāvadarko 'py upāviśat // 18.4.171	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prasarpati tato dhvānte jalopānte sa kesaṭaḥ / upaspraṣṭuṃ gato 'drakṣīdrākṣasaṃ ghoramutthitam // 18.4.172	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhakṣayāmy ahameṣa tvāṃ kva me kesaṭa yāsyasi / ity uktavantaṃ ca sa taṃ rākṣasaṃ kesaṭo 'bhyadhāt // 18.4.173	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
mā sma māṃ bhakṣayestāvattvām upaiṣyāmyahaṃ punaḥ / brāhmaṇasya pratijñātaṃ kāryaṃ nirvāhya niścitam // 18.4.174	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā kārayitvā ca śapathaṃ so 'tha rākṣasaḥ / mumoca kesaṭaṃ so 'pi tajjanyabalakaṃ yayau // 18.4.175	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa vṛddhaviprastaṃ varamaṇḍanamaṇḍitam / ādāya kesaṭaṃ janyaiḥ samaṃ tatprāviśatpuram // 18.4.176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra sajjitavedīkaṃ ratnadattagṛhaṃ ca saḥ / prāveśayat kesaṭaṃ taṃ vividhātodyanāditam // 18.4.177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
kesaṭaś ca sa tāṃ samyagupayeme varānanām / kanyāṃ rūpavatīṃ tatra pitrā prattamahādhanām // 18.4.178	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nananda strījanaścātra tulyau vīkṣya vadhūvarau / sā ca rūpavatī prāptaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ tādṛśaṃ varam // 18.4.179	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāḥ sakhyo 'pi taṃ dṛṣṭvā jajñire jātamanmathāḥ / viṣādavismayākrāntaḥ sa tvāsītkesaṭastadā // 18.4.180	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
rātrau ca śayanīye taṃ cintāsaktaṃ parāṅmukham / priyaṃ rūpavatīṃ dṛṣṭvā vyājasuptaṃ cakāra sā // 18.4.181	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
niśīthe so 'tha suptāṃ tāṃ matvā nirgatya kesaṭaḥ / rākṣasasyāntikaṃ tasya satyaṃ pālayituṃ yayau // 18.4.182	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sāpi rūpavatī svair amutthāyānyupalakṣitā / sakautukā taṃ bhartāramanviyāya pativratā // 18.4.183	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
prāptaṃ ca kesaṭaṃ tatra rākṣasaḥ sa jagāda tam / sādhu bhoḥ pālitaṃ satyaṃ mahāsattvo 'si kesaṭa // 18.4.184	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
puraṃ pāṭaliputraṃ taddesaṭaś ca pitā tvayā / pavitritastadāyāhi yāvattvāṃ bhakṣayāmy aham // 18.4.185	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā sahasopetya rūpavaty abhyadhād idam / māṃ khāda bhakṣite hy asmin patyau kā me gatir bhavet // 18.4.186	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhikṣā te gatirity ukte rakṣasā sāpy uvāca tam / ko me bhikṣāṃ mahāsattva dāsyatīha striyā iti // 18.4.187	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yo na dāsyati bhikṣāṃ te yācitas tasya yāsyati / śatadhā śira ity ukte rākṣasena ca sābravīt // 18.4.188	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tarhi tvam eva me dehi bhartṛbhikṣāmimāmiti / adadac ca mamārāśu śīrṇamūrdhā sa rākṣasaḥ // 18.4.189	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sātha kesaṭamādāya taccāritrātivismitam / āgādrūpavatī veśma tāvac cākṣīyata kṣapā // 18.4.190	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śvobhūte ca kṛtāhāraṃ tajjanyabalakaṃ tataḥ / prasthāya narmadātīraṃ saṃprāpa savadhūvaram // 18.4.191	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato vadhūṃ rūpavatīṃ nāvamāropya sānugām / sa mukhyavṛddhavipro 'nyāṃ nāvamārohadātmanā // 18.4.192	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kesaṭaṃ tu pṛthaṅnāvi svīkṛtyābharaṇādi saḥ / āropayacchaṭhaḥ kṛtvā nāvikaiḥ saha saṃvidam // 18.4.193	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa savadhūjanyaḥ pāraṃ tīrtvā yayau dvijaḥ / nadīmadhyena dūraṃ tu dāśair ninye sa kesaṭaḥ // 18.4.194	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra kṣiptvā mahatyoghe nāvaṃ tāṃ kesaṭaṃ ca te / vṛddhadvijādāttadhanā bāhutīrṇāpagā yayuḥ // 18.4.195	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
kesaṭastu sanauko 'pi nadyā hṛtvottaraṅgayā / kṣipto 'mbudhau vātavaśānnyasto 'bhūdūrmiṇā taṭe // 18.4.196	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tatrāyuṣaḥ saśeṣatvātsamāśvasya vyacintayat / aho pratyupakāro 'yaṃ kṛtastena dvijena me // 18.4.197	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ vā tenaiva nākhyātā tasya nirdharmamūrkhata / yunakti bhāryayā putraṃ pareṇa pariṇāyya yat // 18.4.198	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti saṃcintayanyāvadāste tatra sa vihvalaḥ / vicaratkhecarīcakrā tāvattasyāyayau kṣapā // 18.4.199	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāṃ vinidras turye sa yāme kalakalaṃ divi / śrutvā dadarśa subhagaṃ khādbhraṣṭaṃ puruṣaṃ puraḥ // 18.4.200	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
trastaścirādavikṛtaṃ taṃ vibhāvya sa kesaṭaḥ / ko bhavāniti papraccha tatas taṃ so 'bravītpumān // 18.4.201	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvaṃ me brūhi bhavān ko 'tra tato vakṣyāmy ahaṃ tava / tac chrutvā kesaṭas tasmai svavṛttān tam avarṇayat // 18.4.202	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa puruṣo 'vādīttulyāvastho 'si tarhi me / tadidānīṃ svavṛttāntaṃ tava vacmi sakhe śṛṇu // 18.4.203	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
asti veṇānadītīre puraṃ ratnapurākhyayā / tatra kaṃdarpanāmāhamāḍhyaputro gṛhī dvijaḥ // 18.4.204	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'haṃ pradoṣe toyārthī veṇāmavatarannadīm / tasyāṃ skhalitvā patito vāryogheṇa hṛto 'bhavam // 18.4.205	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
dūraṃ nītvā tayā rātryā tenāhaṃ ca dināgame / āyurbalātkacchagate tarukhaṇḍe niveśitaḥ // 18.4.206	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
śākhāvalambenāruhya rodhasyāśvasya cāntike / mātṛdevagṛhaṃ śūnyaṃ tatrāpaśyam ahaṃ mahat // 18.4.207	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasmin praviśya dṛṣṭvāntaḥ sphurantīriva tejasā / mātṝr ahaṃ śāntabhayo natvā stutvā vyajijñapam // 18.4.208	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
bhagavatyaḥ paritrāṇaṃ kurudhaṃ kṛpaṇasya me / ahameṣa hi yuṣmākaṃ prāpto 'dya śaraṇāgataḥ // 18.4.209	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti vijñapya nadyoghaparikliṣṭasya tatra me / viśrāmyataḥ śanair mittraṃ viśrāntiṃ vāsaro 'py agāt // 18.4.210	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āgāttārāsthimālāḍhyā jyotsnābhūtisitā tataḥ / śaśiśubhrakapālā ca raudrī rajanitāpasī // 18.4.211	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatkālaṃ cātra jānāmi tato mātṛgaṇāntarāt / nirgatya yoginīgrāmaḥ parasparam abhāṣata // 18.4.212	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
adya cakrapure 'smābhir gantavyaṃ cakramelake / iha ca śvāpadākīrṇe rakṣāsya brāhmaṇasya kā // 18.4.213	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad eṣa sthāpyatāṃ nītvā yatraitasya śubhaṃ bhavet / āneṣyāmaḥ punaś cainam eṣo 'smāñ śaraṇaṃ śritaḥ // 18.4.214	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā khena nītvā māmalaṃkṛtya nidhāya ca / pure kvāpi gṛhe kasyāpyāḍhyaviprasya tā gatāḥ // 18.4.215	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra paśyāmi yāvac ca kanyodvāhāya sajjitā / vedo lagnaś ca saṃprāpto na janyabalakaṃ punaḥ // 18.4.216	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tatra sthitaṃ divyavaraveṣaṃ vilokya mām / ayaṃ tāvadvaraḥ prāpta iti sarvo 'bravījjanaḥ // 18.4.217	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato nītvaiva māṃ vedīm ānīyālaṃkṛtāṃ sutām / gṛhastho 'tra sa viprastāṃ mahyaṃ prādādyathāvidhi // 18.4.218	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
diṣṭyā tulyavaraprāpterasyāḥ sumanaso 'dhunā / saundaryaṃ saphalībhūtamityanyonyaṃ striyo 'bhyadhuḥ // 18.4.219	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ kṛtavivāho 'tra tayā sumanasā saha / mahopacārasukhitaḥ prāsāde suptavānaham // 18.4.220	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
athāsmin paścime yāme yoginyaś cakramelakat / āgatya tāḥ svayuktyā māṃ hṛtvaivodapatan nabhaḥ // 18.4.221	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yāntīnāṃ nabhasā tāsāmanyābhir majjihīrṣubhiḥ / sākaṃ pravṛttayuddhānāmahaṃ hastādiha cyutaḥ // 18.4.222	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
na ca tadvedmi nagaraṃ yatra sā sumanā mayā / pariṇītā na jāne ca kimidānīṃ bhaviṣyati // 18.4.223	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityeṣa vidhinā dattā yā me duḥkhaparamparā / sā sukhāntaiva saṃpannā mamādya tvatsamāgamāt // 18.4.224	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavantaṃ kaṃdarpaṃ kesaṭas tam uvāca saḥ / mā bhaiṣīrmittra nedānīṃ yoginyaḥ prabhavanti te // 18.4.225	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
asti me tādṛśī śaktiḥ kāpyapratihatā yataḥ / sahaiva ca bhramiṣyāvo vidhiḥ śreyo vidhāsyati // 18.4.226	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
anyonyaṃ vadatorevaṃ vyatītāya tayor niśā / prātas tatraḥ prayātaḥ sma tau ca tīrṇāmbudhī ubhau // 18.4.227	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kramād bhīmapuraṃ nāma nagaraṃ prāpatuś ca tau / saha kesaṭakaṃdarpau ratnanadyāḥ samīpagam // 18.4.228	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tau tan nadītīre śrutvā kalakalaṃ tadā / gatvā dadṛśaturmatsyamāpūritataṭadvayam // 18.4.229	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
samudravelayā kṣiptaṃ baddhaṃ kāyamahattayā / māṃsārthibhiḥ pāṭyamānaṃ nānāśastrakarair janaiḥ // 18.4.230	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
pāṭyamānasya niragādudarāttasya cāṅganā / sāścaryajanadṛṣṭā ca sā bhītāśiśriyattaṭam // 18.4.231	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatastāṃ vīkṣya kaṃdarpo hṛṣṭo 'bhāṣata kesaṭam / vayasya seyaṃ sumanā yāmahaṃ pariṇītavān // 18.4.232	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
na jāne punaretasyā vāso matsyodare katham / tattūṣṇīmiha tiṣṭhāvo yāvadvyaktirbhaviṣyati // 18.4.233	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatheti kesaṭenokte tatrāvasthitayostayoḥ / kā tvaṃ kimetaditi sā pṛṣṭābhūtsumanā janaiḥ // 18.4.234	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
tataḥ kṛcchreṇa sāvādīdahaṃ ratnākare pure / jayadattābhidhānasya vipracūḍāmaṇeḥ sutā // 18.4.235	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sumanā iti nāmnāsmi sāhaṃ bhavyena kenacit / pariṇītānurūpeṇa niśi brāhmaṇasūnunā // 18.4.236	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadrātrāveva suptāyā gataḥ kvāpi sa me patiḥ / yatnānviṣṭo 'pi matpitra na ca prāptaḥ kuto 'pi saḥ // 18.4.237	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'smi patitā nadyāṃ tadviyogāgniśāntaye / nigīrṇānena matsyena saṃprāpteha vidhervaśāt // 18.4.238	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti tāṃ vādinīmevaṃ nirgatya janamadhyataḥ / āśliṣya yajñasvāmīti vipra eko 'bravīdidam // 18.4.239	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
ehyehi putri bhavati bhaginīduhitā mama / yajñasvāmīti hi bhrātā sodaryo māturasmi te // 18.4.240	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā mukhamudghāṭya sumanāstamavekṣya sā / mātulaṃ pratyabhijñāya sāsrā jagrāha pādayoḥ // 18.4.241	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kṣaṇaṃ tyaktvāśru cāvādīttaṃ tu kāṣṭhāni dehi me / āryaputraviyuktāyā agreranyā na me gatiḥ // 18.4.242	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bodhyamānāpi sā asmānniścayāsnna cacāla yat / tatparīkṣitataccittaḥ kaṃdarpastām upāyayau // 18.4.243	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tam upāgatam ālokya pratyabhijñāya dhīmatī / sumanāḥ pādayos tasya patitvā praruroda sā // 18.4.244	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
janena pṛcchyamānā ca tena sā mātulena ca / ayaṃ sa mama bharteti nijagāda manasvinī // 18.4.245	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sarveṣu hṛṣṭeṣu yajñasvāmī nināya tām / svagṛhaṃ tatpatiṃ taṃ ca kaṃdarpaṃ kesaṭānvitam // 18.4.246	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra tānvarṇitasvasvavṛttāntānsakuṭumbakaḥ / upacāreṇa mahatā prītyā paricacāra saḥ // 18.4.247	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
gateṣv ahaḥsu kaṃdarpaṃ kesaṭo 'tra jagāda tam / abhīṣṭabhāryāprāptyā tvaṃ prāptastāvatkṛtārthatām // 18.4.248	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tatsabhāryo 'dhunā gaccha nijaṃ ratnapuraṃ puram / akṛtārtho gamiṣyāmi na svadeśamahaṃ punaḥ // 18.4.249	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tīrthānyeva bhramandehaṃ kṣapayiṣyāmyamuṃ sakhe / tac chrutvā kesaṭaṃ yajñasvāmī tatra sthito 'vadat // 18.4.250	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kimudvegādvadasyevaṃ sarvaṃ jīvadbhir āpyate / kusumāyudhavṛttāntaṃ tathā ca śṛṇu vacmi te // 18.4.251	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
devasvāmītyabhūccaṇḍapurākhye nagare dvijaḥ / tasyātirūpā kanyābhūnnāmnā kamalalocanā // 18.4.252	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
śiṣyaś ca vipraputro 'bhūnnāmnāsya kusumāyudhaḥ / sa śiṣyaḥ sā ca tatkanyā prītāvāstāṃ parasparam // 18.4.253	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā niścitā dātuṃ pitrānyasmai varāya sā / kanyā sakhīmukenāśu taṃ smāha kusumāyudham // 18.4.254	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tāto maṃ dātumanyasmai pratipanno bhavāṃś ca me / pūrvasaṃkalpito bhartā tadyuktyā hara māmitaḥ // 18.4.255	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'syāḥ so 'parahāya kṛtasaṃvidbahirniśi / asthāpayadvegasarīṃ bhṛtyaṃ ca kusumāyudhaḥ // 18.4.256	anuṣṭubh (1,2: asamīcīna, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
svair aṃ nirgatya cārūḍhā tasyāṃ bhṛtyena tena sā / na tasya nikaṭaṃ ninye ninye svīkartumanyataḥ // 18.4.257	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dūraṃ nītā ca sā tena rātrau kamalalocanā / prāpyaikaṃ nagaraṃ prātastamāha sma ca sā satī // 18.4.258	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvatsvāmī kva sa madbhartā taṃ prāpayasi kiṃ na mām / tac chrutvā sa śaṭho 'vādīdekikāṃ tāṃ videśagām // 18.4.259	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ tvāṃ pariṇeṣyāmi kiṃ tena sa kuto 'dhunā / śrutvaitatsābravītprājñā tvaṃ hi me sutarāṃ priyaḥ // 18.4.260	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tvamevātra na kiṃ sadyaḥ pariṇeyo 'syaho mama // 18.4.261	anuṣṭubh (ardham eva: pathyā)

tatroktanijavṛttāntā tasthau sā tena satkṛtā / so 'py aprāpya kubhṛtyastāmudyānādvimukho yayau // 18.4.264	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
