ity uktastena rājñā sa vaṇiksūnoḥ sakhābravīt / kautukaṃ yadi taddeva śrūyatāṃ kathayāmyadaḥ // 18.5.3	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
brahmasthalāgrahārāgryanivāsī dvijaputrakaḥ / candrasvāmītyahaṃ bhāryā surūpā cāsti me gṛhe // 18.5.4	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ekadā mayi kāryārthaṃ grāmaṃ pitrājñayā gate / tāṃ me kāpaliko 'drākṣīdbhāryāṃ bhikṣārthamāgataḥ // 18.5.5	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tena dṛṣṭvaiva sā jātajvarā sāyaṃ vyapadyata / tato madbandhubhir nītvā naktamāropitā citām // 18.5.6	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prajvalantyāṃ citāyāṃ ca grāmāttatrāhamāgamam / aśrauṣaṃ ca yathāvṛttaṃ svajanātkrandataḥ puraḥ // 18.5.7	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gate mayi citopāntam āgāt kāpālikaś ca saḥ / aṃsasthanṛtyatkhaṭvāṅgaḥ sphūrjaḍḍamarukāravaḥ // 18.5.8	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
bhasmakṣepeṇa śamite citāgnau deva tena sā / udatiṣṭhaccitāmadhyādakṣatāṅgī madaṅganā // 18.5.9	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa cādāya kapālī tāṃ siddhyākṛṣṭānudhāvitām / prādravallaghu tāṃ cāhamanvagāṃ sadhanuḥśaraḥ // 18.5.10	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa ca gaṅgātaṭe prāpya guhāṃ bhūmau nidhāya tat / khaṭvāṅgamabravīddharṣādantaḥsthe kanyake ubhe // 18.5.11	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yuvāṃ prāpte api mayā nopabhukte yayā vinā / saiṣādya has te prāptā me pratijñā siddhimāgatā // 18.5.12	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
iti tābhyāṃ sa madbhāryāṃ yāvaddarśayati bruvan / tāvattattasya khaṭvāṅgaṃ gaṅgāyāmahamakṣipam // 18.5.13	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
re kāpālika bhāryāṃ me jihīṣurna bhavasyayam / ityākṣipaṃ ca tamahaṃ bhraṣṭakhaṭvāṅgasiddhikam // 18.5.14	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
apaśyanso 'tha khaṭvāṅgaṃ palāyanaparaḥ śaṭhaḥ / dhanurākṛṣya kāṇḍena digdhena nihato mayā // 18.5.15	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pāpasiddhyaikasaṃtoṣaviḍambitaśivāgamāḥ / pākhaṇḍinaḥ patantyevaṃ prāgeva patitā api // 18.5.16	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athādāya svabhāryāṃ tāmanye dve te ca kanyake / gṛhamāgatavānasmi dattāścaryaḥ svabandhuṣu // 18.5.17	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra pṛṣṭe svavṛttānte kanye te vadataḥ sma me / vārāṇasyāṃ sute āvāṃ kṣitibhṛtsārthavāhayoḥ // 18.5.18	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
siddhiyuktyā hṛte cāvāmetayaiva kapālinā / tvatprasādāc ca mukte svaḥ pāpādasmādadūṣite // 18.5.19	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktavatyau cānyedyurnītvā vārāṇasīṃ mayā / arpite te svabandhūnāṃ tadvṛttāntamudīrya tam // 18.5.20	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
āgacchaṃś ca tato 'paśyamimaṃ bhāryāviyoginam / vaṇikputraṃ tato 'nena militvāhamihāgataḥ // 18.5.21	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kāpālikaguhālabdhenāṅgarāgeṇa rañjitāt / kṣālitādapi dehānme dṛśyatāṃ vāti saurabham // 18.5.22	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
itthaṃ mṛtotthitā prāptā mayā bhāryeti vādinam / vipraṃ taṃ savaṇikputraṃ satkṛtya prāhiṇonnṛpaḥ // 18.5.23	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato guṇavatīcandravatīmadanasundarīḥ / ānīyādāya ca samaṃ militvā ca svasainikaiḥ // 18.5.24	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
āgātsa vikramādityabhūbhṛdujjayinīṃ purīm / tasyāṃ guṇavatīcandravatyau ca pariṇītavān // 18.5.25	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃsmarannatha tāṃ viśvakarmadevagṛhe sthitām / stambhasthaputrikāṃ rājā sa pratīhāramādiśat // 18.5.26	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kaliṅgasenāt kanyāṃ tāṃ prāptuṃ dūto visṛjyatām / yasyāḥ pratikṛtirdṛṣṭā sā mayā stambhaputrikā // 18.5.27	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
iti rājñā samādiṣṭaḥ kṣattānīya tadagrataḥ / prāhiṇoddattasaṃdeśaṃ dūtaṃ nāmnā suvigraham // 18.5.28	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā kaliṅgaviṣayaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ ca yathocitam / kaliṅgasenaṃ rājānamevaṃ dūto jagāda saḥ // 18.5.29	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
devaḥ śrīvikramādityastvāmādiśati bhūpate / vettha tvaṃ bhuvi yadratnaṃ tadasmānupagacchati // 18.5.30	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tavāsti kanyāratnaṃ ca tad asmabhyaṃ samarpaya / asmatprasādāc ca nijaṃ bhuṅkṣva rājyamakaṇṭakam // 18.5.31	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
etac chrutvā sa kāliṅgaḥ kruddho rājābhyabhāṣata / ko nāma vikramādityaḥ sa evājñāṃ dadāti naḥ // 18.5.32	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mārgatyupāyanaṃ kanyāṃ darpāndho 'dhaḥ patiṣyati / etatkaliṅgasenātsa śrutvā dūtaḥ sam abhyadhāt // 18.5.33	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhṛtyo 'pyevamanātmajñaḥ kathamojāyase prabhoḥ / kiṃ mūḍha tatpratāpāgnau śalabhāyitumicchasi // 18.5.34	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā tata āgatya sa dūtastannyavedayat / vacaḥ kaliṅgasenoktaṃ vikramādityabhūbhṛte // 18.5.35	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato viṣamaśīlo 'sau kruddhaḥ prāyādbalaiḥ saha / sabhūtaketuvetālaḥ kāliṅgaṃ prati taṃ prabhuḥ // 18.5.36	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dehyāśu kanyāmiti taṃ kāliṅgaṃ bruvatīṣviva / senāravapratiravair dikṣu taddeśamāpa ca // 18.5.37	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
dṛṣṭvātha yuddhasaṃnaddhaṃ ruddhvā taṃ ca nṛpaṃ balaiḥ / rājā sa vikramādityo manasyevamacintayat // 18.5.38	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etatsutāṃ vinā tāvanmama nāstyeva nirvṛtiḥ / tatkathaṃ śvaśuraṃ hanmi yuktimatra karomi kim // 18.5.39	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ālocya savetālo rāja tatsiddhyalakṣitaḥ / suptasya prāviśad rātrau kaliṅgeśasya vāsakam // 18.5.40	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
are viṣamaśīlena vigṛhya svapiṣīti tam / prabodhya tatra vitrastaṃ vetālaḥ so 'bravīddhasan // 18.5.41	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa cotthāya kaliṅgendro dṛṣṭvā darśitasāhasam / parijñāya ca rājānaṃ raudravetālasaṃgatam // 18.5.42	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
idānīṃ vaśago 'haṃ te devādiśa karomi kim / iti vijñāpayām āsa bhītastaccaraṇānataḥ // 18.5.43	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mayā cetprabhuṇā kāryaṃ tava taddehi me sutām / kaliṅgasenāmiti taṃ rājāpi pratyabhāṣata // 18.5.44	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
tatheti pratipede ca kaliṅgādhipatiḥ sa tat / rājāpi vetālayutaḥ svamāgācchibiraṃ kṛtī // 18.5.45	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
anyedyuś ca kaliṅgendraḥ sa devi tvāmadātpitā / rājñe viṣamaśīlāya vidhivadvibhavottaram // 18.5.46	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ gāḍhānurāgeṇa rājñā dehapaṇena ca / pariṇītāsi vidhivaddevi nārijigīṣayā // 18.5.47	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
iti kārpaṭikasyāhaṃ devasenasya vakrataḥ / śrutvāvamānaprabhavaṃ he sakhyo manyumatyajam // 18.5.48	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
itthaṃ vivāhitā stambhaputrikādarśanādaham / citrāvalokanāccaiṣā rājñā malayavatyapi // 18.5.49	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ kaliṅgasenā sā vikramādityavallabhā / bhartṛprabhāvamākhyāya svasapatnīranandayat // 18.5.50	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa caivaṃ vikramādityaḥ sarvābhistābhir anvitaḥ / tayā malayavatyāca tasthau sāmrājyasusthitaḥ // 18.5.51	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
athaikadā rājaputraḥ ko 'pyāgāddakṣiṇāpathāt / kṛṣṇaśaktyabhidhāno 'tra paribhūtaḥ svagotrajaiḥ // 18.5.52	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
sa siṃhadvāramāgatya rājñaḥ kārpaṭikavratam / śiśriye rājaputrāṇāmanvitaḥ pañcabhiḥ śataiḥ // 18.5.53	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dvādaśābdānmayā sevā vikramādityabhūpateḥ / kāryeti pratijajñe ca vāryamāṇo 'pi bhūbhujā // 18.5.54	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
niścayena ca tasyātra tiṣṭhataḥ sānuyāyinaḥ / siṃhadvāre nṛpasutasyaikādaśa samā yayuḥ // 18.5.55	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
prāpte ca dvādaśe varṣe tasya deśāntarasthitā / bhāryā ciraviyogārtā prāhiṇollekhapattrikām // 18.5.56	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vīracaryāgate rātrau pracchanne rājñi śṛṇvati / dīpenāvācayat tasyābhāryāṃ sa likhitāmimām // 18.5.57	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃtaptāyatataralāstava virahe nātha kaṭhinahṛdayāyāḥ / niryāntyaviratamete niḥśvāsā me na tu prāṇāḥ // 18.5.58	āryā (12, 18, 12, 15)
iti vācayatastasmātsamrāṭ kārpaṭikānmuhuḥ / śrutvā sa rājadhānīṃ svāṃ gatvā rājā vyacintayat // 18.5.59	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sīdatkalatraḥ kliṣṭo 'yaṃ bata kārpaṭikaściram / asiddhakāryaḥ pūrṇe 'smindvādaśe 'bde tyajedasūn // 18.5.60	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
tadvilambo na kāryo 'sya mayetyālocya bhūpatiḥ / ānāyayatkārpaṭikaṃ dāsīṃ preṣya tadaiva saḥ // 18.5.61	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
śāsanaṃ lekhayitvā ca tam evaṃ sa samādiśat / oṃkārapīṭhamārgeṇa bhadra gacchottarāṃ diśam // 18.5.62	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāmunā śāsanena grāmaṃ bhuṅkṣva madarpitam / nāmnā taṃ khaṇḍavaṭakaṃ pṛcchan gacchann avāpsyasi // 18.5.63	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ity uktvā śāsanaṃ tasmai pradadau tatsa bhūpatiḥ / so 'py anāvedya bhṛtyebhyo yayau kārpaṭiko niśi // 18.5.64	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kā jigīṣā mamaikena grāmeṇa vrīḍadāyinā / tathāpyājñā prabhoḥ kāryetyasaṃtuṣṭaḥ kramādvrajan // 18.5.65	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
oṃkārapīṭhato gatvā dūre 'raṇye dadarśa saḥ / krīḍantīḥ kanyakā bahvīḥ pṛcchati sma tataś ca tāḥ // 18.5.66	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
api jānitha bhoḥ khaṇḍavaṭakaṃ kva bhavediha / etac chrutvā tamūcustāstan na jānīmahe vayam // 18.5.67	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gacchāgre yojaneṣv atra daśamātreṣu naḥ pitā / saumya tiṣṭhati taṃ pṛccha vidyādgrāmaṃ sa jātu tam // 18.5.68	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evam uktaḥ sa kanyābhistābhir gatvā dadarśa tam / kārpaṭī pitaraṃ tāsāṃ rākṣasaṃ bhīṣaṇākṛtim // 18.5.69	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iha kva khaṇḍavaṭakaṃ brūhi bhadreti taṃ ca saḥ / papraccha so 'pi taṃ dhair yamohito rākṣaso 'bravīt // 18.5.70	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ tatra te taddhi puraṃ ciraśūnyaṃ tathāpi cet / yāsi tacchṛṇu mārgo 'yaṃ puratas te dvidhā gataḥ // 18.5.71	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra vāmena gacchestvaṃ pathā yāvadavāpsyasi / pratolīṃ khaṇḍavaṭakasyoccaprākārahāriṇīm // 18.5.72	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ity ukto rakṣasā gatvā pratolīṃ tāmavāpya saḥ / viveśa śūnyaṃ bhayadaṃ divyaṃ hṛdyaṃ ca tatpuram // 18.5.73	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
saptakakṣāvṛtaṃ tatra rājaveśma praviśya ca / āruroha sa harmyāgraṃ maṇikāñcananirmitam // 18.5.74	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra ratnāsanaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasminnupaviveśa ca / tāvac ca rākṣaso 'bhetya vetrahastastam abhyadhāt // 18.5.75	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bho mānuṣa kimatra tvam upaviṣṭo nṛpāsane / tac chrutvā kṛṣṇaśaktiḥ sa dhīraḥ kārpaṭiko 'bravīt // 18.5.76	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahamatra prabhuryūyaṃ karadāś ca kuṭumbinaḥ / vikramādityadevena vilabdhāḥ śāsanena me // 18.5.77	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā śāsanaṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasastaṃ praṇamya saḥ / uvāca rājā tvamiha pratīhārastavāsmi ca // 18.5.78	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
sarvatra vikramādityadevasyājñā hy akhaṇḍitā / ity uktvā prakṛtīḥ sarvā ājuhāva sa rākṣasaḥ // 18.5.79	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āyayurmantriṇaścātra tathā rājaparicchadaḥ / apūri caturaṅgeṇa balena nagaraṃ ca tat // 18.5.80	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
sarvaiḥ praṇamyamāno 'tha hṛṣṭaḥ kārpaṭiko 'tra saḥ / cakre rājopacāreṇa kṛtsnāḥ snānādikāḥ kriyāḥ // 18.5.81	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa rāja bhūtvātra savismayamacintayat / aho prabhāvaḥ ko 'pyeṣa vikramādityabhūpateḥ // 18.5.82	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
gāmbhīryagarimā citramapūrvas tasya ca prabhoḥ / dadāti yadgrāmamiti bruvanrājyamapīdṛśam // 18.5.83	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
iti citrīyamāṇo 'tra rājyaṃ kurvannuvāsa saḥ / tatsakhīnvikramādityo 'pyujjayinyāṃ pupoṣa tān // 18.5.84	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
dinaiś ca vikramādityaṃ praṇantuṃ sa upāyayau / sotkaḥ kārpaṭiko rājā sainyakampitabhūtalaḥ // 18.5.85	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āgataṃ vikramādityaḥ pādānatam uvāca tam / patnyāḥ prahitalekhāyā niḥśvāsān gaccha vāraya // 18.5.86	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā bhūmipatinā preṣitastena sādbhutaḥ / sa kṛṣṇaśaktiḥ sakhibhiḥ sākaṃ deśamagānnijam // 18.5.87	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
utsārya gotrajān bhāryāṃ nandayitvā cirotsukām / siddhepsitādhikaḥ so 'tha bheje rājyaśriyaṃ parām // 18.5.88	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ sodbhutacāritro vikramādityabhūmipaḥ / ekadātra dadarśaikamūrdhvaromakacaṃ dvijam // 18.5.89	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
papraccha taṃ ca he brahmannīdṛkkasmādbhavāniti / tataḥ so 'smai svavṛttāntam evaṃ rājñe dvijo 'bravīt // 18.5.90	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
agnisvāmīti vipro 'bhūddeva pāṭaliputrake / mahāgnihotriṇas tasya devasvāmītyahaṃ sutaḥ // 18.5.91	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mayā ca dūrato deśādviprakanyā vivāhitā / bālatvātsā ca tatraiva sthāpitābhūtpitur gṛhe // 18.5.92	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kālena yauvanasthāṃ tāmānetuṃ śvāśuraṃ gṛhasm / āruhyāśvaṃ sahaikena bhṛtyena gatavānaham // 18.5.93	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
satkṛtaḥ śvaśureṇāhaṃ sahāyātaikaceṭikām / ādāyāśvādhirūḍhāṃ tāṃ bhāryāṃ prāyāmahaṃ tataḥ // 18.5.94	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ardhamārge ca sāśvāyā avaruhyaiva me vadhūḥ / ambupānāpadeśena nadīkacchamagātkila // 18.5.95	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ciraṃ nāyāti yāvat sā tāvac ca tadavekṣaṇe / saha sthitaṃ taṃ tatraiva bhṛtyamasmi visṛṣṭavān // 18.5.96	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
so 'pi nāyāti yāvac ca tāvadasmi gataḥ svayam / tacceṭikāṃ sthāpayitvā turagīrakṣaṇāya tām // 18.5.97	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ra-vipulā)
gatvā paśyāmi yāvat sa bhṛtyo madbhāryayā tayā / bhakṣayitvāsthiśeṣo me kṛto raktāktavaktrayā // 18.5.98	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vitrastaś ca tato yāvadgacchāmi turagīṃ prati / tāvat sāpi tayā tadvattacceṭyā bhakṣitā mama // 18.5.99	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ palāyya yāto 'haṃ tattrāsenādhunāpi me / naivordhvaromakeśatvamantaḥsthena nivartate // 18.5.100	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tad atra me gatir deva iti taṃ vādinaṃ dvijam / ājñayā vikramādityo gatatrāsaṃ vvyadhatta saḥ // 18.5.101	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho dhiṅnāsti viśvāsaḥ strīṣu sāhasabhūmiṣu / iti rājñi vadatyasminneko 'mātyo 'bravīdidam // 18.5.102	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tādṛśya eva durjātāḥ striyo deva tathā ca kim / na śrutaṃ vṛttamiha yadbrāhmaṇasyāgniśarmaṇaḥ // 18.5.103	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ihaivāstyagniśarmākhyaḥ somaśarmasuto dvijaḥ / pitroḥ prāṇasamo mūrkhaḥ sarvavidyāsvaśikṣitaḥ // 18.5.104	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vardhamānapurāttena pariṇītā dvijātmajā / bāleti sā ca na tyaktā pitrā dhanavatā gṛhāt // 18.5.105	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tasyāṃ ca yauvanasthāyāmagniśarmāṇamūcatuḥ / pitarau putra bhāryāṃ tāṃ nānayasyadhunāpi kim // 18.5.106	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutvevaitadanāpṛcchya pitarau sa jaḍāśayaḥ / agniśarmā tataḥ prāyādekākī gṛhiṇīṃ prati // 18.5.107	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nirgatasya gṛhāttasya dakṣiṇo 'bhūtkapiñjalaḥ / dakṣiṇā ca virauti sma śivā vāmaikaśaṃsinī // 18.5.108	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
so 'pi mūrkho 'bhyanandattajjīva jīvetyudīrayan / adṛśyā ca jahāsāsya śrutvā śakunadevatā // 18.5.109	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
saṃprāpya śvāśuraṃ sthānaṃ tasya ca pravivikṣataḥ / vāmaḥ kapiñjalo vāmā śivābhūtkathitāśivā // 18.5.110	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhūyo 'pi cābhyanandatsa jīvajīvetyudīrya tat / acintayac ca śakunādhiṣṭhātrī devatāpi sā // 18.5.111	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
aho mūrkho 'yamaśubhaṃ śubhamityabhinandati / tatkāryaṃ jīvayati yad rakṣyo jīvo 'sya tan mayā // 18.5.112	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
ityasyāṃ cintayantyāṃ ca devatāyāṃ viveśa saḥ / dattapraharṣaḥ śvaśurasyāgniśarmā niveśanam // 18.5.113	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
āgato 'si kimekākīty ukto 'tra śvaśurādibhiḥ / āyāto 'smi gṛhe 'nuktvā sarveṣāmiti so 'bravīt // 18.5.114	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ kṛtocitasnānabhojanasya niśāgame / śayyāgṛhe 'ntikaṃ bhāryā tasyopāgātprasādhitā // 18.5.115	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
pathiśramāc ca suptasya tasya nirgatya sā bahiḥ / caurasyopapateḥ śūlaviddhasyāpyantikaṃ yayau // 18.5.116	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
āliṅgantī ca taddehaṃ daśanaiśchinnanāsikā / bhūtena tatpraviṣṭena palāyata tato bhayāt // 18.5.117	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatvā ca patyuḥ suptasya tasya nyasyāsidhenukām / pārśve vikoṣāmākrandad evaṃ śrāvitabāndhavā // 18.5.118	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
hā hā mṛtā mṛtāsmyeṣā niṣkāraṇamanena me / kim apy utthāya yadbhartrā kṛtaṃ nāsānikartanam // 18.5.119	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā svajanastasyā etya tāṃ chinnanāsikām / dṛṣṭvā tamagniśarmāṇaṃ laguḍādyair atāḍayat // 18.5.120	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prātaś ca vijñapya nṛpaṃ tadādeśādbadhāya tam / nirdoṣabhāryādrohīti vadhakebhyaḥ samarpayat // 18.5.121	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
nīte vadhyabhuvaṃ tasminsā tacchakunadevatā / tadbharyānaiśavṛttāntadarśinī samacintayat // 18.5.122	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
animittaphalaṃ tāvat prāptametena yattvayam / uktavāñjīva jīveti tena rakṣyāmyamuṃ vadhāt // 18.5.123	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityālocyāntarikṣātsā nigūḍhā devatābhyadhāt / nirdoṣa eṣa vadhakā na vadhyo vipraputrakaḥ // 18.5.124	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
śūlasthacauradantāntargatvā paśyata nāsikām / ity uktvā tadvadhūrātrivṛttāntaṃ taṃ jagāda sā // 18.5.125	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatas tatpratyayātkṣattṛmukhena vadhakair nṛpaḥ / vijñapto vīkṣya nāsāṃ tāṃ cauradantāntarasthitām // 18.5.126	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vadhāttamagniśarmāṇaṃ nirmocya vyasṛjadgṛham / kustrīṃ tāṃ ca nijagrāha tadvadhūṃścāpy adaṇḍayat // 18.5.127	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃvidhāḥ striyo rājannity ukte tena mantriṇā / sa rājā vikramādityastat tathetyanvamodata // 18.5.128	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'bravīn mūladevo dhūrto rājāntikasthitaḥ / deva sādhvyo na santyeva kimasādhvīṣu kāsucit // 18.5.129	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ra-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
kiṃ na cūtalatāḥ santi satīṣu viṣavalliṣu / tathāca śrūyatāmetadanubhūtaṃ mayaiva yat // 18.5.130	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ahaṃ pāṭaliputraṃ prāgagacchaṃ śaśinā saha / matvā nāgarikakṣetraṃ tadvaidagdhyadidṛkṣayā // 18.5.131	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra bāhye sarasyekāṃ dṛṣṭvā strīṃ vastradhāvinīm / iha kvāvāsyate pānthair ityahaṃ paripṛṣṭavān // 18.5.132	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
iha tīreṣu cakrāhvair matsyair vāriṇi ṣaṭpadaiḥ / abjeṣv āvāsyate nātra pānthāvāso mayekṣitaḥ // 18.5.133	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etattayāhaṃ vakroktyā praty ukto vṛddhayoṣitā / vilakṣaḥ śaśinā sākaṃ prāviśaṃ nagarāntaram // 18.5.134	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatraikam uṣṇe pātrasthe paramānne puraḥ sthite / bālaṃ dṛṣṭvā gṛhadvāri rudantamavadacchaśī // 18.5.135	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
aho abuddhir bālo 'yaṃ yo 'gradattaṃ na khādati / paramānnaṃ vṛthātmānaṃ kliśnāti ruditaiḥ punaḥ // 18.5.136	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā so 'bravīdbālaḥ pramṛjya nayane hasan / mūrkhā yūyaṃ na jānītha rodane ye guṇā mama // 18.5.137	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
paramānnaṃ śanair eti svādutāṃ śītalībhavat / ghaṭate 'bhyadhikaṃ canyacchleṣmā gacchati ca kṣayam // 18.5.138	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ete guṇā me rudato nāhaṃ maurkhyeṇa rodimi / yūyaṃ grāmyāḥ punarmūrkhā nābhiprāyaṃ vidanti yat // 18.5.139	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity ukte tena bālena svāvaidagdhyavilajjitau / śaśī cāhaṃ ca sāścaryāvapasṛtyānyato gatau // 18.5.140	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāpyāmrataruskandhagatāsmāmrāvacāyinīm / varakanyām apaśyāva mūlasthitiparicchadām // 18.5.141	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
prayacchāsmabhyam apy āmraphalāni katicicchubhe / iti cāsmābhir uktā sā kanyakaivam abhāṣata // 18.5.142	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśnīyāmraphalāny uṣṇāny uta kiṃ śiśirāṇi vā / tac chrutvāścaryajijñāsus tāṃ kanyām aham abravam // 18.5.143	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
aśnīma tāvaduṣṇāni tato 'nyāny api sundari / śrutvaitadakṣipadbhūmau pāṃsuṣvāmraphalāni sā // 18.5.144	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
bhuktāni nirajīkṛtya tānyasmābhir mukhānilaiḥ / tataḥ saparivārā sā kanyā prahasitābravīt // 18.5.145	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etāni pūrvam uṣṇāni dattāny āmraphalāni vaḥ / tathā ca dattvā phūtkārān bhavanto yāny abhakṣayan // 18.5.146	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
gṛhṇīta śītalānyetānyaphūtkārāṇi vāsasi / evam uktvāñcaleṣv anyānyakṣipatsā phalāni naḥ // 18.5.147	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tānyādāya tataḥ sthānādvayaṃ yātā vilakṣitāḥ / tataḥ sahacarān anyāñ śaśinaṃ cāham abravam // 18.5.148	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
avaśyaṃ pariṇeyaiṣā vidagdhā kanyakā mayā / avahāsapratīkāraḥ kāryaḥ kā dhūrtatānyathā // 18.5.149	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
evaṃ mayoktair anviṣṭaṃ taitasyāḥ sadanaṃ pituḥ / vayaṃ veṣāntarālakṣmyā agacchāmāpare 'hani // 18.5.150	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatrāsmān paṭhato vedaṃ yajñasvāmīty upetya saḥ / tatkanyājanako 'pṛcchat kuto yūyam iti dvijaḥ // 18.5.151	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
vayaṃ māyāpurīsthānādvidyāhetorihāgatāḥ / ity uktaḥ sa tato 'smābhir āḍhyo 'vocaddvijottamaḥ // 18.5.152	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tarhīhaiva caturmāsīmetāṃ vasata madgṛhe / kurutānugrahaṃ yūyaṃ dūradeśāgatā yataḥ // 18.5.153	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
śrutvety avocāma vayaṃ brahman kūrmo bhavadvacaḥ / caturmāsāvasāne ced arthitaṃ naḥ pradāsyasi // 18.5.154	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
evamasmābhir uktaḥ sa yajñasvāmī dvijo 'bhyadhāt / śakyaṃ yadarthaṃ mṛgyadhve taddāsyāmyeva niścitam // 18.5.155	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
iti pratiśrute tena tadgṛhe vayamāsmahi / athoktaḥ sa dvijo 'smābhiḥ pūrṇe māsacatuṣṭaye // 18.5.156	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
yāmo vayaṃ tat pūrvoktaṃ dehi yatprārthayāmahe / kiṃ tadity uktavantaṃ taṃ māṃ pradarśyābravīcchaśī // 18.5.157	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
asmanmukhyāya kanyāsmai bhavatā dīyatāmiti / tataḥ sa vipro vāgbaddho yajñasvāmī vyacintayast // 18.5.158	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
chalito 'smyebhir astvetatko doṣo guṇavānayam / ityālocya sa me vipro yathāvattāmadātsutām // 18.5.159	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
naktam cāhaṃ hasan vāsagṛhe tām avadaṃ vadhūm / kaccit smarasi tāny āmrāṇy uṣṇāni śiśirāṇi ca // 18.5.160	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tac chrutvā pratyabhijñāya sā māṃ sasmitam abhyadhāt / evam eva viḍambyante grāmyā nāgarikair iti // 18.5.161	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tato 'ham apy avocaṃ tām āssva nāgarike sukham / grāmyo yāsyāmy ahaṃ dūraṃ tvāṃ vihāya pratijñayā // 18.5.162	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
etac chrutvākarot sāpi pratijñāṃ niścitaṃ mayā / vaṣṭabhyānāyitavyas tvaṃ tvatto jātena sūnunā // 18.5.163	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ityanyonyaṃ pratijñāte sā śete sma parāṅmukhī / svāṅgulīyamahaṃ cāsyāḥ suptāyā aṅgulau nyadhām // 18.5.164	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
nirgatya ca militvā tair ahaṃ sahacarais tataḥ / tasyā didṛkṣur vaidagdhyam āgām ujjayinīṃ nijām // 18.5.165	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: ma-vipulā)
sāpi viprasutā prātarapaśyantī prabudhya mām / aṅgulīyaṃ ca paśyantī mannāvāṅkamacintayat // 18.5.166	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
gatastāvat sa māṃ tyaktvā pratijñā tena pālitā / mayāpi svapratijñātaṃ pālyaṃ tyaktānutāpayā // 18.5.167	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
mūladeveti nāmāsmindṛśyate cāṅgulīyake / taddhruvaṃ mūladevo yaḥ khyāto dhūrtaḥ sa eva saḥ // 18.5.168	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)

iti saṃkalpya pitaraṃ saivaṃ kṛtamṛṣābravīt / gatastāta parityajya bhartā māṃ sahasaiva saḥ // 18.5.170	anuṣṭubh (1,2: na-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
tadviyuktā kathaṃ cāhaṃ tiṣṭhāmīha yathāsukham / tad yāmi tīrthayātrāyai kliśnāmyetāṃ hatāṃ tanum // 18.5.171	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktvā tamanicchantam apy anujñāpya yatnataḥ / pitaraṃ sā tataḥ prāyātsadhanā saparicchadā // 18.5.172	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
krameṇa gatvā kṛtvā sā mahārghaṃ gaṇikocitam / veṣaṃ viveśojjayinīṃ purīṃ lokaikasundarī // 18.5.173	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
kṛtvā ca parivāreṇa saha kartavyasaṃvidam / sumaṅgaleti sākārṣīnnāma viprasutātmanaḥ // 18.5.174	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
kāmarūpān mahātyāgabhogyā nāmnā sumaṅgalā / āgatā gaṇikaiṣeti bhṛtyair ākhyāpyatātra sā // 18.5.175	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
devadattābhidhānātha tatratyā gaṇikottamā / dadāvabhyetya tasyai svaṃ rājārhaṃ mandiraṃ pṛthak // 18.5.176	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra sthitāṃ bhṛtyamukhenādau mittraṃ sa me śaśī / tām abravītkhyātihṛto bhāṭirme gṛhyatāmiti // 18.5.177	anuṣṭubh (1,2: bha-vipulā, 3,4: bha-vipulā)
asmadvaco 'nutiṣṭhedyaḥ praviśetso 'tra kāmukaḥ / na bhāṭyā kāryamasmākaṃ nānyaiḥ paśunibhair nṛbhiḥ // 18.5.178	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
ity uktastanmukhenaiva sa sumaṅgalayā tayā / tathety uktvā śaśī rātrimukhe tanmandiraṃ yayau // 18.5.179	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tatra sa prathamaṃ dvāraṃ saṃprāpyāveditātmakaḥ / dvārapālena jagade kurvasmatsvāminīvacaḥ // 18.5.180	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: na-vipulā)
snāto 'pīha punaḥ snāhi praveśo nāsti te 'nyathā / tac chrutvā sa śaśī snānaṃ tathetyaṅgīcakāra tat // 18.5.181	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tataḥ sa yāvad dāsībhir abhyaṅgodvartanottaram / visrabdhaṃ snapitastāvat prathamaḥ praharo gataḥ // 18.5.182	anuṣṭubh (1,2: ma-vipulā, 3,4: pathyā)
snātvā prapto 'tha sa dvāraṃ dvitīyaṃ dvārarakṣiṇā / ūce snāto 'si tattāvat prasādhanavidhiṃ kuru // 18.5.183	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tathety uktavatas tasya dāsyastāvat prasādhanam / cakruryāvaddvitīyo 'pi praharaḥ paryahīyata // 18.5.184	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
tṛtīyamatha saṃprāptaḥ kakṣyādvāraṃ sa rakṣibhiḥ / jagade bhuṅkṣva tāvattvaṃ praviśābhyantaraṃ tataḥ // 18.5.185	anuṣṭubh (1,2: pathyā, 3,4: pathyā)
